बर्फ formations in the titlis glacier cave
a हिमानी गुफा is a cave formed within the ice of a हिमानी.
हिमानी गुफाएं are often पुकारा बर्फ गुफाएं, लकिन इस term is properly प्रयुक्त to describe bedrock caves that contain year-round बर्फ.
In physics, circular गति is a गति of an object साथ the परिधि of a वृत्त or रोटेशन along a circular path.
it can be uniform, with निरंतर कोणीय rate of रोटेशन ( and constant speed ), or non-uniform साथ a changing रेट of रोटेशन.
The rotation around a fixed axis of a three-dimensional देह involves गोलाकार गति of its parts.
The equations of motion describe the movement of the center of mass of a देह.
Examples of circular motion शामिल : an artificial उपग्रह orbiting the Earth at निरंतर ऊँचाई, a स्टोन जिससे is tied to a rope and is being swung in वृत्त, a car turning through a curve in a रेस track, an electron चलती perpendicular to a uniform चुम्बकीय field, and a गियर turning inside a यांत्रिकी.
चूंकि the object 's गति वेक्टर is constantly changing दिशा, the चलती object is undergoing acceleration by a अभिकेन्द्रीय force in the direction of the center of rotation.
बगैर इस acceleration, the object होता move in a straight line, according to न्यूटन 's कानून of motion.
Apollo Creed is a fictional अक्षर from the Rocky films, initially portrayed as the Undisputed हेवीवेट चैंपियन of the World.
He was played by कार्ल weathers.
Creed था multiple nicknames, सहित The Master of Disaster, The King of Sting, The Dancing Destroyer, the Prince of पंच, The एक and तभी and The Count of Monte Fisto.
Urban legend राज्य that अपोलो Creed 's नाम is a wordplay on the Apostles ' पंथ, a बयान of belief प्रयुक्त in ईसाई चर्च.
All of Apollo 's championship fights were अनुसूचित for the 15 round अलहदा.
Championship fights किया not बदलें इससे 15 rounds to 12 rounds until 1987.
Rocky Balboa is often wrongly credited with popularizing the red, श्वेत, and ब्लू trunks ; Creed थी the पहला man to पहनें them ( latterly worn by रॉकी बाल्बोआ in the 3rd and 4th किश्तों and finally by टॉमी `` The Machine '' Gunn ( Tommy Morrison ) in the 5th installment ) हालांकि normally he wore red और श्वेत, as seen in Rocky ii.
बाल्बोआ 's हस्ताक्षर colors were black and gold—colors he प्रयुक्त in the latest movie.
In the United States, the title of संघीय न्यायधीश usually means a judge appointed by the President of the United राज्य और confirmed by the United States सीनेट pursuant to the Appointments clause in Article II of the संयुक्त States Constitution.
In addition to the Supreme अदालत of the United States, जिनकी existence and some aspects of whose jurisdiction हैं परे the constitutional power of कॉंग्रेस to alter, acts of कॉंग्रेस have established 13 courts of appeals ( also called `` सर्किट courts '' ) with appellate क्षेत्राधिकार over different regions of the संयुक्त राज्य, और 94 संयुक्त States district courts.
प्रत्येक judge appointed to ऐसे a court may be categorized as a federal न्यायधीश ; ऐसे स्थितियाँ include the Chief इंसाफ और Associate Justices of the परम् Court, सर्किट Judges of the न्यायालयों of appeals, and district judges of the संयुक्त States ज़िला न्यायालयों.
सब of these judges described thus far are referred to sometimes as `` Article III न्यायाधीशों '' because they exercise the judicial power vested in the judicial branch of the संघीय government by Article III of the u.S. Constitution.
In जोड, न्यायाधीशों of the अदालत of International Trade exercise न्यायिक शक्ति pursuant to Article iii.
Other judges serving in the federal courts, including magistrate judges and दिवालियापन न्यायाधीशों, हैं also sometimes referred to as `` federal judges '' ; however, वे हैं neither appointed by the अध्यक्ष nor पुष्टि by the Senate, and उनके power derives इससे आलेख I instead.
See Article I and Article iii अधिकरणों.

Variable Universal Life Insurance ( often shortened to VUL ) is a type of जीवन insurance that builds a नकदी value.
in a VUL, the नकदी मान can be invested in a wide variety of separate खाते, similar to mutual निधि, and the चुनाव of which of the उपलब्धियाँ पृथक खाते to उपयोग is entirely up to the अनुबंध owner.
the 'variable ' component in the नाम refers to this ability to invest in separate accounts जिनकी मान vary—they vary because वे हैं invested in stock and/or बंध markets.
The 'universal ' component in the name refers to the flexibility the owner has in making premium payments.
the प्रीमियम can vary इससे nothing in a दिए month up to maximums पारिभाषित by the Internal Revenue Code लिये life insurance.
This लचीलापन is in कंट्रास्ट to whole life बीमे that रै फिक्स्ड प्रीमियम payments that typically can नहीं be missed बगैर lapsing the नीति ( although एक may exercise an Automatic Premium ऋण feature, or surrender dividends to pay a Whole Life premium ).
परिवर्तनीय universal life is a प्रकार of permanent life insurance, because the death लाभ will be paid if the insured मरता कोई time as long as there is sufficient नकदी value to pay the लागत of insurance in the policy.
साथ सबसे if not all VULs, नापसंद whole जीवन, there is no endowment age ( the age at जिससे the cash मान equals the death लाभ amount, which for पूरे life is typically 100 ).
This is yet another key advantage of VUL over Whole जीवन.
साथ a ठेठ पूरे जीवन policy, the मौत benefit is limited to the face राशि निर्दिष्ट in the नीति, और at endowment age, the फेस amount is सब कि is paid out.
Thus साथ either मौत or endowment, the बीमे company keeps कोई cash value निर्मित up over the सालो.
however, कुछ participating whole life policies offer riders which बताएँ कि any dividends paid on the नीति be प्रयुक्त to purchase `` paid up परिवर्धन '' to the नीति जिससे increase दोनो the cash value और the death लाभ over time.
If investments made in the separate accounts out-perform the general account of the insurance कम्पनी, a उच्चतर rate-of-return can occur than the फिक्स्ड rates-of-return ठेठ for पूरे जीवन.
the combination over the years of no endowment आयु, continually increasing death लाभ, और if a high rate-of-return is earned in the पृथक accounts of a vul policy, इस could परिणाम in उच्चतर मान to the owner or beneficiary than that of a पूरे life policy with the same amounts of money सशुल्क in as प्रीमियम.
The बाहरी लकडी boiler is a variant of the क्लासिक wood स्टोव adapted for set-up outdoors जबकि still transferring the ऊष्मा to interior इमारतें.

Girl स्काउट कुकीज़ are cookies बेची by Girl स्काउट of the USA ( GSUSA ) as एक of its major fundraisers for local Scout इकाई.
Members of the gsusa have महरूम selling कुकीज़ चूंकि 1917 to उठाएँ funds.

as of 2007, sales were estimated at about 200 million boxes प्रति साल.
University Hall
purdue विश्वविद्यालयों, located in West lafayette, Indiana, is the फ्लैगशिप विश्वविद्यालयों of the six-campus Purdue विश्वविद्यालयों system.
Purdue was संस्थापित on may 6, 1869, as a land-grant विश्वविद्यालयों when the इंडियाना सामान्य Assembly, taking लाभ of the morrill अधिनियम, accepted a donation of जमीन and धन from Lafayette businessman John purdue to establish a college of विज्ञान, प्रौद्योगिकी, and agriculture in उसके नाम.
The first classes were held on सितंबर 16, 1874, with छह instructors and 39 students.
आज, purdue is a member of the Big Ten Conference, and is a खूब ज्ञात world-class शोध संस्था.
Purdue enrolls the दूसरी largest छात्र body of कोई university in Indiana as well as the fourth largest international student जनसांख्यिकी of कोई विश्वविद्यालयों in the United राज्य.
Purdue offers both undergraduate and graduate कार्यक्रम in over 211 major क्षेत्रों of study, and is खूब known for its competitive अभियान्त्रिकी curricula.
the विश्वविद्यालयों रै also been highly influential in अमेरिका 's history of aviation, having established the first college credit offered in उड़ान training, the first four-year bachelor 's उपाधि in aviation, and the पहला university विमानक्षेत्र ( Purdue University Airport ).
Purdue 's aviation प्रौद्योगिकी program remains one of the most competitive aviation-specific programs in the संसार.
in the mid-20th सदी, purdue 's aviation program विस्तारित to encompass उन्नत spaceflight प्रौद्योगिकी giving वृद्धि to purdue 's nickname, Cradle of Astronauts.
twenty-three purdue graduates have gone on to become astronauts, including Gus Grissom ( one of the original Mercury Seven astronauts ), Neil Armstrong ( the first व्यक्ति to चलना on the moon ), and Eugene Cernan ( the most recent व्यक्ति to walk on the चंद्रमा ).
A sebaceous cyst ( ) is a term कि loosely refers to either epidermoid cysts ( भी known as epidermal cysts ; L72.0 ) or पिलर cysts ( also ज्ञात as trichilemmal cysts ; l72.1 ).
Because an epidermoid cyst originates in the epidermis और a पिलर गाँठ originates from hair follicles, by definition, neither type of गाँठ is strictly a वसामय cyst.
the नाम is regarded as a misnomer as the fatty, white, semi-solid सामग्री in both of these गाँठ entities is not sebum, but keratin.
Furthermore, अंतर्गत the सूक्ष्मदर्शी neither entity contains sebaceous glands.
In practice, however, the terms are often used interchangeably.
`` True '' वसामय cysts हैं relatively विरल and हैं ज्ञात as steatocystomas or, if अनेक, as steatocystoma multiplex.
Modern pointe जूते.
The edge of the टो pad, which is inserted between the foot और toe बक्सा for cushioning, can be देखी on the right foot.
A pointe जूता is a प्रकार of जूता worn by ballet नर्तक when performing pointe work.
pointe जूते developed from the desire लिये नर्तक to appear weightless and sylph -like and have evolved to enable dancers to dance en pointe ( on the tips of उनके toes ) लिये विस्तारित periods of time.
They हैं सामान्यतः worn by मादा नर्तक, though male नर्तक may wear them लिये अपरंपरागत roles ऐसे as the ugly stepsisters in Cinderella, नीचे in A midsummer Night 's सपना, or मेन performing as women in dance companies such as लेस Ballets Trockadero and grandiva.
वे हैं manufactured in a variety of रंगों, सबसे commonly in शेड्स of लाइट pink.
इस tablespoon has a क्षमता of परिचय 15 ml.
Measuring Spoons
In the US and भाग of Canada, a tablespoon is the largest type of चमचा used for eating इससे a bowl.
In the UK, Europe and most राष्ट्रमंडल देशों, a tablespoon is a type of large spoon usually प्रयुक्त for सेवारत.
In देशों where a tablespoon is a serving चमचा, the निकटतम equivalent to the US tablespoon is either the dessert spoon or the soup spoon.
A tablespoonful, nominally the क्षमता of one tablespoon, is commonly प्रयुक्त as a measure of आवाज़ in cooking.
It is abbreviated as t, tb, tbs, tbsp, tblsp, or tblspn.
The capacity of ordinary tablespoons is not regulated by law and is विषय to considerable variation.
In the USA one tablespoon ( measurement unit ) is approximately 15 ml ; the capacity of an actual tablespoon ( डाइनिंग utensil ) सीमाएँ इससे 7 mL to 14 mL.
In ऑस्ट्रेलिया one tablespoon ( measurement unit ) is 20 ml.
Harry कुम्हार is a श्रेणी of सात fantasy novels written by the British author J. K. रोलिंग.
the किताबे वृत्तान्त the adventures of a जादूगर, हैरी कुम्हार, और his friends रोनाल्ड वीज़्ली and हर्माइनी ग्रेंजर, सब of जिसको हैं students at हॉग्वार्ट्स School of चुड़ैल और wizardry.
the main story arc चिंताएं Harry 's quest to overcome the अंधेरा wizard Lord voldemort, whose aims are to become अमर, जीतें the wizarding संसार, subjugate non-magical लोगों, and destroy सब those who स्टैंड in उसके रास्ता, विशेषकर Harry कुम्हार.
Since the रिलीज of the पहला novel हैरी Potter and the Philosopher 's स्टोन on 30 June 1997, the books have gained immense popularity, नाजुक acclaim and वाणिज्यिक success worldwide.
The श्रेणी रै also had कुछ share of आलोचना, सहित concern for the increasingly अंधेरा टोन.
, the किताब series has बेची परिचय 450 लाख copies, making it the best-selling किताब series in history, and has महरूम translated into 67 languages.
The last चार books consecutively set रिकॉर्ड as the fastest-selling किताबे in history.
a series of many genres, सहित काल्पनिक and coming of age ( with elements of mystery, थ्रिलर, एडवेंचर, and रोमांस ), it रै many सांस्कृतिक meanings and सन्दर्भ.
According to रोलिंग, the प्रमुख theme is death.
There are भी many other विषयवस्तु in the श्रेणी, such as पूर्वाग्रह and corruption.
The initial प्रमुख publishers of the books were bloomsbury in the संयुक्त किंगडम and scholastic Press in the United States.
the किताबे have चूंकि महरूम published by many प्रकाशक worldwide.
The books, with the सातवाँ किताब विभाजित into two भाग, have been made into an eight-part film series by Warner भाईs. Pictures, the highest-grossing film series of all समय.
the series also originated much tie-in merchandise, making the हैरी Potter ब्रांड worth in excess of $ 15 अरब.
भी due to the success of the किताबे and films, हैरी Potter has been प्रयुक्त for a theme park, The Wizarding World of हैरी Potter in Universal पार्क & Resorts 's आइलैंड्स of एडवेंचर.

Viking 5c प्रक्षेपास्त्र engine
A प्रक्षेपास्त्र engine, or बस `` rocket '', is a jet इंजन कि uses तभी भंडारित propellant द्रव्यमान for forming इसके high speed propulsive जेट.
Rocket इंजन हैं reaction engines and obtain thrust in accordance साथ न्यूटन 's तीसरा विधि.
चूंकि वे need no external material to रूप उनके जेट, rocket इंजन can be used for spacecraft propulsion as well as स्थलीय उपयोग, ऐसे as missiles.
Most प्रक्षेपास्त्र engines हैं आतंरिक combustion engines, although non-combusting forms also exist.
Rocket engines as a समूह have the उच्चतम exhaust velocities, are by दूर the lightest, but are the least propellant efficient of सब types of jet engines.
``... baby एक More समय '' is a song by अमरीकी रिकॉर्डिंग कलाकार Britney स्पीयर्स.
it परोसा as Spears 's debut single and शीर्षक track from her debut स्टुडियो एल्बम,... Baby One अधिक Time ( 1999 ).
लिखा by Max Martin and produced by Martin और रामी, ``... Baby One अधिक Time '' थी released on September 30, 1998, by Jive रिकॉर्ड.
बाद recording and sending a demo टेप with an unused song from Toni braxton, स्पीयर्स signed a multi-album सौदे साथ Jive.
``... baby One अधिक समय '' is a टीन पॉप and dance-pop सोंग that refers to a लड़की जो संताप breaking up साथ उसके बॉयफ्रेंड.
the song received generally favorable reviews इससे आलोचकों, who praised its संयोजन.
``... Baby One अधिक Time '' attained global success, reaching number एक in every देश it charted.
It also प्राप्त numerous certifications around the world, and is एक of the best-selling singles of all time, with over 10 million copies sold.
An accompanying music video, directed by निगेल Dick, portrays Spears as a student from a कैथोलिक ऊँची school, who starts to daydream that वो is गायन और dancing around the school, while watching her love ब्याज from अफ़ार.
The music वीडियो was later referenced in the music video of `` If U Seek एमी `` ( 2008 ), where स्पीयर्स 's fictional daughter is वेश with a similar schoolgirl outfit जबकि wearing गुलाबी ribbons in her बाल.
in 2010, the म्यूज़िक video लिये ``... baby एक अधिक समय '' थी voted the तीसरा सबसे influential video in the history of पॉप म्यूज़िक, in a poll आयोजित by jam !.
स्पीयर्स has performed ``... Baby एक अधिक समय '' in a number of सजीव दिखावे और in all of her concert tours.
it was the encore of the... baby एक अधिक समय Tour ( 1999 ) and Dream Within a Dream Tour ( 2001 ) ; Spears also performed remixed versions of the सोंग during the उफ़ !...
I किया It again संसार Tour ( 2000 ), the Onyx Hotel Tour ( 2004 ), the M+M 's Tour ( 2007 ), The Circus Starring britney Spears ( 2009 ), and the Femme fatale दौरे ( 2011 ).
``... Baby एक More समय '' थी nominated for a Grammy Award लिये बेहतरीन मादा Pop गायन Performance, and has महरूम included in lists by ब्लेंडर, Rolling Stone and VH1.
It रै been विख्यात for redefining the ध्वनि of late 1990s म्यूज़िक.
स्पीयर्स has named ``... Baby One अधिक समय '' as one of her favorite गीतों from her करियर.
it थी also the final सोंग to be played on the BBC 's music programme शीर्ष of the चबूतरे.
Cholera is an infection in the छोटी आंत caused by the bacterium Vibrio cholerae.
The प्रमुख symptoms हैं watery diarrhea and vomiting.
हस्तांतरण occurs primarily by drinking जल or खाने food कि रै been contaminated by the मल ( बर्बाद उत्पाद ) of an संक्रमित व्यक्ति, सहित एक with no apparent लक्षण.
the गंभीरता of the diarrhea and उल्टी can सीसे to रैपिड dehydration और electrolyte imbalance, and मौत in some cases.
The प्राथमिक treatment is oral rehydration therapy, typically साथ oral rehydration solution, to replace जल and electrolytes.
if this is not tolerated or करता नहीं provide improvement fast enough, intravenous fluids can also be प्रयुक्त.
जीवाणुरोधी drugs हैं beneficial in those साथ कठोर disease to shorten इसके अवधि और गंभीरता.
Worldwide, it affects 3–5 लाख लोगों and causes 100,000–130,000 मौतों a year.
Cholera थी एक of the earliest infections to be पढ़ाई by epidemiological methods.
the चित्र of Dorian Gray is the only प्रकाशित novel by Oscar Wilde, appearing as the सीसे story in Lippincott 's Monthly Magazine on 20 June 1890, printed as the July 1890 issue of इस magazine.
The magazine 's editors feared the story थी indecent as submitted, so वे censored roughly 500 words, बगैर वाइल्ड 's ज्ञान, पहले publication.
लकिन even with that, the स्टोरी थी स्टिल greeted with outrage by अंग्रेजों reviewers, कुछ of जिसको suggested that Wilde should be prosecuted on moral grounds, अग्रणी Wilde to defend the अनोखा aggressively in letters to the British press.
Wilde later revised the story लिये किताब publication, बनाना substantial alterations, deleting विवादास्पद passages, adding नई chapters and सहित an aphoristic Preface which रै since become प्रसिद्ध in इसके own right.
the amended version was प्रकाशित by वार्ड, Lock and Company in अप्रैल 1891.
Some विद्वानों believe कि Wilde would today have wanted us to read the version he originally submitted to Lippincott 's.
the novel tells of a young man named डोरियन धूसर, the subject of a पेंटिंग by artist Basil Hallward.
बेसिल is impressed by डोरियन 's सौंदर्य and becomes infatuated with him, believing his beauty is responsible लिये a new mode in his art.
Dorian meets रब Henry Wotton, a friend of Basil 's, and becomes enthralled by Lord हेनरी 's world दृश्य.
Espousing a new hedonism, रब हेनरी suggests the only things लायक pursuing in जीवन are beauty and fulfilment of the senses.
realizing कि one day उसके सौंदर्य होगा fade, डोरियन ( whimsically ) expresses a ख्वाहिश to बेचें his soul to ensure the portrait Basil has painted होता age बल्कि than he.
डोरियन 's काश is fulfilled, and when he subsequently pursues a life of debauchery, the portrait serves as a reminder of the प्रभाव प्रत्येक act रै upon his आत्मा, साथ each sin प्रदर्शित as a disfigurement of उसके रूप, or through a sign of वृद्धावस्था.
the Picture of Dorian धूसर is माना a work of क्लासिक गोथिक fiction साथ a strong faustian theme.
sári Gábor ( born 6 February 1917 ), known as ज़ा ज़ा Gabor ( ), is a Hungarian -born American अभिनेत्री who acted in supporting roles in movies, on ब्रॉडवे, और occasionally on television.

and played one of उसके few अग्रणी roles in Moulin रूज ( 1952 ), directed by John हस्टन, जो वर्णित her as a `` creditable '' अभिनेत्री.
besides उसके film और television appearances, she is best known लिये having nine पतियों, including hotel magnate Conrad हिल्टन और actor George Sanders.

ब्रूस Lee ( traditional : 李小龍 ; born ली Jun-fan ; 27 नवम्बर 1940 – 20 July 1973 ) थी a चाइनीज अमरीकी martial artist, actor, martial कला प्रशिक्षक, philosopher, और filmmaker.
The संस्थापक of जीत Kune Do, Lee was the son of Cantonese ओपेरा star Lee Hoi-Chuen.
He is widely माना by टीकाकारों, critics, media and other martial artists to be one of the most influential martial artists of all time, और a पॉप culture icon of the 20th सदी.
he is often credited with helping to बदलें the way Asians यहूद प्रस्तुत in अमरीकी films.
Lee थी born in Chinatown, सैन फ्रांसिस्को on 27 November 1940 to parents from हांग काँग and was raised in Kowloon साथ his family until उसके late किशोर.
He थी introduced to the film industry by his father और appeared in अनेक films as a child actor.
ली moved to the संयुक्त राज्य at the age of 18 to receive his उच्चतर education, and it was during इस time that he began teaching martial arts.
His Hong काँग और हॉलीवुड -उपजd films elevated the traditional Hong काँग martial arts फिल्मी to a new स्तर of popularity and acclaim, sparking a surge of ब्याज in Chinese martial कला in the वेस्ट in the 1970s.
the दिशा and tone of his films changed and बहकावे martial कला और martial arts films in Hong काँग and the बाकी of the world.
he is विख्यात लिये his roles in five feature-length films : Lo Wei 's The Big Boss ( 1971 ) और Fist of Fury ( 1972 ) ; रास्ता of the Dragon ( 1972 ), directed and written by ली ; Warner Brothers ' डालें the ड्रैगन ( 1973 ) and the Game of Death ( 1978 ), both निर्देशित by Robert Clouse.
ली became an iconic फिगर ज्ञात throughout the world, विशेषकर among the Chinese, as he portrayed Chinese nationalism in उसके films.
He initially प्रशिक्षित in wing Chun, लकिन later rejected well-defined martial art शैलियाँ, favouring बजाय the उपयोग of तकनीकों from various स्त्रोत, in the spirit of उसके निजी martial arts philosophy, which he dubbed जीत Kune Do ( The Way of the Intercepting Fist ).
Lee आयोजित डुअल citizenship of Hong Kong and the United States.
he died in कोलून टोंग on 20 July 1973 at age 32.
दीर्घकालिक obstructive pulmonary disease ( COPD ), also known as chronic obstructive lung बीमारी ( COLD ), chronic obstructive airway बीमारी ( coad ), chronic airflow limitation ( CAL ) और दीर्घकालिक obstructive respiratory disease ( cord ), is the occurrence of chronic ब्रोंकाइटिस or emphysema, a pair of commonly co-existing diseases of the lungs in जिससे the airways सीमित over time.
This हद airflow to and from the lungs, causing shortness of breath ( dyspnea ).
In clinical अभ्यास, copd is defined by its characteristically low airflow on lung फलन tests.
In contrast to asthma, इस limitation is poorly reversible and usually gets progressively बदतर over समय.
COPD is caused by noxious अणु or gas, सबसे commonly from tobacco धूम्रपान, which triggers an abnormal inflammatory जवाब in the lung.
the diagnosis of COPD requires lung function परीक्षण.
Important management strategies are smoking cessation, vaccinations, rehabilitation, and ड्रग therapy ( often using inhalers ).
Some मरीजों go on to require long-term oxygen therapy or फेफड़ों transplantation.
Worldwide, COPD ranked as the छठे leading cause of death in 1990.
it is प्रक्षिप्त to become the fourth leading कारण of death विश्वव्यापी by 2030, due to an increase in धूम्रपान rates और जनसांख्यिकी changes in many देशों.
COPD is the तीसरा leading कारण of death in the U.S., and the आर्थिक burden of COPD in the U.S. in 2007 was $ 42.6 अरब in स्वास्थ्य care costs and lost उत्पादकता.
annelies `` ऐनी '' मारी Frank (, ?, ; 12 जून 1929early कूच 1945 ) is one of the most discussed यहूदी victims of the Holocaust.
Her डायरी has महरूम the basis for अनेक plays and films.
Born in the city of Frankfurt am Main in वाइमर जर्मनी, she lived most of उसके life in or निकट Amsterdam, in the Netherlands.
born a German national, Frank lost her नागरिकता in 1941.
She gained international fame posthumously बाद her diary थी published.
It documents her अनुभवों hiding during the German occupation of the Netherlands in World युद्ध ii.
The Frank family moved from Germany to Amsterdam in 1933, the साल the Nazis gained control over जर्मनी.
by the beginning of 1940, they were फंस in एम्सटर्डम by the नाजी occupation of the नीदरलैंड्स.
As persecutions of the Jewish population increased in July 1942, the family गई into hiding in the hidden rooms of Anne 's पिता, Otto Frank 's, दफ्तर building.
After two सालो, the group was betrayed and transported to concentration शिविरों.
ऐनी Frank और उसके sister, Margot, यहूद eventually transferred to the Bergen-Belsen concentration camp, where they died of typhus in कूच 1945.
Otto फ़्रैंक, the only उत्तरजीवी of the family, returned to एम्सटर्डम after the war to find कि ऐनी 's diary had महरूम saved, और his efforts led to its publication in 1947.
It was अनूदित इससे its असली डच और first published in English in 1952 as The डायरी of a यंग Girl.
it has चूंकि महरूम translated into many languages.
The diary, which थी given to Anne on उसके 13th birthday, chronicles उसके life इससे 12 June 1942 until 1 August 1944.

कर्ट Donald Cobain ( February 20, 1967 – अप्रैल 5, 1994 ) was an अमरीकी संगीतकार and कलाकार, बेहतरीन ज्ञात as the lead singer, guitarist and primary songwriter of the grunge band Nirvana.
कोबेन formed Nirvana साथ Krist Novoselic in Aberdeen, Washington in 1985 and स्थापित it as part of the Seattle music scene, having its debut एल्बम ब्लीच released on the independent record लेबल Sub पॉप in 1989.
After signing with प्रमुख लेबल dgc रिकॉर्ड, the band found breakthrough कामयाबी with `` खुश्बू जैसे Teen Spirit `` from its दूसरी album Nevermind ( 1991 ).
Following the success of nevermind, Nirvana was labeled `` the flagship band '' of पीढी x, and Cobain hailed as `` the प्रवक्ता of a generation ''.
Cobain, however, was प्रायः असहज और frustrated, believing his message and कलाकारी vision to have been misinterpreted by the पब्लिक, with his निजी मुद्दे often विषय to मीडिया attention.
He challenged Nirvana 's audience साथ its फाइनल studio एल्बम in Utero ( 1993 ).
दौरान the पिछला सालो of उसके life, Cobain struggled साथ heroin व्यसन, बीमारी and depression.
He also had परेशानी coping with his कीर्ति और public image, and the professional और lifelong personal pressures surrounding खुद and his wife, संगीतकार Courtney प्रेम.
On April 8, 1994, Cobain was मिला dead at his home in Seattle, the victim of what थी officially शासित a suicide by a self-inflicted shotgun घाव to the head.
The हालातों of उसके मौत at आयु 27 have become a topic of public fascination और debate.
Since their डेब्यू, Nirvana, with Cobain as a songwriter, has sold over 25 लाख albums in the U.S., and over 50 million विश्वव्यापी.

रेडियल engine of a बाईप्लेन
निपुण rod ( कतरा ), स्लेव and balances इससे a two-row, fourteen-cylinder Pratt & Whitney Twin बर्र
The radial engine is a reciprocating प्रकार internal दहन इंजन विन्यास in जिससे the सिलेंडर point outward इससे a सेंट्रल crankshaft like the तीलियां of a wheel.
it resembles a stylized स्टार when viewed इससे the सामने, और is called a `` star engine '' ( जर्मनी Sternmotor ) in some languages.
The radial विन्यास was very commonly used in वायुयान engines before turbine engines became predominant.
The सुनहरी Girls is an American sitcom, निर्मित by सुसान Harris, that originally aired on एनबीसी from सितंबर 13, 1985, to May 9, 1992.
अभिनीत bea Arthur, Betty White, Rue McClanahan and estelle Getty, the show centers on four older women sharing a home in Miami, फ्लोरिडा.
it थी उत्पादित by witt/thomas/harris Productions, in संघ साथ touchstone Television, और Paul Junger Witt, टोनी थामस, and Harris served as the original executive निर्माता.
The सुनहरी Girls received critical acclaim throughout सबसे of its run and won several पुरस्कार, including the Primetime Emmy Award for Outstanding Comedy श्रेणी twice.
It भी won three Golden Globe पुरस्कार लिये बेहतरीन Television श्रेणी – Musical or कॉमेडी.
All चार सितारों each received an Emmy Award throughout the श्रेणी ' run and had multiple nominations.

Deepwater खुदाई is the process of oil और gas खोजी and production in गहराइयों of more than 500 feet.
by this definition, there are लगभग 600 deepwater wells in the गल्फ of मैक्सिको.
It has महरूम economically infeasible for many years, but with rising आयल कीमतें, more companies हैं investing in this क्षेत्रफल.
प्रमुख कंपनियाँ working in इस सेक्टर शामिल Diamond Offshore, transocean, and बेकर Hughes.
There are basically two kinds of mobile deepwater drilling rigs : semi-submersible drilling rigs and drillships.
खुदाई can also be performed इससे a fixed-position installation such as a floating spar ( platform ) or tension-leg मंच.
हाल industry analysis रै estimated that the total व्यय in the वैश्विक deepwater infrastructure market होगा reach $ 145bn in 2011.
“Not all आयल is accessible on land or in shallow water.
You can find some oil deposits दफ्न deep under the समंदर floor.”... Using sonic equipment, oil कंपनियाँ determine the drilling sites सबसे likely to produce oil.
Then they use a mobile offshore drilling ईकाई ( MODU ) to dig the आरंभिक खूब.
Some units are converted into production rigs, अर्थ they switch from drilling लिये आयल to capturing oil once it 's मिला.
सबसे of the time, the oil company will replace the मोदू with a अधिक स्थाई oil production rig to capture oil.”... the मोदू 's job is to drill down into the ocean 's मंजिल to find आयल deposits.
The भाग of the drill that extends नीचे the डेक and through the जल is पुकारा the riser.
the riser allows लिये drilling fluids to move between the floor और the rig.
इंजीनियर्स निम्नतर a ड्रिल स्ट्रिंग -- a series of पाइप designed to ड्रिल bas to the आयल जमा -- through the riser.”
“The विस्तार of deepwater खुदाई is happening despite accidents in offshore fields... ”
In 2010 a large explosion occurred killing 11 मजदूर और spilling millions of gallons of oil into the Gulf of Mexico while a bp आयल रिग थी drilling in deep waters.
“... Despite the risks, the deepwater खुदाई ट्रेंड is spreading in the Mediterranean and off the coast of East Africa बाद a स्ट्रिंग of huge discoveries of प्राकृतिक gas.”
“The reason लिये the resumption of such खुदाई, analyst say, is continuing ऊँची demand for energy worldwide.”
America needs the oil so it is लगभग जरुरी to face the ऊँची risks कि आइये साथ deepwater drilling in order लिये Americans to continue to carry on उनके everyday lives.
“The उर्जा Department recently प्रक्षिप्त that गल्फ oil उत्पादन would expand इससे its 2011 स्तर of 1.3 million barrels a दिन, still nearly a क्वार्टर of कुल domestic उत्पादन, to 2 million barrels a day by 2020.”
deepwater drilling affects the पर्यावरण in दोनो negative and धनात्मक ways.
Although Deepwater खुदाई rarely causes oil spills it is स्टिल a hazardous possible outcome.
Oil spills परिणाम in oil sinking to the bottom of the ocean smothering plant life leaving fish without food और shelter to survive.
on the other हाथ deepwater खुदाई प्रभाव the पर्यावरण in a positive ways too.
in time once the deepwater आयल well is नहीं in उपयोग anymore पौधे will grow on and around the खूब बनाना a गुफा or cavern like shelter आदर्श for पशु to thrive in.
deepwater drilling also lets us देखिए the depths of the समंदर floor कि हैं hardly ever seen.
”Cameras on rovers at the नीचे of the कुएं record footage और take फ़ोटो of विरल fish कि हैं in वहीँ natural आवास, giving scientist a look at पशु they rarely seen” ( Chevron निगम ). ''
मोनिका Samille Lewinsky ( born July 23, 1973 ) is an अमरीकी स्त्री with whom संयुक्त States अध्यक्ष विधेयक Clinton admitted to having था an `` improper relationship '' while वो worked at the White हाउस in 1995 and 1996.
The affair and its repercussions ( जिससे शामिल क्लिंटन 's impeachment ) became known as the lewinsky कांड.
फ्रांसिस Albert `` Frank '' Sinatra,, ( दिसम्बर 12, 1915 – May 14, 1998 ) was an अमरीकी singer और फिल्मी actor.
Beginning उसके musical career in the swing era with Harry जेम्स and टॉमी dorsey, Sinatra found unprecedented कामयाबी as a सोलो कलाकार from the early to mid-1940s बाद होने signed to Columbia Records in 1943.
Being the idol of the `` bobby soxers ``, he released his first album, The आवाज़ of Frank सिनात्रा in 1946.
His professional career था stalled by the 1950s, लकिन it थी पुनर्जन्म in 1953 बाद he जीती the अकादमी Award for Best supporting कर्ता for उसके performance in From यहाँ to Eternity.
He हस्ताक्षरित with Capitol रिकॉर्ड in 1953 and released अनेक critically lauded albums ( such as in the Wee Small घंटों, Songs लिये swingin ' Lovers !, आइये मक्खी with Me, Only the Lonely and Nice 'n ' आसान ).
सिनात्रा left Capitol to मिला his अपना record label, reprise रिकॉर्ड in 1961 ( finding success साथ albums such as ring-a-ding-ding !, Sinatra at the Sands and फ्रांसिस अल्बर्ट सिनात्रा & अंतोनियो कार्लोस Jobim ), toured internationally, थी a founding सदस्य of the Rat पैक और fraternized साथ celebrities और statesmen, including John F. कैनेडी.
Sinatra turned 50 in 1965, recorded the retrospective सितंबर of My Years, starred in the एमी -winning television special Frank Sinatra : A man and His Music, और scored hits with `` अजनबी in the रात्रि `` और `` my Way ``.
With बिक्री of his म्यूज़िक dwindling और बाद appearing in अनेक poorly received films, Sinatra retired लिये the first समय in 1971.
Two years बाद, however, he आए आउट of retirement and in 1973 recorded several एल्बम, scoring a शीर्ष 40 hit साथ `` ( Theme From ) New यॉर्क, New York `` in 1980.
Using उसके लास Vegas shows as a घर आधार, he toured दोनो within the संयुक्त States और internationally, until a छोटी time before his death in 1998.
Sinatra also forged a highly कामयाब career as a फिल्मी actor.
After winning बेहतरीन Supporting कर्ता in 1953, he also garnered a nomination लिये Best Actor for The man साथ the Golden भुजा, and critical acclaim लिये his performance in the Manchurian Candidate.
He also starred in such musicals as ऊँची Society, pal जॉय, Guys and Dolls और on the Town.
Sinatra थी honored at the कैनेडी बीच Honors in 1983 and was awarded the Presidential पदक of Freedom by Ronald reagan in 1985 और the Congressional सुनहरा पदक in 1997.
He थी the recipient of ग्यारह Grammy Awards, including the ग्रैमी trustees Award, ग्रैमी Legend Award and the Grammy Lifetime Achievement पुरस्कार.
Sinatra is also one of world’s best-selling कलाकारों of all time, having sold अधिक than 150 लाख copies worldwide.
ठेठ cornhole फलक
Cornhole, भी known as सेम थैला टॉस, corn टॉस, baggo or बैग, is a लॉन game in which players take turns फेंकना corn छेद बैग at a उठाया मंच साथ a hole in the दूर end.
A थैला in the छेद स्कोर 3 points, while one on the मंच स्कोर 1 point.
Play continues until a team or player reaches the score of 21.
the American सुनहरा Eagle is an official gold bullion सिक्का of the संयुक्त राज्य.
Authorized under the सुनहरा Bullion Coin Act of 1985, it was first released by the United States Mint in 1986.
बिक्रम Yoga is a system of योग that Bikram Choudhury synthesized from परंपरागत hatha yoga तकनीकों and popularized शुरूआत in the early 1970s.
सब बिक्रम Yoga classes run for 90 minutes और consist of the same श्रेणी of 26 postures और 2 breathing exercises.
Bikram Yoga is ideally practiced in a रूम heated to 105°f ( ≈ 40.6°C ) with a humidity of 40 %,.

A teaspoon is an मद of cutlery and/or a measuring instrument, as well as a unit of measurement of volume in some countries और कस्टम.
A फर्न is कोई one or more of a group of about 12,000 प्रजाति of पौधे belonging to the botanical group known as pteridophyta.
Unlike mosses, वे have जाइलम and फ्लोएम ( making उन्हें vascular plants ).
They have stems, पत्ते, और roots जैसे अन्य vascular पौधे.
Ferns reproduce via बीजाणुओं and have neither बीज nor पुष्प.
by far the largest group of ferns is the leptosporangiate ferns, लकिन ferns as defined यहाँ ( also called monilophytes ) शामिल horsetails, whisk ferns, marattioid ferns, and ophioglossoid ferns.
the term pteridophyte भी refers to ferns and a few other seedless vascular पौधे ( see classification section नीचे ).
Ferns first appear in the fossil रिकार्ड 360 million years ago in the carboniferous लकिन अनेक of the current परिवारों and प्रजाति did नहीं appear जबतक roughly 145 लाख years पहले in the जल्दी Cretaceous ( after flowering पौधे came to dominate अनेक environments ).
ferns are नहीं of major आर्थिक importance, लकिन some are grown or gathered लिये खाना, as ornamental पौधे, for remediating contaminated soils, and have महरूम the subject of research for their ability to remove some रासायनिक pollutants from the एयर.
Some हैं significant weeds.
They also play a role in mythology, आयुर्विज्ञान, और art.
Flat roofs in इसराईल
Flat roof in लॉस एंजिल्स
A flat roof is a type of covering लिये a building.
in contrast to the more sloped form of roof, a flat roof is आड़ा or nearly horizontal.
The slope of a छत is properly known as इसके पिच : Roofs जिससे are nearly चपटा are known as low-pitch roofs ( as the angle of slope increases, so the pitch is said to बढ़ाएँ ).
Any sheet of material used to कवर a चपटा or low-pitched roof is प्रायः ज्ञात as a membrane और the primary purpose of ये membranes is to waterproof the roof area.
Materials कि cover flat roofs typically allow the water to run बंद from a slight inclination or camber into a gutter system.
Water from some flat roofs such as on garden sheds sometimes बहती freely off the edge of a छत, हालांकि gutter systems are of लाभ in keeping both दीवारें and foundations dry.
Gutters on smaller roofs often lead water सीधे onto the ground, or बेहतर, into a विशेषकर बना soakaway.
ड्रेनेज on larger roofs usually सीसे water into the rainwater drainage system of any built up area.
occasionally flat roofs हालांकि are designed to collect water in a pool, प्रायः लिये aesthetic purposes, or for rainwater buffering.
चपटा roofs exist सब over the संसार और प्रत्येक क्षेत्रफल has इसके own परंपरा or वरीयता लिये materials used.
in warmer climes where rainfall is कम and जमने is unlikely to occur, many flat roofs हैं simply निर्मित of masonry or concrete और this is good at keeping out the heat of the sun and सस्ती and easy to निर्माण where timber is not readily उपलब्धियाँ.
in areas where the roof could become संतृप्त by बरसात and लीक, or where जल soaked into the brickwork could freeze to बर्फ and thus सीसे to 'blowing ' ( breaking up of the mortar/brickwork/concrete by the विस्तार of ice as it forms ) ये roofs are not suitable.
traditionally most flat roofs in the western world मेक उपयोग of tar or अधिक प्रायः तारकोल paper applied over roof decking to keep a building watertight.
The tar or tarpaper is in फेरे covered in gravel to रखना the sun 's heat, uv rays and मौसम off it और helps protect it इससे cracking or blistering और degradation.
Roof अलंकार is usually of plywood, chipboard or OSB फलक ( osb = उन्मुख Strand फलक, भी known as Sterling फलक ) of around 18mm thickness.
The tar कोटिंग is applied in एक or अधिक coats as a hot द्रव, heated in a tar केतली, or as sheets of तारकोल impregnated 'paper ' glued down and sealed together at joints by hot तारकोल - once it has cooled, the gravel is स्प्रेड evenly over it.
A main कारण लिये failure of ये traditional roofs is अनभिज्ञता or कमी of maintenance where people or events cause the gravel to be moved or removed from the tar or tarpaper waterproofing, thus exposing it to मौसम और sun whereupon cracking and blistering occurs over time and eventually water gets in.
Tarpaper is usually a 'paper ' or fibre material soaked or impregnated in tar.
As gravel can not protect tarpaper surfaces where वे rise खड़ा from the छत such as on मुंडेर walls or upstands, tarpaper variants are उत्पादित with fine बजरी applied to the hot तारकोल during the प्रक्रम of manufacture such that a स्थाई layer of gravel is stuck to it in अनुक्रम to दे it ongoing protection.
Tarpapers vary in विशेषता as करता the workmanship and training of those applying it to produce अधिक or कम successful परिणाम.
In कुछ सूक्ष्म climates or shaded areas these बल्कि 'basic ' tarpaper roofs can पिछला well in relation to the लागत of materials खरीदें और cost of laying उन्हें, however the लागत of modern membranes such as EPDM रै come bas over हाल years to make उन्हें अधिक and more affordable.
There हैं now अधिक firms supplying आधुनिक alternatives and there is generally a growing जागरूकता of उनके प्रदर्शन और उपलब्धता.
If a leak करता occur on a flat roof तब damage often goes unnoticed for long अवधि of time during which water penetrates और soaks the decking and any insulation and/or structure beneath it.
इस can lead to expensive damage from the rot which प्रायः develops और if left can weaken the roof structure.
There are also विभिन्न health risks to people और animals breathing the mould बीजाणुओं : the severity of this स्वास्थ्य रिस्क remains a debated point.
एक problem साथ maintaining flat roofs is that if water करता घुस the barrier covering ( be it traditional or a modern membrane ) it can सफर a long way before causing visible क्षति or leaking into a भवन जहाँ it can be seen.
यूँ it is नहीं आसान to see where it is leaking in अनुक्रम to repair it.
Once underlying roof decking is soaked it often sags causing a further collection or puddling of water in कि area and the problem worsens.
A cd-rom ( ) is a pre-pressed compact डिस्क जिससे contains आंकड़ा.
the नाम is an acronym जिससे stands लिये `` कॉम्पैक्ट डिस्क Read-only memory ``.
Computers can read CD-ROMs, but can नहीं लिखें on उन्हें.
cd-roms are popularly प्रयुक्त to distribute computer तन्त्र, including वीडियो खेल and मल्टीमीडिया applications, हालांकि any data can be stored ( up to the capacity limit of a disc ).
Some cds, पुकारा enhanced CDs, hold both कंप्यूटर data and audio with the latter capable of being निभाई on a CD player, while आंकड़ा ( such as software or डिजिटल वीडियो ) is only usable on a कंप्यूटर ( such as आईएसओ 9660 format pc cd-roms ).
The पीला Book is the technical standard कि defines the format of CD-ROMs.
एक of a नियत of color-bound books that contain the technical specifications for सब CD स्वरुप, the Yellow किताब, created by Sony और फिलिप्स, was the first extension of Compact Disc Digital Audio.
it adapted the स्वरूप to थाम any form of data.
Joanne `` Jo '' Rowling ( ), ( born 31 जुलाई 1965 ), pen name J. K. रोलिंग, is a British उपन्यासकार, best ज्ञात as the author of the Harry Potter fantasy श्रेणी.
the कुम्हार किताबे have gained worldwide attention, won multiple पुरस्कार, and sold more than 400 million copies.
They have become the best-selling book श्रेणी in history, और महरूम the basis for a श्रेणी of films जिससे has become the highest-grossing फिल्मी series in इतिहास.
रोलिंग had overall approval on the scripts as खूब as maintaining रचनात्मक control by serving as a producer on the final किस्त.
born in Yate, Gloucestershire, रोलिंग was working as a researcher and दुभाषिया secretary for माफ़ी अंतरराष्ट्रीय जब वो conceived the idea लिये the Harry कुम्हार श्रेणी on a delayed train from Manchester to London in 1990.
The seven-year काल that followed entailed the death of her mother, तलाक from her पहला husband and poverty until Rowling समाप्त the first novel in the series, Harry Potter and the पारस 's Stone ( 1997 ).
रोलिंग subsequently published 6 sequels—the last, Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows ( 2007 ) —as खूब as 3 supplements to the series.
in 2012, रोलिंग parted साथ her agency और resumed writing in the रूप of a tragicomedy novel aimed at adult readership, entitled the कैज़ुअल Vacancy.
रोलिंग रै said she is फिलहाल working on दो books—one aimed लिये adults, the अन्य for children younger than the Harry कुम्हार दर्शक, and she expects the latter to be published first.
Rowling रै led a `` rags to riches `` जीवन story, in which she progressed इससे जीना on राज्य लाभ to multi-millionaire status within पाँच सालो.
She is the संयुक्त Kingdom 's best-selling लेखक since रिकॉर्ड began, with sales in excess of £238m.
The 2008 संडे टाइम्स समृद्ध सूची estimated Rowling 's सौभाग्य at £560 लाख ( $ 798 लाख ), ranking her as the बारहवीं richest स्त्री in the United किंगडम.
Forbes ranked Rowling as the forty-eighth most powerful हस्ती of 2007, and TIME magazine named her as a runner-up for इसके 2007 व्यक्ति of the साल, noting the सोशल, moral, और political inspiration she has given उसके fans.
In October 2010, Rowling थी नामित the `` Most influential स्त्री in Britain '' by अग्रणी पत्रिका सम्पादक.
She has become a notable philanthropist, supporting such charities as Comic Relief, One Parent परिवारों, Multiple काठिन्य Society of Great Britain और Lumos ( formerly the Children 's ऊँची Level समूह ).
Auburndale is a नगर in Polk काउंटी, Florida, United राज्य.
the population was 11,032 at the 2000 census.
according to the U.S जनसांख्यिकी estimates of 2005, the नगर had a जनसांख्यिकी of 12,381.
It is part of the Lakeland – Winter हेवन Metropolitan सांख्यिकीय Area.
Hurricane इसाबेल ( 2003 ) as seen from orbit during Expedition 7 of the International Space Station.
The eye, eyewall, और surrounding rainbands, characteristics of tropical cyclones, are clearly visible in इस दृश्य from space.
A tropical cyclone is a तूफ़ान system characterized by a low-pressure center surrounded by a सर्पिल arrangement of thunderstorms that उपज strong हवाएँ और भारी rain.
Tropical cyclones strengthen when water evaporated from the समंदर is released as the saturated एयर rises, resulting in condensation of जल vapor contained in the moist air.
They हैं fueled by a अलग heat mechanism than other cyclonic windstorms such as nor'easters, European windstorms, and ध्रुवीय चढ़ाव.
the characteristic that separates tropical cyclones from अन्य cyclonic systems is कि at any height in the atmosphere, the बीच of a तीव्र cyclone will be warmer than its surroundings ; a घटना called `` गरम core `` तूफ़ान systems.
The term `` तीव्र '' refers दोनो to the भौगोलिक origin of these प्रणालियों, which usually form in तीव्र regions of the ग्लोब, and to their formation in maritime तीव्र air masses.
The term `` चक्रवात '' refers to such storms ' cyclonic nature, साथ counterclockwise wind flow in the उत्तरी गोलार्ध and clockwise wind प्रवाह in the Southern Hemisphere.
the opposite direction of the wind प्रवाह is a परिणाम of the Coriolis force.
Depending on its स्थान and strength, a तीव्र चक्रवात is referred to by names such as hurricane (, ), typhoon ( ), tropical storm, cyclonic storm, तीव्र अवसाद, और simply cyclone.
जबकि tropical cyclones can उपज extremely powerful हवाएँ और torrential rain, वे are also समर्थ to produce ऊँची waves, damaging storm surge, and tornadoes.
वे develop over large लाशें of warm water, and खोना their strength if they move over land due to increased surface घर्षण और loss of the गरम ocean as an energy source.
इस is why coastal regions can receive significant क्षति from a tropical cyclone, जबकि inland regions are अपेक्षाकृत सुरक्षित from receiving strong हवाएँ.
भारी rains, however, can उपज significant flooding inland, and तूफ़ान surges can produce extensive तटीय flooding up to from the coastline.
Although their प्रभाव on human populations can be devastating, तीव्र cyclones can relieve सूखा conditions.
They also carry heat energy away इससे the ऊष्णकटिबन्ध and हस्तांतरण it toward शीतोष्ण latitudes, जिससे makes उन्हें an महत्वपूर्ण भाग of the global atmospheric circulation यांत्रिकी.
as a परिणाम, तीव्र cyclones सहायता to maintain संतुलन in the Earth 's क्षोभमण्डल, और to maintain a relatively stable और warm temperature worldwide.
Many tropical cyclones develop जब the वायुमंडलीय शर्तें around a weak disturbance in the माहौल are favorable.
the background पर्यावरण is modulated by climatological चक्र और patterns such as the madden-julian दोलन, El niño-southern Oscillation, and the अटलांटिक multidecadal oscillation.
अन्य रूप when other types of cyclones acquire तीव्र characteristics.
तीव्र प्रणालियों are then स्थानांतरित by steering हवाएँ in the troposphere ; if the conditions remain favorable, the tropical disturbance intensifies, and can भी develop an eye.
On the other समाप्त of the spectrum, if the शर्तें around the system deteriorate or the tropical cyclone makes landfall, the प्रणाली weakens and आखिरकार dissipates.
It is not संभावित to artificially induce the dissipation of these प्रणालियों with वर्तमान प्रौद्योगिकी.
किर्क Douglas ( born Issur Danielovitch, ; December 9, 1916 ) is an American stage and film कर्ता, फिल्मी producer और author.
His popular films include Out of the Past ( 1947 ), Champion ( 1949 ), इक्का in the छेद ( 1951 ), The Bad and the Beautiful ( 1952 ), 20,000 Leagues Under the Sea ( 1954 ), Lust लिये Life ( 1956 ), Paths of Glory ( 1957 ), Gunfight at the o.k. Corral ( 1957 ), the वाइकिंग्स ( 1958 ), स्पार्टाकस ( 1960 ), निर्जन Are the Brave ( 1962 ), Seven दिनों in May ( 1964 ), The Heroes of Telemark ( 1965 ) और Tough यारों ( 1986 ).
He is No.17 on the American Film Institute 's list of the महानतम male American स्क्रीन महापुरूष of सब time, बनाना him the highest-ranked living person on the सूची.
in 1996, he received the Academy Honorary Award `` for 50 years as a रचनात्मक and moral फ़ोर्स in the motion picture जातियाँ. ''
he is one of the last surviving actors इससे हॉलीवुड 's `` सुनहरी age ''.
Robert क्लार्क `` Bob '' Seger ( born may 6, 1945 ) is an American rock और फेंकें singer-songwriter, guitarist and pianist.
as a locally कामयाब detroit-area कलाकार, he performed and recorded as bob Seger and the Last Heard और Bob Seger System throughout the 1960s.
By the early 1970s, he had dropped the `` System '' from his रिकार्डिंग और जारी to strive for broader कामयाबी with अन्य विभिन्न bands.
in 1973, he put together the चांदी Bullet बैंड, a group of detroit-area musicians, with whom he became most successful on the नेशनल level with the album सजीव Bullet, recorded सजीव with the चांदी गोली बैंड in 1975 at Cobo हॉल in Detroit, Michigan.
In 1976, he achieved a नेशनल breakout साथ the studio एल्बम Night Moves.
On his स्टुडियो albums, he also worked extensively with the Alabama-based Muscle Shoals लय Section, which appeared on several of seger 's best-selling singles and albums.
A roots रॉकर साथ a क्लासिक raspy, चिल्लाना आवाज़, seger wrote and recorded गीतों that dealt with love, women, blue-collar themes और was an exemplar of heartland चट्टान.
Seger रै अंकित many hits, including `` Night Moves, '' `` Turn the पेज, '' `` we 've मिला Tonight, '' `` Against the हवा, '' and Shakedown कि was written लिये बेवर्ली Hills Cop ii and `` Like a Rock, '' and also co-wrote the ईगल्स ' number-one hit `` Heartache Tonight. ''
His iconic recording of `` बूढ़ा समय Rock और फेंकें `` थी named one of the Songs of the सदी in 2001.
With a करियर spanning पाँच decades, Seger continues to perform and रिकार्ड today.
seger थी inducted into the चट्टान and फेंकें हॉल of कीर्ति in 2004 and the Songwriters हॉल of कीर्ति in 2012.
Richard Milhous निक्सन ( January 9, 1913 – April 22, 1994 ) थी the 37th President of the संयुक्त States, serving from 1969 to 1974, जब he became the only president to इस्तीफा the office.
Nixon had previously परोसा as a रिपब्लिकन U.S. representative and senator इससे कैलिफ़ोर्निया and as the 36th Vice President of the United राज्य from 1953 to 1961.
Nixon was born in yorba Linda, California.
he ग्रैजुएट from Whittier College in 1934 और Duke विश्वविद्यालयों School of Law in 1937, returning to कैलिफ़ोर्निया to practice विधि.
he और उसके बीवी, Pat Nixon, moved to वॉशिंगटन to कार्य for the federal government in 1942.
He subsequently served in the United States Navy during संसार War II.
Nixon थी elected in कैलिफ़ोर्निया to the House of Representatives in 1946 और to the Senate in 1950.
His pursuit of the Alger hiss मामला स्थापित his reputation as a अग्रणी anti-communist, और elevated him to नेशनल prominence.
he थी the running mate of Dwight D. आइज़नहावर, the रिपब्लिकन Party presidential nominee in the 1952 चुनाव.
Nixon served लिये eight सालो as वाइस president.
he waged an unsuccessful presidential campaign in 1960, narrowly खोने to John F. Kennedy, and खोया a रेस लिये Governor of कैलिफ़ोर्निया in 1962.
In 1968, he ran again लिये the presidency and was elected.
Although निक्सन initially escalated America 's involvement in the Vietnam War, he subsequently ended u.S. भागीदारी in 1973.
Nixon 's विज़िट to the लोगों 's गणतंत्र of चीन in 1972 opened राजनयिक संबंध between the two nations, और he initiated détente और the anti-ballistic Missile सन्धि with the Soviet संघ the same year.
Domestically, his administration generally embraced नीतियों that transferred शक्ति from Washington to the राज्य.
Among other things, he शुभारम्भ पहलों to लड़ो cancer और illegal drugs, imposed wage और दाम controls, enforced desegregation of some Southern schools, और established the Environmental Protection एजेंसी.
Though he presided over the चंद्र अवतरण beginning with अपोलो 11, he scaled वापस manned space exploration.
He थी re-elected by a भूस्खलन in 1972.
Nixon 's second term saw an अरब आयल embargo, the resignation of his vice president, Spiro agnew, and a continuing series of revelations परिचय the Watergate scandal and अन्य misconduct by members of the प्रशासन.
the scandal escalated, costing निक्सन much of उसके political support, और on अगस्त 9, 1974, he resigned in the face of almost निश्चित impeachment और removal इससे दफ्तर.
After his resignation, he controversially received a pardon issued by his successor, Gerald घाट.
In retirement, निक्सन 's work as an elder statesman, authoring several books and undertaking many विदेशी यात्राएँ, helped to rehabilitate उसके पब्लिक image.
He suffered a debilitating stroke on April 18, 1994, and died four days later at the आयु of 81.

The Dominican Republic annexation सन्धि caused bitter contention between President ग्रान्ट and Sen. Sumner.
Brady 1869 ] ]
Sen. Sumner, opposed to American साम्राज्यवाद in the Caribbean और fearful that annexation would lead to the conquest of the neighboring black republic of हैती, became convinced कि भ्रष्टाचार lay पीछे the सन्धि, and कि मेन close to the president साझा in the भ्रष्टाचार.
as chairman of the सीनेट Foreign Relations कमेटी, Sen. Sumner initially withheld his opinion on the treaty on January 18, 1870.
Sen. Sumner had been leaked सूचना from Assistant Secretary of State, Bancroft डेविस, कि u.s. नवल ships यहूद being used to protect अध्यक्ष Báez.
sen. Sumner 's committee voted against annexation and at Sen. sumner’s suggestion and काफी संभवतः to save the party from an ugly fight or the president from embarrassment, the सीनेट आयोजित इसके बहस of the सन्धि पीछे closed द्वार in executive session.
President ग्रान्ट persisted and sent messages to Congress in एहसान of annexation on कूच 14, 1870, and May 31, 1870.
in closed सत्र, Sen. Sumner spoke आउट against the treaty ; warnng that there would be परेशानी साथ the विदेशी नागरिकों, noting the chronic विद्रोह that took place on the द्वीप, और the रिस्क कि the independence of हैती, recognized by the संयुक्त States in 1862, would be lost.
Sumner stated कि Grant 's use of the U.S. नेवी as a protectorate was a violation of अंतरराष्ट्रीय law and unconstitutional.
आखिरकार, on जून 30, 1870 the treaty was voted on by the Senate and failed to लाभ the required 2/3 बहुमत for treaty ड्योढ़ी.
The following दिन, President Grant, feeling गद्दारी by Sen. sumner, retaliated by ordering the dismissal of Sumner’s बंद friend J. Lothrop motley, दूत to ब्रिटेन.
By पतझड़, Sumner 's निजी hostility to the अध्यक्ष was public knowledge, and he blamed the सचिव of State for failing to have resigned, rather than let Grant have his way.
The two मेन, friends until तब, cooled into bitter दुश्मनों.
in दिसम्बर, 1870, still fearful that ग्रान्ट meant to acquire Santo Domingo somehow, sumner gave a fiercely critical वाक accusing the अध्यक्ष of usurpation and Babcock of unethical conduct.
Already, President ग्रान्ट, supported by उसके Secretary of राज्य हैमिल्टन मछली, had initiated a अभियान to depose sumner from the अध्यक्षता of the Senate विदेशी Relations Committee.
Although sumner stated he थी an `` प्रशासन man '', in addition to having stopped ग्रान्ट 's Dominican Republic treaty attempt, sumner था defeated ग्रान्ट 's full repeal of the Tenure of दफ्तर अधिनियम, blocked Grant 's नामांकन of Alexander Stewart to U.S. सचिव of Treasury, and been a निरंतर harassing force pushing Reconstruction नीतियों faster than Grant था महरूम willing to go.
Grant resented Sumner 's superiority of manner, as well.
बताई once कि Sumner did not believe in the Bible, the अध्यक्ष is supposed to have said that he was नहीं चकित : `` he did n't write it. ''
as the rift between Grant and Sumner increased, sumner’s health began to decline.
जब the 42nd U.S. कॉंग्रेस convened on कूच 4, 1871, Senators संबद्ध with President Grant, known as ‘’New radicals’’ voted to oust Sen. Sumner इससे the सीनेट विदेशी Relations कमेटी chairmanship.
Business ethics ( भी corporate ethics ) is a रूप of applied ethics or professional ethics कि examines ethical सिद्धान्त and moral or नैतिक problems that उठता in a कारोबार पर्यावरण.
it applies to all aspects of कारोबार conduct और is प्रासंगिक to the conduct of individuals and entire organizations.
कारोबार आचार रै दोनो normative and descriptive dimensions.
As a corporate अभ्यास and a career specialization, the field is primarily normative.
लड attempting to understand business behavior employ वर्णनात्मक methods.
the range and मात्रा of business नैतिक मुद्दे reflects the interaction of profit-maximizing behavior साथ non-economic चिंताएं.
Interest in कारोबार ethics accelerated dramatically दौरान the 1980s and 1990s, both within प्रमुख corporations और within academia.
For उदाहरण, today सबसे प्रमुख corporations प्रचार उनके प्रतिबद्धता to non-economic values under headings ऐसे as आचार कोड and social responsibility charters.
आदम Smith कहा, `` लोगों of the same व्यापार seldom meet साथ, even for merriment and diversion, लकिन the conversation ends in a षड्यंत्र against the public, or in some contrivance to उठाएँ कीमतें. ''
Governments उपयोग कानून and regulations to point कारोबार behavior in कया वे perceive to be beneficial दिशानिर्देश.
आचार implicitly regulates areas and विवरण of बर्ताव that झूठ परे governmental कंट्रोल.
The emergence of large corporations साथ limited relationships and sensitivity to the समुदायों in जिससे they operate त्वरित the विकास of औपचारिक ethics regimes.
A burn is a प्रकार of चोट to flesh or skin caused by heat, विद्युत, रसायन, घर्षण, or विकिरण.
Most burns affect तभी the superficial स्किन ( ज्ञात as superficial or पहला degree ) or extend into the deeper skin but do not involve the full मोटाई of the skin ( known as partial मोटाई or second degree ).
rarely all परतों of the skin or deeper tissues, such as muscle or bone can be घायल in जिससे case the burn is either full thickness ( third degree ) or fourth degree.
The treatment required depends on the गंभीरता of the बर्न.
Superficial burns संभवतः प्रबंधित साथ छोटी अधिक than simple pain killers while प्रमुख burns may आवश्यकता prolonged उपचार in specialized बर्न centers.
Cooling with tap जल may सहायता पीड़ा and decrease damage however if exposure is prolonged it may परिणाम in कम body temperature.
Partial thickness burns may require cleaning साथ साबुन और water followed by dressings.
फफोले should typically be left अखंड.
Full मोटाई burns usually require surgical treatments such as skin grafting और extensive burns often require large amount of intravenous fluids.
the most आम complications of burns हैं related to संक्रमण.
जबकि large burns can be fatal, आधुनिक treatments developed in the last 50 सालो have significantly improved the outcomes, especially in children and यंग adults.
globally about 11 million लोगों seek medical उपचार and 300,000 people die from burns.
in the United States, of those admitted to a burn center, approximately 4 % die from their चोटों.
The long पद outcome is primarily related to the size of burn and the आयु of the व्यक्ति effected.
the Atlantic Ocean, not including Arctic and Antarctic regions
This video was लिया by the crew of Expedition 29 on फलक the ISS.
The pass starts from just north-east of the द्वीप of Newfoundland over the उत्तर अटलांटिक Ocean to central Africa, over South सूडान.
The Atlantic Ocean is the second-largest of the संसार 's oceanic विभाजन.
With a कुल क्षेत्रफल of परिचय, it कवर लगभग 20 प्रतिशत of the Earth 's surface and परिचय 29 percent of its जल surface area.
the first part of its name refers to Atlas of यूनानी mythology, बनाना the Atlantic the `` Sea of Atlas ''.
The oldest known जिक्र of `` Atlantic '' is in The histories of Herodotus around 450 bc ( hdt. 1.202.4 ) : अटलांटिस thalassa ( यूनानी : Ἀτλαντὶς θάλασσα ; अंग्रेज़ी : Sea of एटलस ).
the पद Ethiopic Ocean, derived इससे Ethiopia, was लागू to the southern अटलांटिक as late as the mid-19th century.
Before Europeans खोजा अन्य महासागर, the term `` ocean '' itself was synonymous with the waters beyond the जलसन्धि of जिब्राल्टर कि we now know as the अटलांटिक.
The जल्दी Greeks believed this ocean to be a gigantic river encircling the world.
The Atlantic Ocean occupies an elongated, S-shaped basin extending longitudinally between यूरेशिया and Africa to the east, and the americas to the वेस्ट.
As one component of the interconnected global ocean, it is कनेक्ट in the north to the आर्कटिक Ocean ( जिससे is sometimes considered a sea of the Atlantic ), to the Pacific Ocean in the southwest, the भारतीय समंदर in the southeast, and the Southern समंदर in the दक्षिण.
( Other परिभाषाएं describe the अटलांटिक as extending southward to Antarctica. )
The equator subdivides it into the North अटलांटिक Ocean और दक्षिण अटलांटिक Ocean.
Due to उनके long-term persistence, और the need for a unique identifier in issuing forecasts और warnings, तीव्र cyclones and subtropical cyclones हैं given names according to policy ( देखिए तीव्र cyclone naming ).
the following are lists from which these tropical and subtropical cyclone names are निकला.
White light is dispersed by a प्रिज़्म into the रंगों of the optical वर्णक्रम.
The visible spectrum is the portion of the electromagnetic spectrum कि is दृश्य to ( can be detected by ) the human नजर.
Electromagnetic radiation in this दायरा of wavelengths is पुकारा visible लाइट or simply light.
a typical इंसान eye will respond to wavelengths इससे about 390 to 700 nm.
In शर्तें of आवृत्ति, this corresponds to a band in the vicinity of 430–790 THz.
a light-adapted eye generally has its maximum संवेदनशीलता at around 555 nm ( 540 THz ), in the ग्रीन region of the ऑप्टिकल spectrum ( see : दीप्ति function ).
The spectrum does not, however, contain सब the रंगों कि the human आँखें और brain can distinguish.
Unsaturated colors such as pink, or purple variations ऐसे as magenta, हैं अनुपस्थित, for example, क्युकी they can be made only by a mix of multiple wavelengths.
रंगों containing only one wavelength are also called pure रंगों.
दृश्य wavelengths pass through the `` optical window ``, the region of the electromagnetic वर्णक्रम which allows wavelengths to pass largely unattenuated through the Earth 's atmosphere.
An उदाहरण of इस phenomenon is that साफ एयर scatters ब्लू light अधिक than रेड wavelengths, और so the midday sky appears blue.
The ऑप्टिकल खिड़की is भी पुकारा the visible window क्युकी it overlaps the इंसान दृश्य जवाब spectrum.
the निकट इन्फ्रारेड ( nir ) खिड़की झूठ just आउट of the human vision, as well as the Medium Wavelength IR ( MWIR ) खिड़की and the Long wavelength or दूर Infrared ( lwir or FIR ) window though अन्य पशु may अनुभव उन्हें.
Many प्रजाति can see लाइट with frequencies outside the `` दृश्य spectrum, '' which is defined in terms of human vision.
मधुमक्खियों and अनेक अन्य कीट can detect ultraviolet light, जिससे helps them ढूँढें nectar in flowers.
संयंत्र प्रजाति कि निर्भर on insect परागण may owe reproductive success to their रूप in ultraviolet लाइट, rather than how colorful वे appear to humans.
Birds, too, can see into the ultraviolet ( 300–400 nm ), और कुछ have sex-dependent markings on their plumage that are दृश्य only in the ultraviolet range.
Many animals that can see into the पराबैंगनी range, however, can not देखिए red लाइट or any other reddish wavelengths.
मधुमक्खियों ' visible spectrum ends at about 590nm, बस before the नारंगी wavelengths start.
Birds, however, can see कुछ red wavelengths, but not as many as इंसानो.
Zebras ( or ) हैं अनेक species of African equids ( horse family ) संयुक्त by their distinctive black and white धारियाँ.
उनके stripes आइये in different पैटर्न, unique to each individual.
They हैं generally social animals that सजीव in small harems to विशाल herds.
नापसंद their closest relatives, horses and asses, zebras have never been truly domesticated.
वहीँ are तीन species of zebras : the plains जेब्रा, the Grévy 's जेब्रा और the mountain जेब्रा.
the plains zebra और the mountain जेब्रा belong to the subgenus hippotigris, but Grévy 's जेब्रा is the एकमात्र प्रजाति of subgenus Dolichohippus.
The latter resembles an ass, to which it is closely related, while the former two हैं more horse-like.
सब three belong to the genus equus, along with अन्य living equids.
The अद्वितीय stripes of zebras मेक them one of the animals most परिचित to लोगों.
They occur in a variety of habitats, such as grasslands, savannas, वुडलैंड्स, thorny scrublands, kyu, and coastal hills.
However, विभिन्न anthropogenic कारकों have had a कठोर impact on zebra populations, in particular शिकार for skins and habitat विनाश.
Grévy 's जेब्रा and the mountain zebra are endangered.
जबकि plains zebras are much more plentiful, एक subspecies, the quagga, became extinct in the late 19th century – हालांकि there is currently a योजना, called the quagga Project, कि aims to breed zebras that हैं phenotypically समान to the quagga in a प्रक्रम पुकारा प्रजनन वापस.
बैरी श्वेत, born Barry यूजीन कार्टर ( – ), थी an अमरीकी composer and singer-songwriter.
A two-time ग्रैमी पुरस्कार -winner ज्ञात for his distinctive बास आवाज़ and रोमांटिक चित्र, श्वेत 's महानतम success आए in the 1970s as a सोलो सिंगर और साथ the प्रेम असीमित Orchestra, crafting many enduring soul, funk, and disco गीतों ऐसे as his two biggest hits, `` You 're the पहला, the Last, My सबकुछ `` और `` Ca n't Get Enough of Your प्रेम, Babe. ''
साथ with इसहाक़ Hayes, श्वेत is considered by allmusic.com as a pioneer of डिस्को म्यूज़िक in the जल्दी 1970s.
During the कोर्स of उसके करियर in the music कारोबार, श्वेत हासिल 106 gold albums worldwide, 41 of जिससे भी attained platinum औकात.
White had 20 gold and 10 platinum singles, साथ विश्वव्यापी बिक्री in excess of 100 लाख, according to critics ed Hogan and Wade Kergan.
His influences शामिल Rev. James क्लीवलैंड, रे Charles, Aretha फ्रैंकलिन प्लस motown artists the supremes, The चार टॉप and Marvin Gaye.
Angelina Jolie (, born Angelina Jolie वोइट ; June 4, 1975 ) is an American actress, film director, and screenwriter.
वो has प्राप्त an Academy Award, दो स्क्रीन Actors Guild पुरस्कार, और three सुनहरी Globe Awards, and was named Hollywood 's highest-paid अभिनेत्री by Forbes in 2009 और 2011.
Jolie promotes humanitarian causes, and is विख्यात लिये her work साथ refugees as a खास envoy और former Goodwill Ambassador लिये the United राष्ट्र High Commissioner for शरणार्थियों ( unhcr ).
वो has often been cited as the world 's `` most beautiful '' woman, a title for जिससे वो रै received substantial मीडिया ध्यान.
Jolie made her screen debut as a चाइल्ड alongside her पिता Jon Voight in Lookin ' to मिलेंगी Out ( 1982 ), but her film career began in सच्चाई a decade later with the low-budget production Cyborg 2 ( 1993 ).
Her पहला leading भूमिका in a प्रमुख film थी in the cyber-thriller Hackers ( 1995 ).
She starred in the critically acclaimed biographical television films जार्ज Wallace ( 1997 ) और gia ( 1998 ), और जीती an Academy Award for बेहतरीन Supporting Actress for her प्रदर्शन in the drama Girl, बाधित ( 1999 ).
Jolie हासिल wide कीर्ति बाद her portrayal of वीडियो खेल heroine Lara क्रॉफ्ट in Lara Croft : Tomb रेडर ( 2001 ), और established herself among the highest-paid अभिनेत्रियों in हॉलीवुड साथ the sequel the पालना of जीवन ( 2003 ).
She जारी her कार्रवाई स्टार career with Mr. & mrs. Smith ( 2005 ) and Wanted ( 2008 ) —her biggest non-animated commercial successes to date—and received further critical acclaim for her प्रदर्शन in the dramas a mighty दिल ( 2007 ) and changeling ( 2008 ), which अर्जित her a नामांकन लिये an अकादमी पुरस्कार for बेहतरीन Actress.
Jolie made उसके directorial debut with the wartime drama In the जमीन of Blood और Honey ( 2011 ).
Divorced from actors Jonny ली Miller और बिली bob थॉर्नटन, जोली अभी जीवनदान with कर्ता ब्रैड Pitt, in a relationship notable लिये fervent मीडिया attention.
Jolie और Pitt have three biological children and तीन अपनाया children.
a प्राकृतिक मेहराब उत्पादित by the erosion of differentially weathered rock in Jebel Kharaz, Jordan
Erosion is the प्रक्रम by जिससे soil और rock are removed इससे the Earth 's surface by exogenetic processes ऐसे as हवा or water flow, और तब transported and deposited in अन्य locations.
While erosion is a natural process, human activities have increased by 10-40 टाइम्स the रेट at जिससे अपरदन is occurring globally.
excessive अपरदन causes problems such as desertification, decreases in agricultural उत्पादकता due to जमीन degradation, sedimentation of waterways, and ecological collapse due to loss of the nutrient समृद्ध upper मृदा layers.
जल and wind erosion are now the two प्राथमिक causes of land degradation ; संयुक्त, they हैं जिम्मेदार for 84 % of degraded acreage, making excessive erosion एक of the सबसे significant global environmental problems.
औद्योगिक agriculture, deforestation, roads, anthropogenic climate change and urban sprawl are amongst the most significant human activities in लिहाज़ to their effect on stimulating erosion.
However, there are अनेक उपलब्धियाँ alternative land use practices that can curtail or सीमा erosion, ऐसे as terrace -building, no-till agriculture, and revegetation of denuded soils.
जर्सी Shore is an American reality टेलीविज़न श्रेणी which ran on एमटीवी इससे December 3, 2009 to December 20, 2012 in the United राज्य.
the श्रेणी follows the lives of eight housemates spending their गर्मियाँ at the जर्सी Shore in the U.S. राज्य of नई जर्सी.
ऋतु 2 followed the cast escaping the cold northeast शीत to Miami Beach, साथ Season 3 returning to the Jersey Shore.
the चौथी season, filmed in इटली, premiered on August 4, 2011.
the दिखाएँ लौटे लिये a fifth season, at Seaside हाइट्स on January 5, 2012.
The fifth season finale aired on March 15, 2012.
on March 19, 2012, MTV confirmed that the series would return for उनके sixth season.
On अगस्त 30, 2012, MTV announced कि the श्रेणी will end after the sixth ऋतु, which premiered on October 4.
the श्रेणी finale aired on दिसम्बर 20, 2012.
the दिखाएँ debuted amid large amounts of विवाद regarding the use of the words `` Guido / Guidette, '' portrayals of italian-american stereotypes, and scrutiny from locals क्युकी the cast members यहूद नहीं निवासियों of the area.
The श्रेणी garnered रिकार्ड ratings for MTV, making it the संजाल 's सबसे viewed series telecast ever.
the श्रेणी ' डाल have also been credited साथ introducing अद्वितीय lexicon and वाक्यांश into American popular संस्कृति.
the विश्वविद्यालयों of Chicago and the विश्वविद्यालयों of Oklahoma are among the educational institutions that have had वर्ग or सम्मेलनों परिचय the show.
In 2010, the डाल of Jersey Shore was नामित on Barbara Walters ' 10 सबसे fascinating People सूची, and the श्रेणी has since महरूम exported to dozens of countries worldwide.
There हैं अनेक remakes of the दिखाएँ in other countries, साथ two नियत in the संयुक्त किंगडम ; the well known geordie Shore, नियत in Newcastle upon Tyne, England.
The अन्य is The घाटियों, the वेल्श समतुल्य, which is filmed और नियत in कार्डिफ.
The only अन्य official remake of the show is Gandía Shore, नियत in Gandía, स्पेन.
right
संयुक्त States territory is कोई extent of region अंतर्गत the jurisdiction of the federal सरकारी of the United States, including all waters ( around islands or महाद्वीपीय tracts ) and all u.s. Naval बरतन.
The United राज्य has traditionally proclaimed the sovereign अधिकारों लिये exploring, exploiting, conserving, and मैनेजिंग its territory.
This extent of territory is all the क्षेत्रफल belonging to, and under the dominion of, the United States federal government ( which शामिल tracts lying at a अलहदा from the देश ) लिये प्रशासनिक और other purposes.
The United राज्य total territory शामिल a उपसमुच्चय of राजनैतिक divisions.
The u.S. सरकारी is a सरकारी साथ delegated powers under the संयुक्त States संविधान.
`` The शक्तियां not प्रतिनिधित्व to the संयुक्त States by the Constitution, nor निषिद्ध by it to the States, are reserved to the राज्य respectively, or to the लोगों '' by the दसवाँ Amendment.
टर्मिनेटर 3 : वृद्धि of the मशीने ( commonly abbreviated as t3 ) is a 2003 science fiction कार्रवाई फिल्मी directed by जोनाथन Mostow और starring Arnold Schwarzenegger, Nick Stahl, क्लेयर danes and kristanna Loken.
