a cord of wood
The cord is a unit of माप of dry volume used in Canada and the United States to measure firewood and pulpwood.
a cord is the amount of लकडी that, when `` ranked and well stowed '' ( arranged so टुकड़े are aligned, parallel, touching and कॉम्पैक्ट ), occupies a आवाज़ of.
इस corresponds to a खूब stacked woodpile ऊँची, long, and deep ; or any other व्यवस्था of linear माप that yields the same आवाज़.
The name cord probably comes from the use of a cord or string to माप it.
the, is an 8-bit handheld video game device विकसित and manufactured by निन्टेंडो.
It was released in जापानी on, in उत्तर America in, and in Europe on.
it is the first handheld कंसोल in the Game Boy line, and was created by Gunpei yokoi और Nintendo Research & विकास 1 —the same staff who had designed the Game & देखें series as खूब as अनेक popular खेल लिये the Nintendo Entertainment प्रणाली.
Redesigned संस्करण यहूद released in 1996 and 1998, in the रूप of Game Boy Pocket, and Game लड़के Light ( Japan only ), respectively.
the खेल Boy is निन्टेंडो 's second हैंडहेल्ड प्रणाली following the खेल & देखें श्रेणी introduced in, and it combined सुविधाएँ from दोनो the Nintendo entertainment System and Game & Watch.
It was originally bundled with the puzzle game Tetris.
as भाग of the चौथी पीढी of gaming, the Game Boy competed with the sega खेल गियर, atari लिंक्स, और the TurboExpress.
despite these other technologically श्रेष्ठ हैंडहेल्ड consoles, the खेल Boy was a tremendous success.
The Game Boy and its successor, the Game लड़के Color, have दोनो combined sold 118.69 million units विश्वव्यापी.
Upon its release in the संयुक्त States, it sold इसके entire शिपमेंट of एक लाख इकाई within सप्ताह.
The World Trade Center is a complex of इमारतें अंतर्गत निर्माण in Lower Manhattan, नई York City, United States, replacing an पहले complex of सात इमारतें साथ the same नाम on the same साईट.
The असली संसार Trade Center featured landmark जुड़वा मीनारें, which खोली on April 4, 1973 और were destroyed in the सितंबर 11 attacks of 2001, along with 7 World व्यापार बीच.
the अन्य इमारतें in the complex were damaged in the हमले, and उनके ruins were eventually demolished.
The site is being rebuilt साथ पाँच new skyscrapers and a memorial to those मारे in the हमले.
, only एक skyscraper has महरूम समाप्त ; the अन्य चार are expected to be समाप्त पहले 2020.
One संसार व्यापार Center will be the सीसे भवन for the नई जटिल, reaching more than 100 stories at इसके पूर्णता.
It became the tallest भवन in New York City on April 30, 2012, and is अपेक्षित to be समाप्त by 2013.
a छठे tower is प्रतीक्षारत confirmation.
At the time of their पूर्णता, the original 1 World व्यापार बीच ( the North Tower ) and 2 संसार Trade Center ( the South Tower ), ज्ञात collectively as the `` जुड़वा Towers '', were the tallest buildings in the world.
the अन्य buildings included 3 WTC ( the Marriott World Trade Center ), 4 wtc, 5 WTC, 6 WTC, and 7 WTC.
सब of these इमारतें यहूद built between 1975 और 1985.
the लागत for the construction was $ 400 लाख ( $ in dollars ).
the complex was स्तिथ in the दिल of नई York City 's शहर financial ज़िला and contained 13.4 million square फीट ( 1.24 लाख m2 ) of office space.
The World व्यापार Center अनुभवी a आग on, 1975, a bombing on, 1993 and a robbery on, 1998.
In 1998, the Port Authority decided to privatize the World व्यापार Center, पट्टे the buildings to a private company to मैनेज, और awarded the lease to silverstein गुण in.
On the morning of सितंबर 11, 2001, Al-Qaeda -affiliated hijackers flew two Boeing 767 jets into the complex, one into प्रत्येक tower, in a coordinated terrorist आक्रमण.
बाद burning for 56 minutes, the दक्षिण Tower ( 2 ) collapsed, followed a half-hour later by the North Tower ( 1 ), साथ the हमले on the World व्यापार Center resulting in 2,753 मौतों.
Falling debris from the मीनारें, संयुक्त with fires कि the debris initiated in अनेक surrounding buildings, led to the आंशिक or complete पतन of all the other buildings in the जटिल और caused अनर्थकारी damage to ten other large structures in the surrounding क्षेत्रफल.
The process of cleanup और रिकवरी at the World Trade Center site took eight months.
over the following years, plans लिये a rebuilt संसार व्यापार Center took रूप.
The first नई भवन at the साईट was 7 World Trade Center, which opened in.
The निम्नतर Manhattan विकास Corporation ( LMDC ), स्थापित in to oversee the rebuilding process, व्यवस्थित competitions to select a site plan and memorial design.
मेमोरी Foundations, designed by Daniel Libeskind, was selected as the master plan, but this went through substantial changes in design.
The new World व्यापार Center जटिल होगा include एक संसार व्यापार बीच, तीन अन्य high-rise दफ्तर towers, and the National सितंबर 11 Memorial & संग्रहालय.
San जिबरील Mountains
सैन bernardino Mountains, with mt. San Gorgonio in the foreground और बिग Bear Lake in the पृष्ठभूमि.
The Transverse Ranges हैं a group of mountain ranges of southern California, in the प्रशांत coast सीमाएँ physiographic प्रदेश in North America.
The अनुप्रस्थ सीमाएँ begin at the southern end of the California Coast Ranges and झूठ between सांता Barbara and San डिएगो counties.
They derive the name Transverse Ranges due to उनके east-west orientation, बनाना them transverse to the general North-South orientation of सबसे of कैलिफ़ोर्निया 's coastal mountains.
Periodic तालिका with electron shells
an electron shell may be thought of as an orbit followed by electrons around an अणु 's nucleus.
The closest shell to the nucleus is called the `` 1 शेल '' ( भी पुकारा `` K shell '' ), followed by the `` 2 shell '' ( or `` L शेल '' ), then the `` 3 शेल '' ( or `` M शेल '' ), और so on farther और दूर इससे the nucleus.
the शेल अक्षर k, l, M,..., used in the X-ray notation, are alphabetical.
Each shell can contain only a फिक्स्ड number of electrons : The 1st शेल can hold up to two electrons, the 2nd shell can थाम up to आठ electrons, the 3rd शेल can hold up to 18, और 4th शेल can थाम up to 32 and so on.
Since electrons are electrically attracted to the nucleus, an atom 's electrons will generally occupy बाहरी शेल only if the more inner शेल have already been completely filled by अन्य electrons.
However, this is नहीं a सख्त आवश्यकता : Atoms may have two or even तीन incomplete outer shells.
( See madelung नियम for more विवरण. )
लिये an explanation of why electrons exist in these shells see electron विन्यास.
The electrons in the outermost occupied shell ( or शेल ) determine the chemical गुण of the atom ; it is called the valence शेल.
Each shell consists of एक or more subshells, and each subshell consists of one or अधिक परमाणु orbitals.
Vickie lynn Marshall ( née Hogan ; नवम्बर 28, 1967 – फ़रवरी 8, 2007 ), known by her moniker anna Nicole Smith, थी an अमरीकी model, actress, and टेलीविज़न personality.
Smith पहला gained popularity in प्लेबॉय, becoming the 1993 संगिनी of the साल.
She modeled for clothing companies, सहित अंदाज़ा जीन्स and लेन Bryant.
Smith dropped out of high school और was शादीशुदा in 1985.
Her highly publicized second विवाह to oil कारोबार mogul, J. Howard Marshall, 62 years उसके senior, resulted in अटकलें that वो married the octogenarian for his धन, which she अस्वीकृत.
Following मार्शल 's death, Smith began a lengthy विधिक बैटल over a share of उसके एस्टेट.
Her case, Marshall v. Marshall, reached the u.S. परम् Court on a question of संघीय jurisdiction, और again on a question of दिवालियापन court प्राधिकार ( now पुकारा Stern v. Marshall ).
Smith died on February 8, 2007 in a हॉलीवुड, Florida hotel रूम as a result of an overdose of prescription दवाएँ.
भीतर the final six महीने of उसके life, Smith थी the focus of a नवीनीकृत दबायें कवरेज surrounding the मौत of उसके son, Daniel, and the paternity and कस्टडी बैटल over her नवजात daughter, Dannielynn.
The is एक denomination of Japanese yen.
the वर्तमान design थी पहला minted in 1959 using जापानी characters known as the `` new script ``, और यहूद also minted from 1949-1958 using `` old-script '' जापानी characters.
five-yen सिक्के तिथि to 1870 ( when, due to the much higher value of the yen, they यहूद minted in सुनहरा ).
The सामने of the सिक्का depicts a rice plant growing आउट of the water, with `` five yen '' written in kanji ; the वापस is stamped साथ `` Japan '' और the साल of समस्या, भी in kanji, अलग by sprouts of a tree.
the तीन graphic तत्व of the coin represent agriculture and fisheries, the key तत्व of the जापानी first-sector economy.
Around a hole, वहीँ is a gear कि represents industry.
It is the तभी Japanese coin in circulation to lack अरबी numerals on either face.
TLC is an American girl group whose रंगमंडल spanned r & B, hip हॉप, आत्मा, दुर्गंध, और new जोकर swing.
Originally consisting of singer tionne `` T-Boz '' Watkins, rapper Lisa `` Left Eye '' Lopes और सिंगर Rozonda `` Chilli '' Thomas, the group found unprecedented कामयाबी in the 1990s जबकि भी enduring a series of spats with the law, प्रत्येक अन्य, and the समूह 's record label.
Initially, tlc हासिल commercial success following the release of their debut album Ooooooohhh...
On the tlc टिप, which sold 6 लाख copies worldwide.
However, it was their second album, crazysexycool, that catapulted the group to superstar status.
CrazySexyCool went on to be certified डायमंड by the RIAA — a पहला for a मादा group, and eventually sold 23 लाख नक़ल worldwide.
Five years बाद, the group released their third एल्बम FanMail, जिससे became the group 's पहला album to डेब्यू at number one और sold more than 11 लाख copies worldwide.
the subsequent tour following FanMails release became the highest grossing दौरे of all समय by a मादा band.
in 2002, लिसा `` बाएँ नजर '' Lopes died in a car दुर्घटना in Honduras.
सात months बाद, T-Boz and chilli released the group 's fourth एल्बम 3D, which बेची 2 million copies विश्वव्यापी, it प्रदर्शित unreleased vocals इससे बाएँ Eye.
बिलबोर्ड magazine क्रमित tlc as एक of the महानतम musical trios.
between 1992 और 2003, the band accumulated टेन शीर्ष ten singles, four number one singles, चार multi-platinum albums, और चार Grammy पुरस्कार.
At the समाप्त of 1999, tlc was ranked as the सातवाँ most कामयाब act of the 1990s by Billboard.
In 2008, the समूह was inducted into the सब Time Hot 100 Artist हॉल of कीर्ति by the same magazine, at 56th प्लेस.
कि साल it थी also सूचीबद्ध as the # 25 R & B/hip-hop artist of the preceding 25 सालो.
TLC रै sold more than 65 million records worldwide and वे हैं क्रमित as the दूसरी best selling female group of सब समय, and the best selling मादा R & B group of all time.
In 2012, tlc क्रमित 12th on vh1 's 100 Greatest Women in म्यूज़िक, होने क्रमित the number एक सब girl समूह on कि सूची.
Tarzan is a 1999 अमरीकी animated adventure film produced by Walt डिज़्नी विशेषता एनिमेशन और वितरित by Walt Disney तस्वीरें.
The 37th फिल्मी in the वॉल्ट Disney Animated Classics, it is आधारित on the story Tarzan of the Apes by Edgar Rice बरोज, and is the तभी प्रमुख motion picture संस्करण of the स्टोरी Tarzan प्रॉपर्टी to be animated.
निर्देशित by क्रिस Buck and केविन Lima with a screenplay by tab मर्फी, Bob tzudiker, और नोनी White, Tarzan features the voices of Tony Goldwyn, Minnie ड्राइवर, ग्लेन Close, और रोजी o'donnell with ब्रायन Blessed, Lance henriksen, Wayne Knight, और Nigel Hawthorne.
It थी the पिछला bona fide hit before the Disney slump of the early 2000s grossing $ 171,091,819 domestically और $ 448,191,819 worldwide, outgrossing its predecessors hercules ( 1997 ) और Mulan ( 1998 ).
At the समय of its रिलीज, its उत्पादन बजट of $ 130 million made it the most expensive animated film ever made, until topped by Disney 's अपना $ 140 million खजाना Planet in 2002.
It was भी the first Disney animated विशेषता to खोलें at # 1 चूंकि pocahontas.
This थी the last प्रमुख बक्सा office success of the Disney Renaissance.
Oil Platform p-51 off the Brazilian coast is a semi-submersible platform.
Oil मंच Mittelplate in the North sea
An आयल platform, ( offshore platform or colloquially आयल रिग ) is a विशाल structure साथ facilities to ड्रिल wells, to extract और प्रक्रम oil और प्राकृतिक गैस, और to temporarily स्टोर product जबतक it can be brought to shore for refining and marketing.
In अनेक cases, the मंच contains facilities to house the workforce as खूब.
depending on the हालातों, the platform may be fixed to the समंदर floor, may consist of an artificial द्वीप, or may float.
Remote subsea कुएं may also be कनेक्ट to a platform by flow लाइनों and by umbilical connections.
These subsea solutions may consist of one or more subsea कुएं, or of one or अधिक manifold केंद्रों for multiple कुएं.
Slaughter is the हत्या of animals, प्रायः कि of घरेलू livestock लिये खाना.
The animals most commonly slaughtered लिये food हैं चौपायों, water भैंस ( for beef और veal ), sheep, goats ( for मेमने and मटन ), pigs ( लिये pork ), horses ( for घोड़ा मांस ), and fowl, largely chickens, turkeys, and बतखों और increasingly fish from the aquaculture industry ( fish खेती ).
The White हाउस, the president 's official निवास and center of the प्रशासन
Under the United राज्य संविधान, the President of the United राज्य is the head of राज्य and सिर of government of the United राज्य.
As मुख्य of the कार्यपालिका branch and सिर of the संघीय government as a पूरे, the प्रेसिडेंसी is the highest political office in the United States by influence and मान्यता.
The president is also the commander-in-chief of the संयुक्त States हथियारबंद Forces.
The अध्यक्ष is indirectly elected to a four-year term by an Electoral College ( or by the House of Representatives should the चुनावी College fail to award an निरपेक्ष majority of votes to any person ).
चूंकि the अनुसमर्थन of the twenty-second Amendment to the United राज्य Constitution in 1951, no person may be elected अध्यक्ष more than twice, and no one who has served अधिक than two years of a term to जिससे किसी else थी निर्वाचित may be elected more than एकबार.
upon the death, इस्तीफा, or हटाना from office of an incumbent President, the वाइस अध्यक्ष assumes the दफ्तर.
The President जरूर be at तनिक 35 सालो of आयु and a `` प्राकृतिक born '' citizen of the United States.
This सूची includes तभी those व्यक्तियों जो were sworn into office as अध्यक्ष following the ratification of the United States Constitution, which took effect on कूच 4, 1789.
लिये अमरीकी leaders before इस ratification, देखिए President of the महाद्वीपीय कॉंग्रेस.
The list does not include any एक्टिंग Presidents अंतर्गत the Twenty-fifth Amendment to the United States Constitution.
There have been 43 people sworn into office, and 44 presidencies, as Grover Cleveland परोसा two non-consecutive terms and is गिने क्रमबद्धता as both the 22nd और 24th अध्यक्ष.
of the individuals निर्वाचित as president, चार died in office of प्राकृतिक causes ( विलियम Henry हैरिसन, zachary टेलर, वारेन G. हार्डिंग, और फ्रैंकलिन D. Roosevelt ), चार were assassinated ( Abraham lincoln, James A. गारफ़ील्ड, विलियम mckinley, और John F. कैनेडी ) and एक resigned ( रिचर्ड Nixon ).
जार्ज वॉशिंगटन, the first president, थी inaugurated in 1789 बाद a सर्वसम्मत vote of the चुनावी College.
William Henry Harrison spent the shortest time in दफ्तर with 32 days in 1841, and फ्रैंकलिन D. Roosevelt spent the longest with over बारह years, लकिन died shortly into his fourth term in 1945.
He is the only अध्यक्ष to serve अधिक than two terms, and a constitutional amendment, affecting presidents after हैरी Truman, was passed to सीमा the number of times an व्यक्तिगत can be elected अध्यक्ष.
Andrew जैक्सन, the seventh अध्यक्ष, थी the first to be निर्वाचित by men of सब classes in 1828 बाद सबसे कानून barring non-land-owners इससे voting were repealed.
Warren Harding थी the first निर्वाचित after women gained voting rights in 1920.
History रिकॉर्ड four presidents – John q एडम्स, Rutherford B. Hayes, Benjamin Harrison and जार्ज W. Bush – who lost the लोकप्रिय vote but assumed office.
जॉन F. Kennedy रै महरूम the तभी अध्यक्ष of Roman कैथोलिक faith, and the current अध्यक्ष, बराक ओबामा, is the first president of African descent.

bolt action rimfire राइफल with suppressor
AWM-F स्निपर राइफल with संलग्न suppressor.
A suppressor, sound suppressor, or ध्वनि moderator, is a यंत्र attached to or भाग of the barrel of a firearm जिससे reduces the राशि of रव, and usually the राशि of muzzle flash, generated by firing the हथियार.
a suppressor can be used both साथ a firearm और साथ संपीडित air gun.
हालांकि it is sometimes referred to as a silencer, इस term is a misnomer popularized by cinematic fiction : the sound of a projectile, विशेषकर एक moving तेज़ than the गति of ध्वनि, through the air can नहीं be eliminated.
Using a suppressor in long distance शूटिंग ( i.e. वृहद than 300 मीटर ) can lessen, or retard, the रपट at the moment of प्रभाव, and create the impression of खामोशी near the निशाना.
The noise सुना निकट the muzzle as a प्रक्षेप्य leaves the बैरल, though subdued, is not silent at सब.
A suppressor is usually a मेटल बेलन साथ internal mechanisms to reduce the sound of फायरिंग by slowing the escaping propellant gas और sometimes by reducing the गति of the bullet.
जल्दी suppressors यहूद created around the शुरूआत of the 20th सदी by several आविष्कारक.
American आविष्कारक Hiram पर्सी कहावत ( not to be confused with Hiram Stevens Maxim, hiram Percy 's father, और the inventor of the कहावत Machine गन ), is credited साथ inventing and selling the first commercially कामयाब models circa 1902 ( patented 30 March 1909 ).
Maxim gave his यंत्र the trademarked नाम Maxim Silencer.
The muffler for internal दहन इंजन was developed in parallel with the firearm suppressor by Maxim in the जल्दी 20th century, using many of the वही techniques to provide quieter-running engines ( in many European countries ऑटोमोबाइल mufflers हैं still पुकारा silencers ).
The word silencer in सन्दर्भ to गन suppressor remains in widespread use, although it रै चूंकि गिरे आउट of favor with some, especially among the firearms industry, being replaced with the अधिक वस्तुतः accurate term ध्वनि suppressor or just suppressor, because a `` ध्वनि suppressor '' करता नहीं `` silence '' कोई हथियार, rather it eliminates muzzle flash and reduces the सोनिक दबाव of a firearm discharging.
Common usage and u.S. legislative भाषा favor the historically earlier term, silencer.
in U.S. विधि, the terms `` firearm मफलर '' and `` firearm silencer '' are synonymous.
Suppressors were regularly used by एजेंटों of the United राज्य Office of रणनीतिक सेवाएं, who favored the newly designed High मानक hdm.22 long राइफल पिस्टल during World युद्ध II.
OSS Director विलियम जोसेफ `` जंगली Bill '' डोनोवन demonstrated the pistol लिये President Franklin D. Roosevelt at the श्वेत हाउस.
according to OSS शोध chief Stanley लोवेल, डोनोवन ( an बूढ़ा and विश्वसनीय dost of the President ) was waved into the Oval Office, जहाँ रूज़वेल्ट थी dictating a letter.
जबकि Roosevelt समाप्त उसके message, Donovan turned his वापस and fired टेन shots into a sandbag he था brought साथ him, announced what he था किया और handed the smoking gun to the astonished president.
The British SOE ( Special परिचालन कार्यपालिका ) welrod हत्या पिस्टल साथ an अभिन्न suppressor was also प्रयुक्त by the American OSS on clandestine operations in Nazi occupied Europe during the Second World War.
Beatrice `` Bea '' आर्थर ( may 13, 1922 – April 25, 2009 ) थी an American अभिनेत्री, comedienne, and singer जिनकी career spanned सात decades.
Arthur achieved fame as the अक्षर Maude Findlay on the 1970s sitcoms सब in the Family और maude, और as डोरोथी Zbornak on the 1980s sitcom the सुनहरी Girls, winning एमी Awards for दोनो roles.
A stage अभिनेत्री both पहले and बाद उसके television success, she जीती the Tony Award लिये बेहतरीन Featured अभिनेत्री in a Musical for her प्रदर्शन as Vera Charles in the असली cast of Mame ( 1966 ).
is a 2011 Japanese 3D computer-animated film आधारित on the Tekken वीडियो game श्रेणी, उत्पादित by डिजिटल frontier and distributed by Asmik इक्का Entertainment in association with बंदाई Entertainment.
The फिल्मी premiered in उत्तर America by Bandai Entertainment on जुलाई 26, 2011, and in Australia on जुलाई 27, 2011 in a खास exclusive one-off स्क्रीनिंग.
it थी released on सितंबर 3, 2011 in Japan.

लिये a चर्चा of nonprofit, voluntary पड़ोस वकालत समूह, see पड़ोस संघ.
In the United States, a homeowner संघ is a निगम formed by a real estate developer for the purpose of विपणन, managing, और selling of homes and लोट in a residential subdivision.
it grants the developer विशेषाधिकार voting अधिकारों in शासी the association, while allowing the developer to निकास financial and legal responsibility of the organization, typically by transferring ownership of the association to the homeowners after selling बंद a predetermined क्रमांक of lots.
Membership in the homeowners association by a residential खरीदार is typically a कंडीशन of purchase ; a खरीदार is n't given an विकल्प to अस्वीकृत it.
सबसे homeowner एसोसिएशन हैं incorporated, and are subject to राज्य statutes that govern non-profit corporations और homeowner associations.
राज्य oversight of homeowner एसोसिएशन is minimal, और mainly takes the form of laws which are असंगत इससे state to state.
Some states, such as Florida and California, have a large body of homeowner संघ law, and some states, such as Massachusetts, have virtually no homeowner association विधि.
The fastest growing रूप of housing in the संयुक्त States today is common-interest developments ( cids ), a श्रेणी that includes planned-unit developments of single-family homes, condominiums, and cooperative apartments.
चूंकि 1964, homeowner associations have become increasingly common in the USA.
The Community Associations Institute trade association अनुमानित कि HOAs governed 24.8 लाख अमरीकी homes and 62 लाख निवासियों in 2010.
a prize-winning lilac-and-white silkie
वहीँ हैं अनेक breeds of गिनी pig जिससे have been विकसित since its domestication ca. 5000 BC.
breeds vary widely in रूप and purpose, ranging from show breeds साथ long, flowing hair to those in उपयोग as model जीवों by science.
इससे ca. 1200 AD to the Spanish conquest of the इन्का Empire in 1532, selective प्रजनन by indigenous South American peoples resulted in many किस्में of domestic Guinea pigs, जिससे रूप the basis for कुछ of the modern domestic breeds.
जल्दी andean breeds were primarily kept as agricultural stock for food, and efforts at improving the गिनी सुअर as a food सोर्स continue to the modern era.
With the export of गिनी pigs to यूरोपीय in the 15th century, the लक्ष्य in breeding shifted to focus on the विकास of appealing pets.
to this समाप्त, various competitive प्रजनन संगठन were founded by fanciers.
The American Cavy Breeders Association, an adjunct to the American Rabbit प्रजनक संघ, is the governing देह in the United States and Canada.
the British Cavy परिषद governs cavy क्लब in the United किंगडम.
Similar organizations exist in ऑस्ट्रेलिया ( ऑस्ट्रेलियाई National Cavy परिषद ) और New Zealand ( नई Zealand cavy Club ).
Each क्लबों publishes its own मानक of Perfection and determines which breeds are eligible for प्रर्दशित.
New breeds continue to emerge in the 21st century.
हालांकि there are many breeds of Guinea सुअर, only a few breeds हैं commonly मिला on the show table as pets.
सबसे गिनी सूअर found as pets were either found अवांछनीय by प्रजनक or were करवाया to be pleasant pets regardless of how खूब they मिलें the breed standard of perfection.
the छोटी hair, abyssinian, Peruvian and Sheltie ( aka Silkie ) breeds हैं those सबसे अक्सर देखी as पालतु, and the पूर्व three हैं the कोर breeds in the history of the competitive प्रर्दशित of Guinea pigs.
In addition to उनके मानक form, nearly all breeds आइये in a साटन variant.
satins, due to their hollow बाल shafts, possess coats of a special gloss और shine.
However, there is growing evidence that the genes responsible लिये the Satin कोट भी can cause severe अस्थि problems, including Osteodystrophy and Paget 's बीमारी.
Showing Satin variations is prohibited by कुछ cavy breeders ' एसोसिएशन because of animal welfare कारण.
All cavy breeds have some साझा सामान्य standards : the head profile चाहिए be rounded, with large eyes and विशाल, smooth ears.
the देह चाहिए be strong and of compact निर्माण.
Coat colour चाहिए in all variations be clearly पारिभाषित and thorough इससे root to tip.
ये standards are best met by long स्थापित, commonly bred breeds, as their प्रजनक have had enough time और animals to effectively breed लिये these qualities.
The coat colour ideal of शुभ परिभाषा and thoroughness is rarely मिले by अन्य than the smooth coated breeds, जिससे have था खूब established, separate breeding लाइनों for different colours.
State schools ( भी known as public schools or सरकारी schools ) generally refer to primary or secondary schools mandated लिये or offered to all children without charge सशुल्क लिये, in whole or in part, by कराधान.
The term may भी refer to institutions of post-secondary education वित्तपोषित, in whole or in part, और overseen by government.
the ribosome assembles polymeric प्रोटीन अणुओं whose अनुक्रम is controlled by the sequence of मेसेंजर RNA molecules.
This is जरूरी by all living कोशिकाएं and संबद्ध वाइरस.
The ribosome ( इससे ribonucleic एसिड and the यूनानी soma, अर्थ `` body '' ) is a large and जटिल आणविक machine, found within सब living cells, कि serves as the primary site of biological protein synthesis ( अनुवाद ).
Ribosomes link amino acids together in the order specified by messenger RNA ( mrna ) अणुओं.
ribosomes consist of two major subunits—the small ribosomal subunit पढ़े the mrna, while the large subunit joins amino acids to रूप a polypeptide chain.
Each subunit is composed of one or more ribosomal rna ( rRNA ) अणुओं and a variety of proteins.
The sequence of डीएनए encoding लिये a protein may be copied many times into मेसेंजर RNA ( mRNA ) जंजीरों of a समान sequence.
ribosomes can bind to an mrna कड़ी and उपयोग it as a template for determining the correct sequence of amino acids in a particular प्रोटीन.
Amino acids हैं selected, collected and carried to the ribosome by transfer RNA ( tRNA molecules ), which डालें एक part of the राइबोसोम and bind to the messenger RNA chain.
the attached अमीनो acids हैं तब linked together by another part of the राइबोसोम.
Once the protein is उत्पादित, it can तब 'fold ' to produce a specific functional three-dimensional structure.
a ribosome is बना from complexes of RNAs and proteins और is therefore a ribonucleoprotein.
प्रत्येक राइबोसोम is विभाजित into दो subunits : the smaller subunit बांधता to the mRNA pattern, जबकि the larger subunit binds to the trna and the amino acids.
जब a ribosome finishes reading an mRNA molecule, these दो subunits विभाजित apart.
Ribosomes हैं ribozymes, because the catalytic peptidyl transferase activity कि कड़ी अमीनो acids together is performed by the ribosomal RNA.
Ribosomes from जीवाणु, archaea और eukaryotes ( the तीन डोमेन of life on Earth ) differ in उनके आकार, अनुक्रम, structure, और the ratio of protein to rna.
the मतभेद in structure allow कुछ antibiotics to kill bacteria by inhibiting their ribosomes, while leaving इंसान ribosomes unaffected.
In bacteria और archaea, more than एक ribosome may move साथ a सिंगल mRNA chain at एक time, प्रत्येक `` reading '' इसके sequence और producing a सम्बन्धित protein अणु.
the ribosomes in the mitochondria of eukaryotic cells functionally resemble अनेक features of those in जीवाणु, reflecting the likely विकासवादी उत्पत्ति of mitochondria.
अल्बर्ट Claude, ईसाई de Duve, and जार्ज एमिल Palade यहूद jointly awarded the Nobel Prize in physiology or Medicine, in 1974, for the discovery of the ribosomes.
The Nobel पुरस्कार in Chemistry 2009 थी awarded to Venkatraman रामकृष्णन, Thomas A. Steitz and एडीए E. Yonath for determining the detailed ढांचा and mechanism of the ribosome.

Overview of the Calvin cycle and कार्बन fixation
The light-independent प्रतिक्रियाएँ of photosynthesis are chemical reactions कि convert कार्बन डाइऑक्साइड और other compounds into ग्लूकोज.
These reactions occur in the stroma, the fluid-filled क्षेत्रफल of a chloroplast बाहर of the thylakoid membranes.
ये प्रतिक्रियाएँ take the light-dependent प्रतिक्रियाएँ and perform further रासायनिक processes on उन्हें.
There are तीन phases to the light-independent reactions, collectively called the calvin cycle : carbon fixation, कटौती reactions, and ribulose 1,5-bisphosphate ( RuBP ) regeneration.
Despite its नाम, इस process occurs तभी when लाइट is available.
Plants do not carry out the Calvin cycle by रात्रि.
They, बजाय, रिलीज sucrose into the फ्लोएम from their starch reserves.
This process happens जब लाइट is available स्वतंत्र of the दयालु of photosynthesis ( c3 carbon fixation, c4 carbon fixation, और Crassulacean Acid Metabolism ) ; CAM plants स्टोर malic एसिड in उनके vacuoles प्रत्येक रात्रि और रिलीज it by day in order to make this process कार्य.
In mathematics, a वर्गाकार number or पूर्ण square is an integer that is the square of an integer ; in अन्य शब्द, it is the उत्पाद of some integer with itself.
लिये उदाहरण, 9 is a square क्रमांक, चूंकि it can be लिखा as.
the usual संकेतन for the सूत्र लिये the square of a number is not the उत्पाद, लकिन the equivalent exponentiation, प्रायः pronounced as `` squared ''.
The name square क्रमांक comes from the name of the shape ; see नीचे.
Square numbers are non-negative.
Another रास्ता of saying that a ( non-negative ) number is a वर्गाकार number, is कि its square roots are again integers.
For example, = ±3, so 9 is a square क्रमांक.
A positive integer कि रै no perfect वर्गाकार divisors मगर 1 is called square-free.
For a non-negative पूर्णांक, the th square number is, with being the zeroth वर्गाकार.
The concept of square can be विस्तारित to some other क्रमांक systems.
If rational numbers हैं included, then a वर्गाकार is the अनुपात of दो square integers, और, conversely, the अनुपात of दो वर्गाकार integers is a वर्गाकार ( e.g., 4/9 = ( 2/3 ) 2 ).
Starting साथ 1, there हैं square numbers up to and सहित, where the expression represents the floor of the number.
The Era of शुभ Feelings marked a period in the political history of the United States that reflected a sense of national purpose and a desire लिये unity among Americans in the aftermath of the Napoleonic Wars.
the era saw the collapse of the Federalist Party and an समाप्त to the bitter दलगत disputes between it और the dominant democratic-republican party दौरान the पहला Party प्रणाली.
President जेम्स Monroe endeavored to downplay partisan संबद्ध in making उसके nominations, with the ultimate goal of national एकता and eliminating पार्टियों altogether इससे national राजनीती.
The काल is so closely संबद्ध साथ Monroe 's presidency ( 1817–1825 ) और his administrative लक्ष्य कि उसके name and the era are वस्तुतः synonymous.
The era of शुभ जज्बात marked a transition in American politics साथ the समाप्त of the federalist Party as अमेरिका began to develop बाद the War of 1812.
जबकि अमेरिका was experiencing growth and समृद्धि after the war with ब्रिटेन, इस era भी marks the first उदाहरण of economic परेशानियों in the growing United States.
mirroring the American System proposed by Henry Clay, protective tariffs और the chartering of the Second Bank of the United राज्य जटिल the टेंशन between the North and दक्षिण साथ the coming of the first financial crisis.
जबकि the पद “Era of Good feelings” is usually viewed with विडंबना because of the राजनैतिक turmoil, economic factors caused animosity between the North और South.
The designation of the period by historians as one of “good feelings” is प्रायः conveyed with irony or skepticism, as the history of the era was one in जिससे the राजनैतिक माहौल was strained और divisive, especially among factions भीतर the मुनरो प्रशासन और the रिपब्लिकन Party.
the phrase “era of शुभ Feelings” was coined by Benjamin Russell, in the बोस्टन Federalist समाचारपत्र, columbian Centinel, on जुलाई 12, 1817, following मुनरो 's विज़िट to Boston, Massachusetts as part of his good होगा tour of अमेरिका.
mariel मार्गरेट `` Mia '' Hamm ( born March 17, 1972 ) is a retired अमरीकी पेशेवर soccer player.
hamm played many सालो as a forward for the संयुक्त राज्य महिलाओं 's नेशनल soccer team and was a founding सदस्य of the Washington स्वतंत्रता.
hamm scored 158 international लक्ष्य, अधिक than any other खिलाड़ी, male or मादा, in the history of सॉकर और is the तीसरा most capped female खिलाड़ी in soccer इतिहास behind Kristine लिली और क्रिस्टी rampone, appearing in 275 international matches.
hamm was नामित the women 's FIFA संसार Player of the साल the first two टाइम्स कि पुरस्कार was दिए ( in 2001 and 2002 ), और is listed as एक of FIFA 's 125 बेहतरीन living खिलाड़ी ( as चुनी by Pelé ).
She was inducted into the National Soccer हॉल of कीर्ति as खूब as the अलबामा Sports Hall of Fame and Texas खेल Hall of Fame.
वो is the author of Go For the लक्ष्य : a Champion 's मार्गदर्शिका to जीतना in Soccer and जीवन और appeared in the HBO documentary हिम्मत to सपना : The Story of the u.S. Women 's सॉकर Team.
Washington Post columnist माइकल wilbon called Hamm, `` Perhaps the most महत्वपूर्ण athlete of the last 15 years. ''
Hamm takes a corner लात.
The New यॉर्क Red Bulls is an American पेशेवर soccer टोली based in Harrison, New Jersey, representing the नई यॉर्क metropolitan क्षेत्रफल.
The team competes in the पूर्वी सम्मेलन of प्रमुख League Soccer ( mls ).
It is one of the टेन चार्टर क्लब of MLS, having competed in the league since इसके inception.
The team was a founding member of MLS ( 1996 ), but रै gone through अनेक नाम changes.
the टोली was originally known as the नई York/New जर्सी MetroStars through 1997.
From the 1998 season through the 2005 ऋतु, the team was known as the MetroStars.
on March 9, 2006, the टोली was sold to रेड Bull GmbH, अग्रणी to the team 's वर्तमान name.
वे are the तभी original mls मताधिकार not to have won any significant trophy ( including नियमित season, playoffs, and knockout competition ) चूंकि inception.
the team 's बेहतरीन result in the MLS was the mls कप फाइनल in 2008.
In the US खोलें Cup, the MetroStars पहुँचे three semifinals ( 1997, 1998, 2000 ), पहले reaching their first final in 2003, losing 1–0 to the Chicago आग.
On August 26, 2000, the metros ' क्लिंट mathis नियत an MLS record by scoring five लक्ष्य in a game against the डलास बर्न.
कुछ well-known players कि have played for the team शामिल giovanni Savarese, Tim Howard, टोनी meola, Tab Ramos, Alexi lalas, Clint Mathis, Jozy Altidore, माइकल Bradley, Claudio reyna, एडी Pope, रॉबर्टो Donadoni, Lothar matthäus, Adolfo वालेंसिया, youri Djorkaeff, amado ग्वेरा, Juan Pablo Ángel, Thierry Henry, Juninho Pernambucano, Jan गुन्नार solli, राफेल Márquez, और टिम Cahill.
the टोली रै also था well-known coaches, including Carlos Queiroz, Carlos Alberto Parreira, Bora Milutinović, Bob Bradley, Mo johnston, Bruce एरिना and Hans backe.
confucianism, taoism, और Buddhism are one, a पेंटिंग in the litang style portraying तीन men laughing by a नदी स्ट्रीम, 12th सदी, Song राजवंश.
estimating the क्रमांक of बौद्धों in the world, or in many देशों, is difficult due to definitional मुद्दे as खूब as practical समस्याएं of enumeration.
to begin with, the religious beliefs, practices, और पहचान of East Asians ( जो comprise the बहुमत of the संसार 's Buddhists by any measure ) often मिश्रण buddhism with other परंपराओं including Confucianism, the चाइनीज लोक धर्म, Daoism, shinto, and Korean shamanism.
Most followers of Buddhism do not belong to structured congregations, or observe a definite ritual of adherence ऐसे as taking शरण, बनाना it difficult to accurately estimate the क्रमांक of practitioners.
an additional challenge is the hostility of several national governments ( often कम्युनिस्ट ones such as China or North Korea ) to धर्म generally or to buddhism specifically.
सरकारी नीतियों in these देशों may प्रोत्साहित the under-reporting or non-reporting of religious adherence, resulting in official योग that may drastically underestimate the number of धार्मिक practitioners in these countries.
Estimate of the worldwide बौद्ध population दायरा इससे 350 लाख to over one अरब, but cluster nearer to the first फिगर.
Adherents.com ( as of 2012 ) suggests a figure of 397 million.
By major शाखाओं, the numbers हैं as follows:
( 1 ) Mahayana buddhism, सहित ईस्ट Asian buddhism, with no fewer than 185 million adherents, and संभवतः अनेक टाइम्स that many ( again, depending on definitional मुद्दे ).
This is the predominant form of buddhism practiced in China, South Korea, जापानी, Taiwan, सिंगापुर, and Vietnam.
( 2 ) Theravada Buddhism, with no कम than 125 लाख adherents.
इस is the predominant रूप of buddhism practiced in कंबोडिया, Thailand, लाओस, Sri Lanka, and Burma.
( 3 ) Vajrayana Buddhism, with approximately 20 million adherents.
This रूप predominates in the greater Tibetan and मंगोलियाई regions, as well as in the Himalayas.
besides the independent countries of मंगोल and भूटान, और विभिन्न territories within कया is now western China, वज्रयान is traditional to certain regions of रूस ( e.g. Kalmykia, बुर्यातिया ), इण्डिया ( e.g. लद्दाख, Sikkim ), और Nepal ( e.g. Khumbu ).
वज्रयान, भी known as Tibetan Buddhism, is often conflated with Tantric buddhism, but this is imprecise, as Shingon and other फ़ॉर्म of ईस्ट एशियाई Buddhism भी अभ्यास तन्त्र.
at least 7 countries ( Sri Lanka, थाईलैंड, Cambodia, Laos, Burma, Bhutan, and Mongolia ) have unambiguous बौद्ध majorities.
Depending on how एक calculates Chinese and अन्य East Asian adherents, इस फिगर might expand to शामिल several अधिक countries.
In addition, Buddhism is the state religion of Cambodia and भूटान, and receives prominent mention in the constitutions of थाईलैंड and श्री लंका.
in northern इण्डिया and Nepal, the land where buddhism थी born, the religion severely अस्वीकृत दौरान the first millennium.
Whether this decline was due to the इस्लामी conquest of northern India, or to अन्य कारकों, remains controversial.
See the article Decline of buddhism in India.
James बटलर Hickok ( May 27, 1837 – August 2, 1876 ), better known as Wild Bill hickok, थी a folk नायिका of the अमरीकी Old वेस्ट.
उसके कौशल as a gunfighter and scout, along with उसके प्रतिष्ठा as a lawman, provided the आधार लिये उसके fame, हालांकि some of his reported exploits are fictionalized.
born and raised on a farm in ग्रामीण Illinois, hickok गई west at आयु 18 as a भगोड़े from इंसाफ, पहला working as a stagecoach driver, पहले he became a lawman in the frontier territories of Kansas और नेब्रास्का.
He fought for the Union फौज दौरान the American Civil War, और gained publicity बाद the युद्ध as a scout, marksman, कर्ता, और professional gambler.
between his law-enforcement कर्तव्य and जुए, which easily overlapped, hickok was involved in several notable shootouts.
he थी shot और killed जबकि playing poker in the nuttal & Mann 's Saloon in deadwood, Dakota Territory ( अभी South Dakota ).
कलाकार 's conception of the Curiosity रोवर vaporizing rock on मंगल.
the रोवर landed on मंगल in अगस्त 2012.
A Mars rover is an automated motor vehicle जिससे propels itself across the सतह of the planet मंगल बाद landing.
Rovers have अनेक लाभ over stationary landers : वे examine अधिक territory, they can be directed to interesting सुविधाएँ, वे can place themselves in sunny positions to weather winter months और they can advance the ज्ञान of how to perform very remote robotic vehicle control.
There have been four successful robotically संचालित मंगल रोवर्स.
The Jet नोदन Laboratory managed the मंगल Pathfinder mission और its now inactive Sojourner rover.
it फिलहाल manages the Mars Exploration Rover mission 's active अवसर rover and inactive स्पिरिट, और, as part of the मंगल Science Laboratory मिशन, the Curiosity rover.
a financial ऑडिट, or more accurately, an ऑडिट of वित्तीय statements, is the सत्यापन of the financial statements of a legal एंटिटी, with a view to एक्स्प्रेस an ऑडिट opinion.
The audit राय is intended to provide reasonable assurance, but नहीं निरपेक्ष assurance, कि the financial statements हैं presented fairly, in all material respects, and/or give a सच्चा and मेला view in accordance with the financial रिपोर्टिंग फ्रेमवर्क.
the purpose of an audit is provide और objective independent परिक्षा of the वित्तीय statements, which increases the value और विश्वसनीयता of the financial कथन produced by management, यूँ increase user विश्वास in the वित्तीय statement, reduce investor रिस्क और consequently reduce the लागत of पूंजी of the preparer of the financial कथन.
वित्तीय audits are typically performed by firms of practicing accountants who हैं विशेषज्ञ in वित्तीय reporting.
The वित्तीय ऑडिट is एक of अनेक परख functions provided by accounting firms.
Many organizations separately employ or hire internal auditors, who do not attest to financial reports but focus mainly on the आतंरिक controls of the organization.
External auditors may choose to place limited reliance on the work of internal auditors.
auditing promotes transparency and accuracy in the financial disclosures बना by an संगठन, therefore would संभावित to reduce of ऐसे corporations to छिपाते unscrupulous dealings.
Internationally, the अंतरराष्ट्रीय मानकों on Auditing ( ISA ) issued by the International Auditing and परख Standards फलक ( iaasb ) is considered as the बेंचमार्क लिये audit process.
लगभग all jurisdictions require auditors to follow the ISA or a लोकल variation of the ISA.
डालर सिक्के have been minted in the United States in gold, चांदी, और base metal versions.
the पद silver dollar is प्रायः used लिये कोई विशाल white मेटल सिक्का जारी by the United राज्य साथ a फेस value of एक dollar, हालांकि purists insist that a dollar is not silver जबतक it contains कुछ of that मेटल.
चांदी dollars, the पहला dollar सिक्का issue, were minted beginning in 1794.
Gold डॉलर और gold-colored dollars have also महरूम produced by the संयुक्त राज्य.
the sacagawea and Presidential डॉलर are प्रायः referred to as `` golden dollars ''.
In modern times, डालर coins have not महरूम बहुत popular in the संयुक्त States.
despite प्रयत्न by the government to promote their उपयोग, most Americans currently उपयोग the एक dollar bill rather than dollar coins.
in सीधा and स्तर उड़ान lift ( L ) equals weight ( W ).
In a banked फेरे of 60°, lift बराबरी double the weight ( L=2W ).
The पायलट experiences 2g and a doubled weight.
the steeper the bank, the greater the g-forces.
इस top-fuel dragster can accelerate इससे शून्य to in 0.86 सेकेंड.
This is a horizontal acceleration of 5.3 g. संयुक्त with the vertical g-force in the stationary case the Pythagorean प्रमेय yields a g फ़ोर्स of 5.4 g.
g-force ( with g from गुरुत्वाकर्षक ) is a term लिये accelerations felt as weight and measurable by accelerometers.
It is not a फ़ोर्स, प्रति se, but a force per unit mass.
Since such a force is perceived as a weight, कोई g-force can be वर्णित as a `` वज़न प्रति unit द्रव्यमान '' ( see the synonym विशिष्ट weight ).
The g-force acceleration acts as a multiplier of weight-like forces for every unit of an object 's mass, and ( सहेजें for certain electromagnetic force प्रभाव ) is the cause of an ऑब्जेक्ट 's त्वरण in संबंध to free-fall.
This acceleration experienced by an ऑब्जेक्ट is due to the वेक्टर योग of non-gravitational forces एक्टिंग on an object free to मूव.
the accelerations that हैं not produced by गम्भीरता हैं termed proper accelerations, and it is तभी ये कि are measured in g-force units.
वे cause stresses और strains on objects.
क्युकी of these strains, large g-forces may be destructive.
Gravitation acting अलोन does not produce a g-force, even हालांकि g-forces are expressed in multiples of the acceleration of a मानक gravity.
Thus, the मानक gravitational acceleration at the Earth 's surface produces g-force तभी indirectly, as a परिणाम of resistance to it by mechanical forces.
The 1 g-force on an object sitting on the Earth 's सतह is caused by mechanical force exerted in the upward दिशा by the ground, keeping the object इससे going into free-fall.
The upward force इससे the मैदान ensures that an object at rest on the Earth 's सतह is accelerating relative to the free-fall condition, which is the पाथ that the object would follow when गिरना freely toward the Earth 's center.
Objects अनुमत to free-fall in an inertial trajectory अंतर्गत the influence of gravitation-only, feel no g-force.
This is demonstrated by the `` zero-g '' शर्तें inside a freely falling elevator falling toward the Earth 's बीच ( in वैक्यूम ), or ( to good approximation ) conditions अंदर a spacecraft in Earth orbit.
ये हैं उदाहरण of coordinate त्वरण ( a बदलें in velocity ) without a सनसनी of वज़न.
The experience of no g-force ( zero-g ), however it is produced, is synonymous with weightlessness.
in the अनुपस्थिति of gravitational फ़ील्ड, or in दिशानिर्देश at right angles to them, proper and निर्देशांक accelerations हैं the वही, और any coordinate त्वरण जरूर be उत्पादित by a corresponding g-force acceleration.
an example here is a rocket in free स्पेस, in जिससे simple changes in गति are उत्पादित by the engines, and produce g-forces on the rocket and passengers.
An augur पकड़कर a lituus, the curved wand often used as a symbol of augury on Roman coins
The augur was a पुजारी और आधिकारिक in the classical world, विशेषकर प्राचीन रोम और etruria.
His प्रमुख role थी to interpret the will of the gods by अध्ययन the flight of birds : whether they हैं flying in groups or अलोन, what noises they मेक as वे fly, direction of उड़ान and what kind of पक्षियों वे हैं.
इस was known as `` taking the auspices. ''
the रस्म और function of the augur was central to any प्रमुख undertaking in Roman society—public or private—including matters of युद्ध, कॉमर्स, and religion.
The Roman historian Livy stresses the महत्व of the augurs : `` जो करता नहीं know that इस city थी founded तभी after लेने the auspices, that सबकुछ in war and in सलाम, at घर and abroad, was done तभी after लेने the auspices ? ''
Farmington Hills is an affluent जातियाँ in southeastern Michigan.
It is the second largest city in ओकलैंड County in the u.S. state of Michigan.
Its population was 79,740 at the 2010 census.
It is part of the upscale northwestern suburbs of Metropolitan डेट्रॉयट and is also northeast of downtown Ann arbor.
Farmington Hills consistently ranks as one of the safest शहरों in the संयुक्त States, as खूब as in the state of मिशिगन.
In 2010, the area क्रमित as the 30th safest city in America.
Although the two शहरों have पृथक सेवाएं and addresses, Farmington and Farmington Hills हैं प्रायः thought of as the वही community.
Features of the community include a recently संवर downtown, boutiques, a vintage cinema, numerous रेस्तरां, exotic car dealerships, आर्ट galleries, and public पार्क including Heritage Park.
There are several ऐतिहासिक साइट including the Longacre House और the राज्यपाल Warner mansion.
Both शहरों हैं served by farmington पब्लिक Schools.
Farmington पहाड़ियाँ serves as a major कारोबार center लिये the वृहद Detroit area.
present-day impression of a Late कांस्य Age seal
Town मुहर ( matrix ) of náchod इससे 1570
a मुहर is a device for making an छाप in मोम, clay, paper, or some other medium, including an embossment on paper, and is also the impression thus बना.
The original purpose थी to authenticate a दस्तावेज़, a wrapper for one such as a आधुनिक लिफाफा, or the cover of a container or package पकड़कर valuables or अन्य objects.
the sealing process is essentially that of a सांचे, with the फाइनल चित्र represented on the यंत्र for making the छाप by a mirror-image design, incised in sunken- ( or counter- ) relief or intaglio.
The seal-making device is also referred to as the मुहर matrix or die ; the imprint it creates as the seal impression ( or, अधिक rarely, the sealing ).
If the impression is made purely as a relief resulting from the वृहद दबाव on the पेपर where the ऊँची parts of the matrix touch, the मुहर is known as a शुष्क seal ; in सब अन्य cases a द्रव or liquified मीडियम ( such as ink or मोम ) is प्रयुक्त, usually in another color than the पेपर.
लिये विधिक purposes, the definition of a मुहर may be extended to शामिल rubber stamps, or writing specified words ( `` seal '' or `` l.s. `` ).
in the United States, the शब्द `` seal '' is sometimes आबंटित to a facsimile of the मुहर design ( in मोनोक्रोम or रंग ), which may be प्रयुक्त in a variety of contexts सहित architectural जमावट, on ध्वज, or on आधिकारिक letterheads.
यूँ, for example, the ग्रेट मुहर of the संयुक्त States, among अन्य uses, appears on the रिवर्स of the one-dollar bill ; and several of the seals of the u.S. राज्य appear on उनके respective state flags.
In यूरोपीय, although coats of arms and heraldic बैज may well विशेषता in such contexts as well as on seals, the seal डिज़ाइन in इसके entirety rarely appears as an emblem.
The पढ़ाई of seals is known as sigillography or sphragistics.
Groundhog Day ( Pennsylvania जर्मनी : Grundsaudaag, Murmeltiertag ) is a day celebrated on February 2.
According to folklore, if it is cloudy जब a groundhog emerges इससे its burrow on इस day, then spring होगा come early ; if it is sunny, the groundhog होगा supposedly see its shadow and retreat back into its burrow, और the winter मौसम will continue for छह more weeks.
Modern customs of the अवकाश involve celebrations where early morning festivals हैं held to watch the groundhog emerging from इसके burrow.
In southeastern पेन्सिलवेनिया, groundhog lodges ( grundsow lodges ) celebrate the holiday with fersommlinge, social events in जिससे खाना is served, speeches are made, and one or अधिक g'spiel ( plays or skits ) are performed for entertainment.
The Pennsylvania German dialect is the तभी language बोला at the इवेंट, and those जो बोलो English pay a दंड, प्रायः in the रूप of a nickel, dime, or क्वार्टर per शब्द बोला, साथ the money put into a bowl in the center of the table.
the largest Groundhog Day celebration is held in Punxsutawney, पेन्सिलवेनिया.
Groundhog दिन, already a widely पहचाना and popular tradition, प्राप्त widespread attention as a result of the 1993 film Groundhog Day, which was नियत in punxsutawney, PA ( हालांकि filmed primarily in वुडस्टॉक, IL ) और portrayed Punxsutawney फिल.
ऊँची resolution image of tampa खाड़ी प्रदेश
the Tampa खाड़ी क्षेत्रफल has a humid subtropical जलवायु ( Koppen cfa ), with warm and humid summers साथ frequent thunderstorms and drier winters साथ जमने temperatures occurring प्रत्येक 2–3 सालो.
The क्षेत्रफल experiences a significant गर्मियाँ wet ऋतु, as nearly two-thirds of the annual वर्षण falls in the months of जून through September.
The area is listed by the United राज्य विभाग of Agriculture ( USDA ) as होने in hardiness मण्डल 10, जिससे is परिचय the उत्तरी सीमा of where coconut palms and royal palms can be grown.
Highs usually range between 65 and 95 °F ( 18 और 35 °C ) year round.
हालांकि known लिये hot summers, Tampa 's official ऊँची रै never reached 100 °F ( 38 °C ) – the नगर 's all-time record तापमान is 99 °f ( 37 °c ).
St. Petersburg 's all-time रिकार्ड high is exactly 100 °f ( 38 °C ).
Pinellas County lies on a peninsula between Tampa खाड़ी and the गल्फ of Mexico, और much of the city of Tampa झूठ on a छोटी प्रायद्वीप jutting आउट into tampa Bay.
This proximity to विशाल bodies of जल both नरमपंथियों temperatures and introduces large amounts of humidity into the atmosphere.
In सामान्य, the local communities farthest इससे the coast have larger temperature ranges, दोनो दौरान a सिंगल दिन और throughout the seasons of the साल.
A diagram of the electromagnetic वर्णक्रम, showing विभिन्न गुण आरपार the दायरा of frequencies and wavelengths
The इलेक्ट्रोमैग्नेटिक वर्णक्रम is the range of all संभावित बारंबारता of electromagnetic radiation.
the `` इलेक्ट्रोमैग्नेटिक spectrum '' of an object रै a different meaning, और is instead the characteristic वितरण of electromagnetic radiation उत्सर्जित or absorbed by that particular object.
The इलेक्ट्रोमैग्नेटिक spectrum extends इससे below the low बारंबारता used for modern radio संचार to gamma radiation at the short- wavelength ( high-frequency ) end, thereby covering wavelengths इससे हज़ारों of kilometers down to a fraction of the size of an atom.
the limit for long wavelengths is the size of the universe itself, while it is विचार that the short wavelength सीमा is in the vicinity of the Planck length, although in principle the वर्णक्रम is infinite and continuous.
सबसे parts of the electromagnetic वर्णक्रम are used in science for spectroscopic और other probing interactions, as तरीके to पढ़ाई और characterize पदार्थ.
in addition, विकिरण इससे various भाग of the spectrum has मिला many अन्य uses लिये communications and manufacturing ( see electromagnetic radiation for अधिक applications ).
Legend
Franklin Delano रूज़वेल्ट ( or ; January 30, 1882 – April 12, 1945 ), also known by his आद्याक्षर, FDR, was the 32nd अध्यक्ष of the United राज्य ( 1933–1945 ) और a central figure in world कार्यक्रम दौरान the mid-20th century, अग्रणी the United States during a time of worldwide economic अवसाद और total war.
A प्रबल leader of the लोकतांत्रिक Party और the only American president elected to अधिक than two terms, he built a नई Deal Coalition कि realigned अमरीकी politics after 1932, as his domestic नीतियों पारिभाषित American liberalism for the middle third of the 20th century.
With the bouncy लोकप्रिय song `` Happy दिनों हैं यहाँ Again `` as his अभियान theme, FDR पराजित incumbent Republican हर्बर्ट हूवर in नवम्बर 1932, at the depth of the Great अवसाद.
Energized by his personal victory over पोलियो, FDR 's unfailing आशावाद and activism contributed to a renewal of the national स्पिरिट.
He worked closely with अंग्रेजों Prime मंत्री विंस्टन Churchill and Soviet General सचिव Joseph स्टालिन in अग्रणी the allies against जर्मनी और जापानी in संसार War ii, and restoring समृद्धि to the स्वदेश 's अर्थव्यवस्था.
In his first hundred days in office, which began March 4, 1933, रूज़वेल्ट spearheaded major legislation और issued a profusion of कार्यपालिका आदेश कि instituted the New सौदे —a किस्में of programs designed to उपज relief ( government कार्य for the unemployed ), recovery ( economic growth ), and reform ( through regulation of Wall Street, बैंको and transportation ).
the economy improved rapidly from 1933 to 1937, but तब relapsed into a deep recession.
the bipartisan Conservative Coalition that formed in 1937 prevented his पैकिंग the Supreme Court or गुजर any considerable विधान ; it abolished many of the राहत programs when बेरोजगारी diminished during World युद्ध ii.
Most of the regulations on business यहूद ended about 1975–85, except for the regulation of वॉल Street by the प्रतिभूति and Exchange Commission, which स्टिल exists.
Along with अनेक छोटी कार्यक्रम, major surviving programs शामिल the संघीय जमा बीमे Corporation, which थी निर्मित in 1933, and Social सुरक्षा, which Congress passed in 1935.
As संसार War ii loomed after 1938, with the जापानी आक्रमण of चीन और the aggression of Nazi Germany, FDR gave दमदार diplomatic और वित्तीय support to China और Great ब्रिटेन, while remaining officially न्यूट्रल.
उसके goal थी to make America the `` Arsenal of Democracy `` जिससे होता supply munitions to the Allies.
In March 1941, Roosevelt, with congressional approval, provided lend-lease aid to the देशों fighting against नाजी जर्मनी with ब्रिटेन.
साथ very दमदार नेशनल support, he made युद्ध on जापानी और Germany बाद the Japanese attack on Pearl Harbor on दिसम्बर 7, 1941, calling it a `` date which होगा सजीव in infamy ``.
he supervised the mobilization of the u.S. economy to support the अलाइड war effort.
as an active military leader, Roosevelt implemented an overall war रणनीति on दो fronts that ended in the शिकस्त of the Axis शक्तियां and the development of the world 's पहला atom bomb.
In 1942 Roosevelt ordered the internment of 100,000 जापानी अमरीकी नागरिकों.
बेरोजगारी dropped to 2 %, relief programs largely ended, और the industrial अर्थव्यवस्था grew rapidly to new हाइट्स as लाखो of people moved to new jobs in युद्ध centers, और 16 लाख men और 300,000 women were drafted or volunteered for सैन्य service.
Roosevelt dominated the अमरीकी राजनैतिक scene नहीं only during the बारह years of his presidency, लकिन भी for decades afterward.
He orchestrated the realignment of मतदाता that निर्मित the पांचवां Party प्रणाली.
FDR 's नई Deal Coalition संयुक्त मजदूर unions, बिग city मशीने, श्वेत ethnics, अफ़्रीकी अमेरिकी and rural श्वेत southerners.
He also बहकावे the later creation of the संयुक्त Nations and bretton Woods.
Roosevelt is consistently rated by विद्वानों as एक of the शीर्ष तीन U.S. Presidents, along साथ Abraham Lincoln and जार्ज वॉशिंगटन.
A liberal डेमोक्रेट, Roosevelt पारिभाषित his ideological position as `` a little left of बीच. ''
a संयुक्त Committee is a term in politics that is used to refer to a कमेटी made up of members of दोनो कक्षों of a bicameral विधानमंडल.
in अन्य contexts, it refers to a committee with सदस्यों इससे more than one organization.
the विनियमन of prostitution in the संयुक्त States is not among the enumerated powers of the federal government ; Under the दसवाँ Amendment to the United States संविधान, it is इसलिए exclusively the domain of the राज्य to permit, prohibit, or वरना regulate वाणिज्यिक sex, except insofar as कॉंग्रेस may regulate it as भाग of interstate commerce साथ laws जैसे the Mann Act.
in most states, prostitution is माना a misdemeanor in the श्रेणी of पब्लिक अनुक्रम crime, a अपराधों कि disrupts the order of a community.
It थी at one time considered to be a vagrancy crime.
Currently, नेवाडा is the तभी state to allow वेश्यालय prostitution, the terms of जिससे are stipulated in the नेवाडा Revised Statutes.
तभी 8 काउंटी फिलहाल contain क्रियाशील brothels.
All forms of prostitution are illegal in क्लार्क काउंटी ( which contains the लास vegas–paradise metropolitan area ), Washoe County ( जिससे contains Reno ), कार्सन City, Douglas County, and lincoln County.
the other counties theoretically allow brothel prostitution, but some of ये काउंटी फिलहाल have no active brothels.
गली वेश्यावृति, `` pandering, '' and living बंद of the proceeds of a prostitute remain illegal under Nevada विधि, as elsewhere in the देश.
As साथ other देशों, वेश्यावृति in the United राज्य can be विभाजित into three व्यापक categories : गली prostitution, brothel वेश्यावृति, और अनुरक्षण prostitution.
The national flag of the United States of America, often बस referred to as the American flag, consists of thirteen बराबर आड़ा धारियाँ of red ( top and नीचे ) alternating साथ white, with a blue rectangle in the कैण्टन ( referred to specifically as the `` union '' ) bearing fifty small, white, five-pointed stars arranged in नौ offset आड़ा पंक्ति of छह stars ( top and bottom ) प्रत्यावर्ती with पंक्ति of five सितारों.
the 50 stars on the flag represent the 50 राज्य of the United States of अमेरिका और the 13 stripes represent the तेरह British colonies that घोषित स्वतंत्रता from the किंगडम of ग्रेट Britain and became the first states in the Union.
nicknames for the flag include the `` Stars and Stripes '', `` Old Glory ``, और `` The Star-Spangled Banner. ''
India is a संघीय union of राज्य comprising twenty-eight states and seven संघ territories.
the states और territories are further subdivided into districts and so on.
Congressional जिले लिये the 113th संयुक्त States Congress
2010 जनसांख्यिकी change:
बदलें in apportionment of congressional districts, starting in 2013, as a result of the 2010 census.
2000 Census change:
Change in apportionment of congressional districts, from 2003 to 2013, as a result of the 2000 census.
This is a पूरा list of congressional districts लिये representation in the United राज्य हाउस of Representatives.
The मात्रा ( apportionment ) and boundaries ( redistricting ) of districts are determined after प्रत्येक census, although in some मामले राज्य have changed the boundaries अधिक than once per census.
इस list शामिल the 435 current and over 200 obsolete districts.
लिये example, चूंकि the 2000 census, नेब्रास्का रै had तीन districts, but it used to have as many as six.
in the पहला दशक of the twenty-first सदी, Texas had 32 जिले, लकिन रै since added चार due to reapportionment as a परिणाम of the 2010 census.
Other राज्य have खोया districts since the number of congressional seats रै been नियत at 435 by statute.
Also included here हैं non-voting delegations : छह वर्तमान और four obsolete.
The सीमाएँ of जिले often shift साथ प्रत्येक redistricting.
Over time, the प्रदेश and जनसांख्यिकी represented in a district can change substantially.
furthermore, districts sometimes retain the same boundaries जबकि बदलना उनके ज़िला numbers.
Mariah Carey ( born March 27, 1970 ) is an अमरीकी singer, songwriter, record निर्माता, अभिनेत्री, and philanthropist.
Under the मार्गदर्शन of Columbia रिकॉर्ड कार्यपालिका Tommy Mottola, Carey released her self-titled डेब्यू स्टुडियो एल्बम mariah Carey in 1990 ; it गई multi-platinum and शाखित चार लगातार क्रमांक one singles on the u.s. Billboard hot 100 चार्ट.
following her विवाह to Mottola in 1993 and success with hit records भाव ( 1991 ), म्यूज़िक बक्सा ( 1993 ), और Merry Christmas ( 1994 ), Carey थी स्थापित as Columbia 's highest-selling act.
Daydream ( 1995 ) बना music history when its second single `` One मीठी Day ``, a duet साथ Boyz II Men, spent a रिकार्ड sixteen weeks on top of the बिलबोर्ड Hot 100, और remains the longest-running number-one सोंग in u.S. चार्ट इतिहास.
During the recording of the album, Carey began to deviate इससे उसके R & B and pop beginnings and धीरे traversed into हिप हॉप.
इस musical बदलें became evident साथ the release of Butterfly ( 1997 ), at which time Carey था separated from mottola.
Carey left कोलंबिया in 2000, और हस्ताक्षरित a record-breaking $ 100 million रिकॉर्डिंग contract with Virgin Records.
Before the release of her first feature फिल्मी Glitter ( 2001 ), she suffered a शारीरिक and emotional विश्लेषण और थी hospitalized लिये कठोर थकावट.
Following the फिल्मी 's ग़रीब reception, she was bought out of उसके recording contract for $ 50 million, which led to a decline in उसके career.
She signed a multi-million dollar contract सौदे with Island रिकॉर्ड in 2002, और बाद an unsuccessful काल, returned to the शीर्ष of music charts साथ The emancipation of Mimi ( 2005 ).
इसके दूसरी सिंगल `` We belong Together `` became her most successful single of the 2000s, and was later नामित `` Song of the दशक '' by बिलबोर्ड.
कैरी once again ventured into film with a well-received starring भूमिका in ( 2009 ) ; वो थी awarded the `` भेदन Performance Award '' at the ताड़ Springs International Film पर्व, and Black Reel और NAACP चित्र Award nominations.
In a career spanning over two decades, Carey रै sold more than 200 लाख रिकॉर्ड worldwide, बनाना her one of the best-selling music artists of all time.
In 1998, she थी सम्मानित as the संसार 's best-selling रिकॉर्डिंग कलाकार of the 1990s at the World म्यूज़िक Awards.
कैरी was also नामित the best-selling female artist of the मिलेनियम in 2000.
according to the रिकॉर्डिंग उद्योग Association of अमेरिका, she is the तीसरा best-selling female कलाकार in the United राज्य, with 63.5 million certified albums.
साथ the रिलीज of `` Touch my Body `` ( 2008 ), Carey gained उसके eighteenth क्रमांक one सिंगल in the संयुक्त राज्य, अधिक than any other solo कलाकार.
In 2012, Carey was क्रमित second on VH1 's list of the `` 100 Greatest महिलाओं in Music ''.
Aside इससे her वाणिज्यिक accomplishments, कैरी has won five ग्रैमी पुरस्कार, 17 World Music Awards, 11 American Music Awards, and 31 Billboard Music Awards.
referred to as the `` songbird supreme '' by the Guinness World रिकॉर्ड, she is famed लिये her five-octave vocal range, शक्ति, melismatic स्टाइल and हस्ताक्षर उपयोग of the whistle register.
stratocumulus stratiformis cumulogenitus
in meteorology, a cloud is a visible mass of द्रव droplets or frozen crystals made of water or various chemicals निलंबित in the atmosphere above the surface of a planetary body.
ये निलंबित अणु are also known as aerosols.
Clouds in धरती 's माहौल are studied in the cloud भौतिकी शाखा of meteorology.
दो processes, possibly acting साथ, can lead to air बनने संतृप्त ; कूलिंग the एयर or adding जल vapor to the एयर.
In सामान्य, वर्षण will fall to the surface ; an एक्सेप्शन is virga, which evaporates पहले reaching the सतह.
the international cloud वर्गीकरण system is आधारित on the फैक्ट clouds in उनके most basic फ़ॉर्म can दिखाएँ free-convective upward विकास जैसे cumulus, appear in non-convective परतदार sheets such as स्ट्रेट्स, or लो the form of पतला तंतुमय wisps, as in the मामला of पक्षाभ.
prefixes are used in connection with बादल to एक्स्प्रेस variations or complexities in ये basic forms or to specify मध्य or ऊँची altitude ranges.
These include strato- लिये low clouds with limited convection कि रूप mostly in uneven परतों, cumulo- for जटिल highly-convective तूफ़ान बादल, nimbo- लिये मोटा परतदार clouds of कुछ complexity that can उपज moderate to heavy वर्षण, alto- लिये middle बादल, और cirro- for ऊँची clouds ; the latter दो of जिससे may be of सरल or मध्यम जटिल ढांचा.
whether or not a cloud is low, मध्य, or ऊँची स्तर depends on how far above the ground its आधार forms.
Cloud प्रकार साथ significant लंबवत extent can form in the कम or middle ऊँचाई ranges depending on the moisture content of the एयर.
Clouds in the क्षोभमण्डल have Latin names due to the popular adaptation of ल्यूक Howard 's cloud categorization system, जिससे began to spread in popularity दौरान दिसम्बर 1802.
Synoptic surface weather observations use code numbers to record and report the types of tropospheric बादल visible at प्रत्येक scheduled observation समय आधारित on the ऊँचाई and शारीरिक रूप of the बादल.
While a बहुमत of clouds रूप in धरती 's troposphere, वहीँ are occasions when बादल in the stratosphere and mesosphere can be observed.
These three main परतों of the atmosphere where clouds may be seen are collectively ज्ञात as the homosphere.
Above this lies the thermosphere और exosphere, which together make up the heterosphere that marks the transition to बाहरी space.
बादल have been observed on अन्य planets और moons भीतर the Solar प्रणाली, but, due to their different temperature characteristics, वे are रचित of अन्य substances ऐसे as मिथेन, ammonia, and sulfuric acid.
Galveston County is a county स्तिथ in the u.S. state of टेक्सास within the Houston–Sugar land–baytown महानगर area.
As of the 2010 जनसांख्यिकी, the population थी 291,309.
Its county सीट is Galveston.
League नगर is the largest नगर in Galveston काउंटी in terms of जनसांख्यिकी ; URL_http between 2000 and 2005 it surpassed galveston as the county 's largest नगर.
galveston County थी founded in 1838.

The बिग Ten सम्मेलन, formerly Western सम्मेलन और Big Nine Conference, is the oldest Division I college athletic सम्मेलन in the United States.
इसके बारह member institutions ( जिससे are primarily फ्लैगशिप research universities in उनके संबंधित states, well-regarded academically, और with अपेक्षाकृत large student नामांकन ) हैं स्तिथ primarily in the Midwest, stretching from नेब्रास्का in the वेस्ट to Penn राज्य in the east.
the सम्मेलन competes in the ncaa 's Division I ; इसके फ़ुटबॉल टीमों compete in the Football कटोरी Subdivision ( FBS ), formerly ज्ञात as Division I-A, the highest level of ncaa competition in that sport.
Member स्कूलों of the Big टेन ( or, in दो cases, their parent विश्वविद्यालयों systems ) also हैं members of the Committee on संस्थागत सहयोग, a leading educational and research consortium.
Despite the सम्मेलन 's name, the बिग Ten actually consists of 12 स्कूलों, following the जोड of The Pennsylvania State University in 1993 और the University of Nebraska–Lincoln in 2011.
In 2014, the conference will expand to 14 members साथ the additions of the विश्वविद्यालयों of Maryland, College Park और Rutgers, The राज्य विश्वविद्यालयों of नई Jersey.
It is not to be confused साथ the Big 12 Conference, जिससे has only टेन स्कूलों और represents a different प्रदेश of the देश.
Single Malt Scotch is single malt whisky made in Scotland using a घट still distillation प्रक्रम at a single डिस्टिलरी, with malted जौ as the only grain ingredient.
As साथ कोई Scotch whisky, a single malt Scotch must be distilled in स्कॉटलैंड और matured in ओक casks in Scotland for at तनिक three सालो ( सबसे सिंगल malts हैं matured longer ).
`` malt '' indicates कि the whisky is distilled इससे a `` malted '' grain.
Several types of दाने can be malted ( लिये उदाहरण, barley, rye and wheat are all grains which can be malted ) ; however, in the case of single malt स्कॉच, barley is सदा the only grain प्रयुक्त.
`` सिंगल '' indicates that all the malts in the बोतल आइये from a सिंगल डिस्टिलरी.
bottlings containing malt whisky from multiple distilleries are called `` blended malt ``.
Until the Scotch Whisky Regulations 2009 ( SWR 2009 ), the word `` blended '' तभी appeared ( in the context of स्कॉच whisky ) on बोतलों of whisky कि contained a मिश्रण of both barley और non-barley grain whisky, लकिन this is no longer the case.
Under the शब्दावली established by the swr 2009, a `` blended malt स्कॉच whisky '' is a मिश्रण of सिंगल malt स्कॉच whiskies, not a mixture of malted जौ व्हिस्की and non-barley व्हिस्की ; those हैं called `` blended Scotch whisky '', without the शब्द `` malt ''.
the term `` blended malt '' replaced `` vatted malt '' used under the prior लेबलिंग प्रथाओं.
The age statement on a बोतल of single malt स्कॉच is the number of सालो the व्हिस्की spent maturing in cask.
As very few whiskies are bottled from a single cask the आयु statement reflects the age of the youngest malt in the mix.
A texture may be arranged so as to, `` closely दृष्टिकोण the single-object status of fused-ensemble timbres, for example, the खूबसूरत 'northern लाइट्स ' कॉर्ड..., in a very interesting distribution of pitches, produces a fused sound supported by a suspended झांझ roll `` ( Erickson ( 1975 ), p.166 & 168 ).
In contrast to अधिक traditional musical textures, ध्वनि mass संयोजन `` minimizes the importance of individual pitches in वरीयता for texture, timbre, and dynamics as प्राथमिक shapers of gesture and impact. ''
Developed इससे the modernist टोन क्लस्टर and spread to orchestral writing by the late 1950s और 1960s, sound-mass `` obscures the boundary between ध्वनि और रव `` ( एडवर्ड्स 2001, pp. 326–27 ).
Techniques which may create or be प्रयुक्त with ध्वनि द्रव्यमान include extended techniques ऐसे as muted पीतल or स्ट्रिंग्स, आतुर tonguing, wide vibrato, चरम सीमाएँ, and glissandos.
composers and works शामिल Barbara kolb, Pauline oliveros ' Sound पैटर्न लिये chorus ( 1961 ), Norma Beecroft 's इससे सपनो of Brass for कोरस ( 1963–1964 ), and Nancy Van de vate.
Beecroft `` blurs व्यक्तिगत pitches in favor of a collective timbre through the उपयोग of vocal and instrumental क्लस्टर, choral speech, narrator, और a wash of sounds from an electronic टेप. ''
( ibid )
A very जल्दी उदाहरण is the opening of Jean-Féry विद्रोही 's ballet लेस Elémens ( 1737–38 ), where chaos is represented by a धीरे cumulating orchestral cluster of all seven टीप of the d minor scale ( henck 2004, pp. 52–54 ).
a later example is the third movement of Ruth क्रॉफर्ड Seeger 's String Quartet 1931 ( Nonesuch H-71280 ) while अधिक recently Phill Niblock 's multiple ड्रोन based म्यूज़िक serves as an उदाहरण.
The उपयोग of `` chords approaching timbres '' begins with Debussy और edgard Varèse प्रायः carefully scored individual instrumental parts so कि वे would fuse into एक ensemble timbre or sound द्रव्यमान ( Erickson 1975, pp. 18 and 21 ).
अन्य examples शामिल European `` textural '' रचनाएं of the fifties and sixties ऐसे as Krzysztof Penderecki 's Threnody to the पीड़ितों of Hiroshima ( 1959 ) और györgy Ligeti 's works featuring micropolyphony in works like Atmosphères ( 1961 ) and उसके Requiem ( 1963-65 ).
अन्य composers with works using this technique शामिल Henryk Górecki, Karel Husa, Witold lutosławski, kazimierz serocki, and Steven Stucky.
ध्वनि mass techniques भी appear in the music of George crumb ( anon. n.d. ).
