The song was also प्रयुक्त by World Wrestling Entertainment superstar Montel Vontavious Porter during उसके short कार्यावधि in रिंग of Honor.

Elizabeth ii ( एलिज़ाबेथ Alexandra Mary ; born 21 April 1926 ) is the संवैधानिक monarch of 16 sovereign states, ज्ञात as the Commonwealth realms, and उनके territories and dependencies, और head of the 54-member राष्ट्रमंडल of राष्ट्र.
She is परम् Governor of the Church of इंग्लैण्ड and, in some of उसके realms, carries the शीर्षक of Defender of the आस्था as भाग of her full शीर्षक.
on उसके accession on 6 February 1952, एलिज़ाबेथ became Head of the राष्ट्रमंडल and महारानी regnant of सात स्वतंत्र Commonwealth देशों : the United Kingdom, Canada, Australia, नई Zealand, South Africa, Pakistan और Ceylon.
इससे 1956 to 1992, the क्रमांक of her realms varied as territories gained independence and some realms became republics.
at present, in addition to the पहला four aforementioned देशों, Elizabeth is महारानी of Jamaica, Barbados, the Bahamas, Grenada, Papua New Guinea, the सुलेमान आइलैंड्स, तुवालू, संत Lucia, संत विंसेंट and the grenadines, Belize, Antigua and बारबूडा and संत Kitts and नेविस.
Her शासनकाल of सालो is currently the second longest for a British monarch ; only Queen Victoria रै reigned longer at over 63 सालो.
एलिज़ाबेथ was born in London and शिक्षित privately at home.
Her पिता acceded to the सिंहासन as George vi in 1936 on the abdication of his bhai Edward VIII, from जिससे time वो was the वारिस presumptive.
She began to undertake public duties during the Second World युद्ध, in जिससे वो परोसा in the Auxiliary Territorial Service.
In 1947, she married Prince Philip, Duke of एडिनबर्ग, with जिसको she has four children : चार्ल्स, ऐनी, Andrew, and Edward.
उसके coronation सेवा took place in 1953 and was the first to be televised.
The महारानी 's many ऐतिहासिक visits और meetings शामिल a state visit to the गणतंत्र of आयरलैंड and reciprocal visits to और from the पोप.
the Queen has seen major संवैधानिक changes in उसके realms, ऐसे as devolution in the संयुक्त Kingdom and the patriation of the Canadian संविधान.
Times of निजी significance have शामिल the births and विवाह of her children, the births of उसके grandchildren, the investiture of the प्रिंस of वेल्स, and the celebration of milestones such as her चांदी, Golden, and Diamond Jubilees in 1977, 2002, and 2012, क्रमशः.
Major कार्यक्रम in the महारानी 's शासनकाल have शामिल the परेशानियों in Northern Ireland, the Falklands War, wars with Iraq और the युद्ध in Afghanistan.
वहीँ have been times of personal विषाद for her which शामिल the मौत of her father at 56, the हत्या of Prince Philip 's uncle, Lord माउंटबेटन, the breakdown of her children 's विवाह in 1992 ( a साल deemed उसके annus horribilis ), the मौत in 1997 of her पूर्व daughter-in-law, डायना, Princess of वेल्स, और the deaths of her mother और sister in 2002.
the Queen has occasionally faced severe press आलोचना of the royal परिवार और रिपब्लिकन sentiments, but support लिये the monarchy और उसके निजी लोकप्रियता remain high.
christianity is the largest religion listed by australians in the national जनसांख्यिकी.
In the 2011 जनसांख्यिकी, 61.1 % of Australians यहूद listed as Christian.
Australia रै no official state धर्म और the ऑस्ट्रेलियाई Constitution protects स्वतंत्रता of धर्म.
the presence of Christianity in Australia began with the आगमन of the First Fleet of British convicts in 1788.
the धर्म grew to account for 96.1 % of the नेशनल population at the time of the Federation of ऑस्ट्रेलिया in 1901.
The Anglican Church of Australia ( formerly known as the गिरिजाघर of England in Australia ) remained the largest denomination जबतक 1986, when it थी surpassed by the Roman कैथोलिक Church in ऑस्ट्रेलिया.
Post-war multiculturalism and a decline in धार्मिक observance among कुछ sections of the population have diversified the demographics of धर्म in Australia.
Of the roughly 61 % identifying as Christian in 2011, the largest denominations were either Roman Catholic ( 25 % ) or anglican ( 17 % ), with the third largest denomination होने the 5 % संबद्ध with the Uniting Church in Australia.
Post-war immigration has grown the numbers belonging to चर्च like the Greek Orthodox Archdiocese of Australia and there are large and growing Pentecostal groups, such as सिडनी 's Hillsong Church.
The festivals of ईस्टर और क्रिसमस are पब्लिक छुट्टियाँ in Australia.
around a quarter of students attend church स्कूलों and Christian organisations are अग्रणी non-government प्रदाताओं of health and welfare सेवाएं through organisations like Catholic Health ऑस्ट्रेलिया, Anglicare, UnitingCare Australia, the Salvation फौज and St Vincent de पॉल समाज.
historically significant Australian ईसाइयों have शामिल Rev dr John dunmore Lang, संत मरियम MacKillop, कैथरीन Helen Spence, Pastor David Unaipon, the रेवरेंड John flynn and पादरी Sir Doug Nicholls.
High profile contemporary Australian ईसाइयों include : टिम कॉस्टेलो बैपटिस्ट मंत्री और current सीईओ of World Vision ऑस्ट्रेलिया, फ़्रैंक ब्रेनन, जेसुइट human अधिकारों lawyer, कार्डिनल जार्ज Pell, Catholic Archbishop of Sydney, Phillip Aspinall the current anglican Primate and Archbishop of Brisbane, Kevin Rudd, पूर्व Labor Prime मंत्री, and Tony एबॉट, नेता लिये the Federal Opposition उदार पार्टी.
चार्टर creating Collegiate स्कूल, जिससे became Yale College, अक्तूबर 9, 1701
Yale विश्वविद्यालयों is a private Ivy League research university located in नई Haven, कनेक्टिकट.
संस्थापित in 1701 in the उपनिवेश of Connecticut, the university is the third-oldest institution of उच्चतर education in the संयुक्त States.
originally chartered as the `` Collegiate स्कूल '', the संस्था traces इसके roots to 17th-century clergymen who sought to establish a college to ट्रैन clergy और राजनैतिक leaders for the उपनिवेश.
in 1718, the College was renamed `` Yale कॉलेज '' to honor a तोहफा from Elihu yale, a governor of the British ईस्ट इण्डिया कम्पनी.
In 1861, the ग्रैजुएट School of कला and Sciences became the first U.S. संस्था to award the phd. Yale became a founding सदस्य of the संघ of American Universities in 1900.
yale College थी रूपांतरित, शुरूआत in the 1930s, through the establishment of residential colleges : 12 now exist and two अधिक are planned.
Yale employs over 1,100 faculty to teach and सलाह about 5,300 undergraduate and 6,100 graduate and पेशेवर विद्यार्थी.
Almost all tenured professors सिखा undergraduate पाठ्यक्रम, more than 2,000 of which हैं offered annually.
The विश्वविद्यालयों 's एसेट include an endowment valued at $ 19.4 billion, the second-largest of कोई अकादमिक संस्था in the संसार.
Yale 's system of more than two dozen libraries holds 12.5 million आयतन.
49 नोबेल Laureates have been संबद्ध with the University as विद्यार्थी, संकाय, and staff.
Yale रै उत्पादित अनेक notable alumni, including five u.S. Presidents, 19 U.S. Supreme अदालत Justices, और अनेक foreign heads of state.
At the graduate level, Yale Law School, Yale स्कूल of Art, और Yale स्कूल of Drama हैं consistently ranked the शीर्ष programs in their field.
Yale विधि स्कूल is the सबसे selective विधि स्कूल in the United States.
Yale विद्यार्थी compete intercollegiately as the Yale Bulldogs in the NCAA Division I Ivy लीग.
The oldest intercollegiate एथलेटिक event in the United States is the yale-harvard regatta.
artemisia tridentata ( `` बिग sagebrush '' or `` sagebrush '' ) is an खुशबूदार shrub इससे the family Asteraceae, which grows in arid और semi-arid शर्तें, throughout a दायरा of cold मरुस्थल, steppe, and mountain habitats in the Intermountain West of North अमेरिका.
The vernacular name `` sagebrush '' is भी प्रयुक्त for several related members of the genus Artemisia, ऐसे as California Sagebrush ( Artemisia californica ).
Big Sagebrush and अन्य Artemisia प्रजाति are the dominant plants आरपार large portions of the ग्रेट जलाशय, covering कुछ 422,000 वर्गाकार miles in 11 पश्चिमी U.S. & कनाडाई राज्य.
it is the state flower of Nevada.
sagebrush provides food and habitat for a किस्में of species, such as sage grouse, pronghorn antelope, gray vireo, सानो rabbit, and खच्चर हिरण.
बिग sagebrush was प्रयुक्त as an herbal आयुर्विज्ञान by देशी अमेरिकी throughout the Intermountain वेस्ट of North america—especially लिये preventing संक्रमण in wounds, stopping internal bleeding, and treating headaches and colds.
chemically, the active medicinal constituents शामिल camphor, terpenoids, and tannins.
अनेक major threats मौजूद to ऋषि ब्रश ecosystems, including human settlements, परिवर्तन to agricultural जमीन, livestock grazing, invasive plant प्रजाति, wildfires, and जलवायु change.
याहू ! Mail is a free email service offered by the अमरीकी search engine कम्पनी याहू !
it was launched in 1997, and, according to comScore, याहू ! Mail is the third-largest web-based ईमेल service with 281 लाख उपयोक्ता as of December 2012.
फिलहाल, याहू ! offers three संस्करण of Yahoo ! Mail.
The traditional `` याहू ! मेल Classic '' continues the availability of the original इंटरफ़ेस introduced in 1997.
A संस्करण introduced in 2005 शामिल a new Ajax interface, drag-and-drop features, improved search functionality, कुंजीपटल shortcuts, पता auto-complete, tabs, और other अद्यतनीकृत सुविधाएँ.
In October 2010, Yahoo ! released a बीटा संस्करण of Yahoo ! Mail, which included सुधार to the design, performance, search functionality, और Facebook integration.
in May 2011, beta testing लिये the नई संस्करण stopped, and it became the डिफॉल्ट interface for याहू ! Mail.
in जल्दी 2008, याहू ! began offering unlimited mail storage to इसके उपयोक्ता in response to heated competition in the free web-mail market segment.
on June 27, 2009, Yahoo ! मेसेंजर थी integrated साथ Yahoo ! Mail.
टकोमा (, ) is a mid-sized शहरी port नगर और the county सीट of Pierce County, Washington, संयुक्त राज्य.
The नगर is on Washington 's Puget ध्वनि, दक्षिणपश्चिम of Seattle, northeast of the state capital, ओलंपिया, और northwest of Mount rainier नेशनल Park.
The जनसांख्यिकी was 198,397, according to the 2010 जनसांख्यिकी.
टकोमा is the second-largest नगर in the Puget ध्वनि area and the तीसरा largest in the राज्य.
टकोमा भी serves as the center of कारोबार activity for the दक्षिण Sound प्रदेश, which has a जनसांख्यिकी of around 1 लाख लोगों.
टकोमा adopted इसके name after the nearby Mount Rainier, originally called माउंट Tahoma.
It is known as the `` City of नियति '' क्युकी the क्षेत्रफल was चुनी to be the western टर्मिनस of the Northern प्रशांत Railroad in the लेट 19th सदी.
The decision of the रेलरोड was influenced by टकोमा 's neighboring deep-water हार्बर, Commencement खाड़ी.
By connecting the खाड़ी साथ the रेलरोड Tacoma 's motto became `` When rails मिलें sails. ''
Today Commencement Bay serves the Port of टकोमा, a बीच of international trade on the प्रशांत Coast और Washington state 's largest port.
Like most सेंट्रल cities, Tacoma suffered a prolonged decline in the mid-20th century as a result of suburbanization and divestment.
चूंकि the 1990s, developments in the downtown कोर include the University of वॉशिंगटन टकोमा ; Tacoma कड़ी, the first आधुनिक इलेक्ट्रिक लाइट रेल service in the state ; the राज्य 's highest घनत्व of art और इतिहास museums ; and a restored urban waterfront, the thea foss Waterway.
With a long इतिहास of blue-collar labor politics — from the railroad मजदूर of the 19th century, to the longshoremen of the 20th century, to the मजदूर तैयार मजदूर of today — Tacoma रै long महरूम ज्ञात for its rough, किरकिरी चित्र.
A सोंग परिचय टकोमा, `` Thrice All अमरीकी '', by American singer-songwriter and former resident neko मामला, describes it as `` a dusty old jewel in the दक्षिण Puget ध्वनि / where the कारखानों churn / and the timber 's all cut bas ''.
Tacoma-Pierce County has महरूम named one of the सबसे livable areas in the देश.
Tacoma was भी recently सूचीबद्ध as the 19th most walkable नगर in the country.
in कंट्रास्ट, the city is भी क्रमित as the सबसे stressed-out नगर in the country in a 2004 survey.
in 2006, women 's पत्रिका स्वः named Tacoma the `` सबसे Sexually Healthy नगर '' in the संयुक्त States.
in 2012, The Advocate gave Tacoma the शीर्षक of `` Gayest नगर in America '', in part because of the विशाल विविधता of पब्लिक कार्यालयों आयोजित, और Washington State गुजर a विधेयक in 2012 allowing LGBT couples to निकाह.
Tacoma is famous लिये the 1940 पतन of the Tacoma narrows सेतु.
chula Vista ( ; ) is the second largest city in the San डिएगो metropolitan क्षेत्रफल, the सातवाँ largest city in दक्षिणी California, the fourteenth largest नगर in the राज्य of कैलिफ़ोर्निया, और the 77th-largest city in the United राज्य.
the जनसांख्यिकी थी 243,916 as of the 2010 census.
Located just from शहर सैन डिएगो and इससे the Mexican border in the South Bay region of the metropolitan area, the city is at the center of one of the richest आर्थिक और culturally विविध zones in the संयुक्त States.
chula विस्टा is so नामित क्युकी of its scenic location between the सैन Diego Bay और तटीय mountain foothills.
संस्थापित in the जल्दी 19th century, fast जनसांख्यिकी विकास has recently महरूम observed in the city.
As the second largest city in San डिएगो काउंटी, chula Vista has quickly become a गंतव्य popular to अनेक tourists.
स्तिथ in the city is one of America 's few year-round संयुक्त States Olympic Training centers और लोकप्रिय पर्यटक destinations शामिल Cricket बेतार Amphitheater, the Chula Vista marina, और the Chula Vista Nature Center.
Metes and bounds is a प्रणाली or विधि of describing जमीन, real property ( in contrast to निजी property ) or real estate.
The system रै been प्रयुक्त in इंग्लैण्ड for अनेक सदियां, and is स्टिल used वहीँ in the definition of general सीमाएँ.
By custom, it was applied in the original तेरह colonies कि became the संयुक्त राज्य, और in many अन्य land jurisdictions based on English आम law.
typically the प्रणाली उपयोग physical सुविधाएँ of the local भूगोल, along with directions और दूरियाँ, to define और describe the boundaries of a parcel of land.
The boundaries are वर्णित in a कार्यशील prose style, working around the parcel in अनुक्रम, from a point of शुरूआत, returning back to the same point ; compare with the मौखिक ritual of beating the bounds.
it may include references to अन्य adjoining parcels ( and their स्वामी ), और it, in turn, could भी be referred to in बाद surveys.
At the समय the वर्णन is compiled, it may have महरूम marked on the मैदान with स्थाई monuments placed जहाँ there यहूद no suitable natural monuments.
the term `` metes '' refers to a boundary defined by the measurement of each सीधा run, निर्दिष्ट by a अलहदा between the terminal अंक, and an अभिविन्यास or direction.
a direction may be a simple compass bearing, or a precise orientation संकल्पित by सटीक सर्वेक्षण methods.
the term `` bounds '' refers to a more general boundary वर्णन, such as along a certain watercourse, a stone wall, an adjoining public road रास्ता, or an existing building.
The system is प्रायः used to define larger pieces of property ( e.g. farms ), और political subdivisions ( e.g. कस्बा boundaries ) where precise definition is not required or होता be दूर too महंगी, or previously designated सीमाएँ can be incorporated into the वर्णन.
सर इसहाक़ Newton ( 25 दिसम्बर 164220 कूच 1727 ) was an अंग्रेज़ी physicist और mathematician who is widely regarded as एक of the most influential वैज्ञानिकों of all समय और as a कुंजी figure in the scientific क्रान्ति.
His book philosophiæ naturalis प्रिन्सिपिया Mathematica ( `` गणितीय Principles of Natural Philosophy '' ), पहला published in 1687, रखी the foundations for सबसे of classical mechanics.
न्यूटन also बना seminal contributions to optics और साझा क्रेडिट साथ Gottfried लैबनिट्ज़ लिये the आविष्कार of the infinitesimal calculus.
Newton 's प्रिन्सिपिया formulated the laws of motion और सार्वभौमिक gravitation कि वर्चस्व scientists ' view of the physical universe for the अगला three centuries.
it also demonstrated that the गति of objects on the Earth and that of celestial लाशें could be described by the same principles.
By deriving Kepler 's कानून of planetary motion from उसके mathematical description of गम्भीरता, Newton removed the last संदेह परिचय the वैध of the heliocentric मॉडल of the cosmos.
न्यूटन built the first practical reflecting telescope और विकसित a सिद्धान्त of colour आधारित on the observation that a प्रिज़्म decomposes white light into the many रंग of the दृश्य वर्णक्रम.
He भी formulated an अनुभवजन्य law of cooling and पढ़ाई the गति of sound.
In addition to his कार्य on the calculus, as a गणितज्ञ न्यूटन contributed to the study of शक्ति श्रेणी, generalised the द्विपद theorem to non-integer exponents, और developed Newton 's method for approximating the जड़ें of a फलन.
न्यूटन was a fellow of Trinity College and the second lucasian Professor of Mathematics at the विश्वविद्यालयों of कैम्ब्रिज.
he was a devout but unorthodox Christian और, unusually लिये a member of the कैम्ब्रिज faculty, he refused to लो holy orders in the गिरिजाघर of England, शायद क्युकी he privately अस्वीकृत the doctrine of trinitarianism.
In addition to his work on the गणितीय sciences, न्यूटन also dedicated much of his time to the पढ़ाई of alchemy and biblical chronology, लकिन सबसे of his work in those areas remained unpublished जबतक long बाद his मौत.
In his later life, Newton became president of the Royal Society.
he also served the British सरकारी as Warden और Master of the royal Mint.
Prof. वाल्टर Lewin explains Newton 's विधि of gravitation in MIT course 8.01
satellites and projectiles all obey Newton 's विधि of gravitation
न्यूटन 's law of सार्वभौमिक gravitation states that प्रत्येक point mass in the ब्रह्मांड attracts प्रत्येक अन्य पाइंट mass with a force that is directly आंशिक to the product of their masses और inversely आंशिक to the square of the distance between उन्हें.
( Separately it was shown कि large spherically सममित masses attract और हैं आकर्षित as if सब उनके द्रव्यमान were concentrated at उनके centers. )
इस is a general physical विधि derived from अनुभवजन्य observations by what न्यूटन called प्रेरण.
It is a भाग of classical यांत्रिकी and थी formulated in Newton 's work Philosophiæ Naturalis Principia mathematica ( `` the Principia '' ), first published on 5 July 1687.
( When न्यूटन 's book was प्रस्तुत in 1686 to the royal समाज, रॉबर्ट hooke बना a claim कि न्यूटन था प्राप्त the inverse square विधि from him – देखिए History section नीचे. )
In आधुनिक language, the law states the following:
Assuming SI units, F is measured in newtons ( N ), m1 and m2 in गामा ( kg ), r in meters ( m ), और the निरंतर g is लगभग बराबर to.
the value of the निरंतर G was पहला accurately determined from the results of the कैवेंडिश प्रयोग conducted by the British scientist Henry Cavendish in 1798, हालांकि Cavendish किया not खुद गणना a numerical value for g.
This प्रयोग was also the पहला परीक्षण of Newton 's theory of gravitation between masses in the प्रयोगशाला.
It took place 111 years after the publication of न्यूटन 's Principia and 71 years after Newton 's death, so none of Newton 's calculations could use the value of g ; instead he could तभी calculate a फ़ोर्स relative to another force.
Newton 's विधि of gravitation resembles Coulomb 's law of electrical forces, जिससे is प्रयुक्त to calculate the परिमाण of विद्युत फ़ोर्स between दो charged bodies.
Both are inverse-square laws, in जिससे फ़ोर्स is inversely आंशिक to the square of the अलहदा between the bodies.
Coulomb 's Law has the उत्पाद of two आरोप in place of the product of the masses, और the electrostatic constant in place of the gravitational constant.
Newton 's law रै since been superseded by Einstein 's theory of सामान्य आपेक्षिकता, but it continues to be used as an बेहतरीन approximation of the effects of गम्भीरता.
Relativity is जरूरी only when there is a need for extreme परिशुद्धता, or when dealing with gravitation for extremely massive and dense वस्तुएँ.
श्वेत और रेड flags, representing इराकी और American मौतों, sit in the ग्रास चतुष्कोण of the Valley Library on the Corvallis, Oregon, campus of Oregon State University.
As भाग of the traveling Iraq देह गिनती exhibit from 2008 to 2009 ( not सम्बन्धित to इराकी देह गिनती project ), the ध्वज उद्देश्य to `` raise awareness of the human लागत of the इराकी War. ''
( May 2008 )
हताहत of the conflict in Iraq since 2003 ( शुरूआत साथ the 2003 invasion of Iraq, और continuing with the ensuing occupation of Iraq, as well as the activities of the विभिन्न armed groups operating in the country ) have come in अनेक forms, और the accuracy of the सूचना available on different types of Iraq युद्ध हताहत varies greatly.
The तालिका below summarizes various estimates of the Iraqi casualty figures.
For troops in the U.S.-led multinational गठबन्धन, the मौत टोल is carefully tracked and updated daily, और the names and photographs of those killed in कार्रवाई as well as in दुर्घटनाओं have महरूम प्रकाशित widely.
A कुल of 4,486 U.S. सैनिको were मारे in इराकी between 2003 and 2012.
regarding the इराकी, however, सूचना on both military और civilian casualties is दोनो less precise और less consistent.
Estimates of casualty स्तर are उपलब्धियाँ from reporters on the scene, इससे officials of involved संगठन, and from groups that summarize information on incidents reported in the न्यूज media.
The शब्द `` casualties `` in its सबसे general sense शामिल the घायल as खूब as the dead.
खाते of the क्रमांक of coalition wounded vary widely, partly because it is नहीं obvious what चाहिए be गिने : चाहिए only those चोटों गंभीर पर्याप्त to put a सिपाही आउट of commission be शामिल ?
do बीमारियों or injuries caused by दुर्घटनाओं count, or चाहिए the फ़ोकस be restricted to wounds caused by hostile सगाई ?
स्त्रोत using अलग definitions may arrive at very अलग संख्याएँ, और sometimes the precise परिभाषा is not clearly निर्दिष्ट.
asalto al coche ( Robbery of the coach ), by Francisco de Goya
A highwayman was a thief और brigand जो preyed on travellers.
This type of outlaw usually travelled and robbed by घोड़ा, as compared to a footpad who travelled and robbed on पैर.
आरोहित लुटेरों were widely माना to be socially superior to footpads.
ऐसे robbers संचालित in ग्रेट ब्रिटेन and आयरलैंड from the Elizabethan era जबतक the जल्दी 19th century.
The शब्द highwayman is पहला ज्ञात to be प्रयुक्त in the year 1617 ; other euphemisms शामिल `` knights of the सड़क '' और `` gentlemen of the सड़क. ''
Two शर्तें applied to 19th-century North अमरीकी highwaymen यहूद road agents in some उदाहरण लिये पहाड़ डाकुओं जबकि in other मामले the term is Rlallaala लिये mountain-based ruffians.
In the वही time period in Australia, they were ज्ञात as bushrangers.
earvin `` जादू '' जॉनसन, Jr. ( born August 14, 1959 ) is a retired अमरीकी professional बास्केट player who निभाई पाइंट गार्ड for the Los एंजिल्स Lakers of the National बास्केट Association ( NBA ).
After जीतना championships in high स्कूल और college, Johnson थी चयनित पहला overall in the 1979 एनबीए Draft by the Lakers.
he won a championship and an NBA फाइनल सबसे Valuable Player पुरस्कार in उसके रुकी ऋतु, and won four more championships साथ the लेकर्स during the 1980s.
जॉनसन retired abruptly in 1991 बाद announcing that he था contracted HIV, लकिन returned to play in the 1992 all-star Game, winning the All-Star mvp Award.
बाद विरोध इससे his fellow players, he रिटायर्ड again for four सालो, लकिन लौटे in 1996, at आयु 36, to खेल 32 खेल for the Lakers पहले retiring for the तीसरा और फाइनल समय.
जॉनसन 's career उपलब्धियाँ include three NBA MVP Awards, nine एनबीए Finals appearances, बारह all-star games, और ten all-nba पहला and Second टोली nominations.
He led the लीग in regular-season assists चार टाइम्स, and is the NBA 's all-time leader in औसत assists प्रति game, at 11.2.
जॉनसन थी a member of the `` Dream Team ``, the u.S. basketball team that won the Olympic gold पदक in 1992.
After leaving the NBA in 1992, जॉनसन formed the Magic Johnson all-stars, a barnstorming team that travelled around the संसार playing exhibition खेल.
जॉनसन was honored as one of the 50 महानतम खिलाड़ी in NBA History in 1996, and enshrined in the Basketball Hall of कीर्ति in 2002.
He थी rated the greatest NBA point guard of all समय by ईएसपीएन in 2007.
उसके दोस्ती and फंसने with बोस्टन Celtics star लैरी बर्ड, whom he faced in the 1979 ncaa finals और three NBA चैंपियनशिप श्रेणी, were well documented.
चूंकि his retirement, Johnson रै been an एडवोकेट लिये hiV/ AIDS prevention and सुरक्षित sex, as well as an entrepreneur, philanthropist, प्रसारणकर्ता और प्रेरक speaker.
Johnson was a part-owner of the लेकर्स for अनेक सालो, and was part of a group that खरीदा the Los एंजिल्स Dodgers in 2012.
Allium cells in different phases of the cell साईकिल
The cells of eukaryotes ( बाएँ ) and prokaryotes ( सही )
The cell is the basic structural, functional और biological ईकाई of all known जीना जीवों.
It is the smallest ईकाई of life कि is classified as a जीना thing ( except वायरस, जिससे consists तभी इससे dna/rna covered by प्रोटीन and lipids ), and is प्रायः पुकारा the भवन ब्लाक of life.
it consists of a जीवद्रव्य enclosed within a झिल्ली, which contains many biomolecules such as प्रोटीन and nucleic acids.
Organisms can be वर्गीकृत as unicellular ( consisting of a सिंगल cell ; including सबसे bacteria ) or बहुकोशिकीय ( including plants and animals ).
जबकि the क्रमांक of cells in पौधे and animals varies from प्रजाति to species, इंसानो contain about 100 खरब ( 1014 ) cells.
सबसे plant and एनिमल कोशिकाएं हैं between 1 and 100 micrometres और therefore are दृश्य तभी अंतर्गत the सूक्ष्मदर्शी.
The cell was खोजा by Robert Hooke in 1665.
the कोशिका theory, पहला विकसित in 1839 by matthias Jakob Schleiden and Theodor Schwann, राज्य that सब organisms are composed of one or more cells, कि all कोशिकाएं come from preexisting cells, that vital कृत्यों of an organism occur भीतर कोशिकाएं, और कि all cells contain the hereditary सूचना जरुरी लिये regulating cell कृत्यों और लिये transmitting information to the अगला पीढी of कोशिकाएं.
Cells emerged on planet Earth at least 4.0–4.3 billion years पहले.
The word cell comes इससे the लैटिन गर्भगृह, meaning `` छोटी रूम ''.
the descriptive पद for the smallest जीना biological ढांचा was coined by Robert hooke in a book he published in 1665 when he compared the cork कोशिकाएं he देखी through his microscope to the small कक्ष भिक्षुओं lived in.
Grecian सूत्र is a men 's hair coloring product in the United States.
Canada और यूरोपीय previously बैन the product क्युकी of इसके use of सीसे acetate.
A motor scooter 's front साथ an अव्यवहारिक number और variety of headlamps, added for decorative उद्देश्य
A headlamp is a lamp attached to the सामने of a vehicle to लाइट the सड़क ahead.
headlamp performance has steadily improved throughout the ऑटोमोबाइल आयु, spurred by the great disparity between daytime and nighttime ट्रैफ़िक fatalities : the u.S. National राजमार्ग ट्रैफ़िक सुरक्षा Administration states that nearly half of all traffic-related fatalities occur in the अंधेरा, despite तभी 25 % of ट्रैफ़िक यात्राएं दौरान darkness.
While it is आम लिये the term headlight to be used interchangeably in informal discussion, headlamp is the term for the यंत्र itself, जबकि हेडलाइट properly refers to the beam of लाइट उत्पादित and distributed by the यंत्र.
Other vehicles, such as रेल and वायुयान, are required to have headlamps.
Bicycle headlamps हैं often प्रयुक्त on साइकिल, and are जरूरी in some jurisdictions.
वे can be संचालित by a battery or a छोटी electrical सृजनकर्ता on the व्हील.
Additionally automotive रात्रि दृष्टि systems कार्य to संपूरक headlamps.
Women 's rights are the अधिकारों और entitlements claimed for women and girls of many समाजों विश्वव्यापी.
In कुछ places these rights are institutionalized or supported by विधि, local custom, and behaviour, whereas in others they may be ignored or suppressed.
They differ from broader धारणाएं of इंसान rights through दावा of an अंतर्निहित historical and परंपरागत bias against the कसरत of rights by महिलाओं and girls in favour of मेन and boys.
मुद्दे commonly associated with notions of women 's अधिकारों शामिल, हालांकि are not limited to, the सही : to bodily अखंडता और autonomy ; to vote ( suffrage ) ; to थाम पब्लिक दफ्तर ; to कार्य ; to fair मजदूरी or equal pay ; to own property ; to शिक्षा ; to serve in the military or be conscripted ; to डालें into विधिक contracts ; and to have वैवाहिक, parental and धार्मिक अधिकारों.
Caryn Elaine Johnson, best known as Whoopi गोल्डबर्ग (, ( born November 13, 1955 ) is an American comedienne, actress, singer-songwriter, political activist, लेखक और talk दिखाएँ host.
Goldberg made उसके film डेब्यू in the Color जामुनी ( 1985 ), playing celie, a mistreated black woman in the Deep South.
She received a नामांकन for the Academy Award for बेहतरीन Actress और won her पहला Golden ग्लोब पुरस्कार लिये her role in the film.

This performance won her a second सुनहरी ग्लोब and an Academy पुरस्कार for बेहतरीन Supporting Actress ; इस बना Goldberg only the second black woman in the history of the अकादमी Awards to जीत an acting Oscar—the first होने Hattie mcdaniel who जीती for Gone With the हवा in 1939.
notable बाद films include Sister अधिनियम and Sister अधिनियम 2, The खिलाड़ी, Made in अमेरिका, कैसा Stella मिला उसके नाली Back, Girl, बाधित and Rat Race.

गोल्डबर्ग रै been nominated for 13 Emmy पुरस्कार for her work in television.
She थी co-producer of the popular game show हॉलीवुड Squares from 1998 to 2004.
वो रै महरूम the मॉडरेटर of the daytime बात show the View since 2007.
Goldberg has a Grammy, दो Daytime Emmys, दो Golden Globes, a टोनी ( लिये production, नहीं एक्टिंग ), and an Oscar.
In जोड, Goldberg has a अंग्रेजों Academy फिल्मी पुरस्कार, four People 's Choice पुरस्कार, and has been सम्मानित with a star on the Hollywood चलना of कीर्ति.
She is one of the few entertainers जो have won an Emmy, Grammy, Oscar, and Tony पुरस्कार.
the National हॉकी लीग ( NHL ; ) is an `` unincorporated not-for-profit संघ '' which operates a major professional बर्फ हॉकी league of 30 franchised सदस्य clubs, of which seven are फिलहाल located in कनाडा और 23 in the संयुक्त राज्य.
Headquartered in New York City, the NHL is widely माना to be the premier पेशेवर बर्फ hockey लीग in the संसार, and एक of the प्रमुख पेशेवर sports leagues in the United राज्य and Canada.
the Stanley Cup, the oldest professional खेल trophy in North America, is awarded annually to the league playoff champion at the end of each ऋतु.
The लीग was organized on नवम्बर 26, 1917, in मॉन्ट्रियल, क्यूबेक, Canada, बाद the suspension of operations of its पूर्ववर्ती organization, the National Hockey Association ( NHA ), which had been founded in 1909.
It started with four teams और, through a series of expansions, contractions, and relocations, the league is now composed of 30 क्रियाशील franchises.
the nation to which the नाम of the league originally referred was कनाडा, हालांकि the league has अभी महरूम binational since 1924 जब it expanded into the United States.
After a labour विवाद that led to the रद्दीकरण of the entire 2004–05 season, the league resumed play अंतर्गत a नई collective bargaining agreement that शामिल a सैलरी cap.
in 2009, the NHL enjoyed record highs in शर्तें of sponsorships, उपस्थिति, and टेलीविज़न audiences.
the एनएचएल draws अनेक highly skilled खिलाड़ी इससे all over the world and फिलहाल has players from about 20 different countries.
Although canadians have historically constituted the बहुमत of the players in the NHL, over the पास्ट four plus decades the percentages of US and यूरोपीय players have increased दोनो क्युकी of the NHL 's continued expansion इससे छह to तीस clubs since 1967, and the increased उपलब्धता of अत्यधिक skilled यूरोपीय players.
Maggots feeding on carrion.
A maggot is the लार्वा of a fly ( order Diptera ) ; it is applied in particular to the larvae of Brachyceran उड़ता, ऐसे as houseflies, cheese flies, and blowflies, rather than larvae of the Nematocera, ऐसे as मच्छरों और Crane flies.
`` Maggot '' is नहीं a technical term and should not be taken as ऐसे ; in many मानक पाठ्यपुस्तकों of entomology it does नहीं appear in the index at all.
In many non-technical ग्रन्थ the term is प्रयुक्त लिये कीट लार्वे in general.
Other sources have coined उनके own definitions ; लिये example : ``...
the term applies to a grub जब सब ट्रेस of limbs has disappeared... '' और ``... लागू to the footless लार्वे of Dipters. ''
maggot-like fly larvae are of चौड़ी महत्व in पारिस्थितिकी and medicine ; among अन्य roles, various प्रजाति are prominent in recycling carrion और garbage, attacking फसलों and foodstuffs, spreading microbial infections, और causing myiasis.
Herod (, hordos, Greek :, Hērōdēs ), also known as Herod the Great ( 73/74 BCE – 4 BCE in Jericho ), थी a Roman client king of judea.
His epithet of `` the Great '' is widely disputed as he is described as `` a madman जो murdered उसके own परिवार and a great अनेक rabbis ``.
He is भी known for उसके colossal building प्रोजेक्ट in Jerusalem and elsewhere, including उसके expansion of the Second Temple in Jerusalem ( sometimes referred to as हेरोदेस 's टेम्पल ) और the construction of the बंदरगाहों at Caesarea Maritima.
Important details of his biography are gleaned इससे the works of the 1st century ce Roman–Jewish इतिहासकार josephus Flavius.
the Romans made हेरोदेस 's son, Herod Archelaus, ethnarch of Judea, Samaria, और Idumea ( biblical edom ) from 4 BCE to 6 ce, referred to as the tetrarchy of Judea.
Archelaus थी judged incompetent by the Roman emperor Augustus who तब संयुक्त Samaria, Judea proper और Idumea into Iudaea province under rule of a prefect until age 41.
हेरोदेस 's अन्य son हेरोदेस antipas was tetrarch of galilee इससे 4 BCE–39 CE.
ABO blood group antigens present on red रक्त cells और IgM antibodies present in the serum
the ABO blood समूह प्रणाली is the सबसे important blood प्रकार system ( or blood group प्रणाली ) in human blood transfusion.
The संबद्ध anti-a and anti-b antibodies are usually IgM antibodies, जिससे हैं प्रायः produced in the पहला years of जीवन by sensitization to environmental substances such as खाना, जीवाणु, and viruses.
ABO blood प्रकार are भी present in some other पशु, for उदाहरण apes ऐसे as chimpanzees, bonobos, and gorillas.
Year 1907 ( mcmvii ) was a common साल starting on Tuesday ( link होगा प्रदर्शक the full calendar ) of the Gregorian calendar and a आम year starting on सोमवार of the 13-day-slower Julian calendar.
northville is an affluent नगर स्तिथ in और divided by ओकलैंड और Wayne counties in the U.S. state of मिशिगन.
The क्षेत्रफल is a suburb of Metropolitan Detroit.
the जनसांख्यिकी was 5,970 at the 2010 census.

the city is स्तिथ northeast of Ann Arbor और northwest of Detroit.

Misfits is a अंग्रेजों science fiction comedy-drama टेलीविज़न दिखाएँ परिचय a group of young offenders sentenced to work in a जातियाँ service कार्यक्रम, where they obtain supernatural powers after a strange विद्युत तूफ़ान.
the series opened in 2009 और is currently ongoing.
Antonia Thomas, Iwan Rheon, Lauren Socha, Nathan Stewart-Jarrett, and रॉबर्ट Sheehan हैं introduced as Alisha Daniels, साइमन Bellamy, Kelly Bailey, Curtis Donovan, and Nathan यंग respectively.
sheehan left बाद the second series, replaced in the third by जोसेफ Gilgun as Rudy Wade.

Brett lorenzo Favre ( born October 10, 1969 ) is a पूर्व American football quarterback जो spent the majority of his करियर with the Green Bay Packers of the National फ़ुटबॉल League ( NFL ).
He was a 20-year veteran of the एनएफएल, having played quarterback लिये the Atlanta Falcons ( 1991 ), Green खाड़ी Packers ( 1992 – 2007 ), New यॉर्क Jets ( 2008 ) और Minnesota Vikings ( 2009 – 2010 ).
Favre is the तभी क्वार्टरबैक in एनएफएल इतिहास to throw लिये over 70,000 गज, over 500 touchdowns, over 300 interceptions, over 6,000 completions, और over 10,000 pass कोशिशें.
favre प्रारंभ at the क्वार्टरबैक स्थिति लिये the University of Southern मिसिसिपी for four years पहले होने selected in the second round of the 1991 NFL Draft by अटलांटा ( 33rd overall ).
He was traded to Green Bay on February 10, 1992, लिये the 19th pick in the 1992 एनएफएल ड्राफ्ट.
favre became the Packers ' starting क्वार्टरबैक in the fourth खेल of the 1992 season, stepping in लिये injured quarterback Don majkowski, and started every game through the 2007 season.
he was traded to the नई York Jets and started at क्वार्टरबैक for the 2008 season before signing with the वाइकिंग्स on August 18, 2009 as उनके starting quarterback.
He made an NFL record 297 लगातार starts ( 321 including playoffs ).
He is the only player to win the AP Most मूल्यवान खिलाड़ी तीन consecutive टाइम्स ( 1995–97 ).
He has led teams to eight division championships ( 1995, 1996, 1997, 2002, 2003, 2004, 2007, 2009 ), five nfc चैंपियनशिप Games ( 1995, 1996, 1997, 2007, 2009 ), और two Super कटोरी दिखावे ( सुपर Bowl XXXI, सुपर Bowl XXXII ), winning एक ( Super कटोरी xxxi ).
He holds many एनएफएल रिकॉर्ड, सहित most career touchdown passes, सबसे करियर गुजर गज, सबसे करियर pass completions, most career pass कोशिशें, most career interceptions thrown, सबसे consecutive starts by a खिलाड़ी, most consecutive starts by a क्वार्टरबैक, most करियर victories as a starting quarterback, most बर्खास्त, and most fumbles.
He is also referred to by his nickname `` The Gunslinger ''.

The World चौड़ी Web ( abbreviated as www or w3, commonly ज्ञात as the वेब ), is a प्रणाली of interlinked hypertext documents accessed via the Internet.
With a वेब ब्राउजर, एक can दृश्य web पृष्ठों that may contain टेक्स्ट, images, videos, and अन्य मल्टीमीडिया, and navigate between उन्हें via hyperlinks.
using concepts from his earlier हाइपरटेक्स्ट systems like enquire, British engineer, computer scientist और at कि समय कर्मचारी of the cern, Sir Tim Berners-Lee, now निदेशक of the संसार Wide वेब consortium ( W3C ), wrote a प्रस्ताव in March 1989 for what would आखिरकार become the संसार Wide वेब.
At cern, a European शोध संगठन near Geneva straddling the किनारा between France and स्विट्ज़रलैंड, Berners-Lee and Belgian computer वैज्ञानिक रॉबर्ट cailliau proposed in 1990 to use hypertext `` to link and अभिगम सूचना of विभिन्न kinds as a web of nodes in which the user can ब्राउज़ at होगा '', and they publicly introduced the project in December of the same साल.
Wayne lyman Morse ( October 20, 1900July 22, 1974 ) was a politician and attorney from Oregon, संयुक्त राज्य, known for उसके proclivity लिये opposing उसके parties ' नेतृत्व, and specifically for his opposition to the Vietnam युद्ध on संवैधानिक grounds.
Born in Madison, Wisconsin, and educated at the University of Wisconsin-Madison and the University of मिनेसोटा विधि School, मोर्स moved to Oregon in 1930 और began शिक्षण at the University of ऑरेगॉन School of Law.
During संसार युद्ध II he थी elected to the संयुक्त राज्य Senate as a रिपब्लिकन ; he became an स्वतंत्र बाद Dwight D. आइज़नहावर 's election to the presidency in 1952.
While an स्वतंत्र, he set a record लिये performing the दूसरी longest one-person filibuster in the इतिहास of the Senate.
मोर्स joined the Democratic Party in 1955, और थी reelected twice while a member of कि party.
Morse बना a brief run for the लोकतांत्रिक पार्टी 's अध्यक्षीय नामांकन in 1960.
a few years later, मोर्स was one of तभी two Senators who opposed the गल्फ of Tonkin रेज़ोल्यूशन, जिससे authorized the president to लो military action in वियतनाम without a घोषणा of war.
He continued to speak out विरूद्ध the युद्ध in the ensuing years, and lost his 1968 बोली लिये reelection to Bob packwood, जो criticized his strong opposition to the war.
Morse बना दो more बोलियों for reelection to the Senate before his death in 1974.
In parliamentary procedure, a motion to तालिका has दो अलग and contradictory meanings:
In the United राज्य, to table प्रायः means the to lay [ the टॉपिक ] on the table or to move लिये postponement of consideration ; a proposal to बर्खास्तगी विचार of a स्थगित motion.
much less often, it अर्थात् a motion to `` put on the table '' : a proposal to begin विचार ( or reconsideration ), a उपयोग सतत with the बाकी of the English-speaking world.
In the rest of the English-speaking world ऐसे as the United किंगडम, to तालिका means to मूव to place [ the टॉपिक ] upon the तालिका ( or to move to place on the table ) : a प्रस्ताव to begin consideration ( or reconsideration ) of a प्रस्ताव.
दोनो the अमरीकी और the British dialects have the भाव of `` to तालिका '' as to lay [ the topic ] on the तालिका or to cause [ the topic ] to झूठ on the table.
The difference is the विचार of कया the तालिका is for, that of a शेल्फ off to the पक्ष, or an active कार्य bench.
the British अर्थ has the sense of the तालिका as being an क्रियाशील work bench, with the टॉपिक being the center of ध्यान, माना और discussed by all until it can be resolved, at which point it is taken off the 'table '.
The American sense is कि the table is जैसे कि of a shelf, अभिलेख, or long-term storage device, जहाँ the टॉपिक has been disposed of by sending it to the 'table ' और leaving it वहीँ.
खिलौना Story 3 is a 2010 अमरीकी 3d computer animated comedy-drama prison film, और the तीसरा किश्त in the खिलौना Story series.
It थी उत्पादित by पिक्चर्स एनिमेशन Studios and वितरित by Walt डिज़्नी Pictures.
निर्देशित by ली Unkrich, the film was released विश्वव्यापी from June through October in Disney डिजिटल 3-D, RealD, and IMAX 3d.
खिलौना स्टोरी 3 थी also the first film to be released theatrically साथ Dolby Surround 7.1 sound.
the screenplay थी लिखा by Michael Arndt, while Unkrich लिखा the स्टोरी along with John lasseter and Andrew Stanton, respectively निदेशक and co-writer of the two first films.
the plot focuses on the खिलौने Woody, Buzz Lightyear, और their friends dealing with an uncertain future as their मालिक, एंडी, prepares to छोड़ for कॉलेज.
अभिनेताओं Tom Hanks, टिम Allen, Joan Cusack, Don rickles, estelle Harris, John Ratzenberger, वालेस Shawn, Jeff pidgeon, Jodi Benson, R. Lee Ermey, जॉन Morris, और Laurie metcalf reprised उनके voice-over roles from the पिछला films.
Jim varney, who निभाई Slinky Dog in the पहला two films, और Joe ranft, जो portrayed lenny and wheezy, दोनो died before production began on खिलौना स्टोरी 3.
The भूमिका of slinky श्वान was taken over by Blake क्लार्क ( a friend of Varney ), जबकि ranft 's characters and विभिन्न अन्य were written आउट of the story.
नई characters include performances by ned Beatty, Timothy Dalton, Kristen Schaal, Bonnie Hunt, whoopi Goldberg, Jeff Garlin, रिचर्ड दयालु, and माइकल Keaton.
The feature broke Shrek the Thirds record as the biggest opening day North American सकल for an animated फिल्मी unadjusted लिये inflation, and a big खोलने साथ an unadjusted सकल of $ 110,307,189.
It is also the highest-grossing खोलने वीकेंड for a Pixar film, as खूब as the highest-grossing opening weekend for a film to have opened in the month of June.
This is the highest-grossing film of 2010, both in the United राज्य और Canada, and worldwide.
in early August, it became पिक्चर्स 's highest-grossing film at the North American box दफ्तर ( surpassing Finding Nemo ), और the highest-grossing एनिमेटेड film of all time विश्वव्यापी ( surpassing shrek 2 ) ; later that माह, खिलौना स्टोरी 3 became the पहला ever एनिमेटेड film in इतिहास to make over $ 1 billion worldwide.
It is currently the 10th-highest-grossing film of all time.
Toy स्टोरी 3 was nominated लिये five Academy Awards, सहित बेहतरीन Picture, Best Adapted Screenplay, और बेहतरीन Sound Editing.

John Levell starks ( born August 10, 1965 ) is an American retired professional basketball shooting guard.

Although he was not drafted in the 1988 एनबीए ड्राफ्ट after attending four कॉलेजों in his native ओक्लाहोमा, सहित Oklahoma राज्य University, he gained fame जबकि playing for the New York Knicks of the National बास्केट संघ in the 1990s.
Secure डिजिटल or ( SD ) is a non-volatile memory कार्ड format for use in portable डिवाइस, such as mobile phones, digital कैमरे, GPS navigation devices, and tablet कंप्यूटर.
The सुरक्षित Digital standard is कायम by the sd Card संघ ( sda ).
SD technologies have महरूम implemented in more than 400 ब्रांड्स आरपार dozens of उत्पाद categories और अधिक than 8,000 मॉडल.
The सुरक्षित डिजिटल format शामिल चार card परिवारों available in three different रूप factors.
the four families हैं the original Standard-Capacity ( sdsc ), the High-Capacity ( SDHC ), the eXtended-Capacity ( sdxc ), और the SDIO, जिससे combines input/output कृत्यों with data storage.
the तीन form factors are the original आकार, the `` मिनी '' size, और the `` micro '' size ( see illustration ).
There are many combinations of रूप कारकों और device परिवारों.
electrically passive adapters allow the use of a smaller कार्ड in a host device built to थाम a larger कार्ड.
Host devices that comply साथ नए versions of the specification provide backward compatibility और accept पुरानी SD ताश, but इस आलेख explains अनेक factors कि can prevent the use of a नए sd card:
A नए card may प्रस्ताव greater क्षमता than the मेजबान device can handle.
A newer कार्ड may use a file प्रणाली the मेजबान device can not navigate.
Use of an sdio कार्ड requires the मेजबान device be designed for the input/output कृत्यों the card provides.
The organization of the card was changed starting with the sdhc family.
Some vendors produced SDSC cards above 1 gb before the sda had मानकीकृत a method of doing so.
The sda uses several trademarked logos to enforce अनुपालन साथ इसके विशेषताएँ and assure उपयोक्ता of compatibility.
ह्यूज John Mungo Grant ( born 9 September 1960 ) is a अंग्रेजों actor and film producer.
He रै प्राप्त a सुनहरी ग्लोब, a bafta, and an Honorary césar.
उसके films have earned more than us $ 2.4 billion from 25 नाट्य रिलीज विश्वव्यापी.
Grant achieved international stardom बाद appearing in Richard कर्टिस 's successful Four Weddings and a अंत्येष्टि ( 1994 ).
He used इस भेदन role as a frequent cinematic persona दौरान the 1990s, delivering comic performances in mainstream films like मिकी Blue Eyes ( 1999 ) and नॉटिंग Hill ( 1999 ).
by the turn of the 21st सदी, he had established himself as a leading man skilled with a satirical comic हुनर.
Grant has expanded उसके oeuvre with critically acclaimed turns as a कैड in Bridget Jones 's डायरी ( 2001 ), About a Boy ( 2002 ), प्रेम दरअसल ( 2003 ), और अमरीकी Dreamz ( 2006 ).
He बाद played विरूद्ध प्रकार साथ अनेक cameo भूमिकाएँ in the एपिक drama फिल्मी Cloud Atlas ( 2012 ).
Within the film industry, Grant is cited as an anti-film star who approaches उसके भूमिकाएँ like a character actor, और attempts to make his acting appear spontaneous.
Hallmarks of his comic skills include a nonchalant touch of irony / sarcasm and पढ़ाई physical mannerisms as well as his precisely-timed dialogue delivery and facial expressions.
the entertainment media 's coverage of Grant 's life off the big screen रै प्रायः निष्प्रभ उसके work as a thespian.
he रै been vocal परिचय his disrespect लिये the व्यवसायिक of एक्टिंग, and in his disdain towards the culture of celebrity and hostility towards the media.
In a career spanning 30 years, Grant रै repeatedly claimed that acting is नहीं a सच्चा calling but just a job he गिरी into.
The Han Dynasty ( ; ) ( 206 BC – 220 ad ) थी an इम्पीरियल राजवंश of China, preceded by the Qin Dynasty ( 221–207 BC ) and succeeded by the Three kingdoms ( 220–280 AD ).
it थी founded by the विद्रोही leader लियू बंग, ज्ञात मरणोपरांत as सम्राट Gaozu of Han.
it was briefly बाधित by the Xin राजवंश ( 9–23 AD ) of the former regent Wang Mang.
This interregnum separates the Han into दो अवधि : the Western Han ( 206 bc – 9 ad ) and Eastern Han ( 25–220 ad ).
Spanning over four centuries, the काल of the Han राजवंश is considered a golden आयु in Chinese history.
To this दिन, चीन 's बहुमत जातीय group refers to itself as the `` Han लोगों '' और the Chinese script is referred to as `` Han characters ``.
The हान Empire थी विभाजित into areas directly controlled by the सेंट्रल government, ज्ञात as commanderies, and a क्रमांक of semi-autonomous kingdoms.
ये kingdoms gradually खोया सब vestiges of उनके independence, particularly following the Rebellion of the Seven राज्य.
The Xiongnu, a nomadic confederation जिससे dominated the eastern Eurasian Steppe, defeated the हान army in बैटल in 200 BC.
Following the defeat, a राजनैतिक marriage गठबंधन थी negotiated in जिससे the हान became the de facto inferior partner.
जब, despite the treaty, the Xiongnu जारी to रेड Han borders, Emperor Wu of हान ( r. 141–87 BC ) शुभारम्भ several सैन्य अभियान against उन्हें.
The परम Han victory in these wars eventually मजबूर the xiongnu to accept vassal औकात as हान tributaries.
ये अभियान विस्तारित हान sovereignty into the Tarim Basin of Central Asia and helped establish the vast trade संजाल ज्ञात as the रेशा Road, जिससे reached as far as the Mediterranean world.
Han forces managed to divide the Xiongnu into दो competing राष्ट्र, the Southern and उत्तरी Xiongnu, और मजबूर the Northern xiongnu across the Ili नदी.
despite these victories, the territories उत्तर of Han 's सीमायें यहूद quickly overrun by the nomadic Xianbei Confederation.
After 92 AD, the palace हिजड़े increasingly शामिल themselves in अदालत राजनीती, engaging in हिंसक power struggles between the various consort clans of the empresses and empress dowagers, causing the Han 's ultimate downfall.
इम्पीरियल authority was भी seriously challenged by large Daoist religious समाजों जिससे instigated the Yellow Turban विद्रोह और the Five Pecks of Rice विद्रोह.
Following the death of Emperor Ling ( r. 168–189 ad ), the palace eunuchs suffered wholesale नरसंहार by सैन्य officers, allowing members of the aristocracy and सैन्य governors to become warlords and divide the empire.
जब साओ Pi, King of वेई, usurped the सिंहासन from सम्राट Xian, the Han Dynasty ceased to मौजूद.
The Han राजवंश was an age of economic समृद्धि and देखी a significant growth of the धन अर्थव्यवस्था first established during the Zhou Dynasty ( c. 1050–256 BC ).
The coinage जारी by the सेंट्रल सरकारी मिंट in 119 BC remained the मानक coinage of China until the तंग राजवंश ( 618–907 AD ).
To pay लिये its सैन्य अभियान और the settlement of newly conquered frontier territories, the government nationalized the private salt और iron उद्योग in 117 BC.
These government monopolies were repealed दौरान the Eastern Han period, and the lost revenue थी recouped through heavily taxing निजी उद्यमियों.
the emperor थी at the शिखर of Han समाज.
He presided over the Han government लकिन shared शक्ति साथ दोनो the धामों and appointed मंत्रियों जो आए largely from the scholarly gentry class.
इससे the reign of Emperor wu onward, the Chinese court officially sponsored Confucianism in education and court राजनीती, synthesized with the cosmology of later scholars such as डांग Zhongshu.
इस policy endured जबतक the पतन of the Qing राजवंश in 1911 AD.
Science and technology during the Han काल देखी significant advances, सहित papermaking, the nautical steering rudder, the use of ऋणात्मक numbers in mathematics, the raised-relief मैप, the हाइड्रोलिक -powered armillary sphere for खगोलशास्त्र, और a seismometer employing an inverted pendulum.
tourette सिंड्रोम ( also called Tourette 's सिंड्रोम, tourette 's disorder, Gilles de la tourette syndrome, GTS or, अधिक commonly, simply Tourette 's or TS ) is an inherited neuropsychiatric विकार with onset in बाल्यकाल, characterized by अनेक physical ( motor ) tics and at least एक गायन ( phonic ) tic.
ये tics characteristically मोम और wane, can be suppressed temporarily, and are preceded by a premonitory urge.
Tourette 's is पारिभाषित as part of a वर्णक्रम of tic disorders, जिससे includes क्षणिक and chronic tics.
tourette 's was एकबार माना a rare and bizarre syndrome, most often संबद्ध साथ the exclamation of obscene words or socially inappropriate and अपमानजनक remarks ( coprolalia ), but this symptom is उपस्थित in only a small अल्पसंख्यक of people साथ Tourette 's.
Tourette 's is no longer considered a rare कंडीशन, but it is not सदा correctly identified because most मामले हैं mild और the severity of tics decreases for most children as they pass through adolescence.
Between 0.4 % and 3.8 % of children ages 5 to 18 may have tourette 's ; the prevalence of क्षणिक and दीर्घकालिक tics in school-age children is higher, with the more common tics of नजर blinking, coughing, गला clearing, सूँघने, और फेशियल movements.
Extreme Tourette 's in adulthood is a rarity, और Tourette 's does नहीं adversely affect intelligence or जीवन expectancy.
Genetic and environmental factors खेल a role in the etiology of Tourette 's, but the exact causes are unknown.
in most cases, medication is अनावश्यक.
वहीँ is no प्रभावी treatment for प्रत्येक case of tics, लकिन निश्चित medications and therapies can help when उनके उपयोग is warranted.
Education is an important part of कोई treatment योजना, और explanation और reassurance अलोन are प्रायः sufficient treatment.
comorbid शर्तें ( co-occurring diagnoses other than tourette 's ) ऐसे as attention-deficit hyperactivity disorder ( adhd ) और obsessive–compulsive विकार ( OCD ) are उपस्थित in many patients देखी in tertiary specialty clinics.
ये अन्य conditions often cause more कार्यात्मक पुतलियों to the individual than the tics कि हैं the hallmark of tourette 's, hence it is महत्वपूर्ण to correctly identify comorbid conditions and दावत उन्हें.
the eponym was bestowed by Jean-Martin charcot ( 1825–1893 ) on behalf of his resident, Georges Albert édouard ब्रूटस Gilles de la tourette ( 1859–1904 ), a French physician and neurologist, who प्रकाशित an account of nine patients साथ Tourette 's in 1885.
सनबीम बैज.
Sunbeam was a marque registered by John Marston Co. Ltd of Wolverhampton, England, in 1888.
The company पहला बना bicycles, then motorcycles and cars from the late 19th century until about 1936, और लागू the marque to all three फ़ॉर्म of परिवहन.
the कम्पनी also manufactured एयरो engines in the पहला संसार War and 647 वायुयान दौरान the दूसरी World युद्ध.
a सनबीम थी the first British car to win a Grand प्रिक्स race, and set a number of जमीन गति records.
the company went into receivership in 1935 और was purchased by the Rootes Group, जिससे continued to use the सनबीम marque.
Fox News चैनल ( FNC ), भी known as Fox News, is a केबल न्यूज channel स्वामित्व by the Fox Entertainment Group, a subsidiary of न्यूज निगम.
As of April 2009, the चैनल was उपलब्धियाँ to 102 million households in the United States and to viewers internationally, प्रसारण primarily from इसके नई York studios.
The channel was created by Australian-American media mogul रुपर्ट मर्डोक, who नियुक्त former एनबीसी executive Roger Ailes as its founding CEO.
It शुभारम्भ on October 7, 1996 to 17 लाख cable subscribers.
It grew दौरान the late 1990s and 2000s to become the प्रबल केबल न्यूज network in the United राज्य.
Critics have stated that फॉक्स News चैनल promotes conservative राजनैतिक स्थितियाँ and biased reporting.
Commentators, न्यूज anchors, और reporters at फॉक्स News चैनल have responded that news reporting and political commentary operate independently of each other, और have अस्वीकृत कोई bias in न्यूज रिपोर्टिंग.
the mandibular first molar or six-year molar is the दाँत located distally ( away from the midline of the face ) from दोनो the mandibular second premolars of the mouth लकिन mesial ( toward the midline of the फेस ) इससे दोनो mandibular second molars.
It is स्तिथ on the mandibular ( lower ) arch of the mouth, और generally opposes the maxillary ( upper ) पहला molars और the maxillary 2nd premolar in सामान्य class I occlusion.
the फलन of इस molar is समान to that of सब molars in regard to पीस being the principal कार्रवाई during mastication, commonly known as चबाने.
वहीँ हैं usually five well-developed cusps on mandibular first molars : two on the buccal ( side nearest the cheek ), two lingual ( side निकटतम the tongue ), and एक distal.
There are ग्रेट differences between the deciduous ( baby ) mandibular molars and those of the स्थाई mandibular molars, even हालांकि उनके फलन are समान.
The permanent mandibular molars are not माना to have any teeth that precede it.
despite होने named molars, the deciduous molars हैं followed by permanent premolars.
In the सार्वभौमिक system of notation, the deciduous mandibular first molars are designated by a अक्षर लिखा in uppercase.
The right पतझड़ी mandibular first molar is ज्ञात as `` s '', and the left one is ज्ञात as `` L ''.
The international notation has a different system of notation.
Thus, the right पतझड़ी mandibular पहला molar is known as `` 84 '', और the बाएँ one is known as `` 74 ''.
In the सार्वभौमिक प्रणाली of notation, the permanent mandibular first molars are designated by a क्रमांक.
The right स्थाई mandibular first molar is ज्ञात as `` 30 '', and the left एक is ज्ञात as `` 19 ''.
the Palmer संकेतन उपयोग a क्रमांक in संयोजन with a प्रतीक designating in जिससे quadrant the दाँत is found.
For this दाँत, the left and सही first molars would have the वही number, `` 6 '', लकिन the right एक would have the प्रतीक, `` ┐ '', over it, while the बाएँ one would have, `` ┌ ''.
The अंतरराष्ट्रीय notation रै a different क्रमांकन system than the previous two, और the सही स्थाई mandibular first molar is known as `` 46 '', और the बाएँ one is ज्ञात as `` 36 ''.
Mandibular primary first molars usually have four गूदा horns.
The first molar is usually the first permanent दाँत to erupt और रै adult undertones.
anatomy : the mandibular first molar has पाँच cusps : the mesiobuccal ( MB, toward midline and गाल ), mesiolingual ( ML, toward midline and जीभ ), distolingual ( DL, away इससे midline and towards tongue ), distobuccal ( db, दूर इससे midline and toward गाल ), and distal ( D, away इससे midline ), listed in order of अवरोहण size.
सूचीबद्ध in अनुक्रम of decreasing height they हैं : ML, DL, DF, MF, and D. an eighth cusp थी found in a primary second निम्नतर molar in an argentinean child.
Viewed from the शीर्ष of the tooth ( occlusal view ), the mandibular first molar is pentagonal ( पाँच sided ) in shape और tapers toward the lingual, साथ the पहलू होने the buccal surface, the mesial surface, the lingual surface, distal surface, and the distobuccal सतह.
The occlusal सतह has चार grooves.
The central नाली is not सीधा but runs bas the center of the दाँत mesially to distally and contains four pits ( mesial, सेंट्रल, central, और distal ).
the distobuccal groove runs from the distal pit in the central नाली distobuccally separating the distal and distobuccal पुलिन.
The lingual groove runs from the more distal of the central गड्ढों in the सेंट्रल नाली toward the lingual surface between the mesiolingual और distolingual cusps.
the buccal नाली runs from the more mesial of the सेंट्रल pits in the central नाली toward the buccal surface between the mesiobuccal and distobuccal cusps समाप्ति in the buccal गड्ढे.
The portion of the central नाली between the सेंट्रल गड्ढों is termed the लुईस ऑफसेट and is अनिवार्य to खाता for the स्थितियाँ of the buccal and lingual डोले ( buccal नाली being more mesial than the lingual groove जबकि they are parallel ).
From the buccal ( buccal view ), दो roots are present.
the distal रूट is generally straighter, although दोनो often have a slight distal गोलाई.
The heights of रुपरेखा on the mesial और distal contact the सटा दांत और are located at the junction of the occlusal and middle तिहाई of the crown.
The Florida Legislature is the दो houses कि act as the राज्य विधानमंडल of the U.S. state of फ्लोरिडा.
The Florida Constitution राज्य कि `` the legislative शक्ति of the state shall be vested in a विधानमंडल of the State of Florida, '' composed of a सीनेट and हाउस of प्रतिनिधि.
the legislature is seated at the Florida State कैपिटल in Tallahassee.
Stained glass depiction of Daniel interceding with arioch, the किंग 's गार्ड.
Arioch था been चार्ज with killing all the wise मेन after they यहूद not समर्थ to interpret Nebuchadnezzar 's dream.
डेनियल 2 is the दूसरी chapter of the Book of Daniel in the यहूदी बाइबल.
The chapter 's सोर्स text is predominantly written in Aramaic.
according to the text, Nebuchadnezzar is the किंग of Babylon जो is troubled by उसके dreams.
He मांगे an interpretation for his सपनो or will have his mystic interpreters executed.
डेनियल seeks Divine Wisdom to interpret the किंग 's सपनो and गुणगान परमेश्वर with a short psalm.
परमेश्वर gives Daniel a दृष्टि in the night to reveal the किंग 's dream.
Able to satisfy the king, Daniel is प्रचारित over the whole province of बाबुल.
One Comcast Center, the मुख्यालय of comcast in फिलाडेल्फिया, PA.
The बूढ़ा comcast लोगो from 1969 to 1999, when it थी replaced साथ the crescent logo.
The comcast Corporation is an American provider of entertainment, information और संचार उत्पाद and सेवाएं.
It is the largest केबल ऑपरेटर, one of the biggest mass media, घर Internet service provider, और तीसरा largest घर telephone service provider in the United States, providing cable टेलीविज़न, broadband Internet, telephone service और in some क्षेत्रों घर सुरक्षा ( including burglar alarms, surveillance कैमरे, आग alarm systems and home स्वचालन ) to दोनो residential और commercial ग्राहक in 40 states and the ज़िला of Columbia.
The कम्पनी is headquartered in Philadelphia, पेन्सिलवेनिया.
in 2011, Comcast acquired a 51 % बहुमत stake in media conglomerate nbcuniversal इससे ge in January 2011, और began the process of खरीदना the remaining 49 % on फ़रवरी 12, 2013, at a cost of $ 16.7 billion.
It completed the purchase on March 19, 2013.
Comcast also has significant पकड़कर in several केबल संजाल ( सहित E !

Comcast रै been the subject of criticism लिये क्रियाएँ including its stance on जाल neutrality, as खूब as poor results on ग्राहक satisfaction surveys.
Porcupines हैं rodents साथ a coat of sharp कांटे, or quills, that defend and camouflage them इससे परभक्षी.
They are indigenous to the Americas, southern एशिया, and Africa.
Porcupines हैं the third largest of the rodents, behind the capybara and the beaver.
Most porcupines are about long, साथ an long tail.
Weighing, they हैं rounded, large and slow.
Porcupines come in various shades of brown, धूसर, and the असामान्य white.
Porcupines ' spiny protection resembles that of the unrelated erinaceomorph hedgehogs and monotreme echidnas.
The common साही is a herbivore.
It eats पत्ते, herbs, टहनियों and ग्रीन पौधे जैसे skunk cabbage and क्लोवर और in the winter it may eat bark.
The North American porcupine often climbs पेड़ to find food.
the अफ़्रीकी साही is नहीं a climber और forages on the ground.
It is mostly nocturnal, लकिन होगा sometimes forage for food in the day.
porcupines have become a pest in कीनिया and are eaten as a कोमलता.
The name porcupine comes इससे Middle French porc espin ( spined pig ).
A क्षेत्रीय American name for the एनिमल is quill pig.

Elijah J. McCoy ( May 2, 1844 – अक्तूबर 10, 1929 ) was a black canadian-american आविष्कारक and engineer, जो थी notable for his 57 u.S. patents, most to do साथ lubrication of steam engines.
Born फ़्री in Canada, he लौटे as a five-year-old child साथ उसके family to the United States in 1847, जहाँ he lived लिये the बाकी of उसके जीवन और became a us नागरिक.
Honda FCX Clarity, a हाइड्रोजन fuel cell demonstration vehicle introduced in 2008
a hydrogen vehicle is a vehicle that uses hydrogen as its onboard fuel लिये motive शक्ति.
Hydrogen वाहनों शामिल hydrogen fueled space rockets, as खूब as automobiles and other transportation vehicles.
The power plants of such वाहनों बदलें the रासायनिक उर्जा of hydrogen to mechanical उर्जा either by burning hydrogen in an आतंरिक दहन engine, or by reacting हाइड्रोजन with ऑक्सीजन in a fuel cell to run electric मोटर्स.
फैली उपयोग of हाइड्रोजन लिये fueling परिवहन is a कुंजी element of a proposed hydrogen अर्थव्यवस्था.
हाइड्रोजन fuel करता not occur naturally on Earth and thus is not an energy source ; rather it is an energy वाहक.
it is सबसे अक्सर बना इससे methane or other चट्टान fuels, but it can be produced using sources ( ऐसे as wind, solar, or nuclear ) that हैं intermittent, too diffuse or too cumbersome to directly propel vehicles.
Integrated wind-to-hydrogen पौधे, using electrolysis of जल, हैं exploring technologies to उद्धार लागत low enough, and quantities great enough, to compete with परंपरागत energy स्त्रोत.
अनेक कंपनियाँ are working to develop technologies कि might efficiently exploit the संभावित of hydrogen उर्जा for mobile uses.
the आकर्षण of using hydrogen as an energy currency is that, if hydrogen is prepared बगैर using चट्टान fuel inputs, vehicle propulsion होता not contribute to carbon dioxide emissions.
the drawbacks of hydrogen use are ऊँची पूंजी cost, low energy content per ईकाई volume, ऊँची tankage weights, very ऊँची भंडार पोत pressures, the storage, transportation and भरना of gaseous or liquid हाइड्रोजन in vehicles, the large investment in अवसंरचना that would be required to ईंधन vehicles, और the inefficiency of production processes.
Sacramento is the पूंजी city of the u.S. state of California और the सीट of सरकारी of sacramento County.
It is स्तिथ at the confluence of the Sacramento River और the American River in the उत्तरी portion of California 's expansive सेंट्रल घाटी.
साथ an अनुमानित 2011 population of 477,891, it is the sixth-largest city in कैलिफ़ोर्निया and the 35th largest city in the United States.
Sacramento is the core cultural and आर्थिक बीच of the sacramento metropolitan क्षेत्रफल जिससे includes सात counties साथ an estimated 2009 population of 2,527,123.
Its महानगर area is the fourth largest in California बाद the वृहद Los Angeles क्षेत्रफल, San फ्रांसिस्को Bay Area, and the San Diego metropolitan area, as खूब as the 25th largest in the संयुक्त States.
Sacramento was cited by Time magazine as America 's सबसे ethnically और racially integrated city in 2002.
sacramento became a city through the efforts of the स्विस immigrant John Sutter, Sr., his son John Sutter, jr., and James W. Marshall.
Sacramento grew जल्दी thanks to the protection of sutter 's फोर्ट, जिससे was established by sutter in 1839.
During the California सुनहरा फटाफट, sacramento was a प्रमुख distribution point, a वाणिज्यिक and agricultural center, and a टर्मिनस for वैगन रेल, stagecoaches, riverboats, the telegraph, the टट्टू एक्स्प्रेस, and the First transcontinental Railroad.
कैलिफ़ोर्निया State University, Sacramento, अधिक commonly ज्ञात as sacramento State or सैक State, is the largest लोकल university.
It is one of the twenty-three campuses of the California राज्य University प्रणाली.
drexel विश्वविद्यालयों sacramento is स्तिथ in Downtown, Sacramento.
विश्वविद्यालयों of the Pacific 's mcgeorge स्कूल of Law is located in the Oak Park पड़ोस.
in addition, the University of California, Davis is स्तिथ in आसपास डेविस, west of the पूंजी.
The UC Davis चिकित्सा बीच, a world-renowned research hospital, is स्तिथ in the city of Sacramento.
The Apple Store is a chain of खुदरा स्टोर्स owned and operated by ठहराना Inc., dealing in computers और उपभोक्ता इलेक्ट्रॉनिक्स.
The stores बेचें मैकिंटोश personal computers, तन्त्र, ipods, iPads, आईफ़ोन, third-party accessories, and अन्य consumer electronics such as Apple TV.
कुछ ऊँची प्रोफ़ाइल स्टोर्स feature a थिएटर लिये presentations और वर्कशॉप and a स्टुडियो लिये प्रशिक्षण साथ ठहराना products ; all स्टोर्स offer a Genius Bar for तकनीकी support and मरम्मत, as खूब as free workshops available to the पब्लिक.
अंतर्गत the leadership of रॉन जॉनसन, the former वरिष्ठ Vice President of Retail परिचालन, the ठहराना स्टोर्स have, according to an article in the New यॉर्क टाइम्स, been जिम्मेदार लिये `` [ turning ] the boring computer sales floor into a sleek playroom filled with gadgets ''.
, Apple रै 405 stores विश्वव्यापी, with global sales of billion in merchandise in 2011, और they सीसे the संयुक्त States retail मार्केट in terms of sales per unit क्षेत्रफल.
Steven Paul `` Steve '' कार्य ( ; फ़रवरी 24, 1955 – अक्तूबर 5, 2011 ) was an American entrepreneur and inventor, बेहतरीन known as the co-founder, chairman, और CEO of Apple inc.
through ठहराना, he was widely recognized as a charismatic pioneer of the निजी कंप्यूटर revolution and लिये his influential career in the कंप्यूटर and consumer इलेक्ट्रॉनिक्स फ़ील्ड, transforming `` one industry after another, from computers and स्मार्टफ़ोन to music and फिल्मों... ''
Jobs also co-founded and परोसा as मुख्य कार्यपालिका of Pixar Animation studios ; he became a member of the फलक of directors of The Walt डिज़्नी कम्पनी in 2006, when डिज़्नी acquired Pixar.
Jobs थी among the first to see the वाणिज्यिक potential of Xerox PARC 's mouse -driven graphical user interface, which led to the सृष्टि of the ठहराना लिसा and, one year later, the Macintosh.
he also played a role in introducing the LaserWriter, one of the पहला widely available laser printers, to the market.
After a शक्ति संघर्ष with the फलक of directors in 1985, Jobs left Apple and founded NeXT, a computer मंच विकास company specializing in the higher-education and कारोबार markets.
in 1986, he acquired the कंप्यूटर graphics प्रभाग of Lucasfilm, जिससे थी spun off as Pixar.
He was credited in Toy Story ( 1995 ) as an executive producer.
He served as सीईओ and बहुमत shareholder जबतक डिज़्नी 's purchase of Pixar in 2006.
in 1996, after ठहराना था failed to उद्धार its operating प्रणाली, copland, gil amelio turned to NeXT Computer, and the nextstep मंच became the न्यास लिये the मैक os x.
Jobs returned to ठहराना as an advisor, and took कंट्रोल of the company as an interim CEO.
Jobs brought Apple इससे near bankruptcy to profitability by 1998.
As the new सीईओ of the कम्पनी, Jobs oversaw the development of the imac, iTunes, ipod, iPhone, और iPad, और on the सेवाएं side, the कम्पनी 's ठहराना खुदरा Stores, iTunes स्टोर and the App स्टोर.
the success of these उत्पाद and services provided several years of stable financial रिटर्न, और propelled Apple to become the संसार 's most valuable publicly traded कम्पनी in 2011.
the reinvigoration of the company is regarded by many टीकाकारों as one of the महानतम turnarounds in business history.
in 2003, Jobs was diagnosed साथ a pancreas neuroendocrine tumor.
Though it was initially treated, he reported a hormone असंतुलन, underwent a जिगर प्रत्यारोपण in 2009, और appeared progressively thinner as his स्वास्थ्य declined.
On medical छोड़ for most of 2011, Jobs resigned in August that साल, and was निर्वाचित Chairman of the फलक.
he died of respiratory गिरफ़्तार related to his metastatic tumor on October 5, 2011.
कार्य received a number of honors and public recognition for his influence in the प्रौद्योगिकी and music उद्योग.
he रै been referred to as `` legendary '', a `` futurist '' or simply `` visionary '', और has महरूम वर्णित as the `` Father of the डिजिटल Revolution '', a `` master of innovation '', and a `` design perfectionist ''.

और.
The Roman numeral प्रणाली is a cousin of etruscan numerals.
उपयोग of Roman numerals जारी बाद the decline of the रोमन साम्राज्य.
From the 14th सदी on, रोमन numerals began to be replaced in most contexts by more convenient Hindu-Arabic numerals ; however this process was क्रमिक, और the उपयोग of Roman numerals in कुछ नाबालिग applications continues to इस दिन.
Effective नाभिकीय Charge Diagram
The effective नाभिकीय charge ( often symbolize as or Z* ) is the net positive charge अनुभवी by an इलेक्ट्रॉन in a multi-electron atom.
the पद `` effective '' is used because the shielding effect of negatively charged electrons prevents उच्चतर कक्षीय electrons इससे experiencing the full nuclear charge by the repelling effect of inner-layer electrons.
the effective nuclear चार्ज experienced by the outer शेल इलेक्ट्रॉन is also called the core चार्ज.
It is संभावित to determine the शक्ति of the नाभिकीय charge by looking at the oxidation क्रमांक of the अणु.
