The ड्वाइट D. Eisenhower नेशनल System of अंतरराज्यीय and Defense राजमार्गों ( commonly known as the Interstate राजमार्ग System, Interstate Freeway प्रणाली, अंतरराज्यीय प्रणाली, or बस the अंतरराज्यीय ) is a network of freeways कि फ़ॉर्म a भाग of the National Highway System of the United राज्य.
The प्रणाली is named लिये अध्यक्ष Dwight D. आइज़नहावर, who championed its formation.
Construction was प्राधिकृत by the संघीय सहायता राजमार्ग Act of 1956, and the original portion was completed 35 years later.
the संजाल has चूंकि been extended, and, it had a total लंबाई of, making it the world 's second longest after चीन 's., about one-quarter of सब vehicle miles चलित in the देश use the अंतरराज्यीय प्रणाली.
the लागत of निर्माण रै been estimated at $ 425 अरब ( in 2006 dollars ), making it the `` largest public works program since the Pyramids ``.
the प्रणाली रै contributed in shaping the United States into a world आर्थिक superpower और a highly industrialized स्वदेश.
.eu is the देश code top-level domain ( ccTLD ) for the यूरोपीय संघ ( eu ).
Launched on 7 December 2005, the डोमेन is available for organisations in और निवासियों of eu member states.
The TLD is administered by eurid, a consortium originally consisting of the national cctld registry operators of बेल्जियम, स्वीडन, और Italy, joined later by the नेशनल registry operator of the चेक Republic.
ट्रेडमार्क owners यहूद able to submit पंजीकरण through a sunrise काल, in an effort to prevent cybersquatting.
Full पंजीकरण started on 7 अप्रैल 2006.
Meister means निपुण in जर्मनी ( as in निपुण craftsman, or as an honorific title such as Meister eckhart ).
The word is akin to maestro.
In खेल, Meister is प्रयुक्त लिये the current national, European or world champion ( deutscher meister, *Europameister, Weltmeister ).
Many आधुनिक day जर्मनी police forces use the शीर्षक Meister.
During the दूसरी संसार युद्ध, Meister was the highest आयोजिक rank of the ordnungspolizei.
Meister रै been borrowed into English कठबोली, जहाँ it is प्रयुक्त in यौगिक nouns.
A व्यक्ति referred to as “Meister” is one who रै extensive theoretical ज्ञान and practical skills in his profession, कारोबार, or कुछ अन्य दयालु of work or कार्यकलाप.
For example, a “puzzle-meister” would be someone highly skilled at solving puzzles.
These neologisms sometimes have a sarcastic intent ( for उदाहरण, “stubble-meister” for someone साथ a short, neat beard or “crier-meister” for someone जो often cries ).
Mighty morphin Power Rangers is an American live-action children 's television series about teenagers with super-powers, based on the 16th installment of the जापानी सुपर sentai मताधिकार, kyōryū sentai zyuranger.
दोनो the show और इसके related merchandise saw unbridled overnight success, बनने a स्टेपल of 1990s पॉप culture in mere months.
Under the असली name, `` Mighty morphin Power Rangers '' the श्रेणी ran इससे 1993 to 1995 and spawned the विशेषता film Mighty Morphin शक्ति Rangers : The Movie.
The second and तीसरा seasons of the show खींचा on footage and तत्व इससे the सुपर sentai श्रेणी Gosei Sentai dairanger and निंजा sentai kakuranger क्रमशः, though the zyuranger वेशभूषा यहूद still used for the five प्रमुख Rangers and several regular villains.
Only the mecha और the kiba रेंजर costume ( worn by the White Ranger ) were retained from dairanger for the second season, while only the mecha from kakuranger were प्रदर्शित in the third season.
however the Kakuranger वेशभूषा यहूद later used लिये the title वर्ण of the mini-series, Mighty Morphin Alien रेंजरों.
the series was produced by mmpr Productions, वितरित by Saban entertainment, और aired on फॉक्स बच्चे.
The दिखाएँ 's merchandise थी produced and distributed by बंदाई Entertainment.
in 1996, the series थी rebranded as the Power रेंजरों मताधिकार ; renaming the श्रेणी every year after, and using costumes, props, और footage from subsequent Super Sentai series, as well as changing the cast and कथानक.
जबकि an overarching storyline होता continue जबतक Power Rangers Lost Galaxy, subsequent श्रेणी बाद mmpr हैं नहीं sequels or spin-offs in the traditional sense.
In 2010, a re-version of mighty morphin Power रेंजरों, with a new लोगो, कॉमिक book-referenced graphics, and extra alternative खास प्रभाव, was ब्रॉडकास्ट on ABC बच्चे, और Bandai produced brand new toys to coincide with the series.
Edgar allan Poe ( born Edgar Poe ; जनवरी 19, 1809 – October 7, 1849 ) थी an अमरीकी लेखक, कवि, editor and literary critic, माना भाग of the अमरीकी Romantic गति.
Best ज्ञात लिये his किस्से of mystery and the macabre, पो was one of the earliest American practitioners of the short story and is generally माना the inventor of the detective fiction genre.
he is further credited with contributing to the emerging विधा of विज्ञान fiction.
He was the first well-known American writer to कोशिश to earn a living through लिखने अलोन, resulting in a financially difficult life और करियर.
he was born as Edgar पो in Boston, मैसाचुसेट्स ; he was अनाथ यंग when his mother died shortly after his पिता abandoned the family.
पो थी लिया in by John and frances allan, of रिचमंड, वर्जिनिया, लकिन वे never formally adopted him.
he attended the विश्वविद्यालयों of Virginia for एक सेमेस्टर लकिन left due to lack of money.
After enlisting in the Army and बाद failing as an officer 's cadet at वेस्ट पाइंट, Poe parted तरीके with the allans.
His publishing career began विनम्रतापूर्वक, with an anonymous collection of poems, Tamerlane और अन्य Poems ( 1827 ), credited only to `` a bostonian ''.
Poe switched उसके focus to prose and खर्च the next अनेक सालो working लिये literary जर्नल्स और periodicals, becoming known लिये his अपना style of literary criticism.
His work मजबूर him to move among several शहरों, सहित Baltimore, Philadelphia, and नई York City.
In Baltimore in 1835, he married वर्जिनिया clemm, उसके 13-year-old cousin.
In January 1845 Poe published his कविता, `` The रेवेन ``, to instant कामयाबी.
His wife died of tuberculosis two years after its publication.
He began नियोजन to produce his own journal, the Penn ( later renamed The स्टाइलस ), though he died before it could be उत्पादित.
On अक्तूबर 7, 1849, at age 40, Poe died in Baltimore ; the cause of उसके death is unknown and has been variously attributed to alcohol, brain जमघट, हैजा, drugs, heart disease, rabies, suicide, तपेदिक, और other agents.
पो और his works बहकावे literature in the United राज्य और around the संसार, as well as in specialized फ़ील्ड, such as cosmology and क्रिप्टोग्राफी.
Poe and his work appear throughout लोकप्रिय संस्कृति in literature, music, films, and टेलीविज़न.
A number of उसके homes are dedicated संग्रहालय आज.
The Mystery Writers of America present an annual पुरस्कार ज्ञात as the एडगर पुरस्कार for distinguished कार्य in the रहस्य genre.
Lions are obligate carnivores ; they आवश्यकता up to सात kilograms ( 15 पाउंड ) of meat per दिन.
A प्रमुख component of their diet is the flesh of large स्तनधारियों, जैसे this अफ़्रीकी भैंस.
A carnivore ( ) meaning 'meat भक्षक ' ( Latin, caro अर्थ 'meat ' or 'flesh ' और vorare meaning 'to devour ' ) is an organism that गर्भाशयी इसके उर्जा and nutrient requirements from a diet consisting मुख्यतः or exclusively of animal ऊतक, whether through predation or scavenging.
पशु that depend solely on animal flesh for their nutrient आवश्यकताएँ हैं considered carnivores while those that also consume non-animal खाना are considered carnivores.
Omnivores also consume both एनिमल and non-animal food, and apart from the more general definition, there is no clearly defined ratio of plant to animal सामग्री that would distinguish a facultative carnivore इससे an omnivore.
a carnivore कि sits at the शीर्ष of the foodchain is an apex predator.
पौधे that कैप्चर and digest insects are called मांसाहारी plants.
similarly, fungi that कैप्चर microscopic animals are प्रायः called carnivorous fungi.
The FIFA World Cup, often simply the World Cup, is an international association फ़ुटबॉल competition contested by the वरिष्ठ men 's नेशनल teams of the members of fédération Internationale de Football Association ( फीफा ), the खेल 's global governing देह.
the championship रै been awarded every four सालो since the inaugural टूर्नामेंट in 1930, मगर in 1942 and 1946 जब it थी not held because of the दूसरी संसार War.
The current champions are स्पेन, who won the 2010 tournament.
the वर्तमान format of the टूर्नामेंट involves 32 teams competing लिये the शीर्षक at venues within the मेजबान स्वदेश ( s ) over a period of about a माह ; this phase is प्रायः called the World कप Finals.
A योग्यता phase, जिससे फिलहाल takes place over the preceding three सालो, is used to determine जिससे टीमों qualify for the tournament together with the मेजबान nation ( s ).
the 19 World कप tournaments have been won by eight different national teams.
Brazil have won पाँच times, और they are the तभी team to have played in every tournament.
the other संसार Cup winners are Italy, with चार शीर्षक ; Germany, with three titles ; Argentina और inaugural winners उरुग्वे, with two titles each ; and England, फ़्रांस, and स्पेन, साथ one title each.
The World कप is the संसार 's सबसे widely viewed sporting इवेंट ; an estimated 715.1 million people देखी the final match of the 2006 फीफा World कप held in Germany.
the next three World Cups will be hosted by ब्राज़ील in 2014, रूस in 2018, और क़तर in 2022.
Heroes is an अमरीकी science fiction टेलीविज़न नाटक श्रेणी created by Tim Kring that appeared on NBC for four सीज़न इससे सितंबर 25, 2006 through February 8, 2010.
The श्रेणी tells the कहानियां of ordinary लोगों who discover superhuman abilities, and how ये abilities लो प्रभाव in the वर्ण ' lives.
The series emulates the aesthetic style and storytelling of American कॉमिक किताबे, using multi-episode story arcs that निर्माण upon a larger, more encompassing चाप.
The series थी उत्पादित by tailwind प्रोडक्शन्स in association with Universal Media studios.
It was फिल्माया primarily in लॉस Angeles, California.
Four complete seasons aired, ending on फ़रवरी 8, 2010.
the critically acclaimed पहला ऋतु था a run of 23 एपीसोड and garnered an average of 14.3 million viewers in the संयुक्त States, receiving the highest दरजा for an NBC नाटक premiere in five years.
the second season of नायक आकर्षित an average of 13.1 लाख viewers in the u.S., and चिह्नित एनबीसी 's एकमात्र श्रेणी among the top 20 ranked कार्यक्रम in total viewership लिये the 2007–2008 season.
Heroes has earned a क्रमांक of पुरस्कार और nominations, including Primetime Emmy Awards, Golden ग्लोब्स, लोगों 's चुनाव Awards and British अकादमी टेलीविज़न Awards.
An online extension of the series, नायक 360 Experience, बाद rebranded as Heroes evolutions, was निर्मित to explore the Heroes universe और provides insight into the दिखाएँ 's mythology.
अन्य आधिकारिक नायक media include magazines, कार्रवाई figures, tie-in and interactive websites, a mobile game, a अनोखा, कपडे and अन्य merchandise.
In the पतन of 2008, NBC Digital Entertainment released a श्रेणी of online content for the summer, including more original web content, बेतार आईटीवी interactivity, ग्राफिक novels available लिये mobile viewing and webisodes.
NBC announced Heroes रद्दीकरण on may 14, 2010.
Afterward, the network considered बनाना a टेलीविज़न special event to conclude the श्रेणी ; however, on September 9, 2010, एनबीसी announced the decision to stop any further development of the Heroes मताधिकार.
Tim Kring तब suggested that the broad premise of नायक storylines अनुमत for the franchise to return for fans, but he किया नहीं specify when or in what media format.
On April 17, 2013, tv Line reported that MSN थी in talks to revive the श्रेणी साथ a new cast.
John pierpont `` J. p. ''
Morgan ( April 17, 1837 – कूच 31, 1913 ) was an American financier, banker, philanthropist और art collector who वर्चस्व कॉरपोरेट finance और industrial consolidation during his समय.
In 1892 Morgan arranged the merger of Edison सामान्य इलेक्ट्रिक and thomson-houston Electric Company to रूप General इलेक्ट्रिक.
After financing the creation of the Federal स्टील कम्पनी, he merged in 1901 साथ the कार्नेगी स्टील Company और several other steel और iron व्यवसायों, सहित संचित स्टील और Wire Company owned by विलियम Edenborn, to form the United राज्य स्टील निगम.
Morgan died in Rome, Italy, in उसके sleep in 1913 at the आयु of 75, leaving उसके सौभाग्य and business to his son, जॉन pierpont `` Jack '' Morgan, Jr., और bequeathing उसके mansion और large किताब संग्रहण to The Morgan पुस्तकालयों & संग्रहालय in New यॉर्क.
At the height of मॉर्गन 's करियर दौरान the जल्दी 1900s, he और उसके साझेदार था वित्तीय निवेश in many large corporations and were accused by critics of controlling the nation 's high finance.
He directed the बैंकिंग coalition that रोका the Panic of 1907.
He was the leading फाइनेंसर of the Progressive era, and his dedication to दक्षता and modernization helped transform American business.
इस is a list of एपीसोड of the television श्रेणी.
The episodes were निर्देशित by Shigeru ueda and produced by the Yggdrasil कार्यपालिका कमेटी which included Xebec and genco.
The plot of the episodes is set in Tokyo और revolves around Rin Asōgi, an immortal निजी investigator, as she explores the रहस्य of modern and near-future world and the supernatural कार्यक्रम that surround the fictional society of immortals like herself.
वहीँ are large time गैप in the आतंरिक कालक्रम between the पहला five एपीसोड, ranging इससे एक to thirty years.
The six episodes were broadcast मासिक on AT-X चैनल in जापानी, between February 3 and July 6, 2008.
Each episode is 45 minutes long.

Both were composed and performed by the Japanese metal band Galneryus.

aerial फ़ोटो of fletc, where US digital forensics मानकों were विकसित in the 1980s and '90s
Digital forensics ( sometimes ज्ञात as digital forensic विज्ञान ) is a branch of forensic science encompassing the recovery and छानबीन of सामग्री मिला in digital devices, प्रायः in संबंध to computer crime.
The term digital forensics was originally प्रयुक्त as a पर्याय for computer forensics but रै expanded to cover छानबीन of all डिवाइस capable of storing digital data.
साथ roots in the निजी computing क्रान्ति of the लेट 1970s and जल्दी '80s, the अनुशासन evolved in a haphazard manner during the 1990s, और it was not until the जल्दी 21st century that नेशनल policies emerged.
डिजिटल forensics investigations have a variety of अनुप्रयोग.
The most आम is to support or refute a परिकल्पना before criminal or civil ( as part of the इलेक्ट्रॉनिक discovery process ) courts.
Forensics may also विशेषता in the private सेक्टर ; such as during आतंरिक कॉरपोरेट investigations or intrusion छानबीन ( a विशेषज्ञ जांच into the प्रकृति and extent of an unauthorized network intrusion ).
the तकनीकी aspect of an investigation is divided into अनेक sub-branches, relating to the प्रकार of डिजिटल डिवाइस शामिल ; कंप्यूटर forensics, network forensics, forensic आंकड़ा विश्लेषण and मोबाईल device forensics.
the ठेठ forensic process encompasses the seizure, forensic imaging ( अधिग्रहण ) और analysis of डिजिटल media और the production of a report into एकत्रित evidence.
As खूब as identifying सीधा प्रमाण of a अपराधों, डिजिटल forensics can be used to विशेषता evidence to specific suspects, confirm alibis or कथन, determine intent, identify sources ( लिये उदाहरण, in copyright मामले ), or authenticate दस्तावेज़.
Investigations are much broader in पैमाना than अन्य areas of forensic analysis ( जहाँ the usual aim is to provide answers to a series of simpler questions ) प्रायः involving complex time-lines or hypotheses.
a comparison of the chromaticities enclosed by some color spaces.
A रंग मॉडल is an abstract गणितीय model describing the रास्ता colors can be represented as tuples of संख्याएँ, typically as तीन or four values or रंग components ( e.g. आरजीबी and cmyk are रंग मॉडल ).
however, a color मॉडल with no संबद्ध mapping फलन to an निरपेक्ष color स्पेस is a more or कम arbitrary color system साथ no connection to कोई globally understood प्रणाली of रंग निर्वचन.
adding a certain mapping function between the रंग मॉडल and a certain सन्दर्भ color space परिणाम in a definite `` footprint '' within the सन्दर्भ color स्पेस.
इस `` footprint '' is known as a gamut, and, in combination साथ the रंग मॉडल, defines a नई रंग space.
For उदाहरण, Adobe RGB and srgb हैं two different absolute रंग स्पेसेस, both based on the RGB model.
In the सबसे generic sense of the definition ऊपर, color spaces can be पारिभाषित without the use of a रंग model.
These स्पेसेस, ऐसे as Pantone, are in effect a दिए नियत of names or संख्याएँ which हैं defined by the अस्तित्व of a corresponding नियत of physical color swatches.
इस article focuses on the गणितीय model अवधारणा.
मजदूर दिन is an American संघीय holiday observed on the first Monday in सितंबर, that celebrates the economic and social contributions of मजदूर.
जीवन insurance is a contract between an insured ( insurance policy होल्डर ) and an insurer, where the insurer वादे to अदा a designated लाभार्थी a योग of money ( the `` benefits '' ) upon the death of the insured person.
Depending on the contract, अन्य events such as टर्मिनल illness or critical बीमारी may also ट्रिगर भुगतान.
The policy holder typically pays a premium, either regularly or as a lump योग.
अन्य expenses ( such as अंत्येष्टि खर्च ) हैं also sometimes शामिल in the benefits.
जीवन नीतियों are legal contracts और the terms of the contract describe the सीमाएं of the insured कार्यक्रम.
Specific exclusions are प्रायः लिखा into the contract to सीमा the liability of the insurer ; common examples हैं दावा relating to suicide, fraud, युद्ध, riot और civil commotion.
Life-based अनुबंध tend to fall into दो major categories:
Protection policies – designed to provide a benefit in the event of specified event, typically a lump sum payment.
a common रूप of इस design is term insurance.
निवेश नीतियों – where the प्रमुख objective is to facilitate the विकास of capital by नियमित or सिंगल premiums.
आम फ़ॉर्म ( in the us ) are पूरे life, universal life और variable life policies.

Mitzi Gaynor Donahue ( born may 2, 1962 in Yorba Linda, नारंगी County, कैलिफ़ोर्निया ) is an American अभिनेत्री, also credited और more popularly known as mitzi kapture.
Kapture began her career in films, सबसे of which यहूद not huge वाणिज्यिक successes.
वो गई on to मेक a few television guest दिखावे ( MacGyver, 1st & Ten, and as a प्रतियोगी on The $ 100,000 पिरामिड ) before वो gained international exposure with her first major television role as सार्जेंट Rita ली Lance in the टेलीविज़न श्रेणी रेशा Stalkings.
kapture 's भूमिका as रीता, the other हाफ of the दो `` sams '' for almost 5 years, cemented उसके लोकप्रियता.
Paired with रोब Estes who निभाई सार्जेंट Chris lorenzo, Kapture gained global recognition साथ with her costar चूंकि the show was ब्रॉडकास्ट in अनेक countries.
Sergeant तलवार आखिरकार became Lieutenant तलवार by the time Kapture left the series in 1995 to have her first child Madison.
During उसके time साथ the श्रेणी, Kapture briefly सत in the director 's कुर्सी, लिये दो episodes.
She was interviewed लिये the Silk stalkings Season 1 dvd which was distributed by Anchor खाड़ी Entertainment and released in September 2004.
बाद a short अंतराल from the screen following her exit from Silk Stalkings, Kapture लौटे in 1997 to the छोटी screen and USA Network.
वो played lead roles in two यूएसए तस्वीरें Originals telemovies, पूर्ण अपराधों ( based on a true story, also called Hide and Seek : The जोआन जेन्सेन स्टोरी ), जिससे भी starred चमेली guy and His Bodyguard.
She later स्ट्रक्चर in a few other independent फिल्मी प्रोजेक्ट और थिएटर productions and had several टेलीविज़न अतिथि appearances.
Kapture भी था a पुनरावर्ती भूमिका on Baywatch as Alexis ryker.
She played Anita Hodges on The Young and the बेचैन इससे 2002 through 2004, where वो was credited as Mitzi kapture donahue, and स्ट्रक्चर in the made-for-TV फिल्म Night of आतंक which premiered March 26, 2006 on Lifetime संजाल.
Her नवीनतम is a supporting भूमिका in God 's Ears, released in 2007.
Kapture is the आधिकारिक celebrity spokesperson for the Xeroderma Pigmentosum Society.
the एक्सबॉक्स 360 is the दूसरी video game कंसोल developed by और produced लिये Microsoft और the successor to the एक्सबॉक्स.
The Xbox 360 competes with सोनी 's प्लेस्टेशन 3 and Nintendo 's Wii as भाग of the सातवाँ generation of video खेल consoles.
as of September 30, 2012, 70 million Xbox 360 consoles have महरूम बेची worldwide.
The Xbox 360 was officially अनावरण on MTV on May 12, 2005, with विस्तृत लॉन्च और game information divulged बाद that माह at the इलेक्ट्रॉनिक entertainment Expo ( e3 ).
The कंसोल sold आउट completely upon release in all regions except in जापानी.
अनेक major features of the एक्सबॉक्स 360 हैं its एकीकृत Xbox Live सेवा that allows players to compete online ; डाउनलोड arcade games, game demos, trailers, tv shows, म्यूज़िक and movies ; and इसके Windows Media बीच multimedia capabilities.
the एक्सबॉक्स Live also offers access to विभिन्न ( प्रायः region-specific ) third-party मीडिया streaming अनुप्रयोग.
At उनके e3 presentation on जून 14, 2010, Microsoft announced a redesigned एक्सबॉक्स 360 that would जलयान on the वही दिन.
The redesigned console is slimmer than the previous Xbox 360 model and सुविधाएँ एकीकृत 802.11 b/g/n wi-fi, TOSLINK S/PDIF optical ऑडियो output, पाँच USB 2.0 पोर्ट ( compared to the तीन from older versions ) and a special AUX बंदरगाहों.
Older models of the Xbox 360 have since महरूम discontinued.
the पहला new कंसोल to be released features a 250 GB मुश्किल drive, while a बाद, कम expensive SKU features 4 gb internal भंडार.
backpack may also refer to a 2001 novel by Emily barr
A modern backpack
स्विस army backpack ca. 1960
एकीकृत bearer फ़्रेम.
A backpack ( also called रूकसाक, knapsack, packsack, पैक ) is, in its simplest form, a cloth बोरी carried on one 's back and secured with two straps कि go over the shoulders, but वहीँ can be exceptions.
lightweight प्रकार of backpacks हैं sometimes worn on only एक shoulder strap.
Backpacks are often preferred to handbags for carrying भारी loads or carrying any sort of equipment, because of the सीमित capacity to carry heavy weights लिये long अवधि of time in the हैंड्स.
Large backpacks, used to carry loads over 10 kg ( 22 पाउंड ), usually offload the largest भाग ( up to about 90 % ) of their वज़न onto padded hip belts, leaving the shoulder straps mainly for stabilising the लोड.
This improves the potential to carry भारी loads, as the कूल्हों हैं stronger than the shoulders, और also increases agility और संतुलन, since the लोड यात्राएँ nearer the wearer 's अपना center of द्रव्यमान.
In ancient times, the backpack थी प्रयुक्त as a means to carry the शिकारी 's larger खेल and other types of शिकार and as a रास्ता of easier transport लिये other materials.
in the मामले of larger hunts, the hunters होता dismember their शिकार and distribute the pieces of the animal around, प्रत्येक one पैकिंग the meat into many wrappings and then into bags which they लगाई on to their backs.
The थैला itself थी बना up of different animal hide and skin ( depending on what sorts of animals were in the area ) और sewn साथ by the intestines of कहा पशु, जिससे were woven together tightly to मेक a sturdy thread-like material.
मैक्सिको ( ; ; ), officially the United Mexican States ( ), is a संघीय constitutional republic in उत्तर America.
It is bordered on the north by the United States ; on the दक्षिण और west by the प्रशांत Ocean ; on the southeast by Guatemala, बेलीज़, और the Caribbean Sea ; and on the east by the Gulf of मैक्सिको.
Covering almost two लाख square kilometres ( over 760,000 sq mi ), Mexico is the fifth largest country in the americas by कुल area and the 13th largest स्वतंत्र nation in the world.
साथ an estimated population of over 113 लाख, it is the world 's eleventh सबसे populous country and the सबसे populous Spanish-speaking country.
Mexico is a federation comprising thirty-one राज्य और a संघीय District, the capital city.
in pre-columbian Mexico many cultures matured into उन्नत सभ्यताओं such as the Olmec, the toltec, the teotihuacan, the Zapotec, the माया and the एज़टेक before first contact with Europeans.
In 1521, Spain conquered and colonized the territory from its base in méxico-tenochtitlan, which थी administered as the Viceroyalty of New स्पेन.
इस territory would eventually become Mexico following recognition of the उपनिवेश 's independence in 1821.
the post-independence काल was characterized by economic instability, the mexican-american War and territorial cession to the United States, a civil युद्ध, दो empires and a domestic dictatorship.
The latter led to the मैक्सिकन Revolution in 1910, which culminated with the promulgation of the 1917 Constitution and the emergence of the country 's वर्तमान राजनैतिक system.
चुनावों held in जुलाई 2000 marked the first समय कि an opposition पार्टी won the presidency इससे the Institutional Revolutionary पार्टी.
चूंकि 2006 the country has महरूम in the midst of a drug युद्ध जिससे रै caused 60,000 deaths.
Mexico रै one of the world 's largest economies, और is considered दोनो a क्षेत्रीय power and मध्य शक्ति.
in addition, मैक्सिको थी the first लैटिन अमरीकी member of the Organisation for आर्थिक Co-operation and Development oecd ( चूंकि 1994 ), and माना an upper-middle आय देश by the World Bank.
Mexico is considered a newly industrialized country और an emerging शक्ति.
it रै the fourteenth largest nominal GDP and the eleventh largest GDP by purchasing शक्ति पैरिटी.
The अर्थव्यवस्था is strongly linked to those of its North अमरीकी Free Trade अनुबंध ( nafta ) partners, especially the संयुक्त राज्य of America.
Mexico ranks छठे in the संसार and पहला in the Americas by number of UNESCO World Heritage Sites साथ 31, और in 2007 थी the दसवाँ सबसे visited country in the world with 21.4 million international arrivals प्रति year.
बेब Ruth holds the MLB करियर slugging percentage record (.690 ).
in baseball statistics, slugging percentage ( abbreviated SLG ) is a popular measure of the power of a hitter.
It is गणना as total bases divided by at bats :
जहाँ AB is the number of at-bats for a दिए खिलाड़ी, and 1B, 2b, 3B, and HR हैं the क्रमांक of singles, युगल, तिगुना, और home रनों, respectively.
Walks are specifically excluded इससे this गणना.
लिये उदाहरण, in 1920, बेब Ruth played his पहला ऋतु लिये the नई यॉर्क Yankees.
in 458 at bats, Ruth था 172 हिट्स, comprising 73 singles, 36 doubles, 9 triples, और 54 घर runs, जिससे brings the कुल आधार गिनती to ( 73 × 1 ) + ( 36 × 2 ) + ( 9 × 3 ) + ( 54 × 4 ) = 388.
उसके कुल number of bases ( 388 ) divided by his कुल at-bats ( 458 ) is.847, उसके slugging percentage for the ऋतु.
the next year he slugged.846, और these records went अखंड until 2001, जब Barry Bonds achieved 411 bases in 476 at-bats, bringing his slugging percentage to.863, unmatched since.
is a role-playing वीडियो game developed और published by वर्गाकार ( अभी Square एनिक्स ) लिये the Super Nintendo Entertainment प्रणाली in 1995.
Chrono Trigger 's विकास team included three designers कि Square dubbed the `` Dream Team '' : hironobu Sakaguchi, the creator of वर्गाकार 's फाइनल Fantasy श्रेणी ; Yuji Horii, a freelance designer and creator of एनिक्स 's लोकप्रिय Dragon क्वेस्ट series ; और अकिरा Toriyama, a freelance manga artist famed for उसके work with Dragon Quest and ड्रैगन Ball.
kazuhiko aoki produced the game, Masato Kato लिखा most of the प्लाट, जबकि composer Yasunori Mitsuda scored most of the खेल before falling बीमार and deferring बाकी tracks to Final Fantasy composer nobuo uematsu.
The game 's स्टोरी फ़ॉलो a group of adventurers जो travel through time to prevent a वैश्विक catastrophe.
Square re-released a ported version by Tose in Japan लिये Sony 's PlayStation in 1999, later repackaged साथ a Final Fantasy IV port as फाइनल काल्पनिक क्रॉनिकल्स in 2001 लिये the उत्तर American market.
a slightly enhanced chrono ट्रिगर थी released for the Nintendo DS on November 25, 2008, in North America and Japan, and went on बिक्री in Australia on February 3, 2009 and in Europe on फ़रवरी 6, 2009.
The game was never released in PAL territories पहले the Nintendo ds version.
chrono Trigger थी a critical and वाणिज्यिक success upon release and is considered आज to be one of the greatest वीडियो खेल of all समय.
निन्टेंडो Power magazine described aspects of Chrono Trigger as revolutionary, including its अनेक endings, plot-related sidequests focusing on character विकास, unique बैटल प्रणाली, and detailed ग्राफिक्स.
Chrono Trigger was the तीसरा best-selling game of 1995, and the खेल 's SNES and प्लेस्टेशन iterations have shipped 2.65 million नक़ल as of March 2003.
the संस्करण for the Nintendo ds बेची 790,000 copies as of March 2009.
chrono Trigger थी also ported to mobile phones, आभासी कंसोल, the PlayStation संजाल ( तभी in the यूएसए ), iOS devices, और Android डिवाइस.
बकरी चीज
बकरी cheese, or chèvre ( इससे the फ्रेंच word for बकरी ), is चीज बना out of the milk of goats.
अतिताप is elevated देह temperature due to विफल thermoregulation that occurs when a देह produces or absorbs more heat than it dissipates.
Extreme temperature elevation तब becomes a medical emergency requiring immediate treatment to prevent disability or मौत.
The most common causes include ऊष्मा स्ट्रोक और adverse reactions to drugs.
The former is an acute temperature elevation caused by exposure to excessive ऊष्मा, or combination of heat and humidity, कि overwhelms the heat-regulating mechanisms.
the latter is a relatively rare पक्ष effect of many drugs, विशेषकर those that affect the सेंट्रल बेचैन प्रणाली.
malignant hyperthermia is a rare complication of some types of सामान्य एनेस्थीसिया.
Hyperthermia can also be deliberately induced using drugs or medical devices and may be used in the treatment of some kinds of cancer and other शर्तें, सबसे commonly in conjunction with radiotherapy.
Hyperthermia differs from ज्वर in that the देह 's तापमान set point remains अपरिवर्तित.
the opposite is hypothermia, which occurs जब the temperature बूंदें नीचे that जरूरी to maintain normal चयापचय.
बेलीज़, is a country located on the northeastern coast of Central America.
It is the तभी देश in the क्षेत्रफल जहाँ English is the official language, although Kriol और स्पेनी हैं more commonly spoken.
Belize is bordered on the north by मैक्सिको, to the south और west by Guatemala and to the east by the Caribbean Sea.
Its mainland is about long and चौड़ी.
With of जमीन और a जनसांख्यिकी of तभी 312,698 inhabitants ( 2010 census ), Belize possesses the न्यूनतम population density in सेंट्रल अमेरिका.
the country 's population growth rate of 3.15 % ( 2012 est. ) is the दूसरी highest in the region and one of the highest in the western गोलार्ध.
Belize 's abundance of स्थलीय and समुद्री प्रजाति, and its diversity of ecosystems give it a कुंजी place within the globally significant mesoamerican biological corridor.
बेलीज़ has a विविध समाज, comprising many संस्कृतियों और भाषाएं.
It is the only nation in the region with a British औपनिवेशिक heritage, but as a part of the पश्चिमी Caribbean मण्डल, it also साझा a common heritage with the fellow Anglophone caribbean countries.
In general, Belize is considered to be a सेंट्रल American और Caribbean स्वदेश with strong ties to दोनो the Caribbean and Latin अमेरिका.
बेलीज़ is a member of the caribbean Community ( CARICOM ), the Community of लैटिन American and caribbean States ( CELAC ), and सेंट्रल अमरीकी संयोजन System ( SICA ).
बेलीज़ is ज्ञात लिये इसके सितंबर Celebrations, और is the birthplace of chewing gum और punta Rock.
The `` Betsy Ross '' ध्वज
a `` Betsy Ross '' flag उड़ती outside San Francisco नगर Hall
The Betsy Ross ध्वज is an जल्दी design of the ध्वज of the United States, popularly attributed to Betsy रॉस, using the आम motifs of alternating red-and-white धारीदार field with five-pointed stars in a blue canton.
The flag was designed दौरान the American Revolution and features 13 stars to represent the original 13 colonies.
The distinctive विशेषता of the Ross ध्वज is the व्यवस्था of the stars in a circle.
Although the Betsy Ross story is accepted by most Americans, कुछ flag historians और revisionists do not accept the Betsy Ross design as the first American flag.
According to the traditional account, the original flag was बना in June 1776, when a small committee—including George वॉशिंगटन, Robert Morris and सापेक्ष George रॉस —visited Betsy और discussed the need for a new अमरीकी flag.
बेट्सी accepted the job to manufacture the flag, altering the committee 's डिज़ाइन by replacing the six-pointed सितारों with five-pointed stars.
While the बेट्सी Ross लेजेंड is questionable, the flag design is ज्ञात to have been in use by 1777 ; अल्फ्रेड B. गली described it at the surrender of सामान्य Burgoyne and understood the circle of सितारों to represent equality among the अमरीकी राज्य.
It is एक of the oldest संस्करण of U.S. flags known to मौजूद ; जबकि it is नहीं the oldest surviving ध्वज artifact in cloth रूप, its likeness appears on पुरानी physical relics, namely, the contemporary रणभूमि paintings by जॉन Trumbull and Charles willson Peale.
They depict the गोलाकार star व्यवस्था being flown from ship masts and अनेक अन्य स्थान, and यूँ provide the first known historical documentation of the ध्वज 's appearance.
The seal of the U.S. Department of Veterans अफेयर्स uses the Betsy रॉस flag to represent सेवा to all दिग्गजों from the American Revolution to the उपस्थित day.
the Betsy Ross डिज़ाइन of 13-star US flags has महरूम featured in अनेक लोकप्रिय artworks ( sometimes inaccurately, as in वॉशिंगटन क्रासिंग the Delaware ) और films, such as the 1960 संस्करण of Pollyanna.
The flag continues to be एक of the most लोकप्रिय symbols of the American Revolution.
A purr is a ध्वनि बना by all species of felids and is a भाग of cat communication.
It varies between cats ( for उदाहरण by loudness और tone ), and इससे प्रजाति to प्रजाति, but can be characterized as a tonal buzzing.
the पद `` purring '' has been प्रयुक्त liberally in literature, और it has been claimed कि viverrids ( सीविट, नेवला, genet ), bears, badgers, hyaenas ( et cetera ) purr.
अन्य animals that have महरूम said to purr are खरगोश, squirrels, guinea pigs, tapirs, ring-tailed lemurs, हाथियों, raccoons and gorillas while eating.
However, using a सख्त definition of purring that निरन्तर sound उत्पादन must वैकल्पिक between pulmonic egressive and ingressive airstream ( and usually go on for मिनट्स ), पीटर्स ( 2002 ), in an exhaustive review of the वैज्ञानिक literature, पहुँचे the conclusion कि जबतक तब तभी ‘purring cats’ ( Felidae ) और दो species of genets, Genetta tigrina, and सबसे संभावित भी Genetta genetta, had महरूम documented to purr.
The platypus ( ornithorhynchus anatinus ) is a semiaquatic स्तनधारी endemic to eastern Australia, सहित Tasmania.
साथ साथ the चार species of echidna, it is one of the पाँच extant species of monotremes, the only स्तनधारियों कि lay अंडे बजाय of giving birth.
It is the sole living प्रतिनिधि of its family ( ornithorhynchidae ) और genus ( ornithorhynchus ), हालांकि a number of सम्बन्धित species have been मिला in the fossil रिकार्ड.
the unusual रूप of इस egg-laying, duck -billed, beaver -tailed, otter -footed mammal मनोरथ European naturalists when they first encountered it, साथ some considering it an elaborate fraud.
It is एक of the few venomous स्तनधारियों, the male platypus having a spur on the hind पैर that delivers a venom सक्षम of causing severe पीड़ा to इंसानो.
the अद्वितीय features of the platypus make it an महत्वपूर्ण subject in the study of evolutionary biology and a recognisable and iconic symbol of Australia ; it has appeared as a mascot at national events and is featured on the reverse of its 20-cent सिक्का.
the platypus is the animal emblem of the state of New दक्षिण Wales.
जबतक the जल्दी 20th century, it थी hunted for इसके फर, but it is अभी सुरक्षित throughout its range.
हालांकि captive breeding programmes have था तभी limited success और the platypus is vulnerable to the effects of pollution, it is not under any immediate threat.

The जनसांख्यिकी was 336 at the 2010 जनसांख्यिकी.
Wilton is a census-designated place ( CDP ) in Sacramento काउंटी, कैलिफ़ोर्निया, United States.
it is part of the sacramento – Arden-Arcade – Roseville महानगर सांख्यिकीय Area.
The population थी 5,363 at the 2010 जनसांख्यिकी, up इससे 4,551 at the 2000 जनसांख्यिकी.
In human-computer बातचीत, cut और paste और copy and paste are सम्बन्धित commands कि प्रस्ताव a user-interface बातचीत technique for transferring टेक्स्ट, data, फाइलें or objects from a source to a destination.
सबसे ubiquitously, उपयोक्ता require the क्षमता to काटें and paste sections of plain text.
the cut command removes the चयनित आंकड़ा from its original position, while the copy command creates a duplicate ; in both मामले the selected data is placed in a clipboard.
the data in the clipboard is बाद inserted in the स्थिति where the paste command is issued.
The कमांड names are an interface metaphor based on the शारीरिक कार्यविधि used in manuscript editing to बनाएँ a page लेआउट.
इस बातचीत तकनीक रै close associations with related techniques in graphical user interfaces कि उपयोग pointing डिवाइस ऐसे as a computer mouse ( by खीचें and drop, for example ).
आर्थिक अनुक्रम मात्रा is the अनुक्रम quantity that minimizes कुल inventory holding costs and ordering costs.
it is एक of the oldest शास्त्रीय production scheduling मॉडल.
The फ्रेमवर्क प्रयुक्त to determine इस अनुक्रम मात्रा is भी ज्ञात as barabas EOQ Model or Barabas Formula.
The model was developed by Ford W. Harris in 1913, but R. H. Wilson, a सलाहकार who लागू it extensively, is given क्रेडिट लिये his in-depth विश्लेषण.
स्टीफन `` Stevie '' रे Vaughan ( October 3, 1954 – August 27, 1990 ) was an अमरीकी guitarist, singer-songwriter, और record producer.
Often referred to by his initials SRV, Vaughan is बेहतरीन known as a founding member and leader of Double ट्रबल.
Together साथ drummer क्रिस Layton and bassist टॉमी शैनन, they ignited the blues पुनरुद्धार of the 1980s.
With a करियर spanning सात सालो, vaughan and दोगुना Trouble consistently sold out कॉन्सर्ट while उनके एल्बम frequently went gold.
He was born और raised in डलास, Texas, and for a short काल of समय जिया in Graham, टेक्सास.
As the younger brother of Jimmie vaughan, Vaughan started playing the guitar at आयु सात और formed अनेक bands that occasionally performed in local nightclubs.
at age 17, he dropped आउट of ऊँची school और स्थानांतरित to ऑस्टिन to further pursue उसके musical career, joining समूह such as krackerjack, the nightcrawlers, और the cobras.
In 1977, he formed ट्रिपल Threat Revue, a band कि eventually evolved into दोगुना ट्रबल और regularly performed around ऑस्टिन.
In 1982, Vaughan और Double ट्रबल performed at the montreux जैज़ Festival in Switzerland, catching the attention of संगीतकारों David बोवी और जैक्सन Browne.
Bowie asked Vaughan to play on उसके upcoming स्टुडियो album let 's Dance, while browne offered the band free उपयोग of his personal स्टुडियो in Los Angeles to रिकार्ड an album.
In March 1983, Vaughan and Double ट्रबल were signed to एपिक Records by veteran रिकार्ड producer जॉन Hammond Sr. and released their debut album, Texas Flood in June of that year.
After कामयाब touring, the समूह released the एल्बम, Could n't Stand the मौसम ( 1984 ) और Soul to Soul ( 1985 ), the latter of which प्रदर्शित नई keyboardist Reese wynans.
Although his career had progressed सफलतापूर्वक, vaughan checked into a पुनर्वास hospital in अटलांटा, Georgia to give up a कोका and alcohol आदत और returned to touring with the band.
In June 1989, In Step थी released और earned them a Grammy Award for बेहतरीन समकालीन Blues प्रदर्शन.
On अगस्त 27, 1990, Vaughan was killed in a हेलीकाप्टर crash following a performance in ईस्ट Troy, Wisconsin.
vaughan 's uniquely eclectic yet तीव्र स्टाइल was derived from a किस्में of musical जाति.
He was बहकावे by blues musicians सहित अल्बर्ट King, Freddie किंग, Otis फटाफट, और Muddy Waters, and चट्टान guitarists ऐसे as Jimi Hendrix और Lonnie Mack.
उसके गिटार playing reflected the classic blues और pentatonic तराजू.
he रै प्राप्त wide critical recognition for his गिटार playing, रैंकिंग at # 6 on Rolling Stones list of `` 100 महानतम guitarists '' in 2011.
He was posthumously inducted into the Blues हॉल of Fame in 2000 and a memorial statue was erected in Austin 's ऑडिटोरियम Shores park.
स्टीवी Ray Vaughan is widely considered to be one of the greatest musicians to come इससे the state of Texas.
the लास Vegas स्ट्रिप संसार of Coca-Cola museum in 2003
Coca-Cola is a कार्बोनेटेड नरम drink sold in stores, restaurants, and वेंडिंग machines in प्रत्येक country except क्यूबा and North Korea.
It is उत्पादित by The coca-cola Company of Atlanta, जॉर्जिया, and is often referred to बस as कोक ( a पंजीकृत ट्रेडमार्क of The Coca-Cola कम्पनी in the संयुक्त States चूंकि कूच 27, 1944 ).
Originally intended as a patent medicine जब it थी invented in the late 19th century by जॉन pemberton, coca-cola was bought out by businessman Asa griggs Candler, whose marketing tactics led कोक to इसके dominance of the world soft-drink मार्केट throughout the 20th century.
The कम्पनी produces concentrate, which is तब sold to licensed Coca-Cola bottlers throughout the संसार.
the bottlers, who hold territorially विशेष अनुबंध साथ the company, produce समाप्त product in डिब्बे और बोतलों from the concentrate in संयोजन with filtered water और sweeteners.
the bottlers then बेचें, वितरित and merchandise coca-cola to retail stores and vending machines.
Such bottlers include Coca-Cola उद्यमों, जिससे is the largest single Coca-Cola bottler in North अमेरिका and western Europe.
the Coca-Cola Company भी बिकता concentrate लिये सोडा fountains to प्रमुख restaurants और खाना सेवा वितरकों.
The Coca-Cola कम्पनी has, on occasion, introduced अन्य cola drinks under the Coke brand नाम.
the most common of these is Diet Coke, with अन्य सहित Caffeine-Free Coca-Cola, आहार Coke caffeine-free, Coca-Cola चेरी, Coca-Cola शून्य, coca-cola Vanilla, और special versions with नीबू, लाइम or coffee.
Based on Interbrand 's best global brand 2011, Coca-Cola थी the संसार 's most valuable ब्रांड.
Barry लुई larkin ( born April 28, 1964 ) is a retired Major लीग Baseball खिलाड़ी.
Larkin निभाई shortstop for the सिनसिनाटी Reds from 1986 to 2004 and थी एक of the pivotal खिलाड़ी on the 1990 Reds ' World Series चैंपियनशिप टोली.
Larkin थी निर्वाचित to the National बेसबॉल हॉल of Fame in January 2012 और थी inducted on जुलाई 22.
Larkin is माना एक of the शीर्ष players of उसके era, winning nine चांदी slugger पुरस्कार and three Gold Glove awards.
He was selected to the Major लीग all-star Game twelve टाइम्स, और was elected the 1995 National League Most Valuable खिलाड़ी.
brasília ( ) is the federal capital of ब्राज़ील and the सीट of government of the संघीय District.
Administratively, the नगर is located in the Federal ज़िला which is in the central-west Region.
Physically, it is स्तिथ in the Brazilian Highlands.
It has a जनसांख्यिकी of परिचय 2,562,963 ( 3,716,996 in the metropolitan area ) as of the 2008 ibge अनुमान, making it the fourth largest city in ब्राज़ील.
however, as a metropolitan area, it ranks lower at sixth in population.
brasília is the largest नगर in the world that किया नहीं exist at the शुरूआत of the 20th century.
Brasília has the fifth largest GDP among लैटिन American cities और the third in Brazil.
at around R $ 62,000 ब्राज़ीलियाई reais ( equal to approximately $ 30,900 us dollars or €23,000 euros ), the city 's per capita income is the उच्चतम among ब्राज़ील 's largest cities.
As the national पूंजी, Brasília is the seat of all three शाखाओं of the federal government of Brazil.
the city also होस्ट the headquarters of many ब्राज़ीलियाई कंपनियाँ.
Planning policies such as the स्थान of आवासीय इमारतें around expansive शहरी areas, as well as भवन the city around विशाल avenues और dividing it into sectors, have sparked a बहस और reflection on जीवन in big शहरों in the 20th सदी.
The नगर 's डिज़ाइन divides it into गिने blocks as खूब as sectors लिये specified activities, such as the Hotel Sector, the बैंकिंग Sector or the Embassy Sector.
Brasília होस्ट 124 विदेशी embassies.
The city was planned and developed in 1956 साथ Lúcio Costa as the principal urban प्लानर, Oscar Niemeyer as the principal architect और Roberto burle मार्क्स as the landscape designer.
Brasilia is in the Unesco 's World Hertitage List due to its architecture.
On अप्रैल 22, 1960, it formally became ब्राज़ील 's नेशनल capital.
viewed इससे above, the main portion of the नगर resembles an वायुयान or a butterfly.
The city is commonly referred to as पूंजी संघीय, or simply bsb.
निवासियों of Brasília are known as brasilienses or candangos ( the latter referring to those not born in the city लकिन who migrated वहीँ after it was स्थापित ).
In local उपयोग, the शब्द `` Brasília '' usually refers तभी to the पहला Administrative Region ( RA i ) भीतर the Federal District ( distrito संघीय ), where the most महत्वपूर्ण government इमारतें are located.
brasília रै a अद्वितीय status in Brazil, as it is an administrative division rather than a विधिक municipality like nearly all cities in Brazil.
Nationally, the पद is almost सदा प्रयुक्त synonymously with the संघीय District, जिससे constitutes an indivisible Federative Unit, analogous to a state.
Several `` satellite शहरों '' मौजूद जिससे हैं भी भाग of the Federal District.
Brasília International Airport is the प्रमुख airport in brasília, connecting the पूंजी to all major ब्राज़ीलियाई cities और many अंतरराष्ट्रीय destinations.
It is the third सबसे महत्वपूर्ण विमानक्षेत्र in ब्राज़ील, in terms of passengers और aircraft आंदोलनों.
personifications of जर्मनी, France, Russia, Austria-Hungary, और the United Kingdom attempting to रखना the ढक्कन on the simmering cauldron of imperialist and राष्ट्रवादी tensions in the Balkans to prevent a सामान्य यूरोपीय war.
They यहूद कामयाब in 1912 और 1913 लकिन did not सफल in in 1914.
The causes of संसार War I, जिससे began in सेंट्रल यूरोपीय in लेट जुलाई 1914 and finished in 1918, शामिल अनेक कारकों, such as the conflicts and hostility of the चार दशकों leading up to the war.
Militarism, alliances, imperialism, and nationalism played major भूमिकाएँ in the conflict as खूब.
the immediate origins of the युद्ध, however, lay in the निर्णय taken by statesmen and generals दौरान the Crisis of 1914, casus belli for which was the हत्या of archduke Franz Ferdinand ( the Archduke of ऑस्ट्रिया Hungary ) and his बीवी Sophie by gavrilo Princip, an irredentist serb.
The crisis आए बाद a long and difficult series of राजनयिक clashes between the Great शक्तियां ( Italy, France, जर्मनी, the British साम्राज्य, the Austria-Hungarian Empire and रूस ) over यूरोपीय और औपनिवेशिक issues in the decade पहले 1914 that had left tensions high.
In turn ये diplomatic clashes can be traced to परिवर्तन in the संतुलन of power in Europe since 1867.
the अधिक तात्कालिक कारण for the युद्ध was tensions over territory in the Balkans.
Austria-Hungary competed साथ Serbia और रूस लिये territory and influence in the region और they pulled the बाकी of the ग्रेट Powers into the विरोध through their various alliances and treaties.
Although the chain of कार्यक्रम unleashed by the assassination triggered the war, the war 's origins go deeper, involving नेशनल politics, cultures, अर्थशास्त्र, and a complex web of alliances and counterbalances कि had विकसित between the various European powers since 1870.
कुछ of the most महत्वपूर्ण long term or संरचनात्मक कल्याणकारी are : the growth of nationalism आरपार Europe, unresolved territorial disputes, an intricate प्रणाली of alliances, the perceived breakdown of the संतुलन of power in यूरोपीय, convoluted and fragmented governance, the arms races of the पिछला decades, previous military planning, इम्पीरियल and औपनिवेशिक rivalry for wealth, power और prestige, और आर्थिक and military फंसने in उद्योग and व्यापार – e.g., the सुअर War between Austria and सर्बिया.
Other कल्याणकारी that came into खेल दौरान the राजनयिक crisis that preceded the war included misperceptions of intent ( e.g., the जर्मनी belief that the United Kingdom होता remain न्यूट्रल ) and delays and misunderstandings in राजनयिक communications.
The various categories of स्पष्टीकरण for World War i correspond to different इतिहासकारों ' overall methods.
सबसे historians और popular commentators शामिल causes from more than one category of explanation to provide a rounded account of the कल्याणकारी of the war.
the deepest distinction among ये accounts is between stories that see it as the अपरिहार्य and predictable निष्कर्ष of निश्चित कारकों, और those that describe it as an arbitrary and unfortunate mistake.
In attributing causes for the war, historians and लड had to deal with an unprecedented flood of memoirs और official documents, released as प्रत्येक country शामिल tried to avoid दोष लिये starting the war.
Early releases of information by governments, particularly those released लिये use by the `` Commission on the Responsibility of the Authors of the War '' were shown to be incomplete and पक्षपातपूर्ण.
In addition some दस्तावेज़, विशेषकर राजनयिक cables between रूस और फ़्रांस, यहूद found to have महरूम doctored.
भी in बाद दशकों however, when much अधिक सूचना had been released, इतिहासकारों from the same culture have महरूम shown to come to differing conclusions on the causes of the war.
Johnson 's नई chart of नेशनल emblems, published c. 1868.
The विशाल flags दिखाया in the corners are the 37-star flag of the United States ( flown 1867-1877 ), the royal Standard of the United किंगडम, the Russian Imperial Standard, और the फ्रेंच tricolore साथ inset इम्पीरियल Eagle.
विभिन्न अन्य flags flown by ships are shown.
The Flag of क्यूबा is labelled `` Cuban ( so पुकारा ) ``.
The Chinese dragon on the ध्वज of China was drawn mistakenly as a western ड्रैगन.
a national ध्वज is a flag that symbolizes a देश.
The flag is flown by the सरकारी, but प्रायः can भी be flown by citizens of the देश.
दोनो पब्लिक and निजी buildings ऐसे as स्कूलों और courthouses may मक्खी the नेशनल ध्वज.
In कुछ countries, the नेशनल flags हैं only flown इससे non-military इमारतें on certain ध्वज दिनों.
There हैं three distinct types of national flag for use on land, and three for use at sea, हालांकि many देशों use identical डिजाइन लिये अनेक ( and sometimes सब ) of these types of ध्वज.
the अमरीकी Civil War ( ACW ), भी known as the War between the States or simply the सिविल War ( देखिए naming ), थी a civil war लड़ा from 1861 to 1865 between the संयुक्त राज्य ( the `` संघ '' or the `` North '' ) और अनेक Southern slave states that declared उनके secession and formed the Confederate राज्य of America ( the `` confederacy '' or the `` South '' ).
The war had इसके उत्पत्ति in the समस्या of slavery, especially the extension of slavery into the western territories.
Foreign powers किया नहीं intervene.
After चार सालो of bloody कॉम्बैट that बाएँ over 600,000 soldiers मुर्दे और destroyed much of the दक्षिण 's अवसंरचना, the confederacy collapsed, गुलामी थी abolished, and the difficult Reconstruction प्रक्रम of restoring नेशनल unity and guaranteeing अधिकारों to the freed slaves began.
in the 1860 presidential चुनाव, Republicans, led by Abraham lincoln, opposed expanding गुलामी into United राज्य ' territories.
lincoln won, but पहले his उद्घाटन on कूच 4, 1861, seven cotton-based स्लेव states formed the confederacy.
Outgoing Democratic अध्यक्ष James Buchanan and the आवक Republicans rejected secession as illegal.
lincoln 's inaugural address घोषित उसके administration होता not initiate civil युद्ध.
Eight बाकी slave states जारी to reject काल्स for secession.
Confederate शक्तियां seized numerous federal forts within territory claimed by the Confederacy.
A Peace Conference failed to ढूँढें a सुलह, और both sides prepared लिये war.
The confederates assumed that European देशों were so dependent on `` किंग Cotton `` कि they would intervene ; none किया और none पहचाना the new Confederate States of अमेरिका.
hostilities began on अप्रैल 12, 1861, जब confederate forces fired upon फोर्ट sumter, a key फोर्ट held by Union troops in South कैरोलिना.
Lincoln पुकारा for प्रत्येक state to provide सैनिकों to retake the fort ; consequently, चार अधिक slave राज्य joined the Confederacy, bringing उनके कुल to eleven.
the संघ जल्द controlled the border राज्य and स्थापित a नवल blockade that अबोध the दक्षिणी economy.
the Eastern Theater was inconclusive in 1861–62.
The autumn 1862 Confederate campaign into Maryland ( a Union state ) ended with confederate retreat at the बैटल of Antietam, dissuading British intervention.
Lincoln issued the Emancipation Proclamation, जिससे made ending गुलामी a युद्ध goal.
to the west, by summer 1862 the Union destroyed the confederate river navy, then much of उनके western armies, और the संघ at Vicksburg split the Confederacy in two at the Mississippi River.
in 1863, Robert E. ली 's confederate incursion north ended at the Battle of Gettysburg.
पश्चिमी सफलताओं led to Ulysses S. Grant कमांड of सब संघ सेना in 1864.
In the पश्चिमी Theater, विलियम T. Sherman drove east to कैप्चर Atlanta और marched to the sea, destroying confederate infrastructure साथ the way.
the Union marshaled the संसाधन and manpower to आक्रमण the Confederacy from सब directions, and could afford to fight लड़ाइयों of attrition through the overland Campaign towards रिचमंड, the Confederate पूंजी.
the defending confederate army failed, अग्रणी to Lee 's surrender to ग्रान्ट at Appomattox अदालत हाउस on April 9, 1865.
The अमरीकी Civil War was one of the earliest सच्चा industrial wars.
railroads, the telegraph, steamships, और mass-produced weapons यहूद employed extensively.
The mobilization of civilian factories, mines, shipyards, banks, transportation और खाना supplies all foreshadowed World War I.
It remains the deadliest युद्ध in अमरीकी history, resulting in the मौतों of an estimated 750,000 soldiers and an undetermined number of civilian हताहत.
इतिहासकार John Huddleston estimates the death toll at टेन percent of सब उत्तरी males 20–45 years old, और 30 percent of सब दक्षिणी श्वेत males aged 18–40.
norrie बीमारी is a genetic disorder that primarily affects the नजर और almost always leads to दृष्टिहीनता.
In addition to the जन्मजात ocular लक्षण, कुछ मरीजों suffer from a प्रगतिशील hearing घाटा starting ज़्यादातर in उनके 2nd दशक of life, जबकि another portion may be मानसिक challenged.
Patients with Norrie बीमारी may develop cataracts, leukocoria ( a condition where the pupils appear white when लाइट is shone on उन्हें ), साथ साथ other developmental issues in the नजर, ऐसे as shrinking of the ग्लोब and the wasting दूर of the iris.
around 30–50 % of उन्हें होगा also have developmental डेलाy/ mental retardation, psychotic-like features, incoordination of आंदोलनों or behavioral abnormalities.
सबसे patients हैं born साथ normal hearing ; however, the onset of hearing घाटा is very common in early किशोरावस्था.
About 15 % of the मरीजों are estimated to develop सब the features of the बीमारी.
the बीमारी affects almost only male infants at जनम or soon बाद जनम, because the disease is inherited x-linked recessive.
तभी in very rare cases, महिलाओं have महरूम diagnosed with Norrie बीमारी as well.
The exact incidence number is अनजान ; only a few सौ मामले have महरूम reported so far.
it is a very rare विकार that is नहीं associated with कोई विशिष्ट ethnic or racial समूह.
A contract is an अनुबंध having a lawful ऑब्जेक्ट entered into voluntarily by दो or more parties, each of whom intends to create एक or more legal obligations between उन्हें.
The elements of a contract हैं `` offer '' and `` acceptance '' by `` competent persons '' having legal capacity who एक्सचेंज `` consideration '' to बनाएँ `` mutuality of obligation. ''
Proof of some or all of ये तत्व may be किया in writing, though अनुबंध may be made entirely orally or by conduct.
the remedy लिये breach of contract can be `` क्षतिपूर्ति '' in the रूप of मुआवजे of money or विशिष्ट performance enforced through an injunction.
Both of these remedies award the party at loss the `` benefit of the bargain '' or expectation damages, which हैं वृहद than mere reliance damages, as in promissory estoppel.
The parties may be natural व्यक्तियों or juristic व्यक्तियों.
a अनुबंध is a legally enforceable वादा or undertaking that कुछ will or will not occur.
The word promise can be used as a legal पर्याय लिये contract, हालांकि care is जरूरी as a वादा may नहीं have the full standing of a contract, as when it is an अनुबंध बगैर विचार.
अनुबंध विधि varies greatly इससे एक क्षेत्राधिकार to another, including मतभेद in common विधि compared to सिविल law, the impact of प्राप्त विधि, particularly इससे England in common law countries, और of law codified in regional विधान.
regarding Australian Contract Law for example, वहीँ are 40 प्रासंगिक acts which प्रभाव on the interpretation of contract at the Commonwealth ( संघीय / नेशनल ) स्तर, and an अतिरिक्त 26 acts at the level of the राज्य of nsw.
In addition there हैं 6 अंतरराष्ट्रीय यंत्र or conventions which हैं applicable for अंतरराष्ट्रीय dealings, such as the United राष्ट्र Convention on Contracts for the International Sale of goods.
asp.net is a server-side वेब अनुप्रयोग framework designed लिये वेब development to produce डायनेमिक Web पृष्ठों.
it was developed by microsoft to allow programmers to निर्माण dynamic web sites, web applications and वेब services.
it थी पहला released in जनवरी 2002 साथ version 1.0 of the.neT Framework, और is the successor to microsoft 's क्रियाशील Server Pages ( asp ) technology.
ASP.NET is निर्मित on the आम भाषा Runtime ( CLR ), allowing programmers to लिखें ASP.NET कोड using any supported.NET language.
The asp.net साबुन एक्सटेंशन फ्रेमवर्क allows asp.net components to प्रक्रम SOAP messages.
lysergic एसिड diethylamide, abbreviated एलएसडी or LSD-25, भी known as lysergide ( INN ) and colloquially as acid, is a semisynthetic psychedelic drug of the ergoline family, खूब known लिये इसके psychological effects जिससे can include altered thinking processes, closed and खोलें eye visuals, synesthesia, an altered भाव of time and spiritual अनुभवों, as well as for its कुंजी भूमिका in 1960s counterculture.
it is प्रयुक्त mainly as an entheogen, recreational drug, और as an agent in psychedelic चिकित्सा.
एलएसडी is non-addictive, is नहीं known to cause brain damage, and रै extremely low toxicity सापेक्ष to dose.
However, adverse psychiatric प्रतिक्रियाएँ such as anxiety, paranoia, and delusions are संभावित.
LSD was first synthesized by Albert Hofmann in 1938 from ergotamine, a रासायनिक निकला by आर्थर stoll इससे ergot, a grain कवक that typically grows on rye.
the short form `` LSD '' comes from its early कोड name LSD-25, जिससे is an संक्षिप्त for the जर्मनी `` Lysergsäure-diethylamid '' followed by a sequential क्रमांक.
LSD is संवेदनशील to oxygen, ultraviolet light, and chlorine, विशेषकर in solution, though its potency may last लिये years if it is stored away from लाइट and नमी at low तापमान.
In pure form it is a colorless, गंधहीन, tasteless solid.
एलएसडी is typically वितरित orally, usually on a substrate such as absorbent blotter paper, a शुगर घन, or जिलेटिन.
in its liquid रूप, it can भी be administered by intramuscular or intravenous injection.
LSD is बहुत potent, साथ 20–30 μg ( micrograms ) होने the threshold dose.
New experiments with LSD प्रारंभ in 2009 लिये the पहला time in 40 सालो.
introduced by sandoz Laboratories, साथ trade-name delysid, as a drug साथ विभिन्न मनोरोग उपयोग in 1947, LSD quickly became a therapeutic एजेंट that appeared to दिखाएँ great promise.
In the 1950s, officials at the u.S. Central Intelligence Agency ( CIA ) thought the ड्रग might be applicable to दिमाग control and chemical warfare ; the एजेंसी 's mkultra research program propagated the drug among young servicemen और विद्यार्थी.
The subsequent recreational use of the drug by youth संस्कृति in the Western संसार दौरान the 1960s led to a political firestorm that resulted in इसके prohibition.
Currently, a क्रमांक of organizations—including the Beckley न्यास, MAPS, Heffter Research Institute and the अल्बर्ट Hofmann Foundation—exist to fund, encourage and coordinate research into the medicinal और आध्यात्मिक उपयोग of LSD और सम्बन्धित psychedelics.
The संयुक्त राज्य नेवी 's Sea, Air, Land टीमों, commonly known as the Navy SEALs, are the u.S. Navy 's principal खास operations फ़ोर्स और a part of the नवल Special Warfare कमांड and United States खास Operations Command.
`` मुहर '' is सदा capitalized in reference to members of the Naval Special Warfare community.
The एक्रोनिम is derived from their capacity to operate at sea, in the एयर, and on land.
SEALs are male members of the संयुक्त राज्य Navy.
an exchange कार्यक्रम साथ the coast गार्ड, जिससे ग्रैजुएट three Coast Guardsmen as SEALs, was suspended in 2011.
The CIA 's अत्यधिक secretive Special Activities Division ( उदास ) और अधिक specifically its elite खास Operations Group ( SOG ) recruits operators इससे the मुहर Teams.
संयुक्त Navy seals और CIA operations go वापस to the famed macv-sog दौरान the Vietnam War.
This सहयोग still exists today and is देखी in the wars in Iraq and Afghanistan, and in the finding और killing of ओसामा बिन Laden in Pakistan.
संसार population estimates from 1800 to 2100, based on UN 2010 projections ( red, orange, ग्रीन ) और us Census Bureau ऐतिहासिक estimates ( black ).
Actual recorded population figures are in blue.
according to the उच्चतम estimate, the world जनसांख्यिकी may वृद्धि to 16 अरब by 2100 ; according to the lowest अनुमान, it may मनाही to 6 billion.
the संसार population is the कुल क्रमांक of जीना humans on धरती.
As of today, it is estimated to क्रमांक billion by the संयुक्त States Census Bureau ( uscb ).
the USCB estimates that the संसार जनसांख्यिकी exceeded 7 billion on कूच 12, 2012.
according to a separate estimate by the संयुक्त Nations Population Fund, it reached this पड़ाव on अक्तूबर 31, 2011.
The world population has अनुभवी निरन्तर growth since the end of the ग्रेट अकाल और the Black Death in 1350, जब it stood at around 370 million.
The highest rates of growth – वैश्विक population increases above 1.8 % प्रति year – यहूद seen briefly दौरान the 1950s, and लिये a longer period during the 1960s and 1970s.
The विकास rate peaked at 2.2 % in 1963, and had अस्वीकृत to 1.1 % by 2011.
Total सालाना births यहूद highest in the लेट 1980s at परिचय 138 million, and हैं now अपेक्षित to remain essentially निरंतर at their 2011 स्तर of 134 million, while मौतों क्रमांक 56 million per year, and are अपेक्षित to increase to 80 million per year by 2040.
Current projections show a continued increase in जनसांख्यिकी in the निकट भविष्य ( लकिन a steady decline in the जनसांख्यिकी growth rate ), साथ the वैश्विक population expected to reach between 7.5 and 10.5 billion by 2050.
विभिन्न longer-term estimates भविष्यवाणी further growth, stagnation, or even overall decline in the वैश्विक population by 2150.
कुछ analysts have questioned the sustainability of further world population growth, citing the growing pressures on the पर्यावरण, global खाना आपूर्तियाँ, and energy संसाधन.
मेम्फिस is a city in the southwestern corner of the u.S. राज्य of टेनेसी, and the काउंटी सीट of Shelby County.
The नगर is located on the 4th chickasaw bluff, south of the confluence of the Wolf और Mississippi नदियाँ.
Memphis था a population of 672,277 in 2011 making it the largest city in the state of Tennessee, the largest नगर on the मिसिसिपी River, the third largest in the Southeastern संयुक्त States, and the 20th largest in the संयुक्त States.
The वृहद मेम्फिस metropolitan area, including सटा counties in Mississippi and अरकंसास, था a 2010 population of 1,316,100.
This makes Memphis the second largest metropolitan क्षेत्रफल in टेनेसी, surpassed only by महानगर Nashville, which रै overtaken मेम्फिस in recent years.
Memphis is the youngest of Tennessee 's major शहरों.
A निवासी of Memphis is referred to as a memphian, and the Memphis प्रदेश is known, विशेषकर to media outlets, as `` Memphis & The mid-south ``.
The Cattenom नाभिकीय Power संयंत्र in France.
France produces around तीन quarters of its electricity by नाभिकीय power.
The Grafenrheinfeld नाभिकीय शक्ति Plant in Germany.
चांसलर Angela Merkel 's coalition घोषित on May 30, 2011, that germany’s 17 nuclear शक्ति स्टेशन will be shut down by 2022, in a नीति reversal following Japan 's Fukushima daiichi nuclear disaster.
Currently, 68 reactors are अंतर्गत construction in 15 देशों.
नाभिकीय power stations operate in thirty countries.
In 2010, before the फुकुशिमा daiichi नाभिकीय disaster, it was reported that an average of about 10 nuclear reactors were अपेक्षित to become operational per year, although according to the World Nuclear Association, of the 17 civilian reactors planned to become operational between 2007 and 2009, only पाँच दरअसल came on stream.
as of जून 2011, Germany and Switzerland हैं phasing-out नाभिकीय power.
as of June 2011, देशों such as ऑस्ट्रेलिया, ऑस्ट्रिया, Denmark, Greece, आयरलैंड, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Luxembourg, Malaysia, माल्टा, नई Zealand, नार्वे and Portugal remain opposed to नाभिकीय power.
skeletal मांसपेशियां homo sapiens
इस is a तालिका of मांसपेशियां of the human anatomy.
There हैं approximately 642 skeletal मांसपेशियां within the typical इंसान, and almost every muscle constitutes एक part of a जोड़ी of identical द्विपक्षीय muscles, मिला on दोनो sides, resulting in लगभग 320 pairs of मांसपेशियां, as प्रस्तुत in this article.
nevertheless, the सटीक number is मुश्किल to define because अलग sources group मांसपेशियां differently, e.g. regarding what is पारिभाषित as different parts of a single muscle or as अनेक muscles.
Examples range from 640 to 850.
The मांसपेशियां of the इंसान देह can be categorized into a number of समूह which शामिल muscles relating to the सिर and neck, मांसपेशियां of the धड़ or ट्रंक, muscles of the upper limbs, and मांसपेशियां of the lower limbs.
The कार्रवाई refers to the कार्रवाई of each मांसपेशी from the मानक anatomical स्थिति.
In अन्य positions, other actions may be performed.
A reenactment of a बैटल at फोर्ट फोस्टर, 1837 ( at Hillsborough नदी राज्य पार्क )
The Seminole Wars, भी ज्ञात as the फ्लोरिडा Wars, यहूद तीन विरोध in फ्लोरिडा between the Seminole — the सामूहिक नाम given to the amalgamation of various groups of देशी Americans and Black लोगों who settled in फ्लोरिडा in the जल्दी 18th सदी — and the संयुक्त States फौज.
The पहला seminole युद्ध was from 1814 to 1819 ( हालांकि स्त्रोत differ ), the दूसरी Seminole War from 1835 to 1842, और the Third seminole War from 1855 to 1858.
the पहला विरोध with the Seminoles arose out of तनाव relating to सामान्य एंड्रयू जैक्सन 's attack और destruction of Negro Fort in Florida in 1816.
जैक्सन also attacked the स्पेनी at Pensacola.
Ultimately, the स्पेनी Crown ceded the colony to संयुक्त States rule.

A pilot experiment, also called a pilot पढ़ाई, is a छोटी स्केल preliminary study conducted in अनुक्रम to evaluate feasibility, time, cost, adverse events, and effect आकार ( statistical variability ) in an attempt to predict an उचित नमूना size and improve upon the पढ़ाई design prior to प्रदर्शन of a full-scale research project.
Pilot studies, therefore, may not be उचित लिये मामला अध्ययन.

The एकड़ is a unit of area used in the imperial और u.S. customary प्रणालियों.
an एकड़ is about 40 % of a hectare – slightly छोटी than an अमरीकी football फ़ील्ड.
the acre is no longer commonly used, हालांकि a few notable अपवाद शामिल the संयुक्त States, Australia, Burma and the संयुक्त किंगडम ( as of 2010, the acre is no longer officially प्रयुक्त in the संयुक्त किंगडम, हालांकि is स्टिल प्रयुक्त in रियल एस्टेट descriptions ).
it is still प्रयुक्त, to कुछ extent, in Canada.
The international प्रतीक of the acre is ac, and is defined as 1/640 of a square मील.
The सबसे commonly used acre today is the international एकड़.
In the संयुक्त States both the अंतरराष्ट्रीय acre और the थोड़ा different US survey acre are in उपयोग.
The most common उपयोग of the acre is to measure tracts of जमीन.
One अंतरराष्ट्रीय एकड़ is defined as 4046.8564224 वर्गाकार metres.
दौरान the Middle आयु, an acre was the राशि of land कि could be plowed in one day साथ a yoke of oxen.

Language प्रसंस्करण refers to the way human beings उपयोग words to communicate विचार और जज्बात, और how such communications are processed और समझा.
Thus it is कैसा the brain creates and understands language.
Most हाल theories consider that इस प्रक्रम is carried out entirely by और अंदर the दिमाग.
This is considered एक of the सबसे characteristic abilities of the इंसान प्रजाति - शायद the most characteristic.
however बहुत छोटी is known परिचय it and वहीँ is huge पैमाना for शोध on it.
Most of the knowledge acquired to date on the विषय has आइये from patients who have suffered कुछ type of significant head चोट, whether external ( wounds, bullets ) or internal ( स्ट्रोक्स, tumors, degenerative diseases ).
अध्ययन have shown कि सबसे of the language processing functions हैं carried आउट in the cerebral cortex.
The अनिवार्य function of the cortical language क्षेत्रों is symbolic representation.
Even though language exists in different फ़ॉर्म, सब of them are based on symbolic representation.

DVD is an optical disc भंडार format, invented and developed by फिलिप्स, Sony, Toshiba, and Panasonic in 1995.
DVDs प्रस्ताव higher storage capacity than कॉम्पैक्ट discs while having the same आयाम.
pre-recorded DVDs are mass-produced using molding मशीने that physically स्टैम्प आंकड़ा onto the DVD.
Such discs are ज्ञात as DVD- ROM, because data can तभी be पढ़ा और नहीं written nor erased.
Blank recordable dvd discs ( DVD-R and DVD+R ) can be recorded once using a DVD recorder and तब function as a DVD-ROM. rewritable dvds ( DVD-RW, dvd+rw, and dvd-ram ) can be recorded and erased अनेक टाइम्स.
DVDs हैं used in dvd-video consumer digital वीडियो format और in dvd-audio उपभोक्ता डिजिटल audio format, as खूब as for authoring AVCHD discs.
DVDs containing other प्रकार of information may be referred to as dvd data discs.

पीटर Gene Hernandez ( born October 8, 1985 ), known by his stage नाम ब्रूनो Mars, is an अमरीकी singer-songwriter और record निर्माता.
उठाया in Honolulu, Hawaii, by a family of musicians, मंगल began making म्यूज़िक at a यंग आयु and performed in विभिन्न musical venues in his hometown throughout his childhood.
He ग्रैजुएट from high school and then moved to लॉस एंजिल्स, California, to pursue a musical करियर.
Mars produced songs for अन्य artists, joining उत्पादन टोली the smeezingtons.
मंगल था an unsuccessful कार्यावधि with motown Records, but तब हस्ताक्षरित with Atlantic in 2009.
He became recognized as a solo artist after lending उसके vocals और co-writing the hooks लिये the गीतों `` nothin ' on You `` by b.o.b, and `` Billionaire `` by travie McCoy.
he also co-wrote the hits `` सही गोलाकार `` by flo Rida featuring ke $ ha, और `` Wavin ' ध्वज `` by K'naan.
in अक्तूबर 2010, he released उसके डेब्यू album, Doo-Wops & गुंडों.
Anchored by the विश्वव्यापी number-one singles `` Just the रास्ता तुम हैं `` and `` ग्रेनेड ``, the album peaked at number तीन on the बिलबोर्ड 200.
Mars was मनोनीत लिये seven grammys at the 53rd Grammy Awards, जीतना Best पुरूष Pop गायन प्रदर्शन लिये `` बस the Way तुम हैं ''.
उसके दूसरी studio एल्बम, Unorthodox ज्यूकबॉक्स, was released on December 11, 2012.
Mars ' music is विख्यात for displaying a wide variety of styles and influences, और contains elements of many musical genres.
he रै worked with an assortment of artists from various genres.
As a चाइल्ड, he was अत्यधिक influenced by कलाकारों ऐसे as Little Richard, Elvis प्रेस्ली और Michael जैक्सन and would often impersonate these artists इससे a young age.
मंगल also incorporates reggae - and motown -inspired sounds into his work.
विश्वव्यापी, मंगल became the best-selling digital artist in 2011.
He had तीन singles in the top टेन, including first place with `` बस the रास्ता तुम हैं '', which बेची 12.5 million नक़ल.
मंगल won बेहतरीन International पुरूष Solo कलाकार at the 2012 ब्रिट Awards.
ब्रूनो Mars has sold 6 million एल्बम and 40 million singles worldwide as a सिंगर.
althought as a song-writer, निर्माता and singer उसके total single download sales surpass 100 million worldwide.

Greek mythology is the body of मिथकों और शिक्षाओं that belong to the ancient यूनानियों, concerning उनके देवताओं and नायक, the प्रकृति of the world, and the origins and significance of their अपना cult और अनुष्ठान practices.
it was a part of the धर्म in प्राचीन Greece and is part of religion in modern यूनानियों and around the world, known as Hellenismos.
आधुनिक विद्वानों refer to and study the myths in an attempt to throw light on the religious और political संस्थानों of Ancient यूनानियों and its सभ्यता, and to लाभ समझना of the nature of myth-making itself.
यूनानी mythology is explicitly embodied in a large collection of narratives, and implicitly in Greek representational arts, such as vase-paintings and votive उपहार.
यूनानी मिथक attempts to explain the origins of the world, and details the lives and adventures of a wide किस्में of gods, goddesses, heroes, heroines, और mythological जीव.
These accounts initially were disseminated in an oral-poetic परंपरा ; today the Greek myths are ज्ञात primarily from यूनानी साहित्य.
The oldest ज्ञात यूनानी literary स्त्रोत, होमर 's epic कविताएं Iliad and ओडिसी, focus on events surrounding the Trojan War.
दो कविताएं by होमर 's near समकालीन Hesiod, the theogony and the Works and दिनों, contain accounts of the उत्पत्ति of the world, the succession of divine शासकों, the succession of इंसान ages, the उत्पत्ति of इंसान woes, and the उत्पत्ति of sacrificial practices.
मिथकों हैं भी preserved in the homeric Hymns, in fragments of epic poems of the Epic Cycle, in lyric poems, in the works of the tragedians of the fifth सदी BC, in कृतियाँ of विद्वानों and poets of the Hellenistic Age, and in texts from the time of the Roman साम्राज्य by writers such as प्लूटार्क and Pausanias.
पुरातत्व findings provide a principal सोर्स of detail परिचय Greek mythology, साथ देवताओं और heroes प्रदर्शित prominently in the decoration of many artifacts.
Geometric डिजाइन on pottery of the आठवीं century BC depict दृश्यों from the Trojan cycle as खूब as the adventures of Heracles.
in the succeeding archaic, Classical, और hellenistic periods, Homeric and various other mythological scenes appear, supplementing the existing साहित्यिक प्रमाण.
Greek mythology has था an extensive influence on the संस्कृति, कला, and literature of पश्चिमी सभ्यता और remains part of पश्चिमी heritage and भाषा.
Poets and artists from प्राचीन times to the present have derived प्रेरणा इससे यूनानी mythology and have discovered contemporary significance and प्रासंगिकता in the themes.
