The franc ( sign : Fr. or SFr. ; German : Franken, फ्रेंच and romansh : फ़्रैंक, Italian : फ्रेंको ; कोड : CHF ) is the currency और legal tender of Switzerland और Liechtenstein ; it is also विधिक tender in the इतालवी exclave Campione d'Italia.
Although not formally विधिक टेंडर in the German exclave Büsingen ( the sole legal currency is the euro ), it is in चौड़ी daily उपयोग वहीँ.
the स्विस नेशनल बैंको issues banknotes and the संघीय मिंट Swissmint मुद्दे coins.
The स्विस franc is the only version of the franc still जारी in यूरोपीय.
The smaller denomination, a hundredth of a franc, is a rappen ( Rp. ) in जर्मनी, centime ( c. ) in French, centesimo ( ct. ) in इतालवी, and rap ( rp. ) in Romansh.
the ISO कोड of the करेंसी प्रयुक्त by banks and वित्तीय institutions is CHF, although `` Fr. '' is used by most व्यवसायों and विज्ञापनदाता ; कुछ use SFr. ; the latinate `` ch '' stands for Confoederatio helvetica.
Given the different भाषाएं used in Switzerland, लैटिन is प्रयुक्त for language-neutral inscriptions on the सिक्के.
Sir Charles स्पेंसर `` Charlie '' Chaplin, ( 16 April 188925 दिसम्बर 1977 ) थी a अंग्रेजों comic actor and filmmaker जो रोज़ to कीर्ति in the silent era.
चैपलिन became a worldwide प्रतीक through his screen persona `` the Tramp `` and is माना one of the सबसे important figures of the film industry.
His career spanned अधिक than 75 years, from a चाइल्ड in the विक्टोरियन era to बंद to उसके death at the age of 88, and encompassed दोनो adulation and controversy.
Raised in लंदन, Chaplin 's बाल्यकाल थी पारिभाषित by poverty and hardship.
He थी sent to a workhouse twice before the आयु of nine ; उसके father was अनुपस्थित, and his mother थी committed to a mental asylum.
Chaplin began performing from a young age, touring music halls and later working as a stage actor और comedian.
At 19 he was हस्ताक्षरित to the prestigious Fred karno कम्पनी, which took उसे to America.
Chaplin was scouted by the फिल्मी उद्योग, and made his पहला appearances in 1914 with Keystone studios.
he soon विकसित the Tramp persona और formed a विशाल fan आधार.
Chaplin directed उसके films from an early stage, and जारी to hone his craft as he स्थानांतरित to the essanay, Mutual, and First नेशनल corporations.
By 1918, he थी one of the most प्रसिद्ध men in the world.
in 1919, चैपलिन co-founded the वितरण कम्पनी United Artists, giving उसे complete control over his films.
His first feature-length चित्र was The बच्चा ( 1921 ), followed by A स्त्री of Paris ( 1923 ), The Gold फटाफट ( 1925 ), और The सर्कस ( 1928 ).
he refused to मूव to ध्वनि films in the 1930s, बजाय producing नगर Lights ( 1931 ) और आधुनिक Times ( 1936 ) without dialogue.
Chaplin became increasingly political and his next film, The Great तानाशाह ( 1940 ), satirised Adolf हिटलर.
The 1940s was a दशक marked साथ controversy for Chaplin, और his popularity declined rapidly.
He थी अभियुक्त of communist sympathies, while his भागीदारी in a paternity suit और marriages to much younger महिलाओं were considered scandalous.
an FBI छानबीन was opened on Chaplin, और he थी eventually मजबूर to छोड़ the संयुक्त States और settle in Switzerland.
he abandoned the Tramp for his बाद films, which include Monsieur verdoux ( 1947 ), limelight ( 1952 ), A King in नई York ( 1957 ), और a Countess From हांग काँग ( 1967 ).
Chaplin wrote, directed, produced, edited, scored, and स्ट्रक्चर in most of उसके films.
He was a perfectionist, और his वित्तीय independence meant he प्रायः खर्च years on the development and उत्पादन of a picture.
His films are characterised by slapstick combined with pathos, और often feature the Tramp struggling विरूद्ध adversity.
Many contain सोशल और political विषयवस्तु, as खूब as autobiographical elements.
in 1972, as भाग of a renewed appreciation for his work, Chaplin received an Honorary अकादमी पुरस्कार for `` the incalculable effect he रै had in making motion pictures the art रूप of this century ''.
He continues to be held in high regard, with The Gold Rush, City लाइट्स, Modern टाइम्स, and the ग्रेट Dictator प्रायः क्रमित among the महानतम films of सब time.
Planned parenthood Federation of America ( PPFA ), commonly shortened to Planned Parenthood, is the U.S. affiliate of the अंतरराष्ट्रीय नियोजित parenthood Federation ( ippf ) and एक of its larger members.
PPFA is a non-profit organization providing reproductive health and maternal and child स्वास्थ्य सेवाएं.
The नियोजित parenthood कार्रवाई Fund, inc. ( PPAF ) is a related organization जिससे lobbies for pro-choice legislation, comprehensive sex शिक्षा, and access to सस्ती health परवाह in the संयुक्त राज्य.
नियोजित Parenthood is the largest U.S. प्रदाता of reproductive health services, including cancer स्क्रीनिंग, HIV स्क्रीनिंग and counseling, contraception, and गर्भपात.
Contraception accounts for 35 % of ppfa 's total services और abortions account for 3 % ; ppfa conducts roughly 300,000 abortions each साल, among 3 million लोगों परोसा.
The संगठन has its roots in Brooklyn, नई York, जहाँ Margaret Sanger opened the देश 's पहला birth-control clinic.
सैंगर founded the American जनम कंट्रोल League in 1921, which in 1942 became part of the Planned Parenthood संघ of America.
चूंकि तब, Planned parenthood रै grown to have over 820 क्लिनिक स्थितियाँ in the U.S., साथ a total बजट of US $ 1 अरब.
ppfa provides an सरणी of सेवाएं to over three million लोगों in the United States, और supports सेवाएं for over one million clients outside the United States.
Mens rea is लैटिन for `` guilty दिमाग ''.
In दण्ड law, it is viewed as one of the necessary तत्व of कुछ अपराधों.
the मानक common law परीक्षण of दण्ड देयता is usually expressed in the लैटिन phrase, actus गैर facit reum nisi mens बैठना rea, which अर्थात् `` the act is नहीं culpable unless the mind is guilty ''.
Thus, in jurisdictions with due process, there जरूर be an actus reus, or `` अपराधी act, '' accompanied by some level of पुरुषों rea to constitute the crime साथ जिससे the प्रतिवादी is charged ( देखिए the तकनीकी requirement of concurrence ).
as a general नियम, criminal liability करता नहीं attach to a person जो acted with the absence of mental fault.
the एक्सेप्शन is strict देयता अपराधों.
In civil law, it is usually not necessary to prove a subjective mental तत्व to establish liability for उल्लंघन of अनुबंध or tort, लिये उदाहरण.
However, if a अपकृत्य is intentionally committed or a अनुबंध is intentionally breached, such intent may बढ़ाएँ the scope of liability as खूब as the माप of damages देय to the plaintiff.
इसलिए, mens rea refers to the दिमागी element of the अपराध that accompanies the actus reus.
in some jurisdictions, the शर्तें mens rea और actus reus have been replaced by alternative शब्दावली.
In ऑस्ट्रेलिया, for उदाहरण, the तत्व of the federal offences हैं अभी designated as `` दोष तत्व '' or `` दिमागी elements '' ( पुरुषों rea ) और `` physical elements '' or `` बाह्य तत्व '' ( actus reus ).
This terminology थी adopted to replace the obscurity of the Latin शर्तें with सरल and accurate phrasing.
Ulysses S. ग्रान्ट ( born Hiram ulysses Grant ; April 27, 1822 – July 23, 1885 ) was the 18th अध्यक्ष of the संयुक्त राज्य ( 1869–1877 ) following his highly successful भूमिका as a युद्ध general in the दूसरी हाफ of the सिविल War.
Under ग्रान्ट, the संघ Army defeated the confederate military ; having effectively ended the युद्ध and secession with the surrender of Robert E. Lee 's army at Appomattox.
as president he led the कट्टरपंथी Republicans in their effort to eliminate सब vestiges of confederate राष्ट्रवाद and slavery.
परेशान over uncontrolled हिंसा in the दक्षिण और having desired to protect अफ़्रीकी अमरीकी नागरिकता, President ग्रान्ट effectively destroyed the ku klux क्लान in 1871.
ग्रान्ट थी the पहला President to establish सिविल सेवा reform having created a two-year federally funded Civil Service आयोग in 1871.
in शर्तें of foreign policy, Grant revealed an `` अनपेक्षित capacity लिये विवेचना and consultation '' that promoted the नेशनल interest.
His reputation was marred by his दोहराया defense of corrupt appointees, और by America 's पहला औद्योगिक age economic depression ( पुकारा the `` Panic of 1873 `` ) that dominated his second पद.
Although his Republican Party split in 1872 साथ reformers denouncing him, Grant थी easily reelected.
By 1875 the रूढ़िवादी white दक्षिणी opposition regained control of प्रत्येक state in the South and as he left the White House in March 1877 his policies यहूद होने undone.
A career soldier, he ग्रैजुएट from the United States Military अकादमी at West Point and परोसा in the Mexican–American युद्ध.
When the सिविल युद्ध began in 1861, ग्रान्ट प्रशिक्षित Union volunteer regiments in इलिनोइस.
In 1862, as a general he लड़ा a श्रेणी of लड़ाइयों and was प्रचारित to major general after forcing the आत्मसमर्पण of a विशाल confederate army and gaining control of Kentucky and most of टेनेसी.
he तब led संघ शक्तियां to victory after initial setbacks in the Battle of Shiloh, earning a प्रतिष्ठा as an aggressive commander.
in July 1863, after a long, complex campaign, Grant defeated पाँच uncoordinated Confederate सेना ( capturing one of them ) और seized Vicksburg.
This famous विजय gave the संघ पूरा control of the मिसिसिपी River, split off the पश्चिमी Confederacy, and खोली the way लिये more Union triumphs.
After another win at the बैटल of Chattanooga in लेट 1863, President Abraham Lincoln made उसे lieutenant general and commander of all of the Union Armies.
as commanding सामान्य of the army, Grant confronted रॉबर्ट E. Lee in a series of बहुत खूनी battles in 1864 ज्ञात as the Overland अभियान that ended साथ the bottling up of ली at Petersburg, बाहर the Confederate capital of Richmond.
During the घेरा, Grant समन्वित a series of devastating अभियान शुभारम्भ by विलियम tecumseh शरमन, Philip Sheridan, और George थामस.
आखिरकार breaking through ली 's trenches, the Union Army captured Richmond in अप्रैल 1865.
Lee surrendered उसके depleted forces to Grant at appomattox as the Confederacy collapsed.
हालांकि pro-Confederate historians attacked Grant as a ruthless कसाई who जीती by brute फ़ोर्स, most historians have hailed his सैन्य genius.
Grant 's दो consecutive शर्तें as President stabilized the nation बाद the American Civil युद्ध and during the turbulent पुनर्निर्माण period that followed.
As president, he enforced Reconstruction by enforcing civil अधिकारों laws and fighting Ku Klux Klan हिंसा.
Grant जीती ड्योढ़ी of the पंद्रहवीं Amendment ; giving constitutional protection for African-American मतदान अधिकारों.
he used the army to build the Republican Party in the दक्षिण, आधारित on ब्लैक मतदाता, Northern newcomers ( `` carpetbaggers `` ) and native white supporters ( `` Scalawags. '' )
As a परिणाम, African अमेरिकी were represented in the u.S. Congress लिये the first समय in अमरीकी history in 1870.
Reformers praised ग्रान्ट 's Indian peace policy by having टूटा the deadlock on Indian appropriations in कॉंग्रेस, the creation of the Board of Indian Commissioners to make reform recommendations, और his enlistment of Quaker protestants who नियंत्रित mid western Indian agencies, कि effectively curbed Congressional patronage.
ग्रान्ट remained determined in keeping Indians from being exterminated इससे white settler अतिक्रमण or by the U.S. military.
Grant 's प्रतिष्ठा as president by 1875 was at an all-time high for उसके पिछला वीटो of the महंगाई Bill, the passage of the Resumption of Specie Act, and सचिव bristow 's successful छापे that shut down the Whiskey Ring.
Grant 's foreign नीति, led by सचिव of राज्य Hamilton मछली, implemented अंतरराष्ट्रीय Arbitration, settled the Alabama दावा साथ ब्रिटेन and avoided war साथ Spain over the Virginius Affair.
a jukebox is a partially स्वचालित music-playing यंत्र, usually a coin-operated machine, कि will play a patron 's चयन from self-contained media.
The classic ज्यूकबॉक्स has buttons with अक्षर और numbers on them कि, जब entered in combination, are प्रयुक्त to play a विशिष्ट selection.
a drug परीक्षण is a तकनीकी विश्लेषण of a biological specimen – for उदाहरण urine, hair, blood, sweat, or मौखिक fluid / saliva – to determine the presence or absence of specified जनक drugs or their metabolites.
प्रमुख uses of drug परीक्षण हैं to detect the presence of प्रदर्शन enhancing steroids in sport or for दवाएँ prohibited by कानून, such as cannabis, cocaine and heroin.
A `` 10-panel urine स्क्रीन '' consists of the following:
Amphetamines ( including methamphetamine )
Barbiturates
Benzodiazepines
Cannabinoids ( thc )
Cocaine
Methadone
Methaqualone
Opiates ( codeine, मॉरफीन, Heroin, Oxycodone, hydrocodone, etc. )
phencyclidine ( PCP )
propoxyphene
शनि V प्रक्षेपास्त्र, प्रयुक्त for the American manned lunar लैंडिंग मिशन
Space exploration is the डिस्कवरी और exploration of outer स्पेस by अर्थात् of space प्रौद्योगिकी.
शारीरिक exploration of स्पेस is conducted दोनो by human spaceflights और by robotic spacecraft.
While the observation of objects in space, ज्ञात as खगोलशास्त्र, predates विश्वसनीय recorded history, it थी the विकास of विशाल और relatively efficient rockets during the early 20th century that allowed physical space exploration to become a reality.
Common rationales लिये exploring स्पेस include advancing वैज्ञानिक research, uniting अलग nations, ensuring the future अस्तित्व of humanity and developing military and रणनीतिक advantages विरूद्ध other countries.
Various आलोचनाओं of space exploration हैं sometimes made.
स्पेस exploration has प्रायः been प्रयुक्त as a प्रॉक्सी competition for geopolitical rivalries such as the ठंडा War.
The early era of स्पेस exploration was चलित by a `` स्पेस रेस `` between the Soviet Union and the संयुक्त States, the launch of the first man-made object to कक्षा the Earth, the USSR 's sputnik 1, on 4 अक्तूबर 1957, and the first Moon लैंडिंग by the अमरीकी अपोलो 11 craft on 20 जुलाई 1969 are प्रायः taken as the boundaries लिये this initial काल.
The Soviet space program हासिल many of the first माइलस्टोन, सहित the first जीना being in कक्षा in 1957, the first human spaceflight ( यूरी गगारिन aboard वोस्तोक 1 ) in 1961, the first spacewalk ( by Aleksei Leonov ) on 18 March 1965, the पहला स्वचालित landing on another celestial body in 1966, and the launch of the first space station ( Salyut 1 ) in 1971.
After the पहला 20 years of exploration, फ़ोकस shifted इससे one-off flights to बेदर्दी हार्डवेयर, ऐसे as the स्पेस Shuttle कार्यक्रम, और from प्रतियोगिता to cooperation as with the अंतरराष्ट्रीय Space Station ( iss ).
With the substantial completion of the ISS following STS-133 in March 2011, plans for स्पेस खोजी by the यूएसए remain in फ्लक्स.
Constellation, a बुश Administration कार्यक्रम for a return to the Moon by 2020 was judged inadequately वित्तपोषित और unrealistic by an विशेषज्ञ review फलक reporting in 2009.
the Obama Administration proposed a revision of Constellation in 2010 to फ़ोकस on the development of the capability for crewed missions परे low earth orbit ( LEO ), envisioning extending the आपरेशन of the ISS beyond 2020, transferring the development of लॉन्च vehicles लिये human crews from NASA to the private सेक्टर, and developing technology to enable मिशन to beyond LEO, such as earth/moon L1, the Moon, earth/sun l2, near-earth asteroids, और Phobos or मंगल कक्षा.
As of March 2011, the US Senate and हाउस of Representatives are स्टिल working towards a compromise नासा funding bill, which will संभवतः terminate Constellation and निधि development of a heavy lift launch vehicle ( HLLV ).
in the 2000s, the People 's गणतंत्र of China initiated a कामयाब manned spaceflight program, while the European Union, Japan, and India have also planned भविष्य मानवयुक्त स्पेस missions.
चीन, Russia, Japan, and India have advocated manned missions to the Moon during the 21st century, while the यूरोपीय Union रै advocated manned मिशन to दोनो the Moon और Mars during the 21st century.
From the 1990s onwards, निजी रूचि began promoting space पर्यटन और तब private space exploration of the Moon ( देखिए google चंद्र x Prize ).
जॉन Calvin Coolidge, jr. ( July 4, 1872january 5, 1933 ) was the 30th अध्यक्ष of the संयुक्त States ( 1923–1929 ).
A Republican lawyer इससे वर्मांट, कूलिज worked his way up the ladder of Massachusetts राज्य राजनीती, eventually बनने राज्यपाल of कि राज्य.
His conduct दौरान the Boston Police Strike of 1919 thrust him into the नेशनल spotlight and gave him a reputation as a man of decisive action.
जल्द बाद, he was निर्वाचित as the 29th Vice President in 1920 और succeeded to the प्रेसिडेंसी upon the अचानक मौत of वारेन G. हार्डिंग in 1923.
निर्वाचित in उसके own right in 1924, he gained a प्रतिष्ठा as a small-government conservative, और भी as a man जो said very छोटी.
कूलिज restored पब्लिक confidence in the श्वेत House after the scandals of his predecessor 's administration, और left office with considerable लोकप्रियता.
As a कूलिज biographer put it, `` He समाविष्ट the स्पिरिट and hopes of the middle क्लास, could interpret उनके longings और एक्स्प्रेस उनके opinions.
That he किया represent the प्रतिभाशाली of the average is the most convincing प्रमाण of उसके strength. ''
Some बाद criticized कूलिज as part of a general criticism of laissez-faire government.
उसके reputation underwent a पुनर्जागरण during the रोनाल्ड reagan Administration, but the परम मूल्यांकन of उसके प्रेसिडेंसी is स्टिल divided between those जो approve of उसके reduction of the आकार of government programs and those who believe the federal government should be अधिक involved in regulating और controlling the अर्थव्यवस्था.
एस्प्रेसो is a concentrated beverage brewed by forcing a small राशि of nearly boiling water अंतर्गत pressure through finely ground कॉफी beans.
Espresso often has a thicker consistency than coffee brewed by other methods, a उच्चतर विशेषज्ञता of suspended and dissolved solids, and crema ( meaning cream, but होने a reference to the foam with a मलाईदार texture that फ़ॉर्म as a result of the दबाव ).
as a result of the pressurized brewing प्रक्रम the flavors and रसायन in a ठेठ cup of espresso हैं very concentrated.
Espresso is the आधार लिये other drinks, such as a latte, कापुचीनो, macchiato, mocha, or americano.
एस्प्रेसो has more caffeine प्रति ईकाई volume than most beverages, but the usual serving size is smaller—a typical 60 mL ( 2 US fluid ounce ) of espresso रै 80 to 150 mg of caffeine, छोटी कम than the 95 to 200 mg of a मानक 240 mL ( 8 US fluid ounces ) कप of drip-brewed कॉफी.
ब्रायन कैथ केली ( born October 25, 1961 ) is an American फ़ुटबॉल कोच और former खिलाड़ी.
he is currently the head football coach लिये the Notre dame लड़ Irish, a position he रै held चूंकि दिसम्बर 2009.
Kelly was previously सिर कोच at Grand घाटी राज्य University ( 1991–2003 ), Central Michigan विश्वविद्यालयों ( 2004–2006 ), and University of सिनसिनाटी ( 2006–2009 ).
a अनुबंध is an अनुबंध having a lawful ऑब्जेक्ट डाला into voluntarily by दो or more parties, each of जिसको intends to बनाएँ one or more legal obligations between उन्हें.
the तत्व of a अनुबंध हैं `` प्रस्ताव '' and `` acceptance '' by `` competent व्यक्तियों '' having legal capacity who exchange `` विचार '' to create `` mutuality of दायित्व. ''
Proof of कुछ or all of these elements may be done in writing, हालांकि contracts may be made entirely orally or by conduct.
The remedy for breach of contract can be `` क्षतिपूर्ति '' in the रूप of compensation of money or specific प्रदर्शन enforced through an आदेश.
दोनो of these remedies award the पार्टी at घाटा the `` benefit of the सौदेबाजी '' or अपेक्षा damages, which are वृहद than mere reliance क्षतिपूर्ति, as in promissory estoppel.
The parties may be natural persons or juristic व्यक्तियों.
A अनुबंध is a legally enforceable वादा or undertaking that कुछ होगा or होगा not occur.
the शब्द promise can be used as a legal synonym लिये अनुबंध, although परवाह is जरूरी as a वादा may not have the full खड़ा of a अनुबंध, as when it is an agreement without विचार.
Contract law varies greatly इससे एक jurisdiction to another, सहित differences in आम law compared to civil law, the impact of received law, particularly from England in आम law countries, और of विधि संहिताबद्ध in regional legislation.
regarding Australian Contract Law for example, वहीँ are 40 प्रासंगिक acts जिससे प्रभाव on the interpretation of contract at the Commonwealth ( संघीय / नेशनल ) स्तर, and an additional 26 acts at the स्तर of the राज्य of nsw.
In जोड there हैं 6 international instruments or conventions which are applicable for अंतरराष्ट्रीय dealings, ऐसे as the United राष्ट्र Convention on अनुबंध लिये the अंतरराष्ट्रीय Sale of Goods.
Sidney Patrick Crosby, ons ( born अगस्त 7, 1987 ) is a Canadian professional ice हॉकी player who is कप्तान of the पिट्सबर्ग Penguins of the National Hockey League ( NHL ).
Crosby was drafted पहला overall by the Penguins आउट of the Quebec Major Junior हॉकी League ( QMJHL ).
During his two-year major जूनियर career with the Rimouski Océanic, he earned back-to-back chl खिलाड़ी of the साल awards और led his क्लबों to the 2005 Memorial कप final.
Nicknamed `` The अगला एक ``, he was one of the most highly regarded draft picks in hockey इतिहास, अग्रणी अनेक to refer to the 2005 ड्राफ्ट Lottery as the `` sidney crosby Sweepstakes ''.
In his पहला NHL season, Crosby finished छठे in league scoring साथ 102 points ( 39 लक्ष्य, 63 assists ) और was a runner-up for the calder Memorial Trophy ( won by Alexander Ovechkin ).
By his second season, he led the NHL with 120 points ( 36 goals, 84 assists ) to capture the Art Ross ट्रॉफी, becoming the youngest player और the only teenager to win a स्कोरिंग शीर्षक in कोई major North American खेल लीग.
कि वही season, Crosby also जीती the Hart मेमोरियल Trophy as the Professional हॉकी Writers Association 's choice लिये सबसे valuable खिलाड़ी and the लेस्टर B. पियर्सन पुरस्कार as the NHL खिलाड़ी Association 's choice for सबसे outstanding खिलाड़ी, becoming the seventh player in एनएचएल history to earn सब three पुरस्कार in one year.
crosby started the 2007–08 season with the team 's captaincy and subsequently led उन्हें to the 2008 स्टेनली Cup Finals, where वे were defeated by the Detroit Red विंग्स in छह खेल.
The Penguins returned to the फाइनल against Detroit the following year and won in seven games ; Crosby became the youngest कप्तान in NHL इतिहास to जीत the Stanley Cup.
In the 2009–10 ऋतु, Crosby scored a career-high 51 goals, tying him with Steven stamkos for the Rocket Richard ट्रॉफी as the league-leader ; with 58 assists, he totaled 109 points, second in the NHL.
During the off-season, crosby received the Mark मेसियर नेतृत्व Award.
in 2010–11, Crosby sustained a concussion as a परिणाम of hits to the सिर in back-to-back games.
the चोट left उसे sidelined for टेन और a हाफ months.
However, बाद playing आठ games in the 2011–12 season, crosby 's concussion-like लक्षण returned in December 2011, and he किया नहीं वापसी until mid-March 2012.
internationally, Crosby रै represented कनाडा in numerous tournaments for the country 's junior and मेन 's teams.
बाद competing in the 2003 u-18 Junior संसार Cup, he represented Canada in back-to-back iihf World U20 Championships, winning silver in 2004 और gold in 2005.
at the 2006 iihf World Championship, he led the tournament in scoring, जबकि भी earning शीर्ष Forward और all-star टोली honours.
Four years later, crosby was named to Team Canada लिये the 2010 शीत Olympics in Vancouver.
Playing the संयुक्त States in the gold medal खेल, he scored the game-winning goal in ओवरटाइम.
A संयुक्त राज्य cent, भी known as a पैनी.
`` my दो cents '' ( 2¢ ) and इसके longer version `` put my दो cents in '' is an संयुक्त राज्य ( US ) idiomatic expression, taken from the असली अंग्रेज़ी idiom expression : to put in `` my two कौड़ी लायक '' or `` my tuppence worth. ''
It is प्रयुक्त to preface the tentative stating of one’s opinion.
By विरोधात्मक the opinion to follow – suggesting its value is तभी two सेंट, a very small amount – the उपयोक्ता of the phrase hopes to lessen the प्रभाव of a possibly statement, प्रर्दशित politeness and humility.
However, it is also sometimes प्रयुक्त with irony when expressing a strongly felt राय.
the phrase is also used out of आदत to preface uncontentious opinions.
For example:
the चाइनीज Civil War थी a civil युद्ध in चीन fought between forces वफ़ादार to the government of the गणतंत्र of China led by the Kuomintang ( KMT ) and forces of the Communist Party of चीन ( CPC ).
The war began in April 1927, amidst the Northern Expedition, और essentially ended when प्रमुख क्रियाशील battles ceased in 1950.
The conflict eventually resulted in two de facto states, the Republic of चीन ( आरओसी ) in ताईवान and the People 's Republic of चीन ( PRC ) in मेनलैंड China, दोनो claiming to be the legitimate government of China.
the war represented an ideological split ( Left vs. Right ) between the कम्युनिस्ट CPC, और the kmt 's ब्रांड of Nationalism.
the सिविल war continued intermittently जबतक लेट 1937, when the two parties formed a दूसरी United Front to काउंटर a जापानी invasion.
China 's full-scale civil war resumed in 1946, a year after the समाप्त of hostilities with Japan.
After four more सालो, 1950 saw the cessation of major military hostilities—with the newly संस्थापित People 's गणतंत्र of चीन controlling mainland चीन ( सहित Hainan ), और the Republic of China 's क्षेत्राधिकार होने restricted to ताईवान, penghu, Quemoy, Matsu and अनेक outlying islands.
The kuomintang defeat is attributed to several कारकों : Corruption - च्यांग wrote in उसके diary on जून 1948 कि the kmt था failed, नहीं because of बाह्य दुश्मनों लकिन क्युकी of दुर्गन्ध from भीतर.
दमदार आरंभिक support इससे the U.S. diminished, and then, stopped.
( Partly because of KMT भ्रष्टाचार और anti-democratic regime, and partly because of the अनिश्चित U.S. विदेशी policy towards साम्यवादी between 1945 and 1950 ) ; Communist land reform policy promised poor peasants farmland इससे उनके landlords.
इस ensured pla popular support.
After the surrender of Japan at the end of World युद्ध II, Soviet शक्तियां turned over उनके captured Japanese weapons to the cpc और अनुमत the CPC to take कंट्रोल of territory in मंचूरिया.
to इस day, no armistice or peace सन्धि has ever been signed, और it is debated as to the whether the सिविल युद्ध has legally ended.
cross-strait relations have been hindered by सैन्य खतरे and राजनैतिक and economic pressure, particularly over Taiwan 's political status, with दोनो governments officially adhering to a `` One-China नीति. ''
the पीआरसी still actively दावा ताईवान as part of its territory और continues to threaten the ROC साथ a सैन्य invasion if the ROC officially declares स्वतंत्रता by बदलना its नाम to और gaining international recognition as the Republic of Taiwan.
The आरओसी mutually claims mainland China, and वे both continue the fight over राजनयिक मान्यता.
आज, the war as such occurs on the political and आर्थिक fronts in the form of cross-strait relations ; however, the two separate de facto states have बंद economic ties.
The One सौ Twelfth संयुक्त राज्य कॉंग्रेस was the meeting of the विधान branch of the संयुक्त States federal सरकारी, from January 3, 2011 until जनवरी 3, 2013.
it convened in Washington, D.C. on जनवरी 3, 2011, और ended on जनवरी 3, 2013, 17 दिनों पहले the end of the अध्यक्षीय term to which बराक Obama was elected in 2008.
सीनेटरों elected to नियमित terms in 2006 समाप्त those terms in this कॉंग्रेस.
This Congress included the last हाउस of प्रतिनिधि निर्वाचित इससे congressional districts that were apportioned based on the 2000 census.
In the 2010 midterm चुनावों, the Republican पार्टी won the बहुमत in the House of Representatives.
While the डेमोक्रेट रखा their Senate majority, it थी घटाया इससे the previous कॉंग्रेस.
इस was the पहला कॉंग्रेस in जिससे the House and Senate यहूद controlled by different parties चूंकि the 107th कॉंग्रेस ( 2001–2003 ), और the first कॉंग्रेस to शुरू that way since the 99th Congress ( 1985–1987 ).
In इस Congress, the हाउस of प्रतिनिधि था the largest number of Republican members, 242, since the 80th Congress ( 1947–1949 ).
It was also the पहला Congress चूंकि 1947 in जिससे no member of the कैनेडी परिवार परोसा, as खूब as the most politically polarized Congress since पुनर्निर्माण, साथ record low approval ratings.
Wealth in the United States is commonly measured in terms of net लायक, which is the योग of सब assets, including home equity, ऋण सब देनदारी.
The total जाल लायक of us households and nonprofit organizations 1945–2009, unadjusted for महंगाई or population बदलें.
लिये example, a household in possession of an $ 800,000 house, $ 5,000 in mutual निधि, $ 30,000 in गाड़ियाँ, $ 20,000 worth of भण्डार in their own कम्पनी, and a $ 45,000 IRA would have एसेट totaling $ 900,000.
assuming कि this household would have a $ 250,000 mortgage, $ 40,000 in car loans, and $ 10,000 in क्रेडिट card कर्ज़, its debts होता total $ 300,000.
Subtracting the debts from the worth of इस household 's assets ( 900,000 - $ 300,000 = $ 600,000 ), इस household would have a net worth of $ 600,000.
जाल worth can vary with fluctuations in value of the underlying एसेट.
The माल —more specifically, the median net worth—of households in the United राज्य is varied with relation to रेस, education, geographic location और gender.
as one would expect, households साथ greater income feature the highest जाल worths, though high income can नहीं be लिया as an always accurate indicator of जाल लायक.
Overall the number of wealthier households is on the वृद्धि, साथ baby boomers hitting the highs of their careers.
in addition, माल is unevenly distributed, साथ the wealthiest 25 % of US households owning 87 % of the wealth in the United राज्य, which was $ 54.2 खरब in 2009.
सहित human capital ऐसे as कौशल, the United Nations estimated the total wealth of the United States in 2008 to be $ 118 trillion.
This article deals साथ चयनात्मक Dorsal Rhizotomy ( SDR ) बल्कि than the rhizotomy procedures for pain राहत ; for those प्रक्रियाओं, which have begun to लो the नाम `` rhizotomy '' in certain उदाहरण, see facet rhizotomy and समान.
a rhizotomy ( ) is a term chiefly referring to a neurosurgical procedure कि selectively destroys problematic nerve roots in the spinal cord, सबसे प्रायः to relieve the symptoms of neuromuscular शर्तें such as spastic diplegia and other फ़ॉर्म of spastic cerebral palsy.
The selective पृष्ठीय rhizotomy ( sdr ) लिये spastic cerebral palsy has महरूम the प्रमुख use of rhizotomy लिये neurosurgeons specialising in spastic cp since the 1980s ; in this surgery, the spasticity-causing nerves are पृथक and then targeted and नष्ट.
The sensory nerve roots, जहाँ spasticity is स्तिथ, are पहला separated from the motor ones, and the nerve fibres to be cut हैं then पहचाना via electromyographic stimulation.
the ones producing spasticity are तब selectively lesioned with tiny विद्युत pulses.
in spasticity, rhizotomy precisely targets and नष्ट the क्षतिग्रस्त nerves कि don’t receive gamma amino butyric एसिड, which is the कोर problem for people साथ spastic दिमागी palsy.
These over-firing, non-GABA-absorbing nerves generate unusual विद्युत activity during the EMG परीक्षण phase in SDR and are यूँ considered to be the सोर्स of the patient 's hypertonia ; they हैं eliminated with the विद्युत pulses एकबार पहचाना, while the बाकी nerves and तंत्रिका routes carrying the correct messages remain fully intact and untouched.
This means कि the spasticity is permanently dissolved, और that this is done without affecting nervous प्रणाली संवेदनशीलता or फलन in other areas, because the only nerves नष्ट are the over-firing ones responsible लिये the मांसपेशी tightness.
the terms rhizotomy और neurotomy हैं भी increasingly बनने interchangeable in the treatment of chronic वापस पीड़ा from degenerative disc बीमारी.
This is a कार्यविधि पुकारा a facet rhizotomy and is not a surgical procedure but is instead done on an outpatient basis using a simple probe to apply radiofrequency लहरें to the impinged pain-causing nerve रूट lying between the facet संयुक्त and the vertebral body.
ऐसे radio frequency nerve lesioning results in five to eight or अधिक महीने of pain relief पहले the तंत्रिका regenerates और another round of the कार्यविधि needs to be performed.
A facet rhizotomy is बस एक of many अलग फ़ॉर्म of radiofrequency ablation, and its use of the `` rhizotomy '' name should not be उलझन with the sdr कार्यविधि.

the term migrant worker has different आधिकारिक meanings और connotations in different parts of the world.
the संयुक्त Nations ' definition is broad, सहित कोई people working outside of their home देश.
The term can भी be used to describe someone who migrates within a country, possibly उनके own, in order to pursue work such as मौसमी work.

The teardrop tattoo or tear tattoo is a सांकेतिक tattoo that is placed underneath the eye.
it रै no fixed meaning लकिन लगभग all meanings ( देखिए नीचे ) have some connection to prison.
u.S. रूट 75 is a north–south U.S. राजमार्ग.
The highway 's उत्तरी टर्मिनस is in kittson County, मिनेसोटा, at the Canadian किनारा, जहाँ it एकबार जारी as मनिटोबा Highway 75 on the other पक्ष of the now-closed border crossing.
Its southern टर्मिनस is at अंतरराज्यीय 30 और Interstate 45 in डलास, टेक्सास, जहाँ it is ज्ञात as North Central Expressway.
u.S. 75 was a border-to-border रूट, from कनाडा to the गल्फ of मैक्सिको at Galveston, Texas.
however, the entire segment दक्षिण of Dallas, Texas रै been decommissioned in favor of Interstate 45, a cutoff section of town-to-town surface सड़क having become State राजमार्ग 75.
निम्नतर Ninth Ward is a पड़ोस of the नगर of New ऑरलियन्स.
As the नाम implies, it is part of the नवीं Ward of New ऑरलियन्स.
the निम्नतर नवीं Ward is often thought of as the entire area भीतर New ऑरलियन्स downriver of the Industrial Canal ; however, the City नियोजन Commission divides this क्षेत्रफल into the Lower Ninth वार्ड ( 2 ) and पावन Cross ( 3 ) neighborhoods.
The पद `` निम्नतर '' refers to its location farther towards the mouth of the मिसिसिपी River, `` down '' or `` below '' the rest of the city in लोकल geographic terminology.
But the 9th वार्ड, like सब Wards in New Orleans, is a voting ज़िला.
The 9th Ward was added as a मतदान district in 1852.
the `` lower '' 9th वार्ड is रचित of वार्ड 9 Districts 1, 2, 4, and 7 which make up the पावन Cross Area and वार्ड 9 जिले 3, 5, 6, and 8.
Higher voting district संख्याएँ in the 9th Ward ( 8-27 ) are on the upriver side of the औद्योगिक कनाल.
The area came to national attention for its devastation in the aftermath of Hurricane Katrina in 2005.

Red and orange tinted Moon, as seen from Earth दौरान a lunar eclipse, where the धरती comes between the चंद्रमा and सूर्य
the Moon is the only प्राकृतिक satellite of the धरती, और the fifth largest उपग्रह in the Solar प्रणाली.
It is the largest प्राकृतिक satellite of a planet in the Solar System relative to the आकार of इसके प्राथमिक, having 27 % the व्यास और 60 % the घनत्व of Earth, resulting in its mass.
the चंद्रमा is the दूसरी densest satellite after Io, a satellite of बृहस्पति.
the चंद्रमा is in synchronous रोटेशन with Earth, सदा showing the वही फेस साथ its निकट पक्ष marked by dark volcanic maria कि भरण between the bright ancient crustal highlands and the prominent impact craters.
It is the brightest ऑब्जेक्ट in the sky after the सूर्य, हालांकि its surface is actually very dark, with a reflectance similar to कि of coal.
इसके prominence in the sky और इसके नियमित cycle of phases have, since प्राचीन टाइम्स, made the Moon an महत्वपूर्ण सांस्कृतिक influence on language, calendars, आर्ट and mythology.
The Moon 's gravitational influence produces the ocean tides और the मिनट lengthening of the day.
the चंद्रमा 's current orbital अलहदा, परिचय thirty टाइम्स the diameter of the Earth, कल्याणकारी it to appear लगभग the same आकार in the sky as the Sun, allowing it to cover the Sun nearly precisely in कुल सौर eclipses.
This मिलान of apparent visual आकार is a coincidence.
The Moon 's linear अलहदा from the Earth is फिलहाल increasing at a rate of 3.82±0.07cm प्रति year, but इस रेट is नहीं constant.
The Moon is विचार to have formed nearly 4.5 billion years ago, not long after the Earth.
हालांकि वहीँ have been several hypotheses लिये इसके origin in the past, the current सबसे widely accepted स्पष्टीकरण is that the चंद्रमा formed from the debris बाएँ over बाद a दानव impact between धरती और a Mars -आकारd body.
The चंद्रमा is the तभी celestial body other than Earth on जिससे humans have नियत पैर.
the Soviet संघ 's Luna कार्यक्रम was the first to पहुँचें the Moon साथ unmanned spacecraft in 1959 ; the United राज्य ' नासा अपोलो program achieved the तभी मानवयुक्त मिशन to date, शुरूआत with the first मानवयुक्त चंद्र orbiting mission by अपोलो 8 in 1968, and छह manned चंद्र landings between 1969 और 1972, with the first being Apollo 11.
These मिशन लौटे over 380 kg of lunar rocks, which have been used to develop a geological समझना of the Moon 's origins, the formation of इसके internal ढांचा, and its subsequent history.
After the Apollo 17 mission in 1972, the Moon रै been visited तभी by unmanned spacecraft, notably by the final Soviet Lunokhod rover.
Since 2004, Japan, चीन, इण्डिया, the United States, और the European Space Agency have प्रत्येक sent lunar orbiters.
ये spacecraft have contributed to confirming the discovery of चंद्र water बर्फ in permanently shadowed craters at the डंडे और bound into the चंद्र regolith.
Future manned मिशन to the Moon have been planned, including सरकारी as well as privately funded प्रयत्न.
The Moon remains, under the बाहरी Space Treaty, फ़्री to सब राष्ट्र to explore लिये peaceful उद्देश्य.
Ronald Wilson reagan ( ; फ़रवरी 6, 1911 – June 5, 2004 ) was the 40th President of the संयुक्त States ( 1981–1989 ).
Prior to कि, he थी the 33rd राज्यपाल of कैलिफ़ोर्निया ( 1967–1975 ), and a रेडियो, फिल्मी and television actor.
born in tampico, Illinois, and raised in डिक्सन, Reagan थी educated at Eureka कॉलेज, कमाई a स्नातक of कला उपाधि in economics और sociology.
बाद graduating, Reagan moved पहला to आयोवा to work as a radio broadcaster और then, in 1937, to लॉस एंजिल्स where he began a career as an कर्ता, first in films and later टेलीविज़न.
Some of his most notable films include Knute Rockne, All American ( 1940 ), Kings Row ( 1942 ), and bedtime लिये Bonzo ( 1951 ).
Reagan served as अध्यक्ष of the Screen अभिनेताओं Guild and later as a spokesman for General इलेक्ट्रिक ( ge ) ; his start in राजनीती occurred during his work for ge.
Originally a member of the लोकतांत्रिक Party, his स्थितियाँ began shifting rightward in the 1950s, and he switched to the रिपब्लिकन Party in 1962.
After delivering a rousing speech in support of Barry goldwater 's presidential उम्मीदवारी in 1964, he थी persuaded to तलाश the कैलिफ़ोर्निया governorship, जीतना दो years बाद और again in 1970.
he was पराजित in his run for the रिपब्लिकन presidential nomination in 1968 and in 1976, but won both the nomination and सामान्य election in 1980, defeating incumbent Jimmy कार्टर.
as अध्यक्ष, Reagan implemented sweeping नई political और economic पहलों.
His supply-side economic policies, उतावले `` reaganomics ``, advocated reducing tax rates to spur आर्थिक growth, controlling the धन supply to reduce inflation, deregulation of the economy, and reducing सरकारी spending.
In his first पद he survived an assassination attempt, took a hard line against मजदूर unions, घोषित a new War on Drugs, और ordered an invasion of Grenada.
He was re-elected in a भूस्खलन in 1984, proclaiming that it was `` Morning in अमेरिका ``.
उसके second पद थी primarily marked by foreign matters, ऐसे as the ending of the Cold War, the 1986 bombing of लीबिया, and the revelation of the Iran-Contra affair.
सरेआम describing the Soviet Union as an `` evil empire ``, he समर्थित anti-communist movements worldwide और खर्च his first term forgoing the strategy of détente by ordering a विशाल सैन्य buildup in an बाहें race with the USSR.
Reagan negotiated with Soviet सामान्य Secretary मिखाइल गोर्बाचेव, culminating in the inf सन्धि और the decrease of both countries ' nuclear arsenals.
Reagan बाएँ दफ्तर in 1989.
In 1994, the former president disclosed that he had been diagnosed with Alzheimer 's बीमारी earlier in the year ; he died टेन years बाद at the age of 93.
A रूढ़िवादी icon, he ranks highly in public opinion polls of U.S. Presidents and is credited for generating an ideological पुनर्जागरण on the American राजनैतिक right.
Complete set of scrolls, constituting the entire Tanakh.
The tanakh (, or ; भी Tenakh, tenak, tanach ) is a नाम used in Judaism for the canon of the Hebrew Bible.
the tanakh is भी ज्ञात as the masoretic टेक्स्ट or the Miqra.
the नाम is an एक्रोनिम formed from the initial यहूदी अक्षर of the Masoretic Text 's three traditional subdivisions : the Torah ( `` Teaching '', also known as the Five Books of Moses ), nevi'im ( `` Prophets '' ) and Ketuvim ( `` Writings '' ) —hence TaNaKh.
the नाम `` miqra '' ( מקרא ), meaning `` कि which is पढ़ा '', is an वैकल्पिक Hebrew term लिये the Tanakh.
The books of the Tanakh यहूद relayed साथ an accompanying मौखिक tradition passed on by प्रत्येक generation, पुकारा the मौखिक Torah.
the कावासाकी Ninja ZX-6R is a Kawasaki 600 cc class खेल motorcycle.
it was introduced in 1995, and रै been constantly updated throughout the सालो in response to नई उत्पाद इससे होंडा, Suzuki, and यामाहा.
the ZX श्रेणी is what was known as the Ninja line of Kawasaki motorcycles in the 1980s और still carries the नाम today.
Assassination कोशिशें and भूखंड on Presidents of the United राज्य have been numerous : अधिक than 20 कोशिशें to kill sitting and पूर्व राष्ट्रपतियों, as खूब as the Presidents-elect, are known.
चार sitting presidents have महरूम मारे : अब्राहम Lincoln ( the 16th President ), James A. Garfield ( the 20th अध्यक्ष ), विलियम McKinley ( the 25th President ) and जॉन F. Kennedy ( the 35th अध्यक्ष ).
Two presidents were injured in attempted assassinations : पूर्व अध्यक्ष Theodore Roosevelt ( the 26th अध्यक्ष ), and President रोनाल्ड Reagan ( the 40th अध्यक्ष ).
Although the इतिहासकार J.W. क्लार्क has सुझाया that most American assassinations were नीतियां प्रेरित क्रियाएँ, carried out by rational men, नहीं सब ऐसे हमले have महरूम undertaken for राजनैतिक कारण.
Some हमलावर had questionable दिमागी स्थिरता, and a few were judged legally उन्मादी.
चूंकि the Vice अध्यक्ष of the संयुक्त States has लिये अधिक than a century been elected इससे the वही राजनैतिक पार्टी as the President, the हत्या of the अध्यक्ष is unlikely to result in प्रमुख policy changes.
इस may बताइये क्यों political समूह typically do not मेक such हमले.
जहाँ the Red फर्न Grows is a novel लिखा by विल्सन Rawls in 1961 about a boy who buys और trains two redbone Coonhound hunting कुत्तो.
Oklahoma ( ) ( Pawnee : Uukuhuúwa, Cayuga : gahnawiyoˀgeh ) is a राज्य स्तिथ in West दक्षिण Central United States.
Oklahoma is the 20th सबसे extensive और the 28th most populous of the 50 United States.
The राज्य 's name is निकला from the Choctaw शब्द okla और humma, अर्थ `` red people '', and it is ज्ञात informally by its nickname, the Sooner State.
Formed by the combination of ओक्लाहोमा territory and भारतीय Territory on November 16, 1907, ओक्लाहोमा was the 46th state to डालें the संघ.
इसके residents are known as oklahomans or, informally `` Okies '', and इसके पूंजी and largest नगर is Oklahoma नगर.
A major निर्माता of प्राकृतिक gas, oil, and agriculture, ओक्लाहोमा relies on an आर्थिक आधार of विमानन, उर्जा, दूरसंचार, और जैवप्रौद्योगिकी.
it रै one of the तीव्रतम growing economies in the nation, ranking among the शीर्ष states in per capita income growth and सकल domestic उत्पाद विकास.
Oklahoma City और तुलसा serve as Oklahoma 's प्राथमिक economic anchors, with nearly दो thirds of Oklahomans जीना within उनके महानगर statistical क्षेत्रों.
साथ small पहाड़ ranges, प्रेयरी, mesas, और eastern वनों, most of ओक्लाहोमा झूठ in the ग्रेट Plains and the u.s. Interior हाइलैंड्स —a region especially prone to कठोर weather.
In addition to having a prevalence of अंग्रेज़ी, German, स्कॉटिश, आयरिश and Native अमरीकी ancestry, more than 25 देशी अमरीकी भाषाएं are बोला in Oklahoma, दूसरी only to California.
ओक्लाहोमा is located on a confluence of three प्रमुख American सांस्कृतिक regions और historically परोसा as a route for cattle drives, a destination लिये southern settlers, and a government-sanctioned territory लिये Native Americans.
Redwall, by ब्रायन Jacques, is a series of children 's fantasy novels.
it is the title of the पहला book of the श्रेणी, published in 1986, as खूब as the नाम of the Abbey प्रदर्शित in the book and the name of an animated TV श्रेणी आधारित on तीन of the novels ( Redwall, Mattimeo, and Martin the Warrior ), which first aired in 1999.
The किताबे हैं primarily aimed at older children, लकिन have fans of सब आयु.
There have महरूम twenty-two novels और दो चित्र किताबे प्रकाशित.
the twenty-second, और फाइनल, novel, the Rogue क्रू, थी posthumously released on May 3, 2011.
प्राकृतिक गैस is usually measured by आवाज़ in the United States and is stated in घन फीट.
A घन पैर of gas is the amount of gas needed to भरण a आवाज़ of one cubic पैर अंतर्गत नियत शर्तें of दबाव and temperature.To measure larger amounts of प्राकृतिक gas, a `` therm '' is used to denote 100 cubic feet, and `` mcf '' is used to denote 1,000 घन feet.
To provide वृहद सटीकता in comparing fuels, energy content is measured in शर्तें of `` British थर्मल इकाई ( btu 's ). ''
A BTU is the amount of ऊष्मा required to raise एक पाउंड of water ( लगभग a pint ), एक degree फ़ारेनहाइट at or बंद to इसके पाइंट of maximum घनत्व.
One अंग्रेजों therm ( symbol thm ) is a non- si ईकाई of ऊष्मा energy बराबर to 100,000 British thermal इकाई ( btu ).
it is लगभग the energy equivalent of burning 100 घन feet ( प्रायः referred to as 1 CCF ) of natural gas.
Since ( Natural Gas ) meters measure volume and not उर्जा content, a therm factor is used by ( Natural ) गैस कंपनियाँ to convert the आवाज़ of gas used to इसके heat equivalent, and thus calculate the actual energy use.
the therm factor is प्रायः in the इकाई therms/ccf.
It होगा vary with the मिक्सर of hydrocarbons in the natural गैस.
प्राकृतिक गैस with a उच्चतर than average विशेषज्ञता of इथेन, प्रोपेन or butane will have a higher therm factor.
Impurities, ऐसे as carbon dioxide or nitrogen, lower the therm factor.
The volume of the gas is calculated as if measured at standard temperature and दबाव ( STP ).
The heat सामग्री of natural गैस is solely निर्भर on the composition of the गैस, and is स्वतंत्र of temperature और दबाव.
One therm is equal to परिचय 105.5 megajoules, 25,200 kilocalories or 29.3 kilowatt-hours.
एक therm can भी be provided by about of प्राकृतिक gas.
The therm sometimes रै been उलझन साथ the thermie ( देखिए नीचे ).
The names of both units आइये from the Greek शब्द for heat.
A thermie ( th ) is a metric unit of heat energy, भाग of the meter-tonne-second system sometimes प्रयुक्त by यूरोपीय इंजीनियर्स.
the thermie is equal to the amount of energy required to raise the तापमान of 1 tonne of water by 1 °c.
The thermie is समतुल्य to 1,000 kilocalories, 4.1868 megajoules or 3968.3 BTU.
the अमरीकी सिविल War ( ACW ), also known as the War between the States or simply the Civil युद्ध ( देखिए naming ), was a civil युद्ध लड़ा from 1861 to 1865 between the संयुक्त States ( the `` संघ '' or the `` North '' ) और अनेक Southern slave states that घोषित उनके secession और formed the confederate States of अमेरिका ( the `` confederacy '' or the `` South '' ).
the war had इसके origin in the समस्या of slavery, especially the extension of गुलामी into the western territories.
Foreign powers did not intervene.
After four years of bloody कॉम्बैट कि left over 600,000 soldiers dead और नष्ट much of the South 's infrastructure, the Confederacy collapsed, slavery was abolished, and the difficult पुनर्निर्माण प्रक्रम of restoring national एकता and guaranteeing अधिकारों to the freed स्लेव began.
in the 1860 अध्यक्षीय चुनाव, Republicans, led by अब्राहम lincoln, opposed expanding slavery into United States ' territories.
Lincoln जीती, लकिन before his inauguration on कूच 4, 1861, seven cotton-based slave states formed the confederacy.
outgoing लोकतांत्रिक President James Buchanan and the incoming Republicans rejected secession as illegal.
Lincoln 's inaugural पता declared his प्रशासन would नहीं initiate सिविल war.
Eight remaining slave states continued to reject calls for secession.
confederate forces जब्त numerous संघीय दुर्गों within territory claimed by the confederacy.
a सलाम सम्मेलन failed to ढूँढें a सुलह, and दोनो पहलू prepared for युद्ध.
The Confederates assumed that European countries यहूद so dependent on `` किंग Cotton `` that they होता intervene ; none did and none recognized the new confederate States of America.
Hostilities began on April 12, 1861, when confederate forces fired upon Fort Sumter, a key फोर्ट held by Union सैनिकों in South कैरोलिना.
Lincoln called लिये प्रत्येक state to provide troops to retake the फोर्ट ; consequently, चार अधिक slave states joined the Confederacy, bringing उनके total to eleven.
the Union soon controlled the border states and established a naval नाकेबंदी that अबोध the southern economy.
The Eastern थिएटर was inconclusive in 1861–62.
the पतझड़ 1862 confederate campaign into मेरीलैंड ( a Union state ) ended with Confederate रिट्रीट at the Battle of antietam, dissuading British intervention.
Lincoln जारी the Emancipation Proclamation, which made समाप्ति slavery a युद्ध लक्ष्य.
To the वेस्ट, by गर्मियाँ 1862 the Union नष्ट the Confederate नदी navy, तब much of their western सेना, and the Union at vicksburg split the confederacy in दो at the Mississippi नदी.
In 1863, Robert E. Lee 's Confederate incursion उत्तर ended at the Battle of Gettysburg.
Western सफलताओं led to Ulysses S. Grant command of सब संघ सेना in 1864.
In the Western Theater, William T. शरमन drove east to capture Atlanta और marched to the sea, destroying Confederate अवसंरचना along the way.
the Union marshaled the resources and manpower to attack the Confederacy from all directions, और could afford to लड़ो लड़ाइयों of attrition through the Overland अभियान towards Richmond, the Confederate capital.
The defending Confederate army failed, leading to Lee 's surrender to ग्रान्ट at Appomattox Court House on अप्रैल 9, 1865.
The अमरीकी Civil War थी one of the earliest सच्चा औद्योगिक wars.
Railroads, the telegraph, steamships, and mass-produced हथियार यहूद employed extensively.
The mobilization of civilian factories, खानों, shipyards, banks, transportation और खाना आपूर्तियाँ सब foreshadowed संसार War I.
it remains the deadliest war in American history, resulting in the मौतों of an अनुमानित 750,000 soldiers and an undetermined क्रमांक of civilian casualties.
इतिहासकार जॉन Huddleston estimates the death टोल at टेन प्रतिशत of सब Northern males 20–45 years old, and 30 percent of all Southern white males aged 18–40.
विलियम Bruce Jenner ( born October 28, 1949 ) is a former U.S. track और फ़ील्ड खिलाड़ी, motivational स्पीकर, socialite, टेलीविज़न व्यक्तित्व और businessman.
He जीती the gold पदक for decathlon in the Montreal 1976 गर्मियाँ ओलंपिक.
Following his Olympic जीत and the related recognition, he married क्रिस Kardashian, and his professional career evolved into होने a television हस्ती.
By 1981, he था starred in several made-for-TV movies और थी Erik एस्ट्राडा 's बदलना on the top रेटेड TV श्रेणी CHiPs.
He रै six children : Burt, केसी, Brandon, ब्रोडी, Kendall और Kylie.
चूंकि his 1991 marriage to Kris जेनर, he is the stepfather to Kourtney, Kim, khloe and Rob Kardashian.
Since 2007, he has appeared with his blended परिवार on Keeping Up with the Kardashians.
escherichia कोलाई ( ; commonly abbreviated E. coli ) is a Gram-negative, rod-shaped bacterium that is commonly found in the निम्नतर intestine of warm-blooded जीवों ( endotherms ).
Most E. कोलाई strains are हानिरहित, लकिन some serotypes can cause serious food poisoning in इंसानो, and हैं occasionally responsible लिये product recalls due to खाना contamination.
The हानिरहित strains are part of the सामान्य flora of the आंत, और can benefit their होस्ट by producing vitamin k2, and by preventing the स्थापना of रोगजनक जीवाणु within the intestine.
E. coli and related bacteria constitute परिचय 0.1 % of gut flora, and fecal–oral transmission is the प्रमुख route through जिससे रोगजनक strains of the bacterium कारण disease.
Cells हैं able to survive outside the body लिये a limited amount of समय, which makes them आदर्श indicator organisms to परीक्षण environmental samples लिये fecal contamination.
वहीँ is, however, a growing देह of शोध कि has examined environmentally persistent E. coli which can survive for विस्तारित periods बाहर of the host.
The bacterium can also be grown easily and inexpensively in a laboratory setting, and has been intensively investigated for over 60 years.
E. coli is the सबसे widely studied prokaryotic model organism, और an important species in the fields of biotechnology and microbiology, where it रै served as the host organism for the majority of कार्य with recombinant DNA.
Area code 217 is the North American टेलीफोन area code for much of western and central इलिनोइस.
the 217 क्षेत्रफल शामिल Illinois ' capital, Springfield, plus Champaign, Urbana, Decatur, Danville, क्विंसी, and Rantoul.
217 was one of the असली क्षेत्रफल codes, which were created in 1947.
The only significant बदलें in 217 's boundaries थी in 1957, जब इसके northern portion was combined with भाग of area कोड 815 to रूप area code 309.
Image of the largest अंटार्कटिक ozone hole कभी अंकित ( सितंबर 2006 ), over the Southern pole
परतों of the माहौल ( नहीं to scale )
Ozone depletion describes two distinct लकिन सम्बन्धित phenomena observed since the late 1970s : a steady मनाही of about 4 % per दशक in the कुल आवाज़ of ozone in Earth 's stratosphere ( the ozone layer ), and a much larger springtime घटी in stratospheric ओज़ोन over Earth 's ध्रुवीय regions.
the latter घटना is referred to as the ozone hole.
In addition to these well-known stratospheric phenomena, वहीँ are also springtime polar tropospheric ozone depletion कार्यक्रम.
the विवरण of polar ozone छेद गठन differ from that of mid-latitude thinning, but the सबसे important प्रक्रम in दोनो is catalytic destruction of ओज़ोन by atomic halogens.
The main सोर्स of these halogen अणु in the stratosphere is photodissociation of man-made halocarbon refrigerants ( cfcs, freons, halons ).
These compounds are transported into the stratosphere after being emitted at the सतह.
Both types of ओज़ोन depletion were observed to बढ़ाएँ as emissions of halo-carbons increased.
CFCs और अन्य contributory substances हैं referred to as ozone-depleting substances ( ODS ).
Since the ozone layer रोकता most harmful UVB wavelengths ( 280–315 nm ) of ultraviolet light ( uv लाइट ) इससे passing through the Earth 's atmosphere, observed and projected decreases in ozone have उत्पन्न worldwide concern leading to अपनाना of the मॉन्ट्रियल प्रोटोकॉल that bans the production of cfcs, halons, and other ozone-depleting chemicals such as carbon tetrachloride और trichloroethane.
it is suspected that a किस्में of biological consequences such as increases in स्किन cancer, cataracts, क्षति to plants, and कटौती of plankton populations in the समंदर 's photic मण्डल may परिणाम इससे the increased UV exposure due to ओज़ोन depletion.
The प्रस्तावना to the United States संविधान is a ब्रैड परिचयात्मक statement of the संविधान 's fundamental उद्देश्य and guiding principles.
it states in सामान्य शर्तें, and courts have referred to it as विश्वसनीय evidence of, the Founding fathers ' इरादों regarding the Constitution 's अर्थ और कया they hoped the Constitution would achieve as it pertains to सब of the लोगों of the संयुक्त States.
as the phrase, `` we the people '' suggests कि the new government originates from the लोगों of the United States and it sets into motion a question as it pertains to that विशाल population concerning the individual अधिकारों और equality among all लोगों ; this can be seen सबसे broadly in the divide between republicanism and सोशल democracy.
