The shot put ( pronounced ) is a track और field इवेंट involving `` throwing '' / '' putting '' ( throwing in a pushing गति ) a heavy spherical ऑब्जेक्ट —the shot—as दूर as संभावित.
The shot put competition लिये men रै been a part of the आधुनिक Olympics since उनके revival in 1896, women 's competition began in 1948.
Map of the United Nations ( un ) member states, साथ उनके territories ( सहित dependent territories ) recognized by the un in ब्लू
There हैं United Nations ( un ) member राज्य, and प्रत्येक of उन्हें is a member of the United राष्ट्र General Assembly.
The criteria लिये admission of नई सदस्यों हैं set out in the United राष्ट्र चार्टर, Chapter II, आलेख 4:
A recommendation for admission इससे the Security Council requires affirmative votes इससे at तनिक nine of the परिषद 's पंद्रह सदस्यों, with none of the five permanent सदस्यों मतदान against.
The Security Council 's recommendation must then be subsequently approved in the General सभा by a two-thirds majority vote.
In principle, only sovereign states can become UN members, and currently सब UN members हैं sovereign राज्य ( although a few members were not sovereign when they joined the un ).
क्युकी a state can only be admitted to the UN by the स्वीकृति of the Security Council and the General Assembly, a क्रमांक of राज्य कि may be माना sovereign राज्य according to the Montevideo Convention मापदण्ड हैं not सदस्यों because the UN करता नहीं consider them to possess sovereignty, mainly due to the कमी of अंतरराष्ट्रीय recognition or opposition from निश्चित सदस्यों.
In addition to the member राज्य, the UN भी आमंत्रण non-member states ( currently two : the पावन See and Palestine ), intergovernmental संगठन, and अन्य international संगठन and entities whose statehood or sovereignty are नहीं precisely पारिभाषित, to become observers at the General Assembly, allowing them to participate और speak, लकिन not vote, in General सभा meetings.
the Eiffel मीनार (, ) is an iron जाली मीनार located on the Champ de Mars in Paris, नामित after the engineer gustave Eiffel, जिनकी कम्पनी designed and निर्मित the tower.
erected in 1889 as the entrance मेहराब to the 1889 संसार 's Fair, it has become both a वैश्विक cultural प्रतीक of फ़्रांस और one of the सबसे recognizable structures in the संसार.
The tower is the tallest structure in Paris and the most-visited सशुल्क monument in the संसार ; 7.1 million people ascended it in 2011.
The third level वेधशाला 's upper मंच is at the highest accessible to public in the यूरोपीय संघ and the उच्चतम in Europe as long as the platform of the ostankino Tower, at, remains closed as a result of the आग of अगस्त 2000.
the tower received its 250 millionth आगंतुक in 2010.
The tower stands tall, about the वही ऊँचाई as an 81-storey भवन.
दौरान इसके construction, the Eiffel Tower surpassed the वॉशिंगटन Monument to assume the शीर्षक of the tallest man-made ढांचा in the संसार, a title it held लिये 41 सालो, until the क्रिसलर Building in New York नगर was निर्मित in 1930.
क्युकी of the addition, in 1957, of the antenna atop the Eiffel Tower, it is now taller than the Chrysler Building.
Not including broadcast antennas, it is the second-tallest structure in France, बाद the millau Viaduct.
The tower has तीन levels लिये विज़िटर.
Tickets can be खरीदा to ascend, by stairs or लिफ्ट ( elevator ), to the पहला and दूसरी स्तर.
The walk from ground level to the first level is over 300 कदम, as is the चलना from the पहला to the second level.
The तीसरा and highest level is accessible only by lift—stairs do exist but हैं usually closed to the पब्लिक.
The first and दूसरी levels have रेस्तरां.
The मीनार has become the most prominent symbol of both पेरिस और फ़्रांस, प्रायः in the establishing shot of films set in the नगर.
Kenneth वेन `` Ken '' Jennings iii ( born May 23, 1974 ) is an अमरीकी खेल दिखाएँ contestant और author.
जेनिंग्स is विख्यात for holding the record for the longest जीतना streak on the U.S. syndicated खेल दिखाएँ jeopardy !
and as होने the all-time अग्रणी money winner on American game shows.
In 2004, Jennings जीती 74 jeopardy !
खेल before he थी defeated by challenger Nancy zerg on his 75th रूप.
His कुल आय on Jeopardy !
are $ 3,172,700, consisting of $ 2,520,700 over his 74 wins, a $ 2,000 second-place पुरस्कार in his 75th रूप, a $ 500,000 second-place पुरस्कार in the jeopardy !
परम Tournament of Champions, as well as half of a $ 300,000 पुरस्कार in the ibm Challenge.
During his पहला run of jeopardy !
appearances, Jennings earned the record लिये the highest American खेल show winnings.
His total was surpassed by ब्रैड rutter, who पराजित जेनिंग्स in the फाइनल of the Jeopardy !
परम टूर्नामेंट of champions ( first aired on may 25, 2005 ), adding $ 2,000,000 to Rutter 's existing jeopardy !
winnings.
Jennings regained the record after appearing on अनेक अन्य खेल shows, culminating in an appearance on Are You Smarter than a 5th Grader ?
( पहला aired on अक्तूबर 10, 2008 ), though rutter retains the Jeopardy !
record.
बाद उसके success on Jeopardy !, Jennings लिखा परिचय his experience और explored American trivia इतिहास and culture in his किताब brainiac : Adventures in the जिज्ञासु, प्रतिस्पर्धी, बाध्यता World of Trivia buffs, published in 2006.
The Canadian Football League or cfl ( ' [ LCF ] in फ्रेंच ) is a पेशेवर खेल league स्तिथ in Canada.
the CFL is the highest स्तर of प्रतियोगिता in Canadian फ़ुटबॉल, a form of gridiron football closely related to American football.
Its eight current teams, which हैं located in आठ पृथक cities, are divided into दो divisions of four टीमों each — the ईस्ट Division and the West Division.
The लीग 's 19-week regular season runs from late जून to जल्दी नवम्बर ; प्रत्येक टोली plays 18 खेल with one bye सप्ताह.
following the regular season, the तीन टीमों साथ the बेहतरीन रिकॉर्ड in their division ( मगर if the fourth place टोली in एक प्रभाग has a better record than the third प्लेस टोली in the other division, जब the टोली with the बेहतर record makes the playoffs and `` crosses over '' to the other division 's playoff ) compete in the लीग 's three-week divisional playoffs, जिससे culminate in the late-November Grey Cup championship, the देश 's largest सालाना खेल and television इवेंट.
the cfl was officially संस्थापित on जनवरी 19, 1958, making it the दूसरी oldest gridiron फ़ुटबॉल league in उत्तर America still in आपरेशन, हालांकि all its टीमों long predate the modern गठन of the league.
It is the उच्चतम स्तर of खेल in Canadian football, the सबसे लोकप्रिय फ़ुटबॉल league in कनाडा, and the second-most popular major sports league in Canada, बाद the National Hockey League.
Although ice हॉकी is Canada 's सबसे लोकप्रिय खेल, the cfl has increased the popularity of कनाडाई फ़ुटबॉल in क्यूबेक and पश्चिमी Canada.
Canadian फ़ुटबॉल is also played at amateur levels ( i.e. youth, high school, CJFL, qjfl, CIS और senior लीग such as the Alberta Football League ).
The 2010s होगा be a significant दशक लिये the cfl in शर्तें of विकास, as teams have renovated, expanded stadiums, or योजना to निर्माण entirely new stadiums.
The मॉन्ट्रियल अलॉतेस accomplished this first, adding 5,000 सीटे to Percival molson मेमोरियल Stadium in time लिये the 2010 cfl season.
The एडमॉन्टन एस्किमोस and Calgary स्तेमपेड्रस also renovated their respective stadiums और facilities for the 2010 season.
in 2011, the BC शेर निभाई under a नई, retractable छत in bc प्लेस after बिता एक and a half सीज़न at Empire फ़ील्ड.
तब the Winnipeg Blue Bombers होगा खेल in an entirely new stadium at the University of मनिटोबा, scheduled to खोलें in time for the 2013 ऋतु.
The Hamilton tiger-cats, saskatchewan Roughriders और the नई ओटावा मताधिकार हैं भी looking at new or extensively-renovated stadiums in the following years.
वहीँ are also hopes of expanding the league to Atlantic कनाडा ( ideally basing a team in either the more populated Halifax, or the अधिक centralized Moncton ), as 2010 and 2011 था regular ऋतु games hosted in Moncton.
According to sports historian Douglas Brei, the Canadian फ़ुटबॉल League holds the भेद of being the तभी professional sports league in North America, major or minor लीग, in जिससे प्रत्येक existing मताधिकार रै won at least one league title while in their current location.
Each एंटीबॉडी binds to a specific antigen ; an बातचीत समान to a lock और कुंजी.
An antibody ( Ab ), also known as an immunoglobulin ( ig ), is a विशाल Y-shaped प्रोटीन उत्पादित by B-cells that is प्रयुक्त by the प्रतिरक्षा system to पहचानो और neutralize विदेशी objects such as bacteria और viruses.
The antibody recognizes a अद्वितीय part of the विदेशी निशाना, called an प्रतिजन.
Each टिप of the `` y '' of an antibody contains a paratope ( a ढांचा analogous to a lock ) that is specific लिये one particular epitope ( similarly analogous to a कुंजी ) on an प्रतिजन, allowing ये two structures to bind साथ साथ precision.
Using this binding यांत्रिकी, an antibody can टैग a microbe or an संक्रमित cell for आक्रमण by अन्य parts of the प्रतिरक्षा system, or can neutralize its निशाना सीधे ( for उदाहरण, by blocking a भाग of a microbe कि is essential लिये its invasion और survival ).
The production of antibodies is the main function of the humoral immune system.
antibodies are secreted by a type of white blood cell पुकारा a plasma cell.
Antibodies can occur in two शारीरिक forms, a घुलनशील रूप that is स्रावित from the cell, and a membrane -bound form कि is संलग्न to the surface of a b cell और is referred to as the B कोशिका receptor ( bcr ).
The BCR is only found on the surface of b cells और facilitates the सक्रियण of ये कोशिकाएं and their subsequent differentiation into either एंटीबॉडी factories called plasma कोशिकाएं, or memory b कोशिकाएं that होगा survive in the body और remember कि वही antigen so the B cells can respond faster upon future exposure.
In सबसे मामले, interaction of the B cell with a T हेल्पर कोशिका is necessary to produce full सक्रियण of the b cell and, इसलिए, antibody पीढी following प्रतिजन binding.
Soluble antibodies are released into the रक्त और tissue fluids, as well as many secretions to continue to सर्वेक्षण for आक्रमणकारी microorganisms.
antibodies हैं glycoproteins belonging to the immunoglobulin superfamily ; the terms एंटीबॉडी और immunoglobulin are प्रायः used interchangeably.
Antibodies are typically बना of basic structural units—each with दो large भारी chains और दो छोटी लाइट chains.
There हैं अनेक अलग प्रकार of एंटीबॉडी heavy chains, और several different kinds of antibodies, जिससे are grouped into different isotypes based on जिससे भारी कड़ी वे possess.
Five different antibody isotypes are known in mammals, which perform different roles, and help सीधा the उचित immune जवाब for each different type of foreign object they encounter.
Though the सामान्य structure of all antibodies is very similar, a छोटी region at the टिप of the प्रोटीन is अत्यधिक variable, allowing लाखो of antibodies साथ थोड़ा different tip structures, or प्रतिजन binding sites, to मौजूद.
This region is known as the hypervariable region.
प्रत्येक of these विसंगतियाँ can bind to a अलग antigen.
This enormous diversity of antibodies allows the immune प्रणाली to recognize an equally चौड़ी किस्में of antigens.
the large and विविध जनसांख्यिकी of antibodies is उत्पन्न by यादृच्छिक combinations of a नियत of जीन segments कि encode अलग प्रतिजन बाइंडिंग sites ( or paratopes ), followed by random mutations in this क्षेत्रफल of the antibody जीन, जिससे create further विविधता.
एंटीबॉडी genes भी re-organize in a process called class switching that changes the आधार of the भारी chain to another, creating a different isotype of the एंटीबॉडी that retains the प्रतिजन विशिष्ट variable region.
इस allows a single एंटीबॉडी to be used by several अलग parts of the immune प्रणाली.
the प्रतीक used by the Zodiac Killer to sign his correspondence
The zodiac Killer was a सीरियल killer जो संचालित in Northern California in the late 1960s और early 1970s.
the killer 's पहचान remains unknown.
The zodiac murdered पीड़ितों in Benicia, Vallejo, Lake berryessa, and San Francisco between दिसम्बर 1968 और October 1969.
चार men और three women between the ages of 16 and 29 यहूद targeted.
the killer originated the नाम `` Zodiac '' in a series of taunting letters sent to the local Bay Area दबायें.
ये अक्षर included चार cryptograms ( or ciphers ).
Of the four cryptograms sent, only एक has महरूम definitively हल.
Suspects have been named by law प्रवर्तन और amateur investigators, लकिन no conclusive प्रमाण has surfaced.
In April 2004, the सैन Francisco पुलिस विभाग marked the case `` inactive '', yet re-opened the case at some point prior to March 2007.
the मामला also remains खोलें in the नगर of Vallejo, as well as in Napa काउंटी और solano County.
The कैलिफ़ोर्निया विभाग of Justice रै maintained an open case संचिका on the Zodiac murders since 1969.
Jennings is a छोटी city in और the parish सीट of Jefferson Davis मोहल्ला, Louisiana, United States, near झील चार्ल्स.
The population was 10,383 at the 2010 जनसांख्यिकी, a छोटी मनाही from the 2000 tabulation.
The city is 68 percent श्वेत.
Jennings is the principal city of the Jennings Micropolitan Statistical Area, which includes सब of Jefferson डेविस Parish.
it is भी part of the larger Lake Charles-Jennings Combined सांख्यिकीय Area.
Nanotechnology ( sometimes shortened to `` nanotech '' ) is the हेरफेर of matter on an atomic और molecular स्केल.
The earliest, widespread वर्णन of nanotechnology referred to the particular technological लक्ष्य of precisely manipulating अणु and molecules for fabrication of macroscale products, also अभी referred to as molecular nanotechnology.
A more generalized description of nanotechnology was subsequently established by the National Nanotechnology Initiative, which defines nanotechnology as the manipulation of matter साथ at least एक dimension sized from 1 to 100 nanometers.
इस definition reflects the fact that quantum mechanical effects are महत्वपूर्ण at इस quantum-realm scale, और so the definition shifted from a particular technological goal to a research श्रेणी inclusive of सब types of शोध और technologies that सौदे with the खास गुण of matter that occur नीचे the given size threshold.
It is therefore common to देखिए the बहुवचन रूप `` nanotechnologies '' as खूब as `` nanoscale technologies '' to refer to the broad range of research और अनुप्रयोग जिनकी आम trait is size.
क्युकी of the किस्में of संभावित अनुप्रयोग ( सहित औद्योगिक और military ), governments have invested billions of डॉलर in nanotechnology शोध.
through इसके National nanotechnology Initiative, the USA has invested 3.7 अरब dollars.
the यूरोपीय Union has invested 1.2 अरब और Japan 750 लाख dollars.
nanotechnology as defined by आकार is naturally बहुत broad, including fields of विज्ञान as विविध as सतह विज्ञान, organic रसायन, आणविक जीवविज्ञान, semiconductor भौतिकी, microfabrication, etc.
the संबद्ध research and अनुप्रयोग are equally विविध, ranging from एक्सटेंशन of conventional device भौतिकी to completely नई approaches आधारित upon molecular self-assembly, from विकासशील new materials with dimensions on the nanoscale to direct control of matter on the atomic scale.
Scientists currently debate the भविष्य implications of nanotechnology.
nanotechnology may be able to बनाएँ many नई materials और डिवाइस with a विशाल range of applications, such as in medicine, electronics, biomaterials and energy production.
On the other हाथ, nanotechnology raises many of the same मुद्दे as कोई नई प्रौद्योगिकी, including चिंताएं about the toxicity और environmental impact of nanomaterials, and उनके potential effects on global economics, as खूब as speculation about various doomsday scenarios.
These concerns have led to a debate among वकालत groups और governments on whether खास regulation of nanotechnology is warranted.
Map of the Eastern Bloc
The पद पूर्वी Bloc or Communist Bloc refers to the पूर्व communist states of Central and Eastern Europe, generally the सोवियत संघ and the देशों of the Warsaw अनुबंध.
the शर्तें कम्युनिस्ट Bloc और Soviet Bloc were also प्रयुक्त to denote groupings of states aligned with the सोवियत Union, although these शर्तें might include राज्य बाहर Central और Eastern यूरोपीय.
the New जर्सी gubernatorial election of 2009 took place on November 3, 2009.
Democratic राज्यपाल Jon Corzine थी running for a second पद and थी being challenged by रिपब्लिकन Chris क्रिस्टी, स्वतंत्र Christopher Daggett and nine अन्य, in addition to several write-in candidates.
क्रिस्टी जीती the election, साथ about 48.5 प्रतिशत of the vote, to 44.9 प्रतिशत for Corzine and 5.8 percent for daggett.
क्रिस्टी जीती the largest margin for a first term Republican चूंकि 1969.
Christie assumed office on January 19, 2010.
इस थी the first election to भरण the newly created office of लेफ्टिनेंट राज्यपाल.
The candidates for राज्यपाल and लेफ्टिनेंट governor यहूद joined साथ as a single चुनाव, so कि मतदाता किया नहीं have the अवसर to split the टिकट.
Kim Guadagno, Christie 's running mate, became New जर्सी 's पहला लेफ्टिनेंट governor following her उद्घाटन.
Health परवाह in the संयुक्त States is provided by अनेक पृथक organizations.
Health परवाह सुविधाएं हैं largely owned और operated by private सेक्टर व्यवसायों.
Health बीमे for public सेक्टर employees is primarily provided by the government.
60-65 % of healthcare provision और बिता comes from programs such as medicare, medicaid, TRICARE, the children 's स्वास्थ्य बीमे कार्यक्रम, and the Veterans स्वास्थ्य Administration.
Most of the population under 65 is insured by उनके or a परिवार member 's नियोक्ता, कुछ buy स्वास्थ्य insurance on उनके अपना, और the शेष are uninsured.
of 17 high-income देशों studied by the नेशनल Institutes of Health in 2013, the United राज्य was at or निकट the नीचे in शिशु मृत्यु, heart and फेफड़ों बीमारी, sexually transmitted infections, adolescent pregnancies, injuries, homicides, and rates of disability.
Together, ऐसे issues प्लेस the U.S. at the bottom of the list for जीवन expectancy.
On average, a U.S. पुरूष can be expected to सजीव almost four fewer सालो than those in the top-ranked country.
according to the World Health Organization ( जो ), the संयुक्त राज्य खर्च more on स्वास्थ्य care प्रति capita ( $ 7,146 ), and अधिक on स्वास्थ्य care as percentage of इसके GDP ( 15.2 % ), than any other nation in 2008.
The Commonwealth Fund क्रमित the संयुक्त States last in the विशेषता of स्वास्थ्य care among समान countries, and notes U.S. care costs the most.
The U.S. जनसांख्यिकी Bureau reported कि 49.9 million residents, 16.3 % of the population, यहूद uninsured in 2010 ( up from 49.0 million residents, 16.1 % of the population, in 2009 ).
a 2004 Institute of आयुर्विज्ञान ( IOM ) रपट कहा : `` the संयुक्त States is among the few industrialized nations in the world that does not guarantee अभिगम to स्वास्थ्य care for its जनसांख्यिकी. ''
A 2004 OECD report said : `` साथ the exception of मैक्सिको, Turkey, and the संयुक्त States, सब oecd countries था achieved universal or near-universal ( at least 98.4 % insured ) कवरेज of their populations by 1990. ''
a 2010 report observed कि lack of स्वास्थ्य बीमे कल्याणकारी roughly 48,000 unnecessary मौतों प्रत्येक साल in the संयुक्त राज्य.
in 2007, 62.1 % of filers for bankruptcies claimed high medical खर्च.
a 2013 study found कि about 25 % of सब senior नागरिकों declare दिवालियापन due to medical खर्च, and 43 % are मजबूर to mortgage or sell their प्राथमिक residence.
On March 23, 2010, the Patient Protection and सस्ती Care Act ( PPACA ) became law, providing लिये प्रमुख changes in health बीमे.
In physiology, body water is the water content of the इंसान body.
A significant fraction of the इंसान body is जल.
Arthur Guyton 's Textbook of चिकित्सा physiology states that `` the कुल amount of water in a man of औसत weight ( 70 गामा ) is approximately 40 लीटर, averaging 57 percent of his total देह वज़न.
In a newborn शिशु, this may be as ऊँची as 75 percent of the देह weight, but it progressively decreases इससे जनम to old age, सबसे of the घटी occurring दौरान the पहला 10 years of life.
भी, obesity decreases the प्रतिशत of water in the देह, sometimes to as low as 45 percent ''.
ये figures are सांख्यिकीय averages, so are illustrative, and like all biostatistics, will vary with बाते like प्रकार of population, age और number of लोगों sampled, and methodology.
so there is नहीं, और can नहीं be, a figure कि is exactly the same for all people, for इस or any other physiological measure.
लिये उदाहरण, Jackson 's ( 1985 ) anatomy & Physiology लिये Nurses gives a figure of 60 % लिये the proportion of body-weight attributable to water, जिससे approximates Guyton 's 57 %.
In diseased राज्य जहाँ देह water is प्रभावित, the compartment or compartments that have changed can दे clues to the प्रकृति of the प्रॉब्लम.
Body जल is regulated by hormones, सहित anti-diuretic हार्मोन ( ADH ), aldosterone and atrial natriuretic पेप्टाइड.
प्रति netter 's Atlas of Human Physiology, body जल is टूटा down into the following कम्पार्टमेंटs:
Intracellular fluid ( 2/3 of देह जल ).
प्रति Guyton, in a body containing 40 litres of fluid, about 25 litres is intracellular, जिससे amounts to 62.5 % ( 5/8 ), close पर्याप्त to the 2/3 नियम of अंगूठा.
जैक्सन 's ग्रन्थ states 70 % of देह द्रव is intracellular.
Extracellular fluid ( 1/3 of देह water ).
Per Guyton 's illustration, लिये a 40 लीटर body, about 15 लीटर is extracellular, जिससे amounts to 37.5 % again, this is बंद to the 1/3 rule of thumb cited here.
Plasma ( 1/5 of extracellular द्रव ).
प्रति Guyton 's उदाहरण, of the 15 litres of extracellular fluid, plasma volume averages 3 litres.
This amounts to 20 %, the वही as per netter 's Atlas.
Interstitial द्रव ( 4/5 of extracellular द्रव )
Transcellular द्रव ( a.k.a. `` तीसरा स्पेस, '' normally उपेक्षित in calculations )
contained inside अंगों, ऐसे as the gastrointestinal, cerebrospinal, उदरावरणीय, और ocular fluids.
Self-esteem is a term used in psychology to प्रतिबिंबित a व्यक्ति 's overall emotional evaluation of उसके or उसके अपना लायक.
it is a निर्णय of oneself as well as an attitude toward the self.
Self-esteem encompasses beliefs ( लिये example, `` I am competent, '' `` i am worthy '' ) and emotions ऐसे as triumph, despair, pride and शर्म.
Smith और mackie define it by saying `` The self-concept is कया we think about the स्वः ; self-esteem, is the धनात्मक or ऋणात्मक evaluations of the self, as in how we feel about it. ''
Self-esteem is भी known as the evaluative dimension of the self कि शामिल feelings of worthiness, prides और discouragement.
One 's self-esteem is भी closely associated साथ self-consciousness.
Self-esteem is a disposition that a person रै जिससे represents their निर्णयों of their own worthiness.
In the mid-1960s, Morris Rosenberg and social-learning theorists पारिभाषित self-esteem as a personal worth or worthiness.
Nathaniel Branden in 1969 पारिभाषित self-esteem as `` the experience of being competent to cope with the basic चुनौतियां of life and being worthy of happiness. ''
According to Branden, self-esteem is the योग of self-confidence ( a अहसास of निजी capacity ) and self-respect ( a feeling of निजी लायक ).
It exists as a consequence of the implicit judgement that प्रत्येक person has of their क्षमता to face life 's challenges, to समझे and solve problems, और उनके right to achieve happiness, and be given respect.
As a social psychological construct, self-esteem is आकर्षक क्युकी शोधकर्ताओं have conceptualized it as an influential predictor of relevant outcomes, ऐसे as academic achievement ( दलदल 1990 ) or exercise बर्ताव ( Hagger et al. 1998 ).
in addition, self-esteem रै also महरूम treated as an important outcome due to its close relation साथ psychological well-being ( दलदल 1989 ).
self-esteem can लागू specifically to a particular आयाम ( लिये example, `` I मानना I am a good writer और I महसूस happy about कि '' ) or a वैश्विक extent ( for example, `` I मानना I am a bad व्यक्ति, and feel ख़राब about myself in general '' ).
psychologists usually regard self-esteem as an enduring personality characteristic ( `` trait '' self-esteem ), हालांकि normal, short-term विसंगतियाँ ( `` state '' self-esteem ) भी exist.
समानार्थी or near-synonyms of self-esteem include : self-worth, self-regard, self-respect, और self-integrity.
a Masonic आवास, often termed a Private आवास or constituent Lodge, is the basic organisational ईकाई of Freemasonry.
Every new आवास must be warranted or chartered by a ग्रैंड Lodge, but is subject to its direction तभी in enforcing the published Constitution of the jurisdiction.
by एक्सेप्शन the तीन surviving lodges कि formed the संसार 's पहला known ग्रैंड Lodge in London ( आज पुकारा the संयुक्त Grand Lodge of England ) have the unique privilege to operate as time immemorial i.e. बगैर such warrant ; तभी one अन्य आवास operates without a warrant - इस is the ग्रैंड Stewards ' आवास in London, हालांकि it is not भी हकदार to the `` समय immemorial '' title.
a freemason is generally entitled to visit कोई Lodge, in कोई jurisdiction ( i.e. अंतर्गत any Grand Lodge ) in amity with his अपना.
in कुछ jurisdictions this privilege is प्रतिबंधित to निपुण Masons ( कि is, Freemasons who have attained the Order 's तीसरा उपाधि ).
He is first usually required to check, and certify, the regularity of the relationship of the आवास - और be able to satisfy that आवास of his नियमितता of सदस्यता.
Freemasons एकत्रित साथ as a Lodge to कार्य the three basic Degrees of Entered प्रशिक्षु, Fellowcraft and निपुण मेसन.
Pilkington Group Limited is a बहुराष्ट्रीय कांच manufacturing company headquartered in St Helens, United Kingdom and a wholly स्वामित्व subsidiary of the japan-based NSG Group.
prior to its acquisition by NSG in 2006 it थी an स्वतंत्र कम्पनी listed on the London भण्डार Exchange और for a समय थी a constituent of the FTSE 100 अनुक्रमणिका.
A quotation is the repetition of one अभिव्यक्ति as part of another एक, particularly जब the quoted expression is well-known or explicitly attributed by citation to its असली source, and it is indicated by ( punctuated साथ ) quotation marks.
a quotation can also refer to the दोहराया use of units of कोई अन्य रूप of expression, especially parts of artistic works : elements of a पेंटिंग, scenes from a movie or sections from a musical composition.
साल 1877 ( mdccclxxvii ) was a आम year starting on Monday ( कड़ी will display the full पंचांग ) of the gregorian पंचांग और a common year starting on शनिवार of the 12-day slower Julian पंचांग.
Black pepper ( पाइपर nigrum ) is a flowering vine in the family piperaceae, cultivated लिये its fruit, which is usually dried and प्रयुक्त as a spice और seasoning.
The fruit, known as a peppercorn when सूखी, is approximately in व्यास, dark red when fully mature, and, like all drupes, contains a single बीज.
Peppercorns, and the ground pepper derived इससे them, may be described simply as pepper, or more precisely as black pepper ( पकाया and dried unripe फल ), ग्रीन pepper ( सूखी unripe फल ) and white pepper ( dried पके बीज ).
Black pepper is native to south India, और is extensively cultivated वहीँ और elsewhere in tropical regions.
Currently Vietnam is the world 's largest निर्माता and निर्यातक of pepper, producing 34 % of the संसार 's Piper nigrum क्रॉप as of 2008.
Dried मैदान pepper has been used चूंकि प्राचीनता for both its फ्लेवर and as a medicine.
Black pepper is the world 's most traded spice.
It is one of the most common spices added to European भोजन और its descendants.
The spiciness of black pepper is due to the chemical piperine, not to be confused साथ the capsaicin that देता fleshy peppers theirs.
it is in the आधुनिक world, often युग्म साथ salt.
Fire hydrant in Charlottesville, वर्जिनिया, यूएसए
a आग hydrant ( भी known colloquially as a आग plug in the United राज्य or as a johnny pump in New York नगर ), is an active आग protection माप, and a सोर्स of water provided in most urban, suburban and rural areas साथ नगरपालिका water सेवा to enable firefighters to tap into the municipal water सप्लाई to assist in extinguishing a fire.
Buildings near a hydrant may qualify लिये an insurance छूट चूंकि firefighters चाहिए be able to अधिक rapidly extinguish a fire on the insured property.
the concept of fire plugs dates to at least the 17th सदी.
This थी a time when firefighters responding to a call would dig down to the लकड़ी water mains and hastily bore a छेद to सुरक्षित water to लड़ो फ़ायर.
The जल would भरण the hole creating a अस्थाई well, और be transported from the खूब to the आग by बाल्टी brigades or, बाद, by hand-pumped fire engines.
The छेद were तब plugged with stoppers, सामान्यतः redwood, जिससे over time आए to be known as fire plugs.
The स्थान of the plug होता प्रायः be अंकित or marked so कि it could be reused in भविष्य fires.
इस is the source of the colloquial term fire प्लग still used for fire hydrants आज.
After the Great आग of London in 1666, the नगर installed water मेन्स with छेद drilled at intervals, equipped साथ उठते, allowing an access point to the wooden आग plugs from street level.
The invention of a post- or pillar-type fire hydrant is generally credited to Frederick Graff sr., मुख्य Engineer of the फिलाडेल्फिया जल works around the साल 1801.
It था a संयोजन hose/faucet आउटलेट और was of `` wet बैरल '' डिज़ाइन with the वाल्व in the top.
It is said कि graff आयोजित the first पेटेंट for a आग hydrant, but this can नहीं be verified क्युकी the patent office in वॉशिंगटन d.C. caught on fire in 1836 destroying अनेक patent records इससे that period in the प्रक्रम.
The President of the गणतंत्र of South Africa is the सिर of राज्य and सिर of government under South अफ़्रीकी 's Constitution.
From 1961 to 1994, the head of राज्य was पुकारा the State President.
The President is elected by members of the नेशनल Assembly, the lower हाउस of Parliament, and is usually the नेता of the largest पार्टी, which रै been the अफ़्रीकी National कॉंग्रेस चूंकि the first non-racial चुनावों were held on 27 April 1994.
the role was originally founded to be distinct from the now defunct role of प्रधान minister, but the two roles यहूद merged in the 1983 संविधान जिससे निर्दिष्ट a four-year term of दफ्तर.
The 1993 and बाद constitutions हद the president 's time in office to two five-year शर्तें.
The पहला अध्यक्ष to be elected under the new संविधान was Nelson Mandela, and the incumbent president is याक़ूब Zuma.
Under the interim Constitution ( मान्य इससे 1994 to 1996 ), there was a सरकारी of नेशनल Unity, in जिससे an mp from the largest विपक्ष party थी entitled to a position as Deputy अध्यक्ष.
Along with Thabo mbeki, the last State अध्यक्ष, F.W. de Klerk also परोसा as डिप्टी President, in उसके capacity as the leader of the National Party which थी the second-largest पार्टी in the new पार्लियामेंट.
लकिन De klerk later resigned and गई into opposition साथ उसके पार्टी.
a voluntary coalition government continues to मौजूद under the new संविधान ( अपनाया in 1996 ), हालांकि there have महरूम no appointments of विपक्ष राजनेता to the post of deputy president.
खास education or special needs education is the education of विद्यार्थी with special needs in a रास्ता that addresses the students ' individual मतभेद और needs.
Ideally, this process involves the individually नियोजित and systematically monitored व्यवस्था of teaching procedures, adapted equipment and materials, accessible जमावट, and other interventions designed to सहायता learners साथ special needs achieve a higher level of personal self-sufficiency और success in स्कूल and community than होता be available if the student यहूद only दिए access to a typical कक्षा education.
आम खास needs include challenges with learning, संचार challenges, emotional और behavioral disorders, शारीरिक disabilities, and developmental disorders.
विद्यार्थी with these kinds of special needs हैं संभावित to benefit from additional educational सेवाएं ऐसे as अलग approaches to teaching, उपयोग of technology, a specifically adapted teaching क्षेत्रफल, or resource रूम.
बौद्धिक giftedness is a difference in learning और can भी benefit from specialized शिक्षण techniques or different शैक्षणिक programs, but the term `` special education '' is generally used to specifically indicate instruction of students जिनकी special needs reduce their क्षमता to learn independently or in an ordinary classroom, and gifted education is handled separately.
in most developed countries, educators are modifying शिक्षण विधि and environments so that the maximum क्रमांक of students are परोसा in general education environments.
Special शिक्षा in विकसित देशों is प्रायः regarded less as a `` place '' and अधिक as `` a दायरा of services, available in every school. ''
Integration can reduce सोशल stigmas और improve academic achievement for many students.
the विपरीत of खास education is सामान्य शिक्षा.
General education is the standard curriculum presented साथ standard teaching विधि and बगैर additional supports.
George सोरोस ( or ; ; ; born अगस्त 12, 1930, as Schwartz györgy ) is a Hungarian-American कारोबार magnate, investor, and philanthropist.
He is the chairman of Soros निधि प्रबन्धन.
Soros supports progressive-liberal कल्याणकारी.
He is ज्ञात as `` The Man जो broke the बैंको of England `` because of उसके in investment profits दौरान the 1992 Black बुधवार UK करेंसी संकट.
between 1979 and 2011, सोरोस gave दूर over $ 8 billion to human rights, public health, और शिक्षा causes.
He played a significant role in the शांतिपूर्ण transition इससे communism to capitalism in Hungary ( 1984–89 ) and provided one of यूरोपीय 's largest उच्चतर education endowments to Central European विश्वविद्यालयों in बुडापेस्ट.
सोरोस is also the अध्यक्ष of the खोलें समाज Institute.
An actor portraying Alexander Graham Bell बोलना into an early मॉडल टेलीफोन.
the invention of the telephone is the culmination of कार्य done by many individuals, the history of which involves a collection of claims and counterclaims.
The development of the आधुनिक electrical telephone involved an सरणी of lawsuits founded upon the patent claims of several individuals and numerous companies.
इस article कवर the early years इससे 1844 to 1898, from conception of the विचार of an इलेक्ट्रिक voice-transmission यंत्र, to failed कोशिशें to उपयोग `` make-and-break '' current, to successful experiments साथ electromagnetic telephones by Alexander Graham Bell and Thomas वाटसन, और finally to commercially successful telephones in the लेट 19th century.
A Master of ठीक Arts ( mfa, m.f.a. ) is a ग्रैजुएट degree typically requiring 2–3 सालो of postgraduate पढ़ाई beyond the bachelor 's उपाधि ( BFA ), हालांकि the term of पढ़ाई will vary by country or by विश्वविद्यालयों.
The mfa is a creative उपाधि प्रायः awarded as a टर्मिनल उपाधि in visual arts, creative लिखने, filmmaking, dance, or theatre and अन्य performing कला.
Coursework is primarily of an लागू or performing प्रकृति with the कार्यक्रम often culminating in a major work or performance.
Master of ठीक Arts programs have generally required a bachelor 's उपाधि prior to admission, लकिन many do नहीं require कि the undergraduate major be the same as the MFA field of study.
The सबसे important admissions आवश्यकता रै प्रायः महरूम a sample portfolio or a performance ऑडिशन.
The निपुण of ठीक कला differs from the निपुण of कला in that the MFA, while an अकादमिक कार्यक्रम, centers around अभ्यास in the particular field, whereas कार्यक्रम leading to the ma usually center on the scholarly, academic, or नाजुक study of the फ़ील्ड.
Additionally, in the संयुक्त राज्य, an mfa is recognized as a terminal degree लिये practitioners of Visual Art, Design, Dance, थिएटर, film/video, New मीडिया, and Creative लिखने - meaning that it is considered to be the उच्चतम उपाधि in its फ़ील्ड, and is प्रयुक्त as a minimum योग्यता to be समर्थ to apply to become a full-time Professor शिक्षण at the विश्वविद्यालयों level in ये disciplines.
There हैं exceptions to this मानक in the कला, notably in the मामला of music performance, where the MFA is not seen as a terminal degree in the context of the more मानकीकृत DMA उपाधि.
it is भी नाजुक to नोट that in the interest of extending the connection between रचनात्मक उत्पादन और continued academic research, कुछ विश्वविद्यालयों have स्थापित practice-based Ph.D programs in फ़ील्ड such as creative लिखने, visual कला, नई media, design and theater.
जबकि this रै था an प्रभाव in Creative Writing, and to a lesser extent in डिज़ाइन और नई मीडिया, the influx of graduates from practice-based PhD programs has not appreciably बदला the मानक for the MFA as the terminal degree in most Arts disciplines yet.
This is an ongoing contentious टॉपिक, and is the frequent subject of अकादमिक panels, especially at the सालाना College आर्ट Association conference.
The CAA 2008 दिशानिर्देश regarding the MFA strongly re-affirms that the PhD is not required as a टर्मिनल उपाधि in the visual arts.
The परमाणु bombings of the cities of Hiroshima and Nagasaki in जापानी were conducted by the United States दौरान the final stages of World युद्ध II in 1945.
The दो events are the only उपयोग of nuclear weapons in युद्ध to date.
Following a firebombing अभियान that destroyed अनेक Japanese शहरों, the Allies prepared लिये a costly invasion of Japan.
The war in यूरोपीय ended when नाजी Germany हस्ताक्षरित इसके instrument of आत्मसमर्पण on 8 may, लकिन the प्रशांत War continued.
Together with the United किंगडम and the Republic of China, the संयुक्त States पुकारा for a surrender of Japan in the Potsdam घोषणा on 26 July 1945, threatening Japan साथ `` prompt और utter विनाश ''.
the जापानी government ignored this ultimatum, and the United States deployed two nuclear हथियार developed by the Manhattan प्रोजेक्ट.
अमरीकी airmen dropped छोटी Boy on the नगर of हिरोशिमा on 6 August 1945, followed by Fat man over Nagasaki on 9 August.
Within the first दो to चार months of the bombings, the अधि effects killed 90,000–166,000 people in Hiroshima and 60,000–80,000 in नागासाकी, साथ roughly half of the deaths in each नगर occurring on the first दिन.
the Hiroshima prefecture स्वास्थ्य department estimated that, of the people who died on the day of the explosion, 60 % died from फ्लैश or flame burns, 30 % इससे falling मलबा और 10 % from अन्य causes.
दौरान the following months, large numbers died from the प्रभाव of burns, विकिरण sickness, और other चोटों, compounded by illness.
in a US estimate of the total immediate and short term कारण of death, 15–20 % died इससे विकिरण sickness, 20–30 % इससे burns, और 50–60 % from other चोटों, compounded by illness.
In both शहरों, most of the dead were नागरिकों, हालांकि हिरोशिमा had a sizeable garrison.
on 15 August, छह days बाद the bombing of Nagasaki, Japan घोषित its आत्मसमर्पण to the allies, हस्ताक्षर the Instrument of आत्मसमर्पण on 2 September, officially ending World War ii.
The bombings led, in part, to post-war Japan 's adopting तीन non-nuclear Principles, forbidding the स्वदेश from नाभिकीय armament.
The भूमिका of the bombings in Japan 's surrender and their नैतिक justification हैं स्टिल debated.
मोहनदास करमचंद Gandhi ( ; 2 अक्तूबर 1869 – 30 January 1948 ), commonly ज्ञात as Mahatma गांधी, थी the preeminent leader of भारतीय nationalism in british-ruled India.
Employing non-violent civil disobedience, Gandhi led India to independence and प्रेरित movements for non-violence, civil rights और freedom across the संसार.
The son of a senior government official, Gandhi थी born और उठाया in a Hindu Bania community in coastal Gujarat, and trained in विधि in London.
Gandhi became famous by fighting for the सिविल rights of मुस्लिम and Hindu इंडियंस in दक्षिण Africa, using new तकनीकों of non-violent civil disobedience that he developed.
Returning to इण्डिया in 1915, he set परिचय organising peasants to protest excessive land-taxes.
A lifelong opponent of `` communalism `` ( i.e. basing राजनीती on धर्म ) he पहुँचे out widely to सब religious groups.
he became a नेता of Muslims protesting the declining औकात of the खिलाफत.
Assuming leadership of the भारतीय नेशनल Congress in 1921, गांधी led nationwide अभियान लिये easing गरीबी, expanding women 's अधिकारों, building धार्मिक और जातीय amity, ending अस्पृश्यता, increasing economic self-reliance, और above सब लिये achieving Swaraj —the independence of India इससे British हुकूमत.
गांधी led Indians in protesting the national salt tax साथ the Dandi नमक कूच in 1930, और later in demanding the British to immediately छोड़ो India in 1942, during World War ii.
he was imprisoned for कि और लिये numerous अन्य राजनैतिक offenses over the years.
Gandhi sought to practice non-violence और truth in सब situations, and advocated कि others do the वही.
he देखी the गांवों as the core of the true India and promoted self-sufficiency ; he did not support the industrialization programs of his disciple Jawaharlal Nehru.
He lived modestly in a self-sufficient आवासीय जातियाँ और पहना the परंपरागत Indian dhoti और shawl, woven with धागे he had हाथ spun on a charkha.
उसके मुख्य political enemy in ब्रिटेन was Winston Churchill, who ridiculed him as a `` half-naked फकीर. ''
he थी a समर्पित vegetarian, और undertook long fasts as means of both self-purification और राजनैतिक mobilization.
in उसके last year, unhappy at the partition of India, गांधी worked to stop the carnage between Muslims, Hindus and Sikhs that raged in the किनारा area between India and Pakistan.
He थी assassinated on 30 January 1948 by Nathuram गोडसे जो विचार गांधी was too sympathetic to इण्डिया 's मुसलमान.
30 January is observed as Martyrs ' दिन in India.
The honorific Mahatma ( `` Great आत्मा '' ) थी लागू to उसे by 1914.
in India he was भी पुकारा Bapu ( `` पिता '' ).
He is known in India as the पिता of the स्वदेश ; his birthday, 2 अक्तूबर, is commemorated वहीँ as गांधी Jayanti, a नेशनल holiday, and world-wide as the अंतरराष्ट्रीय दिन of Non-Violence.
Gandhi 's philosophy थी not theoretical लकिन एक of व्यावहारिकतावाद, कि is, practicing his principles in the पल.
Asked to दे a संदेश to the people, he would respond, `` My life is my message. ''
जोन Crawford ( March 23, ca. 1904 – may 10, 1977 ), born Lucille Fay lesueur, was an American actress in film, टेलीविज़न और theatre.
starting as a dancer in traveling theatrical companies before debuting on Broadway, Crawford was हस्ताक्षरित to a motion चित्र अनुबंध by Metro-Goldwyn-Mayer in 1925.
Initially कुंठित by the size and quality of her parts, Crawford began a campaign of self-publicity and became nationally ज्ञात as a flapper by the end of the 1920s.
In the 1930s, क्रॉफर्ड 's कीर्ति rivaled, and later outlasted, mgm colleagues Norma Shearer and Greta garbo.
Crawford often played hardworking young women who ढूँढें रोमांस and financial कामयाबी.
These `` rags-to-riches '' कहानियां यहूद well received by Depression -era ऑडियंस and were popular साथ women.
Crawford became एक of Hollywood 's most prominent movie stars और one of the उच्चतम सशुल्क women in the संयुक्त राज्य, but उसके films began losing धन और by the समाप्त of the 1930s वो was labeled `` बक्सा office ज़हर ''.
After an absence of nearly दो सालो from the स्क्रीन, Crawford staged a वापसी by starring in मिल्ड्रेड पियर्स ( 1945 ), for जिससे वो won the अकादमी Award लिये Best अभिनेत्री.
In 1955, वो became involved साथ the Pepsi-Cola Company through her marriage to कम्पनी अध्यक्ष Alfred Steele.
After his death in 1959, Crawford was elected to fill उसके vacancy on the फलक of निर्देशकों but थी forcibly retired in 1973.
वो continued एक्टिंग in फिल्मी and television regularly through the 1960s, when her performances became कम ; after the रिलीज of the अंग्रेजों हॉरर फिल्मी trog in 1970, Crawford रिटायर्ड इससे the screen.
Following a public रूप in 1974, after which unflattering छायाचित्र were published, क्रॉफर्ड withdrew इससे पब्लिक life and became increasingly reclusive until उसके death in 1977.
Crawford शादीशुदा four times.
Her पहला three विवाह ended in divorce ; the last ended साथ the मौत of husband अल्फ्रेड स्टील.
वो अपनाया पाँच children, एक of whom was reclaimed by उसके birth mother.
क्रॉफर्ड 's relationships with her two older children, Christina and Christopher, यहूद acrimonious.
Crawford disinherited the दो और, बाद क्रॉफर्ड 's death, Christina wrote a `` tell-all '' संस्मरण, mommie dearest, in which वो alleged a lifelong पैटर्न of physical and emotional गाली perpetrated by Crawford.
She थी voted the tenth महानतम मादा star in the इतिहास of अमरीकी cinema by the अमरीकी फिल्मी Institute.

Tonneau cover ( or ) describes a मुश्किल or नरम cover used to protect unoccupied passenger सीटे in a convertible or roadster, or the कार्गो bed in a pickup truck.
Hard tonneau covers खोलें by a hinging or फोल्डिंग यांत्रिकी while नरम covers open by रोलिंग up.
The tonneau कवर is प्रयुक्त to conceal cargo.
When the कवर is pulled आउट, it keeps items आउट of the sun और provides अतिरिक्त security by keeping personal items आउट of sight, as खूब as shielding the driver इससे दृश्य.
Twitter is an ऑनलाइन social networking service और microblogging service कि enables its उपयोक्ता to send और read text-based messages of up to 140 characters, ज्ञात as `` tweets ''.
ट्विटर was created in March 2006 by Jack Dorsey and by July, the social networking site was launched.
The service rapidly gained विश्वव्यापी popularity, with over 500 लाख registered उपयोक्ता as of 2012, generating over 340 लाख tweets daily and हैंडलिंग over 1.6 अरब search प्रश्नों प्रति दिन.
Since इसके लॉन्च, Twitter रै become एक of the टेन most visited websites on the Internet, and has been वर्णित as `` the SMS of the अंतरजाल. ''
Unregistered users can read tweets, जबकि पंजीकृत उपयोक्ता can post tweets through the website इंटरफ़ेस, sms, or a दायरा of apps for mobile devices.
ट्विटर Inc. is based in San Francisco, साथ additional servers and offices in New यॉर्क City, Boston, और सैन अंतोनियो.
the Hangover is a 2009 American comedy film, co-produced and directed by Todd Phillips और written by jon Lucas and Scott मूर.
It is the first फिल्मी of The Hangover franchise.The फिल्मी सितारों Bradley Cooper, Ed Helms, Zach Galifianakis, Heather Graham, जस्टिन bartha, and जेफरी Tambor.
The Hangover tells the story of फिल Wenneck, stu Price और Alan गार्नर, जो सफर to लास Vegas लिये a स्नातक party to celebrate उनके dost Doug Billings ' impending marriage.
However, Phil, Stu and Alan have no मेमोरी of the पिछला रात्रि 's कार्यक्रम and must find डग before the विवाह can take place.
Lucas और Moore wrote the script after कार्यपालिका निर्माता Chris bender 's friend disappeared और था a विशाल bill after being भेजा to a strip क्लबों.
After लुकास and मूर sold it to the studio for $ 2 million, Philips और जेरेमी garelick rewrote the स्क्रिप्ट to शामिल a tiger as well as a subplot involving a baby and a पुलिस cruiser, और भी सहित boxer Mike टायसन.
फिल्मांकन took place in नेवाडा for 15 दिनों, and during फिल्मांकन, the तीन प्रमुख अभिनेताओं ( Cooper, helms और Galifianakis ) formed a friendship.
the hangover was released on June 5, 2009, becoming a critical and commercial success.
It became the tenth-highest-grossing फिल्मी of 2009, साथ a worldwide सकल of over US $ 467 लाख.
आलोचकों praised the फिल्मी 's comedic approach लकिन criticized it लिये इसके vulgarity.
the फिल्मी जीती the Golden Globe Award for बेहतरीन Motion चित्र – musical or Comedy, and received अनेक other accolades.
it is the tenth-highest-grossing film of 2009 in the world, as well as the दूसरी highest-grossing R-rated comedy कभी in the संयुक्त States, surpassing a रिकार्ड previously held by बेवर्ली Hills cop लिये almost 25 years और later being surpassed by Ted in 2012.
आउट of all r-rated films, it is the third highest-grossing ever in the u.S., पीछे तभी the Passion of the Christ और the Matrix Reloaded.
a sequel, The hangover Part II, थी released in 2011, and a third and final फिल्मी, The Hangover भाग III, is set for release in 2013.
Events involving meiosis, showing chromosomal crossover
Meiosis ( ) is a special प्रकार of कोशिका division जरुरी लिये यौन reproduction in eukaryotes.
The cells produced by meiosis हैं गैमीट or spores.
In अनेक जीवों, including all animals और land plants ( लकिन नहीं कुछ other groups such as fungi ), gametes are पुकारा शुक्राणु and egg कोशिकाएं.
whilst the प्रक्रम of meiosis bears a number of similarities साथ the 'life-cycle ' cell division process of mitosis, it differs in two important आदरs:
the chromosomes in meiosis undergo a recombination जिससे shuffles the genes producing a different genetic combination in प्रत्येक gamete, compared with the co-existence of प्रत्येक of the two separate pairs of each chromosome ( one received इससे each parent ) in प्रत्येक कोशिका जिससे परिणाम from mitosis.
the outcome of meiosis is potentially चार ( genetically unique ) haploid cells, compared with the two ( genetically identical ) diploid cells produced इससे mitosis.
Meiosis begins साथ एक diploid cell containing दो नक़ल of each chromosome —one from the organism 's mother and एक from its father.
the cell divides twice, potentially producing up to चार अगुणित cells containing one copy of each chromosome.
( `` potentially '' because in कुछ cases, such as the गठन of oocytes in स्तनधारियों, तभी one of the possible four अगुणित cells survives. )
in animals the अगुणित कोशिका resulting from meiosis is a male or मादा gamete.
Each of the resulting chromosomes in the gamete कोशिकाएं is a unique mixture of मातृ और paternal डीएनए, resulting in offspring that are genetically पृथक from either parent.
This देता rise to genetic diversity in sexually reproducing populations.
This genetic diversity can provide the विभिन्नता of शारीरिक और behavioural attributes ( phenotypes ) upon जिससे natural selection can act, but, as वर्णित below in खण्ड 6, उत्पत्ति and फलन of meiosis, the जेनेटिक diversity may be largely a by-product of the homologous recombination that is primarily employed for इसके डीएनए repair फलन during meiosis.
It is also noteworthy कि दौरान meiosis, specific जीनों हैं more highly transcribed, और ये हैं called the meiome, the term प्रयुक्त in कार्यात्मक जीनोमिक्स for the meiotic transcriptome.
Meiosis is a कुंजी विशेषता for सब sexually reproducing eukaryotes in जिससे homologous chromosome pairing, synapse and recombination occur.
in addition to strong meiotic stage-specific expression of mrna ( the meiome ), however, there are also pervasive translational controls ( e.g. selective usage of preformed mrna ), regulating the ultimate meiotic stage-specific protein अभिव्यक्ति of जीनों during meiosis.
Thus, दोनो the meiome and translational नियंत्रण determine the broad restructuring of meiotic cells needed to carry out meiosis.
Prior to the meiosis प्रक्रम the cell 's chromosomes are duplicated by a round of डीएनए replication, creating from the मातृ और पैतृक संस्करण of प्रत्येक chromosome ( homologs ) two सटीक copies, sister chromatids, संलग्न at the centromere प्रदेश.
In the beginning of meiosis the maternal and paternal homologs pair to each other.
Then they typically एक्सचेंज भाग by homologous recombination अग्रणी to crossovers of DNA between the maternal और paternal versions of the chromosome.
spindle मछली bind to the centromeres of each pair of homologs and arrange the pairs at the spindle equator.
तब the fibers खींचो the recombined homologs to opposite डंडे of the कोशिका.
As the chromosomes move away from the center the cell divides into two बेटी कोशिकाएं, each containing a haploid number of गुणसूत्रों composed of दो chromatids.
After the recombined maternal और paternal homologs have separated into the दो बेटी कोशिकाएं, a second round of कोशिका division occurs.
वहीँ meiosis ends as the दो सिस्टर chromatids बनाना up each homolog are separated और मूव into one of the चार resulting gamete कोशिकाएं.
Upon fertilization, for उदाहरण when a शुक्राणु enters an अंडा cell, दो gamete cells उत्पादित by meiosis फ्यूज.
the gamete from the mother and the gamete from the पिता each contribute one हाफ of the नियत of chromosomes that make up the नई offspring 's genome.
Meiosis uses many of the same mechanisms as समसूत्रण, a type of cell division used by eukaryotes जैसे plants और animals to विभाजित one कोशिका into दो identical बेटी कोशिकाएं.
In सब plants and in many protists meiosis results in the गठन of spores : अगुणित cells that can divide vegetatively without undergoing fertilization.
मुक्केबाज़ी ( pugilism, पुरस्कार लड़, the sweet विज्ञान or in Greek pygmachia ) is a martial आर्ट और कॉम्बैट sport in which दो लोगों engage in a contest of strength, गति, reflexes, endurance and will by फेंकना punches with gloved हैंड्स.
Amateur boxing is an ओलम्पिक और Commonwealth खेल and is a common fixture in most of the प्रमुख international खेल - it भी has its अपना World Championships.
Boxing is supervised by a रेफरी over a series of one- to three-minute intervals called rounds.
the परिणाम is decided when an opponent is deemed incapable to continue by a रेफरी, is disqualified लिये breaking a rule, resigns by throwing in a तौलिया, or is सुनाया the winner or loser based on the न्यायाधीशों ' scorecards at the end of the प्रतियोगिता.
The जनम hour of boxing as a खेल may be इसके स्वीकृति by the ancient यूनानियों as an ओलम्पिक खेल as जल्दी as 688 bc.
Boxing विकसित from 16th- और 18th-century prizefights, largely in Great ब्रिटेन, to the forerunner of modern मुक्केबाज़ी in the mid-19th century, again initially in Great ब्रिटेन and later in the United राज्य.
In 2004, ESPN ranked मुक्केबाज़ी as the most मुश्किल sport in the संसार.
अनुबंध or concord happens when a word परिवर्तन form depending on the अन्य words to जिससे it relates.
it is an उदाहरण of inflection, and usually involves making the मान of some grammatical श्रेणी ( ऐसे as लिंग or person ) `` सहमत '' between different शब्द or भाग of the वाक्य.
लिये example, in Standard English, one may कह I am or he is, but नहीं `` I is '' or `` he am ''.
This is because the व्याकरण of the language requires कि the verb और its subject सहमत in व्यक्ति.
The pronouns i and he are first and third व्यक्ति respectively, as are the verb फ़ॉर्म am and is.
the verb form must be चयनित so कि it has the same person as the विषय.
the agreement आधारित on overt grammatical श्रेणी as ऊपर is formal agreement, in contrast to notional agreement, which is based on meaning.
For instance, the phrase the United States is treated as singular लिये उद्देश्य of agreement, even हालांकि it is formally plural.
इस is a list of places below औसत समुद्र level कि are on land.
Places in tunnels, mines, basements, खोदा holes ( also साथ खोलें sky ), under जल, अंतर्गत ice, or existing temporarily as a परिणाम of ebbing of sea tide इत्यादि. are not included.
All आंकड़े are in meters below sea level:
Debbie macomber ( born October 22, 1948 in Yakima, Washington ) is a best-selling अमरीकी लेखक of over 150 रोमांस novels and समकालीन women 's fiction.
Over 140 million copies of her books are in छपाई throughout the world, and four have become made-for-tv-movies.
macomber was the inaugural winner of the fan-voted Quill Award for romance in 2005 and has महरूम awarded both a रोमांस Writers of अमेरिका RITA and a lifetime उपलब्धि पुरस्कार by the Romance लेखक of अमेरिका.
catonsville is a census-designated place ( CDP ) in Baltimore County, मेरीलैंड, United States.
The population was 41,567 at the 2010 census.
the जातियाँ lies to the west of Baltimore along the नगर 's किनारा.
Catonsville is the घर of the विश्वविद्यालयों of Maryland, बाल्टीमोर County ( umbc ), a पब्लिक research विश्वविद्यालयों with over 12,000 students.
a वकील, according to ब्लैक 's Law शब्दकोष, is `` a व्यक्ति learned in the law ; as an attorney, counsel or solicitor ; a person who is practicing विधि. ''
Law is the प्रणाली of rules of conduct स्थापित by the sovereign government of a समाज to सही wrongs, maintain the stability of political और सोशल प्राधिकार, and उद्धार justice.
working as a lawyer involves the व्यावहारिक application of अमूर्त विधिक theories and knowledge to solve specific individualized problems, or to advance the interests of those who retain ( i.e., hire ) वकील to perform विधिक सेवाएं.
The role of the lawyer varies significantly across विधिक jurisdictions, and so it can be treated यहाँ in only the सबसे general terms.
Vector विपणन is the domestic बिक्री arm of Cutco Corporation, an olean, New York based cutlery manufacturer.
The परिवार और Medical Leave अधिनियम of 1993 ( FMLA ) is a संयुक्त States federal विधि requiring covered employers to provide कर्मचारी job-protected और unpaid छोड़ for योग्य medical and family reasons.
Qualified medical and परिवार reasons include : निजी or परिवार बीमारी, family military छोड़, गर्भावस्था, adoption, or the फोस्टर care अवस्थिति of a child.
The fmla is administered by the मजदूरी and Hour प्रभाग of the United States विभाग of मजदूर.
The विधेयक थी a major भाग of President Bill Clinton 's agenda in उसके first term.
President Clinton हस्ताक्षरित the विधेयक into law on फ़रवरी 5, 1993 ( ; 29 U.S.C. sec. 2601 ; 29 CFR 825 ) and it took effect on August 5, 1993, छह months later.
The fmla was intended `` to balance the demands of the workplace साथ the needs of families. ''
The अधिनियम allows योग्य कर्मचारी to लो up to 12 कार्य weeks of unpaid छोड़ दौरान कोई 12-month काल to attend to the serious health कंडीशन of the employee, जनक, spouse or child, or लिये pregnancy or परवाह of a newborn child, or for अपनाना or फोस्टर care of a child.
In order to be eligible लिये FMLA छोड़, an कर्मचारी जरूर have महरूम at the business at least 12 महीने, and worked at तनिक 1,250 hours over the past 12 महीने, and work at a स्थान जहाँ the company employs 50 or अधिक कर्मचारी भीतर 75 miles.
the FMLA कवर both public- और private-sector कर्मचारी, but निश्चित categories of employees are excluded, सहित निर्वाचित officials और उनके personal स्टाफ members.
The Vietnam War ( ) थी a Cold War -era सैन्य conflict that occurred in Vietnam, Laos, and कंबोडिया from 1 नवम्बर 1955 to the fall of Saigon on 30 April 1975.
इस युद्ध followed the पहला Indochina War और was fought between North वियतनाम, समर्थित by its communist allies, और the सरकारी of South वियतनाम, supported by the United States and other anti-communist countries.
The Viet Cong ( also known as the नेशनल मुक्ति Front, or NLF ), a हलके armed दक्षिण Vietnamese communist common front directed by the North, largely लड़ा a छापामार war against anti-communist forces in the region.
The Vietnam लोगों 's Army ( उत्तर Vietnamese Army ) सगाई in a अधिक conventional war, at टाइम्स committing large इकाई into battle.
U.S. और South Vietnamese forces relied on air बड़प्पन and overwhelming firepower to conduct search और destroy operations, involving ground शक्तियां, तोपखाने, and airstrikes.
The U.S. सरकारी viewed involvement in the युद्ध as a रास्ता to prevent a कम्युनिस्ट takeover of South Vietnam as part of their wider strategy of containment.
The उत्तर Vietnamese सरकारी and viet Cong were लड़ to reunify Vietnam अंतर्गत communist rule.
They viewed the विरोध as a colonial युद्ध, लड़ा initially against फ़्रांस, backed by the U.S., और बाद against दक्षिण वियतनाम, which it regarded as a U.S. puppet state.
American military advisors arrived in कया was then फ्रेंच Indochina शुरूआत in 1950.
U.S. भागीदारी escalated in the जल्दी 1960s, साथ troop स्तर tripling in 1961 and tripling again in 1962.
U.S. combat units were deployed beginning in 1965.
Operations spanned अंतरराष्ट्रीय borders, with लाओस and Cambodia heavily bombed.
American involvement in the युद्ध peaked in 1968, at the समय of the Tet अप्रिय.
After this, U.S. ground forces यहूद gradually withdrawn as part of a policy ज्ञात as vietnamization.
despite the पेरिस Peace Accords, signed by सब parties in January 1973, fighting जारी.
u.S. सैन्य involvement ended on 15 August 1973 as a परिणाम of the case–church Amendment passed by the U.S. Congress.
the capture of Saigon by the वियतनाम लोगों 's Army in April 1975 marked the end of the war, and North and South वियतनाम were reunified the following साल.
The युद्ध exacted a huge human cost in terms of fatalities ( see Vietnam War casualties ).
Estimates of the क्रमांक of वियतनामी soldiers and नागरिकों killed vary from 800,000 to 3.1 million.
Some 200,000–300,000 Cambodians, 20,000–200,000 laotians, और 58,220 u.S. service members also died in the विरोध.
क्लीवलैंड ज्वालामुखी in the Aleutian Islands of अलास्का photographed from the International Space Station, May 2006.
Ash plumes पहुँचे a height of 19 km during the climactic फटना at Mount Pinatubo, Philippines in 1991.
A volcano is an खोलने, or rupture, in a ग्रह 's सतह or crust, जिससे allows hot magma, volcanic ash and गैसों to escape from the मैग्मा कक्ष below the सतह.
Volcanoes are generally found जहाँ tectonic प्लेटों are diverging or converging.
a mid-oceanic ridge, for उदाहरण the mid-atlantic लकीरें, has examples of ज्वालामुखी caused by अपसारी tectonic प्लेटों pulling apart ; the Pacific रिंग of आग has उदाहरण of volcanoes caused by अभिसारी tectonic plates coming together.
by contrast, ज्वालामुखी are प्रायः नहीं created जहाँ two tectonic प्लेटों slide past one another.
ज्वालामुखी can भी form where there is stretching and thinning of the Earth 's crust in the इंटीरियर्स of plates, e.g., in the East African दरार, the कुएं Gray-Clearwater volcanic field और the रिओ Grande Rift in उत्तर अमेरिका.
इस type of volcanism जलप्रपात under the umbrella of `` Plate परिकल्पना '' volcanism.
volcanism away from plate boundaries रै also महरूम explained as mantle plumes.
ये so-called `` हॉटस्पॉट ``, for example हवाई, हैं postulated to arise from upwelling diapirs with मैग्मा from the core–mantle boundary, 3,000 km deep in the Earth.
erupting ज्वालामुखी can pose अनेक hazards, नहीं only in the immediate vicinity of the eruption.
volcanic ash can be a threat to aircraft, in particular those with jet इंजन जहाँ राख अणु can be melted by the ऊँची operating तापमान.
Large eruptions can affect temperature as राख और droplets of sulfuric acid obscure the sun और cool the धरती 's lower माहौल or क्षोभमण्डल ; however, they also absorb heat radiated up from the Earth, thereby warming the stratosphere.
historically, so-called volcanic winters have caused catastrophic famines.

a pothole ( sometimes पुकारा a केतली and known in parts of the Western संयुक्त राज्य as a chuckhole ) is a type of disruption in the सतह of a roadway जहाँ a portion of the सड़क सामग्री रै टूटा away, leaving a hole.
renal कोशिका carcinoma ( RCC, also known as hypernephroma ) is a गुर्दा cancer that originates in the lining of the proximal convoluted tubule, the very छोटी tubes in the kidney that transport gf ( glomerular filtrate ) from the glomerulus to the descending limb of the nephron.
rcc is the सबसे common प्रकार of गुर्दा कर्कट in adults, जिम्मेदार लिये approximately 80 % of मामले.
It is also known to be the most lethal of सब the genitourinary tumors.
Initial उपचार is सबसे commonly a कट्टरपंथी or partial nephrectomy और remains the mainstay of curative उपचार.
Where the tumor is confined to the renal parenchyma, the 5-year survival रेट is 60-70 %, but इस is lowered considerably जहाँ metastases have स्प्रेड.
It is अपेक्षाकृत resistant to विकिरण चिकित्सा और chemotherapy, हालांकि कुछ मामले respond to immunotherapy.
targeted cancer therapies ऐसे as sunitinib, temsirolimus, bevacizumab, interferon-alpha, और sorafenib have improved the outlook लिये RCC.

the company रै its headquarters in midtown मैनहटन, New यॉर्क City.
The peritoneum ( ) is the serous झिल्ली कि फ़ॉर्म the lining of the abdominal गुहा or the coelom —it covers सबसे of the intra-abdominal ( or coelomic ) organs—in amniotes and कुछ invertebrates ( annelids, लिये instance ).
It is composed of a परत of mesothelium supported by a पतला layer of connective tissue.
The peritoneum both supports the abdominal अंगों और serves as a conduit for their blood और लसीका बरतन और nerves.
The abdominal गुहा ( the space bounded by the vertebrae, abdominal muscles, diaphragm and श्रोणि floor ) should नहीं be confused with the intraperitoneal स्पेस ( स्तिथ भीतर the abdominal cavity, लकिन wrapped in peritoneum ).
The structures within the intraperitoneal space हैं called `` intraperitoneal '' ( e.g. the पेट ), the structures in the abdominal cavity that are located पीछे the intraperitoneal space हैं called `` retroperitoneal `` ( e.g. the kidneys ), और those structures नीचे the intraperitoneal स्पेस हैं पुकारा `` subperitoneal '' or `` infraperitoneal '' ( e.g. the bladder ).

A solid-state ड्राइव ( ssd ) ( भी known as a solid-state डिस्क or electronic disk, हालांकि it contains no actual `` disk '' of कोई kind ) is a आंकड़ा भंडार device using integrated सर्किट सभाओं as memory to store data persistently.
SSD प्रौद्योगिकी uses इलेक्ट्रॉनिक interfaces संगत with traditional block input/output ( I/O ) hard disk drives.
SSDs have no moving mechanical components, जिससे distinguish उन्हें from traditional electromechanical चुम्बकीय disks ऐसे as hard disk ड्राइव ( HDDs ) or floppy disks, which contain spinning disks and movable read/write heads.
compared साथ electromechanical disks, SSDs हैं typically less susceptible to physical shock, much quieter, have lower access time, and कम latency.
However, while the price of SSDs has continued to decline in 2012, SSDs हैं स्टिल about 7 to 8 times more महंगी प्रति unit of storage than hdds.
Many SSDs use I/O अंतरफलक विकसित लिये hard disk drives, thus permitting simple replacement in आम applications.
, most ssds use nand-based फ्लैश memory, जिससे retains data without शक्ति.
For applications requiring fast access, but नहीं necessarily data persistence after शक्ति loss, ssds may be constructed इससे random-access मेमोरी ( RAM ).
ऐसे devices may employ पृथक power sources, such as बैटरी, to maintain data after power loss.
Hybrid drives or solid राज्य संकर ड्राइव ( SSHD ) combine the सुविधाएँ of SSDs and hdds in the same unit, containing a विशाल मुश्किल डिस्क drive और an SSD संचय to improve प्रदर्शन of अक्सर accessed आंकड़ा.
These devices may प्रस्ताव near-SSD प्रदर्शन for अनेक applications.
