Caviar, according to the Food and Agriculture Organization, is a product बना इससे salt-cured fish-eggs of the Acipenseridae परिवार.
the roe can be `` भैस '' ( non-pasteurized ) or pasteurized, साथ pasteurization reducing its culinary और economic value.
traditionally the term caviar refers only to roe from wild sturgeon in the Caspian और Black Seas ( Beluga, Ossetra और Sevruga caviars ).
Depending on the country, caviar may also be used to describe the roe of अन्य मछली ऐसे as सामन, steelhead, trout, lumpfish, whitefish, and other species of sturgeon.
caviar is considered a luxury delicacy and is eaten as a garnish or a spread.
in 2012, caviar sold for $ 2,500 प्रति pound, or $ 3,000 to $ 5,500 per kilo.
the SEC संजाल is a television अनुप्रयोग network featuring live broadcasts of college football and बास्केट events इससे the Southeastern Conference.
It is स्वामित्व and operated by ईएसपीएन प्लस and is दिखाया in more than 50 percent of households in the United States, mostly Southeastern United States markets.
The सेक Network typically airs in the नून पूर्वी slot that थी former घर to the Raycom Sports SEC खेल of the week.
Games are दिखाया locally on ब्रॉडकास्ट stations, regional खेल networks, as well as on ईएसपीएन GamePlan, ईएसपीएन पूरा अदालत, and ESPN3.com.
the सेक Network is भी उपलब्धियाँ in कनाडा via Atlanta 's WPCH-TV.
the SEC संजाल uses the वही on-screen ग्राफिक्स फिलहाल प्रयुक्त by ईएसपीएन on ABC, a version of ESPN 's ग्राफिक्स package.
सेक Network 's फ़ुटबॉल programming स्टिल uses a title सुरक्षित क्षेत्रफल क्युकी most of its affiliates do नहीं Letterbox their मानक Definition feeds, while ESPN 's television संजाल have allowed their graphics to लापरवाही the शीर्षक सुरक्षित, लकिन letterbox लिये SD दर्शक.
Starting with the SEC 2012 Basketball season, SEC Network 's ग्राफिक्स have been परिवर्तित to a 16:9 widescreen-only format.
This is also होने used लिये the 2013 बास्केट ऋतु, but had still adapted the former 4:3-safe ग्राफिक्स format for the 2012 SEC football season.
the 1990s, सुनाया and also known as `` the nineteen-nineties '' or abbreviated as `` the nineties '' or `` the '90s '', was a decade कि began on January 1, 1990, और ended on December 31, 1999.
it थी the 10th और पिछला दशक of the 20th century and the 100th और पिछला दशक of the 2nd millennium.
The decade is best known for the end of the Cold War at the beginning of the decade और the expansion and व्यावसायीकरण of the Internet during the second half of the decade.
In much of the West the 1990s is remembered as a काल of unprecedented peace और समृद्धि, though अनेक parts of the so-called Third World faced विभिन्न problems सहित नरसंहार, AIDS and new or continuing जातीय tensions and civil युद्धों.
Culturally बोलना the decade थी characterized by the rise of multiculturalism and alternative media.
Movements such as grunge, the रेव scene and हिप hop spread around the संसार to young people during the decade, aided by then-new technology ऐसे as केबल television और the Internet.
a संयोजन of कारकों, सहित the द्रव्यमान mobilization of capital बाज़ार through neoliberalism, the beginning of the widespread अप्रसार of new media ऐसे as the Internet, and the dissolution of the Soviet Union led to a realignment और reconsolidation of economic और political power आरपार the world, and within countries.
आय असमानता among देशों in the संसार rose sharply between the 1980s और the mid-1990s, पहले levelling off and तब गिरना after 2000.
नई जातीय विरोध उभरा in Africa, the Balkans and the काकेशस, the former दो which led to the Rwandan genocide and बोस्नियाई genocide, respectively.
The United राज्य began its current military occupation of the Middle East during the गर्मियाँ of 1990 with Desert Shield after it cut off a विशाल portion of the world 's petroleum supply.
Signs of any resolution of tensions between Israel और the Arab संसार remained elusive, though the आयरिश परेशानियों आए to a standstill in 1998 with the शुभ शुक्रवार अनुबंध after 30 years of violence.
the धूसर wolf or grey wolf ( Canis lupus ) is a species of canid native to the wilderness और remote क्षेत्रों of North America, Eurasia, और उत्तर अफ़्रीकी.
It is the largest सदस्य of इसके family, with males averaging, और महिलाओं.
It is similar in सामान्य रूप और proportions to a German shepherd, or sled dog, but has a larger head, narrower chest, longer टाँगे, straighter tail and बडे paws.
इसके winter fur is long और bushy, and predominantly a mottled gray in colour, although nearly pure white, रेड, or brown to black also occur.
Within the genus Canis, the gray wolf represents a अधिक specialised और progressive form than इसके छोटी cousins ( the कायोटी और सुनहरी jackal ), as demonstrated by its morphological adaptations to शिकार विशाल prey, its more gregarious nature and its highly उन्नत expressive behavior.
It is a सोशल animal, यात्राएं in नाभिकीय परिवारों consisting of a पन्द्रहवें pair, accompanied by the जोड़ी 's adult offspring.
the gray भेड़िया is typically an apex परभक्षी throughout its range, with तभी humans and tigers पोज़ a गंभीर threat to it.
it feeds primarily on large ungulates, though it also eats smaller पशु, livestock, carrion, and garbage.
The gray wolf is एक of the world 's सबसे well शोधकार्य पशु, साथ संभवतः more किताबे लिखा about it than any other वन्यजीव प्रजाति.
it has a long history of संघ साथ इंसानो, having महरूम despised and hunted in most agricultural communities due to इसके attacks on livestock, जबकि conversely being respected by कुछ Native American tribes.
It is the sole पूर्वज of the dog, जिससे was first domesticated in the Middle ईस्ट.
हालांकि the fear of wolves is prevalent in अनेक human societies, the majority of अंकित attacks on people have been attributed to पशु suffering from rabies.
Non-rabid wolves have attacked और मारे people, mainly children, लकिन this is असामान्य, as भेड़ियों are relatively few, live दूर from लोगों, और have been सिखाया to भय humans by hunters और गड़रिये.
शिकार and trapping has reduced the प्रजाति ' range to, though its still अपेक्षाकृत widespread range and stable population अर्थात् that the प्रजाति is not threatened at a global level, and is therefore classified by the आईयूसीएन as Least Concern.
The रोमन साम्राज्य ( ) थी the post- Republican काल of the ancient रोमन civilization, characterised by an autocratic form of government and विशाल territorial holdings around the Mediterranean in यूरोपीय, अफ़्रीकी, and Asia.
The 500-year-old Roman Republic, जिससे preceded it, had been destabilized through a श्रेणी of civil युद्धों.
अनेक कार्यक्रम marked the transition from Republic to साम्राज्य, including Julius Caesar 's appointment as perpetual तानाशाह ( 44 BC ) ; the Battle of Actium ( 31 bc ) ; and the granting of the honorific Augustus to Octavian by the रोमन Senate ( 27 bc ).
the पहला two centuries of the साम्राज्य यहूद a period of unprecedented स्थिरता and समृद्धि ज्ञात as the Pax romana ( `` रोमन सलाम '' ).
It reached its महानतम expanse during the शासनकाल of त्राजान ( 98–117 AD ).
in the 3rd सदी, the साम्राज्य underwent a crisis कि threatened इसके अस्तित्व, but was reunified and stabilized under the emperors Aurelian and Diocletian.
ईसाइयों rose to शक्ति in the 4th सदी, during जिससे time a प्रणाली of डुअल rule was विकसित in the Latin वेस्ट and Greek East.
After the collapse of सेंट्रल government in the West in the 5th century, the पूर्वी हाफ continued as what would बाद be ज्ञात as the Byzantine Empire.
Because of the Empire 's vast extent and long सहनशीलता, the संस्थानों और culture of Rome था a profound and lasting influence on the development of भाषा, religion, architecture, philosophy, विधि, and फ़ॉर्म of सरकारी in the territory it governed, particularly यूरोपीय, and by means of European expansionism throughout the modern world.
शिक्षा in the United States is mainly provided by the पब्लिक sector, साथ control and funding coming from तीन levels : लोकल, state, और federal, in कि order.
चाइल्ड education is अनिवार्य, and there are भी a विशाल number and wide किस्में of उच्चतर education संस्थानों throughout the country that एक can choose to attend, both publicly और privately administered.
Public education is universally available.
School curricula, funding, शिक्षण, नियुक्ति, और अन्य नीतियों are set through locally निर्वाचित school फलक साथ jurisdiction over स्कूल जिले साथ many directives इससे state legislatures.
स्कूल जिले हैं प्रायः पृथक इससे other लोकल jurisdictions, with independent officials और budgets.
Educational मानकों and standardized testing decisions हैं प्रायः बना by state governments.
The ages लिये अनिवार्य education vary by राज्य.
It begins from आयु five to eight and ends इससे आयु fourteen to अठारह.
Compulsory education आवश्यकताएँ can generally be satisfied by educating children in पब्लिक schools, state-certified private schools, or an approved home school कार्यक्रम.
In most public and निजी schools, शिक्षा is विभाजित into three स्तर : elementary स्कूल, middle school ( sometimes called junior high स्कूल ), और ऊँची school ( sometimes referred to as secondary शिक्षा ).
In लगभग सब स्कूलों at ये levels, children are divided by आयु groups into ग्रेड, ranging इससे kindergarten ( followed by पहला grade ) लिये the youngest children in elementary school, up to बारहवीं grade, the फाइनल साल of ऊँची school.
the exact age range of students in these ग्रेड levels varies थोड़ा इससे area to क्षेत्रफल.
post-secondary education, बेहतर ज्ञात as `` college `` in the संयुक्त States, is generally governed separately इससे the elementary and high स्कूल प्रणाली, और is वर्णित in a पृथक section नीचे.
Government supported, free पब्लिक schools for all प्रारंभ being स्थापित after the revolution, and expanded in the 19th century, as the परिणाम of प्रयत्न of मेन जैसे Horace Mann and बुकर T. Washington.
By 1870, all राज्य था फ़्री elementary स्कूलों, albeit तभी in urban centers.
as the 20th century drew nearer, राज्य started passing कानून to मेक schooling compulsory, और by 1910, 72 प्रतिशत of children attended school.
निजी स्कूलों जारी to स्प्रेड during this time, as खूब as colleges and—in the rural centers— land grant colleges.
The साल of 1910 also देखी the first सच्चा high schools.
During the बाकी of the 20th सदी, शैक्षणिक प्रयत्न केन्द्रित on reducing the inequality of the schooling system.
The लैंडमार्क परम् अदालत case भूरा v. Board of शिक्षा made the desegregation of elementary and high स्कूलों a नेशनल प्रधानता, जबकि the Pell Grant कार्यक्रम helped ग़रीब minorities लाभ access to college.
खास शिक्षा थी made into संघीय law in 1975.
the elementary and द्वितीयक Education अधिनियम of 1965 made मानकीकृत testing a requirement, and in 1983, a commission was established to evaluate उनके परिणाम and propose a course of कार्रवाई.
the resulting No चाइल्ड बाएँ पीछे Act of 2001 was विवादास्पद and इसके goals proved to be unrealistic.
a आयोग स्थापित in 2006 evaluated higher education, लकिन its recommendations have yet to be fully implemented.
पॉल ब्रैग ( February 6, 1895 – दिसम्बर 7, 1976 ), nutritionist, थी a पायोनियर in america’s तंदुरुस्ती movement.
Health बिता प्रति capita, in $ us PPP-adjusted, साथ the us and Canada compared amongst अन्य first संसार nations.
Comparison of the स्वास्थ्य care प्रणालियों in Canada and the United राज्य हैं often made by government, public स्वास्थ्य and पब्लिक policy विश्लेषकों.
the दो देशों had similar स्वास्थ्य परवाह systems before कनाडा reformed its system in the 1960s और 1970s.
The United States खर्च much अधिक money on स्वास्थ्य care than कनाडा, on दोनो a per-capita basis and as a percentage of GDP.
in 2006, per-capita spending for health परवाह in Canada was US $ 3,678 ; in the U.S., US $ 6,714.
the U.S. खर्च 15.3 % of GDP on स्वास्थ्य परवाह in that साल ; कनाडा spent 10.0 %.
in 2006, 70 % of स्वास्थ्य care spending in कनाडा थी financed by government, versus 46 % in the United राज्य.
कुल सरकारी spending per capita in the u.S. on health care थी 23 % उच्चतर than Canadian government spending, and u.S. सरकारी expenditure on health care थी बस अंतर्गत 83 % of total Canadian बिता ( public और private ) though ये statistics do n't लो into account population differences.
अध्ययन have come to different conclusions परिचय the result of this disparity in बिता.
a 2007 review of सब अध्ययन comparing health outcomes in Canada and the us in a कनाडाई peer-reviewed medical journal found कि `` health outcomes may be superior in patients cared लिये in Canada बनाम the संयुक्त States, but differences हैं not सतत. ''
जीवन प्रत्याशा is longer in कनाडा, और its infant मृत्यु rate is lower than कि of the U.S., लकिन there is बहस परिचय the underlying causes of these मतभेद.
One commonly cited comparison, the 2000 World स्वास्थ्य संगठन 's ratings of `` overall स्वास्थ्य service performance '', जिससे प्रयुक्त a `` composite माप of achievement in the level of health, the वितरण of health, the level of responsiveness और fairness of financial योगदान '', क्रमित कनाडा 30th और the US 37th among 191 member nations.
This study रेटेड the us `` responsiveness '', or विशेषता of service for individuals receiving उपचार, as 1st, compared with 7th लिये कनाडा.
While the average life प्रत्याशा for Canadians was 80.34 years compared with 78.6 years for निवासियों of the us, बस comparing the जीवन expectancy of two groups with different racial makeup और different मोटापा rates is संभावित not an effective रास्ता of determining जिससे healthcare system is श्रेष्ठ.
the जो 's study methods यहूद criticized by कुछ analyses.
हालांकि वहीँ is a माप of consensus कि life-expectancy and infant mortality mark the सबसे reliable ways to compare nation-wide health परवाह, assuming the population makeup is समान, a recent रपट by the Congressional शोध Service carefully summarizes कुछ हाल आंकड़ा and टीप the `` मुश्किल शोध issues '' facing international comparisons.
the sound सोर्स has अभी broken through the sound speed अवरोध, और is traveling at 1.4 times the गति of ध्वनि, ( Mach 1.4 ).
Since the source is चलती faster ( साथ a गति ) than the ध्वनि waves it creates, it actually लीड the advancing wavefront.
The ध्वनि source होगा pass by a stationary observer ( with a speed ) before the observer actually hears the ध्वनि it creates.
as a परिणाम, an observer in सामने of the source होगा detect
and an निरीक्षक behind the source.
A sonic boom produced by an aircraft चलती at M=2.92, गणना from the cone angle of 20 डिग्री.
An निरीक्षक hears the boom जब the shock wave, on the edges of the cone, crosses his or उसके location.
mach कोन angle
A सोनिक boom is the ध्वनि associated साथ the शॉक waves निर्मित by an ऑब्जेक्ट traveling through the air faster than the गति of sound.
सोनिक booms generate विशाल amounts of sound energy, sounding much like an विस्फोट.
The crack of a सुपरसोनिक bullet passing ओवरहेड is an example of a sonic बूम in miniature.
the Tonight दिखाएँ with jay लीनो is an American late-night talk show hosted by jay Leno कि initially aired from may 25, 1992 to may 29, 2009, and resumed production on March 1, 2010.
The चौथी अवतार of the tonight Show franchise made its debut on May 25, 1992, तीन दिनों following जॉनी Carson 's retirement as मेजबान of the program.
the program originates from NBC Studios in Burbank, California, और is broadcast सोमवार through Friday at 11:35 PM in the पूर्वी and प्रशांत time zones ( 10:35 pm Central / Mountain समय ).
नापसंद Carson or उसके predecessor Jack Paar, Leno only एकबार utilized a अतिथि मेजबान, preferring to host the series by himself.
on अप्रैल 26, 1999, the दिखाएँ began broadcasting in 1080i HDTV, बनने the पहला American nightly talk show to be शॉट in high definition.
The दिखाएँ is shot in 16:9 पहलू अनुपात.
the series, जिससे followed the same मौलिक format as कि of उसके predecessors ( an खोलने monologue followed by comedy दिनचर्या, साक्षात्कार and performances ), भागा until may 29, 2009, बाद which Leno थी succeeded by Conan O'Brien.
एनबीसी हस्ताक्षरित लीनो to a new सौदे लिये a nightly talk show in the 10:00 pm ET timeslot.
The primetime series, titled The jay Leno दिखाएँ, debuted on September 14, 2009, following a समान स्वरूप to the Leno incarnation of Tonight.
neither o'brien 's संस्करण of the program, which premiered June 1, 2009, nor The Jay Leno दिखाएँ generated the ratings कि NBC had अपेक्षित.
The network decided to मूव a condensed 30-minute संस्करण of लीनो 's दिखाएँ to o'brien 's time slot, and O'Brien 's Tonight Show a half-hour बाद.
This निर्णय met साथ विपक्ष from O'Brien, whose stint on The Tonight Show ended जनवरी 22, 2010, after which he began his अपना बात दिखाएँ on tbs.
the Tonight Show with Jay Leno then began its second और current अवतार, the sixth of the franchise, on March 1, 2010.
rfid chip अगला to a grain of rice.
इस chip contains a radio-frequency इलेक्ट्रोमैग्नेटिक field coil that modulates an external magnetic field to transfer a coded identification number जब queried by a रीडर device.
This छोटी प्रकार is incorporated in consumer उत्पाद, and implanted in pets, लिये पहचान purposes.
Radio-frequency identification ( RFID ) is the बेतार non-contact उपयोग of radio-frequency electromagnetic fields to ट्रांसफ़र data, लिये the purposes of automatically identifying and ट्रैकिंग tags संलग्न to वस्तुएँ.
The tags contain electronically stored information.
कुछ टैग are powered and read at short ranges ( a few meters ) via चुम्बकीय fields ( electromagnetic induction ).
Others use a लोकल शक्ति source such as a बैटरी, or else have no बैटरी but collect energy from the interrogating EM field, and then act as a passive transponder to emit microwaves or uhf रेडियो waves ( i.e., electromagnetic radiation at high बारंबारता ).
Battery संचालित tags may operate at hundreds of meters.
Unlike a बार code, the tag does नहीं necessarily need to be within लकीर of sight of the reader, and may be अंतःस्थापित in the tracked ऑब्जेक्ट.
RFID tags हैं used in many उद्योग.
An RFID tag संलग्न to an automobile during production can be प्रयुक्त to track इसके progress through the assembly लकीर.
Pharmaceuticals can be tracked through warehouses.
पशुधन and पालतु may have tags injected, allowing positive identification of the animal.
चूंकि RFID टैग can be attached to कपडे, possessions, or even implanted within लोगों, the सम्भावना of पढना personally-linked सूचना without consent रै raised privacy concerns.
Id, ego और super-ego are the three भाग of the मानसिक apparatus defined in Sigmund फ्रायड 's structural model of the psyche ; they are the तीन theoretical constructs in terms of जिनकी activity and बातचीत mental जीवन is described.
According to इस model of the psyche, the id is the set of uncoordinated instinctual trends ; the super-ego plays the critical and moralizing भूमिका ; and the अहंकार is the व्यवस्थित, realistic part that mediates between the इच्छाओं of the id और the super-ego.
the super-ego can रोकें you from doing certain बाते कि अपना id may want you to do.
भी though the model is structural and makes reference to an apparatus, the id, अहंकार and super-ego are functions of the mind rather than parts of the दिमाग and do not correspond one-to-one with वास्तविक दैहिक structures of the kind dealt with by neuroscience.
the concepts themselves arose at a लेट stage in the विकास of Freud 's thought : the `` संरचनात्मक मॉडल '' ( which succeeded उसके `` आर्थिक मॉडल '' and `` topographical model '' ) was first discussed in उसके 1920 निबन्ध `` Beyond the ख़ुशी Principle `` और थी formalized और elaborated upon three सालो बाद in his `` the अहंकार and the id ``.
Freud 's proposal थी influenced by the ambiguity of the term `` unconscious `` and its many conflicting uses.
Air Force rotc emblem
the Air फ़ोर्स आरक्षित अधिकारी Training Corps ( AFROTC ) is एक of the तीन primary commissioning sources for अधिकारियों in the संयुक्त राज्य एयर Force, the other दो होने the संयुक्त राज्य एयर Force अकादमी ( usafa ) and Air फ़ोर्स Officer Training स्कूल ( ots ).
a अधीनस्थ command of the Air विश्वविद्यालयों भीतर the Air Education और Training कमांड ( AETC ), AFROTC is aligned अंतर्गत the Jeanne M. Holm बीच लिये Officer Accessions and Citizen विकास at मैक्सवेल AFB, अलबामा.
The Holm Center, formerly known as the Air Force Officer Accession और Training Schools ( afoats ), retains direct जिम्मेदारी for both AFROTC and OTS.
AFROTC is the largest and oldest source of commissioned officers for the U.S. एयर फ़ोर्स.
afrotc 's stated मिशन is to उपज quality leaders for the u.S. Air Force.
afrotc units are स्तिथ on 144 college और university campuses साथ 984 अतिरिक्त institutions of उच्चतर learning participating in cross-town agreements that allow उनके students to attend afrotc वर्ग at a nearby `` host '' college or विश्वविद्यालयों.
According to AFOATS HQ, in 2006, AFROTC commissioned 2,083 USAF दूसरी Lieutenants, साथ afrotc enrollment ranging from 23,605 in 1985 to 10,231 in 1993, और around 13,000 enrolled today.
AFROTC units at colleges and विश्वविद्यालयों are called `` detachments, '' and हैं typically headed by an active duty यूएसएएफ अधिकारी in the रैंक of colonel or लेफ्टिनेंट colonel जो functions as दोनो the detachment कमांडर for USAF purposes and with the nominal title of Professor of Aerospace Studies ( pas ) भीतर the institution 's academic community.
Most कॉलेजों and universities will designate the AFROTC detachment as the विभाग of Aerospace Studies.
The PAS is assisted by three to चार Assistant Professors of Aerospace अध्ययन ( APAS ), all क्रियाशील duty USAF officers in the ranks of प्रमुख or कप्तान.
तीन USAF non-commissioned अधिकारियों और one senior non-commissioned officer will typically provide military administrative support and are often augmented by एक to two civilian स्टाफ support employees of the academic संस्था.
Within AFROTC detachments, the students ( referred to as `` cadets '' ) are organized into wings, groups, squadrons, और flights, mirroring the USAF कार्यात्मक wing structure.
The AFROTC detachment 's cadet wing or cadet समूह is separated into two विभाजन : the General सैन्य Course ( जीएमसी ) consisting of the first दो सालो of प्रशिक्षण, and the Professional Officer Course ( POC ) consisting of the last two years of प्रशिक्षण.
the AFROTC program is also divided into दो प्रशिक्षण कृत्यों : the Academic कक्षा कार्यक्रम ( Aerospace Studies वर्ग ) and Cadet क्रियाएँ ( i.e., Leadership Laboratory, Physical Training, और other प्रशिक्षण ).
Paper density ( also known as basis weight and grammage ) is a term प्रयुक्त in the गूदा and paper उद्योग and भी for कपड़ा industry to denote a measure of द्रव्यमान of the उत्पाद per unit of क्षेत्रफल लिये a type of fabric, पेपर or paperboard.
the पद `` density '' is नहीं प्रयुक्त in इसके traditional भाव of द्रव्यमान प्रति ईकाई volume.
`` Paper density '', rather, is a माप of the क्षेत्रफल density.
Paper products that let little or no light pass through ( e.g. poster board ) are माना dense or heavy.
Paper उत्पाद कि allow कुछ लाइट to pass through ( e.g. tissue paper ) हैं considered lightweight.
In the गूदा and paper उद्योग, it is common to नियत a commercial paper machine to produce paper to a निशाना paper density.
Paper density can also be प्रयुक्त to distinguish paper इससे paperboard as the latter usually has a grammage वृहद than 134 g/m2.
Two ways of expressing paper घनत्व are commonly उपयोगd:
Expressed in grams प्रति वर्गाकार meter ( g/m2 ), paper density is also known as grammage.
This is the measure used in सबसे भाग of the world.
Expressed in terms of the द्रव्यमान ( expressed as वज़न ) प्रति number of चादरें, it is ज्ञात as basis weight.
The सम्मेलन used in the United States and a few अन्य countries using us paper sizes is pounds of a ream of 500 ( or in some cases 1000 ) sheets of a दिए ( कच्चा, still uncut ) basis size.
Japanese paper is expressed as the weight in kg of 1000 sheets.
Candace Nicole Parker ( born अप्रैल 19, 1986 ) is an American बास्केट खिलाड़ी लिये the WNBA 's लॉस Angeles स्पार्क्स and UMMC Ekaterinburg of Russia.
She is the younger सिस्टर of NBA player Anthony पार्कर.
वो attended the विश्वविद्यालयों of Tennessee और was drafted by the Sparks in 2008.
वो may be best ज्ञात for being the first woman to डंक in an ncaa टूर्नामेंट game and the first स्त्री to डंक twice in a कॉलेज game—she नियत both माइलस्टोन as a redshirt freshman on कूच 19, 2006.
She also became only the second खिलाड़ी to डंक in a wnba game on जून 22, 2008.
a versatile खिलाड़ी, वो is मुख्यतः a forward, but was listed on टेनेसी 's roster as a आगे, center, और guard.
वो was a प्रारंभ on the Lady Vols basketball team, विजेता of the 2007 and 2008 NCAA championships.
Parker जीती the 2009 Nickelodeon Kids ' Choice पुरस्कार as the favorite मादा खिलाड़ी in the sports श्रेणी.
And she was a guest स्टार on Figure It आउट.
a खाना guide पिरामिड is a pyramid shaped guide of स्वस्थ foods विभाजित into sections to दिखाएँ the recommended intake for प्रत्येक food समूह.
The पहला खाना pyramid was published in Sweden in 1974.
the most widely ज्ञात food pyramid थी introduced by the United राज्य Department of कृषि in the साल 1992, was updated in 2005, और तब replaced in 2011.
over 25 other countries and संगठनों have also published food पिरामिडों.
hans ईसाई Andersen ( ; often referred to in Scandinavia as H. C. andersen ; अप्रैल 2, 1805August 4, 1875 ) was a डैनिश लेखक और poet.
Although a सफल लेखक of plays, travelogues, novels, और poems, andersen is best remembered लिये his fairy tales, a साहित्यिक विधा he so mastered that he खुद रै become as mythical as the किस्से he wrote.
andersen 's लोकप्रियता is not सीमित to children ; उसके stories—called, or `` fantastic किस्से '' —express themes that transcend age and nationality.
During his lifetime he was acclaimed for having प्रसन्न children worldwide और थी feted by रॉयल्टी.
andersen 's fairy किस्से, जिससे have been translated into more than 125 languages, have become culturally अंतःस्थापित in the वेस्ट 's collective consciousness, readily accessible to children, but पेश lessons of पुण्य and resilience in the face of adversity for mature readers as खूब.
They have inspired motion pictures, plays, ballets, और एनिमेटेड films.

In human beings, eye contact is a रूप of अशाब्दिक संचार और is विचार to have a large influence on social behavior.
coined in the जल्दी to mid-1960s, the term रै come in the वेस्ट to प्रायः define the act as a सार्थक and important चिह्न of विश्वास and social संचार.
the customs and significance of eye contact vary widely between cultures, with religious और सोशल differences often altering its अर्थ greatly.
The पढ़ाई of eye contact is sometimes ज्ञात as oculesics.
Bed बग हैं parasitic insects of the cimicid family कि फीड exclusively on blood.
The पद सबसे commonly refers to members of the genus cimex of जिससे Cimex lectularius, the common bed bug, is the best known as it prefers to फीड on इंसान blood although other cimex प्रजाति हैं specialized to other animals, e.g., bat bugs, C. pipistrelli ( Europe ), C. pilosellus ( पश्चिमी us ), and C. adjunctus ( entire पूर्वी US ).
The नाम of the `` bed bug '' is निकला from the preferred habitat of cimex lectularius : warm घरों and विशेषकर आसपास or inside of beds और bedding or other sleep areas.
bed bugs are मुख्यतः active at night, but हैं not exclusively nocturnal.
They प्रायः feed on their होस्ट बगैर being noticed.
a क्रमांक of adverse स्वास्थ्य प्रभाव may result from bed कीड़ा bites, सहित skin rashes, psychological प्रभाव, and allergic symptoms.
निदान involves दोनो finding bed बग and the occurrence of संगत symptoms.
Bed बग have been ज्ञात as human परजीवी for thousands of years.
At a पाइंट in the जल्दी 1940s, वे यहूद mostly eradicated in the विकसित संसार, लकिन have increased in व्यापकता since 1995.
Because infestation of इंसान habitats रै महरूम on the increase, bed कीड़ा bites और related शर्तें have been on the वृद्धि as खूब.
The Book of Isaiah ( ) is the first of the Latter नबियों in the Hebrew Bible, preceding ezekiel, यिर्मयाह and the Book of the बारह.
( the order of the subsequent books differs somewhat in the Christian बूढ़ा Testament ).
The first 39 chapters prophesy doom लिये a गुनाहगार Judah और for all the राष्ट्र of the संसार that oppose God, जबकि the last 27 prophesy the restoration of the nation of Israel और a new सृष्टि in God 's glorious भविष्य kingdom ; this section शामिल the Songs of the Suffering Servant, four पृथक passages referring to the स्वदेश of Israel, interpreted by Christians as prefiguring the coming of यीशु मसीह.
Tradition ascribes authorship of the book to Isaiah बेटे of amoz, but now विद्वानों widely agree that the book is the कार्य of three different लेखक - few scholars इनकार इस दृश्य, और those कि do, do so for theological reasons.
The first, termed Proto-Isaiah ( अध्याय 1–39 ), contains the शब्द of the 8th-century BCE prophet with 7th-century bce expansions ; the second, Deutero-Isaiah ( अध्याय 40–55 ), is the work of a 6th-century bce author writing near the end of the babylonian captivity ; और the third, the काव्य trito-isaiah ( अध्याय 56–66 ), was composed in Jerusalem shortly after the वापसी from exile, संभवतः by अनेक लेखक.
Oregon राज्य विश्वविद्यालयों ( osu ) is a coeducational, public research विश्वविद्यालयों स्तिथ in Corvallis, Oregon, United राज्य.
The university offers undergraduate, graduate और doctoral डिग्री and a multitude of research opportunities.
There are more than 200 अकादमिक degree कार्यक्रम offered through the विश्वविद्यालयों.
osu 's programs in microbiology, nuclear engineering, पारिस्थितिकी, वानिकी, पब्लिक health, biochemistry, zoology, oceanography, खाना विज्ञान and pharmacy are पहचाना nationally as शीर्ष tier programs.
the OSU 's उदार arts programs have भी grown significantly and the department is considered a `` cornerstone '' of the institution.
More than 200,000 लोगों have attended OSU since its founding.
The कार्नेगी न्यास classifies Oregon State University as part of its top tier of research institutions.
as of 2008, OSU is एक of तभी seventy-three land-grant universities.
The स्कूल is also recognized as a sea-grant, space-grant and sun-grant institution, making it one of तभी two US institutions to retain all four designations and the only public university to do so ( कॉर्नेल is the only अन्य with समान designations ).
As one of the two flagship universities of the Oregon विश्वविद्यालयों प्रणाली, OSU receives अधिक funding लिये research, annually, than सब अन्य public higher education संस्थानों in ऑरेगॉन संयुक्त.
Female स्खलन is the expulsion of fluid by human महिलाओं from the paraurethral नलिकाएं through और around the female urethra दौरान or पहले an orgasm.
it is also known colloquially as gushing or squirting, although these हैं माना to be different phenomena in some शोध publications.
The exact सोर्स and प्रकृति of the द्रव continue to be a topic of debate among medical professionals, जिससे is भी related to संदेह over the अस्तित्व of the G-Spot.
The Kanab ambersnail, scientific नाम oxyloma haydeni kanabensis or Oxyloma kanabense, is a critically endangered subspecies or प्रजाति of small, air-breathing land घोंघा, a terrestrial pulmonate gastropod mollusc in the परिवार succineidae, the amber snails.
The common name of the amber घोंघे is based on the शेल, which is translucent and when empty usually resembles amber in color.
This species is endemic to the संयुक्त राज्य, specifically the state of एरिज़ोना और यूटा, where it थी first collected in the जल्दी 20th सदी.
It रै महरूम सूचीबद्ध as endangered on the संयुक्त States मछली and वन्यजीव Service सूची of endangered species चूंकि 8 अगस्त 1991.
This घोंघा lives in वेटलैंड्स, स्रोतों, और seeps, and तभी two of its natural habitats हैं known to exist : Three झीलों, a मर्ग near Kanab, यूटा, and vasey 's Paradise, a वसन्त along the कोलोराडो River भीतर ग्रैंड Canyon National पार्क.
in its प्राकृतिक habitat it is बल्कि polyphagous, feeding मुख्यतः on bacteria, plants और fungi, और reproduces दौरान the summer.
Now considered a critically Endangered प्रजाति on the आईयूसीएन Red List of Threatened Species due to a series of factors ( including influence ), the Kanab ambersnail has been reintroduced to three springs above the ऐतिहासिक high water level साथ the कोलोराडो नदी.
the Spanish भाषा is the second most प्रयुक्त language in the United States.
There are अधिक Spanish अध्यक्षों in the United States than वहीँ are speakers of Chinese, French, जर्मनी, Italian, हवाई, और the Native American languages combined.
according to the 2010 अमरीकी Community Survey conducted by the U.S. जनसांख्यिकी ब्यूरो, स्पेनी is the primary language बोला at home by लगभग 37 million लोगों aged five or older, a figure अधिक than double that of 1990.
वहीँ हैं 45 million Hispanophones जो बोलो Spanish as a पहला or second language, as well as छह million Spanish भाषा students, composing the largest national Spanish-speaking community बाहर of मैक्सिको और making Spanish the Romance language and the Indo-European भाषा साथ largest number of देशी speakers in the world.
roughly half of all U.S. Spanish अध्यक्षों also बोलो English `` बहुत खूब, '' based on the self-assessment Census question respondents.
the language came to the country चूंकि the 16th और 17th centuries साथ the arrival of Spanish colonists in areas that would बाद become the राज्य of फ्लोरिडा, Texas, Colorado, New मैक्सिको, एरिज़ोना, Nevada, Utah, and कैलिफ़ोर्निया and of the स्पेनी explorers - who छान क्षेत्रों of 42 states-.
भी west of Louisiana Territory was स्पेनी between 1763 - 1800 ( साल of the फ्रेंच recovery of territory ), after the French और Indian War.
After of the incorporation of these राज्य to the U.S. in first half of 19th सदी, the Spanish भाषा was बाद reinforced by the acquisition of Puerto Rico in 1898 and by बाद waves of the Hispanic करणों, basically इससे Hispanic America, to the संयुक्त राज्य beginning in the second हाफ of 19th सदी जबतक आज.

The टोकियो Mew Mew manga and anime श्रेणी features a cast of characters designed by मिया Ikumi.
The श्रेणी takes place in Tokyo, Japan, जहाँ पाँच adolescent girls, called mew Mews, are infused with the डीएनए of endangered प्रजाति to कॉम्बैट aliens attempting to take over the Earth.
the manga श्रेणी is followed by a short sequel series, Tokyo mew mew a la विधि, which introduces a new mew Mew and a नई threat.
The mew mews are led by the प्रमुख character, ichigo Momomiya, whose पहला task is to gather the अन्य four Mew Mews : मिंट Aizawa, सलाद midorikawa, खीर Fong, and Zakuro Fujiwara.
As the श्रेणी progresses, ichigo goes इससे having a crush on Masaya aoyama to becoming his गर्लफ्रेंड जबकि trying to hide her secret दोगुना life इससे him.
The series antagonists शामिल three aliens, Kish, Pie, and तीखा, and उनके नेता, Deep Blue.
Originally from धरती, the aliens were मजबूर to छोड़ long ago due to घातक पर्यावरणीय परिवर्तन.
They have returned to मार the इंसानो, who वे feel are destroying their ग्रह, and reclaim the planet.
In a la विधि, middle school student Berry shirayuki is introduced as the sixth mew mew and, in the absence of ichigo, the temporary leader of the mew mews.
a la विधि also introduces नई set of antagonists, the Saint Rose Crusaders, a group of human teenagers with various psychic abilities with a ख्वाहिश to create their own utopia.
Led by Duke, they make अनेक कोशिशें to मार बेरी, आखिरकार turning the local populace against the mew Mews.
ikumi 's initial vision for Tokyo Mew Mew थी a story called Tokyo Black Cat Girl that प्रदर्शित a cat-girl battling एलियन invaders.
After the story was transitioned to a more upbeat स्टोरी of five female superheroes, the character designs यहूद redone to have a lighter, more रंगीन महसूस.
the main श्रेणी characters यहूद praised लिये होने a पूर्ण अनुरूप for the overall story, as well as for उनके cute दिखावे.
the characters introduced in a la Mode were also praised for their विज़ुअल appearances, लकिन criticized as होने repeats of the original series.
The अक्षर Duke was भी criticized लिये having a डिज़ाइन reminiscent of the श्वेत supremacy group, the Ku Klux Klan.
Middle Triassic सीमांत marine sequence of siltstones ( नीचे ) and limestones ( ऊपर ), वर्जिन गठन, southwestern यूटा, USA
Sedimentary रॉक्स are types of rock that are formed by the deposition of material at the धरती 's सतह and within bodies of water.
sedimentation is the collective name for processes that cause mineral and/or organic particles ( detritus ) to settle और accumulate or minerals to precipitate from a समाधान.
अणु कि form a sedimentary rock by accumulating are called sediment.
Before being deposited, sediment was formed by weathering and erosion in a सोर्स area, and then transported to the place of deposition by water, wind, बर्फ, द्रव्यमान गति or glaciers which are called एजेंटों of denudation.
the sedimentary rock cover of the महाद्वीपों of the Earth 's crust is extensive, but the total contribution of sedimentary rocks is अनुमानित to be तभी 8 % of the total volume of the क्रस्ट.
Sedimentary rocks हैं only a thin veneer over a crust consisting mainly of igneous and कायांतरित रॉक्स.
sedimentary rocks हैं deposited in layers as strata, forming a structure called bedding.
The study of sedimentary rocks and rock strata provides सूचना परिचय the subsurface that is उपयोगी for civil engineering, for example in the construction of roads, houses, tunnels, नहरों or अन्य constructions.
Sedimentary रॉक्स are also महत्वपूर्ण स्त्रोत of natural resources like कोयले, fossil fuels, drinking जल or ores.
The study of the sequence of sedimentary rock strata is the main source लिये scientific knowledge about the Earth 's history, सहित palaeogeography, paleoclimatology and the history of life.
The वैज्ञानिक discipline that studies the properties and origin of sedimentary रॉक्स is पुकारा sedimentology.
sedimentology is both भाग of भूविज्ञान and physical भूगोल and overlaps partly साथ other disciplines in the Earth sciences, ऐसे as pedology, geomorphology, geochemistry or structural भूविज्ञान.

Humans are born साथ over 270 bones, कुछ of which fuse साथ into a longitudinal अक्ष, the axial skeleton, to जिससे the appendicular skeleton is संलग्न.
Saint Patrick ( ; ; आधुनिक ; ; c. 387 – 17 March c. 460 or c. 492 ) थी a Romano-British Christian मिशनरी और बिशप in Ireland.
ज्ञात as the `` Apostle of आयरलैंड '', he is the primary संरक्षक saint of the island along साथ Saints Brigid और Columba.
Two प्रामाणिक letters इससे him survive, इससे जिससे आइये the only generally स्वीकृत विवरण of उसके जीवन.
जब he was परिचय 16, he was captured from उसके home and taken as a slave to Ireland, जहाँ he lived लिये six सालो पहले escaping और returning to his परिवार.
बाद बनने a मौलवी, he returned to उत्तरी और western Ireland as an ordained bishop, but little is known परिचय the places जहाँ he worked.
by the seventh century, he had already आइये to be revered as the patron saint of Ireland.
Most उपलब्धियाँ details of उसके life हैं from subsequent hagiographies, और these are now not accepted बगैर विस्तृत criticism.
The Annals of Ulster राज्य that he arrived in आयरलैंड in 432, ministered in Ulster around 443, and died in 457 or 461.
the टेक्स्ट, however, distinguishes between `` Old पैट्रिक '' ( thought to औसत Palladius ) and `` Patrick, archapostle of the Scots, '' जो died in 492.
the actual तिथियाँ of पैट्रिक 's जीवन can नहीं be fixed साथ certainty but, on a फैली interpretation, he was active as a missionary in आयरलैंड दौरान the second हाफ of the 5th century.
He is generally credited with being the पहला bishop of Armagh, Primate of All Ireland.
संत पैट्रिक 's Day is observed on March 17, the date of his death.
It is celebrated दोनो अंदर and outside आयरलैंड, as both a religious और, especially outside आयरलैंड, secular holiday.
In the dioceses of Ireland, it is दोनो a solemnity और a holy day of obligation ; outside Ireland, it can be a जश्न of Ireland itself.
Line segments in the golden ratio
a सुनहरी rectangle with longer पक्ष a और shorter पक्ष b, when placed adjacent to a square साथ पहलू of length a, होगा उपज a similar सुनहरी आयताकार with longer side a + b and shorter पक्ष a.
This illustrates the संबंध.
In गणित and the arts, two quantities are in the सुनहरी अनुपात if the ratio of the योग of the quantities to the larger quantity is equal to the ratio of the larger quantity to the smaller one.
The फिगर on the सही illustrates the geometric संबंध.
Expressed algebraically:
where the यूनानी अक्षर phi ( ) represents the golden ratio.
Its मान is:
The golden ratio is भी called the सुनहरी खण्ड ( Latin : sectio aurea ) or सुनहरी औसत.
अन्य names include extreme और औसत ratio, medial खण्ड, divine proportion, divine section ( लैटिन : sectio divina ), golden proportion, golden cut, and सुनहरी number.
अनेक 20th century कलाकारों and आर्किटेक्ट have proportioned their works to approximate the सुनहरी ratio—especially in the रूप of the golden आयताकार, in जिससे the अनुपात of the longer side to the shorter is the सुनहरी ratio—believing इस proportion to be aesthetically pleasing ( देखिए Applications और observations below ).
mathematicians since Euclid have पढ़ाई the गुण of the golden अनुपात, सहित इसके रूप in the dimensions of a regular प्रस्तुतीकरण and in a golden rectangle, जिससे can be cut into a square और a छोटी rectangle साथ the वही aspect ratio.
the golden ratio has also महरूम used to analyze the proportions of प्राकृतिक वस्तुएँ as well as man-made systems such as financial markets, in कुछ cases based on संदिग्ध fits to data.
North Myrtle Beach is a तटीय रिज़ॉर्ट city in Horry County, South कैरोलिना, United States.

the population was 13,752 at the 2010 census.
संसार War i ( wwi ) was a वैश्विक युद्ध केंद्रित in यूरोपीय that began on 28 July 1914 और lasted until 11 November 1918.
It थी predominantly पुकारा the World War or the Great War इससे its occurrence until the start of संसार War II in 1939, and the First World युद्ध or World War i thereafter.
It involved सब the संसार 's great powers, which were समवेत in two opposing alliances : the Allies ( आधारित on the ट्रिपल entente of the United किंगडम, France और Russia ) और the सेंट्रल शक्तियां ( originally the ट्रिपल Alliance of जर्मनी, Austria-Hungary and Italy ; लकिन, as Austria–Hungary had लिया the offensive against the अनुबंध, Italy did not enter into the युद्ध ).
These alliances यहूद both reorganised and विस्तारित as more nations डाला the युद्ध : इटली, Japan और the संयुक्त राज्य joined the Allies, and the Ottoman Empire और Bulgaria the Central Powers.
ultimately, अधिक than 70 million military कर्मियों, including 60 million Europeans, यहूद mobilised in एक of the largest युद्धों in इतिहास.
अधिक than 9 लाख combatants were मारे, largely क्युकी of technological advancements that led to enormous increases in the lethality of हथियार बगैर corresponding improvements in protection or गतिशीलता.
it was the fifth- deadliest विरोध in संसार history, subsequently paving the रास्ता लिये various political changes, ऐसे as revolutions in अनेक of the राष्ट्र involved.
एक of the long-term causes of the war थी the पुनरुत्थान of imperialism in the foreign नीतियों of the great शक्तियां of Europe.
अधिक immediately, the assassination of Archduke फ्रांज Ferdinand of Austria, the वारिस to the सिंहासन of Austria-Hungary, on 28 जून 1914 by यूगोस्लाव राष्ट्रवादी Gavrilo princip in साराजेवो triggered a राजनयिक संकट जब Austria-Hungary subsequently delivered an ultimatum to the किंगडम of सर्बिया.
Several alliances formed over the पिछला decades were invoked.
भीतर weeks, the major शक्तियां were at war and, via their colonies, the विरोध जल्द स्प्रेड around the world.
on 28 July, the Austro-Hungarians fired the first गोलियाँ of the war as preparation लिये the invasion of Serbia.
जबकि the Russians mobilised, the germans invaded neutral Belgium and Luxembourg on the way to France, providing a casus belli लिये Britain 's declaration of war विरूद्ध जर्मनी.
After the German कूच on पेरिस was brought to a halt—the so-called Miracle of the Marne —the पश्चिमी Front settled into a static battle of अपघर्षण साथ a trench लकीर that changed छोटी until 1917.
on the पूर्वी Front, the रूसी army थी successful विरूद्ध the austro-hungarians, but was रोका in its आक्रमण of East Prussia by the germans.
In November the Ottoman साम्राज्य joined the war, खोलने up fronts in the काकेशस, मेसोपोटामिया और the sinai.
Italy और बुल्गारिया went to war in 1915 and Romania in 1916.
In Russia, the tsar 's सरकारी collapsed in कूच 1917 and a subsequent revolution in नवम्बर brought the russians to शर्तें साथ the सेंट्रल Powers.
After a 1918 German अप्रिय along the पश्चिमी front, the Allies drove वापस the germans in a series of कामयाब offensives and अमरीकी शक्तियां began प्रवेश the trenches.
जर्मनी, which had its own ट्रबल with क्रांतिकारियों, agreed to an armistice on 11 November 1918.
the war ended in विजय लिये the allies.
कार्यक्रम on the घर fronts were as tumultuous as on the battle fronts, as the participants आजमाया to mobilize their जनशक्ति and economic संसाधन to fight a total war.
By the समाप्त of the war, four major इम्पीरियल powers—the German, Russian, austro-hungarian and उस्मानी empires—ceased to मौजूद.
The successor states of the former two lost a ग्रेट राशि of territory, while the latter two यहूद dismantled entirely.
the map of सेंट्रल Europe was redrawn into several छोटी states.
the लीग of राष्ट्र was formed in the hope of preventing another ऐसे conflict.
The European nationalism spawned by the युद्ध और the breakup of empires, the परखना of जर्मनी 's शिकस्त and समस्याएं with the Treaty of Versailles हैं सहमत to be factors contributing to World War II.
Camden is a city in camden County, नई जर्सी, United राज्य.
It is the county सीट, located across the डेलावेयर River from Philadelphia.
as of the 2010 संयुक्त States Census the city था a total population of 77,344, representing a decline of 2,560 ( 3.2 % ) इससे the 79,904 residents enumerated during the 2000 जनसांख्यिकी, which had in turn declined by 7,588 ( 8.7 % ) इससे the 87,492 counted in the 1990 जनसांख्यिकी.
Camden ranked as the 12th-most populous municipality in the state in 2010 after having been ranked 10th in 2000.
Camden थी originally incorporated as a नगर on फ़रवरी 13, 1828, इससे portions of the now-defunct न्यूटन township, while the क्षेत्रफल was still part of Gloucester County.
on March 13, 1844, camden became part of the newly formed Camden County.
Although once a thriving बीच for निर्माण and उद्योग, Camden is perhaps best known लिये its struggles with शहरी dysfunction.
तीन camden mayors have महरूम jailed for भ्रष्टाचार, the most हाल being मिल्टन Milan in 2000.
चूंकि 2005 the school system and police विभाग have महरूम संचालित by the राज्य of नई Jersey ; the takeover समाप्त in 2012.
In 2008, Camden had the highest crime rate in the u.S. with 2,333 हिंसक crimes प्रति 100,000 people while the national average थी 455 per 100,000.
camden पब्लिक स्कूलों खर्च $ 23,770 प्रति student ( $ 19,118 on a budgetary per-pupil basis ) in the 2009–10 school साल and two-thirds of the विद्यार्थी graduate.
Two out of प्रत्येक five residents हैं below the नेशनल poverty लकीर.
amitriptyline ( Tryptomer, elavil, Tryptizol, laroxyl, Saroten, Sarotex, lentizol, endep ) is a tricyclic antidepressant ( TCA ).
it is the सबसे widely used TCA और रै at least equal efficacy विरूद्ध depression as the newer class of SSRIs according to a study इससे early 2001.
As well as reducing depressive symptoms, these प्रकार of tricyclics also आसानी migraines, tension headaches, anxiety attacks और some schizophrenic symptoms.
it is also known to reduce आक्रामकता and हिंसक बर्ताव.
A computer is a सामान्य purpose device that can be programmed to carry out a परिमित set of गणित or लॉजिकल परिचालन.
चूंकि a sequence of operations can be readily changed, the computer can solve more than one दयालु of problem.
Conventionally, a कंप्यूटर consists of at least one प्रसंस्करण element, typically a central processing unit ( cpu ) और some रूप of मेमोरी.
the processing element carries out गणित and लॉजिक operations, and a sequencing और control unit कि can change the order of operations based on भंडारित सूचना.
परिधीय डिवाइस allow information to be पुनर्प्राप्त इससे an external source, and the परिणाम of operations saved and पुनर्प्राप्त.
The first electronic digital computers were विकसित between 1940 and 1945 in the संयुक्त किंगडम और संयुक्त States.
Originally they were the आकार of a विशाल room, consuming as much power as several सौ आधुनिक निजी computers ( PCs ).
in इस era mechanical एनालॉग कंप्यूटर यहूद प्रयुक्त for सैन्य applications.
Modern कंप्यूटर based on एकीकृत circuits are लाखो to billions of times अधिक capable than the जल्दी machines, and occupy a fraction of the स्पेस.
Simple कंप्यूटर are छोटी पर्याप्त to अनुरूप into mobile डिवाइस, और mobile computers can be संचालित by छोटी बैटरी.
Personal computers in उनके various forms are icons of the सूचना Age और हैं what सबसे लोगों सोचो of as “computers.”
However, the embedded computers मिला in many devices इससे mp3 players to सेनानी aircraft and इससे toys to industrial robots are the most numerous.
`` Barefoot और pregnant '' is a phrase सबसे commonly associated with the विवादास्पद idea that महिलाओं should not work outside the home और should have many children during उनके reproductive years.
It has several other meanings as well.
It is a figure of वाक.
The phrase `` barefoot and pregnant '' थी संभवतः पहला प्रयुक्त sometime before 1950.
An article from 1949 राज्य, `` By early 1949, TWA was—in the शब्द of its नई president, Ralph S. Damon—both 'barefoot and pregnant. ' ''
Its usage may तिथि as जल्दी as the 1910s.
An article published in 1958 states the phrase was पहला प्रयुक्त by a `` Dr. Hertzler '' 40 years earlier.
`` Some forty सालो ago, Dr. Hertzler उन्नत a hypothesis which यंग महिलाओं of today seem झुकी on proving correct. '
the तभी way to रखना a स्त्री happy, ' he कहा, 'is to रखना her barefoot और गर्भवती. ' ''

University of Phoenix स्टेडियम, opened August 1, 2006, is a multipurpose फ़ुटबॉल स्टेडियम located in Glendale, Arizona.
it is the home of the Arizona कार्डिनल्स of the नेशनल Football League ( NFL ) and the annual Fiesta Bowl.
The stadium is located अगला door to the jobing.com एरिना and it features the पहला fully retractable natural grass playing सतह built in the United States on top of an AirField प्रणालियों drainage system.
an खोलने on एक side of the stadium allows the playing field to मूव to the exterior of the building, allowing the entire natural turf playing surface to be exposed to daylight.
The stadium रै hosted सुपर कटोरी XLII, और the 2011 bcs नेशनल Championship Game, a game that it होस्ट every चार years, which set the venue 's entertainment attendance record of 78,603 on जनवरी 11, 2011.
it होगा again host Super कटोरी xlix in 2015.
the विश्वविद्यालयों of फीनिक्स acquired the naming rights in सितंबर 2006, shortly बाद the stadium था opened अंतर्गत the नाम कार्डिनल्स Stadium.
The `` विश्वविद्यालयों of Phoenix `` नाम is लागू as a corporate sponsor, और नहीं as the home स्टेडियम of the University ( which रै no intercollegiate athletics कार्यक्रम ).
the स्टेडियम has also hosted the WWE इवेंट WrestleMania XXVI साथ 72,219 प्रशंसक in attendance.
the event थी आयोजित in the stadium on March 28th 2010.
जोशुआ लॉरेंस चेम्बरलेन ( September 8, 1828 – फ़रवरी 24, 1914 ), born as Lawrence जोशुआ Chamberlain, was an अमरीकी कॉलेज professor from the राज्य of Maine, जो volunteered दौरान the American सिविल War to join the संघ फौज.
Although having no earlier education in military strategies, he became a अत्यधिक respected and decorated संघ अधिकारी, reaching the rank of ब्रिगेडियर general ( and brevet major सामान्य ).
For उसके gallantry at Gettysburg, he was awarded the पदक of सम्मान.
he was दिए the सम्मान of commanding the संघ सैनिकों at the आत्मसमर्पण ceremony for the infantry of Robert E. Lee 's Army at Appomattox, वर्जिनिया.
After the युद्ध, he entered राजनीती as a रिपब्लिकन और परोसा four one-year शर्तें of office as the 32nd Governor of Maine.
He परोसा on the faculty, and as अध्यक्ष, of उसके alma मेटर, bowdoin कॉलेज.
An inning, or innings, is a fixed-length खण्ड of a खेल in कोई of a variety of sports – most notably क्रिकेट and baseball दौरान which एक team attempts to score while the other टोली attempts to prevent the पहला from स्कोरिंग.
in क्रिकेट, the term innings is दोनो singular and plural and is always spelled and सुनाया साथ the terminal `` s ''.
In baseball and softball, the एकवचन रूप is inning and only the plural takes an `` s ''.
In अनेक अन्य sports, the length of the game is लिखवाई by a clock और teams swap अप्रिय और रक्षात्मक भूमिकाएँ dynamically by लेने possession of a बॉल or समान मद.
In बेसबॉल and cricket, however, एक टोली, कहा to be `` बल्लेबाजी '', कोशिशें to स्कोर `` runs '' —see चलाएं ( baseball ) और run ( cricket ) —while the अन्य टोली, said to be `` fielding '', कोशिशें to prevent the स्कोरिंग of रनों and get members of the batting team out.
the टीमों switch places after the fielding टोली रै succeeded in getting a fixed number of players आउट, making a clock अनावश्यक.
in क्रिकेट, the term innings is भी प्रयुक्त to refer to the खेल of one particular player ( Smith था a ग़रीब innings, scoring only 12 ).
by एक्सटेंशन, इस term can be प्रयुक्त in British अंग्रेज़ी लिये लगभग any activity जिससे takes a काल of time ( The उदार government had a good पारी, but आखिरकार lost दफ्तर in 1972, or You 've had a fair पारी, अभी it 's my फेरे, meaning `` you have spoken for long enough, now let me बोलो '' ).
it is भी प्रयुक्त in reference to someone who रै died at a reasonably old आयु or जिया a समृद्ध और rewarding life ( ah, खूब.
जॉन थी 89.
at least he था a शुभ innings ).
The baseball-derived parallel to इस in American English is the पद at bat.
According to the Oxford अंग्रेज़ी शब्दकोष, the term पारी has महरूम प्रयुक्त in सन्दर्भ to cricket since at तनिक 1735.
as क्रिकेट was a वयस्क, अत्यधिक व्यवस्थित खेल in the 1600s in England, the term 's उत्पत्ति could well precede this पहला अंकित usage.
the शब्द inning अर्थ 'a gathering in ' is first अंकित in 1522, और could be related.
एडीनोसिन deaminase deficiency, भी पुकारा एडीए कमियां or ada-scid, is an autosomal recessive metabolic विकार कि कल्याणकारी immunodeficiency.
It occurs in fewer than एक in 100,000 live births worldwide.
it accounts लिये about 15 % of all मामले of कठोर संयुक्त immunodeficiency ( SCID ).
it is बहुत विरल, तुम have a 3 % मौका of getting इस gene.
ADA deficiency may be उपस्थित in शैशव, childhood, adolescense, or adulthood.
Age of onset and severity is related to कुछ 29 known genotypes संबद्ध with the विकार.
An उदाहरण of urban गरीबी in इस slum in Jakarta, Indonesia
Poverty is the state of one जो lacks a certain amount of सामग्री possessions or money.
Absolute poverty or destitution refers to the पिछडे of basic human needs, which commonly includes food, water, sanitation, clothing, shelter, health परवाह and education.
Relative गरीबी is पारिभाषित contextually as economic inequality in the location or society in which people live.
For much of इतिहास, poverty was considered largely unavoidable as traditional मोड्स of production were insufficient to give an संपूर्ण population a आरामदायक standard of living.
After the industrial revolution, mass उत्पादन in कारखानों बना wealth increasingly more inexpensive and accessible.
Of more importance is the modernization of कृषि, such as fertilizers, in order to provide enough उपज to feed the population.
The supply of मौलिक needs can be restricted by constraints on government सेवाएं such as corruption, tax avoidance, debt and loan conditionalities और by the brain नाली of health care and educational professionals.
Strategies of increasing income to make मौलिक needs more सस्ती typically शामिल welfare, economic freedoms, और providing वित्तीय services.
गरीबी कटौती is a major goal and issue for अनेक international organizations such as the संयुक्त राष्ट्र and the संसार Bank.
The World बैंको estimated 1.29 billion लोगों were living in निरपेक्ष गरीबी in 2008.
of ये, about 400 million people in absolute गरीबी lived in India और 173 million लोगों in चीन.
in यूएसए 1 in 5 children जीवनदान in poverty.
in terms of percentage of regional populations, sub-saharan Africa at 47 % था the उच्चतम incidence rate of निरपेक्ष गरीबी in 2008.
between 1990 and 2010, about 663 लाख लोगों moved ऊपर the absolute poverty level.
स्टिल, चरम गरीबी is a वैश्विक चुनौती ; it is observed in all parts of the world, including the विकसित economies.
Mushroom poisoning ( also ज्ञात as mycetism ) refers to नुकसानदेह प्रभाव from ingestion of विषाक्त substances उपस्थित in a मशरूम.
ये symptoms can vary इससे पतला gastrointestinal तकलीफ to death.
the toxins present हैं secondary metabolites produced in specific biochemical pathways in the fungal cells.
मशरूम विषाक्तता is usually the result of ingestion of जंगली mushrooms after misidentification of a toxic mushroom as an edible species.
The most आम reason for this misidentification is बंद प्रतिरूप in terms of रंग और general morphology of the toxic mushrooms प्रजाति with खाद्य प्रजाति.
Even very अनुभवी जंगली मशरूम gatherers are upon विरल occasion poisoned by खाने toxic species, despite being well जागरूक of the risks, through carelessness.
To prevent मशरूम poisoning, मशरूम gatherers need to be very familiar with the मशरूम they intend to collect as well as with कोई similar-looking toxic species.
in जोड, edibility of mushrooms may depend on methods of तैयारी लिये कुकिंग.
Collectors भी need to be well aware कि edibility or toxicity of some species varies साथ geographic location.
इंसान height is the distance इससे the bottom of the feet to the top of the सिर in a human देह, खड़ा erect.
जब populations share genetic पृष्ठभूमि and पर्यावरणीय factors, average ऊँचाई is अक्सर characteristic within the समूह.
Exceptional ऊँचाई variation ( around 20 % deviation इससे average ) within such a population is sometimes due to gigantism or dwarfism, जिससे हैं medical शर्तें caused by specific genes or endocrine abnormalities.
in regions of extreme poverty or prolonged warfare, environmental कारकों like chronic malnutrition दौरान बाल्यकाल or किशोरावस्था may account for delayed विकास and/or ( in severe मामले ) marked reductions in adult stature भी बगैर the presence of any of ये medical शर्तें.
Apollo 11 थी the spaceflight that landed the पहला इंसानो, अमेरिकी Neil Armstrong और Buzz Aldrin, on the Moon on July 20, 1969, at 20:18 UTC.
Armstrong became the first to कदम onto the lunar सतह 6 घंटों later on जुलाई 21 at 02:56 utc.
आर्मस्ट्रांग खर्च about two और a half hours बाहर the spacecraft, एल्ड्रिन थोड़ा less ; and together वे collected of lunar material लिये return to Earth.
a third member of the मिशन, Michael Collins, piloted the कमांड spacecraft अलोन in lunar orbit until Armstrong and एल्ड्रिन लौटे to it just under a दिन बाद for the ट्रिप back to Earth.
Launched by a Saturn V rocket इससे Kennedy स्पेस Center in Merritt Island, Florida on July 16, Apollo 11 was the पांचवां मानवयुक्त mission of NASA 's अपोलो कार्यक्रम.
The अपोलो spacecraft had तीन parts : a Command मोड्यूल साथ a cabin for the three astronauts जिससे was the only भाग जिससे landed back on धरती ; a सेवा मोड्यूल जिससे supported the Command Module साथ नोदन, electrical power, ऑक्सीजन और जल ; and a चंद्र Module for landing on the Moon.
After being भेजा to the Moon by the Saturn V 's upper stage, the astronauts अलग the spacecraft from it and travelled लिये three दिनों जबतक वे entered into lunar orbit.
आर्मस्ट्रांग और Aldrin तब moved into the चंद्र Module and landed in the समुद्र of Tranquility.
वे stayed a total of परिचय 21 and a half hours on the चंद्र surface.
After उठाने off in the अपर part of the Lunar मोड्यूल और rejoining Collins in the कमांड मोड्यूल, they लौटे to Earth and उतरा in the Pacific Ocean on July 24.
Broadcast on live tv to a world-wide audience, आर्मस्ट्रांग stepped onto the चंद्र surface और वर्णित the event as `` one small step for [ a ] man, one giant leap लिये mankind. ''
Apollo 11 effectively ended the Space रेस and fulfilled a नेशनल लक्ष्य proposed in 1961 by the late U.S. President जॉन F. Kennedy in a वाक पहले the United States Congress, `` पहले इस decade is आउट, of landing a man on the Moon और returning उसे safely to the Earth. ''
The FIFA संसार Cup, often simply the संसार Cup, is an international association football प्रतियोगिता contested by the senior men 's नेशनल teams of the members of Fédération Internationale de Football संघ ( FIFA ), the खेल 's global governing body.
The चैंपियनशिप has been awarded every चार years since the inaugural tournament in 1930, except in 1942 और 1946 when it was not held because of the दूसरी World War.
the current champions are Spain, who won the 2010 tournament.
The current स्वरूप of the टूर्नामेंट involves 32 teams competing for the शीर्षक at venues within the मेजबान nation ( s ) over a period of परिचय a month ; इस phase is प्रायः called the संसार Cup Finals.
A qualification phase, जिससे currently takes प्लेस over the preceding तीन सालो, is used to determine which टीमों qualify लिये the tournament together with the host nation ( s ).
the 19 World Cup tournaments have महरूम won by eight अलग नेशनल teams.
ब्राज़ील have won five टाइम्स, और they हैं the only team to have निभाई in every tournament.
the अन्य संसार Cup विजेता हैं इटली, with four titles ; जर्मनी, साथ three titles ; Argentina and inaugural winners उरुग्वे, with two titles each ; और इंग्लैण्ड, France, और स्पेन, साथ एक शीर्षक each.
the संसार कप is the संसार 's सबसे widely viewed sporting इवेंट ; an अनुमानित 715.1 million लोगों देखी the final मैच of the 2006 फीफा संसार Cup आयोजित in जर्मनी.
the next three संसार Cups होगा be hosted by Brazil in 2014, रूस in 2018, and क़तर in 2022.
Genocide is a पद coined in 1944 by राफेल lemkin to describe the deliberate and systematic destruction, in पूरे or in भाग, of an ethnic, racial, religious, or national समूह.
It is पारिभाषित in आलेख 2 of the सम्मेलन on the Prevention and दंड of the Crime of Genocide ( CPPCG ) of 1948 as `` कोई of the following acts committed with intent to नष्ट, in whole or in part, a national, ethnical, racial or religious group, as such : हत्या members of the group ; causing serious bodily or mental harm to members of the समूह ; deliberately inflicting on the groups शर्तें of life, calculated to bring about इसके physical destruction in पूरे or in part ; imposing measures intended to prevent births भीतर the समूह ; [ और ] forcibly transferring children of the group to another group. ''
skulls of victims of the Rwandan नरसंहार
the preamble to the CPPCG not only states that `` नरसंहार is a अपराधों under international विधि, contrary to the spirit और aims of the संयुक्त Nations और condemned by the civilized संसार '', but also that `` at सब periods of history genocide has inflicted ग्रेट losses on humanity ''.
determining what historical कार्यक्रम constitute a genocide and which हैं merely criminal or अमानवीय बर्ताव is नहीं a clear-cut पदार्थ.
In nearly प्रत्येक case where आरोपों of नरसंहार have circulated, partisans of various sides have fiercely disputed the निर्वचन और details of the event, प्रायः to the पाइंट of promoting wildly different संस्करण of the facts.
An accusation of genocide is कतई not taken lightly and will लगभग सदा be controversial.
The following सूची of genocides and alleged genocides चाहिए be understood in this context और can नहीं be regarded as the फाइनल word on ये subjects.
A समय belt is a non-slipping mechanical ड्राइव बेल्ट and the पद may refer to either:
Toothed बेल्ट, a flexible belt साथ दांत moulded onto its inner surface
Timing belt ( camshaft ), a toothed belt used to ड्राइव the camshaft ( s ) within an internal combustion engine
the culture of the United राज्य is primarily a Western culture, लकिन is भी influenced by Native American, अफ़्रीकी, Asian, Polynesian, और लैटिन अमरीकी cultures.
American culture started its गठन over 10,000 years पहले with the माइग्रेशन of paleo-indians इससे Asia into the region कि is आज the महाद्वीपीय United राज्य.
it has its own unique सोशल and सांस्कृतिक विशेषताएँ ऐसे as dialect, म्यूज़िक, arts, सोशल habits, cuisine, and folklore.
The संयुक्त राज्य of America is an ethnically और racially diverse country as a result of large-scale आव्रजन इससे many अलग देशों throughout its history.
Its chief जल्दी यूरोपीय प्रभाव came इससे English, Scottish, वेल्श और Irish settlers of colonial America during अंग्रेजों rule.
British संस्कृति, due to औपनिवेशिक ties with ब्रिटेन that spread the अंग्रेज़ी भाषा, विधिक system and other सांस्कृतिक inheritances, had a formative influence.
Other important influences came इससे other parts of पश्चिमी यूरोपीय, especially जर्मनी, फ़्रांस, and Italy.
Original elements also play a दमदार role, ऐसे as the आविष्कार of jeffersonian democracy.
थामस Jefferson 's Notes on the State of वर्जिनिया थी शायद the first influential घरेलू cultural critique by an American और a reactionary piece to the prevailing European सर्वसम्मति कि अमेरिका 's घरेलू मौलिकता was degenerate.
Prevalent ideas और आदर्शों that विकसित domestically, ऐसे as national holidays, uniquely American sports, military परंपरा, और innovations in the कला and entertainment give a strong भाव of national अभिमान among the population as a whole.
American संस्कृति शामिल दोनो conservative और liberal तत्व, वैज्ञानिक और religious competitiveness, political structures, risk लेने और फ़्री expression, भौतिकवादी and moral तत्व.
despite certain consistent वैचारिक सिद्धान्त ( e.g. individualism, egalitarianism, and आस्था in स्वतंत्रता और democracy ), American संस्कृति रै a किस्में of expressions due to इसके भौगोलिक स्केल and demographic diversity.
The लचीलापन of U.S. संस्कृति और its अत्यधिक सांकेतिक प्रकृति lead कुछ शोधकर्ताओं to categorize अमरीकी संस्कृति as a mythic identity ; अन्य see it as अमरीकी exceptionalism.
It also includes तत्व कि evolved इससे Indigenous Americans, and other जातीय cultures—most prominently the संस्कृति of African अमेरिकी, cultures from Latin अमेरिका, and Asian अमरीकी cultures.
अनेक American cultural तत्व, विशेषकर इससे popular culture, have spread across the globe through modern द्रव्यमान मीडिया.
the United राज्य रै प्रायः been विचार of as a melting घट, लकिन beginning in the late 1990s और early 2000s, it trends towards सांस्कृतिक विविधता, बहुलवाद और the image of a सलाद कटोरी instead.
Due to the extent of American संस्कृति, वहीँ हैं many एकीकृत but अद्वितीय social subcultures within the संयुक्त States.
the सांस्कृतिक affiliations an individual in the United States may have commonly depend on सोशल class, political orientation and a multitude of demographic विशेषताएँ such as धार्मिक background, occupation और ethnic समूह membership.
Samoan ( Gagana fa'a sāmoa or Gagana Sāmoa — IPA : ) is the language of the samoan आइलैंड्स, comprising the independent देश of Samoa and the संयुक्त States territory of American Samoa.
It is an आधिकारिक language—alongside English —in both jurisdictions.
samoan, a पोलिनेशियाई भाषा, is the first भाषा लिये सबसे of the समोआ आइलैंड्स ' population of परिचय 246,000.
With many Samoan people जीना in other countries, the कुल क्रमांक of अध्यक्षों विश्वव्यापी is estimated at 370,000.
the language is notable लिये the phonological differences between औपचारिक and informal speech as well as a ceremonial form प्रयुक्त in samoan oratory.
A ग्लूकोज सहिष्णुता test is a medical test in which glucose is given and blood samples taken afterward to determine कैसा जल्दी it is साफ from the blood.
The test is प्रायः used to test for मधुमेह, इंसुलिन resistance, और sometimes प्रतिक्रिया hypoglycemia और acromegaly, or rarer विकार of carbohydrate metabolism.
in the most commonly performed version of the परीक्षण, an मौखिक glucose सहिष्णुता test ( OGTT ), a standard dose of glucose is ingested by mouth और blood स्तर are checked two घंटों बाद.
अनेक विसंगतियाँ of the GTT have been devised over the years for various purposes, साथ different मानक doses of ग्लूकोज, different routes of प्रशासन, different intervals और durations of sampling, and विभिन्न substances measured in जोड to blood glucose.
`` कया About me '' is a song written by Garry Frost and Frances swan, पहला recorded by Australian rock band Moving Pictures from their album दिनों of Innocence.
It थी the band 's पहला number-one single in ऑस्ट्रेलिया बिता छह consecutive weeks on the top ; वहीँ, it थी the second-highest selling सिंगल of 1982.
The success of the सोंग led them to अमेरिका जहाँ it became a hit, reaching # 29 on the u.s. Billboard Hot 100 चार्ट.
the song stayed in the u.S. charts for ऐसे a long समय कि it managed to मेक Billboards top 100 पॉप Singles of 1983, at # 88, a विरल feat for a single with ऐसे a low शिखर स्थिति.
the song made an unusual comeback in 1989, peaking at # 46.
on the left a मुर्गा अंडा, the egg most commonly eaten by इंसानो, and on the right two quail अंडे
Eggs are laid by females of many अलग प्रजाति, सहित birds, reptiles, amphibians, और मछली, और have been eaten by mankind लिये हज़ारों of years.
Bird and reptile eggs consist of a सुरक्षात्मक eggshell, albumen ( अंडा white ), और vitellus ( अंडा yolk ), contained within विभिन्न thin झिल्लियों.
Popular चुनाव लिये egg खपत are मुर्गा, बतख, बटेर, roe, and caviar, लकिन the अंडा most often consumed by humans is the chicken egg, by a wide margin.
Egg yolks and whole eggs स्टोर significant amounts of protein and choline, and are widely used in cookery.
Due to their प्रोटीन सामग्री, the United States विभाग of कृषि ( यूएसडीए ) categorizes eggs as Meats within the खाना Guide Pyramid.
Despite the nutritional मान of eggs, there हैं कुछ संभावित health issues arising from अंडा विशेषता, storage, और individual allergies.
Chickens and other egg-laying creatures are widely kept throughout the संसार, and mass production of chicken eggs is a global industry.
In 2009, an अनुमानित 62.1 million metric टन of अंडे यहूद उत्पादित worldwide from a total लेटा flock of लगभग 6.4 billion मुर्गियां.
There हैं मुद्दे of regional variation in माँग and expectation, as well as current debates concerning विधि of mass उत्पादन, with the यूरोपीय संघ 's ban on बैटरी farming of मुर्गियों.
Major League सॉकर ( mls ) is a पेशेवर soccer league representing the खेल 's highest level in the United राज्य और कनाडा.
Sanctioned by the United States Soccer Federation ( U.S. सॉकर ), the league is composed of 19 teams — 16 in the U.S. and 3 in कनाडा.
Seasons presently run इससे March to December, with each team playing 34 खेल in the नियमित season.
टेन टीमों compete in the postseason MLS Cup playoffs culminating in the चैंपियनशिप game, the mls Cup.
Major लीग Soccer was founded in 1993 as part of the संयुक्त राज्य ' बोली to host the 1994 FIFA World Cup.
The पहला ऋतु took place in 1996 beginning साथ ten teams.
बजाय of ऑपरेटिंग as an संघ of independently owned teams, MLS is a single एंटिटी जहाँ each टोली is स्वामित्व and controlled by the league 's investors.
The league 's closed membership makes it one of the संसार 's few सॉकर लीग not using promotion और relegation.
The legality of कैनबिस varies इससे country to देश.
Possession of cannabis is illegal in most देशों and रै महरूम since the beginning of फैली cannabis prohibition in the late 1930s.
However, अनेक countries have decriminalized the कब्ज़ा of small quantities of कैनबिस, विशेषकर in North अमेरिका, South अमेरिका and Europe.
furthermore, possession is legal or effectively legal in the नीदरलैंड्स, North Korea और होता be in the U.S. states of Colorado and Washington if it यहूद not लिये संघीय विधि, which governs persons in all राज्य.
the medicinal use of cannabis is legal in a number of countries, सहित Canada, the Czech Republic and Israel.
While federal law in the United States bans सब sale and possession of कैनबिस, enforcement varies widely at the राज्य स्तर और some राज्य have established औषधीय मारिजुआना programs in that खण्डन संघीय law ; two states ( Colorado और Washington ) have repealed उनके कानून prohibiting the recreational उपयोग of cannabis and replaced उन्हें with a regulatory regime, also contrary to संघीय statute.
कुछ देशों have laws that हैं not as vigorously prosecuted as others लकिन, apart इससे the countries that offer access to medical मारिजुआना, सबसे countries have विभिन्न penalties ranging इससे lenient to very कठोर.
Some infractions are taken more seriously in some countries than others in regard to the cultivation, use, possession or transfer of कैनबिस for recreational use.
a few jurisdictions have lessened penalties लिये possession of small quantities of कैनबिस, making it punishable by confiscation और a fine, बल्कि than कारावास.
Some jurisdictions/ drug courts use mandatory उपचार programs for यंग or frequent users, साथ स्वतंत्रता from narcotic दवाएँ as the लक्ष्य and a few jurisdictions permit कैनबिस उपयोग for medicinal purposes.
There are also changes in a more restrictive direction as in Canada.
ड्रग tests to detect कैनबिस are increasingly common in many countries and have resulted in jail sentences and लोगों losing उनके कार्य.
However, simple कब्ज़ा can carry long कारावास वाक्य in some देशों, particularly in भाग of East एशिया and southeast एशिया जहाँ the बिक्री of cannabis may lead to a वाक्य of life in prison or भी निष्पादन.
In cardiovascular physiology, ejection भिन्न ( EF ) represents the volumetric fraction of blood pumped out of the ventricle ( heart ) with each heart beat or cardiac साईकिल.
It can be applied to either the right ventricle which ejects via the pulmonary valve into the pulmonary परिसंचरण or the left ventricle which ejects via the aortic valve into the प्रणालीगत परिसंचरण.
इमेजिंग of the physiology of the mammalian heart is the art कि allows सार्थक mathematical अभिव्यक्ति defining ef.
Noninvasive cardiac इमेजिंग has become a worldwide utility enabling study of हृदय प्रदर्शन reproducibly and inexpensively.
Simplified, Ejection भिन्न is a गणितीय उत्पाद allowed by cardiac imaging.
as a गणितीय पद, Ejection भिन्न is an extension of the work of Adolph Fick in हृदय आउटपुट.
Dedicated प्रौद्योगिकी ऐसे as इकोकार्डियोग्राफी, Computed टोमोग्राफी, Magnetic अनुनाद Imaging और muga स्कैनिंग have definitively अनुमत clinically relevant mathematics regarding ischemia, Congenital दिल Disease and Heart Failure.
राज्य Route 14 ( SR 14 ) is a north–south state राजमार्ग in the U.S. state of California, largely in the mojave मरुस्थल.
The southern portion of the राजमार्ग is हस्ताक्षरित as the Antelope Valley फ्रीवे.
the route connects Interstate 5, or Golden राज्य Freeway, निकट सांता clarita और with U.S. रूट 395 निकट Inyokern.
Legislatively, the रूट extends south of I-5 to राज्य Route 1 in the प्रशांत Palisades area of लॉस Angeles, however the portion south of the junction साथ I-5 has नहीं महरूम constructed.
The southern part of the constructed route is a busy commuter freeway सेवारत and connecting the समुदायों of सांता clarita, palmdale और Lancaster with the rest of the Greater Los एंजिल्स क्षेत्रफल.
The northern portion, from Vincent ( south of Palmdale ) to Route 395, is legislatively नामित the Aerospace राजमार्ग, as the राजमार्ग serves Edwards Air Force Base, once one of the primary landing स्ट्रिप्स for NASA 's स्पेस Shuttle.
This section is rural, following the लकीर between the hot Mojave desert and the forming Sierra Nevada mountain range.
सबसे of रूट 14 is loosely paralleled by a main लकीर of the दक्षिणी Pacific रेलरोड, प्रयुक्त लिये the Antelope घाटी Line of the metrolink commuter रेल प्रणाली as well as a कनेक्शन between लॉस Angeles and the California Central Valley via Tehachapi pass.
Linked with US 395, this road connects लॉस एंजिल्स साथ ऐसे places as मैमथ Mountain, Mono Lake, Yosemite National Park और रेनो, Nevada.
Route 14 थी भाग of u.S. Route 6 prior to truncation in 1964, जब U.S. 6 was a coast-to-coast रूट इससे Long बीच to Provincetown, Massachusetts.
The non-freeway खण्ड of sr 14 from चांदी महारानी Road उत्तर of rosamond to Mojave is known as Sierra राजमार्ग, as is the old रूटिंग between अंतरराज्यीय 5 और चांदी महारानी Road जहाँ SR 14 has महरूम स्थानांतरित to a newer freeway alignment.
portions of रूट 14 remain हस्ताक्षरित with names संबद्ध साथ US 6, including मिडलैंड ट्रेल, Theodore Roosevelt Highway and ग्रैंड फौज of the गणतंत्र राजमार्ग.
इस रूट is भाग of the कैलिफ़ोर्निया Freeway और Expressway System.
Blindness is the कंडीशन of lacking visual बोध due to physiological or neurological कारकों.
Various scales have महरूम विकसित to describe the extent of vision loss and define blindness.
कुल दृष्टिहीनता is the पूरा lack of form and विज़ुअल light बोध and is clinically अंकित as NLP, an abbreviation for `` no light perception. ''
दृष्टिहीनता is frequently used to describe severe visual impairment साथ दृष्टि.
Those वर्णित as having only light बोध have no more sight than the क्षमता to बताना light इससे अंधेरा और the सामान्य direction of a light source.
To determine which people may need special सहायता because of their विज़ुअल disabilities, various governmental jurisdictions have formulated अधिक जटिल परिभाषाएं referred to as विधिक blindness.
in North America and most of Europe, legal blindness is defined as visual तीक्ष्णता ( दृष्टि ) of 20/200 ( 6/60 ) or कम in the better नजर with बेहतरीन सुधार possible.
This means that a legally blind व्यक्तिगत would have to स्टैंड from an object to देखिए it—with corrective lenses —with the same degree of स्पष्टता as a normally sighted person could from.
in अनेक areas, people with average तीक्ष्णता जो nonetheless have a विज़ुअल field of कम than 20 degrees ( the norm होने 180 degrees ) हैं भी classified as होने legally blind.
Approximately ten percent of those deemed legally अँधा, by any माप, have no vision.
The rest have some vision, इससे लाइट perception alone to relatively शुभ acuity.
Low vision is sometimes प्रयुक्त to describe visual acuities from 20/70 to 20/200.
By the 10th Revision of the WHO International Statistical Classification of Diseases, चोटों and Causes of Death, low दृष्टि is पारिभाषित as विज़ुअल acuity of less than 20/60 ( 6/18 ), but equal to or better than 20/200 ( 6/60 ), or corresponding visual field घाटा to less than 20 degrees, in the better eye with बेहतरीन संभावित सुधार.
Blindness is पारिभाषित as visual तीक्ष्णता of less than 20/400 ( 6/120 ), or corresponding visual फ़ील्ड घाटा to less than 10 डिग्री, in the better eye साथ best possible correction.
Blind लोगों साथ undamaged आँखें may still पंजीकरण लाइट non-visually for the purpose of circadian entrainment to the 24-hour light/dark साईकिल.
Light सिग्नल for this purpose सफर through the retinohypothalamic tract and हैं नहीं affected by optic तंत्रिका क्षति परे जहाँ the retinohypothalamic tract exits.

in 1999, dmx released his best-selling album... And Then There Was X, which featured the hit सिंगल `` Party Up ( up in Here ) ``.
He has acted in films such as Belly, Romeo जरूर die, निकास Wounds, पालना 2 The Grave, and Last Hour.
