dmx released a mixtape the तौल In as a prelude/promotion towards his एल्बम undisputed ( 2012 ).
dmx रै sold over 30 million रिकॉर्ड विश्वव्यापी, बनाना उसे एक of the best-selling hip-hop कलाकारों of all समय.
पेशेवर certification, trade प्रमाणन, or professional नामांकन, often called बस प्रमाणन or qualification, is a नामांकन अर्जित by a person to assure योग्यता to perform a जॉब or कार्य.
नहीं all certifications that use post-nominal letters हैं an acknowledgement of educational achievement, or an agency नियुक्त to safeguard the public interest.
Bugs बनी is a मजेदार animal cartoon character, best remembered for his starring roles in the Looney Tunes और merrie Melodies series of नाट्य छोटी films उत्पादित by Warner भाईs. दौरान the सुनहरी age of American animation.
उसके लोकप्रियता during इस era led to his becoming a कॉरपोरेट mascot of warner भाईs. Entertainment.
बग is an anthropomorphic gray हरे or rabbit who is famous for his flippant, personality, a सुनाया नई यॉर्क एक्सेंट, his portrayal as a trickster, and his catch phrase `` Eh...
What 's up, doc ? ''
( usually कहा while चबाने a carrot ).
बग has appeared in more films than any other cartoon अक्षर and is the ninth most portrayed film personality in the संसार.
According to उसके 1990 `` biography '' Bugs Bunny : 50 सालो और Only One धूसर हरे, Bugs was born on July 27, 1940 in Brooklyn, New York in a वारेन अंतर्गत ebbets फ़ील्ड, home of the Brooklyn डॉजर्स.
In reality, he was brought to life by the animators and स्टाफ of लिओन schlesinger Productions ( later warner Bros. cartoons ) : सहित Tex एवेरी, who directed बग ' early definitive short a Wild Hare ( 1940 ) ; रॉबर्ट McKimson, who created बग ' निर्णायक character डिज़ाइन ; और mel Blanc, जो originated the voice of बग.
the श्लेष्मक झिल्लियों ( or mucosae or mucosas ; singular mucosa ) हैं linings of mostly endodermal origin, covered in epithelium, which are involved in absorption and secretion.
They line cavities that are exposed to the external पर्यावरण and आतंरिक organs.
They are at several places संलग्न with skin : at the nostrils, the होठ of the mouth, the eyelids, the कानों, the genital area, और the anus.
The sticky, thick fluid secreted by the श्लेष्मक झिल्लियों और glands is termed mucus.
The term mucous झिल्ली refers to जहाँ they are मिला in the देह and not प्रत्येक mucous membrane secretes mucus.
The glans clitoridis, glans शिश्न ( head of the penis ), साथ with the inside of the foreskin और the clitoral हुड, are mucous membranes.
The urethra is also a mucous झिल्ली.
the स्रावित mucus traps the pathogens in the body, preventing कोई further activities of diseases.

केक is a रूप of ब्रैड or bread-like खाना.
in इसके modern forms, it is typically a sweet baked dessert.
In its oldest forms, cakes were सामान्यतः fried breads or cheesecakes, and normally had a डिस्क shape.
determining whether a given food चाहिए be वर्गीकृत as bread, केक, or pastry can be difficult.
आधुनिक cake, विशेषकर परत cakes, सामान्यतः contain a combination of आटा, sugar, eggs, और मक्खन or आयल, with कुछ किस्में भी requiring liquid ( typically milk or जल ) and leavening agents ( such as yeast or baking चूर्ण ).
Flavorful ingredients like fruit purées, nuts, dried or candied fruit, or extracts are प्रायः added, और numerous substitutions for the प्राथमिक ingredients are संभावित.
cakes हैं often filled साथ फल preserves or dessert sauces ( like pastry मलाई ), iced with buttercream or अन्य icings, and सजा साथ marzipan, piped borders or candied fruit.
Cake is often the dessert of choice for meals at ceremonial occasions, particularly विवाह, वर्षगांठ, और जन्मदिन.
There are countless cake recipes ; some are bread-like, some rich and elaborate, and अनेक हैं centuries बूढ़ा.
Cake बनाना is no longer a complicated procedure ; जबकि at एक time considerable labor went into केक making ( particularly the whisking of अंडा foams ), बेकिंग equipment and दिशानिर्देश have महरूम simplified so that भी the सबसे amateur cook may bake a cake.

The जनसांख्यिकी थी 767 at the 2010 census.
It is भाग of the Madison Metropolitan सांख्यिकीय क्षेत्रफल.
Public policy is the principled guide to action taken by the प्रशासनिक कार्यपालिका शाखाओं of the state with लिहाज़ to a class of मुद्दे in a manner सतत साथ विधि और institutional customs.
in general, the न्यास is the pertinent national and substantial संवैधानिक law and implementing विधान such as the US संघीय कोड.
Further substrates include both न्यायिक interpretations and regulations which हैं generally authorized by विधान.
Other विद्वानों define it as a system of `` courses of कार्रवाई, regulatory उपायों, laws, और funding priorities concerning a दिए टॉपिक promulgated by a governmental एंटिटी or इसके representatives. ''
पब्लिक नीति is commonly embodied `` in constitutions, legislative acts, and judicial decisions. ''
in the संयुक्त राज्य, this concept refers not only to the result of नीतियों, लकिन अधिक broadly to the decision-making and विश्लेषण of सरकारी decisions.
As an अकादमिक discipline, public नीति is studied by professors और विद्यार्थी at पब्लिक नीति schools of major universities throughout the country.
The u.S. professional संघ of पब्लिक policy practitioners, researchers, scholars, and विद्यार्थी is the Association for Public Policy विश्लेषण and Management.
पाचन is the mechanical and रासायनिक विश्लेषण of खाना into छोटी components कि हैं more easily absorbed into a blood stream, लिये उदाहरण.
Digestion is a form of catabolism : a breakdown of विशाल food अणुओं to smaller ones.
When food enters the mouth, digestion of the खाना starts by the कार्रवाई of mastication, a रूप of mechanical digestion, and the wetting सम्पर्क of saliva.
लार, a द्रव secreted by the salivary ग्रंथियों, contains salivary amylase, an enzyme which starts the digestion of starch in the food.
बाद undergoing mastication and मंड digestion, the खाना will be in the form of a small, गोलाकार slurry mass called a bolus.
it होगा तब travel down the esophagus and into the stomach by the action of peristalsis.
Gastric juice in the stomach starts प्रोटीन पाचन.
gastric juice mainly contains हाइड्रोक्लोरिक एसिड and pepsin.
As these two chemicals may damage the stomach wall, mucus is स्रावित by the stomach, providing a slimy परत कि acts as a shield against the damaging effects of the chemicals.
at the same time protein digestion is occurring, mechanical mixing occurs by peristalsis, which हैं waves of muscular contractions that मूव along the पेट wall.
This allows the mass of food to further mix with the digestive enzymes.
बाद some समय ( typically an hour or दो in humans, 4–6 hours in dogs, somewhat shorter अवधि in हाउस बिल्लियों ), the resulting मोटा liquid is पुकारा chyme.
When the pyloric sphincter वाल्व opens, chyme enters the duodenum जहाँ it mixes साथ digestive enzymes from the pancreas, and then passes through the छोटी intestine, in which digestion continues.
When the chyme is fully पचता, it is अवशोषित into the blood.
95 % of अवशोषण of nutrients occurs in the small intestine.
जल and खनिज are reabsorbed वापस into the रक्त in the colon ( विशाल intestine ) जहाँ the pH is slightly acidic परिचय 5.6 ~ 6.9.
कुछ vitamins, such as biotin और vitamin k ( K2MK7 ) उत्पादित by bacteria in the colon हैं भी अवशोषित into the रक्त in the colon.
बर्बाद material is eliminated from the मलाशय दौरान defecation.
हेनरी VIII ( 28 June 1491 – 28 January 1547 ) was king of England from 21 April 1509 until उसके मौत.
he was रब, और बाद king, of Ireland, as खूब as continuing the नाममात्र claim by the English monarchs to the Kingdom of फ़्रांस.
हेनरी was the second monarch of the ट्यूडर dynasty, succeeding उसके father, हेनरी VII.
Besides उसके छह marriages, हेनरी VIII is known for his भूमिका in the विरह of the Church of इंग्लैण्ड इससे the Roman Catholic गिरिजाघर.
Henry 's struggles with Rome led to the विरह of the Church of England from papal प्राधिकार, the Dissolution of the monasteries, और उसके own स्थापना as the Supreme सिर of the गिरिजाघर of England.
yet he remained a believer in core Catholic theological teachings, even after his excommunication इससे the Roman Catholic Church.
Henry oversaw the legal union of England and Wales साथ the कानून in Wales Acts 1535 and 1542.
in 1513, the नई किंग allied साथ the पावन रोमन Emperor, maximillian i, and invaded फ़्रांस in 1513 साथ a large, well-equipped army, but achieved little at a considerable financial लागत.
Maximillian, for his part, प्रयुक्त the अंग्रेज़ी invasion to उसके own ends, और this prejudiced England 's क्षमता to शिकस्त the फ्रेंच.
इस foray होता prove the start of an obsession for Henry, who invaded again in 1544.
इस समय, हेनरी 's शक्तियां captured the important city of Boulogne, लकिन again the पावन Roman Emperor, Charles v, supported Henry तभी as long as he needed to and इंग्लैण्ड, strained by the विशाल cost of the war, ransomed the city back for सलाम.
उसके contemporaries considered Henry in his prime to be an attractive, educated and accomplished king, और he has been वर्णित as `` one of the most charismatic शासकों to sit on the English सिंहासन ''.
Besides ruling साथ absolute power, he also engaged himself as an author and composer.
His ख्वाहिश to provide England साथ a पुरूष heir – which stemmed partly from personal vanity and partly because he believed a daughter होता be असमर्थ to consolidate the Tudor dynasty and the fragile सलाम कि existed following the Wars of the गुलाब – led to the two बाते for which Henry is सबसे remembered : his six marriages and the अंग्रेज़ी Reformation.
Henry became morbidly obese and his स्वास्थ्य suffered, contributing to his death in 1547.
He is अक्सर characterised in his later life as a lustful, egotistical, हर्ष, and असुरक्षित किंग.
Bongos ( Spanish : bongó ) हैं an Afro-Cuban percussion instrument.
The drums are of different आकार : the larger drum is called in Spanish the hembra ( female ) and the छोटी the मर्दाना ( male ).
They are membranophones, or instruments that create ध्वनि by a स्पंदन of a stretched झिल्ली.
Different religious groups शामिल अलग किताबे in their Biblical canons, in varying orders, and sometimes divide or combine books, or incorporate additional सामग्री into canonical books.
ईसाई bibles range from the sixty-six किताबे of the Protestant canon to the eighty-one books of the Ethiopian Orthodox tewahedo Church canon.
The यहूदी Bible, or tanakh, contains twenty-four books divided into तीन भाग ; the five किताबे of the Torah ( `` teaching '' or `` law '' ), the Nevi'im ( `` नबियों '' ), और the ketuvim ( `` कृतियाँ '' ).
The पहला part of ईसाई Bibles is the बूढ़ा वसीयत, which contains, at न्यूनतम, the twenty-four books of the यहूदी बाइबल विभाजित into thirty-nine किताबे और ordered differently from the Hebrew Bible.
the Catholic गिरिजाघर और Eastern Christian churches भी hold certain deuterocanonical किताबे और passages to be भाग of the बूढ़ा Testament canon.
The दूसरी भाग is the New Testament, containing twenty-seven books ; the चार Canonical gospels, Acts of the रसूलों, twenty-one Epistles or अक्षर and the Book of Revelation.
The Eastern परंपरागत, प्राच्य Orthodox and Eastern Catholic चर्च may have minor मतभेद in their lists of accepted किताबे.
the सूची given यहाँ लिये these चर्च is the most समावेशी : if at तनिक एक पूर्वी church accepts the book it is शामिल यहाँ.
the नेशनल flag of the संयुक्त States of America, often बस referred to as the अमरीकी ध्वज, consists of thirteen equal आड़ा stripes of red ( top and bottom ) alternating with white, with a blue rectangle in the canton ( referred to specifically as the `` union '' ) bearing पचास छोटी, श्वेत, five-pointed stars arranged in नौ ऑफसेट आड़ा पंक्ति of six सितारों ( शीर्ष और bottom ) प्रत्यावर्ती साथ पंक्ति of five stars.
The 50 सितारों on the flag represent the 50 राज्य of the संयुक्त राज्य of America and the 13 stripes represent the thirteen British colonies that declared स्वतंत्रता from the Kingdom of Great Britain and became the first states in the Union.
Nicknames for the ध्वज include the `` Stars and Stripes '', `` बूढ़ा महिमा ``, and `` The Star-Spangled ध्वज. ''
Dred स्कॉट v. Sandford,, भी ज्ञात as the Dred स्कॉट Decision, थी a लैंडमार्क निर्णय by the U.S. Supreme Court.
it made two main rulings.
the पहला ruling was that African-Americans were not नागरिकों, और इसलिए had no standing to sue in संघीय court.
the second ruling थी that the संघीय government had no power to regulate गुलामी in any territory acquired subsequent to the creation of the United राज्य.
दिए the first ruling, सबसे विद्वानों and many समकालीन political आंकड़े ( including the leadership of the then-new Republican Party ) माना कि the दूसरी सत्ताधारी थी नहीं binding precedent, but mere dictum.
the युक्तिसंगत of the परम् Court regarding the jurisdictional सत्ताधारी implied कि people of अफ़्रीकी descent ( both स्लेव and free ) यहूद नहीं protected by the संविधान and यहूद नहीं U.S. citizens.
Since passage of the 14th Amendment to the U.S. संविधान, दोनो rulings हैं superseded और no longer valid precedent.
Nonetheless, the case retains ऐतिहासिक significance as it is widely regarded as the worst decision ever made by the परम् Court.
The राय of the court, written by मुख्य Justice Roger B. taney, stirred बहस.
the decision थी 7–2, और every Justice besides Taney wrote a पृथक concurrence or dissent.
For the पहला time since marbury v. मैडिसन, the अदालत held an अधिनियम of Congress to be unconstitutional.
Dred Scott, an African-American slave, था asked a United States Circuit अदालत to पुरस्कार उसे his freedom क्युकी he and उसके master had resided in a state ( Illinois ) and a territory ( विस्कॉन्सिन territory ) where गुलामी had been बैन.
Chief Justice रोजर taney, लिखने for the court, held that स्कॉट, as a person of अफ़्रीकी ancestry, was नहीं a citizen of the United States and इसलिए had no सही to sue in federal court.
This holding was contrary to the practice of numerous राज्य at the time, विशेषकर Free राज्य, where free blacks did in फैक्ट आनंद the अधिकारों of citizens, such as the right to vote and थाम public office.
In what is sometimes considered mere obiter dictum, the Court गई on to थाम कि Congress had no प्राधिकार to prohibit गुलामी in संघीय territories because slaves हैं निजी property and the Fifth amendment to the संविधान protects property owners against पिछडे of their property without due process of law.
in reaching this निर्णय, Taney had hoped to settle the growing controversy surrounding slavery in the United राज्य, but it had the विपरीत effect.
The निर्णय was fiercely debated across the देश, as perhaps बेहतरीन सरंचनाओं by the Lincoln–Douglas debates of 1858.
Abraham lincoln, the second-ever रिपब्लिकन nominee लिये अध्यक्ष, was समर्थ to win the अध्यक्षीय election in 1860 ; the stopping of the further expansion of slavery was a कुंजी रिपब्लिकन पार्टी यों.
The decision played an important role in the समय of राज्य secession और the Civil War, हालांकि it is extreme to say the decision `` caused '' the war.
The decision is acknowledged लिये the influential भूमिका it निभाई in altering the national political landscape : it is credited साथ शुभारंभ Abraham Lincoln’s national राजनैतिक career and ultimately allowing लिये his चुनाव.
Although the Supreme अदालत has never explicitly overruled the Dred स्कॉट मामला, the Court stated in the slaughter-house Cases that at least एक भाग of it था already महरूम overruled by the fourteenth amendment in 1868, which begins by stating, `` All persons born or देशीयकृत in the United States, और subject to the jurisdiction thereof, हैं citizens of the संयुक्त राज्य और of the State wherein they reside. ''
to which the Court noted:
The पहला observation we have to make on this clause is, कि it puts at rest both the सवाल जिससे we stated to have महरूम the subject of मतभेद of राय.
it declares that persons may be citizens of the United States बगैर लिहाज़ to their नागरिकता of a particular राज्य, और it overturns the dred Scott निर्णय by making all persons born भीतर the United राज्य and विषय to its क्षेत्राधिकार citizens of the United राज्य.
There are dozens of neighborhoods in कोलंबस, ओहियो.
Some are hard to define, as वे encompass large areas विकसित at अलग times—often with sub-neighborhoods within them.
Borders can also change based on लोकप्रिय understanding of the क्षेत्रफल, as well as the whims of the residents.

Excerpts and border information are drawn directly from the main आलेख.
A biologist is a scientist जो अध्ययन living जीवों और their relationship to their environment.
biologists शामिल in basic research attempt to discover underlying mechanisms that govern how organisms कार्य.
Biologists involved in applied research attempt to develop or improve चिकित्सा, औद्योगिक or agricultural प्रक्रियाओं.

Base jumping from a चट्टान in a wingsuit.
आधार jumping, also sometimes written as B.A.S.E. jumping, is an कार्यकलाप where participants jump from फिक्स्ड objects and use a parachute to ब्रेक their fall.
`` BASE '' is an एक्रोनिम that stands लिये four श्रेणी of fixed objects इससे जिससे एक can जम्प : buildings, एन्टेना, spans ( bridges ), और earth ( cliffs ).
The British shorthair is a domesticated cat whose सुविधाएँ मेक it a लोकप्रिय नस्ल in cat shows.
It रै been the most popular नस्ल of cat registered by the UK 's Governing Council of the बिल्ली Fancy ( GCCF ) since 2001, when it overtook the Persian breed.
The USA बास्केट मेन 's Senior नेशनल टोली, commonly ज्ञात as the United States men 's national basketball टोली, represents the संयुक्त States of America in अंतरराष्ट्रीय मेन 's basketball.
The USA is the most successful team in international competition, जीतना medals in सब seventeen ओलम्पिक tournaments it has entered, coming दूर साथ चौदह golds.
Two of its सुनहरा medal-winning दस्तों यहूद inducted to the naismith मेमोरियल Basketball हॉल of Fame as टीमों in अगस्त 2010—the 1960 टोली, which featured छह Hall of Famers ( 4 खिलाड़ी, 2 coaches ), और the 1992 `` सपना Team '', featuring 14 हॉल of Famers ( 11 players, 3 coaches ).
The संयुक्त States is currently ranked first in the fiba World Rankings.
traditionally रचित of amateur players, a 1989 rule बदलें by FIBA अनुमत USA बास्केट to field teams with पेशेवर players.
The पहला such team, known as the `` सपना टोली '', जीती the gold medal at the 1992 गर्मियाँ ओलंपिक in Barcelona, स्पेन, playing in the final विरूद्ध Croatia.
साथ the introduction of professionals, the टोली थी able to चिंगारी a second चलाएं of दबदबा after capturing only a कांस्य पदक in 1988.
a team of पेशेवर players competed at the 1994 fiba संसार Championship, finishing first.
In 1996, 2000, 2008, and 2012 the USA again captured सुनहरा medals.
Facing increased competition, the USA विफल to win a medal at the 2002 FIBA संसार चैंपियनशिप, finishing sixth.
the 2004 Summer Olympic टोली lost three games on its रास्ता to a कांस्य पदक, a रिकार्ड that represented more नुकसान in a सिंगल year than the देश 's Olympic टीमों था suffered in all previous Olympiads combined.
संकल्पित to put an समाप्त to these failures, यूएसए Basketball initiated a long-term प्रोजेक्ट aimed at creating better, अधिक cohesive teams.
the USA जीती its पहला seven games at the 2006 FIBA World Championship in जापानी पहले losing against Greece in the semi-finals, ending the competition साथ the कांस्य medal.
the USA won gold two years later, हालांकि, at the 2008 गर्मियाँ Olympics with a प्रबल performance.
इस success was followed up at the 2010 FIBA World चैंपियनशिप, जहाँ despite fielding a roster featuring no players from the 2008 Olympic team, the यूएसए did नहीं lose a single game en रूट to defeating host Turkey for the सुनहरा पदक.
The यूएसए continued this streak of दबदबा by going undefeated और capturing gold once अधिक at the 2012 गर्मियाँ ओलंपिक.

The Super कटोरी ring is an पुरस्कार in the National फ़ुटबॉल लीग given to the winners of the लीग 's सालाना World चैंपियनशिप game, the Super Bowl.

the डायन 's उंगली in the carlsbad Caverns
a stalagmite ( or ; from the यूनानी σταλαγμίτης - stalagmitês, from σταλαγμίας - stalagmias, `` छोड़ने, trickling '' ) is a type of speleothem कि rises इससे the मंजिल of a चूना cave due to the टपकता of mineralized solutions and the deposition of calcium कार्बोनेट.
इस stalagmite गठन occurs तभी under निश्चित pH conditions within the underground cavern.
The सम्बन्धित formation on the ceiling of a cave is ज्ञात as a stalactite.
if these formations grow together, the परिणाम is known as a column.
The हॉल of दिग्गज in the carlsbad Caverns
Stalagmites चाहिए normally नहीं be छुआ, since the rock buildup is formed by minerals precipitating आउट of the जल solution onto the बूढ़ा surface ; skin oils can alter the सतह where the खनिज जल will cling, thus affecting the growth of the गठन.
Oils और मैल from इंसान सम्पर्क can also stain the formation and change इसके रंग permanently.
Similar structures can also रूप in lava tubes, associated with some प्रकार of lavacicles, although the mechanism of गठन is very different.
Stalactites and stalagmites can also form on concrete ceilings and floors, हालांकि they form much more rapidly वहीँ than in the natural गुफा पर्यावरण.
The largest stalagmite in the world is high and is located in the गुफा of Cueva मार्टिन Infierno, Cuba.
in the ज़ाग्रोस Mountains of दक्षिण Iran, लगभग इससे the ancient नगर of bishapur, in the Shapur गुफा on the fourth of five terraces स्टैंड the 3rd century CE प्रतिमा of Shapur I, दूसरी ruler of the सासानी Empire.
The statue, carved from एक stalagmite, is nearly ऊँची.
How I Met Your Mother is an American sitcom कि premiered on CBS on सितंबर 19, 2005.
The दिखाएँ was created by Craig थामस and Carter Bays.
How I Met Your माँ is framed by the year 2030, जब टेड mosby ( voiced by bob Saget ) gathers his बेटी ( Lyndsy fonseca ) और son ( David Henrie ) to बताना उन्हें the स्टोरी of how he met उनके mother.
we flashback to where it begins in 2005 with टेड Mosby ( Josh Radnor ) as a single, 27-year-old architect living साथ उसके two best मित्रों from Wesleyan University, मार्शल eriksen ( जेसन Segel ), a law student, और Lily Aldrin ( alyson Hannigan ), a kindergarten टीचर, जो have been डेटिंग लिये almost नौ years when Marshall proposes.
Their engagement causes टेड to सोचो परिचय ढूंढना उसके अपना soul mate, much to the disgust of उसके dost Barney stinson ( Neil पैट्रिक Harris ), a womanizer with an बेनाम corporate job.
और thus, Ted begins उसके search for उसके perfect mate, and meets रोबिन Scherbatsky ( Cobie Smulders ), whom he भी befriends.
The 100th episode of कैसा I मिले अपना Mother aired on January 11, 2010.
On December 21, 2012, the series was renewed लिये a ninth season.
On January 30, 2013, it was घोषित that Season 9 होगा be its final ऋतु.
Gringo (,, ) is a slang Spanish and Portuguese word used in ibero-america, to denote foreigners, प्रायः from the United States.
The term can be लागू to someone who is actually a foreigner, or it can denote a दमदार association or assimilation into विदेशी ( particularly US ) society and culture.
In स्पेनी it करता not have a ऋणात्मक connotation.
Roger Axtell, a travel तहज़ीब विशेषज्ञ, टीप कि `` [ t ] he शब्द gringo is not necessarily a bad word.
it is slang लकिन is derogatory only in its उपयोग and context. ''
The शब्द थी प्रयुक्त in Spain long before it crossed the अटलांटिक to denote foreign, non-native अध्यक्षों of Spanish.
the ग्रेट white शार्क, Carcharodon carcharias, also known as the great श्वेत, white सूचक, white शार्क, or white मौत, is a प्रजाति of विशाल lamniform shark which can be मिला in the coastal सतह waters of सब the प्रमुख महासागर.
The ग्रेट white शार्क is मुख्यतः known for its size, with the largest individuals known to have approached or exceeded in length, और in weight.
इस shark पहुँच its maturity around 15 सालो of आयु and can have a life स्पैन of over 30 years.
The ग्रेट white शार्क is arguably the world 's largest known extant macropredatory मछली, and is one of the primary परभक्षी of marine स्तनधारियों.
it is also ज्ञात to शिकार upon a किस्में of other marine animals, including fish और seabirds.
It is the only ज्ञात surviving species of इसके genus Carcharodon, and is क्रमित first in having the most attacks on इंसानो.
The IUCN सूची the great white shark as a vulnerable प्रजाति, जबकि it is included in Appendix ii of CITES.
the bestselling novel Jaws by Peter benchley और the subsequent blockbuster फिल्मी by Steven स्पिलबर्ग चित्रित the great श्वेत शार्क as a `` ferocious man eater ``.
In reality, humans हैं not the preferred शिकार of the great white shark.
the United States हथियारबंद शक्तियां हैं the सैन्य forces of the United States of America.
वे consist of the Army, नेवी, Marine Corps, एयर Force, and Coast Guard.
the U.S. has a दमदार परंपरा of civilian control of the सैन्य.
the अध्यक्ष is the सैन्य 's overall सिर, और helps form military नीति साथ the u.S. Department of Defense ( dod ), a federal executive department, एक्टिंग as the प्रिंसिपल organ by जिससे सैन्य नीति is carried आउट.
The DoD is headed by the Secretary of Defense, who is a civilian and कैबिनेट सदस्य.
the Defense सचिव is second in the military 's कड़ी of कमांड, just below the President, and serves as the principal सहायक to the President in सब DoD-related matters.
To coordinate military action with कूटनीति, the अध्यक्ष रै an सलाहकार National सुरक्षा Council headed by a नेशनल Security सलाहकार.
Both the अध्यक्ष और Secretary of Defense are advised by a seven-member Joint Chiefs of स्टाफ, which includes the सिर of प्रत्येक of the रक्षा Department 's service branches as well as the chief of the नेशनल Guard Bureau.
नेतृत्व is provided by the अध्यक्ष of the Joint chiefs of Staff and the Vice Chairman of the Joint chiefs of स्टाफ.
The कमांडेंट of the coast Guard is not a सदस्य of the Joint chiefs of Staff.
All of the branches work together during परिचालन and संयुक्त missions, under the Unified Combatant Commands, under the प्राधिकार of the सचिव of रक्षा साथ the exception of the Coast Guard.
the Coast Guard जलप्रपात अंतर्गत the administration of the Department of Homeland Security and receives its operational orders इससे the Secretary of Homeland Security.
The Coast Guard may be transferred to the विभाग of the Navy by the President or Congress दौरान a time of war.
सब पाँच armed services are among the seven uniformed services of the United राज्य ; the others हैं the U.S. Public Health Service Commissioned corps and the National oceanic and Atmospheric Administration Commissioned Corps.
From the समय of its inception, the सैन्य played a निर्णायक role in the history of the United States.
a sense of national एकता and identity was forged as a परिणाम of victory in the First barbary War and the Second Barbary युद्ध.
Even so, the Founders were suspicious of a स्थाई military force and not जबतक the outbreak of संसार युद्ध ii did a large standing army become officially established.
the National Security अधिनियम of 1947, adopted following World War ii and during the Cold War 's onset, निर्मित the modern u.S. सैन्य framework ; the Act merged previously Cabinet-level विभाग of युद्ध and the Department of the नेवी into the नेशनल Military Establishment ( renamed the Department of Defense in 1949 ), headed by the सचिव of रक्षा ; and created the विभाग of the एयर Force और National Security परिषद.
The u.S. सैन्य is one of the largest militaries in terms of number of कर्मियों.
It draws its manpower from a large पूल of paid volunteers ; हालांकि conscription has महरूम used in the past in various times of both war और peace, it has नहीं महरूम used चूंकि 1972.
As of 2013, the U.S. spends about $ 554.2 billion annually to fund its military forces, and appropriates लगभग $ 88.5 अरब to निधि Overseas Contingency Operations.
put together, the U.S. constitutes roughly 43 percent of the संसार 's military expenditures.
the U.S. Armed Forces as a whole possess विशाल quantities of advanced and powerful equipment, along with widespread अवस्थिति of forces around the world, giving them significant सामर्थ्य in both रक्षा और शक्ति projection.
Freedom of speech is the political सही to communicate one 's opinions and ideas using one 's body and प्रॉपर्टी to anyone who is willing to receive them.
the पद freedom of अभिव्यक्ति is sometimes used synonymously, but includes कोई अधिनियम of seeking, receiving and imparting information or विचार, regardless of the मीडियम used.
In अभ्यास, the सही to freedom of वाक is not absolute in कोई देश और the right is commonly विषय to limitations, as with libel, बदनामी, obscenity, sedition ( including, for example inciting ethnic hatred ), कापीराइट उल्लंघन, रहस्योद्घाटन of information that is वर्गीकृत or otherwise.
The सही to freedom of expression is पहचाना as a human सही अंतर्गत Article 19 of the Universal Declaration of Human Rights and recognized in international इंसान rights law in the अंतरराष्ट्रीय वचन on सिविल और Political Rights ( iccpr ).
Article 19 of the ICCPR states that `` [ e ] veryone shall have the right to hold राय without हस्तक्षेप '' and `` everyone shall have the right to freedom of expression ; this सही shall include स्वतंत्रता to seek, receive और impart सूचना and ideas of all kinds, regardless of frontiers, either orally, in writing or in print, in the form of art, or through any other media of his choice ''.
Article 19 goes on to say कि the कसरत of these rights carries `` special duties and responsibilities `` and may `` इसलिए be subject to certain प्रतिबंध '' when necessary `` [ f ] or आदर of the अधिकारों or प्रतिष्ठा of others '' or `` [ f ] or the protection of नेशनल सुरक्षा or of public order ( अनुक्रम पब्लिक ), or of public health or नैतिकता ''.
Freedom of speech may be legally curtailed in some religious legal systems और in secular jurisdictions जहाँ it is found to cause religious offense, ऐसे as the अंग्रेजों जातिगत और Religious Hatred अधिनियम 2006.
the Big Bang Theory लोगो.
The Big Bang Theory is an American कॉमेडी टेलीविज़न श्रेणी created और executive produced by Chuck Lorre and Bill Prady.
Like the name of the श्रेणी itself, साथ the exception of the पहला episode— '' Pilot '' —episode शीर्षक of the बिग बंग सिद्धान्त सदा प्रारंभ with `` the '' और resemble the name of a scientific principle, theory or experiment, whimsically referencing a प्लाट point or quirk.
, 133 episodes have aired.
the Big Bang Theory रै been नवीनीकृत for a seventh ऋतु.
Dwight David `` Ike '' Eisenhower ( सुनाया, ; October 14, 1890 – कूच 28, 1969 ) was the 34th अध्यक्ष of the United States इससे 1953 जबतक 1961.
he had previously been a five-star general in the United राज्य Army दौरान World War II और परोसा as Supreme Commander of the अलाइड शक्तियां in Europe ; he था responsibility लिये नियोजन और supervising the invasion of उत्तर Africa in Operation Torch in 1942–43 and the successful invasion of France and Germany in 1944–45 इससे the पश्चिमी Front.
in 1951, he became the first supreme commander of NATO.
Eisenhower थी of पेन्सिलवेनिया Dutch ancestry and was reared in a large परिवार in कान्सास by अभिभावक with a मजबूत work ethic and religious background.
As एक of six sons, he was conditioned by a competitive atmosphere which instilled self-reliance.
He attended and graduated from West पाइंट और later married and had two बेटे.
After World War ii, आइज़नहावर परोसा as Army Chief of स्टाफ अंतर्गत अध्यक्ष Harry S. ट्रूमैन, then assumed the post of अध्यक्ष at Columbia विश्वविद्यालयों.
Eisenhower डाला the 1952 presidential रेस as a Republican to counter the non-interventionism of Senator Robert A. Taft and to crusade विरूद्ध `` साम्यवादी, कोरियाई और भ्रष्टाचार ''.
He won by a landslide, defeating Democrat Adlai Stevenson and ending two decades of the New Deal Coalition.
in the पहला साल of उसके presidency, आइज़नहावर deposed the leader of इरान in the 1953 Iranian coup d'état and प्रयुक्त नाभिकीय threats to conclude the Korean War साथ चीन.
His New dekh policy of नाभिकीय deterrence gave प्रधानता to inexpensive नाभिकीय हथियार जबकि reducing the funding for conventional military forces ; the goal was to keep pressure on the सोवियत संघ और reduce federal deficits.
in 1954, Eisenhower पहला articulated the domino theory in his वर्णन of the threat presented by the spread of साम्यवादी.
The कॉंग्रेस agreed to his निवेदन in 1955 लिये the Formosa रेज़ोल्यूशन, जिससे enabled उसे to prevent Chinese कम्युनिस्ट आक्रामकता against Chinese nationalists and established the U.S. नीति of defending Taiwan.
When the Soviets launched Sputnik in 1957, he had to खेल catch-up in the space रेस.
Eisenhower forced इसराईल, the uk, और फ़्रांस to end उनके invasion of Egypt during the स्वेज Crisis of 1956.
in 1958, he sent 15,000 us troops to लेबनान to prevent the pro-Western government from गिरना to a Nasser -inspired revolution.
Near the end of his term, उसके efforts to set up a summit meeting with the Soviets collapsed because of the u-2 incident.
On the domestic front, he covertly opposed Joseph मैकार्थी और contributed to the end of mccarthyism by openly invoking the आधुनिक expanded version of कार्यपालिका privilege.
He वरना left सबसे political कार्यकलाप to उसके वाइस अध्यक्ष, Richard निक्सन.
He was a moderate रूढ़िवादी जो जारी New Deal agencies और expanded Social सुरक्षा.
among his enduring innovations, he launched the Interstate Highway System ; the Defense Advanced शोध Projects एजेंसी ( DARPA ), which led to the internet, among अनेक invaluable आउटपुट ; the नेशनल Aeronautics और Space Administration ( नासा ), ड्राइविंग peaceful डिस्कवरी in space ; the establishment of strong science शिक्षा via the नेशनल Defense Education Act ; and प्रोत्साहित peaceful उपयोग of नाभिकीय शक्ति via amendments to the परमाणु Energy अधिनियम.
in social policy, he sent federal सैनिकों to छोटी Rock, अरकंसास, for the first time since पुनर्निर्माण to enforce federal court आदेश to desegregate public स्कूलों.
He also signed civil अधिकारों legislation in 1957 और 1960 to protect the सही to vote.
he implemented desegregation of the armed forces in दो years and बना five appointments to the परम् Court.
He was the पहला term-limited अध्यक्ष in accordance with the 22nd Amendment.
Eisenhower 's two शर्तें were peaceful ones लिये the सबसे part and saw considerable आर्थिक समृद्धि मगर for a sharp मंदी in 1958–59.
Eisenhower is often ranked highly among the U.S. Presidents.
एयर फ़ोर्स One is the official air traffic control कॉल sign of a United States एयर Force aircraft carrying the अध्यक्ष of the United States.
In common parlance the पद refers to those Air Force वायुयान specifically designed, निर्मित, और used for the purpose of transporting the अध्यक्ष.
the Presidential aircraft is a prominent प्रतीक of the American presidency और इसके शक्ति.
the idea of designating specific military वायुयान to transport the President arose in 1943, when officials of the संयुक्त राज्य Army Air Forces – the predecessor to the U.S. Air Force – became चिंतित साथ relying on वाणिज्यिक एयरलाइंस to हस्तांतरण the अध्यक्ष.
a C-87 Liberator Express थी reconfigured for use as a presidential transport ; however, it was rejected by the Secret Service amid concerns over the aircraft 's safety रिकार्ड.
A C-54 Skymaster was then converted for presidential उपयोग ; this वायुयान, उतावले the पवित्र गाय, transported President फ्रैंकलिन D. Roosevelt to the yalta सम्मेलन in फ़रवरी 1945, and was subsequently प्रयुक्त for another दो सालो by अध्यक्ष Harry S. Truman.
the `` Air Force एक '' कॉल sign was निर्मित after a 1953 incident during जिससे a flight carrying President Dwight D. आइज़नहावर entered the वही airspace as a commercial airline flight using the वही कॉल sign.
Several aircraft have been used as एयर फ़ोर्स एक चूंकि the creation of the presidential fleet, including two बोइंग 707s introduced in the 1960s और 1970s, क्रमशः ; since 1990, the अध्यक्षीय fleet has consisted of two Boeing VC-25As – specifically विन्यस्त, highly customized Boeing 747-200B series aircraft.
The Air Force is looking into replacing the two VC-25 aircraft with तीन बदलना वायुयान beginning in 2017.
a wedding वर्षगांठ is the anniversary of the तिथि a विवाह took place.
Traditional names exist for most of उन्हें : लिये उदाहरण, 50 सालो of marriage is called a `` golden wedding वर्षगांठ '' or बस a `` सुनहरी वर्षगांठ ''.
A scanner with Duplexing Automatic दस्तावेज़ Feeder.
in multifunction or all-in-one printers, fax machines, photocopiers and scanners, an स्वचालित document feeder or ADF is a विशेषता जिससे takes several पृष्ठों and फ़ीड्स the paper one पेज at a समय into a scanner or कॉपियर, allowing the user to scan, and thereby नक़ल, print, or fax, multiple-page दस्तावेज़ without having to हस्तचालित बदलें each page.
सबसे copiers allow scanning on the फ्लैटबेड or platen ( the `` कांच '' ) or through a document फीडर.
the विशाल majority of fax machines have an ADF, allowing the unattended sending of multi-page faxes.
Due to the ubiquity of adf in fax machines, some fax machine स्वामी उपयोग the fax machine as a scanner, faxing multi-page दस्तावेज़ to themselves.
दस्तावेज़ feeders are वर्णित by speed, in pages प्रति मिनट or ppm, and क्षमता, usually in a range इससे 10 sheets to 200.
There are दो kinds of document feeders सक्षम of two-sided ( duplex ) स्कैनिंग : a reversing स्वचालित document फीडर or RADF scans one side of a पेज, तब flips it और scans the other पक्ष.
A duplexing automatic दस्तावेज़ फीडर or DADF scans both sides in one pass.
the लाभ of the dadf is faster गति लिये two-sided originals.
RADFs and dadfs are रेटेड in बिंब per मिनट ( IPM ), the number of sides they can स्कैन प्रत्येक minute.
मेला पार्क is a recreational और educational complex located in डलास, Texas ( यूएसए ).
The complex is registered as a डलास लैंडमार्क, नेशनल Historic Landmark और is घर to nine संग्रहालय, छह performance facilities, a लैगून, और the largest फेरिस wheel in उत्तर अमेरिका.
अनेक of the इमारतें on the complex were constructed for the Texas Centennial exposition in 1936 जिससे drew over छह लाख विज़िटर.
Most of the इमारतें निर्मित for the exposition still survive and it is पहचाना as a significant example of Art Deco architecture.
Fair पार्क रै been designated a Great Place in America by the American नियोजन Association.
the अमरीकी नियोजन Association ( apa ) “is an स्वतंत्र, not-for-profit शैक्षणिक संगठन that provides leadership in the development of vital communities.”
The Great स्थान in अमरीकी program helps to celebrate areas साथ “exemplary अक्षर, विशेषता, and planning.”
Being designated as a Great प्लेस in America, मेला Park was एक of only ten शहरों chosen in 2011.
San Jose ( ; स्पेनी : St. Joseph ) is the third-largest city in कैलिफ़ोर्निया, the tenth-largest in the U.S., और the काउंटी seat of Santa Clara काउंटी जिससे is स्तिथ at the southern समाप्त of San फ्रांसिस्को खाड़ी.
सैन Jose is the largest नगर within सिलिकॉन Valley, जिससे is a प्रमुख घटक of the greater सैन फ्रांसिस्को खाड़ी क्षेत्रफल, a region of 8.4 million लोगों and the पांचवां largest महानगर क्षेत्रफल ( सीएसए ) in the United राज्य.
it is the largest city in Northern California.
San जोस was संस्थापित on November 29, 1777, as El Pueblo de सैन José de Guadalupe, the पहला civilian कस्बा in the Spanish colony of Nueva California, जिससे बाद became alta California.
The city परोसा as a farming जातियाँ to support स्पेनी military installations at San फ्रांसिस्को and Monterey.
When California gained statehood in 1850, San Jose परोसा as इसके पहला capital.
After more than 150 सालो as a छोटी खेती नगर, San Jose and the surrounding Santa Clara Valley became the last ( and largest ) contiguous area of अविकसित जमीन surrounding the सैन Francisco Bay.
San जोस experienced increased demand for housing from soldiers और veterans returning from World War II.
सैन Jose then continued इसके आक्रामक विस्तार दौरान the 1950s and 1960s by annexing more land क्षेत्रफल.
The rapid growth of the high-technology and electronics industries further त्वरित the transition इससे an agricultural center, to an urbanized महानगर क्षेत्रफल.
By the 1990s, सैन Jose 's location भीतर the booming लोकल प्रौद्योगिकी industry earned the नगर its nickname, Capital of Silicon Valley.
San Jose अभी maintains वैश्विक नगर status and is the largest city in the San फ्रांसिस्को Bay क्षेत्रफल in terms of population, जमीन area, और industrial development.
the u.S. Census ब्यूरो reported the population of the नगर to be 945,942 as of the 2010 जनसांख्यिकी.
as of अप्रैल 2013, the अनुमानित जनसांख्यिकी of San जोस थी 984,000.
San Jose, along with the Santa Clara Valley, अनुभवी about half a सदी of spectacular suburban sprawl, with characteristics of intense शहरी समान to the Los एंजिल्स area of Southern कैलिफ़ोर्निया.
the city रै लिया definite कदम to avoid becoming `` L.A. उत्तर ''.
However, the sprawl in सैन जोस is बदतर than in Los एंजिल्स by उपायों ऐसे as जनसांख्यिकी density and पब्लिक पारगमन सुरक्षा, investment, and ridership.
Europe depicted by antwerp cartographer अब्राहम ortelius in 1595
the history of यूरोपीय covers the people inhabiting the European continent since it थी पहला populated in प्रागैतिहासिक times to उपस्थित, with the first Homo sapiens arriving between 45,000 and 25,000 BC.
The earliest settlers to Prehistoric यूरोपीय came during the paleolithic era.
The arrival of कृषि around 7000 bc ushered in the neolithic age.
पाषाणकालीन Europe lasted लिये 4000 years, overlapping with metal-using संस्कृतियों कि gradually स्प्रेड throughout the महाद्वीप.
Technological अग्रिम दौरान the prehistoric age tended to arrive from the मध्य ईस्ट, spreading धीरे to the northwest.
Some of the best-known सभ्यताओं of प्रागैतिहासिक Europe यहूद मिनोआई and माइसीनियाई, जिससे flourished during the Bronze आयु until they collapsed in a short काल of time around 1200 bc.
The काल ज्ञात as शास्त्रीय antiquity began with the rise of the city-states of प्राचीन Greece.
यूनानी influence पहुँचे its zenith under the expansive empire of सिकंदर the ग्रेट, spreading throughout Asia.
Northern and पश्चिमी यूरोपीय were वर्चस्व by the la tène संस्कृति, a precursor to the Celts.
रोम, a छोटी city-state traditionally संस्थापित in 753 bc, होता grow to become the Roman Republic in 509 BC और would सफल यूनानी संस्कृति as the dominant भूमध्यसागरीय सभ्यता.
The events of the नियम of Julius Caesar led to reorganization of the Republic into the रोमन साम्राज्य.
The साम्राज्य थी बाद विभाजित by the सम्राट diocletian into the Western and पूर्वी empires.
दौरान the बाद years of the Roman Empire, the Germanic peoples of northern Europe grew in शक्ति and repeated हमले led to the Fall of the Western Roman Empire in AD 476, a तिथि which traditionally marks the end of the classical period और the start of the मध्य Ages.
During the Middle Ages, the Eastern रोमन साम्राज्य survived, though modern इतिहासकारों refer to this state as the Byzantine Empire.
in Western Europe, Germanic peoples moved into positions of power in the remnants of the former Western रोमन Empire and स्थापित kingdoms and empires of उनके own.
Of all of the Germanic peoples, the Franks would वृद्धि to a position of Hegemony over पश्चिमी यूरोपीय, the frankish साम्राज्य reaching its peak under शारलेमेन around AD 800.
francia was divided into अनेक भाग ; West francia होता evolve into the Kingdom of France, while ईस्ट francia would evolve into the Holy Roman साम्राज्य, a precursor to modern जर्मनी.
The अंग्रेजों Isles यहूद the site of several large-scale migrations.
Native सेल्टिक peoples था महरूम marginalized दौरान the काल of रोमन ब्रिटेन, और when the romans abandoned the अंग्रेजों Isles during the 400s, लहरें of germanic Anglo-Saxons migrated to southern ब्रिटेन and स्थापित a series of petty kingdoms in what होता eventually develop into the किंगडम of England by ad 927.
दौरान this period, the किंगडम of Poland and Kingdom of Hungary ( 1000–1945 ) यहूद व्यवस्थित as खूब.
the Viking आयु, a period of migrations of scandinavian peoples, वर्चस्व the काल from the लेट 700s to the मध्य 1000s.
Chief among the viking राज्य was the Empire of cnut the Great, a Danish नेता जो होता become किंग of England, Denmark, and Norway.
The Normans, a viking people जो settled in Northern France and संस्थापित the duchy of Normandy, would have a significant impact on अनेक भाग of यूरोपीय, from the Norman conquest of इंग्लैण्ड to Southern Italy और सिसिली.
another Scandinavian people, the Rus ' people, would go on to found Kievan Rus ', an जल्दी state जिससे was a precursor for the आधुनिक country of Russia.
as the Viking Age drew to a close, the काल known as the क्रूसेड, a श्रेणी of religiously-motivated military रिझाने originally intended to bring the Levant back into ईसाई rule, began.
अनेक Crusader states were founded in the पूर्वी Mediterranean.
These यहूद all short-lived.
the Crusaders होता have a profound प्रभाव on many parts of यूरोपीय.
Their Sack of Constantinople in 1204 brought an abrupt end to the बीज़ान्टिन Empire.
Extinct dog breeds is a compilation of श्वान breeds कि have become विलुप्त.
Wii Speak is a माइक्रोफोन accessory for निन्टेंडो 's Wii वीडियो game कंसोल.
Connected to the console via USB, the यंत्र can be लगाई near the video प्रदर्शक, allowing आवाज़ chat to be conducted with the संपूर्ण रूम.
The यंत्र features an led to indicate when the microphone is क्रियाशील.
वी बोलो थी announced at निन्टेंडो 's 2008 E3 media drug.
It थी released separately और bundled साथ एनिमल क्रासिंग : नगर Folk on November 16, 2008, in North अमेरिका, and थी released on दिसम्बर 5, 2008, in यूरोपीय.
the वी Speak accessory is succeeded by the embedded माइक्रोफोन on the Wii U 's GamePad controller.
Nissan Intelligent key®
a smart कुंजी is an इलेक्ट्रॉनिक access and प्राधिकरण प्रणाली which is available as an विकल्प or standard in several cars.
It थी पहला विकसित by Siemens in the mid-1990s and introduced by Mercedes-Benz अंतर्गत the name `` keyless Go '' in 1998 on the W220 S-Class following its डिज़ाइन patent दायर by daimler-benz on May 17, 1997.
Univisión ( ) is a Spanish-language टेलीविज़न network in the United States.
The network is primarily समर्पित लिये लैटिन American families who reside in the United राज्य.
It has the largest audience of Spanish-language television दर्शक in the संसार according to nielsen ratings.
Randy falco, ( CEO as of June 29, 2011 ) COO, has been in charge of the कम्पनी since the departure of Univision Communications अध्यक्ष and सीईओ Joe Uva in April 2010.
In recent years the network has reached पैरिटी with the U.S. 's five major English-language television networks, and is प्रायः a दमदार fifth, outranking the CW, with some fourth-place साप्ताहिक placings, और as of 2012, even first place rankings for individual कार्यक्रम over सब five अंग्रेज़ी संजाल due to the network 's consistent schedule of new telenovelas सब 52 weeks of the साल.
Univisión is headquartered in New York, and has its major studios, उत्पादन facilities, and operations in Doral, Florida, a उपनगरीय of Miami.
In 2009, another television studio was announced, univision Studios, to be निर्मित in doral.
Univision is उपलब्धियाँ on cable और उपग्रह in most of the देश, साथ लोकल stations in over 50 बाज़ार with विशाल हिस्पैनिक and लातीनी populations and a नेशनल केबल संजाल feed distributed in markets without either the availability or the माँग for a locally-based स्टेशन.
Most of ये stations air full local न्यूज और other local प्रोग्रामिंग in जोड to network shows, and in major markets ऐसे as Los Angeles, नई यॉर्क, and Miami the local newscasts carried by the संजाल 's owned-and-operated स्टेशन ( O & O ) stations are बराबर प्रतिस्पर्धी साथ उनके English-language counterparts ratings-wise.
Univisión was acquired on March 29, 2007 by a consortium led by Haim Saban 's saban Capital Group ( जो had previously owned the एंटिटी Saban Entertainment ), TPG Capital, L.P., Providence इक्विटी साझेदार, मैडिसन Dearborn साझेदार, और Thomas H. Lee Partners for $ 13.7 billion or $ 36.25 per share प्लस $ 1.4 billion in acquired कर्ज़.
the buyout बाएँ the कम्पनी साथ a debt स्तर of twelve times its annual cash प्रवाह, which was twice the norm in buyouts किया over the previous दो सालो.
Artist 's conception of a protoplanetary disk
The formation and of the Solar प्रणाली is अनुमानित to have begun 4.6 अरब सालो पहले with the gravitational पतन of a small भाग of a giant आणविक cloud.
सबसे of the collapsing mass collected in the centre, forming the Sun, जबकि the rest flattened into a protoplanetary डिस्क out of जिससे the ग्रह, moons, asteroids, and other छोटी सौर System bodies formed.
इस widely accepted model, ज्ञात as the nebular hypothesis, थी पहला developed in the 18th सदी by Emanuel Swedenborg, immanuel Kant, and pierre-simon लाप्लास.
Its subsequent विकास रै interwoven a किस्में of scientific disciplines including astronomy, physics, भूविज्ञान, and ग्रहीय science.
चूंकि the dawn of the space age in the 1950s और the discovery of extrasolar ग्रह in the 1990s, the मॉडल has महरूम both challenged और refined to खाता for नई observations.
The सौर प्रणाली रै विकसित considerably चूंकि इसके आरंभिक गठन.
अनेक moons have formed इससे circling discs of gas और dust around their parent planets, while अन्य moons are विचार to have formed independently and बाद been captured by उनके planets.
Still others, as the धरती 's Moon, may be the परिणाम of giant collisions.
Collisions between bodies have occurred continually up to the present day and have महरूम सेंट्रल to the evolution of the सौर प्रणाली.
The positions of the ग्रह प्रायः shifted, and planets have switched places.
इस planetary migration is अभी thought to have been responsible लिये much of the सौर System 's early evolution.
In roughly 5 billion years, the Sun होगा cool और expand outward अनेक times its वर्तमान व्यास ( becoming a red दानव ), पहले ढलाई off its outer layers as a planetary nebula and leaving पीछे a stellar remnant ज्ञात as a white dwarf.
In the दूर distant भविष्य, the gravity of passing stars will gradually reduce the Sun 's retinue of planets.
Some planets होगा be नष्ट, अन्य ejected into interstellar space.
ultimately, over the course of tens of billions of years, it is likely that the Sun होगा be left साथ none of the original bodies in कक्षा around it.
the Trial ( काफ्का 's असली German title :, later as, and ) is a novel लिखा by Franz Kafka in 1914 और 1915 but not published until 1925.
One of काफ्का 's best-known works, it tells the स्टोरी of a man गिरफ्तार और prosecuted by a रिमोट, inaccessible प्राधिकार, with the प्रकृति of his crime नाज़िल to neither उसे nor the reader.
Like काफ्का 's अन्य novels, the Trial was never समाप्त, हालांकि it does शामिल a अध्याय which brings the स्टोरी to an end.
क्युकी of this वहीँ are निश्चित inconsistencies जिससे exist within the अनोखा, such as असमानताओं in timing in addition to other discontinuities in narration.
After काफ्का 's मौत in 1924 उसके dost और literary executor Max Brod edited the text for publication by Verlag Die Schmiede.
the original पाण्डुलिपि is held at the Museum of Modern Literature, Marbach am Neckar, Germany.
in 1999, the book was सूचीबद्ध in le Mondes 100 Books of the Century and as no. 2 of the बेहतरीन German Novels of the Twentieth Century.
Lisa ऐनी Loeb ( born March 11, 1968 ) is an American singer-songwriter and अभिनेत्री.
She शुभारम्भ her career in 1994 साथ the सोंग, `` रहो ( I छूटी तुम ) ``, जिससे was शामिल in the फिल्मी Reality Bites.
She थी the पहला कलाकार to have a number one सिंगल in the United States जबकि नहीं signed to a recording contract.
Her पाँच studio CDs include her major label debut, the gold-selling tails and its follow-up, the Grammy-nominated, gold-selling पटाखा.
Loeb रै भी worked in film, television, voice-over कार्य और children’s recordings.
Loeb has appeared in two television series, dweezil & Lisa, a weekly culinary एडवेंचर for the Food Network and क्रमांक 1 सिंगल, a reality show on the e !
Network in 2006 focused on उसके quest for love, success, career, and family.
उसके children 's music शामिल the albums कैच the चंद्रमा ( 2003 ), और शिविर लिसा ( 2008 ).
Her पहला संयुक्त children 's book and album Lisa Loeb 's Silly Sing-Along : The निराशाजनक Pancake and Other Zany गीतों was published in 2011.
In 2010 वो founded the Lisa Loeb चश्मा संग्रहण, which is based on her अपना designs.
the कोट of arms of the State of नई जर्सी includes:
a shield with तीन plows emblazoned, representative of New Jersey 's agricultural tradition.
A forward-facing नाईट 's हेल्मेट.
A घोड़ा 's head as the crest of the helmet.
The मादा figures स्वतंत्रता और Ceres, representative of the राज्य 's motto ( see next item ).
Liberty is holding a स्टाफ supporting a `` liberty कैप `` ; Ceres is holding an overflowing cornucopia.
The streamer at the foot of the emblem contains the राज्य motto of New जर्सी, `` स्वतंत्रता and समृद्धि '', और the year of statehood, 1776.
It थी originally designed by Pierre यूजीन du simitiere in 1777 और थी modified slightly in 1928.
The seal is the सेंट्रल मोटिफ in the ध्वज of नई Jersey and the ग्रेट Seal of the राज्य of New जर्सी.
the Coat of arms contains a horse 's head.
A helmet प्रर्दशित कि नई Jersey governs itself तदनुसार और तीन plows on a shield referring to the राज्य 's agriculture परंपरा, giving it the nickname `` Garden State ''.
The two देवियाँ represent the State motto, `` Liberty and समृद्धि ''.
स्वतंत्रता is on the बाएँ.
She is holding a staff with a स्वतंत्रता कैप on it, और the शब्द liberty underneath her.
the देवी on the right is Ceres, goddess of कृषि.
वो is holding a cornucopia with समृद्धि लिखा below उसके.
according to the minutes of the नई Jersey General सभा for कूच 11, 1896, the date in which the सभा officially approved the flag as the state emblem, the buff रंग is due indirectly to George Washington, who had ordered on अक्तूबर 2, 1779, that the वर्दी coats of the नई Jersey Continental Line be dark ( Jersey ) ब्लू, साथ buff facings.
Buff-colored facings had until then been reserved only for his own uniform and those of अन्य महाद्वीपीय सेनापतियों और उनके aides.
Then, on फ़रवरी 28, 1780, the महाद्वीपीय युद्ध Officers in Philadelphia निर्देशित that the uniform coat facings of all regiments were to be the same as the background रंग of the regiments ' state flag.

`` we Can Work It Out '' is a सोंग by the Beatles, written by पॉल McCartney और जॉन लेनन.
it was released as a `` double a-sided `` single with `` Day tripper ``, the first समय both पहलू of a सिंगल were so designated in an initial रिलीज.
Both गीतों were recorded दौरान the Rubber Soul sessions.
The song is an उदाहरण of Lennon–McCartney सहयोग at a गहराई that happened तभी rarely after वे लिखा the hit singles of 1963.
This song, `` A Day in the Life ``, `` Baby, तुम 're a समृद्ध man `` and `` i 've मिला a अहसास ``, are among the notable अपवाद.
As a चिकित्सा diagnosis, pedophilia or paedophilia is a psychiatric disorder in व्यक्तियों 16 years of age or older typically characterized by a प्राथमिक or exclusive यौन interest toward prepubescent children ( generally age 11 years or younger, हालांकि specific diagnosis criteria for the विकार extends the cut-off पाइंट for prepubescence to आयु 13 ).
an adolescent who is 16 years of आयु or older must be at तनिक five years older than the prepubescent child before the आकर्षण can be diagnosed as pedophilia.
The term has a दायरा of definitions, as मिला in psychiatry, मनोविज्ञान, the देशी, और law enforcement.
the अंतरराष्ट्रीय वर्गीकरण of Diseases ( ICD ) defines pedophilia as a `` disorder of adult personality और आचरण '' in जिससे there is a sexual वरीयता लिये children of prepubertal or early pubertal आयु.
According to the निदान और सांख्यिकीय Manual of दिमागी Disorders ( dsm ), it is a paraphilia in which adults or adolescents 16 years of age or older have intense and recurrent यौन urges towards and fantasies परिचय prepubescent children that वे have either acted on or which cause them distress or interpersonal difficulty.
In popular usage, pedophilia means any यौन interest in children or the अधिनियम of child sexual गाली, often termed `` pedophilic behavior ''.
For example, The अमरीकी Heritage stedman 's चिकित्सा शब्दकोष states, `` pedophilia is the act or काल्पनिक on the part of an adult of engaging in sexual कार्यकलाप with a child or children. ''
This common उपयोग application भी extends to the यौन ब्याज in and यौन सम्पर्क साथ pubescent or post-pubescent minors.
Researchers recommend that ये imprecise uses be avoided क्युकी हालांकि people who कमिट चाइल्ड sexual गाली commonly exhibit the disorder, कुछ offenders do नहीं meet the नैदानिक निदान मानकों लिये pedophilia और these standards pertain to prepubescents.
additionally, not सब pedophiles दरअसल कमिट such abuse.
Pedophilia was first formally recognized and नामित in the late 19th century.
A significant amount of शोध in the area has taken place चूंकि the 1980s.
Although mostly documented in मेन, वहीँ हैं also महिलाओं who प्रदर्शनी the विकार, और researchers assume available estimates underrepresent the true number of मादा pedophiles.
no इलाज़ for pedophilia रै been विकसित, but वहीँ are therapies कि can reduce the incidence of a person committing child sexual abuse.
in the United राज्य, following Kansas v. Hendricks, sex अपराधियों जो are diagnosed साथ certain दिमागी विकार, particularly pedophilia, can be subject to indefinite सिविल commitment, अंतर्गत various state laws ( generically called SVP कानून ) and the federal Adam Walsh Child Protection and Safety अधिनियम of 2006.
At उपस्थित, the exact causes of pedophilia have नहीं been conclusively established.
Research suggests कि pedophilia may be correlated with several different neurological abnormalities, और often co-exists साथ other personality disorders और मनोवैज्ञानिक pathologies.
in the contexts of forensic मनोविज्ञान and विधि enforcement, a variety of typologies have महरूम सुझाया to categorize pedophiles according to behavior and motivations.
जूलियो César chávez ( born जूलियो césar Chávez gonzález on July 12, 1962 ) is a retired मैक्सिकन professional boxer.
Chávez is माना by अनेक लोगों for उनके खेल statistics the greatest fighter ever to come आउट of मैक्सिको.
he is a six-time world champion in तीन weight divisions, and for several years he थी considered one of the best pound-for-pound boxer in the संसार.
In a career कि spanned over 25 सालो, Chávez जीती five world शीर्षक in three weight divisions : wbc Super Featherweight in 1984, WBA Lightweight in 1987, wbc lightweight in 1988, wbc Light Welterweight in 1989, IBF Light welterweight in 1990, और WBC Light welterweight in 1994.
He holds records लिये most कामयाब consecutive defenses of संसार titles ( 27 ), most title झगड़े ( 37 ), सबसे title-fight victories ( 31 ) and he is बाद जो लुई साथ ( 23 ) लिये सबसे title defenses won by नॉकआउट ( 21 ).
chávez also has the longest undefeated streak in मुक्केबाज़ी history, 13 सालो.
उसके रिकार्ड was 89-0-1 going into his first घाटा to फ्रेंकी रान्डेल and था an 87 लड़ो win streak जबतक his `` चित्रण '' साथ Whitaker.
Julio César Chávez थी known for his बकाया punching power, devastating देह आक्रमण, remarkably strong chin and the relentless stalking of उसके opponents.
he बाँधने # 24 on ईएसपीएन 's 50 Greatest मुक्केबाज of All समय.
on दिसम्बर 7, 2010, he was inducted in the prestigious International मुक्केबाज़ी हॉल of Fame for the Class of 2011.
he is the पिता of prospect ओमर Chávez and पूर्व WBC middleweight Champion जूलियो César chávez, jr.

the Holocaust ( from the Greek ' : hólos, `` whole '' और kaustós, `` जले '' ) भी known as the Shoah ( Hebrew :, hashoah, `` catastrophe '' ; यहूदी :, churben or hurban, from the Hebrew for `` destruction '' ), was the द्रव्यमान murder or नरसंहार of approximately छह लाख Jews दौरान World युद्ध II, a कार्यक्रम of systematic state-sponsored murder by Nazi Germany, led by एडोल्फ हिटलर और the Nazi Party, throughout german-occupied territory.
of the nine million Jews who had resided in यूरोपीय before the Holocaust, approximately two-thirds were killed.
Over one लाख Jewish children यहूद killed in the Holocaust, as were लगभग two million Jewish महिलाओं and three million Jewish men.
A संजाल of over 40,000 facilities in जर्मनी and german-occupied territory यहूद used to concentrate, थाम, and kill यहूदियों and other पीड़ितों.
कुछ विद्वानों argue that the द्रव्यमान हत्या of the Romani and लोगों with disabilities should be शामिल in the परिभाषा, और some use the आम noun `` holocaust '' to describe अन्य Nazi mass हत्याएं, सहित those of सोवियत बंदियों of युद्ध, Polish और सोवियत civilians, और homosexuals.
Recent estimates based on figures obtained since the पतन of the Soviet Union indicates some टेन to eleven million civilians और बंदियों of war were intentionally murdered by the नाजी शासन.
the persecution and नरसंहार were carried आउट in stages.
Various laws to remove the Jews इससे civil समाज, most prominently the Nuremberg Laws, यहूद enacted in जर्मनी years before the outbreak of संसार War II.
विशेषज्ञता शिविरों यहूद स्थापित in which inmates यहूद subjected to slave मजदूर जबतक वे died of exhaustion or disease.
Where Germany conquered नई territory in पूर्वी Europe, specialized इकाई पुकारा einsatzgruppen murdered Jews और political opponents in mass shootings.
The occupiers required Jews and Romani to be confined in overcrowded ghettos before होने transported by freight ट्रैन to extermination शिविरों where, if they survived the यात्रा, most were systematically killed in gas chambers.
Every भुजा of जर्मनी 's अफसरशाही was involved in the लोजिस्टिक्स that led to the genocides, turning the Third Reich into what one holocaust विद्वान has called `` a genocidal राज्य ''.
4-H in the संयुक्त States is a youth संगठन administered by the नेशनल संस्थान of खाना and Agriculture of the United States Department of कृषि ( USDA ), with the मिशन of `` engaging युवावस्था to reach their fullest potential while advancing the field of युवावस्था विकास. ''
the name represents four personal विकास areas of फ़ोकस for the संगठन : head, heart, हैंड्स, and स्वास्थ्य.
the organization has over 6.5 लाख members in the United States, इससे आयु five to twenty-one, in लगभग 90,000 clubs.
The लक्ष्य of 4-H is to develop नागरिकता, leadership, जिम्मेदारी और जीवन कौशल of युवावस्था through experiential learning programs और a धनात्मक युवावस्था development दृष्टिकोण.
Though typically thought of as an agriculturally focused संगठन as a result of इसके history, 4-H आज focuses on citizenship, healthy living, विज्ञान, अभियान्त्रिकी, और technology कार्यक्रम.
Today, 4-H और सम्बन्धित कार्यक्रम exist in over eighty countries around the संसार ; the organization और administration varies from country to country.
Each of these कार्यक्रम operates independently, but cooperatively through अंतरराष्ट्रीय exchanges, वैश्विक शिक्षा कार्यक्रम, and संचार.
The 4-H motto is `` To मेक the बेहतरीन बेहतर '', while its slogan is `` सीख by doing '' ( sometimes written as `` Learn to do by doing '' ).
the national ध्वज of Chile, consists of दो गैरबराबरी horizontal bands of white and red and a ब्लू square the वही height as the white band in the कैण्टन, which bears a white five-pointed star in the center.
It was adopted on 18 अक्तूबर 1817.
The chilean ध्वज is भी known in स्पेनी as la Estrella Solitaria ( The Lone स्टार ).
The star represents a मार्गदर्शिका to progress and honor ; blue symbolizes the आसमान और the Pacific समंदर, श्वेत is लिये the snow-covered andes, and रेड स्टैंड लिये the blood spilled to achieve independence.
According to the epic poem La araucana, the colors यहूद निकला इससे those इससे the ध्वज flown by the mapuche during the Arauco War.
`` ध्वज दिन '' is held each year on the नवीं of जुलाई to commemorate the 77 soldiers who died in the 1882 बैटल of La Concepción.
पीढी y, also ज्ञात as the Millennial पीढी, is the जनसांख्यिकी दल following पीढी x.
There हैं no precise तिथियाँ for जब पीढी Y starts and ends.
Commentators use beginning birth तिथियाँ from the latter 1970s, or इससे the early 1980s to the जल्दी 2000s.
the Torches of नीरो, by henryk siemiradzki.
According to tacitus, नीरो targeted Christians as those responsible for the fire.
The ग्रेट आग of Rome ( ) was an शहरी fire कि occurred beginning 19 July ad 64.
वर्जिनिया ( ), officially the Commonwealth of Virginia, is a u.S. state located in the South अटलांटिक प्रदेश of the United States.
Virginia is nicknamed the `` बूढ़ा डोमिनियन '' and the `` Mother of राष्ट्रपतियों '' बाद the आठ U.S. presidents born वहीँ.
the भूगोल और जलवायु of the Commonwealth are shaped by the Blue Ridge Mountains और the chesapeake खाड़ी, which provide habitat लिये much of its फ्लोरा and fauna.
The capital of the Commonwealth is रिचमंड ; and Virginia बीच is the most populous city.
फेयरफैक्स County is the most populous राजनैतिक subdivision.
The wealthiest is Loudoun County.
The राष्ट्रमंडल 's जनसांख्यिकी is over आठ लाख.
The क्षेत्रफल 's history begins साथ several indigenous groups, सहित the Powhatan.
In 1607 the लंदन Company स्थापित the Colony of वर्जिनिया as the first permanent New संसार अंग्रेज़ी उपनिवेश.
Slave labor and the land acquired from displaced Native American tribes प्रत्येक निभाई a significant role in the colony 's early politics और plantation अर्थव्यवस्था.
Virginia थी one of the 13 Colonies in the American क्रान्ति and joined the Confederacy in the American Civil War, during which Richmond was made the confederate capital and वर्जिनिया 's northwestern काउंटी seceded to form the राज्य of West Virginia.
हालांकि the Commonwealth was अंतर्गत रूढ़िवादी single-party rule for nearly a century following Reconstruction, both प्रमुख national parties हैं प्रतिस्पर्धी in modern वर्जिनिया.
The वर्जिनिया General Assembly is the oldest legislature in the पश्चिमी Hemisphere.
the state सरकारी रै महरूम repeatedly क्रमित सबसे effective by the Pew Center on the States.
It is unique in how it treats cities और counties equally, manages लोकल सड़कें, and prohibits its राज्यपालों इससे सेवारत consecutive शर्तें.
वर्जिनिया 's अर्थव्यवस्था has many sectors : agriculture in the Shenandoah Valley ; संघीय एजेंसियों in Northern Virginia, including the मुख्यालय of the विभाग of Defense and CIA ; and military सुविधाएं in Hampton Roads, the साईट of the region 's प्रमुख seaport.
वर्जिनिया 's पब्लिक schools और many कॉलेजों and universities have contributed to growing मीडिया और technology sectors.
As a result, कंप्यूटर chips have become the state 's leading export.
Windows फिल्म Maker ( formerly ज्ञात as Windows सजीव फिल्म Maker, codenamed sundance ) is a फ्रीवेयर वीडियो संपादन तन्त्र by Microsoft.
It is a भाग of Windows अनिवार्य software suite और offers the ability to बनाएँ and संपादन वीडियो as well as to publish them on skydrive, Facebook, YouTube, और Flickr.
`` Brenda 's मिला a Baby '' is the सोलो debut सिंगल by Tupac shakur, और tenth track from his debut album, 2pacalypse Now.
the सोंग, जिससे सुविधाएँ R & b singer डेव Hollister, is परिचय a twelve year-old लड़की named ब्रेंडा जो lives in a ghetto, has a baby, and is incapable of supporting it.
the song explores the समस्या of टीन pregnancy और its effect on the young माताओं और उनके families.
Like अनेक of shakur 's songs, `` Brenda 's Got a baby '' draws इससे the plight of the impoverished.
using Brenda to represent यंग माताओं in general, Shakur criticises the कम level of support from the baby 's पिता, the government, और समाज in सामान्य.
shakur wrote the song when he read a समाचारपत्र आलेख परिचय a twelve-year-old girl who got गर्भवती इससे her cousin और, because वो did नहीं want उसके अभिभावक to जान परिचय the baby, threw it in a कचरा can.
the official लोगो of पोकीमॉन लिये its international रिलीज ; `` Pokémon '' is short for the original Japanese शीर्षक of `` Pocket Monsters ''.
is a media franchise published and स्वामित्व by Japanese वीडियो game company Nintendo और created by सातोशी Tajiri in 1996.
originally released as a जोड़ी of interlinkable Game Boy role-playing video games developed by Game freak, पोकीमॉन रै चूंकि become the second-most successful और lucrative वीडियो game-based media franchise in the संसार, पीछे तभी निन्टेंडो 's own मारियो franchise.
Pokémon properties have चूंकि been merchandised into anime, manga, व्यापार cards, toys, किताबे, और other मीडिया.
The मताधिकार celebrated in 2006, और, संचयी sales of the video games ( सहित home console संस्करण, such as the `` Pikachu '' निन्टेंडो 64 ) have पहुँचे more than 200 लाख नक़ल.
in November 2005, 4Kids Entertainment, which had प्रबंधित the non-game related लाइसेंसिंग of पोकीमॉन, घोषित that it था agreed नहीं to नवीनीकृत the Pokémon प्रतिनिधित्व agreement.
पोकीमॉन USA inc. ( now the पोकीमॉन कम्पनी International ), a subsidiary of Japan 's Pokémon Co., now oversees सब Pokémon लाइसेंसिंग बाहर of Asia.
The नाम पोकीमॉन is the romanized संकुचन of the Japanese brand.
the पद पोकीमॉन, in जोड to referring to the पोकीमॉन मताधिकार itself, also collectively refers to the 649 fictional species that have made दिखावे in Pokémon मीडिया as of the release of the fifth पीढी titles Pokémon ब्लैक 2 and श्वेत 2 ; with the upcoming रिलीज of Pokémon X and Y, 6 new Pokémon have महरूम प्रदर्शित in promotions लिये the games.
`` पोकीमॉन '' is identical in दोनो the singular and plural, as is each individual प्रजाति name ; it is grammatically correct to कह `` one पोकीमॉन '' और `` many Pokémon '', as well as `` एक Pikachu `` और `` अनेक pikachu ''.

दादा ( ) or dadaism was an art movement of the यूरोपीय avant-garde in the early 20th century.
अनेक अर्जी Dada began in ज्यूरिख, Switzerland in 1916, spreading to Berlin shortly thereafter but the ऊँचाई of New यॉर्क Dada थी the साल पहले in 1915.
to quote डोना Budd 's the Language of आर्ट Knowledge, दादा was born आउट of ऋणात्मक प्रतिक्रिया to the horrors of World युद्ध I.
This international गति थी begun by a समूह of artist and poets संबद्ध साथ the Cabaret Voltaire in Zurich.
Dada rejected reason and logic, prizing nonsense, irrationality और intuition.
The origin of the name दादा is unclear ; some believe कि it is a nonsensical word.
अन्य maintain कि it originates इससे the रोमानियाई artists Tristan Tzara and Marcel janco 's frequent उपयोग of the words da, da, अर्थ यस, yes in the रोमानियाई भाषा.
Another theory says that the name `` Dada '' came during a meeting of the समूह when a paper चाकू stuck into a french-german शब्दकोष happened to point to 'dada ', a French word लिये 'hobbyhorse '.
The movement primarily involved visual कला, literature, poetry, art manifestoes, art theory, theatre, and graphic design, और concentrated its anti-war politics through a rejection of the prevailing मानकों in आर्ट through anti-art सांस्कृतिक works.
In जोड to होने anti-war, Dada थी भी anti- बुर्जुआ and था राजनैतिक affinities with the radical बाएँ.
Dada activities included public महफिलों, demonstrations, and प्रकाशन of art/literary journals ; passionate coverage of art, राजनीती, and culture were topics often discussed in a variety of मीडिया.
कुंजी figures in the movement included Hugo Ball, Emmy Hennings, Hans Arp, Raoul hausmann, हन्ना höch, योहानेस Baader, ट्रिस्टन tzara, Francis Picabia, Richard Huelsenbeck, Georg grosz, John Heartfield, Marcel Duchamp, Beatrice लकडी, कर्ट schwitters, and Hans Richter, among अन्य.
The गति influenced later styles जैसे the avant-garde और शहर music आंदोलनों, and groups सहित surrealism, Nouveau réalisme, pop art और fluxus.
दादा is the groundwork to abstract आर्ट and sound काव्य, a starting point लिये performance art, a prelude to postmodernism, an influence on पॉप art, a जश्न of antiart to be later embraced for anarcho-political uses in the 1960s and the movement that lay the foundation लिये Surrealism.
First trophic स्तर.
The पौधे in इस image, and the algae and phytoplankton in the lake, are primary निर्माता.
They take nutrients from the मृदा or the water, and manufacture their own खाना by photosynthesis, using energy इससे the sun.
the trophic स्तर of an सजीव is the position it occupies in a खाना कड़ी.
The word trophic गर्भाशयी from the Greek τροφή ( trophē ) referring to food or feeding.
a खाना कड़ी represents a succession of जीवों that eat another सजीव और are, in turn, eaten themselves.
the number of steps an organism is from the start of the chain is a measure of its trophic स्तर.
खाना जंजीरों प्रारंभ at trophic level 1 साथ primary निर्माता ऐसे as plants, move to herbivores at level 2, predators at स्तर 3 and typically finish साथ carnivores or apex predators at स्तर 4 or 5.
The path साथ the कड़ी can रूप either a one-way प्रवाह, or a food `` web. ''
ecological समुदायों साथ higher biodiversity रूप more complex trophic paths.
चार of the सबसे महत्वपूर्ण domesticated रेशा moths.
Top to bottom : Bombyx mori, hyalophora cecropia, antheraea pernyi, Samia cynthia.

a silk-producing raspy cricket.
रेशा is a natural protein fibre, कुछ forms of जिससे can be woven into textiles.
The protein fibre of रेशा is composed मुख्यतः of fibroin and produced by certain insect लार्वे to form cocoons.
The best-known प्रकार of silk is प्राप्त from the cocoons of the larvae of the शहतूत silkworm bombyx mori reared in captivity ( sericulture ).
The shimmering रूप of रेशा is due to the triangular prism -like ढांचा of the रेशा fibre, which allows silk cloth to refract incoming light at अलग कोण, यूँ producing different रंगों.
silks are उत्पादित by several अन्य insects, but generally तभी the silk of शलभ caterpillars has been used लिये वस्त्र निर्माण.
वहीँ रै been some research into अन्य silks, which differ at the molecular स्तर.
Many silks are mainly produced by the लार्वे of insects undergoing complete metamorphosis, but some adult कीट ऐसे as webspinners produce रेशा, and कुछ कीट ऐसे as raspy crickets produce रेशा throughout उनके lives.
रेशा production भी occurs in कलापक्ष ( मधुमक्खियों, wasps, and ants ), silverfish, mayflies, thrips, leafhoppers, beetles, lacewings, fleas, उड़ता and midges.
Other प्रकार of सन्धिपाद produce रेशा, most notably various arachnids such as मकड़ियों ( see spider silk ).

The दिखाएँ leads अन्य late night shows in ad revenue with $ 271 million in 2009.
In most U.S. बाज़ार the show airs at 11:35 p.m. eastern/pacific समय, but is अंकित Monday through बुधवार at 4:30 p.m., और गुरुवार at 3:30 p.m and 6:00 p.m.
The दूसरी गुरुवार episode प्रायः airs on Friday of that सप्ताह.

Cyberstalking is the use of the अंतरजाल or other इलेक्ट्रॉनिक means to stalk or harass an individual, a समूह of individuals, or an organization.
it may include the बनाना of false accusations or statements of fact ( as in defamation ), निगरानी, making threats, identity theft, damage to data or equipment, the solicitation of नाबालिग लिये sex, or महफ़िल information कि may be used to harass.
The definition of `` harassment '' जरूर meet the criterion that a reasonable व्यक्ति, in possession of the same सूचना, would regard it as sufficient to cause another उचित व्यक्ति distress.
cyberstalking is अलग from स्थानिक or offline stalking in that it occurs through the use of electronic communications प्रौद्योगिकी ऐसे as the internet.
However, it sometimes लीड to it, or is accompanied by it.
दोनो हैं criminal offenses.
cyberstalking साझा महत्वपूर्ण विशेषताएँ with offline stalking.
अनेक stalkers – ऑनलाइन or बंद – हैं प्रेरित by a desire to control their पीड़ितों.
A cyberstalker may be an ऑनलाइन stranger or a person whom the निशाना knows.
A cyberstalker may be anonymous और may solicit involvement of अन्य people online जो do नहीं even जान the target.
cyberstalking is a दण्ड ठोकर कि comes into play under राज्य anti-stalking laws, slander कानून, और उत्पीड़न कानून.
a cyberstalking conviction can result in a restraining order, परिवीक्षा, or भी दण्ड penalties विरूद्ध the assailant, including कारावास.
A business letter is usually प्रयुक्त when लिखने from एक company to another, or for पत्राचार between ऐसे संगठन and उनके ग्राहक, clients और other external parties.
the overall style of letter होगा निर्भर on the संबंध between the parties concerned.
वहीँ are many reasons to write a कारोबार अक्षर.
It could be to request direct सूचना or action इससे another पार्टी, to order आपूर्तियाँ from a supplier, to identify a गलती that was committed, to reply directly to a request, to apologize लिये a ग़लत or बस to convey goodwill.
Even आज, the कारोबार अक्षर is still very useful because it produces a permanent record, is गोपनीय, formal and delivers persuasive, well-considered संदेश.
tilapia ( ) is the common नाम लिये nearly a hundred species of cichlid मछली from the tilapiine cichlid tribe.
Tilapia are मुख्यतः freshwater मछली, inhabiting उथले streams, ponds, rivers और झीलों, and कम commonly मिला living in brackish जल.
historically, वे have been of major importance in कारीगर fishing in अफ़्रीकी and the Levant, and हैं of increasing महत्व in aquaculture.
Tilapia can become समस्यापूर्ण invasive species in new warm-water habitats, whether deliberately or accidentally introduced, but generally not in temperate climates due to their inability to survive in कूलर waters below about.

Adolf Hitler ( ; 20 April 1889 – 30 अप्रैल 1945 ) was an Austrian -born German politician and the leader of the नाजी पार्टी ( ( nsdap ) ; National Socialist जर्मनी मजदूर Party ).
he was chancellor of Germany from 1933 to 1945 और dictator of Nazi जर्मनी ( as führer und reichskanzler ) from 1934 to 1945.
Hitler was at the centre of Nazi Germany, संसार War ii in यूरोपीय, and the Holocaust.
Hitler was a सजा veteran of संसार War I.
he joined the German मजदूर ' पार्टी ( precursor of the NSDAP ) in 1919, and became leader of the nsdap in 1921.
In 1923, he attempted a coup d'état in Munich, ज्ञात as the Beer Hall Putsch.
The विफल तख्तापलट resulted in हिटलर 's imprisonment, during which time he wrote his memoir, mein कैम्फ ( My Struggle ).
बाद his release in 1924, हिटलर gained popular support by attacking the सन्धि of Versailles और promoting Pan-Germanism, antisemitism, और anti-communism साथ charismatic oratory and Nazi propaganda.
बाद his नियुक्ति as chancellor in 1933, he transformed the Weimar Republic into the Third Reich, a single-party तानाशाही based on the अधिनायकवादी and autocratic विचारधारा of नात्सीवाद.
हिटलर 's उद्देश्य थी to establish a New अनुक्रम of absolute Nazi German आधिपत्य in continental Europe.
to this समाप्त, उसके foreign and domestic policies had the aim of seizing Lebensraum ( `` जीना space '' ) लिये the germanic people.
He directed the rearmament of जर्मनी और the invasion of Poland by the Wehrmacht in सितंबर 1939, resulting in the outbreak of World War II in यूरोपीय.
Under Hitler 's नियम, in 1941 जर्मनी शक्तियां and उनके European allies occupied most of यूरोपीय and उत्तर Africa.
in 1943, Germany had महरूम forced onto the defensive and suffered a series of escalating defeats.
in the फाइनल days of the war, दौरान the Battle of Berlin in 1945, Hitler शादीशुदा उसके long-time partner, एवा braun.
On 30 April 1945, कम than two days later, the two committed आत्महत्या to avoid कैप्चर by the रेड Army, और उनके corpses यहूद burned.
Hitler 's aggressive foreign नीति is माना the main cause of the outbreak of संसार युद्ध II in Europe.
His antisemitic नीतियों और racially प्रेरित ideology resulted in the मौतों of at तनिक 5.5 million यहूदियों, और millions of other people deemed racially inferior.

A डोमेन नाम is an identification string that defines a फ्रेम of administrative स्वायत्तता, authority, or control on the अंतरजाल.
डोमेन names are formed by the नियम and प्रक्रियाओं of the Domain Name प्रणाली ( DNS ).
technically, any name registered in the DNS is a domain नाम.
Domain names are used in विभिन्न networking contexts and application-specific naming और addressing उद्देश्य.
in general, a domain नाम represents an अंतरजाल Protocol ( IP ) संसाधन, such as a personal computer used to अभिगम the अंतरजाल, a सर्वर computer hosting a web साईट, or the web site itself or कोई अन्य service communicated via the अंतरजाल.
Domain names are organized in अधीनस्थ levels ( subdomains ) of the DNS root domain, which is nameless.
The first-level set of domain names are the top-level domains ( TLDs ), including the generic top-level domains ( gtlds ), such as the prominent डोमेन com, info, जाल and org, और the country कोड top-level domains ( ccTLDs ).
नीचे these top-level डोमेन in the DNS पदानुक्रम are the second-level and third-level डोमेन names कि हैं typically खोलें for रिज़र्वेशन by end-users जो wish to connect local area networks to the Internet, create अन्य publicly accessible Internet resources or चलाएं web sites.
The पंजीकरण of ये domain names is प्रायः administered by domain name registrars जो sell their services to the public.
a fully योग्य domain name ( FQDN ) is a डोमेन नाम that is completely निर्दिष्ट in the hierarchy of the DNS, having no omitted भाग.
डोमेन names are usually written in लोअरकेस, although labels in the डोमेन नाम System हैं case-insensitive.
