These nitrate esters हैं a specialized class of explosives.
A wheat कटाई in idaho
This फ़ोटो from a 1921 ज्ञानकोष shows a ट्रैक्टर ploughing a क्रॉप field.
Agriculture is a major industry in the United States and the country is a जाल निर्यातक of खाना.
as of the last जनसांख्यिकी of कृषि in 2007, वहीँ were 2.2 लाख farms, covering an area of, an औसत of per farm.
Although agricultural कार्यकलाप occurs in सबसे राज्य, it is particularly concentrated in the vast expanse of चपटा, arable land known as the ग्रेट Plains, जिससे encompasses the central region of the स्वदेश.
The mpemba effect, named after Tanzanian छात्र Erasto mpemba, is the assertion कि warmer जल can फ्रीज तेज़ than colder water.
हालांकि वहीँ is anecdotal support for the effect, वहीँ is no agreement on exactly कया the effect is and under what circumstances it occurs.
There have been रिपोर्ट्स of similar phenomena चूंकि प्राचीन times, although साथ insufficient विवरण लिये the claims to be replicated.
the घटना seems contrary to thermodynamics, but a number of संभावित स्पष्टीकरण लिये the प्रभाव have महरूम proposed.
further investigations होगा need to decide on a precise definition of `` जमने '' and control a विशाल क्रमांक of starting पैरामीटर्स in order to confirm or explain the effect.
the Siamese (, ) is one of the first distinctly पहचाना breeds of Oriental बिल्ली.
the breed originated in थाईलैंड ( formerly known as Siam ), जहाँ they हैं one of several native breeds and हैं called wichian mat ( วิเชียรมาศ, a नाम meaning `` moon diamond '' ).
In the 20th century the siamese cat became one of the most popular breeds in Europe and North America.

in economics, the धन supply or money stock, is the total amount of मौद्रिक assets उपलब्धियाँ in an अर्थव्यवस्था at a specific समय.
There हैं अनेक तरीके to define `` money, '' but standard measures usually include currency in परिसंचरण and माँग जमा ( depositors ' easily accessed assets on the किताबे of वित्तीय संस्थानों ).
Money supply data are recorded and published, usually by the government or the central bank of the देश.
पब्लिक and निजी sector analysts have long monitored परिवर्तन in money सप्लाई because of इसके effects on the दाम level, महंगाई, the exchange rate and the कारोबार साईकिल.
कि relation between धन और prices is historically associated साथ the quantity theory of money.
There is दमदार अनुभवजन्य evidence of a सीधा relation between money-supply growth and long-term price inflation, at तनिक for रैपिड increases in the राशि of money in the economy.
कि is, a country such as ज़िम्बाब्वे which देखी rapid increases in its धन supply also saw रैपिड increases in कीमतें ( hyperinflation ).
इस is one reason for the रिलायंस on मौद्रिक policy as a अर्थात् of controlling inflation.
The nature of इस causal chain is the subject of contention.
Some शास्त अर्थशास्त्रियों argue that the धन supply is endogenous ( determined by the workings of the अर्थव्यवस्था, not by the central bank ) और that the स्त्रोत of महंगाई जरूर be found in the distributional structure of the अर्थव्यवस्था.
In जोड, those अर्थशास्त्रियों देखकर the central बैंको 's कंट्रोल over the धन supply as feeble say that there are दो कमजोर कड़ी between the विकास of the money supply और the महंगाई rate.
First, in the aftermath of a recession, when अनेक resources are underutilized, an बढ़ाएँ in the धन supply can cause a sustained बढ़ाएँ in रियल उत्पादन instead of inflation.
दूसरी, if the velocity of money, i.e., the ratio between नाममात्र GDP and money supply, changes, an increase in the धन supply could have either no effect, an अतिरंजित effect, or an unpredictable प्रभाव on the growth of नाममात्र GDP.

IMAX ( an abbreviation लिये चित्र Maximum ) is a गति picture film format और a नियत of cinema प्रक्षेप standards created by the Canadian company imax निगम.
IMAX has the capacity to record और display बिंब of far greater आकार and resolution than conventional film प्रणालियों.
चूंकि 2002, कुछ feature films have been converted ( or upgraded ) into IMAX स्वरूप लिये display in IMAX theatres और some have also महरूम partially शॉट in imax.
imax is the सबसे widely प्रयुक्त system लिये special-venue फिल्मी प्रस्तुतियों.
, there are 697 IMAX theatres in 52 countries.

Constitutionalism, in इसके most general meaning, is `` a complex of विचार, attitudes, और पैटर्न of बर्ताव elaborating the principle that the प्राधिकार of government गर्भाशयी from और is limited by a देह of fundamental विधि ''.
A राजनैतिक organization is संवैधानिक to the extent that it `` contain [ s ] institutionalized mechanisms of power control लिये the protection of the रूचि और liberties of the citizenry, including those that may be in the minority ``.

An ice-cream headache, also known as brain फ्रीज, cold-stimulus headache, or its given scientific name sphenopalatine ganglioneuralgia ( अर्थ `` तंत्रिका पीड़ा of the sphenopalatine गंडिका `` ), is a form of brief cranial पीड़ा or headache commonly संबद्ध साथ consumption ( विशेषकर जल्दी consumption ) of cold पेय or भोजन ऐसे as ice cream and ice चबूतरे.
it is caused by having something ठंडा touch the छत of the मुँह ( palate ), and is believed to परिणाम from a तंत्रिका response causing rapid constriction and swelling of blood vessels or a `` referring `` of पीड़ा इससे the छत of the मुँह to the head.
The rate of intake लिये cold भोजन has been पढ़ाई as a contributing factor.
There हैं people who can not अनुभव `` brain freeze '' or similar symptoms.
The पद ice-cream headache रै been in use चूंकि at least 31 January 1937, contained in a journal entry by रेबेका timbres प्रकाशित in the 1939 book We किया n't ask यूटोपिया : a Quaker family in सोवियत Russia.
The first published use of the पद brain फ्रीज, as it pertains to cold-induced headaches, was on 27 May 1991.
`` Auld Lang syne '' ( : note `` s '' बल्कि than `` z '' ) is a स्कॉट्स poem लिखा by रॉबर्ट burns in 1788 and नियत to the धुन of a परंपरागत folk song ( roud # 6294 ).
It is खूब known in many देशों, especially in the english-speaking world ; इसके traditional उपयोग होने to celebrate the start of the नई Year at the stroke of midnight.
By extension, it is also sung at funerals, graduations और as a farewell or समाप्ति to अन्य अवसरों.
the international Boy स्काउट youth movement, in अनेक देशों, uses it as a close to jamborees और other कृत्यों.
The सोंग 's Scots title may be अनूदित into अंग्रेज़ी वस्तुतः as `` old long चूंकि '', or more idiomatically, `` long long पहले '', `` दिनों gone by '' or `` old times ''.
नतीजतन `` लिये auld लैंग syne '', as it appears in the first line of the chorus, might be loosely अनूदित as `` for ( the sake of ) बूढ़ा times ''.
The phrase `` auld Lang syne '' is भी used in समान कविताएं by Robert Ayton ( 1570–1638 ), Allan Ramsay ( 1686–1757 ), and James वाटसन ( 1711 ) as well as older folk गीतों predating Burns.
मैथ्यू Fitt उपयोग the phrase `` in the days of auld लैंग syne '' as the समतुल्य of `` Once upon a time...
`` in his retelling of परी tales in the Scots language.

Leeroy जेनकींस, sometimes misspelled Leroy Jenkins और often elongated with numerous additional अक्षर, is an Internet meme नामित for a खिलाड़ी अक्षर created by Ben Schulz in blizzard entertainment 's mmorpg, World of Warcraft.
the character became popular due to a video of the game कि परिचालित around the अंतरजाल.
the phenomenon has since स्प्रेड परे the सीमाएँ of the गेमिंग जातियाँ into अन्य online और mainstream media.
ऑस्कर Grant थी fatally शॉट by बार्ट police अधिकारी Johannes mehserle in Oakland, California, United States, in the early morning hours of New Year 's दिन 2009.
responding to reports of a fight on a भीड़ खाड़ी Area रैपिड पारगमन train returning from San फ्रांसिस्को, BART Police officers detained ऑस्कर Grant और अनेक other यात्री on the मंच at the Fruitvale बार्ट स्टेशन.
Officer योहानेस Mehserle और another officer were restraining ग्रान्ट, जो थी सजदा and allegedly resisting गिरफ़्तार.
अधिकारी Mehserle stood and, according to witnesses, said : `` मिलेंगी वापस, I 'm gon na tase him. ''
Then mehserle खींचा his गन और shot ग्रान्ट एकबार in the वापस ; mehserle appeared दंग, put उसके हैंड्स to उसके सिर and exclaimed, `` oh, my God ! ''
During उसके court testimony, mehserle said कि Grant तब exclaimed, `` You shot me ! ''
ग्रान्ट turned out to be निहत्थे ; he थी pronounced मुर्दे the next morning at Highland Hospital in Oakland.
the events were captured on अनेक digital वीडियो and cell phone कैमरे.
The footage was disseminated to मीडिया outlets और to विभिन्न websites, where it थी watched millions of times.
the following दिनों saw both peaceful और हिंसक protests.
the shooting has महरूम variously labeled an involuntary manslaughter and a summary execution.
On जनवरी 13, alameda County prosecutors charged Mehserle with murder for the shooting.
He resigned उसके position and pleaded not guilty.
The trial began on June 10, 2010.
Michael rains, mehserle 's दण्ड रक्षा attorney, argued that mehserle mistakenly shot Grant साथ उसके pistol, intending to use उसके तासीर when he देखी ग्रान्ट reaching for his waistband.
Pretrial filings argue that उसके client did not कमिट first-degree murder और asked a लॉस एंजिल्स न्यायधीश to instruct the jury to limit its deliberations to either second-degree हत्या or acquittal.
Oakland सिविल अधिकारों attorney जॉन Burris दायर a $ 25 लाख wrongful मौत claim विरूद्ध BART on behalf of Grant 's परिवार.
on July 8, 2010, the jury returned its verdict : Mehserle थी found अपराधी of involuntary manslaughter and not अपराधी of second-degree murder और voluntary manslaughter.
Initial protests विरूद्ध the ruling यहूद शांतिपूर्वक organized ; लूटने, arson, destruction of प्रॉपर्टी, and छोटी riots broke आउट after dark.
Nearly 80 people यहूद eventually गिरफ्तार.
On Friday, जुलाई 9, 2010, the u.S. Justice विभाग opened a civil rights case against Mehserle ; the federal government can prosecute उसे independently लिये the वही act अंतर्गत the separate sovereigns exception to double jeopardy.
The Department of Justice होगा be working with the u.S. attorney 's दफ्तर in San फ्रांसिस्को and the FBI.
On नवम्बर 5, 2010, Mehserle थी sentenced to two सालो, ऋण time served.
he served his समय in the लॉस Angeles County Jail, occupying a निजी cell दूर from अन्य prisoners.
he थी released on June 13, 2011 and is now on parole.
प्रमुख representatives of the हार्लेम पुनर्जागरण.
The हार्लेम Renaissance was a cultural गति that spanned the 1920s.
at the time, it थी ज्ञात as the `` नई Negro गति '', named after the 1925 anthology by Alain locke.
Though it was केन्द्रित in the Harlem neighborhood of नई York City, अनेक french-speaking black writers from अफ़्रीकी and Caribbean colonies who lived in Paris यहूद भी influenced by the Harlem Renaissance.
The Harlem पुनर्जागरण is unofficially recognized to have spanned from about 1919 until the early or mid-1930s.
Many of its ideas lived on much longer.
the zenith of this `` flowering of Negro साहित्य '', as James weldon Johnson preferred to call the Harlem Renaissance, थी लगाई between 1924 ( the year that Opportunity : A जर्नल of नीग्रो Life hosted a पार्टी for black writers where अनेक श्वेत publishers यहूद in attendance ) and 1929 ( the year of the stock मार्केट crash and the beginning of the ग्रेट अवसाद ).

the इतिहास of Africa begins with the प्रागितिहास of अफ़्रीकी and the emergence of होमो sapiens in East अफ़्रीकी, continuing into the present as a patchwork of विविध and politically विकासशील nation states.
Some early evidence of कृषि in Africa तिथियाँ from 16,000 bce, और metallurgy from about 4000 bce.
the recorded history of जल्दी civilization arose in Egypt, और later in Nubia, the Maghreb and the Horn of Africa.
दौरान the मध्य Ages, islam spread through the regions.
क्रासिंग the Maghreb और the Sahel, a major बीच of Muslim culture was Timbuktu.
कुछ notable pre-colonial राज्य and समाजों in Africa include the nok culture, Mali Empire, Ashanti Empire, Kingdom of mapungubwe, Kingdom of Sine, Kingdom of Saloum, किंगडम of baol, किंगडम of ज़िम्बाब्वे, Kingdom of Kongo, प्राचीन Carthage, Numidia, Mauretania, the Aksumite Empire, the ajuuraan राज्य और the adal सल्तनत.
इससे the late 15th century, europeans और Arabs took स्लेव इससे West, Central and southeast Africa विदेशी in the अफ़्रीकी slave व्यापार.
यूरोपीय colonization of Africa developed rapidly in the हाथापाई for अफ़्रीकी of the late 19th और early 20th सदियां.
Following struggles for independence in many parts of the continent, as खूब as a weakened यूरोपीय after the Second संसार युद्ध ; decolonization took प्लेस.
Africa 's history has महरूम चुनौतीपूर्ण लिये researchers in the फ़ील्ड of African अध्ययन क्युकी of the किल्लत of लिखा स्त्रोत in विशाल parts of sub-Saharan Africa.
scholarly techniques such as the रिकॉर्डिंग of मौखिक इतिहास, ऐतिहासिक भाषाविज्ञान, archaeology और आनुवंशिकी have महरूम crucial.
Curry फोली थी the first खिलाड़ी in प्रमुख League बेसबॉल इतिहास to hit for the cycle.
In baseball, hitting for the साईकिल is the accomplishment of one batter hitting a सिंगल, a दोगुना, a ट्रिपल, and a home चलाएं in the same game.
collecting the hits in कि order is known as a `` प्राकृतिक cycle ''.
Cycles are uncommon in Major लीग Baseball ( एमएलबी ), and have occurred 294 टाइम्स since the first by Curry Foley in 1882.
The cycle is roughly as आम as a no-hitter ( 279 आवृत्ति in एमएलबी history ) ; it रै been called `` one of the rarest '' and `` most मुश्किल feats '' in baseball.
Based on 2009 offensive levels, the probability of an औसत एमएलबी player hitting लिये a साईकिल against an average team in a खेल is approximately 0.00590 % ; this corresponds to about 2.5 cycles in a 162-game season with 30 teams.
In other baseball लीग, the साईकिल is achieved less अक्सर.
Through सितंबर 4, 2008, 62 players in Nippon Professional Baseball ( NPB ), the top-level बेसबॉल organization in Japan, have hit for the cycle, the most हाल होने Michihiro Ogasawara.
Two players have hit for the cycle on the वही दिन एकबार in NPB history ; इस रै occurred twice in एमएलबी history.
एक NPB player रै भी hit लिये the साईकिल in an npb All-Star game.
no player रै ever hit for the साईकिल in the एमएलबी All-Star Game or the postseason.
the main slave routes in मध्यकालीन Africa.
इस आलेख discusses systems, इतिहास, and प्रभाव of slavery within अफ़्रीकी.
See अरब slave trade, Atlantic स्लेव व्यापार, Maafa, और गुलामी in contemporary Africa लिये other discussions.
`` Slave हस्तांतरण in Africa ''.
Europeans usually did not enter the interior regions.
गुलामी in अफ़्रीकी रै existed throughout the महाद्वीप for many centuries, and continues in the current day.
प्रणालियों of servitude और slavery यहूद आम in अनेक भाग of the महाद्वीप, as they यहूद in much of the ancient world.
In most अफ़्रीकी societies where slavery थी prevalent, the enslaved people यहूद largely treated as indentured servants and not treated as chattel स्लेव.
जब the Arab स्लेव trade and अटलांटिक slave व्यापार began, अनेक of the लोकल स्लेव systems changed and began supplying captives for स्लेव markets outside of Africa.
Slavery in ऐतिहासिक अफ़्रीकी थी practiced in many अलग forms and some of these do नहीं clearly fit the definitions of गुलामी elsewhere in the संसार.
Debt गुलामी, enslavement of war captives, सैन्य slavery, and criminal गुलामी यहूद सब practiced in various भाग of अफ़्रीकी.
Although there had been कुछ trans-Saharan व्यापार इससे the आंतरिक of sub-saharan Africa to अन्य regions, गुलामी was a small भाग of the economic जीवन of many societies in Africa जबतक the introduction of transcontinental स्लेव trades ( अरब and अटलांटिक ).
स्लेव practices were again रूपांतरित with European colonization of अफ़्रीकी and the formal abolition of slavery in the early 1900s.
खिड़कियाँ कार्य Manager is a task manager or System monitor अनुप्रयोग included साथ the Microsoft Windows NT family of ऑपरेटिंग systems कि provides limited सूचना परिचय computer performance and कार्यशील अनुप्रयोग, प्रक्रियाओं और CPU उपयोग, commit चार्ज and मेमोरी information, संजाल कार्यकलाप and statistics, logged-in users, and प्रणाली services ( and as प्रायः is the case with software tools provided by Microsoft for Windows, 3rd party तन्त्र is available जिससे fills the आवश्यकताएँ अधिक thoroughly, e.g, `` प्रक्रम एक्सप्लोरर '', `` विस्तारित कार्य Manager '', `` Anvir Task मैनेजर '', `` प्रक्रम Hacker '', और `` System एक्सप्लोरर '' ).
the Task Manager can भी be used to set process priorities, processor affinity, forcibly terminate प्रक्रियाओं, and shut bas, restart, hibernate or log बंद from खिड़कियाँ.
खिड़कियाँ Task मैनेजर was introduced with Windows NT 4.0.
Previous versions of खिड़कियाँ NT शामिल the Task सूची application, which had दूर कम features.
The कार्य सूची थी सक्षम of लिस्टिंग currently कार्यशील processes and killing उन्हें, or बनाना a new process.
In Windows XP only, a Shutdown menu is भी present that allows अभिगम to Standby, Hibernate, फेरे off, restart, Log Off और स्विच User.
Earlier versions of microsoft खिड़कियाँ ( Microsoft Windows 3.x, Windows 95, Windows 98 ) था a कार्यक्रम ज्ञात as tasks to प्रदर्शक the programs currently कार्यशील.
This संचिका was चलाया by running the taskman.exe file from the C : \Windows directory.
The Troop is an American-Canadian live-action, single camera comedy -adventure टेलीविज़न श्रेणी about a तिकड़ी of teenagers who fight और capture monsters and अन्य supernatural phenomena that invade the fictional कस्बा of Lakewood.

Sparsely आबादी in relation to इसके area, the Democratic गणतंत्र of the Congo ( drc ) is home to a vast potential of प्राकृतिक resources and mineral wealth, इसके untapped जमा of कच्चा minerals are estimated to be worth in excess of us $ 24 trillion, yet the economy of the drc has declined drastically since the mid-1980s.
At the समय of its independence in 1960, DRC was the second सबसे industrialized country in Africa after South अफ़्रीकी ; it boasted a thriving mining सेक्टर and its agriculture sector was relatively productive.
if the दर्शक stares at this चित्र for 20–60 seconds and stares at a white ऑब्जेक्ट, a ऋणात्मक afterimage will appear ( in इस मामला, it will be क्यान on magenta ).
इस can also be हासिल by the दर्शक closing his/her आँखें and tilting उनके head up.
An afterimage or ghost image or image burn-in is an optical भ्रम that refers to an image continuing to appear in one 's दृष्टि after the exposure to the original image has ceased.
One of the most आम afterimages is the bright glow कि seems to फ्लैश पहले one 's eyes after looking into a light सोर्स लिये a few seconds.
Closing the नजर can सहायता achieve a better sense of the color in इसके अपना पहलू.
afterimages आइये in दो forms, ऋणात्मक ( inverted ) और positive ( retaining असली color ).
The process पीछे positive afterimages is unknown, though thought to be related to neural अनुकूलन.
On the other hand, ऋणात्मक afterimages are a retinal phenomenon and हैं well understood.
Lost is an अमरीकी serial drama television श्रेणी कि premiered on September 22, 2004 on the अमरीकी प्रसारण कम्पनी ( ABC ).
the श्रेणी was निर्मित by J. J. Abrams and Damon lindelof, आधारित upon an original पायलट script titled Nowhere written by Jeffrey lieber.
छह सीज़न of the show aired, in जोड to numerous clip shows to पूर्वावलोकन previous episodes.
ABC घोषित that Lost होता समाप्त after छह seasons, having produced a total of 121 एपीसोड.
The श्रेणी follows the पास्ट, उपस्थित, and भविष्य experience ( s ) of the survivors of a प्लेन क्रैश on a passenger जेट, Oceanic उड़ान 815, flying इससे Sydney to Los एंजिल्स after it क्रैश on a tropical island in the South Pacific.
The श्रेणी भी includes stories of the lives of people already जीना on the island — वे शामिल the `` Others ``, who initially antagonize the survivors, as well as a group of लोगों who arrive on the freighter kahana.
Each एपीसोड typically features action on the द्वीप as well as a secondary कथानक from another point in a अक्षर 's जीवन.
Season 6 features a detailing of the lives of the survivors in a different वास्तविकता, as if the उड़ान had never crashed.
in the following list, the पद `` featured character ( s ) '' refers to the अक्षर or characters who हैं featured in the secondary storyline of each एपीसोड.
`` No.
in श्रेणी '' refers to the एपीसोड 's number in the overall श्रेणी, whereas `` No.
in season '' refers to the episode 's क्रमांक in each particular season.
`` U.S. viewers ( लाख ) '' refers to the क्रमांक of अमेरिकी in millions who watched the episode live.
A total of 121 episodes of Lost यहूद produced, the last of which aired on May 23, 2010.
All seasons are available on DVD in Regions 1–4 और on Blu-ray in Regions A and B.
Flat feet ( also called pes planus or fallen arches ) is a formal सन्दर्भ to a medical condition in जिससे the मेहराब of the पैर collapses, with the entire एकमात्र of the पैर coming into पूरा or near-complete contact with the ground.
In कुछ individuals ( an अनुमानित 20–30 % of the general population ) the arch बस never develops in one foot ( unilaterally ) or both फीट ( bilaterally ).
Three अध्ययन ( देखिए citations below in military section ) of military recruits have shown no प्रमाण of बाद increased injury, or पैर समस्याएं, due to flat feet, in a जनसांख्यिकी of people जो पहुँचें military service age without prior foot समस्याएं.
However, these studies can not be प्रयुक्त to न्यायधीश संभावित future क्षति from this कंडीशन जब diagnosed at younger आयु.
They also can not be लागू to persons whose flat feet are associated with foot symptoms, or निश्चित लक्षण in other भाग of the body ( ऐसे as the लेग or back ) possibly referable to the पैर.
Generation X, commonly abbreviated to Gen X, is the पीढी born after the Western post-world War ii baby बूम.
Demographers, इतिहासकारों और टीकाकारों use beginning जनम तिथियाँ from the जल्दी 1960s to the जल्दी 1980s.
The term was popularized by Douglas coupland 's 1991 novel Generation X : Tales लिये an Accelerated Culture.
Before that, it had been used for various subcultures or countercultures बाद the 1950s.
दबाव छाले, also known as decubitus ulcers or bedsores, are localized चोटों to the skin and/or underlying tissue usually over a bony prominence, as a परिणाम of pressure, or दबाव in combination with shear and/or घर्षण.
सबसे commonly this होगा be the sacrum, coccyx, heels or the hips, but other साइट such as the elbows, knees, ankles or the वापस of the cranium can be affected.
the कारण of दबाव ulcers is दबाव applied to नरम tissue so that blood flow to the नरम tissue is completely or partially obstructed.
shear is भी a कारण ; shear खींचता on blood vessels that फीड the स्किन.
Pressure ulcers most commonly develop in persons who हैं not moving परिचय or हैं confined to wheelchairs.
It is widely believed that other कारकों can influence the tolerance of स्किन for pressure and shear thereby increasing the risk of दबाव ulcer development.
These कारकों are protein-calorie कुपोषण, microclimate ( skin wetness caused by sweating or incontinence ), diseases कि reduce blood flow to the skin, ऐसे as arteriosclerosis or diseases that reduce the feeling in the skin, such as paralysis or न्यूरोपैथी.
The healing of दबाव ulcers may be slowed by the आयु of the व्यक्ति, medical शर्तें ( such as arteriosclerosis, diabetes or infection ), smoking or medications such as antiinflammatory drugs.
Although often prevented and treatable if मिला early, दबाव छाले can be बहुत difficult to prevent in critically ill patients, frail बड़ो, wheelchair users ( especially जहाँ spinal injury is involved ) और terminally ill patients.
प्राथमिक prevention is to redistribute pressure by turning the patient regularly.
The benefit of turning to avoid further sores is खूब documented since at least the 19th century.
in addition to turning और re-positioning the रोगी in bed or wheelchair, खाने a संतुलित diet with पर्याप्त प्रोटीन and keeping the skin फ़्री इससे exposure to urine और stool is बहुत important.
The prevalence of pressure छाले in hospital settings is ऊँची, लकिन improvements are being बना.
According to the 2010 ipup ( International Pressure अल्सर Prevalence सर्वेक्षण ) conducted in कनाडा, there थी a significant decrease in the overall facility-acquired व्यापकता of pressure छाले इससे 2009-2010.
Ulcers were सबसे commonly identified at the sacral/coccyx अल्सर स्थान ; however, heel ulcers were the most common facility-acquired location in the सर्वेक्षण.

ग्रीन Bay is a city in और the काउंटी seat of Brown County in the U.S. state of विस्कॉन्सिन, located at the head of Green Bay, a sub-basin of Lake Michigan, at the mouth of the Fox नदी.
It has an उन्नयन of above समुद्र level और is located north of मिल्वौकी.
The population थी 104,057 at the 2010 census.
it is the third-largest नगर in the state of Wisconsin, after मिल्वौकी and Madison.
It is भी the third-largest city on the वेस्ट shore of Lake Michigan, बाद शिकागो और मिल्वौकी.
Green खाड़ी is घर to the ग्रीन खाड़ी Packers of the National Football League, making it by far the smallest metropolitan area in the USA to मेजबान a प्रमुख पेशेवर खेल मताधिकार.
Green Bay is the principal city of the Green खाड़ी Metropolitan Statistical Area, जिससे कवर Brown, Kewaunee, and oconto Counties and था a combined जनसांख्यिकी of 282,599 at the 2000 census.
Green खाड़ी is an industrial city with several meatpacking and पेपर पौधे, and a port on Green Bay, an arm of Lake मिशिगन that locals कॉल the खाड़ी of ग्रीन Bay, to avoid conflating it with the eponymous नगर.
It is home to the नेशनल Railroad Museum ; the नेविली Public संग्रहालय, with प्रदर्शनियों of art, history, और science ; और the University of wisconsin–green Bay.
luteinizing hormone ( lh, भी known as lutropin and sometimes lutrophin ) is a हार्मोन उत्पादित by gonadotroph कोशिकाएं in the anterior pituitary gland.
In females, an acute वृद्धि of LH ( `` LH surge '' ) triggers ovulation और development of the कॉर्पस luteum.
In males, जहाँ LH था also been पुकारा अंतरालीय cell-stimulating hormone ( ICSH ), it stimulates Leydig कोशिका उत्पादन of testosterone.
it acts synergistically with FSH.
Selena Quintanilla-Pérez ( अप्रैल 16, 1971 – March 31, 1995 ), known simply as Selena, was an अमरीकी singer-songwriter.
वो was named the `` top लैटिन artist of the '90s '' और `` Best selling Latin artist of the दशक '' by बिलबोर्ड for उसके चौदह top-ten singles in the Top लैटिन Songs chart, सहित सात number-one hits.
सेलिना had the most successful singles of 1994 और 1995, `` Amor Prohibido `` and `` No me Queda más ``.
She थी called `` The Queen of tejano music `` and the Mexican equivalent of Madonna.
Selena released her first album, Selena y Los Dinos, at the age of बारह.
She जीती Female vocalist of the Year at the 1987 Tejano म्यूज़िक Awards and landed a रिकॉर्डिंग contract with EMI a few years बाद.
उसके fame grew throughout the early 1990s, विशेषकर in Spanish-speaking countries, and she था begun recording in English as well.
Selena was murdered at the age of 23 on कूच 31, 1995 by Yolanda saldívar, the former अध्यक्ष of her fan club.
On April 12, 1995, दो weeks बाद her मौत, जार्ज W. बुश, राज्यपाल of Texas at the time, declared her birthday `` Selena दिन '' in Texas.
Warner भाईs. उत्पादित Selena, a film based on उसके जीवन अभिनीत Jennifer लोपेज़, in 1997.
सेलिना 's life थी also the आधार of the musical सेलिना Forever अभिनीत वेरोनिका Vazquez as Selena.
In June 2006 Selena was commemorated साथ a life-sized bronze statue ( Mirador de la Flor in Corpus christi, टेक्सास ) and a Selena museum खोली there.
She रै बेची over 60 million albums विश्वव्यापी, making उसके one of the best-selling कलाकारों of all time.
वो is also the तभी female कलाकार to have पाँच albums in U.S. बिलबोर्ड 200 at the वही समय.
जर्मनी stahlhelm from संसार युद्ध II
Insignia of the bolivian Army colorados regiment, प्रर्दशित a stahlhelm और two crossed bayonets
Stahlhelm ( बहुवचन, Stahlhelme ) is जर्मनी लिये `` steel helmet ''.
The इम्पीरियल German Army began to replace the traditional boiled-leather pickelhaube ( spiked कॉम्बैट हेल्मेट ) with the Stahlhelm during World युद्ध I in 1916.
The term Stahlhelm refers both to a जेनेरिक steel हेल्मेट, and अधिक specifically to the distinctive ( and iconic ) जर्मनी design.
The stahlhelm, with its distinctive `` coal scuttle `` shape, was an instantly recognizable प्रतीक लिये military imagery और became a common element of military propaganda on both पहलू, just जैसे the pickelhaube before it.
Its name थी भी used by the stahlhelm, a अर्धसैनिक राष्ट्रवादी संगठन स्थापित at the समाप्त of 1918.
Glow-in-the-dark may refer to:
Bioluminescence, the उत्पादन और emission of लाइट by a जीना organism
chemiluminescence, is the emission of लाइट ( luminescence ) without emission of heat
स्फुरदीप्ति, a specific type of photoluminescence related to fluorescence
Radioluminescence, production of संदीप्ति in a सामग्री by the bombardment of ionizing radiation

Frankfurt Airport serves as a hub नगर for Lufthansa और receives फ़्लाइट from Star Alliance carriers.
एयरलाइन hubs are airports ranked as विशाल, medium, small, and non-hubs as one of the FAA airport categories जिससे हैं re-evaluated every year आधारित on number of वाणिज्यिक passengers.
The more आम but informal उपयोग लिये the phrase airline हब is an airport कि an एयरलाइन उपयोग as a ट्रांसफ़र पाइंट to get passengers to their intended destination.
it is भाग of a hub and spoke मॉडल, जहाँ travelers चलती between एयरपोर्ट नहीं served by सीधा flights बदलें planes en route to their destinations.
This is as opposed to the पाइंट to पाइंट मॉडल.
अनेक hubs of the airlines हैं also situated at एयरपोर्ट in the cities of the respective head कार्यालयों.
Some एयरलाइंस may use only a single हब, जबकि other airlines use multiple hubs.
Hubs हैं used for दोनो passenger फ़्लाइट as well as कार्गो flights.
Many एयरलाइंस also use focus शहरों, जिससे function much the वही as hubs.
Airlines may भी उपयोग द्वितीयक hubs, a non-technical term for विशाल focus शहरों.
A hub in the मध्य of a route is अधिक effective than at either समाप्त as connecting traffic अधिक easily भरता the plane - passengers prefer a one-stop ( two-leg ) रूट over a two-stop ( three-leg ) रूट.
Hollow Lacedaemon.
Site of the menelaion, the shrine to हेलेन और Menelaus constructed anciently in the Bronze Age नगर that stood on the hill of Therapne on the left बैंको of the Eurotas नदी निहार the future site of डोरियन Sparta.
Across the valley the successive ridges of माउंट taygetus are in evidence.
स्पार्टा ( Doric Greek : ; अटारी यूनानी : ), or lacedaemon, थी a prominent city-state in ancient यूनानियों, situated on the banks of the Eurotas नदी in Laconia, in south-eastern पेलोपोनीज़.
It उभरा as a political entity around the 10th century BC, when the invading Dorians subjugated the local, non-Dorian जनसांख्यिकी.
around 650 bc, it रोज़ to become the dominant military land-power in ancient यूनानियों.
दिए its सैन्य pre-eminence, Sparta was recognized as the overall leader of the संयुक्त Greek शक्तियां during the Greco-Persian Wars.
Between 431 और 404 BC, Sparta was the principal enemy of एथेंस during the Peloponnesian युद्ध, from जिससे it उभरा victorious, though at ग्रेट लागत.
Sparta 's शिकस्त by thebes in the Battle of leuctra in 371 bc ended स्पार्टा 's prominent भूमिका in यूनानियों.
however, it कायम इसके political स्वतंत्रता until the रोमन conquest of यूनानियों in 146 BC.
It तब underwent a long काल of decline, especially in the मध्य आयु, जब many Spartans moved to live in mystras.
Modern स्पार्टा is the capital of the Greek क्षेत्रीय unit of Laconia और a बीच लिये the processing of goods ऐसे as citrus and olives.
स्पार्टा was unique in ancient Greece लिये its सोशल प्रणाली और constitution, which completely focused on सैन्य प्रशिक्षण and excellence.
इसके inhabitants were classified as Spartiates ( Spartan citizens, who enjoyed full अधिकारों ), Mothakes ( non-Spartan free men raised as Spartans ), perioikoi ( freedmen ), and Helots ( state-owned serfs, enslaved non-Spartan local जनसांख्यिकी ).
Spartiates underwent the rigorous agoge प्रशिक्षण और education regimen, और spartan phalanges were widely माना to be among the बेहतरीन in बैटल.
Spartan women enjoyed considerably more rights and equality to men than elsewhere in the शास्त्रीय संसार.
स्पार्टा थी the विषय of fascination in इसके own day, as खूब as in the West following the पुनरुद्धार of classical सीखना.
इस प्रेम or admiration of Sparta is ज्ञात as laconism or laconophilia.
Fantasy football is an interactive competition in which users compete against each other as general प्रबंधक of virtual teams.
the खिलाड़ी that an individual is able to मैनेज हैं पेशेवर अमरीकी football players in the नेशनल Football लीग.
The अलग actions people are able to make are drafting, trading, adding or dropping players, and changing rosters.
Due to the विकास of the Internet, Fantasy football रै vastly increased in popularity, विशेषकर because Fantasy football providers such as ईएसपीएन, याहू, CBS, and the NFL itself are समर्थ to keep track of आंकडे entirely ऑनलाइन, eliminating the need to जाँच box स्कोर और newspapers regularly to keep track of खिलाड़ी.

World जनसांख्यिकी estimates from 1800 to 2100, based on un 2010 projections ( red, नारंगी, ग्रीन ) and us Census ब्यूरो ऐतिहासिक estimates ( black ).
वास्तविक recorded population figures हैं in blue.
according to the highest अनुमान, the world population may rise to 16 billion by 2100 ; according to the न्यूनतम अनुमान, it may decline to 6 अरब.
the world population is the total number of जीना humans on Earth.
as of आज, it is estimated to number billion by the United राज्य Census Bureau ( USCB ).
the USCB estimates कि the world जनसांख्यिकी exceeded 7 billion on March 12, 2012.
according to a पृथक estimate by the संयुक्त राष्ट्र Population Fund, it reached this milestone on October 31, 2011.
The संसार population रै experienced continuous growth since the end of the Great अकाल and the Black Death in 1350, when it stood at around 370 लाख.
The highest दरों of growth – वैश्विक जनसांख्यिकी increases above 1.8 % per साल – were देखी briefly दौरान the 1950s, and लिये a longer period दौरान the 1960s and 1970s.
the growth rate peaked at 2.2 % in 1963, और था अस्वीकृत to 1.1 % by 2011.
Total सालाना births were उच्चतम in the late 1980s at about 138 million, and are now अपेक्षित to remain essentially निरंतर at उनके 2011 level of 134 लाख, while मौतों number 56 लाख प्रति year, और are expected to बढ़ाएँ to 80 million प्रति year by 2040.
वर्तमान projections दिखाएँ a जारी बढ़ाएँ in population in the near future ( लकिन a स्थिर मनाही in the जनसांख्यिकी विकास रेट ), साथ the वैश्विक population अपेक्षित to पहुँचें between 7.5 और 10.5 billion by 2050.
Various longer-term estimates predict further growth, stagnation, or even overall मनाही in the वैश्विक जनसांख्यिकी by 2150.
Some analysts have questioned the स्थिरता of further world population growth, citing the growing pressures on the environment, वैश्विक खाना supplies, and energy resources.
skeletal muscles homo sapiens
इस is a table of मांसपेशियां of the इंसान anatomy.
वहीँ are approximately 642 skeletal मांसपेशियां within the ठेठ इंसान, and almost प्रत्येक मांसपेशी constitutes एक part of a जोड़ी of identical bilateral muscles, found on दोनो पहलू, resulting in approximately 320 pairs of मांसपेशियां, as प्रस्तुत in this आलेख.
Nevertheless, the सटीक number is मुश्किल to define क्युकी अलग स्त्रोत समूह muscles differently, e.g. regarding what is पारिभाषित as अलग भाग of a सिंगल muscle or as अनेक मांसपेशियां.
Examples range इससे 640 to 850.
The muscles of the इंसान देह can be categorized into a क्रमांक of समूह which include muscles relating to the head and neck, मांसपेशियां of the torso or ट्रंक, muscles of the अपर limbs, and मांसपेशियां of the lower limbs.
The action refers to the action of each muscle इससे the standard anatomical स्थिति.
In other स्थितियाँ, other actions may be performed.
a gold bar is a quantity of refined धात्विक gold of कोई shape that is made by a bar निर्माता meeting standard शर्तें of manufacture, labeling, and record keeping.
Larger सुनहरा बार that हैं उत्पादित by pouring the molten metal into molds हैं पुकारा ingots.
Smaller bars may be manufactured by minting or stamping इससे appropriately rolled सुनहरा sheets.
the standard सुनहरा बार आयोजित as gold reserves by central banks and traded among bullion डीलर is the 400-troy-ounce ( 12.4 kg or 438.9 औंस ) Good डिलीवरी gold bar.
the kilobar, which is to कह 1000 grams in mass, is the bar that is more manageable और is प्रयुक्त extensively for व्यापार and निवेश.
the premium on ये bars when traded is very कम over the spot value of the gold बनाना it आदर्श लिये small transfers between banks और traders.
सबसे kilobars हैं चपटा, although कुछ investors, particularly in Europe, prefer the ईंटों shape.
elisha आर्चिबाल्ड `` Archie '' Manning iii ( born May 19, 1949 ) is a former अमरीकी football quarterback in the National फ़ुटबॉल लीग, playing for the नई ऑरलियन्स Saints इससे 1971 to 1982, then लिये the ह्यूस्टन ऑइलर्स and Minnesota Vikings.
He is the father of current Denver Broncos क्वार्टरबैक Peyton Manning, वर्तमान New York दिग्गज starting क्वार्टरबैक एली Manning, और former ओले मिस receiver Cooper मैनिंग.
Advocacy is a political process by an individual or group which aims to influence public-policy and resource allocation decisions भीतर political, आर्थिक, and सोशल प्रणालियों और institutions.
वकालत can include many activities कि a person or organization undertakes including मीडिया campaigns, पब्लिक speaking, commissioning and प्रकाशन research or पोल or the filing of an amicus brief.
lobbying ( प्रायः by lobby समूह ) is a रूप of advocacy where a direct दृष्टिकोण is made to विधायक on an समस्या which plays a significant role in modern politics.
शोध is शुरूआत to explore कैसा advocacy समूह in the U.S. and कनाडा are using social media to सुकर civic सगाई and collective कार्रवाई.
The ध्वज of Mexico ( Spanish : bandera de México ) is a vertical tricolor of ग्रीन, श्वेत, and रेड with the national coat of arms चार्ज in the बीच of the white stripe.
While the meaning of the रंगों has changed over time, these तीन रंगों यहूद adopted by मैक्सिको following independence इससे स्पेन दौरान the देश 's युद्ध of स्वतंत्रता, and subsequent पहला मैक्सिकन Empire.
the वर्तमान ध्वज was adopted in 1968, but the overall design has महरूम प्रयुक्त चूंकि 1821, जब the First National ध्वज was created.
The current law of national symbols, Law on the National Arms, Flag, and गान, कि governs the उपयोग of the नेशनल ध्वज रै महरूम in place since 1984.
रेड, white, and ग्रीन are the रंगों of the national मुक्ति फौज in मैक्सिको.
the central emblem is the Aztec pictogram लिये Tenochtitlan ( now मैक्सिको City ), the center of their साम्राज्य.
It recalls the लेजेंड that inspired the Aztecs to settle on what थी originally a lake-island.
The रूप of the coat of बाहें was most recently revised in 1968.
A रिबन in the नेशनल रंगों is at the नीचे of the coat of बाहें.
Throughout इतिहास, the flag has बदला four टाइम्स, as the design of the coat of arms and the length-width ratios of the ध्वज have been modified.
however, the कोट of arms has had the same features throughout : an त्रिभुज, पकड़कर a serpent in its talon, is perched on top of a prickly नाशपाती कैक्टस ; the cactus is situated on a rock कि उदय above a lake.
The coat of arms is निकला from an एज़टेक legend कि their gods told them to build a नगर जहाँ वे spot an त्रिभुज on a nopal eating a serpent, which is अभी Mexico नगर.
The current नेशनल flag, the Fourth नेशनल Flag, is भी used as the Mexican naval ensign by जहाजों पंजीकृत in Mexico.
a destination marketing organization or सम्मेलन and visitor bureau promotes a कस्बा, city, प्रदेश, or देश in अनुक्रम to बढ़ाएँ the क्रमांक of विज़िटर.
It promotes the development and विपणन of a गंतव्य, focusing on convention sales, पर्यटन marketing, और सेवाएं.
Such organizations प्रचार economic development of a destination by increasing visits इससे पर्यटकों और business travelers, which generates overnight lodging लिये a destination, visits to रेस्तरां, and खरीदारी revenues.
सम्मेलन और visitor bureaus are the सबसे महत्वपूर्ण tourism विपणन संगठन in their संबंधित पर्यटक destinations, as they हैं directly जिम्मेदार for विपणन the गंतव्य brand through travel and tourism `` product awareness '' to विज़िटर.
DMOs उपज अरबों of डॉलर in direct and अप्रत्यक्ष revenue और कर for उनके गंतव्यों ' economies with उनके marketing and sales expertise.
Destination marketing organizations हैं often called travel, सम्मेलन, visitors, or tourism bureaux, welcome centers, सूचना centers and more.
Regardless of the name, these संगठन प्रस्ताव many services to the traveling public.
the नीलगाय or wapiti ( Cervus canadensis ) is one of the largest प्रजाति of हिरण in the संसार, and one of the largest land mammals in North America और eastern Asia.
It was long believed to be a subspecies of the European रेड हिरण ( cervus elaphus ), but evidence इससे a 2004 study of the mitochondrial DNA indicates that the दो are distinct species.
This animal should not be उलझन with the larger moose ( Alces alces ), to which the name `` नीलगाय '' applies in यूरेशिया.
Apart इससे the moose, the only अन्य सदस्य of the हिरण परिवार to rival the elk in size is the south Asian sambar ( Rusa unicolor ).
Elk range in forest and forest-edge habitat, feeding on grasses, पौधे, leaves, and bark.
Although देशी to उत्तर अमेरिका and eastern एशिया, वे have adapted खूब to countries where they have महरूम introduced, सहित Argentina, ऑस्ट्रेलिया, और नई जीलैंड.
Their great adaptability may threaten endemic species and ecosystems into जिससे वे have been introduced.
Male elk have large antlers which are shed each साल.
males also engage in ritualized mating behaviors during the rut, सहित posturing, antler कुश्ती ( sparring ), और bugling, a loud series of vocalizations जिससे establishes दबदबा over other males and attracts females.
Elk are susceptible to a क्रमांक of संक्रामक diseases, कुछ of जिससे can be transmitted to livestock.
Efforts to eliminate संक्रामक रोगों इससे नीलगाय populations, largely through vaccination, have had mixed कामयाबी.
Some cultures आदर the elk as a spiritual फ़ोर्स.
In भाग of एशिया, antlers and their मखमल are used in traditional medicines.
Elk are hunted as a game प्रजाति ; the meat is leaner and उच्चतर in protein than beef or chicken.
The जार्ज वॉशिंगटन University ( gw, GWU, or जार्ज Washington ) is a comprehensive निजी, coeducational शोध विश्वविद्यालयों located in Washington, D.C..
It पुरस्कार प्रमाणपत्र, Bachelor degrees, Masters degrees, और PhDs across अनेक दर्जन disciplines.
The विश्वविद्यालयों थी चार्टर्ड by an Act of कॉंग्रेस on फ़रवरी 9, 1821 as The columbian कॉलेज in the District of कोलंबिया.
The lion ( Panthera leo ) is one of the चार बिग cats in the genus पेंथेरा and a member of the परिवार फ़ेलिडाए.
With some males exceeding in weight, it is the second-largest living cat after the tiger.
जंगली lions फिलहाल मौजूद in sub-Saharan अफ़्रीकी and in एशिया ( जहाँ an endangered remnant जनसांख्यिकी resides in Gir वन National पार्क in इण्डिया ) while अन्य types of शेर have disappeared from North अफ़्रीकी और Southwest Asia in ऐतिहासिक times.
जबतक the लेट pleistocene, about 10,000 सालो ago, the lion was the सबसे widespread large land mammal after इंसानो.
वे were found in सबसे of अफ़्रीकी, आरपार Eurasia from पश्चिमी यूरोपीय to India, और in the americas इससे the Yukon to पेरू.
the शेर is a vulnerable species, having seen a major population decline of 30–50 % over the पास्ट two decades in इसके African range.
Lion populations हैं untenable बाहर designated reserves and नेशनल parks.
Although the cause of the decline is not fully understood, habitat loss and conflicts साथ humans हैं currently the महानतम कल्याणकारी of चिंता.
भीतर अफ़्रीकी, the West अफ़्रीकी शेर population is particularly endangered.
Lions live for 10–14 सालो in the wild, while in captivity वे can live longer than 20 सालो.
in the wild, males seldom सजीव longer than 10 years, as injuries sustained from continual लड़ with प्रतिद्वंद्वी males greatly reduce their longevity.
They typically inhabit savanna and grassland, although they may लो to bush और forest.
Lions are unusually सोशल compared to other cats.
a pride of lions consists of related females and offspring and a छोटी number of adult males.
समूह of मादा शेर typically hunt साथ, preying mostly on large ungulates.
Lions are apex और keystone predators, although they scavenge as opportunity allows.
While शेर do नहीं typically हंट इंसानो, कुछ have महरूम known to do so.
sleeping mainly दौरान the day, lions are primarily nocturnal, हालांकि bordering on crepuscular in प्रकृति.
अत्यधिक distinctive, the male शेर is easily recognised by its mane, और इसके फेस is one of the most widely recognised animal symbols in human संस्कृति.
depictions have existed इससे the Upper paleolithic काल, साथ उत्कीर्णन and paintings इससे the Lascaux and Chauvet Caves, through virtually all ancient और मध्यकालीन cultures where वे एकबार occurred.
it रै महरूम extensively depicted in sculptures, in paintings, on national ध्वज, and in contemporary films and साहित्य.
शेर have been kept in menageries since the समय of the Roman Empire, and have been a key species sought for exhibition in zoos over the world चूंकि the late 18th सदी.
zoos are cooperating worldwide in breeding programs for the endangered Asiatic subspecies.
In the इतिहास of video खेल, the seventh पीढी of consoles is the पिछला generation, और includes consoles released since late by निन्टेंडो, Microsoft, और Sony.
लिये home consoles, the सातवाँ पीढी began on 22 November 2005 with the release of एक्सबॉक्स 360 and जारी with the release of प्लेस्टेशन 3 on 11 November 2006, और Wii on 19 November 2006.
प्रत्येक नई console introduced a नई प्रकार of breakthrough in technology.
the एक्सबॉक्स 360 offered खेल rendered natively at HD resolutions, the PlayStation 3 offered, in addition to fhd gaming, hd movie प्लेबैक via a built-in 3d Blu-ray डिस्क खिलाड़ी, and the वी focused on integrating परिरक्षक with गति sensors as well as joysticks.
joining Nintendo in the motion market, सोनी released the PlayStation मूव in September 2010.
the प्लेस्टेशन Move सुविधाएँ motion संवेदन gaming, similar to कि of the वी.
Microsoft also joined सोनी and Nintendo, with इसके Kinect.
नापसंद the अन्य two systems ( PlayStation 3 and Wii ), kinect करता not use any controllers of any sort और makes the users the `` controller. ''
having sold 8 million units in its first 60 days on the मार्केट, Kinect रै claimed the Guinness संसार Record of being the `` तीव्रतम selling consumer electronics device ''.
While the एक्सबॉक्स 360 offers तार controllers as a standalone product, all PlayStation 3 परिरक्षक can be प्रयुक्त in तार and wireless configurations.
Starting with handheld consoles, the seventh पीढी began on 21 November 2004 with the North अमरीकी परिचय of the निन्टेंडो ds as a `` तीसरा pillar '', alongside Nintendo 's मौजूदा Game लड़के Advance and gamecube consoles.
the Nintendo ds ( NDS ) सुविधाएँ a टच screen and built-in माइक्रोफोन, और supports बेतार IEEE 802.11 ( wi-fi ) standards.
additionally, the revised संस्करण of the NDS, the DSi, सुविधाएँ दो निर्मित in cameras, the क्षमता to download games इससे the DSi store, and a web browser.
the प्लेस्टेशन Portable, or PSP, released बाद the वही साल on 12 दिसम्बर 2004, followed a different पैटर्न.
It became the पहला handheld video game कंसोल to use an optical disc format, सार्वभौमिक Media Disc ( UMD ), as इसके primary भंडार media.
सोनी also दिया the PSP robust multi-media capability, कनेक्टिविटी साथ the प्लेस्टेशन 3 and other psps, and Internet connectivity.
the निन्टेंडो DS likewise रै connectivity to the internet through the निन्टेंडो Wi-Fi Connection और Nintendo DS ब्राउजर, as खूब as wireless connectivity to other DS systems and Wii consoles.
despite high बिक्री numbers लिये दोनो consoles, PlayStation पोर्टेबल बिक्री have consistently lagged पीछे those of the Nintendo DS ; nevertheless, the PlayStation पोर्टेबल रै the distinction of being the best-selling non-nintendo handheld gaming system.
sgt. Pepper 's Lonely Hearts Club बैंड ( often shortened to Sgt. Pepper ) is the आठवीं स्टुडियो album by अंग्रेज़ी चट्टान बैंड the Beatles.
released in June 1967, the एल्बम included songs such as `` With a छोटी Help from My Friends ``, `` Lucy in the आसमान with Diamonds ``, और `` A Day in the Life ``.
continuing the artistic maturation देखी on the band 's album Revolver ( 1966 ), Sgt. Pepper further departed इससे the conventional पॉप rock idiom of the समय and incorporated balladry, psychedelic, music हॉल, and symphonic प्रभाव.
दौरान the sgt. pepper सत्र, the group improved upon the quality of उनके म्यूज़िक 's production while exploring experimental recording techniques.
निर्माता George मार्टिन 's अभिनव दृष्टिकोण included the use of an orchestra.
widely acclaimed and imitated, the album cover, designed by English पॉप artists Peter Blake और Jann Haworth, was inspired by a sketch by Paul mccartney कि depicted the band posing in सामने of a कोलाज of कुछ of their पसंदीदा हस्तियाँ.
sgt. Pepper थी a worldwide नाजुक और वाणिज्यिक success, spending 27 weeks at the शीर्ष of the UK Album Chart and 15 सप्ताह at number एक on the US बिलबोर्ड 200.
A seminal कार्य in the emerging psychedelic चट्टान style, the album थी critically acclaimed upon रिलीज और won चार Grammy पुरस्कार in 1968.
साथ an अनुमानित 32 million नक़ल sold, it is एक of the world 's बेहतरीन selling albums.
sgt. Pepper is considered by अनेक to be the most influential and प्रसिद्ध rock album कभी, और रै महरूम नामित the महानतम album of all समय by both All समय शीर्ष 1000 एल्बम and रोलिंग Stone.
The temporal lobe is a region of the cerebral cortex that is located beneath the पार्श्ववर्ती fissure on दोनो cerebral hemispheres of the mammalian brain.
The temporal lobes हैं involved in the स्तंभन of visual यादें, प्रसंस्करण संवेदी input, comprehending language, storing नई memories, emotion, और deriving meaning.
The इंसान lungs are the अंगों of श्वसन in humans.
Humans have two lungs, a सही lung and a left lung.
The सही फेफड़ों consists of three lobes while the बाएँ lung is slightly smaller consisting of तभी दो निर्मोक ( the बाएँ फेफड़ों रै a `` cardiac notch '' allowing space लिये the heart within the छाती ).
Together, the lungs contain approximately of एयरवेज़ और 300 to 500 million alveoli, having a कुल surface area of परिचय ( ) in वयस्कों — roughly the same क्षेत्रफल as one पक्ष of a tennis अदालत.
Furthermore, if सब of the capillaries that घेर the alveoli यहूद unwound and laid end to end, they would extend लिये about.
प्रत्येक फेफड़ों weighs, इसलिए बनाना the संपूर्ण organ about.
Human फेफड़े
the trachea divides into two bronchi ( one लिये each side ) at the स्तर of T4.
इस junction is also ज्ञात as the carina.
The conducting zone contains the trachea, the bronchi, the bronchioles, और the टर्मिनल bronchioles the respiratory मण्डल contains the respiratory bronchioles, the alveolar नलिकाएं, और the alveoli.
The conducting zone and the respiratory stuffers ( but not the alveoli ) हैं बना up of airways.
The conducting मण्डल has no गैस एक्सचेंज with the रक्त, and is reinforced साथ cartilage in order to hold खोलें the एयरवेज़.
The conducting zone warms the air to and humidifies the एयर.
It also cleanses the एयर by removing particles via cilia located on the दीवारें of all the passageways.
The lungs are घिरी by the rib cage.
The respiratory मण्डल is the site of gas exchange साथ रक्त.
The सहानुभूतिपूर्ण बेचैन system via noradrenaline एक्टिंग on the beta receptors कल्याणकारी bronchodilation.
the parasympathetic nervous system via acetylcholine, which अधिनियमों on the M-3 muscarinic receptors, maintains the resting tone of the bronchiolar चिकना muscle.
This action is related, although considered पृथक from bronchoconstriction.
Many other non-autonomic nervous and biochemical stimuli, including carbon dioxide and ऑक्सीजन, हैं also involved in the विनियमन प्रक्रम.
The pleural गुहा is the संभावित स्पेस between the parietal pleura, lining the inner वॉल of the thoracic cage, और the visceral pleura अस्तर the फेफड़े.
the फेफड़ों parenchyma is सख्ती प्रयुक्त to refer solely to alveolar tissue साथ respiratory bronchioles, alveolar ducts and टर्मिनल bronchioles.
however, it often शामिल any रूप of lung tissue, also सहित bronchioles, bronchi, blood बरतन and फेफड़ों interstitium.
The margarita is a Mexican कॉकटेल consisting of टकीला mixed with Cointreau or समान नारंगी -flavoured liqueur and लाइम or lemon juice, often परोसा with नमक on the कांच रिम.
It is the सबसे common tequila-based cocktail in the United States.
The drink is served shaken with बर्फ ( on the rocks ), blended with बर्फ ( frozen मार्गरिटा ), or without बर्फ ( सीधा up ).

बरगंडी is a dark रेड color associated साथ the बरगंडी वाइन of the same नाम, which in फेरे is named after the Burgundy region of France.
the रंग burgundy is similar to अन्य शेड्स of dark रेड ऐसे as मैरून.
When referring to the color, `` burgundy '' is प्रायः not capitalized.
The पहला recorded उपयोग of `` burgundy '' as a color नाम in अंग्रेज़ी was in 1881.

लापता in action ( MIA ) is a casualty Category assigned under the Status of Missing to armed सेवाएं personnel who are reported लापता during क्रियाशील service.
वे may have महरूम killed, wounded, become a prisoner of war, or उजाड़.
If मृतक, neither their remains nor grave can be positively identified.
Becoming MIA has महरूम an occupational रिस्क for service कर्मियों लिये as long as there has been warfare.
