Intense red-eye effect in ब्लू आँखें with dilated pupil
the red-eye प्रभाव in photography is the common रूप of red pupils in color photographs of आँखें.
It occurs जब using a फ़ोटोग्राफ़िक flash very close to the camera lens ( as साथ most compact कैमरे ), in परिवेश कम light.
the प्रभाव appears in the eyes of इंसानो and animals कि have tapetum lucidum.
नाट्य followspot operators, positioned nearly coincidentally साथ a very bright light और somewhat दूर इससे the अभिनेताओं, occasionally witness red-eye in actors on स्टेज.
the effect is नहीं visible to the बाकी of the audience because it is reliant on the very small कोण between the followspot operator और the लाइट.
The विश्वविद्यालयों of California, Santa Barbara ( commonly referred to as UC सांता बारबरा or ucsb ) is a public research university and one of the ten general campuses of the University of California system.
the main कैम्पस is स्तिथ on a साईट in goleta, California, United राज्य, इससे सांता Barbara and northwest of लॉस एंजिल्स.
Tracing इसके जड़ें back to 1891 as an independent teachers ' college, UCSB joined the University of California system in 1944 and is the third-oldest general-education कैम्पस in the प्रणाली.
UCSB is एक of अमेरिका 's Public Ivy विश्वविद्यालयों, which recognizes top पब्लिक research universities in the संयुक्त States.
The विश्वविद्यालयों is a व्यापक doctoral विश्वविद्यालयों और is organized into पाँच कॉलेजों and schools offering 87 undergraduate degrees और 55 graduate डिग्री.
The कैम्पस is the 6th-largest in the UC प्रणाली by enrollment साथ 18,977 undergraduate and 2,950 graduate विद्यार्थी.
In 2012, UCSB was क्रमित 41st among `` नेशनल Universities '' and 10th among पब्लिक विश्वविद्यालयों by u.S. News & World रपट.
The विश्वविद्यालयों was also ranked 35th worldwide by the टाइम्स Higher Education World विश्वविद्यालयों Rankings and 34th worldwide ( 6th worldwide for engineering ) by the अकादमिक Ranking of World Universities in 2012. < संदर्भ name= '' shanghairanking.com/fieldeng2012 '' >
uc सांता Barbara is a `` बहुत high कार्यकलाप '' research university and spent $ 191.2 लाख on research expenditures in the 2007 fiscal year, 97th-largest in the संयुक्त States.
UCSB houses twelve नेशनल शोध centers, सहित the प्रसिद्ध Kavli Institute for Theoretical भौतिकी.
UCSB संकाय includes पाँच नोबेल Prize laureates, एक Fields Medalist, 29 members of the National Academy of Sciences, 27 members of the नेशनल अकादमी of Engineering, और 31 members of the अमरीकी अकादमी of Arts and sciences.
ucsb was the No. 3 host on the ARPAnet and was elected to the संघ of अमरीकी Universities in 1995.
the uc सांता बारबरा Gauchos compete in the ncaa प्रभाग I बिग West Conference.
the Gauchos have जीती NCAA नेशनल championships in men 's soccer and मेन 's water पोलो.
Saint Joseph with the Infant Jesus by Guido reni
Saint जोसेफ 's Day, March 19, the feast of st. Joseph is in Western christianity the principal feast दिन of Saint Joseph, Spouse of the Blessed वर्जिन मरियम.
He is भी the step-father of यीशु of Nazareth /Jesus मसीह.
It has the रैंक of a solemnity in the Roman कैथोलिक गिरिजाघर ; Catholics who follow the missal of 1962 celebrate it as a first क्लास feast.
पिछला to 1962 it थी celebrated as a feast of the rank of double of the पहला क्लास.
it is a feast or commemoration in the provinces of the Anglican Communion, and a feast or पर्व in the Lutheran गिरिजाघर.
Saint Joseph 's Day is the Patronal Feast दिन लिये कैंडल as खूब as लिये Canada, व्यक्तियों named Joseph, Josephine, etc., लिये धार्मिक institutes, schools and parishes bearing his name, and for carpenters.
It is also Father 's Day in some कैथोलिक countries, mainly स्पेन, पुर्तगाल, and इटली.
कूच 19 was dedicated to Saint Joseph in several Western calendars by the दसवाँ century, और this कस्टम was established in Rome by 1479.
Pope St. पायस v extended इसके use to the entire Roman Rite by his Apostolic Constitution quo Primum ( जुलाई 14, 1570 ).
Since 1969, एपिस्कोपल Conferences may, if they काश, transfer it to a तिथि बाहर lent.
Between 1870 and 1955, a feast was celebrated in honor of St. जोसेफ as Spouse of the Blessed वर्जिन Mary and Patron of the सार्वभौमिक Church, the latter शीर्षक having महरूम दिए to उसे by Pope पायस IX.
Originally celebrated on the third संडे after Easter with an अष्टक, बाद divino afflatu of St. Pius X ( see Reform of the Roman Breviary by Pope पायस X ), it was स्थानांतरित to the preceding बुधवार.
the feast was also retitled The Solemnity of Saint Joseph.
इस जश्न and इसके accompanying अष्टक थी abolished during the modernisation and simplification of rubrics under Pope Pius बारहवीं in 1955.
it is still कायम by catholics who follow the missal of 1962 or पहले missals.
As the परंपरागत holiday of the Apostles Ss. Philip and James, may 1, had faded इससे the memory of सबसे Catholics by the mid-twentieth century, that of जोसेफ the कार्यकर्ता थी created in अनुक्रम to coincide with the celebration of international श्रमिक Day ( May Day ) in many देशों.
The feast of ss. Philip and James, which था been celebrated on that तिथि चूंकि the sixth सदी, थी स्थानांतरित इससे its traditional place.
in the new पंचांग published in 1969, the feast, जिससे at one time occupied the उच्चतम संभावित रैंक in the गिरिजाघर calendar, थी reduced to an optional Memorial, the न्यूनतम rank for a saint 's day.
The Eastern परंपरागत Church मनाता संत जोसेफ on the Sunday after क्रिसमस.
Mariah कैरी ( born March 27, 1970 ) is an American singer, songwriter, रिकार्ड producer, actress, और philanthropist.
Under the guidance of कोलंबिया Records कार्यपालिका Tommy Mottola, Carey released उसके self-titled डेब्यू studio album mariah Carey in 1990 ; it गई multi-platinum और spawned four लगातार number one singles on the U.S. Billboard hot 100 चार्ट.
following उसके marriage to mottola in 1993 और कामयाबी with hit records Emotions ( 1991 ), म्यूज़िक Box ( 1993 ), और Merry क्रिसमस ( 1994 ), Carey was स्थापित as Columbia 's highest-selling अधिनियम.
daydream ( 1995 ) made music इतिहास when its second single `` एक Sweet दिन ``, a duet with बॉयज II मेन, खर्च a रिकार्ड sixteen सप्ताह on top of the Billboard hot 100, and remains the longest-running number-one song in U.S. चार्ट इतिहास.
During the रिकॉर्डिंग of the album, कैरी began to deviate from her R & B and pop beginnings and slowly traversed into हिप hop.
This musical change became evident साथ the रिलीज of Butterfly ( 1997 ), at which समय कैरी had अलग from mottola.
कैरी left कोलंबिया in 2000, और signed a record-breaking $ 100 million रिकॉर्डिंग contract with वर्जिन Records.
Before the रिलीज of her पहला feature फिल्मी glitter ( 2001 ), वो suffered a physical and emotional breakdown and was hospitalized for कठोर थकावट.
Following the film 's poor reception, she थी bought out of उसके recording contract for $ 50 लाख, which led to a मनाही in her करियर.
वो हस्ताक्षरित a multi-million dollar अनुबंध deal साथ द्वीप रिकॉर्ड in 2002, and after an unsuccessful period, लौटे to the शीर्ष of music charts with The emancipation of मिमी ( 2005 ).
Its second सिंगल `` we Belong Together `` became her सबसे successful सिंगल of the 2000s, और was बाद named `` Song of the Decade '' by Billboard.
Carey once again ventured into film साथ a well-received starring role in ( 2009 ) ; वो थी awarded the `` Breakthrough Performance Award '' at the ताड़ Springs अंतरराष्ट्रीय फिल्मी Festival, और Black रील and naacp Image Award nominations.
in a career spanning over दो decades, Carey has sold more than 200 लाख records worldwide, making her एक of the best-selling music कलाकारों of सब time.
In 1998, वो थी honored as the संसार 's best-selling recording कलाकार of the 1990s at the संसार Music पुरस्कार.
कैरी थी also named the best-selling female artist of the मिलेनियम in 2000.
according to the रिकॉर्डिंग Industry संघ of अमेरिका, वो is the तीसरा best-selling female artist in the संयुक्त राज्य, with 63.5 million certified albums.
साथ the रिलीज of `` Touch my Body `` ( 2008 ), कैरी gained her eighteenth number one सिंगल in the United States, अधिक than any अन्य solo artist.
in 2012, Carey was ranked second on VH1 's सूची of the `` 100 महानतम Women in म्यूज़िक ''.
Aside from her commercial accomplishments, Carey has जीती five ग्रैमी Awards, 17 संसार म्यूज़िक Awards, 11 American म्यूज़िक Awards, and 31 Billboard म्यूज़िक Awards.
Referred to as the `` songbird supreme '' by the Guinness World रिकॉर्ड, she is famed for उसके five-octave गायन दायरा, power, melismatic style and signature use of the whistle register.
A bumblebee is any सदस्य of the bee genus bombus, in the family Apidae.
There are over 250 known species, existing primarily in the Northern Hemisphere हालांकि वे भी occur in दक्षिण अमेरिका.
They have been introduced to नई Zealand और the ऑस्ट्रेलियाई state of तस्मानिया.
Bumblebees हैं social कीट that हैं characterised by black और पीला body hairs, often in bands.
however, कुछ प्रजाति have नारंगी or red on उनके bodies, or may be entirely ब्लैक.
Another obvious ( but not unique ) characteristic is the soft nature of the बाल ( long, branched setae ), called pile, that कवर their संपूर्ण body, बनाना उन्हें appear और feel fuzzy.
They हैं best विशिष्ट इससे similarly large, फजी मधुमक्खियों by the form of the मादा hind लेग, which is modified to form a corbicula : a चमकदार concave surface that is bare, लकिन surrounded by a fringe of hairs प्रयुक्त to transport पराग ( in similar मधुमक्खियों, the hind लेग is completely hairy, and pollen grains are wedged into the बालों लिये हस्तांतरण ).
जैसे their relatives the honey मधुमक्खियों, bumblebees feed on nectar और gather pollen to feed their young.
A man openly carrying a handgun in a Burger किंग in त्रिभुज, Colorado.
in the United States, खोलें carry is आशुलिपि शब्दावली लिये `` openly carrying a firearm in पब्लिक '', as distinguished from concealed carry, जहाँ firearms can not be seen by the casual observer.
The practice of open carry, where gun स्वामी openly carry firearms while वे go about उनके daily business, has seen an बढ़ाएँ in the u.S. in recent सालो.
This has been चिह्नित by a क्रमांक of व्यवस्थित events intended to बढ़ाएँ the visibility of open carry और public awareness about the अभ्यास.
Proponents of खोलें carry point to history और statistics, noting that criminals usually छिपाते their हथियार.
प्रोत्साहित by groups like OpenCarry.org, GeorgiaCarry.org and some भागीदार of the Free राज्य Project, open carry has seen a पुनरुद्धार in recent years, लकिन it is not yet clear if this represents बस a short-term trend.
the gun अधिकारों जातियाँ has महरूम mixed in its response.
एलन Gottlieb of the दूसरी Amendment न्यास and the NRA have been cautious in expressing support, जबकि special-interest groups ऐसे as the aforementioned OpenCarry.org और GeorgiaCarry.org, और निश्चित national समूह such as the Gun स्वामी of अमेरिका ( GOA ) have been more outspoken in favor of the practice.
Open carry is strongly opposed by gun कंट्रोल समूह ऐसे as the Brady अभियान और the गठबन्धन to Stop Gun हिंसा.
The cattenom Nuclear Power संयंत्र in France.
France produces around three quarters of its electricity by nuclear power.
The grafenrheinfeld Nuclear शक्ति Plant in जर्मनी.
चांसलर एंजेला Merkel 's coalition घोषित on May 30, 2011, कि Germany’s 17 nuclear शक्ति stations will be shut down by 2022, in a policy reversal following Japan 's Fukushima Daiichi नाभिकीय विपत्ति.
फिलहाल, 68 reactors are under construction in 15 countries.
नाभिकीय power stations operate in तीस countries.
In 2010, before the Fukushima Daiichi nuclear disaster, it was reported कि an average of about 10 nuclear रिएक्टरों were अपेक्षित to become operational प्रति year, although according to the World नाभिकीय Association, of the 17 civilian रिएक्टरों planned to become operational between 2007 and 2009, तभी five दरअसल came on stream.
As of June 2011, Germany and Switzerland हैं phasing-out नाभिकीय शक्ति.
As of जून 2011, देशों ऐसे as ऑस्ट्रेलिया, ऑस्ट्रिया, Denmark, यूनानियों, आयरलैंड, Italy, Latvia, liechtenstein, ध्वज, Malaysia, माल्टा, New जीलैंड, नार्वे और Portugal remain opposed to nuclear power.
रंग motion चित्र फिल्मी refers दोनो to unexposed रंग photographic film in a format suitable for उपयोग in a गति चित्र camera, और to finished गति picture film, ready लिये use in a projector, which bears images in color.
The first color cinematography थी by means of योगात्मक color प्रणालियों such as the एक patented in England by एडवर्ड Raymond टर्नर in 1899 और tested in 1902.
a simplified additive system थी विकसित by George अल्बर्ट Smith and सफलतापूर्वक commercialized in 1909 as Kinemacolor.
These early प्रणालियों प्रयुक्त black-and-white film to फोटोग्राफ and प्रोजेक्ट दो or more component images through different रंग filters.
Still from footage recorded by एडवर्ड टर्नर in 1902
With the present-day technology, वहीँ हैं two distinct processes : Eastman रंग ऋणात्मक 2 रसायन ( camera negative stocks, duplicating interpositive और internegative stocks ) and Eastman Color Positive 2 chemistry ( धनात्मक prints for सीधा projection ), usually abbreviated as ecn-2 और ECP-2.
Fuji 's उत्पाद हैं compatible with ecn-2 और ECP-2.
Ashanti Shequoiya डगलस ( born October 13, 1980 ) is an अमरीकी singer-songwriter, record producer, and अभिनेत्री.
ashanti is most famous for her eponymous डेब्यू album, जिससे featured the hit song `` foolish ``, और sold over 503,000 नक़ल in इसके first week of रिलीज throughout the U.S. in April 2002.
The album set a soundscan रिकार्ड as the biggest खोलने week sales for a नई female कलाकार, outselling debuts by Alicia कुंजियाँ and लॉरिन Hill.
In the same week, वो became the first female performer to simultaneously hold the शीर्ष two स्थान on the Billboard hot 100 singles chart साथ `` Foolish '', और `` कया 's Luv ? ``
( with मोटे Joe ).
Ashanti broke records again by having three शीर्ष ten songs, `` Foolish, '' `` What 's luv ? '' and `` Always on Time ``, on the Billboard Hot 100 charts in the same सप्ताह, being the पहला woman to accomplish इस feat और होने दूसरी तभी to the Beatles.
In 2003, the self-titled डेब्यू एल्बम जीती Ashanti her पहला ग्रैमी Award for बेहतरीन Contemporary r & B album.
As of अप्रैल 1st 2013, Ashanti रै sold over 27.7 million records worldwide.
Ashanti ended the decade ( 2000–09 ) as the third शीर्ष नई R & B artist behind Alicia कुंजियाँ and Beyoncé.
She भी ended the decade at क्रमांक 38 on the Top कलाकार of the Decade list.
वो is फिलहाल on the list of the Twenty बेहतरीन Selling Music Singles चूंकि 1990 for her single Foolish for selling 7.2 लाख copies to-date.
ashanti has an estimated जाल worth of $ 40 million dollars [ USD ].
ashanti लिखा and sang background on Jennifer Lopez 's `` ai n't it मजेदार ( Murder रिमिक्स ) ``, जिससे reached number एक on बिलबोर्ड hot 100, जिससे थी भी in the top 10 चार्ट at the same time as `` Foolish '', `` Always on Time '' ( साथ ja Rule ), and `` What 's Luv '' ( with मोटे Joe ).
बाद कि साल, she was acclaimed as the `` Princess of Hip-Hop & r & B '' by उसके लेबल और capped off her successful डेब्यू by जीतना eight Billboard awards and two American Music Awards.
भीतर सात years of Ashanti 's करियर, she has scored 16 शीर्ष 40 हिट्स on the Hot 100.
Ashanti रै endorsed numerous उत्पाद सहित गैप, हर्बल Essences and Mudd जीन्स.
Ashanti cites Whitney Houston, Janet Jackson, प्रिंस, Madonna, Tupac Shakur, Mary J. blige, एला fitzgerald, Smokey रॉबिन्सन, Donna गर्मियाँ, and ब्लू Magic as her musical influences.
praised as a gifted songwriter by उसके peers and आलोचकों alike, ashanti रै written/co-written the bulk of all her म्यूज़िक.
She is currently working on her own publishing कम्पनी entitled Written Entertainment.
She released her fourth studio एल्बम हकदार The घोषणा on जून 3, 2008 and is फिलहाल in the studio working on her पांचवां.
She also performed the दान धुन `` Just Stand up `` alongside 15 अन्य female singers लिये the `` Stand up to Cancer '' live television खास जिससे helped raise $ 100 लाख dollars for cancer research.
the United States फौज Air Forces ( USAAF or aaf ) was the military विमानन भुजा of the संयुक्त States of America दौरान and immediately बाद World War ii, and the सीधा predecessor of the संयुक्त राज्य एयर फ़ोर्स.
The aaf was a component of the United राज्य Army, which in 1942 was विभाजित functionally by executive order into तीन autonomous शक्तियां : the फौज Ground Forces, the सेवाएं of सप्लाई ( जिससे in 1943 became the फौज Service Forces ), and the AAF.
Each of ये शक्तियां had a commanding general जो reported सीधे to the Chief of स्टाफ of the संयुक्त States Army.
The aaf administered सब parts of military विमानन formerly वितरित among the Army Air Corps, General Headquarters Air Force, and ground forces corps क्षेत्रफल कमांडरों, and यूँ became the first air organization of the u.S. फौज to कंट्रोल its own installations and support personnel.
In practice, the AAF थी वस्तुतः autonomous inside the फौज.
the शिखर size of the AAF was over 2.4 million men and महिलाओं in सेवा and nearly 80,000 aircraft in 1944, and 783 domestic bases in December 1943.
By VE Day it था 1.25 million men stationed overseas और operated from अधिक than 1,600 airfields विश्वव्यापी.
The Air Corps became the फौज Air Forces in जून 1941 to provide the एयर arm a greater स्वायत्तता in जिससे to expand more efficiently, and to provide a structure for the अतिरिक्त कमांड echelons जरूरी by a vastly increased force.
Although other nations already था separate एयर forces independent of the army or नेवी ( ऐसे as the अंग्रेजों Royal एयर Force और the German Luftwaffe ), the AAF remained a part of the संयुक्त राज्य फौज जबतक the United राज्य एयर Force came into होने in September 1947.
however, in its विस्तार and conduct of the युद्ध, the AAF became अधिक than just an भुजा of the greater संगठन.
By the end of World युद्ध II the aaf had become virtually an independent service.
by विनियमन and कार्यपालिका अनुक्रम, the aaf was a subordinate एजेंसी of the युद्ध Department tasked only with organizing, प्रशिक्षण, and equipping combat इकाई, limited in जिम्मेदारी to the महाद्वीपीय United States, as यहूद the Army Ground शक्तियां and the फौज Service Forces.
In reality, मुख्यालय AAF नियंत्रित the conduct of सब aspects of the air युद्ध in every भाग of the संसार, determining air policy and issuing orders बगैर transmitting उन्हें through the Chief of Staff.
This `` contrast between सिद्धान्त और fact is... fundamental to an understanding of the AAF. ''
The स्वतंत्रता of सूचना अधिनियम ( FOIA ) is a federal freedom of information law कि allows लिये the full or आंशिक प्रकटीकरण of previously unreleased सूचना and दस्तावेज़ controlled by the United States government.
The Act defines agency रिकॉर्ड subject to प्रकटीकरण, outlines अनिवार्य प्रकटीकरण procedures और अनुदान nine exemptions to the statute.
It was originally signed into law by President lyndon B. जॉनसन, despite his misgivings, on July 4, 1966 as and गई into effect the following year.
The संघीय Government 's Freedom of सूचना Act चाहिए not be उलझन साथ the अलग और varying स्वतंत्रता of Information अधिनियमों passed by the individual राज्य.
Many of those राज्य acts may be समान but not identical to the संघीय act.
the European संघ ( eu ) is an economic और political union of 27 member states that are located primarily in Europe.
the EU operates through a system of supranational independent संस्थानों and intergovernmental negotiated निर्णय by the member राज्य.
Institutions of the EU include the European Commission, the Council of the यूरोपीय Union, the European परिषद, the Court of Justice of the यूरोपीय Union, the European Central Bank, the Court of Auditors, और the European पार्लियामेंट.
The European Parliament is elected प्रत्येक पाँच years by eu citizens.
The EU 's de facto capital is Brussels.
The EU traces its origins इससे the यूरोपीय कोयले and Steel जातियाँ ( ecsc ) and the European Economic Community ( EEC ), formed by the भीतरी Six countries in 1951 and 1958 क्रमशः.
In the intervening years the community and its successors have grown in size by the accession of new member states और in शक्ति by the addition of नीति क्षेत्रों to its remit.
the maastricht सन्धि established the यूरोपीय संघ under its वर्तमान नाम in 1993.
The latest major amendment to the constitutional basis of the eu, the सन्धि of लिस्बन, आए into फ़ोर्स in 2009.
The EU रै विकसित a single market through a standardised प्रणाली of laws that लागू in all member states.
Within the Schengen Area ( which includes 22 EU and 4 non-EU states ) पासपोर्ट नियंत्रण have been abolished.
eu policies aim to ensure the free movement of people, goods, सेवाएं, और capital, enact legislation in justice और home affairs, और maintain common नीतियों on trade, agriculture, fisheries and क्षेत्रीय विकास.
A monetary union, the eurozone, थी स्थापित in 1999 and is composed of 17 सदस्य राज्य.
through the आम विदेशी और Security नीति the EU has developed a भूमिका in external relations और defence.
Permanent diplomatic मिशन have महरूम established around the world.
the eu is represented at the United राष्ट्र, the wto, the G8 and the g-20.
With a combined जनसांख्यिकी of over 500 million inhabitants, or 7.3 % of the world जनसांख्यिकी, the eu, in 2012, generated a nominal सकल घरेलू उत्पाद ( GDP ) of 16.584 trillion us डॉलर, representing approximately 20 % of the वैश्विक GDP when measured in terms of खरीदना power पैरिटी, और represents the largest nominal GDP and जीडीपी ppp in the world.
The EU was the प्राप्तकर्ता of the 2012 नोबेल Peace पुरस्कार.
the वेल्स national रग्बी league team represent Wales in international रग्बी league football मिलान.
Currently the team is सातवाँ in the RLIF संसार Rankings.
The team यहूद run under the auspices of the Rugby फ़ुटबॉल लीग, but an स्वतंत्र देह, Wales Rugby League, अभी runs the team from Cardiff.
A total of three Welsh खिलाड़ी have महरूम डाला into the रग्बी लीग Hall of Fame.
समान to many अन्य वेल्श national sporting टीमों, Wales strip has महरूम primarily red लिये अनेक सालो, including now.
However in उनके पिछला संसार Cup campaign in 2000 वे किया wear a कमीज़ featuring the वेल्श flag, adding a touch of ग्रीन and white.
The team is known as `` the ड्रेगन '' and so the टीमों logo on the shirt is a red ड्रैगन.
The team date वापस to 1907, making उन्हें the तीसरा oldest national पक्ष after England and नई जीलैंड.
And it was a touring New Zealand पक्ष कि वेल्स first निभाई विरूद्ध in 1908, winning 9-8 at aberdare.
Since then Wales have regularly played England, चूंकि 1935 France, as well as सत्कार the touring Australia and नई Zealand teams, हालांकि they rarely toured themselves, नहीं playing a मैच in the दक्षिणी गोलार्ध जबतक 1975.
For twenty-six years Wales competed विरूद्ध उनके दो biggest विरोधियों, इंग्लैण्ड and France, in the European Nations कप, winning the trophy four times.
वेल्स have भी competed in the World कप on three अवसरों, the first time होने in 1975.
In 1995 and 2000 वे था their most कामयाब tournaments to date, surprisingly making the semi-finals on दोनो अवसरों before होने पिटे by इंग्लैण्ड और Australia क्रमशः.
Wales failed to qualify for the 2008 संसार Cup, being the second उच्चतम ranked पक्ष not to do so, having lost to स्कॉटलैंड on points अंतर over दो matches.
In 2008 ऑस्ट्रेलियाई जॉन Dixon became the new सिर coach and appointed Lee Briers as captain, having played लिये वेल्स चूंकि 1998.
in हाल सीज़न Wales have taken massive strides under former player Iestyn हैरिस who has coached Wales to back to back European Cup successes, which culminated in a Four राष्ट्र appearance in 2011.
cardiomyopathy ( वस्तुतः `` heart मांसपेशी बीमारी '' ) is the measurable deterioration of the function of the myocardium ( the heart मांसपेशी ) for कोई reason, प्रायः leading to heart failure ; आम symptoms हैं dyspnea ( breathlessness ) and परिधीय एडिमा ( swelling of the legs ).
लोगों साथ cardiomyopathy are often at risk of dangerous forms of irregular दिल ताल और अचानक cardiac मौत.
the most common form of cardiomyopathy is dilated cardiomyopathy.
बकवास in its literal अर्थ refers to the act of sexual intercourse.
It is an English word that is often used as a profanity, either to denote तिरस्कार or as an intensifier.
the origin of the शब्द is obscure.
it is प्रायः considered to be first attested to around 1475, लकिन it may be considerably older.
In modern usage, बकवास and इसके derivatives ( such as fucker and fucking ) can be used in the position of a संज्ञा, a verb, an adjective or an adverb.
There हैं many common phrases जिससे मेक उपयोग of the शब्द, as खूब as a क्रमांक of यौगिकों incorporating it, such as motherfucker.
Note : इस आलेख adopts the u.S. Department of Transportation 's definition of a यात्री गाडी, to औसत a car or truck, प्रयुक्त लिये passengers, excluding बसें और trains.
The United राज्य is घर to the largest passenger गाडी market of any देश in the संसार.
Overall, there यहूद an estimated 254.4 million registered यात्री vehicles in the संयुक्त राज्य according to a 2007 DOT पढ़ाई.
इस क्रमांक, along साथ the average age of vehicles, has increased steadily चूंकि 1960, indicating a growing क्रमांक of वाहनों per capita.
The Chinese car market, however, is poised to जल्द exceed the संयुक्त States ; by the end of 2012, there were over 240 million cars on the road in China.
the United States is also home to three large vehicle निर्माताओं : General मोटर्स, Ford मोटर Company और Chrysler, which have historically been referred to as the `` Big Three. ''
क्रिसलर however is no longer among the top तीन ; लकिन is number five, behind टोयोटा and Honda.
The मोटर car has clearly become an integral part of American life, with वाहनों outnumbering licensed drivers.
Clinical प्रयोगशाला in a Hospital setting प्रर्दशित several automated analysers.
a medical प्रयोगशाला or नैदानिक laboratory is a laboratory जहाँ tests are किया on नैदानिक specimens in order to get information about the health of a रोगी as pertaining to the निदान, treatment, और prevention of disease.
in poker, players construct hands of पाँच cards according to predetermined rules, जिससे vary according to which variant of पोकर is being निभाई.
ये हैंड्स are compared using a हाथ रैंकिंग प्रणाली that is standard across all variants of poker, the player with the highest-ranking hand जीतना that particular deal in सबसे variants of poker.
in कुछ विसंगतियाँ, the lowest-ranking hand can win or टाई.
ये hand rankings are also used in कुछ other कार्ड खेल, and in poker dice.
The रैंकिंग of a particular hand is increased by including multiple ताश of the same card rank, by all five ताश being from the same suit, or by all five ताश being of लगातार rank.
the relative ranking of the विभिन्न hand categories is based on the probability of being randomly dealt ऐसे a hand from a well- shuffled deck.
ब्रूस रान्डेल Hornsby ( born November 23, 1954 ) is an American virtuoso ; a singer, pianist, सिंथेसाइज़र, accordion, और dulcimer player, और songwriter.
Known for the spontaneity and रचनात्मकता of उसके live performances, Hornsby draws frequently from शास्त्रीय, jazz, bluegrass, folk, Motown, gospel, rock, blues, और jam band musical traditions साथ his songwriting and the seamless improvisations contained within.
hornsby 's रिकार्डिंग have been recognised on a number of अवसरों साथ industry पुरस्कार, including the Best New Artist ग्रैमी in 1987 with ब्रूस hornsby और the Range, the बेहतरीन Bluegrass Recording Grammy in 1990, and the बेहतरीन Pop इंस्ट्रूमेंटल Grammy in 1993.
hornsby रै also achieved recognition लिये उसके सोलो एल्बम and प्रदर्शन, his touring बैंड ब्रूस hornsby और the noisemakers, उसके ब्लूग्रास प्रोजेक्ट with Ricky Skaggs and उसके appearances as a session- और guest-musician.
He भी collaborated साथ Grateful Dead and was a सदस्य of the band इससे September 1990 to March 1992, playing at over एक hundred shows during कि period.
Sugarcane plantation in rural Cuba
Agriculture in क्यूबा रै निभाई an महत्वपूर्ण part in the economy for several hundred years.
कृषि contributes less than 10 percent to the gross घरेलू product ( जीडीपी ), but it employs roughly 20 प्रतिशत of the working जनसांख्यिकी.
परिचय 30 percent of the देश 's जमीन is प्रयुक्त for क्रॉप cultivation.
The inefficient agricultural industry in Cuba has led to the need to import विशाल amounts of foods.
क्यूबा अभी imports about 80 % of the food it rations to the पब्लिक.
The rationing program खाते for about a third of the खाना energy the average Cuban consumes.
Overall, however, Cuba is निर्भर on imports for तभी 16 % of its खाना.

आचमन लाखो ( initially called The Big Game आचमन लाखो as the successor of The Big Game ) is an अमरीकी multi-jurisdictional $ 1 lottery खेल.
The पहला ( The Big खेल ) Mega Millions drawing थी in 2002 ( देखिए below ).
the न्यूनतम Mega Millions advertised जैकपॉट is $ 12,000,000, paid in 26 बराबर वार्षिक किश्तों ( जबतक the cash option is chosen ) ; प्रायः, the जैकपॉट increases when वहीँ is no top-prize winner.
However, despite no jackpot विजेता for the $ 12,000,000 दिसम्बर 18, 2012 drawing, the जैकपॉट remained at $ 12,000,000 लिये the drawing to be held on December 21.
( See below for सूचना on कैसा the game 's जैकपॉट is वित्तपोषित. )
Reflecting common practice among अमरीकी lotteries, the jackpot is advertised as a नाममात्र मान of annual किश्तों.
a नकदी value विकल्प ( the usual choice ), जब chosen by a jackpot winner ( see below ), pays the approximate उपस्थित value of the किश्तों.
आचमन Millions currently उपयोग a 5/56 ( श्वेत balls ) plus 1/46 ( the आचमन बॉल ) double मेट्रिक्स to select its जीतना संख्याएँ.
Each game costs $ 1.
In 43 of the 44 आचमन Millions jurisdictions ( California is the एक्सेप्शन ), there is an option, called Megaplier ( ऐसे games are $ 2 प्रत्येक ) where non-jackpot पुरस्कार are multiplied by 2, 3, or 4.
the Megaplier थी made available to all Mega Millions jurisdictions in जनवरी 2011 ; it began as a Texas -only option.
Mega Millions is drawn at 10:59 p.m. पूर्वी time Tuesdays and Fridays, सहित holidays.
Mega Millions is administered by a consortium of इसके 12 असली lotteries and the drawings are held at wsb-tv in Atlanta, Georgia.
supervised by the Georgia Lottery.
the largest jackpot in Mega Millions, as well as in अमरीकी lottery इतिहास, was $ 656,000,000 annuitized ( with a नकदी विकल्प of $ 474,000,000 ) for the March 30, 2012 आरेखण in जिससे there were three jackpot-winning tickets ; एक प्रत्येक in इलिनोइस, कान्सास, and Maryland.
All three tickets था महरूम claimed as of अप्रैल 18, with each set of विजेता चुनना the नकदी option.
is a Japanese manga series निर्मित by लेखक Tsugumi ohba and manga artist Takeshi obata.
The प्रमुख character is Light Yagami, a ऊँची school student who discovers a supernatural notebook, the `` मौत Note '', dropped on Earth by a shinigami ( a god of मौत ) named ryuk.
The Death Note grants its उपयोक्ता the ability to मार anyone जिनकी नाम and face they know, by लिखने the name in the notebook while picturing उनके face.
the series centers around Light 's attempt to बनाएँ and नियम a world `` cleansed of evil '' as `` God '' using the notebook, and the efforts of a detective known as L to stop उसे.
Death Note was first serialized in 108 chapters by Shueisha in the जापानी manga magazine साप्ताहिक Shōnen जम्प from दिसम्बर 2003 to may 2006.
The श्रेणी थी भी published in tankōbon format in Japan starting in May 2004 and ending in October 2006 with a कुल of thirteen volumes.
The anime series aired in Japan from October 3, 2006, to जून 26, 2007.
Composed of 37 episodes, the दुश्मनी was developed by madhouse और directed by Tetsuro Araki.
A light novel आधारित on the series, written by Nisio isin, was released in Japan.
Additionally, विभिन्न video खेल have महरूम published by Konami for निन्टेंडो ds.
The श्रेणी थी adapted into live-action films released in Japan on June 17, 2006, नवम्बर 3, 2006, और February 2, 2008.
Viz मीडिया licensed the मौत Note manga in North America and रै published all the बारह volumes from the series, a 13th आवाज़ जिससे serves as a `` रीडर 's guide '', as खूब as the light novels.
the एपीसोड from the anime first appeared in उत्तर America as downloadable by ign.
viz later licensed the दुश्मनी श्रेणी and it aired on bionix in Canada and on कार्टून संजाल in the United राज्य.
the live-action films briefly निभाई in certain North अमरीकी theaters चूंकि 2008.
However, none of the वीडियो games have thus दूर महरूम published in उत्तर America or यूरोपीय.
मौत नोट is एक of Weekly Shōnen jumps best-selling manga series of all time, with बिक्री over 26.5 million copies.
Halloween or Hallowe'en ( a contraction of `` All Hallows ' संध्या `` ), भी known as All Hallows ' संध्या, is a वार्षिक celebration observed in a number of countries on अक्तूबर 31, the eve of the Western Christian feast of All Hallows ( or सब Saints ) and the day initiating the triduum of hallowmas.
According to अनेक विद्वानों, All hallows ' Eve is a christianised feast originally influenced by western European harvest festivals, and त्यौहार of the dead साथ संभावित pagan roots, particularly the Celtic Samhain.
अन्य scholars maintain that it originated independently of Samhain and रै solely Christian जड़ें.
Typical festive Halloween क्रियाएँ include trick-or-treating ( भी known as `` guising `` ), उपस्थित costume parties, नक्काशी pumpkins into jack-o'-lanterns, lighting bonfires, apple bobbing, visiting haunted आकर्षण, playing pranks, telling scary stories, and watching horror films.
नई York City taxicabs during midtown rush hour in मैनहटन
The taxicabs of नई यॉर्क City, with their distinctive पीला paint, हैं a widely recognized प्रतीक of the city.
Taxicabs are संचालित by private कंपनियाँ and licensed by the New York नगर Taxi और Limousine आयोग ( TLC ).
it भी oversees over 40,000 अन्य for-hire वाहनों, including `` black cars '', commuter vans and ambulettes.
`` medallion taxis, '' the familiar पीला कैब, are the तभी vehicles in the नगर permitted to चुनें up यात्री in response to a street hail.
Schematic क्रॉस खण्ड of part of leaf, जाइलम shown as रेड circles at फिगर 8.
जाइलम is one of the two प्रकार of हस्तांतरण ऊतक in vascular पौधे ( फ्लोएम is the अन्य ).
The word xylem is derived from the Greek शब्द ξύλον ( xylon ), अर्थ `` wood '' ; the best-known xylem ऊतक is लकडी, हालांकि it is found throughout the संयंत्र.
Its basic function is to transport जल, but it भी transports some nutrients through the संयंत्र.
U.S. women suffragists demonstrating लिये the right to vote, फ़रवरी 1913.
महिलाओं 's suffrage भी ज्ञात as woman suffrage is the सही of महिलाओं to vote and to run लिये दफ्तर.
Limited voting अधिकारों यहूद gained by women in Sweden, Finland और some western u.S. राज्य in the late 19th century.
अंतरराष्ट्रीय संगठन यहूद formed to coordinate प्रयत्न, विशेषकर the अंतरराष्ट्रीय Council of Women ( 1888 ) और the International Woman Suffrage Alliance ( 1904 ).
in 1893, नई Zealand, तब a self-governing British colony, granted adult महिलाओं the right to vote and the self-governing British उपनिवेश of दक्षिण Australia did the same in 1895, लकिन भी permitted महिलाओं to run for office.
Australia federated in 1901, and महिलाओं acquired the right to vote and stand in federal elections इससे 1902, हालांकि uneven restrictions on Aboriginal women voting in national चुनावों were नहीं completely removed जबतक 1962.
The first European देश to introduce महिलाओं 's suffrage was the Grand duchy of फिनलैंड, then भाग of the रूसी Empire, which also उत्पादित the संसार 's first female members of parliament in the 1907 parliamentary चुनावों.
Norway followed, granting पूरा महिलाओं 's suffrage in 1913.
In most Western देशों, women 's suffrage came after संसार i युद्ध I I, with some important लेट अनुकूलक being फ़्रांस in 1944 और स्विट्ज़रलैंड in 1971.
Women 's suffrage रै generally been पहचाना after political campaigns to obtain it were waged.
In अनेक देशों it थी granted पहले सार्वभौमिक suffrage.
Women 's suffrage is explicitly stated as a right अंतर्गत the Convention on the विलोपन of All Forms of Discrimination Against Women, अपनाया by the United Nations in 1979.
The तेरहवीं Tale ( 2006 ) by Diane Setterfield is a gothic suspense novel, the लेखक 's पहला published किताब.
यहोवा 's गवाह is a millenarian restorationist ईसाई denomination with nontrinitarian मान्यताओं distinct from मुख्यधारा christianity.Sources for descriptors : • millenarian : • Restorationist : • Christian : • Denomination : The organization रिपोर्ट्स worldwide membership of over 7.78 million adherents involved in evangelism, convention attendance of over 12 million, और annual मेमोरियल attendance of over 19 million.
वे are directed by the Governing Body of Jehovah 's Witnesses, a समूह of बड़ो in ब्रुकलीन, नई यॉर्क, that establishes all doctrines.
Jehovah 's Witnesses ' मान्यताओं are आधारित on their interpretations of the Bible और they prefer to use उनके own translation, the New संसार Translation of the पावन शास्त्रों.
They believe that the विनाश of the उपस्थित world system at Armageddon is imminent, and that the establishment of God 's किंगडम on धरती is the तभी solution लिये सब problems faced by mankind.
the समूह emerged from the बाइबल छात्र गति —founded in the late 1870s by Charles Taze Russell with the formation of Zion 's Watch Tower ट्रैक्ट समाज —with significant organizational और doctrinal परिवर्तन under the नेतृत्व of Joseph फ्रैंकलिन रदरफोर्ड.
the name यहोवा 's witnesses, based on यशायाह 43:10–12, थी adopted in 1931 to फर्क themselves इससे other Bible छात्र समूह and symbolize a break साथ the विरासत of रसेल 's परंपराओं.
यहोवा 's गवाह हैं best known लिये their door-to-door preaching, distributing literature ऐसे as The Watchtower और Awake !
, और refusing सैन्य service और blood transfusions.
They consider use of the name Jehovah vital for proper इबादत.
They अस्वीकृत trinitarianism, inherent अमरत्व of the soul, and hellfire, which वे consider to be unscriptural doctrines.
वे do not observe क्रिसमस, Easter, जन्मदिन, or अन्य छुट्टियाँ and कस्टम they consider to have pagan origins असंगत साथ christianity.
adherents commonly refer to their देह of मान्यताओं as `` the सच्चाई '' and consider themselves to be `` in the truth ''.
They consider धर्मनिरपेक्ष society to be morally corrupt and अंतर्गत the influence of Satan, and most limit उनके social interaction साथ non-witnesses.
Congregational disciplinary क्रियाएँ शामिल disfellowshipping, उनके term for औपचारिक expulsion and shunning.
baptized individuals who formally leave are माना disassociated and are also shunned.
disfellowshipped और disassociated individuals may eventually be reinstated if deemed repentant.
the religion 's स्थिति regarding ईमानदार आपत्ति to military service and refusal to सलाम national flags रै brought it into conflict with some governments.
Consequently, Jehovah 's Witnesses have महरूम persecuted और उनके activities are बैन or restricted in some देशों.
persistent legal चुनौतियां by यहोवा 's गवाह have influenced legislation related to सिविल अधिकारों in several countries.
Last Tango in पेरिस ( ) is a 1972 Franco-Italian romantic Drama फिल्मी निर्देशित by Bernardo bertolucci जिससे portrays a recent American विधुर who begins an बेनाम यौन relationship साथ a यंग, betrothed Parisian woman.
It सितारों मार्लोन ब्रैंडो, मरिया श्नाइडर, and jean-pierre Léaud.
the film 's raw portrayal of sexual हिंसा and emotional turmoil led to अंतरराष्ट्रीय विवाद and खींचा various स्तर of government सेंसरशिप.
The MPAA gave the film an x दरजा upon release in the United राज्य.
After revisions यहूद made to the mpaa दरजा code, it थी वर्गीकृत as an nc-17 in 1997.
mgm released a censored R-rated cut in 1981.
The फिल्मी has its nc-17 दरजा for `` some explicit यौन सामग्री. ''
Windows XP is an ऑपरेटिंग system उत्पादित by Microsoft for उपयोग on निजी computers, including घर और business desktops, लैपटॉप and media centers.
First released to computer निर्माताओं on August 24, 2001, it is the second most लोकप्रिय version of Windows, based on installed उपयोक्ता आधार.
the नाम `` xp '' is short for `` अनुभव '', highlighting the enhanced user experience.
Windows XP, the successor to Windows 2000 and Windows ME, थी the first consumer-oriented ऑपरेटिंग प्रणाली produced by Microsoft to be built on the खिड़कियाँ nt kernel.
Windows xp was released worldwide लिये खुदरा sale on October 25, 2001, और over 400 million नक़ल यहूद in use in जनवरी 2006.
It was succeeded by खिड़कियाँ Vista in January 2007.
Direct oem and retail बिक्री of खिड़कियाँ xp ceased on June 30, 2008.
microsoft continued to sell खिड़कियाँ xp through their System Builders ( smaller OEMs who बेचें assembled कंप्यूटर ) कार्यक्रम जबतक January 31, 2009.
on April 10, 2012, microsoft reaffirmed that extended support लिये खिड़कियाँ XP और दफ्तर 2003 होता समाप्त on अप्रैल 8, 2014 and suggested कि प्रशासकों शुरू preparing to migrate to a नए OS.
the NT -based versions of Windows, जिससे are प्रोग्रामित in C, C++, और सभा, are known लिये उनके improved stability और efficiency over the 9x versions of Microsoft Windows.
खिड़कियाँ XP presented a significantly redesigned graphical उपयोक्ता interface, a change Microsoft प्रचारित as more user-friendly than previous versions of खिड़कियाँ.
in an attempt to further ameliorate the `` DLL hell `` that plagued the पास्ट संस्करण of खिड़कियाँ, improved side-by-side assembly प्रौद्योगिकी in Windows xp allows side-by-side installation, registration और सर्विसिंग of multiple versions of globally shared तन्त्र components in पूरा isolation.
It is also the पहला version of खिड़कियाँ to use उत्पाद activation to कॉम्बैट illegal copying.
During खिड़कियाँ xp 's विकास, the प्रोजेक्ट थी codenamed `` whistler '', after whistler, British कोलंबिया, as many microsoft employees skied at the whistler-blackcomb ski resort.
according to web analytics data generated by Net Applications, Windows XP थी the सबसे widely प्रयुक्त operating प्रणाली जबतक August 2012, when Windows 7 overtook it.
, Windows XP मार्केट share is at 38.99 %, having decreased almost every month since at least November 2007, the first month for जिससे आंकडे हैं सरेआम available इससे Net Applications.
`` Por una Cabeza '' is an अर्जेंटाइन टैंगो with म्यूज़िक और lyrics written in 1935 by कार्लोस Gardel और Alfredo Le Pera क्रमशः.
The name is a Spanish horse-racing phrase अर्थ `` by a सिर '', जिससे refers to a horse winning a race by the length of one head.
The lyrics speak of a बाध्यता horse-track gambler who compares उसके व्यसन लिये horses with his आकर्षण to महिलाओं.
अल्फ्रेडो Le Pera थी a ब्राज़ीलियाई from São पाउलो, a much Italian-influenced क्षेत्रफल in Brazil, और also the जन्मस्थान of Zequinha de Abreu, composer of tico-tico no Fubá.
le Pera and gardel died in an airplane crash in medellín, ( Colombia ), on जून 24, 1935.
पोर una cabeza
The टैंगो has since महरूम performed by numerous tango orchestras.
टैंगो scenes साथ `` पोर una Cabeza '' appear in Delicatessen ( 1991 ), Scent of a Woman ( 1992 ), Schindler 's List ( 1993 ), True झूठ ( 1994 ), टाइटैनिक ( 1996 ), ख़राब Santa ( uncut Version, 2003 ), All the King 's Men ( 2006 ), Planet 51 ( 2009 ), episode 37 of Nip/Tuck ( 2003–2010 ), episode 9 of दक्षिण Korean drama series Sweet जासूस ( 2005–08 ), the शुरूआत and ending क्रेडिट of the दक्षिण कोरियाई drama ब्रॉडकास्ट i 'm sorry, I Love तुम ( 2004 ), and the episode `` Down the खरगोश Hole `` ( 2007 ).
In the फिल्म Frida ( Salma Hayek, 2002 ), gardel is सुना गायन it on a रेडियो.
it is also कोटेड in दाउद Del tredici 's `` Good News !
nilda is Back '' ( इससे the सोंग साईकिल miz Inez Sez ).
In Scent of a Woman ( 1992 ), the टैंगो is performed by the `` The Tango Project '', जो actually appear in the dancing झाँकी starring Al पचिनो ( the recording used is उपलब्धियाँ on one of their CD albums ).
जॉन Williams arranged a संस्करण of the टुकड़ा कि appears on the album `` Cinema Serenade '' with the violin solo performed by Itzhak पर्लमैन.
पर्लमैन and Williams ( conducting ) have भी performed the टुकड़ा together in live कॉन्सर्ट.
In 2012 a नृत्य version थी released by the group `` Da Carrera '' featuring the असली गायन रिकॉर्डिंग by कार्लोस Gardel.
the baroreflex or baroreceptor reflex is one of the देह 's homeostatic mechanisms लिये maintaining रक्त pressure.
it provides a negative प्रतिक्रिया loop in जिससे an elevated blood pressure reflexively कल्याणकारी heart रेट to decrease therefore causing रक्त दबाव to घटी ; likewise, decreased रक्त दबाव activates the baroreflex, causing heart rate to increase thus causing an increase in blood pressure.
the system relies on specialized neurons, ज्ञात as baroreceptors, in the aortic मेहराब, carotid साइनस, and elsewhere to मॉनिटर परिवर्तन in blood pressure और रिले them to the brainstem.
subsequent परिवर्तन in blood pressure हैं mediated by the autonomic nervous system.
Atrial natriuretic पेप्टाइड forms a parallel ऋणात्मक feedback लूप in an endocrinological contrast to the renin-angiotensin system.
The Loma prieta earthquake, भी known as the Quake of '89 and the World श्रेणी Earthquake, थी a major earthquake कि struck the San Francisco खाड़ी क्षेत्रफल of कैलिफ़ोर्निया on October 17, 1989, at 5:04 pm local समय.
Caused by a slip along the सैन Andreas दोष, the भूकंप lasted 10–15 सेकेंड and measured 6.9 on दोनो the moment परिमाण scale ( surface-wave magnitude 7.1 ) and on the open-ended Richter स्केल.
the quake मारे 63 लोगों throughout उत्तरी California, injured 3,757 and left कुछ 3,000–12,000 लोगों homeless.
The भूकंप occurred दौरान the warm-up अभ्यास for the तीसरा game of the 1989 World Series, featuring both of the खाड़ी क्षेत्रफल 's Major लीग Baseball teams, the Oakland एथलेटिक्स and the San फ्रांसिस्को Giants.
क्युकी of game-related खेल coverage, this was the first major earthquake in the संयुक्त States to have its initial धक्का ब्रॉडकास्ट सजीव on टेलीविज़न.
Pawn in the standard staunton पैटर्न
The pawn ( ♙♟ ) is the most numerous and in most circumstances the weakest टुकड़ा in the खेल of शतरंज, historically representing infantry or, अधिक विशेषकर, armed peasants or pikemen.
In chess, each player begins the game with eight प्यादे, एक on प्रत्येक वर्गाकार of the rank immediately in सामने of the other pieces.
( In बीजीय संकेतन, the white प्यादे प्रारंभ on a2, b2, c2,..., h2, जबकि black pawns प्रारंभ on a7, b7, c7,..., h7. )
Individual pawns हैं referred to by the संचिका on which वे stand.
लिये example, one speaks of `` White 's f-pawn '' or `` Black 's b-pawn '', or कम commonly ( using descriptive notation ), `` श्वेत 's किंग 's bishop साहूकार '' or `` Black 's queen 's नाईट pawn ''.
it is भी आम to refer to a rook pawn, अर्थ कोई pawn on the a- or h-file, a नाईट pawn ( on the b- or g-file ), a बिशप pawn ( on the c- or f-file ), a महारानी pawn ( on the d-file ), a किंग साहूकार ( on the e-file ), और a central साहूकार ( on either the d- or e-file ).
the सैन्य शक्तियां of the संसार have differing approaches to the enlistment of homosexual ( gay and lesbian ) और द्विलिंगी individuals.
The armed forces of most developed countries have now removed नीतियों excluding non-heterosexual individuals ( with strict नीतियों on यौन harassment ).
Nations that परमिट gay लोगों to serve खुलकर in the military शामिल the 4 of the 5 members of the UN सुरक्षा परिषद ( United States, United Kingdom, France, and रूस ), the Republic of चीन ( ताईवान ), Australia, इसराईल, South Africa, Argentina, और all NATO members excluding Turkey.
Hydrogen उत्पादन is the family of औद्योगिक methods for generating हाइड्रोजन.
Currently the dominant technology for सीधा production is steam reforming इससे hydrocarbons.
अनेक other methods are ज्ञात सहित electrolysis and thermolysis.
in 2006, the United States थी अनुमानित to have a production capacity of 11 million टन of hydrogen.
5 लाख tonnes of hydrogen यहूद consumed on-site in oil शोधन, और in the production of अमोनिया ( Haber process ) and methanol ( reduction of कार्बन मोनोऑक्साइड ).
0.4 लाख tonnes यहूद an incidental by-product of the chlor-alkali process.
हाइड्रोजन production is an estimated $ 100 billion industry.
a आधार पाइंट ( often denoted as bp, colloquially referred to in the plural as `` bips '', also ज्ञात as a `` बीप '' ) is a ईकाई equal to one hundredth of a percentage point, or एक part per ten हजार, 1/10000.
The वही unit is also ( rarely ) पुकारा a permyriad, literally अर्थ 'for ( every ) असंख्य ( ten thousand ) ', and in that कॉन्टेक्स्ट is written with which looks जैसे a percent चिह्न ( % ) with two extra zeroes at the end ( like a stylized form of the four zeros in the denominator, although it originates as a प्राकृतिक extension of the प्रतिशत ( % ) and permille ( ‰ ) signs ).
a basis पाइंट is defined as:
1 आधार पाइंट = 1 permyriad = एक one-hundredth प्रतिशत
1 bp = 1 = 0.01 % = 0.1‰ = 10−4 = = 0.0001
1 % = 100 bp = 100
Basis points हैं प्रयुक्त as a सुविधाजनक unit of measurement in contexts where percentage मतभेद of less than 1 % are discussed.
The most आम example is interest rates, where मतभेद in ब्याज दरों of less than 1 % per साल are usually सार्थक to talk about.
For example, a difference of 0.10 percentage points is equivalent to a change of 10 basis points ( e.g. a 4.67 % rate increases by 10 basis अंक to 4.77 % ).
Like percentage points, basis अंक avoid the ambiguity between relative और absolute discussions about ब्याज दरों by dealing तभी with the absolute बदलें in न्यूमेरिक मान of a rate.
लिये example, if a report says वहीँ has been a `` 1 % बढ़ाएँ '' from a 10 % ब्याज rate, इस could refer to an increase either इससे 10 % to 10.1 % ( सापेक्ष, 1 % of 10 % ), or इससे 10 % to 11 % ( absolute, 1 % plus 10 % ).
If, however, the report says there has महरूम a `` 10 basis point बढ़ाएँ '' इससे a 10 % interest rate, then we know कि the ब्याज rate of 10 % रै increased by 0.10 % ( the absolute बदलें ) to a 10.1 % rate.
It is common practice in the financial industry to use basis अंक to denote a रेट बदलें in a वित्तीय यंत्र, or the अंतर ( स्प्रेड ) between two interest rates, including the yields of fixed-income securities.
चूंकि certain loans और bonds may commonly be quoted in संबंध to some अनुक्रमणिका or underlying सुरक्षा, वे will often be quoted as a स्प्रेड over ( or अंतर्गत ) the index.
For उदाहरण, a ऋण that bears ब्याज of 0.50 % per annum ऊपर the लंदन Interbank offered रेट ( LIBOR ) is said to be 50 आधार points over libor, which is commonly expressed as `` L+50bps '' or बस `` L+50 ''.
The पद `` आधार point '' has its origins in व्यापार the `` basis '' or the spread between two ब्याज rates.
चूंकि the आधार is प्रायः छोटी, these are quoted multiplied up by 10000, and hence a `` पूरा point '' movement in the `` basis '' is a आधार point.
Contrast साथ pips in fx आगे बाज़ार.
The संबंध between percentage परिवर्तन and basis अंक can be summarized as follows : 1 percentage point change = 100 basis points, and 0.01 percentage अंक = 1 आधार point.
So, a bond whose उपज increases from 5 % to 5.5 % is said to increase by 50 आधार points ; or ब्याज rates कि have risen 1 प्रतिशत पाइंट हैं said to have increased by 100 आधार points.
The British royal Family is the group of close relatives of the monarch of the संयुक्त Kingdom.
the term is भी commonly applied to the वही group of people who are the संबंध of the monarch in her or his भूमिका as sovereign of any of the other राष्ट्रमंडल realms, thus sometimes at variance साथ आधिकारिक नेशनल terms for the परिवार.
Members of the Royal Family belong to, either by जनम or marriage, the हाउस of विंडसर, चूंकि 1917, जब George V बदला the name of the royal हाउस इससे Saxe-Coburg and Gotha.
This decision was primarily taken because ब्रिटेन and her Empire were at war with Germany and दिए the अंग्रेजों Royal Family 's strong जर्मनी ancestry ; it was felt that its public image could be improved by choosing a more अंग्रेजों हाउस नाम.
The नई नाम chosen, Windsor, had absolutely no connection अन्य than as the name of the किला which was और continues to be a royal निवास.
Although in the संयुक्त किंगडम वहीँ is no सख्त legal or औपचारिक definition of जो is or is not a सदस्य of the Royal परिवार, और अलग सूचियाँ will शामिल different लोगों, those carrying the style Her or His Majesty ( hm ), or Her or उसके royal highness ( HRH ) are सदा considered members, which प्रायः results in the application of the term to the monarch, the consort of the monarch, the widowed consorts of पिछला monarchs, the children of the monarch and previous monarchs, the male-line grandchildren of the monarch and पिछला monarchs, and the spouses and the widows of a monarch 's and previous monarch 's sons and male-line पोते.
On 30 November 1917, King George V issued Letters Patent defining who हैं members of the Royal Family ; the text of the notice from the London Gazette is as follows:
In 1996, Her Majesty the Queen modified ये Letters पेटेंट, as थी evidenced by इस Notice from the लंदन Gazette:
In 2013 Letters Patent were जारी to extend a शीर्षक and a style borne by members of the Royal Family to additional व्यक्तियों to be born, evidenced by इस Notice from the लंदन gazette:
सदस्यों and रिश्तेदारों of the British Royal Family historically represented the monarch in विभिन्न स्थान throughout the British साम्राज्य, sometimes for extended periods as viceroys, or for विशिष्ट ceremonies or events.
आज, they often perform ceremonial और social duties throughout the United किंगडम और abroad on behalf of the United किंगडम.
aside इससे the monarch, उनके only constitutional role in the affairs of government is to serve, if eligible और जब नियुक्त by letters पेटेंट, as a Counsellor of State, दो or more of whom कसरत the प्राधिकार of the Crown ( भीतर stipulated limits ) in the indisposal or absence इससे the British realm of the monarch.
in the अन्य realms of the राष्ट्रमंडल रॉयल्टी do not serve as Counsellors of State.
however in प्रत्येक such realm the monarch 's family members may act on निमित्त of, are funded by, और represent the sovereign of that particular state, and not the United Kingdom.
the Queen, her consort, उसके children और grandchildren, as खूब as all former अधिपति ' children and grandchildren hold स्थान in the first भाग of the official orders of पूर्वता in इंग्लैण्ड and Wales, Scotland, and Northern Ireland.
पत्नियां of the said enjoy उनके husbands ' precedence, और husbands of princesses हैं unofficially लकिन habitually placed साथ their wives as खूब.
However, the महारानी बदला the निजी अनुक्रम of पूर्वता in the royal परिवार in पक्ष of Princesses Anne and एलेक्जेंड्रा, जो henceforth take private precedence over the duchess of Cornwall, जो is otherwise the realm 's उच्चतम ranking woman after the Queen herself.
वो did नहीं alter the relative पूर्वता of other born-princesses, ऐसे as the बेटियां of her younger बेटे.
Haiti ( ; haitian Creole ayiti ), officially the Republic of Haiti ( ; ), is a Caribbean country.
It occupies the पश्चिमी, छोटी portion of the द्वीप of Hispaniola, in the Greater Antillean archipelago, which it साझा साथ the Dominican Republic.
Ayiti ( जमीन of high kyu ) was the indigenous taíno or amerindian नाम for the island.
the देश 's highest point is Pic la Selle, at.
The total area of हैती is और इसके capital is Port-au-Prince.
haitian Creole and French are the official भाषाएं.
हैती 's regional, historical, और ethno-linguistic स्थिति is अद्वितीय for several कारण.
It थी the first independent स्वदेश of Latin America और the caribbean, the first ब्लैक -led republic in the world, and the second गणतंत्र in the Americas when it gained independence in 1804 as part of a successful slave क्रान्ति lasting nearly a दशक.
In 2012, हैती announced इसके intention to seek associate सदस्यता status in the अफ़्रीकी संघ.
हैती is the सबसे populous of the predominantly francophone स्वतंत्र nations in the Americas.
It is one of only two independent nations in the americas ( साथ साथ Canada ) to designate फ्रेंच as an official language ; the अन्य French-speaking areas are सब विदेशी départements, or collectivités, of फ़्रांस.
हैती is the most populous पूरा member-state of the caribbean Community ( CARICOM ).
It is the poorest country in the Americas as measured by the Human Development Index.
Political हिंसा has occurred regularly throughout इसके history, leading to government अस्थिरता.
Most recently, in February 2004, a तख्तापलट d'état originating in the उत्तर of the country forced the इस्तीफा और exile of अध्यक्ष Jean-Bertrand Aristide.
A provisional सरकारी took कंट्रोल साथ security provided by the United Nations Stabilization Mission in Haiti ( minustah ).
Michel Martelly, the current अध्यक्ष, was निर्वाचित in the haitian general election, 2011.
the द्वीप has था a history of destructive earthquakes.
A 7.0 magnitude earthquake struck हैती on 12 जनवरी 2010 और devastated Port-au-Prince.
the उच्चतम विश्वसनीय death count was estimated at 220,000.
haitian सरकारी estimates यहूद higher.
the अध्यक्षीय palace, Parliament and many other important structures were नष्ट, along with अनगिनत घरों and businesses, leaving hundreds of thousands of लोगों homeless.
the देश has yet to रिकवर from the 2010 earthquake ( and subsequent incidents ) due to both the severity of the damage Haiti endured in 2010, as well as a सरकारी that थी ineffective well पहले the भूकंप.
United States aid organizations have donated $ 2 billion.
संयुक्त with other international donations, these निधि हैं intended to योगदान to the rebuilding of the country.
the Bloody Beetroots is the pseudonym of Sir Bob कॉर्नेलियस Rifo, the इतालवी electro हाउस and dance-punk म्यूज़िक निर्माता, dj और photographer.
The खूनी Beetroots is well-known for the ब्लैक venom mask he wears during performances.
in fact, the तभी identifying पब्लिक विशेषता of rifo is the year `` 1977 '' tattooed across उसके छाती, which is दोनो the year कि the producer और punk-rock थी born.
`` The खूनी beetroots DJ set '' contains सर bob कॉर्नेलियस rifo and टॉमी चाय.
a मोटोरोला सलाहकार alphanumeric पेजर used in ब्राज़ील in the 1990s, operated by Teletrim
a pager is a wireless telecommunications यंत्र that receives और displays numeric or टेक्स्ट संदेश, or receives and announces voice messages.
One-way pagers can only receive संदेश, while जवाब pagers and two-way pagers can भी acknowledge, जवाब to, और originate messages using an आतंरिक ट्रांसमीटर.
Pagers operate as भाग of a paging system which includes one or अधिक fixed transmitters ( or in the case of response pagers और two-way pagers, एक or अधिक आधार स्टेशन ), as well as a क्रमांक of pagers carried by mobile उपयोक्ता.
These प्रणालियों can range इससे a restaurant प्रणाली with a single low-power transmitter, to a nationwide system with हज़ारों of high-power आधार स्टेशन.
One of the first practical paging सेवाएं was शुभारम्भ in 1950 लिये physicians in the New यॉर्क City area.
Physicians paid us $ 12 per month for the service and carried a ( 6 oz ) pager that would प्राप्त फोन संदेश within ( 25 mi ) of a single ट्रांसमीटर मीनार.
the system was manufactured by the Reevesound कम्पनी and operated by Telanswerphone.
in 1960, जॉन फ्रांसिस Mitchell combined elements of Motorola 's walkie Talkie और automobile रेडियो technologies to बनाएँ the पहला transistorized pager, and from this पाइंट, paging प्रौद्योगिकी continued to advance, and pager अपनाना continued to expand, जबतक the जल्दी 1990s.
however, by the mid-1990s, as cellular technologies became सस्ता और more widely available, advanced services began to displace paging as a commercial product.
Today, pagers मौजूद largely as niche उत्पाद, ढूंढना preferential use in अनुप्रयोग ऐसे as अस्पताल, पब्लिक सुरक्षा, and retail locations where उनके simplicity, high विश्वसनीयता, and कम cost represent significant advantages.
Reevesville is a town in Dorchester County, South कैरोलिना, संयुक्त राज्य.
the population was 196 at the 2010 जनसांख्यिकी.
as defined by the u.S. Office of प्रबन्धन और बजट, और प्रयुक्त by the u.S. जनसांख्यिकी Bureau for सांख्यिकीय purposes only, Reevesville is included भीतर the charleston-north Charleston-Summerville महानगर area.
Frida Kahlo de Rivera ( born Magdalena कार्मेन frieda Kahlo y calderón ; जुलाई 6, 1907 – जुलाई 13, 1954 ) थी a मैक्सिकन चित्रकार, born in Coyoacán, who is best known for उसके self-portraits.
Kahlo 's life began और ended in Mexico City, in उसके home ज्ञात as the ब्लू हाउस.
She gave उसके जनम date as जुलाई 7, 1910, but उसके जनम certificate shows July 6, 1907.
kahlo था allegedly wanted the year of उसके birth to coincide साथ the साल of the beginning of the मैक्सिकन क्रान्ति so कि उसके life would शुरू with the जनम of आधुनिक मैक्सिको.
Her work has महरूम celebrated in मैक्सिको as emblematic of national and indigenous परंपरा, and by नारीवादी लिये इसके uncompromising depiction of the female experience and form.
Mexican culture और Amerindian सांस्कृतिक tradition हैं महत्वपूर्ण in उसके work, जिससे रै been sometimes characterized as Naïve आर्ट or लोक art.
Her work रै also महरूम वर्णित as `` surrealist '', और in 1938 आंद्रे Breton, principal initiator of the surrealist movement, described Kahlo 's art as a `` ribbon around a bomb ''.
kahlo था a volatile marriage with the famous Mexican कलाकार Diego रिवेरा.
She suffered lifelong health problems.
Many of her health problems were the result of a traffic दुर्घटना वो survived as a किशोरावस्था.
recovering from her चोटों isolated her from other people और this अलगाव influenced her works, अनेक of which are self-portraits of one sort or another.
kahlo सुझाया, `` I पेंट myself because I am so प्रायः अलोन and क्युकी i am the विषय I know best. ''
She भी stated, `` i was born a bitch.
i थी born a painter. ''

Theresienwiese on the दिन पहले Oktoberfest 2006
oktoberfest is a 16-day पर्व celebrating beer held annually in Munich, Bavaria, Germany, running from late September to the पहला वीकेंड in अक्तूबर.
It is एक of the most famous कार्यक्रम in Germany और is the संसार 's largest मेला, साथ अधिक than 6 million लोगों from around the संसार उपस्थित the event प्रत्येक year.
To the locals, it is नहीं पुकारा oktoberfest, but `` die Wiesn '', after the colloquial नाम of the fairgrounds themselves.
the oktoberfest is an important भाग of Bavarian संस्कृति, having महरूम आयोजित since 1810.
Other cities across the world also hold oktoberfest celebrations, modeled बाद the original Munich इवेंट.
the म्यूनिख Oktoberfest originally took प्लेस during the सोलह days up to, and सहित, the पहला Sunday in अक्तूबर.
In 1994, the अनुसूची was परिवर्धित in response to जर्मनी reunification so that if the first संडे in अक्तूबर falls on the 1st or 2nd, तब the festival होता go on जबतक October 3 ( German एकता Day ).
Thus, the festival is अभी 17 दिनों जब the पहला Sunday is अक्तूबर 2 and 18 days जब it is October 1.
In 2010, the पर्व lasted until the पहला Monday in October, to चिह्नित the वर्षगांठ of the इवेंट.
the festival is आयोजित in an क्षेत्रफल नामित the theresienwiese ( field, or meadow, of Therese ), often called wiesn लिये short, located निकट Munich 's center.
विशाल quantities of Oktoberfest Beer are खपत, with almost 7 लाख liters served during the 16 day festival in 2007.
Visitors may भी enjoy a wide किस्में of परंपरागत food such as hendl ( मुर्गा ), schweinebraten ( रोस्ट pork ), schweinshaxe ( ग्रील्ड हैम hock ), steckerlfisch ( ग्रील्ड fish on a स्टिक ), Würstl ( sausages ) along with brezeln ( Pretzel ), Knödel ( potato or ब्रैड dumplings ), Käsespätzle ( चीज noodles ), Reiberdatschi ( potato pancakes ), Sauerkraut or rotkohl/blaukraut ( रेड cabbage ) साथ with such bar delicacies as Obatzda ( a spiced cheese-butter स्प्रेड ) and Weisswurst ( a श्वेत सॉसेज ).

Wheels of gouda
चीज is a generic पद for a diverse समूह of milk-based food उत्पाद.
चीज is produced in wide-ranging जायका, textures, and forms.
चीज consists of प्रोटीन और fat from milk, usually the milk of cows, buffalo, बकरियों, or sheep.
It is produced by जामन of the मिल्क protein casein.
Typically, the milk is acidified और addition of the एंजाइम rennet causes coagulation.
The solids are separated और दबाया into final रूप.
Some cheeses have molds on the rind or throughout.
Most cheeses melt at cooking temperature.
सैंकड़ों of प्रकार of cheese इससे various देशों are उत्पादित.
उनके styles, बनावट and जायका निर्भर on the origin of the milk ( including the animal 's आहार ), whether they have महरूम pasteurized, the butterfat सामग्री, the bacteria and mold, the processing, and वृद्धावस्था.
Herbs, spices, or लकडी smoke may be प्रयुक्त as flavoring एजेंटों.
the yellow to red रंग of many cheeses, such as Red लीसेस्टर, is normally formed from adding annatto.
For a few cheeses, the milk is curdled by adding acids such as vinegar or lemon juice.
Most cheeses हैं acidified to a lesser degree by bacteria, which turn milk sugars into lactic एसिड, then the addition of rennet completes the curdling.
Vegetarian alternatives to rennet हैं उपलब्धियाँ ; सबसे हैं उत्पादित by fermentation of the कवक mucor miehei, but others have महरूम extracted इससे various species of the Cynara thistle परिवार.
Cheese is valued for its portability, long life, and high content of fat, प्रोटीन, calcium, and phosphorus.
Cheese is more compact और has a longer shelf life than मिल्क, हालांकि how long a चीज will रखना may depend on the प्रकार of चीज ; labels on packets of cheese often claim कि a cheese चाहिए be consumed भीतर तीन to पाँच days of opening.
generally speaking, hard cheeses last longer than soft cheeses, ऐसे as Brie or goat 's milk cheese.
Cheesemakers निकट a दुग्ध प्रदेश may benefit from fresher, lower-priced मिल्क, और lower shipping costs.
The long भंडार life of some cheese, विशेषकर if it is encased in a protective rind, allows selling when markets are favorable.
Additional ingredients may be added to some cheeses, such as black peppers, garlic, chives or जमाया.
a विशेषज्ञ seller of cheese is sometimes known as a cheesemonger.
To become an विशेषज्ञ in this field, like wine or cooking, requires कुछ औपचारिक education and years of चख and hands-on experience.
इस position is typically responsible लिये all aspects of the cheese inventory ; selecting the cheese मेनू, purchasing, receiving, storage, and ripening.
Legal citation सिग्नल हैं a set of brief abbreviated phrases or शब्द प्रयुक्त to clarify the authority or significance of a legal citation as it relates to a proposition.
Signals help a रीडर quickly discern अर्थ or usefulness of a particular reference जब the सन्दर्भ itself does नहीं provide adequate information.
Most citation signals हैं लगाई in front of the citation to जिससे वे apply.
लिये उदाहरण, in the अनुच्छेद When writing a विधिक argument, it is important to refer to प्राथमिक sources.
To assist पाठक in locating ये sources, it is desirable to उपयोग a मानकीकृत citation स्वरूप.
See generally Harvard Law Review संघ, The Bluebook : A Uniform System of citation ( 18th ed. 2005 ).
Note, however, that कुछ courts may require कोई विधिक papers that हैं submitted to them to conform to a different citation format.
the signal is the phrase `` देखिए generally, '' जिससे indicates कि the citation `` the bluebook : A Uniform प्रणाली of citation ( 18th ed. 2005 ) '' provides general background information on the टॉपिक.
Neil Alden आर्मस्ट्रांग ( अगस्त 5, 1930 – August 25, 2012 ) थी an American astronaut and the first person to चलना on the Moon.
He थी also an aerospace engineer, नवल aviator, परीक्षण pilot, and university प्राध्यापक.
पहले बनने an astronaut, Armstrong थी an officer in the u.S. नेवी and परोसा in the कोरियाई War.
After the युद्ध, he earned उसके स्नातक 's उपाधि at Purdue University and served as a परीक्षण पायलट at the National सलाहकार Committee लिये Aeronautics High-Speed Flight Station, अभी known as the Dryden उड़ान शोध Center, जहाँ he logged over 900 फ़्लाइट.
He later completed graduate अध्ययन at the University of दक्षिणी California.
a भागीदार in the u.S. Air फ़ोर्स 's Man in स्पेस soonest और x-20 dyna-soar human spaceflight programs, Armstrong joined the नासा Astronaut corps in 1962.
He made उसके पहला स्पेस उड़ान, as command pilot of मिथुन 8, in 1966, becoming NASA 's first civilian astronaut to मक्खी in space.
on इस mission, he performed the first docking of two spacecraft, with पायलट David Scott.
Armstrong 's second और पिछला spaceflight was as mission commander of the Apollo 11 चंद्रमा landing, in July 1969.
On this मिशन, आर्मस्ट्रांग और Buzz एल्ड्रिन descended to the lunar surface और spent दो and a हाफ hours exploring, while Michael Collins remained in lunar कक्षा in the Command Module.
Along साथ Collins और Aldrin, Armstrong थी awarded the Presidential Medal of स्वतंत्रता by अध्यक्ष Richard Nixon ; in 1978, President Jimmy Carter presented आर्मस्ट्रांग the Congressional स्पेस पदक of सम्मान in 1978 ; he और उसके पूर्व crewmates received the Congressional सुनहरा पदक in 2009.
Armstrong died in सिनसिनाटी, ओहियो, on August 25, 2012, at the आयु of 82, बाद complications इससे coronary artery bypass surgery.
सचिवालय ( कूच 30, 1970 – अक्तूबर 4, 1989 ) was an American Thoroughbred racehorse कि in 1973 became the first u.s. Triple Crown champion in 25 सालो.
He set race records in all three events in the Series — the केंटकी Derby ( 1:59.4 ), the preakness stakes ( 1:53 ), and the Belmont stakes ( 2:24 ) — records कि still stand today.
he is considered to be one of the महानतम Thoroughbreds of all time.
In 1999, ESPN ranked Secretariat the 35th बेहतरीन खिलाड़ी of the 20th century, the highest ranking racehorse on the list url_http.
He ranked दूसरी पीछे Man o ' War in The Blood-Horse 's List of the Top 100 u.S. racehorses of the 20th Century.
सचिवालय was sired by Bold शासक out of somethingroyal, by princequillo.
He थी foaled at the मर्ग in Caroline County, वर्जिनिया.
Like उसके famous predecessor man o ' युद्ध, Secretariat was a विशाल chestnut टट्टू और was given the same उपनाम, `` Big Red. ''
सचिवालय 's grandsire, nasrullah, is also the great-great-grandsire of 1977 ट्रिपल Crown winner Seattle slew.
Owned by पैनी Chenery, he थी प्रशिक्षित by Lucien Laurin और mainly ridden by Canadian jockey रॉन turcotte, साथ with प्रशिक्षु jockey पॉल फेलिसियानो ( first two दौड़ ), and veteran एडी मेपल ( last रेस ).
He raced in Chenery 's Meadow stable 's ब्लू and white checkered रंगों और his groom थी एडी Sweat.
सचिवालय stood लगभग tall, और weighed, with a 75-inch girth, in his racing prime.
Madrid (, ) is the पूंजी और largest city of स्पेन.
The जनसांख्यिकी of the नगर is roughly 3.3 लाख and the संपूर्ण जनसांख्यिकी of the Madrid महानगर area is गणना to be around 6.5 million.
it is the third-largest नगर in the European Union, after London और बर्लिन, और its metropolitan क्षेत्रफल is the third-largest in the European Union after London and पेरिस.
The city spans a total of.
The नगर is स्तिथ on the manzanares river in the केन्द्र of दोनो the country और the जातियाँ of Madrid ( जिससे comprises the नगर of मैड्रिड, its conurbation and विस्तारित suburbs and villages ) ; this जातियाँ is bordered by the autonomous communities of castile and león और Castile-La मांचा.
as the capital city of स्पेन, सीट of सरकारी, और निवास of the स्पेनी monarch, Madrid is also the political, economic and cultural centre of स्पेन.
The current mayor is ana Botella इससे the People 's Party ( pp ).
the Madrid urban agglomeration has the third-largest GDP in the यूरोपीय संघ and its प्रभाव in राजनीती, education, entertainment, पर्यावरण, media, फ़ैशन, science, संस्कृति, and the arts all योगदान to its status as one of the संसार 's प्रमुख global शहरों.
Due to इसके आर्थिक output, ऊँची standard of living, और market आकार, Madrid is considered the major वित्तीय केन्द्र of दक्षिणी Europe और the Iberian Peninsula ; it होस्ट the सिर कार्यालयों of the vast majority of the major स्पेनी कंपनियाँ, such as Telefónica, Iberia or repsol.
Madrid is the most touristic city of स्पेन, the fourth-most touristic of the महाद्वीप, and the seventh most visited नगर in the संसार according to Forbes.
Is the 10th most livable नगर in the world according to Monocle magazine, in इसके 2010 index.
Madrid भी बाँधने among the 12 greenest यूरोपीय cities in 2010. < संदर्भ name= '' एचटीटीपी : //www.citymayors.com/environment/greenest-cities-europe.html '' > मैड्रिड is currently a प्रत्याशी City for the 2020 गर्मियाँ ओलंपिक.
Madrid घरों the headquarters of the संसार Tourism Organization ( wto ), belonging to the संयुक्त Nations संगठन ( UN ), the SEGIB, the Organization of Ibero-American States ( OEI ), और the पब्लिक ब्याज Oversight Board ( PIOB ).
It also hosts major अंतरराष्ट्रीय institutions regulators of Spanish : the खड़ा Committee of the Association of Spanish भाषा Academies, मुख्यालय of the Royal Spanish अकादमी ( RAE ), the Cervantes संस्थान और the न्यास of तात्कालिक Spanish ( fundéu ).
Madrid organizes मेलों as fitur, ARCO, SIMO TCI and the cibeles Madrid फ़ैशन Week.
While Madrid possesses a आधुनिक infrastructure, it रै preserved the look और feel of many of इसके ऐतिहासिक neighbourhoods and streets.
Its लैंडमार्क include the Royal Palace of Madrid ; the Teatro रियल ( Royal थिएटर ) साथ its लौटी 1850 ओपेरा House ; the Buen Retiro पार्क, संस्थापित in 1631 ; the 19th-century National पुस्तकालयों building ( founded in 1712 ) containing कुछ of स्पेन 's ऐतिहासिक अभिलेख ; a large क्रमांक of National museums, और the सुनहरी Triangle of आर्ट, स्तिथ साथ the Paseo del Prado and comprising three art museums : Prado संग्रहालय, the museo Nacional Centro de Arte reina sofía, a museum of modern आर्ट, and the thyssen-bornemisza संग्रहालय, which completes the त्रुटियां of the other two संग्रहालय.
Cibeles राजमहल और Fountain have become the स्मारक प्रतीक of the city.
The path of the via Appia and of the Via appia traiana.
remains of the appian रास्ता in Rome, near Quarto Miglio
Near Rome.
the appian Way ( Latin and इतालवी : via appia ) थी one of the earliest and strategically सबसे important Roman सड़कें of the ancient republic.
it connected Rome to Brindisi, Apulia, in southeast Italy.
इसके महत्व is indicated by its common name, recorded by statius :
Appia teritur regina longarum viarum
`` the Appian way is the queen of the long roads ''
The सड़क is नामित बाद Appius Claudius Caecus, the Roman censor जो began और समाप्त the first खण्ड as a military road to the दक्षिण in 312 BC during the samnite युद्धों.
the draupner wave, a single giant wave measured on New Year 's Day 1995, finally confirmed the existence of freak waves, which had previously been माना near-mythical
Rogue waves ( भी known as freak waves, monster waves, कातिल लहरें, चरम waves, and असामान्य लहरें ) हैं relatively large and spontaneous ocean surface लहरें कि occur दूर out at sea, and are a threat even to large जहाजों and ocean liners.
in oceanography, they are अधिक precisely पारिभाषित as लहरें whose height is more than twice the significant wave ऊँचाई ( SWH ), which is itself पारिभाषित as the mean of the largest तीसरा of waves in a वेव record.
Therefore rogue लहरें are नहीं necessarily the biggest waves मिला at sea ; they हैं, बल्कि, surprisingly large waves लिये a दिए sea state.
Rogue लहरें seem नहीं to have a single distinct cause, लकिन occur where physical कारकों such as ऊँची winds and strong currents cause waves to merge to बनाएँ a single exceptionally large वेव.
Electress Sophia of हनोवर ( 1630–1714 )
The line of उत्तराधिकार to the British सिंहासन is the ordered sequence of सब those people eligible to सफल to the throne of the United किंगडम and the अन्य 15 Commonwealth realms.
the Act of Settlement 1701 bestowed उत्तराधिकार on the electress Sophia of हनोवर and her descendants while excluding Roman Catholics.
the अंग्रेजों government does not प्रकाशित an official list of सब those in line to सफल, लकिन the कार्य of genealogical लेखक and amateur researchers suggests कि there are several हजार लोगों potentially in line.
at a समिट in Perth, पश्चिमी ऑस्ट्रेलिया in 2011, the heads of government of all 16 राष्ट्रमंडल realms agreed to take कदम to adopt absolute primogeniture, समाप्त the exclusion of people शादीशुदा to Roman Catholics, और मेक अन्य changes in the succession नियम.
the line of succession is भी प्रयुक्त to select the Counsellors of राज्य ( और a regent if the need arises ) under the प्रावधानों of the Regency Act 1937.
For पहले versions of the लकीर of succession, see History of the अंग्रेजों लकीर of उत्तराधिकार.
एडवर्ड Montgomery Clift ( अक्तूबर 17, 1920July 23, 1966 ) was an अमरीकी film और स्टेज actor The New यॉर्क times’ obituary विख्यात उसके portrayal of `` मूडी, sensitive यंग मेन ''.
He often played outsiders और `` victim-heroes '' ; examples शामिल the social climber in George Stevens 's a प्लेस in the सूर्य, the anguished कैथोलिक priest in Hitchcock 's I Confess, the doomed नियमित soldier Robert E. Lee Prewitt in Fred Zinnemann 's From Here to Eternity, and the यहूदी gi bullied by antisemites in Edward Dmytryk 's The यंग Lions.
Later, बाद a disfiguring car क्रैश in 1956, and alcohol and prescription ड्रग गाली, he became erratic.
Nevertheless important roles were स्टिल his, including `` the लापरवाह, alcoholic, mother-fixated rodeo performer '' in जॉन हस्टन 's The Misfits, the title भूमिका in हस्टन 's, and the concentration camp victim in Stanley Kramer 's निर्णय at Nuremberg. ''
क्लिफ्ट received चार अकादमी Award nominations during his career, three for बेहतरीन कर्ता and one for Best Supporting कर्ता.
The War on Terror ( also ज्ञात as the Global War on आतंक ) is a term commonly applied to an international सैन्य अभियान जिससे started as a परिणाम of the 11 सितंबर 2001 terrorist हमले on the संयुक्त States.
This resulted in an अंतरराष्ट्रीय military campaign to eliminate al-Qaeda and अन्य उग्रवादी organizations.
The United Kingdom and many other नाटो and non-nato राष्ट्र participate in the विरोध.
The phrase 'War on Terror ' थी first प्रयुक्त by us अध्यक्ष George W. बुश on 20 September 2001.
the Bush administration and the पश्चिमी media have since used the term to signify a वैश्विक सैन्य, political, lawful, and conceptual struggle—targeting both organizations designated as terrorist and regimes अभियुक्त of supporting उन्हें.
it थी typically प्रयुक्त with a particular focus on उग्रवादी islamists, al-qaeda, और अन्य जिहादी समूह.
हालांकि the term is not officially used by the प्रशासन of us अध्यक्ष Barack Obama ( जिससे instead uses the term विदेशी आकस्मिकता आपरेशन ), it is still commonly used by politicians, in the media and by कुछ aspects of government officially, such as the संयुक्त राज्य ' वैश्विक War on Terrorism सेवा Medal.

The main कल्याणकारी of World War ii were nationalistic मुद्दे, अनसुलझे मुद्दे, और resentments resulting from World युद्ध I और the interwar period in Europe, in जोड to the प्रभाव of the Great अवसाद in the 1930s.
the culmination of events कि led to the outbreak of war are generally समझा to be the 1939 आक्रमण of कैंडल by Germany and Soviet Russia और the 1937 आक्रमण of the Republic of चीन by the Empire of Japan.
These सैन्य aggressions यहूद the परिणाम of decisions made by the authoritarian सत्ताधारी नाजी elite in Germany और by the नेतृत्व of the Kwantung फौज in जापानी.
World War ii started बाद these aggressive actions were met साथ an official घोषणा of युद्ध and/or हथियारबंद resistance.
