The Mitsubishi Galant is an automobile manufactured by Mitsubishi Motors between 1969 and 2012.
The name थी निकला from the फ्रेंच शब्द galant, meaning `` chivalrous ''.
There have महरूम नौ distinct पीढियां, और cumulative sales अभी exceed five million.
it began as a कॉम्पैक्ट सेडान, but over the कोर्स of इसके life has विकसित into a larger mid-size car.
Initial उत्पादन थी only based in Japan, but since 1994 the अमरीकी market has महरूम served by वाहनों assembled at the पूर्व diamond-star मोटर्स ( DSM ) facility in Normal, इलिनोइस.
रक्त pressure ( bp ), sometimes referred to as arterial रक्त pressure, is the pressure exerted by circulating रक्त upon the walls of रक्त बरतन, और is one of the principal vital signs.
When प्रयुक्त without further specification, `` रक्त दबाव '' usually refers to the arterial pressure of the systemic परिसंचरण.
During each heartbeat, blood दबाव varies between a अधिकतम ( systolic ) and a minimum ( diastolic ) दबाव.
the रक्त pressure in the परिसंचरण is principally due to the pumping कार्रवाई of the heart.
Differences in औसत रक्त pressure are जिम्मेदार for blood प्रवाह इससे एक स्थान to another in the circulation.
The रेट of औसत blood flow depends on the प्रतिरोध to flow presented by the blood बरतन.
Mean रक्त pressure decreases as the circulating रक्त moves away from the heart through arteries और capillaries due to viscous losses of energy.
Mean blood pressure drops over the whole परिसंचरण, although most of the पतन occurs along the छोटी arteries and arterioles.
गम्भीरता affects रक्त दबाव via hydrostatic forces ( e.g., during standing ) और valves in veins, श्वास, and pumping from contraction of skeletal मांसपेशियां भी influence रक्त दबाव in रगों.
रक्त दबाव without further specification प्रायः refers to the systemic arterial दबाव measured at a person 's upper भुजा and is a माप of the pressure in the brachial धमनी, the major artery in the upper arm.
A person’s रक्त pressure is usually expressed in terms of the systolic दबाव over diastolic pressure और is measured in millimetres of पारा ( mmHg ), लिये example 120/80.
A वीटो – Latin for `` i forbid '' – is the शक्ति ( used by an officer of the state, for example ) to unilaterally stop an आधिकारिक action, especially the enactment of legislation.
A veto can be absolute, as for instance in the United Nations सुरक्षा Council, whose permanent members ( China, France, Russia, United Kingdom, United राज्य of अमेरिका ) can block कोई रेज़ोल्यूशन.
Or it can be limited, as in the विधान प्रक्रम of the United States, जहाँ a two-thirds vote in both the House and सीनेट may ओवरराइड a Presidential वीटो of legislation.
A veto only gives शक्ति to रोकें changes, not to अपनाना them ( मगर for the rare `` amendatory veto '' ).
यूँ a वीटो allows इसके holder to protect the status quo.
The अवधारणा of a वीटो देह originated साथ the Roman consuls और tribunes.
Either of the two consuls holding दफ्तर in a given साल could block a military or civil decision by the other ; any tribune था the power to unilaterally block legislation passed by the रोमन Senate.
Sulfur dioxide ( also sulphur dioxide ) is the रासायनिक compound with the formula.
It is a toxic gas with a pungent, irritating महकते, कि is released by volcanoes और in various औद्योगिक प्रक्रियाओं.
Since coal and पेट्रोलियम often contain sulfur यौगिकों, उनके दहन generates गंधक डाइऑक्साइड जबतक the sulfur compounds हैं removed before burning the fuel.
Further oxidation of SO2, usually in the presence of a उत्प्रेरक ऐसे as no2, फ़ॉर्म H2SO4, और यूँ एसिड rain.
गंधक डाइऑक्साइड emissions are also a precursor to particulates in the माहौल.
दोनो of these impacts are कारण for चिंता over the environmental impact of these fuels.
Myasthenia ग्रेविस ( from Greek μύς `` मांसपेशी '', `` weakness '', and `` गंभीर '' ; abbreviated MG ) is an असंक्राम्य neuromuscular बीमारी अग्रणी to fluctuating muscle कमज़ोरी और fatigability.
it is an autoimmune disorder, in which कमज़ोरी is caused by circulating antibodies कि ब्लाक acetylcholine receptors at the postsynaptic neuromuscular junction, inhibiting the excitatory effects of the neurotransmitter acetylcholine on nicotinic receptors throughout neuromuscular junctions.
Myasthenia is treated medically with acetylcholinesterase inhibitors or immunosuppressants, और, in चयनित मामले, thymectomy.
The disease incidence is 3–30 cases प्रति million per year and उठती as a result of increased जागरूकता.
MG must be distinguished इससे congenital myasthenic syndromes कि can present similar symptoms but प्रस्ताव no response to immunosuppressive उपचार.
Reflective twisted nematic liquid क्रिस्टल प्रदर्शक.
Polarizing फिल्टर film with a vertical axis to polarize light as it enters.
कांच substrate with ITO electrodes.
the shapes of these electrodes will determine the shapes that will appear when the एलसीडी is turned ON.
लंबवत ridges etched on the surface are smooth.
Twisted nematic द्रव क्रिस्टल.
कांच substrate with common एलेक्ट्रोड film ( ITO ) with horizontal ridges to line up with the horizontal फिल्टर.
polarizing फिल्टर फिल्मी with a आड़ा अक्ष to block/pass light.
Reflective सतह to send light back to viewer.
( in a backlit एलसीडी, this परत is replaced with a light source. )
A liquid-crystal display ( LCD ) is a चपटा फलक display, इलेक्ट्रॉनिक visual display, or video display that उपयोग the light modulating properties of liquid crystals.
Liquid crystals do not emit light directly.
lcds हैं available to display arbitrary बिंब ( as in a general-purpose computer display ) or fixed images which can be प्रदर्शित or छुपा, such as preset words, digits, and 7-segment प्रदर्शक as in a डिजिटल clock.
They use the वही basic technology, मगर that arbitrary बिंब are बना up of a large क्रमांक of small pixels, while other displays have larger elements.
lcds are used in a चौड़ी range of अनुप्रयोग सहित computer मॉनीटर, टेलीविज़न, instrument panels, aircraft cockpit प्रदर्शक, और signage.
They हैं common in consumer devices ऐसे as video players, गेमिंग डिवाइस, clocks, घड़ियाँ, calculators, and telephones, और have replaced cathode रे ट्यूब ( crt ) displays in most applications.
They are उपलब्धियाँ in a wider range of screen sizes than crt and plasma प्रदर्शक, and चूंकि वे do not उपयोग phosphors, they do not suffer image burn-in.
LCDs हैं, however, susceptible to image persistence.
The एलसीडी स्क्रीन is अधिक उर्जा कुशल और can be disposed of अधिक सकुशल than a CRT.
इसके low विद्युत power consumption enables it to be used in battery -powered इलेक्ट्रॉनिक उपकरण.
it is an electronically modulated ऑप्टिकल device बना up of any number of खण्ड filled with liquid crystals और arrayed in सामने of a लाइट source ( backlight ) or reflector to produce बिंब in color or मोनोक्रोम.
Liquid crystals were first discovered in 1888.
by 2008, worldwide sales of टेलीविज़न साथ LCD screens exceeded annual sales of CRT units ; the crt became obsolete for most उद्देश्य.
The Borgata Hotel Casino and स्पा is a luxury hotel, कसीनो, और स्पा in Atlantic नगर, नई Jersey, United States.
It is स्वामित्व by मरीना ज़िला विकास, a joint venture between Boyd Gaming and a divesture विश्वास established by mgm Resorts अंतरराष्ट्रीय.
the $ 1.1 billion casino hotel features 2,002 कक्ष and is the largest होटल in New Jersey.
the borgata opened in July 2003 as a Las Vegas-style megaresort और is the top-grossing casino in Atlantic नगर.
A बोतल of ऊँची potency b-complex vitamin संपूरक pills.
a vitamin ( or ) is an सशुल्क compound required by an सजीव as a vital nutrient in सीमित amounts.
an organic chemical यौगिक ( or सम्बन्धित नियत of compounds ) is called a vitamin जब it can not be synthesized in sufficient quantities by an सजीव, and जरूर be obtained इससे the diet.
यूँ, the पद is conditional दोनो on the circumstances and on the particular organism.
For example, ascorbic acid ( विटामिन c ) is a vitamin लिये इंसानो, लकिन नहीं for most other animals, और biotin और vitamin d are required in the human आहार only in certain हालातों.
By convention, the term vitamin शामिल neither other essential nutrients, ऐसे as dietary minerals, essential fatty acids, or अनिवार्य अमीनो acids ( which are needed in larger amounts than विटामिन ) nor the large क्रमांक of अन्य nutrients कि promote health but हैं otherwise required less often.
तेरह विटामिन हैं universally recognized at उपस्थित.
Vitamins are classified by their biological and chemical activity, not their structure.
यूँ, प्रत्येक `` vitamin '' refers to a क्रमांक of vitamer यौगिकों that all show the biological कार्यकलाप associated साथ a particular vitamin.
Such a set of रसायन is grouped अंतर्गत an alphabetized विटामिन `` generic descriptor '' title, such as `` vitamin a ``, which includes the compounds retinal, retinol, और चार known carotenoids.
Vitamers by definition are convertible to the active रूप of the विटामिन in the body, and are sometimes inter-convertible to one another, as well.
Vitamins have diverse biochemical कृत्यों.
Some have hormone-like कृत्यों as regulators of खनिज metabolism ( such as विटामिन D ), or regulators of cell और ऊतक विकास and differentiation ( ऐसे as some फ़ॉर्म of विटामिन A ).
अन्य फलन as antioxidants ( e.g., विटामिन E और sometimes vitamin C ).
The largest क्रमांक of vitamins ( ऐसे as B complex विटामिन ) फलन as precursors for enzyme cofactors, that सहायता enzymes in उनके कार्य as catalysts in चयापचय.
in इस role, विटामिन may be tightly bound to enzymes as part of prosthetic groups : लिये उदाहरण, biotin is part of enzymes शामिल in making fatty acids.
Vitamins may भी be less tightly bound to enzyme catalysts as coenzymes, detachable अणुओं that function to carry रासायनिक groups or electrons between molecules.
For उदाहरण, folic acid may carry मिथाइल, formyl, और methylene समूह in the cell.
हालांकि ये भूमिकाएँ in assisting enzyme-substrate प्रतिक्रियाएँ हैं vitamins ' best-known function, the अन्य vitamin functions are बराबर important.
Until the mid-1930s, जब the first commercial yeast-extract vitamin B जटिल and semi-synthetic vitamin C संपूरक टैबलेट were sold, vitamins यहूद obtained solely through food intake, और changes in आहार ( जिससे, लिये example, could occur दौरान a particular growing season ) usually greatly altered the types and amounts of vitamins ingested.
however, vitamins have महरूम produced as commodity रसायन and made widely उपलब्धियाँ as inexpensive semisynthetic और synthetic-source multivitamin dietary and खाना पूरक and additives, since the मध्य of the 20th century.

संसार Muslim population in millions
islam is the world 's second largest धर्म बाद Christianity.
According to a 2010 study, Islam has 1.62 billion adherents, बनाना up over 23 % of the संसार population.
Islam is the predominant religion in the मध्य East, in Sahel, in the सींग of Africa और northern Africa, and in some parts of एशिया.
Large समुदायों of मुसलमान are भी मिला in चीन, the balkans, और Russia.
Other भाग of the world host large Muslim immigrant communities ; in Western Europe, लिये instance, Islam is the दूसरी largest religion after Christianity, जहाँ it represents 6 % of the कुल population.
According to the Pew Research Center in 2010 there यहूद 49 Muslim-majority countries.
Around 62 % of the world 's Muslims सजीव in South and Southeast Asia, साथ over 1 अरब adherents.
the largest Muslim country is इंडोनेशिया, home to 12.7 % of the world 's Muslims, followed by Pakistan ( 11.0 % ), इण्डिया ( 10.9 % ), और Bangladesh ( 9.2 % ).
परिचय 20 % of Muslims live in Arab देशों.
in the मध्य East, the non-arab देशों of Turkey and Iran are the largest muslim-majority देशों ; in अफ़्रीकी, Egypt और सीरियल have the most populous Muslim समुदायों.
a study conducted by the pew शोध बीच in 2010 and released January 2011 मिला that वहीँ हैं 1.62 billion Muslims around the world.
The study found अधिक Muslims in the United किंगडम than in Lebanon और more in चीन than in Syria.
Rhode Island ( or ), officially the राज्य of rhode Island और Providence Plantations, is a state in the New England प्रदेश of the United States.
rhode Island is the smallest in area, the eighth तनिक populous, लकिन the दूसरी most densely आबादी of the 50 us states behind नई Jersey.
rhode Island is bordered by कनेक्टिकट to the west and Massachusetts to the north and east, और it shares a जल boundary साथ New यॉर्क 's Long Island to the दक्षिणपश्चिम.
Rhode द्वीप was the first of the 13 असली colonies to declare स्वतंत्रता from British rule, declaring itself independent on May 4, 1776, two months before कोई other colony.
The State was भी the पिछला of the तेरह original colonies to ratify the United States Constitution.
rhode Island 's official nickname is `` The Ocean राज्य '', a reference to the State 's geography, चूंकि Rhode द्वीप has several विशाल bays and inlets that राशि to परिचय 14 % of इसके कुल area.
इसके जमीन area is, but इसके total क्षेत्रफल is significantly larger.
Dubai ( ; ', ) is a नगर in the संयुक्त Arab Emirates, स्तिथ within the अमीर of the same नाम.
The अमीर of Dubai is स्तिथ on the southeast coast of the पारसी Gulf on the Arabian Peninsula और is one of the seven अमीरात that मेक up the country.
it has the largest population in the UAE ( 2,106,177 ) and the second-largest land territory by area ( 4,114 km2 ) after Abu Dhabi.
दुबई and abu धाबी, the नेशनल पूंजी, are the तभी दो emirates to have वीटो power over critical matters of national importance in the country 's legislature.
the city of Dubai is located on the emirate 's उत्तरी coastline and heads up the dubai-sharjah-ajman metropolitan क्षेत्रफल.
दुबई is nowadays often misperceived as a देश or city-state and, in कुछ cases, the uae as a पूरे रै been described as 'Dubai '.
the earliest जिक्र of Dubai is in 1095 AD, and the earliest recorded उपनिवेश in the region dates from 1799.
The sheikhdom of दुबई was formally established in 1833 by Sheikh Maktoum बिन Butti al-maktoum when he persuaded around 800 members of उसके tribe of the Bani yas, living in कया was तब the Second Saudi State और now part of Saudi Arabia, to follow him to the Dubai क्रीक by the Abu Falasa clan of the bani yas.
It remained under the जनजाति 's control when the संयुक्त Kingdom assumed सुरक्षा of the sheikhdom in 1892 और joined the nascent United Arab अमीरात upon स्वतंत्रता in 1971 as the country 's दूसरी emirate.
Its strategic geographic स्थान बना the town an महत्वपूर्ण trading hub and by the शुरूआत of the 20th सदी, Dubai was already an important regional port.
आज, दुबई has emerged as a कॉस्मोपॉलिटन metropolis that has grown steadily to become a global city और a कारोबार और cultural hub of the मध्य ईस्ट and the Persian Gulf region.
Although दुबई 's अर्थव्यवस्था was historically निर्मित on the oil industry, the अमीर 's western-style मॉडल of कारोबार drives इसके अर्थव्यवस्था with the प्रमुख revenues अभी coming from tourism, real estate, and वित्तीय सेवाएं.
Dubai has recently attracted world attention through many innovative large construction projects and खेल events.
the नगर रै become सांकेतिक लिये its skyscrapers and high-rise इमारतें, ऐसे as the world 's tallest Burj खलीफा, in जोड to महत्वाकांक्षी विकास projects including man-made islands, hotels, और some of the largest shopping मॉल in the region और the संसार.
इस increased ध्यान has also highlighted मजदूर and इंसान अधिकारों मुद्दे concerning the नगर 's largely दक्षिण Asian paid workforce.
Dubai 's property मार्केट experienced a प्रमुख deterioration in 2008–2009 as a परिणाम of the worldwide economic downturn following the financial crisis of 2007-2008.
However, Dubai रै बना a स्थिर and gradual रिकवरी with सहायता coming from neighboring अमीरात.
the handful of new projects कि are in the pipeline have been समर्थ to सहायता दुबई real estate make a comeback.
As of 2012, Dubai is the 22nd most expensive नगर in the world, और the most महंगी city in the Middle ईस्ट, surpassing इसराईल 's Tel aviv ( 31st ).
दुबई has भी महरूम रेटेड as one of the best स्थान to सजीव in the Middle ईस्ट, सहित by us अमरीकी वैश्विक consulting firm मर्सर जो rated the नगर as the best place to सजीव in the Middle ईस्ट in 2011.

सतह of the अटलांटिक ocean बैठक the Earth 's planetary boundary layer and क्षोभमण्डल.
Waves on an ocean coast.
This एनिमेशन uses Earth science आंकड़ा इससे a variety of sensors on NASA Earth observing satellites to माप physical oceanography पैरामीटर्स such as समंदर currents, समंदर winds, समुद्र सतह ऊँचाई और समुद्र सतह temperature.
an ocean ( ; the World समंदर of classical antiquity ) is a देह of saline जल that composes a विशाल part of a planet 's hydrosphere.
in the कॉन्टेक्स्ट of Earth, it refers to एक or सब of the प्रमुख विभाजन of the planet 's World Ocean – they are, in descending order of area, the Pacific, अटलांटिक, भारतीय, Southern ( Antarctic ), और आर्कटिक Oceans.
the word `` sea `` is often used interchangeably साथ `` समंदर '', लकिन सख्ती speaking a समुद्र is a body of saline जल ( possibly a division of the World Ocean ) partly or fully enclosed by जमीन.
Earth is the only planet known to have an ocean ( or any विशाल amounts of open द्रव water ).
लगभग 72 % of the ग्रह 's surface ( ~3.6x108 km2 ) is covered by saline water that is customarily विभाजित into अनेक प्रिंसिपल महासागर और smaller समंदर, with the समंदर covering लगभग 71 % of the Earth 's surface.
In शर्तें of the hydrosphere of the Earth, the समंदर contains 97 % of the Earth 's जल.
oceanographers have stated कि आउट of 97 %, only 5 % of the समंदर as a whole on Earth has been छान.
क्युकी it is the principal component of Earth 's hydrosphere, the संसार ocean is integral to all ज्ञात जीवन, forms भाग of the carbon साईकिल, और प्रभाव climate और weather patterns.
the कुल volume is approximately 1.3 अरब घन kilometres ( 310 million cu mi ) साथ an average depth of.
It is the habitat of 230,000 ज्ञात species, although much of the ocean 's depths remain unexplored and it is अनुमानित that over दो million marine species exist.
the origin of धरती 's महासागर is still unknown, but महासागर हैं believed to have formed in the Hadean period and may have महरूम the impetus लिये the emergence of life.
Extraterrestrial oceans may be रचित of a चौड़ी range of elements and compounds.
the तभी confirmed large stable bodies of extraterrestrial surface liquids are the lakes of Titan, although there is evidence for the existence of oceans elsewhere in the Solar System.
Early in उनके geologic histories, Mars and Venus are theorized to have था large water oceans.
the मंगल समंदर परिकल्पना suggests that nearly a तीसरा of the surface of मंगल was एकबार covered by water, though the water on Mars is no longer oceanic, and a runaway ग्रीनहाउस effect may have boiled away the वैश्विक समंदर of शुक्र.
यौगिकों ऐसे as salts और अमोनिया dissolved in water निम्नतर its freezing point, so कि water might exist in large quantities in extraterrestrial environments as brine or convecting ice.
Unconfirmed oceans हैं speculated beneath the surface of many बौना planets and natural satellites ; notably, the ocean of Europa is believed to have over twice the जल volume of Earth.
The Solar प्रणाली 's gas giant ग्रह हैं also believed to possess द्रव atmospheric layers of yet to be पुष्टि compositions.
Oceans may भी exist on exoplanets और exomoons, including surface oceans of liquid water within a परितारकीय ठहरने zone.
Ocean planets हैं a hypothetical type of ग्रह with a सतह completely covered साथ liquid.
Elvis आरोन Presley ( January 8, 1935 – अगस्त 16, 1977 ) was an अमरीकी singer and actor.
a cultural icon, he is commonly known by the single name एल्विस.
एक of the most popular musicians of the 20th century, he is प्रायः referred to as the `` King of Rock और Roll '' or `` the King ''.
Born in Tupelo, मिसिसिपी, Presley स्थानांतरित to मेम्फिस, Tennessee, with उसके family at the age of 13.
He began his career there in 1954, working with सूर्य रिकॉर्ड owner sam phillips, जो wanted to लाओ the ध्वनि of African-American music to a wider audience.
Accompanied by guitarist Scotty मूर and bassist Bill Black, प्रेस्ली was the सबसे important popularizer of rockabilly, an uptempo, backbeat -ड्राइवn fusion of country and rhythm and ब्लूज़.
RCA विक्टर acquired his contract in a deal arranged by कर्नल Tom पार्कर, जो गई on to manage the सिंगर for over two दशकों.
Presley 's first RCA single, `` heartbreak Hotel ``, released in जनवरी 1956, थी a number-one hit.
He became the leading figure of the newly लोकप्रिय sound of चट्टान and roll with a series of संजाल television appearances and chart-topping records.
उसके सक्रिय interpretations of songs, many इससे African-American sources, and his uninhibited प्रदर्शन style made उसे enormously popular—and विवादास्पद.
In November 1956, he made his फिल्मी डेब्यू in प्रेम Me Tender.
Drafted into military service in 1958, Presley relaunched उसके रिकॉर्डिंग career two सालो बाद with some of उसके most commercially successful work.
He staged few कॉन्सर्ट however, and guided by Parker, proceeded to devote much of the 1960s to बनाना हॉलीवुड फिल्मों and soundtrack एल्बम, most of them critically derided.
In 1968, बाद seven सालो away from the स्टेज, he returned to सजीव प्रदर्शन in a मनाये वापसी television special that led to an विस्तारित लास वेगास कॉन्सर्ट रेसिडेंसी and a string of लाभप्रद tours.
in 1973 प्रेस्ली staged the पहला कॉन्सर्ट ब्रॉडकास्ट globally via उपग्रह, Aloha from Hawaii.
नुस्खा drug abuse severely deteriorated his health, and he died suddenly in 1977 at the आयु of 42.
प्रेस्ली is regarded as one of the सबसे important figures of 20th-century popular culture.
he had a versatile voice and unusually चौड़ी success encompassing many जाति, सहित देश, pop ballads, gospel, and ब्लूज़.
he is the best-selling solo artist in the इतिहास of लोकप्रिय music.
Nominated लिये 14 प्रतिस्पर्धी Grammys, he won तीन, और received the Grammy Lifetime Achievement Award at age 36.
He has महरूम inducted into अनेक music halls of कीर्ति.
A कांच of रूट beer with झाग
Root बियर is a carbonated, sweetened पेय, originally बना using the root of a sassafras plant ( or the छाल of a sassafras tree ) as the प्राथमिक स्वाद.
रूट बियर, popularized in North America, आता in दो forms : alcoholic and soft पेय.
the ऐतिहासिक रूट बियर थी analogous to small बियर in कि the process provided a पेय साथ a very कम alcohol content.
Although जड़ें हैं प्रयुक्त as the source of many soft drinks throughout the संसार, often different names are used.
fluorescent खनिज emit visible लाइट जब उजागर to पराबैंगनी light
प्रतिदीप्ति is the उत्सर्जन of light by a substance कि रै absorbed light or other electromagnetic विकिरण.
it is a form of संदीप्ति.
in सबसे मामले, the उत्सर्जित light रै a longer wavelength, और therefore lower energy, than the अवशोषित विकिरण.
However, when the अवशोषित इलेक्ट्रोमैग्नेटिक radiation is intense, it is possible for one electron to absorb दो photons ; this two-photon अवशोषण can lead to emission of विकिरण having a shorter wavelength than the absorbed विकिरण.
The उत्सर्जित radiation may also be of the same wavelength as the absorbed विकिरण, termed `` अनुनाद प्रतिदीप्ति ''.
The most striking उदाहरण of प्रतिदीप्ति occur when the अवशोषित विकिरण is in the ultraviolet region of the वर्णक्रम, and thus अदृश्य to the इंसान नजर, and the उत्सर्जित light is in the दृश्य region.
Fluorescence रै अनेक practical applications, सहित mineralogy, gemology, रासायनिक सेंसर ( fluorescence spectroscopy ), fluorescent लेबलिंग, dyes, biological डिटेक्टरों, and, most commonly, fluorescent lamps.
Informal logic, intuitively, refers to the principles of logic and logical thought outside of a औपचारिक setting.
however, perhaps because of the informal in the title, the precise definition of अनौपचारिक लॉजिक is a matter of some विवाद.
Ralph H. Johnson और J. Anthony ब्लेयर define informal logic as `` a branch of logic whose task is to develop non-formal standards, मापदण्ड, प्रक्रियाओं लिये the analysis, interpretation, evaluation, आलोचना and construction of argumentation. ''
इस definition reflects what had been implicit in their अभ्यास and कया others were doing in their informal लॉजिक texts.
Informal लॉजिक is associated with ( अनौपचारिक ) fallacies, critical thinking, the Thinking कौशल Movement and the interdisciplinary पूछताछ known as argumentation theory.
Frans H. van eemeren writes that the लेबल `` अनौपचारिक logic '' कवर a `` collection of normative approaches to the study of तर्क in ordinary भाषा that remain करीब to the अभ्यास of argumentation than औपचारिक लॉजिक. ''
यूएसए सालाना रियल GDP 1910–60, साथ the years of the Great अवसाद ( 1929–1939 ) highlighted.
बेरोजगारी rate in the US 1910–1960, with the years of the Great अवसाद ( 1929–1939 ) highlighted.
The ग्रेट Depression began in अगस्त of 1929, जब the संयुक्त States अर्थव्यवस्था first गई into an economic recession.
Although the देश खर्च two months साथ declining जीडीपी, it थी not until the Wall Street क्रैश of अक्तूबर, 1929 कि the प्रभाव of a declining अर्थव्यवस्था यहूद felt, और a major worldwide आर्थिक downturn ensued.
the market क्रैश marked the beginning of a decade of high unemployment, गरीबी, कम profits, अपस्फीति, plunging farm incomes, and lost opportunities लिये economic growth and निजी advancement.
Although its कल्याणकारी हैं स्टिल uncertain और controversial, the जाल effect थी a अचानक और general घाटा of confidence in the economic भविष्य.
The usual explanations include numerous factors, especially ऊँची consumer debt, ill-regulated markets कि permitted overoptimistic लोन by banks और investors, and the कमी of high-growth new industries, सब interacting to बनाएँ a downward आर्थिक सर्पिल of घटाया spending, falling विश्वास, और lowered उत्पादन.
Industries that suffered the सबसे included निर्माण, agriculture as dust-bowl शर्तें persisted in the agricultural heartland, shipping, mining, and लॉगिंग as खूब as durable goods like automobiles और appliances that could be postponed.
the economy पहुँचे bottom in the शीत of 1932–33 ; then came चार years of very rapid विकास until 1937, when the मंदी of 1937 brought वापस 1934 levels of unemployment.
the अवसाद caused major राजनैतिक परिवर्तन in America.
तीन years into the depression, Herbert Hoover lost the 1932 presidential election to Franklin Delano Roosevelt in a sweeping landslide.
रूज़वेल्ट 's आर्थिक recovery योजना, the नई Deal, instituted unprecedented कार्यक्रम लिये राहत, recovery and reform, and brought परिचय a प्रमुख realignment of American politics.
The Depression भी resulted in an बढ़ाएँ of emigration of people to अन्य countries for the first समय in American इतिहास.
लिये example, कुछ immigrants गई back to their native देशों, and some native US citizens went to Canada, ऑस्ट्रेलिया, and South Africa.
It भी resulted in the द्रव्यमान माइग्रेशन of लोगों from badly hit areas in the Great मैदान and the South to स्थान ऐसे as कैलिफ़ोर्निया and the उत्तर, respectively ( see Okies और the ग्रेट Migration of अफ़्रीकी Americans ).
जातिगत tensions also increased दौरान this time.
By the 1940s immigration था returned back to normal, and करणों अस्वीकृत.
a well-known उदाहरण of an emigrant was फ़्रैंक McCourt, जो went to Ireland, as recounted in his book एंजेला 's Ashes.
The मेमोरी of the अवसाद also shaped आधुनिक theories of अर्थशास्त्र और resulted in अनेक परिवर्तन in how the government dealt साथ economic downturns, ऐसे as the use of stimulus packages, keynesian अर्थशास्त्र, और सोशल Security.
it भी shaped आधुनिक American साहित्य, resulting in प्रसिद्ध novels such as जॉन steinbeck 's `` The Grapes of Wrath `` और `` of चूहे और Men ``.
The Great अवसाद of the 1930s started with the भण्डार market क्रैश of October 1929.
Turkey ( ), officially the Republic of Turkey, is a transcontinental country, located ज़्यादातर on आनातोलिया in पश्चिमी Asia and on ईस्ट Thrace in Southeastern यूरोपीय.
Turkey is bordered by eight countries : बुल्गारिया to the northwest ; Greece to the वेस्ट ; Georgia to the पूर्वोत्तर ; अर्मेनिया, इरान and the Azerbaijani exclave of Nakhchivan to the ईस्ट ; and Iraq and Syria to the southeast.
The Mediterranean समुद्र is to the south ; the Aegean समुद्र is to the वेस्ट ; और the Black Sea is to the उत्तर.
The समुद्र of Marmara, the bosphorus and the Dardanelles ( जिससे साथ रूप the तुर्की straits ) demarcate the boundary between Thrace and Anatolia ; they also separate यूरोपीय and एशिया.
Turkey 's स्थान at the क्रॉसरोड्स of Europe and एशिया makes it a country of significant geostrategic महत्व.
The country 's आधिकारिक language is तुर्की, a turkic language, which is spoken by लगभग 85 % of the population as mother tongue.
The सबसे numerous ethnic group is the Turks, who constitute between 70 % और 75 % of the जनसांख्यिकी according to the World Factbook.
kurds हैं the largest जातीय minority and, according to the same source, number around 18 % of the population जबकि other ethnic minorities are अनुमानित to be at 7–12 %.
the विशाल majority of the population is मुस्लिम.
the area अभी पुकारा तुर्कों has महरूम inhabited चूंकि the paleolithic, सहित various Ancient Anatolian civilizations और thracian peoples.
After सिकंदर the ग्रेट 's conquest, the क्षेत्रफल थी hellenized, जिससे जारी साथ the Roman rule and the परिवर्तन into the Byzantine Empire.
the सलजूक़ Turks began migrating into the क्षेत्रफल in the 11th सदी, starting the process of turkification, which थी greatly त्वरित by the सलजूक़ victory over the Byzantines at the Battle of manzikert in 1071.
the सलजूक़ Sultanate of Rûm ruled Anatolia until the Mongol invasion in 1243, upon which it disintegrated into अनेक small तुर्की beyliks.
Starting from the late 13th सदी, the Ottoman beylik united Anatolia and निर्मित an साम्राज्य encompassing much of southeastern Europe, पश्चिमी Asia और North अफ़्रीकी.
बाद the Ottoman साम्राज्य collapsed following its defeat in World War I, parts of it यहूद occupied by the विजयी allies.
A cadre of young सैन्य officers, led by Mustafa kemal Atatürk और his colleagues, organized a कामयाब resistance to the Allies ; in 1923 वे established the modern Republic of तुर्कों, with अतातुर्क as इसके first president.
Turkey is a लोकतांत्रिक, secular, unitary, constitutional republic साथ a diverse cultural heritage.
Turkey has become increasingly एकीकृत साथ the West through membership in संगठनों such as the Council of यूरोपीय, नाटो, OECD, OSCE and the G-20 major economies.
तुर्कों began full सदस्यता negotiations with the European Union in 2005, having been an associate member of the यूरोपीय Economic जातियाँ since 1963 and having joined the EU कस्टम Union in 1995.
Turkey has also fostered बंद cultural, राजनैतिक और आर्थिक संबंध साथ the मध्य ईस्ट, Caucasus, the Turkic राज्य of Central एशिया and the African देशों through membership in संगठनों ऐसे as the turkic परिषद, Joint प्रशासन of Turkic Arts and Culture, Organisation of Islamic सहयोग और the Economic Cooperation संगठन.
Turkey 's growing अर्थव्यवस्था और diplomatic पहलों have led to इसके recognition as a regional power.
Turkey is the संसार 's 17th largest अर्थव्यवस्था by nominal जीडीपी और the 16th largest by खरीदना power पैरिटी.
Caryn Elaine Johnson, बेहतरीन known as whoopi Goldberg (, ( born November 13, 1955 ) is an American comedienne, actress, singer-songwriter, political activist, author और talk show मेजबान.
Goldberg made her फिल्मी डेब्यू in The Color जामुनी ( 1985 ), playing celie, a mistreated black woman in the गहन South.
She received a nomination लिये the Academy पुरस्कार लिये Best Actress और won her first Golden Globe Award for her भूमिका in the फिल्मी.
In 1990, वो played oda Mae Brown, a wacky psychic helping a slain man ( पैट्रिक Swayze ) सहेजें his lover ( Demi मूर ) in the ब्लॉकबस्टर भुत.
This performance जीती her a second Golden ग्लोब and an अकादमी Award लिये Best supporting Actress ; this made गोल्डबर्ग तभी the दूसरी ब्लैक woman in the history of the Academy पुरस्कार to win an एक्टिंग Oscar—the first होने Hattie McDaniel who won लिये Gone With the हवा in 1939.
Notable later films शामिल सिस्टर Act and सिस्टर Act 2, The Player, Made in अमेरिका, How स्टेला Got उसके नाली वापस, Girl, Interrupted and चूहा रेस.
वो is भी acclaimed लिये उसके roles as the bartender Guinan in Star Trek : The Next Generation, as टेरी doolittle in Jumpin ' जोकर Flash, and as कार्मेन tibideaux in ग्ली, as खूब as the आवाज़ of Shenzi the hyena in The शेर King.
Goldberg रै been nominated for 13 एमी पुरस्कार लिये her work in television.
She थी co-producer of the लोकप्रिय game दिखाएँ Hollywood Squares from 1998 to 2004.
She has been the moderator of the daytime talk show The View since 2007.
गोल्डबर्ग has a Grammy, two दिन Emmys, दो Golden ग्लोब्स, a Tony ( लिये production, not एक्टिंग ), and an ऑस्कर.
In addition, गोल्डबर्ग has a British Academy फिल्मी Award, four लोगों 's चुनाव Awards, and रै been सम्मानित with a star on the Hollywood Walk of Fame.
वो is one of the few मनोरंजनकर्ता who have जीती an एमी, ग्रैमी, Oscar, and टोनी पुरस्कार.
augusta is a consolidated नगर in the u.S. राज्य of Georgia, located at the पतन लकीर of the Savannah नदी, at the head of its navigable portion.
As of the 2010 census, the augusta– Richmond County जनसांख्यिकी was 195,844 not counting the unconsolidated cities of hephzibah and Blythe.
augusta is the प्रिंसिपल city of the augusta – रिचमंड काउंटी महानगर Statistical क्षेत्रफल, जिससे as of 2010 था an estimated population of 556,877, making it both the second-largest city and the second-largest metro area in the state after अटलांटा.
It is the 116th-largest city in the United States.
internationally, augusta is बेहतरीन known लिये hosting The Masters Tournament in golf प्रत्येक वसन्त.
A CD-ROM ( ) is a pre-pressed कॉम्पैक्ट disc जिससे contains data.
the नाम is an एक्रोनिम जिससे स्टैंड लिये `` कॉम्पैक्ट डिस्क read-only मेमोरी ``.
Computers can पढ़ा cd-roms, लकिन can नहीं write on उन्हें.
cd-roms are popularly used to वितरित कंप्यूटर software, including वीडियो games and multimedia अनुप्रयोग, हालांकि कोई आंकड़ा can be stored ( up to the क्षमता सीमा of a डिस्क ).
Some CDs, पुकारा उन्नत cds, hold दोनो computer आंकड़ा and audio साथ the latter सक्षम of होने played on a CD player, while data ( ऐसे as software or डिजिटल video ) is तभी usable on a computer ( ऐसे as ISO 9660 format PC CD-ROMs ).
the Yellow Book is the technical standard कि defines the format of CD-ROMs.
One of a नियत of color-bound books कि contain the technical विशेषताएँ for सब cd formats, the Yellow किताब, created by सोनी and Philips, थी the पहला extension of कॉम्पैक्ट डिस्क डिजिटल Audio.
it adapted the स्वरूप to hold कोई form of data.
The Chicago Blackhawks ( spelled as Black Hawks पहले 1986, and ज्ञात colloquially as the Hawks ) are a professional बर्फ hockey टोली based in Chicago, इलिनोइस.
They are सदस्यों of the Central Division of the पश्चिमी Conference of the नेशनल Hockey League ( एनएचएल ).
वे have won four स्टेनली Cup championships चूंकि their founding in 1926, सबसे recently in 2009–10.
the Blackhawks are एक of the Original Six NHL टीमों, साथ with the डेट्रॉयट Red Wings, Montreal canadiens, Toronto Maple Leafs, Boston Bruins and नई York रेंजरों.
चूंकि the ब्लैकहॉक्स have निभाई their home games at the United Center after having खर्च 65 years playing at शिकागो स्टेडियम.
Lent celebrants carrying आउट a गली procession during पावन Week.
the violet रंग is often associated with penance and detachment.
Similar Christian penitential practice is seen in अन्य Catholic countries, sometimes associated with mortification of the flesh.
granada, Nicaragua.
Lent ( Latin : quadragesima ) is a solemn observance in the liturgical year of many Christian denominations, lasting for a period of लगभग छह weeks अग्रणी up to ईस्टर Sunday.
In the general latin-rite and most Western denominations lent is लिया to चलाएं from राख Wednesday to Maundy गुरुवार ( पावन गुरुवार ) morning or to ईस्टर Eve.
in the कैथोलिक Church, lent lasts until Holy Thursday, while other denominations चलाएं जबतक Easter Eve.
the परंपरागत purpose of Lent is the preparation of the आस्तिक through prayer, penance, repentance, almsgiving, और self-denial.
इसके institutional purpose is heightened in the सालाना commemoration of Holy Week, marking the death, burial और resurrection of Jesus, which recalls the कार्यक्रम of the Bible जब यीशु is crucified on Good शुक्रवार, which then culminates in the जश्न on ईस्टर Sunday of the क़यामत of Jesus Christ.
During lent, अनेक of the वफादार commit to उपवास or giving up निश्चित प्रकार of luxuries as a form of penitence.
the Stations of the क्रॉस, a devotional commemoration of Christ 's carrying the Cross और of his execution, are प्रायः observed.
Many रोमन कैथोलिक and some प्रोटोस्टेंट चर्च remove पुष्प from their altars, while crucifixes, religious मूर्तियाँ, और अन्य elaborate religious symbols हैं often रहमत in बैंगनी fabrics in solemn observance of the event.
In certain pious Catholic countries, कुछ adherents mark the season with the traditional abstention from the consumption of meat.
in कुछ देशों, ग्रैंड religious जुलूसों और सांस्कृतिक customs हैं observed, और the वफादार attempt to विज़िट seven चर्च during पावन सप्ताह in सम्मान of Jesus Christ heading to Mount कलवारी.
lent is traditionally वर्णित as lasting for चालीस days, in commemoration of the चालीस days which, according to the Gospels of Matthew, चिह्नित और Luke, Jesus spent उपवास in the मरुस्थल पहले the beginning of उसके पब्लिक मंत्रालय, जहाँ he endured temptation by the शैतान.
However, अलग ईसाई denominations calculate the चालीस दिनों of Lent differently.
In सबसे Western परंपराओं the Sundays हैं not गिने as part of Lent ; यूँ the period इससे राख बुधवार जबतक ईस्टर consists of 40 दिनों when the Sundays are excluded.
however in the Roman Catholic Church Lent is now taken to end on Holy Thursday rather than Easter Eve, and hence lasts 38 days excluding sundays, or 44 दिनों in total.
इस event, along with इसके pious कस्टम are observed by Catholics, Lutherans, Methodists, presbyterians, और anglicans.
स्थान of Chernobyl nuclear शक्ति plant

The Chernobyl disaster (, Chornobylska katastrofa – chornobyl प्रलय ) थी a catastrophic nuclear दुर्घटना that occurred on 26 April 1986 at the Chernobyl Nuclear Power संयंत्र in Ukraine ( तब officially the Ukrainian SSR ), which was under the direct क्षेत्राधिकार of the central अधिकारियों of the Soviet Union.
An विस्फोट और fire released विशाल quantities of radioactive अणु into the atmosphere, which स्प्रेड over much of the पश्चिमी ussr and यूरोपीय.
the Chernobyl विपत्ति is widely considered to have been the worst nuclear शक्ति plant accident in इतिहास, and is one of only two वर्गीकृत as a स्तर 7 event on the International नाभिकीय Event स्केल ( the अन्य being the Fukushima Daiichi नाभिकीय विपत्ति in 2011 ).
The बैटल to contain the संदूषण and avert a वृहद catastrophe ultimately शामिल over 500,000 मजदूर and cost an estimated 18 अरब rubles.
The आधिकारिक Soviet casualty गिनती of 31 deaths has महरूम विवादित, and long-term effects such as cancers and deformities हैं still being accounted for.
In grammar, a subject पूरक is a predicative अभिव्यक्ति कि follows a linking verb ( copula ) और कि complements ( completes ) the विषय of the sentence by either ( 1 ) renaming it or ( 2 ) describing it.
in the पूर्व case, a renaming संज्ञा phrase such as a noun or pronoun is called a predicative nominal.
An adjective following the copula and describing the subject is पुकारा a predicative adjective.
in either case the predicative complement in प्रभाव mirrors the विषय.
विषय complements are used with a small क्लास of verbs called linking verbs or copula, of which be is the most आम.
चूंकि copula हैं stative क्रियाएँ, subject complements are not प्रभावित by any action of the verb.
Subject complements are typically not clause वितर्क, nor हैं they clause adjuncts.
throughout the fifty-five year history of the Grammy Awards, many significant रिकॉर्ड have been set.
इस पेज तभी includes the competitive awards जीती by various artists.
This करता not शामिल the विभिन्न खास awards that are presented by the National अकादमी of रिकॉर्डिंग Arts and sciences ऐसे as Lifetime उपलब्धि Awards, Trustees Awards, Technical पुरस्कार or Legend Awards.
the page however करता include other non-performance सम्बन्धित grammys ( known as the शिल्प & उत्पादन फ़ील्ड ) that may have been presented to the कलाकार ( s ).
Marshall Bruce Mathers iii ( born October 17, 1972 ), better ज्ञात by उसके stage name एमिनेम ( stylized as eminǝm ) और by उसके alter ego पतला छायादार, is an American rapper, रिकार्ड निर्माता, songwriter और actor.
Eminem, साथ साथ उसके सोलो करियर, is a member of उसके group D12, and also one हाफ of the hip हॉप duo Bad Meets Evil, with रॉयस da 5'9 ''.
एमिनेम is one of the best-selling कलाकारों in the world और is the best-selling artist of the 2000s.
He रै महरूम सूचीबद्ध and ranked as one of the greatest artists of सब time by many मैगज़ीन, सहित Rolling Stone पत्रिका which क्रमित him 82nd on its list of the 100 महानतम कलाकारों of सब Time.
The same पत्रिका घोषित उसे The King of Hip हॉप.
सहित his कार्य with D12 and Bad Meets दुष्ट, Eminem रै achieved ten number-one albums on the Billboard 200.
he has बेची more than 100 million रिकॉर्ड worldwide, सहित 42 million tracks and 49.1 million एल्बम in the संयुक्त States.
As an भूमिगत rapper Eminem released his डेब्यू सोलो album, Infinite in 1996.
the album was a नाजुक and वाणिज्यिक विफलता.
he gained mainstream लोकप्रियता in 1999 after the release of उसके major-label debut एल्बम the Slim Shady lp.
The LP also earned एमिनेम उसके पहला Grammy पुरस्कार लिये Best Rap Album.
उसके next two records The Marshall Mathers LP, और the एमिनेम Show, भी जीती Best Rap Album Grammy Awards, बनाना Eminem the पहला कलाकार to जीत Best Rap Album for three लगातार एलपी.
This थी followed by another स्टुडियो release in 2004 titled encore.
Eminem then went on hiatus बाद touring in 2005.
He released his पहला album in five years titled पतन, on may 15, 2009.
in 2010, Eminem released his seventh स्टुडियो album Recovery.
Recovery was an international कामयाबी and was नामित the best selling album of 2010 worldwide, joining the Eminem दिखाएँ, which was the best seller of 2002.
Eminem won ग्रैमी Awards लिये दोनो पतन and रिकवरी, giving उसे a total of 13 grammys in उसके करियर.
एमिनेम रै opened other ventures, सहित his अपना रिकार्ड label छायादार Records with his मैनेजर Paul rosenberg.
He भी रै उसके own radio channel, Shade 45 on sirius xm रेडियो.
Eminem began an acting करियर in 2002, when he स्ट्रक्चर in the hip हॉप drama फिल्मी 8 मील.
He won the Academy Award for बेहतरीन असली Song, बनने the first रैप artist कभी to win the पुरस्कार.
He has भी made cameo appearances in The धो ( 2001 ), मजेदार People ( 2009 ) और the टेलीविज़न series अनुगामी.
The एकड़ is a unit of area used in the imperial और u.S. प्रथागत systems.
an एकड़ is परिचय 40 % of a हेक्टेयर – slightly smaller than an अमरीकी football field.
The acre is no longer commonly used, although a few notable exceptions शामिल the United राज्य, Australia, Burma and the संयुक्त किंगडम ( as of 2010, the acre is no longer officially used in the संयुक्त Kingdom, हालांकि is still used in real estate descriptions ).
It is still used, to कुछ extent, in Canada.
the international symbol of the acre is ac, और is पारिभाषित as 1/640 of a square मील.
The most commonly used acre आज is the international एकड़.
In the संयुक्त राज्य both the international acre and the slightly अलग US survey acre हैं in use.
the सबसे आम उपयोग of the acre is to measure tracts of land.
एक अंतरराष्ट्रीय एकड़ is defined as 4046.8564224 square metres.
दौरान the Middle आयु, an acre थी the राशि of land कि could be plowed in एक दिन with a yoke of oxen.
एंटोनी लाव्वाज़्ये 's discovery of the विधि of Conservation of Mass led to अनेक new निष्कर्षों in the 19th सदी.
जोसेफ Proust 's law of definite proportions और John Dalton 's atomic theory branched from the discoveries of Antoine Lavoisier.
लाव्वाज़्ये 's quantitative experiments revealed कि दहन involved ऑक्सीजन rather than what was previously विचार to be phlogiston.
The law of संरक्षण of mass, or principle of mass conservation, राज्य कि for कोई system closed to all हस्तांतरण of matter and energy ( both of which have mass ), the mass of the system must remain निरंतर over समय, as system mass can not change quantity if it is not added or removed.
Hence, the मात्रा of mass is `` conserved '' over समय.
the law implies कि mass can neither be निर्मित nor नष्ट, although it may be rearranged in space, or the entities संबद्ध साथ it may be changed in form, as for example जब लाइट or शारीरिक work is रूपांतरित into अणु कि योगदान the वही mass to the system as the लाइट or कार्य had contributed.
the law implies ( requires ) कि दौरान any chemical प्रतिक्रिया, nuclear प्रतिक्रिया, or radioactive decay in an isolated प्रणाली, the द्रव्यमान of the reactants or starting material must equal the द्रव्यमान of the उत्पाद.
The concept of द्रव्यमान conservation is widely प्रयुक्त in many fields such as रसायन, mechanics, और fluid dynamics.
Historically, mass conservation थी खोजा in chemical प्रतिक्रियाएँ by Antoine Lavoisier in the late 18th सदी, and थी of crucial importance in the progress इससे alchemy to the modern natural science of chemistry.
the closely सम्बन्धित concept of matter conservation was मिला to थाम शुभ in रसायन to ऐसे high approximation that it failed only लिये the ऊँची energies treated by the later refinements of आपेक्षिकता theory, but otherwise remains useful and fear सटीक लिये most chemical calculations, even in आधुनिक practice.
In special relativity, needed for सटीकता जब विशाल energy हस्तांतरण between प्रणालियों is शामिल, the difference between thermodynamically closed and isolated systems becomes important, चूंकि संरक्षण of mass is strictly and perfectly upheld तभी लिये so-called पृथक प्रणालियों, i.e. those completely पृथक from all exchanges with the पर्यावरण.
in इस परिस्थिति, the mass-energy equivalence प्रमेय states that mass संरक्षण is equivalent to total उर्जा conservation, जिससे is the first law of ऊष्मागतिकी.
By contrast, लिये a thermodynamically बंद system ( i.e., एक which is बंद to exchanges of matter, लकिन open to exchanges of non-material energy, such as heat and कार्य, with the परिवेश ) mass is ( usually ) तभी approximately conserved.
the input or output of non-material energy जरूर change the द्रव्यमान of the system in आपेक्षिकता सिद्धान्त, हालांकि the change is प्रायः small, since relatively large amounts of ऐसे energy ( by comparison with ordinary अनुभव ) carry only a छोटी राशि of mass ( again by ordinary standards of measurement ).
in खास relativity, mass is not converted to energy, चूंकि energy in सब of इसके फ़ॉर्म सदा retains its समतुल्य amount of द्रव्यमान throughout कोई transformation or translocation into, or out of, a प्रणाली.
However, certain types of matter ( a अलग अवधारणा ) may be converted to उर्जा, so long as the द्रव्यमान of the system is unchanged in the process.
However, if such energy is removed from प्रणालियों, they जरूर lose the mass that is संबद्ध with it.
in general relativity, द्रव्यमान ( और energy ) conservation in expanding आयतन of space is a complex concept, subject to अलग definitions, and neither द्रव्यमान nor energy is as strictly और बस conserved as is the मामला in special आपेक्षिकता और in Minkowski space.
For a चर्चा, see द्रव्यमान in सामान्य आपेक्षिकता.
a pig is कोई of the पशु in the genus Sus, within the Suidae family of even-toed ungulates.
Pigs include the घरेलू pig, इसके ancestor the wild boar, और several अन्य wild relatives.
Young and small सूअर are known as piglets.
Pigs are omnivores और हैं highly social and बुद्धिमान animals.

a 3.5-inch diskette 's `` फ्लॉपी '' magnetic material, removed इससे इसके housing
A floppy डिस्क, or diskette, is a disk storage medium रचित of a डिस्क of thin and लचीली चुम्बकीय storage medium, sealed in a rectangular प्लास्टिक वाहक lined with कपड़ा कि removes dust particles.
वे are read and written by a फ्लॉपी डिस्क ड्राइव ( fdd ).
Floppy disks, initially as मीडिया and बाद in और 3.5-inch ( 90 mm ) sizes, यहूद a सर्वव्यापी form of data storage and exchange from the mid-1970s well into the first दशक of the 21st century.
By 2010, computer motherboards were rarely manufactured with floppy ड्राइव support ; `` floppies could be used as an बाह्य usb ड्राइव, लकिन ``, 8 ``, और non-standard ड्राइव could only be handled by बूढ़ा equipment.
जबकि floppy disk ड्राइव स्टिल have कुछ limited उपयोग, विशेषकर with legacy industrial computer उपकरण, they have been superseded by data भंडार methods साथ much greater capacity, such as usb flash ड्राइव, portable बाह्य मुश्किल disk ड्राइव, optical discs, memory cards, and computer networks.
an एनिमेटेड diagram of a cutter
in baseball, a cutter, or cut fastball, is a प्रकार of fastball जिससे breaks slightly toward the pitcher 's glove side as it reaches घर plate.
This पिच is कही between a slider और a fastball, as it is प्रायः thrown तेज़ than a slider but साथ more motion than a ठेठ fastball.
Some pitchers उपयोग a cutter as a way to prevent hitters from expecting उनके regular fastballs.
A common technique प्रयुक्त to throw a कटर is to use a four-seam fastball पकड़ साथ the बेसबॉल नियत slightly off center in the hand.
जब a batter is able to hit a कटर पिच, it often results in नरम सम्पर्क और an easy out, due to the pitch 's movement keeping the ball दूर from the bat 's sweet spot.
the cutter is typically 2–5 mph slower than a pitcher 's four-seam fastball.
In 2010, the average pitch classified as a cutter by PITCHf/x thrown by a right-handed pitcher was 88.6 किमी ; the औसत four-seamer थी 92.1 mph.
`` What It takes '' is a power ballad by अमरीकी hard चट्टान band एरोस्मिथ.
It थी लिखा by Steven Tyler, जो पेरी, और डेसमंड Child.
it थी released in 1990 as the तीसरा single इससे Aerosmith 's critically and commercially कामयाब 1989 एल्बम Pump.
In the video the Making of पंप, A & R man जॉन kalodner described the song as `` a masterpiece ''.
During सजीव प्रदर्शन, Tyler sings the पहला verse a cappella और belts आउट one of his हस्ताक्षर चिल्लाती right before the chorus.
the एल्बम संस्करण of the song is followed by an untitled hidden track.

odysseus ( or ; यूनानी :, ), also known by the Roman name ulysses ( ; ), was a legendary Greek किंग of Ithaca और a hero of होमर 's एपिक poem the Odyssey.
Odysseus also plays a key role in Homer 's Iliad and other works in कि same Epic साईकिल.
husband of Penelope, father of telemachus, और बेटे of Laërtes ( or Sisyphus ) and Anticlea, Odysseus is renowned for his brilliance, guile, and versatility ( polytropos ), and is hence ज्ञात by the epithet Odysseus the Cunning ( mētis, or `` cunning प्रज्ञा `` ).
He is most famous for the ten eventful सालो he took to वापसी घर बाद the decade-long trojan युद्ध and his प्रसिद्ध Trojan Horse ploy to कैप्चर the नगर of ट्रॉय.
erie is a statutory Town in Boulder और Weld counties in the u.S. state of कोलोराडो.
The जनसांख्यिकी according to the 2010 जनसांख्यिकी is 18,135 and was अंकित as 6,291 at the 2000 census.
The Town of erie is located just west of I-25 for easy अभिगम to I-70, Denver International Airport और Colorado 's entire सामने Range.
Erie 's नियोजन Area spans 48 वर्गाकार मील, extending इससे the north side of राज्य Highway 52 south to State Highway 7, और between us 287 on the west and Interstate 25 to the ईस्ट.
erie is लगभग 35 minutes from डेनवर अंतरराष्ट्रीय Airport, 25 minutes to डेनवर and 20 minutes from बोल्डर.
the फलक of Trustees serves as the विधान and governing देह of the Town of Erie and is जिम्मेदार लिये establishing Town policies and goals.
The Board has the प्राधिकार to अपनाना laws, ordinances और resolutions as needed to conduct the कारोबार of the कस्बा, और by ordinance may enter into contracts or intergovernmental समझौतों to furnish, receive services or to provide लिये सहकारी सेवा delivery.
Appointed by और serving at the pleasure of the Board of trustees, the कस्बा Administrator is the chief ऑपरेटिंग और administrative अधिकारी of the कस्बा and is जिम्मेदार for providing professional नेतृत्व in the प्रशासन and निष्पादन of नीतियों and objectives formulated by the Board.
The mission of the erie Police विभाग is to communicate and कार्य साथ the community to maintain a safe पर्यावरण, prevent अपराधों and enforce the विधि, जबकि protecting the अधिकारों of सब.
erie नगरपालिका विमानक्षेत्र ( EIK ) is owned और operated by the कस्बा of erie और is रणनीतिक located in the Denver-Boulder metropolitan क्षेत्रफल on Colorado Highway 7, a little over three miles वेस्ट of Interstate 25.
The main रनवे is concrete paved and 4,700 feet long.
the is a घर video game कंसोल उत्पादित by Sony Computer entertainment.
It is the successor to the PlayStation 2, as part of the PlayStation series.
the प्लेस्टेशन 3 competes with microsoft 's एक्सबॉक्स 360 and निन्टेंडो 's Wii as part of the seventh generation of video खेल consoles.
it was first released on नवम्बर 11, 2006, in Japan, साथ international markets following shortly thereafter.
The कंसोल थी first officially announced at e3 2005.
Originally नियत for a वसन्त 2006 release date, it थी विलम्बित several times until finally hitting स्टोर्स at the end of the year.
It was the पहला and फिलहाल only console to use blu-ray Disc as इसके प्राथमिक storage मीडियम.
प्रमुख features of the console include its एकीकृत ऑनलाइन गेमिंग service, the PlayStation Network, and इसके कनेक्टिविटी साथ the प्लेस्टेशन पोर्टेबल and PlayStation Vita, in सितंबर 2009 the updated PlayStation 3 पतला, was released.
इस पतला is हल्का and thinner than the असली version, although it lacks PlayStation 2 backwards संगतता ( removed on later असली models ), लकिन notably प्रदर्शित a re-designed logo and विपणन डिज़ाइन.
As of November 4, 2012, 70 लाख प्लेस्टेशन 3s have been बेची worldwide.
Its successor, प्लेस्टेशन 4, is नियत for a q4 2013 release.
साल्वाडोर डोमिंगो फेलिप Jacinto dalí i domènech, 1st Marqués de Dalí de pubol ( May 11, 1904january 23, 1989 ), ज्ञात as साल्वाडोर Dalí ( ), was a prominent स्पेनी surrealist painter born in Figueres, Spain.
dalí was a skilled draftsman, बेहतरीन ज्ञात for the striking और विचित्र images in his surrealist कार्य.
His painterly कौशल are often attributed to the influence of पुनर्जागरण मास्टर्स.
His best-known कार्य, the Persistence of मेमोरी, was समाप्त in 1931.
Dalí 's expansive कलाकारी repertoire included फिल्मी, मूर्तिकला, और photography, in सहयोग साथ a दायरा of artists in a variety of media.
Dalí attributed his `` love of everything कि is gilded and excessive, my passion लिये luxury and my प्रेम of oriental कपडे '' to a self-styled `` अरब lineage '', claiming that उसके पूर्वजो यहूद descended from the Moors.
dalí was highly कल्पनाशील, and also enjoyed indulging in unusual and वैभवशाली बर्ताव.
उसके eccentric manner and attention-grabbing पब्लिक क्रियाएँ sometimes खींचा अधिक ध्यान than his कलाकृति, to the dismay of those जो held his work in high esteem, and to the irritation of his आलोचकों.
पारस Plato by Silanion
The humanities are academic disciplines कि पढ़ाई human संस्कृति, using methods कि are primarily analytical, critical, or speculative, and having a significant ऐतिहासिक element, as distinguished इससे the mainly अनुभवजन्य approaches of the प्राकृतिक sciences.
the मानवता include ancient और modern भाषाएं, साहित्य, philosophy, religion, and visual और performing arts ऐसे as music and थिएटर.
the मानवता that हैं भी regarded as social sciences include history, anthropology, क्षेत्रफल studies, communication studies, सांस्कृतिक studies, विधि, अर्थशास्त्र and भाषाविज्ञान.
विद्वानों working in the humanities हैं sometimes described as `` humanists ''.
However, कि पद भी describes the philosophical position of humanism, which कुछ `` antihumanist `` विद्वानों in the humanities अस्वीकृत.
कुछ द्वितीयक स्कूलों offer humanities classes, usually consisting of English साहित्य, global अध्ययन, and art.
Human disciplines like history, सांस्कृतिक मानवशास्त्र and मनोविश्लेषण study विषय matters to जिससे the experimental method करता not apply, और they have अभिगम instead to the तुलनात्मक method and तुलनात्मक शोध.
The 2005 ब्लू Room Christmas Tree
the श्वेत House Christmas Tree, भी ज्ञात as the Blue रूम Christmas Tree, is the official indoor Christmas tree at the residence of the अध्यक्ष of the संयुक्त States, the White हाउस.
The first अंदर Christmas पेड़ was संस्थापित in the White House sometime in the 19th सदी ( वहीँ are varying दावा as to the exact year ) and चूंकि 1961 the tree has had a प्रसंग motif at the discretion of the पहला Lady of the United States.
The अध्यक्ष of the संयुक्त राज्य of अमेरिका ( POTUS ) is the head of राज्य and head of government of the United राज्य.
The अध्यक्ष लीड the कार्यपालिका शाखा of the federal government और is the commander-in-chief of the United States Armed Forces.
Article II of the U.S. Constitution vests the कार्यपालिका शक्ति of the United राज्य in the president and आरोप him with the execution of संघीय law, alongside the responsibility of appointing federal executive, diplomatic, regulatory, and judicial officers, and concluding treaties साथ विदेशी powers, साथ the advice and सहमति of the सीनेट.
The अध्यक्ष is further empowered to grant federal pardons and reprieves, और to convene and adjourn either or both houses of Congress अंतर्गत extraordinary circumstances.
चूंकि the founding of the United राज्य, the power of the अध्यक्ष and the संघीय सरकारी have grown substantially और each आधुनिक अध्यक्ष, despite possessing no औपचारिक legislative powers beyond हस्ताक्षर or vetoing congressionally passed bills, is largely responsible for dictating the legislative agenda of his पार्टी और the विदेशी और घरेलू नीति of the United States.
The अध्यक्ष is frequently वर्णित as the सबसे शक्तिशाली person in the world.
The अध्यक्ष is indirectly निर्वाचित by the लोगों through the Electoral College to a four-year term, and is एक of only two nationally elected federal officers, the other being the Vice President of the United राज्य.
The Twenty-second Amendment, adopted in 1951, prohibits anyone from कभी being निर्वाचित to the presidency लिये a third पूरा पद.
It also prohibits a व्यक्ति from होने elected to the प्रेसिडेंसी अधिक than एकबार if that व्यक्ति previously had served as अध्यक्ष, or acting अध्यक्ष, for more than दो years of another person 's पद as president.
In all, 43 individuals have परोसा 55 four-year शर्तें.
On जनवरी 20, 2009, Barack ओबामा became the 44th and current अध्यक्ष.
on November 6, 2012, he थी re-elected and is scheduled to serve until जनवरी 20, 2017.
Senses are physiological capacities of जीवों कि provide data for बोध.
the होश और their आपरेशन, classification, और theory हैं अतिव्यापी topics studied by a किस्में of fields, सबसे notably neuroscience, cognitive मनोविज्ञान ( or संज्ञानात्मक science ), और philosophy of perception.
the बेचैन system रै a specific संवेदी प्रणाली or organ, समर्पित to each भाव.
इंसानो have a multitude of senses.
Sight ( ophthalmoception ), सुनना ( audioception ), स्वाद ( gustaoception ), smell ( olfacoception or olfacception ), and touch ( tactioception ) are the five traditionally recognized.
While the ability to detect अन्य stimuli beyond those governed by the traditional senses exists, including तापमान ( thermoception ), kinesthetic भाव ( proprioception ), पीड़ा ( nociception ), संतुलन ( equilibrioception ), त्वरण ( kinesthesioception ), और various internal stimuli ( e.g. the different chemoreceptors for detecting salt and carbon dioxide एकाग्रता in the blood ), तभी a small number of these can safely be classified as पृथक senses in और of themselves.
What constitutes a भाव is a matter of some बहस, leading to difficulties in धमक कया exactly a sense is.
Animals भी have receptors to sense the world around them, with डिग्री of capability varying greatly between प्रजाति.
Humans have a comparatively weak भाव of smell, जबकि some पशु may lack one or more of the traditional पाँच senses.
Some पशु may also सेवन और interpret संवेदी stimuli in very अलग तरीके.
Some प्रजाति of पशु are able to sense the संसार in a way that humans can not, with some species समर्थ to sense विद्युत और magnetic fields, and detect जल दबाव and currents.
मकड़ियों ( अनुक्रम Araneae ) are air-breathing arthropods कि have आठ legs और chelicerae साथ fangs that inject venom.
They are the largest order of arachnids and रैंक seventh in total species diversity among सब अन्य groups of जीवों.
Spiders are मिला विश्वव्यापी on every महाद्वीप except for Antarctica, और have become established in nearly every habitat साथ the exception of एयर and sea colonization.
As of 2008, at तनिक 43,678 मकड़ी प्रजाति, and 109 families have been recorded by taxonomists ; however, there has been confusion भीतर the scientific community as to how सब ये परिवारों चाहिए be वर्गीकृत, as evidenced by the over 20 different classifications कि have महरूम proposed since 1900.
anatomically, spiders differ from अन्य arthropods in कि the usual body segments हैं fused into two tagmata, the cephalothorax and abdomen, and joined by a small, बेलनाकार pedicel.
Unlike कीट, spiders do not have antennae.
In all except the सबसे primitive समूह, the mesothelae, मकड़ियों have the सबसे centralized nervous systems of all arthropods, as all their ganglia are fused into one द्रव्यमान in the cephalothorax.
Unlike most arthropods, spiders have no extensor मांसपेशियां in उनके limbs और instead extend them by हाइड्रोलिक pressure.
Their abdomens bear appendages that have महरूम modified into spinnerets that extrude silk इससे up to six types of रेशा ग्रंथियों within their उदर.
मकड़ी webs vary widely in size, shape and the राशि of स्टिकी लड़ी used.
it अभी appears that the सर्पिल orb web may be one of the earliest forms, और spiders कि produce tangled cobwebs हैं more abundant और diverse than orb-web मकड़ियों.
spider-like arachnids साथ silk-producing spigots appeared in the Devonian period परिचय, लकिन these पशु apparently lacked spinnerets.
True मकड़ियों have been मिला in Carboniferous rocks from, और हैं very similar to the सबसे primitive surviving order, the Mesothelae.
The प्रमुख समूह of modern मकड़ियों, Mygalomorphae and Araneomorphae, first appeared in the Triassic period, पहले.
A herbivorous species, Bagheera kiplingi, was वर्णित in 2008, but all other ज्ञात species are परभक्षी, mostly preying on insects and on other spiders, हालांकि a few large species भी take birds and lizards.
मकड़ियों use a चौड़ी दायरा of strategies to कैप्चर prey : trapping it in sticky webs, lassoing it with स्टिकी bolas, mimicking the prey to avoid डिटेक्शन, or running it bas.
Most detect शिकार मुख्यतः by sensing vibrations, लकिन the active hunters have अधि vision, और hunters of the genus Portia दिखाएँ लक्षण of intelligence in उनके choice of tactics and ability to develop new ones.
Spiders ' guts are too narrow to take solids, and they liquidize उनके खाना by flooding it with digestive एंजाइमों और grinding it with the bases of उनके pedipalps, as they do not have true जबड़े.
Male spiders पहचानो themselves by a किस्में of complex प्रेमालाप rituals to avoid being खाया by the महिलाओं.
males of most species survive a few matings, सीमित मुख्यतः by their short life spans.
Females weave रेशा egg-cases, each of which may contain hundreds of अंडे.
Females of many species परवाह लिये उनके young, for उदाहरण by carrying them around or by sharing खाना साथ them.
A minority of प्रजाति are social, building सांप्रदायिक webs that may house anywhere from a few to 50,000 individuals.
Social behavior सीमाएँ इससे precarious toleration, as in the विधवा मकड़ियों, to co-operative शिकार और food-sharing.
Although most spiders सजीव लिये at सबसे two years, tarantulas and other mygalomorph spiders can live up to 25 सालो in captivity.
While the venom of a few प्रजाति is dangerous to इंसानो, वैज्ञानिकों हैं now researching the use of spider venom in आयुर्विज्ञान और as non-polluting pesticides.
Spider silk provides a combination of lightness, strength and elasticity कि is superior to कि of सिंथेटिक materials, and spider रेशा जीनों have been inserted into स्तनधारियों and पौधे to see if these can be used as रेशा कारखानों.
As a result of their wide दायरा of व्यवहार, spiders have become common प्रतीकों in art and mythology symbolizing विभिन्न combinations of patience, क्रूरता and creative powers.
Grey 's anatomy is an अमरीकी television medical drama that premiered on the American Broadcasting कम्पनी ( एबीसी ), as a mid-season बदलना on March 27, 2005.
The series has aired nine seasons, और focuses on the fictional lives of surgical interns and residents as they gradually evolve into seasoned डॉक्टर, while trying to maintain personal जीवनदान.
the show 's आधार originated with शोंडा rhimes, who serves as an executive producer, along साथ Betsy Beers, चिह्नित गॉर्डन, क्रिस्टा vernoff, रोब मकई, चिह्नित wilding, और Allan Heinberg.
the series was निर्मित to be racially diverse, utilizing a color-blind casting technique.
it is primarily filmed in लॉस एंजिल्स, California.
the series ' protagonist is dr. मेरेडिथ धूसर ( एलेन pompeo ), who originally is स्वीकृत into the residency program at the fictional Seattle Grace Hospital.
Meredith is assigned to कार्य अंतर्गत Dr. मिरांडा Bailey ( चन्द्रा Wilson ), साथ with dr. Cristina Yang ( Sandra Oh ), dr. George O'Malley ( T. R. Knight ), dr. izzie Stevens ( Katherine Heigl ), और dr. Alex Karev ( Justin Chambers ).
Following o'malley 's death and स्टीवंस ' departure, the हॉस्पिटल 's विलय with रहमत West brings in Dr. जैक्सन एवेरी ( Jesse Williams ) और dr. April kepner ( Sarah Drew ), in the sixth season.
the surgical wing is primarily पर्यवेक्षित by Dr. रिचर्ड Webber ( जेम्स Pickens, Jr. ), who is आखिरकार replaced by Dr. Derek गड़रिये ( Patrick डेम्पसे ), and बाद Dr. Owen Hunt ( केविन McKidd ).
Dr. preston बुर्के ( Isaiah Washington ) departs at the निष्कर्ष of the तीसरा season, and is replaced by Dr. एरिका hahn ( Brooke Smith ), जो leaves the दिखाएँ दौरान the fifth season, and later dr. टेडी altman ( किम Raver ), जो departs at the end of the eighth season.
Introduced in the दूसरी season is dr. Addison मोंटगोमरी ( Kate Walsh ), who leaves the दिखाएँ at the end of the तीसरा ऋतु, in अनुक्रम to लॉन्च उसके own spin-off medical नाटक Private Practice.
dr. callie Torres ( Sara Ramirez ) and dr. चिह्नित Sloan ( Eric डेन ) also enter the show in the दूसरी ऋतु, जबकि the latter मरता in the प्रीमियर of the ninth ऋतु.
Meredith 's half-sister, Dr. Lexie धूसर ( chyler leigh ), appears from season तीन और dies at the end of ऋतु आठ.
Dr. एरिज़ोना Robbins ( Jessica capshaw ) is given श्रेणी regular status at the शुरूआत of the छठे season.
Grey 's Anatomy is the highest-rated drama in the key 18–49 demographic.
Previously among the overall top-ten rated shows in the United States, Grey 's anatomy रै महरूम well प्राप्त by critics.
माना an impact on संस्कृति, the series has received numerous awards, और has also been included in various critics ' शीर्ष टेन सूचियाँ.
the show रै produced several specials, as खूब as distributed all seasons to DVD, and released a संग्रहण of merchandise.
In 2012, धूसर 's Anatomy was named the fifth-highest revenue earning show, in terms of advertising प्रति half-hour.
on may 11, 2012, the श्रेणी was नवीनीकृत लिये a ninth season, जिससे premiered on September 27, 2012.
Schizophrenia ( or ) is a दिमागी disorder characterized by a breakdown of विचार प्रक्रियाओं and by a deficit of typical emotional responses.
आम symptoms शामिल auditory hallucinations, paranoid or bizarre delusions, or disorganized वाक और thinking, और it is accompanied by significant सोशल or occupational dysfunction.
The onset of symptoms typically occurs in यंग adulthood, with a global lifetime व्यापकता of परिचय 0.3–0.7 %.
निदान is based on observed behavior और the patient 's reported experiences.
आनुवंशिकी, early पर्यावरण, neurobiology, and मनोवैज्ञानिक और social processes appear to be महत्वपूर्ण contributory कारकों ; some recreational और prescription drugs appear to cause or worsen symptoms.
Current शोध is focused on the भूमिका of neurobiology, although no single isolated organic कारण रै महरूम मिला.
The अनेक संभावित combinations of symptoms have triggered debate परिचय whether the diagnosis represents a single disorder or a number of अलहदा syndromes.
Despite the etymology of the पद from the Greek roots skhizein ( σχίζειν, `` to विभाजित '' ) और phrēn, phren- ( φρήν, φρεν- ; `` दिमाग '' ), schizophrenia does not imply a `` विभाजित व्यक्तित्व '', or `` multiple personality विकार '' ( which is known these days as dissociative identity विकार ) —a condition साथ which it is often confused in public perception.
बल्कि, the term अर्थात् a `` splitting of दिमागी functions '', क्युकी of the symptomatic presentation of the illness.
The mainstay of treatment is antipsychotic दवा, which primarily suppresses dopamine ( और sometimes serotonin ) receptor activity.
मनोचिकित्सा और वोकेशनल और social rehabilitation हैं also important in उपचार.
in more serious cases—where there is risk to स्वः and others— involuntary hospitalization may be necessary, although hospital stays are now shorter and less frequent than they once were.
The disorder is विचार mainly to affect cognition, लकिन it भी usually contributes to दीर्घकालिक समस्याएं साथ behavior and emotion.
लोगों with schizophrenia are likely to have additional ( comorbid ) conditions, including प्रमुख अवसाद और चिंता disorders ; the आजीवन occurrence of पदार्थ उपयोग विकार is almost 50 %.
Social समस्याएं, such as long-term unemployment, poverty, और homelessness are common.
the average life expectancy of people साथ the disorder is 12 to 15 years कम than those without, the result of increased physical स्वास्थ्य problems and a higher आत्महत्या rate ( about 5 % ).

the एपिक of Gilgamesh, an epic poem from मेसोपोटामिया, is amongst the earliest surviving works of literature.
the literary history of Gilgamesh begins साथ five independent Sumerian कविताएं about 'bilgamesh ' ( Sumerian लिये Gilgamesh ), king of uruk.
चार of these were प्रयुक्त as source सामग्री for a combined एपिक in Akkadian.
इस first संयुक्त epic, known as the `` Old Babylonian '' version, dates to the 18th सदी BC और is titled बाद its incipit, Shūtur eli sharrī ( `` Surpassing सब Other किंग्स '' ).
तभी a few fragments of it have बच.
The बाद `` Standard Babylonian '' version dates इससे the 13th to the 10th centuries BC और bears the incipit Sha naqba īmuru ( `` He who देखी the Deep '' ).
fragments of approximately दो thirds of this longer, twelve-tablet version have been recovered.
Some of the बेहतरीन नक़ल यहूद खोजा in the library ruins of the 7th-century bc Assyrian किंग Ashurbanipal.
The स्टोरी centers on a friendship between Gilgamesh and Enkidu.
Enkidu is a जंगली man निर्मित by the gods as gilgamesh 's equal to distract him from oppressing the people of Uruk.
साथ, they journey to the Cedar Mountain to शिकस्त Humbaba, इसके monstrous संरक्षक.
Later they मार the सांड of Heaven, जिससे the goddess Ishtar भेजना to सजा gilgamesh for spurning her advances.
As a दंड लिये ये क्रियाएँ, the gods वाक्य Enkidu to death.
the second half of the epic focuses on Gilgamesh 's distress at Enkidu 's death, and his quest for अमरत्व.
In order to सीख the secret of eternal जीवन, Gilgamesh undertakes a long and perilous journey.
He learns कि `` The जीवन that you हैं seeking you will never ढूँढें.
जब the gods created man they आवंटित to him death, but life they retained in their own keeping. ''
This quote थी originally attributed to Siduri in the Old babylonian version of the एपिक, and then attributed to the immortal flood hero utnapishtim in the Akkadian version of the epic.
Nevertheless, gilgamesh 's कीर्ति lived on बाद his death, because of उसके great building प्रोजेक्ट, and his account of what utnapishtim told him happened during the flood.
the स्टोरी has been translated into अनेक different languages, and Gilgamesh has since become adapted in works of popular fiction.
A eukaryote ( or ) is an सजीव whose cells contain जटिल structures enclosed भीतर झिल्लियों.
eukaryotes may अधिक formally be referred to as the taxon eukarya or Eukaryota.
The धमक membrane-bound structure कि sets eukaryotic कोशिकाएं apart from prokaryotic cells is the nucleus, or nuclear envelope, within जिससे the जेनेटिक सामग्री is carried.
The उपस्थिति of a nucleus gives eukaryotes उनके name, which comes इससे the Greek ( eu, `` शुभ '' ) and ( karyon, `` nut '' or `` कर्नेल '' ).
सबसे eukaryotic कोशिकाएं also contain other membrane-bound organelles ऐसे as mitochondria, chloroplasts और the golgi apparatus.
All विशाल complex organisms are eukaryotes, including animals, plants and fungi.
the group भी शामिल अनेक एककोशिकीय जीवों.
कोशिका division in eukaryotes is different from that in organisms बगैर a केंद्रक ( Prokaryote ).
It involves separating the duplicated chromosomes, through आंदोलनों directed by microtubules.
There हैं two types of division processes.
in समसूत्रण, one cell divides to उपज two genetically identical cells.
In meiosis, जिससे is required in यौन जनन, one द्विगुणित cell ( having two instances of प्रत्येक chromosome, one इससे प्रत्येक जनक ) undergoes recombination of each जोड़ी of parental गुणसूत्रों, और then दो चरण of कोशिका प्रभाग, resulting in four haploid कोशिकाएं ( gametes ).
Each gamete रै बस एक complement of chromosomes, each a अद्वितीय mix of the corresponding जोड़ी of parental गुणसूत्रों.
eukaryota appears to be monophyletic, and so makes up one of the तीन डोमेन of जीवन.
The दो other डोमेन, Bacteria and Archaea, are prokaryotes और have none of the ऊपर features.
eukaryotes represent a tiny minority of all living बाते ; भी in a human body there हैं 10 टाइम्स more microbes than human कोशिकाएं.
however, due to उनके much larger size उनके सामूहिक worldwide बायोमास is अनुमानित at about बराबर to कि of prokaryotes.
They are माना to have first विकसित लगभग 1.6–2.1 billion years पहले.
The use of अंतरजाल services or तन्त्र with Internet access to defraud पीड़ितों or to otherwise लो advantage of them, लिये उदाहरण by stealing personal information, which can even सीसे to identity चोरी.
a very common form of Internet fraud is the distribution of rogue security software.
Internet सेवाएं can be used to उपस्थित fraudulent solicitations to prospective victims, to conduct बेईमान transactions, or to संचारण the proceeds of धोखाधड़ी to financial संस्थानों or to others connected with the scheme.
Internet fraud can occur in chat rooms, ईमेल, message boards, or on वेबसाइटों.
The International Security Assistance Force ( isaf ) is a NATO -led सुरक्षा mission in अफगानिस्तान that was established by the United Nations सुरक्षा परिषद in December 2001 by Resolution 1386, as envisaged by the बॉन अनुबंध.
Its प्रमुख purpose is to ट्रैन the Afghan नेशनल सुरक्षा Forces ( ANSF ) and assist Afghanistan in rebuilding कुंजी government संस्थानों but is भी engaged in the 2001-present war with insurgent groups.
isaf थी initially चार्ज with securing Kabul और surrounding क्षेत्रों इससे the तालिबान, al Qaeda और factional warlords, so as to allow for the establishment of the अफगान transitional प्रशासन headed by हामिद Karzai.
in अक्तूबर 2003, the UN सुरक्षा Council authorized the expansion of the ISAF mission throughout Afghanistan, और ISAF subsequently विस्तारित the मिशन in चार main चरण over the whole of the country.
From 2006 to 2011, ISAF था been involved in increasingly more intensive combat operations in southern और eastern Afghanistan.
Troop योगदानकर्ता शामिल from the United राज्य, United किंगडम, नाटो सदस्य राज्य and a number of other countries.
the तीव्रता of the combat faced by contributing nations varies greatly, साथ the United राज्य, संयुक्त किंगडम, और कनाडा sustaining the majority of casualties in intensive combat operations, with other contributors sustaining significantly कम.
as of early 2010, वहीँ यहूद at least 700 military bases inside Afghanistan लकिन अधिक were expected to be निर्मित in the coming सालो.
About 400 of ये were प्रयुक्त by American‐led NATO forces और 300 by ansf.
Cocaine ( benzoylmethylecgonine ) ( INN ) is a crystalline tropane एल्कलॉएड that is प्राप्त इससे the leaves of the coca plant.
The name आता इससे `` coca '' and the alkaloid प्रत्यय -ine, forming cocaine.
It is a stimulant, an appetite suppressant, and a topical anesthetic.
Biologically, कोका acts as a serotonin–norepinephrine–dopamine reuptake inhibitor, भी ज्ञात as a ट्रिपल reuptake inhibitor ( ट्राई ).
It is addictive because of its effect on the mesolimbic बदला pathway.
Unlike most molecules, कोका has pockets साथ दोनो high hydrophilic and lipophilic दक्षता, violating the नियम of hydrophilic-lipophilic संतुलन.
इस causes it to cross the blood–brain barrier दूर बेहतर than अन्य psychoactive रसायन and may even induce blood-brain barrier breakdown.
It is illegal to possess, produce, or वितरित cocaine for non-medicinal और non-government-sanctioned उद्देश्य in लगभग प्रत्येक country.
