The tri-tip is a काटें of बीफ from the नीचे sirloin primal काटें.
It is a छोटी triangular muscle, usually 1.5 to 2.5 पाउंड. ( 675 to 1,150g ) प्रति पक्ष of beef.
the वैज्ञानिक name of this मांसपेशी is tensor fasciae latae, inserted in the fascia lata, the connective tissue covering the quadriceps femoris, also called quadriceps extensor, a group of four मांसपेशियां which in turn insert in the patella, or घुटना कैप of the एनिमल.
Willmar is a city in, and the county सीट of, kandiyohi काउंटी, Minnesota, United States.
The population थी 19,610 at the 2010 census.
Willmar रै been आबंटित zip code 56201 by the संयुक्त States Postal Service.
U.S. Routes 12 and 71 and Minnesota राज्य राजमार्गों 23 और 40 are four of the प्रमुख routes in the city.
The स्पीकर of the United States House of प्रतिनिधि ( or स्पीकर of the House ) is the presiding officer of the कक्ष.
The दफ्तर was स्थापित in 1789 by Article i, खण्ड 2 of the United States संविधान, which states in भाग, `` the House of प्रतिनिधि shall chuse उनके Speaker... ''
The वर्तमान स्पीकर is John Boehner, a Republican जो represents ओहियो 's 8th congressional district.
The Constitution does not आवश्यकता कि the स्पीकर be a Member of कॉंग्रेस, but no non-member has कभी महरूम निर्वाचित to the दफ्तर.
The Speaker is second in the United States presidential line of उत्तराधिकार, after the वाइस President and ahead of the President pro tempore of the u.S. Senate.
Unlike कुछ Westminster प्रणाली parliaments, in जिससे the office of Speaker is considered non-partisan, in the United States the Speaker of the House is a leadership स्थिति और the office-holder actively works to set the बहुमत पार्टी 's विधान agenda.
the स्पीकर प्रायः does not personally preside over debates, बजाय delegating the ड्यूटी to members of the House इससे the majority party.
aside इससे कर्तव्य relating to heading the House और the बहुमत political party, the Speaker भी performs administrative and procedural functions, and represents his or her congressional district.
A bicycle फ़्रेम is the main component of a bicycle, on to which wheels and अन्य components are fitted.
The modern and most आम frame design for an upright सायकिल is based on the सुरक्षा bicycle, and consists of two triangles, a main triangle और a paired rear त्रिभुज.
इस is known as the डायमंड फ़्रेम.
Frames हैं जरूरी to be दमदार, stiff और light, जिससे they do by combining अलग materials and आकार.
`` सरल gravity लोलक '' मॉडल assumes no घर्षण or air प्रतिरोध.
an exemplar एनिमेशन of a pendulum प्रर्दशित the velocity and acceleration vectors
A लोलक is a weight suspended from a so that it can झूले freely.
When a pendulum is विस्थापित बगलों from its resting equilibrium स्थिति, it is विषय to a restoring फ़ोर्स due to gravity that होगा accelerate it back toward the equilibrium position.
When released, the restoring force combined with the pendulum 's द्रव्यमान causes it to oscillate about the संतुलन स्थिति, swinging back and forth.
The time लिये one complete cycle, a left swing and a सही swing, is called the काल.
A pendulum swings with a विशिष्ट period which depends ( mainly ) on इसके लंबाई.
From इसके डिस्कवरी around 1602 by Galileo गैलिली the नियमित motion of pendulums was प्रयुक्त for timekeeping, and was the world 's most accurate timekeeping प्रौद्योगिकी until the 1930s.
Pendulums हैं used to विनियमित लोलक clocks, and हैं used in scientific instruments such as accelerometers and seismometers.
Historically they यहूद प्रयुक्त as gravimeters to measure the acceleration of gravity in geophysical सर्वेक्षण, and even as a standard of length.
The word 'pendulum ' is new Latin, इससे the लैटिन pendulus, अर्थ 'hanging '.
the simple gravity pendulum is an idealized mathematical model of a pendulum.
This is a weight ( or bob ) on the end of a massless cord suspended इससे a, without friction.
जब given an आरंभिक धक्का, it will swing वापस और forth at a निरंतर amplitude.
रियल pendulums हैं विषय to friction और एयर drag, so the amplitude of their swings गिरावट.
The पहला बैटल of सांड चलाएं, also known as First Manassas ( the name used by Confederate forces ), was fought on July 21, 1861, in प्रिंस William County, Virginia, near the city of Manassas.
It थी the पहला major land battle of the American Civil युद्ध.
Just months after the प्रारंभ of the war at फोर्ट Sumter, the उत्तरी public clamored लिये a कूच विरूद्ध the Confederate पूंजी of Richmond, Virginia, which वे अपेक्षित to bring an early end to the rebellion.
yielding to political pressure, Brig. Gen. Irvin mcdowell led उसके unseasoned संघ फौज आरपार सांड चलाएं विरूद्ध the बराबर अनुभवहीन Confederate Army of Brig. gen. P. G. T. beauregard camped निकट manassas जंक्शन.
McDowell 's ambitious योजना for a आश्चर्य flank आक्रमण on the confederate left थी poorly चलाया by उसके officers and men ; nevertheless, the Confederates, जो had been नियोजन to attack the Union left flank, मिला themselves at an initial disadvantage.
confederate reinforcements under ब्रिगेडियर. Gen. जोसेफ E. johnston arrived from the Shenandoah Valley by railroad and the कोर्स of the battle quickly changed.
A ब्रिगेड of Virginians अंतर्गत a relatively unknown colonel इससे the Virginia सैन्य संस्थान, Thomas J. Jackson, stood their ground and जैक्सन received उसके famous nickname, `` Stonewall Jackson ''.
The Confederates then launched a दमदार counterattack, and as the Union troops began withdrawing under आग, many panicked and it turned into a rout as McDowell 's मेन frantically ran without order in the direction of Washington, D.C.
दोनो सेना यहूद sobered by the fierce fighting and अनेक हताहत, और एहसास the war was going to be much longer and bloodier than either had anticipated.
अंधड़ निकट garajau, Madeira
Weather is the state of the माहौल, to the उपाधि that it is hot or cold, गीला or dry, calm or stormy, clear or cloudy.
सबसे मौसम phenomena occur in the क्षोभमण्डल, बस below the stratosphere.
Weather generally refers to day-to-day temperature और precipitation कार्यकलाप, whereas climate is the पद for the average वायुमंडलीय शर्तें over longer अवधि of time.
जब used बगैर qualification, `` weather '' is understood to be the मौसम of धरती.
मौसम is चलित by एयर pressure ( temperature and नमी ) differences between one place और another.
These pressure और temperature differences can occur due to the sun angle at any particular spot, which varies by latitude from the tropics.
The strong temperature contrast between polar और tropical एयर देता rise to the जेट स्ट्रीम.
मौसम प्रणालियों in the mid-latitudes, ऐसे as extratropical cyclones, are caused by instabilities of the jet stream प्रवाह.
क्युकी the धरती 's अक्ष is tilted relative to its orbital प्लेन, sunlight is incident at different angles at different times of the year.
On Earth 's surface, temperatures usually range ±40 °C ( −40 °F to 100 °F ) annually.
over हज़ारों of years, changes in Earth 's orbit affect the राशि और वितरण of solar energy received by the धरती and influence long-term climate and वैश्विक जलवायु बदलें.
सतह temperature differences in फेरे cause pressure मतभेद.
Higher altitudes हैं cooler than निम्नतर altitudes due to मतभेद in compressional heating.
मौसम forecasting is the application of science और प्रौद्योगिकी to predict the state of the atmosphere for a future time and a दिए स्थान.
the atmosphere is a chaotic system, so small परिवर्तन to एक part of the system can grow to have large effects on the system as a whole.
Human कोशिशें to control the weather have occurred throughout human history, and वहीँ is evidence that human कार्यकलाप ऐसे as agriculture and उद्योग रै inadvertently modified weather patterns.
Studying कैसा the weather works on other ग्रह रै महरूम helpful in understanding कैसा weather works on Earth.
a famous landmark in the Solar System, बृहस्पति 's Great Red Spot, is an anticyclonic storm known to have existed लिये at तनिक 300 सालो.
However, weather is नहीं limited to planetary लाशें.
a star 's corona is constantly being lost to space, creating कया is essentially a very पतला atmosphere throughout the Solar System.

वो हस्ताक्षरित with Capitol रिकॉर्ड.
Perry has released three स्टुडियो एल्बम, including उसके डेब्यू ईसाई प्रयत्न Katy Hudson, One of the लड़कों, and Teenage Dream.
Perry 's mainstream career was kicked बंद with the massive चार्ट कामयाबी of उसके debut single `` i Kissed a लड़की ``.

The following is a list of sovereign states and territories where English is an आधिकारिक language or language of government.
In 2012, वहीँ यहूद 88 राज्य in total ( 60 sovereign राज्य और 28 non-sovereign राज्य ).
In many countries English is the dominant language, लकिन does not have official status.
in ऑस्ट्रेलिया, English is बोला by the विशाल majority of the जनसांख्यिकी और is the only language प्रयुक्त in government institutions, but ऑस्ट्रेलिया करता नहीं have an official भाषा.
the मामला is the same in the संयुक्त किंगडम and the United States, though अनेक states and regions within the U.S. do have अंग्रेज़ी as an आधिकारिक language.
अंग्रेज़ी is the dominant भाषा of नई जीलैंड और an official language of कनाडा ( along with French ), India ( along with हिंदी and अनेक other languages ), Ireland ( along with Irish ), and the फिलीपीन ( along साथ tagalog ).
English is the एकमात्र आधिकारिक language of the राष्ट्रमंडल of Nations and the राष्ट्रमंडल Games.
English is one of the आधिकारिक languages of the United Nations, the European Union and the International Olympic Committee.
अनेक of ये countries हैं वर्तमान or former colonies or dependencies of the United Kingdom ( देखिए also British साम्राज्य ), or of the United States, itself a पूर्व colony of the uk.
Notable exceptions include रवांडा, जिससे थी a former Belgian उपनिवेश and इरित्रिया, जिससे was an Italian उपनिवेश जहाँ the British Empire spanned इसके control तभी in World War II and shortly after ( 1941-1952 ).
India 's linguistic picture is जटिल.
according to the संविधान of इण्डिया, `` हिंदी in the Devanagari स्क्रिप्ट '' is the official language of the union ; and अंग्रेज़ी the 'subsidiary official language ' ; however, English is mandated for the authoritative texts of all federal laws and Supreme अदालत decisions and ( along साथ Hindi ) is एक of the दो भाषाएं of the भारतीय पार्लियामेंट.
English is used लगभग exclusively लिये उच्चतर education, कारोबार और science.
Courses in majority of the schools are taught exclusively in English.
अंग्रेज़ी is extensively प्रयुक्त लिये administrative उद्देश्य in इण्डिया.
India is the second-largest English-speaking country in the world by number of speakers, बाद the United राज्य.
as such, अनेक consider English to be the de facto आधिकारिक भाषा of India.
See आधिकारिक languages of India.
The linguistic मेकअप of Pakistan is similarly complex.
While the नेशनल भाषा is उर्दू, English is an official language and used in कारोबार, government and विधि.
अंग्रेज़ी is a compulsory language in स्कूलों.
All school courses are taught in English.
Pakistan is the 9th largest English-speaking देश in the संसार by जनसांख्यिकी.
Southern Cone (, ) is a geographic प्रदेश composed of the southernmost areas of दक्षिण America, south of the Tropic of Capricorn.
हालांकि geographically this includes Southern और part of southeast ( São Paulo ) of ब्राज़ील, in terms of राजनैतिक भूगोल the Southern कोन has traditionally comprised Argentina, Chile, पैराग्वे, और उरुग्वे.
In the narrowest sense, it तभी covers अर्जेंटीना, चिली and Uruguay, bounded on the उत्तर by the राज्य of ब्राज़ील, पैराग्वे, Bolivia and पेरू, on the वेस्ट by the Pacific Ocean, and south to the junction between the Pacific and Atlantic महासागर, which it is the closest continental क्षेत्रफल of अंटार्कटिक ( 1000 km ).
ऊँची जीवन expectancy, the highest Human विकास अनुक्रमणिका of लैटिन America, high Standard of जीना, significant participation in the global markets and the उभरते economy of इसके members make the Southern कोन the most prosperous macro-region in South America.
लिये multi-event athletic competitions देखिए track and Field प्रतियोगिताओं, खण्ड `` बैठक ''.
बैठक are sometimes held around सम्मेलन tables.
In a बैठक, दो or more people come together to discuss one or more विषय, often in a औपचारिक setting.
An आधिकारिक game in बेसबॉल, also sometimes पुकारा a regulation खेल, is a game कि रै progressed beyond the point at which it can be considered complete if जरुरी.
This is approximately the halfway पाइंट of the खेल.
In the मामला of inclement मौसम, कोई खेल जिससे has पहुँचे this point may be stopped and shortened as needed, with the result होने फाइनल, and all records और statistics counted.
A खेल which has नहीं reached this point पहले being रोका is either माना a निलंबित game ( to be जारी at a later तिथि इससे the पाइंट of stoppage ), or is बस रद्द and replayed from the प्रारंभ.
( इस depends on the rules of each individual league. )
In either case, no आंकडे are counted until the game becomes आधिकारिक.
चूंकि most पेशेवर बेसबॉल games are nine पारी long, the पांचवां inning is प्रयुक्त as the threshold for an official खेल.
If the visiting team is leading, or the game is tied, the end of the fifth inning marks this point.
If the home team ( which bats last ) is already ahead in the score, and theoretically would नहीं need इसके half of the पांचवां inning, then 41⁄2 innings ( i.e., the मध्य of the fifth ) is considered an official खेल.
the खेल is also considered आधिकारिक if the home team स्कोर to लो the lead in the नीचे of the पांचवां inning, since the खेल would end immediately if the same thing happened in the ninth.
In nearly all मामले, the `` आधिकारिक खेल '' status is used to determine whether a बरसात जाँच will be honored लिये fans holding tickets.
If a game is started but करता not पहुँचें the point of becoming official, प्रशंसक हैं entitled to a new टिकट लिये the make-up game or ( in most cases ) कोई other उपलब्धियाँ game of their चुनाव.
If a game is halted बाद it becomes आधिकारिक, the खेल is बस shortened और no rain जाँच is given.
The `` official खेल '' statistic received some attention during the 1995 season, when Cal ripken, Jr. थी approaching the record for consecutive games played, previously आयोजित by Lou Gehrig.
Large numbers were hung on the side of the B & o Warehouse at Oriole Park at camden Yards to दिखाएँ the number of games in Ripken 's streak.
Each day, a new number थी unfurled दौरान the पांचवां inning बाद प्रत्येक game had become official ( चूंकि the statistic होता not have counted if the खेल था been रोका before that point ).
A similar practice रै महरूम used to गिनती down toward the demolition of अनेक स्टेडियम ( including दिग्गजों स्टेडियम in Philadelphia in 2003, Busch Memorial स्टेडियम in St. Louis in 2005, and the असली Yankee स्टेडियम और Shea Stadium in नई York नगर in 2008 ) ; as प्रत्येक game became official, the टोली होता unveil a new ( lower ) number प्रर्दशित the क्रमांक of games left to be निभाई in the स्टेडियम.
A telephone number or phone number is a अनुक्रम of digits used to call इससे एक telephone लकीर to another in a public switched telephone network.
When telephone numbers यहूद invented, they were छोटी — as few as एक, दो or three अंक — and यहूद given orally to a switchboard ऑपरेटर.
As फोन प्रणालियों have grown and interconnected to encompass the संसार, टेलीफोन संख्याएँ have become longer.
in जोड to telephones, they अभी अभिगम other devices, such as computers and फैक्स machines.
The क्रमांक contains the information necessary to पहचानो uniquely the intended endpoint लिये the telephone कॉल.
प्रत्येक such endpoint जरूर have a अद्वितीय number within the पब्लिक switched telephone network.
Most countries use fixed लंबाई numbers ( for normal lines at तनिक ) और therefore the क्रमांक of endpoints determines the जरुरी लंबाई of the telephone number.
It is also संभावित for each सदस्य to have a set of shorter numbers for the endpoints most प्रायः used.
ये `` आशुलिपि '' or `` गति कॉलिंग '' numbers are automatically अनूदित to अद्वितीय telephone numbers before the call can be कनेक्ट.
कुछ special services have उनके own short numbers ( e.g., 1-1-9, 9-1-1, 0-0-0, 9-9-9, 1-1-1, and 1-1-2 होने the आपात Services numbers for China, जापानी, South कोरियाई, Taiwan और श्री Lanka ; कनाडा and the संयुक्त राज्य ; Australia ; the United Kingdom, Ireland, दक्षिण Africa, Poland, Saudi अरब, the United Arab अमीरात, मोरक्को, Macao, बहरीन, क़तर, बांग्लादेश, Botswana, Ghana, कीनिया, Hong Kong, Malaysia, Mauritius, Singapore, Zimbabwe, Trinidad, Tobago ; New जीलैंड ; कुवैत और the European Union, respectively. )
अनेक systems also allow काल्स within a local area to be बना बगैर dialing the लोकल area कोड.
लिये उदाहरण, a phone number in उत्तर America will प्रारंभ with three संख्याएँ ( such as 661 ), which is the क्षेत्रफल code, followed by seven digits split into भाग of तीन and चार ( ऐसे as 550-1212 ), which is the local number.
कुछ areas now have अनिवार्य ten-digit dialing in place, भी for local calls.
सबसे telephone संजाल today ( exceptions being निजी intercom और सुरक्षित phone networks ) हैं interconnected in the अंतरराष्ट्रीय टेलीफोन network, where the format of telephone numbers is standardized by itu-t in the recommendation e.164.
इस specifies that the entire number चाहिए be 15 अंक or shorter, and begin साथ a country prefix.
For most countries, this is followed by an area कोड or नगर कोड and the subscriber number, जिससे might consist of the code for a particular telephone exchange.
ITU-T recommendation e.123 describes how to represent an international टेलीफोन number in writing or print, starting साथ a plus sign ( `` + '' ) और the country code.
जब calling an international क्रमांक from a fixed लकीर फोन, the + must be replaced साथ the international call उपसर्ग chosen by the country the कॉल is होने made from.
Some mobile phones allow the + to be डाला सीधे.
The format and आवंटन of local phone संख्याएँ are नियंत्रित by each स्वदेश 's respective government, either directly or by प्रायोजित organizations ( such as nanpa overseen by neustar inc. ).
पहले a टेलीफोन कॉल is connected, the टेलीफोन क्रमांक जरूर be dialed by the calling पार्टी or Caller.
the पुकारा party might have equipment that presents caller ID before the call is answered.
a संग्रहण एजेंसी is a कारोबार that pursues payments of debts owed by individuals or व्यवसायों.
Most collection agencies operate as एजेंटों of creditors and collect debts for a fee or percentage of the कुल राशि owed.
वहीँ are many types of संग्रहण agencies.
First-party agencies हैं oftentimes subsidiaries of the original कम्पनी the debt is owed to.
Third-party agencies हैं पृथक companies contracted by a company to collect debts on उनके behalf लिये a शुल्क.
Debt खरीदार purchase the कर्ज़ at a percentage of इसके value, then attempt to collect it.
Each देश रै इसके own rules and regulations regarding them.
कैनबिस पुष्प with दृश्य trichomes
Cannabis, also known as marijuana ( from the मैक्सिकन Spanish marihuana ), और by other names, is a तैयारी of the Cannabis plant intended for use as a psychoactive drug and as आयुर्विज्ञान.
Pharmacologically, the प्रिंसिपल psychoactive constituent of कैनबिस is tetrahydrocannabinol ( thc ) ; it is one of 483 known compounds in the plant, including at तनिक 84 other cannabinoids, ऐसे as cannabidiol ( CBD ), cannabinol ( CBN ), tetrahydrocannabivarin ( thcv ).
and cannabigerol ( CBG ).
इस is a list of अमरीकी football quarterbacks who have प्रारंभ लिये the Washington redskins, as well as इसके predecessors the बोस्टन Braves ( 1932 ) और Boston Redskins ( 1933 – 1936 ), in the National Football लीग ( NFL ).
The वॉशिंगटन redskins मताधिकार थी originally founded in Boston, Massachusetts as the Boston Braves, नामित after the लोकल बेसबॉल franchise.
the name was changed the following साल to the redskins.
In 1937, the franchise स्थानांतरित to वॉशिंगटन, d.c.
Of the 49 Redskins starting quarterbacks, two have been inducted into the प्रो Football Hall of कीर्ति : Sammy Baugh और सन्नी Jurgensen.

1st खास शक्तियां Operational Detachment-Delta ( 1st SFOD-D ), popularly known as डेल्टा Force, is one of the United States ' चार गुपचुप tier-one counter-terrorism and Special मिशन इकाई.
It was formerly सूचीबद्ध as the Combat अनुप्रयोग Group by the विभाग of रक्षा लकिन has since been officially re-designated the फौज Compartmented Elements ( ACE ).
While 1st SFOD-D is administratively समर्थित by usasoc, it जलप्रपात अंतर्गत the operational कंट्रोल of the संयुक्त Special परिचालन कमांड.
Delta Force और its Navy counterpart, the Naval Special warfare विकास समूह, हैं the United राज्य military 's primary counter-terrorism इकाई.
डेल्टा Force 's primary कार्य are counter-terrorism, सीधा कार्रवाई, and नेशनल हस्तक्षेप परिचालन, although it is an extremely बहुमुखी group capable of conducting many प्रकार of covert missions, including, लकिन not limited to, hostage rescues और raids.
the सेंट्रल Intelligence Agency 's highly गुपचुप खास Activities Division ( उदास ) and more specifically its elite Special परिचालन Group ( SOG ) often works साथ – and recruits – operators from डेल्टा Force.
Alpha क्षय is one example type of radioactive decay, in which an परमाणु केंद्रक emits an अल्फा particle, and thereby परिणत ( or 'क्षयs ' ) into an अणु साथ a mass number 4 less and atomic number 2 कम.
अनेक other types of decays हैं possible.
रेडियोसक्रिय decay, also known as nuclear क्षय or radioactivity, is the process by जिससे a nucleus of an अस्थिर अणु loses energy by emitting अणु of आयनकारी विकिरण.
a material that अनायास emits this दयालु of radiation — which includes the emission of ऊर्जावान alpha अणु, beta अणु, और गामा किरणें — is माना रेडियोसक्रिय.
वहीँ हैं many different प्रकार of रेडियोसक्रिय decay ( see table नीचे ).
a decay, or loss of energy, परिणाम when an अणु with एक प्रकार of केंद्रक, called the जनक radionuclide, transforms to an atom with a nucleus in a अलग state, or to a different केंद्रक containing different numbers of protons and neutrons.
either of ये products is named the बेटी nuclide.
in some decays the parent और daughter हैं different रासायनिक elements, and thus the decay प्रक्रम परिणाम in नाभिकीय transmutation ( creation of an atom of a नई तत्व ).
the पहला क्षय processes to be discovered यहूद alpha क्षय, बीटा decay, and gamma decay.
Alpha decay occurs जब the nucleus ejects an अल्फा कण ( helium केंद्रक ).
This is the most common process of emitting nucleons, but in rarer types of decays, nuclei can eject protons, or specific nuclei of other तत्व ( in the प्रक्रम पुकारा cluster क्षय ).
बीटा क्षय occurs when the nucleus emits an electron or positron और a प्रकार of neutrino, in a process that परिवर्तन a प्रोटॉन to a न्यूट्रॉन or the other way around.
The nucleus may capture an orbiting electron, converting a proton into a neutron ( electron capture ).
सब of these प्रक्रियाओं result in नाभिकीय transmutation.
By contrast, there exist रेडियोसक्रिय decay processes that do not result in transmutation.
The energy of an उत्साहित केंद्रक may be emitted as a gamma रे in gamma decay, or used to eject an orbital electron by interaction साथ the excited nucleus in a process called internal परिवर्तन.
radioisotopes occasionally emit neutrons, and इस परिणाम in a change in an element इससे one isotope to another.
One type of radioactive क्षय परिणाम in products जिससे are not पारिभाषित, but appear in a range of `` टुकड़े '' of the असली केंद्रक.
This decay is called spontaneous परिवर्द्धन.
This decay happens when a large अस्थिर nucleus अनायास splits into two ( और occasionally three ) smaller daughter nuclei, और usually emits गामा किरणें, neutrons, or other अणु as a consequence.
Radioactive decay is a stochastic ( i.e., random ) प्रक्रम at the स्तर of single atoms, in कि, according to quantum theory, it is impossible to predict when a particular atom होगा decay.
However, the chance that a दिए atom होगा decay is निरंतर over time.
For a large क्रमांक of atoms, the क्षय रेट for the collection is computable from the measured decay constants of the nuclides ( or equivalently इससे the half-lifes ).
वैक्सिंग is a रूप of semi-permanent hair removal जिससे removes the बाल from the रूट.
नई बाल will not grow back in the previously waxed area लिये two to eight सप्ताह, हालांकि कुछ लोगों will प्रारंभ to see regrowth in only a सप्ताह.
Almost कोई area of the body can be waxed, सहित eyebrows, फेस, बिकिनी area, legs, बाहें, back, abdomen और feet.
There are many प्रकार of waxing उपयुक्त लिये removing अनावश्यक hair.
Strip waxing is संपन्नता by spreading a मोम thinly over the skin.
A cloth or पेपर strip is then दबाया on the top और ripped बंद the direction of hair growth.
This removes the मोम along साथ the hair.
Strip wax can also be made at home using नीबू रस, water, sugar and मधु.
Hot वैक्सिंग utilizes hot मोम ( as opposed to स्ट्रिप मोम ).
in this मामला, the मोम is लागू somewhat thickly and साथ no cloth or paper strips.
The मोम then hardens जब it cools, thus allowing the easy हटाना by a therapist without the aid of cloths.
This वैक्सिंग विधि is very beneficial to लोगों who have sensitive स्किन.
वॉल painting ( 1st सदी AD ) from pompeii depicting a multigenerational भोज
प्राचीन Roman संस्कृति existed throughout the लगभग 1200-year history of the civilization of प्राचीन रोम.
The term refers to the culture of the Roman Republic, later the रोमन Empire, which, at इसके शिखर, covered an area from Lowland Scotland and मोरक्को to the euphrates.
Life in ancient Rome revolved around the city of Rome, its famed seven पहाड़ियाँ, और its स्मारकीय structures ऐसे as the Flavian Amphitheatre ( अभी called the कोलोसियम ), the Forum of Trajan, and the pantheon.
the city भी had several थिएटर, gymnasiums, and अनेक taverns, baths, and brothels.
throughout the territory under ancient Rome 's control, आवासीय architecture ranged from बहुत modest houses to देश विला, and in the पूंजी city of रोम, there were imperial निवास on the सुरुचिपूर्ण Palatine Hill, from which the शब्द राजमहल is derived.
the vast majority of the population lived in the नगर center, packed into insulae ( अपार्टमेंट blocks ).
the city of Rome थी the largest megalopolis of that समय, with a जनसांख्यिकी that may well have exceeded one million लोगों, with a high end estimate of 3.6 million and a कम end अनुमान of 450,000.
Historical estimates indicate that around 30 प्रतिशत of the जनसांख्यिकी under the city 's क्षेत्राधिकार lived in innumerable urban centers, साथ population of at least 10,000 and several सैन्य settlements, a बहुत ऊँची rate of urbanization by pre-industrial मानकों.
The most urbanized part of the Empire was इटली, which had an estimated rate of शहरी of 32 %, the same rate of शहरी of इंग्लैण्ड in 1800.
सबसे Roman towns and शहरों had a forum, temples and the same प्रकार of इमारतें, on a smaller स्केल, as मिला in Rome.
the large urban population जरूरी an अंतहीन supply of food which was a जटिल logistical कार्य, including acquiring, transporting, storing and distribution of food for Rome और अन्य शहरी centers.
इतालवी खेतो supplied vegetables and फल, but fish और मांस were luxuries.
Aqueducts यहूद built to bring जल to urban centers and wine and oil were आयातित from hispania, Gaul and अफ़्रीकी.
There was a very विशाल amount of commerce between the provinces of the रोमन Empire, चूंकि इसके transportation प्रौद्योगिकी थी बहुत efficient.
The average costs of transport and the technology यहूद comparable साथ 18th-century यूरोपीय.
the बाद नगर of रोम did नहीं भरण the space भीतर इसके ancient Aurelian दीवारें जबतक after 1870.
Eighty percent of the population under the jurisdiction of प्राचीन Rome जिया in the countryside in settlements साथ less than 10 thousand inhabitants.
Landlords generally resided in शहरों और their estates were left in the care of farm प्रबंधक.
the plight of rural slaves was generally worse than their counterparts working in urban aristocratic households.
to stimulate a higher labor productivity most landlords freed a large number of स्लेव and many received wages.
Some records indicate that `` as many as 42 लोगों lived in one small फार्म hut in Egypt, while six परिवारों owned a सिंगल olive tree. ''.
ऐसे a ग्रामीण पर्यावरण continued to induce migration of population to urban centers until the early 2nd century, when the urban population रोका growing और प्रारंभ to decline.
starting in the middle of the 2nd सदी BC, private Greek culture थी increasingly in ascendancy, in spite of tirades against the `` softening '' effects of hellenized संस्कृति इससे the रूढ़िवादी moralists.
by the time of augustus, cultured यूनानी household slaves सिखाया the Roman young ( sometimes even the girls ) ; शेफ़, decorators, secretaries, doctors, and hairdressers—all आए इससे the Greek East.
यूनानी sculptures सुशोभित Hellenistic landscape gardening on the palatine or in the विला, or were imitated in Roman sculpture yards by Greek slaves.
The रोमन भोजन preserved in the cookery books ascribed to apicius is essentially यूनानी.
Roman writers disdained लैटिन for a cultured Greek style.
Only in विधि and governance थी the तिरछा प्रकृति of रोम 's accretive culture supreme.
Against this human background, both the urban और rural सेटिंग, एक of history 's सबसे influential civilizations took shape, leaving behind a cultural legacy that survives in भाग today.
James जोसेफ `` डफी '' waldorf, jr. ( born August 20, 1962 ) is an American पेशेवर golfer.

Glass production involves two main विधि – the float glass process, which produces चादर glass, और glassblowing which produces बोतलों and अन्य containers.
a ऋतु is a subdivision of the साल, marked by changes in मौसम, पारिस्थितिकी, और hours of daylight.
Seasons result from the yearly revolution of the धरती around the Sun and the tilt of the धरती 's axis relative to the प्लेन of revolution.
In temperate and polar regions, the seasons हैं चिह्नित by changes in the intensity of धूप that पहुँच the Earth 's surface, variations of जिससे may कारण animals to go into शीतनिष्क्रियता or to migrate, and plants to be dormant.
दौरान may, जून and July, the northern hemisphere is exposed to more सीधा धूप because the hemisphere faces the sun.
the same is true of the southern गोलार्ध in November, December और January.
It is the झुकाव of the धरती that causes the सूर्य to be उच्चतर in the sky during the गर्मियाँ months जिससे increases the solar फ्लक्स.
however, due to मौसमी lag, जून, जुलाई और अगस्त are the hottest months in the उत्तरी hemisphere and December, January and February हैं the hottest महीने in the दक्षिणी hemisphere.
In temperate और subpolar regions, generally four calendar -आधारd seasons ( साथ उनके adjectives ) are पहचाना : spring ( vernal ), गर्मियाँ ( estival ), autumn ( autumnal ) and winter ( hibernal ).
However, ecologists mostly use a छह ऋतु model लिये temperate climate regions कि शामिल pre-spring ( prevernal ) and late summer ( serotinal ) as distinct seasons along साथ the traditional four.
Hot regions have two or three सीज़न ; the rainy ( or wet, or monsoon ) season और the शुष्क ऋतु, and in some tropical areas, a cool or mild ऋतु.
In some parts of the संसार, खास `` सीज़न '' are loosely defined आधारित on महत्वपूर्ण events such as a hurricane ऋतु, tornado season or a wildfire ऋतु.

The बैटल of Fort Sumter ( April 12–14, 1861 ) was the बमबारी and surrender of Fort sumter, निकट Charleston, दक्षिण कैरोलिना, that प्रारंभ the American Civil War.
Following declarations of secession by सात Southern राज्य, South कैरोलिना मांगे that the U.S. Army लापरवाही its सुविधाएं in चार्ल्सटन हार्बर.
on दिसम्बर 26, 1860, u.S. प्रमुख रॉबर्ट Anderson surreptitiously स्थानांतरित his small command from the indefensible फोर्ट moultrie on सुलीवान 's Island to Fort Sumter, a substantial किला controlling the entrance of Charleston Harbor.
An attempt by u.S. अध्यक्ष जेम्स बुकानन to reinforce and resupply Anderson, using the unarmed व्यापारी जलयान स्टार of the West, विफल जब it थी fired upon by shore बैटरी on जनवरी 9, 1861.
दक्षिण कैरोलिना अधिकारियों तब जब्त all Federal property in the चार्ल्सटन क्षेत्रफल, मगर for Fort Sumter.
During the early months of 1861, the situation around Fort sumter increasingly began to resemble a siege.
in कूच, ब्रिगेडियर. Gen. P. G. T. Beauregard, the first general अधिकारी of the newly formed confederate States of अमेरिका, was लगाई in कमांड of confederate forces in चार्ल्सटन.
beauregard energetically directed the strengthening of batteries around चार्ल्सटन harbor aimed at फोर्ट Sumter.
शर्तें in the फोर्ट grew dire as the Union soldiers rushed to complete the संस्थापना of additional guns.
एंडरसन थी short of men, food, and आपूर्तियाँ.
the resupply of Fort Sumter became the first crisis of the administration of President Abraham Lincoln.
he notified the Governor of दक्षिण Carolina, Francis W. Pickens, that he was sending supply जहाजों, which resulted in an ultimatum from the Confederate government : evacuate फोर्ट Sumter immediately.
Major Anderson refused to आत्मसमर्पण.
Beginning at 4:30 a.m. on April 12, the Confederates bombarded the fort from artillery बैटरी surrounding the हार्बर.
हालांकि the संघ garrison returned fire, they यहूद significantly outgunned and, after 34 घंटों, Major एंडरसन सहमत to evacuate.
There थी no loss of life on either side as a सीधा परिणाम of this engagement, हालांकि a gun explosion during the surrender ceremonies on April 14 caused two Union deaths.
following the battle, वहीँ was फैली support from both North और South लिये further सैन्य action.
Lincoln 's immediate call लिये 75,000 स्वयंसेवक to suppress the विद्रोह resulted in an additional four southern स्लेव states also declaring their secession and joining the confederacy.
the सिविल युद्ध था begun.
3g, short for तीसरा पीढी, is the तीसरा generation of मोबाईल telecommunications technology.
3g दूरसंचार networks support सेवाएं कि provide an information transfer रेट of at least 200 kbit/s.
However, अनेक सेवाएं advertised as 3G provide higher speed than the न्यूनतम technical requirements for a 3g service.
Recent 3G releases, often denoted 3.5G और 3.75g, भी provide मोबाईल broadband अभिगम of अनेक mbit/s to स्मार्टफ़ोन और मोबाईल modems in laptop computers.
3g finds application in बेतार voice telephony, मोबाईल Internet access, फिक्स्ड wireless Internet अभिगम, वीडियो calls और mobile TV.
`` Mazel Tov ! '' written on a वाइन glass tag
Traditionally, after the groom breaks the glass, the अतिथि चिल्लाओ `` Mazel tov ! ``.
A birthday केक, आइस्ड with the शब्द `` מזל טוב '' ( mazal tov ), as is प्रायः किया in Israel.
Here the phrase is written in यहूदी cursive.
`` Mazel tov '' or `` mazal tov '' ( Hebrew / यहूदी : `` מזל טוב '', Hebrew : `` mazal tov '' ; यहूदी : `` mazel tov '' ; lit.
`` शुभ luck '' ) is a phrase used to express बधाई for a प्रसन्न and significant अवसर or event.
Hepatitis c is an संक्रामक disease affecting primarily the liver, caused by the hepatitis C virus ( hcv ).
the संक्रमण is often asymptomatic, लकिन chronic infection can lead to scarring of the liver and ultimately to cirrhosis, which is generally apparent बाद अनेक years.
In कुछ cases, those with cirrhosis होगा go on to develop liver विफलता, liver कर्कट or life-threatening esophageal and gastric varices.
HCV is spread primarily by blood-to-blood सम्पर्क associated साथ intravenous drug use, poorly sterilized चिकित्सा उपकरण and transfusions.
An अनुमानित 130–200 million लोगों विश्वव्यापी are infected साथ.
The अस्तित्व of ( originally `` non- A non- b hepatitis '' ) was postulated in the 1970s and सिद्ध in 1989.
तभी infects humans and chimpanzees.
The virus persists in the liver in about 85 % of those संक्रमित.
इस persistent infection can be treated साथ medication : the standard चिकित्सा is a combination of peginterferon और ribavirin, साथ either boceprevir or telaprevir added in some मामले.
Overall, 50–80 % of people treated हैं cured.
those who develop cirrhosis or liver कर्कट may आवश्यकता a liver प्रत्यारोपण.
is the अग्रणी cause of liver transplantation, हालांकि the virus usually recurs after प्रत्यारोपण.

a flexible spending account ( FSA ), also known as a लचीली spending व्यवस्था, is एक of a क्रमांक of tax-advantaged वित्तीय खाते that can be set up through a cafeteria plan of an employer in the United States.
An FSA allows an employee to set aside a portion of earnings to pay लिये योग्य खर्च as स्थापित in the cafeteria plan, most commonly for medical expenses लकिन often for dependent care or अन्य खर्च.
धन deducted from an employee 's pay into an FSA is not subject to payroll taxes, resulting in substantial payroll tax बचत.
एक significant disadvantage to using an FSA is कि निधि not प्रयुक्त by the समाप्त of the plan year are lost to the employee, known as the `` use it or lose it '' rule.
The सबसे आम प्रकार of flexible spending खाता, the medical expense FSA ( also चिकित्सा FSA or health FSA ), is similar to a स्वास्थ्य बचत account ( hsa ) or a स्वास्थ्य reimbursement खाता ( HRA ).
However, जबकि HSAs and hras are almost exclusively प्रयुक्त as components of a consumer driven health परवाह plan, चिकित्सा fsas are commonly offered with more traditional स्वास्थ्य योजनाएँ as well.
in addition, funds in a health savings account हैं not lost जब the plan year is over, unlike निधि in an FSA.
Paper forms or an fsa debit card, भी ज्ञात as a flexcard, may be used to access the account funds.
Tennessee ( ) ( ) is a U.S. राज्य स्तिथ in the southeastern संयुक्त राज्य.
Tennessee is the 36th most extensive और the 17th most populous of the 50 संयुक्त States.
Tennessee is bordered by केंटकी and वर्जिनिया to the उत्तर, उत्तर Carolina to the ईस्ट, जॉर्जिया, Alabama, and मिसिसिपी to the दक्षिण, and अरकंसास and मिसौरी to the west.
The Appalachian kyu dominate the eastern भाग of the state, and the मिसिसिपी River forms the राज्य 's पश्चिमी border.
Tennessee 's पूंजी and second largest city is नैशविले, which रै a population of 609,644.
मेम्फिस is the state 's largest city, साथ a population of 652,050.
The state of Tennessee is rooted in the watauga Association, a 1772 frontier pact generally regarded as the पहला constitutional सरकारी west of the Appalachians.
What is now Tennessee थी initially भाग of North कैरोलिना, and later part of the दक्षिणपश्चिम territory.
टेनेसी was admitted to the Union as the 16th state on June 1, 1796.
Tennessee थी the पिछला राज्य to छोड़ the Union and join the Confederacy at the outbreak of the U.S. Civil युद्ध in 1861, और the पहला राज्य to be readmitted to the संघ at the समाप्त of the war.
Tennessee furnished more soldiers लिये the confederate Army than any other राज्य, and more soldiers for the संघ Army than any अन्य दक्षिणी state.
in the 20th सदी, टेनेसी transitioned इससे an कृषिक economy to a अधिक diversified economy, aided at times by federal entities such as the Tennessee घाटी Authority.
In the early 1940s, the city of ओक लकीरें was स्थापित to हाउस the Manhattan Project 's uranium enrichment facilities, helping to निर्माण the world 's पहला atomic बमबारी.
टेनेसी रै played a नाजुक role in the development of अनेक फ़ॉर्म of American लोकप्रिय music, including rock and फेंकें, blues, country, और rockabilly.
Beale गली in Memphis is considered by many to be the birthplace of the ब्लूज़, with musicians such as W.C. Handy performing in its क्लब as जल्दी as 1909.
Memphis थी also home to सूर्य रिकॉर्ड, where musicians such as एल्विस Presley, Isaac Hayes, Johnny नकदी, कार्ल perkins, जेरी Lee Lewis, रॉय Orbison, and चार्ली Rich began उनके रिकॉर्डिंग करियर, and where चट्टान and फेंकें took shape in the 1950s.
The 1927 विक्टर रिकॉर्डिंग सत्र in Bristol generally mark the शुरूआत of the country music genre and the वृद्धि of the ग्रैंड ओले opry in the 1930s helped मेक Nashville the center of the देश music recording उद्योग.
Three bricks and गारा museums recognize टेनेसी 's role in nurturing various फ़ॉर्म of popular म्यूज़िक : the मेम्फिस Rock n ' Soul Museum, the देश Music हॉल of Fame और Museum in नैशविले, और the International Rock-A-Billy Museum in Jackson.
In जोड, the Rockabilly हॉल of कीर्ति, an online site recognizing the development of rockabilly in which Tennessee played a निर्णायक भूमिका, is based in नैशविले.
टेनेसी 's major उद्योग शामिल कृषि, manufacturing, and tourism.
Poultry, soybeans, और cattle are the राज्य 's primary agricultural products, और प्रमुख manufacturing exports शामिल रसायन, परिवहन उपकरण, and विद्युत उपकरण.
The ग्रेट Smoky kyu नेशनल Park, the स्वदेश 's most visited national park, is headquartered in the eastern part of the state, and a section of the Appalachian Trail roughly फ़ॉलो the tennessee-north Carolina किनारा.
अन्य major पर्यटक आकर्षण include the टेनेसी Aquarium in चट्टानूगा, the sunsphere in knoxville, Dollywood in कबूतर Forge, the पार्थेनन, the Country म्यूज़िक Hall of Fame and Museum, and ryman Auditorium in Nashville, और एल्विस Presley 's Graceland residence and मकबरा in मेम्फिस.
One design variant of a मुर्गा रिंग.
A cock ring is a रिंग कि can be लगाई around a man 's penis, प्रायः at the आधार, primarily to slow the flow of blood इससे the वीर्यपात penile ऊतक, यूँ maintaining an स्तंभन लिये a much longer period of time.
मुर्गा rings can be worn around बस the शिश्न or both the शिश्न and scrotum, or just the scrotum अलोन, though this is usually पुकारा a testicle कफ.
Rings can be बना of a किस्में of अलग materials, most commonly चमड़े, rubber, or silicone, though नायलॉन and मेटल हैं भी used either as the main component or part of the closure.
The पद cock ring is sometimes used as a पर्याय for a Prince अल्बर्ट piercing, a piercing of the penis that is usually, though not always, a metal रिंग.
जब used in cases of erectile dysfunction वे are known by विभिन्न names such as `` erection रिंग '' और `` टेंशन ring ''.
the headquarters of Major लीग बेसबॉल at 245 Park एवेन्यू, Midtown मैनहटन, New यॉर्क नगर, यूएसए.
Major लीग बेसबॉल ( एमएलबी ) is a पेशेवर baseball league, consisting of teams that खेल in the National League and the American लीग.
Dating to 1876 और 1901 respectively, the दो leagues merged in 2000 into a single organization led by the Commissioner of Baseball, after 100 years as पृथक legal entities.
MLB constitutes एक of the प्रमुख पेशेवर sports लीग of the United States and कनाडा.
it is composed of 30 teams — 29 in the United States और एक in कनाडा.
Teams in MLB खेल 162 games each season over six महीने ( April through September ).
Five टीमों in each लीग advance to a four-round postseason टूर्नामेंट that culminates in the World श्रेणी, a best-of-seven-games championship series between the दो लीग champions which dates to 1903.
the संगठन oversees अनेक minor-league baseball leagues which operate about 240 teams संबद्ध with the major-league clubs.
With the International Baseball Federation, the league also manages the international World Baseball क्लासिक टूर्नामेंट.
एमएलबी has the उच्चतम ऋतु attendance of any sports league in the संसार with nearly 75 million spectators in 2012.
Delaware ( ) is a u.S. state स्तिथ on the अटलांटिक coast in the mid-atlantic region of the United राज्य.
it is bordered to the south and west by मेरीलैंड, to the northeast by नई Jersey, and to the north by पेन्सिलवेनिया.
the state takes इसके नाम इससे थामस West, 3rd सामन्त De La Warr, an अंग्रेज़ी nobleman और वर्जिनिया 's पहला colonial राज्यपाल, after whom कया is now पुकारा Cape Henlopen was originally named.
डेलावेयर is स्तिथ in the northeastern portion of the Delmarva प्रायद्वीप and is the दूसरी smallest, the छठे तनिक populous, but the sixth most densely populated of the पचास United States.
Delaware is divided into three counties.
From north to south, these three काउंटी हैं नई Castle, Kent, and Sussex.
While the दक्षिणी दो counties have historically महरूम predominantly agricultural, नई किला County has been more industrialized.
पहले its तटरेखा was explored by Europeans in the 16th सदी, Delaware थी inhabited by अनेक groups of देशी अमेरिकी, सहित the Lenape in the north और nanticoke in the south.
It was initially colonized by डच traders at zwaanendael, स्तिथ near the present कस्बा of Lewes, in 1631.
डेलावेयर was one of the 13 colonies participating in the American Revolution और on December 7, 1787, became the पहला राज्य to ratify the संविधान of the संयुक्त States, thereby बनने ज्ञात as the पहला राज्य.
Energy Transformation in उर्जा Systems Language
Energy transformation or उर्जा conversion is the प्रक्रम of changing one form of उर्जा to another.
in physics, the पद energy describes the capacity to उपज certain changes within a system, without regard to limitations in transformation imposed by एन्ट्रॉपी.
Changes in कुल उर्जा of systems can तभी be संपन्नता by adding or subtracting energy इससे them, as energy is a quantity which is conserved, according to the first law of thermodynamics.
according to special relativity, changes in the उर्जा of systems will भी coincide साथ changes in the प्रणाली 's द्रव्यमान, और the total amount of mass of a system is a measure of इसके energy.
Energy in a प्रणाली may be transformed so कि it resides in a different राज्य, or a different type of energy.
उर्जा in अनेक states may be प्रयुक्त to do many varieties of शारीरिक कार्य.
उर्जा may be used in natural प्रक्रियाओं or machines, or else to provide some सेवा to society ( such as ऊष्मा, लाइट, or motion ).
For example, an internal combustion engine converts the potential रासायनिक उर्जा in gasoline and ऑक्सीजन into heat, which is then transformed into the propulsive energy ( kinetic उर्जा that moves a गाडी ).
A सौर cell converts solar विकिरण into विद्युत energy that can then be used to लाइट a बल्ब or power a कंप्यूटर.
The generic नाम लिये a यंत्र जिससे converts energy इससे one रूप to another, is a transducer.
In general, सबसे types of energy, सहेजें लिये थर्मल उर्जा, may be परिवर्तित efficiently to कोई other दयालु of energy.
sometimes इस occurs with an efficiency of essentially 100 %, ऐसे as जब potential energy is परिवर्तित to गतिज energy as an object falls in vacuum, or जब it orbits nearer or farther from another ऑब्जेक्ट, in स्पेस.
परिवर्तन of अन्य types of energies to heat may भी occurs साथ nearly perfect दक्षता ( many types of friction do इस ).
अपवाद लिये perfect conversion efficiency ( भी for isolated systems ) occur when energy रै already been partly distributed among अनेक उपलब्धियाँ quantum states for a collection of अणु, जिससे are freely allowed to explore कोई राज्य of momentum and position ( phase space ).
In such circumstances, a measure called Entropy, or evening-out of energy वितरण in ऐसे राज्य, dictates कि future states of the system जरूर be of at least बराबर evenness in energy वितरण.
( There is no रास्ता, taking the universe as a पूरे, to collect energy into fewer राज्य, एकबार it has spread to उन्हें ).
a consequence of this requirement is that वहीँ हैं limitations to the दक्षता with which thermal energy can be परिवर्तित to अन्य kinds of उर्जा, चूंकि थर्मल energy in संतुलन at a दिए तापमान already represents the maximal evening-out of उर्जा between all possible states.
ऐसे energy is sometimes considered `` degraded उर्जा, '' because it is नहीं entirely usable.
the second law of ऊष्मागतिकी is a रास्ता of stating कि, for this reason, थर्मल energy in a system may be परिवर्तित to other kinds of energy साथ efficiencies approaching 100 %, तभी if the एन्ट्रॉपी ( even-ness or disorder ) of the universe is increased by other अर्थात्, to compensate for the घटी in एन्ट्रॉपी संबद्ध with the disappearance of the thermal energy and इसके entropy सामग्री.
वरना, तभी a भाग of thermal energy may be converted to other kinds of energy ( और यूँ, useful कार्य ), चूंकि the remainder of the ऊष्मा must be सुरक्षित to be transferred to a thermal टंकी at a निम्नतर temperature, in ऐसे a way that the increase in एन्ट्रॉपी लिये इस process more than compensates लिये the entropy decrease associated साथ परिवर्तन of the rest of the ऊष्मा into अन्य प्रकार of energy.
the National हॉकी League ( NHL ; ) is an `` unincorporated not-for-profit association '' जिससे operates a प्रमुख professional ice hockey league of 30 franchised member क्लब, of which seven are currently located in कनाडा and 23 in the संयुक्त राज्य.
headquartered in New York City, the NHL is widely considered to be the premier professional बर्फ हॉकी league in the world, and one of the major professional sports leagues in the संयुक्त States and Canada.
The Stanley Cup, the oldest पेशेवर खेल ट्रॉफी in North America, is awarded annually to the league playoff champion at the end of each ऋतु.
The league was organized on नवम्बर 26, 1917, in मॉन्ट्रियल, Quebec, कनाडा, बाद the बर्खास्तगी of operations of its predecessor organization, the नेशनल Hockey Association ( NHA ), जिससे था महरूम founded in 1909.
it प्रारंभ with four teams and, through a series of expansions, contractions, and relocations, the league is now composed of 30 active franchises.
The nation to which the name of the league originally referred was Canada, हालांकि the लीग रै अभी महरूम binational चूंकि 1924 when it expanded into the United States.
After a labour dispute that led to the cancellation of the entire 2004–05 season, the league resumed खेल under a new सामूहिक bargaining agreement कि included a salary cap.
In 2009, the एनएचएल enjoyed record highs in terms of sponsorships, attendance, और television audiences.
The NHL draws many highly skilled खिलाड़ी इससे सब over the world and फिलहाल रै players इससे about 20 different देशों.
हालांकि Canadians have historically constituted the majority of the players in the NHL, over the पास्ट four plus decades the percentages of US और यूरोपीय players have increased both because of the एनएचएल 's continued विस्तार from six to thirty क्लब since 1967, और the increased उपलब्धता of highly skilled European players.
This is the पूरा list of the ratified and unratified amendments to the United States संविधान which प्राप्त the approval of the संयुक्त States कॉंग्रेस.
twenty-seven amendments have been ratified चूंकि the असली signing of the Constitution, the पहला टेन of which are ज्ञात collectively as the Bill of Rights.
The procedure लिये amending the United States संविधान is governed by Article v of the असली टेक्स्ट.
वहीँ have महरूम many other प्रस्ताव for amendments to the United States संविधान introduced in Congress, but not सुपुर्द to the states.
पहले an amendment can take प्रभाव, it must be proposed to the states by a two-thirds vote of both घरों of Congress or by a सम्मेलन ( ज्ञात as an आलेख v सम्मेलन ) called by two-thirds of the states, और ratified by three-fourths of the राज्य or by three-fourths of प्रथाओं thereof, the method of ratification होने संकल्पित by कॉंग्रेस at the time of proposal.
to तिथि, no convention for proposing amendments has been पुकारा by the राज्य, और only once—in 1933 for the अनुसमर्थन of the twenty-first amendment —has the सम्मेलन method of अनुसमर्थन been employed.
fmr LLC ( Fidelity प्रबन्धन and Research ) or Fidelity Investments is an American बहुराष्ट्रीय financial सेवाएं corporation.
It is one of the largest परस्पर निधि and वित्तीय services groups in the संसार.
It was founded in 1946 and serves उत्तर अमरीकी investors.
वफ़ादारी Ventures is its venture पूंजी arm.
वफ़ादारी International Limited ( फील ), थी an international संबद्ध संस्थापित in 1969, serving सबसे countries in the rest of the world.
In सितंबर 2011, फील was rebranded as 'Fidelity विश्वव्यापी Investment '.
Fidelity Investments manages a विशाल family of mutual funds, provides निधि distribution और investment advice सेवाएं, as well as providing छूट brokerage services, रिटायरमेंट सेवाएं, wealth management, securities निष्पादन और clearance, life बीमे और a क्रमांक of अन्य सेवाएं.

समाजशास्त्र is the scientific study of इंसान society and इसके origins, development, organizations, and संस्थानों.
It is a social विज्ञान which uses various methods of अनुभवजन्य investigation और critical analysis to develop a देह of knowledge about human सोशल activity, structures, और कृत्यों.
A goal for many sociologists is to conduct शोध जिससे may be applied सीधे to social policy and welfare, while अन्य focus primarily on refining the theoretical understanding of social processes.
Subject matter ranges from the सूक्ष्म level of व्यक्तिगत एजेंसी और बातचीत to the macro स्तर of systems और the social ढांचा.
the परंपरागत focuses of समाजशास्त्र include सोशल stratification, social class, संस्कृति, race और नस्ल, gender और कामुकता, social गतिशीलता, धर्म, secularization, law, and deviance.
As सब spheres of इंसान activity हैं affected by the interplay between social ढांचा और व्यक्तिगत एजेंसी, sociology has धीरे विस्तारित इसके focus to further विषय, ऐसे as health, चिकित्सा, military और penal institutions, the Internet, environmental sociology, political अर्थव्यवस्था और the role of social कार्यकलाप in the विकास of scientific knowledge.
The range of social वैज्ञानिक methods has also expanded.
सोशल researchers draw upon a किस्में of qualitative and quantitative techniques.
the भाषाई and सांस्कृतिक turns of the mid-twentieth सदी led to increasingly interpretative, hermeneutic, और philosophic approaches to the analysis of समाज.
Conversely, recent decades have seen the वृद्धि of new analytically, mathematically and computationally rigorous तकनीकों, such as agent-based modelling and सोशल network विश्लेषण.
समाजशास्त्र चाहिए not be confused with various general सोशल studies पाठ्यक्रम which bear छोटी संबंध to sociological सिद्धान्त or सोशल विज्ञान शोध methodology.
Thunder is the sound caused by lightning.
depending on the प्रकृति of the lightning and distance of the listener, थंडर can दायरा इससे a शार्प, loud crack to a long, low rumble ( brontide ).
The sudden increase in pressure और temperature इससे बिजली produces रैपिड विस्तार of the एयर surrounding and भीतर a bolt of lightning.
In फेरे, this विस्तार of एयर creates a sonic शॉक wave, समान to a सोनिक बूम, जिससे produces the ध्वनि of thunder, प्रायः referred to as a clap, क्रैक, or peal of thunder.
the अलहदा of the बिजली can be calculated by the listener based on the time अंतराल इससे when the lightning is देखी to when the sound is heard.
पालमा (,, ), in पूरा पालमा de Mallorca, is the major city and port on the island of Majorca ( Mallorca ) and capital city of the autonomous जातियाँ of the Balearic Islands in Spain.
The names Ciutat de Mallorca ( City of majorca ) and Ciutat ( City ) were प्रयुक्त before the War of the Spanish Succession और are still प्रयुक्त by लोगों in Majorca.
However, the आधिकारिक name was Mallorca, the वही as the द्वीप.
It is situated on the south coast of the island on the खाड़ी of Palma.
as of the 2009 जनसांख्यिकी, the जनसांख्यिकी of the city of Palma proper थी 401,270, और the जनसांख्यिकी of the entire urban area was 517,285, रैंकिंग as the twelfth largest urban area of Spain.
Almost हाफ of the कुल population of Majorca live in Palma.
the cabrera Archipelago, हालांकि widely separated इससे पालमा proper, is administratively considered part of the नगरपालिका.
Its विमानक्षेत्र, बेटे Sant Joan, serves over 22 लाख passengers each year.
The Marivent Palace थी offered by the नगर to the तब प्रिंस Juan कार्लोस i of स्पेन.
The royals have since spent their गर्मियाँ holidays in पालमा.

सिकंदर जोसेफ `` Lex '' Luthor is a fictional character, a supervillain appearing in comic books published by DC कॉमिक्स.
Luthor is the archenemy of सुपरमैन, और as a high-status supervillain, has also come into विरोध with बैटमैन and other superheroes in the DC Universe.
निर्मित by Jerry siegel और Joe Shuster, the character पहला appeared in Action Comics # 23 ( अप्रैल 1940 ).
luthor is described as `` a power-mad, दुष्ट वैज्ञानिक '' of ऊँची intelligence and incredible technological prowess.
luthor 's goals typically center on हत्या Superman, the foremost obstacle to achieving the villain 's megalomaniacal goals.
Despite periodically wearing a संचालित बहि, Luthor has traditionally lacked superpowers or a dual पहचान.
The अक्षर was originally चित्रित as a mad वैज्ञानिक जो, in the vein of pulp novels, wreaks havoc on the world with his अत्याधुनिक weaponry.
In his earliest appearances, Luthor is दिखाया with a पूरा head of रेड बाल.
Despite इस, the अक्षर later became hairless as the result of an artist 's mistake.
A 1960 स्टोरी by Jerry Siegel expanded upon Luthor 's उत्पत्ति and motivations, revealing him to be a बाल्यकाल friend of Superman 's who खोया his बाल जब a fire destroyed his laboratory ; Luthor vowed revenge.
following the 1985 सीमित series Crisis on Infinite earths, the अक्षर was re-imagined as a machiavellian industrialist और white-collar criminal, even briefly serving as अध्यक्ष of the United States.
In हाल years, विभिन्न लेखक have revived luthor 's mad scientist persona from the 1940s.
The character was ranked as the 8th महानतम Villain by Wizard on its 100 महानतम Villains of All Time list.
IGN 's list of the शीर्ष 100 Comic किताब खलनायक of सब समय ranked luthor as # 4.
luthor is भी वर्णित as a `` megavillain '' by कॉमिक book आलोचक Peter Sanderson, एक of a few genre-crossing villains whose adventures take place `` in a world in which the ordinary कानून of nature are slightly suspended '' ; characters such as प्राध्यापक Moriarty, Count ड्रैकुला, hannibal Lecter, डॉक्टर Doom, and Darth Vader, also fit इस description.
मार्टिन लूथर King, Jr. Day is a संयुक्त States federal holiday marking the birthday of रेव. Dr. मार्टिन लूथर King, Jr.
It is observed on the third सोमवार of January प्रत्येक साल, which is around the समय of King 's birthday, January 15.
The फ्लोटिंग अवकाश is समान to छुट्टियाँ नियत under the Uniform सोमवार अवकाश अधिनियम, though the अधिनियम predated the establishment of Martin Luther किंग, Jr. दिन by 15 सालो.
किंग was the मुख्य spokesman for nonviolent activism in the सिविल अधिकारों movement, which successfully protested जातिगत पक्षपात in federal and state विधि.
the campaign लिये a संघीय अवकाश in King 's honor began जल्द after उसके assassination in 1968.
Ronald Reagan signed the holiday into विधि in 1983, and it was पहला observed on जनवरी 20, 1986.
At पहला, कुछ राज्य resisted observing the अवकाश as such, giving it alternative names or combining it with other holidays.
It थी officially observed in all 50 राज्य लिये the पहला समय in 2000.
the camera phone समाधान allows instant sharing of तस्वीरें.
as it 's automatic और instant, the उपयोक्ता does नहीं have to use a केबल or removable मीडिया to connect to a personal computer.
A कैमरा phone is a मोबाईल फोन which is able to कैप्चर स्टिल photographs ( और प्रायः वीडियो ).
चूंकि early in the 21st century the majority of मोबाईल phones in उपयोग हैं कैमरा phones.
Most camera फोन हैं simpler than separate digital cameras.
Their usual fixed फ़ोकस lenses और smaller सेंसर limit their प्रदर्शन in poor lighting.
lacking a physical shutter, most have a long शटर lag.
Flash, जहाँ present, is usually weak.
Optical zoom और tripod screws are विरल.
Some also कमी a USB कनेक्शन, removable memory card, or other way of transferring their pictures more quickly than by the फोन 's inherent communication विशेषता.
Some of the more महंगी camera phones have only a few of ये technical disadvantages, which apply most acutely in कम लाइट शर्तें and in any case have not inhibited their फैली use.
Most model lines improve in ये regards प्रत्येक year or two.
कुछ, ऐसे as the Droid Incredible only have a menu choice to start an application कार्यक्रम to activate the camera.
अन्य, ऐसे as the ब्लैकबेरी Storm 2, Droid x, Motorola V980 और Nokia 5800 also have a separate camera बटन for quickness और convenience.
खिड़कियाँ फोन can be विन्यस्त to operate as a camera even if the phone is asleep.
Some camera phones हैं designed to resemble separate low-end डिजिटल कॉम्पैक्ट cameras in appearance and to कुछ extent in features और picture quality, और are branded as दोनो mobile phones and कैमरे, including certain सोनी phones.
the प्रिंसिपल advantages of कैमरा फोन हैं लागत और compactness ; indeed for a user who carries a मोबाईल phone anyway, the additional size and लागत हैं negligible.
Smartphones that are कैमरा फोन may चलाएं mobile applications to add capabilities ऐसे as geotagging और चित्र stitching.
a few ऊँची end फोन can use their touch screen to direct उनके कैमरा to फ़ोकस on a particular object in the field of view, giving even an अनुभवहीन user a degree of focus control exceeded only by seasoned photographers using manual focus.
`` whatever happened to the man of कल ? '' is a 1986 comic book स्टोरी featuring the DC Comics character of सुपरमैन.
Written by Alan Moore with help from long-time, और जल्द to be retiring, Superman एडिटर, Julius Schwartz, the स्टोरी थी प्रकाशित in two भाग, beginning in सुपरमैन # 423 and ending in Action कॉमिक्स # 583, दोनो published in सितंबर 1986.
The story थी drawn by long-time artist Curt swan, in his फाइनल major योगदान to the Superman titles, और was inked by George pérez in the issue of Superman and कर्ट Schaffenberger in the समस्या of कार्रवाई कॉमिक्स.
the story थी an imaginary tale which told the final story of the Silver Age Superman and उसके long history, which थी being rebooted following the events of Crisis on Infinite Earths, before उसके आधुनिक introduction in the जॉन Byrne series, the Man of स्टील.
मूर wanted his plot to honor the long history of the character and to serve as a complete conclusion to his mythology.
The story is a frame स्टोरी set टेन years after Superman थी पिछला देखी, where Lois Lane recounts the टेल of the end of Superman 's career to a reporter इससे the Daily Planet.
Her story includes numerous violent attacks against सुपरमैन by his enemies, the public revelation of उसके secret identity of Clark केंट and a क्रमांक of deaths of those closest to उसे.
the स्टोरी रै been cited as एक of the best stories of the character of Superman, and आलोचकों और audiences अक्सर choose it as एक of the most यादगार कॉमिक्स ever published.
it is used as an उदाहरण of कैसा to बंद the long-time continuity of a comic किताब अक्षर.
the story 's विरासत रै endured with समान कहानियां लिखा as श्रद्धांजलि to it.
The शीर्षक is a reference to एक of the nicknames of Superman as the man of कल, and थी used in the शीर्षक of another Superman.
The bugatti Veyron EB 16.4 is a mid-engined grand touring car, designed और developed by the volkswagen Group and manufactured in molsheim, France by Bugatti Automobiles s.a.s.
The Super खेल version of the veyron is the fastest street-legal उत्पादन car in the संसार, साथ a top speed of.
the असली version रै a शीर्ष गति of.
it was नामित Car of the Decade ( 2000–2009 ) by the BBC television कार्यक्रम Top Gear.
The standard Veyron won शीर्ष Gears Best car Driven All Year पुरस्कार in 2005.
On 6 अप्रैल 2013, bugatti set the रिकार्ड लिये the तीव्रतम roadster in the world साथ the Veyron Grand Sport Vitesse, reaching on average a शीर्ष speed of.
the veyron 's मुख्य पंक्तियां थी hartmut Warkuss, and the exterior was designed by jozef Kabaň of Volkswagen, with much of the engineering work being conducted अंतर्गत the मार्गदर्शन of अभियान्त्रिकी मुख्य वुल्फगांग Schreiber.
A क्रमांक of special variants have महरूम produced.
in December 2010, Bugatti began offering prospective buyers the क्षमता to मनपसंद exterior और इंटीरियर्स colours by using the veyron 16.4 configurator application on the marque 's official जालस्थल.
The institution of the eucharist has महरूम a कुंजी थीम in the depictions of the Last Supper in Christian art, as in this 16th-century जुआन de Juanes painting.
`` at the पिछला Supper, on the night he was गद्दारी, our रक्षक instituted the Eucharistic sacrifice of उसके देह and रक्त. ''
( Catechism of the Catholic गिरिजाघर 1323 )
Eucharist in the कैथोलिक Church refers to both the celebration of the Mass, that is, the Eucharist liturgy, और the ब्रैड और वाइन which after the consecration are transubstantiated ( changed in substance ) into the body and blood of यीशु Christ, Lord and परमेश्वर, a घोषणा formulated by the परिषद of Trent with an anathema against anyone who अस्वीकृत this.
Blessed Sacrament is a devotional term used in the Roman Catholic गिरिजाघर to refer to the Eucharistic species ( the देह और Blood of Christ ).

A short story is a brief कार्य of साहित्य, usually written in narrative prose.
उभरते from पहले oral storytelling परंपराओं in the 17th सदी, the short story रै grown to encompass a देह of work so diverse as to defy easy characterization.
at its सबसे prototypical the short स्टोरी सुविधाएँ a small cast of नामित characters, और focuses on a self-contained incident साथ the intent of evoking a `` सिंगल प्रभाव '' or मनोदशा.
in so doing, short stories make उपयोग of plot, अनुनाद, और other dynamic components to a दूर greater उपाधि than is typical of an anecdote, yet to a far lesser degree than a novel.
जबकि the short स्टोरी is largely distinct from the novel, authors of दोनो generally चित्रण इससे a आम pool of literary techniques.
Short stories have no set लंबाई.
In terms of शब्द count वहीँ is no official demarcation between an anecdote, a short स्टोरी, और a novel.
बल्कि, the रूप 's पैरामीटर्स are दिए by the rhetorical और व्यावहारिक कॉन्टेक्स्ट in which a दिए story is produced and considered, so कि what constitutes a छोटी story may differ between genres, देशों, eras, और commentators.
जैसे the novel, the छोटी story 's predominant आकार reflects the demands of the available markets लिये publication, and the एवोल्यूशन of the form seems closely tied to the evolution of the publishing industry और the submission दिशानिर्देश of its constituent houses.
the short story has been माना both an apprenticeship form preceding अधिक lengthy works, and a crafted form in its अपना right, collected together in किताबे of समान लंबाई, price, और वितरण as novels.
छोटी story writers may define their works as भाग of the कलाकारी और personal अभिव्यक्ति of the form.
वे may also attempt to resist categorization by genre and fixed form.
Area कोड in Michigan
Area code 810 is the टेलीफोन क्षेत्रफल code सेवारत eastern मिशिगन.
the raccoon (, Procyon lotor ), sometimes spelled racoon, भी known as the आम raccoon, North American raccoon, northern raccoon and colloquially as कून, is a medium-sized mammal देशी to North America.
The raccoon is the largest of the procyonid family, having a देह length of and a देह weight of.
इसके grayish कोट ज़्यादातर consists of घना underfur जिससे insulates विरूद्ध cold weather.
दो of the raccoon 's सबसे distinctive features are इसके extremely dexterous front paws और इसके facial mask, which हैं themes in the mythology of several देशी American tribes.
Raccoons हैं noted लिये their intelligence, साथ अध्ययन showing that they are able to remember the solution to tasks लिये up to three years.
the diet of the omnivorous raccoon, जिससे is usually nocturnal, consists of about 40 % invertebrates, 33 % संयंत्र foods, and 27 % vertebrates.
The original habitats of the raccoon are deciduous और मिश्रित forests, but due to उनके adaptability वे have extended their range to mountainous areas, coastal marshes, और urban areas, जहाँ कुछ homeowners consider them to be पीड़कों.
As a result of escapes and deliberate introductions in the mid-20th century, raccoons are अभी also distributed across the European mainland, the काकेशस region और Japan.
हालांकि previously विचार to be solitary, वहीँ is now evidence कि raccoons engage in gender-specific सोशल behavior.
Related महिलाओं often share a आम area, while unrelated males सजीव together in groups of up to four animals to maintain their positions विरूद्ध foreign males दौरान the mating season, and other potential आक्रमणकारियों.
Home दायरा आकार vary anywhere इससे 3 हेक्टेयर ( 7 acres ) for महिलाओं in cities to 50 km2 ( 20 sq mi ) for males in prairies.
बाद a gestation काल of परिचय 65 days, two to five यंग, known as `` kits '', are born in spring.
the kits हैं subsequently उठाया by their mother until dispersion in late fall.
Although खिलाते raccoons have been known to सजीव over 20 years, their average जीवन expectancy in the wild is तभी 1.8 to 3.1 years.
In many areas, hunting and vehicular injury हैं the two most आम causes of मौत.
the 2010 Haiti earthquake was a catastrophic magnitude 7.0 Mw earthquake, with an epicenter near the कस्बा of Léogâne ( ouest Department ), लगभग वेस्ट of Port-au-Prince, हैती 's capital.
The भूकंप occurred at 16:53 लोकल time ( 21:53 UTC ) on मंगलवार, 12 जनवरी 2010.
By 24 January, at तनिक 52 aftershocks measuring 4.5 or greater था महरूम recorded.
An अनुमानित three million लोगों यहूद affected by the भूकंप.
the उच्चतम विश्वसनीय death गिनती was अनुमानित at 220,000.
Haitian सरकारी estimates were higher.
the government of हैती estimated that 250,000 residences और 30,000 commercial इमारतें had collapsed or were severely damaged.
The earthquake caused major क्षति in Port-au-Prince, Jacmel और अन्य settlements in the प्रदेश.
अनेक notable landmark buildings were significantly damaged or नष्ट, including the अध्यक्षीय Palace, the नेशनल Assembly building, the Port-au-Prince Cathedral, और the main jail.
among those मारे were Archbishop of Port-au-Prince जोसेफ सर्ज Miot, and opposition नेता Micha Gaillard.
The मुख्यालय of the United Nations स्थिरीकरण Mission in Haiti ( MINUSTAH ), located in the पूंजी, collapsed, killing अनेक, including the मिशन 's मुख्य, hédi annabi.
Many countries responded to appeals लिये humanitarian aid, pledging निधि and dispatching rescue and medical teams, engineers और support personnel.
Communication प्रणालियों, air, जमीन, and sea transport सुविधाएं, hospitals, और electrical networks had been damaged by the भूकंप, जिससे hampered बचाव और सहायता प्रयत्न ; confusion over who was in charge, एयर ट्रैफ़िक जमघट, and problems with prioritisation of flights further जटिल early relief कार्य.
port-au-prince 's morgues were overwhelmed साथ tens of हज़ारों of bodies.
ये था to be दफ्न in द्रव्यमान graves.
as rescues tailed off, supplies, medical परवाह और sanitation became priorities.
Delays in aid distribution led to angry appeals from aid workers and survivors, और looting और विरल violence were observed.
On 22 January the संयुक्त Nations noted कि the emergency phase of the relief operation थी drawing to a बंद, और on the following दिन the Haitian सरकारी officially called off the ढूंढें for survivors.
Mister Ed is a fictional talking horse, originally appearing in short कहानियां by वाल्टर R. Brooks, and later in an अमरीकी टेलीविज़न हालात comedy produced by filmways कि first aired in अनुप्रयोग इससे January 5 to July 2, 1961, और तब on CBS इससे October 1, 1961 to February 6, 1966.
the सितारों of the दिखाएँ were Mister Ed, a palomino घोड़ा जो could `` बात '', played by gelding Bamboo Harvester and voiced by former Western star Allan Lane ( who went uncredited for the entire length of the series ), और his owner, an eccentric और enormously klutzy, yet friendly, architect named Wilbur Post ( Alan यंग ).
Much of the program 's ह्यूमर stemmed इससे the फैक्ट मिस्टर Ed would बोलो only to Wilbur, as well as ed 's सुर्खी as a troublemaker.
अन्य running jokes centered on Wilbur 's character होने a विशाल klutz and inadvertently causing नुक़सान to खुद or अन्य.
according to the दिखाएँ 's निर्माता, आर्थर Lubin, Young was chosen as the सीसे character क्युकी he `` बस seemed जैसे the sort of guy a horse होता बात to ''.
lubin, a dost of Mae वेस्ट, scored a coup by persuading the screen icon to अतिथि star in एक एपीसोड.
In the United States, reruns aired on Nick at Nite from कूच 3, 1986, to February 1, 1993.
Sister स्टेशन TV Land भी reran the show from 1996–98 और again इससे 2003-06.
the series is currently ब्रॉडकास्ट every morning on This TV, साथ with Highway Patrol, और The Patty Duke दिखाएँ.
It is भी फिलहाल ब्रॉडकास्ट on Hallmark Movie Channel.
as of January 1, 2011, the first दो seasons of the दिखाएँ are available on Hulu.
the Rapture is a term in ईसाई eschatology which refers to the `` being caught up '' discussed in 1 thessalonians 4:17, जब the `` मुर्दे in Christ '' and `` we जो are alive and remain '' will be `` caught up in the बादल '' to मिलें `` the Lord in the air ''.
The पद `` rapture '' is used in at तनिक दो senses.
in the pre-tribulation view, a समूह of people will be left behind on earth after another group literally leaves `` to meet the Lord in the air. ''
This is now the सबसे आम उपयोग of the term, especially among fundamentalist ईसाइयों and in the United States.
The other, older use of the term `` Rapture '' is बस as a पर्याय for the final resurrection generally, without a विश्वास that a group of people is left behind on earth for an extended tribulation काल बाद the events of 1 Thessalonians 4:17.
इस distinction is महत्वपूर्ण as कुछ प्रकार of Christianity never refer to `` the Rapture '' in धार्मिक शिक्षा, but might उपयोग the older और more general sense of the word `` rapture '' in referring to कया happens दौरान the final क़यामत.
There are अनेक views among Christians regarding the timing of Christ 's return ( including whether it will occur in one इवेंट or दो ), and various views regarding the गंतव्य of the aerial gathering described in 1 Thessalonians 4.
Denominations ऐसे as रोमन catholics, Orthodox ईसाइयों, लूथरन Christians, and Reformed Christians believe in a rapture only in the भाव of a general final क़यामत, जब मसीह रिटर्न a सिंगल समय.
वे do not मानना कि a group of people is left behind on earth लिये an extended tribulation काल after the events of 1 Thessalonians 4:17.
Pre-tribulation rapture theology was developed in the 1830s by जॉन Nelson Darby और the Plymouth brethren, and popularized in the संयुक्त राज्य in the जल्दी 20th century by the wide circulation of the Scofield सन्दर्भ Bible.
