The Philistine cities of Gaza, Ashdod, ashkelon, Ekron, and Gath
The Philistines (,,, or ;, plištim ), pleshet or peleset, were a लोगों who as part of the Sea peoples appeared in the southern coastal क्षेत्रफल of Canaan at the शुरूआत of the Iron आयु ( circa 1175 BC ), सबसे probably from the ईजियन region.
According to the Bible, they ruled the five city-states ( the `` philistine Pentapolis '' ) of Gaza, Ashkelon, Ashdod, ekron and gath, from Wadi गाजा in the south to the yarqon नदी in the उत्तर, but साथ no फिक्स्ड किनारा to the east.
The बाइबल paints them as the किंगडम of Israel 's सबसे खतरनाक enemy.
Originating कही in the Aegean, their population was around 25,000 in the 12th century BC, rising to a peak of 30,000 in the 11th century BC, of which the ईजियन element was not अधिक than half the total, और perhaps much कम.
Nothing is known for निश्चित about the original भाषा or भाषाएं of the philistines, however they were नहीं part of the Semitic Canaanite जनसांख्यिकी.
There is कुछ limited evidence in favour of the assumption that the philistines were Indo-European-speakers either इससे Greece and/or Luwian अध्यक्षों इससे the coast of एशिया नाबालिग.
Philistine-related शब्द found in the बाइबल are not सामीती, and can in कुछ cases, with reservations, be traced back to Proto-Indo-European जड़ें.
by the शुरूआत of the 1st मिलेनियम BCE वे had adopted the सामान्य Canaanite भाषा of the region.
the हथियारबंद Services वोकेशनल Aptitude Battery ( ASVAB ) is a अनेक choice test, administered by the संयुक्त राज्य Military Entrance प्रसंस्करण Command, used to determine qualification for enlistment in the संयुक्त States हथियारबंद forces.
It is प्रायः offered to American ऊँची स्कूल विद्यार्थी when वे are in the 10th, 11th और 12th ग्रेड, though anyone eligible for enlistment may take it.
Although the test is administered by the सैन्य, it is not ( और never रै महरूम ) a requirement कि a test-taker with a qualifying score enlist in the armed forces.
In वित्तीय accounting, a संतुलन sheet or बयान of वित्तीय position is a summary of the financial balances of a sole proprietorship, a business partnership, a corporation or अन्य कारोबार organization, such as an llc or an llp.
एसेट, देनदारी और ownership equity are listed as of a specific तिथि, ऐसे as the end of इसके वित्तीय साल.
a balance चादर is प्रायः described as a `` snapshot of a कम्पनी 's वित्तीय condition ''.
of the चार मौलिक वित्तीय कथन, the संतुलन sheet is the तभी statement which applies to a सिंगल point in time of a business ' calendar year.
A मानक कम्पनी संतुलन sheet has तीन भाग : assets, liabilities और स्वामित्व equity.
the main श्रेणी of एसेट are usually listed first, और typically in order of चलनिधि.
एसेट are followed by the देनदारी.
The अंतर between the एसेट और the liabilities is known as इक्विटी or the net assets or the net लायक or पूंजी of the कम्पनी and according to the accounting equation, net लायक must equal assets minus liabilities.
Another way to look at the same समीकरण is that एसेट equals liabilities plus owner 's इक्विटी.
Looking at the equation in इस रास्ता shows how assets were financed : either by borrowing धन ( देयता ) or by using the मालिक 's money ( मालिक 's equity ).
Balance चादरें हैं प्रायः प्रस्तुत with assets in one खण्ड और देनदारी and जाल worth in the other section with the two भाग `` balancing. ''
A कारोबार ऑपरेटिंग entirely in नकदी can माप इसके profits by withdrawing the संपूर्ण बैंको balance at the end of the काल, प्लस any cash in hand.
however, many businesses are not paid immediately ; they निर्माण up inventories of goods और they acquire buildings and equipment.
in other words : businesses have assets and so they can not, भी if वे want to, तत्काल फेरे these into नकदी at the end of each period.
प्रायः, these businesses owe money to आपूर्तिकर्ता and to tax अधिकारियों, and the proprietors do not withdraw सब their original पूंजी and profits at the समाप्त of प्रत्येक period.
in अन्य words व्यवसायों भी have liabilities.
.17 Hornady Magnum Rimfire, commonly ज्ञात as the.17 hmr, is a rimfire राइफल cartridge विकसित by the ammunition company hornady in 2002.
it descended इससे the.22 Magnum by necking down the.22 Magnum case to take a.17 caliber ( 4.5 mm ) गोली, and it is अधिक costly to shoot than traditional.22 कैलिबर rimfire cartridges.
Commonly loaded साथ a 17 grain ( 1.1 g ) bullet, it can deliver muzzle गतियाँ in excess of 2550 ft/s ( 775 m/s ).
the Schaumburg flyers were a professional baseball टोली आधारित in Schaumburg, Illinois, in the United राज्य.
The flyers were to be a चार्टर member of the उत्तर American League, which is नहीं संबद्ध with Major लीग Baseball, however, the टोली folded in March 2011, before they began play in the nal.
इससे the 1999 ऋतु to the 2010 season, the Flyers निभाई their घर games at Alexian फ़ील्ड, near the Elgin o'hare एक्सप्रेसवे.
The team formerly played in थंडर खाड़ी, ओंटारियो, where वे यहूद known as the Thunder Bay Whiskey jacks.
the टोली was originally a member of the Northern League इससे 1993 to 2010.
on जुलाई 27, 2009, the flyers played मेजबान to Battle of the Sexes II, which pitted the flyers विरूद्ध the नेशनल Pro fastpitch Softball Champions, the Chicago डाकुओं.
Played by आधिकारिक softball rules, the खेल थी seen by an overflow रिकार्ड crowd of 8,918, and was won by the डाकुओं 4-2.
In 1999, the Flyers hired their first manager, Ron Kittle.
Kittle is best known लिये his playing दिनों साथ the Chicago White Sox, and former Chicago Cubs और श्वेत Sox खिलाड़ी Greg Hibbard was the pitching coach.
दौरान the early years of the franchise, kittle did a श्रेणी of tv commercials to promote the टोली, using the gimmick `` ma kittle. '' where he played दोनो himself और his `` ma. ''
the विज्ञापन were कामयाब at sparking कुछ initial ब्याज in the team as the Flyers hoped to steal away fans इससे the nearby Kane County cougars.
the ad mimicked the highly successful Converse ads where लैरी Johnson स्ट्रक्चर as दोनो himself और `` Gramama. ''
At the समाप्त of the 2001 ऋतु, however, Kittle resigned इससे his managerial position, and Jim boynewicz was hired to replace him.
In 2004, the Flyers made it to the उत्तरी लीग चैंपियनशिप Series against the st. Paul संतो.
despite अग्रणी the five-game श्रेणी 2-1, Schaumburg आखिरकार खोया the श्रेणी.
In Game 5, Flyers relief pitcher lyle Prempas अनुमत a game winning grand स्लैम by St. Paul infielder मार्क Mirizzi in the नवीं inning.
the flyers appeared in the Northern League playoffs four times ( 1999, 2003, 2004, 2006 ) but never जीती the चैंपियनशिप.
Some famous players जो निभाई लिये the Flyers were पूर्व ओकलैंड a 's outfielder ozzie Canseco and पूर्व Chicago Cubs outfielder Dwight Smith.
Rachel Hannah Weisz ( / vice / ; born 7 कूच 1970 ) is an English film और theatre actress and former फ़ैशन model.
Weisz began her acting career at ट्रिनिटी हॉल, कैम्ब्रिज in the जल्दी 1990s, then started working in television, appearing in इंस्पेक्टर Morse, the British mini-series स्कारलेट and Black, और the television film Advocates II.
वो बना her फिल्मी début in the फिल्मी Death Machine ( 1994 ), लकिन her breakthrough role came in the film Chain प्रतिक्रिया ( 1996 ), अग्रणी to a high-profile भूमिका as Evelyn Carnahan-O'Connell in the films the Mummy ( 1999 ) and the Mummy रिटर्न ( 2001 ).
अन्य notable films featuring वाइज़ are Enemy at the Gates, परिचय a Boy, constantine, The Fountain and The निरंतर Gardener, लिये जिससे वो received an Academy पुरस्कार, a सुनहरी Globe और a Screen अभिनेताओं ' Guild award for her supporting role as Tessa Quayle.
She has महरूम labelled an `` English rose '' चूंकि उसके minor role in Stealing सौंदर्य ( 1996 ).
वाइज़ भी works in theatre.
Her stage breakthrough was the 1994 revival of Noël कायर 's play Design for जीना, जिससे earned her the London Critics Circle पुरस्कार for the सबसे promising newcomer.
Weisz 's performances भी include the 1999 donmar गोदाम production of टेनेसी Williams ' Suddenly, पिछला Summer, और उनके 2009 revival of A Streetcar नामित ख्वाहिश.
उसके portrayal of blanche dubois in the latter खेल earned उसके the Critics ' Circle थिएटर Award लिये Best Actress.
वो has recently played Evanora in Oz the Great and Powerful.
the अमरीकी सिविल War ( ACW ), also ज्ञात as the युद्ध between the States or simply the Civil War ( देखिए नामकरण ), was a civil युद्ध लड़ा इससे 1861 to 1865 between the संयुक्त States ( the `` Union '' or the `` North '' ) और several Southern slave states that declared उनके secession and formed the Confederate राज्य of America ( the `` confederacy '' or the `` दक्षिण '' ).
The war had its उत्पत्ति in the समस्या of slavery, विशेषकर the extension of slavery into the western territories.
Foreign powers did not intervene.
बाद four सालो of bloody combat that बाएँ over 600,000 soldiers dead and destroyed much of the South 's अवसंरचना, the Confederacy collapsed, slavery was abolished, और the difficult Reconstruction process of restoring national एकता और guaranteeing अधिकारों to the freed slaves began.
in the 1860 अध्यक्षीय election, Republicans, led by अब्राहम Lincoln, opposed expanding गुलामी into United States ' territories.
Lincoln जीती, but पहले his inauguration on March 4, 1861, seven cotton-based स्लेव राज्य formed the Confederacy.
outgoing लोकतांत्रिक President James Buchanan और the incoming Republicans अस्वीकृत secession as illegal.
lincoln 's inaugural address declared his प्रशासन would नहीं initiate civil war.
Eight remaining slave states जारी to reject calls for secession.
confederate forces जब्त numerous संघीय दुर्गों भीतर territory claimed by the Confederacy.
a सलाम सम्मेलन विफल to find a compromise, and both पहलू prepared लिये युद्ध.
The Confederates assumed कि यूरोपीय countries were so dependent on `` King Cotton `` that they होता intervene ; none did और none पहचाना the new confederate राज्य of अमेरिका.
hostilities began on April 12, 1861, जब confederate शक्तियां fired upon Fort Sumter, a key फोर्ट आयोजित by संघ troops in दक्षिण Carolina.
Lincoln पुकारा लिये each state to provide troops to retake the fort ; नतीजतन, four अधिक स्लेव राज्य joined the Confederacy, bringing उनके कुल to eleven.
the Union जल्द controlled the border states and स्थापित a नवल नाकेबंदी कि crippled the southern economy.
the पूर्वी थिएटर was inconclusive in 1861–62.
The autumn 1862 confederate अभियान into Maryland ( a संघ state ) ended साथ confederate रिट्रीट at the Battle of antietam, dissuading अंग्रेजों हस्तक्षेप.
lincoln issued the Emancipation Proclamation, जिससे made ending गुलामी a war लक्ष्य.
To the west, by summer 1862 the Union नष्ट the Confederate river नेवी, then much of उनके पश्चिमी सेना, और the Union at vicksburg विभाजित the confederacy in two at the Mississippi River.
in 1863, Robert E. Lee 's Confederate incursion उत्तर ended at the Battle of Gettysburg.
पश्चिमी successes led to ulysses S. Grant command of all संघ armies in 1864.
In the Western Theater, William T. शरमन drove east to capture Atlanta and marched to the sea, destroying Confederate infrastructure along the रास्ता.
the संघ marshaled the resources and manpower to आक्रमण the confederacy from सब directions, and could afford to लड़ो battles of attrition through the Overland Campaign towards Richmond, the Confederate capital.
the defending Confederate army failed, अग्रणी to ली 's surrender to ग्रान्ट at appomattox अदालत House on April 9, 1865.
the American सिविल War was एक of the earliest true industrial wars.
railroads, the telegraph, steamships, और mass-produced weapons were employed extensively.
the mobilization of civilian factories, खानों, shipyards, banks, transportation और food supplies सब foreshadowed World युद्ध i.
It remains the deadliest war in American इतिहास, resulting in the deaths of an estimated 750,000 soldiers और an undetermined number of civilian हताहत.
Historian जॉन huddleston estimates the death टोल at टेन percent of सब उत्तरी males 20–45 years old, and 30 percent of all Southern white males aged 18–40.
आलू ब्रैड is a रूप of bread in which potato replaces a portion of the regular wheat flour.
It is cooked in a variety of विधि, including by बेकिंग it on a hot तवे or pan, or in an oven.
It may be leavened or unleavened, और may have a किस्में of other संघटक baked into it.
The ratio of potato to wheat flour varies significantly from recipe to recipe, साथ some recipes having a बहुमत of potato, and others having a majority of गेहूं flour.
Some व्यंजनों कॉल for mashed potatoes, with अन्य calling लिये निर्जलित potato flakes.
It is available as a commercial उत्पाद in many countries, with समान विसंगतियाँ in संघटक, cooking विधि, and अन्य variables.
The Pacific Time Zone observes standard time by subtracting eight hours इससे Coordinated सार्वभौमिक समय ( ).
The क्लॉक time in इस zone is आधारित on the mean सौर time of the 120th meridian वेस्ट of the ग्रीनविच Observatory.
During daylight saving समय, its time offset is.
In the संयुक्त राज्य and Canada, इस time zone is generically called Pacific Time ( PT ).
Specifically, it is Pacific Standard Time ( pst ) when observing standard समय ( शीत ), and Pacific Daylight Time ( PDT ) जब observing daylight saving समय ( गर्मियाँ ).
Most of Canada uses daylight saving समय.
in Mexico the UTC−8 समय मण्डल is ज्ञात as the उत्तरपश्चिम Zone, which is synchronized साथ the U.S. PDT daylight saving schedule.
The largest नगर in the Pacific समय मण्डल is Los Angeles in कैलिफ़ोर्निया इससे USA ; the city 's महानगर area is the largest in the zone.
The zone is एक hour ahead of the अलास्का Time मण्डल, one hour पीछे the Mountain Time Zone and three घंटों behind the पूर्वी Time मण्डल.
स्टीरियो 8, commonly known as the eight-track cartridge, eight-track tape, or बस eight-track, is a magnetic टेप ध्वनि रिकॉर्डिंग technology.
It थी लोकप्रिय in the संयुक्त States इससे the mid-1960s through to the जल्दी 1980s, but was अपेक्षाकृत unknown in many यूरोपीय countries.
It was, however, very popular in the United Kingdom during इस period.
Stereo 8 थी created in 1964 by a consortium led by विधेयक Lear of lear Jet Corporation, along with Ampex, घाट Motor Company, General मोटर्स, Motorola, and RCA विक्टर रिकॉर्ड ( RCA ).
it थी a further विकास of the समान Stereo-Pak four-track कार्ट्रिज created by Earl `` madman '' Muntz.
a later quadraphonic संस्करण of the format was announced by RCA in अप्रैल 1970 और first known as quad-8, तब later बदला to बस q8.
Ramesses II ( 1303 BC – July or अगस्त 1213 BC ; Egyptian :, alternatively transcribed as rameses and Ramses or ), referred to as Ramesses the Great, was the third Egyptian pharaoh ( reigned 1279 bc – 1213 BC ) of the उन्नीसवीं राजवंश.
He is often regarded as the greatest, most मनाये, and most powerful pharaoh of the Egyptian साम्राज्य.
His successors और बाद Egyptians called उसे the `` Great Ancestor. ''
Ramesses II led several military expeditions into the Levant, re-asserting मिश्र control over Canaan.
he also led रिझाने to the दक्षिण, into Nubia, commemorated in inscriptions at Beit el-wali and Gerf Hussein.
At आयु fourteen, Ramesses was appointed प्रिंस Regent by his father Seti I.
he is believed to have लिया the throne in his late किशोर and is known to have शासित Egypt from 1279 bc to 1213 bc लिये 66 years and 2 months, according to दोनो Manetho and मिश्र 's contemporary historical records.
He थी एकबार said to have lived to be 99 सालो old, लकिन it is more likely that he died in उसके 90th or 91st year.
if he became Pharaoh in 1279 BC as most Egyptologists today मानना, he would have assumed the throne on may 31, 1279 bc, आधारित on उसके known accession तिथि of III shemu दिन 27.
रामेसेस ii celebrated an unprecedented 14 sed त्यौहार ( the first held after thirty years of a pharaoh 's शासनकाल, और then every three सालो ) दौरान उसके reign—more than any अन्य pharaoh.
on his death, he थी buried in a tomb in the घाटी of the किंग्स ; उसके body was बाद स्थानांतरित to a royal cache जहाँ it थी खोजा in 1881, और is अभी on display in the Cairo Museum.
the early part of his शासनकाल थी focused on building cities, temples और monuments.
He स्थापित the नगर of pi-ramesses in the nile Delta as his new capital and प्रमुख base लिये उसके अभियान in सीरियाई.
This city थी built on the remains of the city of Avaris, the capital of the हिक्सोस when they took over, and थी the location of the main Temple of नियत.
he is also ज्ञात as Ozymandias in the Greek sources, from a लिप्यन्तरण into Greek of a part of Ramesses 's सिंहासन name,, `` Ra 's mighty सच्चाई, chosen of Ra ''.
The Texas रेंजरों are a professional baseball टोली located in the Dallas-Fort लायक Metroplex, based in आर्लिंगटन, Texas.
the रेंजरों मताधिकार is फिलहाल a सदस्य of the Western प्रभाग of Major League Baseball 's American League.
चूंकि, the Rangers have played in Rangers ballpark in Arlington in आर्लिंगटन, Texas.
the टोली 's name is borrowed इससे the प्रसिद्ध law enforcement agency of the same नाम.
The franchise थी स्थापित in 1961 by the name of the वॉशिंगटन Senators, an expansion टोली awarded to वॉशिंगटन, D.C., after the city 's पहला ballclub, the original Washington Senators, स्थानांतरित to Minnesota and became the Twins.
बाद the season, the new Senators स्थानांतरित to आर्लिंगटन, टेक्सास, and debuted as the रेंजरों the following वसन्त.
The Texas Rangers बेसबॉल Club has made six appearances in the एमएलबी postseason, सब following division championships, in 1996, 1998, 1999, 2010, 2011 and 2012.
In 2010, the रेंजरों advanced past the प्रभाग श्रेणी लिये the पहला time, defeating the Tampa खाड़ी Rays.
टेक्सास तब brought home their पहला American लीग pennant बाद beating the नई यॉर्क यांकीज़ in छह खेल.
In the 2010 World Series, the franchise 's first, the रेंजरों fell to the सैन Francisco दिग्गज in five खेल.
Their लोन victory made उन्हें the first Texas टोली to win a World Series खेल, the Houston Astros having been swept in उनके 2005 World श्रेणी रूप.
वे repeated as अमरीकी League champions the following साल, तब lost the 2011 संसार Series to the st. Louis Cardinals in seven games.
gaius Julius Caesar (, July 100 bc – 15 March 44 bc ) was a रोमन general, statesman, कौंसुल और notable लेखक of लैटिन prose.
He played a critical role in the events कि led to the निधन of the Roman Republic और the वृद्धि of the Roman Empire.
In 60 BC, Caesar, crassus और pompey formed a political alliance that थी to dominate रोमन राजनीती for several years.
Their attempts to amass शक्ति through populist tactics यहूद opposed by the रूढ़िवादी elite भीतर the रोमन सीनेट, among उन्हें केटो the Younger with the बारंबार support of Cicero.
Caesar 's conquest of gaul, completed by 51 bc, विस्तारित Rome 's territory to the English Channel और the Rhine.
सीज़र became the पहला रोमन सामान्य to cross दोनो when he निर्मित a bridge आरपार the Rhine and conducted the पहला invasion of ब्रिटेन.
These achievements granted उसे बेमेल military शक्ति and threatened to eclipse the standing of pompey, who था realigned himself with the Senate after the death of crassus in 53 BC.
With the gallic Wars concluded, the Senate ordered Caesar to lay down his सैन्य command और return to Rome.
Caesar refused, and marked उसके defiance in 49 bc by क्रासिंग the Rubicon with a legion, leaving his province and illegally entering रोमन territory अंतर्गत arms.
Civil युद्ध resulted, from जिससे he उभरा as the unrivaled leader of रोम.
After assuming कंट्रोल of government, सीज़र began a program of social and सरकारी reforms, सहित the सृष्टि of the Julian calendar.
He centralised the अफसरशाही of the Republic and was eventually proclaimed `` तानाशाह in perpetuity ''.
लकिन the underlying political विरोध था नहीं been resolved, और on the Ides of March ( 15 March ) 44 BC, सीज़र थी assassinated by a समूह of सीनेटरों led by मार्कस Junius ब्रूटस.
A नई series of सिविल wars broke आउट, और the constitutional सरकारी of the गणतंत्र थी never restored.
Caesar 's अपनाया heir Octavian, later known as augustus, रोज़ to एकमात्र power, and the era of the Roman साम्राज्य began.
Much of Caesar 's जीवन is known from his अपना खाते of his military campaigns, and इससे other contemporary स्त्रोत, मुख्यतः the letters और speeches of Cicero और the ऐतिहासिक कृतियाँ of sallust.
The later biographies of सीज़र by suetonius और Plutarch are also major स्त्रोत.
Caesar is deemed to be one of the महानतम military कमांडरों of इतिहास.
Linguistic map of Nigeria, कैमरून, and Benin.

There are hundreds of languages बोला in सीरियल.
The प्रमुख languages are Yoruba, Hausa, Igbo, ईदो, Fulfulde, Kanuri, and ibb.
The official language of Nigeria, English, the former औपनिवेशिक भाषा, थी चुनी to सुकर the cultural and linguistic unity of the country.
English, however, remains an exclusive बचाना of the country 's शहरी elite, और is नहीं widely बोला in rural क्षेत्रों, जिससे comprise three quarters of the देशों जनसांख्यिकी.
सीरियल 's भाषाई diversity is a microcosm of अफ़्रीकी as a whole, encompassing three major अफ़्रीकी भाषाएं families : Afroasiatic, Nilo-Saharan, and Niger–Congo.
सीरियल also has several as-yet unclassified भाषाएं, such as Cen Tuum, which may represent a relic of an even greater विविधता prior to the स्प्रेड of the वर्तमान language परिवारों.
daucus carota ( common names शामिल wild गाजर, ( UK ) bird 's घोंसला, बिशप 's lace, और Queen Anne 's फीता ( उत्तर अमेरिका ) ) is a flowering plant in the परिवार apiaceae, native to temperate regions of यूरोपीय, southwest Asia and naturalised to उत्तर अमेरिका और ऑस्ट्रेलिया.
domesticated गाजर are cultivars of a subspecies, daucus carota subsp. sativus.
in the United States, the title of federal न्यायधीश usually अर्थात् a judge appointed by the President of the United राज्य और पुष्टि by the United राज्य सीनेट pursuant to the Appointments clause in Article II of the संयुक्त States संविधान.
In addition to the Supreme Court of the संयुक्त States, whose existence और some aspects of whose क्षेत्राधिकार हैं beyond the संवैधानिक power of कॉंग्रेस to alter, acts of Congress have स्थापित 13 courts of appeals ( also पुकारा `` circuit courts '' ) साथ appellate jurisdiction over different regions of the संयुक्त States, और 94 United States district न्यायालयों.
Every judge appointed to such a court may be categorized as a federal judge ; ऐसे स्थितियाँ include the Chief Justice and संबद्ध Justices of the Supreme Court, सर्किट Judges of the courts of appeals, and ज़िला judges of the United States ज़िला न्यायालयों.
All of these न्यायाधीशों described यूँ far are referred to sometimes as `` Article iii न्यायाधीशों '' because they कसरत the judicial power vested in the judicial शाखा of the federal सरकारी by Article iii of the U.S. Constitution.
in जोड, न्यायाधीशों of the Court of International Trade exercise न्यायिक शक्ति pursuant to Article iii.
अन्य न्यायाधीशों सेवारत in the संघीय courts, including magistrate judges and bankruptcy judges, are भी sometimes referred to as `` federal न्यायाधीशों '' ; however, they are neither appointed by the अध्यक्ष nor confirmed by the Senate, और their शक्ति derives from आलेख I instead.
See Article I और Article iii tribunals.
नेल Kim Furtado ( born December 2, 1978 ) is a कनाडाई singer, songwriter and actress.
She has sold 20 लाख एल्बम worldwide और अधिक 20 million singles, bringing her total sales to over 40 लाख रिकॉर्ड around the संसार.
Furtado पहला gained fame with her डेब्यू album, Whoa, नेल !
, जिससे spawned two कामयाब singles, `` i 'm Like a बर्ड `` और `` Turn Off the Light ``. ``
i 'm जैसे a Bird '' जीती a 2001 Juno Award लिये सिंगल of the साल and a 2002 Grammy Award for बेहतरीन Female Pop गायन Performance.
in 2003, फ़र्टाडो released Folklore, जिससे उत्पादित three international singles— `` Powerless ( कह What तुम want ) ``, `` Try `` और `` Força ``.
Three years later वो released Loose, a विश्वव्यापी commercial success.
The album शाखित चार number-one हिट्स : `` promiscuous ``, `` maneater ``, `` Say It Right `` and `` All शुभ बाते ( Come to an End ) ``.
बाद a three-year ब्रेक, she released her first full-length Spanish एल्बम, Mi योजना, and Furtado प्राप्त a Latin ग्रैमी for Best Female Pop गायन Album.
In 2012, फ़र्टाडो 's fourth English-language studio album, The स्पिरिट Indestructible was released.
फ़र्टाडो 's work has अर्जित उसके numerous पुरस्कार and accolades, including 2 Grammy पुरस्कार, 10 juno Awards, 3 muchmusic वीडियो Awards और a star on कनाडा 's Walk of Fame.
Creatures of the Night is the tenth studio एल्बम by Kiss.
It is the बैंड 's last एल्बम लिये कासाब्लांका रिकॉर्ड, the only label the group था ever recorded for at that point.
the album थी dedicated to the memory of कासाब्लांका संस्थापक और जल्दी चुंबन supporter Neil Bogart, who had died of cancer during the रिकॉर्डिंग sessions.
It is also the band 's last एल्बम recorded with Ace Frehley credited as an official सदस्य ( until 1998 's psycho Circus ), and its first album with Vinnie Vincent as the initially uncredited lead guitarist ( Vincent होता बाद be credited, but नहीं featured pictorially on the cover, of 1985 's reissue of the album ).
टच is a निर्णायक means of receiving information.
This photo shows tactile markings identifying stairs for visually impaired people.
The somatosensory प्रणाली is a diverse sensory प्रणाली comprising the receptors and processing centres to produce the sensory modalities such as टच, तापमान, proprioception ( body position ), and nociception ( pain ).
the संवेदी receptors cover the skin and epithelia, skeletal muscles, bones and joints, आतंरिक अंगों, and the cardiovascular system.
While touch is माना one of the पाँच परंपरागत होश, the छाप of touch is formed from अनेक modalities.
in आयुर्विज्ञान, the colloquial पद `` touch '' is प्रायः replaced साथ `` somatic senses '' to better प्रतिबिंबित the variety of mechanisms शामिल.
Somatic होश are sometimes referred to as somesthetic senses, with the समझना that somesthesis includes touch, proprioception और ( depending on उपयोग ) also haptic perception.
the system reacts to diverse stimuli using अलग receptors : thermoreceptors, nociceptors, mechanoreceptors and chemoreceptors.
Transmission of information from the receptors passes via संवेदी nerves through tracts in the स्पाइनल cord and into the brain.
प्रसंस्करण primarily occurs in the प्राथमिक somatosensory क्षेत्रफल in the parietal पालि of the cerebral cortex.
the cortical homunculus was devised by वाइल्डर Penfield.
at its simplest, the प्रणाली works when कार्यकलाप in a sensory neuron is triggered by a specific stimulus such as heat ; इस signal eventually passes to an area in the दिमाग uniquely attributed to that क्षेत्रफल on the body—this allows the processed stimulus to be felt at the correct location.
the point-to-point mapping of the देह सतहों in the brain is called a homunculus and is essential in the creation of a देह चित्र.
This brain-surface ( `` cortical '' ) map is not अपरिवर्तनीय, however.
Dramatic shifts can occur in response to stroke or injury.
Magnolia is a large genus of about 210 flowering संयंत्र species in the subfamily Magnolioideae of the family Magnoliaceae.
It is named after फ्रेंच botanist Pierre Magnol.
Magnolia is an प्राचीन genus.
Appearing before मधुमक्खियों did, the flowers विकसित to प्रोत्साहित परागण by beetles.
To avoid क्षति from pollinating भृंग, the carpels of Magnolia पुष्प are अत्यधिक tough.
fossilised नमूनों of Magnolia acuminata have महरूम मिला dating to 20 लाख years ago, और of पौधे identifiably belonging to the Magnoliaceae dating to 95 लाख years पहले.
Another पहलू of magnolias that is considered to represent an ancestral state is that the flower bud is enclosed in a bract बल्कि than in sepals ; the perianth भाग हैं undifferentiated और called tepals बल्कि than पृथक sepals and petals.
Magnolia shares the tepal characteristic with अनेक other flowering plants निकट the आधार of the flowering plant lineage such as amborella और Nymphaea ( as खूब as साथ many अधिक recently derived plants ऐसे as Lilium ).
the प्राकृतिक range of magnolia species is a disjunct वितरण, साथ a main केन्द्र in east और southeast Asia and a secondary centre in eastern उत्तर अमेरिका, सेंट्रल America, the West Indies, and कुछ प्रजाति in दक्षिण America.

`` White Christmas '' is an इरविंग बर्लिन सोंग reminiscing about an old-fashioned Christmas सेटिंग.
according to the गिनीज Book of संसार रिकॉर्ड, the version sung by bing Crosby is the best-selling single of all time, with अनुमानित sales in excess of 50 लाख copies worldwide.
Accounts vary as to जब and जहाँ Berlin लिखा the सोंग.
One स्टोरी is कि he wrote it in 1940, in warm la quinta, California, जबकि staying at the La Quinta Hotel, a frequent Hollywood रिट्रीट also favored by writer-producer Frank capra, although the Arizona biltmore also claims the song was written वहीँ.
He प्रायः stayed up सब रात्रि writing — he बताई उसके secretary, `` पकड़ें your pen and take bas this सोंग.
I बस wrote the best सोंग I 've ever लिखा — heck, i बस लिखा the best सोंग कि anybody 's ever लिखा ! ''
Cross-country skiing ( or XC skiing ) is a form of ski touring in जिससे participants propel themselves आरपार snow-covered मैदान using skis और poles.
The कार्यकलाप is popular in many places with large snowfields, primarily उत्तरी Europe, Canada, and अलास्का.
cross-country स्कीइंग is भाग of the nordic skiing sport family, which शामिल ski jumping, Nordic संयुक्त ( cross-country स्कीइंग और ski jumping ), Biathlon ( skiing और राइफल marksmanship ) and ski-orienteering ( which includes map नेविगेशन along snow trails and ट्रैक्स ).
Cross-country स्कीइंग is the आधुनिक स्टाइल of skiing that most resembles prehistoric स्कीइंग, विशेषकर जब किया in the backcountry.
It is also सम्बन्धित to Telemark skiing.
a use tax in United राज्य is पूरक to बिक्री tax जिससे अर्थात्, if तुम ख़रीदे a Taxable product/services without paying any बिक्री कर to vendor, तुम owe use कर.
You must स्वः assess use tax and pay it सीधे to the state where the उत्पाद यहूद consumed or सेवाएं were rendered.
Use tax typically is a tax on consumption but if you ख़रीदे an मद ( without paying बिक्री कर ) और स्टोर it in your warehouse initially, उपयोग tax applies to कि स्थान where goods were stored.
बाद on जब the फाइनल consumption takes प्लेस at some other location, तुम हैं required to अदा the अवकल of tax rate to the jurisdiction of परम प्लेस of consumption.
This वाकई means कि तुम do n't have to pay both बिक्री कर as well as उपयोग Tax on one transaction.
It is only one or the other that तुम are required to अदा on खरीदें of taxable products/services.
if vendor does n't चार्ज कोई बिक्री कर on इसके चालान तब it is the दायित्व of the खरीदार to self assess Use tax और अदा it to the उचित jurisdication.
Use कर is generally चार्ज at the same tax rate of Sales कर but in some states the tax रेट is different.
Use tax is also termed as `` खपत Tax '' or `` Consumer उपयोग Tax ''.
A उपयोग tax is a प्रकार of excise tax levied in the United राज्य by numerous state सरकारें.
It is assessed upon ठोस personal property purchased by a resident of the assessing state लिये उपयोग, storage, or खपत in that state ( not for पुनर्विक्रय ), regardless of where the खरीदें took place.
If a resident of a state makes a खरीदें भीतर उसके home state, पूरा sales tax is सशुल्क at the समय of the लेनदेन.
The use tax applies जब a निवासी of the assessing state purchases an item कि is नहीं subject to उसके home state 's बिक्री tax.
प्रायः, this is due to out-of-state purchases, as well as ordering items through the मेल, by phone, or over the Internet from other राज्य.
the उपयोग कर is typically assessed at the same rate as the sales tax that would have महरूम owed ( if any ) था the same goods been purchased in the state of निवास.
For example, a निवासी of Massachusetts, with a 6.25 % `` sales and उपयोग कर '' on certain goods और services, purchases non-exempt goods or services in New हैम्पशायर for उपयोग, storage or other consumption in Massachusetts.
Under New हैम्पशायर law, the New Hampshire विक्रेता collects no बिक्री कर on the goods, लकिन the मैसाचुसेट्स purchaser/user जरूर स्टिल pay 6.25 % of the sales price directly to the विभाग of Revenue in Massachusetts as a उपयोग tax.
if the वही goods are खरीदा in a US राज्य कि does collect sales tax लिये ऐसे goods at time of खरीदें, whatever taxes were paid by the क्रेता to that state can be deducted ( as a कर क्रेडिट ) from the 6.25 % owed लिये subsequent उपयोग, भंडार or consumption in मैसाचुसेट्स.
With few अपवाद, no state 's vendors होगा charge the native state 's बिक्री tax on goods shipped out of राज्य, meaning सब goods ordered इससे out-of-state are essentially फ़्री of sales tax.
The क्रेता is इसलिए जरूरी to घोषित और अदा the उपयोग tax to उसके home राज्य on ये ordered goods.
The assessing क्षेत्राधिकार may मेक the use tax payable annually, but कुछ states require a मासिक भुगतान.
For उदाहरण, जहाँ a Vermont निवासी has नहीं paid at तनिक 6 % बिक्री कर on प्रॉपर्टी brought in for उपयोग in the state, Vermont law requires दाखिल a tax return ( रूप SU-452 and भुगतान ) by the 20th day of the माह following non-exempt purchases to avoid a $ 50 late fee, a 5 % penalty प्रति माह, to a maximum of 25 %, प्लस statutory interest on the unpaid कर and दंड.
ठेठ छूटों include purchases by charitable non-profit organizations or governmental एजेंसियों, purchases for पुनर्विक्रय in commerce, और purchases via `` casual sales '' by individuals not in the ordinary कोर्स of कारोबार.
भी नोट कि there हैं thousands of tax jurisdictions in the U.S. और many have ever-changing lists of specific प्रकार of goods और सेवाएं that are not taxable.
as an illustration of the complexities : a 2006 Massachusetts law requires भुगतान of tax on `` pre-written '' ( not custom ) software purchased और downloaded over the Internet लिये installation and use in मैसाचुसेट्स, regardless of where it originates.
however, the actual उपयोग of the same software downloaded by a मैसाचुसेट्स निवासी to a सर्वर in another राज्य remains a non-taxed `` सेवा ''.
In कंट्रास्ट, Arkansas generally does not tax anything delivered over the अंतरजाल ( ऐसे as downloaded software or music ), except VoIP which is specifically पारिभाषित as taxable `` telecommunications services ''.
Software ( pre-written or custom ) `` वितरित thru a ठोस मीडियम '' ( i.e., on disk ) in अरकंसास is taxable भी if ordered online, मगर `` कस्टम software लिये a particular customer '' which is non-taxable `` प्रोग्रामिंग services '' even if delivered on a disk.
In most मामले, this complexity is part of the underlying बिक्री tax laws ; but जबकि a brick-and-mortar store रै to सौदे with only the sales कर कानून of its अपना स्थान, remote sellers have to deal with the उपयोग tax laws of अनेक jurisdictions—up to every US state and मोहल्ले कि प्रकृती उन्हें, if the company has a presence or `` nexus '' in every state ( as large `` brick-and-mortar '' विक्रेता जैसे wal-mart और Best ख़रीदे do ).
in आयुर्विज्ञान, pulmonary hypertension ( ph ) is an increase of रक्त pressure in the pulmonary धमनी, pulmonary रग, or pulmonary capillaries, साथ ज्ञात as the lung vasculature, अग्रणी to shortness of साँस, dizziness, fainting, और other symptoms, all of which हैं exacerbated by exertion.
Pulmonary hypertension can be a severe बीमारी with a markedly decreased exercise tolerance और heart विफलता.
It was first identified by Dr. Ernst वोन Romberg in 1891.
according to the सबसे recent classification, it can be one of five different प्रकार : arterial, venous, hypoxic, thromboembolic or miscellaneous.

Sanuk, a प्रभाग of deckers Outdoor निगम, is a जूते ब्रांड based in Southern कैलिफ़ोर्निया.
sanuk, the Thai शब्द लिये fun, was founded by Southern California देशी Jeff Kelley when he started making sandals out of indoor-outdoor carpet.
The first product created was green carpeted and हकदार the `` फर रियल '' after one shop owner पूछा if the novelty sandal थी `` लिये रियल. ''
The Fur Real first became a runaway hit through बुटीक stores and नहीं the intended surf shops.
The novelty act थी followed up by a चन्दन लपेटा in wire जाल, a leopard print version, और styles made आउट of a poncho सामग्री in a variety of colors.
Sanuk has grown to शामिल style विकल्प लिये मेन, महिलाओं and युवावस्था and is distributed आरपार the संयुक्त राज्य और in over 50 देशों throughout Europe, Asia, South America and ऑस्ट्रेलिया.
Sanuk centers itself around a positive lifestyle advocating the slogan, `` Smile, pass it on ! ``.
in कंप्यूटर science, सरणी programming languages ( also known as vector or multidimensional languages ) generalize operations on scalars to apply transparently to सदिश, matrices, and उच्चतर आयामी arrays.
सरणी programming primitives concisely express broad ideas about आंकड़ा manipulation.
the level of conciseness can be dramatic in certain cases : it is नहीं uncommon to ढूँढें array programming language one-liners that require अधिक than a couple of पृष्ठों of जावा कोड.
APL, designed by Ken iverson, was the पहला प्रोग्रामिंग language to provide सरणी programming capabilities.
the mnemonic apl refers to the शीर्षक of उसके seminal book `` A Programming Language '' and नहीं to arrays per se. Iverson 's contribution to rigor and स्पष्टता थी संभवतः more important than the सरल extension of dimensions to functions.
in the संयुक्त States an annuity अनुबंध is created when an insured party, usually an individual, pays a life insurance company a सिंगल प्रीमियम कि will बाद be distributed back to the insured party over समय.
Annuity contracts traditionally provide a guaranteed distribution of income over time, such as via फिक्स्ड payments, until the मौत of the person or व्यक्तियों named in the अनुबंध or until a final तिथि, whichever आता पहला.
However, the बहुमत of आधुनिक annuity customers उपयोग annuities only to accumulate निधि फ़्री of income और पूंजी gains taxes and to बाद लो lump-sum withdrawals without using the guaranteed-income-for-life feature.
President Barack ओबामा.
Barack Obama with his पहला Supreme Court nominee, Sonia Sotomayor.
Following is a list of all United राज्य संघीय judges appointed by अध्यक्ष Barack Obama during his presidency.
As of April 30, 2013, 187 Obama नामांकित to आलेख iii judgeships have महरूम confirmed by the संयुक्त राज्य सीनेट, namely दो justices to the Supreme Court of the United States, 35 न्यायाधीशों to the United राज्य न्यायालयों of appeals and 150 न्यायाधीशों to the United States district courts.
25 further nominations हैं currently प्रतीक्षारत सीनेट कार्रवाई.
There are currently 16 vacancies on the संयुक्त राज्य न्यायालयों of Appeals, 67 vacancies on the संयुक्त States district courts and 22 additional संघीय न्यायपालिका vacancies कि are anticipated to occur before the end of ओबामा 's दूसरी term.
Obama रै नहीं made कोई recess नियुक्ति to the federal न्यायालयों.
ओबामा has बना two nominations to the United राज्य Court of International व्यापार, an Article iii tribunal.
ओबामा also designated बैठे judge Emily C. Hewitt of the United States Court of Federal दावा, an Article i अदालत, to be मुख्य Judge of that court.
इस is a list of airports in Mexico, sorted by स्थान.

Only major National and International Airports हैं shown.
एजेंसी debt also ज्ञात as an Agency बंध is a सुरक्षा, usually a बंध, जारी by a U.S. government-sponsored agency.
The offerings of ये agencies are समर्थित but नहीं guaranteed by the us government चूंकि the agencies are private entities.
Some prominent issuers of these securities are Student ऋण विपणन Association ( Sallie Mae ), संघीय National बंधक संघ ( Fannie mae ) and संघीय घर ऋण Mortgage निगम ( Freddie Mac ).
Agency securities हैं प्रायः exempt इससे राज्य और local taxes, but not संघीय tax.
Agency debt is also पुकारा an agency security.
The susquehanna भाप इलेक्ट्रिक Station, a boiling जल reactor.
The रिएक्टरों हैं located अंदर the आयताकार containment buildings towards the front of the कूलिंग मीनारें.
तीन nuclear-powered American warships, ( top to नीचे ) nuclear cruisers uss Bainbridge and USS long बीच साथ USS Enterprise the first nuclear-powered वायुयान वाहक in 1964.
Crew members are स्पेलिंग out आइंस्टीन 's mass-energy equivalence सूत्र e = mc2 on the flight डेक.
The रूसी nuclear-powered icebreaker NS yamal on a 1994 संयुक्त expedition with the nsf.
Nuclear power is the use of sustained nuclear परिवर्द्धन to generate ऊष्मा and electricity.
नाभिकीय power पौधे provided परिचय 5.7 % of the संसार 's उर्जा और 13 % of the संसार 's विद्युत, in 2012.
in 2013, the iaea report that there are 437 operational nuclear power reactors ( हालांकि not all are producing विद्युत ), in 31 countries.
In addition, वहीँ are approximately 140 naval बरतन using नाभिकीय propulsion in आपरेशन, संचालित by some 180 रिएक्टरों.
वहीँ is an जारी बहस about the उपयोग of नाभिकीय energy.
Proponents, ऐसे as the संसार नाभिकीय संघ, the iaea और पर्यावरणविद लिये Nuclear Energy contend that नाभिकीय शक्ति is a sustainable उर्जा सोर्स that reduces carbon emissions.
Opponents, such as ग्रीनपीस International and nirs, मानना that nuclear power मुद्राएँ अनेक खतरे to people and the environment.
Nuclear शक्ति plant accidents include the chernobyl disaster ( 1986 ), Fukushima Daiichi नाभिकीय disaster ( 2011 ), and the तीन मील द्वीप दुर्घटना ( 1979 ).
वहीँ have also been some nuclear-powered submarine mishaps.
शोध into safety improvements is continuing and नाभिकीय fusion, believed to be safer, may be प्रयुक्त in the future.
As of 2012, according to the IAEA, विश्वव्यापी there were 68 सिविल nuclear power reactors under construction in 15 countries.
in the US the licenses of लगभग हाफ इसके reactors have महरूम extended to 60 years, और plans to निर्माण another दर्जन हैं अंतर्गत serious विचार.
However, Japan 's 2011 फुकुशिमा Daiichi nuclear disaster prompted a rethink of nuclear उर्जा नीति in अनेक countries.
जर्मनी decided to बंद सब इसके reactors by 2022, और Italy has बैन nuclear शक्ति.
Following Fukushima, the अंतरराष्ट्रीय Energy एजेंसी halved इसके अनुमान of अतिरिक्त nuclear generating capacity to be निर्मित by 2035.
Photograph of the Berlin वॉल taken इससे the West पक्ष.
The वॉल थी built in 1961 to prevent ईस्ट germans from fleeing from साम्यवादी.
It was an iconic प्रतीक of the ठंडा War और इसके पतन in 1989 marked the end of the War.
the ठंडा War, प्रायः दिनाँक from 1947 to 1991, थी a sustained राज्य of political and military tension between powers in the पश्चिमी Bloc, dominated by the United States with NATO among its allies, and powers in the Eastern bloc, वर्चस्व by the Soviet Union along with the Warsaw Pact.
इस began बाद the success of their अस्थाई wartime गठबंधन against Nazi Germany, leaving the USSR and the US as two superpowers with profound economic और राजनैतिक differences.
A neutral गुट arose with the Non-Aligned Movement founded by मिश्र, India, and Yugoslavia ; this गुट rejected association with either the US-led West or the Soviet-led ईस्ट.
the Cold War थी so named because the two प्रमुख powers—each possessing nuclear weapons and thereby threatened साथ mutual assured विनाश —never मिले in सीधा सैन्य कॉम्बैट.
Instead, in their संघर्ष for global influence they engaged in ongoing psychological warfare और in regular अप्रत्यक्ष confrontations through proxy wars.
चक्र of relative calm होता be followed by high टेंशन, जिससे could have led to संसार युद्ध.
the tensest टाइम्स यहूद दौरान the Berlin Blockade ( 1948–1949 ), the कोरियाई War ( 1950–1953 ), the Suez Crisis ( 1956 ), the Berlin Crisis of 1961, the क्यूबन missile crisis ( 1962 ), the वियतनाम War ( 1959–1975 ), the Yom kippur War ( 1973 ), the Soviet war in अफगानिस्तान ( 1979–1989 ), the सोवियत downing of कोरियाई Air Lines Flight 007 ( 1983 ), और the `` समर्थ archer '' NATO military exercises ( 1983 ).
The conflict थी expressed through सैन्य coalitions, रणनीतिक conventional force deployments, extensive aid to क्लाएंट states, espionage, विशाल propaganda अभियान, conventional and nuclear बाहें दौड़, appeals to न्यूट्रल nations, rivalry at खेल events ( in particular the Olympics ), and technological प्रतियोगिताओं such as the स्पेस रेस.
The us and USSR became शामिल in political and सैन्य conflicts in the Third संसार देशों of Latin America, Africa, the Middle ईस्ट, and Southeast Asia.
to alleviate the risk of a संभावित nuclear war, both पहलू sought राहत of राजनैतिक tensions through détente in the 1970s.
In the 1980s, the United States increased राजनयिक, military, and आर्थिक pressures on the Soviet Union, at a समय when the कम्युनिस्ट state was already suffering from economic stagnation.
in the mid-1980s, the new सोवियत President Mikhail गोर्बाचेव introduced the liberalizing reforms of perestroika ( `` reorganization '', 1987 ) and glasnost ( `` खुलेपन '', ca. 1985 ).
Pressures लिये national independence grew stronger in पूर्वी यूरोपीय, विशेषकर कैंडल.
वे reached a तोड़कर point जब गोर्बाचेव refused to use Soviet सैनिकों to support the faltering सरकारी of East Germany in late 1989.
Within सप्ताह all the satellite राज्य broke free from Moscow in a शांतिपूर्ण wave of revolutions ( वहीँ was कुछ violence in रोमानिया ).
The pressures escalated अंदर the Soviet संघ, where साम्यवादी fell और the USSR थी formally dissolved in लेट 1991.
The United States remained as the world 's तभी superpower.
the ठंडा War and इसके कार्यक्रम have left a significant विरासत, और it is often referred to in popular culture, विशेषकर in media featuring themes of espionage and the threat of nuclear warfare.
Pikes Peak राज्य पार्क is a राज्य park of Iowa, यूएसए, featuring a bluff overlooking the अपर Mississippi नदी विपरीत the confluence of the विस्कॉन्सिन नदी.
The पार्क is operated by the आयोवा विभाग of प्राकृतिक Resources.
It is nearly a thousand acres ( 4 km2 ) in extent.
The nearest city is McGregor, आयोवा.
आयोवा राजमार्ग 76 लगभग defines its northern boundary.
It gets इसके नाम from the Iowa अवतार of pikes Peak, a विशेषकर ऊँची point निहार the gorge of the Upper मिसिसिपी, and जैसे Pikes शिखर in Colorado, is named लिये zebulon Pike.
There are चढ़ाई trails, campgrounds and RV सुविधाएं.
Mountain बाइक are permitted in certain portions of the park.
aside from recreational विकास, the land in the park was never cleared और to a large extent remains as it थी पहले the आगमन of white उपनिवेश.
It is part of a larger complex of parks, reserves और refuges which include Effigy mounds नेशनल Monument, the विभिन्न components of the पीला River State Forest, the enormous Upper Mississippi नदी नेशनल Wildlife and मछली Refuge और much छोटी, much less खूब known driftless क्षेत्रफल नेशनल Wildlife Refuge.
the Northeast आयोवा Legacy ट्रेल System is undergoing विकास, and होगा कनेक्ट तत्व of ये sites.
zac Brown Band is an अमरीकी country/folk band based in Atlanta, Georgia.
the lineup consists of Zac भूरा ( lead vocals, guitar ), Jimmy De Martini ( चलाऊ, vocals ), जॉन Driskell हॉपकिंस ( bass guitar, vocals ), coy Bowles ( गिटार, keyboards ), क्रिस Fryar ( drums ), मिट्टी कुक ( guitar, keyboards, mandolin, स्टील guitar, vocals ), और डेनियल de लॉस रेयेस ( percussion ).
the band has toured throughout the United राज्य, सहित a स्लॉट on the 2009 and 2010 Bonnaroo Music Festival.
They have भी recorded पाँच studio albums, and charted nine Number One singles on the Billboard country charts : `` Chicken Fried ``, `` Toes ``, `` राजमार्ग 20 Ride ``, `` फ़्री ``, `` As वो 's Walking Away ``, `` Colder मौसम ``, `` Knee Deep ``, `` Keep me In Mind ``, and `` अलविदा in Her Eyes `` in जोड to the singles `` whatever It Is `` और `` No Hurry ``, which peaked at क्रमांक 2 on the same chart.
बात radio is a radio स्वरूप containing discussion परिचय topical issues.
Most shows are regularly hosted by a single individual, और often feature interviews with a क्रमांक of different अतिथि.
बात रेडियो typically शामिल an तत्व of listener participation, usually by प्रसारण live conversations between the host and listeners जो `` call in '' ( प्रायः via telephone ) to the दिखाएँ.
Listener contributions हैं usually screened by a दिखाएँ 's producer ( s ) in order to maximize audience ब्याज and, in the मामला of commercial talk radio, आकर्षित विज्ञापनदाता.
Generally, the shows are organized into segments, each separated by a ठहराना लिये विज्ञापन ; however, in पब्लिक or non-commercial radio, music is sometimes played in place of commercials to separate the कार्यक्रम segments.
विसंगतियाँ of talk रेडियो शामिल conservative talk, hot बात, उदार talk and खेल talk.
While बात रेडियो रै historically been associated with am/fm, starting around 2005 the प्रौद्योगिकी for Internet-based talk-radio shows became cost प्रभावी in the form of podcasts.
अभी, it is संभावित for an व्यक्तिगत to उपयोग a variety of सेवाएं to host an Internet-based talk-radio show without carriage by a परंपरागत रेडियो station.
in जोड tv प्रोग्रामिंग from बात and news आउटलेट ऐसे as BBC, सीएनएन, Bloomberg और फॉक्स हैं अभी often available expanding the संसार of talk रेडियो further.
बात रेडियो सुनना is अभी enjoyed not तभी on radios, लकिन a wide variety of अन्य devices and सेवाएं सहित PCs using itunes, स्टेशन निर्देशिका such as Tunein, show निर्देशिका smartphones साथ apps ऐसे as Stitcher.
hippa is a genus of decapod crustaceans in the family Hippidae, containing the following species:
hippa adactyla Fabricius, 1787
Hippa admirabilis ( Thallwitz, 1892 )
hippa alcimede ( De man, 1902 )
Hippa australis hale, 1927
Hippa carcineutes Holthuis & Manning, 1970
hippa celaeno ( de Man, 1896 )
Hippa granulatus ( Borradaile, 1904 )
Hippa hirtipes ( Dana, 1852 )
hippa indica haig, मुरुगन & Balakrishnan नायर, 1986
Hippa marmorata ( Hombron & Jacquinot, 1846 )
Hippa ovalis ( A. Milne-Edwards, 1862 )
hippa picta ( Heller, 1861 )
hippa strigillata ( Stimpson, 1860 )
hippa testudinaria ( Herbst, 1791 )
Hippa truncatifrons ( Miers, 1878 )
It is closely सम्बन्धित to the genus Emerita, and species have प्रायः been transferred between the दो genera.
Jakarta ( ), officially ज्ञात as the Special पूंजी Region of जकार्ता ( ), is the capital and largest city of इंडोनेशिया.
Located on the northwest coast of जावा, Jakarta is the देश 's economic, सांस्कृतिक and राजनैतिक केन्द्र, and साथ a population of 10,187,595 as of नवम्बर 2011, it is the most populous नगर in Indonesia and in Southeast एशिया, and is the thirteenth सबसे आबादी नगर in the world.
the आधिकारिक metropolitan area, known as jabodetabek ( a नाम formed by combining the आरंभिक syllables of जकार्ता, bogor, Depok, Tangerang and bekasi ), is the second largest in the world, yet the metropolis 's suburbs still continue beyond it.
Jakarta is सूचीबद्ध as a वैश्विक नगर in the 2008 वैश्वीकरण and संसार Cities Study समूह and Network ( GaWC ) research.
and रै an area of.
This क्षेत्रफल has population of खूब over 28 million, making it one of the world 's largest conurbations in terms of number of inhabitants.
in 2011, Jakarta ranked 17th among the world 's 200 largest cities, a jump इससे its 2007 ranking of 171.
जकार्ता has grown अधिक rapidly than Kuala Lumpur, बीजिंग and Bangkok.
Established in the fourth सदी, the city became an important trading बंदरगाहों for the Kingdom of sunda.
It was the de facto पूंजी of the डच East Indies ( when it थी ज्ञात as batavia ) and has continued as the पूंजी of इंडोनेशिया चूंकि the देश 's independence was घोषित in 1945.
the नगर is the seat of the ASEAN Secretariat.
Jakarta is परोसा by the soekarno–hatta International Airport, Halim Perdanakusuma International विमानक्षेत्र, और Tanjung priok harbour ; it is connected by several intercity and commuter railways, and served by अनेक बस lines कार्यशील on सुरक्षित busways.

Air conditioning is the प्रक्रम of altering the गुण of air ( primarily तापमान and humidity ) to अधिक favourable शर्तें.
अधिक generally, एयर conditioning can refer to कोई रूप of technological cooling, heating, ventilation, or disinfection कि modifies the condition of air.
An एयर कंडीशनर ( often referred to as एयर कॉन, ac or A/C, and not to be उलझन साथ the संक्षिप्त लिये alternating वर्तमान ) is a major or home appliance, प्रणाली, or mechanism designed to बदलें the air तापमान और आर्द्रता within an area ( प्रयुक्त for cooling और sometimes हीटिंग depending on the air properties at a given time ).
The कूलिंग is typically done using a simple प्रशीतन साईकिल, but sometimes evaporation is प्रयुक्त, commonly लिये comfort cooling in buildings और मोटर वाहनों.
in construction, a पूरा system of heating, ventilation और air conditioning is referred to as `` hvac ``.

DC बात ( styled as dc बात ), is a ग्रैमी -winning Christian rap trio.
the group थी formed in lynchburg, वर्जिनिया in 1987 by Toby McKeehan, Michael Tait, and केविन अधिकतम स्मिथ.
वे have released five major studio albums together : DC बात ( 1989 ), nu Thang ( 1990 ), फ़्री at Last ( 1992 ), यीशु Freak ( 1995 ), and Supernatural ( 1998 ).
In 2002, the Encyclopedia of Contemporary Christian म्यूज़िक पुकारा DC बात `` the most popular overtly ईसाई act of सब time. ''
In 2000, the group released an EP titled Solo which contained दो solo गीतों from each member.
चूंकि कि time, dc बात रै महरूम on an indefinite hiatus, और the तीन बैंड सदस्यों have प्रत्येक led solo careers.
They have performed and recorded व्यक्तिगत songs together several टाइम्स दौरान the 2000s, हालांकि the समूह never officially reunited or disbanded.
the समूह 's musical style विकसित significantly throughout उनके करियर.
Their पहला two releases, DC बात और Nu थांग, were of the hip हॉप genre.
dc Talk 's तीसरा album, फ़्री at पिछला, also मुख्यतः took influence from the हिप hop स्टाइल, हालांकि उनके music began taking on a rock ध्वनि.
The trio 's पिछला दो albums, यीशु freak and Supernatural, यहूद predominantly pop rock.
The Bible is a संकलन of अनेक shorter किताबे written at अलग times और बाद समवेत into the biblical canon.
All but the shortest of these books have महरूम विभाजित into अध्याय, generally a page or so in length, since the early 13th सदी.
Since the mid-16th सदी, प्रत्येक अध्याय has महरूम further विभाजित into `` verses '' of a few short लाइनों or sentences.
sometimes a वाक्य spans more than one verse, as in the मामला of, and sometimes there is more than एक वाक्य in a सिंगल verse, as in the case of.
as the chapter और verse divisions यहूद not part of the original ग्रन्थ, they रूप भाग of the paratext of the Bible.
the Jewish divisions of the यहूदी टेक्स्ट differ at various points from those प्रयुक्त by Christians.
For उदाहरण, in यहूदी tradition, the ascriptions to अनेक Psalms हैं regarded as स्वतंत्र verses, making 116 अधिक आयतें, whereas the स्थापित Christian practice is to गिनती और क्रमांक each Psalm ascription together with the first verse following it.
Some chapter divisions भी occur in different स्थान, e.g. in यहूदी Bibles is numbered as in ईसाई translations.
An index ( plural : indexes ) is a list of words or phrases ( 'headings ' ) and संबद्ध संकेतक ( 'locators ' ) to where useful material relating to कि heading can be found in a document.
in a traditional back-of-the-book index the headings होगा शामिल names of लोगों, places और events, and concepts selected by a व्यक्ति as होने प्रासंगिक और of interest to a possible रीडर of the book.
The pointers are typically page numbers, paragraph numbers or खण्ड numbers.
In a library catalog the words हैं लेखक, titles, विषय headings, etc., और the संकेतक हैं कॉल संख्याएँ.
Internet ढूंढें इंजन, such as Google, and full text searching सहायता provide अभिगम to information but are नहीं as selective as an index, as वे provide non-relevant links, and may miss relevant information if it is नहीं phrased in exactly the रास्ता वे expect.
in United राज्य financial regulation, a suspicious activity report ( or sar ) is a रपट made by a financial institution to the वित्तीय Crimes प्रवर्तन Network ( FinCEN ), an agency of the संयुक्त राज्य विभाग of the Treasury, regarding संदिग्ध or potentially संदिग्ध activity.

Facebook is an online social networking service, जिनकी नाम तना इससे the colloquial नाम लिये the किताब given to students at the start of the academic साल by some university administrations in the United States to help विद्यार्थी get to know each other.
it थी founded in February 2004 by चिह्नित zuckerberg with his कॉलेज roommates and fellow हार्वर्ड University students Eduardo Saverin, Andrew mccollum, डस्टिन Moskovitz और क्रिस ह्यूजेस.
The website 's सदस्यता was initially limited by the founders to Harvard students, but was expanded to other कॉलेजों in the Boston क्षेत्रफल, the आइवी लीग, और Stanford विश्वविद्यालयों.
It धीरे added support for विद्यार्थी at various other universities पहले opening to high school students, and eventually to anyone aged 13 and over.
फेसबुक अभी allows any users who घोषित themselves to be at least 13 सालो old to become registered users of the site.
Users must register पहले using the site, बाद जिससे they may बनाएँ a personal प्रोफ़ाइल, add अन्य उपयोक्ता as friends, and एक्सचेंज संदेश, including automatic notifications जब वे update their profile.
Additionally, उपयोक्ता may जुड़ें common-interest user groups, व्यवस्थित by workplace, स्कूल or कॉलेज, or other characteristics, and categorize their friends into lists ऐसे as `` People From Work '' or `` बंद मित्रों ''.
As of सितंबर 2012, Facebook रै over एक अरब क्रियाशील उपयोक्ता.
According to a may 2011 उपभोक्ता Reports survey, there हैं 7.5 million children under 13 with accounts and 5 million under 10, violating the site 's शर्तें of सेवा.
In may 2005, Accel साझेदार invested $ 12.7 लाख in Facebook, और जिम Breyer added $ 1 million of his own money to the घट.
A जनवरी 2009 Compete.com study क्रमित Facebook as the सबसे प्रयुक्त सोशल networking सेवा by worldwide मासिक क्रियाशील उपयोक्ता.
entertainment Weekly included the साईट on its end-of-the-decade `` best-of '' list, saying, `` How on धरती किया we stalk our exes, remember our co-workers ' birthdays, bug our friends, and play a rousing खेल of scrabulous पहले Facebook ? ''
Critics, such as Facebook Detox, state कि Facebook has turned into a नेशनल obsession in the United States, resulting in vast amounts of time खोया and प्रोत्साहित आत्ममोह.
Quantcast estimates Facebook has 138.9 लाख monthly unique U.S. विज़िटर in May 2011.
According to Social Media Today, in अप्रैल 2010 an estimated 41.6 % ( 129.5 million ) of the U.S. जनसांख्यिकी था a Facebook खाता.
nevertheless, फेसबुक 's market growth started to stall in some regions, साथ the site losing 7 लाख active उपयोक्ता in the संयुक्त States और Canada in may 2011.
Facebook आखिरकार filed for an आरंभिक पब्लिक offering on February 1, 2012, और was headquartered in मेनलो Park, California.
Facebook inc. began selling stock to the पब्लिक और trading on the नैस्डैक on May 18, 2012.
सल्फोनेमाइड functional group
hydrochlorothiazide is a sulfonamide और a thiazide.
Furosemide is a sulfonamide, but नहीं a thiazide.
Sulfonamide or sulphonamide is the basis of several groups of drugs.
the original जीवाणुरोधी sulfonamides ( sometimes called sulfa drugs or sulpha drugs ) are synthetic antimicrobial एजेंटों that contain the सल्फोनेमाइड group.
Some sulfonamides are also विहीन of antibacterial activity, e.g., the anticonvulsant sultiame.
the sulfonylureas और thiazide diuretics हैं नए ड्रग groups based on the जीवाणुरोधी sulfonamides.
Sulfa allergies हैं आम, hence medications containing sulfonamides are विहित carefully.
it is important to मेक a distinction between sulfa drugs and other sulfur-containing दवाएँ and एडिटिव, such as sulfates और sulfites, जिससे are chemically unrelated to the sulfonamide group, और do not कारण the same hypersensitivity reactions देखी in the sulfonamides.

30 सेकेंड to Mars is an अमरीकी चट्टान band from लॉस Angeles, formed in 1998.
Since 2007, the बैंड has consisted of कर्ता jared Leto ( सीसे vocals, rhythm guitar, songwriter ), Shannon Leto ( ड्रम, percussion ) and Tomo Miličević ( lead guitar, keyboards ).
following the departure of मैट Wachter ( now of Angels & airwaves ) in 2007, Tim kelleher became the bassist लिये the समूह, performing live तभी with दोनो jared and Miličević रिकॉर्डिंग बास for studio recordings, while Braxton olita ( keyboards ) was added to the touring lineup in 2009.
Previously, the समूह also featured guitarists Solon Bixler ( अभी of Great उत्तरी ) and केविन Drake ( now of polaroid Kiss ).
To तिथि, 30 सेकेंड to Mars have released three स्टुडियो एल्बम – 30 सेकेंड to मंगल ( 2002 ), A खूबसूरत Lie ( 2005 ), This is War ( 2009 ) और three extended plays – AOL Sessions Undercover ( 2007 ), to the Edge of the Earth ( 2008 ), and MTV Unplugged : 30 Seconds to Mars ( 2011 ).
30 Seconds to Mars ' म्यूज़िक has been associated ज़्यादातर with neo-prog, प्रगतिशील मेटल and post-grunge, लकिन वे have भी included emo, screamo, space rock and synthrock into उनके म्यूज़िक.
वे have महरूम compared to गुलाबी Floyd ( who यहूद an influence on their work ) और औजार because of their उपयोग of philosophical और spiritual गीत, concept एल्बम और their उपयोग of प्रायोगिक music.
A Christmas स्टोरी is a 1983 अमरीकी Christmas comedy फिल्मी based on the short कहानियां और semi-fictional उपाख्यानों of लेखक and raconteur जां गड़रिये, आधारित on his किताब In God We विश्वास, सब Others अदा Cash, with some elements निकला from Wanda हिक्की 's रात्रि of Golden यादें.
it was निर्देशित by Bob Clark.

The भवन थी initially a rowing club and was later converted into the restaurant.

नई यॉर्क नगर क्रूज Liner टर्मिनल in Hell 's Kitchen at 52nd Street.
the New यॉर्क Passenger Ship टर्मिनल ( also known as the लक्ज़री Liner पंक्ति or मैनहटन Cruise टर्मिनल or नई York Cruise Terminal ) is a terminal for ocean-going passenger ships on मैनहटन 's west side.
the टर्मिनल consists of उत्तर River Piers 88, 90, 92 and 94 on the Hudson River between West 46th और West 54th Street.
( As a general नियम, pier संख्याएँ in मैनहटन can be determined by adding 40 to the corresponding cross-street. )
Ships now डॉक at पियर 88, 90 and 92.
Pier 94 on the north पक्ष is now प्रयुक्त लिये exhibition space.
बांध 86, once प्रयुक्त by United राज्य Lines, is अभी home to the USS Intrepid.
in 2003, the टर्मिनल संभाला 900,000 passengers.
The नगर is forecasting कि 1.5 million will use the terminal by 2017.
the piers हैं long और अलावा.
They were first completed in 1935 to replace the चेल्सी Piers as the city 's लक्ज़री liner टर्मिनल.
The new terminal थी built to हैंडल बडे जहाजों that था outgrown the Chelsea पियर.
the piers were renovated in 1970 और हैं फिलहाल undergoing another $ 150 लाख नवीकरण.
The renovated plans call for it to handle three विशाल जहाजों at a time.
In doing renovations, the नगर is also considering decommissioning बांध 92.
Logo of the नई York क्रूज Terminal.For
decades the टर्मिनल was the only ocean-going यात्री terminal in New York harbor.
With an upsurge in क्रूज ship ट्रैफ़िक and the terminal 's क्षमता to handle comfortably only तीन large ships at a time, two new terminals have opened in the harbor — the केप स्वतंत्रता क्रूज Port opened in 2004 in Bayonne, नई जर्सी ( used by royal Caribbean क्रूज Line, Celebrity क्रूज़ और azamara क्रूज़ ), and the Brooklyn क्रूज टर्मिनल ( प्रयुक्त by the Queen Mary 2 and other ships of the Carnival Corporation क्रूज ब्रांड्स ) खोली in 2006 in Brooklyn, New यॉर्क.
the West पक्ष Highway takes a छोटी jog ईस्ट from the पियर to नीचे West 42nd गली because जब the टर्मिनल was निर्मित land था to be taken away from मैनहटन to allow लिये longer पियर.
The us Army corps of Engineers, who कंट्रोल the waterfront dimension, would नहीं extend the pierhead line farther into the river, so the city विस्तारित the pier by cutting दूर at the land.
The city earlier किया this for the Chelsea Piers ; however in Chelsea only landfill was taken दूर.
At the यात्री Terminal वास्तविक मैनहटन schist थी taken दूर.

Many प्रमुख passenger जहाजों have docked there, including the RMS महारानी Mary 2 and Freedom of the Seas, पहले the Brooklyn and Bayonne terminals opened.

Christian सही is a पद used in the United राज्य to describe right-wing Christian political groups that are characterized by उनके strong support of socially रूढ़िवादी policies.
Christian conservatives principally तलाश to apply their understanding of the teachings of christianity to politics and पब्लिक policy by proclaiming the मान of those शिक्षाओं and/or by seeking to use those teachings to influence विधि and पब्लिक policy.
in the u.S., the ईसाई सही is an informal coalition formed around a core of धर्मान्तरण protestants that draws `` support from politically conservative Catholics, Jews, Mormons, और occasionally secularists '' जो share उनके लक्ष्य.
The movement has its roots in अमरीकी राजनीती going back as far the 1940s और has महरूम especially influential since the 1970s.
Their influence draws, in part, इससे grassroots activism as well as their focus on social issues and ability to motivate the electorate around those issues.
The ईसाई सही is notable आज for advancing socially conservative positions on issues including school prayer, स्टेम cell शोध, homosexuality, contraception, गर्भपात, और pornography.
Although the Christian right is usually संबद्ध साथ the U.S., the movement has been a key factor in the politics of Canada, The Netherlands, Northern आयरलैंड और ऑस्ट्रेलिया, among others.
दूर East Movement ( stylized as far★east गति or abbreviated FM ) is an American हिप hop band quartet based in Los एंजिल्स.
the समूह formed in 2003 और consists of Kev nish ( केविन nishimura ), prohgress ( James roh ), j-splif ( jae Choung ), और dj virman ( Virman coquia ).
Far East Movement 's पहला claim to fame थी उनके सोंग `` गोलाकार Round '' featured in the हॉलीवुड movie, the तेज़ and the Furious : Tokyo Drift, और इसके subsequent soundtrack, वीडियो खेल और dvd.
Since `` गोलाकार गोलाकार '', the group रै महरूम featured on विभिन्न संजाल shows सहित,, Entourage, Gossip लड़की, and Finishing the खेल ( a प्रदर्शित फिल्मी at sundance 2007 ).
Their single `` जैसे a g6 `` hit क्रमांक one on the बिलबोर्ड Hot 100 Chart और on iTunes as खूब in late अक्तूबर 2010.
Far East गति also has the भेद of होने the first asian-american group to earn a # 1 hit on the Billboard Hot 100 in the संयुक्त राज्य.
LR44 is the आईईसी नामांकन लिये an क्षारीय 1.5 volt बटन कोशिका, commonly used in छोटी led flashlights, digital thermometers, calculators, calipers, घड़ियाँ, घड़ियाँ, खिलौने and laser pointers.
LR44 alkaline cell
The battery नामकरण is defined by the International Electrotechnical Commission ( IEC ) in इसके 60086-3 standard ( प्राथमिक batteries, भाग 3 देखें बैटरी ).
the अक्षर L indicates the electrochemical system प्रयुक्त ; a zinc negative एलेक्ट्रोड, manganese dioxide depolarizer and धनात्मक एलेक्ट्रोड, and an क्षारीय electrolyte.
R44 indicates a round cell 11.4±0.2 mm व्यास और 5.2±0.2 mm height as defined by the IEC standard 60086.
Manufacturers have their अपना part numbers for IEC प्रकार LR44 batteries including:
lr44, LR44G, LR44GD, LR44H

a76, gda76, GP76A, GPA7, GPA75, GPA76, gps76A,

4.5-volt, d, c, AA, AAA, AAAA, A23, 9-volt, CR2032 and LR44 बैटरी
Other types of बैटरी are or यहूद made in the R44 size.
Formerly, पारा batteries यहूद made as बटन cells ( प्रकार MR44 और nr44 ).
Zinc-air batteries type PR44 require एयर to work.
Silver-oxide batteries type SR44 may provide extra क्षमता compared to lr44 types but have slightly different वोल्टेज विशेषताएँ.
Performance of a device meant to use a silver-oxide battery may be degraded साथ substitution of LR44 types.
