Hurricane कैटरीना was the deadliest और most destructive Atlantic hurricane of the 2005 अटलांटिक hurricane season.
It was the costliest प्राकृतिक disaster, as well as एक of the five deadliest hurricanes, in the history of the United राज्य.
Among अंकित अटलांटिक hurricanes, it was the sixth strongest overall.
at least 1,833 people died in the hurricane and subsequent floods, बनाना it the deadliest u.S. hurricane since the 1928 okeechobee hurricane ; total property damage was estimated at $ 81 billion ( 2005 USD ), nearly triple the क्षति brought by Hurricane Andrew in 1992.
hurricane Katrina formed over the बहामा on August 23, 2005 and crossed दक्षिणी Florida as a moderate Category 1 hurricane, causing कुछ deaths और flooding वहीँ पहले strengthening rapidly in the गल्फ of मैक्सिको.
The hurricane strengthened to a Category 5 hurricane over the warm Gulf water, लकिन weakened before making its second landfall as a Category 3 hurricane on the morning of Monday, अगस्त 29 in southeast louisiana.
It caused severe विनाश along the गल्फ coast इससे central Florida to टेक्सास, much of it due to the storm surge.
The most significant number of मौतों occurred in New ऑरलियन्स, louisiana, जिससे flooded as the levee प्रणाली catastrophically failed, in many cases hours after the storm था स्थानांतरित inland.
आखिरकार 80 % of the city and विशाल tracts of neighboring parishes became flooded, and the floodwaters lingered for weeks.
however, the worst प्रॉपर्टी क्षति occurred in तटीय areas, ऐसे as all Mississippi beachfront towns, जिससे यहूद flooded over 90 % in घंटों, as नौकाएँ and casino barges rammed buildings, pushing cars and घरों अंतर्देशीय, with waters reaching 6–12 miles ( 10–19 km ) इससे the beach.
The hurricane surge protection असफलताओं in New Orleans are considered the worst सिविल अभियान्त्रिकी disaster in u.S. history and prompted a मुकदमा against the U.S. Army corps of Engineers ( usace ), the designers और builders of the तटबन्ध प्रणाली as mandated by the Flood Control अधिनियम of 1965.
Responsibility लिये the failures and बाढ़ was laid squarely on the Army Corps in January 2008 by Judge Stanwood Duval, u.S. District अदालत, लकिन the संघीय agency could नहीं be held financially liable due to sovereign प्रतिरक्षण in the Flood कंट्रोल Act of 1928.
There थी also an investigation of the responses from संघीय, राज्य and लोकल सरकारें, resulting in the resignation of Federal Emergency Management Agency ( fema ) director Michael D. Brown, और of New Orleans पुलिस Department ( nopd ) Superintendent एडी Compass.
Several agencies सहित the United राज्य coast गार्ड ( USCG ), नेशनल Hurricane Center ( NHC ), और National Weather सेवा ( NWS ) यहूद commended लिये their actions.
They provided सटीक hurricane weather tracking forecasts with sufficient lead time.
भी the सबसे insistent appeals from national, राज्य और लोकल public officials to निवासियों to evacuate before the storm did नहीं warn that the levees could उल्लंघन और fail.
U.S. कर्ज़ इससे 1940 to 2011.
Red लाइनों indicate the `` debt आयोजित by the पब्लिक '' and ब्लैक lines indicate the total नेशनल debt or सकल पब्लिक कर्ज़.
the अंतर is the `` intragovernmental debt, '' जिससे शामिल दायित्वों to सरकारी programs ऐसे as सोशल Security.
Stated as a formula, National कर्ज़ = कर्ज़ held by the Public + intragovernmental कर्ज़.
The दूसरी फलक shows the two कर्ज़ figures as a percentage of U.S. जीडीपी ( dollar value of u.S. economic production for that year ).
The शीर्ष panel is deflated so every year is in 2010 dollars.
the United राज्य public कर्ज़ is the money borrowed by the संघीय सरकारी of the United States through the issuing of प्रतिभूति by the Treasury और other संघीय government agencies.
us पब्लिक debt consists of two components:
Debt held by the पब्लिक includes Treasury प्रतिभूति आयोजित by निवेशकों outside the federal government, including कि आयोजित by individuals, corporations, the संघीय आरक्षित प्रणाली और विदेशी, state और local governments.
Debt आयोजित by government खाते or intragovernmental कर्ज़ includes non-marketable Treasury securities held in खाते administered by the संघीय सरकारी कि are owed to program beneficiaries, such as the सोशल Security विश्वास निधि.
Debt आयोजित by सरकारी accounts represents the संचयी surpluses, including ब्याज आय, of these खाते that have महरूम invested in राजकोष securities.
Public debt increases or decreases as a result of the annual unified budget deficit or surplus.
The संघीय government बजट deficit or surplus is the अंतर between सरकारी रसीदें और spending, ignoring intra-governmental हस्तांतरण.
however, कुछ spending that is excluded from the deficit ( supplemental appropriations ) भी adds to the debt.
Historically, the US पब्लिक कर्ज़ as a share of जीडीपी increased दौरान युद्धों और recessions, and subsequently declined.
लिये example, debt held by the पब्लिक as a share of जीडीपी peaked बस after संसार युद्ध II ( 113 % of जीडीपी in 1945 ), but then गिरी over the following 30 सालो.
in हाल decades, however, large बजट deficits and the resulting increases in debt have led to चिंता about the long-term sustainability of the federal सरकारी 's fiscal policies.
On 2 April 2013, कर्ज़ held by the public was approximately $ 11.959 trillion or about 75 % of GDP.
intragovernmental holdings stood at $ 4.846 trillion, giving a combined total public debt of $ 16.805 खरब.
as of January 2013, $ 5.6 खरब or लगभग 47 % of the debt held by the public थी owned by विदेशी investors, the largest of which were the लोगों 's Republic of China और Japan at just over $ 1.1 trillion each.
In बास्केट, an assist is attributed to a player जो गुजरता the बॉल to a teammate in a way that leads to a स्कोर by फ़ील्ड लक्ष्य, अर्थ that he or वो was `` assisting '' in the basket.
वहीँ is some निर्णय involved in deciding whether a passer should be credited with an assist.
An assist can be scored for the passer भी if the खिलाड़ी who receives the pass makes a बास्केट after dribbling the बॉल.
however, the असली definition of an assist किया नहीं शामिल such परिस्थितियों, so the comparison of assist statistics across eras is a complex matter.
तभी the pass directly before the स्कोर may be गिने as an assist, so no more than एक assist can be recorded प्रति field लक्ष्य ( unlike in अन्य sports, ऐसे as ice हॉकी ).
A pass कि leads to a शूटिंग foul and scoring by फ़्री throws does not गिनती as an assist in the NBA, but करता in fiba play ( तभी one assist is awarded per set of free throws in जिससे at तनिक एक free throw is made ).
Point guards tend to मिलेंगी the most assists per खेल ( apg ), as उनके भूमिका is primarily that of a passer और ballhandler.
centers tend to मिलेंगी fewer assists, but centers साथ शुभ मंजिल उपस्थिति and court दृष्टि can dominate a टोली by assisting.
Being inside the key, the center often रै the best angles and the best position for `` dishes '' और other छोटी passes in the scoring area.
बीच Wilt Chamberlain led the NBA in assists in 1968.
A दमदार center साथ inside-scoring prowess, such as पूर्व एनबीए center hakeem olajuwon, can भी be an effective assistor क्युकी the रक्षा 's double-teaming tends to open up offense in the रूप of shooters.
The एनबीए single-game assist record is 30, held by स्कॉट Skiles of the ऑरलैंडो जादू विरूद्ध the डेनवर Nuggets, on December 30, 1990.
the NBA record for most career assists is held by जॉन Stockton with 15,806.
the mill or mille ( ) ( sometimes mil in the uk, जब discussing property taxes in the संयुक्त States, or previously in Cyprus और Malta ) is a now-abstract ईकाई of currency used sometimes in accounting.
In the United राज्य, it is a notional unit समतुल्य to of a संयुक्त States डालर ( a tenth of a cent ).
In the संयुक्त किंगडम it was प्रस्तावित during the decades of चर्चा on the decimalization of the पाउंड as a division of the पाउंड sterling.
Several other मुद्राएँ प्रयुक्त the मिल, ऐसे as the maltese lira.
The term आता इससे the Latin `` millesimum '', meaning `` thousandth part ''.
The greco-persian Wars ( also often पुकारा the Persian Wars ) were a श्रेणी of conflicts between the Achaemenid साम्राज्य of फारस and city-states of the Hellenic world that started in 499 BC और lasted जबतक 449 BC.
the टक्कर between the fractious राजनैतिक संसार of the Greeks और the enormous empire of the Persians began when Cyrus the ग्रेट conquered ionia in 547 bc.
Struggling to rule the independent-minded cities of Ionia, the Persians appointed उत्पीड़क to नियम प्रत्येक of them.
इस would prove to be the source of much trouble लिये the Greeks and Persians alike.
In 499 BC, the तब tyrant of Miletus, aristagoras, embarked on an expedition to जीतें the island of Naxos, with Persian support ; however, the expedition was a क़हर और, pre-empting उसके dismissal, Aristagoras incited सब of हैलेनिक Asia Minor into rebellion विरूद्ध the फारसियों.
This was the beginning of the Ionian विद्रोह, which होता पिछला until 493 bc, progressively drawing more regions of एशिया नाबालिग into the conflict.
aristagoras secured सैन्य support इससे एथेंस and Eretria, और in 498 BC ये शक्तियां helped to कैप्चर and बर्न the पारसी regional पूंजी of sardis.
the Persian king दारा the Great vowed to have बदला on Athens और eretria लिये this अधिनियम.
The revolt continued, साथ the दो sides effectively stalemated throughout 497–495 BC.
in 494 bc, the फारसियों regrouped, and attacked the epicentre of the विद्रोह in Miletus.
at the Battle of Lade, the Ionians suffered a decisive शिकस्त, and the rebellion collapsed, साथ the final members being stamped out the following साल.
Seeking to सुरक्षित उसके empire इससे further revolts और इससे the interference of the mainland Greeks, Darius embarked on a योजना to जीतें यूनानियों और to punish एथेंस and eretria for burning sardis.
The पहला पारसी invasion of Greece began in 492 bc, साथ the Persian general mardonius conquering Thrace और macedon पहले several mishaps मजबूर an जल्दी समाप्त to the अभियान.
In 490 BC a दूसरी फ़ोर्स was भेजा to यूनानियों, इस समय आरपार the ईजियन समुद्र, अंतर्गत the कमांड of datis and Artaphernes.
This expedition subjugated the Cyclades, पहले besieging, capturing and razing eretria.
However, while en रूट to आक्रमण एथेंस, the पारसी force was decisively defeated by the athenians at the बैटल of मैराथन, ending Persian प्रयत्न for the time being.
दारा then began to plan to पूरा the conquest of यूनानियों, but died in 486 BC and responsibility for the conquest passed to उसके बेटे Xerxes I.
in 480 BC, Xerxes personally led the second पारसी invasion of Greece साथ एक of the largest प्राचीन armies कभी assembled.
Victory over the 'Allied ' यूनानी राज्य ( led by Sparta and Athens ) at the Battle of thermopylae allowed the Persians to torch Athens और overrun सबसे of यूनानियों.
However, while seeking to destroy the combined Greek fleet, the फारसियों suffered a severe defeat at the बैटल of Salamis.
the following साल, the confederated Greeks गई on the offensive, defeating the Persian फौज at the Battle of plataea, और ending the आक्रमण of यूनानियों.
The अलाइड Greeks followed up their कामयाबी by destroying the rest of the Persian fleet at the Battle of mycale, before expelling Persian garrisons from Sestos ( 479 BC ) और Byzantium ( 478 BC ).
The क्रियाएँ of the सामान्य Pausanias at the siege of byzantium alienated many of the Greek states from the Spartans, और the anti-Persian गठबंधन was therefore reconstituted around Athenian leadership, as the so-called Delian League.
The Delian League जारी to campaign against Persia for the अगला three decades, beginning with the expulsion of the remaining Persian garrisons इससे यूरोपीय.
at the बैटल of the Eurymedon in 466 BC, the League जीती a दोगुना विजय कि finally secured freedom for the cities of Ionia.
However, the League 's involvement in an मिश्र विद्रोह ( from 460–454 BC ) resulted in a विनाशकारी शिकस्त, and further campaigning थी निलंबित.
a fleet was sent to साइप्रस in 451 bc, but हासिल little, and जब it withdrew the greco-persian Wars खींचा to a शांत समाप्त.
Some historical sources suggest the end of hostilities was चिह्नित by a peace treaty between एथेंस और Persia, the so-called Peace of callias.
Hooverville निकट Portland, Oregon
A `` Hooverville '' is the लोकप्रिय नाम for shanty towns built by बेघर people during the ग्रेट Depression.
They यहूद named after Herbert Hoover, who was President of the संयुक्त States during the onset of the Depression and widely blamed लिये it.
The पद was coined by Charles Michelson, publicity chief of the Democratic National Committee.
Matthew माइकल Hasselbeck ( born September 25, 1975 ) is an अमरीकी फ़ुटबॉल quarterback for the Indianapolis कोल्टस of the नेशनल Football League ( NFL ).
He थी drafted in the छठे round of the 1998 एनएफएल Draft by the ग्रीन Bay पैकर्स.
After a season on the अभ्यास स्क्वाड और two seasons backing up Brett Favre, he was traded to the सिएटल Seahawks in 2001.
hasselbeck gained the starting role in 2003, and led सिएटल to छह playoff दिखावे and a Super कटोरी appearance ; he was selected to three Pro Bowls and an all-pro selection.
Following टेन सीज़न with the Seahawks, Hasselbeck joined the टेनेसी टाइटन्स in 2011.
Hasselbeck then हस्ताक्षरित a contract साथ the Indianapolis Colts in 2013 कम than 24 hours बाद होने released by the टेनेसी Titans.
ICT is inevitably related to the कंप्यूटर network.
सूचना and Communications Technology or ( ICT ), is often used as an विस्तारित पर्याय लिये सूचना प्रौद्योगिकी ( it ), लकिन is a more specific term कि stresses the role of unified communications और the संयोजन of telecommunications ( telephone lines and wireless signals ), कंप्यूटर as खूब as necessary enterprise तन्त्र, middleware, storage, and audio-visual प्रणालियों, which enable users to अभिगम, store, संचारण, और हेरफेर information.
the phrase ICT had महरूम प्रयुक्त by अकादमिक शोधकर्ताओं since the 1980s, लकिन it became लोकप्रिय बाद it was प्रयुक्त in a रपट to the UK सरकारी by डेनिस stevenson in 1997 और in the संशोधित नेशनल Curriculum लिये England, वेल्स और Northern Ireland in 2000.
The term ICT is now also प्रयुक्त to refer to the अभिसरण of audio-visual and टेलीफोन संजाल with computer networks through a single cabling or कड़ी प्रणाली.
There are large आर्थिक incentives ( विशाल cost savings due to विलोपन of the टेलीफोन network ) to merge the audio-visual, building management and telephone network with the computer संजाल system using a सिंगल unified system of cabling, signal वितरण and management.
The term infocommunications is used in कुछ cases as a shorter form of information and संचार ( s ) technology.
In फैक्ट Infocommunications is the expansion of दूरसंचार साथ सूचना processing और content handling functions on a common डिजिटल technology आधार.
लिये a comparison of these और अन्य शर्तें, देखिए.
For आईसीटी Development Index around the संसार, देखिए.
This is a list of characters from जार्ज Lopez.
a schematic प्रस्तुतीकरण of the plum pudding मॉडल of the atom ; in Thomson 's गणितीय model the `` corpuscles '' ( or आधुनिक electrons ) यहूद arranged non-randomly, in rotating rings
The वर्तमान model of the sub-atomic structure involves a dense nucleus surrounded by a probabilistic `` बादल '' of electrons
the plum pudding model of the अणु by J. J. Thomson, जो discovered the electron in 1897, was प्रस्तावित in 1904 before the डिस्कवरी of the परमाणु केंद्रक in order to add the electron to the परमाणु model.
In इस मॉडल, the atom is रचित of electrons ( जिससे Thomson still पुकारा `` corpuscles '', though G. J. Stoney had प्रस्तावित that atoms of electricity be called electrons in 1894 ) घिरी by a soup of धनात्मक charge to balance the electrons ' ऋणात्मक आरोप, like negatively चार्ज `` plums `` surrounded by positively charged `` खीर ``.
The electrons ( as we जान उन्हें today ) यहूद विचार to be positioned throughout the अणु, but साथ many structures possible for positioning multiple electrons, particularly rotating बजती of electrons ( see below ).
बजाय of a soup, the atom was भी sometimes said to have had a `` cloud '' of positive चार्ज.
With this model, Thomson abandoned उसके earlier `` nebular atom '' परिकल्पना in which the atom थी composed of immaterial vortices.
अभी, at least part of the अणु was to be composed of Thomson 's particulate ऋणात्मक corpuscles, although the बाकी of the positively charged भाग of the अणु remained somewhat nebulous and ill-defined.
the 1904 Thomson model थी disproved by the 1909 सुनहरा foil प्रयोग of Hans Geiger and अर्नेस्ट Marsden.
This थी interpreted by Ernest Rutherford in 1911
to imply a बहुत small nucleus of the atom containing a very high positive चार्ज ( in the case of सुनहरा, enough to संतुलन about 100 electrons ), thus leading to the Rutherford मॉडल of the atom.
Although gold has an परमाणु number of 79, तत्काल बाद Rutherford 's paper appeared in 1911 Antonius Van den broek made the intuitive suggestion कि atomic number is nuclear charge.
The matter required experiment to decide.
Henry Moseley 's work दिखाया experimentally in 1913 ( see moseley 's law ) कि the effective nuclear चार्ज was very close to the atomic number ( moseley found तभी एक unit difference ), and Moseley referenced तभी the papers of वैन den broek और रदरफोर्ड.
This कार्य culminated in the solar-system-like ( but quantum-limited ) bohr model of the atom in the same year, in जिससे a nucleus containing an atomic number of धनात्मक charge is घिरी by an equal number of electrons in orbital शेल.
Bohr था also inspired Moseley 's work.
thomson 's मॉडल was compared ( हालांकि नहीं by thomson ) to a British dessert पुकारा plum खीर, hence the name.
Thomson 's पेपर was published in the March 1904 edition of the Philosophical Magazine, the leading अंग्रेजों science जर्नल of the दिन.
In thomson 's दृश्य :... the अणु of the elements consist of a number of negatively electrified corpuscles enclosed in a गोला of uniform positive electrification,...
In this model, the electrons were free to rotate within the blob or बादल of धनात्मक substance.
These orbits were stabilized in the मॉडल by the fact कि जब an electron moved दूर from the center of the positive cloud, it felt a larger net positive inward फ़ोर्स, क्युकी वहीँ was more material of opposite charge, अंदर its orbit ( see गाउस 's विधि ).
in Thomson 's model, electrons were फ़्री to rotate in बजती जिससे यहूद further stabilized by interactions between the electrons, and spectra यहूद to be accounted for by energy differences of अलग ring orbits.
Thomson attempted to make उसके model account for कुछ of the प्रमुख spectral लाइनों known for कुछ elements, but थी नहीं notably successful at इस.
Still, thomson 's मॉडल ( साथ साथ a समान saturnian रिंग model for atomic electrons, भी put forward in 1904 by Nagaoka बाद James Clerk मैक्सवेल 's model of शनि 's बजती ), यहूद पहले harbingers of the बाद और more successful solar-system-like bohr मॉडल of the atom.
Typical strip of bacon.
Bacon is a cured meat prepared इससे a pig.
it is first cured using विशाल quantities of नमक, either in a brine or in a dry पैकिंग ; the result is fresh bacon ( भी ज्ञात as green bacon ).
Fresh bacon may then be further सूखी for weeks or months in cold air, or it may be boiled or smoked.
Fresh and dried bacon is typically पकाया पहले eating.
Boiled bacon is तैयार to eat, as is कुछ smoked बेकन, but may be पकाया further before eating.
Bacon is prepared इससे अनेक different कटौती of मांस.
It is usually बना from side and back cuts of पोर्क, मगर in the संयुक्त States, जहाँ it is almost always prepared from pork पेट ( typically referred to as `` streaky '', `` fatty '', or `` American स्टाइल '' outside of the us और कनाडा ).
The side काटें has more मांस and कम fat than the belly.
Bacon may be prepared इससे either of two distinct back cuts : fatback, which is almost pure मोटे, और pork loin, जिससे is बहुत lean.
bacon-cured pork loin is known as वापस bacon.
uncooked पोर्क belly बेकन strips.
बेकन may be eaten स्मोक्ड, boiled, fried, baked, or grilled, or used as a नाबालिग ingredient to flavor बर्तन.
बेकन is also प्रयुक्त for barding and larding roasts, especially game, e.g. venison, pheasant.
the word is निकला इससे the Old High जर्मनी bacho, meaning `` buttock '', `` ham '' or `` side of bacon '', और cognate with the बूढ़ा French bacon.
in continental Europe, इस भाग of the pig is usually not smoked like बेकन is in the United States ; it is प्रयुक्त primarily in घन ( lardons ) as a cooking ingredient, valued both as a source of fat और लिये इसके flavor.
in इटली, this is called pancetta and is usually cooked in छोटी घन or served uncooked और thinly sliced as भाग of an antipasto.
मांस from other animals, such as बीफ, lamb, chicken, बकरी, or turkey, may भी be cut, cured, or वरना prepared to resemble bacon, और may even be referred to as `` बेकन ''.
Such उपयोग is common in areas with significant Jewish and Muslim populations.
The यूएसडीए defines बेकन as `` the cured belly of a swine carcass '' ; other cuts and विशेषताएँ must be separately योग्य ( e.g., `` स्मोक्ड pork loin बेकन '' ).
For safety, bacon जरूर be treated to prevent trichinosis, caused by Trichinella, a parasitic roundworm which can be destroyed by heating, freezing, drying, or धूम्रपान.
Bacon is distinguished from नमक pork और हैम by मतभेद in the brine ( or शुष्क packing ).
Bacon brine रै added curing ingredients, सबसे notably sodium nitrite, और occasionally सोडियम नाइट्रेट or potassium nitrate ( साल्टपीटर ) ; sodium ascorbate or erythorbate are added to accelerate curing और stabilize रंग.
Flavorings ऐसे as भूरा sugar or maple हैं used for some products.
If used, sodium polyphosphates are added to improve sliceability and reduce spattering when the bacon is pan fried.
आज, a brine लिये ham, but not bacon, includes a large राशि of sugar.
historically, `` ham '' and `` bacon '' referred to different cuts of मांस that were brined or packed identically, often together in the वही बैरल.
The Employee Retirement आय Security अधिनियम of 1974 ( ERISA ) (, संहिताबद्ध in part at ) is a संघीय law जिससे establishes minimum मानकों for pension plans in निजी industry and provides for extensive नियम on the federal income कर effects of transactions संबद्ध साथ employee लाभ plans.
erisa was enacted to protect the interests of employee benefit plan participants and their beneficiaries by:
Requiring the disclosure of financial and other information concerning the योजना to beneficiaries ;
Establishing मानकों of conduct लिये plan fiduciaries ;
Providing for appropriate remedies and access to the federal न्यायालयों.
erisa is sometimes प्रयुक्त to refer to the full body of laws regulating employee benefit योजनाएँ, जिससे are found मुख्यतः in the Internal आय कोड and erisa itself.
Responsibility for the interpretation and enforcement of ERISA is divided among the Department of मजदूर, the Department of the राजकोष ( particularly the आतंरिक Revenue Service ), और the Pension लाभ guaranty Corporation.
illegal immigration to the United राज्य is the act of विदेशी nationals प्रवेश the संयुक्त States, without सरकारी permission and in violation of United राज्य राष्ट्रीयता विधि, or रहकर परे the termination date of a वीज़ा, also in violation of the विधि.
a warning sign at the international boundary between the संयुक्त राज्य and Canada in Point रॉबर्ट्स, Washington.
a much different approach at the U.S.-Mexico किनारा निकट el पासो, टेक्सास
The undocumented immigrant population of the संयुक्त States in 2008 was estimated by the बीच for Immigration अध्ययन to be परिचय 11 लाख people, bas from 12.5 million people in 2007.
Other estimates दायरा from 7 to 20 लाख.
according to a 2005 pew हिस्पैनिक बीच रपट, 56 % of undocumented आप्रवासियों यहूद इससे Mexico ; 22 % were from other Latin अमरीकी देशों ; 13 % were इससे एशिया ; 6 % यहूद from Europe और Canada ; and 3 % यहूद from अफ़्रीकी and the बाकी of the संसार.
Alvin Independent School District is a स्कूल district based in एल्विन, Texas ( यूएसए ).
एल्विन ISD is a विशाल suburban स्कूल district south of ह्यूस्टन in the communities of एल्विन, Manvel, Pearland, Hillcrest, Rosharon, Iowa Colony, लिवरपूल, and Amsterdam.
AISD serves Pearland city 's rapidly growing western portion of the नगर including the नई large master-planned communities of छाया क्रीक Ranch, दक्षिण Fork, और दक्षिणी trails.
Alvin ISD covers of land.
In इंसान anatomy, the ulnar nerve is a तंत्रिका जिससे रनों near the ulna bone.
The ulnar collateral स्नायु of elbow संयुक्त is in संबंध with the ulnar nerve.
The nerve is the largest unprotected तंत्रिका in the human देह ( meaning unprotected by मांसपेशी or अस्थि ), so injury is आम.
इस nerve is directly connected to the little finger, and the सटा half of the रिंग finger, supplying the palmar side of these fingers, including दोनो front and वापस of the tips, perhaps as far back as the fingernail beds.
One method of injuring the तंत्रिका is to strike the medial epicondyle of the humerus from posteriorly, or inferiorly with the कोहनी flexed.
The ulnar nerve is trapped between the bone और the overlying skin at इस point.
इस is commonly referred to as bumping एक 's `` funny bone ''.
This name is विचार to be a pun, based on the ध्वनि resemblance between the name of the bone of the अपर arm, the `` humerus `` और the word `` humorous ``.
Alternatively, according to the ऑक्सफोर्ड अंग्रेज़ी Dictionary it may refer to `` the peculiar sensation experienced when it is struck ''.
Hogwarts स्कूल of चुड़ैल and wizardry, shortened Hogwarts, is a fictional British school of magic for students aged eleven to eighteen, and is the primary setting लिये the पहला six books in J.K. रोलिंग 's Harry Potter श्रेणी.
रोलिंग has suggested that वो may have inadvertently लिया the name from the hogwort संयंत्र ( croton capitatus ), which वो had seen at Kew Gardens some समय पहले writing the श्रेणी, although the names `` The हॉग्वार्ट्स '' और `` hoggwart '' appear in the 1954 निगेल molesworth book How To be topp by Geoffrey Willans.
हॉग्वार्ट्स school was voted as the 36th बेहतरीन Scottish शैक्षणिक स्थापना in a 2008 online ranking, outranking Edinburgh 's Loretto स्कूल.
according to a director of the Independent Schools संजाल Rankings, it was added to the schools listing `` for fun '' and was तब voted on.
The U.S. subprime mortgage crisis was a नियत of कार्यक्रम and शर्तें कि led to a financial संकट and subsequent recession कि began in 2008.
it was characterized by a rise in subprime बंधक delinquencies और foreclosures, and the resulting मनाही of प्रतिभूति backed by said mortgages.
Several major financial institutions collapsed in सितंबर 2008, साथ significant disruption in the flow of credit to businesses और consumers and the onset of a कठोर वैश्विक recession.
There were अनेक कल्याणकारी of the संकट, साथ टीकाकारों assigning different levels of दोष to वित्तीय institutions, regulators, credit एजेंसियों, government housing policies, और consumers, among अन्य.
A proximate कारण was the rise in subprime lending.
the प्रतिशत of lower-quality subprime mortgages originated दौरान a given साल rose इससे the historical 8 % or निम्नतर range to approximately 20 % इससे 2004 to 2006, with much higher ratios in some parts of the u.s.
A high percentage of these subprime mortgages, over 90 % in 2006 for उदाहरण, यहूद adjustable-rate mortgages.
ये two परिवर्तन were भाग of a broader ट्रेंड of lowered lending standards और higher-risk बंधक उत्पाद.
Further, U.S. households had become increasingly ऋणी, with the ratio of debt to disposable निजी income rising from 77 % in 1990 to 127 % at the समाप्त of 2007, much of इस बढ़ाएँ mortgage-related.
When U.S. home prices अस्वीकृत steeply बाद peaking in mid-2006, borrowers ' क्षमता to पुनर्वित्त their loans became more मुश्किल.
As adjustable-rate mortgages began to reset at higher interest दरों ( causing higher monthly payments ), mortgage delinquencies soared.
Securities backed with mortgages, सहित subprime mortgages, widely आयोजित by वित्तीय firms globally, lost सबसे of their मान.
Global investors भी drastically घटाया purchases of mortgage-backed debt and अन्य प्रतिभूति as part of a decline in the capacity and willingness of the private financial प्रणाली to support lending.
चिंताएं about the soundness of u.S. क्रेडिट and वित्तीय markets led to tightening credit around the संसार and slowing आर्थिक growth in the u.S. and Europe.
The संकट था severe, long-lasting consequences for the u.S. और European economies.
The U.S. entered a गहन मंदी, साथ nearly 9 लाख कार्य खोया दौरान 2008 and 2009, roughly 6 % of the workforce.
U.S. आवास prices गिरी nearly 30 % on average और the U.S. भण्डार market fell approximately 50 % by early 2009.
As of early 2013, the u.S. भण्डार market had बरामद to इसके pre-crisis शिखर लकिन housing कीमतें remained near उनके कम point and बेरोजगारी remained elevated.
Economic विकास remained नीचे pre-crisis levels.
यूरोपीय भी continued to संघर्ष with इसके own economic crisis.
कार्ल जंग in 1910.
Myers और Briggs extrapolated their MBTI theory from जंग 's कृतियाँ in his book मनोवैज्ञानिक Types.
The Myers-Briggs प्रकार Indicator ( MBTI ) मूल्यांकन is a psychometric questionnaire designed to measure psychological preferences in how लोगों perceive the संसार and make decisions.
These preferences were extrapolated from the typological theories प्रस्तावित by Carl Gustav Jung and first published in उसके 1921 किताब मनोवैज्ञानिक Types ( अंग्रेज़ी edition, 1923 ).
जंग theorized कि there are चार प्रिंसिपल psychological functions by जिससे we अनुभव the world : सनसनी, intuition, feeling, and thinking.
One of these चार functions is dominant सबसे of the time.
the original developers of the व्यक्तित्व inventory यहूद Katharine Cook Briggs और her daughter, Isabel briggs Myers ; ये two, having पढ़ाई extensively the work of जंग, turned their interest of इंसान behavior into a devotion of turning the theory of मनोवैज्ञानिक types to व्यावहारिक उपयोग.
They began creating the indicator दौरान संसार युद्ध II, believing that a knowledge of personality वरीयताओं would help women जो यहूद entering the industrial workforce for the first time to पहचानो the sort of war-time jobs that would be `` most comfortable और effective ''.
The initial questionnaire grew into the myers-briggs Type Indicator, which was first published in 1962.
The mbti focuses on सामान्य populations और emphasizes the value of naturally occurring differences.
Robert Kaplan and Dennis Saccuzzo believe `` the underlying assumption of the mbti is that we all have विशिष्ट preferences in the रास्ता we construe our experiences, and these preferences underlie our रूचि, needs, values, and प्रेरणा '' ( p. 499 ).
`` Judas '' is a सोंग by American recording artist Lady गागा, इससे उसके second studio एल्बम Born This रास्ता ( 2011 ).
it was released by interscope Records on April 15, 2011, चार days ahead of इसके अनुसूचित रिलीज.
Written and उत्पादित by Lady गागा and RedOne, `` Judas '' is a dance and electro हाउस सोंग परिचय a स्त्री in प्रेम with a man who गद्दारी उसके.
It embodies the incidents that have haunted Gaga in the पास्ट, and its कोर meaning refers to the negative भाग of her जीवन that वो ca n't escape.
गागा रै further समझाया that the सोंग was also about honoring एक 's inner darkness in order to bring oneself into the लाइट.
The artwork for the सिंगल was designed by Gaga in Microsoft Word.
In spite of a polarizing impact on several धार्मिक groups, the सोंग was generally खूब received by critics, who likened the song to `` Bad Romance `` with some noting it चाहिए have been the एल्बम 's lead single.
The सोंग has a similar sound to गागा 's पिछला redone-produced ट्रैक्स, including `` Poker फेस ``, `` LoveGame ``, `` Bad Romance '', and `` alejandro ``.
It contains three पृथक hooks और a हाउस -influenced ब्रेक down.
गागा explained कि the lines बोला दौरान the breakdown talk परिचय उसके as परे redemption, regarding the परंपरागत दृश्य of what a स्त्री should be.
`` Judas '' initially had a strong बिक्री खोलने, but was कम successful commercially in comparison to Gaga 's previous singles.
the सोंग reached the शीर्ष ten of the charts in सबसे प्रमुख music बाज़ार, और also पहुँचे the top of the charts in दक्षिण कोरियाई.
a म्यूज़िक video for the song was फिल्माया in अप्रैल 2011, co-directed by Gaga and Laurieann गिब्सन and co-starring Norman Reedus.
it has a biblical कथानक जहाँ Reedus निभाई Judas इस्कैरियट और गागा निभाई Mary magdalene.
The video portrays them as आधुनिक दिन missionaries going to Jerusalem.
It शामिल the biblical स्टोरी of यहूदा betraying यीशु, and ended साथ Gaga as magdalene getting stoned to मौत.
Before its रिलीज, the Catholic लीग condemned गागा for the alleged use of धार्मिक imagery और her role in the वीडियो.
However, आलोचकों generally praised the video, नहीं ढूंढना any अप्रिय content.
The वीडियो was nominated लिये दो पुरस्कार at the 2011 एमटीवी वीडियो Music Awards.
गागा has performed `` Judas '' on a क्रमांक of टेलीविज़न shows, including the Graham नॉर्टन Show, Saturday Night सजीव, शुभ Morning americas `` Summer Concert श्रेणी '', the French X फ़ैक्टर as well as on The Ellen DeGeneres Show.
Marvin Gaye ( April 2, 1939april 1, 1984 ), born Marvin pentz gay, Jr., was an अमरीकी singer-songwriter and musician.
Gaye helped to shape the ध्वनि of Motown रिकॉर्ड in the 1960s with a स्ट्रिंग of hits सहित `` How Sweet It Is ( To Be loved By तुम ) `` और `` i सुना it Through the Grapevine `` and duet recordings with मरियम Wells and tammi terrell, later कमाई the titles `` प्रिंस of motown '' and `` प्रिंस of आत्मा ''.
दौरान the 1970s, Gaye recorded the concept albums What 's Going On और Let 's मिलेंगी It On and became among the first कलाकारों in Motown to ब्रेक away इससे the reins of इसके production company.
gaye 's later recordings influenced अनेक r & b subgenres such as शांत storm and neo-soul.
following a काल in Europe under a कर निर्वासन in the early 1980s, Gaye released the 1982 ग्रैमी award-winning hit `` Sexual Healing `` and the मध्यरात्रि प्रेम album.
Since उसके death in 1984, gaye रै been posthumously honored by many institutions, including the ग्रैमी आजीवन Achievement Award and the Rock and फेंकें Hall of Fame.
The अकादमी Award लिये Best चित्र is एक of the Academy Awards of Merit presented annually by the अकादमी of Motion चित्र कला and Sciences ( AMPAS ) to producers working in the गति चित्र उद्योग और is the only category in जिससे प्रत्येक सदस्य is योग्य to nominate for.
बेहतरीन Picture is माना the most important of the Academy Awards, as it represents all the directing, acting, म्यूज़िक composing, लिखने, संपादन और other प्रयत्न put forth into a film.
Consequently, बेहतरीन चित्र is the final award and the conclusion of the annual अकादमी Awards रस्म.
the Grand staircase columns at the dolby Theatre in Los एंजिल्स, where the Academy पुरस्कार ceremonies have महरूम held चूंकि 2002, शोकेस every फिल्मी that रै won the Best Picture शीर्षक since the award 's inception 85 years पहले.
Heavy बरसात is an इंटरैक्टिव drama action-adventure video खेल निर्मित by फ्रेंच developer Quantic Dream exclusively for the प्लेस्टेशन 3.
the game is written और निर्देशित by quantic Dream 's founder और CEO दाउद पिंजरा.
भारी Rains story is a dramatic थ्रिलर modelled after फिल्मी noir, featuring चार protagonists involved साथ the रहस्य of the origami Killer, a serial कातिल who उपयोग विस्तारित periods of rainfall to drown his पीड़ितों.
Ethan Mars is trying to save his son from being the next victim, जबकि investigative journalist Madison Paige, FBI profiler Norman jayden, और निजी जासूस स्कॉट शेल्बी हैं each trying to track bas clues to the Origami Killer 's पहचान.
the खिलाड़ी interacts with the खेल by performing actions highlighted on screen सम्बन्धित to motions on the नियंत्रक, and in कुछ cases, performing a श्रेणी of जल्दी time events during fast-paced action sequences.
The खिलाड़ी 's decisions और actions during the game will affect the narrative.
the प्रमुख वर्ण can be killed, and निश्चित actions may lead to different scenes और endings.
A playable demo थी released on 11 February 2010.
The demo थी released prior to इस तिथि for people जो took भाग in a Four Day चुनौती on 5 फ़रवरी 2010.
a पैच to allow use of the प्लेस्टेशन Move नियंत्रक to खेल the game थी released in September 2010.
भारी बरसात was critically acclaimed and has sold over दो लाख copies.

a परिवर्धित version of the game थी released titled Heavy Rain Edition modifiée exclusively in France, aimed towards a younger audience.
in 2010, the game was included in the किताब 1001 Video Games You Must Play Before तुम die.
कुल superannuation industry देनदारी : members funds और reserves ( A $ लाखो ) चूंकि 1988.
सालाना total superannuation उद्योग asset विकास 1996-2005.
Superannuation in Australia refers to the इंतजाम जिससे लोगों make in Australia to have निधि available लिये them in रिटायरमेंट.
in ऑस्ट्रेलिया, superannuation arrangements हैं government-supported और encouraged, और minimum provisions are compulsory लिये कर्मचारी.
For उदाहरण, नियोक्ता are required to अदा a proportion of an employee 's salaries and wages ( फिलहाल 9 % ) into a superannuation fund, but लोगों are encouraged to put aside additional निधि into superannuation.
The न्यूनतम obligation required by employers is नियत to बढ़ाएँ to 12 % धीरे stepping annually from 2013 to 2020.
An individual can withdraw निधि आउट of a superannuation fund when the person meets one of the conditions of release contained in Schedule 1 of the Superannuation उद्योग ( पर्यवेक्षण ) regulations 1994.

चुनावी College map प्रर्दशित the results of the 2012 U.S. presidential election.
President बराक ओबामा ( D - il ) जीती the popular vote in 26 states and the ज़िला of Columbia ( denoted in blue ) to कैप्चर 332 electoral मत.
Former Governor mitt romney ( r - ma ) won the लोकप्रिय vote in 24 राज्य ( denoted in रेड ) to कैप्चर 206 electoral votes.
Cartogram representation of the Electoral College vote for the 2012 चुनाव, with प्रत्येक वर्गाकार representing एक electoral vote.
The संयुक्त States चुनावी कॉलेज is the संस्था कि officially elects the President और Vice President of the United States प्रत्येक four सालो.
The अध्यक्ष और वाइस President are not elected directly by the मतदाता.
Instead, they हैं निर्वाचित by `` electors '' जो are chosen by popular vote on a state-by-state basis.
निर्वाचक हैं apportioned to each राज्य and the District of Columbia, लकिन नहीं to territorial possessions of the United States, such as Puerto रीको and गुआम.
the क्रमांक of electors in प्रत्येक राज्य is equal to the क्रमांक of members of Congress to which the state is entitled.
the Twenty-third Amendment has always resulted in the ज़िला of कोलंबिया having three electors.
वहीँ are 538 electors, based on there being 435 प्रतिनिधि और 100 senators, plus the three electors इससे the ज़िला of कोलंबिया.
Electors are pledged to particular presidential and vice presidential उम्मीदवार, though unpledged electors are possible.
In all states, except Maine and Nebraska, electors are निर्वाचित on a `` winner-take-all '' basis.
कि is, सब electors pledged to the अध्यक्षीय candidate who wins the most votes in a state become electors for that state.
maine and Nebraska use the `` congressional ज़िला विधि '', selecting एक elector within each congressional ज़िला by लोकप्रिय vote और selecting the बाकी two electors by a statewide लोकप्रिय vote.
हालांकि no elector is जरूरी by federal law to honor a pledge, there have तभी been बहुत few occasions जब an elector voted contrary to a प्रतिज्ञा.
the बारहवीं amendment specifies कैसा a President और Vice अध्यक्ष are elected and requires each elector to डाल एक vote for President and another vote for Vice President.
Critics argue that the चुनावी कॉलेज is inherently undemocratic और gives swing states अनुपातहीन influence in electing the अध्यक्ष and वाइस President.
The Electoral College gives a numeric advantage in the election of the president to the smaller राज्य, as the न्यूनतम number of electors for the छोटी राज्य is three compared to एक लिये the चुनाव of representatives.
On the other hand, the winner-take-all विधि of voting favors the larger states.
A क्रमांक of constitutional amendments have been proposed seeking to alter the Electoral कॉलेज or replace it साथ a direct लोकप्रिय vote.
बराक Hussein Obama II ( ; born August 4, 1961 ) is the 44th and वर्तमान President of the United States, the पहला अफ़्रीकी अमरीकी to hold the office.
Born in Honolulu, Hawaii, Obama is a graduate of Columbia University and Harvard विधि स्कूल, where he थी president of the हार्वर्ड Law पुनर्विलोकन.
he was a community organizer in Chicago before कमाई his law degree.
He worked as a civil rights attorney in Chicago and taught constitutional law at the University of Chicago विधि स्कूल from 1992 to 2004.
he परोसा three शर्तें representing the 13th ज़िला in the इलिनोइस सीनेट इससे 1997 to 2004, कार्यशील unsuccessfully for the United States House of प्रतिनिधि in 2000.
In 2004, Obama प्राप्त नेशनल ध्यान during उसके अभियान to represent Illinois in the United राज्य Senate with his victory in the March Democratic Party primary, his keynote पता at the लोकतांत्रिक National Convention in July, और his चुनाव to the सीनेट in नवम्बर.
he began उसके अध्यक्षीय अभियान in 2007, और in 2008, बाद a close primary campaign against Hillary rodham Clinton, he won sufficient delegates in the लोकतांत्रिक पार्टी primaries to प्राप्त the presidential nomination.
He तब defeated Republican nominee जॉन मैक्केन in the general election, और थी inaugurated as अध्यक्ष on January 20, 2009.
Nine months बाद, ओबामा was नामित the 2009 नोबेल सलाम पुरस्कार laureate.
he was re-elected अध्यक्ष in November 2012, defeating रिपब्लिकन nominee Mitt romney, and was sworn in लिये a second term on January 20, 2013.
Early in his first term in office, Obama signed into विधि economic stimulus legislation in response to the ग्रेट मंदी in the रूप of the American Recovery and Reinvestment Act of 2009 और the कर राहत, बेरोजगारी Insurance reauthorization, और जॉब सृष्टि अधिनियम of 2010.
Other major domestic initiatives in his presidency include the Patient सुरक्षा and सस्ती परवाह अधिनियम, often referred to as `` Obamacare '' ; the dodd–frank वॉल गली Reform and Consumer Protection Act ; the do n't पूछो, do n't बताना Repeal Act of 2010 ; the Budget Control Act of 2011 ; और the American Taxpayer Relief Act of 2012.
In May 2012, he became the first sitting U.S. अध्यक्ष to सरेआम support same-sex marriage and in 2013 उसके administration दायर briefs which urged the Supreme Court to rule in एहसान of same-sex युगल in two high-profile मामले.
In foreign policy, ओबामा ended u.S. military involvement in the Iraq War, increased troop स्तर in Afghanistan, हस्ताक्षरित the नई प्रारंभ arms कंट्रोल treaty साथ रूस, ordered U.S. सैन्य भागीदारी in लीबिया, और ordered the सैन्य आपरेशन कि resulted in the मौत of ओसामा bin Laden.
the होंडा CBR1100XX Super blackbird थी a Honda motorcycle made इससे 1996 to 2007.

An इलेक्ट्रॉनिक health रिकार्ड ( ehr ) is an evolving अवधारणा defined as a व्यवस्थित collection of electronic स्वास्थ्य information about व्यक्तिगत patients or populations.
It is a record in डिजिटल format कि is theoretically सक्षम of being साझा आरपार अलग health care जमावट.
In कुछ मामले this sharing can occur by way of network-connected enterprise-wide information प्रणालियों and other सूचना networks or exchanges.
EHRs may include a range of आंकड़ा, सहित demographics, चिकित्सा history, दवा और allergies, immunization status, प्रयोगशाला test परिणाम, radiology images, vital signs, personal stats like age और वज़न, और billing information.

The Rime of the Ancient मेरिनर ( originally the Rime of the ancyent marinere ) is the longest प्रमुख कविता by the English poet Samuel Taylor Coleridge, written in 1797–98 and published in 1798 in the first संस्करण of गीतात्मक ballads.
Modern editions उपयोग a बाद revised संस्करण मुद्रित in 1817 that featured a gloss.
Along साथ अन्य poems in Lyrical Ballads, it was a signal shift to modern poetry और the शुरूआत of British Romantic साहित्य.
A प्रॉक्सी auto-config ( pac ) संचिका defines कैसा web browsers and other user agents can automatically चुनें the appropriate proxy सर्वर ( अभिगम विधि ) for fetching a दिए URL.
A PAC file contains a जावास्क्रिप्ट फलन “FindProxyForURL ( url, मेजबान ) ”.
इस function returns a स्ट्रिंग साथ एक or more access विधि specifications.
These specifications कारण the उपयोक्ता agent to use a particular प्रॉक्सी सर्वर or to connect सीधे.
Multiple specifications provide a fall-back जब a प्रॉक्सी fails to respond.
The browser fetches this PAC file पहले requesting other यूआरएल.
The url of the PAC file is either configured manually or संकल्पित automatically by the वेब Proxy autodiscovery प्रोटोकॉल.
Zendaya कोलमैन ( born September 1, 1996 ), known mononymously as Zendaya, is an अमरीकी actress, singer और dancer.
वो stars on the डिज़्नी चैनल sitcom Shake It Up as Rocky ब्लू.
वो has starred in दो films and played one of the lead roles in the फिल्मी Frenemies as Halley ब्रैंडन.
She voiced Fern in the Pixie Hollow Games.
वो appeared in Good Luck Charlie as रॉकी Blue and in a Good Luck चार्ली और शेक it Up crossover शीर्षक चार्ली शेक it up.
She appeared on PrankStars as herself in the episode `` Walk the शरारत '' और on A.N.T. Farm as Sequoia Jones in the episode `` Creative सलाहकार. ''
zendaya is also a musician.
She signed a deal with हॉलीवुड रिकॉर्ड on अगस्त 8, 2012 और प्रारंभ recording गीतों for उसके debut album on अगस्त 12, 2012.
She released a सिंगल इससे an independent label called `` swag it आउट `` and another सिंगल with Bella thorne called `` Watch Me, '' which is featured on the ब्रेक it bas album.

On अगस्त 21, 2012, Zendaya and Bella Thorne released an EP पुकारा Shake It Up : Made In Japan.
Zendaya has a Christmas song called `` Shake सांता शेक, '' which is on the Disney Channel अवकाश Playlist cd, which was released on अक्तूबर 2, 2012.
On March 5, 2013 the third Shake it Up soundtrack थी released, entitled I < 3 नृत्य ; on it, zendaya रै two गीतों with Bella - `` Contagious Love '' and `` This Is my नृत्य Floor '' - as well as एक सोलो सोंग, `` Beat of my Drum. ''

it contains सब public-use and military airports in the राज्य.

iOS ( previously iPhone os ) is a mobile ऑपरेटिंग system विकसित and वितरित by Apple inc. originally released in 2007 लिये the iphone and iPod टच प्लेटफ़ॉर्म, it has been extended to support other ठहराना devices ऐसे as the iPad and Apple TV.
नापसंद Microsoft 's Windows Phone and Google 's Android, ठहराना करता नहीं license आईओएस for संस्थापना on non-Apple हार्डवेयर.
, Apple 's app Store contained more than 700,000 iOS applications, जिससे have collectively महरूम downloaded अधिक than 30 billion times.
It had a 21 % share of the smartphone मोबाईल operating system units shipped in the चौथी क्वार्टर of 2012, पीछे only Google 's एंड्रॉइड.
in जून 2012, it accounted for 65 % of mobile वेब आंकड़ा consumption ( including उपयोग on both the iPod टच और the ipad ).
at the half of 2012, वहीँ were 410 लाख devices activated.
according to the खास media event आयोजित by ठहराना on September 12, 2012, 400 million devices have महरूम बेची through June 2012.
the उपयोक्ता इंटरफ़ेस of आईओएस is आधारित on the concept of direct manipulation, using multi-touch इशारों.
Interface control elements consist of sliders, switches, और buttons.
Interaction साथ the os includes इशारों ऐसे as swipe, tap, pinch, and reverse pinch, सब of which have विशिष्ट definitions भीतर the कॉन्टेक्स्ट of the आईओएस ऑपरेटिंग system and its multi-touch interface.
Internal accelerometers are used by some applications to respond to shaking the device ( one common परिणाम is the undo कमांड ) or rotating it in three dimensions ( one common result is switching इससे portrait to लैंडस्केप विधि ).
आईओएस is derived from OS X, साथ जिससे it shares the डार्विन न्यास.
आईओएस is ठहराना 's मोबाईल संस्करण of the os X ऑपरेटिंग system प्रयुक्त on Apple computers.
In iOS, there हैं चार abstraction layers : the कोर OS परत, the Core सेवाएं परत, the Media परत, and the Cocoa Touch परत.
the current संस्करण of the ऑपरेटिंग system ( iOS 6.1.3 ) dedicates 1-1.5 GB of the device 's फ्लैश memory for the system विभाजन, using roughly 800 mb of कि विभाजन ( varying by model ) लिये iOS itself.
आईओएस फिलहाल रनों on iphone, iPad, iPod टच and Apple TV.

A बिगाड़ने is an automotive aerodynamic यंत्र जिनकी intended design function is to 'spoil ' प्रतिकूल air गति आरपार a देह of a गाडी in motion, प्रायः described as turbulence or खीचें.
विघ्न on the सामने of a vehicle are often called air dams, क्युकी in addition to directing air flow they also reduce the amount of air flowing underneath the गाडी which generally reduces aerodynamic लिफ्ट and खीचें.
Spoilers हैं often fitted to race and high-performance खेल cars, although they have become common on passenger vehicles as खूब.
कुछ spoilers हैं added to cars primarily for styling purposes and have either little aerodynamic benefit or even मेक the वायुगतिकी worse.
Spoilers लिये cars are प्रायः incorrectly confused with, or the पद used interchangeably with, विंग्स.
Automotive wings are devices जिनकी intended डिज़ाइन is to generate downforce as air passes around them, नहीं बस disrupt मौजूदा airflow patterns.
Mario, who serves as Nintendo 's शुभंकर, is a fictional अक्षर created by खेल पंक्तियां Shigeru Miyamoto और voiced by Charles martinet.
इस is a सूची of video games where the अक्षर Mario plays a part, either as the समर्थक, antagonist, supporting अक्षर, as भाग of an ensemble डाल, as a कैमियो, or in a game within a game.
It does not शामिल सरल references to the character, such as the portraits of Mario found in the Legend of Zelda : a कड़ी to the Past.
the साल indicated is the साल the खेल was पहला released, most commonly in जापानी ; games were sometimes released सालो later in अन्य regions of the संसार.
The सूची शामिल पोर्ट, remakes and compilations.
It does n't शामिल कोई Virtual Console re-releases.
`` man of Constant विषाद '' ( also known as `` i Am A man of Constant Sorrow '' ) is a परंपरागत अमरीकी folk song first अंकित by लंड burnett, a partially blind fiddler इससे Kentucky.
The song was originally recorded by Burnett as `` Farewell Song '' printed in a Richard burnett songbook, circa 1913.
an जल्दी version थी recorded by emry आर्थर in 1928 ( vocalion vo 5208 ).
Public interest in the सोंग was renewed after the release of the 2000 फिल्मी O Brother, Where Art Thou ?
, as it plays a सेंट्रल role in the film 's plot.
The song was also included in the फिल्मी 's highly successful, multiple-platinum selling साउंडट्रैक.

The वोल्ट ( symbol : v ) is the SI derived unit लिये electric संभावित ( वोल्टेज ), इलेक्ट्रिक potential अंतर, and electromotive फ़ोर्स.
The volt is नामित in सम्मान of the Italian physicist alessandro Volta ( 1745–1827 ), जो invented the voltaic pile, possibly the first रासायनिक battery.

On 28 June 1914, Archduke Franz Ferdinand of ऑस्ट्रिया, heir presumptive to the Austro-Hungarian throne, and his बीवी, Sophie, Duchess of Hohenberg, were शॉट मुर्दे in Sarajevo, by Gavrilo Princip, एक of a समूह of छह Bosnian serb assassins coordinated by डेनियल Ilić.
the political objective of the assassination was to ब्रेक off austria-hungary 's south-slav प्रांतों so वे could be संयुक्त into a Greater सर्बिया or a Yugoslavia.
The assassins ' motives were consistent साथ the movement that बाद became known as Young Bosnia.
सर्बियाई सैन्य अधिकारियों stood behind the attack.
at the top of ये सर्बियाई सैन्य conspirators was Chief of सर्बियाई Military Intelligence Dragutin Dimitrijević, उसके righthand man Major Vojislav Tankosić, and Masterspy rade Malobabić.
Major Tankosić हथियारबंद the assassins साथ बम and pistols और trained them.
The assassins were given access to the वही clandestine टनल of safe-houses and agents that Rade malobabić used लिये the infiltration of weapons and operatives into Austria-Hungary.
The assassins, the कुंजी सदस्यों of the clandestine tunnel, और the key Serbian military षड्यंत्रकारियों who यहूद स्टिल alive यहूद arrested, आजमाया, convicted and punished.
Those who यहूद गिरफ्तार in बोस्निया यहूद आजमाया in Sarajevo in अक्तूबर 1914.
The other षड्यंत्रकारियों were गिरफ्तार और tried before a Serbian kangaroo court on the French-controlled Salonika Front in 1916–1917 on unrelated false आरोप ; सर्बिया चलाया three of the top military conspirators.
Much of कया is known about the assassinations comes from ये two trials and related records.
कार्यभार of responsibility for the bombing and murders of 28 जून is highly विवादास्पद because the attack led to the outbreak of World युद्ध I one month बाद.
मिशन San Juan capistrano was a Spanish मिशन in Southern California, located in present-day San जुआन capistrano.
It was founded on सब संतो ' दिन नवम्बर 1, 1776, by Spanish Catholics of the Franciscan Order.
Named for Giovanni da Capistrano, a 15th century theologian and `` warrior पुजारी '' जो resided in the Abruzzo region of Italy, सैन Juan Capistrano has the distinction of being घर to the oldest भवन in California still in उपयोग, a chapel निर्मित in 1782.
Known alternately as `` Serra 's चैपल '' and `` Father सेरा 's गिरिजाघर, '' it is the only extant structure where it has been documented that the padre junipero सेरा मनाये mass.
एक of the बेहतरीन ज्ञात of the alta कैलिफ़ोर्निया missions ( and one of the few missions to have actually been संस्थापित twice—others होने मिशन सैन Gabriel Arcángel and Mission la Purísima Concepción ).
The site was originally consecrated on अक्तूबर 30, 1775, by Father fermín Lasuén, लकिन was जल्दी abandoned due to अशांति among the स्वदेशी population in सैन Diego.
The success of the settlement is evident in its ऐतिहासिक रिकॉर्ड.
Prior to the आगमन of the missionaries, some 550 natives यहूद बिखरे throughout the लोकल क्षेत्रफल.
By 1790, the number of परिवर्तित ईसाइयों had grown to 700, and बस छह years later nearly 1,000 `` neophytes `` ( हाल converts ) lived in or around the Mission compound.
1,649 baptisms were conducted that साल alone, out of the total 4,639 souls converted between 1776 and 1847.
More than 2,000 former inhabitants ( mostly Juaneño इंडियंस ) are दफ्न in unmarked graves in the Mission 's cemetery ( campo santo ).
the remains of पिता ( later Monsignor ) st. जॉन O'Sullivan, who recognized the property 's ऐतिहासिक value और working tirelessly to conserve and rebuild इसके structures, हैं buried at the entrance to the कब्रिस्तान on the वेस्ट पक्ष of the प्रॉपर्टी, and a statue उठाया in उसके honor stands at the head of the crypt.
The surviving chapel also serves as the final resting place of three padres जो passed on जबकि सेवारत at the Mission : fathers जोस Barona, Vicente fustér, और Vicente Pascual Oliva are all entombed beneath the sanctuary floor.
The Criolla or `` Mission grape, '' was पहला planted at San Juan Capistrano in 1779 ; in 1783, the पहला वाइन produced in Alta California उभरा from the Mission 's winery.
the Mission entered a long period of gradual decline बाद secularization in 1833.
Numerous प्रयत्न were made over the years to restore the Mission to its former glory, लकिन none मिले with great success जबतक the arrival of पिता O'Sullivan in 1910.
Restoration efforts continue, और `` Serra 's चैपल '' is स्टिल used for धार्मिक सेवाएं.
About half-a-million visitors, सहित 80,000 school children, come to the Mission each साल.
And while the तबाह of `` The Great स्टोन गिरिजाघर '' ( which थी all but leveled by an 1812 भूकंप ) are a renowned architectural अचरज, the मिशन is perhaps best ज्ञात for the annual `` Return of the दात '' which is traditionally observed प्रत्येक March 19 ( Saint Joseph 's दिन ).
मिशन San Juan capistrano has परोसा as a पसंदीदा विषय for अनेक notable कलाकारों, and रै महरूम immortalized in साहित्य और on film numerous times, शायद अधिक than कोई other मिशन.
In 1984, a आधुनिक church जटिल थी constructed just उत्तर और वेस्ट of the Mission compound and is अभी known as Mission Basilica San Juan capistrano.
Today, the mission compound serves as a museum, with the सेरा Chapel भीतर the compound serving as a चैपल for the mission parish.
Better Off मुर्दे is a 1985 American teen रोमांटिक comedy film starring John Cusack and written और directed by जंगली Steve हॉलैंड.
It tells the स्टोरी of high स्कूल student लेन myer जो is suicidal after उसके girlfriend breaks up साथ उसे.
Mercedes-Benz Superdome ( originally Louisiana superdome and commonly the Superdome ) is a खेल and exhibition स्टेडियम, located in the Central कारोबार District of New Orleans, Louisiana, यूएसए.
योजनाएँ were drawn up in 1967, by the New Orleans modernist architectural firm of Curtis and Davis.
Its steel frame covers a expanse.
Its गुम्बद is made of a Lamella multi-ringed फ़्रेम and has a diameter of, making it the largest fixed domed ढांचा in the संसार.
It is घर to the एनएफएल 's New Orleans संतो, the NCAA 's Division I-A tulane Green Wave फ़ुटबॉल team ( the largest फ़ुटबॉल stadium in सम्मेलन USA ), the State Farm Bayou Classic, the R+L वाहक New ऑरलियन्स Bowl, the Allstate Sugar कटोरी and, every चौथी साल, the BCS National Championship Game.
Because of the size और location in one of the major tourist destinations in the United राज्य, the superdome routinely makes the `` short सूची '' of candidates होने considered for प्रमुख sporting कार्यक्रम, such as the Super कटोरी and the Final चार.
In 2005, the Superdome gained अंतरराष्ट्रीय ध्यान of a अलग type जब it housed thousands of people seeking shelter इससे Hurricane कैटरीना.
The भवन suffered extensive damage as a result of the तूफ़ान, and was closed लिये अनेक months afterward.
On October 3, 2011, it थी घोषित कि जर्मनी automaker Mercedes-Benz purchased नामकरण अधिकारों to the stadium.
the new name took प्रभाव on October 23, 2011.
It is the third स्टेडियम कि रै naming rights from mercedes-benz ( and first in the संयुक्त States ), after the Mercedes-Benz Arena, the stadium of Bundesliga club VfB Stuttgart, in Stuttgart, Germany और the Mercedes-Benz Arena in शंघाई, China.

Disney 's एनिमल किंगडम Lodge is an african-themed deluxe resort at the वॉल्ट Disney World Resort.

the रिज़ॉर्ट is स्वामित्व और संचालित by Walt डिज़्नी Parks and Resorts.
डिज़्नी 's एनिमल किंगडम Lodge is located in the एनिमल किंगडम Resort क्षेत्रफल, adjacent to डिज़्नी 's Animal किंगडम.
