The लोगों 's Party, भी known as the `` populists '', was a short-lived राजनैतिक पार्टी in the United States स्थापित in 1891 दौरान the Populist movement ( United States, 19th Century ).
It was सबसे महत्वपूर्ण in 1892-96, and then rapidly faded दूर.
Based among poor, white cotton किसानो in the South ( especially उत्तर कैरोलिना, अलबामा, and टेक्सास ) और hard-pressed wheat किसानो in the plains states ( especially कान्सास and Nebraska ), it represented a कट्टरपंथी crusading form of agrarianism and hostility to banks, railroads, and elites generally.
It sometimes formed coalitions साथ मजदूर unions, and in 1896 the Democrats endorsed their अध्यक्षीय nominee, William Jennings Bryan.
the terms `` populist '' और `` populism `` are commonly used लिये anti-elitist appeals in opposition to स्थापित रूचि and मुख्यधारा parties.
Linguistic map of Nigeria, कैमरून, and Benin.
Sign in अंग्रेज़ी, outside the University of लागोस
वहीँ are सैंकड़ों of भाषाएं spoken in Nigeria.
the प्रमुख भाषाएं are Yoruba, Hausa, Igbo, Edo, Fulfulde, Kanuri, and Ibibio.
the official language of सीरियल, English, the पूर्व colonial language, थी chosen to facilitate the cultural and linguistic एकता of the देश.
English, however, remains an exclusive preserve of the country 's शहरी elite, और is नहीं widely spoken in rural क्षेत्रों, जिससे comprise three quarters of the countries population.
Nigeria 's linguistic diversity is a microcosm of Africa as a whole, encompassing three प्रमुख अफ़्रीकी भाषाएं families : Afroasiatic, Nilo-Saharan, and Niger–Congo.
Nigeria also रै several as-yet unclassified भाषाएं, such as Cen Tuum, which may represent a relic of an even greater diversity prior to the spread of the वर्तमान language परिवारों.
a series of events led to the attack on पर्ल Harbor.
War between Japan और the United States था been a सम्भावना that प्रत्येक स्वदेश 's सैन्य शक्तियां नियोजित for since the 1920s, though real tension did नहीं begin until the 1931 invasion of मंचूरिया by जापानी.
over the next दशक, Japan expanded slowly into China, अग्रणी to all out war between the two in 1937.
In 1940 Japan invaded French Indochina in an effort to embargo सब imports into China, सहित war supplies purchased from the U.S.
This move prompted the संयुक्त States to embargo सब आयल निर्यात, leading the इम्पीरियल Japanese नेवी to estimate कि it था less than दो years of बंकर oil remaining और to support the मौजूदा plans to seize आयल resources in the डच ईस्ट इंडीज.
नियोजन था महरूम underway लिये some time on an attack on the `` दक्षिणी Resource Area '' to add it to the Greater East एशिया Co-Prosperity Sphere that Japan envisioned in the Pacific.
The फिलीपीन islands, at कि time an American territory, were also a जापानी target.
The Japanese military concluded that an आक्रमण of the फिलीपीन would provoke an अमरीकी military जवाब.
बल्कि than seize and fortify the आइलैंड्स, and wait लिये the inevitable US counterattack, जापानी 's सैन्य leaders instead decided on the pre-emptive पर्ल Harbor आक्रमण, which they assumed would negate the American शक्तियां needed for the मुक्ति and reconquest of the islands.
Planning लिये the attack had begun in very early 1941, by admiral isoroku यामामोटो.
he finally जीती assent इससे the Naval High कमांड by, among अन्य things, threatening to इस्तीफा.
The आक्रमण was approved in the summer at an इम्पीरियल Conference and again at a second Conference in the पतन.
Simultaneously over the year, pilots were trained, और ships prepared लिये its निष्पादन.
प्राधिकार लिये the attack was granted at the second इम्पीरियल सम्मेलन if a राजनयिक परिणाम satisfactory to जापानी थी not पहुँचे.
After final approval by सम्राट Hirohito the अनुक्रम to attack was issued at the शुरूआत of December.
A common office stapler
A common school stapler
A stapler is a mechanical device कि joins sheets of paper or similar सामग्री by ड्राइविंग a thin metal staple through the sheets और folding the ends.
Staplers हैं widely used in government, business, कार्यालयों, homes and schools.
the word `` stapler '' can दरअसल refer to a क्रमांक of अलग डिवाइस of varying उपयोग.
In addition to joining paper sheets together, staplers can also be used in a surgical सेटिंग to जुड़ें tissue साथ with सर्जिकल staples to बंद a surgical घाव ( much in the same रास्ता as stitches or sutures ).
typically, सबसे staplers हैं used to जुड़ें अनेक चादरें of paper.
Paper staplers come in two distinct types : manual and इलेक्ट्रिक.
Manual staplers are normally hand-held, although मॉडल that are used while नियत on a desk or other surface are नहीं uncommon.
इलेक्ट्रिक staplers मौजूद in a variety of अलग designs and मॉडल.
उनके प्राथमिक operating function is to join विशाल numbers of पेपर sheets साथ in rapid succession.
Some electric staplers can join up to 20 चादरें at a समय.
Swallowing, known scientifically as deglutition, is the process in the human or एनिमल body that makes कुछ pass from the mouth, to the pharynx, and into the ग्रासनाल, जबकि shutting the epiglottis.
If इस fails and the object goes through the trachea, then choking or pulmonary aspiration can occur.
in the human body it is नियंत्रित by the swallowing reflex.
Thaddeus स्टीवंस ( April 4, 1792 – अगस्त 11, 1868 ), of पेन्सिलवेनिया, was a leader of the Radical Republican गुट of the Republican Party and a fierce प्रतिद्वन्दी of slavery.
He थी one of the सबसे influential members in the इतिहास of कॉंग्रेस.
as chairman of the powerful हाउस तरीके and अर्थात् Committee, Stevens, a witty, व्यंग्यात्मक स्पीकर और flamboyant party नेता, वर्चस्व the हाउस from 1861 जबतक उसके death.
He wrote much of the financial विधान that paid for the अमरीकी Civil War.
Stevens और Senator चार्ल्स sumner यहूद the प्रधान leaders of the कट्टरपंथी Republicans दौरान the war and Reconstruction era.
Scholarly views of स्टीवंस have swung sharply since उसके death as interpretations of Reconstruction have changed.
Historians of the Dunning स्कूल ( 1890s–1940s ) held Stevens responsible लिये demanding harsh उपचार of the श्वेत दक्षिण और violating अमरीकी traditions of republicanism, depicting Stevens as a villain लिये उसके वकालत of harsh उपायों in the दक्षिण such as disfranchising all ex-confederates.
इस highly negative characterization held sway into the 1950s.
The rise of the neo-abolitionist स्कूल in the 1950s led to a strong positive appreciation of स्टीवंस ' work on civil अधिकारों for Freedmen.
a recent biographer characterizes him as, `` The ग्रेट Commoner, savior of free public शिक्षा in Pennsylvania, national Republican नेता in the struggles against गुलामी in the United States and intrepid mainstay of the attempt to secure जातिगत justice लिये the freedmen during पुनर्निर्माण, the only सदस्य of the House of प्रतिनिधि ever to have been ज्ञात as the 'dictator ' of कॉंग्रेस. ''
अवलोकन of the अनुवाद of eukaryotic messenger RNA
Diagram showing the translation of mRNA and the संश्लेषण of proteins by a ribosome
In molecular biology और genetics, अनुवाद is the प्रक्रम through जिससे सेल्यूलर ribosomes manufacture proteins.
it is part of the process of जीन अभिव्यक्ति.
in translation, messenger RNA ( mRNA ) उत्पादित by ट्रांसक्रिप्शन is decoded by the ribosome to produce a विशिष्ट अमीनो acid कड़ी, or polypeptide, that will later fold into an क्रियाशील प्रोटीन.
In bacteria, अनुवाद occurs in the cell 's cytoplasm, where the large और छोटी subunits of the ribosome हैं स्तिथ, and bind to the mRNA.
in eukaryotes, translation occurs आरपार the membrane of the endoplasmic reticulum in a प्रक्रम called vectorial संश्लेषण.
The ribosome facilitates decoding by inducing the binding of trnas with complementary anticodon sequences to that of the mRNA.
The tRNAs carry विशिष्ट amino acids that हैं chained together into a polypeptide as the mRNA गुजरता through and is `` पढ़ा '' by the ribosome in a फ़ैशन reminiscent to that of a भण्डार ticker and ticker टेप.
in many instances, the entire ribosome/mRNA complex बांधता to the outer membrane of the अशिष्ट endoplasmic reticulum और रिलीज the nascent protein polypeptide अंदर लिये later vesicle हस्तांतरण and secretion बाहर of the कोशिका.
Many types of transcribed RNA, ऐसे as transfer rna, ribosomal rna, और small नाभिकीय RNA, do not undergo translation into proteins.
Translation proceeds in four phases : दीक्षा, elongation, translocation और termination ( all describing the growth of the अमीनो एसिड कड़ी, or polypeptide कि is the product of translation ).
अमीनो acids are brought to ribosomes and समवेत into proteins.
In activation, the सही amino acid is covalently bonded to the correct ट्रांसफ़र RNA ( tRNA ).
The अमीनो एसिड is joined by its carboxyl group to the 3 ' oh of the trna by an ester bond.
When the tRNA रै an amino acid linked to it, it is termed `` charged ''.
दीक्षा involves the छोटी subunit of the ribosome बाइंडिंग to the 5 ' end of mRNA with the help of initiation factors ( IF ).
termination of the polypeptide happens जब the a site of the राइबोसोम faces a stop codon ( uaa, UAG, or uga ).
No tRNA can recognize or bind to this codon.
Instead, the stop codon induces the binding of a release factor प्रोटीन that prompts the disassembly of the entire ribosome/mrna complex.
A number of एंटीबायोटिक अधिनियम by inhibiting अनुवाद ; ये include anisomycin, cycloheximide, chloramphenicol, tetracycline, streptomycin, erythromycin, और puromycin, among अन्य.
Prokaryotic ribosomes have a अलग ढांचा इससे that of eukaryotic ribosomes, और thus एंटीबायोटिक can specifically निशाना बैक्टीरियल infections बगैर any detriment to a eukaryotic host 's कोशिकाएं.
A multimedia message on a mobile फोन.
Multimedia Messaging Service ( mms ) is a standard way to send messages that include multimedia सामग्री to और from mobile फोन.
it extends the core sms ( Short संदेश Service ) capability कि allowed एक्सचेंज of text संदेश तभी up to 160 characters in लंबाई.
The most popular उपयोग is to send छायाचित्र from camera-equipped handsets, हालांकि it is भी popular as a method of delivering news और entertainment content including videos, pictures, टेक्स्ट pages और ringtones.
The मानक is developed by the Open Mobile Alliance ( OMA ), हालांकि during विकास it थी भाग of the 3GPP और वैप समूह.
smallpox was an संक्रामक disease unique to humans, caused by either of two virus variants, Variola major and Variola नाबालिग.
The disease is also known by the Latin names variola or Variola वीरा, निकला from varius ( `` spotted '' ) or varus ( `` मुंहासे '' ).
the बीमारी थी originally ज्ञात in English as the `` चेचक '' or `` red plague '' ; the term `` smallpox '' was first प्रयुक्त in Britain in the 15th century to फर्क variola इससे the `` great चेचक '' ( syphilis ).
The last naturally occurring मामला of smallpox ( variola नाबालिग ) थी diagnosed on 26 October 1977.
smallpox localized in small blood बरतन of the skin and in the mouth and गला.
In the skin it resulted in a characteristic maculopapular खाज और, later, raised fluid-filled फफोले.
V. major produces a more serious बीमारी और has an overall mortality रेट of 30–35 %.
V. नाबालिग causes a milder form of बीमारी ( also known as alastrim, cottonpox, milkpox, whitepox, और Cuban खुजली ) which मारता about 1 % of its पीड़ितों.
Long-term जटिलताओं of V. प्रमुख infection शामिल characteristic scars, commonly on the फेस, which occur in 65–85 % of survivors.
Blindness resulting इससे corneal ulceration and scarring, and limb deformities due to गठिया और osteomyelitis are less आम complications, seen in about 2–5 % of cases.
smallpox is believed to have उभरा in human populations परिचय 10,000 BC.
The earliest शारीरिक evidence of it is संभवतः the pustular खाज on the mummified body of pharaoh Ramses V of मिश्र.
the बीमारी killed an estimated 400,000 Europeans annually during the closing सालो of the 18th century ( including five reigning monarchs ), और थी जिम्मेदार for a third of all blindness.
Of सब those infected, 20–60 % —and over 80 % of infected children—died from the disease.
smallpox थी responsible लिये an estimated 300–500 million मौतों during the 20th century.
As recently as 1967, the World Health Organization ( WHO ) estimated कि 15 million people contracted the disease and that two लाख died in that साल.
बाद टीकाकरण अभियान throughout the 19th and 20th centuries, the WHO certified the eradication of smallpox in 1979.
smallpox is एक of two infectious रोगों to have महरूम eradicated, the अन्य होने rinderpest, जिससे was घोषित eradicated in 2011.
`` I want to थाम अपना Hand '' is a song by the English rock band the Beatles.
Written by जॉन लेनन and पॉल McCartney, और अंकित in अक्तूबर 1963, it थी the first बीटल्स record to be made using four-track उपकरण.
साथ advance orders exceeding one लाख copies in the United Kingdom, `` I want to थाम अपना Hand '' होता ordinarily have gone straight to the top of the अंग्रेजों record charts on its day of release ( 29 November 1963 ) था it नहीं been blocked by the group 's first million विक्रेता `` She loves You ``, the Beatles ' पिछला uk single, which थी having a resurgent spell in the top position following intense media coverage of the समूह.
Taking two सप्ताह to dislodge its predecessor, `` I Want to Hold Your हाथ '' ठहरे at number one for five weeks and remained in the uk शीर्ष पचास for twenty-one weeks in कुल.
it was also the group 's first American number one, entering the Billboard Hot 100 chart on 18 जनवरी 1964 at number forty-five and starting the अंग्रेजों आक्रमण of the American म्यूज़िक industry.
by 1 February it held the क्रमांक एक स्पॉट — लिये seven सप्ताह — पहले being replaced by `` She loves तुम '', a रिवर्स परिदृश्य of कया had occurred in Britain, और remained in the us चार्ट लिये a total of fifteen सप्ताह.
`` I want to थाम Your Hand '' became the Beatles ' best-selling single worldwide.
A gasser was a प्रकार of hot rod originating on the dragstrips of the United States in the लेट 1950s and continued जबतक the जल्दी 1970s.
Gassers were आधारित on production models from the 1930s to mid-1960s, which have been stripped of extraneous वज़न and jacked up using a ट्रक बीम axle to provide better weight वितरण on त्वरण ( Beam axles are also हल्का than an स्वतंत्र front suspension ), though a raised stock front suspension is आम as खूब.
आम weight reduction तकनीकों include fiberglass body panels, stripped इंटीरियर्स और plexiglass खिड़कियाँ ( sometimes रंग tinted ).
Because वे were primarily built for रेसिंग, ये गाड़ियाँ typically had the engine swapped to a larger or more powerful एक, the existing stock engine परिवर्धित ( प्रायः heavily ) or both.
It was बहुत common to fit a जड़ें supercharger and mechanical fuel injection, such as एक from Algon, Hilborn, or Crower.
साथ रूप होने लिखवाई by फलन, उनके रूप is often बहुत शीर्ष heavy and ungainly, largely due to front ends होने उठाया higher than stock, to assist in the weight ट्रांसफ़र during रैपिड त्वरण ( racing ).
Having उनके exhaust pipes exit through the front फेंडर well is a common characteristic of gassers, as is having bodies चित्रित in flamboyant metalflakes, मोती, और candy finishes complemented by lettering in जंगली fonts.
The नाम arose because वे competed in a gasoline -fueled drag रेसिंग क्लास, rather than एक using methanol or nitromethane.
the gasser is the predecessor of the modern Funny Car.
Twelve-lead EKG of a 26-year-old male
Electrocardiography ( ECG or ईकेजी from ) is a transthoracic ( across the वक्ष or chest ) interpretation of the electrical activity of the heart over a period of time, as detected by electrodes संलग्न to the सतह of the skin और recorded by a device बाह्य to the body.
the recording उत्पादित by this noninvasive कार्यविधि is termed an electrocardiogram ( also ECG or EKG ).
an ECG is प्रयुक्त to माप the rate और नियमितता of heartbeats, as खूब as the आकार and position of the chambers, the presence of कोई क्षति to the heart, and the प्रभाव of दवाएँ or डिवाइस used to regulate the heart, such as a pacemaker.
Most ECGs हैं performed for diagnostic or research purposes on इंसान दिल, लकिन may also be performed on पशु, usually लिये निदान of दिल abnormalities or शोध.
Donald John ट्रम्प, sr. ( born जून 14, 1946 ) is an American business magnate, television personality and author.
He is the chairman and अध्यक्ष of the Trump संगठन और the संस्थापक of Trump Entertainment रिसॉर्ट.
Trump 's हद lifestyle, outspoken manner, and role on the NBC reality दिखाएँ The प्रशिक्षु have made उसे a well-known हस्ती who was No. 14 on the 2012 Forbes Celebrity 100 list.
ट्रम्प is the son of Fred Trump, a धनवान New York City real-estate developer.
he worked लिये his father 's firm, Elizabeth ट्रम्प & बेटे, while attending the व्हार्टन School of the University of पेन्सिलवेनिया, और in 1968 officially joined the company.
He was दिए कंट्रोल of the कम्पनी in 1971 and renamed it The Trump Organization.
In 2010, ट्रम्प expressed an ब्याज in बनने a candidate लिये अध्यक्ष of the संयुक्त States in the 2012 चुनाव, though in May 2011, he घोषित he would not be a candidate.
In दिसम्बर 2011, ट्रम्प थी suggested as a संभावित vice presidential selection by मिशेल Bachmann, if she were to win the रिपब्लिकन nomination.
`` A बदलें Is Gon na Come '' is a 1964 सिंगल by r & B singer-songwriter sam cooke, written and first recorded in 1963 और released under the आरसीए Victor label shortly after his मौत in late 1964.
हालांकि only a modest hit for cooke in comparison with his previous singles, the song came to exemplify the 1960s ' Civil Rights Movement.
the song has gained in popularity और नाजुक acclaim in the decades since its release, और is # 12 on रोलिंग Stone 's 500 महानतम गीतों of All Time.
भाप उठती इससे the Nesjavellir geothermal Power Station in Iceland.
geothermal उर्जा is thermal energy generated और stored in the धरती.
Thermal उर्जा is the energy कि determines the तापमान of matter.
The geothermal energy of the Earth 's क्रस्ट originates इससे the असली formation of the planet ( 20 % ) and from radioactive decay of खनिज ( 80 % ).
The geothermal gradient, जिससे is the अंतर in तापमान between the core of the planet और its surface, drives a continuous conduction of thermal energy in the form of heat इससे the core to the surface.
The adjective geothermal originates from the यूनानी roots γη ( ge ), अर्थ earth, और θερμος ( thermos ), meaning hot.
at the कोर of the Earth, थर्मल energy is created by radioactive क्षय और temperatures may reach over 5000 °C ( 9,000 °f ).
Heat conducts from the core to surrounding cooler चट्टान.
the ऊँची temperature and दबाव cause some rock to melt, बनाना magma convection upward चूंकि it is हल्का than the ठोस चट्टान.
The magma heats rock और water in the crust, sometimes up to 370 °c ( 700 °F ).
इससे hot springs, geothermal उर्जा has been used for bathing चूंकि Paleolithic times and for space heating चूंकि ancient Roman times, लकिन it is अभी बेहतर known for विद्युत generation.
विश्वव्यापी, परिचय 10,715 megawatts ( MW ) of geothermal power is ऑनलाइन in 24 countries.
An additional 28 gigawatts of सीधा geothermal हीटिंग capacity is installed for district heating, space हीटिंग, spas, industrial प्रक्रियाओं, desalination and agricultural applications.
geothermal power is cost effective, विश्वसनीय, sustainable, and environmentally friendly, लकिन रै historically महरूम सीमित to क्षेत्रों near tectonic plate boundaries.
Recent technological advances have dramatically विस्तारित the range and आकार of सुगठित संसाधन, विशेषकर for अनुप्रयोग ऐसे as घर heating, opening a potential for फैली शोषण.
Geothermal कुएं रिलीज ग्रीनहाउस gases trapped गहन भीतर the earth, but ये emissions are much lower प्रति उर्जा ईकाई than those of fossil fuels.
as a result, geothermal शक्ति रै the potential to सहायता mitigate global warming if widely deployed in प्लेस of चट्टान fuels.
The Earth 's geothermal resources हैं theoretically अधिक than adequate to supply मानवता 's energy needs, but only a very small भिन्न may be profitably शोषित.
Drilling और खोजी for गहन संसाधन is very expensive.
Forecasts लिये the future of geothermal शक्ति depend on assumptions about प्रौद्योगिकी, उर्जा prices, subsidies, and interest rates.
पायलट कार्यक्रम जैसे eweb 's customer opt in Green Power Program show that customers would be willing to अदा a little अधिक for a renewable energy सोर्स like geothermal.
But as a परिणाम of government assisted research and industry अनुभव, the cost of generating geothermal शक्ति has decreased by 25 % over the पास्ट two decades.
in 2001, geothermal energy cost between दो and ten सेंट per सम्पात.
Ownership of प्रॉपर्टी may be private, collective, or common and the प्रॉपर्टी may be objects, land/real एस्टेट, or intellectual property.
Determining स्वामित्व in law involves determining जो has निश्चित rights and कर्तव्य over the प्रॉपर्टी.
ये rights और कर्तव्य, sometimes called a 'bundle of rights ', can be separated and held by different parties.
the सवाल of स्वामित्व reaches वापस to the ancient philosophers, Plato और Aristotle, जो held different opinions on the subject.
प्लेटो ( 428/427 bc – 348/347 bc ) विचार निजी property created divisive inequalities, जबकि अरस्तू ( 384 bc – 322 BC ) thought private property enabled people to receive the full benefit of उनके मजदूर.
Private प्रॉपर्टी can circumvent कया is अभी referred to as the “ त्रासदी of the कॉमन्स ” प्रॉब्लम, जहाँ people tend to रुसवा आम प्रॉपर्टी more than they do private प्रॉपर्टी.
Given a short-sighted मालिक, however, a private property system can make ये tragedies worse—for example, a private owner of a piece of oil-rich प्रॉपर्टी, depending on his worldview, might be more interested in short-term financial लाभ than incremental use with an eye toward other 's चिंताएं ( e.g., those of भविष्य generations, the disenfranchised, इत्यादि. ).
While Aristotle justified the अस्तित्व of private ownership, he बाएँ खोलें questions of ( 1 ) how to allocate प्रॉपर्टी between what is private and common and ( 2 ) कैसा to allocate the निजी property भीतर society.
over the सहस्राब्दियों, और आरपार cultures कया can be प्रॉपर्टी और how it is regarded culturally have varied widely.
स्वामित्व is the आधार लिये अनेक अन्य concepts that form the मूलाधार of प्राचीन और modern societies such as धन, trade, debt, bankruptcy, the criminality of चोरी, and निजी vs. public property.
स्वामित्व is the कुंजी भवन ब्लाक in the विकास of the पूंजीवादी socio-economic system.
आदम Smith stated कि one of the पवित्र कानून of justice थी to guard a व्यक्ति 's property and possessions.
the process और यांत्रिकी of ownership are fairly complex : एक can gain, ट्रांसफ़र और lose ownership of प्रॉपर्टी in a क्रमांक of ways.
To acquire प्रॉपर्टी एक can purchase it साथ money, व्यापार it लिये other property, receive it as a gift, steal it, find it, make, it or homestead it.
One can ट्रांसफ़र or खोना स्वामित्व of property by selling it for money, exchanging it for other property, giving it as a gift, होने robbed of it, it, or having it stripped इससे एक 's ownership through legal अर्थात् ऐसे as eviction, foreclosure, seizure, or लेने.
स्वामित्व is self-propagating in that the मालिक of कोई प्रॉपर्टी will also अपना the economic लाभ of that प्रॉपर्टी.
`` What 's My नाम ? '' is a song recorded by Barbadian रिकॉर्डिंग कलाकार Rihanna, लिये her fifth studio एल्बम लाउड ( 2010 ).
Featuring guest vocals इससे Canadian rapper Drake, the song was released as the दूसरी single इससे लाउड on अक्तूबर 29, 2010 through डेफ jam Recordings.
The R & B सोंग was उत्पादित by the Norwegian production duo स्टारगेट, और was लिखा by the duo साथ with Ester डीन, Traci hale, and Drake.
Lyrically, it incorporates विषयवस्तु of sexual मैथुन and romance.
Music critics gave the सोंग positive समीक्षाएँ, citing it कुछ of Rihanna 's best vocal कार्य to date ; there थी a praise regarding its रोमांटिक nature, as well as its यौन टोन.
`` कया 's My नाम ? '' was a वाणिज्यिक कामयाबी और अव्वल the US बिलबोर्ड Hot 100 चार्ट, giving Rihanna उसके third number-one single in 2010, as खूब as her eighth overall on the chart.
The सोंग also अव्वल the charts in Hungary और the United किंगडम and पहुँचे the top पाँच in Canada, Ireland, New Zealand, नार्वे और Slovakia.
The सोंग received a नामांकन at the 54th Grammy Awards for Best rap/sung सहयोग.
An accompanying म्यूज़िक video, directed by Philip Andelman, portrays a romantic एनकाउंटर between रिहाना और Drake in a किराना स्टोर साथ with रोमांटिक दृश्यों between the pair and रिहाना walking through मैनहटन 's Lower East Side.
`` What 's My नाम ? '' was प्रचारित साथ live performances across both sides of the अटलांटिक, including Saturday Night सजीव in अमेरिका और the श्रेणी सात finale of The x फ़ैक्टर in the संयुक्त किंगडम.
the latter प्रदर्शन resulted in an investigation from the country 's मीडिया regulator, Ofcom, लिये the raunchy प्रकृति of रिहाना 's outfit.
A mathematical constant is a special number, प्रायः a रियल number, that is `` significantly दिलचस्प in some way ''.
स्थिरांक arise in अनेक different क्षेत्रों of गणित, with स्थिरांक such as e ( mathematical निरंतर ) | and pi| occurring in such diverse contexts as geometry, number सिद्धान्त and calculus.
कया it अर्थात् लिये a constant to arise `` naturally '', और कया makes a constant `` दिलचस्प '', is ultimately a पदार्थ of taste, and कुछ mathematical constants हैं notable अधिक for ऐतिहासिक कारण than for their intrinsic गणितीय interest.
The अधिक popular स्थिरांक have been पढ़ाई throughout the ages and computed to many decimal places.
All गणितीय constants are definable numbers and प्रायः are also computable संख्याएँ ( Chaitin 's निरंतर being a significant exception ).
Elections to the संयुक्त राज्य Senate were आयोजित on November 2, 2010, for 37 of the United States सीनेट 's 100 सीटे.
( a special चुनाव on जनवरी 19, 2010 in Massachusetts थी held earlier in the year. )
Thirty-four of the seats यहूद लिये six-year terms to the Senate 's `` class three '', और three यहूद special चुनावों for shorter शर्तें.
Of the 37 elections, 19 प्रदर्शित incumbent Democrats ( 7 of जिसको retired or were defeated in the primary ) और 18 प्रदर्शित incumbent Republicans ( आठ of जिसको retired or यहूद defeated in the प्राथमिक ).
बाद the previous elections ( in 2008 ), the United राज्य सीनेट was composed of 58 Democrats, 40 Republicans, और 2 independents जो caucus साथ the Democrats.
republicans won चार सीटे held by retiring Democrats and republicans पराजित two incumbent Democrats.
This was the largest क्रमांक of republicans gains चूंकि the 1994 चुनावों और भी the पहला time since कि election कि Republicans successfully defended all of उनके अपना seats.
This थी the fourth लगातार चुनाव of `` क्लास 3 '' senators जहाँ Democrats have विफल to लाभ सीटे and the third consecutive mid-term चुनाव held in a president 's first term जहाँ republicans have picked-up seats.
Despite these Republican विन्स, however, the Democrats retained a majority of the सीनेट साथ 51 seats plus 2 independents जो caucus साथ them, compared to the 47 republicans.
A solstice is an astronomical event that occurs twice each year as the Sun reaches its highest or lowest excursion relative to the celestial equator on the celestial गोला.
as a result, on the दिन of the solstice, the Sun appears to have पहुँचे its highest or न्यूनतम सालाना altitude in the sky above the horizon at local सौर noon.
The शब्द संक्रांति is derived इससे the लैटिन सोल ( sun ) and sistere ( to stand स्टिल ), because at the solstices, the Sun स्टैंड स्टिल in declination ; कि is, the मौसमी movement of the Sun 's पाथ ( as seen from Earth ) comes to a रोकें पहले reversing direction.
The solstices, together with the equinoxes, हैं connected with the seasons.
In many cultures the solstices mark either the beginning or the midpoint of winter and summer.
the term solstice can also be प्रयुक्त in a broader sense, as the date ( दिन ) when this occurs.
The day of the solstice is either the longest दिन of the साल ( in गर्मियाँ ) or the shortest दिन of the year ( in शीत ) लिये any place बाहर of the tropics.
Jerry Lee Lewis ( born September 29, 1935 ) is an अमरीकी rock और roll and country म्यूज़िक singer-songwriter and pianist.
he is ज्ञात by the nickname `` the कातिल '' and is often viewed as “rock & फेंकें 's first ग्रेट wild man”.
An जल्दी पायोनियर of rock and roll म्यूज़िक, in 1956 Lewis made his first रिकार्डिंग at सूर्य Records.
`` क्रेजी Arms `` बेची 300,000 copies in the South, but it थी his 1957 hit `` पूरे lotta shakin ' Going On `` कि shot Lewis to कीर्ति worldwide.
लुईस followed this in that वही year जब he recorded songs such as `` Great गेंदें of Fire ``, `` Breathless `` और `` High School गोपनीय ``.
Lewis बेची more रिकॉर्ड than Elvis प्रेस्ली at इस time.
However, Lewis ' चट्टान 'n ' roll career faltered in the wake of उसके marriage to उसके यंग cousin.
He had little कामयाबी in the charts following the कांड and his popularity जल्दी धुंधली.
His live performance शुल्क plummeted इससे $ 10,000 per night to $ 250.
In the meantime he was संकल्पित to लाभ वापस some of his popularity.
During the early 60’s he did n't have much chart कामयाबी with few अपवाद such as `` What 'd I कह ``.
उसके live performances at this time were increasingly wild और ऊर्जावान.
His album Live at the Star Club, हैम्बर्ग इससे 1964 is often regarded by many music पत्रकारों और प्रशंसक as one of the wildest and greatest rock और roll कॉन्सर्ट albums कभी.
बाद recording गीतों such as `` I 'm on Fire '' for several सालो with छोटी success, in 1968 Lewis बना a परिवर्तन into देश music और had hits with गीतों such as `` another प्लेस, Another Time ''.
इस reignited उसके career and throughout the late '60s और '70s he regularly topped the country-western charts.
His # 1 देश hits included `` To Make प्रेम मीठी लिये You ``, `` There Must Be More to प्रेम Than इस ``, `` Would तुम लो Another मौका on Me `` and `` me और Bobby mcgee ``.
Lewis 's successes continued throughout the दशक और he embraced his rock 'n ' roll पास्ट with गीतों such as a cover of the बिग Bopper 's `` chantilly फीता `` and `` Rockin ' My Life Away ``.
In the 21st सदी Lewis continues to tour to ऑडियंस around the संसार और स्टिल releases new albums.
एक ऐसे एल्बम, titled Last Man खड़ा, is his बेहतरीन selling to तिथि at over a million copies sold worldwide.
इस was followed by औसत Old man जिससे रै प्राप्त कुछ of the best sales of Lewis’s करियर.
लुईस has था a dozen gold रिकॉर्ड in दोनो चट्टान और country, won अनेक Grammy पुरस्कार, सहित a Lifetime उपलब्धि पुरस्कार.
लुईस थी inducted into the चट्टान और Roll Hall of Fame in 1986, and his pioneering योगदान to the genre has been recognized by the Rockabilly Hall of Fame.
in 1989, his जीवन was chronicled in the फिल्म Great Balls of Fire, अभिनीत Dennis Quaid.
In 2003, Rolling Stone Magazine सूचीबद्ध उसके box नियत सब कातिल, no Filler : The Anthology number 242 on उनके list of `` 500 greatest एल्बम of सब time ``.
In 2004, वे क्रमित him number 24 on उनके सूची of the 100 महानतम Artists of All Time.
लुईस is the पिछला surviving member of Sun Records ' Million Dollar quartet and the Class of '55 album, जिससे also included जॉनी Cash, कार्ल perkins, Roy Orbison and Elvis Presley.
Henry लुई Stephens, बेनाम watercolor ( 1863 ) of a man reading a समाचारपत्र with शीर्षक `` Presidential Proclamation / गुलामी ''.
The Emancipation Proclamation was an order issued to सब खण्ड of the कार्यपालिका branch ( सहित the फौज and Navy ) of the United States by President Abraham Lincoln on जनवरी 1, 1863, दौरान the American सिविल युद्ध.
It थी आधारित on the president 's constitutional प्राधिकार as commander in chief of the हथियारबंद शक्तियां ; it थी not a विधि passed by Congress.
it proclaimed सब those enslaved in confederate territory to be forever free, और ordered the Army ( and सब segments of the कार्यपालिका शाखा ) to दावत as free all those enslaved in ten राज्य that यहूद still in विद्रोह, thus applying to 3.1 million of the 4 million स्लेव in the U.S.
The उदघोषणा could not be enforced in areas स्टिल under rebellion, but as the फौज took कंट्रोल of Confederate regions, the slaves in those regions यहूद emancipated rather than returned to उनके मास्टर्स.
इससे 20,000 to 50,000 former slaves in regions where rebellion था already been subdued were तत्काल emancipated, और over 3 लाख more यहूद emancipated as the Union army advanced.
The उदघोषणा किया not apply to the five slave राज्य कि were not in rebellion, nor to most regions already controlled by the संघ army ; emancipation there होता आइये बाद पृथक राज्य actions and/or the दिसम्बर 1865 ratification of the Thirteenth Amendment, which made गुलामी illegal everywhere in the U.S.
the Proclamation did not compensate the owners, किया नहीं itself outlaw slavery, और did not make the ex-slaves ( पुकारा freedmen ) नागरिकों.
it made the eradication of slavery an explicit war goal, in जोड to the goal of reuniting the संघ.
On सितंबर 22, 1862, Lincoln had issued a preliminary proclamation that he would order the emancipation of सब स्लेव in कोई state of the Confederate States of America that did नहीं वापसी to Union control by January 1, 1863.
None returned, and the order, signed और issued January 1, 1863, took प्रभाव except in locations where the Union had already ज़्यादातर regained कंट्रोल.
The Proclamation outraged white Southerners who envisioned a रेस war, angered some उत्तरी डेमोक्रेट, energized anti-slavery forces, और weakened शक्तियां in Europe that wanted to intervene to सहायता the Confederacy.
it also lifted the आत्माओं of अफ़्रीकी Americans दोनो in the Southern और Northern States, and led to अनेक slaves escaping उनके मास्टर्स and running behind संघ lines in order to have उनके emancipation enforced.
Sucker पंच is a 2011 अमरीकी fantasy action फिल्मी निर्देशित by Zack Snyder and co-written by उसे और Steve Shibuya.
it is Snyder 's पहला film based on an original स्क्रिप्ट.
The फिल्मी stars Emily ब्राउनिंग, abbie Cornish, Jena Malone, Vanessa Hudgens, Jamie Chung, and Carla Gugino.
the storyline फ़ॉलो the fantasies of a यंग स्त्री जो is committed to a mental institution, as वो makes a plan to एस्केप the हॉस्पिटल पहले कष्ट a मस्तिष्कखंडछेदन.
The film was released in दोनो conventional and imax थिएटर in the United राज्य at midnight on March 25, 2011.
it received generally negative reviews from critics, लकिन was a moderate box office कामयाबी.
सामने and वापस of Canon powershot a95, a typical pocket-size डिजिटल camera
Haselblad 503CW साथ ixpress V96C डिजिटल back, an example of a पेशेवर digital कैमरा system
a डिजिटल camera ( or digicam ) is a camera that takes video or still photographs by रिकॉर्डिंग images on an electronic image sensor.
सबसे कैमरे sold आज are digital, and digital कैमरे हैं incorporated into many डिवाइस ranging इससे गुस्से and mobile phones ( पुकारा कैमरा phones ) to vehicles.
Digital और film cameras share an optical प्रणाली, typically using a lens साथ a variable diaphragm to focus light onto an image pickup device.
the diaphragm and shutter admit the सही राशि of light to the imager, बस as साथ film लकिन the चित्र pickup device is इलेक्ट्रॉनिक rather than रासायनिक.
However, नापसंद film कैमरे, digital cameras can प्रदर्शक images on a screen immediately after being recorded, and स्टोर and delete बिंब from मेमोरी.
Many digital कैमरे can also record moving video with ध्वनि.
कुछ digital cameras can क्रॉप and stitch तस्वीरें and perform other elementary image संपादन.
the अंदर and front of a Dell PowerEdge web सर्वर, a कंप्यूटर designed for rack mounting
Multiple वेब servers may be used for a ऊँची traffic जालस्थल, here चार Sun Fire X4200 servers are संस्थापित together
Web सर्वर can refer to either the हार्डवेयर ( the computer ) or the software ( the कंप्यूटर application ) that helps to deliver web content कि can be accessed through the Internet.
The most common use of वेब servers is to host वेबसाइटों, but वहीँ हैं other uses ऐसे as gaming, आंकड़ा भंडार or कार्यशील एंटरप्राइज़ applications.
The American Red Cross ( चाप ), also ज्ञात as the American National रेड Cross, is a humanitarian संगठन कि provides emergency assistance, disaster relief and education अंदर the United States.
it is the designated u.S. affiliate of the International संघ of Red Cross and Red Crescent समाजों.
Today, in addition to घरेलू disaster relief, the अमरीकी Red Cross offers services in पाँच other क्षेत्रों : जातियाँ services कि help the मोहताज ; communications services और सुकून लिये सैन्य members and their family members ; the collection, processing and distribution of blood and रक्त products ; educational programs on preparedness, health, और safety ; and international relief and development कार्यक्रम.
जारी a corporate charter by the संयुक्त राज्य कॉंग्रेस under Title 36 of the United States कोड, खण्ड 3001, the अमरीकी National रेड Cross is governed by volunteers और समर्थित by community दान, आय इससे स्वास्थ्य and safety training and उत्पाद, and आय इससे रक्त products.
the American Red क्रॉस is headquartered in Washington, D.C.
The Chairman of the फलक of Governors, serving her second three-year पद, is bonnie McElveen-Hunter.
The current अध्यक्ष and मुख्य कार्यपालिका अधिकारी is Gail J. McGovern.

a मुर्गा ( भी called a cockerel or मुर्गा ) is a male gallinaceous bird.
it usually refers to a पुरूष मुर्गा ( Gallus gallus ).
नादान male मुर्गियों less than एक year old are called cockerels.
The term `` मुर्गा '' originates in the संयुक्त States, and the पद is widely प्रयुक्त throughout North अमेरिका, as well as Australia और New जीलैंड.
In the संयुक्त किंगडम और Ireland the पुरानी पद `` cockerel '' is more commonly used.
`` Cock '' is in सामान्य use as the नाम लिये a पुरूष of other species of बर्ड, लिये उदाहरण `` मुर्गा sparrow ''.
`` roosting '' is the कार्रवाई of perching aloft to sleep at रात्रि, and is done by both sexes.
the rooster is polygamous, but can not guard अनेक nests of eggs at once.
He guards the सामान्य area where his मुर्गियां हैं nesting, and होगा आक्रमण अन्य roosters that डालें his territory.
दौरान the daytime, he usually sits on a high perch, usually 3–5 फीट off the ground to serve as a lookout for उसके flock.
he होगा sound a distinctive alarm कॉल if predators are आसपास.
the पोकीमॉन Trading Card Game ( Pokémon TCG ) is a collectible card game आधारित on the Pokémon वीडियो खेल series, पहला published in अक्तूबर 1996 by मीडिया Factory in Japan.
In the us, it was initially published by Wizards of the coast, the कम्पनी कि produces, in December 1998.
Nintendo took over publishing in जून 2003.
it is एक of Nintendo 's last remaining दमदार कड़ी to its heritage as a playing कार्ड company.
Land रोवर is a British car निर्माता with इसके मुख्यालय in Gaydon, Warwickshire, संयुक्त Kingdom which specialises in four-wheel-drive वाहनों.
It is part of the Jaguar जमीन Rover group, a subsidiary of tata मोटर्स of इण्डिया.
It is the second oldest four-wheel-drive car brand in the संसार ( बाद Jeep ).
the Land रोवर नाम was originally प्रयुक्त by the Rover कम्पनी लिये one विशिष्ट vehicle model, named बस the Land रोवर, launched by रोवर in 1948.
Over the following सालो it developed into a marque encompassing a range of four-wheel-drive models, सहित the defender, डिस्कवरी, Freelander, Range Rover, दायरा Rover Sport and Range Rover evoque.
Land Rovers हैं currently assembled in the कम्पनी 's Halewood और solihull पौधे, साथ शोध and development taking प्लेस at JLR 's Gaydon और Whitley engineering centres.
Land रोवर sold 194,000 vehicles worldwide in 2009.
हालांकि the ब्रांड originates इससे the original 1948 model, जमीन रोवर as a company रै only existed since 1978.
prior to this, it थी a उत्पाद line of the रोवर Company which was subsequently अवशोषित into the Rover-Triumph division of the British leyland Motor Corporation ( bl ) following Leyland Motor Corporation ’s takeover of रोवर in 1967.
The ongoing commercial कामयाबी of the original Land Rover series models, और latterly the दायरा Rover in the 1970s in the midst of BL’s खूब documented business troubles prompted the स्थापना of a separate Land Rover कम्पनी but still अंतर्गत the bl umbrella, बाकी part of the subsequent Rover समूह in 1988, under the स्वामित्व of British aerospace after the remains of British leyland were broken up and privatised.
in 1994 Rover समूह plc was acquired by BMW.
In 2000, Rover Group was broken-up by BMW और Land Rover थी sold to Ford Motor कम्पनी, becoming part of इसके प्रीमियर Automotive समूह.
in 2006 Ford purchased the रोवर ब्रांड from BMW लिये around £6 million.
इस reunited the रोवर and Land रोवर ब्रांड्स for the first time since 2000 जब the रोवर समूह was broken up by BMW.
In जून 2008, Ford बेची दोनो Land रोवर और जैगुआर गाड़ियाँ to tata Motors.
इस बिक्री also शामिल the dormant Rover ब्रांड
The कवर of the पहला DVD संकलन released by aniplex of The नई कप्तान shūsuke Amagai चाप
the नवीं ऋतु of the Bleach anime श्रेणी is नामित.
The series is based on Tite kubo 's manga साथ same नाम.
The episodes are निर्देशित by Noriyuki Abe and उत्पादित by TV Tokyo, Dentsu, and स्टुडियो Pierrot.
The एपीसोड ' plot focuses on the परिचय of a new Soul Reaper कप्तान, Shūsuke amagai, और the रहस्य surrounding the kasumiōji clan, एक of the परिवारों कि constitute the nobility of आत्मा समाज.
the ऋतु began airing on अप्रैल 23, 2008 in जापानी on TV टोकियो and ended on October 7, 2008.
the English अनुकूलन of the Bleach anime is licensed by Viz Media, and this चाप began airing on August 28, 2010 on Cartoon Network 's Adult तैरना, and समाप्त on January 29, 2011.
Five dvd compilations, प्रत्येक containing four एपीसोड of the ऋतु, have been released by Aniplex ; the पहला DVD संकलन थी released on November 26, 2008 और the पांचवां on कूच 25, 2009.
A dvd box होगा be published by Viz Media on December 13, 2011.
The episodes use three pieces of थीम म्यूज़िक : एक opening theme and दो closing themes.
the opening थीम is `` Chu-Bura `` by Kelun.
the first closing theme is `` नारंगी '' by lil'b, used for एपीसोड 168 to 179, और the second closing theme is `` Gallop '' by pe'zmoku, प्रयुक्त for the शेष of the एपीसोड.
the regulation of prostitution in the संयुक्त States is not among the enumerated शक्तियां of the federal सरकारी ; अंतर्गत the दसवाँ amendment to the संयुक्त States Constitution, it is इसलिए exclusively the domain of the राज्य to परमिट, prohibit, or वरना विनियमित वाणिज्यिक sex, except insofar as Congress may regulate it as भाग of अंतरराज्यीय कॉमर्स with laws जैसे the Mann अधिनियम.
in most राज्य, वेश्यावृति is considered a misdemeanor in the category of public अनुक्रम अपराधों, a अपराधों कि disrupts the अनुक्रम of a community.
it थी at one time माना to be a vagrancy crime.
फिलहाल, Nevada is the तभी state to allow brothel prostitution, the शर्तें of which are stipulated in the Nevada संशोधित statutes.
Only 8 काउंटी currently contain क्रियाशील brothels.
All forms of वेश्यावृति are illegal in Clark County ( which contains the Las Vegas–Paradise metropolitan area ), washoe काउंटी ( which contains रेनो ), कार्सन City, डगलस काउंटी, और lincoln County.
The अन्य काउंटी theoretically allow वेश्यालय वेश्यावृति, but some of these काउंटी currently have no active brothels.
Street वेश्यावृति, `` pandering, '' और living बंद of the proceeds of a prostitute remain illegal under Nevada विधि, as elsewhere in the देश.
As with अन्य countries, वेश्यावृति in the United States can be विभाजित into तीन broad categories : street prostitution, वेश्यालय prostitution, और अनुरक्षण वेश्यावृति.
the East Coast of the United राज्य, भी ज्ञात as the Eastern seaboard or the Atlantic Seaboard और commonly shortened to East Coast, refers to the easternmost coast of the United राज्य along the अटलांटिक समंदर.
The राज्य which have shoreline on the East Coast are, इससे north to दक्षिण, the u.S. states of maine, नई Hampshire, मैसाचुसेट्स, Rhode Island, Connecticut, New यॉर्क, New Jersey, डेलावेयर, Maryland, Virginia, North Carolina, South Carolina, Georgia, and फ्लोरिडा.
रिचर्ड milhous Nixon ( January 9, 1913 – April 22, 1994 ) was the 37th President of the संयुक्त States, serving from 1969 to 1974, when he became the only president to resign the office.
Nixon था previously served as a Republican u.S. representative and senator from California and as the 36th Vice अध्यक्ष of the United राज्य इससे 1953 to 1961.
निक्सन was born in Yorba लिंडा, कैलिफ़ोर्निया.
he graduated from Whittier कॉलेज in 1934 and Duke University School of Law in 1937, returning to कैलिफ़ोर्निया to अभ्यास विधि.
He and his wife, Pat Nixon, moved to Washington to work लिये the संघीय government in 1942.
He subsequently served in the United राज्य Navy during World War II.
निक्सन was elected in California to the House of Representatives in 1946 and to the Senate in 1950.
उसके pursuit of the Alger hiss case established उसके reputation as a leading anti-communist, and elevated उसे to नेशनल prominence.
He was the running mate of Dwight D. Eisenhower, the Republican पार्टी अध्यक्षीय nominee in the 1952 election.
निक्सन परोसा लिये आठ सालो as vice अध्यक्ष.
he waged an unsuccessful अध्यक्षीय अभियान in 1960, narrowly losing to John F. Kennedy, and lost a रेस लिये Governor of California in 1962.
In 1968, he भागा again लिये the प्रेसिडेंसी and थी निर्वाचित.
Although Nixon initially escalated अमेरिका 's involvement in the वियतनाम युद्ध, he subsequently ended u.S. भागीदारी in 1973.
निक्सन 's visit to the लोगों 's गणतंत्र of चीन in 1972 opened diplomatic संबंध between the two राष्ट्र, and he initiated détente और the anti-ballistic Missile सन्धि with the Soviet Union the same year.
Domestically, his administration generally embraced नीतियों कि transferred power इससे वॉशिंगटन to the राज्य.
Among अन्य things, he launched पहलों to लड़ो cancer and illegal drugs, imposed मजदूरी and price controls, enforced desegregation of कुछ दक्षिणी schools, और स्थापित the Environmental सुरक्षा Agency.
Though he presided over the चंद्र landings शुरूआत with Apollo 11, he scaled back मानवयुक्त space खोजी.
he was re-elected by a भूस्खलन in 1972.
Nixon 's second पद saw an Arab oil embargo, the इस्तीफा of his vice अध्यक्ष, spiro agnew, और a continuing series of खुलासे about the वाटरगेट scandal और other misconduct by सदस्यों of the प्रशासन.
The कांड escalated, costing Nixon much of his political support, और on अगस्त 9, 1974, he resigned in the फेस of almost certain महाभियोग और हटाना इससे दफ्तर.
After उसके resignation, he controversially received a pardon जारी by his successor, जेराल्ड घाट.
in रिटायरमेंट, Nixon 's कार्य as an elder statesman, authoring several books और undertaking अनेक विदेशी trips, helped to rehabilitate his पब्लिक image.
He suffered a debilitating स्ट्रोक on April 18, 1994, and died four दिनों बाद at the आयु of 81.
Sertraline hydrochloride ( trade names Zoloft, lustral ) is an antidepressant of the selective serotonin reuptake inhibitor ( ssri ) क्लास.
It was introduced to the market by Pfizer in 1991.
Sertraline is primarily prescribed for प्रमुख depressive disorder in adult outpatients as well as obsessive–compulsive, panic, और social anxiety विकार in दोनो adults और children.
In 2011, it was the second-most prescribed antidepressant on the u.S. retail market, with 37,208,000 prescriptions.
The efficacy of sertraline for अवसाद is similar to कि of older tricyclic antidepressants, लकिन its side effects हैं much कम pronounced.
Differences with newer antidepressants हैं subtler and also ज़्यादातर confined to पक्ष प्रभाव.
Evidence suggests that sertraline may work better than fluoxetine ( Prozac ) लिये कुछ subtypes of depression.
Treatment of panic disorder साथ sertraline results in a significant decrease of the क्रमांक of panic attacks और in improved quality of जीवन.
For obsessive-compulsive विकार, sertraline is नहीं as effective as cognitive behavioral therapy ; the best परिणाम have been achieved by combining these दो treatments.
हालांकि स्वीकृत for social phobia and posttraumatic stress विकार, sertraline leads to तभी modest सुधार in these conditions.
sertraline भी alleviates the symptoms of premenstrual dysphoric disorder and can be used in sub-therapeutic doses or intermittently for its उपचार.
sertraline shares the आम पक्ष effects and contraindications of other SSRIs, with high दरों of मतली, अतिसार, insomnia, and sexual side effects ; however, it करता नहीं cause weight लाभ, and its effects on both cognition and vigilance are relatively mild.
In pregnant women taking sertraline, the drug थी present in significant concentrations in fetal blood, and was भी associated with a higher रेट of various जनम defects.
Similarly to other antidepressants, the use of sertraline for depression may be associated with a higher rate of suicidality.
The पाँच heartbeats is a 1991 musical drama film directed by रॉबर्ट टाउनसेंड, जो co-wrote the script with keenan Ivory Wayans.
Distributed by 20th Century फॉक्स, the फिल्मी 's main डाल includes टाउनसेंड, Michael Wright, Leon Robinson, Harry J. lennix, tico कुएं, Harold Nicholas of the Nicholas Brothers, and Diahann Carroll.
the प्लाट of the फिल्मी ( which is loosely based on the lives of अनेक कलाकारों : The Dells, the Temptations, चार Tops, Wilson Pickett, James भूरा, Frankie lymon, Sam Cooke और अन्य ) follows the three decade career of the r & b vocal समूह the पाँच heartbeats.
The film depicts the rise and fall of a motown inspired आत्मा अधिनियम through the आँखें of the film 's main समर्थक, Donald `` Duck '' matthews ( portrayed by टाउनसेंड ), who serves as a narrator throughout the film.
however, a majority of the cinema is प्रस्तुत in a consecutive समय लकीर as opposed to traditional फ्लैश backs.
the film includes a significant amount of असली music conceived by various artists for the film 's साउंडट्रैक, including singles such as `` a दिल Is a House लिये Love ``, `` We Have n't Finished yet '', and `` nothing But प्रेम ''.
the film was released to सबसे North American audiences March 29, 1991 however it थी not made available to audiences in other continents until 2002 when a DVD was released prior to another DVD release in 2006 लिये the फिल्मी 's 15th anniversary.
the movie received mixed समीक्षाएँ from critics.
Secretariat ( March 30, 1970 – October 4, 1989 ) थी an American Thoroughbred racehorse कि in 1973 became the first U.S. Triple Crown champion in 25 सालो.
He set रेस रिकॉर्ड in सब three कार्यक्रम in the श्रेणी — the Kentucky डर्बी ( 1:59.4 ), the Preakness stakes ( 1:53 ), और the belmont Stakes ( 2:24 ) — records that still stand आज.
He is माना to be one of the greatest Thoroughbreds of सब समय.
In 1999, ESPN क्रमित Secretariat the 35th best खिलाड़ी of the 20th century, the उच्चतम ranking racehorse on the list URL_http.
He ranked दूसरी behind Man o ' War in The blood-horse 's सूची of the Top 100 U.S. racehorses of the 20th Century.
सचिवालय was sired by Bold शासक out of Somethingroyal, by princequillo.
He थी foaled at the Meadow in कैरोलीन County, Virginia.
Like उसके famous पूर्ववर्ती Man o ' युद्ध, Secretariat was a विशाल chestnut टट्टू and थी दिए the same उपनाम, `` Big Red. ''
सचिवालय 's grandsire, Nasrullah, is भी the great-great-grandsire of 1977 ट्रिपल Crown winner सिएटल Slew.
Owned by Penny Chenery, he थी trained by lucien laurin और mainly ridden by कनाडाई jockey Ron Turcotte, साथ with apprentice jockey Paul Feliciano ( पहला दो दौड़ ), and दिग्गज एडी मेपल ( last race ).
he raced in chenery 's Meadow Stable 's ब्लू और श्वेत checkered colors and his दूल्हे was एडी Sweat.
Secretariat stood लगभग लम्बा, and weighed, साथ a 75-inch girth, in उसके racing prime.
A ठेठ 12 V, 40 ah lead-acid car बैटरी
an automotive बैटरी is a type of rechargeable battery कि supplies electric energy to an automobile.
Usually this refers to an SLI बैटरी ( starting, lighting, ignition ) to शक्ति the starter motor, the लाइट्स, and the प्रज्वलन system of a vehicle’s engine.
ऑटोमोटिव SLI बैटरी are usually lead-acid प्रकार, and हैं बना of six गैल्वानी कोशिकाएं in series to provide a 12 वोल्ट system.
प्रत्येक cell provides 2.1 volts for a total of 12.6 वोल्ट at पूरा चार्ज.
Heavy vehicles ऐसे as राजमार्ग ट्रक or tractors, प्रायः equipped with diesel इंजन, may have दो batteries in series लिये a 24 वोल्ट system, or may have parallel strings of batteries.
lead-acid batteries are made up of प्लेटों of सीसे and पृथक plates of सीसे dioxide, which हैं submerged into an electrolyte solution of about 38 % sulfuric एसिड and 62 % जल.
इस कल्याणकारी a chemical reaction कि releases electrons, allowing them to flow through conductors to produce electricity.
As the battery discharges, the एसिड of the electrolyte reacts with the सामग्री of the plates, changing their सतह to सीसे sulfate.
When the battery is recharged, the chemical प्रतिक्रिया is reversed : the lead sulfate reforms into सीसे डाइऑक्साइड and सीसे.
साथ the plates restored to उनके original कंडीशन, the प्रक्रम may now be repeated.
बैटरी रीसाइक्लिंग of ऑटोमोटिव batteries reduces the need लिये resources required for manufacture of नई batteries, diverts toxic सीसे इससे landfills, and रोकता risk of improper disposal.
Full-time employment is नियुक्ति in which a व्यक्ति works a न्यूनतम number of hours defined as such by his/her नियोक्ता.
full-time employment often आता साथ लाभ that हैं not typically offered to part-time, temporary, or flexible workers, such as annual छोड़, sickleave, and health बीमे.
Full-time jobs हैं प्रायः माना careers.
They generally pay more than part-time jobs, and usually carry अधिक घंटों per सप्ताह.
The Fair Labor मानकों Act ( FLSA ) करता नहीं define full-time नियुक्ति or part-time नियुक्ति.
This is a पदार्थ generally to be determined by the employer ( US विभाग of मजदूर ).
the परिभाषा by employer can vary और is generally published in a company 's Employee हैंडबुक.
कंपनियाँ commonly require इससे 30–35 or 40 घंटों per सप्ताह to be defined as full-time and इसलिए योग्य for लाभ.
full-time status varies between कम्पनी and is often based on the शिफ़्ट the कर्मचारी जरूर work during प्रत्येक work सप्ताह.
the `` standard '' कार्य week consists of five eight-hour दिनों, commonly परोसा between 9:00am to 5:00PM totaling 40 hours.
जबकि a four-day week generally consists of four ten-hour days ; it may भी consist of as little as nine hours for a total of a 36 घंटा कार्य week.
twelve-hour shifts are often three दिनों per week, unless the company रै the इरादे of paying आउट the employee overtime.
Overtime is legally paid आउट anytime an कर्मचारी works अधिक than 40 hours per week.
The विधिक minimum लिये overtime starts at आधार Pay + One-Half.
the increased payout is considered to compensate थोड़ा for the increased थकान जिससे a person experiences on such long शिफ्ट.
Shifts can also be very irregular, as in retail, but are स्टिल full-time if the जरूरी क्रमांक of hours is reached.
वहीँ हैं some परिस्थितियों जहाँ a व्यक्ति जो needs full-time work is dropped to part-time, which is sometimes a रूप of constructive dismissal to avoid paying unemployment benefits to a laid-off worker.
seahorse is the शीर्षक दिए to 54 species of समुद्री fish in the genus Hippocampus.
`` Hippocampus '' comes इससे the प्राचीन Greek hippos meaning `` घोड़ा '' and kampos meaning `` समुद्र monster ''.
the नियंत्रित Substances Act ( CSA ) was enacted into law by the कॉंग्रेस of the संयुक्त राज्य as Title II of the Comprehensive Drug गाली रोकथाम and Control Act of 1970.
the CSA is the federal u.S. drug नीति under which the manufacture, importation, कब्ज़ा, use and distribution of certain substances is regulated.
the Act also served as the नेशनल implementing विधान for the सिंगल Convention on narcotic Drugs.
the legislation निर्मित five Schedules ( classifications ), साथ varying योग्यता for a substance to be included in each.
Two federal agencies, the Drug प्रवर्तन Administration and the Food और ड्रग Administration, determine जिससे substances are added to or removed from the various schedules, though the statute passed by कॉंग्रेस निर्मित the आरंभिक लिस्टिंग, and Congress has sometimes अनुसूचित other substances through legislation such as the hillory J. farias और Samantha Reid Date-Rape Prevention Act of 2000, जिससे placed गामा hydroxybutyrate in अनुसूची i. Classification decisions are जरूरी to be made on मापदण्ड including संभावित for abuse ( an undefined term ), currently accepted चिकित्सा use in treatment in the United States, and अंतरराष्ट्रीय treaties.
Maya numerals
माया numerals are a vigesimal ( base - बीस ) numeral system used by the Pre-Columbian Maya civilization.
the numerals are made up of तीन प्रतीकों ; zero ( shell shape ), one ( a dot ) और पाँच ( a bar ).
For example, तेरह is लिखा as three dots in a आड़ा row above दो आड़ा lines stacked above प्रत्येक अन्य.
Lyndon Baines Johnson ( अगस्त 27, 1908 – January 22, 1973 ), प्रायः referred to as LBJ, थी the 36th अध्यक्ष of the United राज्य ( 1963–1969 ), a स्थिति he assumed बाद उसके सेवा as the 37th Vice अध्यक्ष of the United States ( 1961–1963 ).
He is एक of तभी चार people who served in सब चार निर्वाचित federal कार्यालयों of the United States : प्रतिनिधि, सीनेटर, Vice President, और अध्यक्ष.
Johnson, a डेमोक्रेट इससे Texas, परोसा as a संयुक्त राज्य प्रतिनिधि इससे 1937–1949 and as a Senator इससे 1949–1961, including six years as संयुक्त States Senate Majority Leader, two as सीनेट अल्पसंख्यक Leader and दो as सीनेट बहुमत चाबुक.
After campaigning unsuccessfully लिये the लोकतांत्रिक नामांकन in 1960, Johnson was पूछा by जॉन F. कैनेडी to be उसके कार्यशील mate लिये the 1960 अध्यक्षीय election.
Johnson succeeded to the प्रेसिडेंसी following the assassination of जॉन F. Kennedy on November 22, 1963, completed Kennedy 's पद और थी elected President in his own right, जीतना by a large हाशिया over Barry goldwater in the 1964 election.
जॉनसन थी greatly supported by the लोकतांत्रिक पार्टी and as President, he थी जिम्मेदार for designing the `` ग्रेट Society `` legislation that included कानून कि upheld civil rights, public प्रसारण, medicare, Medicaid, पर्यावरणीय protection, सहायता to education, and his `` युद्ध on गरीबी. ''
Johnson was प्रसिद्ध लिये उसके domineering personality and the `` जॉनसन treatment, '' his coercion of powerful राजनेता in order to अग्रिम legislation.
meanwhile, Johnson escalated American involvement in the Vietnam War, from 16,000 अमरीकी advisors/soldiers in 1963 to 550,000 कॉम्बैट सैनिकों in early 1968, as अमरीकी casualties soared and the सलाम process bogged down.
The भागीदारी stimulated a विशाल एंग्री antiwar गति आधारित especially on university campuses in the U.S. and विदेश.
Summer दंगे broke out in सबसे major cities after 1965, और crime rates soared, as his प्रतिद्वंद्वियों उठाया demands for `` विधि and order '' नीतियों.
the Democratic Party विभाजित in multiple feuding गिरोहों, and after Johnson did poorly in the 1968 New हैम्पशायर प्राथमिक, he ended उसके bid लिये reelection.
Republican रिचर्ड निक्सन was निर्वाचित to सफल उसे.
Historians argue कि Johnson 's presidency marked the शिखर of modern liberalism in the संयुक्त States after the नई सौदे era.
Johnson is क्रमित favorably by some इतिहासकारों because of his domestic policies.
प्रोजेस्टेरोन भी known as p4 ( pregn-4-ene-3,20-dione ) is a C-21 स्टेरॉयड hormone involved in the female menstrual cycle, pregnancy ( supports gestation ) और embryogenesis of इंसानो और other species.
Progesterone belongs to a क्लास of hormones called progestogens, और is the major naturally occurring human progestogen.
Big बर्ड is a protagonist of the children 's television show Sesame गली.
Officially performed by Caroll spinney since 1969, he is an eight-foot two-inch ( 249 cm ) tall उज्जवल primrose-yellow bird.
He can रोलर skate, ice skate, dance, sing, write poetry, चित्रण and even सवारी a unicycle.
But despite this wide array of talents, he is prone to बारंबार misunderstandings, on one occasion even singing the alphabet as एक big long शब्द ( इससे the song called `` ABC-DEF-GHI, '' pronounced `` ab-keddef-gajihkel-monop-quristuv-wixyz '' ), pondering कया it could कभी mean.
He जीवनदान in a विशाल nest behind the 123 तिल गली brownstone and रै a teddy भालू named Radar.

It provides वेब, सोशल, and मोबाईल analytics और other software solutions related to marketing intelligence.

the दूसरी crusade ( 1145–1149 ) was the second major crusade launched from Europe.
the Second crusade was प्रारंभ in जवाब to the पतन of the County of Edessa the previous year to the शक्तियां of Zengi.
The county था been founded during the पहला Crusade ( 1096–1099 ) by Baldwin of Boulogne in 1098.
जबकि it was the first जेहादी राज्य to be संस्थापित, it थी also the first to पतन.
the Second crusade थी announced by पोप Eugene III, and was the first of the crusades to be led by European kings, namely लुई VII of France और Conrad III of जर्मनी, with सहायता from a क्रमांक of अन्य European nobles.
The armies of the दो kings marched separately across यूरोपीय.
बाद क्रासिंग बीज़ान्टिन territory into आनातोलिया, both armies were separately पराजित by the Seljuq turks.
The main Western ईसाई सोर्स, odo of Deuil, और Syriac Christian स्त्रोत claim that the Byzantine emperor Manuel i Comnenus secretly hindered the crusaders ' progress, particularly in आनातोलिया where he is कथित to have deliberately ordered turks to attack them.
Louis and कोनराड and the remnants of उनके armies reached Jerusalem और, in 1148, participated in an ill-advised attack on Damascus.
The crusade in the east was a failure for the crusaders and a great victory for the Muslims.
It would ultimately have a key influence on the पतन of Jerusalem and give rise to the तीसरा Crusade at the समाप्त of the 12th सदी.
the only कामयाबी of the Second crusade came to a combined फ़ोर्स of 13,000 फ्लेमिश, Frisian, Norman, अंग्रेज़ी, स्कॉटिश, और जर्मनी crusaders in 1147.
यात्राएं from England, by ship, to the Holy Land, the army रोका और helped the smaller ( 7,000 ) Portuguese फौज in the कैप्चर of Lisbon, expelling its Moorish occupants.
wal-mart Stores, Inc. ( ), branded as Walmart, is an American multinational retail निगम that रनों chains of विशाल discount विभाग स्टोर्स और गोदाम stores.
the company is the world 's third largest public corporation, according to the सौभाग्य Global 500 list in 2012, the biggest private employer in the संसार with over दो million employees, and is the largest retailer in the world.
Walmart remains a family-owned business, as the company is controlled by the Walton परिवार, जो own a 48 percent stake in walmart.
it is also one of the world 's most valuable companies.
The company was founded by sam Walton in 1962, incorporated on October 31, 1969, and सरेआम traded on the नई यॉर्क Stock Exchange in 1972.
It is headquartered in Bentonville, अरकंसास.
Walmart is भी the largest किराना retailer in the United States.
In 2009, it generated 51 percent of इसके us $ 258 billion sales in the U.S. from grocery कारोबार.
It भी owns और operates the Sam 's Club खुदरा warehouses in North America.
by 1988, Wal-Mart was the most profitable रिटेलर in the us, और by नवम्बर 1990, it outsold k-mart.
by 1991 it outsold सियर्स in खुदरा, बनाना it अमेरिका 's largest retailer, a distinction it still holds.
walmart has 8,500 stores in 15 देशों, अंतर्गत 55 different names.
The कम्पनी operates under the Walmart name in the United States, including the 50 states and प्यूर्टो रीको.
it operates in Mexico as Walmex, in the संयुक्त Kingdom as asda, in जापानी as seiyu, and in India as बेहतरीन Price.
It has wholly owned परिचालन in Argentina, Brazil, and कनाडा.
walmart 's investments outside उत्तर America have had mixed results : its operations in the United Kingdom, South अमेरिका, and China are अत्यधिक कामयाब, whereas ventures in Germany and दक्षिण कोरियाई यहूद unsuccessful.
Robert William Gary मूर ( 4 April 1952 – 6 February 2011 ), was a Northern Irish संगीतकार, most widely recognised as a singer and guitarist.
In a करियर dating वापस to the 1960s, Moore निभाई with artists including Phil lynott and ब्रायन Downey during his teens, leading him to memberships with the Irish bands Skid पंक्ति and पतला Lizzy on three पृथक अवसरों.
Moore साझा the stage साथ such blues and rock luminaries as b.b. King, Albert King, कोलोसियम ii, George Harrison और Greg झील, as खूब as having a successful solo करियर.
he guested on a क्रमांक of albums अंकित by high profile musicians, including a कैमियो appearance playing the lead गिटार solo on `` She 's my baby `` इससे traveling Wilburys आवाज़. 3.
An example of रैक आरोहित servers
a web hosting service is a type of Internet hosting सेवा that allows individuals and organizations to make उनके website accessible via the World Wide Web.
Web होस्ट हैं कंपनियाँ that provide space on a server owned or leased for use by clients, as well as providing Internet कनेक्टिविटी, typically in a data बीच.
Web होस्ट can also provide data center स्पेस और connectivity to the Internet for other सर्वर स्तिथ in उनके data center, पुकारा colocation, भी known as Housing in Latin America or France.
the scope of web होस्टिंग services varies greatly.
the सबसे basic is web page and small-scale file होस्टिंग, where फाइलें can be uploaded via संचिका Transfer Protocol ( FTP ) or a Web interface.
The files are usually delivered to the Web `` as is '' or साथ minimal processing.
Many अंतरजाल service providers ( ISPs ) offer this service free to सदस्य.
individuals और संगठन may भी obtain वेब page hosting from वैकल्पिक service providers.
निजी वेब साईट hosting is typically free, advertisement-sponsored, or inexpensive.
Business वेब साईट hosting often has a उच्चतर expense depending upon the size और type of the जालस्थल.
Single page hosting is generally sufficient for निजी वेब पृष्ठों.
a complex site काल्स लिये a अधिक comprehensive package that provides डेटाबेस support and application development platforms ( e.g. पीएचपी, जावा, माणिक्य on Rails, ColdFusion, or ASP.NET ).
ये facilities allow customers to लिखें or install स्क्रिप्ट for अनुप्रयोग जैसे forums and content प्रबन्धन.
भी, Secure sockets परत ( एसएसएल ) is typically used for e-commerce.
The host may also provide an interface or control panel for managing the Web सर्वर और installing scripts, as खूब as other मौड्यूल और service applications like e-mail.
Some होस्ट specialize in निश्चित तन्त्र or सेवाएं ( e.g. e-commerce ), जिससे हैं commonly प्रयुक्त by larger companies कि outsource संजाल infrastructure.
Obstetrics ( from the लैटिन obstare, `` to stand by '' ) is the medical specialty dealing साथ the care of all women 's reproductive tracts और their children during गर्भावस्था ( prenatal period ), childbirth and the postnatal period.
Many obstetricians are also gynecologists, meaning they perform in both specialties.
In the संयुक्त States, these physicians are commonly referred to as OB/GYNs.
the Wright brothers, Orville ( August 19, 1871 – January 30, 1948 ) and Wilbur ( अप्रैल 16, 1867 – may 30, 1912 ), were two अमरीकी भाइयो, आविष्कारक, और विमानन pioneers who were credited with inventing और building the संसार 's first successful वायुयान और making the पहला controlled, संचालित and sustained heavier-than-air इंसान flight, on December 17, 1903.
इससे 1905 to 1907, the भाइयो विकसित उनके flying machine into the पहला व्यावहारिक fixed-wing वायुयान.
Although not the पहला to build and मक्खी प्रायोगिक aircraft, the Wright भाइयो यहूद the पहला to invent वायुयान नियंत्रण that made fixed-wing powered flight possible.
The brothers ' fundamental भेदन थी their आविष्कार of three-axis control, which enabled the पायलट to steer the aircraft effectively and to maintain its equilibrium.
This method became standard और remains standard on fixed-wing aircraft of सब kinds.
इससे the beginning of their aeronautical work, the Wright भाइयो केन्द्रित on developing a विश्वसनीय method of pilot control as the key to solving `` the उड़ती प्रॉब्लम ''.
इस approach differed significantly from other experimenters of the time who put अधिक emphasis on विकासशील शक्तिशाली engines.
Using a small homebuilt wind टनल, the wrights also एकत्रित more सटीक data than कोई पहले, enabling उन्हें to design and निर्माण विंग्स और propellers कि were अधिक कुशल than कोई before.
Their first u.S. पेटेंट, 821,393, did not अर्जी invention of a flying machine, but बल्कि, the आविष्कार of a system of aerodynamic कंट्रोल that manipulated a flying यंत्र 's सतहों.
They gained the mechanical कौशल essential for their success by working for years in their दूकान साथ printing दबाता, साइकिल, motors, और other machinery.
Their work साथ साइकिल in particular influenced their belief कि an unstable गाडी like a उड़ती machine could be नियंत्रित और संतुलित with practice.
इससे 1900 until their first powered फ़्लाइट in लेट 1903, वे conducted extensive glider tests that also developed उनके skills as pilots.
उनके bicycle shop कर्मचारी Charlie Taylor became an महत्वपूर्ण part of the team, building their first aircraft इंजन in close सहयोग with the brothers.
The राइट brothers ' status as inventors of the वायुयान रै महरूम विषय to counter-claims by various parties.
much controversy persists over the अनेक स्पर्धा claims of जल्दी aviators.
America 's अगला Top Model, Cycle 12 is the बारहवीं cycle of America 's अगला शीर्ष मॉडल and the sixth ऋतु to air on The CW network.
It premiered on March 4, 2009.
the साईकिल 's catch phrase is `` Get in the Fold. ''
The cycle 's promotional song is Lady Gaga 's `` the Fame ''.
