A फ़ैशन spread and cover in Seventeen.
a 100,000 अनुबंध साथ CoverGirl cosmetics.
The first हाफ of the cycle took प्लेस in New York City, moving the दिखाएँ back इससे Los Angeles last season.
The अंतरराष्ट्रीय destination for इस cycle is são Paulo, Brazil, the series first visit to दक्षिण America.
The number of girls was reduced to 13, the first time since साईकिल 9, after being maintained at 14 in the last two cycles.
This थी the last समय Paulina Porizkova participated as judge.
the विजेता was 20-year-old Teyona Anderson from woodstown, New जर्सी.
इस season averaged 4.35 million दर्शक per episode.
Exxon mobil Corporation, or exxonmobil, is an American multinational oil and gas निगम headquartered in इरविंग, टेक्सास, संयुक्त States.
it is a direct descendant of John D. rockefeller 's Standard Oil कम्पनी, and was formed on नवम्बर 30, 1999, by the merger of Exxon and Mobil.
It is affiliated with इम्पीरियल आयल which operates in कनाडा.
ExxonMobil is the world 's largest कम्पनी by revenue और in 2013, became the largest publicly traded कम्पनी by मार्केट capitalization in the संसार.
the कम्पनी is ranked # 5 globally in Forbes वैश्विक 2000 list in 2013.
exxon mobil 's reserves यहूद 72 billion oil-equivalent barrels at the समाप्त of 2007 and, at then ( 2007 ) rates of production, हैं अपेक्षित to पिछला over 14 years.
With 37 आयल refineries in 21 देशों constituting a संयुक्त daily refining क्षमता of, exxon Mobil is the largest refiner in the world, a title that थी also associated with Standard आयल since इसके incorporation in 1870.
exxonmobil is the largest of the world 's supermajors साथ daily production of 3.921 लाख BOE ( barrels of आयल समतुल्य ).
In 2008, this was approximately 3 % of world production, which is less than several of the largest state-owned petroleum कंपनियाँ.
When ranked by आयल और gas reserves it is 14th in the world with कम than 1 % of the total.
a 2012 article in The रोज़ टेलीग्राफ says that ExxonMobil रै `` grown into one of the planet’s most hated corporations, समर्थ to determine American foreign policy and the fate of entire राष्ट्र ''.
in terms of इसके environmental record, exxonmobil increasingly drills in terrains leased to them by dictatorships, such as those in chad and Equatorial गिनी.
ली रेमंड, the corporation’s chief executive जबतक 2005, was `` notoriously sceptical परिचय climate change and disliked government interference at कोई स्तर ''.
The कम्पनी थी widely criticized for इसके slow जवाब to सफ़ाई its 1989 Valdez आयल spill in Alaska.
इस आलेख is about the ग्लोब Theatre of शेक्सपियर.
लिये the modern पुनर्निर्माण in London, देखिए Shakespeare 's Globe.
लिये अन्य uses, देखिए ग्लोब Theatre ( बहुविकल्पी ).
The ग्लोब थिएटर was a थिएटर in लंदन संबद्ध साथ विलियम Shakespeare.
It थी निर्मित in 1599 by शेक्सपियर 's playing कम्पनी, the Lord Chamberlain 's Men, on land स्वामित्व by Thomas Brend और inherited by उसके son, Nicholas Brend and grandson सर Matthew Brend, and थी destroyed by आग on 29 जून 1613.
A दूसरी Globe थिएटर was built on the same साईट by जून 1614 और closed in 1642.
A modern reconstruction of the Globe, named `` शेक्सपियर 's Globe ``, opened in 1997 लगभग इससे the साईट of the original थिएटर.
it 's a Wonderful Life is a 1946 American क्रिसमस drama फिल्मी produced और directed by फ़्रैंक Capra, based on the short स्टोरी `` the Greatest Gift ``, which Philip Van doren stern wrote in 1939 and privately published in 1945.
The film is considered one of the सबसे loved films in American cinema and has become traditional viewing during the Christmas ऋतु, alongside लोकप्रिय क्लासिक such as Charles डिकेंस ' A Christmas कैरोल.
The फिल्मी stars जेम्स Stewart as जार्ज Bailey, a man who रै given up उसके सपनो in अनुक्रम to help अन्य और whose imminent suicide on Christmas Eve brings परिचय the हस्तक्षेप of his guardian angel, Clarence odbody ( Henry Travers ).
Clarence shows जार्ज सब the lives he has touched और how अलग life in his जातियाँ of bedford Falls would be had he never been born.
despite initially performing poorly at the बक्सा office due to ऊँची production costs and stiff प्रतियोगिता at the time of इसके release, the film रै come to be regarded as a classic और is a स्टेपल of क्रिसमस television around the संसार.
Theatrically, the film 's break-even point थी actually $ 6.3 million, approximately twice the production लागत, a फिगर it never came close to achieving in इसके आरंभिक रिलीज.
An appraisal in 2006 reported : `` Although it was not the पूरा बक्सा office विफलता that today everyone मानता... it was initially a major disappointment and confirmed, at least to the studios, कि Capra was no longer capable of turning out the populist features that बना his films the must-see, money-making कार्यक्रम they once were. ''
The film was nominated लिये पाँच Oscars and रै been पहचाना by the American Film संस्थान as एक of the 100 best American films ever बना, placing number 11 on its आरंभिक 1998 greatest फिल्म list, and होता also place number one on इसके सूची of the सबसे inspirational American films of all time.
Data Warehouse अवलोकन
In कम्प्यूटिंग, a आंकड़ा warehouse or enterprise आंकड़ा गोदाम ( DW, DWH, or EDW ) is a database प्रयुक्त for reporting and data विश्लेषण.
It is a सेंट्रल repository of data which is created by integrating आंकड़ा इससे one or अधिक disparate स्त्रोत.
Data warehouses store current as खूब as historical data and are used लिये creating trending reports लिये वरिष्ठ प्रबन्धन रिपोर्टिंग ऐसे as सालाना and quarterly comparisons.
the आंकड़ा stored in the गोदाम are uploaded from the operational systems ( ऐसे as विपणन, sales etc., shown in the figure to the सही ).
The data may pass through an operational आंकड़ा स्टोर for अतिरिक्त operations before वे are प्रयुक्त in the DW लिये reporting.
The typical etl -based data गोदाम uses staging, आंकड़ा संयोजन, और access परतों to हाउस its key functions.
The staging परत or staging डेटाबेस stores raw data extracted इससे प्रत्येक of the disparate source आंकड़ा systems.
the integration layer integrates the disparate आंकड़ा sets by transforming the आंकड़ा from the स्टेजिंग layer often storing इस रूपांतरित आंकड़ा in an operational data स्टोर ( ODS ) डेटाबेस.
The एकीकृत data are then स्थानांतरित to yet another डेटाबेस, often called the data warehouse database, जहाँ the data is arranged into hierarchical groups often called dimensions and into facts और aggregate facts.
The संयोजन of facts and dimensions is sometimes पुकारा a star schema.
the अभिगम परत helps users retrieve data.
a आंकड़ा गोदाम constructed from an एकीकृत data सोर्स systems does नहीं आवश्यकता ETL, staging databases, or operational data store databases.
The integrated आंकड़ा source systems may be माना to be a part of a वितरित operational data स्टोर परत.
Data federation विधि or आंकड़ा virtualization methods may be used to access the वितरित integrated source data systems to consolidate and aggregate data सीधे into the data गोदाम database tables.
नापसंद the ETL-based data warehouse, the integrated सोर्स आंकड़ा systems और the data warehouse are all integrated since there is no transformation of आयामी or reference data.
This एकीकृत आंकड़ा गोदाम architecture supports the drill down from the कुल आंकड़ा of the आंकड़ा गोदाम to the transactional data of the एकीकृत source data systems.
आंकड़ा warehouses can be subdivided into data marts.
आंकड़ा marts स्टोर subsets of आंकड़ा from a warehouse.
This परिभाषा of the data warehouse focuses on आंकड़ा storage.
the प्रमुख सोर्स of the आंकड़ा is cleaned, transformed, cataloged and made available for use by managers and अन्य कारोबार पेशेवर लिये data mining, online analytical processing, मार्केट research और decision support ( marakas & O'Brien 2009 ).
however, the अर्थात् to retrieve and analyze आंकड़ा, to निकालें, transform और load आंकड़ा, और to manage the आंकड़ा शब्दकोष are भी considered essential components of a आंकड़ा warehousing system.
Many references to data warehousing use this broader कॉन्टेक्स्ट.
Thus, an विस्तारित definition for आंकड़ा warehousing शामिल कारोबार intelligence टूल्स, टूल्स to निकालें, रूपांतरण and लोड data into the repository, and tools to मैनेज and retrieve metadata.
पोर्टलैंड stone quarry on the आइल of Portland, England
An abandoned construction कुल quarry near Adelaide, South Australia
a quarry is a type of open-pit मेरा from which चट्टान or खनिज are extracted.
खदानों हैं generally प्रयुक्त for extracting building सामग्री, ऐसे as आयाम stone, construction कुल, riprap, बालू, और बजरी.
They are often collocated with concrete and asphalt पौधे due to the requirement for विशाल amounts of aggregate in those materials.
खोलें खानों कि produce खनिज are typically referred to as open pit mines.
The word पाषाण can include underground quarrying for stone, such as नहाना stone.
Mormons ( ) are a religious और सांस्कृतिक group सम्बन्धित to mormonism, the principal शाखा of the Latter Day Saint movement of Restorationist Christianity, which began with the visions of जोसेफ Smith in upstate नई York during the 1820s.
After स्मिथ 's मौत in 1844 the Mormons followed Brigham यंग to what would become the यूटा territory.
Today Mormons हैं understood to be members of The गिरिजाघर of Jesus मसीह of Latter-day Saints ( lds गिरिजाघर ).
Some mormons are भी either स्वतंत्र or non-practicing.
the center of mormon सांस्कृतिक influence is in यूटा, and उत्तर America has more Mormons than any other continent, though the बहुमत of mormons live बाहर the संयुक्त States.
Mormons have developed a दमदार sense of communality that तना इससे their doctrine और history.
दौरान the 19th सदी mormon converts tended to एकत्रित to a central geographic स्थान, और between 1852 and 1890 a अल्पसंख्यक of Mormons openly practiced बहुवचन marriage, a form of religious polygamy.
mormons dedicate large amounts of time और resources to serving in their गिरिजाघर, and अनेक young Mormons चुनें to serve a full-time proselytizing mission.
Mormons have a health code that eschews alcoholic पेय, tobacco, कॉफी, tea, और other addictive substances.
They tend to be very family-oriented, and have strong connections across generations and साथ विस्तारित family, reflective of their belief that families can be sealed together परे मौत and throughout शाश्वत.
Mormons भी have a सख्त law of chastity, requiring abstention from sexual संबंध outside of विवाह और सख्त वफ़ादारी भीतर marriage.
mormons self-identify as ईसाई, हालांकि some of उनके मान्यताओं differ from mainstream christianity.
Mormons believe in the Bible, as well as अन्य किताबे of scripture, ऐसे as the किताब of Mormon.
They have a अद्वितीय view of cosmology, and मानना कि all लोगों are spirit-children of God.
Mormons believe that returning to God requires following the उदाहरण of Jesus Christ, and accepting his atonement through ordinances such as बपतिस्मा.
They मानना कि मसीह 's church थी restored through जोसेफ स्मिथ, और is हिदायत by living नबियों और रसूलों.
Central to mormon faith is the belief कि परमेश्वर speaks to his children और answers उनके प्रार्थनाएं.
In वित्तीय accounting, एसेट हैं आर्थिक resources.
Anything ठोस or intangible कि is सक्षम of होने owned or नियंत्रित to उपज मान and that is आयोजित to have धनात्मक आर्थिक value is considered an asset.
बस stated, एसेट represent value of ownership that can be परिवर्तित into cash ( although cash itself is also माना an एसेट ).
the balance sheet of a firm रिकॉर्ड the monetaryJ.
G. siegel, N. Dauber & J. K. Shim, `` the Vest Pocket cpa '', Wiley, 2005.There are different methods of assessing the मौद्रिक मान of the एसेट recorded on the संतुलन Sheet.
in some cases, the Historical लागत is प्रयुक्त ; ऐसे that the value of the एसेट जब it थी खरीदा in the past is प्रयुक्त as the monetary value.
In अन्य instances, the present मेला market value of the asset is used to determine the value shown on the balance sheet.
value of the assets owned by the कड़.
It is धन और अन्य valuables belonging to an individual or business.
दो major asset वर्ग are ठोस assets and intangible assets.
ठोस एसेट contain विभिन्न subclasses, including current assets and fixed assets.J.
Downes, J.E. Goodman, `` Dictionary of वित्त & Investment Terms '', Baron 's Financial Guides, 2003 वर्तमान एसेट include inventory, while fixed assets include ऐसे वस्तुएं as buildings और उपकरण.J. Downes, j.e. Goodman, `` Dictionary of Finance & Investment Terms '', Baron 's Financial मार्गदर्शिका, 2003 ; and J. G. Siegel, N. Dauber & J. K. Shim, `` The बनियान जेब CPA '', Wiley, 2005.
Intangible एसेट हैं nonphysical संसाधन and rights that have a मान to the firm because they दे the firm some दयालु of advantage in the मार्केट place.
Examples of intangible एसेट are साख, copyrights, trademarks, patents and कंप्यूटर programs, and वित्तीय assets, including ऐसे items as खाते receivable, bonds और स्टॉक्स.
A neuron ( or ; भी known as a neurone or nerve cell ) is an electrically excitable cell कि processes और transmits सूचना through electrical and chemical सिग्नल.
a chemical signal occurs via a synapse, a specialized connection with अन्य cells.
न्यूरॉन्स कनेक्ट to each other to रूप neural संजाल.
न्यूरॉन्स हैं the कोर components of the nervous system, which शामिल the दिमाग, स्पाइनल cord, और peripheral ganglia.
A क्रमांक of specialized types of न्यूरॉन्स exist : sensory न्यूरॉन्स respond to touch, sound, लाइट और numerous other stimuli affecting cells of the sensory अंगों that then send सिग्नल to the स्पाइनल cord and दिमाग.
Motor neurons प्राप्त signals from the brain और स्पाइनल cord, cause muscle contractions, और affect ग्रंथियों.
Interneurons connect न्यूरॉन्स to अन्य न्यूरॉन्स within the वही region of the brain or spinal cord.
A ठेठ neuron possesses a cell body ( प्रायः called the सोम ), dendrites, and an axon.
Dendrites हैं पतला structures कि उठता इससे the cell body, often extending लिये सैंकड़ों of micrometres और branching अनेक times, giving वृद्धि to a जटिल `` dendritic पेड़ ''.
an axon is a खास cellular extension that arises from the cell body at a साईट called the axon उभरकर and travels for a distance, as दूर as 1 meter in humans or even more in अन्य species.
the cell body of a न्यूरॉन frequently देता rise to multiple dendrites, but never to अधिक than एक axon, although the axon may शाखा hundreds of times before it terminates.
at the majority of synapses, सिग्नल are sent from the axon of एक neuron to a dendrite of another.
There हैं, however, many exceptions to ये नियम : न्यूरॉन्स कि कमी dendrites, neurons that have no axon, synapses कि कनेक्ट an axon to another axon or a dendrite to another dendrite, etc.
All न्यूरॉन्स are electrically excitable, maintaining voltage gradients across their membranes by means of metabolically चलित ion pumps, which combine साथ ion channels embedded in the membrane to generate intracellular-versus-extracellular विशेषज्ञता differences of ions such as सोडियम, potassium, chloride, and calcium.
Changes in the cross-membrane voltage can alter the function of voltage-dependent ion channels.
If the वोल्टेज परिवर्तन by a विशाल enough amount, an all-or-none electrochemical pulse called an कार्रवाई संभावित is उत्पन्न, जिससे travels rapidly along the कोशिका 's axon, और activates सिनेप्टिक connections साथ other cells when it arrives.
Neurons do नहीं undergo cell division.
In सबसे मामले, neurons are generated by special प्रकार of स्टेम cells.
astrocytes, a type of glial cell, have also महरूम observed to फेरे into न्यूरॉन्स by पुण्य of the stem cell characteristic pluripotency.
in humans, neurogenesis largely ceases दौरान adulthood—but in दो दिमाग areas, the hippocampus and olfactory बल्ब, वहीँ is strong evidence लिये पीढी of substantial numbers of new neurons.
Super Bowl xliii was an अमरीकी football खेल between the अमरीकी फ़ुटबॉल सम्मेलन ( AFC ) champion Pittsburgh Steelers and the नेशनल Football Conference ( nfc ) champion Arizona कार्डिनल्स to decide the नेशनल Football लीग ( NFL ) चैंपियन for the 2008 ऋतु.
The स्टीलर्स defeated the Cardinals by the score of 27–23.
the खेल was निभाई on February 1, 2009, at Raymond James स्टेडियम in Tampa, Florida.
साथ this जीत, the Steelers became the first team to win छह सुपर Bowls.
पिट्सबर्ग, जो समाप्त the नियमित season with a 12–4 record, also won their दूसरी Super Bowl in four years बाद winning सुपर Bowl XL at the समाप्त of the 2005 season.
The Cardinals entered the game seeking their पहला NFL title चूंकि 1947, the longest चैंपियनशिप सूखा in the लीग.
The क्लबों became an unexpected विजेता दौरान the regular season, compiling a 9–7 रिकार्ड, and the playoffs with the aid of सिर coach केन whisenhunt, who थी the स्टीलर्स ' offensive समन्वयक in Super Bowl xl, and the re-emergence of quarterback Kurt Warner, who थी the Super कटोरी mvp in सुपर Bowl xxxiv with उसके पूर्व टोली, St. लुई मेढ़ों.
पिट्सबर्ग jumped to a 17–7 मध्यांतर सीसे, aided by linebacker James हैरिसन 's सुपर कटोरी रिकार्ड 100-yard interception return लिये a touchdown.
trailing 20–7 at the प्रारंभ of the चौथी quarter, Arizona scored 16 unanswered points, सहित चौड़ी receiver Larry Fitzgerald 's 64-yard touchdown reception, to take the सीसे साथ 2:37 remaining in the खेल.
लकिन the स्टीलर्स marched 78 गज to score on wide receiver Santonio holmes ' 6-yard game-winning touchdown catch with 35 seconds बाएँ.
Holmes, who caught नौ passes लिये 131 yards and a touchdown, सहित चार receptions for 73 yards on कि final game-winning ड्राइव, थी named Super Bowl MVP.
He became the sixth wide receiver to जीत the award, and भी थी the तीसरा Pittsburgh receiver to win the पुरस्कार, following Lynn Swann and Hines Ward.
Despite the वैश्विक financial संकट और limited राशि of आनुषंगिक festivities कि are सामान्यतः आयोजित before the game, the एनबीसी television network broadcast आकर्षित an average U.S. दर्शक of 98.7 million viewers, making it the most देखी Super Bowl in इतिहास to that point.
A diagram of the electromagnetic वर्णक्रम, प्रर्दशित various गुण across the दायरा of frequencies और wavelengths
The electromagnetic spectrum is the दायरा of all possible बारंबारता of electromagnetic विकिरण.
the `` electromagnetic वर्णक्रम '' of an object has a अलग अर्थ, and is instead the characteristic distribution of electromagnetic radiation emitted or अवशोषित by that particular object.
The electromagnetic वर्णक्रम extends from नीचे the कम बारंबारता used for modern radio संचार to गामा radiation at the short- wavelength ( high-frequency ) end, thereby covering wavelengths from thousands of kilometers down to a fraction of the आकार of an अणु.
The सीमा for long wavelengths is the size of the universe itself, while it is विचार कि the short wavelength सीमा is in the vicinity of the प्लांक लंबाई, हालांकि in principle the spectrum is infinite और निरन्तर.
Most parts of the इलेक्ट्रोमैग्नेटिक वर्णक्रम हैं प्रयुक्त in science लिये spectroscopic और other probing interactions, as तरीके to study and characterize matter.
In addition, विकिरण इससे various भाग of the spectrum रै मिला many अन्य उपयोग for communications and manufacturing ( देखिए इलेक्ट्रोमैग्नेटिक विकिरण लिये more अनुप्रयोग ).
Legend
Marchantia, a liverwort
ब्रायोफाइटा is a traditional name used to refer to सब embryophytes ( जमीन plants ) कि do नहीं have true vascular ऊतक और are इसलिए पुकारा ' non-vascular plants '.
Some bryophytes do have specialized tissues लिये the transport of water ; however since these do not contain lignin, वे are not माना to be true vascular ऊतक.
Currently bryophytes are thought not to be a प्राकृतिक or monophyletic समूह ; however the name is convenient and remains in use as a सामूहिक पद लिये mosses, hornworts, और liverworts.
bryophytes produce enclosed reproductive structures ( gametangia and sporangia ), but they उपज neither पुष्प nor बीज, reproducing via spores.
The term ब्रायोफाइटा comes इससे Greek βρύον, bryon, `` tree-moss, oyster-green '' + φυτόν - phyton `` plant ''.
a बैंको is a वित्तीय institution और a financial intermediary कि accepts deposits और channels those जमा into lending activities, either सीधे by loaning or indirectly through पूंजी markets.
a बैंको is the connection between ग्राहक कि have capital deficits and customers with capital surpluses.
Due to उनके influence भीतर a financial system and an economy, banks हैं generally अत्यधिक regulated in most countries.
Most banks operate अंतर्गत a प्रणाली known as fractional reserve बैंकिंग where they थाम only a छोटी reserve of the funds deposited और lend out the rest for profit.
वे are generally विषय to न्यूनतम पूंजी requirements जिससे हैं आधारित on an international set of capital standards, ज्ञात as the Basel accords.
The oldest bank still in अस्तित्व is मोंटे dei Paschi di Siena, headquartered in Siena, Italy, जिससे has been operating continuously since 1472.
it is followed by Berenberg Bank of Hamburg ( 1590 ) and Sveriges Riksbank of स्वीडन ( 1668 ).
बैंकिंग in इसके modern भाव evolved in समृद्ध शहरों of पुनर्जागरण इटली, such as फ्लोरेंस, Venice और Genoa.
In the history of banking, a number of banking dynasties —among them notably Medici, Fugger, welser, Berenberg, baring and रोथ्सचाइल्ड —have played a central role over many centuries.
the Xbox is a video खेल console manufactured by Microsoft.
It थी released on नवम्बर 15, 2001 in North America, February 22, 2002 in जापानी, and March 14, 2002 in Australia और यूरोपीय.
It was Microsoft 's first foray into the gaming console market.
as भाग of the sixth-generation of gaming, the Xbox competed साथ सोनी 's प्लेस्टेशन 2, Sega 's Dreamcast ( which stopped American बिक्री पहले the Xbox went on sale ), and Nintendo 's GameCube.
the एक्सबॉक्स was the first console offered by an अमरीकी कम्पनी after the Atari जैगुआर stopped sales in 1996.
The एकीकृत Xbox Live सेवा शुभारम्भ in नवम्बर 2002 अनुमत players to खेल खेल online with a broadband कनेक्शन.
It पहला competed साथ dreamcast 's online सेवा but बाद primarily competed साथ PlayStation 2 's online service.
Although these दो हैं free while एक्सबॉक्स Live required a subscription, as well as broadband-only connection which थी नहीं completely adopted yet, एक्सबॉक्स सजीव was a success due to बेहतर servers, features such as a buddy list, और milestone titles like Halo 2 released in नवम्बर 2004, जिससे is the best-selling Xbox video game and was by दूर the most लोकप्रिय online game for years.
Xbox 's successor, the Xbox 360, was शुभारम्भ in November 2005.
The एक्सबॉक्स थी discontinued in लेट 2005 in Japan जहाँ sales were ग़रीब.
It was discontinued in लेट 2006 in यूरोपीय and early 2007 in उत्तर अमेरिका.
the last एक्सबॉक्स game in Europe थी टोनी हॉक 's Project 8 released in नवम्बर 2006, और the last game in North America was Madden एनएफएल 09 released in अगस्त 2008.
support लिये out-of-warranty Xbox consoles was discontinued on March 2, 2009, stating that any in-warranty repair now needed will नहीं be undertaken.
Xbox अभिगम to एक्सबॉक्स सजीव थी stopped on अप्रैल 15, 2010.
The Gospel According to John ( Greek τὸ κατὰ ἰωάννην εὐαγγέλιον ), commonly referred to as the Gospel of John or simply John and प्रायः referred to in New वसीयत scholarship as the Fourth इन्जील, is an खाता of the पब्लिक ministry of Jesus.
It begins with the गवाह और प्रतिज्ञान by John the Baptist and concludes with the मौत, burial, resurrection, और post-resurrection appearances of यीशु.
This account is fourth of the canonical gospels, after the synoptics Matthew, चिह्नित and Luke.
states कि the book derives from the testimony of the ' disciple जिसको Jesus loved. '
साथ with Peter, the बेनाम disciple is विशेषकर close to यीशु, and early-church tradition पहचाना उसे as John the apostle, एक of यीशु ' Twelve Apostles.
The gospel is closely related in style और content to the three surviving epistles of John such कि commentators दावत the चार books together, yet, according to सबसे आधुनिक विद्वानों, John थी not the लेखक of कोई of these books.
Recent Christian Scripture स्कॉलरशिप more और more रै placed John within a first-century यहूदी कॉन्टेक्स्ट.
Raymond E. Brown did pioneering कार्य to ट्रेस the development of the परंपरा from which the gospel arose.
the discourses seem to be चिंतित with the actual issues of the church-and-synagogue debate at the time when the इन्जील थी written.
It is notable कि, in the gospel, the community still appears to define itself primarily against Judaism, बल्कि than as part of a wider Christian गिरिजाघर.
हालांकि Christianity started as a movement within Judaism, धीरे Christians and Jews became bitterly opposed.
John presents a `` higher '' Christology than the synoptics, meaning कि it describes Jesus as the incarnation of the divine लोगो through whom सब things were made, as the object of veneration, और अधिक explicitly as God incarnate.
तभी in John does Jesus बात at length about खुद and his दैवी role, often shared with the शिष्यों only.
विरूद्ध the synoptics, जॉन focuses largely on different चमत्कार ( सहित resurrecting Lazarus ), given as लक्षण meant to engender आस्था.
Synoptic तत्व ऐसे as parables और exorcisms हैं not मिला in जॉन.
It presents a realized eschatology in which मोक्ष is already present लिये the believer.
The Plagues of Egypt ( ), also पुकारा the टेन Plagues ( ) or the Biblical Plagues, were ten calamities that, according to the biblical किताब of exodus, Israel 's God, Yahweh, inflicted upon Egypt to राजी Pharaoh to रिलीज the ill-treated Israelites इससे slavery.
pharaoh capitulated after the tenth plague, triggering the exodus of the Jewish people.
the plagues were designed to contrast the power of yahweh साथ the impotence of Egypt 's various देवताओं.
Some टीकाकारों have associated several of the plagues with judgment on specific देवताओं associated with the nile, fertility और natural phenomena.
the plagues of Egypt हैं भी उल्लेखित in the Quran ( 7,133–136 ).
according to the Book of Exodus, God proclaims that all the देवताओं of Egypt will be judged through the दसवाँ and final plague:
John Martin 's painting of the plague of hail और fire ( 1823 ).
a role-playing game ( आरपीजी और sometimes roleplaying खेल ) is a खेल in which players assume the roles of characters in a fictional सेटिंग.
खिलाड़ी take जिम्मेदारी लिये एक्टिंग आउट these भूमिकाएँ within a कथा, either through शाब्दिक acting or through a process of संरचित decision-making or अक्षर development.
क्रियाएँ लिया भीतर अनेक खेल succeed or असफल according to a औपचारिक प्रणाली of rules और guidelines.
वहीँ are several forms of आरपीजी.
The original form, sometimes called the tabletop RPG, is conducted through discussion, whereas in live action role-playing games ( LARP ) players physically perform their वर्ण ' actions.
In both of ये forms, an arranger पुकारा a खेल निपुण ( gm ) प्रायः decides on the नियम and सेटिंग to be प्रयुक्त and अधिनियमों as referee, जबकि प्रत्येक of the other खिलाड़ी plays the role of a single character.
अनेक किस्में of RPG भी मौजूद in electronic media, such as multi-player text-based muds and उनके graphics-based successors, massively एकाधिक online role-playing games ( mmorpgs ).
Role-playing games also include single-player offline role-playing video games in जिससे खिलाड़ी कंट्रोल a अक्षर or team who undertake quests, और may शामिल capabilities कि advance using सांख्यिकीय mechanics.
These games प्रायः share settings and नियम with tabletop rpgs, but emphasize अक्षर advancement more than collaborative storytelling.
Despite इस variety of फ़ॉर्म, some game forms such as trading card games and wargames that are related to role-playing खेल may not be शामिल.
Role-playing activity may sometimes be उपस्थित in such games, but it is not the primary focus.
the term is भी sometimes प्रयुक्त to describe लिए simulation games and exercises प्रयुक्त in teaching, प्रशिक्षण, and अकादमिक शोध.
The American सिविल War ( ACW ), also known as the War between the राज्य or simply the Civil युद्ध ( देखिए नामकरण ), was a सिविल युद्ध fought इससे 1861 to 1865 between the United राज्य ( the `` Union '' or the `` उत्तर '' ) and several Southern स्लेव राज्य कि declared their secession and formed the Confederate States of अमेरिका ( the `` confederacy '' or the `` South '' ).
the war had इसके उत्पत्ति in the issue of गुलामी, especially the extension of slavery into the western territories.
Foreign powers किया not intervene.
After चार सालो of खूनी कॉम्बैट कि left over 600,000 soldiers dead and destroyed much of the South 's अवसंरचना, the Confederacy collapsed, गुलामी was abolished, और the difficult Reconstruction प्रक्रम of restoring national unity and guaranteeing अधिकारों to the freed स्लेव began.
In the 1860 अध्यक्षीय चुनाव, republicans, led by अब्राहम lincoln, opposed expanding गुलामी into संयुक्त States ' territories.
Lincoln won, लकिन before his inauguration on March 4, 1861, seven cotton-based slave राज्य formed the confederacy.
Outgoing Democratic अध्यक्ष जेम्स बुकानन और the आवक republicans अस्वीकृत secession as illegal.
Lincoln 's inaugural address declared his administration होता नहीं initiate civil war.
आठ remaining slave राज्य जारी to reject काल्स लिये secession.
Confederate forces seized numerous federal दुर्गों within territory claimed by the confederacy.
A Peace सम्मेलन failed to find a सुलह, and both पहलू prepared for war.
The confederates assumed that European countries यहूद so निर्भर on `` किंग Cotton `` that वे would intervene ; none किया and none पहचाना the new Confederate राज्य of अमेरिका.
hostilities began on April 12, 1861, जब confederate forces fired upon फोर्ट Sumter, a key fort held by Union सैनिकों in South Carolina.
Lincoln called for प्रत्येक state to provide troops to retake the fort ; consequently, four अधिक slave states joined the Confederacy, bringing their कुल to ग्यारह.
The Union soon controlled the border states और स्थापित a नवल blockade कि crippled the southern अर्थव्यवस्था.
The Eastern थिएटर was inconclusive in 1861–62.
The autumn 1862 Confederate अभियान into Maryland ( a संघ राज्य ) ended with confederate रिट्रीट at the बैटल of Antietam, dissuading British intervention.
lincoln issued the emancipation Proclamation, जिससे बना ending slavery a war goal.
To the west, by summer 1862 the Union destroyed the Confederate river नेवी, तब much of उनके western सेना, और the Union at vicksburg split the confederacy in दो at the Mississippi River.
In 1863, रॉबर्ट E. ली 's Confederate incursion north ended at the बैटल of Gettysburg.
पश्चिमी सफलताओं led to ulysses S. Grant command of all संघ सेना in 1864.
in the Western थिएटर, William T. शरमन drove east to कैप्चर अटलांटा and marched to the sea, destroying Confederate infrastructure साथ the way.
the Union marshaled the resources and manpower to आक्रमण the Confederacy from सब directions, and could afford to fight battles of attrition through the Overland Campaign towards Richmond, the confederate capital.
The defending Confederate army failed, अग्रणी to Lee 's surrender to ग्रान्ट at appomattox Court House on अप्रैल 9, 1865.
The अमरीकी Civil युद्ध was एक of the earliest true industrial युद्धों.
railroads, the टेलीग्राफ, steamships, and mass-produced हथियार were employed extensively.
the mobilization of civilian कारखानों, mines, shipyards, banks, transportation and खाना supplies सब foreshadowed World War i.
It remains the deadliest war in American इतिहास, resulting in the मौतों of an अनुमानित 750,000 सैनिको and an undetermined number of civilian हताहत.
इतिहासकार John huddleston estimates the मौत toll at ten प्रतिशत of all Northern males 20–45 years बूढ़ा, and 30 percent of सब Southern श्वेत males aged 18–40.
the परिभाषा of the संसार 's busiest airport has been specified by the एयरपोर्ट Council International in Geneva, Switzerland.
The ACI defines और measures the following three types of विमानक्षेत्र traffic:
यात्री ट्रैफ़िक : total passengers emplaned and deplaned, यात्री in पारगमन counted एकबार
Cargo traffic : loaded और unloaded भाड़ा and mail in मीट्रिक tonnes
Traffic movements : अवतरण और take-offs of aircraft
संसार War I ( WWI ) थी a वैश्विक war centred in Europe कि began on 28 जुलाई 1914 और lasted जबतक 11 नवम्बर 1918.
it थी predominantly called the संसार युद्ध or the ग्रेट युद्ध from its occurrence until the start of World युद्ध ii in 1939, and the First World War or World War i thereafter.
It involved all the world 's ग्रेट powers, which यहूद समवेत in two opposing alliances : the allies ( based on the Triple Entente of the United Kingdom, France and Russia ) और the Central शक्तियां ( originally the Triple Alliance of जर्मनी, austria-hungary and Italy ; but, as Austria–Hungary था taken the offensive विरूद्ध the agreement, इटली did not डालें into the war ).
ये alliances were दोनो reorganised and expanded as more nations entered the युद्ध : इटली, जापानी and the संयुक्त States joined the Allies, and the Ottoman साम्राज्य and Bulgaria the Central शक्तियां.
ultimately, अधिक than 70 million सैन्य personnel, including 60 million europeans, were mobilised in एक of the largest wars in history.
More than 9 लाख combatants were killed, largely क्युकी of technological advancements कि led to विशाल increases in the lethality of हथियार without सम्बन्धित improvements in protection or mobility.
It was the fifth- deadliest conflict in संसार history, subsequently paving the रास्ता लिये विभिन्न political परिवर्तन, such as revolutions in अनेक of the nations शामिल.
One of the long-term causes of the war was the resurgence of imperialism in the foreign policies of the great शक्तियां of यूरोपीय.
More immediately, the assassination of Archduke Franz Ferdinand of ऑस्ट्रिया, the वारिस to the सिंहासन of austria-hungary, on 28 June 1914 by Yugoslav राष्ट्रवादी Gavrilo Princip in साराजेवो triggered a राजनयिक crisis when austria-hungary subsequently delivered an ultimatum to the किंगडम of Serbia.
Several alliances formed over the previous दशकों were invoked.
भीतर weeks, the प्रमुख powers यहूद at युद्ध और, via their colonies, the conflict जल्द स्प्रेड around the संसार.
on 28 जुलाई, the Austro-Hungarians fired the first गोलियाँ of the युद्ध as preparation for the आक्रमण of सर्बिया.
While the russians mobilised, the Germans invaded neutral बेल्जियम and Luxembourg on the way to France, providing a casus belli for Britain 's declaration of युद्ध विरूद्ध जर्मनी.
बाद the जर्मनी march on Paris थी brought to a halt—the so-called Miracle of the Marne —the Western सामने settled into a static battle of attrition with a trench line that बदला little जबतक 1917.
On the पूर्वी Front, the Russian army थी successful विरूद्ध the austro-hungarians, but थी रोका in its invasion of ईस्ट Prussia by the Germans.
In November the Ottoman साम्राज्य joined the war, खोलने up fronts in the Caucasus, Mesopotamia and the sinai.
Italy और बुल्गारिया went to war in 1915 and Romania in 1916.
In रूस, the tsar 's government collapsed in कूच 1917 and a subsequent revolution in नवम्बर brought the russians to terms साथ the सेंट्रल Powers.
After a 1918 German अप्रिय along the western सामने, the allies drove back the germans in a series of successful offensives and American शक्तियां began entering the trenches.
Germany, जिससे था इसके own ट्रबल साथ revolutionaries, सहमत to an armistice on 11 नवम्बर 1918.
the war ended in विजय for the allies.
Events on the home fronts were as tumultuous as on the बैटल fronts, as the भागीदार आजमाया to mobilize their manpower और आर्थिक संसाधन to लड़ो a कुल war.
By the समाप्त of the युद्ध, चार major इम्पीरियल powers—the German, Russian, austro-hungarian and Ottoman empires—ceased to exist.
the successor राज्य of the पूर्व two खोया a great राशि of territory, जबकि the latter two were dismantled entirely.
the मैप of central Europe was redrawn into several smaller राज्य.
The लीग of राष्ट्र थी formed in the hope of preventing another such विरोध.
the European nationalism शाखित by the war and the ब्रेकअप of empires, the repercussions of Germany 's defeat और समस्याएं with the सन्धि of versailles are agreed to be factors contributing to संसार War ii.
the deepwater क्षितिज oil spill ( also referred to as the BP oil spill, the bp आयल disaster, the Gulf of मैक्सिको आयल spill, और the Macondo blowout ) थी an oil spill in the Gulf of Mexico on the BP -operated Macondo Prospect, considered the largest accidental marine आयल spill in the इतिहास of the petroleum उद्योग, estimated to be between 8 % और 31 % larger in आवाज़ than the पहले Ixtoc I oil spill.
Following the explosion और sinking of the Deepwater Horizon आयल rig, which claimed 11 lives, a sea-floor oil gusher flowed unabated लिये 87 days, जबतक it was capped on 15 July 2010.
The total निर्वहन is अनुमानित at.
A विशाल जवाब ensued to protect beaches, wetlands और मुहानों from the spreading आयल utilizing skimmer जहाजों, फ्लोटिंग booms, नियंत्रित burns and of corexit आयल dispersant.
After अनेक failed प्रयत्न to contain the flow, the well थी declared sealed on 19 सितंबर 2010.
Some रिपोर्ट्स indicate the well site continues to लीक.
due to the months-long spill, साथ साथ प्रतिकूल effects from the जवाब and cleanup क्रियाएँ, extensive damage to marine and wildlife habitats, fishing और पर्यटन industries, और human स्वास्थ्य problems have continued through 2013.three years बाद the spill, तारकोल balls could स्टिल be found on the Mississippi coast.
Numerous investigations explored the causes of the explosion और record-setting spill.
Notably, the u.S. सरकारी 's सितंबर 2011 रपट pointed to defective cement on the खूब, faulting mostly bp, but भी well ऑपरेटर transocean और ठेकेदार Halliburton.
Earlier in 2011, a White House आयोग likewise blamed BP और इसके partners for a श्रेणी of cost-cutting decisions और an insufficient safety system, but also concluded that the spill resulted from `` प्रणालीगत '' root कल्याणकारी and `` absent significant सुधार in दोनो industry practices and government policies, might well recur ''.
In November 2012, bp and the United राज्य विभाग of इंसाफ settled federal criminal charges साथ BP pleading guilty to 11 counts of manslaughter, two misdemeanors, and a felony count of lying to कॉंग्रेस.
bp also सहमत to four years of government निगरानी of इसके safety practices and ethics, and the Environmental Protection Agency घोषित कि BP होता be temporarily banned इससे new contracts साथ the us सरकारी.
BP और the Department of Justice agreed to a record-setting $ 4.525 billion in fines और other payments लकिन further विधिक proceedings not अपेक्षित to conclude until 2014 are जारी to determine payouts and जुर्माना अंतर्गत the Clean जल Act और the Natural Resources क्षति मूल्यांकन.
As of फ़रवरी 2013, criminal and civil settlements और payments to a trust fund had लागत the कम्पनी $ 42.2 billion.
`` जहाँ the Streets have no नाम '' is a song by rock band U2.
It is the खोलने track from उनके 1987 album the जोशुआ पेड़ and थी released as the album 's third single in August 1987.
the song 's आँकड़ा is a repeating guitar arpeggio using a विलंब प्रभाव, निभाई during the song 's परिचय और again at the समाप्त.
सीसे vocalist Bono wrote the lyrics in response to the ख़्याल कि it is possible to पहचानो a person 's religion और income आधारित on the street on जिससे वे lived, विशेषकर in belfast.
During the band 's कठिनाइयों recording the song, निर्माता Brian eno माना erasing the song 's tapes to have them start इससे खरोंच.
`` जहाँ the गलियों Have No Name '' थी praised by आलोचकों and became a वाणिज्यिक कामयाबी, peaking at number thirteen in the US, number fourteen in कनाडा, क्रमांक ten in the Netherlands, and number चार in the United Kingdom.
the song रै become one of the band 's सबसे लोकप्रिय songs and has remained a staple of their सजीव अधिनियम since the song debuted in 1987 on The Joshua Tree दौरे.
the सोंग was notably performed on a Los Angeles rooftop लिये the filming of its music video, which जीती a Grammy Award for Best प्रदर्शन Music वीडियो.recently the सोंग has been used by the NFL 's बाल्टीमोर Ravens as their प्रवेश song in Super कटोरी xlvii
Thomas Jeffrey `` Tom '' Hanks ( born July 9, 1956 ) is an American actor, निर्माता, लेखक, and director.
हैंक्स is known for उसके भूमिकाएँ in अपोलो 13, Big, कि Thing तुम Do !
, The ग्रीन Mile, तुम 've मिला मेल, sleepless in Seattle, Charlie Wilson 's War, Catch Me if तुम can, फॉरेस्ट गंप, Cast दूर, a लीग of उनके अपना, the Da विंची कोड, Angels & Demons, as well as animated films like the Toy Story film श्रेणी, The ध्रुवीय Express, and The सिम्पसन्स Movie.
He has earned and been मनोनीत लिये numerous पुरस्कार दौरान उसके career, सहित जीतना a Golden Globe for Best कर्ता और an Academy पुरस्कार लिये बेहतरीन Actor for his role in Philadelphia और a Golden ग्लोब, an Academy पुरस्कार, a स्क्रीन अभिनेताओं Guild Award, और a लोगों 's Choice Award for Best Actor for his role in Forrest Gump, and कमाई the स्टेनली Kubrick britannia पुरस्कार for Excellence in फिल्मी from the baftas in 2004.
Hanks is also ज्ञात for उसके सहयोग साथ film director Steven Spielberg on Saving निजी रयान और the mini-series बैंड of Brothers, जिससे शुभारम्भ हैंक्स भी as a कामयाब निदेशक, producer और लेखक.
as of 2012, Hanks ' films have grossed over $ 4.2 अरब at the United States बक्सा office alone, और over $ 8.5 billion worldwide making him the उच्चतम all-time बक्सा office स्टार.
The केप is an अमरीकी superhero drama series.
it premiered on एनबीसी दौरान the 2010–2011 टेलीविज़न season as a mid-season replacement beginning साथ a two-hour pilot एपीसोड on संडे, जनवरी 9, 2011 at 9 pm Eastern और Pacific समय.
An encore निभाई on Monday, January 10, with follow-up एपीसोड continuing on Monday evenings in the 9 pm timeslot beginning on January 17.
NBC subsequently cut the कुल number of episodes to be aired from 13 to 10 as a परिणाम of low दरजा.
on March 2, 2011, एनबीसी announced that the series finale would तभी be aired on the network 's website.
Halley 's Comet or Comet हैली ( or ), officially designated 1p/halley, is the best-known of the short-period धूमकेतुओं और is visible इससे Earth every 75–76 सालो.
Halley is the तभी short-period धूमकेतु that is clearly दृश्य to the naked नजर इससे Earth, और thus the तभी naked-eye धूमकेतु कि might appear twice in a इंसान lifetime.
Other naked-eye comets may be brighter and अधिक spectacular, but होगा appear तभी एकबार in हज़ारों of years.
Halley 's returns to the inner Solar प्रणाली have been observed और recorded by astronomers since at least 240 BCE.
Clear records of the comet 's appearances were made by चाइनीज, Babylonian, और मध्यकालीन European chroniclers, but were not पहचाना as reappearances of the same ऑब्जेक्ट at the समय.
the comet 's periodicity was पहला determined in 1705 by अंग्रेज़ी astronomer Edmond हैली, बाद whom it is अभी नामित.
हैली 's धूमकेतु last appeared in the inner Solar System in 1986 and will next appear in mid-2061.
During its 1986 apparition, हैली became the पहला comet to be observed in detail by spacecraft, providing the first observational आंकड़ा on the ढांचा of a धूमकेतु केंद्रक and the यांत्रिकी of coma and टेल गठन.
ये observations supported a क्रमांक of longstanding hypotheses about धूमकेतु construction, विशेषकर Fred Whipple 's `` dirty स्नोबॉल '' मॉडल, which correctly पूर्वानुमानित कि हैली would be रचित of a मिश्रण of volatile ices – ऐसे as जल, carbon डाइऑक्साइड and ammonia – and dust.
the missions also provided data जिससे substantially reformed और reconfigured these विचार ; लिये instance it is now समझा that Halley 's surface is largely रचित of dusty, non-volatile सामग्री, and कि तभी a छोटी portion of it is icy.
the following is a list of the most populous incorporated places of the United States of America.
as पारिभाषित by the संयुक्त States Census Bureau, an `` incorporated प्लेस `` includes a variety of designations, including नगर, कस्बा, village, borough, और नगरपालिका.
A few exceptional जनसांख्यिकी Designated Places ( cdps ) हैं भी included in the Census ब्यूरो 's listing of incorporated places.
Consolidated city-counties represent a पृथक प्रकार of government कि includes the entire जनसांख्यिकी of a county, or काउंटी समतुल्य.
Some संचित city-counties, however, include multiple incorporated स्थान.
इस list presents only कि portion ( or `` balance '' ) of ऐसे संचित city-counties that are नहीं a part of another incorporated place.
नोट that this सूची refers तभी to the जनसांख्यिकी of individual municipalities भीतर their defined हद, जिससे does नहीं include other municipalities or unincorporated suburban क्षेत्रों within urban agglomerations.
a different ranking is evident जब considering U.S. महानगर क्षेत्रफल populations.
The mayflower थी the ship that in 1620 transported 102 English तीर्थयात्रियों, including a core समूह of separatists, to नई इंग्लैण्ड.
Their story is one of travail and survival in a harsh New World पर्यावरण.
A New जीलैंड आगे ( in white ) takes a शॉट on लक्ष्य विरूद्ध Cameroon in the 2011 FIFA U-20 World कप.
Forwards, also ज्ञात as strikers, हैं the खिलाड़ी on a team in संघ football who play nearest to the opposing टोली 's goal, और हैं इसलिए principally responsible लिये scoring लक्ष्य.
This बहुत उन्नत स्थिति and its limited defensive responsibilities औसत forwards normally स्कोर more लक्ष्य than other खिलाड़ी.
This स्थिति requires intelligence, speed, और शक्ति, both of execution and of thought, to perform the भूमिका खूब.
Modern team formations प्रायः include one to three forwards ; two is the most common.
Coaches typically फ़ील्ड एक striker जो plays in an advanced position ( the केन्द्र forward ), और another attacking forward who plays somewhat deeper and assists in making लक्ष्य as well as scoring ( the दूसरी striker ).
It should be noted that inside forwards develop from attacking midfield positions और hence हैं naturally midfielders.
बार्सिलोना FC स्टार Lionel Messi is a typical attacking मिडफील्डर seen as a आगे due to his shot accuracy.
a California domestic साझेदारी is a legal relationship उपलब्धियाँ to same-sex युगल, and to certain opposite-sex युगल in which at least one पार्टी is at तनिक 18 सालो of age.
it affords the couple `` the वही rights, protections, और benefits, और... the same जिम्मेदारियों, obligations, और duties under विधि... '' as married spouses.
enacted in 1999, the domestic partnership registry was the पहला of its दयालु in the United राज्य निर्मित by a विधानमंडल without court हस्तक्षेप.
initially, domestic partnerships enjoyed very few privileges—principally बस hospital-visitation rights और the right to be claimed as a next of kin of the एस्टेट of a deceased संगी.
The legislature has since expanded the पैमाना of कैलिफ़ोर्निया domestic partnerships to शामिल all of the अधिकारों and responsibilities common to marriage.
as such, कैलिफ़ोर्निया domestic partnerships are functionally equivalent to civil unions offered in several other states.
Although the कार्यक्रम enjoys व्यापक support in California, it has been the सोर्स of some controversy.
Groups opposed to the recognition of same-sex families have challenged the विस्तार of domestic partnerships in court.
conversely, advocates of same-sex marriage contend कि anything less than पूरा marriage rights विस्तारित to same-sex partners is analogous to the `` पृथक but equal '' racial कानून of the Jim कौवा era.
Mark A. जैक्सन ( born अप्रैल 1, 1965 ) is an American basketball coach, and पूर्व खिलाड़ी who is the current head कोच of the Golden State योद्धाओं of the एनबीए.
A पाइंट गार्ड from st. जॉन 's विश्वविद्यालयों, he निभाई for the New York knicks, Indiana पेसर्स, Los एंजिल्स Clippers, Denver Nuggets, Toronto रैपटर्स, यूटा जैज़ and Houston Rockets in the NBA in a career spanning इससे 1987 to 2004.
Jackson रै also worked as a कमेंटेटर लिये ESPN और एबीसी alongside his पूर्व कोच Jeff Van Gundy and play-by-play man माइक breen.
he थी previously an NBA analyst for the यस Network 's नई जर्सी Nets games.
दक्षिण अफ़्रीकी has ग्यारह आधिकारिक languages : Afrikaans, अंग्रेज़ी, ndebele, उत्तरी sotho, Sotho, Swazi, tswana, सोंगा, Venda, Xhosa and Zulu.
Fewer than two percent of दक्षिण Africans बोलो a पहला language other than an official one.
Most दक्षिण africans can बोलो अधिक than one language.
Dutch and English were the first आधिकारिक भाषाएं of दक्षिण Africa from 1910 to 1925.
अफ्रीकी थी added as a part of Dutch in 1925.
डच was replaced by Afrikaans when South Africa became a republic in 1961, and Dutch was dropped in 1983, so between 1983 और 1994, South Africa था दो official languages : English and अफ्रीकी.
The English version of the दक्षिण African constitution refers to the भाषाएं by the names in those languages : isiZulu, isiXhosa, Afrikaans, Sepedi ( referring to Northern Sotho ), Setswana, अंग्रेज़ी, Sesotho ( referring to Southern Sotho ), xitsonga, siswati, tshivenda and isindebele ( referring to दक्षिणी Ndebele ).
in दक्षिण अफ़्रीकी, दक्षिणी Ndebele is known simply as ndebele, as most speakers of Northern Ndebele सजीव in Zimbabwe.
The 1993 version of the Constitution referred to Northern Sotho as Sesotho sa Leboa, but the 1996 version referred to the भाषा as Sepedi.
Different government विभाग and आधिकारिक bodies use अलग terms to denote Northern Sotho.
The main language of government is English भी if दक्षिण africans often take अभिमान in using indigenous languages लिये कोई purpose.
Afrikaans also सुविधाएँ prominently in कॉमर्स together with English as the भाषाएं साथ the highest number of धाराप्रवाह speakers are Afrikaans and English.
In शर्तें of भाषाई वर्गीकरण, the official भाषाएं include two West-Germanic languages ( अंग्रेज़ी and अफ्रीकी ) and nine Bantu languages.
Four of these are Nguni languages ( ज़ुलू, Xhosa, Swati and Ndebele ) and three are sotho–tswana languages ( Northern Sotho, दक्षिणी Sotho and Tswana ).
Tsonga is a Tswa–Ronga भाषा.
South अफ़्रीकी चिह्न Language is a distinct हालांकि incompletely emerged national standard भाषा which भी subsumes a क्लस्टर of semi-standardised dialects.
एल्युमिनियम nitrate is a salt of aluminium and nitric एसिड, मौजूदा normally as a crystalline hydrate, सबसे commonly as aluminium नाइट्रेट nonahydrate, Al ( no3 ) 3·9h2o.
The नई यॉर्क jets हैं a professional football team headquartered in Florham Park, नई Jersey, representing the New York metropolitan area.
The टोली is a सदस्य of the पूर्वी Division of the American Football Conference ( AFC ) in the नेशनल Football लीग ( NFL ).
in a unique व्यवस्था लिये the लीग, the Jets share MetLife स्टेडियम in ईस्ट Rutherford, New Jersey with the नई यॉर्क Giants.
the मताधिकार is legally और corporately registered as New York jets, LLC.
the टोली थी founded in 1959 as the टाइटन्स of नई यॉर्क, an असली member of the American फ़ुटबॉल लीग ; बाद, the मताधिकार joined the एनएफएल in the AFL–NFL merger.
the team began to play in 1960 at the Polo grounds.
अंतर्गत नई स्वामित्व, the current नाम थी adopted in 1963 and the franchise थी relocated to shea Stadium in 1964 and तब to the Meadowlands Sports जटिल in 1984.
The jets advanced to the playoffs for the first समय in 1968 और went on to compete in Super Bowl III जहाँ वे defeated the Baltimore Colts, बनने the पहला AFL टोली to defeat an NFL क्लबों in an afl-nfl World Championship Game.
चूंकि 1968, the jets have appeared in the playoffs तेरह times, और in the AFC चैंपियनशिप Game चार टाइम्स, most recently losing to the पिट्सबर्ग Steelers in 2010.
However, the jets have never returned to the सुपर कटोरी, making उन्हें एक of तीन NFL teams to win उनके lone Super Bowl रूप, साथ with the नई ऑरलियन्स संतो and tampa Bay buccaneers.
The team 's प्रशिक्षण सुविधा, Atlantic Health Jets प्रशिक्षण बीच, जिससे opened in 2008, is located in Florham पार्क.
The team currently holds their annual प्रशिक्षण शिविर sessions on the campus of the State University of नई York at Cortland in cortland, New York जबकि पकड़कर occasional sessions at the Florham Park जटिल.
Psilocybe semilanceata
Psilocybin mushrooms, also known as साइकेडेलिक mushrooms, हैं fungi that contain psychoactive indole alkaloids.
There हैं multiple colloquial शर्तें for psilocybin मशरूम, the most common being shrooms and जादू mushrooms.
biological genera containing psilocybin mushrooms include Agrocybe, Conocybe, Copelandia, Galerina, Gerronema, Gymnopilus, Hypholoma, Inocybe, Mycena, Panaeolus, pluteus, and Psilocybe.
There are लगभग 190 प्रजाति of psilocybin mushrooms and सबसे of उन्हें fall in the genus Psilocybe.
psilocybin mushrooms have likely been used since प्रागैतिहासिक times and may have been चित्रित in rock आर्ट.
Many cultures have प्रयुक्त these मशरूम in religious rites.
In modern पश्चिमी समाज they are used recreationally for उनके साइकेडेलिक effects.
हाल studies done at Imperial कॉलेज London और Johns Hopkins स्कूल of Medicine conclude that when प्रयुक्त properly, psilocybin acts as an anti-depressant as suggested by fmri दिमाग scans.
अलास्का ( ) is a state in the संयुक्त राज्य, situated in the northwest extremity of the उत्तर American continent, साथ the international boundary साथ कनाडा to the ईस्ट, the आर्कटिक Ocean to the north, and the Pacific समंदर to the west and दक्षिण, साथ Russia further वेस्ट across the Bering जलसन्धि.
अलास्का is the largest state in the United States by क्षेत्रफल, the 4th least populous and the तनिक densely आबादी of the 50 United States.
लगभग half of Alaska 's 731,449 निवासियों सजीव भीतर the Anchorage महानगर क्षेत्रफल.
Alaska 's अर्थव्यवस्था is वर्चस्व by the आयल, प्राकृतिक gas, and fishing industries ; it has ये resources in abundance.
Alaska थी purchased इससे रूस on March 30, 1867, for $ 7.2 लाख ( $ adjusted for inflation ) at approximately दो cents per acre ( $ 4.74/km2 ).
the land went through अनेक प्रशासनिक changes before बनने an organized ( or incorporated ) territory on may 11, 1912, and the 49th राज्य of the u.S. on January 3, 1959.
the नाम `` अलास्का '' ( аляска ) was already introduced in the Russian colonial period, जब it थी used only लिये the peninsula and is निकला इससे the Aleut alaxsxaq, meaning `` the mainland '' or, more वस्तुतः, `` the ऑब्जेक्ट towards which the action of the समुद्र is directed ''.
It is भी known as Alyeska, the `` ग्रेट जमीन '', an Aleut word निकला इससे the same रूट.
The 101 French विभाग हैं विभाजित into 342 arrondissements, which may be translated into अंग्रेज़ी as districts.
The पूंजी of an arrondissement/district is called a subprefecture.
When an arrondissement contains the prefecture ( पूंजी ) of the department, that prefecture is the capital of the arrondissement, acting both as a prefecture and as a subprefecture.
Arrondissements are further विभाजित into cantons and communes.
the vagina ( from Latin vāgīna, literally `` म्यान '' or `` scabbard `` ) is a tubular ट्रैक्ट which is a sex organ and रै दो main functions ; sexual intercourse और प्रसव.
In humans, this passage लीड इससे the खोलने of the vulva to the uterus ( womb ), but the vaginal ट्रैक्ट ends at the ग्रीवा.
Unlike men, जो have तभी one genital orifice, women have two, the urethra और the vagina.
The vaginal खोलने is much larger than the urethral opening, and both openings हैं protected by the labia.
the भीतरी mould of the योनि has a foldy बनावट which can create घर्षण for the शिश्न during intercourse.
दौरान arousal, the योनि gets नम to facilitate the entrance of the penis.
The Latinate plural `` vaginae '' is rarely used in अंग्रेज़ी.
Colloquially, the word vagina is प्रायः used to refer to the vulva or to the मादा genitals in general.
however, by its dictionary and anatomical परिभाषाएं, vagina refers exclusively to the specific internal structure.
the Cincinnati Reds हैं a Major League Baseball team based in सिनसिनाटी, Ohio.
They हैं members of the National लीग Central Division.
स्थापित in 1881 as an स्वतंत्र club, the team became a चार्टर सदस्य of the American Association in 1882, और joined the National लीग in 1890.
the club traditionally traces its उत्पत्ति to baseball 's first openly पेशेवर team in 1869.
the Reds have won पाँच World श्रेणी शीर्षक, one American Association pennant, nine National लीग pennants and टेन division titles.
the लाल निभाई in the National League West between 1969 and 1993 and have महरूम in the National League Central चूंकि 1994.
चूंकि 2003, the Reds have played at Great American Ball Park, built next to उनके घर इससे 1970 to 2002, Riverfront Stadium.
Bob castellini has owned the Cincinnati Reds since 2006.
A prank बदबू बमबारी.
A बदबू bomb is a device designed to create an unpleasant smell.
वे range in effectiveness from सरल pranks to military grade malodorants or riot control chemical agents.
The Guinness किताब of रिकॉर्ड सूचियाँ दो smelliest substances.
One is `` us सरकारी Standard Bathroom Malodor '' ; a mixture of eight रसायन with a stench resembling human मल, only much stronger, designed to test the efficacy of deodorizers and एयर fresheners.
another one, `` जो me ? ``, is a mixture of five sulfur-containing chemicals and खुश्बू like rotting खाना और carcasses.
the कहावत `` A चित्र is लायक a हजार words '' refers to the notion that a complex idea can be conveyed with just a single still image.
It भी aptly characterizes one of the main लक्ष्य of visualization, namely बनाना it possible to absorb large amounts of आंकड़ा quickly.
The expression `` Use a चित्र.
it 's लायक a thousand words. '' appears in a 1911 समाचारपत्र article quoting समाचारपत्र एडिटर Arthur Brisbane discussing journalism और publicity.
1913 newspaper विज्ञापन
A similar phrase, `` One dekh Is Worth A Thousand शब्द '', appears in a 1913 newspaper विज्ञापन for the piqua Auto सप्लाई House of Piqua, Ohio.
An जल्दी use of the सटीक phrase appears in an 1918 newspaper विज्ञापन लिये the San Antonio Light which says : एक of the Nation 's Greatest Editors says : One Picture is Worth a हजार शब्द The San अंतोनियो Light 's Pictorial Magazine of the युद्ध Exemplifies the truth of the ऊपर statement -- judging from the गरम reception it रै received at the hands of the संडे Light readers.
it is believed by कुछ that the modern उपयोग of the phrase stems इससे an article by Fred R. बर्नार्ड in the विज्ञापन व्यापार जर्नल Printers ' Ink, promoting the use of images in विज्ञापन कि appeared on the sides of streetcars.
the दिसम्बर 8, 1921 समस्या carries an ad entitled, `` One Look is लायक a Thousand Words. ''
Another ad by Barnard appears in the March 10, 1927 समस्या साथ the phrase `` One चित्र लायक टेन Thousand Words, '' where it is labeled a Chinese कहावत ( 一圖勝萬言 ).
the घर Book of proverbs, Maxims, and Familiar वाक्यांश उद्धरण बर्नार्ड as saying he called it `` a Chinese proverb, so कि people would take it seriously. ''
Soon बाद, the proverb होता become popularly attributed to Confucius.
The चर्चा of `` एक Picture Worth Thousand Words '' versus `` एक Picture लायक Ten हजार Words '' Wan yen I hua and 10.000 मील worth 10.000 books is cited in Information graphics जहाँ the concept of अनेक in different disciplines and cultures.
A picture is worth a thousand शब्द
despite this आधुनिक origin of the popular phrase, the sentiment रै महरूम expressed by earlier writers.
For उदाहरण the Russian लेखक Ivan Turgenev wrote ( in fathers और Sons in 1862 ), `` a चित्र shows me at a glance कया it takes dozens of pages of a book to expound. ''
Computer programmer और लेखक Fred Brooks makes an opposite statement regarding प्रोग्रामिंग in The mythical man-month : `` Show me your flowcharts and conceal your टेबल, और I shall continue to be mystified.
दिखाएँ me अपना टेबल, और I won’t प्रायः need your flowcharts ; they’ll be obvious. ''
The phrase has also been spoofed by John मैकार्थी, the प्रसिद्ध computer scientist, to make the विपरीत point : `` as the चाइनीज say, 1001 words is worth more than a picture. ''
a ऋतु is a subdivision of the साल, marked by changes in मौसम, ecology, and hours of daylight.
Seasons result इससे the वार्षिक क्रान्ति of the Earth around the Sun and the झुकाव of the Earth 's अक्ष relative to the plane of क्रान्ति.
In temperate and ध्रुवीय regions, the seasons are चिह्नित by परिवर्तन in the तीव्रता of धूप that पहुँच the Earth 's सतह, variations of which may कारण animals to go into hibernation or to migrate, and plants to be dormant.
During May, जून and July, the northern hemisphere is उजागर to more direct sunlight because the गोलार्ध faces the sun.
The same is सच्चा of the southern गोलार्ध in November, दिसम्बर और January.
It is the tilt of the धरती that causes the Sun to be higher in the sky दौरान the गर्मियाँ months जिससे increases the solar flux.
However, due to मौसमी lag, जून, July और August are the hottest महीने in the उत्तरी hemisphere and दिसम्बर, January and February हैं the hottest months in the southern गोलार्ध.
in temperate and subpolar regions, generally four calendar -based सीज़न ( with उनके adjectives ) are पहचाना : वसन्त ( vernal ), गर्मियाँ ( estival ), autumn ( autumnal ) और शीत ( hibernal ).
However, ecologists ज़्यादातर use a six ऋतु model for temperate climate regions that includes pre-spring ( prevernal ) and लेट गर्मियाँ ( serotinal ) as पृथक seasons साथ with the traditional चार.
Hot regions have दो or three seasons ; the बरसात ( or गीला, or monsoon ) season and the dry ऋतु, और in some tropical areas, a कूल or mild season.
in कुछ भाग of the world, special `` सीज़न '' हैं loosely defined based on महत्वपूर्ण events ऐसे as a hurricane ऋतु, tornado season or a दावानल season.
The six ecological seasons
The four पंचांग seasons, depicted in an ancient Roman मोज़ेक from Tunisia
Dutch exports in 2006
At the समय of लिखने the Netherlands is the 17th largest economy of the world.
( see : List of countries by GDP ( nominal ) )
GDP प्रति capita is roughly $ 42,000 जिससे puts it in the शीर्ष 10 of richest nations in the संसार ( देखिए : सूची of countries by GDP ( PPP ) per capita ).
Between 1996 and 2000 annual economic विकास ( GDP ) averaged over 4 %, well above the European औसत.
विकास slowed considerably in 2001-05 as part of the वैश्विक आर्थिक slowdown.
2006 और 2007 however दिखाया economic विकास of 3.4 % और 3.9 %.
The Dutch economy was hit considerably by the ongoing global financial crisis और the ensuing European debt crisis.
Several banks went bankrupt, and a number of अन्य had to receive governmental सहायता.
In 2009 the economy declined with 3.5 %, followed by two years of mild विकास.
The Dutch economy is currently in a मंदी again, with an economic मनाही of 0.5 % in 2012.
Inflation is at 3.2 % in फ़रवरी 2013.
बेरोजगारी has been relatively low compared to अन्य eu nations for decades but after mid-2012 it has seen a तेज़ increase and in February 2013 it has hit 7.7 %.
The नीदरलैंड्स managed to maintain its AAA दरजा at least जबतक March 2013 according to the तीन major credit दरजा agencies.
Historically, the डच introduced and invented the stock मार्केट by the merchandise trading through Dutch वेस्ट इण्डिया कम्पनी.
The Netherlands is a founding member of the European संघ, the oecd और the World व्यापार संगठन.
Loyal to the Game is the tenth studio एल्बम और sixth studio album by तुपाक Shakur.
it contains remixes of previously unreleased music recorded by shakur before his मौत in 1996.
Released in the United राज्य on December 14, 2004 ( दिसम्बर 12 in the United Kingdom ), Loyal to the Game was produced by Eminem.

the दृश्य is an American बात show broadcast on ABC कि debuted in 1997 as part of the network 's दिन programming block.
निर्मित by Barbara walters and Bill Geddie, who दोनो also serve as the show 's executive producers, the program सुविधाएँ a panel of women as co-hosts.
Along साथ Walters, the current panel शामिल Whoopi Goldberg, who serves as the moderator, Joy behar, Elisabeth Hasselbeck, और Sherri Shepherd.
International संस्करण of the कार्यक्रम are aired in several देशों.
as of the 2012–13 season, its 16th, The View is the fourth-longest कार्यशील national daytime बात show in history, behind The Phil Donahue दिखाएँ ( 29 ), the variously-named सजीव !
programs ( 25 ), and The Oprah Winfrey Show ( 25 ).
Prunus virginiana, commonly called bitter-berry, chokecherry, Virginia बर्ड cherry and पश्चिमी chokecherry ( also black chokecherry लिये P. virginiana var. demissa ), is a प्रजाति of bird चेरी ( prunus subgenus Padus ) native to North अमेरिका ; the प्राकृतिक historic range of P. virginiana includes सबसे of the महाद्वीप, except for the far north and far south.
Los Angeles International विमानक्षेत्र is the प्राथमिक airport सेवारत the वृहद Los एंजिल्स Area, the second-most आबादी महानगर क्षेत्रफल in the संयुक्त States.
It is सबसे प्रायः referred to by इसके IATA विमानक्षेत्र code LAX, साथ the अक्षर pronounced individually.
lax is located in southwestern लॉस एंजिल्स along the Pacific coast in the neighborhood of westchester, from the downtown core and is the प्राथमिक airport of Los एंजिल्स World Airports ( LAWA ), an एजेंसी of the Los एंजिल्स city सरकारी formerly ज्ञात as the विभाग of Airports.
In 2011, LAX थी the छठे busiest विमानक्षेत्र in the world बाद Hartsfield-Jackson Atlanta अंतरराष्ट्रीय Airport, बीजिंग Capital International विमानक्षेत्र, London Heathrow विमानक्षेत्र, शिकागो O'Hare International विमानक्षेत्र, and Tokyo Haneda International Airport with 61,862,052 यात्री.
The विमानक्षेत्र holds the claim लिये `` the संसार 's busiest उत्पत्ति and destination ( O & D ) विमानक्षेत्र '' in 2011 that involves non-connecting यात्री ट्रैफ़िक.
it is also the तभी airport to rank among the top five u.S. एयरपोर्ट for दोनो passenger और cargo ट्रैफ़िक.
LAX is the busiest airport in the वृहद लॉस Angeles Area, but other airports सहित Bob Hope विमानक्षेत्र, John Wayne Airport, Long Beach Airport, la/ontario International Airport, और ताड़ स्रोतों अंतरराष्ट्रीय Airport भी serve the region.
lax is भी the व्यस्ततम विमानक्षेत्र in कैलिफ़ोर्निया और the West coast of the United States in शर्तें of उड़ान operations, passenger traffic and air cargo कार्यकलाप, अग्रणी it to be referred to as the `` Gateway to the प्रशांत Rim ``.
peyton Williams Manning ( born March 24, 1976 ) is an American फ़ुटबॉल quarterback for the डेनवर broncos of the नेशनल Football League ( NFL ).
He played for the इंडियानापोलिस कोल्टस for 14 seasons इससे 1998 to 2011.
he is the son of पूर्व एनएफएल क्वार्टरबैक आर्ची Manning और an elder brother of नई York दिग्गज क्वार्टरबैक एली Manning.
मैनिंग निभाई college फ़ुटबॉल for the University of Tennessee, अग्रणी the स्वयंसेवक to the 1997 SEC Championship in उसके senior ऋतु.
However, No. 3 Tennessee lost to the no. 2 Nebraska Cornhuskers 42-17 in the नारंगी कटोरी giving Nebraska और tom Osborne उनके 3rd national championship in 4 years.
He थी चुनी by the इंडियानापोलिस कोल्टस with the first overall pick in the 1998 NFL Draft.
From 1998 to 2010, he led the कोल्टस to आठ ( seven AFC दक्षिण and one AFC ईस्ट ) division championships, दो AFC championships, and to a सुपर Bowl championship ( सुपर Bowl XLI ).
He has won a record four लीग most valuable player awards, was the सबसे मूल्यवान player of Super Bowl xli, has महरूम named to twelve प्रो Bowls, has twelve 4,000-yard गुजर सीज़न, और is the Indianapolis कोल्टस ' all-time leader in गुजर yards ( 54,828 ) and touchdown गुजरता ( 399 ).
in 2009, he थी named the best player in the NFL and Fox Sports along with खेल illustrated named उसे the NFL player of the दशक of the 2000s.
In May 2011, he underwent गर्दन सर्जरी to alleviate गर्दन पीड़ा और arm कमज़ोरी he dealt with दौरान the पिछला few seasons पहले signing a five-year, $ 90 million contract एक्सटेंशन साथ the कोल्टस in जुलाई 2011.
मैनिंग had hoped to खेल in the 2011 season, but in September 2011, he underwent a much अधिक serious second सर्जरी : a level एक cervical fusion procedure.
मैनिंग had never missed an एनएफएल खेल in उसके career, but थी मजबूर to मिस the entire 2011 season.
he थी released by the कोल्टस on March 7, 2012, and after an लगभग two-week period जहाँ he visited साथ and worked आउट for several एनएफएल टीमों, he हस्ताक्षरित साथ the डेनवर Broncos on कूच 20, 2012.
मैनिंग 's pre-snap routine has अर्जित उसे the nickname, `` the Sheriff '' और is one of the सबसे recognizable और parodied in the NFL.
The Indianapolis कोल्टस ' almost exclusive use of the hurry-up offense led to Manning using an array of इशारों and मौखिक commands to कॉल the play at the लकीर of scrimmage बल्कि than in the huddle.
The America Tower of the अमरीकी General Center, the headquarters of Baker Hughes
Baker ह्यूजेस is one of the world 's largest oilfield सेवाएं कंपनियाँ.
it operates in over 90 देशों, providing the oil and gas उद्योग with products और services for खुदाई, formation evaluation, completion, production और टंकी परामर्श.
Baker Hughes has its मुख्यालय in the America Tower in the American General बीच in Neartown, ह्यूस्टन.
बेकर ह्यूजेस incorporated was formed when Baker International और Hughes Tool Company merged in 1987.
Baker ह्यूजेस operates worldwide साथ major कार्यालयों in लिवरपूल, United Kingdom ; Singapore ; दुबई ; a research और maintenance facility in celle, Germany ; lafayette, Louisiana ; ह्यूस्टन, टेक्सास ; Pescara, इटली ; and Kuala lumpur, Malaysia.
the company is administered broadly in दो hemispheres : the eastern hemisphere with five regions ( यूरोपीय, अफ़्रीकी, the Middle ईस्ट, Asia Pacific and Russia/Caspian ) और the western hemisphere with चार regions ( Canada, US जमीन, US गल्फ, और लैटिन America ).
Each of these regions is subdivided into markets.
The United States one- cent सिक्का, commonly ज्ञात as a पैनी, is a ईकाई of currency equaling one one-hundredth of a United States डालर.
the cent 's symbol is ¢.
इसके obverse रै प्रदर्शित the profile of President अब्राहम Lincoln since 1909, the centennial of उसके birth.
From 1959 ( the sesquicentennial of lincoln 's जनम ) to 2008, the रिवर्स featured the Lincoln मेमोरियल.
Four different reverse डिजाइन in 2009 honored lincoln 's 200th जन्मदिवस और a नई, स्थाई reverse – the संघ Shield – was introduced in 2010.
The coin is 0.75 इंच ( 19.05 mm ) in diameter और 0.061 इंच ( 1.55 mm ) in thickness.
The U.S. Mint 's official नाम लिये a penny is `` '' and the U.S. राजकोष 's आधिकारिक name is `` one cent piece ''.
The colloquial term penny derives इससे the British सिक्का of the same नाम, the pre-decimal version of जिससे had a similar मान.
In American अंग्रेज़ी, pennies is the plural रूप, other plural फ़ॉर्म pence and पेशाब ( standard use in अंग्रेजों अंग्रेज़ी ) are नहीं प्रयुक्त.
As of 2012, it costs the U.S. Mint 2.00 cents to मेक a cent क्युकी of the cost of सामग्री and उत्पादन.
This figure includes the Mint’s fixed components लिये वितरण and fabrication, estimated at $ 13 million in fy 2011.
It also includes Mint overhead आबंटित to the पैनी, जिससे was $ 17.7 लाख for 2011.
Fixed लागत और overhead होता have to be अवशोषित by अन्य circulating coins बगैर the penny.
the घाटा in profitability due to producing the one cent सिक्का in the संयुक्त States लिये the साल of 2012 was $ 58,000,000.
This थी a slight घटी from 2011, the year before, जिससे था a production loss of $ 60,200,000.
or more specifically, are ornamental varieties of domesticated आम कार्प ( Cyprinus carpio ) that are kept लिये decorative उद्देश्य in outdoor कोई तालाबों or जल gardens.
Koi किस्में हैं distinguished by coloration, patterning, and scalation.
Some of the प्रमुख colors हैं श्वेत, black, रेड, पीला, ब्लू, and cream.
The most popular category of koi is the gosanke, which is made up of the Kohaku, Taisho Sanshoku, and showa sanshoku किस्में.
the अमरीकी संघ of Government Employees ( afge ) is an अमरीकी labor union representing over 650,000 employees of the federal government, about 5,000 कर्मचारी of the ज़िला of Columbia, and a few hundred private sector employees, ज़्यादातर in और around federal facilities.
afge is the largest संघ लिये civilian, non- postal संघीय employees and the largest union for ज़िला of Columbia employees who रपट सीधे to the mayor ( i.e., बाहर of D.C. public schools ).
It is संबद्ध साथ the AFL-CIO.
