The evolution of पौधे has resulted in increasing levels of जटिलता, इससे the earliest algal मैट्स, through bryophytes, lycopods, ferns to the complex gymnosperms और angiosperms of आज.
While अनेक of the groups which appeared पहले continue to thrive, विशेषकर in the environments in which they evolved, for a समय each new grade of organisation became more `` successful '' than its predecessors.
In the Ordovician period, around, the first जमीन plants appeared.
These began to diversify in the late सिल्यूरियन Period, around, and the results of their diversification are displayed in उल्लेखनीय विवरण in an early Devonian चट्टान assemblage from the rhynie chert.
इस chert preserved जल्दी plants in सेल्यूलर detail, petrified in volcanic springs.
By the middle of the Devonian काल, most of the features recognised in plants today are present, including जड़ें, पत्ते and secondary wood ; and, by लेट devonian टाइम्स, seeds had विकसित.
Late Devonian plants had thereby पहुँचे a degree of परिष्कार कि allowed उन्हें to form वनों of लम्बा पेड़.
Evolutionary नवीनता जारी into the carboniferous period और is still जारी आज.
Most plant समूह यहूद अपेक्षाकृत unscathed by the Permo-Triassic extinction event, although the structures of communities बदला.
इस may have नियत the scene for the रूप of the flowering पौधे in the Triassic ( ~ ), और their later diversification in the Cretaceous and paleogene.
The नवीनतम major समूह of पौधे to evolve यहूद the grasses, which became important in the mid-paleogene, from around.
the grasses, as well as many other groups, evolved new mechanisms of चयापचय to survive the low and warm, शुष्क conditions of the tropics over the last.
The winning Super Bowl team receives the Vince Lombardi Trophy.
The सुपर Bowl is an सालाना American football game that determines the champion of the National Football League ( एनएफएल ).
The प्रतियोगिता is held in an American city that is चुनी तीन to चार years beforehand, प्रायः in warm-weather or domed sites.
Since 1971, the विजेता of the American फ़ुटबॉल सम्मेलन ( AFC ) Championship Game has faced the विजेता of the National Football Conference ( nfc ) चैंपियनशिप Game in the culmination of the एनएफएल playoffs.
पहले the 1970 merger between the अमरीकी Football League ( AFL ) and the National Football League ( NFL ), the two लीग met in चार such contests.
The पहला two were ज्ञात as the `` AFL-NFL संसार Championship Game. ''
Super Bowl iii in 1969 was the first such खेल कि carried the `` सुपर Bowl '' moniker, the names `` Super कटोरी I `` and `` Super Bowl II `` यहूद retroactively applied to the first two खेल.
The NFC /nfL leads in Super कटोरी wins साथ 25, जबकि the afc /AFL has जीती 22.
Eighteen अलग franchises, सहित टीमों that relocated to another city, have won the Super Bowl.
The पिट्सबर्ग स्टीलर्स have जीती the most सुपर Bowls साथ six championships ( record 6–2 ), जबकि both the डलास cowboys and San Francisco 49ers have five विन्स each ( cowboys 5–3 ; 49ers 5–1 ).
Dallas और Pittsburgh have the most Super कटोरी appearances साथ आठ, while the Buffalo बिल्स have the most लगातार appearances with चार नुकसान in a row from 1990 to 1993.
The नई इंग्लैण्ड Patriots, Denver Broncos and Minnesota Vikings have also lost a record four Super Bowls.
Buffalo and Minnesota हैं both 0–4, डेनवर is 2–4 and New England is 3–4.
The रिकार्ड लिये consecutive wins is two और is shared by सात franchises : the 1966-67 ग्रीन खाड़ी पैकर्स, the 1972-73 मियामी Dolphins, the 1974-75 और 1978-79 Pittsburgh Steelers ( the तभी team to accomplish this feat twice ), the 1988-89 San Francisco 49ers, the 1992-93 डलास Cowboys, the 1997-98 डेनवर Broncos, और the 2003-04 New England Patriots.
The तभी टोली with अनेक सुपर Bowl दिखावे and no losses is the Baltimore ravens, जो in जीतना सुपर Bowl xlvii unseated and replaced the 49ers in that स्थिति.
Four वर्तमान NFL टीमों have never appeared in a सुपर कटोरी, सहित franchise relocations and renaming : the Cleveland Browns, डेट्रॉयट Lions, Jacksonville jaguars, और Houston Texans, हालांकि दोनो the Browns and Lions had जीती एनएफएल चैंपियनशिप खेल prior to the सृष्टि of the Super Bowl.
मार्टिन काउंटी is a काउंटी स्तिथ in the u.S. राज्य of Texas.
As of the 2010 जनसांख्यिकी, इसके population was 4,799.
Its सीट is Stanton.
The county is named for wylie Martin, an early settler.
Martin काउंटी is one of 30 prohibition, or entirely dry, काउंटी in the राज्य of टेक्सास.
क्षारीय phosphatase ( alp, ALKP ) ( ) is a hydrolase enzyme जिम्मेदार लिये removing फास्फेट groups इससे अनेक types of अणुओं, including nucleotides, proteins, and alkaloids.
The process of निकालना the फास्फेट group is पुकारा dephosphorylation.
As the name suggests, alkaline phosphatases हैं most प्रभावी in an क्षारीय पर्यावरण.
It is sometimes used synonymously as basic phosphatase.
Triticale ( × Triticosecale ), ( ) is a hybrid of wheat ( triticum ) और rye ( secale ) first bred in laboratories during the लेट 19th century.
The grain was originally bred in Scotland और स्वीडन.
commercially available triticale is almost सदा a second पीढी hybrid, i.e., a क्रॉस between two kinds of प्राथमिक ( first cross ) triticales.
As a rule, triticale combines the उपज potential and अनाज quality of गेहूं with the बीमारी and पर्यावरणीय सहिष्णुता ( सहित soil शर्तें ) of rye.
तभी recently has it महरूम विकसित into a commercially viable crop.
depending on the cultivar, triticale can अधिक or less resemble either of its parents.
It is grown ज़्यादातर लिये forage or fodder, हालांकि कुछ triticale-based भोजन can be purchased at स्वास्थ्य food stores or हैं to be मिला in some नाश्ता cereals.
When क्रासिंग गेहूं and rye, wheat is प्रयुक्त as the मादा parent और rye as the पुरूष जनक ( pollen दाता ).
the resulting संकर is sterile, और must be treated with colchicine to induce polyploidy and thus the क्षमता to reproduce itself.
The primary निर्माता of triticale are कैंडल, जर्मनी, France, बेलारूस and ऑस्ट्रेलिया.
in 2009, according to the Food और कृषि Organization ( fao ), 15.0 लाख टन were harvested in 29 देशों across the world.
the triticale संकरण are सब amphidiploid, जिससे अर्थात् the plant is द्विगुणित लिये दो genomes निकला from अलग प्रजाति.
In other words, triticale is an allotetraploid.
In पहले years, सबसे work was किया on octoploid triticale.
Different ploidy स्तर have महरूम created और evaluated over time.
The tetraploids showed little promise, लकिन hexaploid triticale was successful पर्याप्त to find commercial अनुप्रयोग.
The cimmyt triticale improvement कार्यक्रम wanted to improve खाना production और nutrition in developing देशों.
Triticale रै संभावित in the production of bread and अन्य खाना products, ऐसे as cookies, पास्ता, pizza आटा और breakfast cereals.
The protein सामग्री is उच्चतर than that of wheat, हालांकि the glutenin fraction is less.
The grain has भी been stated to have higher levels of lysine than wheat.
Assuming increased स्वीकृति, the milling उद्योग will have to adapt to triticale, as the मिलिंग techniques employed लिये wheat are unsuited to triticale.
Sell et al. found triticale could be used as a फीड अनाज, and later शोध found its starch थी particularly readily digested.
as a फीड grain, triticale is already खूब स्थापित and of ऊँची economic महत्व.
it रै प्राप्त attention as a potential energy क्रॉप, and शोध is फिलहाल being conducted on the use of the क्रॉप 's biomass in bioethanol उत्पादन.
`` कश, the Magic ड्रैगन '' is a सोंग written by लियोनार्ड lipton and पीटर Yarrow, और बना लोकप्रिय by Yarrow 's समूह Peter, पॉल और Mary in a 1963 recording.
The song achieved great popularity.
A college football national चैंपियनशिप in the highest स्तर of collegiate play in the संयुक्त States, फिलहाल the National Collegiate एथलेटिक Association ( ncaa ) Division i Football कटोरी subdivision ( fbs ), is a नामांकन awarded annually by various third-party organizations to their selection ( s ) of the बेहतरीन कॉलेज football team ( s ).
Division i fbs ( formerly Division I-A ) फ़ुटबॉल is the only ncaa sport in which a वार्षिक चैंपियन is नहीं determined by an ncaa sanctioned championship इवेंट.
Because the चैंपियनशिप team is not determined by a ncaa चैंपियनशिप or tournament event, it is sometimes unofficially referred to as a `` mythical नेशनल चैंपियनशिप ``.
Since the NCAA, the sport 's governing देह, does नहीं determine or declare a national चैंपियन in this field, determination of such has often engendered controversy.
a championship team is independently declared by various individuals और organizations, often referred to as `` चयनकर्ताओं ''.
ये choices are sometimes at odds with each other.
While the ncaa रै never officially endorsed an सालाना championship टोली, it रै documented the चुनाव of several चयनकर्ताओं in the official ncaa Football Bowl subdivision रिकॉर्ड.
In addition, various तीसरा party analysts have independently प्रकाशित उनके अपना सूचियाँ of what वे have determined to be the most legitimate selections लिये प्रत्येक ऋतु.
These are भी प्रायः at हालात with each अन्य as well as individual स्कूल 's दावा on नेशनल championships, which, लिये any particular season, may or may नहीं correlate to the selections प्रकाशित elsewhere.
Currently, दो widely पहचाना national champions चयनकर्ताओं are the Associated Press, जिससे conducts a poll of फ़ुटबॉल sportswriters, and the USA Today कोच ' पोल, a poll of अमरीकी Football कोच Association क्रियाशील coaches that is contractually obligated to name the विजेता of the कटोरी Championship श्रेणी championship खेल as इसके नेशनल champion.

The team is a member of the सेंट्रल Division of प्रमुख लीग Baseball 's National लीग and plays its घर games at मिलर पार्क.

the Washington Nationals हैं a पेशेवर baseball टोली आधारित in वॉशिंगटन, d.c.
The नागरिकों are a member of the ईस्ट Division of the नेशनल लीग of Major League Baseball ( MLB ).
the टोली 's home ballpark is Nationals Park, स्तिथ on दक्षिण कैपिटल Street in Southeast d.C., near the anacostia River.
the पार्क खोली in 2008, replacing RFK स्टेडियम, the टोली 's home from 2005 to 2007.
The नागरिकों ' name गर्भाशयी इससे the former वॉशिंगटन बेसबॉल team that था the same नाम ( used interchangeably with सीनेटरों ).
उनके nickname is `` the Nats '' —a shortened संस्करण that थी also प्रयुक्त by the old D.C. टीमों.
An विस्तार मताधिकार, the club थी founded in as the Montreal Expos, the पहला प्रमुख league टोली in Canada.
They were based in Montreal, Quebec, and played their home games at jarry Park Stadium and बाद in Olympic Stadium.
in, the Expos won a division चैंपियनशिप, won उनके first-ever playoff series by defeating the फिलाडेल्फिया फ़िलीज़, 3–2, और advanced to the नेशनल लीग चैंपियनशिप श्रेणी, जहाँ they होता go on to खोना to the Los Angeles डॉजर्स, 3–2, in their तभी postseason appearance during the strike-shortened season.
The Expos had उनके highest winning प्रतिशत in the strike-shortened season of, when the team था the best record in baseball.
the team 's subsequent shedding of खिलाड़ी caused fan ब्याज to drop off.
After the 2001 ऋतु, MLB माना revoking the team 's franchise, along with either the मिनेसोटा जुड़वा or the tampa खाड़ी शैतान किरणें.

The नागरिकों are एक of two MLB franchises, और the तभी one in the National League, that has never played in a World Series ( the सिएटल Mariners हैं the other ).
A contingent fee ( in the United States ) or conditional fee ( in England और Wales ) is any fee for सेवाएं provided जहाँ the fee is payable तभी if वहीँ is a favourable result.
In the law, it is defined as a `` fee charged for a lawyer 's सेवाएं तभी if the lawsuit is कामयाब or is favorably settled आउट of court....
निर्भर शुल्क हैं प्रायः calculated as a प्रतिशत of the client 's net recovery. ''
in the अंग्रेज़ी legal प्रणाली, it is generally referred to as no जीत no fee.
A सशर्त fee agreement between a law firm और a client.
The usual रूप of this agreement is that the solicitor will लो a law मामला on the understanding that if खोया, no भुगतान is made.
however, if the मामला is won, the lawyer will be entitled to the सामान्य fee based on hourly billing, plus a success fee.
The success शुल्क in इंग्लैण्ड जरूर be as a प्रतिशत no greater than 100 % of the normal शुल्क.
इस contrasts with the contingency fee in the us, जिससे gives the कामयाब attorney a percentage of the क्षतिपूर्ति awarded in favor of his client.
इस makes it easier लिये the poor to pursue their civil अधिकारों since otherwise, to मुकदमा someone for a अपकृत्य, one जरूर first be धनवान पर्याप्त to pursue such litigation in the first place.
However, because of the high risk, few attorneys will take मामले on a contingency basis unless they महसूस the case रै good merit.
According to a 2004 किताब by विधि प्राध्यापक हर्बर्ट Kritzer, contingent शुल्क were allowed as of that year in the following देशों : ऑस्ट्रेलिया, ब्राज़ील, कनाडा, the डोमिनिकन गणतंत्र, France, Greece, आयरलैंड, जापानी, New जीलैंड, the United Kingdom and the संयुक्त States.
They are भी अनुमत in personal injury actions in Lithuania.
Recently, they have महरूम अनुमत in बेल्जियम as well.

बेटे of Anarchy is a television नाटक series निर्मित by Kurt sutter about the जीवनदान of a close-knit गैरकानूनी motorcycle club ऑपरेटिंग in Charming, a fictional कस्बा in California 's Central Valley.

बेटे of अराजकता premiered on September 3, 2008, on cable संजाल fx.
the तीसरा ऋतु of the series attracted an average of 4.9 million दर्शक per week, बनाना it FX 's highest रेटेड श्रेणी ever, surpassing FX 's अन्य हिट्स The शील्ड, nip/tuck, and Rescue Me.

the Grímsvötn sub-glacial lakes ( ; vötn = `` waters '', singular : ) और the volcano of the same name are in south-east Iceland.
They हैं in the हाइलैंड्स of आइसलैंड at the northwestern पक्ष of the Vatnajökull ice-cap.
The lakes are at, at an उन्नयन of.
Beneath the lakes is the मैग्मा कक्ष of the grímsvötn volcano.
Grímsvötn is a basaltic ज्वालामुखी which रै the highest eruption frequency of all the volcanoes in Iceland and has a southwest-northeast-trending फिशर system.
The विशाल climate-impacting Laki fissure फटना of 1783–1784 was a part of the same fissure system.
grímsvötn was erupting at the वही time as laki दौरान 1783, but continued to erupt until 1785.
क्युकी most of the volcano lies underneath Vatnajökull, most of इसके eruptions have been subglacial और the interaction of magma and meltwater from the ice causes phreatomagmatic explosive activity.
On 21 May 2011 at 19:25 utc, an फटना began, साथ high plumes accompanied by multiple भूकंप, resulting in रद्दीकरण of 900 फ़्लाइट in Iceland, and in the United किंगडम, ग्रीनलैंड, जर्मनी, Ireland and नार्वे on 22–25 May.
जबतक 25 May the फटना स्केल had been larger than that of the 2010 eruption of eyjafjallajökull.
The फटना stopped at 02:40 utc on 25 may 2011, हालांकि वहीँ was some विस्फोटक कार्यकलाप इससे the tephra vents affecting only the क्षेत्रफल around the crater.
vetting is the प्रक्रम of performing a पृष्ठभूमि जाँच on someone पहले offering them नियुक्ति, conferring an पुरस्कार, etc.
A prospective person or प्रोजेक्ट may be vetted before बनाना a hiring decision.
In जोड, in intelligence महफ़िल, assets हैं vetted to determine उनके usefulness.

caesars entertainment Corporation ( formerly Harrah 's Entertainment इससे 1995 to 2010 ) is an अमरीकी पब्लिक गेमिंग निगम कि owns और operates over 50 casinos, hotels, और seven golf पाठ्यक्रम under several brands.
The company, based in Paradise, नेवाडा, is the largest गेमिंग company in the संसार, with annual revenues of $ 8.9 अरब ( 2010 ).
caesars is a public कम्पनी, with a joint venture of अपोलो Global Management and Texas Pacific Group ownig a large portion of the stack और blackstone Group भी holding a significant stake.
The name change from `` harrah 's Entertainment inc. '' to `` Caesars Entertainment Corporation '' was made official on नवम्बर 23, 2010.
harrah 's remains a key ब्रांड in the company.
on November 5, 2010, harrah 's घोषित an आरंभिक पब्लिक offering of 31,250,000 साझा लकिन retracted इस offering on November 19.
a Permanent Resident in Canada is a person जो is नहीं a कनाडाई citizen लकिन who has been granted अनुमति to live and कार्य in Canada without कोई time limit on his or her stay.
a permanent निवासी must live in Canada लिये दो सालो out of every पाँच or risk खोने that status.
A स्थाई Resident holds अनेक of the वही rights और responsibilities as a कनाडाई citizen, among others the right to कार्य for any एंटरप्राइज़ as well as लिये the federal or provincial government ( under प्रतिबंध of अभिगम rights to निश्चित regulated professions ).
The main differences हैं that residents can नहीं :
vote in elections in कनाडा ;
run for निर्वाचित दफ्तर ;
hold कनाडाई passports ;
in जोड, वे may be अनुमत to join कनाडा 's armed forces if the national interest होता not be prejudiced.
Permanent residents भी रिस्क प्रत्यर्पण for serious crimes committed जबकि resident in Canada.
स्थाई residents may लागू for Canadian citizenship after three years in Canada ; however this is नहीं अनिवार्य.

Regarding the North-American मार्केट, TV Guide काल्स her `` unequivocally the most प्रसिद्ध soap opera character in the इतिहास of daytime TV '', and included उसके in their 2013 सूची of The 60 Nastiest Villains of सब Time.
a आलेख of the us cpi from 1913 to 2006 ( in ब्लू ), and its percent annual बदलें ( in red )
a consumer दाम index ( CPI ) measures changes in the दाम स्तर of a market basket of consumer goods and सेवाएं purchased by households.
the CPI in the संयुक्त States is defined by the Bureau of Labor आंकडे as `` a माप of the औसत change over time in the prices paid by urban उपभोक्ता लिये a मार्केट बास्केट of consumer goods and services. ''
The cpi is a statistical अनुमान constructed using the prices of a नमूना of representative items whose prices are collected periodically.
sub-indexes और sub-sub-indexes are computed लिये different categories and sub-categories of goods and सेवाएं, होने combined to produce the overall अनुक्रमणिका with weights reflecting their shares in the total of the उपभोक्ता expenditures covered by the index.
It is one of अनेक price indices गणना by सबसे national statistical agencies.
The सालाना percentage change in a CPI is used as a measure of महंगाई.
A cpi can be used to अनुक्रमणिका ( i.e., adjust लिये the effect of महंगाई ) the रियल मान of wages, salaries, pensions, for regulating कीमतें and for deflating मौद्रिक magnitudes to दिखाएँ changes in रियल मान.
In सबसे countries, the CPI is, along with the population census and the USA National आय and Product खाते, one of the most closely देखी नेशनल economic statistics.
Knocking on लकडी, or to टच wood, refers to the apotropaic परंपरा in पश्चिमी लोकगीत of वस्तुतः touching/knocking on लकडी, or merely stating that you हैं doing or intend same, in order to avoid `` tempting भाग्य `` बाद बनाना a favourable observation, a boast, or declaration concerning one 's अपना मौत.
Rocker arm
Generally referred to भीतर the context of the आतंरिक दहन engine of automotive, समुद्री, motorcycle और प्रत्यागमनी विमानन इंजन, the rocker arm is an oscillating लीवर कि conveys radial movement इससे the कैम पालि into linear movement at the poppet valve to खोलें it.
One end is raised and lowered by a घूर्णन lobe of the camshaft ( either सीधे or via a tappet ( lifter ) and pushrod ) जबकि the other end अधिनियमों on the वाल्व stem.
When the camshaft पालि raises the बाहर of the arm, the inside presses down on the वाल्व stem, opening the valve.
When the outside of the arm is permitted to return due to the camshafts रोटेशन, the अंदर उदय, allowing the valve spring to close the वाल्व.
The drive cam is driven by the camshaft.
This pushes the rocker arm up और down about the trunnion pin or rocker shaft.
Friction may be घटाया at the पाइंट of contact साथ the वाल्व स्टेम by a रोलर cam follower.
A समान arrangement transfers the motion via another roller कैम अनुसरणकर्ता to a second rocker भुजा.
This rotates about the rocker shaft, और transfers the motion via a tappet to the poppet वाल्व.
in इस case this opens the intake valve to the cylinder head.
the effective leverage of the arm ( और thus the फ़ोर्स it can exert on the वाल्व स्टेम ) is determined by the रॉकर arm ratio, the ratio of the अलहदा from the रॉकर भुजा 's center of रोटेशन to the tip divided by the distance इससे the center of रोटेशन to the point acted on by the camshaft or pushrod.
वर्तमान automotive डिज़ाइन favors rocker arm ratios of about 1.5:1 to 1.8:1.
However, in the पास्ट smaller धनात्मक ratios ( the valve lift is वृहद than the कैम लिफ्ट ) और even ऋणात्मक ratios ( वाल्व lift छोटी than the कैम lift ) have been used.
अनेक pre-WW2 engines उपयोग 1:1 ( neutral ) ratios.
लिये car engines the rocker बाहें are generally steel stampings, providing a उचित balance of शक्ति, वज़न और किफायती लागत.
Because the rocker बाहें are, in भाग, reciprocating वज़न, excessive द्रव्यमान especially at the lever ends limits the engine 's ability to पहुँचें high ऑपरेटिंग speeds.
`` The Night the Lights Went Out in जॉर्जिया '' is a Southern Gothic song लिखा by songwriter bobby रसेल और performed in 1972 by his then-wife vicki लॉरेंस.
reba mcentire later covered it in 1991.
Recorded in लेट October 1972 in United/Western studios on Sunset in Hollywood and released less than two weeks later in November 1972, the song centers around the older brother of the narrator, falsely convicted of and executed for a हत्या, which the narrator herself रै वचनबद्ध.
In postal mail, a return address is an सुस्पष्ट inclusion of the पता of the person sending the message.
It provides the प्राप्तकर्ता ( और sometimes प्राधिकृत intermediaries ) with a अर्थात् to determine how to respond to the प्रेषक of the message if needed.
The return address need not include a sender 's नाम, लकिन should include address or P.O. box विवरण in the same way as the delivery पता should.
In some countries, the return पता is conventionally located in the upper बाएँ hand कोने of the लिफाफा, card, or label.
In the संयुक्त Kingdom, the return address is प्रायः लगाई on the reverse of the envelope, निकट the शीर्ष.
व्यवसायों often उपयोग envelopes preprinted with a return address.
Many individuals have sheets of adhesive लेबल्स preprinted with their home address to affix to their correspondence.
Charities sometimes include such sheets in mailshots.
Rolls of वापसी पता Labels can be purchased from companies कि sell personalized labels to provide individuals an आसान रास्ता to peel और stick वापसी address labels to उनके envelopes.
the वापसी address is not required on डाक mail.
however, कमी of a return पता prevents the postal सेवा from होने समर्थ to वापसी the मद if it proves undeliverable ; such as from क्षति, postage due, or invalid गंतव्य.
ऐसे mail may thus become dead अक्षर mail.
Should the वापसी address be of a different राज्य or country, the mail may be routed through that स्थान for ease of वापसी.
A तंत्रिका मार्गदर्शन conduit ( भी referred to as an कृत्रिम nerve conduit or artificial तंत्रिका graft, as opposed to an autograft ) is an artificial means of guiding axonal regrowth to facilitate nerve regeneration and is one of several clinical treatments for तंत्रिका चोटों.
जब direct suturing of the two stumps of a severed तंत्रिका can नहीं be संपन्नता without tension, the standard clinical treatment for peripheral nerve चोटों is autologous nerve grafting.
Due to the सीमित उपलब्धता of donor ऊतक और कार्यात्मक रिकवरी in autologous nerve कलम, neural ऊतक engineering शोध रै केन्द्रित on the development of bioartificial nerve guidance conduits as an alternative treatment, especially लिये large दोषों.
Similar तकनीकों are भी होने छान लिये nerve repair in the स्पाइनल cord but तंत्रिका regeneration in the सेंट्रल बेचैन system मुद्राएँ a greater चुनौती क्युकी its axons do नहीं regenerate appreciably in उनके native पर्यावरण.
The सृष्टि of कृत्रिम conduits is also known as entubulation क्युकी the तंत्रिका ends और intervening gap are enclosed within a ट्यूब composed of biological or सिंथेटिक materials.
Whether the conduit is in the form of a biologic tube, synthetic tube or tissue-engineered conduit, it चाहिए सुकर neurotropic और neurotrophic संचार between the proximal and distal ends of the nerve gap, ब्लाक external inhibitory factors, and provide a शारीरिक मार्गदर्शन लिये axonal regrowth.
the most basic objective of a nerve मार्गदर्शन conduit is to combine physical, chemical, और biological cues अंतर्गत शर्तें that होगा foster tissue गठन.
Materials that have been प्रयुक्त to मेक biologic tubes शामिल blood vessels and skeletal muscles, while nonabsorbable और bioabsorbable synthetic tubes have been बना from silicone और polyglycolide respectively.
Tissue-engineered तंत्रिका guidance conduits हैं a combination of many elements : scaffold structure, scaffold material, cellular therapies, neurotrophic factors and biomimetic सामग्री.
the choice of जिससे शारीरिक, chemical और biological cues to use is based on the properties of the तंत्रिका पर्यावरण, which is critical in creating the सबसे desirable environment for axon regeneration.
The factors that कंट्रोल material selection include biocompatibility, biodegradability, mechanical integrity, controllability during nerve विकास, implantation और sterilization.
Hardcore Pawn is an American reality टेलीविज़न श्रेणी produced by RDF यूएसए ( later Zodiak USA ) and रिचर्ड Dominick प्रोडक्शन्स for truTV परिचय the day-to-day परिचालन of अमरीकी Jewelry and Loan, a family-owned pawn shop located at 20450 Greenfield Road, between 8 Mile Road and the John C. आवास Freeway in Detroit, Michigan.
The श्रेणी premiered on August 16, 2010, delivering दो लाख दर्शक, setting a record as truTV 's most-watched series premiere कभी.
amoxicillin BP
Amoxicillin ( INN ), formerly amoxycillin ( BAN ), और abbreviated amox, is a moderate-spectrum, bacteriolytic, β-lactam antibiotic used to दावत bacterial infections caused by susceptible microorganisms.
It is प्रायः the drug of choice भीतर the class क्युकी it is better अवशोषित, following oral administration, than other β-lactam एंटीबायोटिक.
amoxicillin is एक of the सबसे common antibiotics prescribed for children.
The drug became available in 1972.
Amoxicillin is susceptible to degradation by β-lactamase -producing जीवाणु, जिससे हैं resistant to a व्यापक वर्णक्रम of β-lactam antibiotics, such as पेनिसिलीन.
लिये this कारण, it is प्रायः combined साथ clavulanic एसिड, a β-lactamase inhibitor.
This increases effectiveness by reducing its susceptibility to β-lactamase resistance.
Lyndon Baines Johnson ( August 27, 1908 – जनवरी 22, 1973 ), often referred to as LBJ, थी the 36th अध्यक्ष of the संयुक्त States ( 1963–1969 ), a position he assumed after his सेवा as the 37th Vice President of the United States ( 1961–1963 ).
He is एक of तभी चार लोगों जो served in सब चार elected संघीय कार्यालयों of the संयुक्त States : Representative, Senator, वाइस President, और President.
जॉनसन, a डेमोक्रेट from टेक्सास, served as a संयुक्त States प्रतिनिधि from 1937–1949 और as a Senator from 1949–1961, including six सालो as United States सीनेट बहुमत नेता, दो as Senate अल्पसंख्यक नेता और दो as Senate Majority चाबुक.
After campaigning unsuccessfully for the लोकतांत्रिक nomination in 1960, Johnson was पूछा by जॉन F. कैनेडी to be उसके running mate लिये the 1960 presidential election.
जॉनसन succeeded to the presidency following the assassination of John F. Kennedy on नवम्बर 22, 1963, completed कैनेडी 's पद and was निर्वाचित अध्यक्ष in उसके own right, winning by a large margin over बैरी goldwater in the 1964 चुनाव.
जॉनसन थी greatly समर्थित by the Democratic Party और as President, he थी responsible लिये डिजाइनिंग the `` ग्रेट समाज `` legislation that included laws that upheld civil rights, public broadcasting, Medicare, Medicaid, पर्यावरणीय protection, aid to education, और his `` War on गरीबी. ''
Johnson थी प्रसिद्ध for his domineering personality and the `` Johnson उपचार, '' his coercion of powerful politicians in अनुक्रम to अग्रिम legislation.
Meanwhile, जॉनसन escalated American भागीदारी in the Vietnam War, from 16,000 अमरीकी advisors/soldiers in 1963 to 550,000 combat सैनिकों in जल्दी 1968, as अमरीकी हताहत soared और the peace process bogged down.
the involvement stimulated a विशाल angry antiwar movement आधारित विशेषकर on university campuses in the u.S. और विदेश.
गर्मियाँ दंगे broke आउट in most प्रमुख शहरों after 1965, and अपराधों rates soared, as his opponents उठाया मांगे for `` law और अनुक्रम '' नीतियों.
The Democratic पार्टी split in multiple feuding गिरोहों, and बाद Johnson किया poorly in the 1968 New Hampshire primary, he ended his बोली लिये reelection.
रिपब्लिकन Richard निक्सन थी elected to सफल him.
इतिहासकारों argue that Johnson 's presidency चिह्नित the peak of आधुनिक उदारतावाद in the संयुक्त राज्य after the New सौदे era.
Johnson is ranked favorably by some इतिहासकारों क्युकी of his domestic नीतियों.
the Big बंग सिद्धान्त डाल at कॉमिक Con 2009, इससे left : कुणाल Nayyar, Simon helberg, kaley Cuoco, जिम पार्सन्स, and जॉनी galecki
the अमरीकी sitcom The Big Bang Theory, निर्मित और कार्यपालिका produced by Chuck Lorre and विधेयक Prady, premiered on CBS on September 24, 2007.
the दिखाएँ centers on five वर्ण : roommates शेल्डन Cooper and लियोनार्ड hofstadter, दो caltech physicists ; पैनी, a waitress and aspiring अभिनेत्री who lives across the hall ; and Leonard and Sheldon 's मित्रों और co-workers aerospace इंजीनियर Howard Wolowitz, और astrophysicist राजेश Koothrappali.
over time, several supporting वर्ण have been प्रचारित to starring भूमिकाएँ : Leslie winkle ( ऋतु 1 recurring ; season 2 नियमित ; season 3 अतिथि ), a physicist colleague, and, at अलग times, a प्रेमी of दोनो लियोनार्ड और Howard ; Bernadette Rostenkowski-Wolowitz ( ऋतु 3 recurring ; ऋतु 4-present regular ), a microbiologist, हावर्ड 's fiancée और subsequent wife, and former part-time waitress alongside पैनी ; neuroscientist एमी farrah Fowler ( season 3 guest ; season 4 पुनरावर्ती ; season 4-present नियमित ), who joins the group बाद being matched to Sheldon on a dating जालस्थल ; and कॉमिक किताब store-owner, Stuart खिलते ( सीज़न 2–5 recurring ; season 6-present regular ), जो replaces हावर्ड as Raj 's बेहतरीन friend when Howard is in स्पेस.
the show also features numerous supporting वर्ण, each of whom plays a prominent role in a छोटी group of episodes.
the American सिविल War ( ACW ), भी ज्ञात as the War between the States or बस the Civil War ( see नामकरण ), थी a civil युद्ध लड़ा from 1861 to 1865 between the United States ( the `` Union '' or the `` उत्तर '' ) and several Southern slave states that declared उनके secession and formed the confederate States of America ( the `` confederacy '' or the `` दक्षिण '' ).
The युद्ध had its origin in the issue of slavery, especially the extension of गुलामी into the western territories.
Foreign powers किया not intervene.
After four सालो of bloody combat कि बाएँ over 600,000 soldiers dead and नष्ट much of the South 's अवसंरचना, the confederacy collapsed, slavery was abolished, और the difficult Reconstruction process of restoring national एकता and guaranteeing अधिकारों to the freed slaves began.
in the 1860 अध्यक्षीय चुनाव, republicans, led by Abraham Lincoln, opposed expanding slavery into United राज्य ' territories.
Lincoln जीती, लकिन before उसके उद्घाटन on March 4, 1861, सात cotton-based slave states formed the confederacy.
outgoing Democratic अध्यक्ष जेम्स Buchanan and the incoming Republicans rejected secession as illegal.
lincoln 's inaugural address declared his प्रशासन होता नहीं initiate सिविल युद्ध.
Eight remaining slave states जारी to reject काल्स लिये secession.
Confederate forces जब्त numerous संघीय forts within territory claimed by the confederacy.
A Peace Conference विफल to find a सुलह, और both sides prepared for युद्ध.
The confederates assumed that European countries यहूद so dependent on `` King Cotton `` that they would intervene ; none did and none recognized the new confederate States of अमेरिका.
Hostilities began on April 12, 1861, when Confederate शक्तियां fired upon Fort sumter, a key fort आयोजित by संघ troops in दक्षिण कैरोलिना.
lincoln called लिये each state to provide troops to retake the fort ; नतीजतन, four more slave states joined the Confederacy, bringing उनके कुल to ग्यारह.
The Union soon controlled the border states and स्थापित a नवल blockade कि अबोध the दक्षिणी अर्थव्यवस्था.
the Eastern थिएटर थी inconclusive in 1861–62.
the autumn 1862 confederate campaign into Maryland ( a संघ state ) ended साथ Confederate रिट्रीट at the Battle of antietam, dissuading अंग्रेजों हस्तक्षेप.
Lincoln जारी the emancipation उदघोषणा, जिससे made ending गुलामी a war goal.
to the west, by summer 1862 the Union नष्ट the Confederate river navy, then much of their पश्चिमी armies, and the Union at Vicksburg विभाजित the Confederacy in दो at the Mississippi River.
in 1863, रॉबर्ट E. ली 's confederate incursion उत्तर ended at the Battle of gettysburg.
Western सफलताओं led to Ulysses S. Grant command of सब Union सेना in 1864.
in the Western Theater, William T. Sherman drove ईस्ट to capture अटलांटा and marched to the sea, destroying confederate अवसंरचना along the रास्ता.
The संघ marshaled the संसाधन and जनशक्ति to आक्रमण the Confederacy इससे all directions, and could afford to fight battles of attrition through the Overland Campaign towards रिचमंड, the Confederate capital.
The defending confederate army विफल, अग्रणी to ली 's surrender to Grant at appomattox अदालत हाउस on अप्रैल 9, 1865.
the American Civil War थी one of the earliest सच्चा औद्योगिक wars.
railroads, the टेलीग्राफ, steamships, and mass-produced weapons were employed extensively.
The mobilization of civilian factories, mines, shipyards, banks, transportation और खाना supplies सब foreshadowed World War I.
It remains the deadliest युद्ध in American history, resulting in the deaths of an estimated 750,000 soldiers and an undetermined number of civilian casualties.
इतिहासकार John Huddleston estimates the death toll at ten प्रतिशत of सब उत्तरी males 20–45 सालो old, and 30 percent of सब दक्षिणी white males aged 18–40.
इंसान evolution refers to the evolutionary प्रक्रम leading up to the रूप of modern humans.
जबकि it began साथ the पिछला common ancestor of सब life, the topic प्रायः covers तभी the evolutionary history of primates, in particular the genus होमो, और the emergence of Homo sapiens as a distinct species of hominids ( or `` ग्रेट apes '' ).
the study of इंसान एवोल्यूशन involves many scientific disciplines, सहित physical anthropology, primatology, पुरातत्व, linguistics, विकासवादी psychology, embryology and genetics.
According to genetic studies, primates diverged इससे अन्य mammals परिचय in the Late Cretaceous period, and the earliest जीवाश्मों appear in the Paleocene, around.
The परिवार Hominidae diverged इससे the Hylobatidae ( Gibbon ) family 15-20 लाख सालो ago, और around, the Ponginae ( orangutans ), diverged इससे the Hominidae family.
bipedalism is the मौलिक adaption of the hominin लकीर, और the earliest bipedal hominin is माना to be either sahelanthropus or Orrorin, साथ Ardipithecus, a full bipedal, coming somewhat later.
the गोरिल्ला और chimpanzee diverged around the same time, परिचय 4-6 लाख सालो पहले, and either sahelanthropus or orrorin may be our last साझा ancestor साथ them.
The जल्दी bipedals eventually evolved into the australopithecines and बाद the genus होमो.
the earliest documented members of the genus Homo are Homo habilis which evolved around ; the earliest प्रजाति लिये which वहीँ is धनात्मक evidence of use of stone टूल्स.
The दिमाग of ये early hominins were परिचय the वही size as कि of a chimpanzee.
During the अगला million सालो a प्रक्रम of encephalization began, और साथ the आगमन of होमो इरेक्टस in the fossil रिकार्ड, cranial capacity had doubled to 850 cm3.
Homo erectus and Homo ergaster यहूद the first of the hominina to छोड़ अफ़्रीकी, and these species spread through Africa, Asia, and Europe between.
It is believed कि these species were the पहला to use fire and complex टूल्स.
according to the Recent अफ़्रीकी ancestry सिद्धान्त, आधुनिक humans विकसित in अफ़्रीकी possibly from होमो heidelbergensis, Homo rhodesiensis or होमो antecessor और migrated आउट of the महाद्वीप some 50,000 to 100,000 सालो पहले, replacing local populations of होमो erectus, होमो denisova, Homo floresiensis और Homo neanderthalensis.
Archaic Homo sapiens, the forerunner of anatomically modern humans, विकसित between 400,000 और 250,000 years पहले.
Recent डीएनए evidence suggests that several haplotypes of neanderthal उत्पत्ति are present among सब non-African populations, and Neanderthals और other hominids, ऐसे as denisova hominin may have contributed up to 6 % of their genome to present-day humans. < ref name= '' 10.1126/science.1209202 '' > anatomically modern humans evolved इससे archaic Homo sapiens in the मध्य Paleolithic, about 200,000 years पहले.
The transition to behavioral modernity with the development of सांकेतिक culture, language, and specialized lithic प्रौद्योगिकी happened around 50,000 years पहले according to many anthropologists हालांकि कुछ suggest a gradual बदलें in behavior over a longer समय span.
लिसा Cuddy, M.D., is a fictional अक्षर on the Fox network medical drama हाउस.
वो is portrayed by Lisa Edelstein.
Cuddy थी the Dean of आयुर्विज्ञान and hospital व्यवस्थापक of the fictional princeton-plainsboro Teaching Hospital in नई Jersey.
वो also becomes House 's love interest through the years to start a relationship with उसे in ऋतु seven.
Cuddy quit her job बाद the कार्यक्रम of season seven 's finale `` Moving On ``.
Track and field is a sport comprising विभिन्न competitive एथलेटिक contests आधारित on कार्यशील, कूद, and throwing.
The name of the खेल गर्भाशयी from the प्रतियोगिता venue : a स्टेडियम with an ओवल कार्यशील track around a grass field.
The फेंकना and jumping events generally लो प्लेस in the central enclosed क्षेत्रफल.
track and field जलप्रपात under the umbrella खेल of एथलेटिक्स, which भी शामिल road running, cross country running, and race चलना.
The दो most prestigious international track and फ़ील्ड competitions हैं आयोजित अंतर्गत the banner of athletics : the एथलेटिक्स प्रतियोगिता at the Olympic Games and the आइएएएफ संसार Championships in Athletics.
the अंतरराष्ट्रीय संघ of Athletics federations is the international governing देह for track and फ़ील्ड.
Track and field कार्यक्रम are generally individual sports with athletes challenging each अन्य to decide a single victor.
The रेसिंग कार्यक्रम are won by the athlete with the तीव्रतम time, जबकि the कूद और throwing events are जीती by the खिलाड़ी who has achieved the greatest distance or ऊँचाई in the contest.
the कार्यशील कार्यक्रम हैं categorised as sprints, मध्य और long-distance events, relays, और hurdling.
नियमित jumping कार्यक्रम शामिल long जम्प, triple jump, high jump और ध्रुव vault, while the most आम फेंकना events हैं शॉट put, javelin, discus और hammer.
There हैं also `` संयुक्त कार्यक्रम '', such as heptathlon और decathlon, in which athletes compete in a number of the above events.
Records हैं kept of the best performances in विशिष्ट events, at world और national स्तर, right bas to a personal स्तर.
however, if एथलीट are deemed to have violated the इवेंट 's नियम or regulations, they are disqualified from the प्रतियोगिता और their marks are erased.
in उत्तर America, the term track and field may be used to refer to एथलेटिक्स in general, rather than specifically track and फ़ील्ड कार्यक्रम.
the Gulf War ( 2 August 1990 – 28 February 1991 ), codenamed Operation Desert Storm ( 17 जनवरी 1991 – 28 फ़रवरी 1991 ) थी a युद्ध waged by a U.N.-authorized Coalition फ़ोर्स from 34 राष्ट्र led by the United States, against Iraq in जवाब to Iraq 's आक्रमण और annexation of Kuwait.
The war is भी known अंतर्गत अन्य names, ऐसे as the Persian गल्फ युद्ध, पहला गल्फ युद्ध, Gulf युद्ध i, or the पहला Iraq युद्ध, before the term `` Iraq युद्ध '' became पहचाना बजाय साथ the 2003 Iraq War ( भी referred to in the u.S. as `` Operation Iraqi स्वतंत्रता '' ).
Kuwait 's invasion by Iraqi troops कि began 2 अगस्त 1990 थी met साथ international condemnation, and brought immediate आर्थिक प्रतिबंधों विरूद्ध Iraq by members of the u.N. Security Council.
U.S. President जार्ज H. W. Bush तैनात u.S. forces into Saudi अरब, और urged other countries to भेजें उनके own forces to the scene.
An array of nations joined the Coalition.
the ग्रेट बहुमत of the Coalition 's सैन्य forces were इससे the u.S., साथ सऊदी अरब, the United Kingdom and Egypt as अग्रणी योगदानकर्ता, in that order.
सऊदी Arabia paid around us $ 36 billion of the us $ 60 अरब cost.
The war was चिह्नित by the beginning of सजीव news on the front लाइनों of the लड़ो, with the primacy of the u.S. network सीएनएन.
The war has also earned the उपनाम Video Game War after the रोज़ ब्रॉडकास्ट images on फलक the U.S. bombers during आपरेशन Desert Storm.
the initial conflict to निकाल Iraqi troops इससे कुवैत began with an aerial bombardment on 17 जनवरी 1991.
This थी followed by a ground assault on 24 February.
This was a निर्णायक विजय for the गठबन्धन forces, who liberated कुवैत और advanced into Iraqi territory.
The गठबन्धन ceased their अग्रिम, and declared a cease-fire 100 घंटों after the मैदान campaign started.
Aerial and ground combat was confined to इराकी, Kuwait, and areas on Saudi Arabia 's border.
इराकी शुभारम्भ Scud missiles against Coalition military targets in सऊदी अरब and against Israel.
The nickel, in अमरीकी usage, is a five- cent सिक्का issued by the United राज्य Mint.
Composed of 75 % copper and 25 % निकल, the piece रै महरूम struck since 1866.
the चांदी half dime, equal to five cents, था been issued since the 1790s.
the अमरीकी सिविल War caused economic hardship, ड्राइविंग gold and silver from परिसंचरण ; in response, in place of low-value सिक्के, the सरकारी at first issued पेपर करेंसी.
In 1865, Congress abolished the five-cent fractional करेंसी नोट बाद Spencer M. Clark, head of the Currency Bureau ( आज the Bureau of Engraving and Printing ), placed उसके own portrait on the denomination.
After कामयाब परिचय of two-cent and three-cent pieces, without अनमोल मेटल, Congress also authorized a five-cent piece consisting of base मेटल ; the Mint began striking इस संस्करण in 1866.
The initial design of the Shield nickel was struck until 1883, then replaced by the स्वतंत्रता सिर निकल.
the Buffalo निकल was introduced in 1913 as भाग of a ड्राइव to increase the beauty of American coinage ; in 1938, the Jefferson nickel followed.
In 2004 and 2005, special designs in honor of the bicentennial of the Lewis and Clark Expedition यहूद जारी.
in 2006, the Mint reverted to using Jefferson निकल पंक्तियां Felix schlag 's original रिवर्स ( or `` tails '' side ), although a new obverse, by Jamie franki, was substituted.
As of 2013, it costs more than ग्यारह cents to produce a nickel ; the Mint is exploring the सम्भावना of reducing cost by using less महंगी धातुओं.
A पोस्टर with पुष्प or clusters of flowers produced by बारह प्रजाति of flowering plants इससे different परिवारों
A flower, sometimes ज्ञात as a bloom or blossom, is the reproductive structure found in flowering पौधे ( plants of the division Magnoliophyta, also पुकारा angiosperms ).
the biological function of a flower is to effect reproduction, usually by providing a mechanism लिये the संघ of sperm साथ eggs.
पुष्प may सुकर outcrossing ( fusion of शुक्राणु and eggs इससे different individuals in a population ) or allow selfing ( fusion of sperm and egg from the वही पुष्प ).
Some flowers produce diaspores without fertilization ( parthenocarpy ).
पुष्प contain sporangia और are the site where gametophytes develop.
Flowers give वृद्धि to फल और बीज.
अनेक flowers have evolved to be attractive to पशु, so as to cause them to be vectors for the transfer of पराग.
in जोड to facilitating the reproduction of flowering plants, flowers have long been admired and used by इंसानो to beautify their environment, और also as objects of रोमांस, ritual, धर्म, medicine and as a source of food.
The McDonnell डगलस ( now Boeing ) F-15 Eagle is a twin-engine, all-weather रणनीतिक सेनानी designed by McDonnell Douglas to लाभ and maintain एयर बड़प्पन in aerial combat.
It is considered among the सबसे कामयाब modern fighters, साथ over 100 aerial कॉम्बैट victories with no नुकसान in dogfights.
Following समीक्षाएँ of प्रस्ताव, the United States Air फ़ोर्स चयनित mcdonnell डगलस ' डिज़ाइन in 1967 to मिलें the सेवा 's need for a समर्पित एयर बड़प्पन fighter.
The Eagle first flew in जुलाई 1972, and entered सेवा in 1976.
Since the 1970s, the Eagle रै been exported to इसराईल, जापानी, Saudi Arabia, और other nations.
the f-15 was originally envisioned as a pure एयर superiority वायुयान.
Its design शामिल a द्वितीयक ground-attack capability कि was largely unused.
The डिज़ाइन proved लचीली enough that an all-weather strike derivative, the F-15E स्ट्राइक Eagle, थी बाद developed, and डाला सेवा in 1989.
The F-15 Eagle is अपेक्षित to be in service साथ the u.S. Air फ़ोर्स past 2025.
Mimio is a brand नाम of a line of technology उत्पाद aimed at the education market.
The प्राथमिक products are केन्द्रित around कंप्यूटर whiteboard interactive teaching devices.
mimiocapture devices also allow users to कैप्चर all of the स्याही strokes that are written on the whiteboard.
जब प्रयुक्त in conjunction साथ a वीडियो projector it turns the ordinary whiteboard surface into a fully interactive whiteboard.
The product line थी originally designed by आभासी स्याही.
On October 4, 2006 Newell Rubbermaid acquired the Mimio interactive whiteboard ( iwb ) product line.
rahab of जेरिको
Rahab, ( ; ; ) was, according to the Book of Joshua, a woman who lived in Jericho in the Promised Land and assisted the Israelites in capturing the city.
Nearly सब अंग्रेज़ी अनुवाद of Joshua describe her as a harlot or वेश्या.
The संगठन of अमरीकी States ( Spanish : organización de लॉस estados americanos, पुर्तगाली : organização dos estados americanos, French : संगठन देस états américains ), or the OAS, is a regional international organization.
the oas was founded on 30 April 1948, and has its headquarters in Washington, d.C., संयुक्त राज्य.
Its सदस्यों हैं the 35 independent राज्य of the Americas.
Since 26 may 2005, the Secretary General of OAS has been जोस Miguel Insulza.
Christopher Columbus ( Italian : Cristoforo कोलोन ; Spanish : Cristóbal Colón ; Portuguese : Cristóvão कोलोन ; before 31 October 145120 may 1506 ) थी an Italian एक्सप्लोरर, नाविक, and colonizer, born in the गणतंत्र of Genoa, in कया is today northwestern Italy.
Under the auspices of the Catholic monarchs of Spain, he completed four voyages आरपार the अटलांटिक समंदर that led to सामान्य European जागरूकता of the अमरीकी continents.
Those voyages, and his efforts to स्थापित permanent settlements on the island of हिस्पानिओला, initiated the Spanish colonization of the New World.
in the context of emerging western imperialism और आर्थिक competition between European kingdoms seeking माल through the स्थापना of trade routes and colonies, कोलंबस 's सट्टे proposal, to reach the ईस्ट इंडीज by sailing westward, आखिरकार received the support of the Spanish crown, जिससे saw in it a वादा, however remote, of gaining the upper हाथ over प्रतिद्वंद्वी powers in the contest लिये the lucrative spice व्यापार साथ एशिया.
दौरान his first voyage in 1492, बजाय of reaching Japan as he had intended, कोलंबस landed in the Bahamas archipelago, at a locale he नामित San साल्वाडोर.
Over the course of three more voyages, Columbus visited the Greater and Lesser Antilles, as well as the Caribbean coast of Venezuela और Central America, claiming उन्हें लिये the स्पेनी साम्राज्य.
Though Columbus थी नहीं the first यूरोपीय explorer to पहुँचें the americas ( having महरूम preceded by the Norse expedition led by Leif Ericson in the 11th सदी ), कोलंबस 's voyages led to the first स्थायी यूरोपीय contact साथ the Americas, inaugurating a काल of European खोजी, conquest, and colonization that lasted for several सदियां.
They था, therefore, an enormous impact in the historical विकास of the modern Western संसार.
कोलंबस खुद देखी उसके accomplishments primarily in the लाइट of the spreading of the Christian religion.
Never admitting कि he था reached a continent previously unknown to Europeans, बल्कि than the East इंडीज he था set आउट लिये, Columbus पुकारा the inhabitants of the lands he visited indios ( Spanish for `` Indians `` ).
कोलंबस 's strained संबंध साथ the Spanish crown और its appointed औपनिवेशिक administrators in America led to his arrest और dismissal as राज्यपाल of the settlements on the island of हिस्पानिओला in 1500, and बाद to protracted litigation over the लाभ which कोलंबस और उसके वारिस claimed यहूद owed to उन्हें by the क्राउन.
Bred in जर्मनी, the boxer is a नस्ल of stocky, medium-sized, short-haired dogs.
The coat is smooth and tight-fitting ; colors हैं fawn or brindled, साथ or without white markings, जिससे may cover the entire देह.
Boxers are brachycephalic ( वे have broad, short skulls ), और have a वर्गाकार muzzle, mandibular prognathism ( an underbite ), very strong जबड़े, and a शक्तिशाली काटना आदर्श for hanging on to large prey.
The Boxer was करवाया इससे the बूढ़ा अंग्रेज़ी बुल and the अभी विलुप्त bullenbeisser, and is part of the Molosser group.
Boxers यहूद first exhibited in a dog show for St. bernards in म्यूनिख in 1895, the first boxer क्लबों होने founded the next year.
Based on 2012 अमरीकी Kennel क्लबों आंकडे, Boxers आयोजित steady as the सातवाँ most लोकप्रिय breed of श्वान in the United States for the तीसरा consecutive year.
सीरियल ATA ( SATA ) is a computer bus interface that connects मेजबान बस adapters to mass भंडार डिवाइस such as hard डिस्क ड्राइव and ऑप्टिकल ड्राइव.
सीरियल ata replaces the पुरानी AT Attachment standard ( ATA ; बाद referred to as Parallel ATA or PATA ), offering several लाभ over the older इंटरफ़ेस : reduced केबल आकार and cost ( सात conductors बजाय of 40 ), देशी hot swapping, faster आंकड़ा transfer through उच्चतर signalling rates, and more efficient ट्रांसफ़र through an ( optional ) I/O queuing protocol.
SATA मेजबान adapters और डिवाइस communicate via a high-speed serial cable over two pairs of conductors.
in कंट्रास्ट, parallel ATA ( the redesignation लिये the legacy ATA विशेषताएँ ) used a 16-bit चौड़ी data बस with many additional support and कंट्रोल सिग्नल, all operating at much lower frequency.
to ensure backward संगतता with legacy ATA software and applications, sata उपयोग the वही basic ATA and ATAPI command-set as legacy ATA devices.
SATA has replaced समानांतर ATA in consumer desktop और laptop कंप्यूटर, and रै largely replaced PATA in नई embedded अनुप्रयोग.
SATA 's market share in the desktop pc market थी 99 % in 2008.
PATA remains widely used in औद्योगिक and embedded अनुप्रयोग कि use compactflash storage, even हालांकि the new CFast मानक is आधारित on SATA.
Serial ATA उद्योग compatibility specifications originate from The सीरियल ATA अंतरराष्ट्रीय संगठन ( उर्फ.
SATA-IO, serialata.org ).
the SATA-IO group collaboratively creates, reviews, ratifies, and publishes the interoperability specifications, the test मामले, और plug-fests.
As with many other industry compatibility standards, the SATA सामग्री स्वामित्व is transferred to other industry लाशें : primarily the incits t13 subcommittee ATA, the incits t10 subcommittee ( SCSI ) ; a subgroup of t10 responsible लिये सीरियल संलग्न SCSI ( sas ).
The पूरा specification इससे SATA-IO.
The remainder of this आलेख होगा कोशिश to use the terminology and specifications of SATA-IO.
The इतिहास of the अंतरजाल began with the development of electronic कंप्यूटर in the 1950s.
The public was पहला introduced to the concepts कि होता सीसे to the Internet when a message थी sent over the arpanet from कंप्यूटर विज्ञान Professor Leonard kleinrock 's laboratory at विश्वविद्यालयों of California, Los Angeles ( ucla ), बाद the second piece of संजाल उपकरण was संस्थापित at स्टैनफोर्ड Research Institute ( श्री ).
पैकेट switched संजाल ऐसे as ARPANET, Mark I at NPL in the uk, cyclades, मेरिट Network, Tymnet, and Telenet, were developed in the लेट 1960s और जल्दी 1970s using a variety of प्रोटोकॉल.
the ARPANET in particular led to the development of प्रोटोकॉल for internetworking, in which multiple पृथक संजाल could be joined साथ into a network of networks.
in 1982, the अंतरजाल protocol suite ( TCP/IP ) थी standardized, और consequently, the concept of a world-wide network of interconnected TCP/IP networks, called the अंतरजाल, was introduced.
Access to the ARPANET थी विस्तारित in 1981 when the National Science न्यास ( nsf ) developed the Computer विज्ञान संजाल ( csnet ) and again in 1986 जब NSFNET provided access to महासंगणक sites in the United States from research and शिक्षा organizations.
वाणिज्यिक Internet service प्रदाताओं ( ISPs ) began to emerge in the late 1980s और early 1990s.
The ARPANET was decommissioned in 1990.
The Internet थी commercialized in 1995 when nsfnet थी decommissioned, removing the पिछला restrictions on the use of the Internet to carry commercial traffic.
चूंकि the mid-1990s, the Internet रै था a revolutionary impact on culture और commerce, including the वृद्धि of near-instant संचार by इलेक्ट्रॉनिक मेल, instant messaging, आवाज़ over अंतरजाल प्रोटोकॉल ( VoIP ) `` फोन काल्स '', two-way इंटरैक्टिव वीडियो calls, and the संसार चौड़ी Web with इसके discussion forums, ब्लॉग, social networking, and online खरीदारी sites.
The research and education community continues to develop and उपयोग उन्नत networks ऐसे as NSF 's बहुत ऊँची speed रीढ़ संजाल Service ( vbns ), internet2, और National LambdaRail.
increasing amounts of आंकड़ा हैं transmitted at उच्चतर और higher speeds over fiber ऑप्टिक संजाल ऑपरेटिंग at 1-Gbit/s, 10-gbit/s, or अधिक.
The Internet 's कब्ज़ा over the global संचार लैंडस्केप was almost instant in historical शर्तें : it only communicated 1 % of the information बहती through two-way telecommunications networks in the year 1993, already 51 % by 2000, और more than 97 % of the telecommunicated सूचना by 2007.
आज the Internet continues to grow, driven by कभी वृहद amounts of online सूचना, commerce, entertainment, and social नेटवर्किंग.

प्राध्यापक Albus पर्सिवल wulfric ब्रायन Dumbledore is a प्रमुख अक्षर और protagonist of J. K. Rowling 's Harry Potter series.
For most of the series, he is the headmaster of the wizarding school Hogwarts.
As part of his backstory, it is revealed that he is the founder and leader of the अनुक्रम of the फीनिक्स, an organisation dedicated to fighting the main विपक्षी of the श्रेणी, रब Voldemort.
Dumbledore is portrayed by रिचर्ड Harris in the film adaptions of हैरी Potter and the पारस 's Stone and हैरी Potter and the Chamber of Secrets.
बाद Harris ' मौत, माइकल Gambon portrayed डम्बल्डोर लिये all of the बाकी films.
Rowling stated वो chose the name Dumbledore, which is an जल्दी Modern अंग्रेज़ी word for `` bumblebee ``, because of Dumbledore 's प्रेम of music : वो imagined उसे चलना around `` humming to खुद a लॉट ''.
calcitonin ( भी known as thyrocalcitonin ) is a 32-amino acid रैखिक polypeptide hormone कि is produced in इंसानो primarily by the parafollicular cells ( भी known as C-cells ) of the thyroid, and in many other animals in the ultimobranchial देह.
it acts to reduce blood कैल्सियम ( ca2+ ), opposing the प्रभाव of parathyroid हार्मोन ( pth ).
calcitonin रै महरूम found in fish, सरीसृपों, birds, और स्तनधारियों.
Its महत्व in humans has not महरूम as well established as इसके importance in other पशु, as इसके function is usually नहीं significant in the regulation of normal calcium समस्थापन.
It belongs to calcitonin-like protein परिवार.
A mousepad with a padded कलाई बाकी.
A mousepad ( us ) or चूहा mat ( UK ) is a सतह लिये placing और moving a computer mouse.
A mousepad enhances the usability of the चूहा compared to using a चूहा directly on a तालिका by providing a surface to allow the tracking LED or ball ( in पूर्व models ) to माप गति accurately and बगैर jitter.
कुछ mousepads increase ergonomics by providing a padded wrist rest.

riverfront Stadium ( 1970–1995 ), later known as Cinergy फ़ील्ड ( 1996–2002 ), थी the home of the Cincinnati लाल National लीग बेसबॉल team and the Cincinnati bengals नेशनल Football League टोली.
Located on the Ohio River in शहर Cincinnati, the स्टेडियम was best ज्ञात as the घर of `` the Big रेड Machine ``, as the लाल were often called in the 1970s.
Construction began on February 1, 1968, and थी समाप्त at a cost of कम than $ 50 लाख.
on June 30, 1970, the Reds hosted the Atlanta braves in their ग्रैंड खोलने, with हांक आरोन hitting the first ever home चलाएं at riverfront.
दो सप्ताह later on जुलाई 14, 1970, riverfront hosted the 1970 Major League बेसबॉल all-star Game.
इस खेल is best remembered for the often-replayed collision at home थाली between Reds स्टार Pete रोज़ and catcher रे Fosse of the क्लीवलैंड इंडियंस.
In September 1996, riverfront Stadium थी renamed `` Cinergy Field '' in a sponsorship सौदे साथ वृहद सिनसिनाटी 's उर्जा company, cinergy निगम.
In 2001, to make room for Great American Ball पार्क, the seating capacity at Cinergy Field was घटाया to 39,000.
वहीँ थी a huge wall in Center Field दृश्य after the renovations, to serve as the batter 's eye.
the स्टेडियम थी demolished by implosion on December 29, 2002.

The silent बहुमत is an अनिर्दिष्ट large majority of people in a country or group who do नहीं express उनके opinions सरेआम.
The पद was popularized ( हालांकि not पहला used ) by U.S. President Richard निक्सन in a November 3, 1969, speech in जिससे he कहा, `` और so tonight—to you, the great silent बहुमत of my fellow Americans—I ask for your support. ''
In this usage it referred to those अमेरिकी who किया not जुड़ें in the large demonstrations विरूद्ध the Vietnam War at the time, who did not जुड़ें in the counterculture, और who किया not participate in पब्लिक discourse.
निक्सन along with many others देखी इस group of मध्य Americans as होने निष्प्रभ in the media by the अधिक गायन अल्पसंख्यक.
the phrase थी used in the 19th सदी as a euphemism referring to सब the people जो have died, और others have used it पहले और बाद Nixon to refer to groups of मतदाता in various nations of the संसार.
sam, a rhesus मंकी, उड़ाया to an altitude of 88 km in 1959.

Before इंसानो गई into स्पेस, अनेक animals यहूद शुभारम्भ into space, सहित numerous बंदरों, so that वैज्ञानिकों could investigate the biological प्रभाव of स्पेस सफर.
the United राज्य शुभारम्भ फ़्लाइट containing primate cargo primarily between 1948-1961 with one flight in 1969 and one in 1985.
France शुभारम्भ two monkey-carrying flights in 1967.
The Soviet Union और रूस शुभारम्भ बंदरों between 1983 and 1996.
Most monkeys were anesthetized before lift-off.
overall thirty-two monkeys उड़ाया in the स्पेस program ; none flew more than एकबार.
Numerous back-up monkeys भी गई through the कार्यक्रम लकिन never उड़ाया.
Monkeys from अनेक species were प्रयुक्त, सहित rhesus बंदरों, cynomolgus monkeys, गिलहरी monkeys, and pig-tailed macaques.
Some chimpanzees ( जिससे are apes बल्कि than monkeys ) यहूद भी प्रयुक्त.
RAID ( redundant array of independent डिस्क, originally redundant array of inexpensive disks ) is a भंडार technology that combines multiple disk drive components into a logical unit.
आंकड़ा is distributed across the drives in one of several तरीके पुकारा `` RAID levels '', depending on the level of अतिरेक और performance required.
the term `` रेड '' was पहला पारिभाषित by David Patterson, Garth A. गिब्सन, and Randy Katz at the University of कैलिफ़ोर्निया, बर्कली in 1987.
विपणक representing industry रेड manufacturers बाद attempted to reinvent the term to describe a redundant array of independent डिस्क as a अर्थात् of disassociating a low-cost expectation from रेड technology.
RAID is now used as an छतरियाँ term लिये computer आंकड़ा storage schemes कि can divide और replicate data among अनेक शारीरिक ड्राइव : रेड is an example of storage virtualization और the array can be पहुँचा by the ऑपरेटिंग प्रणाली as one single ड्राइव.
The अलग योजनाएं or architectures are named by the शब्द रेड followed by a क्रमांक ( e.g. RAID 0, रेड 1 ).
प्रत्येक scheme provides a अलग balance between the key goals : reliability and availability, performance and capacity.
RAID levels greater than रेड 0 provide सुरक्षा against unrecoverable ( sector ) पढ़ा त्रुटियाँ, as खूब as पूरे डिस्क failure.
a lymphocyte is a type of श्वेत blood cell in the vertebrate immune system.
अंतर्गत the microscope, lymphocytes can be divided into विशाल lymphocytes and small lymphocytes.
Large granular lymphocytes include natural killer कोशिकाएं ( NK cells ).
Small lymphocytes consist of t कोशिकाएं and B कोशिकाएं.
The Big Lebowski is a 1998 dark कॉमेडी फिल्मी लिखा और directed by Joel and ethan कोएन.
जेफ़ पुलों stars as Jeff Lebowski, an unemployed Los एंजिल्स slacker और avid बॉलर, nicknamed `` the Dude. ''
After a मामला of mistaken पहचान, The यार is introduced to a करोड़पति भी named Jeffrey lebowski.
जब the करोड़पति Lebowski 's trophy wife is later kidnapped, he आयोग The Dude to deliver the फिरौती to secure her रिलीज.
The योजना goes awry when The Dude 's friend वाल्टर sobchak ( John गुडमैन ) schemes to keep the full ransom.
Steve buscemi, Philip Seymour Hoffman, दाउद Huddleston, julianne मूर, tara Reid, and जॉन Turturro also star in the film, जिससे is narrated by a cowboy ज्ञात only as `` The अजनबी '', played by sam Elliott.
The film is loosely inspired by the कार्य of Raymond Chandler.
जोएल कोएन stated : `` we चाही to do a चांडलर दयालु of story – how it moves episodically, and deals साथ the वर्ण trying to unravel a mystery, as खूब as having a hopelessly complex प्लाट that 's ultimately महत्वहीन. ''
the original स्कोर थी composed by Carter Burwell, a longtime collaborator of the कोएन भाइयो.
the Big Lebowski was a निराशा at the U.S. बक्सा office and received mixed reviews at the समय of इसके रिलीज.
Reviews have trended towards the positive over time, and the film has become a cult पसंदीदा, noted for its idiosyncratic characters, dream sequences, unconventional संवाद, and eclectic साउंडट्रैक.
सेवेरस Snape is a fictional अक्षर in the Harry कुम्हार book series written by j.K. Rowling.
in the first novel of the series, he is hostile toward Harry and is built up to be the primary antagonist until the फाइनल अध्याय.
As the series progresses, Snape 's अक्षर becomes more layered and complex.
Rowling does नहीं fully reveal the details of his true loyalties until the end of the final book, Harry Potter और the Deathly Hallows.
Over the कोर्स of the series, snape 's portrayal evolves इससे that of a malicious and partisan टीचर to कि of a pivotal character of considerable complexity and moral ambiguity.
Snape primarily teaches potions at हॉग्वार्ट्स, though in the sixth novel he teaches रक्षा Against the Dark कला, a स्थिति जिससे he थी known to have desired throughout the series.
He ultimately becomes Headmaster of Hogwarts in the फाइनल novel.
Rowling has described उसे as `` a तोहफा of a character ''.
Grits refers to a ground-corn food of देशी अमरीकी उत्पत्ति, कि is common in the Southern संयुक्त States and mainly eaten at breakfast.
Modern grits हैं commonly made of alkali-treated corn known as hominy.
Grits are similar to अन्य मोटा maize-based porridges इससे around the world such as polenta or the thinner farina.
`` तत्काल grits '' have been processed to speed cooking.
the शब्द `` grits '' derives इससे the Old English शब्द `` grytt, '' अर्थ coarse meal.
इस word originally referred to wheat and अन्य porridges अभी known as groats in parts of the u.K..
Maize, अनजान in Europe in the Middle Ages, is a खाना निकला from corn ( a नई World plant ) and `` मकई '' had been used to describe wheat products in अनेक यूरोपीय regions.
`` Grits '' may be either singular or बहुवचन ; historically, in the American South the word was invariably singular notwithstanding its बहुवचन form ( cf. such food names as `` spaghetti '' or `` linguine '', likewise plural in रूप, but singular in उपयोग ).
Sometimes, grits हैं called sofkee or sofkey ( from a native American Muskogee word ).
In molecular जीवविज्ञान, human chorionic gonadotropin ( hcg ) is a hormone produced by the fertilized अंडा after conception.
Later दौरान गर्भावस्था it is made by the developing placenta, and later by the placental घटक syncytiotrophoblast.
Some cancerous tumors produce इस हार्मोन ; इसलिए, elevated स्तर measured when the रोगी is नहीं pregnant can सीसे to a कर्कट diagnosis.
However, it is not known whether this उत्पादन is a contributing कारण or an effect of tumorigenesis.
The pituitary analogue of hcg, known as luteinizing हार्मोन ( LH ), is उत्पादित in the pituitary gland of males and females of all ages.
, the FDA has निषिद्ध the sale of `` homeopathic '' और over the counter hCG diet उत्पाद and घोषित them बेईमान and illegal.

Coca-Cola is a carbonated नरम पेय sold in stores, restaurants, and vending machines in प्रत्येक country except Cuba और North कोरियाई.
it is उत्पादित by The coca-cola Company of Atlanta, Georgia, और is often referred to बस as कोक ( a registered ट्रेडमार्क of the Coca-Cola Company in the संयुक्त राज्य since कूच 27, 1944 ).
Originally intended as a patent आयुर्विज्ञान when it थी invented in the लेट 19th सदी by John pemberton, Coca-Cola was खरीदा out by बिजनेसमैन Asa griggs Candler, whose विपणन tactics led Coke to इसके दबदबा of the world soft-drink market throughout the 20th century.
The company produces concentrate, which is then sold to licensed Coca-Cola bottlers throughout the संसार.
The bottlers, who थाम territorially exclusive contracts साथ the कम्पनी, उपज finished product in cans and बोतलों from the concentrate in combination साथ filtered water and sweeteners.
the bottlers तब sell, वितरित and merchandise Coca-Cola to retail stores और vending machines.
Such bottlers include Coca-Cola उद्यमों, which is the largest single Coca-Cola bottler in North America and western यूरोपीय.
the Coca-Cola कम्पनी भी बिकता concentrate लिये सोडा स्रोतों to major रेस्तरां और food सेवा distributors.
The Coca-Cola Company has, on occasion, introduced other cola drinks under the कोक ब्रांड name.
The सबसे common of these is Diet Coke, साथ अन्य including Caffeine-Free Coca-Cola, आहार Coke Caffeine-Free, Coca-Cola Cherry, Coca-Cola शून्य, Coca-Cola Vanilla, और special versions with lemon, लाइम or coffee.
Based on interbrand 's बेहतरीन वैश्विक brand 2011, Coca-Cola थी the संसार 's most मूल्यवान brand.
An ombudsman is an official, प्रायः appointed by the government or by parliament but साथ a significant उपाधि of स्वतंत्रता, जो is चार्ज with representing the रूचि of the public by investigating and addressing complaints of maladministration or violation of rights.
In some countries an Inspector सामान्य, Citizen एडवोकेट or other आधिकारिक may have कर्तव्य समान to those of a national ombudsman, and may भी be appointed by the legislature.
Below the national level an ombudsman may be appointed by a राज्य, local or municipal सरकारी, और unofficial ombudsmen may be appointed by, or भी work for, a निगम such as a utility supplier or a समाचारपत्र, for an NGO, or for a पेशेवर regulatory देह.
whether appointed by the विधानमंडल, the कार्यपालिका, or an organization ( or, less frequently, elected by the constituency that he or वो serves ), the ठेठ कर्तव्य of an ombudsman are to investigate complaints and attempt to resolve उन्हें, प्रायः through recommendations ( बाइंडिंग or not ) or mediation.
Ombudsmen sometimes also उद्देश्य to पहचानो systemic issues अग्रणी to poor service or breaches of लोगों 's rights.
at the नेशनल level, most ombudsmen have a wide mandate to deal साथ the entire पब्लिक sector, और sometimes भी elements of the private sector ( for उदाहरण, contracted सेवा प्रदाताओं ).
in some cases, वहीँ is a more प्रतिबंधित mandate, लिये example with particular सेक्टर of society.
अधिक recent developments have included the सृष्टि of specialised Children 's ombudsman और Information Commissioner एजेंसियों.
In कुछ jurisdictions an ombudsman charged with the हैंडलिंग of concerns परिचय national government is अधिक formally referred to as the `` Parliamentary कमिश्नर '' ( e.g. the संयुक्त Kingdom संसदीय Commissioner for Administration, and the पश्चिमी Australian state ombudsman ).
in अनेक देशों जहाँ the ombudsman 's remit extends परे dealing साथ alleged maladministration to promoting और protecting human अधिकारों, the ombudsman is recognised as the नेशनल human अधिकारों संस्था.
the पोस्ट of ombudsman था by the समाप्त of the 20th century been instituted by most governments and by कुछ intergovernmental organizations ऐसे as the European संघ.
Making a complaint to an ombudsman is usually free of charge.

New इंग्लैण्ड is a region in the northeastern corner of the संयुक्त States consisting of the छह राज्य of Maine, नई Hampshire, Vermont, Massachusetts, Rhode Island, और कनेक्टिकट.
नई England is bordered by नई York राज्य to the दक्षिणपश्चिम, क्यूबेक to the उत्तरपश्चिम, and नई Brunswick and the Atlantic समंदर to the ईस्ट.
In एक of the earliest English settlements in North America, Pilgrims from England पहला settled in New इंग्लैण्ड in 1620, to रूप Plymouth Colony.
टेन years later, the Puritans settled north of plymouth उपनिवेश in बोस्टन, यूँ forming Massachusetts खाड़ी उपनिवेश.
Over the next 130 years, New England fought in four फ्रेंच और भारतीय युद्धों, until the British defeated the French and उनके native allies in North America.
in the late 18th सदी, the New England Colonies initiated the प्रतिरोध to the British Parliament 's प्रयत्न to impose new कर बगैर the consent of the colonists.
the बोस्टन Tea Party was a विरोध to which ग्रेट Britain responded साथ a series of दंडात्मक कानून stripping Massachusetts of self-government, which यहूद termed the `` असहनीय Acts `` by the colonists.
The confrontation led to open warfare in 1775, the expulsion of the अंग्रेजों अधिकारियों इससे New England in वसन्त 1776, and the Declaration of Independence in July 1776.
Some of the पहला आंदोलनों of American literature, philosophy, और education originated in New इंग्लैण्ड.
The प्रदेश played a prominent भूमिका in the movement to abolish slavery, and was the पहला region of the संयुक्त राज्य to be रूपांतरित by the Industrial क्रान्ति.
Today, New इंग्लैण्ड is a major world बीच of education, ऊँची technology, बीमे, and आयुर्विज्ञान.
बोस्टन is its cultural, financial, शैक्षणिक, medical and परिवहन center.
प्रत्येक राज्य is प्रधानतया subdivided into small incorporated municipalities known as नई England towns, which are often governed by town meeting.
The only unincorporated territory in नई England exists in the sparse, northern regions of Vermont, New हैम्पशायर, and Maine.
चूंकि 1970, voters have अधिक often supported liberal candidates at the state and संघीय level than those of any other प्रदेश in the संयुक्त राज्य.
New इंग्लैण्ड is the तभी one of the संयुक्त States Census Bureau 's nine क्षेत्रीय विभाजन जिनकी name does नहीं derive from इसके geography, और it is the only multi-state प्रदेश with साफ, सतत boundaries.
It maintains a दमदार sense of सांस्कृतिक पहचान नियत apart इससे the rest of the country, हालांकि the terms of इस पहचान हैं often contested, combining Puritanism with उदारतावाद, कृषिक जीवन साथ उद्योग, और isolation साथ आव्रजन.

is an American television श्रेणी that combines the medical drama और action-adventure genres.
It थी produced by Mark सात Limited and वितरित by सार्वभौमिक studios.
It debuted as a midseason बदलना on जनवरी 15, 1972, on NBC, replacing the two short-lived श्रेणी The Partners और the शुभ जीवन, और ran until सितंबर 3, 1977, साथ छह अतिरिक्त two-hour टेलीविज़न films during the following two सालो.
