थी निर्मित and produced by Jack Webb and रॉबर्ट A. Cinader, both of whom were also responsible लिये the police dramas adam-12 and Dragnet.
The Eastern समय Zone ( ET ) encompasses 17 u.S. राज्य in the eastern part of the contiguous संयुक्त राज्य, parts of कनाडा and three देशों in दक्षिण अमेरिका.
Places कि use Eastern मानक Time ( EST ) जब observing standard time ( autumn/winter ) हैं 5 घंटों पीछे समन्वित सार्वभौमिक Time ( ).
Eastern Daylight Time ( EDT ), when observing daylight saving time ( spring/summer ) is 4 घंटों behind Coordinated Universal समय ( ).
in the northern भाग of the time zone, दौरान the दूसरी संडे in March, at 2:00 a.m. est, clocks are उन्नत to 3:00 a.m. EDT leaving a one घंटा `` gap. ''
During the first Sunday in November, at 2:00 a.m. EDT, घड़ियाँ are स्थानांतरित back to 1:00 a.m. est, यूँ `` duplicating '' एक घंटा.
Southern parts of the zone ( पनामा and the Caribbean ) do नहीं observe daylight saving.
मानक रूप of the periodic table.
The colors represent different श्रेणी of elements समझाया below.
The periodic table is a tabular display of the chemical तत्व, organized on the आधार of their atomic numbers, इलेक्ट्रॉन configurations, और पुनरावर्ती chemical properties.
तत्व हैं प्रस्तुत in order of increasing परमाणु क्रमांक ( number of protons ).
The standard रूप of table comprises an 18 × 7 grid or प्रमुख body of तत्व, positioned above a छोटी दोगुना पंक्ति of elements.
The तालिका can भी be deconstructed into four rectangular ब्लॉक : the s-block to the left, the p-block to the right, the d-block in the मध्य, and the f-block below कि.
the rows of the तालिका हैं called अवधि ; the कालम of the s-, d-, और p-blocks are called समूह, with कुछ of these having names such as the हैलोजन्स or the प्रतिष्ठित gases.
चूंकि, by परिभाषा, a periodic तालिका incorporates पुनरावर्ती trends, कोई ऐसे table can be प्रयुक्त to derive relationships between the properties of the elements और predict the गुण of new, yet to be खोजा or synthesized, तत्व.
As a परिणाम, a periodic table—whether in the standard form or कुछ other variant—provides a useful framework लिये analyzing chemical बर्ताव, और ऐसे tables हैं widely used in रसायन और अन्य sciences.
Although precursors मौजूद, Dmitri Mendeleev is generally credited with the प्रकाशन, in 1869, of the पहला widely recognized periodic तालिका.
he developed उसके table to illustrate periodic रुझान in the गुण of the then-known elements.
Mendeleev भी predicted some properties of then-unknown elements कि would be अपेक्षित to fill gaps in इस table.
Most of his predictions यहूद proved correct when the elements in question were subsequently खोजा.
Mendeleev 's periodic table रै since महरूम विस्तारित और refined with the डिस्कवरी or synthesis of further new तत्व और the विकास of नई theoretical मॉडल to बताइये chemical behavior.
सब तत्व इससे atomic numbers 1 ( हाइड्रोजन ) to 118 ( ununoctium ) have been discovered or synthesized.
the elements इससे 1 to 98 ( californium ) have महरूम मिला to exist naturally, although some are मिला only in trace amounts and were initially discovered by संश्लेषण in laboratories.
The elements after 98 have only been synthesized in laboratories.
Production of elements परे ununoctium is being pursued, with the question of कैसा the periodic table may need to be modified to accommodate कोई ऐसे additions being a matter of जारी debate.
numerous सिंथेटिक radionuclides of naturally occurring elements have also been उत्पादित in laboratories.
Minecraft is a सैंडबॉक्स इंडी game originally created by स्वीडिश प्रोग्रामर Markus `` Notch '' Persson and बाद विकसित और published by mojang.
It was publicly released for the pc on May 17, 2009, as a developmental alpha version and, after gradual updates, was published as a full रिलीज version on नवम्बर 18, 2011.
A version for Android थी released a month earlier on अक्तूबर 7, and an iOS version थी released on November 17, 2011.
On may 9, 2012, the game थी released on एक्सबॉक्स 360 as an Xbox सजीव Arcade game, co-developed by 4j Studios.
सब versions of minecraft receive आवधिक updates.
The रचनात्मक and भवन aspects of minecraft allow players to build constructions out of textured घन in a 3D procedurally generated world.
Other activities in the खेल include खोजी, gathering resources, crafting और combat.
Gameplay in its commercial रिलीज रै two principal मोड्स : survival, जिससे requires players to acquire संसाधन and maintain their health और hunger ; और creative, where खिलाड़ी have an असीमित supply of संसाधन, the ability to मक्खी, और no स्वास्थ्य or भूख.
a third gameplay mode named hardcore is the same as survival, differing तभी in difficulty ; it is नियत to hardest सेटिंग और respawning is disabled, forcing players to delete their worlds upon मौत.
minecraft प्राप्त पाँच पुरस्कार from the 2011 Game डेवलपर सम्मेलन : it was awarded the Innovation पुरस्कार, बेहतरीन Downloadable Game पुरस्कार, और the बेहतरीन Debut खेल पुरस्कार from the खेल Developers Choice पुरस्कार ; and the दर्शक पुरस्कार, as well as the seumas McNally ग्रैंड Prize, from the स्वतंत्र Games Festival in 2011.
In 2012, Minecraft was awarded a सुनहरी Joystick Award in the श्रेणी Best Downloadable Game.
As of अप्रैल 8, 2013, the game has sold over 10 लाख copies on PC and as of जनवरी 22, 2013, over 20 million नक़ल across all प्लेटफ़ॉर्म.
the Dark नाईट is a 2008 British-American superhero film निर्देशित, produced, and co-written by Christopher Nolan.
आधारित on the dc Comics character Batman, the film is the second part of नोलन 's Batman film श्रेणी और a sequel to 2005 's बैटमैन Begins.
Christian Bale reprises the lead role of ब्रूस wayne/batman, with a returning डाल of Michael Caine as Alfred pennyworth, Gary Oldman as James गॉर्डन and Morgan फ्रीमैन as लुसियस फॉक्स.
the film introduces the character of घनघोर Dent ( आरोन eckhart ), Gotham 's newly elected ज़िला Attorney और the consort of Bruce Wayne 's बाल्यकाल dost रेचल Dawes ( मैगी जिलएनहॉल ), जो joins बैटमैन and the police in combating the नई उठती threat of a दण्ड mastermind calling himself `` the Joker `` ( Heath Ledger ).
नोलन 's inspiration for the film was the Joker 's comic book debut in 1940, the 1988 graphic novel, और the 1996 श्रेणी, which retold Two-Face 's origin.
the nickname `` the Dark Knight '' was पहला लागू to Batman in Batman no. 1 ( 1940 ), in a स्टोरी लिखा by Bill उंगली.
The Dark नाईट was filmed primarily in शिकागो, as खूब as in several other स्थितियाँ in the United States, the संयुक्त किंगडम, और Hong काँग.
नोलन प्रयुक्त an IMAX camera to फिल्मी some sequences, including the जोकर 's first रूप in the film.
On जनवरी 22, 2008, कुछ महीने after he had completed फिल्मांकन on The अंधेरा Knight and six months before the फिल्मी 's रिलीज, झाड़ Ledger died from a विषाक्त संयोजन of नुस्खा drugs, अग्रणी to intense attention from the press and movie-going पब्लिक.
warner Bros. had initially created a viral marketing campaign लिये the अंधेरा नाईट, विकासशील promotional websites and trailers highlighting screen shots of Ledger as the Joker, लकिन after लेजर 's death, the studio refocused इसके promotional campaign.
the Dark Knight थी released on July 16, 2008 in Australia, on July 18, 2008 in उत्तर America, और on जुलाई 24, 2008 in the United किंगडम.
Considered one of the best films of the 2000s and एक of the बेहतरीन superhero films कभी बना, the फिल्मी प्राप्त highly positive समीक्षाएँ and set numerous records during इसके theatrical चलाएं.
साथ over $ 1 अरब in revenue विश्वव्यापी, it is the 14th-highest-grossing फिल्मी of सब time, unadjusted लिये inflation.
The फिल्मी received आठ Academy Award nominations ; it won the award for Best ध्वनि Editing और Ledger थी posthumously awarded बेहतरीन Supporting Actor.
the Dark Knight Rises, the final भाग of the trilogy, was released on जुलाई 20, 2012.
the समयरेखा of radio lists भीतर the इतिहास of रेडियो, the प्रौद्योगिकी and events कि produced यंत्र कि use radio waves and activities that people undertook.
Later, the history is वर्चस्व by प्रोग्रामिंग and contents, जिससे is closer to सामान्य history.
the Sydney Opera House is a multi-venue performing arts centre in New South वेल्स, Australia.
It was conceived and largely built by Danish वास्तु jørn Utzon, opening in 1973 after a long gestation कि began with उसके competition-winning डिज़ाइन in 1957.
Joseph Cahill 's New South Wales सरकारी gave the go-ahead लिये work to begin in 1958.
The government 's bold decision to चुनें utzon 's design is often overshadowed by the scandal that followed.
It is on Bennelong Point in सिडनी Harbour, बंद to the Sydney Harbour Bridge.
it sits at the northeastern tip of the Sydney central कारोबार district ( the सीबीडी ), surrounded on three पहलू by the harbour ( Sydney कोव and फार्म Cove ) and अंतर्देशीय by the royal Botanic Gardens.
Contrary to its name, it घरों अनेक प्रदर्शन venues.
it is among the busiest performing कला centres in the world, होस्टिंग over 1,500 प्रदर्शन each year attended by कुछ 1.2 million लोगों.
It provides a venue for अनेक performing-arts companies, सहित the four कुंजी निवासी कंपनियाँ Opera Australia, the ऑस्ट्रेलियाई बैले, the सिडनी Theatre Company and the Sydney Symphony Orchestra, and presents a wide range of productions on its अपना account.
it is भी one of the सबसे popular visitor attractions in Australia, साथ अधिक than सात million people visiting प्रत्येक साल, 300,000 of जिसको take a guided tour.
it is administered by the सिडनी ओपेरा House Trust, under the New दक्षिण Wales Ministry of the कला.
On 28 जून 2007, it was बना a युनेस्को World Heritage Site.
It is एक of the 20th सदी 's most distinctive इमारतें and one of the सबसे famous performing कला centres in the world.
a आलेख of body द्रव्यमान index as a फलन of देह mass and देह height is shown ऊपर.
the dashed lines represent subdivisions भीतर a प्रमुख क्लास.
For instance the `` underweight '' वर्गीकरण is further विभाजित into `` severe '', `` moderate '', and `` mild '' subclasses.
The देह mass index ( BMI ), or Quetelet index, is a माप for human देह shape based on an individual 's weight और ऊँचाई.
it थी devised between 1830 and 1850 by the Belgian polymath Adolphe Quetelet दौरान the course of developing `` सोशल भौतिकी ''.
देह mass अनुक्रमणिका is पारिभाषित as the व्यक्तिगत 's body द्रव्यमान विभाजित by the square of their height.
The formulae universally used in आयुर्विज्ञान produce a unit of measure of kg/m2.
बीएमआई can also be determined using a BMI chart, which प्रदर्शक बीएमआई as a फलन of weight ( आड़ा axis ) और ऊँचाई ( vertical अक्ष ) using contour लाइनों for अलग values of बीएमआई or रंगों लिये अलग BMI categories.
† The फ़ैक्टर लिये uk/us units is अधिक precisely 703.06957964, but that level of precision is नहीं meaningful for this गणना.
To work इससे stone and pounds first multiply the stone by 14 तब add the पाउंड to give the पूरे द्रव्यमान in पाउंड ; to work इससे feet and inches first गुणा the feet by 12 तब add the inches to दे the पूरे ऊँचाई in इंच.
Thomas Paine ( January 29, 1737 ( ns February 9, 1737 ) – June 8, 1809 ) was an English-American राजनैतिक activist, author, political theorist and revolutionary.
as the author of दो अत्यधिक influential pamphlets at the start of the American Revolution, he inspired the Patriots in 1776 to घोषित independence from ब्रिटेन.
उसके ideas reflected आत्मज्ञान era बयानबाजी of transnational इंसान rights.
he रै been called `` a corsetmaker by trade, a journalist by व्यवसायिक, और a propagandist by inclination. ''
born in Thetford, England, in the काउंटी of Norfolk, paine emigrated to the British अमरीकी colonies in 1774 with the सहायता of Benjamin Franklin and he arrived in समय to participate in the अमरीकी क्रान्ति.
उसके principal contributions यहूद the powerful, widely read pamphlet आम भाव ( 1776 ), the all-time best-selling American book that advocated औपनिवेशिक America 's independence from the किंगडम of ग्रेट ब्रिटेन, and The अमरीकी Crisis ( 1776–83 ), a pro-revolutionary pamphlet श्रेणी.
आम Sense was so influential that जॉन Adams said, `` Without the pen of the author of Common भाव, the sword of Washington होता have been raised in vain.”
Paine जिया in France लिये most of the 1790s, बनने deeply शामिल in the फ्रेंच क्रान्ति.
He लिखा the अधिकारों of man ( 1791 ), in part a defence of the French Revolution विरूद्ध इसके critics.
His attacks on अंग्रेजों लेखक Edmund Burke led to a trial and conviction in absentia in 1792 लिये the crime of seditious मानहानि.
In 1792, despite not being समर्थ to speak फ्रेंच, he was elected to the French National Convention.
the girondists regarded उसे as an ally.
नतीजतन, the Montagnards, especially Robespierre, regarded him as an दुश्मन.
In December 1793, he थी arrested and imprisoned in पेरिस, then released in 1794.
he became बदनाम because of The Age of कारण ( 1793–94 ), his किताब that advocates deism, promotes reason और freethinking, and argues विरूद्ध institutionalized धर्म in general and Christian doctrine in particular.
He also wrote the pamphlet Agrarian Justice ( 1795 ), discussing the origins of property, and introduced the concept of a गारंटी minimum income.
In 1802, he लौटे to America where he died on June 8, 1809.
Only छह लोगों attended his funeral as he had been ostracized for उसके ridicule of Christianity.
नैदानिक ट्रायल हैं सेट of परीक्षण in चिकित्सा research और drug development कि generate safety और efficacy आंकड़ा ( or more specifically, information परिचय adverse drug प्रतिक्रियाएँ और adverse effects of other उपचार ) for स्वास्थ्य interventions ( e.g., drugs, diagnostics, डिवाइस, therapy protocols ).
वे are conducted only after संतोषजनक information has महरूम gathered on the quality of the non clinical सुरक्षा, and health authority/ethics कमेटी approval is granted in the country where स्वीकृति of the drug or यंत्र is sought.
previously, many emerging countries किया not require लोकल trials for product approvals.
अभी, though emerging देशों still accept data इससे u.s./europe, they also आवश्यकता some local ट्रायल.
Depending on the type of product और the stage of its विकास, जांचकर्ताओं initially enroll स्वयंसेवक and/or patients into small pilot अध्ययन, and subsequently conduct larger स्केल studies in मरीजों that प्रायः compare the नई उत्पाद with अन्य already approved for the affliction of ब्याज.
As positive safety और efficacy data are gathered, the number of patients is typically increased.
नैदानिक trials can vary in आकार, and can involve a single research entity in एक country or many ऐसे entities in multiple countries.
A full श्रेणी of trials may incur sizable लागत, और the burden of paying for all the जरुरी लोगों और सेवाएं is प्रायः borne by the sponsor, जिससे may be a सरकारी organization or a फार्मास्युटिकल, biotechnology or medical यंत्र company.
When the विविधता of जरूरी support भूमिकाएँ exceeds the संसाधन of the sponsor, a clinical विचारण is प्रबंधित by an outsourced partner, such as a अनुबंध research संगठन or a नैदानिक ट्रायल ईकाई in the academic सेक्टर.
The ग्रीन खाड़ी Packers are an American football team आधारित in Green Bay, Wisconsin.
They हैं सदस्यों of the North प्रभाग of the National Football सम्मेलन ( NFC ) in the National फ़ुटबॉल लीग ( NFL ).
Green Bay is the third-oldest मताधिकार in the NFL, having been व्यवस्थित and playing in 1919.
The पैकर्स are the only non-profit, community-owned प्रमुख लीग professional खेल team in the संयुक्त States.
the Packers are the last vestige of `` small town टीमों '' कि were एकबार आम in the NFL during the 1920s और 1930s.
Founded in 1919 by अर्ल `` Curly '' Lambeau ( hence the name Lambeau Field on which the team plays ) और George Whitney Calhoun, the Green Bay Packers can trace their lineage to अन्य semi-professional teams in ग्रीन Bay dating back to 1896.
In 1919 और 1920 the Packers competed as a semi-professional football team against clubs इससे around Wisconsin और the मिडवेस्ट.
वे joined the American Professional Football Association ( apfa ) in 1921, the forerunner to कया is known today as the नेशनल फ़ुटबॉल League ( एनएफएल ).
Although Green Bay is the पिछला NFL `` छोटी कस्बा '' टोली, इसके local प्रशंसक base और media extends into nearby Milwaukee ; the team भी निभाई चयनित घर games there between 1933 और 1994.
The ग्रीन खाड़ी Packers have won 13 league championships ( more than कोई अन्य टोली in the NFL ), सहित नौ NFL championships prior to the Super कटोरी era and चार Super Bowl victories —in 1967 ( सुपर Bowl I ), 1968 ( Super Bowl ii ), 1997 ( Super कटोरी xxxi ) and 2011 ( सुपर Bowl xlv ).
The Packers have long-standing, कड़वा rivalries with their NFC North ( formerly the NFC Central ) opponents, the Chicago bears, Minnesota Vikings और the डेट्रॉयट शेर.
The Bears-Packers rivalry is one of the oldest rivalries in NFL history, dating back to 1921.
Ethanol fuel is ethanol ( ethyl दारू ), the same type of दारू found in alcoholic beverages.
it is most often प्रयुक्त as a motor ईंधन, मुख्यतः as a biofuel योगात्मक for gasoline.
World ethanol उत्पादन for transport fuel tripled between 2000 and 2007 from 17 billion to more than 52 billion liters.
इससे 2007 to 2008, the share of ethanol in global गैसोलीन type ईंधन उपयोग increased इससे 3.7 % to 5.4 %.
in 2011 worldwide इथेनॉल fuel production पहुँचे 22.36 अरब U.S. द्रव gallons ( bg ) ( 84.6 अरब liters ), with the United States as the top producer with 13.9 bg ( 52.6 billion liters ), accounting for 62.2 % of global उत्पादन, followed by Brazil with 5.6 bg ( 21.1 billion liters ).
Ethanol ईंधन रै a `` gasoline गैलन equivalency `` ( gge ) value of, जिससे अर्थात् 1.5 गैलन of इथेनॉल उपज the energy of एक gallon of gasoline.
Ethanol fuel is widely used in ब्राज़ील और in the United राज्य, और together both देशों were जिम्मेदार for 87.1 % of the world 's इथेनॉल fuel उत्पादन in 2011.
Most गाड़ियाँ on the road आज in the U.S. can चलाएं on मिश्रणों of up to 10 % ethanol, और इथेनॉल represented 10 % of the u.S. गैसोलीन ईंधन सप्लाई derived इससे domestic sources in 2011.
चूंकि 1976 the ब्राज़ीलियाई government has made it mandatory to मिश्रण ethanol साथ gasoline, और चूंकि 2007 the legal मिश्रण is around 25 % इथेनॉल और 75 % gasoline ( E25 ).
By दिसम्बर 2011 Brazil था a fleet of 14.8 लाख flex-fuel ऑटोमोबाइल और light trucks और 1.5 million flex-fuel motorcycles कि regularly उपयोग neat इथेनॉल ईंधन ( known as E100 ).
Bioethanol is a रूप of बेदर्दी उर्जा कि can be produced इससे agricultural feedstocks.
It can be made from very common crops such as शुगर cane, आलू, manioc and corn.
There has been considerable debate परिचय कैसा useful bioethanol will be in replacing गैसोलीन.
चिंताएं about its उत्पादन and use relate to increased खाना prices due to the विशाल राशि of arable land required for फसलों, as well as the energy and pollution संतुलन of the whole cycle of इथेनॉल production, especially from मकई.
Recent developments with cellulosic इथेनॉल उत्पादन and commercialization may allay कुछ of these concerns.
Cellulosic ethanol offers promise because cellulose मछली, a प्रमुख and universal component in plant cells दीवारें, can be used to उपज ethanol.
According to the अंतरराष्ट्रीय Energy Agency, cellulosic ethanol could allow इथेनॉल fuels to खेल a much बडे role in the भविष्य than previously विचार.

the second E85 flexifuel मॉडल introduced by Saab in the Swedish मार्केट.
A plaque commemorating the location of the Sarajevo assassination और steps of Gavrilo Princip ( image लिया in 1987, before steps were removed in 1992 और plaque changed from Cyrillic to लैटिन स्क्रिप्ट )
A प्लैक commemorating the location of the साराजेवो हत्या ( image taken in 2009 )
On 28 June 1914, archduke फ्रांज फर्डिनेंड of Austria, वारिस presumptive to the Austro-Hungarian throne, and उसके बीवी, Sophie, Duchess of Hohenberg, were shot dead in Sarajevo, by gavrilo Princip, one of a group of छह Bosnian Serb हत्यारे coordinated by Danilo ilić.
the political objective of the assassination was to break off Austria-Hungary 's south-Slav provinces so they could be combined into a वृहद सर्बिया or a Yugoslavia.
the हत्यारे ' motives were consistent with the गति कि बाद became ज्ञात as Young बोस्निया.
Serbian military officers stood पीछे the attack.
At the top of these Serbian military षड्यंत्रकारियों was Chief of सर्बियाई Military प्रज्ञा Dragutin dimitrijević, उसके righthand man Major Vojislav Tankosić, और masterspy rade Malobabić.
Major tankosić armed the assassins with bombs and pistols और trained them.
The हत्यारे were given access to the same clandestine tunnel of safe-houses and एजेंटों that Rade Malobabić प्रयुक्त for the infiltration of weapons and operatives into Austria-Hungary.
The assassins, the कुंजी members of the clandestine टनल, and the कुंजी सर्बियाई military conspirators who यहूद स्टिल alive यहूद arrested, आजमाया, convicted and punished.
Those who यहूद arrested in बोस्निया were tried in Sarajevo in October 1914.
the other षड्यंत्रकारियों were गिरफ्तार and tried पहले a सर्बियाई kangaroo court on the french-controlled Salonika Front in 1916–1917 on unrelated false charges ; Serbia चलाया तीन of the top सैन्य conspirators.
much of कया is known परिचय the assassinations comes from ये two trials और related records.
Assignment of responsibility for the bombing और हत्याएं of 28 June is highly विवादास्पद because the attack led to the outbreak of World War I एक month later.
Renée Kathleen Zellweger ( born April 25, 1969 ) is an अमरीकी actress and निर्माता.
Zellweger first gained फैली attention for उसके role in the film Jerry Maguire ( 1996 ), and subsequently received दो nominations for the अकादमी Award लिये Best Actress for her भूमिकाएँ as Bridget जोन्स in the कॉमेडी Bridget Jones 's Diary ( 2001 ), और as Roxie Hart in the musical शिकागो ( 2002 ).
She won the अकादमी Award लिये Best Supporting अभिनेत्री for उसके performance in the नाटक Cold पहाड़ ( 2003 ).
वो has won an Academy Award, तीन Golden Globe Awards, तीन Screen Actors Guild पुरस्कार, और a bafta पुरस्कार ; was नामित Hasty Pudding 's Woman of the Year in 2009 ; and established herself as एक of the highest-paid Hollywood अभिनेत्रियों as of 2007.
The ossicles ( also called auditory ossicles ) are the three smallest bones in the इंसान देह, the malleus, the incus और the stapes.
They हैं contained within the मध्य कान space और serve to transmit sounds from the air to the fluid-filled labyrinth ( cochlea ).
the absence of the auditory ossicles होता constitute a moderate-to-severe सुनना loss.
the पद `` ossicles '' literally अर्थात् `` छोटा bones '' and commonly refers to the auditory ossicles, हालांकि the पद may refer to any small bone throughout the body.
The नई Covenant ( Hebrew • • — Greek • • diatheke kaine ) is a biblical interpretation originally derived from a phrase in the किताब of यिर्मयाह, in the Hebrew Scriptures.
It is often thought of as an eschatological मुक्तिदाता आयु or world to आइये and is related to the biblical concept of the Kingdom of God.
generally, ईसाइयों believe कि the New Covenant थी instituted at the Last Supper as भाग of the Eucharist, which in the इन्जील of जॉन includes the New Commandment.
There are several Christian eschatologies कि further define the New वचन, as an उदाहरण an उदघाटन eschatology defines and describes the नई Covenant as an जारी relationship between Christian ईमानवालों और God that will be in full fruition after the Second Coming of मसीह ; कि is, it will नहीं only be in full fruition in believing hearts, but in the भविष्य external world as well.
The connection between the Blood of मसीह and the नई Covenant is seen in सबसे modern English translations of the नई Testament with the saying : `` this कप कि is poured आउट लिये you is the new वचन in my blood ''.
Christians believe that Jesus is the mediator of the New वचन, and that the रक्त of Christ shed at उसके crucifixion is the जरूरी blood of the वचन.
As साथ all covenants between God और man described in the Bible, the New वचन is माना `` a बंध in blood sovereignly administered by परमेश्वर. ''
it रै महरूम theorized that the New Covenant is the विधि of Christ as बोला दौरान his उपदेश on the माउंट.
The following List of people pardoned or granted दया by the अध्यक्ष of the United States documents the सबसे prominent cases of प्रत्येक प्रेसिडेंसी.
as granted by the संविधान ( Article II, Section 2, clause 1 ), Presidents have the power to grant clemency in one or more of the following तरीके : the ability to grant a पूरा pardon, to भ्रमण a sentence, or to तोड़ना a fine.
U.S. राष्ट्रपतियों have no power to ग्रान्ट clemency लिये अपराधों prosecuted under state law.
As to the difference between a pardon and a commutation:
a pardon is an कार्यपालिका order vacating a conviction.
A commutation is the शमन of the sentence of someone currently serving a वाक्य for a crime pursuant to a conviction, बगैर vacating the conviction itself.
लगभग 20,000 pardons and clemencies were issued by U.S. presidents in the 20th सदी अलोन.
The records of अधिनियमों of दया यहूद public जबतक 1934.
In 1981 the दफ्तर of the Pardon Attorney was created and records इससे अध्यक्ष H. W. Bush forward हैं अभी सूचीबद्ध.
This सूची शामिल pardons and commutations.
tampa ( ) is a city in the U.S. राज्य of Florida.
it serves as the county seat for Hillsborough County और is स्तिथ on the west coast of फ्लोरिडा, on Tampa Bay निकट the गल्फ of Mexico.
the जनसांख्यिकी of tampa in 2011 was 346,037.
The current location of Tampa थी once inhabited by indigenous peoples of the Safety Harbor culture, most notably the tocobaga और the pohoy, जो lived along the shores of tampa Bay.
it थी briefly छान by स्पेनी explorers in the early 16th century, but there यहूद no permanent अमरीकी or यूरोपीय settlements within आज 's city limits until बाद the संयुक्त राज्य had acquired फ्लोरिडा from Spain in 1819.
In 1824, the संयुक्त राज्य Army established a frontier outpost called फोर्ट ब्रुक at the mouth of the Hillsborough River, निकट the site of today 's Tampa Convention Center.
The पहला civilian residents were pioneers जो settled near the फोर्ट लिये protection इससे the आसपास seminole जनसांख्यिकी.
the town grew slowly जबतक the 1880s, when railroad links, the डिस्कवरी of phosphate, and the arrival of the cigar industry jump-started Tampa 's development and helped it to grow into an important city by the early 1900s.
Today, Tampa is a भाग of the metropolitan क्षेत्रफल सबसे commonly referred to as the tampa Bay Area.
For U.S. Census purposes, Tampa is भाग of the Tampa-St. Petersburg-Clearwater, Florida Metropolitan Statistical Area.
The four-county क्षेत्रफल is रचित of roughly 2.7 लाख निवासियों, बनाना it the second largest महानगर सांख्यिकीय area ( MSA ) in the राज्य, and the चौथी largest in the southeastern संयुक्त States, पीछे Miami, वॉशिंगटन, d.C., and Atlanta.
The वृहद Tampa खाड़ी क्षेत्रफल रै just over 4 million residents and generally includes the tampa and Sarasota मैट्रो areas.
the tampa Bay Partnership and u.S. Census आंकड़ा showed an औसत सालाना growth of 2.47 percent, or a gain of approximately 97,000 residents per year.
Between 2000 and 2006, the Greater Tampa खाड़ी Market अनुभवी a संयुक्त growth rate of 14.8 percent, growing from 3.4 लाख to 3.9 लाख and hitting the 4 लाख लोगों mark on April 1, 2007.
A 2012 estimate shows the tampa Bay area population to have 4,310,524 लोगों and a 2017 प्रक्षेप of 4,536,854 people.
tampa रै a number of खेल टीमों, ऐसे as the Tampa Bay buccaneers of the National Football League, the Tampa Bay Lightning of the National Hockey League, और the Tampa Bay तूफ़ान of the एरिना फ़ुटबॉल League.
the tampa खाड़ी Rays in प्रमुख League बेसबॉल and the Tampa खाड़ी Rowdies of the North American Soccer लीग play their home खेल in neighboring St. Petersburg, Florida.
in 2008, tampa थी ranked as the 5th best बाहरी नगर by Forbes.
A 2004 सर्वेक्षण by the NYU newspaper वॉशिंगटन वर्गाकार News क्रमित Tampa as a top city for `` twenty-somethings. ''
Tampa is अभी ranked as a `` गामा '' संसार नगर by Loughborough University.
According to Loughborough, Tampa ranks alongside other world cities such as Phoenix, Santo डोमिंगो, and ओसाका.
in recent years Tampa has seen a notable upsurge in high-market माँग इससे उपभोक्ता, signaling more wealth concentrated in the area.
Tampa hosted the 2012 रिपब्लिकन नेशनल सम्मेलन.
the Chevrolet cavalier थी a compact ऑटोमोबाइल produced इससे 1982 to 2005 by General Motors.
Built on the कम्पनी 's J मंच, the cavalier produced the highest sales in 1984.
at & T Mobility llc branded and referred to as AT & t ( formerly Cingular बेतार LLC ), is a wholly स्वामित्व subsidiary of at & t Inc. that provides wireless services to 107 लाख subscribers in the United States, including Puerto रीको and the U.S. Virgin आइलैंड्स.
AT & T गतिशीलता is the दूसरी largest बेतार telecommunications provider in the संयुक्त States और प्यूर्टो Rico, behind Verizon Wireless, which serves 115.78 million customers as of the चौथी क्वार्टर of 2012.
at & T Mobility is headquartered in the Lenox पार्क area of DeKalb co. जॉर्जिया, just outside Atlanta.
Originally Cingular Wireless llc from 2000 to 2007, a joint venture between sbc संचार and BellSouth, the company acquired the बूढ़ा AT & t Wireless in 2004 ; sbc बाद acquired the original AT & t and re-branded as `` AT & T ''.
Cingular became wholly स्वामित्व by AT & t in दिसम्बर 2006 as a result of at & T 's अधिग्रहण of bellsouth.
in January 2007, cingular confirmed it would re-brand itself अंतर्गत the AT & T name.
हालांकि the legal corporate नाम change occurred immediately, for दोनो नियामक और brand-awareness reasons both ब्रांड्स were प्रयुक्त in the कम्पनी 's signage और विज्ञापन दौरान a परिवर्तन period.
The परिवर्तन concluded in late June, just prior to the rollout of the Apple iPhone.
on March 20, 2011, AT & T गतिशीलता घोषित its intention to acquire t-mobile यूएसए इससे Deutsche Telekom लिये $ 39 अरब.
If it था received government और नियामक approval, AT & T would have था more than 130 million subscribers.
However, the U.S. Department of इंसाफ, the संघीय Communications Commission, and at & t Mobility 's competitors ( ऐसे as Sprint Nextel ) opposed the मूव on the grounds that it होता reduce प्रतियोगिता in the cellular संचार market.
In December 2011, in the फेस of both governmental and फैली consumer विपक्ष, AT & T withdrew their प्रस्ताव to पूरा the विलय.
मार्टिन लूथर किंग, jr. ( January 15, 1929 – अप्रैल 4, 1968 ) थी an अमरीकी clergyman, activist, और leader in the African-American Civil Rights Movement.
He is बेहतरीन known लिये his role in the उन्नति of सिविल rights using nonviolent civil disobedience.
King रै become a national icon in the history of अमरीकी प्रगतिवाद.
A बैपटिस्ट minister, किंग became a civil rights activist जल्दी in his career.
He led the 1955 मोंटगोमरी Bus Boycott and helped found the Southern ईसाई Leadership सम्मेलन ( SCLC ) in 1957, सेवारत as इसके पहला अध्यक्ष.
With the SCLC, किंग led an unsuccessful संघर्ष against पृथक्करण in Albany, जॉर्जिया, in 1962, और organized nonviolent विरोध in Birmingham, अलबामा, that आकर्षित national ध्यान following television न्यूज कवरेज of the क्रूर police response.
King also helped to organize the 1963 March on वॉशिंगटन, जहाँ he delivered उसके `` I have a सपना `` वाक.
There, he established his reputation as एक of the greatest orators in American इतिहास.
He also established उसके reputation as a radical, और became an ऑब्जेक्ट of the Federal Bureau of Investigation 's COINTELPRO for the rest of उसके life.
FBI एजेंटों investigated उसे for possible कम्युनिस्ट ties, recorded his extramarital liaisons और reported on उन्हें to government officials, और on एक अवसर, mailed King a threatening बेनाम letter that he interpreted as an attempt to make उसे कमिट आत्महत्या.
On October 14, 1964, King received the नोबेल सलाम Prize लिये combating जातिगत inequality through nonviolence.
in 1965, he and the SCLC helped to व्यवस्थित the Selma to मोंटगोमरी marches और the following year, he took the गति उत्तर to Chicago.
In the फाइनल सालो of उसके जीवन, King expanded his फ़ोकस to include poverty और the Vietnam युद्ध, alienating अनेक of his liberal allies with a 1967 speech titled `` Beyond Vietnam ''.
King थी नियोजन a national occupation of वॉशिंगटन, D.C., पुकारा the Poor लोगों 's Campaign.
King was assassinated on April 4, 1968, in मेम्फिस, Tennessee.
उसके death was followed by दंगे in many U.S. cities.
Allegations that जेम्स Earl रे, the man convicted of हत्या किंग, था been framed or acted in concert with government agents persisted लिये दशकों after the shooting, और the जूरी of a 1999 civil विचारण found loyd Jowers to be complicit in a conspiracy against किंग.
King थी awarded the Presidential Medal of स्वतंत्रता and the Congressional Gold पदक मरणोपरांत.
Martin लूथर King, jr. Day was established as a U.S. संघीय अवकाश in 1986.
Hundreds of streets in the U.S. have been renamed in his honor.
A memorial प्रतिमा on the नेशनल Mall थी खोली to the public in 2011.
the बाघ ( Panthera tigris ) is the largest बिल्ली species, reaching a total body length of up to और weighing up to.
it is the तीसरा largest land carnivore ( behind only the polar भालू और the भूरा bear ).
इसके सबसे recognizable विशेषता is a pattern of अंधेरा vertical stripes on reddish-orange fur with a हल्का underside.
it has exceptionally stout दांत, and the canines हैं the longest among living felids with a क्राउन ऊँचाई of as much as or even.
in zoos, tigers have lived for 20 to 26 years, which भी seems to be उनके longevity in the wild.
They हैं territorial and generally solitary but social पशु, often requiring large contiguous areas of habitat that support their prey आवश्यकताएँ.
This, coupled साथ the फैक्ट that वे हैं स्वदेशी to some of the अधिक densely populated places on Earth, has caused significant conflicts साथ इंसानो.
Tigers एकबार ranged widely across Asia, from Turkey in the वेस्ट to the पूर्वी coast of Russia.
Over the पास्ट 100 years, they have lost 93 % of their historic range, और have been extirpated from दक्षिणपश्चिम and सेंट्रल एशिया, from the आइलैंड्स of Java और bali, and from विशाल areas of southeast और पूर्वी Asia.
Today, वे दायरा from the siberian ताइगा to खोलें grasslands and tropical mangrove swamps.
The बाकी six बाघ subspecies have महरूम classified as endangered by IUCN.
The वैश्विक population in the जंगली is estimated to number between 3,062 and 3,948 individuals, down इससे around 100,000 at the start of the 20th century, with सबसे remaining populations occurring in small pockets isolated from each अन्य.
Major reasons for जनसांख्यिकी decline include habitat destruction, habitat fragmentation and poaching.
The extent of क्षेत्रफल occupied by टाइगर्स is estimated at less than, a 41 % decline इससे the क्षेत्रफल estimated in the mid-1990s.
टाइगर्स हैं among the most recognisable and लोकप्रिय of the संसार 's charismatic महाप्राणी.
They have प्रदर्शित prominently in प्राचीन mythology and folklore, and continue to be depicted in आधुनिक films and literature.
Tigers appear on many flags, coats of arms, and as mascots लिये sporting टीमों.
the Bengal tiger is the national एनिमल of both इण्डिया and Bangladesh.
the सरलीकृत आतंरिक structure of a हरितलवक
अवलोकन of the Calvin cycle और carbon fixation
The light-independent प्रतिक्रियाएँ of photosynthesis are रासायनिक reactions कि बदलें carbon dioxide and other compounds into glucose.
These reactions occur in the stroma, the fluid-filled area of a chloroplast outside of the thylakoid membranes.
ये प्रतिक्रियाएँ take the light-dependent reactions और perform further chemical प्रक्रियाओं on them.
There are three phases to the light-independent reactions, collectively called the Calvin साईकिल : carbon fixation, reduction reactions, and ribulose 1,5-bisphosphate ( RuBP ) regeneration.
despite इसके name, इस process occurs only जब light is available.
पौधे do not carry out the Calvin cycle by night.
They, instead, release sucrose into the phloem from उनके starch reserves.
इस process happens when light is available independent of the kind of photosynthesis ( C3 carbon fixation, c4 carbon fixation, और crassulacean Acid चयापचय ) ; CAM पौधे स्टोर malic acid in their vacuoles every रात्रि और release it by day in अनुक्रम to make this प्रक्रम work.

Linen ( ) is a textile made इससे the fibers of the flax plant, Linum usitatissimum.
Linen is labor-intensive to manufacture, लकिन जब it is बना into garments, it is valued for its असाधारण शीतलता and ताजगी in hot weather.
the शब्द `` linen '' is of West Germanic origin and cognates साथ the Latin नाम for the flax संयंत्र linum, and the पहले यूनानी λινόν ( linon ).
इस word history has दिए rise to a क्रमांक of other शर्तें in English, the most notable of जिससे is the अंग्रेज़ी word लकीर, निकला from the use of a linen ( flax ) thread to determine a सीधा लकीर.
वस्त्र in a लिनेन weave बनावट, भी when बना of cotton, hemp and अन्य non-flax fibers are also loosely referred to as `` लिनेन ''.
ऐसे fabrics generally have their own specific names अन्य than linen ; लिये example, fine cotton धागे in a linen-style बुनते is पुकारा Madapolam.
the collective term `` linens `` is still प्रायः used generically to describe a class of woven and भी knitted bed, bath, table और रसोईघर वस्त्र.
The name linens is retained because traditionally, linen थी used लिये many of ये items.
In the past, the शब्द `` linens '' थी also used to mean lightweight undergarments such as शर्ट, chemises, waistshirts, lingerie ( a शब्द भी cognate with लिनेन ), और detachable shirt छल्लों and cuffs, which were historically made almost exclusively out of linen.
The inside cloth layer of fine कम्पोजिट कपडे garments ( as लिये उदाहरण jackets ) was traditionally बना of लिनेन, और इस is the उत्पत्ति of the word अस्तर.
Linen textiles appear to be some of the oldest in the संसार : their इतिहास goes वापस many thousands of years.
fragments of straw, seeds, fibers, yarns, और various types of fabrics जिससे date back to परिचय 8000 BC have महरूम found in स्विस lake dwellings.
dyed flax fibers found in a प्रागैतिहासिक cave in Georgia सुझाएँ the उपयोग of woven linen fabrics from wild flax may date वापस even पहले to 36,000 BP.
Linen was sometimes प्रयुक्त as करेंसी in ancient Egypt.
मिश्र mummies यहूद लपेटा in linen क्युकी it was seen as a symbol of light और पवित्रता, और as a display of माल.
Some of these fabrics, woven from हाथ spun yarns, यहूद बहुत ठीक for उनके दिन, लकिन are coarse compared to modern linen.
Today, लिनेन is प्रायः an expensive textile, and is उत्पादित in अपेक्षाकृत छोटी quantities.
It रै a long `` स्टेपल '' ( individual fiber लंबाई ) relative to cotton and other प्राकृतिक मछली.
अनेक products are made of लिनेन : aprons, bags, तौलिये ( swimmers, bath, बीच, body और धो towels ), napkins, bed linens, linen चौके, धावक, कुर्सी कवर, and मेन 's & women 's wear.
The FIFA World कप, प्रायः बस the World Cup, is an international संघ football competition contested by the senior men 's नेशनल teams of the सदस्यों of fédération Internationale de फ़ुटबॉल संघ ( फीफा ), the sport 's global शासी body.
The चैंपियनशिप has महरूम awarded every four years चूंकि the inaugural tournament in 1930, except in 1942 and 1946 जब it was not आयोजित because of the दूसरी World युद्ध.
The current champions are Spain, who won the 2010 टूर्नामेंट.
The current स्वरूप of the टूर्नामेंट involves 32 teams स्पर्धा for the title at venues भीतर the host nation ( s ) over a period of about a माह ; इस phase is प्रायः पुकारा the World Cup Finals.
a योग्यता phase, which currently takes प्लेस over the preceding तीन सालो, is used to determine जिससे teams qualify for the tournament साथ with the मेजबान nation ( s ).
the 19 संसार कप tournaments have been won by eight अलग national teams.
ब्राज़ील have won पाँच times, और they हैं the तभी team to have played in every टूर्नामेंट.
The other World Cup winners हैं इटली, with चार titles ; Germany, with three शीर्षक ; Argentina and inaugural winners उरुग्वे, with two शीर्षक प्रत्येक ; और England, France, and स्पेन, साथ one शीर्षक each.
the World कप is the संसार 's most widely viewed sporting event ; an estimated 715.1 million people watched the final मैच of the 2006 FIFA संसार Cup held in Germany.
The अगला तीन World cups होगा be hosted by ब्राज़ील in 2014, रूस in 2018, और क़तर in 2022.

According to Nintendo, the सेंसर in the यंत्र supplements the accelerometer और Sensor बार capabilities of the वी Remote to enable actions to be rendered identically on the स्क्रीन in real time.
The Wii 's successor console, the Wii U, supports the वी MotionPlus and its peripherals in खेल जहाँ उपयोग of इसके touchscreen-built-in प्राथमिक नियंत्रक is नहीं जरुरी.
Majulah Singapura ( onward Singapore ) is the नेशनल anthem of Singapore.
रचित by zubir Said in 1958 as a theme song for आधिकारिक कृत्यों of the City Council of Singapore, the सोंग थी selected in 1959 as the island 's गान जब it attained self-government.
Upon पूरा independence in 1965, Majulah Singapura थी formally adopted as Singapore 's नेशनल anthem.
by विधि the गान may तभी be सुंग साथ इसके original मलय lyrics, although there exist authorized अनुवाद of the गीत of the anthem in Singapore 's three other आधिकारिक languages : अंग्रेज़ी, Mandarin and तमिल.
originally रचित in the key of G major, in 2001 the national गान थी officially relaunched in the lower कुंजी of f major as this was said to allow for a `` grander and more प्रेरणादायी arrangement ''.
the national anthem is regularly performed or sung in स्कूलों and हथियारबंद forces शिविरों at ceremonies held at the beginning and/or the end of each day, दौरान which the नेशनल flag is also raised and lowered and the नेशनल pledge is taken.
Singaporeans are especially encouraged to sing the national गान on अवसरों of national celebration or national significance ऐसे as at the National Day परेड, at National Day observance ceremonies conducted by शैक्षणिक institutions and सरकारी विभाग, और at sporting events at which Singapore teams हैं participating.

Shipbuilding is the निर्माण of जहाजों and फ्लोटिंग बरतन.
it सामान्यतः takes प्लेस in a specialized facility ज्ञात as a shipyard.
shipbuilders, also called shipwrights, follow a specialized occupation कि traces its जड़ें to before recorded history.
Shipbuilding and ship मरम्मत, both वाणिज्यिक and military, हैं referred to as `` naval engineering ''.
The निर्माण of boats is a similar कार्यकलाप पुकारा boat building.
The dismantling of जहाजों is पुकारा ship तोड़कर.

The following is a list of the most populous incorporated स्थान of the संयुक्त राज्य of America.
As defined by the United राज्य जनसांख्यिकी ब्यूरो, an `` incorporated place `` includes a variety of designations, including नगर, कस्बा, village, बरो, और नगरपालिका.
A few असाधारण Census designated Places ( CDPs ) are भी शामिल in the जनसांख्यिकी Bureau 's लिस्टिंग of incorporated places.
संचित city-counties represent a पृथक type of government that शामिल the entire population of a काउंटी, or county समतुल्य.
Some consolidated city-counties, however, शामिल multiple incorporated स्थान.
This सूची presents only that portion ( or `` balance '' ) of ऐसे consolidated city-counties कि हैं not a part of another incorporated प्लेस.
Note कि this सूची refers only to the जनसांख्यिकी of व्यक्तिगत municipalities भीतर their defined हद, जिससे does not include other municipalities or unincorporated suburban areas within शहरी agglomerations.
A अलग ranking is evident जब considering u.S. महानगर क्षेत्रफल populations.
alt=larger flashcart, दिखाया साथ small card और u.S. quarter लिये size
Nintendo DS भंडार devices are devices प्रयुक्त to store a licensed डेवलपर 's work-in-progress images, homebrew वीडियो games and डाउनलोड commercial games ( since the निन्टेंडो DS is नहीं बेची साथ a rewritable storage medium ).
Licensed डेवलपर, however, can use a blue Intelligent Systems Nitro Emulator box to फ्लैश cards.
These devices हैं also known as `` flashcarts '' or `` flashcards ''.
There are two main वर्ग of flashcarts : पुरानी devices जिससे fit in Slot-2 ( the खेल Boy Advance खेल Pak स्लॉट ) and नए डिवाइस that fit in Slot-1 ( the DS Game Card slot ).
Slot-2 ( or first-generation ) devices have been historically cheaper due to economies of स्केल ( inherited from their उपयोग साथ खेल लड़के Advance ), लकिन require a booting tool in slot-1 in order to उपयोग the touch screen और other DS सुविधाएँ.
second-generation devices ( those which तभी use slot-1 ) do नहीं work with GBA homebrew, but became कम expensive and easier to use, rivaling अनेक Slot-2 डिवाइस in price.
First-generation devices शामिल GBA फ्लैश cartridges, GBAMP cf, supercard, and M3.
Second-generation devices शामिल r4 क्रान्ति, cyclods, G6 Real and DS-X.
the भंडार device either contains फ्लैश memory or a slot for a मेमोरी card to स्टोर homebrew.
भंडार devices with a memory-card slot usually have अधिक storage capacity than flash-memory devices.
हालांकि flash-memory capacity is usually measured in megabits ( mb ), memory-card क्षमता is प्रायः measured in megabytes ( mb ) ( where 8 mb is 1 MB ).
Storage-device brands differ in उनके support for homebrew ; DS और खेल लड़के Advance roms ; special features ( such as ability to play media files ) ; physical size और लागत.
सख्ती speaking, a भंडार device is not necessary लिये ds with FlashMe installed because homebrew can be sent to the ds using wmb.
however, इस is नहीं an easily-portable method क्युकी the ds needs to be भीतर range of a उपयुक्त Wi-Fi card.
हैं अमरीकी people of जापानी विरासत.
Japanese Americans have historically been among the तीन largest Asian American समुदायों, but in हाल decades, it has become the छठे largest समूह at roughly 1,304,286, including those of mixed-race or mixed-ethnicity.
In the 2010 जनसांख्यिकी, the largest Japanese American समुदायों were found in कैलिफ़ोर्निया साथ 272,528, Hawaii with 185,502, नई यॉर्क साथ 37,780, Washington with 35,008, और Illinois with 17,542.
दक्षिणी California has the largest japanese-american जनसांख्यिकी in North अमेरिका.

This list spans from the समस्या दिनाँक January 1, 1955 to present.
The Billboard Hot 100 began साथ the issue dated August 4, 1958, and is फिलहाल the standard लोकप्रिय music चार्ट in the संयुक्त राज्य.
prior to the creation of the Hot 100, बिलबोर्ड published चार singles charts : `` Best Sellers in स्टोर्स '', `` Most Played by Jockeys '', `` Most निभाई in Jukeboxes '' and `` The Top 100 ''.
ये charts, जिससे ranged इससे 20 to 100 slots, यहूद phased out at different times between 1957 and 1958.
Though technically not भाग of the Hot 100 chart history, उनके data is included for कम्प्यूटेशनल उद्देश्य, and to avoid unenlightening or भ्रामक characterizations.
All items सूचीबद्ध नीचे are from the hot 100 era, unless वरना विख्यात ( pre-hot 100 charts ).

a remake of the 1983 miniseries created by केनेथ Johnson, the नई श्रेणी chronicles the arrival on Earth of a technologically advanced एलियन species जिससे ostensibly आता in सलाम, लकिन actually रै sinister motives.
v stars मुरैना Baccarin, Lourdes benedicto, Morris शाहबलूत, Joel Gretsch, Logan huffman, चार्ल्स mesure, Elizabeth Mitchell, Laura Vandervoort and Scott Wolf, and was executive उत्पादित by स्कॉट rosenbaum, Yves simoneau, स्कॉट पीटर्स, और Jace हॉल.

geocaching is an outdoor recreational activity, in which the participants use a वैश्विक Positioning System ( GPS ) receiver or मोबाईल device और other navigational techniques to hide and तलाश containers, called `` geocaches '' or `` caches '', anywhere in the world.
A ठेठ cache is a small waterproof container containing a logbook जहाँ the geocacher enters the date they found it and लक्षण it with their स्थापित कोड name.
After हस्ताक्षर into the log, the संचय जरूर be placed back exactly जहाँ the person found it.
Larger containers ऐसे as प्लास्टिक storage containers ( Tupperware or समान ) or ammunition boxes can also contain items लिये trading, usually खिलौने or trinkets of छोटी मान.
geocaching साझा अनेक पहलुओं with benchmarking, trigpointing, orienteering, treasure-hunting, letterboxing, and waymarking.

the समूह pioneered the fusion of dancehall reggae और हिप hop music और their डेब्यू lp Criminal minded contained फ़्रैंक descriptions of जीवन in the दक्षिण Bronx of the लेट 1980s यूँ setting the stage for what होता eventually become gangsta रैप.
a municipal bond is a bond issued by a लोकल government, or उनके agencies.
Potential issuers of municipal bonds शामिल states, cities, counties, redevelopment एजेंसियों, special-purpose जिले, school districts, पब्लिक utility जिले, सरेआम स्वामित्व airports and seaports, and कोई other सरकारी entity ( or group of सरकारें ) at or नीचे the state level.
Municipal bonds may be सामान्य दायित्वों of the issuer or secured by specified revenues.
in the संयुक्त States, ब्याज आय received by holders of municipal bonds is often exempt from the federal income tax और from the आय tax of the state in जिससे they हैं जारी, although municipal bonds issued for निश्चित उद्देश्य may not be tax exempt.
नापसंद new समस्या stocks कि are brought to मार्केट with दाम restrictions until the deal is sold, municipal bonds हैं free to trade at any समय once वे are purchased by the investor.
पेशेवर traders regularly trade और retrade the same bonds several times a सप्ताह.
`` Gim me कुछ lovin ' '' is a सोंग written by Steve winwood, Spencer Davis and muff winwood, and originally performed by the Spencer डेविस समूह.
the मौलिक riff of the song was उधार from the Homer बैंको song `` ( Ai n't कि ) A Lot of Love '', written by Banks and Willie डीन `` Deanie '' Parker.
`` gim me कुछ Lovin ' '' was a UK # 2 in the पतझड़ of 1966 और a US # 7.

the Internet Movie Database ( IMDb ) is an online डेटाबेस of information related to films, टेलीविज़न programs, and वीडियो खेल.
This includes actors, production crew कर्मियों, and fictional characters featured in these तीन विज़ुअल entertainment media.
It is one of the most लोकप्रिय online entertainment गंतव्यों, with over 100 लाख unique users each month और a solid and rapidly growing mobile उपस्थिति.
IMDb थी launched on October 17, 1990, और in 1998 थी acquired by amazon.com.
As of अप्रैल 27, 2013, आईएमडीबी had 2,503,783 titles ( includes एपीसोड ) और 5,192,493 personalities in इसके डेटाबेस, as well as 43 लाख पंजीकृत उपयोक्ता.
The website has an Alexa rank of 48.
Fibre Channel मेजबान Bus एडाप्टर ( 64-bit pci-x कार्ड )
SCSI Host Bus Adapter ( 16-bit ISA कार्ड )
in कंप्यूटर हार्डवेयर, a host नियंत्रक, host एडाप्टर, or मेजबान बस adapter ( HBA ) connects a host system ( the computer ) to अन्य संजाल and storage devices.
the terms हैं primarily used to refer to devices for connecting SCSI, Fibre चैनल and eSATA devices.
however, डिवाइस लिये connecting to आईडीई, Ethernet, FireWire, USB and अन्य systems may also be पुकारा host adapters.
recently, the advent of iSCSI and fibre चैनल over Ethernet रै brought about Ethernet HBAs, which हैं अलग इससे Ethernet nics in कि वे include TCP offload Engines.
वहीँ are भी converged HBAs कि support both Ethernet and Fibre Channel called Converged Network Adapters ( CNAs ).
Cashmere Scarves
आधुनिक men 's cashmere sweaters for बिक्री.
Cashmere wool, usually बस known as cashmere, is a fiber obtained from Cashmere goats और अन्य प्रकार of goat.
the word cashmere गर्भाशयी इससे an old स्पेलिंग of काश्मीर.
Cashmere is fine in texture, दमदार, light, and soft.
garments made from it provide excellent इन्सुलेशन.
in the United राज्य, under the u.s. Wool Products labeling अधिनियम of 1939, as amended, ( 15 uction 68b ( a ) ( 6 ) ), राज्य that a wool or वस्त्र product may not be labeled as containing cashmere unless:
such ऊन product is the ठीक ( dehaired ) undercoat fibers produced by a cashmere बकरी ( Capra hircus laniger ) ;
the average व्यास of the fiber of such wool product does नहीं exceed 19 microns ; और
such wool product does नहीं contain अधिक than 3 percent ( by weight ) of cashmere fibers with average diameters that exceed 30 microns.
the average रेशा व्यास may be subject to a गुणांक of variation around the mean कि shall नहीं exceed 24 percent.
Jennifer convertibles inc. is the मालिक and licensor of sofabed and leather specialty retail स्टोर्स in the संयुक्त States, साथ stores स्तिथ throughout the Eastern seaboard, in the मिडवेस्ट, on the वेस्ट Coast और in the Southwest.
the कम्पनी was founded in 1975 and is आधारित in woodbury, New York.
On July 19, 2010, the company announced that it had दायर for bankruptcy as a consequence of `` substantial losses ''.

It subsequently उभरा इससे अध्याय 11 under the control of its प्रमुख प्रदायक, the Haining Mengnu Group.
अंडा फेंकें is a term used for अनेक अलग भोजन around the world.
2__Egg_roll __ किस्में of egg rolls are found in मेनलैंड China, many Chinese-speaking regions of Asia, and Chinese immigrant समुदायों around the world.
अंडा रोल्स as referred to in China.
In Guangdong और Hong Kong, अंडा roll usually refers to बिस्किट फेंकें.
इस is a type of बिस्किट.
The संघटक शामिल egg, flour और sugar.
अंडा फेंकें भी is a डिश in Canton and Hong Kong, this is प्रायः made साथ सब्ज़ी.
भीतर चीन egg rolls are eaten predominantly in the southeast and हैं not as commonly consumed in the उत्तर और पश्चिमी parts of China.
In अमरीकी चाइनीज cuisine, an egg roll is a savory डिश typically परोसा as an क्षुधावर्धक.
It is प्रायः stuffed with chicken, पोर्क or झींगा, cabbage, गाजर, टमाटर, bean sprouts and other सब्जियां, और तब deep fried.
This variety of the egg roll is very आम and लोकप्रिय, across even regional किस्में of American चाइनीज food, और is often included as part of a `` combination platter ''.
In Montreal, कनाडा, open-ended eggrolls are a Jewish-Chinese fusion dish.
वे can be either कोषेर certified or merely कोषेर style.
Pain and suffering is the legal term for the physical और emotional stress caused इससे an चोट ( देखिए also pain और कष्ट ).
Some damages that might be अंतर्गत इस category होता be : aches, temporary and स्थाई limitations on activity, potential shortening of जीवन, depression or scarring.
जब दाखिल a lawsuit as a परिणाम of an injury, it is common for someone to seek धन both in compensation for actual money कि is lost and for the पीड़ा और तनाव संबद्ध with वस्तुतः कोई injury.
In a suit, pain and suffering is part of the `` सामान्य क्षतिपूर्ति '' section of the claimant 's अर्जी, or, alternatively, it is an element of `` compensatory '' non-economic क्षतिपूर्ति that allows रिकवरी for the दिमागी anguish and/or शारीरिक पीड़ा endured by the claimant as a result of चोट for which the plaintiff seeks परितोष.
Apart from धन क्षतिपूर्ति awarded in trial, धन damages हैं also given informally outside the judicial system in mediations, arbitration ( both of जिससे may be अदालत annexed or non litigated दावा ) as well as in routine बीमे settlements.
व्यक्तिगत claimants or those represented by lawyers often present demands to insurers to settle लिये धन.
These demand for bodily injury compensation monies often set out damages that are similarly प्रयुक्त in the अदालत litigated pleadings.
मांगे are usually लिखा summaries of a claimant 's चिकित्सा परवाह और the facts which resulted in the injury.
नमूना of a medallion signature गारंटी stampIn
the United States और Canada, a medallion signature गारंटी is a खास signature guarantee for the ट्रांसफ़र of प्रतिभूति.
It is a गारंटी by the transferring financial संस्था कि the हस्ताक्षर is वास्तविक और the वित्तीय institution स्वीकृत देयता for any जालसाजी.
Signature guarantees protect shareholders by preventing unauthorized transfers and संभावित investor नुकसान.
They भी limit the देयता of the transfer agent who स्वीकृत the certificates.
Different institutions have different नीतियों as to कया प्रकार of पहचान वे require to provide the guarantee and whether वे चार्ज a fee लिये ऐसे service ( प्रायः nominal if any ).
Most institutions होगा नहीं guarantee a signature of किसी who has नहीं already been their customer.
a medallion हस्ताक्षर गारंटी is not the same as an acknowledgment by a notary public, in the भाव कि a `` signature guarantee '' is a प्रमाणन by the institution that the हस्ताक्षर is प्रामाणिक, and an acknowledgment is a certification by a नोटरी public attesting that the signer signed a document voluntarily.
Some बैंको may no longer provide this service, however, many still do as खूब as अन्य financial संस्थानों ऐसे as a Savings और Loans and Credit Unions.
at उनके sole discretion, ये संस्थानों may स्टिल decline to provide the Medallion हस्ताक्षर guarantees.
जब US citizens are विदेश, some financial institutions may accept संयुक्त States Embassy seals, in place of the Medallion हस्ताक्षर गारंटी Stamp.
Pacific Electric Railway streetcars stacked at a junkyard on Terminal द्वीप, Los एंजिल्स काउंटी, कैलिफ़ोर्निया, कूच 1956
The सामान्य Motors streetcar conspiracy ( also known as the ग्रेट American streetcar scandal ) refers to allegations और convictions in relation to a program by General मोटर्स ( GM ) और अन्य कंपनियाँ who purchased और then dismantled स्ट्रीटकार और electric ट्रैन systems in many अमरीकी शहरों.
between 1936 and 1950, नेशनल नगर Lines और प्रशांत City Lines —with investment from gm, Firestone टायर, मानक Oil of कैलिफ़ोर्निया, Phillips Petroleum, mack Trucks, and the Federal अभियान्त्रिकी corporation—bought over 100 electric surface-traction प्रणालियों in 45 शहरों including Baltimore, Newark, Los एंजिल्स, New York City, ओकलैंड and San Diego और converted उन्हें into bus आपरेशन.
अनेक of the companies involved were convicted in 1949 of conspiracy to monopolize interstate commerce but यहूद acquitted of conspiring to monopolize the ownership of these कंपनियाँ.
कुछ suggest that इस program played a कुंजी role in the decline of पब्लिक transit in शहरों across the United राज्य ; notably Edwin J. quinby, who first खींचा attention to the program in 1946, and then Bradford C. Snell, an anti-trust attorney for the United राज्य Senate whose controversial 1974 testimony to a Senate inquiry brought the समस्या to नेशनल awareness.
Both Quinby और snell argued that the deliberate destruction of streetcars थी part of a larger strategy to push the United States into automobile dependency.
Others कह that independent आर्थिक factors brought about परिवर्तन in the transit system, including the ग्रेट Depression, the पब्लिक यूटिलिटी पकड़कर कम्पनी अधिनियम of 1935, labor unrest, मार्केट forces, rapidly increasing traffic congestion, urban sprawl, कराधान policies कि favored निजी गाडी स्वामित्व, और general enthusiasm for the automobile.
One writer on the subject has सुझाया that Snell and अन्य fell into simplistic षड्यंत्र सिद्धान्त thinking, bordering on paranoid delusions saying `` clearly, GM waged a युद्ध on electric traction.
It थी बेशक an all आउट उत्पीड़न, but by no अर्थात् the single कारण लिये the failure of rapid transit.
भी, it is बस as साफ that actions and inactions by government contributed significantly to the elimination of electric traction. ''
Only a small handful of U.S. cities have surviving effective rail-based urban transport systems based on streetcars or trams, सहित न्यूर्क, Philadelphia, सैन फ्रांसिस्को, पिट्सबर्ग, and Boston ; अन्य are re-introducing them.
The story has been छान अनेक टाइम्स in print, फिल्मी and अन्य मीडिया, notably in Who Framed रोजर खरगोश, लिया लिये a Ride and The समाप्त of suburbia.

अमरीकी औपनिवेशिक architecture includes several भवन design शैलियाँ associated with the औपनिवेशिक काल of the United राज्य, सहित First Period English ( late-medieval ), फ्रेंच औपनिवेशिक, Spanish औपनिवेशिक, Dutch Colonial और जॉर्जियाई.
These styles हैं associated with the houses, चर्च and सरकारी buildings of the काल from परिचय 1600 through the 19th century.
`` in the Mood '' is a बिग बैंड era # 1 hit recorded by अमरीकी bandleader ग्लेन Miller.
It अव्वल the चार्ट in 1940 in the U.S. और one साल later थी featured in the movie सूर्य Valley serenade.
In 1999, National Public Radio ( NPR ) शामिल the 1939 Glenn Miller रिकॉर्डिंग on आरसीए Bluebird on the NPR 100, the list of `` The 100 most important अमरीकी musical works of the 20th सदी ''.
NEPTUNE logo
the NEPTUNE Canada प्रोजेक्ट is the world’s पहला regional-scale underwater ocean observatory कि plugs सीधे into the अंतरजाल.
चूंकि दिसम्बर 2009, it रै allowed लोगों to `` surf '' the seafloor while ocean scientists चलाएं deep-water experiments इससे labs और universities around the संसार.
साथ साथ इसके सिस्टर project, शुक्र, वरुण offers a unique दृष्टिकोण to समंदर science.
traditionally, ocean scientists have relied on infrequent जलयान cruises or space-based satellites to carry आउट their शोध, जबकि the NEPTUNE project uses a remotely operated क्रॉलर.
A gramophone रिकार्ड, commonly known as a phonograph record ( in अमरीकी English ), vinyl record ( in reference to विनाइल, the material most commonly प्रयुक्त बाद परिचय 1950 ), or colloquially, `` a रिकार्ड '', is an एनालॉग ध्वनि भंडार medium consisting of a चपटा disc with an inscribed, modulated spiral नाली.
The groove usually starts near the periphery और ends near the center of the disc.
Phonograph records हैं generally वर्णित by their diameter in inches ( 12-inch, 10-inch, 7-inch, etc. ), the rotational speed at which वे are निभाई ( `` 33 rpm ``, `` 78 '', `` 45 '', इत्यादि. ), उनके time capacity ( `` long playing '' ), उनके reproductive accuracy, or `` वफ़ादारी `` ( `` high fidelity '', `` orthophonic '', `` full-range '', इत्यादि. ), और the number of चैनल्स of ऑडियो provided ( `` मोनो ``, `` stereo ``, `` quadraphonic ``, etc. ).
Phonograph records यहूद the प्राथमिक medium used for म्यूज़िक जनन for most of the 20th century, replacing the phonograph cylinder, साथ जिससे it had co-existed, by the 1920s.
By the late 1980s, digital media था gained a larger market share, और the विनाइल record बाएँ the मुख्यधारा in 1991.
वे continue to be manufactured और sold in the 21st century.
In 2008, nearly 2.9 लाख units shipped, the सबसे in any साल since 1998 और the format रै continued to धीरे regain popularity.
They are विशेषकर used by DJs and audiophiles लिये अनेक types of म्यूज़िक.
as of 2013, vinyl records continue to be used for वितरण.

grasslands हैं areas where the वनस्पति is dominated by grasses ( Poaceae ), however sedge ( cyperaceae ) और फटाफट ( Juncaceae ) families can also be found.
Grasslands occur naturally on all continents except अंटार्कटिक.
In temperate latitudes, such as northwestern Europe and the Great Plains and California in उत्तर America, देशी grasslands are dominated by perennial bunch grass प्रजाति, whereas in warmer climates annual प्रजाति form a greater component of the vegetation.
grasslands हैं मिला in सबसे ecoregions of the Earth.
लिये उदाहरण वहीँ हैं five terrestrial ecoregion classifications ( subdivisions ) of the temperate grasslands, savannas, and shrublands biome ( ' ecosystem ' ), which is एक of आठ terrestrial ecozones of the Earth 's सतह.
हिना ( lawsonia inermis, भी called हिना tree ) or Hina is a flowering plant, the sole species in the genus Lawsonia in the परिवार lythraceae.
The English name `` henna '' comes इससे the अरबी ( ala-lc : ḥinnāʾ / pronounced ) or colloquially, loosely सुनाया.
The name is also प्रयुक्त for डाई preparations derived from the संयंत्र, and for the आर्ट of अस्थाई गोदना based on those dyes.
Henna has been used since antiquity to डाई स्किन, बाल, और fingernails, as well as fabrics including Silk, ऊन and चमड़े.
additionally, the name is misused for अन्य skin and बाल dyes, ऐसे as ब्लैक henna or न्यूट्रल henna, which हैं not derived इससे the संयंत्र.
A पतला film is a layer of सामग्री ranging from fractions of a nanometer ( monolayer ) to several micrometers in thickness.
Electronic semiconductor devices and optical coatings are the main applications benefiting from thin-film construction.
A परिचित अनुप्रयोग of पतला films is the household दर्पण, which typically has a thin metal coating on the back of a चादर of कांच to form a परावर्तक इंटरफ़ेस.
The process of silvering was एकबार commonly used to उपज mirrors.
a very-thin-film coating ( less than a nanometer thick ) is used to produce two-way mirrors.
the performance of optical coatings ( e.g. antireflective, or ar, coatings ) हैं typically enhanced when the thin-film कोटिंग consists of अनेक layers having varying thicknesses and refractive indices.
Similarly, a periodic ढांचा of alternating पतला films of different सामग्री may collectively form a so-called superlattice जिससे exploits the phenomenon of क्वांटम confinement by restricting electronic phenomena to two-dimensions.
Work is होने किया साथ ferromagnetic और ferroelectric पतला films लिये use as computer memory.
it is also being लागू to दवाएँ, via thin-film ड्रग delivery.
Thin-films are used to उपज thin-film बैटरी.
Thin films are also used in dye-sensitized solar कोशिकाएं.
सिरेमिक पतला films हैं in चौड़ी use.
The relatively high कठोरता और inertness of सिरेमिक सामग्री मेक इस type of thin coating of ब्याज लिये protection of substrate सामग्री विरूद्ध संक्षारण, oxidation और पहनें.
in particular, the use of such coatings on cutting tools can extend the जीवन of ये वस्तुएं by अनेक orders of magnitude.
Research is होने done on a new क्लास of thin-film inorganic ऑक्साइड materials, called amorphous heavy-metal cation multicomponent आक्साइड, which could be प्रयुक्त to make पारदर्शी transistors कि हैं inexpensive, stable, और environmentally benign.
गियर्स of War is a सैन्य science fiction third-person शूटर video game developed by Epic Games and प्रकाशित by Microsoft Game Studios.
it was initially released as an exclusive title for the Xbox 360 in November 2005 in उत्तर America, ऑस्ट्रेलिया, और most of यूरोपीय and included a `` Limited Collector 's Edition '' साथ added content and an art book titled नष्ट सौंदर्य that detailed much of the game 's back-story.
Despite the initial statements of एक्सबॉक्स 360 exclusivity, a Microsoft खिड़कियाँ संस्करण of the game was developed in conjunction साथ People Can मक्खी and released a year बाद, featuring नई सामग्री including additional campaign levels, a नई एकाधिक game विधि, and Games लिये खिड़कियाँ Live कार्यक्षमता.
the खेल focuses on the सैनिकों of डेल्टा Squad as they wield a desperate, last-ditch attempt to सहेजें the बाकी human inhabitants of the fictional ग्रह Sera इससे a relentless and seemingly अजेय subterranean enemy known as the Locust horde.
The player assumes the भूमिका of मार्कस fenix ( but can भी play as डोमिनिक Santiago ), a former कैदी और war-hardened soldier.
The game is based on the use of कवर और रणनीतिक आग for the खिलाड़ी to advance through the scenarios ; a दूसरी खिलाड़ी can play cooperatively through the प्रमुख अभियान to assist.
the खेल also सुविधाएँ several online multiplayer खेल मोड्स लिये up to आठ खिलाड़ी.
Gears of War sold over तीन लाख copies in बस टेन सप्ताह and was the fastest-selling वीडियो game of 2005 as well as the second-most played खेल over एक्सबॉक्स सजीव during.
It फिलहाल स्टैंड as the 5th best selling Xbox 360 game of all समय.
the game has since sold over five million नक़ल by September 2008.
The खेल was well received by critics, who praised इसके gameplay और विस्तृत visuals, and it won several `` Game of the साल '' awards in 2006.
The कामयाबी of the game रै led to the development of the Gears of War मताधिकार, including the 2008 sequel Gears of War 2 and इसके follow-up, Gears of युद्ध 3, जिससे was released on September 20, 2011, after having initially महरूम set to have been released on April 5, 2011, the तिथि upon जिससे Epic Games ' चट्टान Bleszinski थी a guest on लेट Night with jimmy Fallon.

A पेड़ Grows in Brooklyn is a 1943 अनोखा written by बेट्टी स्मिथ.
the story focuses on an irish-american family in williamsburg, ब्रुकलीन, New York City.
The novel is set in the first and दूसरी decades of the 20th century.
The book थी an immense कामयाबी.
The main metaphor of the book is the hardy पेड़ of Heaven, native to China and ताईवान, now considered हृदयरोग, and आम in the vacant लोट of नई York City.

Tropical climate zones of the Earth where सब twelve महीने have mean temperatures above 18 °C ( 64 °f ).
The tropics is a region of the धरती surrounding the equator.
it is limited in latitude by the tropic of Cancer in the northern hemisphere at approximately n and the Tropic of Capricorn in the southern hemisphere at S ; ये latitudes correspond to the axial tilt of the Earth.
the ऊष्णकटिबन्ध हैं भी referred to as the tropical zone and the torrid zone ( see भौगोलिक zone ).
The ऊष्णकटिबन्ध शामिल all the areas on the Earth जहाँ the Sun reaches a पाइंट directly ओवरहेड at तनिक once दौरान the सौर year.
The tropics are विशिष्ट from the other climatic और biomatic regions of धरती, the middle latitudes और the ध्रुवीय regions on either पक्ष of the equatorial zone.

`` कया तुम Need '' is an एपीसोड of the अमरीकी television anthology series The Twilight Zone.
It is based on the छोटी स्टोरी of the same नाम by Lewis Padgett ( Henry Kuttner और C. L. मूर ).
playhousesquare, in the क्लीवलैंड थिएटर District in शहर Cleveland, ओहियो, is the second-largest theater complex in the संयुक्त राज्य, दूसरी only to New York City 's Lincoln बीच ).

An airbag is a गाडी safety device.
it is an occupant संयम system consisting of a flexible कपड़ा लिफाफा or cushion designed to inflate rapidly दौरान an ऑटोमोबाइल collision.
Its purpose is to cushion occupants दौरान a crash and provide protection to their bodies when वे strike interior objects ऐसे as the परिचालन wheel or a window.
Modern vehicles may contain multiple airbag मौड्यूल in various पक्ष and frontal locations of the passenger seating positions, and सेंसर may deploy one or more airbags in an प्रभाव zone at परिवर्तनीय दरों आधारित on the type, angle और गंभीरता of प्रभाव ; the airbag is designed to only inflate in moderate to कठोर frontal क्रैश.
Airbags are सामान्यतः designed with the intention of supplementing the protection of an occupant जो is correctly restrained साथ a seatbelt.
सबसे designs are inflated through pyrotechnic अर्थात् and can तभी be operated एकबार.
Newer side-impact airbag मौड्यूल consist of संपीडित air cylinders that are triggered in the इवेंट of a पक्ष impact vehicle impact.
the first commercial डिजाइन यहूद introduced in passenger automobiles दौरान the 1970s with सीमित success.
Broad commercial adoption of airbags occurred in अनेक बाज़ार during the लेट 1980s और early 1990s with a driver airbag, और a front यात्री एयरबैग as खूब on some गाड़ियाँ ; and अनेक modern vehicles now include four or more इकाई.
IRS tax फ़ॉर्म are प्रयुक्त for taxpayers and tax-exempt organizations to रपट वित्तीय information to the Internal Revenue Service ( IRS ) of the संयुक्त States.
वे are प्रयुक्त to report आय, calculate taxes to be सशुल्क to the संघीय government of the United राज्य, और disclose other सूचना as जरूरी by the आतंरिक Revenue Code ( IRC ).
There हैं over 800 various फ़ॉर्म and schedules.
The best-known of these is रूप 1040 प्रयुक्त by individuals.
in the संयुक्त States, ड्राइवर 's पंक्तियां are issued by each individual state ( सहित Washington, D.C. और territories ), rather than the संघीय government because of the political अवधारणा of संघवाद.
Drivers are सामान्यतः required to obtain a अनुज्ञा इससे their राज्य of निवास and सब states recognize प्रत्येक other 's licenses लिये temporary विज़िटर विषय to normal आयु requirements.
a state may भी suspend an individual 's ड्राइविंग privilege भीतर its borders for ट्रैफ़िक violations.
Many states share a common प्रणाली of अनुज्ञा classes, with some अपवाद, and commercial license classes are मानकीकृत by संघीय विनियमन at 49 cfr भाग 383.
चीन रै महरूम the source of many आविष्कारों, सहित the चार Great आविष्कारों : papermaking, the कम्पास, gunpowder, और मुद्रण ( दोनो woodblock और movable type ).
The list below contains these and अन्य आविष्कारों.
The चाइनीज invented technologies involving mechanics, hydraulics, और mathematics applied to horology, metallurgy, खगोलशास्त्र, agriculture, अभियान्त्रिकी, music theory, craftsmanship, nautics, and warfare.
by the युद्धरत States Period ( 403–221 bc ), they had advanced metallurgic technology, including the blast भट्टी and cupola भट्टी, जबकि the finery forge and puddling प्रक्रम यहूद ज्ञात by the हान राजवंश ( 202 BC – AD 220 ).
a sophisticated economic system in चीन gave birth to आविष्कारों such as paper धन during the सोंग Dynasty ( 960–1279 ).
The आविष्कार of बारूद by the 10th century led to an array of inventions ऐसे as the आग lance, land mine, नवल मेरा, हाथ तोपों, exploding cannonballs, multistage rocket, and rocket bombs with aerodynamic wings and explosive payloads.
With the navigational aid of the 11th-century compass और ability to steer at high sea with the 1st-century sternpost अरित्र, premodern Chinese sailors sailed as far as ईस्ट अफ़्रीकी and मिश्र.
in water-powered clockworks, the premodern चाइनीज था प्रयुक्त the escapement mechanism चूंकि the 8th सदी और the अंतहीन power-transmitting chain drive in the 11th सदी.
वे भी made large mechanical puppet theaters चलित by waterwheels और carriage wheels and wine-serving automatons चलित by paddle wheel नौकाएँ.
The contemporaneous Peiligang and pengtoushan cultures represent the oldest Neolithic cultures of China and यहूद formed around 7000 bc.
Some of the first inventions of पाषाणकालीन, prehistoric चीन include semilunar and आयताकार स्टोन knives, स्टोन hoes and हुकुम, the cultivation of बाजरा, rice and the soybean, the refinement of sericulture, the भवन of rammed earth structures साथ lime -plastered हाउस floors, the creation of the potter 's wheel, the सृष्टि of pottery with cord-mat-basket designs, the सृष्टि of pottery tripods and pottery steamers, and the development of ceremonial vessels and scapulimancy लिये उद्देश्य of भविष्यवाणी.
Francesca Bray argues that the domestication of the ox and भैंस दौरान the Longshan culture ( c. 3000–c. 2000 bc ) period, the absence of Longshan-era सिंचाई or high-yield फसलों, पूरा evidence of Longshan cultivation of dry-land cereal crops जिससे दिया high yields `` तभी जब the soil was carefully cultivated, '' suggest कि the हल थी known at least by the Longshan culture period and explains the high agricultural production yields जिससे allowed the rise of Chinese civilization दौरान the शांग राजवंश ( c. 1600–c. 1050 bc ).
With later inventions ऐसे as the multiple-tube बीज drill and heavy moldboard iron हल, चीन 's agricultural आउटपुट could sustain a much larger जनसांख्यिकी.
For the उद्देश्य of this सूची, आविष्कारों हैं regarded as technological firsts विकसित in China, and as ऐसे करता not शामिल foreign technologies which the Chinese acquired through सम्पर्क, such as the पवनचक्की इससे the Middle ईस्ट or the telescope इससे जल्दी आधुनिक यूरोपीय.
It भी does not include technologies विकसित elsewhere और later invented separately by the चाइनीज, ऐसे as the odometer और chain pump.
Scientific, mathematic or natural discoveries, परिवर्तन in minor concepts of design or स्टाइल और कलाकारी innovations can not be regarded as आविष्कारों और do not appear on the list.

वैश्वीकरण ( or globalisation—see स्पेलिंग मतभेद ) is the process of international integration arising इससे the इंटरचेंज of संसार दृश्य, products, ideas, और अन्य पहलुओं of culture.
put in सरल शर्तें, वैश्वीकरण refers to processes that promote world-wide exchanges of नेशनल and सांस्कृतिक resources.
अग्रिम in transportation और दूरसंचार infrastructure, including the वृद्धि of the अंतरजाल, are major factors in वैश्वीकरण, generating further interdependence of economic and सांस्कृतिक क्रियाएँ.
हालांकि several scholars प्लेस the origins of वैश्वीकरण in modern टाइम्स, अन्य ट्रेस its history long before the European आयु of discovery और voyages to the New World.
Some भी ट्रेस the origins to the तीसरा मिलेनियम BCE.
चूंकि the beginning of the 20th century, the pace of वैश्वीकरण has intensified at a rapid rate, especially दौरान the पोस्ट Cold War era.
The term वैश्वीकरण रै been in increasing use since the mid-1980s and विशेषकर चूंकि the mid-1990s.
In 2000, the International मौद्रिक Fund ( IMF ) पहचाना four basic aspects of globalization : व्यापार और transactions, capital and निवेश आंदोलनों, माइग्रेशन and गति of people and the dissemination of knowledge.
Further, environmental चुनौतियां such as climate change, cross-boundary water and air प्रदूषण, और over-fishing of the समंदर are linked with globalization.
Globalizing processes affect and हैं affected by कारोबार and work संगठन, अर्थशास्त्र, socio-cultural resources, और the प्राकृतिक पर्यावरण.
The replacements is a 2000 अमरीकी sports कॉमेडी film निर्देशित by Howard deutch.
It stars कियानू रीव्स, जीन hackman, and ब्रुक langton.

इस airport is the airline 's largest हब.
