the list also contains destinations no longer परोसा by the एयरलाइन, जिससे are marked as terminated destinations.
it करता नहीं include destinations served लिये American एयरलाइंस by its regional affiliates अमरीकी Eagle Airlines, कार्यपालिका एयरलाइंस, and AmericanConnection.
`` day-o ( The Banana Boat Song ) '' is a traditional Jamaican mento folk song, the best-known संस्करण of जिससे थी sung by Harry Belafonte और an वैकल्पिक version interspersed with another Jamaican folksong, हिल और Gully सवार, by Dame शर्ली bassey.
Despite the song 's mento प्रभाव, `` Day-O ( The banana Boat Song ) '' is widely ज्ञात as an उदाहरण of calypso म्यूज़िक.
It is a work सोंग, from the point of view of dock workers working the रात्रि शिफ़्ट लदान bananas onto जहाजों.
Daylight has come, the shift is over and they want उनके work to be counted up so that they can go home.
World War I ( wwi ) was a वैश्विक युद्ध centred in Europe कि began on 28 July 1914 and lasted जबतक 11 November 1918.
It was predominantly पुकारा the World युद्ध or the Great War from इसके occurrence जबतक the start of World War II in 1939, and the पहला संसार War or संसार युद्ध I thereafter.
it involved all the संसार 's great powers, which यहूद समवेत in two opposing alliances : the Allies ( based on the ट्रिपल entente of the United Kingdom, France and Russia ) और the Central शक्तियां ( originally the Triple गठबंधन of जर्मनी, austria-hungary and इटली ; लकिन, as Austria–Hungary had लिया the offensive विरूद्ध the अनुबंध, इटली किया not enter into the war ).
These alliances यहूद both reorganised और विस्तारित as more nations entered the युद्ध : Italy, Japan और the संयुक्त States joined the Allies, और the Ottoman Empire and Bulgaria the Central शक्तियां.
Ultimately, more than 70 लाख military personnel, including 60 million europeans, were mobilised in one of the largest wars in history.
अधिक than 9 million combatants were मारे, largely क्युकी of technological advancements that led to enormous increases in the lethality of weapons without सम्बन्धित improvements in protection or गतिशीलता.
it थी the fifth- deadliest conflict in world history, subsequently paving the way for विभिन्न राजनैतिक changes, such as revolutions in अनेक of the nations involved.
एक of the long-term causes of the युद्ध was the resurgence of imperialism in the foreign policies of the ग्रेट powers of Europe.
More immediately, the हत्या of Archduke Franz फर्डिनेंड of ऑस्ट्रिया, the heir to the सिंहासन of austria-hungary, on 28 जून 1914 by यूगोस्लाव राष्ट्रवादी Gavrilo Princip in Sarajevo triggered a राजनयिक crisis जब Austria-Hungary subsequently वितरित an ultimatum to the Kingdom of सर्बिया.
अनेक alliances formed over the previous decades यहूद invoked.
Within सप्ताह, the major powers यहूद at युद्ध and, via their colonies, the विरोध soon spread around the संसार.
On 28 July, the Austro-Hungarians fired the first गोलियाँ of the युद्ध as preparation लिये the invasion of Serbia.
जबकि the russians mobilised, the germans invaded neutral बेल्जियम और Luxembourg on the रास्ता to France, providing a casus belli लिये ब्रिटेन 's declaration of war विरूद्ध Germany.
After the German march on पेरिस was brought to a halt—the so-called Miracle of the marne —the Western Front settled into a static battle of attrition with a trench line that बदला छोटी जबतक 1917.
On the Eastern Front, the Russian army थी successful विरूद्ध the austro-hungarians, लकिन was stopped in its आक्रमण of East Prussia by the germans.
In November the Ottoman Empire joined the war, opening up fronts in the काकेशस, Mesopotamia and the sinai.
Italy and बुल्गारिया गई to war in 1915 और रोमानिया in 1916.
In रूस, the त्सार 's government collapsed in कूच 1917 and a subsequent revolution in November brought the Russians to terms with the सेंट्रल Powers.
After a 1918 German अप्रिय साथ the पश्चिमी सामने, the Allies drove back the Germans in a श्रेणी of successful offensives and अमरीकी forces began entering the trenches.
Germany, which था इसके own trouble साथ revolutionaries, agreed to an armistice on 11 November 1918.
The war ended in victory लिये the Allies.
Events on the घर fronts were as tumultuous as on the बैटल fronts, as the participants आजमाया to mobilize their manpower और आर्थिक संसाधन to लड़ो a कुल युद्ध.
By the end of the war, चार major imperial powers—the German, Russian, Austro-Hungarian और Ottoman empires—ceased to exist.
The successor states of the former two lost a great राशि of territory, जबकि the latter two were dismantled entirely.
The map of सेंट्रल Europe was redrawn into अनेक छोटी states.
The लीग of राष्ट्र थी formed in the hope of preventing another such conflict.
the European nationalism spawned by the war और the ब्रेकअप of empires, the परखना of जर्मनी 's शिकस्त और problems साथ the Treaty of versailles are सहमत to be factors contributing to संसार War ii.
Nurse Jackie is an अमरीकी series that premiered on June 8, 2009, on Showtime, फिल्म सेंट्रल and the फिल्म संजाल.
The श्रेणी stars Edie Falco as the title अक्षर Jackie Peyton, an emergency विभाग nurse at All Saints ' Hospital in New York नगर.
लिये Jackie, `` Every day is a ऊँची wire act of juggling मरीजों, doctors, fellow नर्स और her own indiscretions. ''
Keeping Up साथ the Kardashians ( often referred to simply as The Kardashians ) is an American reality television series that premiered on अक्तूबर 14, 2007, on E !.
it फ़ॉलो the जीवनदान of the kardashian/jenner family, सहित sisters Kourtney, किम, and Khloé कार्दशियन.
The series ' success has led to the spin-offs कोर्टनी and किम Take नई York, Khloé & लैमर, Kourtney और Khloé Take मियामी, and Kourtney and Kim Take मियामी.
अफगानिस्तान ( ; ; ), officially the इस्लामी Republic of Afghanistan, is a landlocked sovereign state forming part of South Asia, Central Asia, और to some extent Western एशिया.
It has a जनसांख्यिकी of around 30 लाख inhabiting an area of लगभग, बनाना it the 42nd most populous and 41st largest स्वदेश in the world.
It is bordered by Pakistan in the south और the east, Iran in the west, तुर्कमेनिस्तान, Uzbekistan and ताजिकिस्तान in the उत्तर, and चीन in the far northeast.
Afghanistan has महरूम an प्राचीन फोकल पाइंट of the रेशा सड़क and इंसान माइग्रेशन.
Archaeologists have found evidence of human habitation इससे as दूर वापस as the मध्य Paleolithic.
शहरी सभ्यता may have begun in the area as जल्दी as 3,000 to 2,000 BCE.
Sitting at an important geostrategic location that connects the मध्य ईस्ट culture with Central Asia और the Indian उपमहाद्वीप, the जमीन has महरूम घर to various peoples through the आयु and witnessed अनेक सैन्य campaigns, notably by Alexander the ग्रेट, Genghis Khan, और in आधुनिक era पश्चिमी forces.
the land also परोसा as a सोर्स from जिससे the greco-bactrians, Kushans, hephthalites, Saffarids, Ghaznavids, ghorids, khiljis, Timurids, Mughals, durranis, और अन्य have risen to form प्रमुख empires.
the political history of the modern state of अफगानिस्तान begins in 1709, जब the hotaki राजवंश was established in Kandahar followed by अहमद Shah Durrani 's rise to power in 1747.
In the late 19th century, Afghanistan became a बफ़र state in the `` ग्रेट खेल `` between the अंग्रेजों and रूसी empires.
following the 1919 Anglo-Afghan War, King अमानुल्ला began a European style modernization of the country but was stopped by the ultra-conservatives.
During the Cold युद्ध, बाद the वापसी of the अंग्रेजों इससे neighboring India in 1947, the United राज्य and the सोवियत Union began spreading प्रभाव in Afghanistan, जिससे led to a bloody युद्ध between the us-backed मुजाहिदीन forces and the Soviet-backed अफगान सरकारी in जिससे over a लाख afghans lost उनके lives.
This थी followed by the 1990s सिविल युद्ध, the rise and fall of the extremist Taliban सरकारी and the 2001–present war.
In दिसम्बर 2001, the संयुक्त Nations Security Council authorized the सृष्टि of the International Security Assistance Force ( ISAF ) to help maintain सुरक्षा in Afghanistan and assist the Karzai administration.
Three decades of war made Afghanistan one of the world 's most dangerous countries, including the largest producer of refugees and asylum seekers.
While the अंतरराष्ट्रीय community is पुनर्निर्माण war-torn अफगानिस्तान, terrorist groups ऐसे as the Haqqani Network and Hezbi islami हैं actively शामिल in a देशभर तालिबान -led उग्रवाद, जिससे includes hundreds of assassinations and suicide हमले.
according to the संयुक्त Nations, the insurgents यहूद responsible for 80 % of civilian हताहत in 2011 and 2012.
The American Civil युद्ध ( acw ), also known as the War between the States or simply the Civil War ( see naming ), was a civil war लड़ा from 1861 to 1865 between the United States ( the `` Union '' or the `` North '' ) and several दक्षिणी स्लेव states that declared their secession and formed the Confederate States of America ( the `` confederacy '' or the `` दक्षिण '' ).
the war had its उत्पत्ति in the समस्या of slavery, विशेषकर the extension of slavery into the पश्चिमी territories.
विदेशी शक्तियां did नहीं intervene.
बाद four सालो of खूनी कॉम्बैट कि बाएँ over 600,000 soldiers dead and destroyed much of the दक्षिण 's infrastructure, the Confederacy collapsed, slavery was abolished, and the मुश्किल पुनर्निर्माण प्रक्रम of restoring national unity और guaranteeing rights to the freed स्लेव began.
In the 1860 presidential चुनाव, Republicans, led by अब्राहम Lincoln, opposed expanding slavery into United States ' territories.
lincoln won, but पहले उसके inauguration on कूच 4, 1861, seven cotton-based स्लेव states formed the Confederacy.
outgoing लोकतांत्रिक President जेम्स बुकानन and the incoming Republicans अस्वीकृत secession as illegal.
Lincoln 's inaugural address declared his प्रशासन would not initiate सिविल युद्ध.
आठ remaining स्लेव राज्य continued to reject calls लिये secession.
Confederate forces जब्त numerous federal forts भीतर territory claimed by the Confederacy.
a Peace Conference विफल to find a compromise, और both sides prepared for war.
the confederates assumed कि European countries यहूद so निर्भर on `` King कपास `` that they would intervene ; none did और none recognized the new Confederate States of America.
Hostilities began on April 12, 1861, when confederate forces fired upon फोर्ट Sumter, a कुंजी fort held by Union सैनिकों in दक्षिण कैरोलिना.
lincoln called for each राज्य to provide सैनिकों to retake the फोर्ट ; consequently, four more slave राज्य joined the Confederacy, bringing their total to ग्यारह.
The संघ soon controlled the border states और स्थापित a naval नाकेबंदी कि crippled the दक्षिणी economy.
The Eastern Theater थी inconclusive in 1861–62.
the autumn 1862 Confederate campaign into Maryland ( a Union state ) ended साथ Confederate retreat at the Battle of Antietam, dissuading British हस्तक्षेप.
Lincoln issued the Emancipation Proclamation, which made ending गुलामी a war लक्ष्य.
To the वेस्ट, by summer 1862 the संघ नष्ट the confederate river नेवी, then much of उनके western सेना, and the संघ at vicksburg split the Confederacy in two at the Mississippi River.
In 1863, Robert E. Lee 's Confederate incursion north ended at the बैटल of gettysburg.
Western सफलताओं led to ulysses S. ग्रान्ट command of सब संघ armies in 1864.
In the Western थिएटर, विलियम T. शरमन drove east to capture अटलांटा and marched to the समुद्र, destroying Confederate अवसंरचना along the way.
the Union marshaled the resources and manpower to attack the confederacy from सब directions, and could afford to fight battles of अपघर्षण through the Overland Campaign towards रिचमंड, the Confederate capital.
The defending Confederate army विफल, leading to ली 's surrender to Grant at Appomattox Court House on April 9, 1865.
the American सिविल युद्ध थी one of the earliest true औद्योगिक युद्धों.
Railroads, the टेलीग्राफ, steamships, and mass-produced weapons were employed extensively.
The mobilization of civilian factories, mines, shipyards, बैंको, परिवहन and food supplies all foreshadowed World युद्ध i.
it remains the deadliest युद्ध in American इतिहास, resulting in the मौतों of an estimated 750,000 सैनिको and an undetermined क्रमांक of civilian casualties.
Historian जॉन Huddleston estimates the death टोल at ten percent of all उत्तरी males 20–45 years old, और 30 percent of all Southern श्वेत males aged 18–40.
लागत of goods sold ( cogs ) refer to the inventory costs of those goods a business रै बेची दौरान a particular period.
Costs are associated with particular goods using one of several formulas, including specific identification, first-in first-out ( FIFO ), or average cost.
लागत include सब costs of खरीदें, costs of conversion and other costs incurred in bringing the inventories to their उपस्थित location and condition.
लागत of goods बना by the business include material, मजदूर, and allocated overhead.
The costs of those goods not yet sold हैं deferred as costs of inventory until the inventory is sold or लिखा bas in value.

A confectionery store ( अधिक commonly referred to as a मीठी shop in the United Kingdom, a कैंडी store in the North America, or a lolly shop in ऑस्ट्रेलिया ) sells confectionery and is प्रायः targeted to children.
सबसे confectionery स्टोर्स हैं filled साथ an assortment of sweets far larger than a grocer or convenience store could accommodate.
They often offer a चयन of बूढ़ा fashioned treats, और sweets इससे different देशों.
Very often unchanged in layout since उनके inception, confectioneries हैं known लिये उनके वार्मिंग and nostalgic feel.
The गाँव of pateley Bridge claims to have the oldest confectionery store in इंग्लैण्ड.

Oklahoma ( ) ( pawnee : Uukuhuúwa, cay : Gahnawiyoˀgeh ) is a राज्य located in वेस्ट दक्षिण Central संयुक्त States.
ओक्लाहोमा is the 20th most extensive और the 28th most populous of the 50 United States.
the राज्य 's नाम is derived from the Choctaw words okla और humma, meaning `` red people '', और it is known informally by इसके nickname, The Sooner State.
Formed by the संयोजन of Oklahoma Territory and भारतीय Territory on नवम्बर 16, 1907, ओक्लाहोमा was the 46th राज्य to डालें the union.
इसके निवासियों are ज्ञात as Oklahomans or, informally `` okies '', और its capital and largest city is Oklahoma नगर.
a major producer of प्राकृतिक गैस, oil, and agriculture, Oklahoma relies on an economic आधार of aviation, उर्जा, दूरसंचार, and biotechnology.
it रै एक of the तीव्रतम growing economies in the nation, रैंकिंग among the top राज्य in per capita income growth and gross domestic product growth.
Oklahoma City and तुलसा serve as Oklahoma 's primary economic anchors, with nearly दो thirds of Oklahomans living within their metropolitan सांख्यिकीय क्षेत्रों.
With small mountain ranges, prairie, mesas, and eastern forests, most of Oklahoma lies in the Great मैदान and the U.S. Interior Highlands —a region विशेषकर prone to severe मौसम.
In addition to having a prevalence of अंग्रेज़ी, जर्मनी, Scottish, Irish and Native अमरीकी ancestry, more than 25 Native American languages are बोला in Oklahoma, second तभी to कैलिफ़ोर्निया.
ओक्लाहोमा is स्तिथ on a confluence of तीन major American सांस्कृतिक regions और historically परोसा as a route for चौपायों drives, a destination for दक्षिणी settlers, and a government-sanctioned territory for Native Americans.

a tire ( or टायर ) is a ring-shaped covering that fits around a wheel 's रिम to protect it and enable better गाडी प्रदर्शन.
सबसे tires, such as those for automobiles and साइकिल, provide traction between the vehicle और the road जबकि providing a flexible cushion that absorbs shock.
the materials of आधुनिक pneumatic टायर are सिंथेटिक रबर, natural rubber, fabric और wire, साथ with carbon black and other chemical यौगिकों.
They consist of a tread and a body.
the tread provides कर्षण while the देह provides containment for a quantity of संपीडित एयर.
Before रबर was विकसित, the पहला versions of tires यहूद simply bands of मेटल that fitted around लकड़ी wheels to prevent wear and tear.
Early rubber tires यहूद solid ( not pneumatic ).
आज, the majority of टायर are न्यूमेटिक inflatable structures, comprising a doughnut-shaped body of cords and wires encased in rubber और generally filled with compressed air to form an inflatable cushion.
Pneumatic टायर are प्रयुक्त on अनेक types of वाहनों, सहित cars, bicycles, motorcycles, trucks, earthmovers, and aircraft.
Metal tires हैं still used on इंजनों और railcars, और solid rubber ( or अन्य पॉलिमर ) टायर are स्टिल used in various non-automotive applications, such as कुछ casters, carts, lawnmowers, और wheelbarrows.
dr. Joseph Warren ( June 11, 1741 – June 17, 1775 ) was an अमरीकी डॉक्टर जो played a leading role in American Patriot organizations in बोस्टन in जल्दी days of the American क्रान्ति, आखिरकार serving as president of the revolutionary मैसाचुसेट्स प्रांतीय Congress.
Warren enlisted Paul Revere और William dawes on April 18, 1775, to छोड़ Boston and spread the alarm that the अंग्रेजों गैरीसन in Boston थी सेटिंग out to रेड the कस्बा of concord and गिरफ़्तार rebel leaders John Hancock and सैमुएल Adams.
Warren participated in the next day 's Battles of lexington and concord, which are commonly माना to be the opening engagements of the अमरीकी क्रांतिकारी युद्ध.
वारेन था महरूम commissioned a प्रमुख General in the colony 's militia shortly before the जून 17, 1775 बैटल of Bunker हिल.
Rather than exercising his रैंक, Warren served in the battle as a निजी soldier, and थी killed in कॉम्बैट जब British troops stormed the redoubt atop Breed 's Hill.
उसके death, immortalized in जॉन Trumbull 's painting, the Death of General Warren at the Battle of Bunker 's हिल, जून 17, 1775, जस्ती the rebel forces, and he रै महरूम memorialized in many place names in the United राज्य.
STM चित्र of self-assembled supramolecular chains of the organic सेमीकंडक्टर Quinacridone on Graphite.
An organic सेमीकंडक्टर is an सशुल्क material with semiconductor गुण, that is, साथ an electrical conductivity between कि of insulators and कि of metals.
Single molecules, छोटी कड़ी ( oligomers ) and organic polymers can be semiconductive.
semiconducting small molecules ( aromatic hydrocarbons ) शामिल the polycyclic aromatic यौगिकों pentacene, anthracene, and rubrene.
Polymeric organic semiconductors include poly ( 3-hexylthiophene ), बहु ( p-phenylene vinylene ), as खूब as polyacetylene and इसके derivatives.
वहीँ are two major अतिव्यापी classes of सशुल्क semiconductors.
ये are organic charge-transfer complexes and various linear-backbone conductive polymers derived from polyacetylene.
Linear रीढ़ organic semiconductors include polyacetylene itself and इसके derivatives polypyrrole, and polyaniline.
at least locally, charge-transfer देवालय often प्रदर्शनी समान conduction mechanisms to अकार्बनिक semiconductors.
Such mechanisms उठता from the उपस्थिति of छेद and electron conduction परतों अलग by a band गैप.
While such क्लासिक mechanisms are important locally, as साथ inorganic amorphous semiconductors, tunnelling, localized states, mobility gaps, and phonon -assisted hopping भी significantly योगदान to conduction, विशेषकर in polyacetylenes.
जैसे अकार्बनिक semiconductors, organic semiconductors can be doped.
Organic semiconductors susceptible to doping ऐसे as polyaniline ( Ormecon ) और हैं also ज्ञात as organic metals.
Typical वर्तमान carriers in organic semiconductors are holes और electrons in π-bonds.
Almost all organic solids हैं insulators.
लकिन when उनके constituent molecules have π-conjugate systems, electrons can move via π-electron cloud overlaps, especially by hopping, tunnelling और related mechanisms.
Polycyclic aromatic hydrocarbons and phthalocyanine salt crystals हैं examples of इस प्रकार of organic semiconductor.
Mainly due to कम mobility, भी unpaired electrons may be stable in charge-transfer complexes.
Such unpaired electrons can function as वर्तमान carriers.
इस प्रकार of semiconductor is also प्राप्त by pairing an इलेक्ट्रॉन donor अणु साथ an electron acceptor molecule.
Female स्खलन is the expulsion of द्रव by human females इससे the paraurethral ducts through and around the female urethra दौरान or before an orgasm.
It is also ज्ञात colloquially as gushing or squirting, although these are considered to be different phenomena in some research publications.
The exact सोर्स और nature of the fluid continue to be a टॉपिक of debate among medical professionals, which is भी सम्बन्धित to संदेह over the existence of the g-spot.
The फीफा Women 's World Cup is an international association फ़ुटबॉल प्रतियोगिता contested by the वरिष्ठ महिलाओं 's national टीमों of the members of fédération Internationale de Football संघ ( FIFA ), the sport 's global शासी body.
the championship has महरूम awarded प्रत्येक four years since the inaugural tournament in 1991.
जापानी won the 2011 tournament in a penalty गोलीबारी.
The वर्तमान format of the टूर्नामेंट involves 16 टीमों competing for the शीर्षक at venues भीतर the मेजबान स्वदेश ( s ) over a period of about three weeks ; – this phase is प्रायः पुकारा the संसार कप Finals.
A योग्यता phase, which फिलहाल takes place over the preceding three years, is used to determine जिससे teams qualify for the tournament साथ with the host nation ( s ).
The फीफा Women 's संसार कप is recognized as the सबसे महत्वपूर्ण अंतरराष्ट्रीय प्रतियोगिता in women 's football and is played amongst महिलाओं 's नेशनल फ़ुटबॉल टीमों of the member states of FIFA, the sport 's वैश्विक governing body.
the पहला महिलाओं 's संसार कप टूर्नामेंट, नामित the Women 's संसार Championship, was held in 1991, sixty-one सालो बाद the men 's first FIFA World कप टूर्नामेंट in 1930.
the छह World कप tournaments have महरूम won by चार different national टीमों.
the next संसार Cup will be hosted by कनाडा in 2015.

'son of man ' is the अनुवाद of various Hebrew और यूनानी phrases used in दोनो the यहूदी बाइबल and the नई Testament.
It रै विविध meanings, ranging from a सामान्य human being to a prophesied eternal, दैवी ruler.
The Hebrew अभिव्यक्ति `` son of man '' ( בן–אדם i.e. ben-'adam ) appears one सौ and seven टाइम्स in the यहूदी Bible.
This is the सबसे common Hebrew निर्माण लिये the एकवचन लकिन is used mostly in ezekiel ( 93 times ) and 14 times elsewhere.
In तीस दो cases the phrase appears in intermediate plural form `` sons of मेन '', i.e. इंसान beings.
as generally interpreted by Jews, it denotes humankind generally.
In the Koine यूनानी of the New Testament, `` the बेटे of man '' is invariably प्रयुक्त as `` ὁ υἱὸς τοὺ ἀνθρώπου '' साथ a definite आलेख.
The उपयोग of the definite आलेख in `` the son of man '' in the ईसाई gospels is novel, और before its use there, no records of its use in कोई of the surviving Greek documents of antiquity exist.
geza Vermes has stated कि `` the बेटे of man '' in the Christian gospels is unrelated to Hebrew बाइबल usages.
in Christian usage, नापसंद the बेटे of God title, which रै महरूम an अनिवार्य तत्व of ईसाई creeds चूंकि the Apostolic age, the proclamation of `` Jesus as the Son of man '' has never been an आलेख of faith in christianity.
The interpretation of the use of `` the बेटे of man '' in the नई वसीयत रै remained challenging और after 150 years of debate no सर्वसम्मति on the समस्या has उभरा among विद्वानों.
निपुण of foxhounds leads the फ़ील्ड from Powderham Castle in देवों, इंग्लैण्ड, with the hounds in front.
Fox hunting is an activity involving the tracking, chase, और sometimes हत्या of a fox, traditionally a red फॉक्स, by trained foxhounds or other scent hounds, और a group of unarmed अनुसरणकर्ता led by a master of foxhounds, who follow the hounds on पैर or on horseback.
Fox hunting originated in the form practised until recently in the United Kingdom in the 16th century, लकिन is practised सब over the संसार, सहित in ऑस्ट्रेलिया, कनाडा, फ़्रांस, Ireland, इटली और the United राज्य.
in ऑस्ट्रेलिया, the पद also refers to the hunting of foxes साथ firearms समान to spotlighting or deer hunting.
In much of the संसार शिकार in सामान्य is समझा to सुनाना to कोई खेल animals or weapons ( e.g., deer hunting साथ bow and arrow ) ; in ब्रिटेन and आयरलैंड, `` hunting '' without qualification implies fox शिकार ( or other forms of शिकार साथ hounds- beagling, स्टैग hunting, मिंक शिकार, खीचें hunting or शिकार the clean बूट ) as described here.
the खेल is controversial, particularly in the UK, जहाँ it थी बैन in स्कॉटलैंड in 2002, और in इंग्लैण्ड and Wales in November 2004 ( law enforced from February 2005 ), though shooting foxes as vermin remained legal.
Proponents of fox hunting view it as an महत्वपूर्ण part of rural culture and उपयोगी for कारण of संरक्षण and pest कंट्रोल, while प्रतिद्वंद्वियों argue कि it is cruel and unnecessary.
तम्बाकू विज्ञापन is the advertising of तम्बाकू उत्पाद or उपयोग ( typically सिगरेट smoking ) by the तम्बाकू उद्योग through a किस्में of मीडिया सहित sponsorship, particularly of sporting कार्यक्रम.
It is now one of the सबसे अत्यधिक regulated forms of marketing.
Some or all forms of tobacco विज्ञापन हैं banned in many countries.
Bally technologies, Inc. is a निर्माता of slot machines और other gaming technology based in लास Vegas, Nevada.
the company was founded in 1968 as Advanced पेटेंट प्रौद्योगिकी.
It eventually changed its name to Alliance गेमिंग and acquired, in 1996, Bally Gaming International, a पूर्व प्रभाग of बल्ली निर्माण.

Inferno ( Italian लिये `` नरक `` ) is the पहला part of Dante Alighieri 's 14th-century epic poem दैवी कॉमेडी.
It is followed by purgatorio and Paradiso.
It is an allegory telling of the journey of Dante through नरक, हिदायत by the Roman कवि Virgil.
In the poem, Hell is depicted as नौ वृत्त of suffering स्तिथ within the Earth.
Allegorically, the Divine कॉमेडी represents the यात्रा of the soul towards God, with the Inferno describing the recognition और अस्वीकृति of sin.

The Serenity दुआ is the common name for an originally untitled prayer by the American theologian Reinhold Niebuhr ( 1892–1971 ).
It रै been अपनाया by alcoholics Anonymous और अन्य twelve-step programs.

The घोषणा और resolves of the पहला Continental कॉंग्रेस ( भी ज्ञात as the घोषणा of Colonial Rights, or the घोषणा of Rights ), was a statement अपनाया by the First महाद्वीपीय कॉंग्रेस on अक्तूबर 14, 1774, in response to the Intolerable Acts passed by the अंग्रेजों पार्लियामेंट.
The Declaration outlined colonial objections to the असहनीय अधिनियमों, सूचीबद्ध a colonial विधेयक of rights, and provided a detailed list of grievances.
it थी similar to the Declaration of Rights और grievances, passed by the Stamp Act कॉंग्रेस a दशक earlier.
The घोषणा concluded साथ an outline of Congress 's योजनाएँ : to डालें into a बहिष्कार of British trade ( the महाद्वीपीय संघ ) जबतक their grievances यहूद redressed, to publish addresses to the people of Great Britain और अंग्रेजों अमेरिका, and to send a याचिका to the King.
पल्स pressure is the pressure that is felt when feeling the pulse.
measured in millimeters of mercury ( mmHg ), the दबाव अंतर between the systolic and diastolic pressures is the pressure change to बनाएँ the पल्स, which is the pulse pressure.
if resting रक्त pressure is ( systolic/diastolic ) 120/80 millimeters of पारा ( mmhg ), पल्स pressure is 40.

in poker, bad ताल is a subjective term for a hand in which a player with what appear to be strong cards nevertheless loses.
it most प्रायः occurs जहाँ one खिलाड़ी bets the clearly stronger hand और उनके opponent makes a poor call that eventually `` हिट्स '' और विन्स.
There is no consensus among पोकर players as to what exactly constitutes a bad ताल and often खिलाड़ी will disagree about whether a particular hand थी a bad ताल.
the goldfish ( carassius auratus auratus ) is a freshwater मछली in the परिवार Cyprinidae of अनुक्रम cypriniformes.
It was one of the earliest fish to be domesticated, and is one of the सबसे commonly kept एक्वेरियम fish.
A relatively small सदस्य of the कार्प family ( which भी शामिल the koi carp and the crucian carp ), the goldfish is a domesticated version of a less-colorful कार्प ( Carassius auratus ) native to east एशिया.
It was पहला domesticated in China अधिक than a thousand सालो ago, and several distinct breeds have since महरूम developed.
Goldfish breeds vary greatly in आकार, देह shape, जोडे configuration और coloration ( various combinations of श्वेत, पीला, नारंगी, red, भूरा, और black हैं known ).

rouladen ( or rinderroulade, singular : roulade ) is a German meat roulade प्रायः consisting of बेकन, onions, सरसों और pickles wrapped in thinly sliced beef जिससे is तब cooked.
In some countries, the roulade is also known as `` beef olive ''.
बीफ or veal is used as meat though कुछ food scholars tend to believe that the असली संस्करण was probably venison or pork, और पोर्क is still popular in कुछ areas.
The बीफ rouladen as we know उन्हें today have become लोकप्रिय over the last सदी.
The काटें is usually topside बीफ or silverside चूंकि इस is the cheaper cut.
The अधिक महंगी version होता be the गोलाकार steak, भी ज्ञात as rump steak.
The मांस is cut into large, thin slices.
the filling is a mixture of smoked and पकाया पोर्क belly, कटा onions and chopped अचार ( gurken ) which is at टाइम्स varied by adding minced meat, सॉसेज meat, पाइन nuts and mustard.
The mixture varies इससे region to region.
rouladen हैं traditionally served for dinner.
Red wine is often served with this dish.
Typical eukaryotic cell.
Cellular respiration is the नियत of the metabolic reactions and processes that लो प्लेस in the कोशिकाएं of जीवों to convert biochemical energy इससे nutrients into एडीनोसिन ट्राइफॉस्फेट ( ATP ), and then रिलीज waste products.
the प्रतिक्रियाएँ involved in श्वसन are catabolic reactions, which break विशाल molecules into smaller ones, releasing energy in the process as कमजोर so-called `` high-energy '' bonds are replaced by stronger bonds in the products.
Respiration is एक of the key तरीके a cell gains useful energy to fuel cellular activity.
सेल्यूलर श्वसन is माना an ऊष्माक्षेपी रेडॉक्स reaction.
the overall प्रतिक्रिया is broken into many छोटी ones when it occurs in the देह, सबसे of जिससे हैं रेडॉक्स प्रतिक्रियाएँ themselves.
हालांकि technically, सेल्यूलर श्वसन is a दहन reaction, it clearly करता नहीं resemble one when it occurs in a living cell.
This अंतर is because it occurs in many separate steps.
While the overall reaction is a दहन reaction, no single प्रतिक्रिया that comprises it is a combustion प्रतिक्रिया.
Nutrients that are commonly प्रयुक्त by एनिमल और plant cells in respiration include शुगर, अमीनो acids and वसीय acids, और a common oxidizing agent ( इलेक्ट्रॉन acceptor ) is आणविक ऑक्सीजन ( o2 ).
The उर्जा भंडारित in ATP ( its third phosphate समूह is weakly bonded to the rest of the अणु और is cheaply टूटा allowing stronger bonds to form, thereby transferring energy for use by the कोशिका ) can then be प्रयुक्त to drive प्रक्रियाओं requiring उर्जा, सहित biosynthesis, locomotion or परिवहन of अणुओं across कोशिका membranes.
Countries by 2011 GDP ( nominal ) according to the CIA World Factbook.
This आलेख includes a सूची of countries in the संसार sorted by उनके gross domestic product ( GDP ), the market value of all फाइनल goods and सेवाएं इससे a स्वदेश in a दिए साल.
The जीडीपी dollar estimates presented यहाँ are calculated at market or government official exchange rates.
Several economies जिससे हैं नहीं considered to be देशों ( world, the EU, and some निर्भर territories ) are included in the सूचियाँ because they appear in the स्त्रोत.
These economies हैं not ranked in the charts यहाँ, लकिन हैं listed where applicable.
The figures presented यहाँ do नहीं take into खाता differences in the cost of जीना in different countries, और the results can vary greatly from one year to another based on fluctuations in the exchange rates of the country 's करेंसी.
Such fluctuations may बदलें a country 's ranking इससे one year to the next, भी हालांकि they प्रायः मेक छोटी or no difference to the standard of जीना of its जनसांख्यिकी.
Therefore these figures should be प्रयुक्त with caution.
कुछ countries/regions may have नागरिकों जिससे are on औसत धनवान.
ये countries/regions could appear in this list as having a छोटी GDP.
This होता be क्युकी the country/region listed रै a small population, and therefore small कुल economy ; the GDP is गणना as the population times the wealth per capita.
comparisons of national माल हैं also अक्सर made on the आधार of खरीदना शक्ति parity ( ppp ), to adjust लिये differences in the cost of जीना in different countries.
( See सूची of देशों by GDP ( PPP ) )
ppp largely removes the exchange रेट problem, but has its own drawbacks ; it does not reflect the मान of आर्थिक output in अंतरराष्ट्रीय trade, और it also requires अधिक estimation than नाममात्र GDP.
on the whole, ppp per capita figures हैं more narrowly spread than nominal जीडीपी per capita figures.
The पहला list includes आंकड़ा compiled by the संयुक्त Nations आंकडे प्रभाग for 2011.
The second list largely includes आंकड़ा ( अनुमान ) compiled by the International मौद्रिक निधि for 2012.
the तीसरा सूची shows the संसार Bank 's mostly 2011 estimates, and the चौथी list includes mostly 2012 estimates from the सीआईए World Factbook.
Lapping is a machining process, in which two surfaces हैं rubbed साथ with an abrasive between उन्हें, by हाथ गति or by रास्ता of a machine.
This can take दो फ़ॉर्म.
the पहला type of lapping ( traditionally पुकारा grinding ), typically involves rubbing a भंगुर material such as कांच against a surface such as आयरन or glass itself ( also known as the `` गोद '' or पीस tool ) साथ an abrasive ऐसे as एल्यूमिनियम oxide, jeweller 's रूज, optician 's रूज, emery, सिलिकॉन carbide, डायमंड, etc., in between उन्हें.
This produces microscopic conchoidal fractures as the abrasive rolls परिचय between the दो सतहों and removes material from both.
The other form of lapping involves a softer material such as pitch or a ceramic लिये the lap, जिससे is `` चार्ज '' with the अक्खड़.
The lap is then प्रयुक्त to काटें a harder material—the workpiece.
the अक्खड़ embeds भीतर the softer material जिससे holds it और permits it to score across and cut the harder material.
लिया to a finer सीमा, इस will produce a polished सतह ऐसे as साथ a polishing cloth on an ऑटोमोबाइल, or a polishing cloth or पॉलिशिंग पिच upon कांच or steel.
लिया to the ultimate सीमा, साथ the सहायता of accurate interferometry और specialized पॉलिशिंग machines or skilled hand polishing, lensmakers can produce surfaces that are चपटा to बेहतर than 30 nanometers.
This is एक twentieth of the wavelength of light इससे the commonly used 632.8 nm helium नियॉन laser light source.
सतहों this flat can be molecularly bonded ( optically contacted ) by bringing them together under the right conditions.
( This is not the same as the wringing प्रभाव of Johansson blocks, although it is similar ).
the term `` America 's टोली '' is a लोकप्रिय उपनाम in the United States that refers to the डलास Cowboys in the National फ़ुटबॉल लीग.
The nickname originated with the team 's 1978 highlight film, where the narrator opens with the following introduction : The term is recognized and प्रायः प्रयुक्त by मीडिया outlets, including ESPN, याहू !, HBO Sports, and Sports Illustrated.
My दाई 's a Vampire ( French : Ma gardienne est un vampire ) is a 2011 कनाडाई टेलीविज़न श्रेणी, आधारित on the टेलीविज़न film of the same नाम.
In Canada, the श्रेणी premiered in फ्रेंच on Télétoon on February 28, 2011, in English on teletoon on March 14, 2011, और on Disney Channel in the United राज्य on June 27, 2011.
The show was created by Fresh TV, creators of 6teen and Total Drama.
The show फ़ॉलो Ethan Morgan ( मैथ्यू Knight ), जो, in the television फिल्मी, learns that his दाई Sarah ( Vanessa मॉर्गन ) is a पिशाच.
in the film, he learns he is समर्थ to have visions and उसके best friend बेनी वीयर ( Atticus मिशेल ) is a spellmaster.
The series फ़ॉलो the three as they take on अलौकिक forces and have adventures, with occasional सहायता from fellow vampires रोरी ( Cameron Kennedy ) and Erica ( Kate टॉड ), जबकि dealing साथ the troubles of regular ऊँची स्कूल life.

A पिकअप truck or pick-up, often simply referred to as a pickup, is a light motor vehicle साथ an open-top, पश्च कार्गो area ( bed ).
In उत्तर अमेरिका, the term pickup is प्रयुक्त for लाइट trucks with a हल्का ड्यूटी chassis and factory built, एकीकृत bed, as well as for coupé यूटिलिटी vehicles, often आधारित on a निजी car chassis, but also प्रायः on a special dedicated chassi for ऐसे उपयोग.
कुछ countries have their अपना शर्तें similar to पिकअप, such as ute in Australia and नई Zealand, or bakkie in South Africa.
विशाल पिकअप ट्रक are somewhat rare in Europe, जहाँ वैन and लाइट lorries are commonly प्रयुक्त for similar roles.
The President of the United States of America ( POTUS ) is the सिर of state and head of सरकारी of the United राज्य.
The president leads the executive शाखा of the federal सरकारी and is the commander-in-chief of the United राज्य हथियारबंद शक्तियां.
Article ii of the U.S. Constitution vests the कार्यपालिका power of the संयुक्त राज्य in the president and charges him with the निष्पादन of federal विधि, alongside the responsibility of appointing संघीय executive, diplomatic, regulatory, and न्यायिक officers, and concluding treaties साथ विदेशी powers, with the advice and consent of the सीनेट.
the अध्यक्ष is further सशक्त to grant federal pardons और reprieves, and to convene and adjourn either or both घरों of कॉंग्रेस अंतर्गत असाधारण हालातों.
Since the founding of the संयुक्त States, the power of the president and the संघीय सरकारी have grown substantially and प्रत्येक आधुनिक अध्यक्ष, despite possessing no formal legislative powers परे हस्ताक्षर or vetoing congressionally passed bills, is largely responsible लिये dictating the legislative agenda of his party और the foreign and domestic policy of the United States.
The अध्यक्ष is frequently वर्णित as the most powerful person in the world.
The president is indirectly elected by the people through the Electoral College to a four-year term, and is one of तभी two nationally elected federal officers, the other होने the वाइस अध्यक्ष of the United States.
the Twenty-second Amendment, adopted in 1951, prohibits anyone इससे कभी होने elected to the presidency लिये a third full term.
it also prohibits a व्यक्ति इससे होने elected to the presidency more than once if that व्यक्ति previously had served as president, or acting president, for more than दो years of another person 's पद as president.
in all, 43 individuals have served 55 four-year शर्तें.
on January 20, 2009, Barack Obama became the 44th और current president.
on नवम्बर 6, 2012, he was re-elected and is scheduled to serve जबतक जनवरी 20, 2017.
बोतलबंद mineral water
बोतलबंद water is drinking water ( e.g., well water, distilled water, Mineral जल, or वसन्त जल ) packaged in प्लास्टिक or कांच जल बोतलों.
Bottled water may be carbonated or नहीं.
Sizes range from small single serving बोतलों to large carboys for जल coolers.
मैप of the major नदियाँ, झीलों, और reservoirs in इण्डिया
मैप प्रर्दशित नदियाँ and flood prone क्षेत्रों in इण्डिया
Rivers of इण्डिया खेल an important भूमिका in the lives of the Indian people.
The river प्रणालियों provide irrigation, potable water, cheap परिवहन, विद्युत, और the livelihoods लिये a large number of people all over the country and to rural areas.
This easily explains why nearly all the प्रमुख cities of India are located by the banks of rivers.
The नदियाँ also have an important भूमिका in Hindu mythology and हैं considered holy by all हिन्दुओं in the देश.
सात major नदियाँ साथ with their numerous tributaries make up the river प्रणाली of इण्डिया.
Most of the नदियाँ pour उनके waters into the Bay of बंगाल ; however, some of the rivers जिनकी courses take उन्हें through the पश्चिमी भाग of the country and towards the east of the state of himachal pradesh खाली into the Arabian समुद्र.
Parts of लद्दाख, northern parts of the aravlli दायरा and the arid parts of the थार मरुस्थल have inland नाले.
Dr.Francis Buchanan surveyed the courses of the नदियाँ of India along साथ their tributaries और शाखाओं in 1810-11 AD and प्रस्तुत a minute account of it.
the shifting of the courses and bed over the सदियां is बहुत उल्लेखनीय.
Many of the channels mentioned in that survey have अभी become मुर्दे, dried or even विलुप्त.
All प्रमुख नदियाँ of India originate इससे one of the तीन प्रमुख watersheds :
the हिमालय and the Karakoram सीमाएँ
Vindhya and Satpura सीमाएँ and Chotanagpur पठार in central India
Sahyadri or Western Ghats in पश्चिमी इण्डिया
the Bretton वुड्स system of मौद्रिक management स्थापित the rules लिये वाणिज्यिक और financial relations among the संसार 's प्रमुख औद्योगिक राज्य in the mid-20th century.
The bretton Woods system was the पहला उदाहरण of a fully negotiated मौद्रिक order intended to govern monetary relations among स्वतंत्र nation-states.
Preparing to rebuild the international economic प्रणाली as World युद्ध ii थी still raging, 730 delegates from सब 44 अलाइड nations gathered at the माउंट Washington Hotel in bretton वुड्स, नई Hampshire, United States, for the United Nations Monetary और Financial सम्मेलन.
The delegates deliberated दौरान 1–22 July 1944, and हस्ताक्षरित the Agreement on its फाइनल day.
Setting up a system of rules, institutions, और procedures to विनियमित the international मौद्रिक प्रणाली, the planners at Bretton Woods established the International Monetary Fund ( IMF ) and the International बैंको for पुनर्निर्माण and Development ( IBRD ), जिससे today is भाग of the World Bank Group.
These organizations became operational in 1945 बाद a sufficient क्रमांक of countries had ratified the agreement.
the मुख्य सुविधाएँ of the Bretton Woods system were an दायित्व लिये प्रत्येक country to अपनाना a monetary policy that maintained the एक्सचेंज rate by tying its करेंसी to the u.S. dollar और the ability of the IMF to सेतु अस्थाई imbalances of payments.
On 15 August 1971, the संयुक्त States unilaterally terminated convertibility of the us $ to gold.
इस brought the bretton Woods system to an end and saw the dollar become fiat currency.
This action, referred to as the निक्सन shock, created the हालात in which the United राज्य dollar became a आरक्षित currency used by अनेक states.
at the same time, अनेक fixed currencies ( such as GBP, for example ), भी became फ़्री floating.
Ducati Motor Holding S.p.A. is an Italian कम्पनी that डिजाइन और manufactures motorcycles.
Headquartered in Bologna, इटली, डुकाटी is स्वामित्व by Audi through its Italian subsidiary Lamborghini.
A credit स्कोर is a numerical expression आधारित on a सांख्यिकीय analysis of a person 's क्रेडिट files, to represent the creditworthiness of that व्यक्ति.
a क्रेडिट score is primarily based on क्रेडिट रपट information typically sourced इससे credit bureaus.
Lenders, ऐसे as banks and credit कार्ड companies, use credit स्कोर to evaluate the potential रिस्क posed by lending money to consumers और to mitigate losses due to bad debt.
Lenders use credit scores to determine who qualifies for a loan, at what ब्याज rate, and what credit limits.
Lenders also उपयोग credit स्कोर to determine जिससे customers are likely to bring in the most revenue.
The use of क्रेडिट or पहचान scoring prior to authorizing access or granting credit is an क्रियान्वयन of a विश्वसनीय प्रणाली.
Credit स्कोरिंग is not सीमित to banks.
Other संगठन, ऐसे as mobile phone companies, बीमे companies, landlords, and सरकारी departments employ the same तकनीकों.
Credit scoring भी has a लॉट of overlap साथ data mining, जिससे उपयोग many similar तकनीकों.
ये techniques combine हज़ारों of factors लकिन they are अधिक or कम similar or the same.
the सात SI आधार units and the interdependency of their definitions : लिये example, to निकालें the परिभाषा of the metre from the गति of light, the परिभाषा of the second must be known while the ampere and candela are both dependent on the परिभाषा of energy जिससे in फेरे is defined in शर्तें of length, द्रव्यमान और time.
The International प्रणाली of Units ( si ) defines सात इकाई of measure as a मौलिक set from जिससे all अन्य SI units are derived.
These si base units और उनके शारीरिक quantities are:
metre लिये length ( us अंग्रेज़ी : मीटर )
kilogram लिये द्रव्यमान ( नोट : not the gram )
दूसरी लिये time
ampere for electric वर्तमान
kelvin for तापमान
candela for luminous intensity
mole for the राशि of substance.
the SI base quantities रूप a set of mutually स्वतंत्र आयाम as required by dimensional analysis commonly employed in science और technology.
However, in a दिए realization of these इकाई वे may खूब be interdependent, i.e. defined in terms of each अन्य.
The names of SI इकाई हैं written in lowercase वर्ण ( the 'degree सेल्सियस ' meets इस rule, as 'degree ' is the ईकाई, और 'celsius ' is a modifier ).
the प्रतीकों of इकाई are लिखा in lowercase ( e.g. मीटर has the प्रतीक m ), मगर that प्रतीकों लिये units नामित बाद persons are written साथ an आरंभिक capital letter ( e.g., the hertz has the अपरकेस symbol hz ).
अनेक other units, such as the लीटर ( us अंग्रेज़ी : liter ), हैं formally not भाग of the SI, लकिन are accepted लिये use with si.
स्मारक Canyon
कोलोराडो नेशनल Monument ( locally referred to as The Monument ) is a भाग of the नेशनल पार्क Service near the नगर of Grand Junction, Colorado.
Spectacular canyons काटें deep into sandstone and even granite–gneiss–schist चट्टान formations, in कुछ areas.
This is an क्षेत्रफल of मरुस्थल land high on the कोलोराडो पठार, with पिनियन और juniper forests on the पठार.
The park hosts a चौड़ी दायरा of wildlife, including red-tailed चीलों and golden ईगल्स, ravens, jays, desert bighorn sheep, और coyotes.
क्रियाएँ include चढ़ाई, horseback सवारी, road bicycling, और दर्शनीय ड्राइव ; a visitor center on the west side contains a natural history संग्रहालय और gift दूकान.
वहीँ हैं magnificent दृश्य from trails और the Rim Rock Drive, which हवाएँ along the पठार.
आसपास are the किताब cliffs, और the largest flat-topped mountain in the world, the Grand Mesa.
Its feature attraction is स्मारक Canyon, which रनों the width of the पार्क, and शामिल rock formations ऐसे as स्वतंत्रता Monument, the Kissing Couple, और कोक Ovens.
The monument includes 20,500 acres ( 32 square miles ), much of which has महरूम recommended to Congress लिये designation as wilderness.
left to right : यूटिलिटी वर्दी, ब्लू Dress Uniform, सेवा वर्दी, and Evening पोशाक वर्दी
the वर्दी of the संयुक्त राज्य समुद्री Corps serve to फर्क Marines from सदस्यों of अन्य सेवाएं.
Among current uniforms in the संयुक्त States Armed Forces, the marines ' uniforms have been in सेवा the longest.
The समुद्री Dress ब्लू वर्दी रै, साथ few परिवर्तन, been worn in essentially इसके वर्तमान रूप since the 19th century.
North American टेलीफोन क्षेत्रफल कोड 419 और 567 serve the उत्तरपश्चिम quadrant of the U.S. राज्य of ओहियो.
The largest city परोसा by these area codes is Toledo ( और इसके suburbs of Holland, Maumee, northwood, Oregon, Ottawa Hills, Perrysburg, Rossford, sylvania, swanton, waterville, and whitehouse ).
अन्य cities परोसा by these क्षेत्रफल codes शामिल एडीए, Ashland, Bellevue, Bluffton, Bowling Green, ब्रायन, bucyrus, celina, क्लाइड, Crestline, Defiance, Delphos, Edison, Erastus, Findlay, fostoria, fremont, Galion, kenton, Lima, Mansfield, Mount gilead, नेपोलियन, नॉरवॉक, Oak हार्बर, Port क्लिंटन, sandusky, Shelby, St. marys, tiffin, अपर sandusky, Van Wert, wapakoneta, Wauseon, willard.
अन्य क्षेत्रों परोसा include the झील Erie Islands north of बंदरगाहों Clinton and west of Sandusky.
The प्रमुख area कोड, 419, was निर्मित as एक of the असली क्षेत्रफल कोड in अक्तूबर 1947 ; the overlay area code 567 थी निर्मित on January 1, 2002.
Despite the presence of Toledo, the state 's fourth-largest city, 419 was the last of Ohio 's original four क्षेत्रफल codes to have महरूम विभाजित or overlaid.
मिकी Leroy gilley ( born March 9, 1936 ) is an American country music सिंगर and संगीतकार.
हालांकि he started out singing straight-up country and पश्चिमी material in the 1970s, he moved towards a अधिक पॉप -friendly sound in the 1980s, bringing उसे further कामयाबी on नहीं बस the country चार्ट, लकिन the pop charts as well.
among his biggest हिट्स हैं `` Room Full of Roses, '' `` Do n't the लड़कियों सब मिलेंगी prettier at Closing Time, '' and the रीमेक of the Soul hit `` Stand by Me ``.
he is भी the cousin of Jerry Lee लुईस, Carl McVoy, Jim Gilley and Jimmy swaggart.

the September 11 attacks ( भी referred to as September 11, सितंबर 11th, or 9/11 ) were a series of four coordinated आतंकवादी attacks launched by the इस्लामी आतंकवादी group al-Qaeda upon the United States in New York City और the Washington, d.C. area on सितंबर 11, 2001.
Four passenger airliners were hijacked by 19 al-qaeda terrorists so they could be flown into buildings in suicide हमले.
दो of those planes, American Airlines उड़ान 11 और United एयरलाइंस उड़ान 175, were क्रैश into the उत्तर और दक्षिण मीनारें, respectively, of the संसार Trade Center जटिल in New यॉर्क City.
Within दो घंटों, दोनो towers collapsed साथ मलबा and the resulting fires causing partial or complete पतन of all अन्य buildings in the wtc complex, as well as major damage to ten other विशाल surrounding structures.
A third plane, American एयरलाइंस Flight 77, was crashed into the प्रस्तुतीकरण ( the मुख्यालय of the संयुक्त States विभाग of Defense ), अग्रणी to a आंशिक पतन in its western side.
The fourth plane, United Airlines Flight 93, was targeted at the United States कैपिटल in Washington, D.C., but क्रैश into a field near Shanksville, पेन्सिलवेनिया, after इसके passengers tried to overcome the hijackers.
In कुल, लगभग 3,000 people died in the attacks, including the 227 civilians and 19 hijackers सवार the four planes.
Suspicion जल्दी गिरी on al-Qaeda.
Although the group 's leader, ओसामा बिन Laden, initially अस्वीकृत कोई भागीदारी, in 2004 he claimed responsibility for the हमले.
Al-Qaeda और bin Laden cited U.S. support of Israel, the presence of U.S. troops in Saudi Arabia, and प्रतिबंधों against Iraq as motives for the attacks.
The संयुक्त राज्य responded to the हमले by launching the War on आतंक and आक्रमणकारी Afghanistan to depose the Taliban, जिससे था harbored al-Qaeda.
Many countries strengthened their anti-terrorism legislation and expanded law प्रवर्तन powers.
Having evaded capture लिये years, bin लादेन was located and killed by u.S. शक्तियां in May 2011.
The विनाश of the Twin मीनारें and other गुण caused गंभीर damage to the economy of Lower Manhattan and had a significant प्रभाव on global बाज़ार.
क्लीनअप of the World Trade Center साईट थी समाप्त in May 2002, और the प्रस्तुतीकरण was repaired भीतर a साल.
numerous memorials have महरूम constructed, सहित the National September 11 Memorial & संग्रहालय in नई York, the प्रस्तुतीकरण Memorial, और the उड़ान 93 नेशनल Memorial in Pennsylvania.
After a lengthy विलंब, the One संसार व्यापार बीच is अपेक्षित to be completed at Ground शून्य in New York City in 2013.
Finding nemo is a 2003 American computer-animated comedy-drama adventure फिल्मी written and directed by एंड्रयू stanton, released by Walt Disney तस्वीरें, और the fifth फिल्मी उत्पादित by Pixar Animation studios.
It tells the स्टोरी of the over-protective clownfish named Marlin ( Albert Brooks ) who, साथ साथ a regal tang नामित Dory ( Ellen degeneres ), searches for his abducted son nemo ( सिकंदर gould ) all the way to Sydney Harbour.
साथ the way, Marlin learns to take risks और let Nemo लो care of himself.
It is Pixar 's पहला फिल्मी to be released in cinemas in the northern hemisphere गर्मियाँ.
The film was re-released लिये the first time in 3d on सितंबर 14, 2012, and it was released on Blu-ray on December 4, 2012.
a sequel, ढूंढना Dory, is फिलहाल in development, नियत to be released on नवम्बर 25, 2015.
The film received universal critical acclaim and won the Academy पुरस्कार for Best Animated विशेषता, and was nominated in तीन अधिक categories सहित Best असली Screenplay.
It थी the second highest-grossing film of 2003, earning a total of $ 921 million विश्वव्यापी.
ढूंढना nemo is also the best-selling dvd of सब समय, with over 40 million copies बेची as of 2006, and was the highest-grossing G-rated film of all time before Pixar 's own Toy Story 3 overtook it.
It is also the 23rd highest-grossing फिल्मी of सब time, as well as the 3rd highest-grossing animated film.
in 2008, the American Film संस्थान नामित it the tenth greatest animated फिल्मी ever made दौरान their Top 10.
the sixth season of अमेरिका 's Best नृत्य Crew, भी known as अमेरिका 's Best नृत्य Crew : ऋतु of the Superstars, premiered on April 7, 2011 and concluded on June 5, 2011.
Auditions were held in चार cities इससे जनवरी 21 through फ़रवरी 5 : शिकागो, Houston, नई York, and Los एंजिल्स.

in the United States, सोशल सुरक्षा refers to the Old-Age, survivors, और विकलांगता Insurance ( OASDI ) federal कार्यक्रम.
The original Social Security अधिनियम ( 1935 ) and the current संस्करण of the Act, as amended, encompass अनेक social welfare and social बीमे कार्यक्रम.
Social सुरक्षा is primarily funded through dedicated payroll taxes called Federal Insurance योगदान Act कर ( fica ).
Tax जमा हैं formally entrusted to the Federal old-age and survivors बीमे Trust Fund, the संघीय विकलांगता Insurance विश्वास निधि, the Federal हॉस्पिटल बीमे विश्वास Fund, or the Federal Supplementary Medical बीमे Trust निधि जिससे comprise the सोशल सुरक्षा विश्वास Fund.
Upward redistribution of income is responsible लिये about 43 % of the projected सोशल सुरक्षा shortfall over the next 75 years.
according to economist Martin Feldstein, the संयुक्त spending लिये all सोशल insurance programs in 2003 constituted 37 % of सरकारी expenditure and 7 % of the gross domestic उत्पाद.
सोशल Security is currently estimated to रखना roughly 40 percent of all Americans आयु 65 or पुरानी out of गरीबी.
the Social Security प्रशासन is headquartered in woodlawn, मेरीलैंड, बस west of Baltimore.
The दारू by आवाज़ दिखाया on a bottle of absinthe.
दारू by volume ( abbreviated as abv, abv, or alc/vol ) is a standard measure of how much दारू ( ethanol ) is contained in an alcoholic beverage ( expressed as a percentage of total volume ).
The abv मानक is used worldwide.
In कुछ देशों, alcohol by volume is referred to as डिग्री Gay-Lussac ( बाद the French chemist जोसेफ Louis gay-lussac ).

Charles जॉन huffam डिकेंस ( ; 7 February 1812 – 9 June 1870 ) was an English writer and सोशल आलोचक.
he created कुछ of the संसार 's सबसे memorable fictional characters and is generally regarded as the महानतम novelist of the Victorian period.
During his जीवन, उसके works enjoyed unprecedented कीर्ति, और by the बीसवीं सदी his literary genius थी broadly acknowledged by आलोचकों and विद्वानों.
His novels and short stories continue to be widely popular.
Born in Portsmouth, इंग्लैण्ड, डिकेंस बाएँ school to work in a factory after उसके father थी thrown into कर्जदार ' prison.
हालांकि he था छोटी औपचारिक शिक्षा, उसके जल्दी impoverishment drove उसे to सफल.
Over उसके करियर he edited a साप्ताहिक जर्नल for 20 years, wrote 15 novels, 5 novellas और hundreds of short कहानियां and non-fiction articles, lectured and performed extensively, was an indefatigable letter लेखक, और campaigned vigorously लिये children 's rights, शिक्षा, and other social reforms.
Dickens sprang to fame with the 1836 serial प्रकाशन of the Pickwick Papers.
Within a few years he था become an अंतरराष्ट्रीय literary celebrity, famous for उसके humour, व्यंग्य, और keen observation of character और समाज.
उसके novels, most published in monthly or साप्ताहिक instalments, pioneered the serial प्रकाशन of कथा fiction, जिससे became the प्रबल विक्टोरियन mode for novel प्रकाशन.
The किस्त स्वरूप अनुमत Dickens to evaluate his दर्शक 's reaction, and he प्रायः modified उसके प्लाट and अक्षर development based on such feedback.
For example, जब his wife 's chiropodist expressed distress at the रास्ता मिस mowcher in दाउद Copperfield लगा to प्रतिबिंबित her disabilities, डिकेंस गई on to improve the character with धनात्मक lineaments.
fagin in ओलिवर ट्विस्ट apparently mirrors the प्रसिद्ध fence Ikey सुलेमान ; His caricature of leigh Hunt in the फिगर of Mr Skimpole in bleak House थी likewise toned down on सलाह from some of उसके friends, as they read episodes.
in the वही novel, both Lawrence Boythorne और मूनी the beadle are drawn from real जीवन – boythorne इससे Walter Savage landor and Mooney from 'Looney ', a beadle at Salisbury वर्गाकार.
His plots were carefully constructed, और Dickens प्रायः wove in तत्व from topical events into his narratives.
Masses of the illiterate ग़रीब chipped in ha'pennies to have each new monthly एपीसोड read to them, खोलने up and inspiring a new class of readers.
डिकेंस was regarded as the साहित्यिक colossus of his age.
His 1843 novella, a Christmas Carol, is one of the most influential works कभी written, and it remains लोकप्रिय और continues to inspire adaptations in every artistic genre.
उसके creative genius has been praised by fellow writers—from leo टालस्टाय to G. K. चेस्टरटन and जार्ज Orwell —for इसके realism, comedy, prose style, unique characterisations, and सोशल आलोचना.
On the अन्य हाथ ऑस्कर वाइल्ड, हेनरी जेम्स और वर्जिनिया Woolf complained of a lack of मनोवैज्ञानिक depth, loose लिखने, और a रग of saccharine sentimentalism.
मार्टिन Luther किंग और other civil अधिकारों leaders in front of the statue of Abraham Lincoln, August 28, 1963
the सिविल अधिकारों movement was a series of विश्वव्यापी राजनैतिक आंदोलनों लिये समता पहले the law कि peaked in the 1960s.
In many situations it took the form of अभियान of सिविल resistance aimed at achieving change by nonviolent forms of resistance.
In कुछ situations it was accompanied, or followed, by सिविल अशांति और हथियारबंद विद्रोह.
the process was long और tenuous in अनेक countries, और many of these movements did not fully achieve उनके goals हालांकि, the प्रयत्न of these आंदोलनों किया lead to सुधार in the legal rights of previously दलित groups of people.
The main aim of the civil rights movement शामिल, and include, ensuring कि the rights of all लोगों हैं equally protected by the law, including the rights of minorities.
Civil rights movements ranging from the वैश्विक lgbt अधिकारों गति to the global महिलाओं 's rights गति to various racial अल्पसंख्यक rights movements around the world continue.
The 2010 फीफा World Cup was the 19th FIFA World Cup, the world championship for men 's नेशनल संघ फ़ुटबॉल टीमों.
it took place in South अफ़्रीकी from 11 जून to 11 July 2010.
the bidding process for होस्टिंग the टूर्नामेंट finals was खोलें only to African राष्ट्र ; in 2004, the international फ़ुटबॉल federation, FIFA, selected South Africa over Egypt and Morocco to become the first अफ़्रीकी nation to host the फाइनल.
The matches were निभाई in ten stadiums in नौ मेजबान cities around the देश, with the फाइनल निभाई at the सॉकर City स्टेडियम in दक्षिण अफ़्रीकी 's largest city, Johannesburg.
Thirty-two teams यहूद चयनित for भागीदारी via a worldwide qualification tournament that began in अगस्त 2007.
in the first गोलाकार of the tournament finals, the teams competed in round-robin groups of four teams for points, साथ the top two teams in each group proceeding.
These sixteen teams advanced to the नॉकआउट stage, जहाँ three rounds of खेल decided which teams would participate in the final.
in the फाइनल, Spain, the European champions, defeated third-time finalists the नीदरलैंड्स 1–0 after अतिरिक्त time, साथ आन्द्रेस iniesta 's goal in the 116th minute giving Spain their first world शीर्षक, बनने the eighth स्वदेश to जीत the टूर्नामेंट, and the पहला European nation to जीत the टूर्नामेंट बाहर its घर continent.
मेजबान स्वदेश South अफ़्रीकी, 2006 world champions Italy और 2006 runners-up फ़्रांस were all eliminated in the first round of the tournament.
it was the पहला समय that the hosts यहूद eliminated in the पहला round.
नई जीलैंड साथ their three draws यहूद the only अपराजित टोली in the tournament, but were also eliminated in the पहला गोलाकार.
The McMuffin is a family of नाश्ता sandwiches in various sizes और configurations, बेची by the fast-food restaurant कड़ी मैकडोनाल्ड 's.
The अंडा mcmuffin is the हस्ताक्षर नाश्ता सैंडविच ; it थी invented by the late McDonald 's franchisee हर्ब पीटरसन in the लेट 1960s and was introduced nationwide in 1972.
जॉन Lennon थी an English musician who gained worldwide fame as one of the founders of The Beatles, लिये his subsequent सोलो करियर, और लिये his राजनैतिक activism and शांतिवाद.
he was shot by Mark David chapman at the प्रवेश of the building जहाँ he lived, the Dakota, in नई यॉर्क City on 8 दिसम्बर 1980.
लेनन had just लौटे from रिकार्ड संयंत्र स्टुडियो साथ his wife, Yoko Ono.
लेनन was pronounced मुर्दे on arrival at St. Luke's-Roosevelt Hospital Center, where it was stated कि nobody could have जिया लिये अधिक than a few मिनट्स बाद sustaining ऐसे चोटों.
shortly after लोकल news स्टेशन reported Lennon 's death, crowds gathered at रूज़वेल्ट Hospital और in front of the Dakota.
Lennon थी cremated on 10 December 1980 at the Ferncliff कब्रिस्तान in Hartsdale, नई यॉर्क ; the ashes were given to Ono, जो chose not to hold a अंत्येष्टि for उसे.
The first report of Lennon 's death to a u.S. national audience was announced by Howard Cosell, on ABC 's Monday Night Football.
New Orleans ( or, locally or ; ) is a major United राज्य port और the largest city और metropolitan area in the state of louisiana.
the जनसांख्यिकी of the city थी 343,829 as of the 2010 U.S. Census.
the New Orleans metropolitan area ( New orleans–metairie–kenner Metropolitan Statistical Area ) had a population of 1,167,764 in 2010 and was the 46th largest in the संयुक्त राज्य.
the New Orleans–Metairie–Bogalusa Combined सांख्यिकीय Area, a larger व्यापार क्षेत्रफल, had a 2010 population of 1,214,932.
the city is नामित after Orléans, a नगर located on the Loire River in Centre, फ़्रांस, and is well known लिये इसके distinct फ्रेंच क्रियोल वास्तुकला, as well as इसके cross-cultural and बहुभाषी विरासत.
New Orleans is also famous for इसके भोजन, music ( particularly as the जन्मस्थान of जैज़ ), और its सालाना जश्न और festivals, most notably Mardi ग्रा.
The नगर is प्रायः referred to as the `` सबसे unique '' in अमेरिका.
New Orleans is स्तिथ in southeastern louisiana, straddling the मिसिसिपी River.
the नगर और Orleans मोहल्ला ( ) are.
The city और parish हैं bounded by the parishes of St. Tammany to the north, st. Bernard to the east, plaquemines to the south and Jefferson to the south और वेस्ट.
Lake Pontchartrain, part of जिससे is included in the city हद, lies to the north और Lake Borgne झूठ to the east.
the United States presidential election of 1968 was the 46th quadrennial presidential election, held on Tuesday, नवम्बर 5, 1968.
The Republican nominee, पूर्व vice-president Richard निक्सन, won the election over the Democratic nominee, incumbent vice-president Hubert Humphrey.
निक्सन ran on a अभियान कि promised to restore law and order to the nation 's शहरों, torn by दंगे and crime.
विश्लेषकों have argued the election of 1968 is a realigning election as it permanently disrupted the नई Deal Coalition कि had वर्चस्व अध्यक्षीय politics for 36 सालो.
Coming four years after डेमोक्रेट Lyndon B. Johnson जीती in a historic भूस्खलन, the election देखी the incumbent president मजबूर आउट of the race and a Republican elected for the first time in बारह years.
it थी a wrenching नेशनल experience, conducted during a साल of violence कि included the हत्या of civil rights leader Martin लूथर King, jr., and subsequent race riots across the nation, the assasination of Democratic presidential candidate रॉबर्ट F. कैनेडी, widespread opposition to the Vietnam युद्ध आरपार university campuses, and violent confrontations between पुलिस and anti-war protesters at the 1968 लोकतांत्रिक नेशनल Convention as the लोकतांत्रिक party split again and again.
The election प्रदर्शित the strongest third पार्टी effort since 1912 by former Alabama Governor जार्ज Wallace, a डेमोक्रेट.
Because वालेस 's campaign opposed federal हस्तक्षेप in the दक्षिण to end school segregation, he carried the Deep दक्षिण और ran well in ethnic औद्योगिक districts in the North.
इस was the last election in which New यॉर्क had the most votes in the electoral कॉलेज ( 43 votes ).
बाद the 1970 census, California gained the सबसे electoral votes और has remained the most populous state चूंकि then.
इस is the latest election जहाँ a presidential ticket won बगैर carrying the vice presidential प्रत्याशी 's home state.
Karak ( ; भी known as Garak, Garrak, और gorg ) is a village in Gamasiyab ग्रामीण ज़िला, in the Central ज़िला of Nahavand County, हमादान Province, Iran.
At the 2006 census, इसके population थी 294, in 65 families.
