Kurt डोनाल्ड कोबेन ( फ़रवरी 20, 1967 – April 5, 1994 ) थी an American संगीतकार and artist, बेहतरीन ज्ञात as the सीसे singer, guitarist and primary songwriter of the grunge बैंड Nirvana.
Cobain formed निर्वाण with Krist Novoselic in Aberdeen, Washington in 1985 और स्थापित it as भाग of the सिएटल music झाँकी, having its debut album Bleach released on the स्वतंत्र रिकार्ड लेबल Sub पॉप in 1989.
After signing with major लेबल DGC Records, the बैंड मिला भेदन success साथ `` खुश्बू Like Teen Spirit `` from इसके दूसरी एल्बम Nevermind ( 1991 ).
following the success of nevermind, Nirvana was labeled `` the flagship बैंड '' of पीढी x, और Cobain hailed as `` the spokesman of a generation ''.
Cobain, however, थी often uncomfortable and कुंठित, believing उसके message और artistic vision to have महरूम misinterpreted by the पब्लिक, साथ his personal issues प्रायः subject to media attention.
he challenged Nirvana 's audience with its final studio album In Utero ( 1993 ).
During the पिछला years of his life, Cobain struggled with heroin addiction, illness and depression.
He भी था परेशानी coping साथ उसके fame और पब्लिक image, and the पेशेवर and lifelong निजी pressures surrounding himself and उसके बीवी, musician Courtney Love.
on April 8, 1994, Cobain थी found मुर्दे at उसके घर in Seattle, the victim of what was officially ruled a आत्महत्या by a self-inflicted shotgun घाव to the head.
The circumstances of उसके मौत at आयु 27 have become a topic of पब्लिक fascination और debate.
Since their debut, Nirvana, with Cobain as a songwriter, has बेची over 25 लाख एल्बम in the U.S., and over 50 million विश्वव्यापी.
a millwright is a craftsman or tradesman सगाई with the निर्माण और मेंटेनेंस of मशीनरी.
अधिक generally in the English speaking संसार, early millwrights यहूद विशेषज्ञ carpenters जो erected machines प्रयुक्त in कृषि, खाना processing and processing lumber and पेपर.
in the early part of the Industrial Revolution, उनके कौशल were दबाया into सेवा building the earliest संचालित वस्त्र mills.
Modern millwrights work साथ steel and other materials in जोड to लकडी and जरूर प्रायः combine the कौशल of several skilled trades in order to सफलतापूर्वक fabricate industrial machinery or to assemble machines from pre-fabricated parts.
the modern millwright must भी be able to read blueprints and other schematics to aid उसे in the निर्माण of जटिल systems.
millwrights are अक्सर unionized, साथ around 45 % unionized in the us, although अनुभवी millwrights often नियत themselves up as स्वतंत्र contractors.
the समायोजन Bureau is a 2011 अमरीकी romantic कार्रवाई thriller film loosely based on the Philip K. Dick short स्टोरी, `` Adjustment Team ``.
The film थी written और directed by जार्ज nolfi and सितारों मैट डैमन और एमिली कुंद.
The डाल also includes एंथोनी mackie, John Slattery, Michael Kelly, और Terence Stamp.
the score was composed by Thomas न्युमैन, साथ two गीतों by रिचर्ड Ashcroft ( `` भविष्य 's Bright '' for the खोलने sequence ; `` Are You तैयार ? '' लिये the closing credits ).
Sodium azide is the inorganic यौगिक साथ the formula NaN3.
This colorless salt is the gas-forming घटक in many car airbag systems.
It is used लिये the preparation of other azide यौगिकों.
It is an ionic substance, is highly soluble in जल, and is very acutely toxic.
Double रेनबो और supernumerary rainbows on the अंदर of the प्राथमिक arc.
The छाया of the फ़ोटोग्राफ़र 's सिर on the bottom marks the केन्द्र of the रेनबो circle ( antisolar point ).
A rainbow is an ऑप्टिकल और meteorological phenomenon that is caused by reflection of लाइट in water droplets in the धरती 's माहौल, resulting in a वर्णक्रम of light appearing in the sky.
it takes the form of a multicoloured चाप.
rainbows caused by sunlight सदा appear in the section of sky सीधे opposite the सूर्य.
in a `` प्राथमिक रेनबो '', the arc shows red on the outer भाग and violet on the inner side.
This रेनबो is caused by light होने refracted जबकि प्रवेश a droplet of water, then reflected inside on the वापस of the droplet और refracted again जब leaving it.
In a double rainbow, a second arc is seen बाहर the प्राथमिक arc, and रै the अनुक्रम of its colours reversed, red facing toward the अन्य one, in दोनो rainbows.
इस दूसरी रेनबो is caused by लाइट reflecting twice inside water droplets.
The Conservative पार्टी, officially the रूढ़िवादी and Unionist Party और colloquially referred to as the tory Party or the Tories, is a centre-right राजनैतिक party in the संयुक्त किंगडम that espouses the philosophies of कोसा and अंग्रेजों unionism.
it is the largest राजनैतिक party in the United किंगडम, होने the largest सिंगल party in the House of Commons with 303 mps, the largest party in local government साथ 9,391 councillors, and the largest अंग्रेजों पार्टी in the European Parliament with 25 MEPs.
it governs in गठबन्धन with the Liberal Democrats, with party leader David Cameron as Prime Minister.
the Conservative Party थी founded in 1834, और थी एक of two प्रबल parties in the 19th century, along साथ the उदार पार्टी.
It बदला its name to the रूढ़िवादी और Unionist Party in 1912 बाद merging साथ the उदार यूनियनिस्ट पार्टी, although that नाम is rarely प्रयुक्त और it is generally referred to as simply the Conservative पार्टी.
in the 1920s, the उदार vote greatly diminished and the श्रमिक Party became the conservatives ' main rivals.
रूढ़िवादी Prime मंत्रियों led governments for 57 years of the 20th century, सहित विंस्टन Churchill ( 1940–45, 1951–55 ) and मार्गरेट थैचर ( 1979–90 ).
Thatcher 's tenure led to wide-ranging economic उदारीकरण and saw the Conservatives become the most eurosceptic of the three major parties.
The party was returned to government in coalition, having failed to जीत a majority, in 2010 under the अधिक `` liberal '' नेतृत्व of David Cameron.
in the European पार्लियामेंट, the Conservatives हैं the largest British पार्टी साथ 25 MEPs, who बैठना साथ the soft eurosceptic यूरोपीय conservatives and Reformists ( ecr ) संसदीय समूह, जबकि the पार्टी itself is a सदस्य of the Alliance of European Conservatives and Reformists ( aecr ) Europarty.
They are the third-largest पार्टी in the स्कॉटिश Parliament and second-largest in the वेल्श सभा.
वे यहूद formally अलाइड to the Ulster यूनियनिस्ट पार्टी ( UUP ) as भाग of the Ulster Conservatives और unionists arrangement, with the uup currently participating in the five-party Northern Ireland Executive.
Destiny 's Child was an अमरीकी R & B girl group whose final, and perhaps most recognizable, line-up comprised बेयोंस नॉलेस, Kelly Rowland and मिशेल Williams.
formed in 1990 in Houston, Texas, नियति 's चाइल्ड सदस्यों began their musical endeavors as Girl 's टीमे comprising, among others, नॉलेस, rowland, latavia roberson and LeToya luckett.
After सालो of limited success, वे were हस्ताक्षरित to कोलंबिया Records as नियति 's चाइल्ड.
Destiny 's Child थी launched into mainstream recognition following the रिलीज of उनके best-selling दूसरी एल्बम, the Writing 's on the वॉल, जिससे contained the number-one singles `` बिल्स, Bills, Bills `` और `` Say my Name ``.
despite critical and वाणिज्यिक success, the group was plagued by internal विरोध and legal turmoil, as roberson और Luckett attempted to split from the समूह 's manager Mathew Knowles, citing favoritism of Knowles और Rowland, his बेटी और niece, respectively.
Both Roberson and Luckett were soon replaced with विलियम्स and Farrah Franklin ; however, in 2000, Franklin was dismissed, leaving उन्हें as a trio.
Their तीसरा एल्बम, उत्तरजीवी, जिससे contains themes the public interpreted as a channel to the group 's experience, contains the worldwide hits `` स्वतंत्र महिलाओं ``, `` Survivor `` and `` Bootylicious ``.
in 2002, वे announced a hiatus और re-united two years बाद लिये the रिलीज of उनके चौथी स्टुडियो एल्बम, नियति Fulfilled ( 2004 ).
Destiny 's चाइल्ड has बेची more than 50 million records worldwide to तिथि.
Billboard पत्रिका ranks the group as one of the greatest musical trios of all time, the ninth सबसे कामयाब artist/band of the 2000s, and placed the group 68th in its All-Time hot 100 कलाकारों सूची in 2008.
the centers लिये Disease Control and Prevention ( CDC ) is a United States संघीय एजेंसी under the Department of Health and Human Services headquartered in Druid पहाड़ियाँ, unincorporated dekalb County, Georgia, in वृहद अटलांटा.
It works to protect public स्वास्थ्य और सुरक्षा by providing information to enhance स्वास्थ्य decisions, and it promotes health through partnerships साथ state health विभाग और अन्य organizations.
the CDC focus national attention on developing and applying disease prevention और control ( especially infectious रोगों and foodborne pathogens और other microbial infections ), environmental स्वास्थ्य, occupational सुरक्षा and स्वास्थ्य, health promotion, चोट prevention and education activities designed to improve the health of the people of the संयुक्त States.
the सीडीसी is the United States ' national पब्लिक health institute and is a founding सदस्य of the अंतरराष्ट्रीय Association of नेशनल Public Health संस्थान.
भूकंप prediction `` is usually पारिभाषित as the specification of the time, स्थान, and परिमाण of a भविष्य earthquake within stated limits '', and विशेषकर of `` the अगला strong भूकंप to occur in a region. ''
इस can be distinguished from earthquake forecasting, which is the probabilistic assessment of सामान्य भूकंप hazard, including the frequency and परिमाण of damaging भूकंप, in a दिए area over periods of years or decades.
This can be further विशिष्ट from real-time भूकंप warning systems, which, upon डिटेक्शन of a कठोर earthquake, can provide neighboring regions a few seconds चेतावनी of potentially significant shaking.
To be उपयोगी, an भूकंप prediction जरूर be precise पर्याप्त to warrant the cost of increased precautions, including disruption of ordinary क्रियाएँ and commerce, and timely पर्याप्त कि preparation can be बना.
Predictions जरूर भी be विश्वसनीय, as false alarms and रद्द alarms हैं not only economically costly, लकिन seriously undermine confidence in, और thereby the प्रभावकारिता of, any kind of warning.
साथ over 7,000 earthquakes around the world each year with a परिमाण of 4.0 or वृहद, नगण्य success in earthquake prediction is easily obtained using sufficiently broad parameters of समय, स्थान, or magnitude.
However, such trivial `` successful पूर्वानुमान '' are not useful.
Major earthquakes हैं often followed by रिपोर्ट्स that they were पूर्वानुमानित, or at least anticipated, but no अर्जी of a successful prediction of a प्रमुख earthquake has बच close inquiry.
in the 1970s वहीँ थी तीव्र optimism amongst वैज्ञानिकों that some method of predicting भूकंप might be found, but by the 1990s continuing विफलता led many scientists to question whether it was even possible.
While अनेक वैज्ञानिकों स्टिल थाम that, given enough resources, prediction might be possible, अनेक अन्य maintain that earthquake भविष्यवाणी is inherently impossible.
डेबोरा Ann `` debby '' रयान ( born may 13, 1993 ) is an अमरीकी actress, singer, musician, songwriter और रिकार्ड निर्माता.
Ryan is best known for starring as Bailey पिकेट in the Disney Channel Original श्रेणी The सुइट जीवन on डेक.
In 2008, the Suite जीवन on Deck ranked as tv 's top श्रेणी among kids 6-11 और the no. 2 scripted श्रेणी among tweens 9-14.
रयान started acting in पेशेवर theatres at the age of सात ; in 2007 वो appeared in the Barney & Friends straight-to-dvd फिल्मी Barney : Let 's Go to the Firehouse and तब थी discovered in a nationwide search by Disney.
She is also ज्ञात for appearing in the 2008 विशेषता film the longshots as एडिथ.
in 2009, she guest स्ट्रक्चर in an एपीसोड of Wizards of waverly Place in Wizards on Deck साथ Hannah Montana as Bailey Pickett साथ with her अन्य cast mates इससे the Suite Life on Deck.
Then, in 2010, she starred in the फिल्मी 16 Wishes, जिससे थी the most watched cable program on the दिन of its premiere on the डिज़्नी चैनल.
16 Wishes introduced Ryan to new audiences ; the फिल्म प्राप्त ऊँची viewership in the वयस्कों demographic ( 18-34 ).
Soon after कि, Ryan स्ट्रक्चर in the independent theatrical film, What if..., which premiered on August 20, 2010.
Ryan भी स्ट्रक्चर in the नई Disney Channel Original movie, Radio Rebel, जहाँ वो portrays the role of tara Adams, a shy 17-year-old girl who adopts the रेडियो personality, Radio विद्रोही.
Released February 17, 2012.
रयान stars in the titular भूमिका in the डिज़्नी Channel Original श्रेणी, जेसी.
stührling tourbillon Movement ( ).
In horology, a tourbillon ( ; `` whirlwind '' ) is an addition to the यांत्रिकी of a watch escapement.
Developed around 1795 by the French-Swiss घड़ीसाज़ Abraham-Louis Breguet इससे an पहले विचार by the English chronometer मेकर जॉन अर्नाल्ड, a tourbillon aims to counter the effects of गम्भीरता by mounting the escapement and balance wheel in a rotating cage, to negate the effect of गम्भीरता जब the timepiece ( thus the escapement ) is stuck in a certain position.
Originally an attempt to improve accuracy, tourbillons हैं still included in some expensive आधुनिक घड़ियाँ as a विलक्षणता and demonstration of watchmaking virtuosity.
the यांत्रिकी is प्रायः exposed on the watch 's face to show it off.
The Windows Installer ( previously known as Microsoft Installer ) is a software component प्रयुक्त for the संस्थापना, maintenance, and removal of तन्त्र on modern Microsoft Windows systems.
The installation information, और प्रायः the files themselves, are packaged in संस्थापना packages, loosely relational databases संरचित as COM Structured Storages and commonly known as `` msi files '', इससे उनके डिफॉल्ट file extension.
Windows Installer contains significant changes from इसके predecessor, सेटअप API.
New सुविधाएँ शामिल a जीयूआई framework और स्वचालित पीढी of the uninstallation sequence.
खिड़कियाँ Installer is positioned as an वैकल्पिक to stand-alone executable installer frameworks ऐसे as older संस्करण of installshield and NSIS.
Microsoft encourages तीसरा पार्टियों to उपयोग Windows Installer as the basis लिये installation frameworks, so कि they synchronize correctly साथ other installers और keep the internal database of संस्थापित products consistent.
Important सुविधाएँ ऐसे as rollback and versioning depend on a सतत internal डेटाबेस for विश्वसनीय आपरेशन.
furthermore, Windows Installer facilitates the principle of least privilege by performing software संस्थापना by proxy लिये unprivileged users.
Four Loko is a line of alcoholic beverages, originally marketed as उर्जा drinks, बेची by phusion Projects of Chicago, इलिनोइस.
Phusion operates as Drink Four brewing कम्पनी.
चार लोको, the company 's most popular beverage, debuted in the United राज्य मार्केट in 2005.
it is अभी sold in 48 राज्य, and in Canada, The Bahamas, बोलीविया, होंडुरास, and यूरोपीय.
The नाम `` Four '' is derived from the original energy drink 's four main ingredients : दारू, कैफीन, taurine, and guarana.
चार ब्रांडेड products have महरूम the ऑब्जेक्ट of legal, ethical, and health चिंताएं सम्बन्धित to the कम्पनी allegedly marketing उन्हें to the underaged और the purported danger of combining दारू और कैफीन.
बाद the beverage was banned in several states, a उत्पाद reintroduction in दिसम्बर 2010 removed caffeine, taurine, और guarana as संघटक, and the malt beverage is no longer marketed as an energy drink.
the neck of a गिटार प्रर्दशित the नट ( in the background, coloured श्वेत ) and पहला four metal frets.
a fret is a raised तत्व on the गर्दन of a stringed instrument.
Frets usually extend across the पूरा width of the neck.
on most आधुनिक पश्चिमी fretted यंत्र, frets are मेटल स्ट्रिप्स inserted into the fingerboard.
On some ऐतिहासिक यंत्र और non-european instruments, frets are made of टुकड़े of string tied around the गर्दन.
Frets divide the गर्दन into फिक्स्ड segments at intervals related to a musical framework.
On instruments such as guitars, प्रत्येक fret represents one semitone in the standard western प्रणाली where एक octave is divided into twelve semitones.
Fret is प्रायः प्रयुक्त as a verb, meaning बस `` to दबायें bas the स्ट्रिंग पीछे a fret. ''
fretting often refers to the frets and/or उनके system of placement.
There थी खपत of alcohol दोनो दौरान और after prohibition.
the 18th amendment prohibited the production, वितरण और sale of alcoholic beverages in the United States और थी widely supported by the American पब्लिक when it went into effect in 1920.
the temperance movement था popularized the belief कि alcohol was the major cause of most personal और सोशल problems और prohibition was देखी as the समाधान to the स्वदेश 's poverty, crime, violence, और अन्य ills.
upon ratification of the amendment, the famous evangelist Billy Sunday said that `` The slums will जल्द be तभी a memory.
We will turn हमारी जेलों into कारखानों and हमारी jails into storehouses और corncribs. ''
( Compare christianity और alcohol. )
Since alcohol थी to be banned and since it थी seen as the cause of most, if not सब, crime, कुछ communities sold उनके jails.
the स्वदेश थी अत्यधिक आशावादी and the अग्रणी prohibitionist in the संयुक्त राज्य कॉंग्रेस confidently asserted that `` वहीँ is as much chance of repealing the eighteenth Amendment as there is for a hummingbird to मक्खी to the ग्रह मंगल with the Washington Monument tied to इसके tail.”
The मीटर ( meter in अमरीकी English ), ( si unit symbol : m ; SI dimension symbol : L ), is the आधारभूत unit of length in the International प्रणाली of Units ( si ).
originally intended to be एक ten-millionth of the distance from the धरती 's equator to the उत्तर Pole ( at समुद्र level ), its परिभाषा रै been periodically परिष्कृत to प्रतिबिंबित growing knowledge of metrology.
चूंकि 1983, it रै महरूम defined as `` the लंबाई of the path travelled by लाइट in vacuum during a समय interval of 1/299,792,458 of a second. ''

A भूवैज्ञानिक is a वैज्ञानिक जो studies the solid and द्रव matter that constitutes the धरती as well as the processes और इतिहास that रै तराशा it.
geologists usually engage in अध्ययन भूविज्ञान.
Geologists, अध्ययन more of an applied विज्ञान than a theoretical one, must दृष्टिकोण Geology using physics, chemistry और जीवविज्ञान as well as other sciences.
geologists, compared to scientists engaged in अन्य फ़ील्ड, हैं generally more उजागर to the बाहरी than रहकर in laboratories ; हालांकि some geologists prefer to perform most of उनके studies in the lab.
geologists हैं engaged in exploration for खनन companies in search of metals, oils, and अन्य Earth resources.
They हैं also in the forefront of प्राकृतिक hazards और disasters चेतावनी and mitigation, अध्ययन earthquakes, volcanic activity, tsunamis, weather storms, and the like ; their studies are used to warn the सामान्य public of the occurrence of these events.
फिलहाल, geologists हैं भी engaged in the discussion of climate बदलें, as वे पढ़ाई the इतिहास and evidence लिये इस Earth process.

Modern वैक्यूम tubes, mostly miniature style
in electronics, a vacuum ट्यूब, electron ट्यूब ( in उत्तर अमेरिका ), thermionic valve, tube, or वाल्व is a device controlling इलेक्ट्रिक current through a vacuum in a sealed container.
The संग्राहक is often thin transparent glass in a roughly cylindrical shape.
the simplest vacuum ट्यूब, the डायोड, is essentially an incandescent light bulb with an added electrode inside.
When the bulb 's filament is heated white-hot, electrons are `` boiled '' off its surface और into the vacuum inside the bulb.
if the electrode -- called a `` plate '' or `` धनाग्र '' -- is बना अधिक positive than the hot फिलामेंट, a direct current बहती through the vacuum to the electrode ( a demonstration of the एडिसन प्रभाव ).
As the current only flows in one direction, it makes it संभावित to बदलें an alternating current applied to the फिलामेंट to सीधा current.
The introduction of a third एलेक्ट्रोड, a grid between the filament and the थाली, yields another function.
A वोल्टेज applied to the grid नियंत्रण the वर्तमान flowing from the filament to the plate.
Thus, it allows the device to be used as an इलेक्ट्रॉनिक प्रवर्धक.
Vacuum tubes are यूँ used for rectification, प्रवर्धन, switching, or similar processing or creation of electrical signals.
the विशाल majority of modern दिन tubes consist of a sealed संग्राहक साथ a vacuum अंदर, और essentially rely on thermionic उत्सर्जन of electrons from a hot filament or a कैथोड heated by the filament.
कुछ exceptions to this are dealt with in the section about gas-filled tubes below.
Vacuum tubes were critical to the विकास of electronic प्रौद्योगिकी, which drove the विस्तार और commercialization of रेडियो प्रसारण, television, रडार, sound reinforcement, ध्वनि recording and जनन, large टेलीफोन संजाल, analog and digital computers, और industrial process कंट्रोल.
Although some अनुप्रयोग had counterparts using पहले technologies such as the चिंगारी gap ट्रांसमीटर or mechanical कंप्यूटर, it थी the invention of the vacuum tube with three electrodes ( पुकारा a triode ) and इसके capability of electronic amplification that made these technologies फैली and practical.
in most अनुप्रयोग, solid-state डिवाइस such as transistors and अन्य semiconductor devices have replaced tubes.
Solid-state डिवाइस पिछला longer और are smaller, अधिक efficient, more विश्वसनीय, और सस्ता than tubes.
tubes can be नाजुक, sometimes generate significant अनावश्यक heat, and can take many seconds—many मिनट्स in critical applications—after powering on to warm to a temperature where they perform within operational सहिष्णुता.
however, tubes still find उपयोग where solid-state devices have नहीं महरूम developed, हैं impractical, or where a ट्यूब has superior performance, as साथ कुछ डिवाइस in professional ऑडियो and high-power रेडियो transmitters.
tubes are still उत्पादित for such applications.
Tubes हैं less likely than semiconductor डिवाइस to be destroyed by the इलेक्ट्रोमैग्नेटिक पल्स उत्पादित by nuclear विस्फोट and geomagnetic storms produced by giant solar flares.
skittles is a ब्रांड of fruit-flavoured मिठाई, फिलहाल उत्पादित and marketed by the wm. wrigley Jr. Company, a प्रभाग of Mars, Inc.
वे have hard sugar शेल which carry the letter S.
The inside is mainly शुगर, corn syrup, and hydrogenated palm kernel आयल साथ with fruit juice, साइट्रिक acid, और natural and artificial चटपटा.
the confectionery has been बेची in a variety of फ्लेवर collections, ऐसे as Tropical और जंगली बेरी.
सर Winston लियोनार्ड spencer-churchill, ( 30 November 1874 – 24 जनवरी 1965 ) was a British politician जो थी the Prime Minister of the संयुक्त Kingdom from 1940 to 1945 और again from 1951 to 1955.
widely regarded as one of the greatest wartime leaders of the 20th century, Churchill was also an officer in the British Army, a इतिहासकार, a writer, and an कलाकार.
He is the तभी British प्रधान Minister in इतिहास to have प्राप्त the Nobel Prize in Literature, और was भी the first person to be made an मानद Citizen of the संयुक्त States.
चर्चिल थी born into an aristocratic परिवार as the पोता of the 7th ड्यूक of Marlborough.
His father, रब Randolph चर्चिल, थी a charismatic politician who served as चांसलर of the exchequer ; his mother, Jennie Jerome, was an अमरीकी socialite.
As a young फौज officer, he देखी कार्रवाई in अंग्रेजों India, the सूडान, and the Second बोअर युद्ध.
He gained fame as a युद्ध correspondent और लिखा books about उसके अभियान.
At the forefront of politics लिये fifty सालो, he आयोजित many political and cabinet positions.
Before the पहला संसार War, he served as अध्यक्ष of the Board of Trade, घर सचिव, and First Lord of the admiralty as भाग of the Asquith Liberal government.
During the युद्ध, he continued as पहला Lord of the Admiralty जबतक the disastrous Gallipoli अभियान caused his departure from government.
He तब briefly resumed क्रियाशील army सेवा on the पश्चिमी Front as commander of the 6th बटालियन of the Royal Scots Fusiliers.
He लौटे to सरकारी as Minister of munitions, सचिव of State for War, और Secretary of राज्य लिये Air.
बाद the युद्ध, चर्चिल परोसा as चांसलर of the Exchequer in the Conservative ( baldwin ) government of 1924–29, controversially returning the pound sterling in 1925 to the gold मानक at its pre-war पैरिटी, a move widely देखी as creating deflationary pressure on the uk economy.
भी controversial थी उसके opposition to increased घर rule for इण्डिया and his प्रतिरोध to the 1936 abdication of Edward viii.
Out of office और नीतियां `` in the wilderness '' during the 1930s, Churchill took the lead in warning परिचय Nazi Germany and in campaigning लिये rearmament.
On the outbreak of the दूसरी संसार War, he was again appointed First Lord of the Admiralty.
following the इस्तीफा of नेविली चेम्बरलेन on 10 May 1940, Churchill became प्रधान मंत्री.
उसके steadfast refusal to consider शिकस्त, surrender, or a compromise peace helped inspire British प्रतिरोध, especially दौरान the difficult early दिनों of the युद्ध जब ब्रिटेन stood alone among European countries in its active विपक्ष to Adolf Hitler.
चर्चिल was विशेषकर noted for उसके भाषणों और रेडियो प्रसारण, जिससे helped inspire the British people.
He led Britain as Prime मंत्री until victory over नाजी Germany had been secured.
After the Conservative Party lost the 1945 चुनाव, he became Leader of the विपक्ष to the Labour ( Attlee ) सरकारी.
After winning the 1951 election, he again became प्रधान मंत्री, before retiring in 1955.
upon his death, एलिज़ाबेथ II granted him the honour of a राज्य funeral, जिससे देखी one of the largest सभाओं of संसार statesmen in history.
Named the Greatest briton of all time in a 2002 poll, Churchill is widely regarded as being among the most influential people in अंग्रेजों history.

घाट began बिक्री of the Focus to यूरोपीय in जुलाई 1998 और in North America during 1999 लिये the 2000 model year.
in यूरोपीय, South अमेरिका, North America और दक्षिण Africa, the Focus replaced the various versions of the Ford अनुरक्षण बेची in those markets.
in Asia and australasia, it replaced the घाट Laser.
As of the first हाफ of 2012, the Focus surpassed the Toyota Corolla to become the संसार 's best selling ऑटोमोबाइल nameplate.

An आगर थाली -- an example of a बैक्टीरियल विकास medium.
specifically, it is a streak plate ; the orange lines और dots are formed by bacterial colonies.
a growth medium or culture मीडियम is a द्रव or gel designed to support the growth of microorganisms or कोशिकाएं, or छोटी पौधे जैसे the मॉस physcomitrella patens.
There are अलग types of मीडिया for growing different types of cells.
वहीँ हैं two प्रमुख types of growth media : those प्रयुक्त for cell culture, which use विशिष्ट कोशिका types निकला इससे पौधे or animals, और microbiological संस्कृति, जिससे are used लिये growing microorganisms, such as जीवाणु or yeast.
The most आम विकास मीडिया लिये microorganisms are nutrient broths and आगर plates ; specialized मीडिया are sometimes required लिये microorganism and कोशिका संस्कृति विकास.
कुछ organisms, termed fastidious organisms, require specialized environments due to complex nutritional requirements.
Viruses, for example, are obligate intracellular परजीवी और require a growth medium containing जीना cells.
A हुनर एजेंट, or बुकिंग agent, is a व्यक्ति who finds jobs लिये अभिनेताओं, authors, film निर्देशकों, संगीतकारों, मॉडल, producers, professional athletes, लेखक and other people in various entertainment businesses.
An agent also defends, supports और promotes the ब्याज of his/her clients.
Agents can नहीं उपज their अपना shows due to विरोध of interest.
A हुनर agent must be familiar with their क्लाइंट.
An agent has to know कया kind of work the client can and can नहीं do in अनुक्रम to match them साथ विभिन्न jobs.
having an एजेंट is नहीं required, but does help the कलाकार in getting jobs.
In many मामले casting निर्देशकों, or अन्य businesses, go to talent agencies to find कलाकारों वे are looking for.
the agent is paid a प्रतिशत of the स्टार 's आय ( typically 10 % ).
एजेंटों sometimes will be referred to as `` 10 percenters. ''
There are different regulations कि govern अलग types of agents that are स्थापित by artist 's संघ and the legal क्षेत्राधिकार in जिससे the agent operates.
There are also पेशेवर organizations कि license talent एजेंसियों.
Since the decline in viewership in theaters, इससे the 1950s to 1960s, this caused a monumental shift in कैसा studios would produce films और यूँ reducing the cost of exclusive and expensive actors.
Actors and अभिनेत्रियों were working for the studios but were नहीं स्वामित्व by एक प्रमुख studio एंटिटी and so were able to कार्य on within their समय and साथ other studios.
Because of this, एजेंटों यहूद अभी seen as a necessity instead of an option.
Agents now became तीसरा parties that negotiated between studios और क्लाइंट, this बनाना their सेवाएं imperative between each party.
Since talent एजेंसियों are working साथ lucrative contracts, all talent एजेंसियों must be licensed under special sections of the California मजदूर Code, जिससे calls an agent a `` व्यक्ति or निगम who engages in the occupation of procuring, offering, होनहार, or attempting to procure नियुक्ति लिये artist or artists. ''
मंगल has two ज्ञात moons, Phobos and deimos, which हैं विचार to be captured क्षुद्रग्रह.
Both satellites were discovered in 1877 by asaph Hall and are named after the characters Phobos ( panic/fear ) and Deimos ( terror/dread ) who, in Greek mythology, accompanied उनके पिता Ares, परमेश्वर of war, into battle.
एरीस थी known as मंगल to the Romans.
It is possible कि Mars may have moons smaller than 50 - 100 मीटर and a dust ring between Phobos और Deimos may be उपस्थित लकिन none have been खोजा.
In law enforcement parlance, the term murder book refers to the case file of a murder investigation.
Typically, हत्या किताबे include crime scene छायाचित्र and sketches, autopsy and forensic reports, transcripts of investigators ' टीप और witness interviews.
The murder किताब encapsulates the complete पेपर ट्रेल of a हत्या investigation, from the time the हत्या is first reported through the arrest of a suspect.
Law enforcement एजेंसियों typically guard हत्या किताबे carefully, and it is असामान्य लिये नागरिकों to be given unfettered access to these kinds of records, विशेषकर for unsolved मामले.

melon गेंदें are balls of melon made using a melon baller कि varies इससे around 1 centimeter to 3 centimeters ( about 3/8 inch to 1 इंच ).
वे are generally used in fruit सलाद.
A ksa, or Knowledge, कौशल, and Abilities, is a series of narrative statements that हैं जरूरी when applying to United States संघीय government जॉब openings.
KSAs हैं used to determine, साथ साथ resumes, जो the best applicants are when several candidates qualify लिये a जॉब.
The knowledge, skills and abilities ( KSAs ) necessary for the कामयाब प्रदर्शन of a position are contained on each जॉब vacancy announcement.
in 2009 the Office of निजी Management asked संघीय agencies to रोकें requiring job आवेदकों to fill आउट the questionnaires, to be phased आउट within a साल.
ksas हैं brief और केन्द्रित essays about one 's career and educational पृष्ठभूमि that presumably qualify one to perform the कर्तव्य of the position being applied for.
A knowledge, कौशल, and abilities ( KSA ) is a concise essay about one 's talent and विशेषज्ञता and related experiences ( work, शिक्षा, स्वयंसेवी ) और accomplishments.
a series of KSA statements हैं usually required when applying लिये most संघीय government और some state और city government jobs.
KSAs are प्रयुक्त as a yardstick to assess the सामर्थ्य of a prospective applicant in terms of likely क्षमता to perform the duties of the job.
सबसे government hiring officials look for a short, कुरकुरे और साफ KSA that emphasizes results or accomplishments obtained in पिछला work.
KSA कथन are भी ज्ञात as Evaluation Factors.
Other एजेंसियों sometimes call them `` Rating Factors '', `` Quality रैंकिंग Factors '', `` ज्ञान, Abilities, skills and Other Characteristics '', or `` Job Elements ''.
the name can be just a name लकिन प्रायः it प्रभाव content और length of the निबन्ध.
प्रत्येक agency रै इसके own regulations लकिन most of the time the प्रत्येक ksa फ़ैक्टर चाहिए be 1/2 to 11⁄2 पृष्ठों long.
The below परिभाषाएं are पारिभाषित by the u.S. Office of Personnel प्रबन्धन :
ज्ञान, Skills, and Abilities ( KSAs ) - The attributes जरूरी to perform a जॉब and are generally demonstrated through qualifying सेवा, education, or training.
Knowledge - Is a body of information applied directly to the performance of a फलन.
Skill - is an observable competence to perform a learned psychomotor अधिनियम.
Ability - is competence to perform an observable बर्ताव or a behavior कि परिणाम in an observable product.
The scoring of KSA essays is based on a स्केल of from one to 100.
Job applicants must स्कोर above 70 to be माना for the position.
High स्कोर are derived through answering the KSA question as specifically as possible, providing उदाहरण from पिछला employment or training that clearly demonstrate तुम meet the योग्यता.
When applying to federal government स्थितियाँ, a Federal Resume is प्रायः जरूरी in addition to KSA कथन.

प्रेम सदा is the debut एल्बम of American R & B duo K-Ci & जोजो, released on June 17, 1997, by MCA रिकॉर्ड.
It was recorded at various studios in नई York and the Los Angeles area in 1996 और 1997.
It was produced by JoJo और अनेक अन्य, सहित devante Swing, जेम्स Mtume, and Jeff Redd.
The duo were originally a part of Jodeci पहले this album.
the album peaked at छठे on the US Billboard 200 and भी appeared on अंतरराष्ट्रीय charts.
the single `` All my जीवन `` charted क्रमांक एक in अनेक countries, and all चार of the एल्बम 's singles peaked above the top 25 in the US Hot R & b/hip-hop Songs और the नई जीलैंड Top 40 Singles.
Love Always was received favorably by critics, who praised the भाइयो ' गायन ability और the production.
The album has been certified three times प्लेटिनम by the रिकॉर्डिंग Industry संघ of अमेरिका ( RIAA ) and gold by Music Canada और IFPI Sweden.
as of June 1999 it था बेची 2.9 million नक़ल in the United States.
A variable-rate mortgage, adjustable-rate mortgage ( भुजा ), or tracker mortgage is a बंधक ऋण with the interest rate on the note periodically समायोजित based on an index जिससे reflects the cost to the lender of borrowing on the credit markets.
The ऋण may be offered at the lender 's मानक variable चूहाe/ base rate.
There may be a सीधा and legally-defined कड़ी to the underlying index, लकिन जहाँ the lender offers no विशिष्ट link to the underlying मार्केट or अनुक्रमणिका the रेट can be changed at the lender 's discretion.
the पद `` variable-rate mortgage '' is सबसे आम बाहर the United States, whilst in the संयुक्त राज्य, `` adjustable-rate mortgage '' is most common, and implies a बंधक regulated by the संघीय government, with caps on charges.
in many countries, समायोज्य रेट mortgages हैं the norm, and in such places, may simply be referred to as mortgages.
Among the सबसे common indices हैं the दरों on 1-year constant-maturity राजकोष ( CMT ) securities, the Cost of Funds Index ( COFI ), and the London interbank offered Rate ( LIBOR ).
A few lenders उपयोग उनके अपना लागत of निधि as an index, rather than using other indices.
This is किया to ensure a स्थिर margin for the lender, जिनकी अपना cost of funding will प्रायः be related to the index.
नतीजतन, payments made by the borrower may change over time साथ the changing interest rate ( alternatively, the पद of the ऋण may बदलें ).
इस is पृथक from the ग्रैजुएट भुगतान बंधक, जिससे offers बदलना भुगतान amounts लकिन a फिक्स्ड interest रेट.
अन्य फ़ॉर्म of mortgage loan शामिल the interest only mortgage, the fixed rate बंधक, the ऋणात्मक amortization बंधक, और the गुब्बारा भुगतान बंधक.
समायोज्य दरों transfer part of the ब्याज rate रिस्क इससे the lender to the borrower.
वे can be used where मनमौजी interest rates मेक fixed rate loans difficult to obtain.
The borrower लाभ if the ब्याज रेट falls लकिन loses if the interest rate increases.
The borrower benefits from reduced margins to the underlying cost of उधार compared to फिक्स्ड or capped rate mortgages.
the assassination of Robert फ्रांसिस `` Bobby '' कैनेडी, a United States सीनेटर और bhai of assassinated President जॉन Fitzgerald `` जोकर '' कैनेडी, took place shortly after midnight on जून 5, 1968, in लॉस एंजिल्स, कैलिफ़ोर्निया, during the अभियान ऋतु लिये the United States Presidential चुनाव, 1968.
बाद winning the कैलिफ़ोर्निया and South Dakota प्राथमिक elections लिये the Democratic nomination for अध्यक्ष of the संयुक्त राज्य, कैनेडी was shot as he walked through the kitchen of the Ambassador Hotel and died in the Good Samaritan हॉस्पिटल twenty-six घंटों later.
sirhan Sirhan, a 24-year-old फिलीस्तीनी / जार्डन अप्रवासी, थी convicted of Kennedy 's हत्या and is serving a life वाक्य लिये the crime.
Sirhan 's lawyers have released statements claiming evidence कि he थी framed.
The shooting was recorded on ऑडियो tape by a freelance newspaper reporter, and the aftermath was captured on फिल्मी.
कैनेडी 's देह lay in repose at St. Patrick 's गिरजाघर in नई York for two दिनों before a funeral mass was held on June 8.
His body थी interred near his brother जॉन at आर्लिंगटन National Cemetery.
His मौत prompted the protection of अध्यक्षीय candidates by the संयुक्त States रहस्य सेवा.
Hubert Humphrey went on to win the Democratic nomination लिये the presidency, but ultimately narrowly खोया the चुनाव to रिचर्ड Nixon.
as with his bhai Jack 's death, Bobby 's assassination and the circumstances surrounding it have शाखित a किस्में of conspiracy theories.
as of 2013 Kennedy remains one of only दो बैठे United States Senators to be assassinated ( the अन्य होने Huey Long ).
the आधुनिक Age of Comic Books is an informal नाम लिये the period in the इतिहास of mainstream American कॉमिक books generally considered to last from the mid-1980s until present day.
in this period, कॉमिक book वर्ण generally became darker और more psychologically complex, creators became better-known और क्रियाशील in बदलना the industry, स्वतंत्र comics flourished, और larger प्रकाशन घरों became अधिक commercialized.
An वैकल्पिक नाम for इस period is the Dark Age of Comic Books, due to the लोकप्रियता and कलाकारी influence of grim शीर्षक, such as और Watchmen.
When Harry मिले सैली... is a 1989 American romantic comedy फिल्मी written by Nora Ephron और directed by Rob Reiner.
It stars बिली Crystal as हैरी and मेग रयान as Sally.
The story फ़ॉलो the title characters from the समय वे मिलें just before sharing a cross-country drive, through twelve सालो or so of chance मुठभेड़ों in नई York City.
the फिल्मी raises the question `` can men और women ever just be मित्रों ? '' and advances अनेक विचार परिचय relationships that became household concepts, ऐसे as those of the `` '' girlfriend and the `` transitional person ''.
the origins of the film आए from Reiner 's return to single life बाद a तलाक.
an interview Ephron conducted with Reiner provided the basis for हैरी.
सैली थी based on Ephron and कुछ of her friends.
Crystal came on फलक and made उसके अपना contributions to the screenplay, बनाना Harry funnier.
ephron supplied the structure of the film with much of the dialogue आधारित on the real-life दोस्ती between Reiner and क्रिस्टल.
The soundtrack consists of standards performed by हैरी Connick, Jr., साथ a बिग बैंड और ऑर्केस्ट्रा arranged by मार्क Shaiman.
connick won उसके first Grammy Award लिये Best जैज़ पुरूष गायन प्रदर्शन.
कोलंबिया तस्वीरें released the फिल्मी using the `` मंच '' technique, which शामिल खोलने it in a few select शहरों, letting धनात्मक शब्द of मुँह generate interest, and then gradually expanding distribution over subsequent weeks.
When Harry मिले सैली... grossed a कुल of us $ 92.8 million in North America.
Ephron received a अंग्रेजों अकादमी फिल्मी Award, an Oscar नामांकन, and a Writers Guild of अमेरिका Award नामांकन for her screenplay.
The film is क्रमित 23rd on AFI 's 100 सालो... 100 Laughs list of the top कॉमेडी films in American cinema और क्रमांक 60 on Bravo 's `` 100 Funniest Movies ''.
In जल्दी 2004, the फिल्मी was adapted for the stage in a उत्पादन starring ल्यूक पेरी and Alyson हनिंगन.

Hamburger हेल्पर is a लकीर of packaged food products primarily consisting of boxed pasta bundled with a packet or packets of powdered sauce or seasonings.
the सामग्री of प्रत्येक बक्सा are combined साथ browned ground बीफ, water and मिल्क to create a पूरा डिश.
the उत्पाद लकीर भी features उत्पाद with अन्य starches such as राइस or potatoes instead of पास्ता.
it is बना by सामान्य मिलों.
Although the क्लासिक boxed हैमबर्गर हेल्पर उत्पाद only सप्लाई the मंड मद and the sauce पैकेट्स, कुछ किस्में of the product include मैदान बीफ.
ये include a frozen food लकीर, which सुविधाएँ कुछ of the brand 's क्लासिक किस्में in a complete meal kit form, साथ frozen ground बीफ and frozen sauce packaged separately from the noodles in the same bag.
वहीँ is भी an `` तत्काल '' version of हैमबर्गर Helper containing dehydrated मांस, नूडल्स and seasonings in a small pouch, requiring only जल to be added.
The हैमबर्गर हेल्पर mascot is the `` Helping हाथ '', an anthropomorphic एनिमेटेड, चार fingered left-hand दस्ताने, which appears in the product 's television commercials and on the packages.

a dwarf ग्रह is a planetary-mass ऑब्जेक्ट कि is neither a ग्रह nor a satellite.
More explicitly, the International Astronomical Union ( iau ) defines a बौना ग्रह as a celestial body in direct कक्षा of the सूर्य that is विशाल पर्याप्त for its shape to be controlled by gravitation, लकिन कि नापसंद a planet has not साफ its orbital region of अन्य वस्तुएँ.
The पद dwarf planet was adopted in 2006 as भाग of a three-way categorization of लाशें orbiting the Sun, brought परिचय by an बढ़ाएँ in discoveries of trans-Neptunian objects that rivaled Pluto in आकार, और आखिरकार precipitated by the discovery of an भी अधिक massive object, Eris.
इस classification राज्य that bodies large पर्याप्त to have साफ the neighbourhood of their कक्षा हैं defined as ग्रह, while those कि हैं not massive enough to be rounded by their own gravity हैं defined as small Solar System लाशें.
Dwarf planets come in between.
The exclusion of dwarf ग्रह इससे the रोस्टर of planets by the iau रै been both praised and criticized ; it थी said to be the `` right decision '' by Mike Brown, who खोजा और अन्य new बौना ग्रह, but has been rejected by Alan Stern, जो had coined the पद dwarf ग्रह in 1990.
The iau फिलहाल recognizes five dwarf planets in the सौर System :, Pluto,,, और.
however, तभी two of ये लाशें, Ceres और Pluto, have महरूम observed in पर्याप्त विवरण to demonstrate that they fit the परिभाषा.
eris रै महरूम accepted as a dwarf ग्रह क्युकी it is more विशाल than प्लूटो.
The IAU subsequently decided that unnamed trans-Neptunian वस्तुएँ साथ an निरपेक्ष magnitude brighter than +1 ( and hence a diameter of ≥838 km assuming a ज्यामितीय albedo of ≤1 ) are to be named अंतर्गत the assumption that they are dwarf ग्रह.
The only दो such वस्तुएँ ज्ञात at the time, माकेमाके and हउमेया, गई through this नामकरण कार्यविधि and were घोषित to be बौना planets.
it is suspected that another hundred or so ज्ञात objects in the Solar प्रणाली are बौना ग्रह.
Estimates are that up to 200 dwarf planets may be found जब the entire प्रदेश known as the Kuiper belt is explored, और कि the number may exceed 10,000 जब वस्तुएँ scattered बाहर the Kuiper belt are माना.
Individual खगोलशास्त्रियों recognize अनेक of these, and in August 2011 माइक Brown published a list of 390 candidate objects, ranging इससे `` nearly निश्चित '' to `` possible '' बौना ग्रह. '
Brown identifies nine known वस्तुएँ – the पाँच स्वीकृत by the IAU plus,,, and – as `` virtually निश्चित '', साथ another दो dozen highly likely, and वहीँ हैं संभवतः a सौ or so such objects in कुल.
the वर्गीकरण of bodies in अन्य planetary systems साथ the characteristics of बौना planets has not been addressed.
a debit कार्ड ( भी known as a बैंको card or check card ) is a plastic payment कार्ड कि provides the cardholder इलेक्ट्रॉनिक अभिगम to उसके or her bank account ( s ) at a financial संस्था.
कुछ ताश have a stored value with जिससे a भुगतान is made, while सबसे रिले a संदेश to the cardholder 's bank to withdraw निधि from a payee 's designated bank खाता.
the कार्ड, where accepted, can be used instead of नकदी जब making purchases.
in some cases, the primary account number is आबंटित exclusively लिये use on the अंतरजाल और there is no physical card.
In अनेक countries, the उपयोग of debit ताश रै become so widespread कि उनके volume रै overtaken or entirely replaced cheques और, in कुछ उदाहरण, cash transactions.
The development of debit cards, नापसंद credit cards और charge cards, has generally been country specific resulting in a number of different systems around the world, जिससे were often असंगत.
Since the mid-2000s, a number of पहलों have allowed debit cards जारी in one country to be used in other countries और अनुमत उनके use for internet and फोन purchases.
Unlike credit और charge ताश, payments using a डेबिट card हैं तत्काल transferred from the cardholder 's designated बैंको account, बजाय of them paying the धन वापस at a बाद date.
डेबिट ताश प्रायः also allow for instant withdrawal of cash, acting as the एटीएम कार्ड लिये withdrawing नकदी.
व्यापारियों may also offer cashback facilities to ग्राहक, where a ग्राहक can withdraw cash साथ साथ their purchase.
Francois henri `` Jack '' LaLanne ( सितंबर 26, 1914 - January 23, 2011 ) was an अमरीकी फ़िटनेस, कसरत, और nutritional विशेषज्ञ and motivational speaker जो is sometimes called `` the godfather of फ़िटनेस '' और the `` पहला फ़िटनेस superhero. ''
He वर्णित खुद as होने a `` sugarholic '' and a `` जंक food junkie '' जबतक he was 15.
He also था behavioral समस्याएं, but `` turned उसके जीवन around '' after listening to a पब्लिक लेक्चर by पॉल Bragg, a well-known nutrition speaker.
दौरान his career, he आए to मानना कि the country 's overall health depended on the health of इसके population, लिखने that `` physical culture और nutrition — is the मोक्ष of अमेरिका. ''
Decades पहले health और fitness began being promoted by हस्तियाँ जैसे Jane फोंडा and रिचर्ड Simmons, LaLanne was already widely recognized for publicly preaching the health benefits of regular exercise और a good diet.
he प्रकाशित numerous books on fitness and hosted a fitness television दिखाएँ between 1953 और 1985.
As जल्दी as 1936, at आयु 21, he खोली एक of the स्वदेश 's first फ़िटनेस gyms in ओकलैंड, California, जिससे became a prototype लिये dozens of similar gyms using उसके name.
एक of उसके 1950s टेलीविज़न exercise programs थी aimed toward महिलाओं, whom he also प्रोत्साहित to join उसके health clubs.
he invented a number of exercise machines, सहित leg-extension and pulley devices.
Besides producing his अपना श्रेणी of videos, he coached the बुजुर्ग and निष्क्रिय नहीं to forgo exercise, believing it would enable them to enhance their strength.
lalanne also gained recognition for his success as a bodybuilder, as well as लिये his prodigious feats of strength.
Arnold श्वार्ज़नेगर एकबार stated, `` That Jack LaLanne 's an एनिमल !, '' after LaLanne, at 54, beat a 21-year-old Schwarzenegger `` badly '' in an informal contest.
On the अवसर of lalanne 's death, श्वार्ज़नेगर credited LaLanne लिये being `` an apostle लिये fitness '' by प्रेरणादायी `` अरबों all over the world to live healthier lives, '' and, as governor of California, था पहले placed उसे on his राज्यपाल 's Council on शारीरिक फ़िटनेस.
Steve रीव्स credited lalanne as his प्रेरणा to build his muscular physique while keeping a slim waist.
he थी inducted to the California Hall of कीर्ति और has a star on the हॉलीवुड Walk of कीर्ति.
Air शक्तियां of सबसे of the countries use प्रणाली similar to सेना.
However, the RAF and the एयर forces of अनेक Commonwealth countries, or those formerly under a अंग्रेजों influence, use a अलग set of ranks loosely आधारित on नवल equivalents ; Lieutenant, कमांडर, कप्तान and Commodore are prefixed लिये एयर force उपयोग with Flight, Wing, Group and एयर, respectively ( the first three being the units that they used to कमांड ).
पेनेलोपे क्रूज़ sánchez ( ; born अप्रैल 28, 1974 ) is a स्पेनी actress.
हस्ताक्षरित by an agent at age 15, वो बना her एक्टिंग डेब्यू at 16 on television and her feature film डेब्यू the following year in Jamón, jamón ( 1992 ), to नाजुक acclaim.
Her subsequent roles in the 1990s and 2000s included Open Your Eyes ( 1997 ), The hi-lo Country ( 1999 ), The Girl of Your सपनो ( 2000 ) और Woman on शीर्ष ( 2000 ).
क्रूज़ हासिल recognition for उसके lead roles in the 2001 films वैनिला Sky and Blow.
She रै चूंकि built a कामयाब करियर, appearing in films इससे a wide दायरा of genres, including the comedy Waking up in रेनो ( 2002 ), the thriller Gothika ( 2003 ), the क्रिसमस फिल्म नोएल ( 2004 ), and the action adventure सहारा ( 2005 ).
She रै received नाजुक acclaim for her भूमिकाएँ in Volver ( 2006 ) और नौ ( 2009 ) receiving सुनहरी Globe and Academy Award nominations for each.
She जीती the Academy Award for Best Supporting Actress in 2008 लिये विक्की क्रिस्टीना Barcelona.
वो थी the पहला स्पेनी अभिनेत्री in history to receive an Academy पुरस्कार and the पहला स्पेनी अभिनेत्री to receive a star at the हॉलीवुड Walk of कीर्ति.
क्रूज़ रै modeled for companies ऐसे as Mango, Ralph Lauren and l'oréal.
पेनेलोपे and her younger sister mónica Cruz have designed वस्तुएं for Mango.
वो has दान both her समय और money to charities.
Cruz has volunteered in Uganda and इण्डिया, जहाँ she spent one सप्ताह working लिये माँ Teresa ; she दान her salary इससे ' to help fund the late नन 's मिशन.

File Explorer, previously known as Windows Explorer, is a संचिका मैनेजर अनुप्रयोग and भी a navigation tool that is included with रिलीज of the Microsoft खिड़कियाँ operating system from Windows 95 onwards.
it provides a आलेखीय उपयोक्ता इंटरफ़ेस for accessing the file प्रणालियों.
it is also the component of the ऑपरेटिंग प्रणाली that presents अनेक उपयोक्ता इंटरफ़ेस items on the मॉनिटर ऐसे as the taskbar and desktop.
Controlling the computer is संभावित without Windows एक्सप्लोरर running ( for उदाहरण, the संचिका | Run कमांड in Task मैनेजर on NT-derived versions of खिड़कियाँ will फलन बगैर it, as will कमांड typed in a command संकेत खिड़की ).
Located in the C : \खिड़कीs निर्देशिका, it is sometimes referred to as the खिड़कियाँ शेल, explorer.exe, or simply “Explorer”.
The Care Bears हैं characters created by American Greetings in 1981 for use on ग्रीटिंग ताश.
the असली कलाकृति for the ताश थी painted by artist Elena Kucharik.
In 1983, kenner turned the Care Bears into plush teddy bears.
The परवाह bears appeared in their own TV specials called The Care Bears in the जमीन Without जज्बात ( 1983 ) and the परवाह Bears बैटल the Freeze यंत्र ( 1984 ).
They also had their own television series इससे 1985 to 1988, in जोड to तीन विशेषता films : the Care Bears फिल्म ( 1985 ), Care Bears Movie II : A New Generation ( 1986 ), और The Care Bears एडवेंचर in Wonderland ( 1987 ).
Each परवाह Bear आता in a अलग रंग and has a specialized तमगा on its belly that represents इसके ड्यूटी and व्यक्तित्व.
इस insignia थी ज्ञात as their `` tummy प्रतीक. ''
however, the फिल्म Care Bears : Oopsy करता it ! renamed them `` belly badges ''.
Adding to the परवाह Bear परिवार are the `` Care Bear Cousins '', which विशेषता a शेर, rabbit, पेंगुइन, raccoon, और other such animals निर्मित in the same स्टाइल as the teddy bears.
In 2002, the bears were reintroduced with new toys.
Made by Play-Along खिलौने, the new खिलौने offered features ऐसे as illuminated bellies upon touch, aerobic bears, और glow-in-the-dark bears.
As part of this वापसी, the bears have appeared in दो computer-animated movies : Care Bears : Journey to joke-a-lot ( 2004 ) and The Care Bears ' Big Wish Movie ( 2005 ).
In 2007, the franchise celebrated its 25th anniversary ; another relaunch took place, as well as the release of Care Bears : Oopsy Does It !.
In mid-2011, ag announced a revival TV एनिमेटेड श्रेणी titled `` परवाह bears : Welcome to care-a-lot ``.
the प्रीमियर of the series utilizes `` 30 years of देखभाल ''.
It premiered on The Hub on June 2, 2012.
As of 2013, परवाह Bears merchandise is still होने marketed.

Interstate 70 ( I-70 ) is an Interstate Highway in the United States कि रनों from Interstate 15 near कोव Fort, Utah, to a Park और Ride निकट बाल्टीमोर, Maryland.
It was the पहला Interstate Highway project in the संयुक्त राज्य.
i-70 approximately traces the path of U.S. Route 40 ( और भी the old National Road ) ईस्ट of the रॉकी kyu.
West of the Rockies, the route of i-70 was निकला इससे अनेक sources.
I-70 is the पांचवां longest अंतरराज्यीय राजमार्ग, after i-90, I-80, I-40, and I-10.
The निर्माण of i-70 in कोलोराडो and Utah is माना an engineering marvel as the रूट गुजरता through the Eisenhower Tunnel, Glenwood canyon, और the सैन राफेल swell.
The आइज़नहावर Tunnel is the highest point साथ the Interstate राजमार्ग प्रणाली with an उन्नयन of.
The sections of the अंतरराज्यीय in Missouri and Kansas have laid claim to be the first interstate in the संयुक्त States.
हालांकि disputed, the Federal राजमार्ग Administration रै claimed the खण्ड of I-70 through glenwood canyon, completed in 1992, थी the last टुकड़ा of the अंतरराज्यीय Highway system, as originally planned, to खोलें to ट्रैफ़िक.
Photo of 1999 कुल eclipse
As seen इससे the Earth, a solar ग्रहण occurs when the चंद्रमा passes between the सूर्य and Earth, and the Moon fully or partially blocks ( `` occults `` ) the Sun.
इस can happen तभी at नई चंद्रमा, जब the सूर्य और the Moon हैं in conjunction as seen from Earth in an संरेखण referred to as syzygy.
In a total ग्रहण, the disk of the Sun is fully obscured by the चंद्रमा.
In partial and annular eclipses only भाग of the सूर्य is obscured.
If the चंद्रमा were in a perfectly गोलाकार orbit, a little closer to the Earth, and in the same orbital plane, वहीँ होता be total solar eclipses every single माह.
However, the चंद्रमा 's कक्षा is inclined ( tilted ) at अधिक than 5 degrees to Earth 's कक्षा around the Sun ( see ecliptic ) so इसके shadow at नई चंद्रमा usually चूकें Earth.
धरती 's orbit is called the ecliptic प्लेन as the Moon 's orbit must क्रॉस इस plane in order for an ग्रहण ( दोनो सौर as खूब as lunar ) to occur.
In जोड, the Moon 's actual कक्षा is elliptical, often taking it far enough away from Earth that इसके apparent आकार is not विशाल पर्याप्त to block the Sun totally.
The orbital planes क्रॉस प्रत्येक year at a line of nodes resulting in at तनिक दो, and up to five, solar eclipses occurring प्रत्येक year ; no अधिक than two of which can be कुल eclipses.
however, total सौर eclipses are विरल at कोई particular location because totality exists only along a narrow पाथ on Earth 's surface traced by the चंद्रमा 's shadow or umbra.
an ग्रहण is a natural phenomenon.
nevertheless, in some प्राचीन और modern संस्कृतियों, सौर eclipses have been attributed to अलौकिक causes or regarded as ख़राब शकुनों.
A total solar eclipse can be frightening to people जो हैं unaware of इसके astronomical explanation, as the Sun seems to गायब during the day and the sky darkens in a पदार्थ of मिनट्स.
क्युकी it is खतरनाक to dekh directly at the Sun, observers चाहिए use special eye protection or अप्रत्यक्ष viewing techniques when viewing a partial ग्रहण, or the partial phases of a total eclipse.
it is safe to view the कुल phase of a total solar eclipse साथ the unaided eye and बगैर सुरक्षा, however.
लोगों referred to as eclipse chasers or umbraphiles होगा सफर to remote locations to observe or गवाह predicted सेंट्रल solar eclipses.
a political party ( इससे, genitive partis, `` part '', `` portion '' ) is a political organization कि typically seeks to influence, or entirely control, government नीति, usually by nominating candidates with लकीर political दृश्य and trying to seat उन्हें in political office.
पार्टियों participate in electoral अभियान और शैक्षणिक outreach or विरोध actions.
पार्टियों often espouse an ideology or vision, expressed in a पार्टी program, bolstered by a लिखा platform with specific लक्ष्य, forming a गठबन्धन among disparate interests.
The आम is a fleshy स्टोन फल belonging to the genus mangifera, consisting of numerous तीव्र fruiting trees in the flowering plant family Anacardiaceae.
the mango is native to South Asia, इससे जहाँ it has महरूम वितरित worldwide to become एक of the सबसे cultivated fruits in the tropics.
While other Mangifera प्रजाति ( e.g. horse mango, M. foetida ) हैं also grown on a अधिक localized basis, mangifera इंडिका – the 'common आम ' or 'इण्डियाn mango ' – is the तभी mango tree commonly cultivated in अनेक tropical और subtropical regions.
It is the national fruit of India, Pakistan और फिलीपीन.
In several संस्कृतियों, its fruit और पत्ते हैं ritually used as floral decorations at विवाह, public जश्न और धार्मिक ceremonies.
गिल arnette Byrd, < ref name > एचटीटीपी : //www.pro-football-reference.com/players/B/ByrdGi00.htm ( born फ़रवरी 20, 1961 in सैन फ्रांसिस्को, California ) is a former professional American football player.
He थी a two time Pro Bowl cornerback in 1991 और 1992 लिये the San Diego Chargers after graduating इससे सैन Jose राज्य विश्वविद्यालयों.
Byrd was inducted into the chargers हॉल of Fame in 1998.
He थी an all-city running वापस and defensive वापस at Lowell High स्कूल ( सैन Francisco ), helping to सीसे the Cardinals to the city चैंपियनशिप in उसके वरिष्ठ ऋतु of 1978.
संसार map showing the Tropic of Cancer
the Tropic of Cancer, also referred to as the Northern tropic, is the circle of अक्षांश on the Earth that marks the सबसे northerly position at which the Sun may appear directly overhead at इसके zenith.
इस इवेंट occurs once per year, at the time of the जून solstice, when the Northern Hemisphere is tilted toward the Sun to its अधिकतम extent.
it currently ( साल 2013 ) झूठ at 23° 26′ 15.143′′ north of the equator.
इसके दक्षिणी गोलार्ध बंटवारा, अंकन the most southerly position at which the Sun may appear directly overhead, is the Tropic of मकर.
ये ऊष्णकटिबन्ध are two of the five major उपाधि measures or प्रमुख circles of अक्षांश कि चिह्नित maps of the धरती, besides the Arctic and Antarctic वृत्त और the equator.
The positions of these circles of latitude ( other than the Equator ) are dictated by the tilt of the Earth 's अक्ष of rotation relative to the plane of इसके orbit.
dvd-video is a consumer वीडियो format used to store digital video on DVD discs, and is फिलहाल the dominant consumer video format in एशिया, North America, Europe, and Australia.
Discs using the dvd-video specification require a DVD ड्राइव और an H.262/MPEG-2 भाग 2 decoder ( e.g., a dvd player, or a computer dvd drive with a software DVD player ).
वाणिज्यिक DVD फिल्मों हैं एनकोडेड using a combination of H.262/MPEG-2 भाग 2 compressed video and audio of varying formats ( often multi-channel स्वरुप as described below ).
Typically, the data rate for DVD movies ranges from 3 Mbit/s to 9.5 Mbit/s, और the bit rate is प्रायः adaptive.
it थी पहला उपलब्धियाँ लिये retail around 1997.
The DVD-Video specification थी created by dvd Forum and can be obtained इससे DVD Format/Logo Licensing Corporation for a शुल्क of $ 5,000.
The specification is not सरेआम available, because every subscriber must sign a non-disclosure agreement.
Certain information in the dvd किताब is proprietary and confidential.
In कम्प्यूटिंग and specifically Internet, a leech is one who benefits, usually deliberately, from अन्य ' सूचना or प्रयत्न but करता not offer anything in वापसी, or makes तभी टोकन offerings in an attempt to avoid being पुकारा a leech.
In economics, this type of बर्ताव is called `` free riding '' और is associated with the free सवार प्रॉब्लम.
depending on context, leeching करता नहीं necessarily refer to illegal उपयोग of कंप्यूटर संसाधन, लकिन प्रायः instead to लालची उपयोग according to etiquette : to wit, using too much of कया is freely given without contributing a उचित राशि back to the जातियाँ that provides it.
the name गर्भाशयी from the leech, an animal कि झंझट रक्त and then tries to छोड़ unnoticed.
Other शर्तें हैं used, such as `` freeloader '', but जोंक is the most common.
the पूरा eagle logo, used in विभिन्न संस्करण इससे 1970 to 1993.
the United States Postal सेवा ( usps ), भी known as the पोस्ट दफ्तर and U.S. Mail, is an स्वतंत्र agency of the संयुक्त States federal सरकारी responsible for providing डाक service in the United राज्य.
it is one of the few सरकारी agencies explicitly authorized by the United राज्य संविधान.
The usps traces its जड़ें to 1775 during the Second Continental Congress, जहाँ Benjamin फ्रैंकलिन was appointed the first postmaster general.
The cabinet-level पोस्ट दफ्तर Department was निर्मित in 1792 इससे Franklin 's operation and transformed into इसके वर्तमान form in 1971 under the Postal Reorganization अधिनियम.
the usps employs over 574,000 मजदूर and operates over 260,000 vehicles.
The USPS is the ऑपरेटर of the largest गाडी बेड़े in the संसार.
The usps is legally obligated to serve all अमेरिकी, regardless of geography, at वर्दी दाम and quality.
the usps has exclusive अभिगम to letter boxes चिह्नित `` U.S. Mail '' और personal letterboxes in the United States, लकिन स्टिल competes against निजी package delivery services, ऐसे as यूपीएस और FedEx.
the USPS has not सीधे प्राप्त taxpayer-dollars चूंकि the early 1980s with the minor एक्सेप्शन of subsidies for costs संबद्ध with the disabled and विदेशी मतदाता.
चूंकि the 2006 all-time peak मेल volume, बाद which कॉंग्रेस passed the Postal जवाबदेही and enhancement Act ``, ( which mandated $ 5.5 अरब प्रति साल to be paid into an खाता to pre-fund retiree health-care, 75 years into the भविष्य, a requirement अद्वितीय among organizations and व्यवसायों in the u.S. ), आय dropped sharply due to recession-influenced घटती mail volume, prompting the postal service to look to अन्य sources of आय while cutting लागत to reduce इसके budget deficit.
वॉशिंगटन, D.C. has महरूम the capital of the United राज्य since 1800.
Eight other शहरों have served as the meeting प्लेस for Congress and हैं therefore माना to have once been the capital of the United राज्य.
in addition, each of the 50 U.S. राज्य और the five principal territories of the United States maintains इसके own capital.
Princess cut डायमंड set in a रिंग
The राजकुमारी cut is the second सबसे लोकप्रिय cut shape लिये diamonds, next to a round शानदार.
The face-up shape of the राजकुमारी cut is वर्गाकार or rectangular और the profile or side-on shape is समान to कि of an उलट pyramid with चार beveled पहलू.
the princess cut is a अपेक्षाकृत new diamond काटें, having महरूम created in the 1960s.
It has gained in लोकप्रियता in recent years as a अधिक distinctive वैकल्पिक to the अधिक popular गोलाकार brilliant cut, in which the top of diamond, called the crown, is काटें साथ a round face-up आकार और the bottom, called the pavilion, is shaped similar to a कोन.
a राजकुमारी cut साथ the वही width as the व्यास of a round brilliant होगा weigh more as it has four किनारे which होता otherwise have महरूम काटें off and rounded to रूप a गोलाकार brilliant.
The राजकुमारी काटें is sometimes referred to as a square modified शानदार.
However, while displaying the same high उपाधि of brilliance, its faceting style is अद्वितीय and completely different from that of a गोलाकार शानदार.
The राजकुमारी काटें had its origins in the early `` French '' cut, having a step-modified `` Double-French '' or `` क्रॉस '' cut क्राउन और a series of अद्वितीय, chevron-shaped facets in the pavilion जिससे combine to दे a पृथक cross-shaped reflection when the stone is viewed directly through the तालिका.
Effectively, the Princess cut combines the high उपाधि of light वापसी of a round brilliant cut with a distinctive वर्गाकार or आयताकार आकार.
The वर्गाकार princess काटें diamond is usually थोड़ा cheaper than round शानदार cut diamonds of the same कैरेट weight because it retains परिचय 80 % of the rough डायमंड, as opposed to the round शानदार जिससे retains only परिचय 50 % of the अशिष्ट.
The क्षमता to retain more crystal वज़न makes this shape popular amongst डायमंड cutters.
Accredited Gem appraisers ( आगा ) और American Gem Society Laboratory ( AGSL ) और यूरोपीय Gem Laboratories-USA ( EGL-USA ) हैं currently the only labs कि grade the Princess cut for काटें.
वहीँ is no universal definition of what measurements मेक an ideal राजकुमारी काटें diamond और many डायमंड निर्माताओं market ideal ईंट with differing facet patterns और angles as `` ideal cut ''.
In contrast to the AGSL, AGA, और EGL-USA the gemological संस्थान of America ( GIA ) रै stated that वहीँ is not enough industry consensus or empirical data to specify काटें ग्रेडिंग standards for Princess काटें diamonds और to do so is at the risk of consumers who may be deceived by diamonds accompanied by निर्गुण Ideal or Excellent काटें ग्रेड.
The नाम `` Princess Cut '' was originally used in कनेक्शन साथ another diamond काटें, otherwise ज्ञात as the `` Profile '' cut, designed by Arpad nagy, a London cutter, in 1961.
The same name was बाद used और made popular by Ygal Perlman, betzalel Ambar, and इसराईल Itzkowitz in Israel in 1979.
a similar cut with तभी 49 facets, as opposed to the असली 58 facets of the princess काटें, was later ब्रांडेड the `` Quadrillion '' and initially वितरित by ambar ईंट in Los Angeles.
तीन years of ऑप्टिकल research yielded a square stone with faceting similar to that of a गोलाकार brilliant काटें डायमंड.
A Comparison
The क्रमांक of chevrons can affect the overall आउटलुक of a princess cut diamond.
This can usually be संकल्पित by the wire आरेख कि is plotted in डायमंड grading रिपोर्ट्स.
by adding अधिक chevrons on the मण्डप side of the डायमंड, the individual facets of the diamond will अभी be broken bas into छोटी facets.
as a परिणाम, it can दे a राजकुमारी cut diamond a `` कुचल ice '' look.
वाइस versa, जब a princess cut diamond रै lesser chevrons, it tends to give the diamond a चंकी outlook due to broader facets.
The domestic श्वान ( Canis lupus familiaris ) is a subspecies of the gray wolf ( Canis lupus ), a सदस्य of the कैनिडाए family of the mammalian order carnivora.
The term `` domestic dog '' is generally प्रयुक्त for both domesticated and feral varieties.
the श्वान has been the पहला animal to be domesticated और has महरूम the most widely रखा working, hunting, and पालतु animal in इंसान history.
The word `` श्वान '' may भी mean the male of a canine प्रजाति, as opposed to the शब्द `` bitch '' लिये the female of the प्रजाति.
mtdna evidence shows an विकासवादी split between the modern श्वान 's lineage and the modern भेड़िया 's lineage around 100,000 सालो ago लकिन,, the oldest fossil नमूनों genetically linked to the modern dog 's lineage तिथि to लगभग 33,000-36,000 years पहले.
Dogs ' मान to early human hunter-gatherers led to उन्हें quickly becoming ubiquitous across world cultures.
कुत्तो perform अनेक roles for लोगों, such as hunting, herding, pulling loads, protection, assisting police and सैन्य, companionship, and, more recently, aiding handicapped individuals.
इस प्रभाव on human society has given them the nickname `` Man 's Best Friend '' in the Western संसार.
In some संस्कृतियों, dogs हैं also a सोर्स of मांस.
in 2001, वहीँ were estimated to be 400 लाख dogs in the world.
सबसे breeds of कुत्तो are at most a few hundred years बूढ़ा, having been artificially selected for particular morphologies and behaviors by people for विशिष्ट functional roles.
Through this चयनात्मक breeding, the dog रै विकसित into hundreds of varied breeds, and shows more behavioral और morphological विभिन्नता than कोई अन्य land mammal.
लिये example, ऊँचाई measured to the withers सीमाएँ from in the Chihuahua to परिचय in the Irish Wolfhound ; रंग varies from श्वेत through grays ( usually called `` ब्लू '' ) to black, और भूरा from light ( tan ) to dark ( `` red '' or `` चॉकलेट '' ) in a wide विभिन्नता of पैटर्न ; coats can be short or long, coarse-haired to wool-like, सीधा, curly, or चिकना.
it is common for most breeds to shed इस कोट.
Diagram of a हस्तांतरण इलेक्ट्रॉन सूक्ष्मदर्शी
A 1973 Siemens electron सूक्ष्मदर्शी, Musée देस Arts et métiers, पेरिस
An इलेक्ट्रॉन सूक्ष्मदर्शी ( EM ) is a type of microscope that uses an इलेक्ट्रॉन beam to illuminate a specimen और produce a magnified चित्र.
An EM has greater resolving power than a लाइट सूक्ष्मदर्शी और can reveal the ढांचा of smaller objects because electrons have wavelengths about 100,000 times shorter than visible light photons.
They can achieve better than 50 pm resolution और magnifications of up to about 10,000,000x whereas ordinary, non-confocal light microscopes are limited by diffraction to परिचय 200 nm resolution and useful magnifications नीचे 2000x.
The इलेक्ट्रॉन सूक्ष्मदर्शी uses electrostatic और electromagnetic lenses to कंट्रोल the इलेक्ट्रॉन beam and फ़ोकस it to रूप an image.
ये इलेक्ट्रॉन optical lenses are analogous to the glass lenses of a light ऑप्टिकल सूक्ष्मदर्शी.
इलेक्ट्रॉन microscopes हैं used to investigate the ultrastructure of a चौड़ी range of biological and अकार्बनिक specimens including microorganisms, cells, large अणुओं, biopsy नमूने, धातुओं, and crystals.
industrially, the इलेक्ट्रॉन microscope is often प्रयुक्त for विशेषता control and विफलता analysis.
Modern इलेक्ट्रॉन microscopes उपज electron micrographs, using specialized digital cameras or frame grabbers to capture the चित्र.
popeyes louisiana Kitchen is a कड़ी of fried मुर्गा fast food रेस्तरां संस्थापित in 1972 in New Orleans, Louisiana.
प्रायः referred to as popeyes and sometimes as Popeyes Chicken & बिस्कुट or popeyes Chicken & Seafood, It was acquired by sandy स्रोतों, जॉर्जिया -based AFC Enterprises, originally अमेरिका 's पसंदीदा Chicken Company, in 1993.
According to a कम्पनी दबायें रिलीज दिनाँक जून 29, 2007, popeyes is the second-largest `` quick-service मुर्गा restaurant समूह, measured by number of units '', with अधिक than 1,800 restaurants in more than 40 states and the ज़िला of Columbia, और over 22 देशों worldwide सहित तुर्कों, Northern Cyprus, Bahrain, China, Hong Kong, Iraq, इंडोनेशिया, जॉर्डन, Kuwait, संयुक्त अरब Emirates, जापानी, मलेशिया, Saudi अरब, South Korea, Singapore, कनाडा, Jamaica, गुयाना, Suriname, Mexico, Trinidad, Puerto Rico, Honduras, वियतनाम, Panama, Peru, and कोस्टा Rica.
About thirty locations हैं company-owned, the rest franchised.
The लेग press is a weight training कसरत in which the व्यक्तिगत pushes a weight or resistance away from them using उनके टाँगे.
The पद leg press also refers to the apparatus used to perform इस exercise.
The लेग दबायें can be प्रयुक्त to evaluate an खिलाड़ी 's overall lower body शक्ति ( इससे knee joint to hip ).
using the diagonal sled-type लेग दबायें machine.
वहीँ are दो प्रमुख types of leg press:
The diagonal or vertical 'sled ' type leg press.
Weight disks ( प्लेटों ) are संलग्न सीधे to the sled, which is आरोहित on rails.
The उपयोक्ता sits below the sled and pushes it upward साथ their फीट.
ये machines normally include समायोज्य सुरक्षा brackets that prevent the user इससे होने trapped अंतर्गत the वज़न.
The 'cable ' प्रकार leg दबायें, or 'seated leg दबायें ', commonly found on multigyms.
The user sits कतरा and pushes आगे साथ their feet onto a plate कि is संलग्न to the वज़न स्टेक by अर्थात् of a long steel cable.
Wendy Williams शिकारी ( born वेन्डी Joan Williams ; जुलाई 18, 1964 ) is an American media व्यक्तित्व, अभिनेत्री और author.
वो hosts a syndicated television talk दिखाएँ, The Wendy विलियम्स Show.
Prior to टेलीविज़न, विलियम्स थी a `` शॉक jockette `` on several radio shows.
विलियम्स has gained सुर्खी लिये उसके on-air spats with celebrities.
She was the विषय of the 2006 VH1 वास्तविकता TV series called the Wendy Williams Experience जिससे broadcast कार्यक्रम surrounding उसके radio show.
She has लिखा an autobiography और several other किताबे, and has created a product लकीर पुकारा Adorn by वेन्डी विलियम्स.
Patrick Henry `` Treason '' वाक पहले the हाउस of Burgesses in an 1851 painting by पीटर F. Rothermel
`` Give me liberty, or give me death ! '' is a quotation attributed to पैट्रिक Henry from a वाक he made to the वर्जिनिया Convention.
On that दिन, at st. जॉन 's Church in Richmond, Virginia, और is credited with having swung the संतुलन in convincing the वर्जिनिया हाउस of Burgesses to pass a resolution delivering the वर्जिनिया troops to the क्रांतिकारी युद्ध.
among the delegates to the convention यहूद future us राष्ट्रपतियों थामस Jefferson and George वॉशिंगटन.
न्यूफ़ाउंडलैंड and Labrador (, locally ) is the easternmost प्रांत of Canada.
Situated in the country 's अटलांटिक प्रदेश, it incorporates the द्वीप of Newfoundland और मेनलैंड Labrador to the उत्तरपश्चिम, with a combined area of.
In 2011, the province 's जनसांख्यिकी was 514,536.
Approximately 92 प्रतिशत of the province 's जनसांख्यिकी जीवनदान on the द्वीप of Newfoundland ( including its संबद्ध smaller islands ), of which अधिक than half live on the avalon Peninsula.
The province is Canada 's सबसे linguistically homogenous, साथ 97.6 % of residents reporting अंग्रेज़ी ( Newfoundland अंग्रेज़ी ) as उनके mother जीभ in the 2006 census ;.
Historically, Newfoundland was भी घर to अद्वितीय किस्में of फ्रेंच, और Irish, as well as the now-extinct beothuk language.
in labrador, local dialects of innu-aimun और Inuktitut are भी बोला.
Newfoundland and labrador 's capital and largest city, st. John 's, is Canada 's 20th-largest Census महानगर क्षेत्रफल, और is home to almost 40 percent of the प्रांत 's जनसांख्यिकी.
St. John 's is the seat of government, घर to the House of Assembly of न्यूफ़ाउंडलैंड और labrador and the highest court in the क्षेत्राधिकार, the न्यूफ़ाउंडलैंड and Labrador Court of Appeal.
A former colony and डोमिनियन of the संयुक्त Kingdom, न्यूफ़ाउंडलैंड and Labrador became the tenth प्रांत to डालें the कनाडाई कनफेडरेशन on कूच 31, 1949, as Newfoundland.
on दिसम्बर 6, 2001, an amendment was बना to the Constitution of कनाडा to बदलें the province 's आधिकारिक name to न्यूफ़ाउंडलैंड and Labrador.
In day-to-day conversation, however, canadians generally still refer to the प्रांत itself as न्यूफ़ाउंडलैंड and to the region on the कनाडाई mainland as labrador.
थियोडोर `` T.R. ''
Roosevelt, Jr. ( ; अक्तूबर 27, 1858—January 6, 1919 ) थी the 26th President of the United States ( 1901–1909 ).
He is noted लिये उसके exuberant personality, range of interests and उपलब्धियाँ, और his leadership of the Progressive Movement, as खूब as his `` cowboy `` persona and robust मर्दानगी.
he थी a leader of the Republican Party और संस्थापक of the first अवतार of the short-lived Progressive ( `` सांड मूस '' ) पार्टी of 1912.
पहले बनने President, he held कार्यालयों at the नगर, state, and संघीय levels.
Roosevelt 's achievements as a naturalist, एक्सप्लोरर, शिकारी, author, और soldier are as much a part of his fame as कोई office he आयोजित as a राजनेता.
Roosevelt was 42 years बूढ़ा जब sworn in as President of the United States in 1901, making him the youngest अध्यक्ष कभी ; he beat out the youngest निर्वाचित president, John F. कैनेडी, by तभी एक year.
Roosevelt was also the पहला of only three sitting presidents to have won the Nobel सलाम पुरस्कार.
The Teddy भालू is नामित बाद उसे, despite उसके अवमानना for being called `` Teddy ''.
born into a wealthy family in नई यॉर्क City, रूज़वेल्ट was a sickly child जो suffered from asthma और stayed at home studying natural इतिहास.
To overcome उसके शारीरिक weakness, he embraced a ज़ोरदार life.
home-schooled, he became an eager student of प्रकृति.
He attended Harvard University, where he पढ़ाई biology, boxed and developed an ब्याज in naval अफेयर्स.
In 1881, one साल out of Harvard, he थी elected to the New यॉर्क राज्य सभा, जहाँ he became a नेता of the सुधार faction of his Republican पार्टी ( the `` GOP '' ).
His The Naval War of 1812 ( 1882 ) established his पेशेवर reputation as a serious historian ; he wrote numerous books on hunting, the बाहरी, और current political issues, as well as frontier history.
In 1884, his first बीवी और his mother died on the same day.
He temporarily बाएँ politics and गई to the frontier, becoming a rancher in the `` badlands '' in the Dakotas.
Returning to नई York नगर, he भागा for mayor in 1886, finishing third साथ 60,000 मत.
he बाद gained fame by लेने vigorous charge of the नगर पुलिस.
at the नेशनल level, he was a नेता in civil service सुधार.
the Spanish–American War broke आउट in 1898 while Roosevelt was, effectively, कार्यशील the विभाग of the Navy.
he promptly resigned and formed the Rough राइडर्स – a स्वयंसेवी cavalry regiment कि fought in Cuba.
The युद्ध hero was elected governor in 1898 और in 1900 थी nominated लिये वाइस president.
He सफलतापूर्वक energized the GOP आधार as a अत्यधिक visible प्रचारक to reelect अध्यक्ष विलियम McKinley on a platform of ऊँची tariffs, the सुनहरा मानक, imperialism, prosperity at घर और विजय abroad.
In 1901, अध्यक्ष William McKinley was assassinated और Roosevelt became अध्यक्ष.
he attempted to move the Republican पार्टी ( gop ) toward प्रगतिवाद, सहित trust busting और increased regulation of व्यवसायों.
Roosevelt became the first person elected to a term in his own right in 1904 after having ascended to the प्रेसिडेंसी ( इससे the vice-presidency ) upon the मौत of उसके predecessor, जीतना the largest प्रतिशत of the लोकप्रिय vote since the uncontested election of 1820.
रूज़वेल्ट coined the phrase `` Square Deal `` to describe his domestic कार्यसूची, emphasizing that the average citizen होता get a fair share under his policies.
As an outdoorsman और naturalist, he promoted the संरक्षण गति.
on the संसार स्टेज, Roosevelt 's policies यहूद characterized by his slogan, `` Speak softly and carry a big stick ``.
a cousin is a सापेक्ष with जिसको a व्यक्ति shares एक or more आम ancestor ( s ) ( other than a जनक, child/descendant, सहोदर, child/descendant of a सहोदर, or सहोदर of a parent/ancestor ).
However in आम parlance, `` cousin '' सामान्यतः specifically means `` first cousin ''.
प्रणालियों of `` degrees '' और `` removals '' are used in the English-speaking संसार to describe the exact relationship between two cousins ( in the broad भाव ) और the ancestor वे have in आम.
विभिन्न governmental entities have established systems लिये legal उपयोग कि can more precisely specify kinships with आम पूर्वजो existing any number of generations in the past, though आम उपयोग often eliminates the degrees and removals and refers to people with common ancestry as बस `` दूर cousins '' or `` relatives ''.
वेबस्टर is an American situation कॉमेडी कि aired on ABC from सितंबर 16, 1983 until may 8, 1987, और in first-run अनुप्रयोग from September 21, 1987 until कूच 10, 1989.
The श्रेणी was निर्मित by stu Silver.
The show stars emmanuel लुईस in the शीर्षक role as a young लड़के जो, बाद losing उसके parents, is adopted by his एनएफएल -pro godfather, portrayed by एलेक्स Karras, और his नई socialite wife, निभाई by Susan Clark.
the focus थी largely on how इस impulsively married couple था to adjust to उनके नई lives and sudden parenthood, लकिन it थी the अनुकूल Webster himself who drove much of the प्लाट.
The series was उत्पादित by जॉर्जियाई Bay Ltd., emmanuel लुईस Entertainment Enterprises, inc. ( 1986-1989 ) और Paramount टेलीविज़न.

तीन प्रकार of कोशिका प्रभाग
Cell प्रभाग is the process by which a parent cell divides into दो or more बेटी cells.
Cell division usually occurs as part of a larger कोशिका साईकिल.
in eukaryotes, there हैं two distinct प्रकार of cell division : a vegetative division, whereby प्रत्येक daughter कोशिका is genetically identical to the जनक cell ( mitosis ), and a reductive cell प्रभाग, whereby the number of गुणसूत्रों in the daughter कोशिकाएं is reduced by half, to उपज haploid gametes ( meiosis ).
Both of these cell division cycles हैं required in sexually reproducing organisms at कुछ पाइंट in their जीवन साईकिल, and दोनो are believed to be उपस्थित in the पिछला eukaryotic common पूर्वज Prokaryotes भी undergo a vegetative कोशिका division known as शब्दकोष fission, where उनके जेनेटिक सामग्री is segregated बराबर into two daughter कोशिकाएं.
सब cell विभाजन, regardless of organism, are preceded by a single round of DNA replication.
For सरल unicellular जीवों ऐसे as the amoeba, एक cell division is समतुल्य to reproduction – an संपूर्ण नई organism is created.
On a larger स्केल, mitotic cell प्रभाग can create progeny from multicellular जीवों, such as पौधे that grow from cuttings.
कोशिका division also enables sexually reproducing organisms to develop इससे the one-celled zygote, जिससे itself was produced by कोशिका division इससे gametes.
और बाद growth, कोशिका प्रभाग allows for continual निर्माण and मरम्मत of the organism.
A इंसान being 's देह experiences परिचय 10,000 खरब cell divisions in a आजीवन.
Cell division रै been modeled by finite subdivision rules.
The प्राथमिक concern of cell division is the मेंटेनेंस of the original cell 's genome.
पहले division can occur, the genomic सूचना कि is stored in गुणसूत्रों must be replicated, और the duplicated genome जरूर be separated cleanly between cells.
A great सौदे of सेल्यूलर infrastructure is involved in keeping genomic information consistent between `` generations ''.
