Howard जोन्स ( born जॉन Howard Jones, 23 February 1955, Southampton, Hampshire, इंग्लैण्ड ) is a अंग्रेजों musician, singer और songwriter.
According to the गिनीज किताब of अंग्रेजों hit Singles & Albums, `` Jones is an accomplished singer-songwriter who was a regular चार्ट visitor in the mid-1980s with उसके brand of synthpop.
Jones, जो थी equally लोकप्रिय in the U.S., appeared at Live Aid ``.
Allmusic journalist, Stephen Thomas Erlewine adds, `` जोन्स थी एक of the defining आंकड़े of mid-1980s synthpop.
His music मिलाया the प्रौद्योगिकी intensive sound of नई Wave with the cheery आशावाद of hippies and लेट 1960s पॉप.
Jones racked up a string of हिट्स in the मिड और लेट 1980s, before he retreated into होने a cult figure in the 1990s ''.
The अंतरराष्ट्रीय Isle of man TT ( Tourist ट्रॉफी ) रेस is a मोटरसाइकिल racing इवेंट held on the आइल of man और was for many सालो the most prestigious motorcycle रेस in the world.
the इवेंट was भाग of the FIM Motorcycle ग्रैंड Prix World Championship during the काल 1949–1976 before being transferred to the संयुक्त Kingdom after safety concerns and run by the FIM as the अंग्रेजों ग्रैंड Prix for the 1977 season.
The आइल of man TT दौड़ became part of the TT Formula 1 चैंपियनशिप इससे 1977 to 1990 to बचाना the इवेंट 's रेसिंग औकात.
इससे 1989 the racing has been विकसित by the आइल of Man Department of Tourism as the आइल of man tt पर्व.
the रेस is चलाएं in a time-trial format on पब्लिक सड़कें बंद लिये रेसिंग by the provisions of an अधिनियम of tynwald ( the parliament of the Isle of Man ).
The first race थी आयोजित on Tuesday 28 may 1907 and was पुकारा the International auto-cycle पर्यटक Trophy.
The event was organised by the auto-cycle क्लबों over 10 गोद of the St John 's छोटी कोर्स of 15 miles 1,470 गज लिये road-legal touring motorcycles with exhaust silencers, saddles, pedals और mud-guards.
The विजेता of the single-cylinder class, और overall विजेता of the first इवेंट in 1907, was Charlie Collier सवारी a Matchless motorcycle in a time of 4 hours, 8 minutes and 8 seconds at an average race गति of 38.21 mph.
the विजेता of the twin-cylinder class was rem Fowler सवारी a Peugeot engined Norton in a समय of 4 hours 21 मिनट्स और 52 सेकेंड at an औसत race गति of 36.21 mph.
The ट्रॉफी presented to चार्ली collier as the winner of the 1907 Isle of man TT रेस, was दान by the बिल्ले de Mouzilly st. मंगल.
It featured a stylised संस्करण of ओलम्पिक परमेश्वर hermes by Giovanni da बोलोग्ना as a silver figurine astride a winged व्हील.
The ट्रॉफी was समान in डिज़ाइन to the 18 carat सुनहरा montague Trophy presented to जॉन नेपियर ( arrol-johnston ) as the inaugural winner of the Isle of Man Tourist Trophy car रेस in 1905 now known as the rac पर्यटक ट्रॉफी.
the बिल्ले de mouzilly st. मंगल ट्रॉफी is now presented annually to the विजेता of the Isle of man वरिष्ठ tt Motor-Cycle रेस.
The 2007 Isle of Man tt थी the Centenary event which ran between 26 may and 8 June 2007 and प्रदर्शित a special Re-enactment of the 1907 Isle of man TT Race held on the गाँव ग्रीन next to Tynwald Hill in St जॉन 's on सोमवार 28 May 2007.
The vintage parade of 100 क्लासिक मोटरसाइकिल लिये the centenary Re-enactment on the original St जॉन 's Short Course was flagged दूर by former World Motor-Cycle चैंपियन Geoff Duke.
The first of the भागीदार to be flagged away was the recently restored twin-cylinder Peugeot-Norton ridden by Rem Fowler during the पहला आइल of Man TT रेस in 1907.
भी participating in the 2007 Re-enactment was TT race प्रतिस्पर्धी guy मार्टिन सवारी a 1938 Triumph बाघ 100 500 cc और अन्य former TT प्रतिस्पर्धी including एलन cathcart, सैमी Miller, Nick Jefferies and मिक Grant भी completed the re-enactment गोद.

बेरोजगारी ( or joblessness ) occurs जब people हैं बगैर कार्य और actively seeking work.
The बेरोजगारी rate is a measure of the prevalence of unemployment and it is calculated as a percentage by dividing the क्रमांक of बेरोजगार individuals by all individuals currently in the labor force.
During अवधि of recession, an economy प्रायः experiences a relatively ऊँची unemployment rate.
According to International श्रमिक संगठन रपट, अधिक than 197 million लोगों globally हैं आउट of work or 6 % of the संसार 's workforce were without a job in 2012.
There remains considerable सैद्धांतिक बहस regarding the कल्याणकारी, consequences and समाधान लिये बेरोजगारी.
Classical economics, New शास्त्रीय अर्थशास्त्र, and the Austrian स्कूल of economics argue कि market mechanisms हैं reliable means of resolving unemployment.
ये theories argue against interventions imposed on the मजदूर मार्केट इससे the outside, such as unionization, minimum wage laws, कर, and अन्य regulations कि they claim discourage the भर्ती of मजदूर.
keynesian economics emphasizes the cyclical nature of unemployment और recommends सरकारी interventions in the अर्थव्यवस्था that it दावा होगा reduce बेरोजगारी during recessions.
This सिद्धान्त focuses on recurrent shocks that एकाएक reduce कुल demand लिये goods and सेवाएं and thus reduce demand for workers.
keynesian मॉडल recommend government interventions designed to increase demand for workers ; these can शामिल financial stimuli, publicly funded job सृष्टि, and expansionist monetary policies.
In जोड to these व्यापक theories of बेरोजगारी, वहीँ हैं a few categorizations of unemployment कि हैं प्रयुक्त to more precisely model the प्रभाव of unemployment भीतर the आर्थिक system.
The main types of unemployment शामिल संरचनात्मक unemployment जिससे focuses on structural problems in the अर्थव्यवस्था and inefficiencies inherent in labour markets, including a बेमेल between the सप्लाई and माँग of laborers with जरुरी कौशल सेट.
संरचनात्मक वितर्क emphasize causes and solutions सम्बन्धित to विघटनकारी technologies and वैश्वीकरण.
Discussions of frictional unemployment फ़ोकस on voluntary decisions to work आधारित on each individuals ' valuation of उनके own कार्य और how that compares to वर्तमान wage दरों प्लस the time और effort required to find a job.
Causes and solutions for frictional unemployment often पता job entry threshold and मजदूरी rates.
Behavioral economists highlight व्यक्तिगत biases in निर्णय making, and often involve समस्याएं and solutions concerning स्टिकी wages and efficiency wages.
Collectivism is कोई philosophic, political, धार्मिक, economic, or social आउटलुक that emphasizes the interdependence of every human होने in a society or सभ्यता.
Collectivism is a basic cultural तत्व that exists as the रिवर्स of individualism in इंसान nature ( in the same way ऊँची कॉन्टेक्स्ट culture exists as the रिवर्स of low context culture ).
collectivist orientations stress the importance of cohesion within social समूह ( such as an `` in-group '', in कया specific context it is defined ) and in कुछ cases, the priority of group goals over व्यक्तिगत goals.
Collectivists प्रायः फ़ोकस on community, society, nation or country.
It रै महरूम used as an तत्व in many different and diverse प्रकार of सरकारी and राजनैतिक, आर्थिक and शैक्षणिक philosophies throughout इतिहास और most human समाजों in practice contain तत्व of both व्यक्तिगत and collectivism.
कुछ उदाहरण of collectivist cultures include India and Japan.
collectivism can be divided into horizontal collectivism and लंबवत collectivism.
Horizontal collectivism stresses collective decision-making among बराबर individuals, और is thus प्रायः आधारित on decentralization and समतावाद.
लंबवत collectivism is based on hierarchical structures of power and on moral and cultural conformity, और is therefore based on centralization and पदानुक्रम.
a सहकारी enterprise would be an उदाहरण of horizontal collectivism, whereas a military hierarchy would be an उदाहरण of vertical collectivism.
Acute disseminated encephalomyelitis ( ADEM ) is an प्रतिरक्षा mediated disease of the brain.
it usually occurs following a viral infection but may appear following टीकाकरण, bacterial or parasitic infection, or भी appear spontaneously.
as it involves autoimmune demyelination, it is similar to multiple sclerosis, and is considered part of the अनेक sclerosis borderline diseases.
the incidence rate is परिचय 8 प्रति 1,000,000 people प्रति साल.
Although it occurs in all ages, most reported मामले हैं in children और adolescents, with the औसत age around 5 to 8 सालो बूढ़ा.
the mortality rate may be as ऊँची as 5 %, पूरा रिकवरी is seen in 50 to 75 % of cases, while up to 70 to 90 % रिकवर साथ some नाबालिग residual disability.
the औसत समय to recover is one to six months.
ADEM produces multiple inflammatory lesions in the दिमाग and स्पाइनल cord, particularly in the श्वेत पदार्थ.
Usually ये हैं found in the subcortical और सेंट्रल श्वेत matter and cortical gray-white जंक्शन of both दिमागी hemispheres, cerebellum, brainstem, and स्पाइनल cord, लकिन periventricular श्वेत matter and धूसर matter of the cortex, thalami और basal ganglia may also be शामिल.
When the रोगी पीड़ित अधिक than one demyelinating episode, it is called तूल disseminated encephalomyelitis or multiphasic disseminated encephalomyelitis ( MDEM ).
The stomach is a muscular, hollow, dilated part of the पाचन system which functions as an महत्वपूर्ण अंग of the digestive ट्रैक्ट in कुछ animals, including vertebrates, echinoderms, insects ( mid-gut ), और molluscs.
It is involved in the दूसरी phase of पाचन, following mastication ( चबाने ).
The stomach is स्तिथ between the esophagus और the small आंत.
it secretes protein-digesting एंजाइमों called protease and strong acids to aid in खाना पाचन, ( भेजा to it via esophageal peristalsis ) through smooth muscular contortions ( पुकारा segmentation ) पहले sending partially पचता खाना ( chyme ) to the छोटी intestines.
the word stomach is derived from the Latin stomachus जिससे is निकला इससे the Greek word stomachos ( στόμαχος ), ultimately इससे stoma ( ), `` mouth ''.
The words gastro- and gastric ( meaning related to the stomach ) are both derived from the यूनानी word gaster ( ).

a woodie is a car body style, especially a स्टेशन wagon, where the rear bodywork is constructed of wood फ्रेमवर्क साथ infill panels of लकडी or चित्रित मेटल.
बाद the निधन of वास्तविक लकडी construction, manufacturers प्रयुक्त अनुकरण woodgrain चादर vinyl—sometimes augmented साथ three-dimensional, simulated framework—to recall wood construction.
In 2008, लकडी निर्माण थी evoked abstractly on the Ford Flex साथ a series of पक्ष और rear आड़ा grooves.
A pearl is a hard object उत्पादित भीतर the नरम ऊतक ( specifically the mantle ) of a living shelled mollusc.
Just जैसे the shell of a clam, a pearl is made up of calcium carbonate in मिनट crystalline form, which रै been deposited in केंद्रिय परतों.
The ideal pearl is perfectly गोलाकार और चिकना, but many other shapes of मोती ( बरॉक मोती ) occur.
The finest विशेषता natural pearls have महरूम highly valued as रत्नों and objects of सौंदर्य लिये अनेक सदियां, और क्युकी of this, the word पर्ल has become a metaphor for something बहुत rare, ठीक, सराहनीय, and valuable.
the सबसे मूल्यवान pearls occur spontaneously in the जंगली, लकिन वे हैं extremely विरल.
ये wild pearls are referred to as प्राकृतिक मोती.
संस्कारी or farmed मोती from pearl oysters and freshwater mussels make up the बहुमत of those that are currently sold.
नकल मोती हैं also widely sold in inexpensive jewelry, लकिन the विशेषता of उनके iridescence is usually very ग़रीब, and often, कृत्रिम मोती are easily distinguished इससे genuine मोती.
मोती have been harvested and cultivated primarily लिये उपयोग in आभूषण, लकिन in the past वे were भी stitched onto lavish clothing.
मोती have also been crushed and प्रयुक्त in cosmetics, medicines, and in paint formulations.
Whether जंगली or cultured, gem quality pearls are लगभग सदा nacreous and, as is the interior of the shell that produces them.
However, almost all species of shelled molluscs हैं सक्षम of producing मोती ( formally referred to as `` calcareous concretions '' by कुछ स्त्रोत ) of lesser shine or less गोलाकार shape.
Although these may also be legitimately referred to as `` मोती '' by gemological labs and also अंतर्गत u.S. Federal व्यापार Commission नियम, और are formed in the same way, सबसे of them have no मान, except as curiosities.
Bing ( known previously as सजीव Search, Windows सजीव ढूंढें, and MSN Search ) is a web search engine ( advertised as a `` निर्णय engine `` ) from Microsoft.
Bing थी unveiled by microsoft सीईओ स्टीव Ballmer on may 28, 2009 at the All Things Digital conference in सैन Diego लिये release on जून 1.
notable changes शामिल the listing of search सुझाव while प्रश्नों are entered और a सूची of सम्बन्धित searches ( called `` explore pane '' ) based on semantic प्रौद्योगिकी from powerset which Microsoft purchased in 2008.
on July 29, 2009, Microsoft और याहू ! घोषित a सौदे in जिससे bing would शक्ति Yahoo ! ढूंढें.
सब याहू ! Search वैश्विक customers और partners are expected to have बना the transition by early 2012.
In October 2011, bing घोषित it थी working on नई back-end search अवसंरचना, with the लक्ष्य of delivering faster and थोड़ा more relevant search परिणाम for users.
ज्ञात as `` Tiger '', the new index-serving प्रौद्योगिकी रै been incorporated into Bing globally, since August 2011.
in May 2012, Bing announced another redesign of its search engine that शामिल `` Sidebar '', a social विशेषता कि searches users ' सोशल networks for information प्रासंगिक to the search query.
A आरेख प्रर्दशित an i Formation on offense और a 4-3 गठन on defense
in अमरीकी फ़ुटबॉल, प्रत्येक team रै ग्यारह players on the field at one time.
The specific भूमिका कि a खिलाड़ी takes on the फ़ील्ड is called their position.
Under the आधुनिक rules of अमरीकी football, teams हैं allowed unlimited subsititutions, कि is teams may बदलें any number of खिलाड़ी after any खेल.
This रै resulted in the development of three `` platoons '' of players, the offense ( the टोली साथ the ball, who is trying to score ), the defense ( the टोली trying to prevent the अन्य टोली इससे scoring, and to take the ball from them ), और the special teams ( जो खेल in kicking परिस्थितियों ).
Within those platoons, various विशिष्ट positions मौजूद depending on what the player 's main जॉब is.
The Irish लोगों ( or na héireannaigh ; Ulster-Scots : airish fowk ) हैं an ethnic group who originate in Ireland, an island in northwestern Europe.
Ireland has महरूम populated for around 9,000 years ( according to archaeological studies, see प्रागैतिहासिक Ireland ).
The Irish लोगों 's earliest ancestors हैं recorded in legends – वे are claimed to be descended from groups ऐसे as the Nemedians, Fomorians, fir bolg, Tuatha dé Danann and the milesians.
Lebor Gabála érenn, a किताब of Irish mythology tells that milesians were Scythian descendants.
The प्रमुख groups that interacted with the आयरिश in the मध्य आयु include the Picts, स्कॉट्स, and the वाइकिंग्स.
Due to this contact, icelanders हैं noted लिये having कुछ Irish descent.
The Anglo-Norman invasion of the High मध्य आयु, the English बागानों and the subsequent English नियम of the country introduced the normans and फ्लेमिश into Ireland.
वेल्श, picts, Bretons, and small पार्टियों of gauls and भी Anglo-Saxons are known in Ireland इससे much earlier टाइम्स.
वहीँ have been many notable आयरिश लोगों throughout इतिहास.
the 6th सदी आयरिश monk and missionary Columbanus is regarded as एक of the `` fathers of Europe '', followed by Kilian of Würzburg और Vergilius of साल्जबर्ग.
The वैज्ञानिक रॉबर्ट बॉयल is माना the `` पिता of chemistry ``.
Famous आयरिश explorers include Brendan the नाविक, Robert mcclure, अर्नेस्ट Shackleton और tom crean.
By कुछ खाते, the first European child born in North America had आयरिश descent on both पहलू ; और an Irishman थी the first European to set foot on अमरीकी soil in Columbus ' expedition of 1492.
There are वंशजों of आयरिश people जीना in अनेक western countries, विशेषकर in english-speaking देशों.
historically, emigration रै been caused by politics, अकाल और economic मुद्दे.
An estimated 50 to 80 million लोगों हैं वंशजों of Irish people, primarily in the United किंगडम, the संयुक्त States, ऑस्ट्रेलिया, कनाडा and आइसलैंड ; वहीँ हैं also smaller संख्याएँ in Argentina, चिली, Mexico, Jamaica, Barbados, South Africa, नई जीलैंड, फ़्रांस, Germany and Brazil.
The largest number of वंशजों of Irish people live in the संयुक्त States.
The क्रमांक of people living in ऑस्ट्रेलिया जो are of Irish descent is higher, as a प्रतिशत of कुल population, than that of कोई other country.
Approximately forty percent of the settlement जनसांख्यिकी of आइसलैंड आए इससे Ireland or Scotland.
The very first निवासियों of Iceland were Irish.
the Hubble Space दूरदर्शी ( HST ) is a स्पेस telescope that was carried into orbit by a स्पेस शटल in 1990 and remains in operation.
A एपर्चर दूरदर्शी in low Earth कक्षा, हबल 's four main instruments observe in the निकट पराबैंगनी, दृश्य, and निकट infrared.
The दूरदर्शी is नामित बाद the astronomer एडविन हबल.
हबल 's कक्षा बाहर the distortion of Earth 's atmosphere allows it to take extremely sharp images with almost no background लाइट.
Hubble 's गहन Field have been कुछ of the सबसे detailed visible-light बिंब कभी, allowing a गहन view into स्पेस और time.
अनेक Hubble observations have led to breakthroughs in astrophysics, such as accurately determining the rate of expansion of the universe.
Although not the first space telescope, Hubble is one of the largest and most versatile, और is खूब ज्ञात as both a vital शोध tool and a public संबंध boon for खगोलशास्त्र.
The HST थी निर्मित by the United राज्य स्पेस agency NASA, साथ contributions from the European Space एजेंसी, और is operated by the स्पेस दूरदर्शी Science Institute.
the HST is one of NASA 's ग्रेट observatories, along साथ the Compton Gamma रे Observatory, the Chandra X-ray वेधशाला, and the Spitzer Space दूरदर्शी.
Space telescopes यहूद प्रस्तावित as early as 1923.
Hubble was funded in the 1970s, with a proposed launch in 1983, लकिन the प्रोजेक्ट was घिरा by तकनीकी delays, budget problems, and the Challenger disaster.
जब finally launched in 1990, वैज्ञानिकों मिला that the main mirror had been ground incorrectly, compromising the telescope 's capabilities.
The दूरदर्शी was लौटी to its intended विशेषता by a servicing मिशन in 1993.
Hubble is the तभी telescope designed to be serviced in space by astronauts.
between 1993 और 2002, four मिशन repaired, upgraded, और replaced प्रणालियों on the दूरदर्शी ; a पांचवां mission was canceled on सुरक्षा grounds following the Columbia disaster.
however, after spirited public discussion, NASA administrator Mike Griffin approved एक final सर्विसिंग mission, समाप्त in 2009 by स्पेस Shuttle Atlantis.
The telescope is अभी अपेक्षित to function until at least 2013.
इसके वैज्ञानिक successor, the जेम्स Webb स्पेस दूरदर्शी ( JWST ), is to be launched in 2018 or possibly later.
Anti-inflammatory refers to the property of a पदार्थ or treatment that reduces सूजन.
anti-inflammatory दवाएँ मेक up about half of analgesics, remedying pain by reducing inflammation as opposed to opioids, जिससे affect the central nervous system.
The Tonight Show is a US late-night talk दिखाएँ that रै aired on NBC since 1954.
It is the longest फिलहाल running regularly अनुसूचित entertainment कार्यक्रम in the US and the third longest-running दिखाएँ on NBC बाद Meet the Press and Today.
The tonight Show थी hosted by Steve एलन ( 1954–1957 ), Jack paar ( 1957–1962 ), Johnny Carson ( 1962–1992 ), Jay Leno ( 1992–2009, 2010–present ), और कोनन o'brien ( 2009–2010 ).
Several guest hosts also appeared, विशेषकर during the paar और Carson eras.
the longest-serving मेजबान to date was Johnny Carson, जो hosted The tonight दिखाएँ अभिनीत जॉनी Carson लिये 30 seasons from the fall of 1962 through the spring of 1992.
The वर्तमान host of the show is Jay Leno, जो था previously hosted the दिखाएँ from 1992 to 2009 and began his second tenure on कूच 1, 2010.
On April 3, 2013, NBC घोषित Jimmy fallon होता become the new host of the tonight Show.
the Tonight Show साथ Jimmy Fallon will premiere February 24, 2014, the day बाद the closing ceremonies of the 2014 Winter ओलंपिक.
ss एंड्रिया डोरिया.
सुनाया थी an ocean लाइनर for the Italian Line ( Società di navigazione इटालिया ) home ported in जेनोआ, Italy, सबसे famous लिये इसके sinking in 1956, when 52 people died ( 51 इससे तात्कालिक प्रभाव ).
नामित बाद the 16th-century genoese admiral एंड्रिया Doria, the ship had a gross register tonnage of 29,100 और a capacity of परिचय 1,200 passengers and 500 crew.
For a country attempting to rebuild its अर्थव्यवस्था and reputation बाद संसार युद्ध II, एंड्रिया Doria was an प्रतीक of Italian national pride.
of all इटली 's ships at the समय, एंड्रिया डोरिया was the largest, fastest और supposedly safest.
शुभारम्भ on 16 जून 1951, the जलयान undertook its maiden voyage on 14 जनवरी 1953.
on 25 जुलाई 1956, while the एंड्रिया Doria was approaching the coast of nantucket, Massachusetts, बंधी लिये नई यॉर्क City, the eastbound of the Swedish अमरीकी Line collided साथ it in कया became one of इतिहास 's most infamous maritime disasters.
Struck in the side, the top-heavy एंड्रिया Doria immediately प्रारंभ to list severely to starboard, which बाएँ half of इसके lifeboats unusable.
The consequent shortage of lifeboats might have resulted in significant घाटा of life, लकिन the दक्षता of the जलयान 's तकनीकी design allowed it to रहो afloat for over 11 hours बाद the ramming.
the good बर्ताव of the crew, improvements in communications और the rapid response of अन्य जहाजों averted a विपत्ति similar in scale to that of the in 1912.
1,660 passengers and crew यहूद बचाया and बच, जबकि 46 लोगों died as a consequence of the टक्कर.
the evacuated लक्ज़री लाइनर capsized and sank the following morning.
This दुर्घटना remains the worst maritime disaster to occur in United States waters since the sinking of the in 1915.
the incident and its aftermath यहूद heavily covered by the news मीडिया.
जबकि the rescue प्रयत्न were both successful and commendable, the कारण of the टक्कर साथ the स्टॉकहोम and the घाटा of एंड्रिया Doria generated much interest in the मीडिया and अनेक lawsuits.
largely because of an out-of-court settlement अनुबंध between the two shipping companies during hearings immediately after the विपत्ति, no determination of the कारण ( s ) was ever formally प्रकाशित.
Although वृहद दोष appeared initially to पतन on the इतालवी liner, more recent discoveries have indicated that a misreading of radar on the Swedish जलयान may have initiated the collision course, अग्रणी to errors on दोनो जहाजों.
Andrea डोरिया was the last major transatlantic passenger vessel to sink before aircraft became the preferred method of travel.
Dialysis tubing
Dialysis tubing is a type of semi- or partially permeable झिल्ली tubing made from regenerated cellulose or सेलोफेन.
It can be प्रयुक्त for diffusion with solutes or osmosis if used with water तभी.
Osmosis is when जल passes through a semi-permeable परत to पहुँचें संतुलन.
Diffusion, on the other हाथ, allows the गति of अणुओं इससे high विशेषज्ञता to low concentration.
It will only allow molecules to pass through a semi-permeable membrane or layer if the अणु is small पर्याप्त to fit through the झिल्ली or a झिल्ली 's pore.
इस प्रायः परिणाम with the effects of diffusion through a झिल्ली तभी really affects small molecules, और लगभग never larger molecules.
डायलिसिस tubing is used in clinical हालातों to ensure a filtered flow of अणुओं, preventing the प्रवाह of larger solute molecules.
Small molecules can be `` धोया '' आउट of a solution जिससे is उत्तेजित through the tubing into a solvent, प्रायः जल, which surrounds it and in which they can be flushed away.
In demonstrations of semi-permeable membranes, a solution containing several प्रकार of molecules, प्रायः ग्लूकोज and मंड, is लगाई into a semi-permeable dialysis थैला, ऐसे as a cellulose membrane साथ pores, and the bag is sealed साथ a गांठ or elastic band.
the sealed डायलिसिस bag is लगाई in a संग्राहक of a different solution, or water.
अणुओं small enough to pass through the tubing ( water, salts, monosaccharides, और other small अणुओं ) tend to मूव into or आउट of the dialysis थैला in the दिशा of decreasing concentration, therefore displaying diffusion.
Larger molecules ( ऐसे as proteins, or polysaccharides ) that have dimensions significantly greater than the pore diameter are retained inside the डायलिसिस bag.
the water और smaller solutes in a hypotonic solution ( a solution कि रै a lesser solute विशेषज्ञता than the समाधान it is संदर्भित to ) होगा क्रॉस a semi-permeable membrane, like dialysis tubing, into a hypertonic समाधान ( a समाधान that has a उच्चतर solute concentration than the समाधान it is संदर्भित to ) in an attempt to पहुँचें equilibrium, जहाँ the solute विशेषज्ञता of each solution is in संतुलन.
Mercury laboratory thermometer
A थर्मामीटर ( इससे the यूनानी, thermos, meaning `` hot '' और μἐτρον, metron, `` माप '' ) is a यंत्र that measures temperature or temperature gradient using a variety of different principles.
A thermometer रै दो important elements : the temperature सेंसर ( e.g. the बल्ब on a mercury-in-glass thermometer ) in which some physical बदलें occurs with temperature, plus some means of converting this physical change into a numerical value ( e.g. the दृश्य स्केल कि is marked on a mercury-in-glass thermometer ).
There are many प्रकार and many उपयोग for thermometers, as विस्तृत below in sections of this आलेख.
Snow White and the सात dwarfs is a 1937 American animated musical fantasy film produced by वॉल्ट डिज़्नी और released by RKO Radio Pictures.
Based on the German परी टेल by the Brothers Grimm, it is the पहला full-length cel animated विशेषता film and the earliest in the Walt Disney एनिमेटेड Classics श्रेणी.
The स्टोरी was adapted by storyboard कलाकारों Dorothy ऐन Blank, रिचर्ड creedon, Merrill de Maris, ओटो englander, Earl hurd, Dick rickard, टेड Sears and Webb Smith.
दाउद हाथ थी the supervising director, जबकि विलियम Cottrell, Wilfred Jackson, लैरी Morey, Perce pearce, और Ben sharpsteen directed the film 's individual sequences.
Snow श्वेत premiered at the carthay Circle Theatre on दिसम्बर 21, 1937, followed by a nationwide रिलीज on February 4, 1938, and with international आय of $ 8 million during इसके initial release briefly assumed the record of highest grossing sound फिल्मी at the time.
the लोकप्रियता of the फिल्मी has led to it being re-released theatrically many टाइम्स, until इसके home वीडियो रिलीज in the 1990s.
Adjusted for महंगाई, it is one of the शीर्ष ten performers at the North American बक्सा office.
at the 11th Academy पुरस्कार, Walt डिज़्नी was awarded an honorary Oscar, and the फिल्मी थी nominated लिये Best musical Score.
It थी added to the United States National Film Registry in 1989 and is ranked in the अमरीकी Film Institute 's list of the 100 महानतम American films, who also नामित the फिल्मी as the महानतम अमरीकी animated film of सब समय in 2008.
Disney 's take on the परी टेल रै had a big cultural प्रभाव, resulting in a लोकप्रिय थीम park attraction, a video खेल, and a ब्रॉडवे musical.
Childbirth, labour, delivery, birth, partus, or parturition is the culmination of a गर्भावस्था काल with the expulsion of one or more newborn infants from a स्त्री 's गर्भाशय.
The प्रक्रम of normal childbirth is categorized in three stages of labour : the shortening और dilation of the cervix, descent और जनम of the infant, and जनम of the placenta.
In अनेक cases and with increasing आवृत्ति, प्रसव is achieved through प्रेरण of मजदूर or caesarean section, which is the removal of the neonate through a surgical incision in the उदर, बल्कि than through vaginal birth.
Childbirth by C-Sections increased 50 % in the u.S. from 1996 to 2006, और comprise nearly 32 % of births in the U.S. and Canada.
With आदर to induced मजदूर, अधिक than 22 % of women undergo induction of labour in the United States.
चिकित्सा professional policy makers ढूँढें that induced births and elective cesarean can be नुकसानदेह to the भ्रूण and neonate as well as harmful or without benefit to the माँ, and have established strict guidelines लिये non-medically indicated induced births और elective cesarean before 39 सप्ताह.

the दिखाएँ ran लिये 5 seasons between 2003 and 2005.
Flushed Away is a 2006 british/american computer एनिमेटेड कार्रवाई / adventure कॉमेडी फिल्मी directed by David Bowers और sam Fell.
it was बना in the partnership between aardman Animations और DreamWorks एनिमेशन, और is Aardman 's पहला completely computer-animated feature as opposed to the usual stop-motion.
the film stars the आवाज़ talents of Hugh Jackman, Kate Winslet, Andy Serkis, Bill Nighy, इयान McKellen, शेन Richie and जां Reno.
the स्टोरी थी by sam गिरी, पीटर रब, लंड सहनशील, और इयान La Frenais, और the screenplay was written by लंड Clement, इयान La frenais, Christopher Lloyd, Joe Keenan, and William davies.
the film was released in US on 3 नवम्बर 2006, and in uk on दिसम्बर 1 2006, और थी distributed by Paramount Pictures, मगर लिये स्विट्ज़रलैंड, Spain, and the नीदरलैंड्स, जिससे यहूद handled by Universal तस्वीरें.
The Atlanta Braves are a पेशेवर बेसबॉल टोली based in Atlanta.
The Braves are a member of the Eastern प्रभाग of Major League Baseball 's National League.
the Braves have played in टर्नर फ़ील्ड since 1997.
The `` braves '' नाम, जिससे was पहला प्रयुक्त in 1912, originates from a term लिये a Native American warrior.
They हैं nicknamed `` the bravos '', and often referred to as `` America 's टोली `` in सन्दर्भ to the team 's games being ब्रॉडकास्ट on the nationally उपलब्धियाँ TBS इससे the 1970s until 2007, gaining a wide fanbase.
इससे 1991 to 2005 the braves यहूद one of the most successful franchises in baseball, जीतना division शीर्षक an unprecedented 14 consecutive times in कि period ( omitting the strike-shortened 1994 season in जिससे there were no आधिकारिक division champions ).
The Braves जीती the NL वेस्ट 1991–93 and the NL East 1995–2005, और returned to the playoffs as the National League जंगली कार्ड in 2010.
The braves advanced to the संसार Series five times in the 1990s, जीतना the title in 1995.
Since their डेब्यू in the National League in 1876, the मताधिकार रै जीती 16 divisional शीर्षक, 17 National League pennants, as खूब as three World श्रेणी championships—in 1914 as the बोस्टन braves, in 1957 as the Milwaukee braves, and in 1995 in अटलांटा.
The Braves are the तभी MLB मताधिकार to have won the World Series in three different home cities.
the club is एक of the National लीग 's two remaining charter franchises ( the other होने the Chicago शावक ) and was founded in Boston, मैसाचुसेट्स, in 1871 as the Boston रेड Stockings ( not to be confused साथ the American League 's बोस्टन Red sox ).
They are माना `` the oldest लगातार playing team in major उत्तर American sports. ''
वहीँ is an argument as to who is दरअसल older because although the शावक हैं a full season `` older '' ( formed as the Chicago श्वेत stockings in 1870 ) शिकागो lost two सीज़न to the Great Chicago Fire, यूँ the Braves have played अधिक लगातार सीज़न.
After various name changes ( such as the Boston beaneaters ), the टोली operated as the बोस्टन Braves लिये सबसे of the पहला हाफ of the 20th सदी.
In 1953, the team moved to मिल्वौकी, विस्कॉन्सिन और became the Milwaukee Braves, followed by the move to Atlanta in 1966.
the टोली 's tenure in Atlanta is famous लिये Hank आरोन तोड़कर बेब Ruth 's करियर home चलाएं record in 1974, हालांकि the बहुमत of Aaron 's home runs were hit while the टोली थी in मिल्वौकी.
His record stood जबतक 2007, जब सैन Francisco left fielder बैरी bonds broke the record.
The leaves of a beech tree
3d रेंडरिंग of a μCT स्कैन of a leaf piece, resolution circa 40 μm/ voxel.
A पत्ता is an अंग of a vascular संयंत्र, as पारिभाषित in वनस्पति terms, and in particular in plant morphology.
Foliage is a mass noun कि refers to पत्ते as a feature of plants.
Typically a leaf is a पतला, flattened अंग borne ऊपर ground and specialized for photosynthesis, but many types of पत्ते are adapted in ways almost unrecognisable in those terms : कुछ are नहीं चपटा ( लिये उदाहरण many succulent leaves और conifers ), some are not above ground ( such as बल्ब scales ), और कुछ हैं without major photosynthetic फलन ( consider for उदाहरण cataphylls, spines, and cotyledons ).
Conversely, many structures of non-vascular पौधे, or even of कुछ lichens, जिससे हैं नहीं plants at all ( in the भाव of होने सदस्यों of the kingdom plantae ), do look और फलन much like पत्ते.
furthermore, several structures मिला in vascular plants look like पत्ते but हैं नहीं actually leaves ; they differ इससे leaves in उनके structures और origins.
उदाहरण शामिल phyllodes, cladodes, and phylloclades.
शीर्षक card for the 1937 हमारी Gang कॉमेडी Rushin ' Ballet.
Our गिरोह ( भी ज्ञात as the छोटी Rascals or Hal रोच 's Rascals ) हैं a श्रेणी of अमरीकी कॉमेडी short films about a समूह of poor neighborhood children और their adventures.
Created by कॉमेडी producer एचएएल रोच, the श्रेणी is विख्यात लिये showing children behaving in a अपेक्षाकृत natural way, as Roach and original निदेशक Robert F. McGowan worked to film the unaffected, कच्चा nuances apparent in नियमित children बल्कि than have उन्हें imitate वयस्क acting styles.
In जोड, Our Gang notably put boys, girls, whites and blacks together in a समूह as equals, कुछ कि `` broke new मैदान, '' according to film historian Leonard maltin.
ऐसे a बात था never महरूम done before in सिनेमा लकिन has चूंकि महरूम repeated after the कामयाबी of हमारी गिरोह.
The पहला उत्पादन at the रोच studio in 1922 was a series of silent छोटी विषय.
जब Roach changed वितरकों from pathé to Metro-Goldwyn-Mayer ( MGM ) in 1927, and converted the series to sound in 1929, the श्रेणी took off even further.
Production continued at the Roach studio जबतक 1938, when the श्रेणी was sold to MGM, who then continued producing the comedies until 1944.
the हमारी Gang series शामिल a कुल of 220 shorts और one feature film, General spanky, featuring over forty-one child अभिनेताओं.
As MGM retained the अधिकारों to the हमारी गिरोह trademark following उनके purchase of the उत्पादन अधिकारों, the 80 Roach-produced `` talkies '' were syndicated for television अंतर्गत the title The Little दुष्टों beginning in 1955.
Both Roach 's the Little दुष्टों package ( अभी स्वामित्व by सीबीएस टेलीविज़न वितरण ) और mgm 's हमारी Gang पैकेज ( अभी owned by Warner Bros. entertainment ) have चूंकि remained in अनुप्रयोग, साथ periodic new productions आधारित on the शॉर्ट्स surfacing over the सालो, सहित a 1994 छोटी दुष्टों विशेषता film released by Universal तस्वीरें.
Zacharias Janssen ( भी Zacharias जानसन or Sacharias Jansen ) ( b.1580-88, d.pre-1632 to 1638 ) थी a डच spectacle-maker from Middelburg संबद्ध with the आविष्कार of the पहला optical दूरदर्शी.
Janssen is sometimes also credited लिये inventing the first truly यौगिक microscope.
However, the origin of the microscope, बस like the origin of the दूरदर्शी, is a matter of debate.
झील tahoe ( ; washo : dáʔaw ) is a large freshwater झील in the Sierra नेवाडा of the संयुक्त States.
At a सतह उन्नयन of, it is located along the border between California और नेवाडा, वेस्ट of Carson City.
Lake Tahoe is the largest अल्पाइन lake in North America.
इसके depth is, बनाना it the United राज्य 's second-deepest ( the deepest is Crater Lake in Oregon, being deeper, at ).
Additionally, Lake Tahoe is listed as the 26th largest झील by आवाज़ in the world at.
the झील थी formed about 2 लाख सालो पहले और is a part of the झील tahoe Basin with the modern झील being shaped during the ice ages.
it is ज्ञात लिये the clarity of इसके water and the panorama of surrounding kyu on सब sides.
The area surrounding the lake is भी referred to as झील Tahoe, or simply Tahoe.
झील tahoe is a major tourist attraction in दोनो Nevada and California.
it is home to a क्रमांक of ski resorts, summer outdoor recreation, and tourist attractions.
Snow and skiing are a significant भाग of the area 's अर्थव्यवस्था and reputation.
Mountain and lake scenery are आकर्षण throughout the year.
The Nevada पक्ष भी includes विशाल कसीनो.
राजमार्गों provide year-round अभिगम from Reno, कार्सन नगर, और Sacramento.

The Twenty-seventh Amendment ( Amendment XXVII ) prohibits any law that increases or decreases the salary of सदस्यों of the कॉंग्रेस इससे taking effect until the start of the next नियत of terms of दफ्तर लिये प्रतिनिधि.
it is the सबसे recent amendment to the United राज्य Constitution.
It थी submitted to the राज्य for अनुसमर्थन in 1789 and थी adopted in 1992.
“First they आए... ” is a famous बयान and provocative poem attributed to pastor Martin niemöller ( 1892–1984 ) परिचय the sloth of German intellectuals following the nazis ' वृद्धि to शक्ति और the subsequent purging of उनके chosen लक्ष्य, समूह बाद group.
There is कुछ असहमति over the सटीक wording of the quotation and जब it was निर्मित ; the सामग्री of the quotation may have महरूम presented differently by Niemöller on अलग अवसरों.
This सूची of आइलैंड्स by area includes सब islands in the संसार वृहद than 2,500 km2 ( ) and अनेक अन्य आइलैंड्स over 500 km2 ( ), sorted in descending order by area.

Four Thirds लोगो
The चार तिहाई प्रणाली is a standard created by ओलम्पस and कोडक for डिजिटल single-lens reflex camera ( DSLR ) design and development. < ref name='DPReview.com 2001-02-13 ' >
The system provides a मानक कि, with digital cameras और lenses available इससे अनेक manufacturers, allows for the इंटरचेंज of lenses और लाशें इससे different manufacturers.
seems to कवर the standard.
Proponents describe it as an खोलें standard, but companies may तभी उपयोग it under a non-disclosure अनुबंध.
नापसंद older SLR प्रणालियों, चार Thirds has been designed from the मैदान up to be entirely digital.
अनेक lenses are extensively computerized, to the point that Olympus offers फर्मवेयर अद्यतन for many of उन्हें.
Lens डिज़ाइन has महरूम tailored to the requirements of डिजिटल sensors, most notably through telecentric डिजाइन.
the आकार of the सेंसर is significantly छोटी than for most DSLRs और this implies that lenses, especially telephoto lenses, can be छोटी.
लिये example, a Four Thirds lens साथ a 300 mm focal length होता कवर परिचय the same angle of view as a 600 mm focal लंबाई lens for the 35 mm फिल्मी मानक, and is correspondingly more compact.
यूँ, the Four Thirds System has crop factor ( फोकल length multiplier ) of परिचय 2, और while this enables longer फोकल length for वृहद magnification, it करता n't aid the manufacture of wide कोण lenses.
The चित्र sensor format, generally इंटरमीडिएट between those of larger slrs and छोटी compact cameras, generally gives levels of लागत, प्रदर्शन और convenience intermediate between those two वर्ग.
HVAC प्रणालियों use वेंटिलेशन air ducts installed throughout a building to supply conditioned air to a रूम through आउटलेट vents, called diffusers ; और ducts to हटाएँ एयर through return-air grilles.
HVAC ( heating, ventilation, and air कंडीशनिंग ) is the technology of indoor और automotive पर्यावरणीय सुकून.
hvac प्रणाली डिज़ाइन is a subdiscipline of mechanical engineering, आधारित on the principles of ऊष्मागतिकी, fluid यांत्रिकी, और heat transfer.
Refrigeration is sometimes added to the फ़ील्ड 's संक्षिप्त as HVAC & R or HVACR, or ventilating is dropped as in hacr ( ऐसे as the designation of HACR-rated सर्किट ब्रेकर्स ).
HVAC is important in the डिज़ाइन of मीडियम to विशाल industrial और दफ्तर buildings ऐसे as skyscrapers और in marine environments such as aquariums, where safe and स्वस्थ building शर्तें are regulated with respect to temperature and आर्द्रता, using भैस air from outdoors.
Ventilation on the downdraught system, by impulsion, or the 'plenum ' principle, applied to schoolrooms ( 1899 )
Heating, ventilating, and air कंडीशनिंग is based on आविष्कारों and discoveries made by Nikolay Lvov, Michael Faraday, Willis Carrier, Reuben Trane, जेम्स जूल, William rankine, sadi carnot, और अनेक others.
the आविष्कार of the components of HVAC प्रणालियों went hand-in-hand साथ the industrial revolution, and new methods of modernization, higher दक्षता, and system कंट्रोल are constantly introduced by कंपनियाँ और आविष्कारक worldwide.
the three central कृत्यों of heating, ventilating, and air-conditioning हैं interrelated, विशेषकर साथ the need to provide thermal comfort और acceptable indoor एयर quality भीतर reasonable installation, operation, और maintenance costs.
HVAC systems can provide वेंटिलेशन, reduce एयर infiltration, और maintain pressure संबंध between spaces.
The means of air डिलीवरी and हटाना from स्पेसेस is known as रूम air वितरण.
the starting point in carrying आउट an estimate both लिये कूलिंग and हीटिंग depends on the exterior climate और interior specified शर्तें.
However before taking up the heat load calculation, it is necessary to ढूँढें fresh एयर आवश्यकताएँ for each क्षेत्रफल in विवरण, as pressurization is an important consideration.
in modern इमारतें the design, संस्थापना, and कंट्रोल प्रणालियों of ये कृत्यों हैं एकीकृत into एक or अधिक HVAC systems.
For very छोटी इमारतें, contractors normally capacity इंजीनियर और चुनें HVAC systems और उपकरण.
For larger इमारतें, भवन सेवाएं designers and engineers, ऐसे as mechanical, architectural, or building services engineers analyze, design, and specify the HVAC प्रणालियों, and specialty mechanical ठेकेदारों fabricate और आयोग उन्हें.
Building permits and code-compliance inspections of the installations हैं normally जरूरी for all sizes of buildings.
the HVAC industry is a worldwide enterprise, with roles including operation और maintenance, प्रणाली design और construction, equipment manufacturing and sales, और in education और शोध.
the HVAC उद्योग was historically regulated by the manufacturers of HVAC equipment, लकिन regulating और मानकों संगठन such as HARDI, ASHRAE, SMACNA, ACCA, वर्दी Mechanical कोड, International mechanical Code, and AMCA have महरूम established to support the industry and प्रोत्साहित high standards and उपलब्धि.
Royal Navy कमांडर James बंध, CMG, RNVR, is a fictional अक्षर created by British पत्रकार और उपन्यासकार Ian Fleming in 1953.
he is the protagonist of the जेम्स Bond series of novels, films, comics and video games.
फ्लेमिंग wrote twelve बंध novels और two short स्टोरी संग्रहण before उसके मौत, although the पिछला दो books— The Man with the Golden Gun and Octopussy and The Living daylights —were published मरणोपरांत.
The बंध character is a Secret Service agent, code number 007, residing in London लकिन क्रियाशील internationally.
Bond थी a कम्पोजिट character जो थी आधारित on a number of कमांडो जिसको Fleming knew दौरान उसके सेवा in the Naval Intelligence प्रभाग during संसार War II, to whom Fleming added उसके अपना style और a number of उसके own tastes ; Bond 's name was appropriated from अमरीकी ornithologist James Bond.
बंध has a number of अक्षर traits which run throughout the books, including an enjoyment of cars, a love of खाना and drink, and an average intake of sixty custom-made cigarettes a day.
चूंकि Fleming 's मौत in 1964, there have been other authorised writers of बंध material, including जॉन Gardner, who लिखा fourteen novels और दो novelizations और Raymond Benson, जो लिखा छह novels, three novelizations and तीन short stories.
There have भी been तीन authors who लिखा one किताब each, Kingsley Amis ( writing as Robert markham ), Sebastian Faulks and Jeffery deaver.
additionally a श्रेणी of novels आधारित on बंध 's youth— Young Bond —was written by चार्ली Higson.
As spin-offs from the साहित्यिक works, there was a television adaptation of the first novel, Casino Royale, in which Bond was निभाई as an American एजेंट.
a comic strip series भी भागा in the Daily Express newspaper.
There have also महरूम twenty-five बंध films ; seven अभिनेताओं have played Bond in these films.
`` प्रकृति Boy '' is a सोंग by ईडन Ahbez, published in 1947.
the सोंग tells a काल्पनिक of a `` अजीब enchanted लड़के... जो wandered बहुत दूर '' तभी to learn कि `` the greatest thing... was just to प्रेम and be loved in return ''.
nat King कोल 's 1948 रिकॉर्डिंग of the सोंग was a major hit और `` प्रकृति लड़के '' has since become a पॉप and जैज़ standard, with दर्जनों of major artists interpreting the सोंग.
Louisiana ( or ;, ; louisiana Creole : léta de la Lwizyàn ) is a राज्य located in the southern region of the United राज्य of America.
Louisiana is the 31st सबसे extensive and the 25th most populous of the 50 संयुक्त States.
Its पूंजी is Baton Rouge और largest city is New ऑरलियन्स.
louisiana is the only राज्य in the u.S. साथ political subdivisions termed parishes, which are local सरकारी 's equivalent to counties.
The largest parish by population is ईस्ट Baton Rouge Parish, और the largest by land area is cameron Parish.
Much of the राज्य 's lands were formed from sediment washed down the मिसिसिपी River, leaving विशाल deltas and vast areas of तटीय दलदल and swamp.
These contain a समृद्ध southern biota ; typical examples शामिल पक्षियों ऐसे as ibis और egrets.
There are also many species of पेड़ frogs, and fish such as sturgeon and paddlefish.
in more elevated क्षेत्रों, fire is a natural process in the लैंडस्केप, and has produced extensive areas of longleaf pine वन और wet savannas.
These support an exceptional विशाल number of plant species, including many प्रजाति of orchids और carnivorous plants.
Some Louisiana शहरी environments have a multicultural, बहुभाषी heritage, होने so strongly influenced by an admixture of 18th-century French, Spanish, देशी अमरीकी ( Indian ) and अफ़्रीकी cultures कि they are माना to be somewhat exceptional in the U.S.
पहले the American purchase of the territory, the current Louisiana राज्य had महरूम both a स्पेनी and French colony.
In जोड, the pattern of विकास included importing numerous अफ़्रीकी slaves in the 18th century, with many इससे the same region of West Africa, thus concentrating उनके संस्कृति.
In the post-civil युद्ध environment, Anglo-Americans increased the pressure for Anglicization, और in 1915, English थी बना the तभी official भाषा of the state.
Women 's अधिकारों are the अधिकारों और entitlements claimed for महिलाओं और girls of अनेक societies worldwide.
In कुछ places these अधिकारों हैं institutionalized or supported by law, local कस्टम, और behaviour, whereas in others वे may be ignored or suppressed.
They differ from broader notions of इंसान अधिकारों through दावा of an inherent historical और traditional bias against the कसरत of अधिकारों by महिलाओं and लड़कियों in favour of men और boys.
मुद्दे commonly associated साथ notions of women 's अधिकारों include, though हैं नहीं सीमित to, the सही : to bodily अखंडता and autonomy ; to vote ( suffrage ) ; to hold public office ; to work ; to fair wages or बराबर pay ; to own property ; to शिक्षा ; to serve in the सैन्य or be conscripted ; to डालें into legal contracts ; और to have marital, parental and religious अधिकारों.
the laws of विज्ञान or scientific कानून are statements that describe, भविष्यवाणी, and शायद explain क्यों, a दायरा of phenomena behave as they appear to in nature.
the term `` विधि '' has diverse usage in many cases : approximate, सटीक, व्यापक or सीमित theories, in all natural वैज्ञानिक disciplines ( भौतिकी, रसायन, biology, geology, astronomy इत्यादि. ).
An analogous पद for a scientific विधि is a principle.
Scientific laws:
summarize a large collection of facts determined by experiment into a single statement,
can usually be formulated mathematically as एक or अनेक statements or समीकरण, or at least stated in a single sentence, so that it can be used to भविष्यवाणी the निष्कर्ष of an experiment, दिए the initial, boundary, और other शारीरिक conditions of the processes which लो place,
हैं strongly समर्थित by अनुभवजन्य evidence - वे are वैज्ञानिक knowledge that experiments have repeatedly verified ( and never falsified ).
उनके सटीकता does नहीं बदलें जब नई theories are worked out, but rather the पैमाना of application, चूंकि the equation ( if any ) representing the law करता not change.
As साथ other scientific knowledge, वे do नहीं have absolute certainty like mathematical theorems or identities, और it is सदा possible लिये a विधि to be विकल by भविष्य observations.
हैं प्रायः quoted as a आधारभूत controlling influence बल्कि than a description of observed तथ्य.
i.e. `` the laws of गति require that ''
Laws differ from hypotheses और postulates, which हैं proposed during the scientific process before और दौरान validation by experiment and observation.
These are नहीं laws since they have not महरूम सत्यापित to the वही degree and may not be sufficiently सामान्य, हालांकि they may lead to the formulation of कानून.
a विधि is a अधिक solidified and formal बयान, distilled इससे दोहराया experiment.
हालांकि the अवधारणाओं of a law or principle in nature is borderline to दर्शनशास्त्र, and presents the गहराई to which गणित can describe nature, वैज्ञानिक laws are माना इससे a scientific perspective और follow the scientific method ; they `` serve उनके purpose '' rather than `` questioning reality '' ( philosophical ) or `` statements of logical absolution '' ( mathematical ).
For example, whether a विधि `` refers to reality '' is a philosophical issue, बल्कि than वैज्ञानिक.
fundamentally, all scientific laws follow from physics, कानून which occur in other sciences ultimately follow from physical laws.
Often, from mathematically fundamental viewpoints, सार्वभौमिक constants emerge इससे scientific कानून.
the लॉन्च of the PlayStation 3 into the Japanese market on 10 November 2006 marked the second major सातवाँ generation entertainment system to be released.
The system was released seven days later on 17 नवम्बर in the United States.
Introduction into other world बाज़ार was delayed by a shortage of diodes लिये use in the Blu-ray डिस्क खिलाड़ी ; the यंत्र थी शुभारम्भ in यूरोपीय और other world markets in the first हाफ of 2007.
लॉरेन fenmore baldwin ( formerly विलियम्स and Grainger ) is a fictional character from the CBS soap operas The Young और the Restless और The बिंदास and the खूबसूरत, portrayed by ट्रेसी E. Bregman.
वो made her debut दौरान the एपीसोड airing on January 21, 1983.
In 1992, bregman began बनाना sporadic दिखावे on The बिंदास and the Beautiful, later resulting in the अक्षर migrating there fully in 1995.
following a अतिथि रूप in 2000, bregman returned to The यंग और the Restless on August 24, 2001, remaining on पुनरावर्ती औकात.
In 2013, it was announced that Bregman था been placed on contract.

The 2010 NBA Finals थी the National Basketball Association ( NBA ) चैंपियनशिप series लिये the 2009–10 season.
The best-of-seven playoff was लडे between the Los Angeles लेकर्स, champions of the Western सम्मेलन and defending NBA champions, और the बोस्टन सेल्टिक्स, champions of the पूर्वी Conference.
The लेकर्स defeated the Celtics, four games to three, to win the franchise 's 16th NBA championship.
The 64th edition of the championship series was निभाई between June 3 and जून 17, was broadcast on ABC, and was watched by an औसत of 18.1 million people.
The सेल्टिक्स earned their berth into the playoffs by winning the Atlantic प्रभाग.
The लेकर्स won the प्रशांत Division to earn उनके berth.
The Celtics reached the एनबीए फाइनल by defeating the Miami Heat in the best-of-seven पूर्वी Conference पहला गोलाकार, the Cleveland Cavaliers in the best-of-seven पूर्वी Conference Semifinals, और defending Eastern सम्मेलन चैंपियन ऑरलैंडो Magic in the best-of-seven Eastern सम्मेलन Finals.
The Lakers reached the एनबीए Finals by defeating the ओक्लाहोमा City Thunder in the best-of-seven पश्चिमी सम्मेलन First गोलाकार, the Utah Jazz in the best-of-seven Western Conference Semifinals, and the Phoenix Suns in the best-of-seven Western सम्मेलन फाइनल.
The NBA Finals were अनुसूचित in the Major League Baseball World श्रेणी 2–3–2 सात game format, साथ the लेकर्स possessing home-court advantage as a reward for finishing with better regular ऋतु रिकार्ड than the Celtics.
दोहराया baskets इससे starters Kobe ब्रायंट, pau Gasol, and Ron Artest brought the Lakers बंद to victory in Game 1.
a record breaking performance from Ray एलन 's eight three-point baskets ensured the सेल्टिक्स a Game 2 triumph.
डेरेक फिशर ’s 11 points in the fourth क्वार्टर helped the Lakers win Game 3.
The सेल्टिक्स won Game 4 ; it did n't ठेस कि वे netted an बेहतरीन performance in baskets by the team’s reserves, while पॉल Pierce led the team to a Game 5 win with 27 अंक on 57 % शूटिंग इससे the मंजिल.
the लेकर्स avoided elimination by जीतना a decisive Game 6 with 24 अंक contributed by their bench.
Although they trailed the सेल्टिक्स by 13 अंक early in the third क्वार्टर, the Lakers rallied and won उनके second consecutive चैंपियनशिप by taking over an exciting खेल 7 aided by लेट contributions on offense by Pau gasol और artest and rebounding.
Bryant थी named सबसे Valuable Player of the फाइनल for his second लगातार ट्रॉफी.
This थी the first एनबीए Finals to go the full seven games चूंकि and only the fourth since the NBA फाइनल returned to a 2–3–2 format in.
The laker franchise has 16 NBA Championships ( Five in मिनियापोलिस, 11 in लॉस एंजिल्स ) trailing the सेल्टिक्स ' सत्रह championships.
the एनबीए Finals used the `` World श्रेणी '' Format in 1949 Minneapolis Lakers पराजित the Washington Capitols 4 खेल to 2 ; in 1953 Minneapolis पराजित the New यॉर्क knicks 4 खेल to 1 ; in 1954 मिनियापोलिस defeated the syracuse Nationals 4 games to 3 ; और in 1955 Syracuse Nationals defeated the Fort वेन Pistons 4 खेल to 3.

Black pepper ( पाइपर nigrum ) is a flowering vine in the परिवार Piperaceae, cultivated लिये its फल, जिससे is प्रायः सूखी and प्रयुक्त as a मसाला और seasoning.
The फल, ज्ञात as a peppercorn जब सूखी, is approximately in diameter, dark red when fully वयस्क, and, like all drupes, contains a single seed.
peppercorns, और the ground pepper derived from them, may be वर्णित बस as pepper, or more precisely as black pepper ( पकाया and सूखी unripe फल ), green pepper ( सूखी unripe fruit ) and श्वेत pepper ( dried ripe seeds ).
Black pepper is native to south India, and is extensively cultivated there and elsewhere in तीव्र regions.
Currently Vietnam is the world 's largest producer and निर्यातक of pepper, producing 34 % of the संसार 's पाइपर nigrum crop as of 2008.
सूखी मैदान pepper रै been used since प्राचीनता for both इसके फ्लेवर and as a medicine.
Black pepper is the world 's सबसे traded spice.
It is one of the सबसे आम spices added to European भोजन और its descendants.
The spiciness of black pepper is due to the रासायनिक piperine, नहीं to be confused with the capsaicin कि देता fleshy मिर्च theirs.
It is in the modern संसार, often युग्म with salt.
in cardiovascular physiology, ejection fraction ( EF ) represents the volumetric fraction of blood pumped आउट of the ventricle ( दिल ) with प्रत्येक heart ताल or cardiac cycle.
it can be applied to either the right ventricle which ejects via the pulmonary valve into the pulmonary circulation or the बाएँ ventricle जिससे ejects via the aortic valve into the systemic परिसंचरण.
इमेजिंग of the physiology of the mammalian heart is the art that allows meaningful mathematical अभिव्यक्ति defining ef.
noninvasive हृदय इमेजिंग रै become a worldwide utility enabling study of cardiac performance reproducibly and inexpensively.
Simplified, Ejection भिन्न is a mathematical product allowed by cardiac इमेजिंग.
As a mathematical term, Ejection भिन्न is an extension of the work of एडाल्फ Fick in cardiac आउटपुट.
समर्पित technology such as Echocardiography, Computed Tomography, Magnetic Resonance इमेजिंग and muga scanning have definitively allowed clinically relevant गणित regarding Ischemia, जन्मजात दिल Disease और Heart Failure.
The prosecutor is the मुख्य legal representative of the अभियोजन in countries with either the common विधि adversarial प्रणाली, or the सिविल विधि inquisitorial system.
the prosecution is the legal पार्टी responsible for presenting the case in a criminal trial विरूद्ध an व्यक्तिगत अभियुक्त of तोड़कर the law.

abū al-Qāsim Muḥammad इब्न ʿAbd allāh ibn ʿAbd al-Muṭṭalib ibn Hāshim ( ) ( circa| 570 – circa| 8 June 632 ), also transliterated as Muhammad ( ), was a धार्मिक, राजनैतिक, and सैन्य नेता from Mecca जो unified Arabia into a single धार्मिक polity under Islam.
he is believed by Muslims and bahá'ís to be a messenger and prophet of God.
Muhammad is almost universally considered by Muslims as the last नबी sent by God for mankind.
Non-Muslims regard मुहम्मद as the संस्थापक of Islam.
मुसलमान consider him to be the restorer of an unaltered original monotheistic faith of आदम, नूह, Abraham, मूसा, यीशु, और other prophets.
born in परिचय 570 CE in the Arabian city of Mecca, he was orphaned at an early age और brought up under the परवाह of his uncle Abu तालिब.
He later worked ज़्यादातर as a व्यापारी, as खूब as a गड़रिये, and was first married by age 25.
Being in the आदत of periodically retreating to a गुफा in the surrounding kyu लिये अनेक नाइट्स of seclusion and दुआ, he बाद reported that it थी वहीँ, at आयु 40, that he received his first revelation from God.
Three years after इस event Muhammad started उपदेश ये revelations publicly, proclaiming that `` God is One ``, that पूरा `` surrender '' to Him ( lit.
islām ) is the तभी way ( dīn ) acceptable to God, and that he himself थी a prophet and मेसेंजर of God, in the same vein as अन्य Islamic नबियों.
मुहम्मद gained few अनुसरणकर्ता early on, and थी met साथ दुश्मनी from कुछ Meccan जनजातियों ; he and his followers were treated harshly.
to escape persecution, मुहम्मद भेजा कुछ of his अनुसरणकर्ता to अबीसीनिया पहले he and उसके अनुसरणकर्ता in Mecca migrated to Medina ( तब known as yathrib ) in the साल 622.
This event, the Hijra, marks the beginning of the इस्लामी पंचांग, जिससे is भी ज्ञात as the Hijri पंचांग.
in Medina, Muhammad united the tribes अंतर्गत the Constitution of मदीना.
बाद eight years of लड़ with the meccan जनजातियों, his followers, who by तब था grown to 10,000, took control of मक्का in the largely peaceful conquest of मक्का.
He destroyed the pagan idols in the city and then भेजा उसके अनुसरणकर्ता आउट to नष्ट all of the बाकी pagan temples in Eastern अरब.
In 632, a few months बाद returning to Medina इससे The Farewell यात्राएं, Muhammad गिरी बीमार और died.
by the time of his death, most of the arabian Peninsula had परिवर्तित to islam, and he had united अरब into a single Muslim religious polity.
The revelations ( or ayah, lit.
`` Signs [ of God ] '' ) — which Muhammad reported receiving until उसके death – form the verses of the Quran, regarded by मुसलमान as the `` शब्द of God '' और around जिससे the religion is आधारित.
besides the Quran, Muhammad 's life ( sira ) और परंपराओं ( sunnah ) are also upheld by Muslims as the स्त्रोत of शरीयत law.
They discuss Muhammad and other prophets of islam साथ reverence, adding the phrase peace be upon him whenever their names are mentioned.
While conceptions of Muhammad in मध्यकालीन Christendom and premodern times were largely negative, appraisals in modern इतिहास have महरूम far less so.
The Great किताबे ( second संस्करण )
Great किताबे of the Western World is a श्रेणी of किताबे originally प्रकाशित in the संयुक्त राज्य in 1952 by Encyclopædia विश्वकोष Inc. to उपस्थित the Great किताबे in a सिंगल package of 54 volumes.
The series is now in its second edition और contains 60 volumes.
The original editors of the श्रेणी chose तीन criteria for समावेश : a book must be प्रासंगिक to समकालीन issues, और not तभी important in इसके ऐतिहासिक context ; it must reward rereading ; and it जरूर be a part of `` the great conversation about the great विचार, '' relevant to at least 25 of the 102 ग्रेट ideas identified by the editors.
Books were नहीं chosen on the आधार of ethnic or cultural inclusiveness, ऐतिहासिक influence, or the editors ' अनुबंध with the दृश्य expressed.
`` Cocaine '' is a सोंग written और recorded by jj Cale in 1976, but also ज्ञात as a cover संस्करण recorded by Eric क्लैप्टन.
allmusic calls the latter `` among [ Clapton 's ] सबसे enduringly popular हिट्स '' and notes कि `` भी for an artist जैसे क्लैप्टन with a huge body of high-quality work, 'Cocaine ' ranks among उसके best. ''
glyn जॉन्स, who था previously worked साथ The जो, Led Zeppelin and The Rolling Stones, produced the क्लैप्टन रिकॉर्डिंग, which थी released on Clapton 's 1977 album slowhand और as a सिंगल in 1980.
The live संस्करण of `` Cocaine '', from the Just One Night एल्बम recorded in Tokyo, charted on the बिलबोर्ड Hot 100 as the b-side of `` Tulsa Time ``, which थी a No. 30 hit in 1980. ``
कोका '' was एक of अनेक of cale 's songs recorded by Clapton, सहित `` After Midnight `` और `` Travelin ' लाइट ''.
the आक्रमण on Pearl हार्बर ( called हवाई Operation or Operation AI by the जापानी Imperial General Headquarters ( आपरेशन Z in नियोजन ) and the बैटल of Pearl हार्बर ) was a surprise सैन्य स्ट्राइक conducted by the इम्पीरियल Japanese नेवी विरूद्ध the United States naval base at पर्ल हार्बर, Hawaii, on the morning of December 7, 1941 ( December 8 in Japan ).
From the standpoint of the defenders, the attack commenced at 7:48 a.m. Hawaiian Time.
The आक्रमण was intended as a निवारक कार्रवाई in order to keep the U.S. Pacific बेड़े इससे interfering साथ military actions the Empire of जापानी थी planning in southeast एशिया विरूद्ध overseas territories of the संयुक्त Kingdom, the Netherlands, and the United States.
the आधार was attacked by 353 Japanese fighters, बमवर्षक and torpedo planes in two waves, launched from छह aircraft carriers.
All eight U.S. Navy battleships were damaged, with चार होने sunk.
Two of these यहूद later raised, और with the बाकी चार repaired, six battleships returned to service later in the war.
The जापानी also sank or damaged three cruisers, तीन destroyers, an anti-aircraft training ship, और एक minelayer.
188 U.S. वायुयान were destroyed ; 2,402 अमेरिकी यहूद मारे and 1,282 wounded.
महत्वपूर्ण base installations such as the शक्ति station, डॉकयार्ड, maintenance, और ईंधन and torpedo भंडार facilities, as well as the submarine piers और headquarters building ( भी घर of the intelligence section ) यहूद not attacked.
Japanese losses were लाइट : 29 aircraft and पाँच midget submarines lost, and 65 servicemen killed or wounded.
One Japanese sailor थी captured.
the आक्रमण आए as a profound shock to the American people और led directly to the American entry into World War ii in both the Pacific and European theaters.
The following दिन ( December 8 ), the संयुक्त राज्य declared war on Japan.
Domestic support लिये non-interventionism, which had महरूम strong, disappeared.
Clandestine support of ब्रिटेन ( for example the Neutrality Patrol ) थी replaced by active alliance.
Subsequent परिचालन by the U.S. prompted Germany and Italy to declare युद्ध on the u.S. on December 11, which थी reciprocated by the U.S. the वही day.
There were numerous ऐतिहासिक precedents लिये unannounced military action by जापानी.
however, the lack of any औपचारिक warning, particularly while negotiations यहूद still apparently ongoing, led President Franklin D. Roosevelt to proclaim December 7, 1941, `` a तिथि which होगा सजीव in infamy ``.
Project Runway ऋतु 2 थी the second ऋतु of Bravo 's successful Project रनवे, a reality competition for fashion designers.
Season 2 began airing on December 7, 2005.
Following a nationwide ढूंढें earlier in the साल, sixteen designers were चुनी as semi-finalists and brought to नई यॉर्क City in June, 2005.
After the first चुनौती, called `` सड़क to the Runway '', fourteen went on to compete as finalists.
The winning designer, क्लो Dao, received $ 100,000 in seed money to help launch उसके own line, a 2007 Saturn Sky roadster, a spread in ELLE पत्रिका, and a mentorship with the Banana गणतंत्र डिज़ाइन Team.
Winning alongside Dao थी उसके model, Grace Kelsey, जो received the ELLE Magazine spread.
Michael kors and नीना Garcia returned as judges लिये the दूसरी ऋतु.
the चौथी judging seat rotated प्रत्येक week, based on the चुनौती.
टिम Gunn, fashion chair at Parsons The New School for डिज़ाइन, returned as a mentor for the designers.
Kara Janx बाद appeared in प्रोजेक्ट Runway : All सितारों in 2012, where she finished 7th आउट of 13.
andrae Gonzalo, in the same year, competed in the second season of the All सितारों संस्करण placing 10th out of 13.
An example of a heraclius mule
in numismatics, a mule is a सिक्का or पदक minted साथ obverse and reverse डिजाइन not सामान्यतः seen on the वही piece.
These can be intentional or उत्पादित by error.
इस type of error is highly sought after, और उदाहरण can fetch steep कीमतें इससे collectors.
The earliest mules are found among प्राचीन यूनानी and रोमन सिक्के.
Opinion is विभाजित between those who think कि वे हैं आकस्मिक, the result of an incorrect संयोजन of a new die with one that था officially been withdrawn इससे उपयोग, or the कार्य of coiners working साथ dies stolen from an official मिंट, perhaps at a time जब one of उन्हें should have been नष्ट.
The नाम गर्भाशयी from the mule, the hybrid offspring of a horse and a गधा, due to ऐसे a सिक्का having two पहलू intended for अलग coins, much as a mule has अभिभावक of two अलग प्रजाति.
इस पेज दस्तावेज़ the tornadoes and tornado outbreaks of 2010.
the बहुमत of tornadoes form in the U.S., but वे can occur almost anywhere under the सही conditions.
A lesser number occur बाहर the U.S., most notably in parts of neighboring दक्षिणी Canada दौरान the उत्तरी Hemisphere 's summer ऋतु, but are also ज्ञात in South America, Europe, एशिया, और Australia.
There were 1,531 tornadoes reported in the संयुक्त States in 2010 ( of which at least 1,266 यहूद confirmed ), with 45 पुष्टि fatalities.
elsewhere in the संसार, 11 people यहूद killed in tornadoes, six in अर्जेंटीना, three in the बहामा, one in Bangladesh, and one in Germany.
The year was near average for tornadoes despite an extremely quiet early spring period, however such बदला बाद a विशाल upswing starting in लेट April और a व्यस्त late वसन्त और summer period.
the autumn months were थोड़ा above average.
a lymphocyte is a प्रकार of white blood कोशिका in the vertebrate immune system.
Under the सूक्ष्मदर्शी, lymphocytes can be विभाजित into विशाल lymphocytes and छोटी lymphocytes.
Large granular lymphocytes include प्राकृतिक killer cells ( NK कोशिकाएं ).
छोटी lymphocytes consist of t cells and b कोशिकाएं.
Windows powershell is microsoft 's task automation framework, consisting of a command-line shell and associated scripting language built on.NET Framework.
powershell provides पूरा access to com और wmi, enabling administrators to perform administrative कार्य on both local and remote Windows systems.
in PowerShell, प्रशासनिक कार्य are generally performed by cmdlets ( सुनाया command-lets ), which are specialized.NET classes implementing a particular आपरेशन.
Sets of cmdlets may be संयुक्त together in scripts, executables ( which are स्टैंडअलोन applications ), or by instantiating regular.NET classes ( or wmi/com Objects ).
These कार्य by accessing data in different आंकड़ा stores, जैसे the filesystem or registry, जिससे are made उपलब्धियाँ to the powershell runtime via खिड़कियाँ powershell प्रदाताओं.
खिड़कियाँ PowerShell also provides a होस्टिंग API साथ which the खिड़कियाँ PowerShell runtime can be अंतःस्थापित inside other applications.
These applications can then उपयोग खिड़कियाँ powershell कार्यक्षमता to implement certain परिचालन, including those उजागर via the आलेखीय interface.
इस capability has महरूम used by Microsoft एक्सचेंज Server 2007 to expose its प्रबन्धन कार्यक्षमता as PowerShell cmdlets and प्रदाताओं और implement the graphical प्रबन्धन tools as powershell होस्ट which invoke the necessary cmdlets.
अन्य Microsoft applications सहित Microsoft एसक्यूएल Server 2008 भी expose उनके प्रबन्धन इंटरफ़ेस via PowerShell cmdlets.
With powershell, graphical interface-based management applications on खिड़कियाँ are परतदार on top of Windows PowerShell.
A PowerShell scripting interface for खिड़कियाँ products is mandated by the आम Engineering मापदण्ड.
Windows powershell शामिल इसके अपना extensive, console-based help, similar to man पृष्ठों in Unix shells, via the Get-Help cmdlet.
मरियम Poppins is a 1964 musical film अभिनीत Julie एंड्रयूज, Dick वैन dyke, दाउद tomlinson, and Glynis Johns, उत्पादित by Walt डिज़्नी, और based on the Mary poppins books series by P. L. ट्रेवर्स.
The फिल्मी थी निर्देशित by Robert stevenson and written by विधेयक वाल्श और डॉन DaGradi, साथ songs by the Sherman भाइयो.
It was शॉट at Walt Disney Studios in Burbank, California.
Julie Andrews won the अकादमी Award लिये बेहतरीन Actress for her performance as Mary poppins और the film also जीती Oscars लिये Best Film Editing, असली Music स्कोर, Best Song लिये `` Chim chim Cher-ee '' and Best विज़ुअल प्रभाव, and प्राप्त a total of 13 nominations.
A story चाप is an विस्तारित or continuing कथानक in episodic storytelling मीडिया ऐसे as टेलीविज़न, comic किताबे, comic स्ट्रिप्स, boardgames, वीडियो games, और in some cases, films.
On a television program, for example, the story होता unfold over अनेक episodes.
in टेलीविज़न, the use of the story चाप is much more common in dramas than in comedies, विशेषकर in soap operas.
Webcomics हैं अधिक likely to use स्टोरी arcs than newspaper comics, as most वेब comics have पठनीय अभिलेख ऑनलाइन कि a newcomer to the strip can read in अनुक्रम to समझे कया is going on.
Although story arcs have existed लिये decades, the term `` स्टोरी arc '' was coined in 1988 in संबंध to the टेलीविज़न श्रेणी Wiseguy, और was quickly adapted for अन्य उपयोग.
अनेक American comic book श्रेणी are now लिखा in four or six-issue arcs, भीतर a continuing series.
Short story arcs हैं easier to package as व्यापार paperbacks लिये resale, and more accessible to the casual reader than the never-ending निरंतरता कि once characterised comics.
ब्लैक Friday is the day following Thanksgiving Day in the United राज्य, often regarded as the beginning of the Christmas shopping season.
In recent years, सबसे major retailers have opened अत्यधिक जल्दी और offered promotional बिक्री to kick बंद the holiday shopping season, similar to मुक्केबाज़ी Day बिक्री in many Commonwealth Nations.
Black Friday is नहीं an आधिकारिक public holiday as such, but many non-retail कर्मचारी और स्कूलों have दोनो थैंक्सगिविंग और the दिन after off, followed by a वीकेंड, thereby increasing the number of potential shoppers.
It has routinely been the busiest खरीदारी दिन of the year since 2005, हालांकि न्यूज reports, which at कि समय were inaccurate, have described it as the busiest shopping day of the साल for a much longer काल of time.
The दिन 's नाम originated in Philadelphia, where it originally थी used to describe the भारी and विघटनकारी pedestrian और गाडी ट्रैफ़िक जिससे होता occur on the day after Thanksgiving.
Use of the पद started पहले 1961 और began to see broader use outside Philadelphia around 1975.
Later an वैकल्पिक explanation began to be offered : that `` Black शुक्रवार '' indicates the पाइंट at जिससे retailers begin to turn a profit, or are `` ''.
For many सालो, it was आम लिये रिटेलर to खोलें at 6:00 a.m., लकिन in the late 2000s many had crept to 5:00 or even 4:00.
This was taken to a new चरम in 2011, when अनेक retailers ( सहित निशाना, Kohl 's, Macy 's, Best ख़रीदे, and bealls ) खोली at मध्यरात्रि for the पहला time.
in 2012, walmart and several other retailers announced that they होता खोलें most of उनके स्टोर्स at 8:00 p.m. on थैंक्सगिविंग दिन ( मगर in राज्य where खोलने on Thanksgiving is prohibited due to ब्लू laws, such as Massachusetts where वे still खोली around midnight ), prompting calls लिये a walkout among some workers.
Black शुक्रवार shopping is known लिये attracting aggressive crowds, with annual reports of assaults, shootings, and throngs of people trampling on other shoppers in an attempt to मिलेंगी the बेहतरीन सौदे on a उत्पाद before आपूर्तियाँ run आउट.
The Family कि Preys is a 2008 अमरीकी फिल्म drama written, उत्पादित, और निर्देशित by Tyler Perry.
The screenplay focuses on दो families, one wealthy और the अन्य working क्लास, whose lives are intertwined in both प्रेम और business.
The movie is the second of four in which Perry 's signature character, madea, does not make an appearance.
It is also the दूसरी perry-directed फिल्मी ( alongside पापा 's Little Girls ) that is not based on any of the फिल्मकार 's स्टेज plays.
Net 10, जाल 15, Net 30 and जाल 60 ( also जाल 10 days, et al ) are forms of trade क्रेडिट जिससे बताएँ कि the net amount ( the total बकाया on the चालान ) is अपेक्षित to be सशुल्क in पूरा और received by the विक्रेता within 10, 15, 30 or 60 days बाद the goods are dispatched or सेवा is समाप्त.
जाल 30 or जाल 60 terms are प्रायः coupled साथ a credit लिये early भुगतान.
the शब्द net in इस sense अर्थात् `` total बाद सब discounts. ''
It originally गर्भाशयी from the Latin nitere ( to चमक ) और nitidus ( elegant, trim ), और more recently from the फ्रेंच net ( शार्प, neat, clean ).

The British वेस्ट इंडीज were the islands in and around the Caribbean that यहूद part of the British साम्राज्य.
In 1912, the अंग्रेजों West इंडीज were विभाजित into eight colonies : The बहामा, बारबाडोस, अंग्रेजों guiana, अंग्रेजों होंडुरास, जमैका ( साथ its dependencies the Turks और Caicos आइलैंड्स and the Cayman आइलैंड्स ), Trinidad और Tobago, the windward Islands और the leeward आइलैंड्स.
Between 1958 और 1962, सब of the island territories except the British Virgin Islands, the बहामा, अंग्रेजों Honduras और British guiana यहूद संगठित into the वेस्ट Indies Federation.
it was hoped कि the Federation होता become स्वतंत्र as a single nation, but it had सीमित शक्तियां, many practical समस्याएं, and a lack of popular support.
नतीजतन, the वेस्ट Indies Federation was dissolved.
Most of the territories, including all the larger ones, are now independent as पृथक देशों, with membership to many international forums such as the संगठन of American राज्य, the Association of caribbean States, the World व्यापार Organization, the संयुक्त Nations, the Caribbean जातियाँ, the Commonwealth of Nations और the Caribbean Development Bank among अन्य.
The remainder हैं British विदेशी territories.
सब the former nations of the British West इंडीज, मगर the Commonwealth of Dominica, गुयाना and Trinidad and Tobago, are Commonwealth Realms.
the term is still used for British Overseas Territories in the Caribbean, such as the केमन Islands.

`` कया a अद्भुत World '' is a सोंग written by bob Thiele ( as `` George डगलस '' ) and जार्ज David वेइस.
It was पहला recorded by लुई Armstrong and released as a single in 1967.
thiele और Weiss were both prominent in the music संसार ( thiele as a निर्माता and Weiss as a composer/performer ).
Armstrong 's रिकॉर्डिंग was inducted in the Grammy Hall of कीर्ति in 1999.
the प्रकाशन for इस सोंग is controlled by Memory लेन Music Group, Carlin Music Corp., and कीड़ा Music, Inc.

The inauguration of the अध्यक्ष of the United राज्य is a ceremonial event marking the commencement of a new four-year term of a president of the United States.
the day a presidential inauguration occurs is ज्ञात as `` Inauguration दिन '' and occurs on January 20 ( or 21st if the 20th is a संडे ).
( prior to the Twentieth amendment, the date थी March 4, the day of the year on which the Constitution of the United राज्य पहला took प्रभाव in 1789 ; the पिछला उद्घाटन to take place on the older date थी Franklin D. रूज़वेल्ट 's पहला एक on March 4, 1933. )
the most हाल पब्लिक presidential उद्घाटन ceremony, the swearing in of अध्यक्ष Barack Obama to शुरू उसके दूसरी four-year पद in office, took प्लेस on सोमवार, January 21, 2013.
The only inauguration element mandated by the संयुक्त राज्य Constitution is कि the अध्यक्ष make an oath or affirmation before that व्यक्ति can `` डालें on the Execution '' of the दफ्तर of the presidency.
However, over the years, विभिन्न परंपराओं have arisen कि have expanded the inauguration from a सरल oath-taking ceremony to a day-long इवेंट, including parades, भाषणों, and balls.
इससे the presidency of Andrew Jackson through that of jimmy Carter, the प्राथमिक Inauguration Day रस्म took place on the कैपिटल 's ईस्ट Portico.
चूंकि the 1981 उद्घाटन of रोनाल्ड reagan, the रस्म has been आयोजित at the कैपिटल 's वेस्ट सामने.
The inaugurations of William हावर्ड taft in 1909 and Reagan in 1985 यहूद स्थानांतरित indoors at the Capitol due to ठंडा weather.
the युद्ध of 1812 and संसार युद्ध II caused दो inaugurations to be held at other locations in वॉशिंगटन, D.C.
When जार्ज वॉशिंगटन was inaugurated, the शपथ was administered by रॉबर्ट livingston, Chancellor of New यॉर्क राज्य, in 1789, and by विलियम Cushing, Associate Justice of the परम् अदालत, in 1793.
Since Chief इंसाफ ओलिवर Ellsworth swore in अध्यक्ष जॉन Adams, no chief justice has छूटी an Inauguration दिन.
When Inauguration Day has fallen on a Sunday, the मुख्य इंसाफ has administered the oath to the president on the Sunday privately और then again the अगला day सरेआम.
When a new अध्यक्ष takes over mid-term due to the मौत or resignation of a president, the oath of office is administered लकिन formal, public उद्घाटन events have not been आयोजित.
Stefani Joanne एंजेलीना germanotta ( ; born कूच 28, 1986 ), known by her stage नाम Lady Gaga, is an अमरीकी singer, songwriter, record producer, dancer, activist, businesswoman, fashion designer, अभिनेत्री और लोकसेवक.
Born and उठाया in New यॉर्क City, वो primarily पढ़ाई at the Convent of the पवित्र Heart and briefly attended नई यॉर्क University 's Tisch School of the Arts पहले withdrawing to फ़ोकस on her musical career.
She soon began performing in the rock म्यूज़िक scene of Manhattan 's निम्नतर East Side.
by the end of 2007, record कार्यपालिका and producer Vincent Herbert signed her to उसके label streamline Records, an imprint of interscope Records.
initially working as a songwriter at Interscope Records, उसके vocal abilities captured the attention of recording artist एकॉन, who भी signed her to kon सजीव वितरण, उसके own लेबल under interscope.
Lady Gaga आए to prominence as a रिकॉर्डिंग कलाकार following the release of her debut एल्बम, the Fame ( 2008 ), जिससे was a नाजुक and commercial success that topped charts around the world and included the international number-one singles `` बस Dance `` और `` पोकर फेस ``.
After embarking on the The Fame बॉल Tour, she followed the album with The Fame दानव ( 2009 ), जिससे spawned the worldwide hit singles `` Bad Romance ``, `` टेलीफोन ``, and `` alejandro ``.
the Fame राक्षस success अनुमत her to embark on the eighteen-month long दानव Ball Tour, which बाद became one of the highest-grossing concert tours of all समय.
उसके most recent album, Born This रास्ता ( 2011 ), topped the charts of most major markets और उत्पन्न more अंतरराष्ट्रीय chart-topping singles, including `` Born This रास्ता ``, `` यहूदा ``, and `` The Edge of Glory ``.
बहकावे by Britney स्पीयर्स, दाउद Bowie, Michael Jackson, Madonna, और महारानी, महिला गागा is recognized लिये her flamboyant, विविध and outré contributions to the music industry through उसके fashion, performances और music वीडियो.
as of October 2011, वो has sold an estimated 23 million albums और 64 million singles worldwide और उसके singles are some of the best-selling worldwide.
Her उपलब्धियाँ शामिल पाँच Grammy पुरस्कार और 13 एमटीवी Video म्यूज़िक पुरस्कार.
Lady गागा has consecutively appeared on Billboard पत्रिका 's कलाकारों of the Year ( स्कोरिंग the definitive title in 2010 ), ranked fourth in VH1 's list of 100 Greatest महिलाओं in Music, is the sixth बेहतरीन selling डिजिटल singles artist in us according to RIAA, is regularly placed on lists composed by Forbes पत्रिका and was named one of the सबसे influential people in the संसार by समय पत्रिका.
besides उसके musical career, she involves herself with humanitarian causes और lgbt सक्रियता.

The फ्लोरिडा Gators baseball team represents the University of Florida in the खेल of baseball.
The फ्लोरिडा Gators compete in Division I of the नेशनल Collegiate Athletics संघ ( ncaa ), and the Eastern Division of the Southeastern Conference ( SEC ).
वे play their घर खेल in अल्फ्रेड A. McKethan स्टेडियम on the university 's gainesville, फ्लोरिडा campus, and हैं फिलहाल led by head कोच Kevin O'Sullivan.
In the ninety-eight season history of the Gators baseball program, the team has जीती बारह SEC championships and has appeared in आठ कॉलेज World श्रेणी tournaments.
