a राजनैतिक campaign is an व्यवस्थित प्रयत्न which seeks to influence the decision making process भीतर a specific group.
in democracies, राजनैतिक अभियान often refer to electoral अभियान, wherein प्रतिनिधि are chosen or referendums are decided.
In modern राजनीती, the सबसे ऊँची profile राजनैतिक campaigns are focused on candidates for head of state or head of सरकारी, often a President or प्रधान मंत्री.
एलिज़ाबेथ Cady Stanton और her daughter, harriot
Elizabeth cady Stanton ( नवम्बर 12, 1815 – October 26, 1902 ) थी an American social activist, abolitionist, and leading फिगर of the early women 's rights movement.
Her Declaration of Sentiments, presented at the first women 's अधिकारों सम्मेलन held in 1848 in Seneca Falls, New York, is प्रायः credited साथ initiating the first व्यवस्थित women 's rights and महिलाओं 's suffrage आंदोलनों in the संयुक्त राज्य.
Before Stanton narrowed उसके राजनैतिक focus लगभग exclusively to महिलाओं 's अधिकारों, she थी an active abolitionist साथ with her husband, Henry Brewster Stanton and cousin, Gerrit स्मिथ.
नापसंद अनेक of those involved in the महिलाओं 's rights गति, Stanton addressed various मुद्दे pertaining to महिलाओं beyond मतदान rights.
Her concerns शामिल women 's parental and custody अधिकारों, property अधिकारों, नियुक्ति और income rights, तलाक, the economic health of the family, और birth control.
She was also an outspoken supporter of the 19th-century temperance गति.
बाद the American Civil War, Stanton 's प्रतिबद्धता to मादा suffrage caused a schism in the women 's अधिकारों movement जब she, together with Susan B. Anthony, declined to support ड्योढ़ी of the fourteenth और Fifteenth amendments to the संयुक्त राज्य Constitution.
वो opposed giving added legal सुरक्षा and voting rights to African American men while महिलाओं, ब्लैक and white, were denied those same rights.
उसके position on this issue, साथ साथ उसके विचार on व्यवस्थित Christianity and women 's issues परे मतदान rights, led to the formation of दो separate women 's अधिकारों organizations that were आखिरकार rejoined, साथ stanton as अध्यक्ष of the संयुक्त organization, लगभग बीस सालो after her ब्रेक from the original women 's suffrage movement.
stanton died in 1902 having authored दोनो the Woman 's बाइबल और her autobiography, along साथ many articles and pamphlets concerning female suffrage and women 's अधिकारों.
My Fair महिला is a musical आधारित upon George बर्नार्ड Shaw 's Pygmalion and साथ book और गीत by Alan Jay lerner और म्यूज़िक by फ्रेडरिक Loewe.
The story concerns eliza doolittle, a Cockney flower girl who takes speech lessons from professor Henry Higgins, a phoneticist, so कि she may pass as a well-born महिला.
the musical 's 1956 ब्रॉडवे production थी a hit, सेटिंग what थी then the record लिये the longest run of कोई प्रमुख musical थिएटर उत्पादन in इतिहास.
It was followed by a hit लंदन उत्पादन, a लोकप्रिय film version, और numerous revivals.
It रै महरूम पुकारा `` the perfect musical ''.
deregulation is the अधिनियम or process of removing or reducing state regulations.
it is इसलिए opposite of regulation, which refers to the process of the government regulating निश्चित activities.
the बोस्टन Bruins रेडियो संजाल is a 25-station ( 17 A.M., 8 F.M. प्लस 2 F.M. अनुवादक ) सीबीएस रेडियो संजाल which carries live game प्रसारण of the Boston Bruins.

`` वहीँ होगा Come नरम rains '' is a short स्टोरी by science fiction लेखक रे bradbury which was first published in the may 6, 1950 समस्या of collier 's.
बाद कि same year the स्टोरी थी शामिल in Bradbury 's the martian क्रॉनिकल्स ( 1950 ).
With over 1.2 billion people, Han Chinese is the largest ethnic group in the world.
Pashtun लोगों of the Pashtunistan प्रदेश, which sits in an area between दक्षिण of the Hindu Kush in अफगानिस्तान और the Indus नदी in पाकिस्तानी.
They क्रमांक around 50 लाख.
The Korowai people of Papua numbered just around 3,000 लोगों, and were uncontacted until the 1970s.
Ethnicity or जातीय group is a socially defined श्रेणी based on आम culture or राष्ट्रीयता.
Ethnicity can, but करता not have to, शामिल आम ancestry, appearance, भोजन, ड्रेसिंग style, विरासत, इतिहास, भाषा or dialect, धर्म, प्रतीकों, परंपराओं, or अन्य cultural factor.
Ethnic पहचान is constantly reinforced through common विशेषताएँ which set the समूह अलावा इससे other समूह.
The 19.9 MW Gemasolar solar plant in Spain सुविधाएँ 15 घंटों of storage and can supply power 24 घंटों a day.
Solar energy, रौशन light and heat from the sun, रै महरूम harnessed by humans since ancient times using a range of ever-evolving technologies.
सौर energy technologies शामिल solar heating, सौर photovoltaics, solar thermal electricity, solar architecture और कृत्रिम photosynthesis, which can make considerable contributions to solving कुछ of the most urgent उर्जा problems the world now चेहरों.
Solar technologies are broadly characterized as either passive सौर or active solar depending on the way वे capture, convert और वितरित solar उर्जा.
क्रियाशील सौर तकनीकों include the use of photovoltaic panels and सौर थर्मल collectors to दोहन the उर्जा.
passive solar तकनीकों शामिल orienting a building to the सूर्य, selecting सामग्री with अनुकूल thermal mass or लाइट dispersing गुण, and designing स्पेसेस कि naturally circulate air.
in 2011, the अंतरराष्ट्रीय Energy Agency कहा that `` the विकास of affordable, inexhaustible और साफ solar energy technologies will have विशाल longer-term लाभ.
It होगा increase countries’ energy सुरक्षा through रिलायंस on an indigenous, inexhaustible और ज़्यादातर import-independent संसाधन, enhance स्थिरता, reduce pollution, निम्नतर the costs of mitigating climate change, और keep fossil ईंधन prices lower than वरना.
ये advantages are वैश्विक.
Hence the अतिरिक्त लागत of the incentives लिये जल्दी deployment चाहिए be माना learning निवेश ; वे जरूर be wisely खर्च and need to be widely साझा ''.
The शास्त्रीय Latin alphabet or रोमन alphabet विकसित from a western variety of the Greek alphabet called the cumaean वर्णमाला, which थी adopted और modified by the etruscans who ruled जल्दी रोम.
The etruscan वर्णमाला थी in turn adopted और further परिवर्धित by the प्राचीन Romans to write the लैटिन language.
दौरान the Middle Ages, the Latin वर्णमाला was adapted to Romance languages, direct descendants of Latin, as खूब as to Celtic, Germanic, बाल्टिक, and some Slavic languages.
साथ the आयु of colonialism and Christian evangelism, the लैटिन स्क्रिप्ट was spread overseas, और applied to indigenous American, ऑस्ट्रेलियाई, ऑस्ट्रोनीशियाई, Austroasiatic, and African भाषाएं.
अधिक recently, linguists have also tended to prefer the Latin स्क्रिप्ट or the International Phonetic Alphabet ( itself largely आधारित on लैटिन script ) जब transcribing or creating written standards लिये non-european भाषाएं, such as the African सन्दर्भ alphabet.
the पद Latin वर्णमाला may refer to either the वर्णमाला प्रयुक्त to write Latin ( as described in इस आलेख ), or अन्य alphabets based on the लैटिन script, which is the मौलिक set of अक्षर common to the various alphabets descended इससे the classical Latin one, ऐसे as the English वर्णमाला.
These latin-derived alphabets may discard letters, जैसे the rotokas वर्णमाला, or add new letters, जैसे the डैनिश और Norwegian alphabet.
Letter shapes have बदला over the सदियां, including the creation लिये मध्यकालीन लैटिन of lower case forms जिससे किया नहीं मौजूद in the शास्त्रीय period.
The assassination of United States President अब्राहम Lincoln took place on Good Friday, April 14, 1865, as the American सिविल War was drawing to a बंद.
The assassination occurred पाँच days बाद the commander of the Confederate Army of Northern Virginia, सामान्य Robert E. Lee, surrendered to लेफ्टिनेंट सामान्य Ulysses S. Grant and the Union फौज of the Potomac.
lincoln थी the first American president to be assassinated, हालांकि an unsuccessful attempt था been made on Andrew Jackson 30 years before in 1835.
The assassination थी नियोजित और carried आउट by the well-known स्टेज actor John Wilkes Booth, as भाग of a larger षड्यंत्र in a बोली to revive the confederate cause.
बूथ 's co-conspirators were Lewis Powell और दाउद herold, who were आबंटित to मार Secretary of State William H. Seward, and George atzerodt जो थी to मार Vice अध्यक्ष Andrew जॉनसन.
By simultaneously eliminating the top तीन people in the administration, Booth and उसके co-conspirators hoped to sever the continuity of the United States सरकारी.
lincoln was shot while watching the खेल हमारी American cousin साथ his wife Mary Todd lincoln at Ford 's Theatre in वॉशिंगटन, d.C. on the रात्रि of April 14, 1865.
he died जल्दी the next morning.
The rest of the षड्यंत्रकारियों ' प्लाट failed ; Powell तभी प्रबंधित to घाव Seward, while Atzerodt, Johnson 's would-be हत्यारे, lost his nerve and fled वॉशिंगटन.
add-on might mean:
Plug-in ( computing ), a टुकड़ा of software which enhances another तन्त्र application and प्रायः can नहीं be run independently
Browser extension, which modifies the इंटरफ़ेस and/or behavior of web browsers
Add-on ( Mozilla ), a टुकड़ा of तन्त्र that enhances and customizes Mozilla-based अनुप्रयोग
Add-ons लिये फायरफॉक्स ( addons.mozilla.org ), the आधिकारिक मोज़िला न्यास वेब site जिससे serves as a repository of add-ons लिये mozilla-based अनुप्रयोग
Peripheral, an optional कंप्यूटर hardware component that significantly supplements or enhances the कार्यक्षमता of the original unit
Video खेल accessory, a टुकड़ा of hardware used in conjunction with a वीडियो game कंसोल for playing video खेल
क्लबों level seating is a खास section of seating in आधुनिक खेल stadiums.
The क्लबों स्तर is प्रायः स्तिथ towards the middle of the stage of seating sections, above the lower डेक लकिन नीचे the अपर डेक.
They हैं प्रायः सही next to the Luxury Boxes, either right above, सही नीचे, or sandwiched between two levels of Luxury बाक्स.
क्लबों स्तर seating is considered as उच्चतर क्लास than sitting anywhere else in the arena, but lower क्लास compared to the Luxury Boxes.
Unlike the Luxury बाक्स, सबसे क्लबों levels do not रैप entirely around the एरिना.
Some club levels stop at a certain point, giving way to an विस्तार of the Mezzanine, while अन्य give way to lower क्लास Luxury Boxes ( ऐसे as `` Party Suites '' ).
A notable exception to this is अमीरात स्टेडियम in London, which has a पूरा tier of club seating.
Club Levels allow प्रशंसक multiple levels of entertainment.
Club स्तर seating is खोलें to the elements, as opposed to the entirely enclosed luxury boxes, which gives more of an बाहरी impression at roofless and open-roof स्टेडियम and arenas.
Club Level seating is सामान्यतः bought on a अनुबंध basis to allow लिये maximum profit on the भाग of the स्टेडियम.
the Club Level provides fans साथ special अभिगम to an indoor भाग of the arena exclusive to प्रशंसक with खास tickets.
These areas are एयर conditioned and allow access to खास रेस्तरां, merchandise stands, और lounge क्षेत्रों of the स्टेडियम that are not वरना available.
रियायत stands और vendors on the Club Level also often offer अलग menus than in other stands to give more of a special feel to the Club.
These क्षेत्रों are closed off to the rest of the स्टेडियम, and they usually can तभी be पहुँचा through the विशेष, निजी club entrances.
Sophia लोरेन ( ; born सोफिया Villani Scicolone ; 20 सितंबर 1934 ) is an Italian actress.
Loren is widely recognized as इटली 's most प्रसिद्ध and honored actress.
She थी the first actress of the talkie era to जीत an Academy Award for a non-English-speaking प्रदर्शन, लिये उसके portrayal of cesira in vittorio de Sica 's Two Women.
उसके अन्य पुरस्कार include a Grammy Award, five special Golden ग्लोब्स, a BAFTA Award and a लॉरेल Award.
In 1995 वो प्राप्त the Cecil B. DeMille Award for आजीवन achievements, one of अनेक such पुरस्कार.
उसके films शामिल : Houseboat ( 1958 ), El सीआईडी ( 1961 ), कल, Today and Tomorrow ( 1963 ), Marriage Italian-Style ( 1964 ), और a खास दिन ( 1977 ).

In 1994 she starred in Robert Altman 's prêt-à-porter, which earned her a Golden ग्लोब nomination the वही year.
वो has also achieved नाजुक and वाणिज्यिक success in TV movies such as Courage ( 1986 ).
मौतों for self-inflicted चोटों per 100,000 निवासियों in 2004.
incidence of suicide is underreported due to दोनो धार्मिक and social pressures, और possibly completely unreported in some क्षेत्रों.
Nevertheless, from reported मामले, certain रुझान हैं apparent.
चूंकि the data is skewed, comparing आत्महत्या दरों between nations is statistically unsound.
The trends themselves हैं not the कारण, but may be indicative of a root cause.

Hospital Emergency कोड हैं used in hospitals worldwide to चेतावनी staff to विभिन्न emergencies.
the use of codes is intended to convey अनिवार्य information quickly और with minimal misunderstanding to staff, जबकि preventing stress और panic among विज़िटर to the हॉस्पिटल.
ये कोड may be posted on placards throughout the हॉस्पिटल, or मुद्रित on employee identification badges लिये ready सन्दर्भ.
Back of a hospital ID badge showing disaster codes.
Hospital emergency codes may denote अलग events at अलग hospitals, including आसपास ones.
क्युकी many physicians work at more than one सुविधा, इस may lead to confusion in emergencies, so वर्दी systems have been प्रस्तावित.
the route of the Eifel जलसेतु, with its average slope.
The Eifel Aqueduct थी one of the longest aqueducts of the Roman Empire.
the जलसेतु, constructed in AD 80, carried जल कुछ from the hilly Eifel प्रदेश of कया is अभी Germany to the प्राचीन city of Colonia Claudia Ara Agrippinensium ( present-day कोलोन ).
if the auxiliary स्पर्स to additional springs are included, the length was.
the construction was लगभग entirely नीचे ground, और the प्रवाह of the जल was produced entirely by gravity.
a few पुलों, सहित one up to in लंबाई, were needed to pass over valleys.
नापसंद कुछ of the अन्य famous Roman aqueducts, the Eifel जलसेतु थी specifically designed to minimize the above-ground portion to protect it इससे damage और जमने.
In रसायन, a disulfide bond ( br.e. disulphide बंध ) is a covalent bond, प्रायः derived by the coupling of दो thiol groups.
The linkage is also पुकारा an SS-bond or disulfide सेतु.
The overall कनेक्टिविटी is therefore r-s-s-r.
The शब्दावली is widely प्रयुक्त in biochemistry.
In formal terms, the connection is a persulfide, in analogy to its congener, peroxide ( r-o-o-r ), but इस terminology is अस्पष्ट and is no longer used ( मगर in reference to R-S-S-H or H-S-S-H compounds ).
Formal depiction of disulfide bond formation as an oxidation.

Religion in the संयुक्त Kingdom और in the देशों कि preceded it, रै been dominated, लिये over 1,400 years, by विभिन्न फ़ॉर्म of christianity.
According to some सर्वेक्षण, a बहुमत of citizens स्टिल identify with Christianity, हालांकि regular church उपस्थिति has fallen dramatically since the middle of the 20th century, and immigration and जनसांख्यिकी बदलें have contributed to the विकास of अन्य faiths.
Religious संबद्धों of UK नागरिकों are recorded by regular सर्वेक्षण, the four major ones being the UK Census, the Labour Force Survey, the अंग्रेजों Social attitudes survey and the यूरोपीय Social Survey.
According to the 2001 uk जनसांख्यिकी, Christianity is the प्रमुख religion, followed by Islam, Hinduism, Sikhism, Judaism और buddhism in terms of क्रमांक of adherents.
This, और the relatively large number of individuals with nominal or no धार्मिक affiliations has led टीकाकारों to variously describe the संयुक्त Kingdom as a multi-faith, secularised, or post-Christian समाज.
The संयुक्त Kingdom was formed by the union of previously independent countries इससे 1707, और consequently सबसे of the largest धार्मिक groups do not have uk-wide organisational structures.
जबकि some groups have separate structures for the individual countries of the संयुक्त किंगडम, others may have a single ढांचा covering इंग्लैण्ड और वेल्स or ग्रेट Britain.
similarly, due to the relatively recent creation of उत्तरी Ireland in 1921, most major religious groups in Northern आयरलैंड are संगठित on an all-Ireland आधार.
The 1967 Newark riots यहूद a प्रमुख civil disturbance कि occurred in the city of न्यूर्क, नई Jersey between जुलाई 12 और जुलाई 17, 1967.
The six दिनों of rioting, लूटने, and विनाश बाएँ 26 dead and hundreds injured.
in United राज्य कॉलेज athletics, redshirt is a विलंब or बर्खास्तगी of an athlete 's participation in order to lengthen his or her काल of eligibility.
Typically, a छात्र 's athletic eligibility in a given खेल is four सीज़न, a number निकला from the चार years of अकादमिक classes that हैं normally जरूरी to obtain a bachelor 's उपाधि at an अमरीकी college or विश्वविद्यालयों.
However, a छात्र खिलाड़ी may be offered the opportunity to redshirt लिये up to two years, which allows the athlete to spread those चार सालो of eligibility over five, or sometimes six सालो.
In a redshirt year, a student खिलाड़ी may attend वर्ग at the college or university, practice साथ an athletic टोली, and dress for play लकिन he or वो may नहीं compete during the खेल.
Using this यांत्रिकी, a student athlete रै up to five अकादमिक years to use the चार years of eligibility, thus बनने a fifth-year वरिष्ठ.
The पद is used as a क्रिया, संज्ञा, and क्रियाशील.
For उदाहरण, a coach may choose to redshirt a खिलाड़ी who is then referred to as a redshirt freshman or simply a redshirt.
The opposite of this is a `` सच्चा freshman. ''
World War i ( wwi ) थी a global युद्ध केंद्रित in Europe that began on 28 July 1914 and lasted until 11 November 1918.
It थी predominantly पुकारा the World War or the Great War from its occurrence जबतक the प्रारंभ of संसार War II in 1939, और the पहला संसार युद्ध or संसार युद्ध i thereafter.
It involved all the संसार 's great powers, which were समवेत in two opposing alliances : the allies ( आधारित on the ट्रिपल Entente of the United किंगडम, फ़्रांस और Russia ) और the सेंट्रल Powers ( originally the ट्रिपल Alliance of Germany, Austria-Hungary and इटली ; but, as austria–hungary था लिया the अप्रिय against the agreement, इटली किया नहीं enter into the war ).
These alliances यहूद both reorganised और expanded as more nations डाला the war : इटली, जापानी and the United राज्य joined the allies, and the उस्मानी साम्राज्य और Bulgaria the Central शक्तियां.
ultimately, more than 70 million military personnel, including 60 million Europeans, यहूद mobilised in एक of the largest wars in history.
More than 9 लाख combatants were मारे, largely because of technological advancements that led to विशाल increases in the lethality of weapons without corresponding improvements in सुरक्षा or गतिशीलता.
it was the fifth- deadliest conflict in संसार history, subsequently paving the रास्ता for various political changes, such as revolutions in many of the nations शामिल.
One of the long-term causes of the war was the resurgence of imperialism in the विदेशी policies of the ग्रेट powers of यूरोपीय.
अधिक immediately, the assassination of Archduke फ्रांज फर्डिनेंड of Austria, the heir to the throne of Austria-Hungary, on 28 June 1914 by यूगोस्लाव nationalist Gavrilo Princip in Sarajevo triggered a diplomatic संकट जब Austria-Hungary subsequently वितरित an ultimatum to the किंगडम of Serbia.
अनेक alliances formed over the पिछला decades यहूद invoked.
भीतर weeks, the प्रमुख powers were at युद्ध and, via उनके colonies, the विरोध जल्द स्प्रेड around the संसार.
on 28 जुलाई, the austro-hungarians fired the first shots of the युद्ध as preparation लिये the invasion of सर्बिया.
While the russians mobilised, the Germans invaded न्यूट्रल Belgium and ध्वज on the way to फ़्रांस, providing a casus belli for Britain 's declaration of युद्ध against जर्मनी.
After the जर्मनी कूच on Paris was brought to a halt—the so-called चमत्कार of the Marne —the Western Front settled into a static battle of attrition with a trench line that बदला little जबतक 1917.
On the पूर्वी सामने, the रूसी फौज was successful विरूद्ध the Austro-Hungarians, लकिन was रोका in its invasion of East prussia by the germans.
In नवम्बर the Ottoman Empire joined the युद्ध, opening up fronts in the Caucasus, Mesopotamia and the Sinai.
Italy and Bulgaria गई to war in 1915 और Romania in 1916.
in Russia, the tsar 's government collapsed in कूच 1917 और a subsequent क्रान्ति in नवम्बर brought the Russians to terms साथ the Central Powers.
After a 1918 German अप्रिय along the western front, the Allies drove वापस the Germans in a series of कामयाब offensives और American forces began entering the trenches.
Germany, जिससे था its own ट्रबल with revolutionaries, सहमत to an armistice on 11 November 1918.
The war ended in victory for the Allies.
कार्यक्रम on the home fronts were as tumultuous as on the बैटल fronts, as the participants आजमाया to mobilize their manpower और economic संसाधन to लड़ो a कुल युद्ध.
By the end of the war, four major imperial powers—the German, Russian, Austro-Hungarian and Ottoman empires—ceased to मौजूद.
The successor states of the पूर्व दो खोया a great राशि of territory, while the latter two were dismantled entirely.
The मैप of सेंट्रल Europe was redrawn into several छोटी states.
the लीग of राष्ट्र was formed in the आशा of preventing another ऐसे conflict.
The यूरोपीय राष्ट्रवाद शाखित by the war और the breakup of empires, the repercussions of Germany 's शिकस्त और problems साथ the सन्धि of Versailles are सहमत to be factors contributing to संसार युद्ध ii.
Map of देशों कि घोषित themselves to be socialist states under the Marxist–Leninist or माओवादी परिभाषा - कि is to say, `` Communist राज्य '' - between 1979 and 1983.
This period marked the greatest territorial extent of Communist states.
A communist राज्य is a state where the means of उत्पादन are collectively owned by the society.
It रै a रूप of government characterized by single-party rule or dominant-party नियम of a कम्युनिस्ट party ( referred as Dictatorship of the proletariat by its proponents ) and a professed निष्ठा to a Leninist or Marxist–Leninist ideology as the guiding principle of the राज्य.
Technically, `` कम्युनिस्ट राज्य '' is a contradictio in terminis as a communist society as defined by दोनो माक्र्सवादी and anarcho-communists is in principle stateless.
From this परिप्रेक्ष्य, the term marxist-leninist राज्य is अधिक उचित.
historically, a `` communist राज्य '' referred to a system where public स्वामित्व of all or most अर्थात् of production by the कम्युनिस्ट पार्टी -run राज्य is deemed जरुरी to further the रूचि of the working class ; आज, a कम्युनिस्ट राज्य can भी, for instance, refer to contemporary China और Vietnam, जहाँ a कम्युनिस्ट Party-run state exists alongside a मिश्रित economy.
according to Marxist–Leninists, the state is a tool in the हैंड्स of the ruling class, which in a socialist society is the working class, so a socialist राज्य is, according to leninists, a राज्य of the working class.
in अभ्यास, communist states do not दरअसल refer to themselves as such.
They do this not to disguise the fact that the ruling party is communist, but rather because they do not consider themselves to be a कम्युनिस्ट society at present.
बजाय, they constitutionally identify themselves as समाजवादी राज्य or मजदूर ' states.
The primary goal of these states, जिससे also explains their आधिकारिक name, is to मार्गदर्शिका their संबंधित countries in the process of building socialism, ultimately अग्रणी to साम्यवादी.
Communist राज्य may have अनेक legal राजनैतिक parties, लकिन the कम्युनिस्ट party is प्रायः granted a खास or dominant भूमिका in सरकारी, often by statute or under the constitution.
Consequently, the institutions of the state और of the कम्युनिस्ट party become intimately entwined, such as in the development of parallel संस्थानों.
in the 20th century, सबसे कम्युनिस्ट states अपनाया planned economies.
However, वहीँ were अपवाद : the सोवियत संघ दौरान the 1920s and लेट 1980s and Yugoslavia after संसार युद्ध II अनुमत limited markets and a उपाधि of कार्यकर्ता self-management, while China, वियतनाम and Laos introduced far-reaching market reforms after the 1980s.
In the 21st century, चीन and Vietnam have allowed a मिश्रित economy to develop.
The fundamental concepts of communist states often diverge from the असली socio-economic ideologies from which they develop.
As a result, many adherents of these ideologies प्रायः oppose the राजनैतिक systems commonly associated साथ ये राज्य.
लिये example, dissenting communists such as trotskyists were प्रायः opposed to the communist राज्य of the 20th सदी, claiming either कि वे था nothing to do साथ `` real '' communism or that the ideology of ऐसे states had पहुँचे a point of irrevocable भ्रष्टाचार.
Michael Fred Phelps ii ( born जून 30, 1985 ) is a retired American swimmer और the most decorated ओलंपियन of सब time, with a total of 22 medals.
Phelps also holds the all-time records for Olympic gold medals ( 18, double the दूसरी उच्चतम record holders ), Olympic gold medals in individual कार्यक्रम ( 11 ), and Olympic medals in व्यक्तिगत events for a पुरूष ( 13 ).
In winning eight सुनहरा medals at the 2008 Beijing Games, Phelps took the record लिये the most first-place finishes at कोई single Olympic खेल.
पाँच of those victories were in individual कार्यक्रम, tying the single खेल record.
In the 2012 Summer Olympics in London, फेल्प्स जीती चार golds और दो चांदी medals, making उसे the सबसे कामयाब खिलाड़ी of the Games for the तीसरा ओलंपिक in a पंक्ति.
Phelps is the long course संसार recordholder in the 100-meter तितली, 200-meter butterfly और 400-meter व्यक्तिगत medley as well as the पूर्व long course संसार recordholder in the 200-meter freestyle and 200-meter व्यक्तिगत medley.
he has won a कुल of 71 medals in major international long-course competition, 57 gold, 11 silver, और three कांस्य spanning the Olympics, the World, and the Pan Pacific championships.
फेल्प्स 's international titles और record-breaking performances have अर्जित उसे the World तैराक of the Year Award सात times और American Swimmer of the Year पुरस्कार नौ times as well as the FINA Swimmer of the Year Award in 2012.
उसके unprecedented Olympic success in 2008 अर्जित Phelps खेल Illustrated पत्रिका 's Sportsman of the साल award.
बाद the 2008 गर्मियाँ Olympics, फेल्प्स प्रारंभ the Michael Phelps Foundation, which focuses on growing the खेल of swimming and promoting healthier lifestyles.
He expects to do further work with उसके न्यास after the 2012 Olympics, जिससे he has said will be उसके last.
लेनोवो Group सीमित ( ) is a चाइनीज multinational computer hardware और electronics company with its headquarters in बीजिंग, China and Morrisville, उत्तर कैरोलिना and its पंजीकृत office in Hong Kong, China.
Its उत्पाद include personal computers, tablet computers, मोबाईल phones, workstations, servers, electronic storage devices, it प्रबन्धन तन्त्र and smart televisions.
लेनोवो is the संसार 's second-largest PC vendor by 2012 ईकाई बिक्री.
It markets the ThinkPad लकीर of notebook computers and the ThinkCentre लकीर of desktops.
लेनोवो has operations in अधिक than 60 countries and sells इसके products in around 160 countries.
Lenovo थी founded in बीजिंग in 1984 and incorporated in हांग Kong in 1988 under इसके पिछला नाम, Legend.
Lenovo is listed on the Hong काँग भण्डार एक्सचेंज and is a constituent of the हैंग Seng China-Affiliated Corporations अनुक्रमणिका.
Slug is a common नाम लिये an apparently shell-less स्थलीय gastropod mollusk.
the शब्द `` slug '' is also प्रायः प्रयुक्त as भाग of the आम name of कोई gastropod mollusc कि has no shell, रै a very घटाया shell, or has तभी a small आतंरिक shell.
( इस is in contrast to the आम name `` snail ``, जिससे is applied to gastropods that have a coiled shell कि is large पर्याप्त that the नरम भाग of the एनिमल can retract fully into it. )
Slugs exist on land and in the sea, and वहीँ is भी one genus of freshwater slugs, Acochlidium.
the unadorned word `` स्लग '' is however applied primarily to land slugs, whereas slugs from the समुद्र or from freshwater हैं प्रायः referred to as `` समुद्र slugs `` और `` freshwater slugs ''.
जमीन gastropods with a shell that is not quite vestigial, लकिन is too छोटी to retract into ( जैसे अनेक in the family urocyclidae ), हैं known as semislugs.
the विभिन्न taxonomic families of slugs form part of अनेक काफी different विकासवादी lineages जिससे भी शामिल snails.
यूँ, for उदाहरण, the various families of जमीन slugs are नहीं very closely related to एक another, despite a superficial समानता in the overall body रूप.
the shell-less condition रै arisen अनेक टाइम्स independently during the evolutionary पास्ट, and यूँ the category `` slug '' is emphatically a polyphyletic one.
Slugs, like all other gastropods, undergo torsion ( a 180° टेढ़ी of the आतंरिक अंगों ) during विकास.
Internally, slug anatomy clearly shows the effects of इस rotation, but externally the bodies of land slugs appear to be अधिक or less symmetrical, except for the positioning of the pneumostome, which is on one पक्ष of the एनिमल, normally the सही hand side.
The नरम, slimy bodies of slugs हैं prone to desiccation, so land-living slugs are confined to moist environments and जरूर retreat to damp छुपाना स्थान when the मौसम is dry.
the subsequent सूचना in this आलेख applies to land slugs.
is a Latin शब्द that अर्थात् `` thus '' or, in लिखने, `` it थी यूँ in the source material ''.

Sic, cluj, a कम्यून in रोमानिया

सैन isidro Club, an Argentine रग्बी संघ club

Specific inductive क्षमता, abbreviated to SIC, जिससे is अधिक commonly known as the relative permittivity or the परावैद्युत constant

इम्पीरियल Standard of Napoleon I
Napoleon बोनापार्ट (, ; 15 August 1769 – 5 May 1821 ) थी a French सैन्य and political leader who रोज़ to prominence during the latter चरण of the French Revolution and its associated wars in यूरोपीय.
as Napoleon i, he was Emperor of the French इससे 1804 to 1815.
His legal सुधार, the Napoleonic Code, has been a प्रमुख influence on many civil विधि jurisdictions worldwide, but he is बेहतरीन remembered for उसके भूमिका in the युद्धों led against France by a श्रेणी of coalitions, the so-called napoleonic युद्धों.
He स्थापित hegemony over सबसे of continental Europe and sought to spread the आदर्शों of the French Revolution, while consolidating an इम्पीरियल साम्राज्य जिससे restored aspects of the अपदस्थ ancien Régime.
due to his कामयाबी in ये wars, often against numerically श्रेष्ठ enemies, he is generally regarded as एक of the महानतम सैन्य कमांडरों of all समय, और उसके अभियान are studied at सैन्य अकादमियों worldwide.
Napoleon थी born at ajaccio in Corsica in a family of noble इतालवी ancestry which had settled Corsica in the 16th century.
He trained as an artillery अधिकारी in मेनलैंड France.
He rose to prominence अंतर्गत the French पहला गणतंत्र और led कामयाब अभियान against the First and दूसरी Coalitions arrayed against फ़्रांस.
he led a कामयाब आक्रमण of the Italian peninsula.
in 1799, he staged a तख्तापलट d'état and installed himself as पहला Consul ; five years बाद the फ्रेंच Senate proclaimed उसे emperor, following a plebiscite in his favour.
in the पहला दशक of the 19th सदी, the French Empire under Napoleon सगाई in a श्रेणी of conflicts—the napoleonic Wars —that involved प्रत्येक प्रमुख European power.
After a streak of victories, France secured a प्रबल position in continental Europe, और नेपोलियन maintained the फ्रेंच sphere of influence through the formation of extensive alliances और the नियुक्ति of friends and family सदस्यों to rule अन्य European countries as French client राज्य.
The Peninsular War और 1812 फ्रेंच invasion of Russia marked turning points in नेपोलियन 's fortunes.
His Grande Armée was badly क्षतिग्रस्त in the campaign और never fully बरामद.
in 1813, the Sixth Coalition पराजित his शक्तियां at Leipzig ; the following year the Coalition invaded फ़्रांस, मजबूर नेपोलियन to abdicate and exiled उसे to the द्वीप of एल्बा.
कम than a year later, he फरार एल्बा and returned to शक्ति, but was पराजित at the Battle of Waterloo in June 1815.
नेपोलियन spent the last छह सालो of his जीवन in कारावास by the British on the island of संत Helena.
an पोस्टमार्टम concluded he died of stomach cancer, but there has महरूम some बहस परिचय the कारण of उसके मौत, as कुछ scholars have speculated कि he was a शिकार of arsenic poisoning.
This is a कालानुक्रमिक लिस्टिंग of the United States Senators इससे Pennsylvania.
United States Senators are popularly elected, लिये a six-year term, शुरूआत January 3.
चुनावों are held the पहला मंगलवार बाद November 1.
पहले 1914, they were chosen by the पेन्सिलवेनिया General Assembly, and before 1935, their terms began March 4.
the South Africa national रग्बी संघ team ( known as the springboks ) represents South Africa in रग्बी संघ.
They compete in the annual Rugby Championship, along with southern-hemisphere counterparts अर्जेंटीना, Australia and नई Zealand.
वे have won this चैंपियनशिप on three अवसरों in सोलह years.
They हैं currently ranked second in the संसार by the International Rugby फलक, and were नामित 2008 World Team of the Year at the laureus संसार Sports पुरस्कार.
Although South Africa was इंस्ट्रूमेंटल in the creation of the रग्बी संसार कप प्रतियोगिता, the Springboks did not compete in the पहला दो संसार cups in 1987 and 1991 क्युकी of anti-apartheid sporting boycotts of South अफ़्रीकी.
the team बना its World कप डेब्यू in 1995, जब the newly democratic South Africa hosted the टूर्नामेंट.
the Springboks then defeated the सब अश्वेतों 15–12 in the final, which is अभी remembered as one of the greatest moments in दक्षिण अफ़्रीकी 's sporting history, और a watershed moment in the post-Apartheid nation-building प्रक्रम.
दक्षिण Africa regained their title as champions 12 years बाद, जब वे पराजित England 15–6 in the 2007 फाइनल.
as a परिणाम of the 2007 World कप टूर्नामेंट the springboks were promoted to first प्लेस in the IRB World Rankings, a स्थिति they held जबतक July the following year when New Zealand regained the top spot.
The springboks खेल in green और सुनहरा jerseys, and उनके प्रतीक are the Springbok और the protea.
the side has been playing international rugby चूंकि 1891, जब a अंग्रेजों Isles पक्ष toured the स्वदेश, playing दक्षिण Africa in उनके पहला Test on 30 July.
South Africa थी coached by Jake श्वेत, who led the boks to the 2007 World कप title, announcing उसके इस्तीफा effectively from the end of 2007.
His replacement 's ( Peter de villiers ) contract expired in 2011, following a 11–9 defeat to ऑस्ट्रेलिया in the Rugby World Cup quarter-final, जो then stated he would नहीं be हस्ताक्षर a new deal.
The पिछला captain was जॉन smit, who पहले he रिटायर्ड in 2011 played वेश्या for सबसे of his career, although he रै also महरूम a prop, मुख्यतः in 2008 and 2009.
Due to smit होने अनुपलब्ध for the नवम्बर 2010 परीक्षण बाद सर्जरी, ताला Victor Matfield took Smit 's place as captain लिये that दौरे.
the current captain is जां de villiers.
The Battle of Gettysburg (, with an ध्वनि ), थी fought July 1–3, 1863, in and around the town of gettysburg, Pennsylvania.
It was the बैटल with the largest क्रमांक of हताहत in the American Civil युद्ध and is प्रायः described as the war 's turning point.
संघ Maj. Gen. George गॉर्डन Meade 's फौज of the Potomac पराजित हमले by confederate gen. Robert E. ली 's फौज of Northern Virginia, समाप्ति ली 's आक्रमण of the North.
बाद उसके कामयाबी at chancellorsville in Virginia in May 1863, Lee led his army through the shenandoah Valley to begin his second invasion of the North—the gettysburg Campaign.
साथ his army in ऊँची spirits, Lee intended to shift the focus of the गर्मियाँ अभियान from war-ravaged उत्तरी वर्जिनिया और hoped to influence Northern politicians to give up their prosecution of the युद्ध by penetrating as दूर as Harrisburg, Pennsylvania, or even फिलाडेल्फिया.
prodded by President अब्राहम Lincoln, Maj. Gen. जोसेफ वेश्या moved his army in pursuit, but was relieved just three days पहले the battle and replaced by Meade.
Elements of the दो armies initially collided at Gettysburg on July 1, 1863, as Lee urgently concentrated his forces वहीँ, his objective being to engage the Union फौज and नष्ट it.
Low ridges to the northwest of कस्बा were defended initially by a Union प्यादे division under ब्रिगेडियर. Gen. John buford, और soon reinforced साथ दो corps of संघ infantry.
However, दो विशाल Confederate corps assaulted them from the उत्तरपश्चिम and उत्तर, collapsing the hastily developed Union lines, sending the defenders retreating through the गलियों of town to the hills just to the दक्षिण.
On the दूसरी दिन of बैटल, most of both सेना था assembled.
The Union लकीर was laid out in a defensive formation resembling a fishhook.
In the late afternoon of July 2, Lee शुभारम्भ a heavy assault on the Union left पार्श्व, and fierce लड़ raged at छोटी Round Top, the Wheatfield, Devil 's Den, and the Peach Orchard.
on the Union right, demonstrations escalated into full-scale assaults on culp 's Hill and Cemetery Hill.
सब across the battlefield, despite significant losses, the Union defenders held their lines.
on the third day of battle, July 3, लड़ resumed on Culp 's हिल, और cavalry battles raged to the ईस्ट and south, but the main event was a dramatic infantry assault by 12,500 confederates विरूद्ध the बीच of the Union line on Cemetery लकीरें, ज्ञात as Pickett 's Charge.
The चार्ज was repulsed by Union राइफल and artillery fire, at great losses to the confederate फौज.
ली led उसके army on a torturous retreat back to Virginia.
Between 46,000 और 51,000 soldiers from दोनो armies were casualties in the three-day battle.
That November, President Lincoln used the dedication ceremony for the gettysburg National Cemetery to honor the गिरे संघ सैनिको and redefine the purpose of the war in his historic gettysburg Address.
an academic discipline, or field of study, is a branch of ज्ञान कि is taught और researched at the कॉलेज or university level.
Disciplines are defined ( in भाग ), और recognized by the academic journals in which research is published, and the learned समाजों and academic विभाग or faculties to which their practitioners belong.
However, वहीँ exists no formal criteria for जब शैक्षणिक कार्यक्रम and scholarly जर्नल्स form an academic discipline.
a huge difference exists between, on the एक hand, well established disciplines that exist in almost सब universities सब over the संसार, have a long history, और have a well स्थापित नियत of journals and सम्मेलनों, and, on the अन्य हाथ, सुझाव for new fields supported only by few universities और publications.
Fields of study प्रायः have several sub-disciplines or शाखाओं, and the distinguishing lines between ये are प्रायः both arbitrary और ambiguous.
पीएचपी is a server-side एनक्रिप्शन भाषा designed for web development but also used as a general-purpose programming भाषा.
PHP is अभी installed on अधिक than 244 लाख वेबसाइटों और 2.1 million वेब servers.
originally निर्मित by Rasmus Lerdorf in 1995, the सन्दर्भ implementation of PHP is अभी उत्पादित by The PHP Group.
जबकि PHP originally stood for Personal Home पेज, it now स्टैंड लिये पीएचपी : हाइपरटेक्स्ट preprocessor, a recursive acronym.
PHP code is interpreted by a web server with a PHP processor module जिससे generates the resulting web पेज : PHP कमांड can be embedded directly into an एचटीएमएल source document rather than कॉलिंग an external file to प्रक्रम data.
It has also evolved to शामिल a command-line इंटरफ़ेस काबिलियत और can be used in standalone graphical अनुप्रयोग.
PHP is फ़्री तन्त्र released under the PHP License, which is incompatible साथ the GNU General पब्लिक License ( GPL ) due to प्रतिबंध on the उपयोग of the पद PHP.
PHP can be deployed on most web servers and भी as a स्टैंडअलोन shell on almost every operating प्रणाली और platform, free of charge.
John Fitzgerald `` जोकर '' Kennedy ( May 29, 1917 – November 22, 1963 ), often referred to by his आद्याक्षर JFK, थी the 35th अध्यक्ष of the संयुक्त राज्य, सेवारत from 1961 until his death in 1963.
After सैन्य सेवा as commander of the मोटर Torpedo Boats PT-109 और PT-59 दौरान World War ii in the South प्रशांत, Kennedy represented Massachusetts ' 11th congressional district in the U.S. House of प्रतिनिधि from 1947 to 1953 as a डेमोक्रेट.
Thereafter, he served in the U.S. Senate from 1953 जबतक 1960.
Kennedy पराजित Vice President and Republican candidate रिचर्ड निक्सन in the 1960 u.S. presidential election.
At 43 years of age, he is the youngest to have महरूम elected to the office, the second-youngest अध्यक्ष ( after थियोडोर रूज़वेल्ट ), और the first व्यक्ति born in the 20th सदी to serve as president.
a Catholic, कैनेडी is the only non- प्रोटोस्टेंट president, and is the तभी president to have जीती a Pulitzer पुरस्कार.
Events during his presidency शामिल the खाड़ी of सूअर आक्रमण, the क्यूबन Missile संकट, the भवन of the Berlin वॉल, the स्पेस Race, the African-American Civil अधिकारों गति, और early stages of the वियतनाम युद्ध.
Therein, कैनेडी increased the number of सैन्य advisers, special operation शक्तियां, and helicopters in an प्रयत्न to curb the स्प्रेड of साम्यवादी in South East एशिया.
The कैनेडी administration adopted the policy of the रणनीतिक हैमलेट कार्यक्रम which थी implemented by the South वियतनामी सरकारी.
It शामिल certain forced relocation, village internment, and पृथक्करण of ग्रामीण South वियतनामी इससे the northern and दक्षिणी communist insurgents.
Kennedy थी assassinated on November 22, 1963 in डलास, टेक्सास.
Lee Harvey Oswald थी charged साथ the अपराधों, लकिन he was shot and मारे by Jack माणिक्य दो days later, before a trial could लो प्लेस.
The एफबीआई and the वारेन Commission officially concluded that Oswald was the lone assassin.
however, the United राज्य हाउस Select कमेटी on assassinations ( hsca ) concluded कि those investigations यहूद flawed and that कैनेडी was probably assassinated as the परिणाम of a conspiracy.
however, ABC News in उनके छानबीन, The Kennedy Assassination : परे Conspiracy, पुष्टि the निष्कर्षों of the Warren आयोग ; having concluded ओसवाल्ड acted अलोन.
Kennedy 's controversial Department of Defense tfx सेनानी bomber कार्यक्रम led to a congressional छानबीन that lasted from 1963 to 1970.
Since the 1960s information concerning Kennedy 's private जीवन has आइये to light.
Details of Kennedy 's health problems in which he struggled have become बेहतर ज्ञात, विशेषकर since the 1990s.
Although initially kept secret from the सामान्य पब्लिक, reports of Kennedy 's philandering have garnered much press.
Kennedy बाँधने highly in public राय दरजा of u.S. presidents.
`` Stand by Me '' is a सोंग originally performed by Ben E. किंग और लिखा by King, जेरी leiber, और Mike stoller, प्रेरित by the spiritual `` Lord Stand by Me, '' plus दो लाइनों rooted in Psalms 46:2–3.
वहीँ have महरूम over 400 recorded versions of the सोंग.
a political cartoon from an 1894 पक पत्रिका by illustrator S.D. ehrhart, shows a फार्म woman labeled `` Democratic Party '' sheltering इससे a tornado of political change.
a metaphor is a figure of वाक that describes a विषय by asserting that it is, on some पाइंट of comparison, the same as another वरना unrelated object.
रूपक is a type of analogy and is closely सम्बन्धित to other rhetorical figures of वाक that achieve उनके प्रभाव via संघ, तुलना or resemblance including allegory, hyperbole, और simile.
in simpler शर्तें, a metaphor compares दो objects or things without using the words `` like '' or `` as ''.
One of the most prominent examples of a metaphor in English literature is the सब the world 's a stage monologue from As You जैसे It :
सब the संसार 's a स्टैगe,
And सब the मेन और महिलाओं merely खिलाड़ी ;
वे have their exits and their entrances ; — William शेक्सपियर, as You जैसे it, 2/7
इस उद्धरण is a रूपक क्युकी the world is not literally a स्टेज.
by figuratively asserting that the संसार is a stage, Shakespeare uses the points of comparison between the world and a स्टेज to convey an understanding about the यांत्रिकी of the संसार and the lives of the people within it.
माउंट Fuji, from the thirty-six Views of Mount फुजी, color woodcut by Katsushika Hokusai
rembrandt वैन rijn, Self-portrait, etching, c.1630
फ्रांसिस्को Goya, वहीँ is No One To Help उन्हें, Disasters of War series, aquatint c.1810
Felix Vallotton, la raison probante ( The Cogent Reason ), woodcut इससे the series Intimités, 1898
printmaking is the प्रक्रम of बनाना artworks by मुद्रण, normally on paper.
printmaking normally कवर तभी the प्रक्रम of बनाना prints with an तत्व of originality, बल्कि than बस being a photographic जनन of a painting.
Except in the case of monotyping, the process is सक्षम of producing multiples of the वही piece, which is called a छपाई.
प्रत्येक छपाई produced is नहीं considered a `` copy '' लकिन rather is considered an `` original ''.
इस is because typically प्रत्येक छपाई varies to an extent due to variables intrinsic to the printmaking प्रक्रम, और also because the imagery of a print is typically not simply a reproduction of another कार्य लकिन बल्कि is often a अद्वितीय चित्र designed from the start to be expressed in a particular printmaking तकनीक.
a print may be known as an छाप.
Printmaking ( other than monotyping ) is not chosen only लिये its ability to produce अनेक impressions, but rather for the unique qualities that each of the printmaking processes lends itself to.
prints हैं created by transferring ink from a मेट्रिक्स or through a prepared स्क्रीन to a चादर of पेपर or other material.
आम types of matrices शामिल : metal plates, usually copper or zinc, or polymer plates लिये engraving or etching ; stone, aluminum, or पॉलिमर लिये lithography ; blocks of wood लिये woodcuts and wood engravings ; और linoleum लिये linocuts.
screens made of silk or synthetic fabrics are used for the screenprinting process.
अन्य types of matrix substrates और सम्बन्धित प्रक्रियाओं are discussed नीचे.
अनेक impressions मुद्रित from the same मेट्रिक्स form an edition.
चूंकि the late 19th century, artists have generally हस्ताक्षरित individual impressions इससे an संस्करण and often number the impressions to form a limited edition.
prints may also be printed in किताब रूप, such as illustrated किताबे or artist 's किताबे.

an interceptor aircraft ( or simply interceptor ) is a प्रकार of सेनानी वायुयान designed specifically to prevent missions of enemy aircraft, particularly बमवर्षक and reconnaissance वायुयान, and destroy उन्हें, relying usually on ग्रेट गति और powerful armament.
Being प्रयुक्त चूंकि the पहला World War, बाद the लेट 1960s, interceptors became कम महत्वपूर्ण due to shifting from bombers to इंटरकांटिनेंटल बैलिस्टिक missiles ( ICBMs ) for नाभिकीय warfare.
A Vietnamese अमरीकी ( ) is an American of Vietnamese descent.
They make up about half of all overseas Vietnamese ( người việt Hải Ngoại ) and are the fourth-largest एशियाई अमरीकी समूह.
Mass वियतनामी आव्रजन to the United राज्य प्रारंभ after 1975, after the समाप्त of the Vietnam युद्ध.
Early immigrants were refugee नाव people fleeing persecution or poverty.
Forced to भागो इससे their मातृभूमि and प्रायः thrust into poor urban पड़ोस, these newcomers have nevertheless प्रबंधित to establish strong समुदायों in a short amount of time.
अधिक than साठ percent of Vietnamese अमेरिकी reside in the states of California, Texas, Washington, Florida, and Virginia.

Adolf हिटलर वचनबद्ध suicide by gunshot on 30 अप्रैल 1945 in his führerbunker in बर्लिन.
His wife एवा ( née braun ) committed suicide with उसे by ingesting cyanide.
कि दोपहर, in accordance with Hitler 's prior instructions, उनके remains were carried up the stairs through the बंकर 's emergency निकास, doused in पेट्रोल और set alight in the Reich Chancellery गार्डन बाहर the bunker.
the Soviet अभिलेख रिकार्ड कि their जले remains were recovered और interred in successive locations जबतक 1970 when they यहूद again exhumed, cremated और the राख बिखरे.
खाते differ as to the कारण of death ; one that he died by ज़हर तभी and another that he died by a self-inflicted gunshot, while biting down on a cyanide capsule.
Contemporary इतिहासकारों have rejected these खाते as होने either Soviet प्रचार or an attempted compromise in अनुक्रम to reconcile the different conclusions.
One eye-witness recorded कि the देह दिखाया लक्षण of having been शॉट through the mouth, but this रै महरूम proven असंभावित.
वहीँ is also विवाद regarding the authenticity of skull और jaw fragments which यहूद बरामद.
In 2009, डीएनए tests were performed on a skull सोवियत officials had long believed to be हिटलर 's.
The tests नाज़िल कि the skull थी दरअसल कि of a स्त्री less than 40 सालो बूढ़ा.
स्थान of मिसौरी
the दारू laws of Missouri are among the least restrictive and सबसे lax और permissive in the United States.
मिसौरी is known throughout the Midwest for इसके largely laissez-faire approach to alcohol विनियमन, in sharp contrast to the very strict दारू laws of कुछ of इसके पड़ोसी, like Kansas और ओक्लाहोमा.
necrotizing fasciitis ( or ) or NF, commonly known as flesh-eating disease or flesh-eating जीवाणु सिंड्रोम, is a rare संक्रमण of the deeper layers of स्किन and subcutaneous ऊतकों, easily spreading across the fascial plane भीतर the subcutaneous ऊतक.
necrotizing fasciitis is quickly progressing, having greater risk of developing in the immunocompromised due to conditions like diabetes, cancer, etc.
It is a severe disease of sudden onset and is प्रायः treated तत्काल साथ high doses of intravenous antibiotics.
Type I describes a polymicrobial infection, whereas Type II describes a monomicrobial संक्रमण.
Many types of bacteria can cause necrotizing fasciitis ( e.g., समूह a streptococcus ( streptococcus pyogenes ), staphylococcus aureus, Clostridium perfringens, bacteroides fragilis, Aeromonas hydrophila ).
Such infections हैं अधिक संभावित to occur in people with compromised immune प्रणालियों.
historically, Group A streptococcus made up most मामले of प्रकार II infections.
however, since as जल्दी as 2001, another serious form of monomicrobial necrotizing fasciitis has महरूम observed with increasing आवृत्ति, caused by methicillin-resistant staphylococcus aureus ( मरसा ).
कुछ published case reports have implied a संभावित link between use of non-steroidal anti-inflammatory दवाएँ और nf, though the प्रमाण of the link was said to be कमजोर क्युकी of a small number of case patients and it was unclear whether the drugs बस masked the लक्षण of a secondary infection or were a कारण प्रति se.
World War II ( wwii or ww2 ), also known as the Second World युद्ध, थी a वैश्विक युद्ध that lasted इससे 1939 to 1945.
it involved the vast majority of the संसार 's राष्ट्र —including all of the ग्रेट powers —eventually forming दो opposing military alliances : the Allies and the अक्ष.
It थी the सबसे widespread युद्ध in इतिहास, साथ अधिक than 100 million लोगों serving in सैन्य इकाई from over 30 different countries.
In a राज्य of `` total war ``, the major भागीदार placed उनके संपूर्ण economic, औद्योगिक, and scientific capabilities at the service of the war प्रयत्न, erasing the भेद between civilian and military संसाधन.
Marked by mass मौतों of civilians, including the Holocaust and the तभी use of nuclear weapons in warfare, it resulted in 50 million to over 75 लाख fatalities.
ये मौतों make World युद्ध II by दूर the deadliest conflict in human history.
the Empire of Japan aimed to dominate ईस्ट एशिया and was already at war with the गणतंत्र of China in 1937, but the world war is generally कहा to have begun on 1 सितंबर 1939 with the आक्रमण of कैंडल by Germany और subsequent declarations of war on Germany by France and Britain.
From लेट 1939 to early 1941, in a series of campaigns and treaties, Germany formed the Axis alliance साथ इटली, conquering or subduing much of continental Europe.
Following the molotov–ribbentrop Pact, जर्मनी and the सोवियत Union partitioned and annexed territories between themselves of their यूरोपीय neighbours, including Poland.
the संयुक्त किंगडम and the other members of the अंग्रेजों Commonwealth were the तभी प्रमुख अलाइड forces continuing the लड़ो विरूद्ध the अक्ष, with battles taking place in उत्तर Africa as खूब as the long-running Battle of the Atlantic.
In जून 1941, the European अक्ष launched an आक्रमण of the Soviet संघ, giving a start to the largest land theatre of war in इतिहास, which tied bas the major part of the Axis ' सैन्य forces लिये the rest of the war.
In December 1941, Japan joined the अक्ष, attacked the United राज्य और यूरोपीय territories in the Pacific Ocean, and जल्दी conquered much of the पश्चिमी प्रशांत.
the Axis अग्रिम was stopped in 1942, बाद Japan खोया a श्रेणी of naval लड़ाइयों and European Axis troops were defeated in North Africa and, decisively, at stalingrad.
In 1943, साथ a श्रेणी of जर्मनी defeats in Eastern Europe, the Allied invasion of Italy, और American victories in the प्रशांत, the अक्ष lost the पहल and undertook strategic रिट्रीट on सब fronts.
In 1944, the Western allies invaded France, while the सोवियत Union regained all of इसके territorial नुकसान and invaded जर्मनी और its allies.
During 1944 and 1945 the United States पराजित the Japanese Navy और captured कुंजी पश्चिमी प्रशांत islands.
The war in यूरोपीय ended with the capture of Berlin by Soviet and Polish troops and the subsequent German unconditional surrender on 8 May 1945.
following the पॉट्सडैम घोषणा by the allies on 26 July 1945, the United राज्य dropped परमाणु bombs on the Japanese शहरों of Hiroshima on 6 अगस्त, और Nagasaki on 9 अगस्त.
With an आक्रमण of the Japanese archipelago निकट, and the सोवियत Union having घोषित war on Japan by आक्रमणकारी Manchuria, Japan surrendered on 15 August 1945, समाप्ति the युद्ध in Asia और cementing the कुल victory of the Allies over the Axis.
संसार War ii altered the political alignment और social ढांचा of the world.
The संयुक्त Nations ( un ) थी स्थापित to foster international cooperation और prevent future विरोध.
the great शक्तियां कि यहूद the victors of the war—the संयुक्त राज्य, the सोवियत Union, China, the संयुक्त किंगडम, और france—became the permanent members of the United राष्ट्र सुरक्षा Council.
The Soviet संघ and the United States emerged as rival superpowers, setting the stage लिये the Cold युद्ध, जिससे lasted लिये the अगला 46 years.
Meanwhile, the influence of European ग्रेट powers started to decline, while the decolonisation of Asia and Africa began.
सबसे countries whose उद्योग had been damaged स्थानांतरित towards आर्थिक रिकवरी.
Political integration, especially in Europe, emerged as an effort to stabilise postwar relations and लड़ो अधिक effectively in the ठंडा युद्ध.
a limited liability company ( llc ) is a लचीली रूप of enterprise कि blends तत्व of साझेदारी and कॉरपोरेट structures.
Note than an llc is not a corporation, and कॉलिंग an llc a corporation is technically गलत.
an LLC is a विधिक form of company that provides सीमित देयता to इसके owners in the vast majority of United राज्य jurisdictions.
llcs do नहीं need to be organized for profit.
Five k-cups
The inside of a used k-cup, with the शीर्ष foil and the used coffee grounds removed.
This shows the filter अंदर the k-cup.
k-cup portion पैक are used साथ Keurig or अन्य single cup brewing systems to काढ़ा a कप of कॉफी, चाय, or hot chocolate.
Each k-cup is a plastic संग्राहक साथ a coffee filter अंदर.
मैदान कॉफी beans are packed in the k-cup and sealed air-tight साथ a संयोजन प्लास्टिक और foil lid.
जब the K-Cup is placed in a keurig brewer, the brewer punctures the foil lid and the नीचे of the k-cup and शक्तियां hot जल under दबाव through the k-cup and into a mug.
keurig पंक्तियां इसके K-Cup technology to कॉफी roasters and tea makers such as Green Mountain Coffee Roasters, diedrich/ Gloria जीन्स, Timothy 's संसार कॉफी, Van Houtte, Caribou Coffee, Celestial Seasonings, bigelow Tea Company, Twinings, टली 's, Coffee लोगों और न्युमैन 's अपना.
Keurig 's patents on the original k-cup डिज़ाइन समाप्त in September 2012.
keurig holds at least एक additional, still-active US patent and another patent अनुप्रयोग, detailing सुधार that have subsequently been incorporated in उनके K-Cup डिज़ाइन.
electa जेब Chronograph ( ca. 1890s ) manufactured by the Gallet Watch कम्पनी in La Chaux-de-Fonds, स्विट्ज़रलैंड.

A आधुनिक Seiko quartz wristwatch using the chronograph फलन ( movement 7T92 ).
नागरिक Atessa Eco-Drive atv53-3023 analog-digital chronograph साथ 4 क्षेत्रफल Radio Controlled reception ( उत्तर America, Europe, China, Japan ).
a chronograph is a specific type of देखें that is प्रयुक्त as a stopwatch combined with a प्रदर्शक देखें.
A basic chronograph has an independent sweep दूसरी hand ; it can be started, रोका, and returned to zero by successive pressure on the stem.
Louis Moinet invented the chronograph in 1816
Conventional पीसीआई ( पीसीआई is an initialism formed from परिधीय Component इंटरकनेक्ट, part of the PCI लोकल बस standard और often shortened to बस PCI ) is a local computer bus for attaching हार्डवेयर डिवाइस in a कंप्यूटर.
The पीसीआई bus supports the कृत्यों मिला on a प्रोसेसर बस, but in a standardized format that is स्वतंत्र of कोई particular प्रोसेसर.
डिवाइस connected to the bus appear to the प्रोसेसर to be connected सीधे to the processor बस, और हैं आबंटित addresses in the processor 's address space.
Attached devices can take either the रूप of an integrated सर्किट fitted onto the मदरबोर्ड itself, called a planar device in the PCI specification, or an विस्तार कार्ड that fits into a slot.
the PCI Local Bus थी first implemented in ibm PC compatibles, जहाँ it विस्थापित the संयोजन of ISA plus one VESA Local Bus as the bus विन्यास.
It रै subsequently been अपनाया for other computer types.
PCI and PCI-X are होने replaced by पीसीआई Express, लकिन, सबसे motherboards are still made साथ एक or more पीसीआई slots, which are sufficient for many uses.
the पीसीआई specification covers the physical size of the बस ( including the आकार और spacing of the circuit फलक किनारे electrical contacts ), electrical characteristics, bus timing, and protocols.
The specification can be purchased इससे the PCI खास Interest Group ( PCI-SIG ).
ठेठ PCI ताश used in PCs शामिल : संजाल ताश, sound cards, modems, extra ports such as USB or serial, tv tuner cards and disk परिरक्षक.
PCI वीडियो ताश replaced isa and VESA ताश, until growing bandwidth आवश्यकताएँ outgrew the capabilities of पीसीआई ; the preferred interface लिये वीडियो ताश became अगप, and then PCI एक्स्प्रेस.
PCI video ताश remain उपलब्धियाँ for उपयोग साथ old PCs बगैर AGP or PCI Express slots.
Many devices previously provided on पीसीआई विस्तार cards are now commonly integrated onto motherboards or उपलब्धियाँ in universal serial bus और पीसीआई एक्स्प्रेस संस्करण.
Michael Whitaker स्मिथ ( born अक्तूबर 7, 1957 ) is an अमरीकी contemporary ईसाई संगीतकार, who रै charted primarily in the समकालीन Christian and occasionally in the मुख्यधारा charts.
उसके biggest success in मुख्यधारा म्यूज़िक was in 1991 when `` Place in this World '' hit No. 6 on the बिलबोर्ड hot 100.
Smith is a three-time ग्रैमी पुरस्कार winner, and has अर्जित 40 Dove पुरस्कार.
Over the course of उसके career, he sold more than 13 million albums और recorded 29 No. 1 Hit songs, चौदह सुनहरा albums, and five platinum albums.
Smith is an American म्यूज़िक Award प्राप्तकर्ता ; he थी भी नामित एक of People पत्रिका 's `` सबसे खूबसूरत People ''.
An अमरीकी poster from the संसार युद्ध ii -era कि was used to inform लोगों परिचय what they चाहिए do if वे suspect sabotage.
तोड़फोड़ is a deliberate action aimed at weakening another entity through subversion, रुकावट, disruption, or destruction.
In a workplace setting, तोड़फोड़ is the conscious withdrawal of efficiency generally directed at causing some बदलें in कार्यस्थल शर्तें.
One जो engages in sabotage is a saboteur.
As a rule, saboteurs कोशिश to छिपाते their identities क्युकी of the consequences of their actions.
लिये उदाहरण, whereas an environmental दबाव group might be प्रसन्न to be identified साथ an act of sabotage, it होता नहीं want the individual identities of the perpetrators known.
पैट्रिक हेनरी कॉलेज ( PHC ) is a private, independent college साथ an Evangelical Christian basis that focuses on शिक्षण शास्त्रीय उदार arts and government, स्तिथ in Purcellville, Virginia, संयुक्त राज्य.
Patrick Henry is known लिये its रूढ़िवादी धर्मान्तरण ईसाई फ़ोकस.
as of April 17, 2007, the कॉलेज was accredited by the transnational संघ of Christian Colleges and स्कूलों, a national faith-related accrediting संगठन recognized by the विभाग of शिक्षा and the परिषद for Higher Education Accreditation.
The स्कूल was संस्थापित with the help of the घर स्कूल Legal रक्षा Association, और अभी serves as the headquarters लिये the organization, साथ which it is स्टिल closely connected.
The history of टेलीविज़न comprises the work of numerous engineers और inventors in अनेक countries over अनेक decades.
The earliest प्रस्ताव was in 1908, in a पेपर by A. A. Campbell-Swinton and postulated the उपयोग of कैथोड rays.
the first practical demonstrations of television, however, यहूद developed using electromechanical विधि to स्कैन, संचारण, and reproduce an चित्र.
As electronic कैमरा and display tubes were perfected, electromechanical television gave way to all-electronic प्रणालियों in nearly all अनुप्रयोग.

A सिनेमा in ऑस्ट्रेलिया
A ठेठ मल्टीप्लेक्स ( एएमसी Promenade 16 in Woodland पहाड़ियाँ, Los Angeles, U.S. )
A फिल्म theater ( also पुकारा a सिनेमा, फिल्म house, film house, फिल्मी theater or picture हाउस ) is a venue, usually a building, for देखने films.
सबसे लकिन not सब movie थिएटर हैं वाणिज्यिक operations catering to the general पब्लिक, जो attend by खरीदना a ticket.
The movie is projected with a फिल्म प्रोजेक्टर onto a विशाल projection screen at the सामने of the auditorium.
सबसे फिल्म theaters हैं अभी equipped लिये digital सिनेमा projection, निकालना the need to बनाएँ and transport a physical film print.

A मोटरसाइकिल club is a group of individuals whose प्राथमिक interest और activities involve motorcycles.
lyme बीमारी, lyme borreliosis is an संक्रामक बीमारी caused by at least three species of bacteria belonging to the genus Borrelia.
Borrelia burgdorferi sensu stricto is the main cause of lyme बीमारी in उत्तर America, whereas Borrelia afzelii and Borrelia garinii cause most European मामले.
the disease is नामित after the कस्बों of Lyme and Old Lyme, Connecticut, USA, जहाँ a number of cases were identified in 1975.
हालांकि एलन Steere realized कि Lyme बीमारी was a tick-borne disease in 1978, the कारण of the disease remained a रहस्य जबतक 1981, जब B. burgdorferi थी identified by विली Burgdorfer.
lyme बीमारी is the most common tick-borne बीमारी in the उत्तरी Hemisphere.
Borrelia is transmitted to इंसानो by the bite of infected ticks belonging to a few प्रजाति of the genus ixodes ( `` hard ticks '' ).
Early symptoms may include ज्वर, सिरदर्द, थकान, अवसाद, और a characteristic circular स्किन खाज पुकारा erythema migrans ( em ).
बाएँ अनुपचारित, later symptoms may involve the joints, heart, and central बेचैन प्रणाली.
In most cases, the infection and its लक्षण हैं eliminated by एंटीबायोटिक, विशेषकर if the illness is treated early.
विलम्बित or अपर्याप्त treatment can सीसे to more गंभीर symptoms, जिससे can be disabling and difficult to दावत.

शिश्न ( plural penises or penes ) is a general term लिये the अंगों with जिससे male और उभयलिंगी animals introduce शुक्राणु into receptive females during copulation.
Such organs occur in अनेक पशु, both vertebrate और invertebrate, but males do नहीं भालू a शिश्न in every animal प्रजाति, and in those species in जिससे the पुरूष करता भालू a so-called शिश्न, the penes in the various species are नहीं necessarily समजात.
लिये example, the शिश्न of a mammal is at सबसे analogous to the penis of a पुरूष insect or barnacle.
the term शिश्न applies to many reproductive intromittent अंगों, लकिन not to सब ; लिये उदाहरण the intromittent अंग of most cephalopoda is the hectocotylus, a specialised arm, and पुरूष मकड़ियों use उनके pedipalps.
In सबसे species of पशु in जिससे there is an organ कि might reasonably be described as a penis, it has no प्रमुख फलन अन्य than intromission, or at तनिक conveying the sperm to the female, but in the placental स्तनधारियों the penis bears the distal भाग of the urethra, which discharges both मूत्र during urination and वीर्य during copulation as the occasion requires.
Artists और रंगमंडल ( A & r ) is the प्रभाग of a रिकार्ड label or music प्रकाशन company कि is responsible लिये talent scouting और overseeing the कलाकारी development of रिकॉर्डिंग artists and/or songwriters.
It also acts as a liaison between कलाकारों और the record label or प्रकाशन company ; every कार्यकलाप involving artists to the point of एल्बम release is generally माना under the purview of, और responsibility of, a & r.
A furlong is a measure of अलहदा in इम्पीरियल इकाई और U.S. प्रथागत units equal to one-eighth of a mile, equivalent to 220 yards, 660 feet, 40 छड़, or 10 जंजीरों.
the सटीक value of the furlong varies slightly among English-speaking countries.
पाँच furlongs हैं approximately 1 kilometre ( 1.0058 km is a closer सन्निकटन ).
Since the original परिभाषा of the मीटर was one-quarter of एक ten-millionth of the परिधि of the Earth ( along the great circle coincident with the meridian of longitude passing through पेरिस ), the circumference of the धरती is about 40,000 km or about 200,000 furlongs.

Lithium बैटरी are डिस्पोजेबल ( primary ) batteries कि have लिथियम metal or लिथियम compounds as an anode.
वे स्टैंड apart from अन्य batteries in उनके high charge density ( long life ) और high cost per unit.
Depending on the design and chemical compounds used, लिथियम cells can produce voltages from 1.5 V ( comparable to a zinc–carbon or alkaline battery ) to about 3.7 V. Lithium batteries are widely प्रयुक्त in उत्पाद such as portable consumer इलेक्ट्रॉनिक devices.

Facebook is an online social networking service, जिनकी name stems इससे the colloquial name for the book given to students at the start of the academic साल by some university administrations in the संयुक्त States to help students मिलेंगी to जान each other.
it was संस्थापित in फ़रवरी 2004 by Mark Zuckerberg साथ his college roommates and fellow Harvard University विद्यार्थी एडुआर्डो saverin, Andrew McCollum, Dustin Moskovitz and Chris Hughes.
the website 's membership थी initially limited by the founders to Harvard students, but was expanded to other colleges in the Boston क्षेत्रफल, the आइवी League, और स्टैनफोर्ड University.
it धीरे added support for students at विभिन्न other विश्वविद्यालयों पहले opening to high स्कूल students, and आखिरकार to anyone aged 13 and over.
फेसबुक अभी allows कोई users who declare themselves to be at least 13 सालो old to become registered users of the साईट.
उपयोक्ता जरूर register before using the साईट, बाद which वे may create a निजी प्रोफ़ाइल, add अन्य users as friends, and एक्सचेंज messages, सहित automatic notifications जब वे update their प्रोफ़ाइल.
Additionally, उपयोक्ता may join common-interest user groups, व्यवस्थित by workplace, स्कूल or college, or other characteristics, and categorize उनके friends into lists such as `` People From कार्य '' or `` Close Friends ''.
As of सितंबर 2012, Facebook has over one billion active users.
According to a may 2011 उपभोक्ता रिपोर्ट्स सर्वेक्षण, there are 7.5 million children under 13 साथ accounts and 5 लाख under 10, violating the site 's शर्तें of सेवा.
in May 2005, accel partners invested $ 12.7 लाख in Facebook, और Jim Breyer added $ 1 million of उसके अपना money to the pot.
a January 2009 Compete.com study क्रमित Facebook as the सबसे प्रयुक्त social networking service by worldwide monthly active उपयोक्ता.
entertainment Weekly included the साईट on इसके end-of-the-decade `` best-of '' list, saying, `` कैसा on धरती किया we stalk our exes, remember हमारी co-workers ' जन्मदिन, bug our friends, and play a rousing खेल of Scrabulous before फेसबुक ? ''
आलोचकों, such as Facebook detox, state that Facebook has turned into a national obsession in the United राज्य, resulting in विशाल amounts of time खोया and encouraging आत्ममोह.
Quantcast estimates Facebook has 138.9 million मासिक unique u.S. विज़िटर in May 2011.
according to सोशल Media Today, in April 2010 an अनुमानित 41.6 % ( 129.5 लाख ) of the U.S. जनसांख्यिकी था a Facebook account.
nevertheless, फेसबुक 's market growth प्रारंभ to स्टाल in some regions, साथ the साईट losing 7 million active उपयोक्ता in the United States and Canada in May 2011.
फेसबुक आखिरकार filed for an आरंभिक पब्लिक offering on February 1, 2012, और was headquartered in Menlo Park, कैलिफ़ोर्निया.
फेसबुक Inc. began selling stock to the public and trading on the NASDAQ on May 18, 2012.
अर्विन Johannes Eugen ख़बरों ( 15 November 1891 – 14 अक्तूबर 1944 ), popularly known as The Desert Fox ( wüstenfuchs, ), was a जर्मनी फ़ील्ड Marshal of World War II.
he अर्जित the आदर of both उसके अपना troops और the enemies he लड़ा.
Rommel was a highly सजा अधिकारी in World War i और was awarded the डालना le Mérite लिये his exploits on the इतालवी front.
In World War ii, he further distinguished himself as the commander of the 7th Panzer प्रभाग during the 1940 invasion of France.
उसके leadership of German and इतालवी forces in the उत्तर African campaign established him as एक of the most समर्थ commanders of the war, and earned him the appellation of the मरुस्थल Fox.
He is regarded as एक of the most skilled commanders of मरुस्थल warfare in the विरोध.
he बाद commanded the German forces opposing the Allied cross-channel invasion in Normandy.
His assignments never took him to the Eastern Front.
ख़बरों is regarded as having महरूम a दयालु और professional officer.
उसके afrika Korps थी never accused of युद्ध crimes, and सैनिको captured during उसके Africa campaign were reported to have महरूम treated humanely.
आदेश to kill Jewish soldiers, नागरिकों and captured commandos यहूद ignored.
Late in the war, Rommel was linked to the conspiracy to assassinate Adolf Hitler.
चूंकि ख़बरों was a नेशनल hero, हिटलर desired to eliminate उसे चुपचाप.
he forced ख़बरों to commit suicide with a cyanide pill, in वापसी लिये आश्वासनों that Rommel 's family would नहीं be persecuted following his मौत.

The seven उपहार of the Holy स्पिरिट is an enumeration of seven spiritual उपहार originating साथ patristic authors, later elaborated by five intellectual virtues and four अन्य समूह of ethical characteristics.
They are : wisdom, understanding, wonder and डरते ( fear of the Lord ), counsel, knowledge, fortitude, और piety ( reverence ).
the Earth Day Flag, the नवीनतम proposal of जॉन mcconnell लिये a flag of Earth Day
Earth Day is an सालाना इवेंट, celebrated on अप्रैल 22, on which कार्यक्रम are held विश्वव्यापी to demonstrate support for पर्यावरणीय protection.
it थी first celebrated in 1970, and is अभी coordinated globally by the Earth Day Network, and celebrated in अधिक than 192 countries प्रत्येक साल.
In 1969 at a युनेस्को Conference in San Francisco, the date प्रस्तावित was कूच 21, 1970, the first day of spring in the उत्तरी hemisphere.
इस day of nature 's equipoise was बाद sanctioned in a Proclamation signed by Secretary सामान्य U Thant at the संयुक्त Nations.
a month later a separate धरती Day was संस्थापित by United States Senator Gaylord नेल्सन as an environmental teach-in first आयोजित on अप्रैल 22, 1970.
Nelson was later awarded the अध्यक्षीय पदक of Freedom Award in recognition of his work.
While इस April 22 Earth दिन was focused on the United राज्य, an संगठन launched by डेनिस Hayes, who was the original national coordinator in 1970, took it अंतरराष्ट्रीय in 1990 और व्यवस्थित events in 141 nations.
Numerous समुदायों celebrate Earth सप्ताह, an entire week of क्रियाएँ focused on पर्यावरणीय issues.
Iodine is a रासायनिक element with प्रतीक i and परमाणु number 53.
The name is इससे Greek ioeidēs, meaning बैंगनी or जामुनी, due to the color of elemental आयोडीन vapor.
आयोडीन and its यौगिकों are primarily used in nutrition, और industrially in the उत्पादन of acetic acid and certain polymers.
Iodine 's relatively high atomic number, low toxicity, and ease of attachment to organic compounds have made it a part of many X-ray contrast materials in modern medicine.
Iodine has only one stable समस्थानिक.
A number of आयोडीन radioisotopes are also used in चिकित्सा अनुप्रयोग.
Iodine is मिला on धरती मुख्यतः as the अत्यधिक water-soluble iodide आयन, i−, जिससे concentrates it in oceans and brine pools.
जैसे the अन्य halogens, free आयोडीन occurs mainly as a diatomic अणु I2, and then only momentarily after being oxidized इससे iodide by an oxidant जैसे फ़्री oxygen.
In the ब्रह्मांड and on Earth, iodine 's high atomic number makes it a relatively rare element.
However, its presence in ocean जल has दिए it a भूमिका in biology.
it is the heaviest अनिवार्य तत्व utilized widely by जीवन in biological functions ( तभी tungsten, employed in एंजाइमों by a few प्रजाति of bacteria, is अत्यधिक ).
Iodine 's rarity in many soils, due to initial low abundance as a crust-element, और also leaching of घुलनशील आयोडाइड by rainwater, रै led to many deficiency problems in land animals and inland human populations.
आयोडीन deficiency affects about two billion people और is the leading preventable cause of बौद्धिक disabilities.
Iodine is जरूरी by higher animals, which उपयोग it to synthesize थायराइड हार्मोन, जिससे contain the तत्व.
क्युकी of this function, radioisotopes of आयोडीन are concentrated in the thyroid gland साथ साथ nonradioactive आयोडीन.
if inhaled, the radioisotope iodine-131, जिससे रै a ऊँची परिवर्द्धन product yield, concentrates in the thyroid, लकिन is easily remedied with पोटैशियम आयोडाइड उपचार.
Lobbying ( also lobby ) is the act of attempting to influence decisions made by officials in the government, सबसे often legislators or members of regulatory agencies.
Lobbying is done by many अलग types of people और व्यवस्थित groups, सहित individuals in the private sector, corporations, fellow legislators or सरकारी officials, or वकालत groups ( ब्याज groups ).
Lobbyists may be among a legislator 's constituencies, meaning a voter or bloc of voters within his or उसके electoral district, or not ; they may engage in lobbying as a कारोबार, or not.
पेशेवर lobbyists are people जिनकी कारोबार is trying to influence legislation on behalf of a समूह or individual who hires उन्हें.
Individuals और nonprofit संगठन can also lobby as an act of volunteering or as a छोटी भाग of उनके normal job ( लिये उदाहरण, a सीईओ meeting with a प्रतिनिधि परिचय a project महत्वपूर्ण to his/her कम्पनी, or an activist meeting साथ his/her विधायक in an unpaid capacity ).
सरकारें प्रायः define and विनियमित व्यवस्थित समूह lobbying कि has become influential.
the ethics और नैतिकता of lobbying हैं.
lobbying is often spoken of साथ अवमानना, when the implication is that people with inordinate socioeconomic शक्ति are corrupting the विधि ( टेढ़ी it away from निष्पक्षता ) in order to serve उनके own conflict of interest.
But another side of lobbying is making यकीनन that others ' interests are विधिवत defended against अन्य ' भ्रष्टाचार, or even बस बनाना sure that minority रूचि are fairly defended against mere जुल्म of the majority.
लिये example, a medical association, or a व्यापार association of health insurance कंपनियाँ, may lobby a legislature in order to counteract the influence of तम्बाकू कंपनियाँ, in जिससे मामला the lobbying would be viewed by सबसे people as justified ( duly defending against अन्य ' भ्रष्टाचार ).
The difficulty in drawing उद्देश्य lines between which lobbyists are `` good lobbyists '' और जिससे ones are `` ख़राब ones '' is compounded by the cleverness with जिससे lobbyists or their क्लाइंट can argue that their own lobbying is of the `` शुभ '' kind.
At heart, the effort to influence legislation is a शक्ति struggle.
As in other फ़ॉर्म of शक्ति संघर्ष, such as war or law enforcement, motives range from to self-defense to fighting for justice, and the dividing line between predation और इंसाफ is subject to rationalization.
Sunshine of your प्रेम guitar riff
मलाई यहूद a 1960s अंग्रेजों rock supergroup consisting of bassist/vocalist जोकर Bruce, guitarist/vocalist Eric Clapton, and drummer अदरक Baker.
Their sound थी characterised by a संकर of blues चट्टान, hard rock और साइकेडेलिक चट्टान, combining the psychedelia-themed lyrics, Eric Clapton 's blues guitar playing and vocals, Jack Bruce 's आवाज़ और prominent bass playing and Ginger Baker 's जैज़ -influenced drumming.
the group 's तीसरा एल्बम, Wheels of आग, was the world 's पहला platinum-selling दोगुना album.
Cream are widely regarded as being the world 's first successful supergroup.
In their career, they बेची over 15 million एल्बम worldwide.
Cream 's म्यूज़िक included गीतों based on traditional ब्लूज़ ऐसे as `` Crossroads `` और `` Spoonful ``, और आधुनिक ब्लूज़ ऐसे as `` Born Under a Bad Sign ``, as well as more eccentric songs ऐसे as `` Strange Brew ``, `` किस्से of Brave ulysses `` and `` Toad ``.
मलाई 's biggest हिट्स were `` I महसूस Free `` ( UK, number 11 ), `` Sunshine of अपना Love `` ( US, क्रमांक 5 ), `` White रूम `` ( US, number 6 ), `` Crossroads '' ( US, number 28 ), और `` Badge `` ( UK, number 18 ).
Cream बना a significant impact on the लोकप्रिय म्यूज़िक of the time, and, साथ साथ Jimi Hendrix, और टेरी कठ of शिकागो, popularised the use of the wah-wah पैदल.
They provided a heavy yet technically निपुण musical theme that foreshadowed और बहकावे the emergence of British bands such as the जेफ़ बेक Group in the लेट 1960s.
the band 's live प्रदर्शन बहकावे progressive rock acts such as Rush.
Cream were inducted into the Rock और फेंकें हॉल of कीर्ति in 1993.
They were शामिल in both Rolling Stone and vh1 's lists of the `` 100 Greatest कलाकारों of सब समय ''.
They were also ranked number 16 on VH1 's `` 100 Greatest Artists of मुश्किल Rock ''.
hairspray is a 1988 comedy film written और directed by जॉन waters, और अभिनीत ricki झील, Sonny Bono, Debbie Harry, माइकल st. Gerard, Shawn थॉम्पसन, Colleen Fitzpatrick, Jerry Stiller, और in उसके पिछला फिल्मी role, Divine.
Hairspray was a नाटकीय प्रस्थान from Waters ' earlier works, with a much broader intended दर्शक.
In फैक्ट, Hairsprays PG is the mildest rating a Waters film has received ; most of his previous films यहूद रेटेड X by the mpaa.
नियत in 1962 Baltimore, मेरीलैंड, the फिल्मी घूमती around self-proclaimed `` pleasantly plump '' किशोरावस्था Tracy Turnblad as वो pursues स्टारडम as a dancer on a local TV show और rallies विरूद्ध जातिगत पृथक्करण.
Hairspray was only a moderate कामयाबी upon its आरंभिक theatrical release, कमाई a modest gross of $ 8 million.
