Most आलोचकों praised the फिल्मी, although कुछ यहूद displeased with the overall campiness.
In 2002, the फिल्मी was adapted into a Broadway musical of the same name, which won eight टोनी Awards, including बेहतरीन musical in 2003.
A दूसरी film संस्करण of hairspray, an adaptation of the स्टेज musical, was also released by नई लकीर सिनेमा in 2007, which included many changes of scripted वस्तुएं from the असली.
the फिल्मी भी ranks # 444 on Empire magazine 's 2008 list of the 500 greatest movies of all समय.
a Christian denomination is an identifiable religious body अंतर्गत a आम नाम, ढांचा, and doctrine within Christianity.
कुछ groups शामिल do नहीं consider themselves a denomination ( e.g., the कैथोलिक गिरिजाघर considers itself the एक true church और the अपोस्टोलिक देखिए, and as pre-denominational ).
Some समूह viewed by non-adherents as denominational actively resist being called a denomination and do नहीं have कोई formal denominational structure, प्राधिकार, or record-keeping परे the लोकल congregation ; several समूह within बहाली Movement पतन into इस श्रेणी.
कुछ groups हैं विशाल ( e.g. catholics, Lutherans, anglicans or baptists ), जबकि others are just a few छोटी चर्च, and in सबसे cases the relative आकार is नहीं evident in this सूची.
Modern movements such as Fundamentalist christianity, Pietism, evangelicalism, Pentecostalism and the Holiness movement sometimes क्रॉस denominational लाइनों, or in कुछ cases बनाएँ नई denominations out of two or अधिक continuing समूह, ( as is the मामला for अनेक संयुक्त and uniting churches, लिये उदाहरण ).
Such subtleties और complexities are not clearly चित्रित here.
प्रमुख विभाजन भीतर Christianity.
नोट : This is not a complete सूची, but aims to provide a comprehensible अवलोकन of the diversity among denominations of Christianity.
as there हैं reported to be approximately 41,000 Christian denominations, many of जिससे can not be verified to be significant, only those denominations साथ Wikipedia articles होगा be listed in order to ensure that सब entries on this सूची हैं notable और verifiable.
Between denominations, theologians, और comparative religionists there हैं considerable मतभिन्नता परिचय जिससे समूह can be properly पुकारा Christian, मतभिन्नता arising primarily इससे doctrinal मतभेद between groups.
लिये the purpose of simplicity, इस list is intended to reflect the self-understanding of each denomination.
Explanations of different राय concerning their status as Christian denominations can be मिला at उनके respective articles.
There is no official recognition in most parts of the संसार लिये religious bodies, and there is no official clearinghouse जिससे could determine the औकात or respectability of धार्मिक bodies.
Often there is considerable असहमति between various चर्च about whether अन्य चर्च चाहिए be labeled साथ pejorative terms ऐसे as `` cult '', or about whether this or that group enjoys कुछ माप of respectability.
ऐसे considerations प्रायः vary from place to प्लेस, where एक religious समूह may आनंद बहुमत औकात in एक region, लकिन be widely regarded as a `` dangerous cult '' in another भाग of the संसार.
Inclusion on this सूची करता नहीं indicate कोई निर्णय परिचय the आकार, importance, or अक्षर of a group or इसके सदस्यों.
1804 map of `` louisiana ``, edged on the वेस्ट by the Rocky kyu.
The louisiana खरीदें ( `` बिक्री of Louisiana '' ) was the अधिग्रहण by the United States of America in 1803 of of France 's अर्जी to the territory of louisiana.
the U.S. paid 50 million francs ( $ 11,250,000 ) प्लस cancellation of debts worth 18 लाख francs ( $ 3,750,000 ), for a कुल sum of 15 लाख डॉलर ( कम than 3 cents प्रति एकड़ ) for the louisiana territory ( $ million in dollars, less than 42 सेंट प्रति acre ).
The Louisiana territory encompassed all or part of 15 उपस्थित u.S. states and दो Canadian provinces.
The land purchased contained all of present-day अरकंसास, मिसौरी, आयोवा, Oklahoma, Kansas, और नेब्रास्का ; parts of मिनेसोटा that यहूद वेस्ट of the Mississippi River ; most of उत्तर Dakota ; most of दक्षिण Dakota ; northeastern New मैक्सिको ; उत्तरी टेक्सास ; the portions of मोंटाना, व्योमिंग, and Colorado ईस्ट of the Continental Divide ; louisiana वेस्ट of the मिसिसिपी River, including the city of New ऑरलियन्स ; और small portions of land that would आखिरकार become भाग of the कनाडाई provinces of Alberta और Saskatchewan.
France नियंत्रित इस विशाल क्षेत्रफल from 1699 until 1762, the year it gave the territory to इसके ally स्पेन.
Under Napoleon बोनापार्ट, France took back the territory in 1800 in the आशा of भवन an साम्राज्य in North America.
a slave revolt in हैती and an impending war with Britain, however, led फ़्रांस to abandon these योजनाएँ and sell the संपूर्ण territory to the United States, जो had originally intended only to seek the खरीदें of New ऑरलियन्स and इसके adjacent lands.
the purchase of the territory of Louisiana took place दौरान the presidency of Thomas जेफरसन.
at the time, the purchase faced domestic opposition because it थी thought to be unconstitutional.
Although he agreed that the U.S. संविधान किया not contain provisions for acquiring territory, जेफरसन decided to go ahead with the purchase anyway in अनुक्रम to remove France 's उपस्थिति in the region और to protect both U.S. trade access to the बंदरगाहों of New ऑरलियन्स और फ़्री ड्योढ़ी on the मिसिसिपी नदी.
Ceremony at प्लेस d'Armes, नई ऑरलियन्स marking ट्रांसफ़र of louisiana to the United States, 10 कूच 1804, as चित्रित by Thure de thulstrup.
`` Cool Jerk '' is a लोकप्रिय song written by Donald storball और originally performed by The capitols.
released in 1966, it पहुँचे No. 2 on the American R & b chart and No. 7 on the पॉप chart.
the बैकिंग track लिये this song was actually recorded ( secretly ) by the motown house band The Funk Brothers.
Per एक of the दुर्गंध Brothers, the सोंग was originally to be called `` Pimp Jerk. ''
This थी taken इससे watching पड़ोस pimps, जो होता dance in the क्लब, लकिन were too `` cool '' to do the jerk like नियमित folks.
Their version was subsequently named `` the Pimp Jerk. ''
the निर्माता थी afraid that a song with the word pimp in the शीर्षक would be banned or नहीं receive much positive attention, and था the शीर्षक changed to इसके current form.
The Go-Go 's, Todd rundgren, Big Trouble, इंसान यौन Response, The La de Da 's, The Creation, और the coasters have covered the सोंग.
Todd Rundgren did his संस्करण in an विषम time हस्ताक्षर ( 7/4 ), giving an obviously jerky feel to the song.
The Go-Go 's covered the सोंग for their 1982 album Vacation and later re-recorded it लिये उनके 1990 album Greatest.
In the feature फिल्मी Home Alone 2 : खोया in New यॉर्क, ताऊ फ़्रैंक ( gerry Bamman ) sings `` कूल Jerk '' in the shower.
A version of the song with अलग lyrics ( `` Do the कूल चाबुक '' ) is used in कूल चाबुक commercials.
A recording of `` कूल झटका '' by रिकार्डो Ray is featured in the feature फिल्मी donnie Brasco ( 1997 ).
The सोंग सुविधाएँ in the फिल्मी Standing in the साए of Motown, performed by the Funk Brothers with सीसे vocals by Bootsy Collins.
The song is heard briefly in the animated feature, मेडागास्कर 3 : यूरोपीय 's Most Wanted.
Despite इस reason, it is सूचीबद्ध in some विसंगतियाँ of the फिल्मी 's साउंडट्रैक.
A लीग is a unit of length ( or, rarely, area ).
It was long आम in Europe और लैटिन America, but it is no longer an official ईकाई in कोई nation.
The लीग originally referred to the अलहदा a person could walk in an hour.
Since the मध्य Ages, अनेक values have महरूम specified in अनेक countries.
in the कॉन्टेक्स्ट of nautical दूरियाँ, the 3 mile ( 4.8 km ) distance corresponds to कैसा far an निरीक्षक of average height ( 5'9 '' or 1.78 m ) can see जब खड़ा at sea level.
यूँ, a जलयान traveling one `` लीग '' रै reached what was previously the farthest visible distance on the horizon.
The lack of a historical और वैश्विक standard for the सटीक measure of a `` league '' can be accounted लिये by the variable elevation of the observer ( i.e., sightings from a ship 's deck vs. masthead ).
the आयरिश state came into being in 1922 as the Irish Free राज्य, a dominion of the British Commonwealth, having seceded इससे the संयुक्त Kingdom under the Anglo-Irish Treaty.
it comprises 26 of Ireland 's 32 काउंटी.
चूंकि 1949 it रै existed as the Republic of Ireland.
From its न्यास, the Irish Free राज्य was embroiled in a civil युद्ध between nationalists supporting the सन्धि और opponents जो supported a republic.
the pro-Treaty side, organised as cumann na nGaedheal emerged victorious इससे the conflict और won subsequent चुनावों.
They formed the government of the राज्य until 1932, when they peacefully handed over power to the anti-Treaty गुट in fianna fáil, who defeated them in an चुनाव.
The Irish राज्य, despite इसके हिंसक beginnings, रै remained a liberal democracy throughout its अस्तित्व.
a नई संविधान in 1937 removed many of the links with Britain स्थापित अंतर्गत the सन्धि और Ireland 's neutrality in the Second संसार युद्ध demonstrated its स्वतंत्रता in foreign नीति matters इससे Britain.
in 1948 Ireland formally left the British Commonwealth and adopted the title of `` Republic ''.
in the economic sphere, the Irish state has had a mixed performance.
on independence, it थी एक of the wealthier देशों in Europe प्रति head of जनसांख्यिकी.
however it भी inherited from British नियम the problems of unemployment, emigration, uneven भौगोलिक विकास and कमी of a native औद्योगिक base.
For much of its history, the राज्य struggled to rectify ये problems.
Particular चोटियों of emigration यहूद अंकित दौरान the late 1930s, 1950s और 1980s, when the आयरिश अर्थव्यवस्था अंकित little विकास.
in the 1930s, fianna Fáil governments attempted to create Irish domestic उद्योग using subsidies and protective tarifs.
In the late 1950s, these policies यहूद dropped in favour of फ़्री व्यापार साथ चयनित देशों and encouraging of foreign investment with कम taxes.
This थी विस्तारित when आयरलैंड डाला the यूरोपीय आर्थिक Community in 1972.
In the 1990s और 2000s, Ireland अनुभवी an economic boom known as the सेल्टिक Tiger, in which the देश 's GDP surpassed अनेक of its European पड़ोसी.
Immigration also surpassed emigration, bringing the राज्य 's population up to over 4 लाख.
However, चूंकि 2008, Ireland has अनुभवी a severe संकट in the banking sector and with sovereign debt.
the resultant economic slump has deepened the प्रभाव of the world मंदी on Ireland.
From 1937 to 1998, the आयरिश constitution included a claim on Northern आयरलैंड as a भाग of the national territory.
However, the state भी opposed and used its security forces against those armed groups - principally the Provisional आयरिश Republican फौज, who tried to एकजुट Ireland by force.
इस occurred in the 1950s, throughout the 1970s और 1980s and has जारी on a reduced scale.
Irish governments meanwhile tried to दलाली an agreement to the विरोध ज्ञात as the परेशानियों within Northern आयरलैंड from 1968 to the late 1990s.
The British government officially recognised the right of the Irish सरकारी to be a पार्टी to the उत्तरी negotiations in the Anglo-Irish अनुबंध of 1985.
in 1998, as भाग of the Good Friday Agreement, the Irish constitution थी altered by referendum to remove the territorial claim to Northern Ireland and instead extend the right of Irish नागरिकता to all the लोगों of the द्वीप चाहिए वे काश to have it.
John Quincy Adams ( July 11, 1767February 23, 1848 ) थी the sixth अध्यक्ष of the संयुक्त States ( 1825–1829 ).
He served as American diplomat, Senator, and Congressional प्रतिनिधि.
he was a सदस्य of the Federalist, Democratic-Republican, National Republican, और बाद anti-masonic and Whig parties.
एडम्स थी the son of पूर्व President जॉन Adams and अबीगैल एडम्स.
As a राजनयिक, Adams निभाई an important role in negotiating many international treaties, most notably the सन्धि of Ghent, जिससे ended the युद्ध of 1812.
as Secretary of राज्य, he negotiated साथ the United Kingdom over America 's उत्तरी border with कनाडा, negotiated साथ स्पेन the annexation of Florida, और authored the Monroe Doctrine.
इतिहासकारों agree he was एक of the महानतम diplomats and secretaries of राज्य in American history.
as president, he sought to modernize the American economy and promoted education.
Adams enacted a part of उसके agenda and paid बंद much of the national debt.
he थी stymied by a Congress नियंत्रित by his enemies, और his कमी of patronage networks helped राजनेता eager to undercut उसे.
he lost his 1828 bid for re-election to Andrew Jackson.
In doing so, he became the first president since उसके father to serve a single पद.
Adams is best ज्ञात as a diplomat who shaped America 's foreign नीति in line साथ his ardently nationalist commitment to अमेरिका 's republican values.
More recently होवे ( 2007 ) portrayed एडम्स as the exemplar and moral leader in an era of modernization.
During एडम्स ' आजीवन, technological innovations and new अर्थात् of communication spread संदेश of religious revival, social reform, and पार्टी politics.
Goods, money, and people traveled more rapidly and efficiently than कभी पहले.
Adams was elected a u.S. Representative इससे Massachusetts after leaving office, serving लिये the पिछला 17 सालो of उसके जीवन with far greater acclamation than he had achieved as अध्यक्ष.
He is, so far, the तभी president बाद elected to the संयुक्त States हाउस of प्रतिनिधि ( हालांकि John टायलर थी elected to the हाउस of Representatives of the Confederate राज्य just before his death in 1862 ).
एनिमेटेड by his growing revulsion against गुलामी, Adams became a leading प्रतिद्वन्दी of the Slave Power.
he predicted कि if a civil युद्ध were to break out, the अध्यक्ष could abolish slavery by using उसके युद्ध powers.
एडम्स also predicted the Union 's dissolution over the slavery issue, लकिन said that if the दक्षिण became independent there would be a series of bloody स्लेव revolts.
Windows Internet Explorer 9 ( IE9 ) is a version of the Internet Explorer web ब्राउजर from Microsoft.
It was released to the पब्लिक on March 14, 2011.
microsoft has released अंतरजाल एक्सप्लोरर 9 as a major out-of-band version कि is not tied to the रिलीज schedule of कोई particular version of खिड़कियाँ, नापसंद previous संस्करण.
it is the first version चूंकि अंतरजाल Explorer 2 to नहीं be bundled साथ a खिड़कियाँ operating system, हालांकि some oems have संस्थापित it with Windows 7 on their PCs, as well as new Windows 7 लैपटॉप.
The प्रणाली आवश्यकताएँ लिये अंतरजाल Explorer 9 are खिड़कियाँ 7, Windows Server 2008 r2, Windows विस्टा Service पैक 2 or Windows Server 2008 SP2 साथ the मंच अद्यतन.
खिड़कियाँ XP and पहले are not समर्थित.
Internet Explorer 9 is the last version of अंतरजाल Explorer to be supported on Windows Vista.
Both IA-32 and x64 builds हैं available.
Internet Explorer 9 supports अनेक CSS 3 properties, embedded ICC v2 or v4 color profiles support via Windows रंग प्रणाली, and has improved JavaScript performance.
It is the पिछला of the five major web browsers to implement support for स्केलेबल Vector Graphics ( SVG ).
it also features hardware-accelerated ग्राफिक्स रेंडरिंग using direct2d, hardware-accelerated text rendering using DirectWrite, hardware-accelerated वीडियो rendering using Media Foundation, imaging support provided by खिड़कियाँ इमेजिंग घटक, and high fidelity मुद्रण powered by the xml Paper specification ( xps ) print pipeline.
अंतरजाल Explorer 9 also supports the HTML5 वीडियो and ऑडियो टैग और the Web Open फ़ॉन्ट स्वरूप.
Alka-Seltzer is an effervescent antacid और pain reliever first marketed by the Dr. मील Medicine Company.
It was developed by मौरिस treener, head केमिस्ट at मील, in Elkhart, Indiana.
Alka-Seltzer is marketed for relief of minor aches, pains, inflammation, fever, headache, heartburn, sour stomach, indigestion, and hangovers, जबकि neutralizing excess stomach acid.
it थी शुभारम्भ in 1931.
A spin-off of Alka-Seltzer बना to relieve colds and flu, Alka-Seltzer Plus, was बाद introduced.
A short-lived antacid non-aspirin रूपांतर, Alka-Mints, was introduced in 1994 और discontinued in 1997.
alka-seltzer is फिलहाल स्वामित्व by Bayer Schering Pharma ag, जर्मनी.
The नाम `` alka-seltzer '' रै महरूम extended to incorporate an entire लकीर of medications sold over the counter and taken by means of rapidly dissolving tablets कि रूप a carbonated solution in जल.

a stalactite (, ; इससे the यूनानी stalasso, ( σταλάσσω ), `` to drip '', और meaning `` कि जिससे drips '' ) is a type of speleothem ( secondary खनिज ) that hangs इससे the छत of limestone caves.
It is a type of dripstone.
the corresponding formation on the floor of the cave is known as a stalagmite.
उपाधि abbreviations are प्रयुक्त as an alternative way to बताएँ an अकादमिक उपाधि instead of spelling आउट the शीर्षक in full, ऐसे as in reference books like Who 's जो और on कारोबार cards.
Many डिग्री have अधिक than one abbreviation.
In the uk, it is not generally the कस्टम to punctuate abbreviations लिये degrees with पूरा stops ( e.g. `` बीएससी '' बल्कि than `` B.Sc. ``.
Race is a classification system used to categorize इंसानो into large and distinct populations or groups by anatomical, cultural, ethnic, जेनेटिक, geographical, ऐतिहासिक, भाषाई, धार्मिक, or सोशल संबद्ध.
पहला used to denote नेशनल affiliations, the term began to be प्रयुक्त to relate to शारीरिक traits in the 17th century.
In the early 20th century the पद was प्रायः used, in a taxonomic sense, to denote genetically differentiated इंसान populations defined by phenotype.
जबकि biologists sometimes use the अवधारणा of race to मेक distinctions among फजी सेट of traits, others in the scientific जातियाँ सुझाएँ that the विचार of race often is used in a naive or simplistic रास्ता, i.e. that among humans, race रै no taxonomic significance : सब living humans belong to the वही प्रजाति, Homo sapiens और subspecies, Homo sapiens sapiens.
सोशल conceptions and groupings of races vary over time, involving folk taxonomies
that define of individuals based on perceived traits.
Scientists consider biological essentialism obsolete, और generally discourage जातिगत explanations for सामूहिक differentiation in both physical और behavioral traits.
चूंकि the दूसरी half of the 20th सदी the associations of रेस with the ideologies and theories that grew out of the work of 19th-century anthropologists and physiologists has led to the use of the word रेस itself बनने समस्यापूर्ण.
Although स्टिल प्रयुक्त in सामान्य contexts, it is अभी प्रायः replaced by अन्य शब्द which are less अस्पष्ट और emotionally चार्ज, such as populations, people ( s ), ethnic groups or communities depending on context.
लुसी Stone ( August 13, 1818 – October 19, 1893 ) थी a prominent American abolitionist and suffragist, and a vocal advocate and आयोजक promoting rights for महिलाओं.
In 1847, स्टोन became the first woman from मैसाचुसेट्स to earn a कॉलेज degree.
She spoke out for women 's अधिकारों और विरूद्ध slavery at a time जब women were discouraged and prevented from public बोलना.
Stone थी the पहला recorded अमरीकी woman to retain उसके own last name बाद marriage.
स्टोन 's organizational activities for the कारण of women 's rights yielded tangible gains in the difficult राजनैतिक environment of the 19th century.
Stone helped initiate the first नेशनल महिलाओं 's Rights Convention and वो supported and sustained it annually along with a number of अन्य local, राज्य and regional activist प्रथाओं.
स्टोन spoke in सामने of a number of विधान bodies to promote laws giving अधिक rights to महिलाओं.
She assisted in establishing the स्त्री 's National वफ़ादार लीग to help pass the तेरहवीं amendment और thereby abolish slavery, after which वो helped form the largest समूह of like-minded महिलाओं 's rights reformers, the नीतियां मॉडरेट अमरीकी स्त्री Suffrage संघ, जिससे worked लिये दशकों at the state level in favor of महिलाओं 's right to vote.
Stone लिखा extensively about a wide range of महिलाओं 's rights, publishing and distributing भाषणों by herself और अन्य, and convention कार्यवाही.
in the long-running और influential Woman 's Journal, a weekly periodical that she established and promoted, स्टोन aired दोनो उसके own and differing views परिचय महिलाओं 's अधिकारों.
पुकारा `` the orator '' and `` the morning star of the स्त्री 's rights गति '', Stone delivered a वाक which sparked Susan B. Anthony to take up the cause of महिलाओं 's suffrage.
Elizabeth Cady Stanton लिखा that `` लुसी Stone थी the पहला person by जिसको the दिल of the American पब्लिक was deeply stirred on the स्त्री सवाल. ''
साथ, Anthony, Stanton, और Stone have महरूम पुकारा the 19th century `` triumvirate `` of women 's suffrage and feminism.
in finance, a bond is an यंत्र of indebtedness of the बंध issuer to the धारकों.
it is a कर्ज़ सुरक्षा, under which the issuer owes the holders a कर्ज़ और, depending on the शर्तें of the bond, is obliged to अदा them interest ( the coupon ) or to repay the प्रिंसिपल at a बाद तिथि, termed the परिपक्वता.
Interest is usually payable at fixed intervals ( semiannual, सालाना, sometimes मासिक ).
बहुत प्रायः the बंध is negotiable, i.e. the ownership of the instrument can be transferred in the secondary मार्केट.
यूँ a bond is a form of ऋण or iou : the holder of the बंध is the lender ( creditor ), the जारीकर्ता of the bond is the borrower ( debtor ), and the coupon is the interest.
Bonds provide the borrower साथ external funds to finance long-term निवेश, or, in the मामला of सरकारी bonds, to finance current expenditure.
Certificates of deposit ( cds ) or छोटी पद वाणिज्यिक paper are considered to be money market instruments और नहीं bonds : the main अंतर is in the लंबाई of the पद of the instrument.
bonds और स्टॉक्स are दोनो securities, but the major अंतर between the two is that ( पूंजी ) stockholders have an इक्विटी stake in the company ( i.e. वे are owners ), whereas bondholders have a creditor हिस्सेदारी in the कम्पनी ( i.e. they हैं lenders ).
Another difference is that bonds usually have a defined पद, or maturity, बाद जिससे the बंध is redeemed, whereas stocks may be outstanding indefinitely.
an एक्सेप्शन is an irredeemable bond, ऐसे as consols, which is a perpetuity, i.e. a bond with no maturity.

इस model can be found inside the मीनार.

a scale मॉडल is a शारीरिक model, a प्रतिनिधित्व or copy of an ऑब्जेक्ट कि is larger or smaller than the वास्तविक आकार of the ऑब्जेक्ट, which seeks to maintain the relative proportions ( the scale फ़ैक्टर ) of the physical size of the original object.
बहुत often the स्केल model is used as a guide to making the object in पूरा size.
Scale मॉडल are निर्मित or collected for many reasons.
the Zune HD थी a पोर्टेबल media player in the zune उत्पाद परिवार released on सितंबर 15, 2009 by microsoft.
it थी a सीधा competitor with the Apple iPod और iPhone श्रेणी of मोबाईल devices.
it was initially released in 16 and 32 gb capacities.
A 64 gb version थी released on April 9, 2010.
It utilized a touchscreen इंटरफ़ेस for नेविगेशन और included Wi-Fi लिये synchronization, access to the Zune मार्केटप्लेस and वेब browsing.
The Zune hd utilized the nvidia Tegra apx 2600 chip, allowing it to खेल 720p वीडियो through the वैकल्पिक HDMI zune dock on a high-definition television.
वरना, content होता be scaled down to 480x272 pixels on the player 's oled touchscreen.
बूढ़ा Sparky, the इलेक्ट्रिक chair used at Sing Sing थाना
निष्पादन by electrocution, usually performed using an electric chair, is an निष्पादन method originating in the संयुक्त States in which the condemned person is strapped to a specially built लकड़ी chair and electrocuted through electrodes placed on the देह.
This निष्पादन method was created by कर्मचारी of Thomas Edison during the War of currents, and has been used only in the United राज्य and, लिये a period of several दशकों, in the Philippines ( its first उपयोग there in 1924 अंतर्गत American occupation, last in 1976 ).
Historically, once the condemned व्यक्ति was संलग्न to the कुर्सी, विभिन्न cycles ( differing in voltage and अवधि ) of alternating current would be passed through the व्यक्तिगत 's body, in order to cause fatal क्षति to the आतंरिक organs ( सहित the brain ).
The पहला jolt of इलेक्ट्रिक current was designed to कारण तात्कालिक unconsciousness और brain death ; the second one was designed to cause fatal damage to the vital अंगों.
मौत थी frequently caused by विद्युत overstimulation of the heart.
Although in the United States the electric कुर्सी has become a symbol of the मौत penalty, its उपयोग is in मनाही due to the rise of lethal injection, which is widely believed to be a more दयालु विधि of execution.
Although कुछ राज्य still maintain electrocution as a विधि of execution, आज it is only कायम as a secondary method that may be chosen over lethal injection at the request of the prisoner.
as of 2010, electrocution is an optional form of execution in अलबामा, फ्लोरिडा, South Carolina और Virginia.
They allow the prisoner to choose lethal इंजेक्शन as an वैकल्पिक method.
in the राज्य of Kentucky and टेनेसी, the electric chair रै महरूम retired except for those whose पूंजी अपराधों यहूद committed prior to legislated तिथियाँ in 1998 ( केंटकी : March 31, 1998 ; Tennessee : दिसम्बर 31, 1998 ) and who chose electrocution.
in दोनो राज्य, inmates who do not चुनें electrocution or inmates who वचनबद्ध उनके अपराधों after the designated तिथि हैं killed by lethal इंजेक्शन.
The इलेक्ट्रिक chair is an alternate form of execution approved for potential use in अरकंसास and ओक्लाहोमा if other forms of execution are found असंवैधानिक in the state at the समय of execution.
It is the sole विधि of निष्पादन in Vermont, where treason is the तभी capital crime.
On February 8, 2008, the नेब्रास्का Supreme अदालत determined that निष्पादन by इलेक्ट्रिक chair थी a `` cruel और unusual punishment '' under the राज्य 's constitution.
इस brought executions of this प्रकार to an end in नेब्रास्का, the only remaining राज्य to retain electrocution as इसके sole method of execution for हत्या.
the मेरीलैंड House of Delegates is the निम्नतर हाउस of the सामान्य सभा, the राज्य legislature of the American राज्य of मेरीलैंड, and is रचित of 141 delegates निर्वाचित इससे 47 districts.
The House of Delegates Chamber is located in the Maryland State House ( राज्य capitol ) on State Circle in annapolis, which is the state पूंजी.
The State House also houses the Maryland State Senate कक्ष और the कार्यालयों of the राज्यपाल and Lieutenant Governor of the State of Maryland.
Each Delegate has offices in Annapolis, in the nearby Casper R. Taylor, jr. हाउस Office भवन.
The Liberation of Paris ( also ज्ञात as the बैटल लिये पेरिस ) took प्लेस दौरान World युद्ध II from 19 August 1944 जबतक the surrender of the occupying जर्मनी garrison on 25 August.
The Liberation of पेरिस started with an uprising by the फ्रेंच प्रतिरोध विरूद्ध the German garrison.
on 24 August, the फ्रेंच Forces of the Interior ( Forces françaises de l'intérieur, FFI ) प्राप्त reinforcements from the फ़्री फ्रेंच फौज of मुक्ति और इससे the U.S. तीसरा फौज under General patton.
the पूंजी region of France था महरूम governed by Nazi जर्मनी since the हस्ताक्षर of the Second Compiègne armistice in जून 1940, when the जर्मनी फौज occupied northern and westernmost फ़्रांस, and जब the puppet regime of Vichy France was established in the town of Vichy in सेंट्रल फ़्रांस.
इस battle चिह्नित the liberation of Paris and the निर्वासन of the vichy सरकारी to sigmaringen in Germany.
however, there was still much भारी fighting to be done पहले France was liberated, including the अभियान in southern France during august-september ( in provence and extending into the southwestern प्रदेश of the vosges kyu ), साथ the german-held seaports of पश्चिमी फ़्रांस ( ऐसे as at brest and dunkirk ), in alsace and Lorraine in eastern France, और in northeastern फ़्रांस, such as along the Rhine और Moder Rivers.
The German फौज and SS fought doggedly in ये क्षेत्रों for the remainder of 1944 और into 1945.
`` Feelin ' Alright ? '' also known as `` अहसास Alright '' is a सोंग लिखा by Dave मेसन of the English rock बैंड Traffic from their eponymous 1968 album, Traffic.
The सोंग थी भी a hit सिंगल for several performers : जो Cocker ( 1969, # 69, recharted in 1972, US # 33 ), mongo santamaría ( 1969, # 95 ) and Grand दुर्गंध रेलरोड ( 1971, US # 54 ).
it has also been अंकित by Three श्वान रात्रि ( 1969 ), The 5th आयाम ( 1970 ), लू राल्स, Freddie किंग, Paul Weller, Lulu, Chairmen of the फलक ( 1970 ), Rare Earth, The Electric Concept Orchestra, माँ 's Finest ( 1973 ), the ओहियो Players ( 1971 ), Diana रॉस साथ the Jackson 5 ( 1971 ), Maceo Parker, Gladys Knight & the pips, फैली दहशत and the ब्लैक Crowes.
A Steel ढोल version by Trinidad Oil Company was reissued on the dancefloor jazz compilation Blue रस 2.
it थी also प्रदर्शित in the 2000 film duets, sung by huey Lewis.
Both the original और the Joe Cocker कवर were featured in the फिल्म उड़ान, starring Denzel Washington.
Devon Werkheiser ( born March 8,1991 ) is an अमरीकी actor, voice actor, singer, songwriter और musician, best known लिये उसके starring role as ned Bigby on the निकलोडियन sitcom Ned 's Declassified स्कूल अस्तित्व मार्गदर्शिका and for his role in the 2007 TV फिल्म Shredderman नियम, as the lead अक्षर नोलन byrd.

Sample view of an इलेक्ट्रॉनिक स्वास्थ्य record based on बिंब
Sample दृश्य of an electronic स्वास्थ्य record
an electronic health record ( EHR ) is an evolving अवधारणा defined as a व्यवस्थित संग्रहण of electronic स्वास्थ्य सूचना परिचय individual patients or populations.
It is a रिकार्ड in digital स्वरूप कि is theoretically capable of being shared across different स्वास्थ्य care जमावट.
In some cases इस sharing can occur by way of network-connected enterprise-wide सूचना systems and other सूचना संजाल or exchanges.
EHRs may include a दायरा of data, including demographics, medical इतिहास, दवा and allergies, immunization status, प्रयोगशाला test परिणाम, radiology बिंब, vital signs, personal आंकड़े like age और weight, and billing information.
ऋण origination is the प्रक्रम by which a borrower applies लिये a new loan, और a lender प्रक्रियाओं कि अनुप्रयोग.
Origination generally शामिल all the कदम from taking a ऋण अनुप्रयोग up to disbursal of funds ( or declining the application ).
Loan सर्विसिंग covers everything after disbursing the funds until the ऋण is fully paid off.
Loan origination is a specialized version of नई account खोलने लिये financial सेवाएं organizations.
निश्चित people और organizations specialize in ऋण origination.
बंधक brokers और अन्य mortgage originator कंपनियाँ serve as a prominent उदाहरण.
There are many अलग types of लोन.
लिये अधिक information on loan प्रकार, देखिए the loan and consumer lending आलेख.
कदम involved in originating a loan vary by loan type, विभिन्न kinds of ऋण risk, regulator, lender policy, and other factors.
Top बाएँ : The Tennessee घाटी Authority, भाग of the New Deal, being signed into विधि in 1933.
Top सही : फ्रैंकलिन delano रूज़वेल्ट, जो थी जिम्मेदार लिये initiatives और programs collectively ज्ञात as the नई सौदे.
नीचे : a पब्लिक भित्ति इससे one of the artists employed by the New सौदे.
The New Deal was a श्रेणी of आर्थिक programs enacted in the संयुक्त राज्य between 1933 and 1936.
They involved presidential executive आदेश or laws passed by कॉंग्रेस during the first पद of अध्यक्ष Franklin D. Roosevelt.
The कार्यक्रम were in response to the ग्रेट Depression, and focused on कया historians call the `` 3 rs '' : Relief, Recovery, और Reform.
That is राहत लिये the बेरोजगार and poor ; रिकवरी of the economy to सामान्य स्तर ; and Reform of the वित्तीय प्रणाली to prevent a repeat अवसाद.
The नई Deal उत्पादित a political realignment, making the Democratic Party the बहुमत ( as well as the party that आयोजित the श्वेत हाउस for सात आउट of नौ Presidential terms from 1933 to 1969 ), with its base in liberal ideas, the white South, traditional Democrats, बिग city मशीने, और the newly सशक्त labor संघ और ethnic अल्पसंख्यकों.
The republicans यहूद विभाजित, साथ conservatives opposing the entire New Deal as an enemy of कारोबार और growth, and उदारवादियों accepting some of it and promising to make it अधिक कुशल.
the realignment crystallized into the नई सौदे गठबन्धन that वर्चस्व सबसे presidential elections into the 1960s, while the opposition रूढ़िवादी Coalition largely controlled Congress from 1937 to 1963.
By 1936 the term `` liberal '' typically थी used for supporters of the नई सौदे, and `` conservative `` लिये इसके प्रतिद्वंद्वियों.
इससे 1934 to 1938, रूज़वेल्ट थी assisted in his endeavours by a “pro-spender” majority in Congress ( drawn from two-party, competitive, non-machine, प्रगतिशील, और Left party जिले ).
as noted by Alexander Hicks, “roosevelt, समर्थित by rare, non-southern Democrat majorities — 270 non-Southern Democrat representatives and 71 non-Southern Democrat senators — spelled दूसरी New Deal reform.”
Many इतिहासकारों distinguish between a `` पहला नई Deal '' ( 1933–34 ) and a `` Second नई Deal '' ( 1935–38 ), with the दूसरी one more liberal और more controversial.
The `` First New Deal '' ( 1933–34 ) dealt with विविध समूह, from banking and railroads to उद्योग and खेती, सब of which मांगे help for आर्थिक survival.
The Federal आपात राहत प्रशासन, for उदाहरण, provided $ 500 million for राहत परिचालन by states and शहरों, while the short-lived CWA ( सिविल works Administration ) gave बस्तियों money to operate make-work projects in 1933-34.
The `` दूसरी नई Deal `` in 1935–38 शामिल the वेगनर Act to प्रचार मजदूर unions, the works Progress Administration ( WPA ) relief कार्यक्रम ( which बना the federal सरकारी by far the largest single employer in the nation ), the Social Security Act, and नई कार्यक्रम to सहायता tenant farmers और migrant मजदूर.
The final प्रमुख items of New सौदे विधान were the creation of the संयुक्त States Housing Authority and Farm Security Administration, both in 1937, और the Fair Labor मानकों Act of 1938, जिससे set अधिकतम घंटों and न्यूनतम wages for most categories of workers.
The economic downturn of 1937–38, and the bitter विभाजित between the AFL and CIO labor unions led to प्रमुख Republican gains in कॉंग्रेस in 1938.
Conservative Republicans and Democrats in Congress joined in the अनौपचारिक Conservative गठबन्धन.
By 1942–43 they shut down relief कार्यक्रम such as the WPA and ccc and blocked प्रमुख liberal प्रस्ताव.
रूज़वेल्ट himself turned his ध्यान to the युद्ध effort, and won reelection in 1940 and 1944.
The Supreme Court घोषित the National Recovery Administration ( nra ) और the पहला version of the agricultural समायोजन Act ( AAA ) unconstitutional, however the AAA was rewritten और तब upheld.
as the first Republican अध्यक्ष निर्वाचित बाद FDR, ड्वाइट D. आइज़नहावर ( 1953–61 ) left the नई Deal largely बरकरार, भी expanding it in कुछ क्षेत्रों.
In the 1960s, Lyndon B. Johnson 's ग्रेट Society प्रयुक्त the New सौदे as inspiration for a नाटकीय expansion of उदार programs, which रिपब्लिकन Richard M. Nixon generally retained.
बाद 1974, however, the कॉल for deregulation of the economy gained bipartisan support.
The नई सौदे विनियमन of बैंकिंग ( Glass–Steagall अधिनियम ) थी निलंबित in the 1990s.
Many नई Deal कार्यक्रम remain active, with कुछ still operating अंतर्गत the original names, including the Federal जमा Insurance Corporation ( FDIC ), the Federal Crop बीमे Corporation ( fcic ), the संघीय Housing Administration ( fha ), and the Tennessee Valley प्राधिकार ( त्व ).
The largest कार्यक्रम still in existence आज are the Social Security System और the Securities और Exchange Commission ( SEC ).
A स्त्री ( ), pl : महिलाओं ( ) is a female इंसान.
the पद स्त्री is प्रायः सुरक्षित for an adult, साथ the term लड़की being the usual term for a female चाइल्ड or adolescent.
however, the पद woman is भी sometimes used to identify a female human, regardless of आयु, as in phrases such as `` Women 's अधिकारों ``.
महिलाओं हैं typically सक्षम of giving birth, though older महिलाओं जो have गए through रजोनिवृत्ति और कुछ intersex women can not.
`` i do n't Want to Miss a Thing '' is a सोंग performed by American rock बैंड एरोस्मिथ for the 1998 film Armageddon.
Written by Diane Warren, the song debuted at number one on the Billboard Hot 100 ( the first # 1 for the band after 28 years together ).
The song ठहरे at क्रमांक एक लिये four weeks from September 5 to सितंबर 26, 1998.
the सोंग also stayed at number 1 for several सप्ताह in several other countries.
in the uk, the song peaked at number four, बनने Aerosmith 's उच्चतम charting सोंग in the uk, जहाँ it थी the 17th best-selling सिंगल of 1998, और has बेची over a million copies.
Although not प्रयुक्त by the majority of the संसार 's countries, daylight saving समय is आम in the Western संसार.
Daylight छायांकन time ( DST ) —also summer time in अंग्रेजों English — is the practice of advancing clocks during the हल्का months so that evenings have more daylight and mornings have कम.
typically clocks are समायोजित forward एक hour near the start of spring and हैं समायोजित पिछड़ा in पतझड़.
The modern idea of daylight saving was first प्रस्तावित in 1895 by George Vernon हडसन and it was first implemented during the First World युद्ध.
Many देशों have प्रयुक्त it at विभिन्न टाइम्स since then.
Much of the United राज्य प्रयुक्त DST in the 1950s और 1960s, and dst use विस्तारित following the 1970s energy crisis and रै been widely used in North अमेरिका and Europe since तब.
The अभ्यास रै महरूम both praised and criticized.
adding daylight to evenings benefits retailing, खेल, और अन्य activities that exploit sunlight बाद working hours, but can cause समस्याएं for evening entertainment and other occupations tied to the sun.
हालांकि an early goal of dst थी to reduce evening usage of incandescent lighting ( formerly a primary use of विद्युत ), आधुनिक हीटिंग और cooling usage patterns differ greatly, और शोध परिचय how dst फिलहाल affects energy उपयोग is सीमित or contradictory.
DST clock shifts उपस्थित अन्य चुनौतियां.
They complicate timekeeping, and can disrupt meetings, सफर, बिलिंग, record keeping, चिकित्सा डिवाइस, heavy उपकरण, और नींद patterns.
Software can often adjust कंप्यूटर घड़ियाँ automatically, but this can be सीमित and error-prone, particularly जब dst तिथियाँ हैं changed.
Floorplan of the Château de montargis
montargis is a कम्यून in the loiret विभाग in north-central France on the Loing नदी.
The town is located about south of Paris and ईस्ट of orléans in the gâtinais.
Montargis is the second largest city in the Loiret, after orléans.
It is near a विशाल forest, और contains light industry और farming, सहित केसरिया.
due to इसके numerous canals and पुलों, Montargis sometimes bills itself as the `` वेनिस of the gâtinais. ''
हालांकि काफी modern, it retains a medieval charm in इसके downtown area.
in कंप्यूटर storage, a लॉजिकल unit number, or LUN, is a number used to identify a logical ईकाई, which is a यंत्र addressed by the SCSI protocol or प्रोटोकॉल which encapsulate scsi, such as Fibre चैनल or iSCSI.
A LUN may be used साथ कोई device which supports read/write परिचालन, such as a tape ड्राइव, लकिन is most often used to refer to a logical disk as created on a SAN.
हालांकि not technically सही, the पद `` LUN '' is प्रायः also प्रयुक्त to refer to the logical disk itself.
The Gospel according to Mark (,, to euangelion kata Markon ), commonly shortened to the Gospel of चिह्नित or simply चिह्नित, is the second book of the नई Testament.
This canonical खाता of the जीवन of Jesus of Nazareth is one of the three synoptic gospels.
it was thought to be an निचोड़, which accounts लिये its place as the second इन्जील in the Bible.
However, सबसे contemporary scholars अभी regard it as the earliest of the canonical gospels ( c 70 ).
That चिह्नित was प्रयुक्त as a सोर्स लिये the other synoptic gospels इन्जील of मैथ्यू and इन्जील of Luke is widely आयोजित by अनेक, हालांकि नहीं सब, नई Testament scholars.
The Gospel of चिह्नित narrates the Ministry of Jesus from his baptism by John the बैपटिस्ट to उसके मौत and resurrection.
It focuses particularly on the last week of his जीवन ( अध्याय 11–16 ) in जेरूसलम.
Its swift narrative portrays यीशु as a वीर man of कार्रवाई, an exorcist, healer and miracle कार्यकर्ता.
an important theme of चिह्नित is the मुक्तिदाता Secret.
Jesus silences the demoniacs he heals, कोशिशें unsuccessfully to रखना his मुक्तिदाता identity रहस्य, और conceals his message साथ parables.
meanwhile, the disciples fail to समझे both the implication of the miracles of यीशु and the meaning of the things he predicts परिचय उसके arrest, मौत और क़यामत.
सबसे विद्वानों मानना that the original text of the gospel ends at Mark 16:8 with the डिस्कवरी of Jesus ' empty मकबरा and कि the following account of his क़यामत appearances is a later जोड.
According to tradition and कुछ early church लेखक, the author is चिह्नित the इंजीलवादी, the companion of the apostle पीटर.
The इन्जील, however, appears to rely on several underlying स्त्रोत, varying in form and in theology, which tells विरूद्ध the tradition that the gospel थी आधारित on पीटर 's preaching.
The text is a compilation which may include eye-witness accounts as well as ज्ञात apostolic preachings, and pre-existing written रिकॉर्ड that do नहीं मौजूद आज लकिन can be पुष्टि इससे 2nd-century commentators.
Some of the कहानियां in the इन्जील may have been transmitted orally पहले being written down.
Various तत्व within the इन्जील suggest that the author लिखा in Syria or फिलिस्तीन for a non-Jewish Christian community.
the रब of the Rings is an epic high fantasy novel लिखा by अंग्रेज़ी भाषाशास्त्री and विश्वविद्यालयों of Oxford प्राध्यापक J. R. R. tolkien.
The story began as a sequel to Tolkien 's 1937 children 's काल्पनिक novel the होब्बिट, but आखिरकार विकसित into a much larger कार्य.
It was written in stages between 1937 and 1949, much of it during संसार War II.
It is the दूसरी best-selling अनोखा कभी written, with over 150 million copies sold.
The title of the अनोखा refers to the स्टोरी 's प्रमुख विपक्षी, the अंधेरा Lord Sauron, who had in an earlier age निर्मित the एक Ring to rule the other बजती of Power as the परम weapon in उसके अभियान to जीतें and rule सब of middle-earth.
From quiet beginnings in the शायर, a Hobbit land नहीं unlike the अंग्रेज़ी countryside, the story ranges आरपार north-west middle-earth, following the course of the युद्ध of the Ring through the आँखें of इसके characters, notably the hobbits frodo baggins, Samwise `` Sam '' gamgee, meriadoc `` Merry '' brandybuck and Peregrin `` pippin '' Took, लकिन भी the hobbits ' मुख्य allies and यात्राएं companions : Aragorn, a इंसान रेंजर ; boromir, a man from Gondor ; Gimli, a Dwarf योद्धा ; legolas, an Elven prince ; and gandalf, a Wizard.
The work was initially intended by tolkien to be एक volume of a two-volume set, with the other होने The Silmarillion, but this विचार थी dismissed by उसके प्रकाशक.
it was decided for आर्थिक reasons to प्रकाशित The Lord of the बजती as तीन आयतन over the course of a साल from 29 July 1954 to 20 October 1955, यूँ creating the now परिचित Lord of the बजती trilogy.
the three आयतन were हकदार The Fellowship of the Ring, The Two Towers, and the Return of the King.
Structurally, the novel is विभाजित internally into six books, दो per volume, with अनेक appendices of background material शामिल at the end of the third volume.
the Lord of the Rings रै since महरूम reprinted numerous टाइम्स और translated into अनेक languages.
Tolkien 's कार्य has been the subject of extensive analysis of its themes and origins.
Although a प्रमुख work in itself, the story थी तभी the पिछला movement of a larger एपिक tolkien had worked on since 1917, in a process he वर्णित as mythopoeia.
Influences on this earlier कार्य, and on the story of The Lord of the बजती, शामिल philology, mythology, religion और the author 's distaste लिये the प्रभाव of industrialization, as खूब as पहले काल्पनिक works and Tolkien 's experiences in World War i.
The Lord of the Rings in its फेरे is माना to have had a ग्रेट effect on modern fantasy ; the प्रभाव of Tolkien 's works is ऐसे that the use of the words `` Tolkienian '' और `` Tolkienesque '' have महरूम recorded in the Oxford English Dictionary.
the enduring popularity of The रब of the बजती has led to numerous सन्दर्भ in लोकप्रिय culture, the founding of अनेक समाजों by fans of Tolkien 's works, and the publication of many books परिचय Tolkien और his works.
The Lord of the बजती has inspired, and continues to inspire, artwork, म्यूज़िक, films और television, वीडियो खेल, और subsequent साहित्य.
award-winning adaptations of the रब of the Rings have महरूम made for radio, theatre, और फिल्मी.
the following is an एपीसोड list लिये the Nickelodeon sitcom Drake & Josh.
the series debuted on जनवरी 11, 2004.

Drake घंटी, जोश Peck, and Miranda cosgrove यहूद the तभी अभिनेताओं to appear in all 60 एपीसोड.
the सैन फ्रांसिस्को 49ers conduct training camp at the team 's मुख्यालय and practice facility in Santa Clara, कैलिफ़ोर्निया in अगस्त 2010.
the offense is wearing रेड jerseys साथ the exception of क्वार्टरबैक Alex Smith, who is in a ब्लैक jersey ; the रक्षा in श्वेत.
In the National फ़ुटबॉल लीग, training camp refers to the समय before the ऋतु commences.
दौरान this time, teams will sometimes congregate at an outside location, usually a विश्वविद्यालयों, to conduct प्रशिक्षण शिविर for at least the पहला few weeks.
इस is समान to baseball 's spring training.
Training camp is used in अनेक different ways.
New players and coaches उपयोग it to acclimate themselves to नई teammates और प्रणालियों.
For younger खिलाड़ी, it serves as a period of evaluation ; लिये दिग्गजों, it is time to गोलाकार वापस into form.
प्रशिक्षण शिविर is विभाजित into several अलग components.
the first is scrimmages.
ये are pseudo-games where teams चलाएं nearly full खेल ' worth of plays.
sometimes, two practice sessions are held on the same day.
इस अवधारणा is referred to as two-a-days.
Other parts of प्रशिक्षण camp शामिल drills, बैठक with coaches और अन्य खिलाड़ी at one 's position, weight प्रशिक्षण, and pre-season games.
the latter half of training शिविर leads directly into the प्रदर्शनी season.
साथ एनएफएल प्रशिक्षण camps starting in late-July, the biggest चिंता has been निर्जलीकरण.
in 2001, Minnesota वाइकिंग्स खिलाड़ी korey Stringer died of a चिकित्सा condition based from dehydration और heatstroke.
The death of Stringer prompted the NFL to change their प्रशिक्षण policies.
at each practice, every team जरूर have the team डॉक्टर and trainers on the फ़ील्ड ; additionally, an ambulance must be उपस्थित दौरान practices.
With NFL training camps beginning in लेट July, severe weather can affect अभ्यास and प्रदर्शनी games.
In 2002, a Cleveland भूरा प्रदर्शनी खेल ended due to lightning निकट Cleveland भूरा Stadium, और कठोर तूफ़ान have महरूम known to disrupt training camps.
Fans हैं often able to visit their favorite टोली 's training camp to catch an जल्दी look at the खिलाड़ी ; admission to practices is often free or substantially less expensive than a game टिकट, बनाना training शिविर trips a popular विकल्प लिये fans who can नहीं attend अनेक खेल due to financial or अन्य reasons.
NFL teams often sell कलाकृतियां and concessions at camp साइट along साथ offering activities और कार्यक्रम to मेक training शिविर a more fan-friendly अनुभव.
in computing, a file system ( or filesystem ) is a प्रकार of data स्टोर जिससे can be used to store, retrieve and अद्यतन a नियत of फाइलें.
the term could refer to the अमूर्त data structures used to define files, or to the वास्तविक तन्त्र or firmware components that implement the अमूर्त ideas.
Some संचिका systems हैं used on local data भंडार devices ; अन्य provide file अभिगम via a network protocol ( e.g. NFS, smb, or 9p clients ).
कुछ संचिका प्रणालियों हैं `` आभासी '', in that the `` फाइलें '' supplied हैं computed on request ( e.g. procfs ) or are merely a मानचित्रण into a different file प्रणाली used as a backing स्टोर.
the file system manages access to both the content of files और the metadata परिचय those फाइलें.
it is जिम्मेदार लिये arranging भंडार स्पेस ; reliability, दक्षता, and tuning साथ regard to the शारीरिक storage medium are important design considerations.
William Howard Taft ( September 15, 1857 – March 8, 1930 ) was the 27th अध्यक्ष of the United राज्य ( 1909–1913 ) and later the tenth Chief इंसाफ of the United राज्य ( 1921–1930 ).
He is the only person to have served in दोनो of ये कार्यालयों.
Before becoming अध्यक्ष, Taft, a Republican, was selected to serve on the Superior अदालत of सिनसिनाटी in 1887.
in 1890, taft was appointed solicitor General of the United राज्य and in 1891 a judge on the United राज्य Court of appeals for the छठे सर्किट.
In 1900, अध्यक्ष William McKinley appointed Taft Governor-General of the फिलीपीन.
In 1904, President Theodore Roosevelt नियुक्त taft Secretary of War in an प्रयत्न to groom Taft, तब his बंद political ally, into his handpicked अध्यक्षीय successor.
Taft assumed a prominent role in problem solving, assuming on some occasions the भूमिका of एक्टिंग सचिव of राज्य, जबकि declining repeated offers from रूज़वेल्ट to serve on the Supreme Court.
Riding a वेव of लोकप्रिय support for fellow Republican Roosevelt, Taft won an easy victory in उसके 1908 bid for the presidency.
in उसके only term, taft 's domestic कार्यसूची emphasized trust-busting, सिविल service reform, strengthening the Interstate Commerce आयोग, improving the performance of the postal service, और ड्योढ़ी of the सोलहवीं Amendment.
Abroad, taft sought to further the economic विकास of nations in लैटिन America and एशिया through `` Dollar Diplomacy ``, और showed decisiveness and संयम in जवाब to revolution in Mexico.
the task-oriented taft थी बेख़बर to the राजनैतिक ramifications of उसके decisions, प्रायः alienated उसके अपना key constituencies, and थी overwhelmingly पराजित in उसके bid for a second पद in the presidential election of 1912.
In सर्वेक्षण of अध्यक्षीय विद्वानों, Taft is usually क्रमित निकट the मध्य of सूचियाँ of all American राष्ट्रपतियों.
After leaving office, Taft खर्च his time in academia, मध्यस्थता, and the search for world सलाम through his self-founded League to Enforce Peace.
In 1921, after the First World युद्ध, President वारेन G. Harding appointed Taft मुख्य Justice of the United राज्य.
Taft परोसा in this capacity until shortly before उसके death in 1930.
The टेन Commandments is a 1956 epic फिल्मी produced and निर्देशित by सेसिल B. demille that dramatized the biblical story of the Exodus, in which the hebrew-born Moses, an adopted मिश्र प्रिंस, becomes the deliverer of the Hebrew स्लेव.
it starred चार्ल्टन Heston in the lead role, Yul brynner as his adoptive brother, Pharaoh rameses II, Anne Baxter as Nefretiri, एडवर्ड G. रॉबिन्सन as Dathan, Yvonne De Carlo as sephora, Debra पेजेट as Lilia, और जॉन Derek as Joshua.
The supporting cast शामिल सर Cedric Hardwicke as Pharaoh Seti i, Nina Foch as Bithiah, Martha स्कॉट as yoshebel, Judith Anderson as Memnet, Vincent Price as Baka, and John carradine as Aaron.
the फिल्मी was released by Paramount तस्वीरें in VistaVision on October 5, 1956.
The Ten Commandments, which DeMille narrated, was the पिछला फिल्मी that he directed.
He थी नियत to direct the 1958 remake of his 1938 film the Buccaneer, but उसके final बीमारी forced him to relinquish the directing chores to his son-in-law, कर्ता एंथोनी Quinn.
demille था भी planned to film the life of रब Baden Powell, the founder of the स्काउट movement, with David Niven ; इस project was never एहसास.
the Ten Commandments is a आंशिक remake of demille 's 1923 silent film.
Some of the cast and crew of the 1956 version worked on the असली.
It रै चूंकि been remade as a television miniseries broadcast in अप्रैल 2006.
The Ten Commandments is one of the most financially कामयाब films कभी made, grossing over $ 65 लाख at the U.S. बक्सा दफ्तर.
Adjusting for inflation, this makes it the छठे highest-grossing film domestically, साथ an समायोजित कुल of $ 1,025,730,000 in 2012.
the box दफ्तर website `` The Numbers '' lists the घरेलू सकल at $ 80 लाख.
In 1999, The Ten आयतें was चयनित for संरक्षण in the United States नेशनल फिल्मी Registry by the पुस्तकालयों of Congress as being `` culturally, historically, or aesthetically significant ''.
In जून 2008, the अमरीकी फिल्मी Institute revealed इसके `` टेन शीर्ष Ten `` —the बेहतरीन टेन films in ten अमरीकी फिल्मी genres—after polling over 1,500 people from the रचनात्मक जातियाँ.
The Ten आयतें थी listed as the tenth बेहतरीन फिल्मी in the एपिक विधा.
the film received seven Academy Award nominations including Best Picture, और जीती the Academy Award लिये बेहतरीन विज़ुअल Effects.
Charlton Heston was nominated लिये a Golden Globe Award लिये बेहतरीन Motion चित्र कर्ता in the drama श्रेणी.
yul brynner जीती the National फलक of पुनर्विलोकन Award for Best कर्ता for his role as Rameses, along with उसके other roles in The King और i और Anastasia.
Louisville (, or ) is a major नगर and the largest city in the U.S. राज्य of केंटकी और the county seat of जेफरसन काउंटी.
चूंकि 2003, the नगर 's borders have महरूम साथ those of the काउंटी because of a city-county विलय.
The city 's total संचित population at the 2010 census थी 741,096 ( Louisville 's balance कुल, 602,011, excludes semi-autonomous towns और is the population listed in सबसे स्त्रोत और national rankings ).
As of 2010, the Louisville metropolitan area ( MSA ) था a population of 1,307,647 रैंकिंग 42nd nationally.
the metro area includes Louisville-Jefferson County और 12 surrounding काउंटी, eight in केंटकी and four in Southern Indiana ( see Geography below ).
The Louisville संयुक्त सांख्यिकीय Area, having a population of 1,451,564, includes the एमएसए, Hardin काउंटी and larue काउंटी in केंटकी, और स्कॉट County, Indiana.
an important आतंरिक shipping port in the 19th century, louisville today is best known as the स्थान of the Kentucky डर्बी, the first of तीन annual thoroughbred horse races making up the ट्रिपल Crown.
A ठेठ experimental setup for an aldol reaction.
दोनो flasks are submerged in a dry ice/acetone कूलिंग नहाना ( −78 °C ) the temperature of which is होने monitored by a तापयुग्म ( the wire on the left ).
A कूलिंग नहाना, in laboratory chemistry ( प्रायः but नहीं always organic chemistry ) practice, is a liquid mixture which is used to maintain low temperatures, typically between 13 °C और −196 °C.
ये कम temperatures are used to collect liquids after distillation, to हटाएँ सॉल्वैंट्स using a rotary evaporator, or to perform a रासायनिक प्रतिक्रिया नीचे room तापमान ( देखिए : kinetic control ).
कूलिंग baths हैं generally one of दो प्रकार : ( a ) a cold द्रव ( particularly द्रव nitrogen, जल, or भी air ) — but most commonly the term refers to ( b ) a mixture of 3 components : ( 1 ) a cooling एजेंट ( such as शुष्क ice or जल ice ) ; ( b ) a liquid 'carrier ' ( such as द्रव जल, ethylene glycol, acetone, इत्यादि. ), जिससे हस्तांतरण heat between the नहाना और the पोत ; ; and ( c ) an योगात्मक to depress the melting-point of the solid/liquid प्रणाली.
( a familiar उदाहरण of this is the use of an ice/rock-salt mixture to freeze ice cream.
The phase-change of ice into द्रव water requires उर्जा, 'pulling ' heat from the system.
adding salt lowers the temp at जिससे इस happens, अर्थ अधिक उर्जा has to be अवशोषित इससे the environment in अनुक्रम to melt the बर्फ.
This effectively makes the बर्फ 'colder ' — it जरूर 'pull ' अधिक ऊष्मा इससे its environment to become liquid. )
खाने विकार are conditions defined by abnormal eating habits that may involve either अपर्याप्त or excessive food सेवन to the detriment of an व्यक्तिगत 's physical और mental स्वास्थ्य.
Bulimia nervosa and एनोरेक्सिया नर्वोज़ा are the सबसे common specific forms in the संयुक्त Kingdom.
अन्य प्रकार of eating विकार शामिल binge eating विकार and eating विकार नहीं otherwise specified.
Bulimia नर्वोज़ा is a disorder characterized by binge eating and purging.
Purging can include self-induce vomiting, over-exercising, और the usage of diuretics, enemas, और laxatives.
Anorexia नर्वोज़ा is characterized by extreme खाना restriction to the पाइंट of self-starvation और excessive वज़न घाटा.
Though primarily thought of as affecting females ( an अनुमानित 5–10 million होने affected in the U.K. ), eating disorders affect males as खूब.
an estimated 10 – 15 % of लोगों with eating विकार are males ( Gorgan, 1999 ).
( an estimated 1 लाख u.K. males होने प्रभावित ).
Although eating disorders are increasing सब over the world among both men और महिलाओं, वहीँ is evidence to suggest कि it is women in the पश्चिमी संसार जो are at the highest risk of developing them और the उपाधि of westernization increases the risk.
nearly हाफ of all अमेरिकी personally जान किसी with an eating disorder.
The skill to comprehend the central processes of appetite has increased tremendously since leptin was खोजा, और the skill to observe the कृत्यों of the brain as well.
Interactions between प्रेरक, homeostatic and self-regulatory control प्रक्रियाओं are शामिल in खाने आचरण, which is a key घटक in eating disorders.
the precise cause of खाने disorders is not entirely understood, but there is evidence that it may be linked to other चिकित्सा conditions and परिस्थितियों.
सांस्कृतिक idealization of thinness and youthfulness have contributed to eating विकार affecting विविध populations.
One study showed that girls साथ ADHD have a वृहद chance of getting an eating disorder than those not प्रभावित by ADHD.
another study suggested that women with PTSD, especially due to sexually सम्बन्धित trauma, हैं अधिक likely to develop anorexia nervosa.
One study showed कि फोस्टर लड़कियों are अधिक संभावित to develop bulimia nervosa.
Some सोचो that पीर pressure and idealized body-types seen in the मीडिया हैं also a significant फ़ैक्टर.
Some research show कि for निश्चित people there हैं genetic reasons क्यों they may be prone to विकासशील an खाने विकार.
हाल studies have found प्रमाण a correlation between patients with bulimia nervosa and substance use विकार.
in addition, चिंता disorders and व्यक्तित्व disorders are common आवृत्ति साथ clients of खाने disorders.
जबकि उचित treatment can be अत्यधिक effective for अनेक कष्ट from specific types of खाने विकार, the consequences of eating disorders can be कठोर, including मौत ( whether इससे direct medical effects of disturbed खाने habits or from comorbid conditions ऐसे as suicidal thinking ).
Slavery in the United States existed इससे the early सालो of the colonial काल ; it थी firmly established by the समय the United States sought independence इससे Great ब्रिटेन in 1776.
However, by 1804, all राज्य उत्तर of the मेसन and Dixon लकीर था either abolished slavery outright or passed laws लिये the gradual abolition of गुलामी.
In 1787 कॉंग्रेस prohibited slavery in the Northwest territory.
But slavery gained new life in the दक्षिण with the cotton industry after 1800, और expanded into the Southwest.
The nation थी polarized into slave and free states along the Mason-Dixon Line, जिससे separated Pennsylvania and Maryland.
the United States and Great Britain दोनो निषिद्ध the अंतरराष्ट्रीय स्लेव trade in 1808, but the domestic व्यापार, with बिक्री to the गहन दक्षिण, विस्तारित dramatically, and many captives were shipped by the coastwise स्लेव trade.
पहले the 1840s, the South was vigorously defending गुलामी और इसके expansion into the territories.
in the उत्तर कुछ abolitionists denounced it as गुनाहगार, and numerous anti-slavery शक्तियां अस्वीकृत it as हानिकारक to the rights of free men.
After failed compromises and Abraham lincoln 's election, in 1861 ग्यारह slave states broke away to form the Confederate States of America, अग्रणी to the American Civil War.
the federal government in 1862 made abolition of गुलामी a युद्ध लक्ष्य.
in January 1863 President lincoln freed स्लेव in the confederacy through the emancipation उदघोषणा.
बाद the war, the Thirteenth Amendment, effective दिसम्बर 1865, abolished slavery throughout the entire United States, including the Border states and the भारतीय territories.
From the 16th to the 19th सदियां, an अनुमानित 12 लाख Africans यहूद shipped as स्लेव to the americas.
See Slavery in the americas.
The great majority went to the शुगर plantations of the West इंडीज or Brazil, where मृत्यु was high.
About 645,000 यहूद brought to कया is now the संयुक्त States.
By the 1860 संयुक्त States जनसांख्यिकी, the slave जनसांख्यिकी in the American South था grown to चार million.
of सब 1,515,605 परिवारों in the 15 slave states, nearly 400,000 held slaves ( roughly one in चार ), amounting to 8 % of all अमरीकी families.
जबकि कुछ slaves worked as house servants and शहरी शिल्पकार, the great बहुमत worked on बागानों or large खेतो, cultivating lucrative cash crops, ऐसे as rice, tobacco, sugar और, after 1800, chiefly cotton.
By 1860 most slaves were held in the Deep South, where they served in work-gangs ; two-thirds worked in cotton.
In छोटी परिचालन, वे worked with their स्वामी.
In large plantations they were directed by white paid overseers.
Under the system that became chattel गुलामी ( ownership of a human being, and of his/her वंशजों ), a जातिगत element was fundamental : slaves यहूद blacks of अफ़्रीकी descent and owned, almost universally, by whites of European descent.
In the 17th century, Virginia, followed by other दक्षिणी colonies, enacted law that children of स्लेव mothers यहूद born into slavery.
स्लेव could gain freedom only by running दूर ( which थी मुश्किल और illegal to do ), or by manumission by owners, which थी regulated by राज्य, and became increasingly मुश्किल or prohibited.
In the earliest era of chattel slavery, the colonies also व्यवस्थित work by a प्रणाली of bonded मजदूर known as indentured servitude.
इस typically lasted for several years लिये both ग़रीब europeans and Africans alike, to pay off the costs of transport to the colonies.
They contracted for such इंतजाम because of poor economies in their home countries.
between 1680 और 1700, as fewer Europeans migrated to the colonies, planters began to import more africans as slaves.
recognizing the importance of slavery, the हाउस of Burgesses in Virginia enacted a new slave code in 1705 ; it combined a variety of legislation और added new प्रावधानों enforcing white supremacy in the law.
Schematic क्रॉस section of part of leaf, xylem shown as रेड circles at figure 8.
Xylem is one of the two types of हस्तांतरण ऊतक in vascular पौधे ( फ्लोएम is the अन्य ).
The शब्द xylem is derived इससे the Greek word ξύλον ( xylon ), meaning `` लकडी '' ; the best-known जाइलम tissue is wood, हालांकि it is मिला throughout the संयंत्र.
Its मौलिक फलन is to transport water, लकिन it also transports कुछ nutrients through the संयंत्र.
This clock representation shows कुछ of the प्रमुख units of geological समय and definitive कार्यक्रम of Earth history.
The hadean इओन represents the time before चट्टान record of जीवन on Earth ; इसके अपर boundary is now regarded as 4.0 ga ( अरब सालो ago ).
अन्य subdivisions प्रतिबिंबित the evolution of जीवन ; the archean और proterozoic are दोनो eons, the Palaeozoic, Mesozoic and Cenozoic are eras of the Phanerozoic इओन.
The दो million साल quaternary काल, the time of recognizable इंसानो, is too छोटी to be दृश्य at इस स्केल.
The geologic समय scale is a system of कालानुक्रमिक measurement कि relates स्तरिकी to समय, and is प्रयुक्त by geologists, paleontologists, and अन्य धरती scientists to describe the timing and संबंध between कार्यक्रम that have occurred throughout Earth 's history.
the तालिका of geologic time spans प्रस्तुत यहाँ agrees साथ the dates and nomenclature set forth by the International आयोग on स्तरिकी standard रंग कोड of the International आयोग on Stratigraphy.
Evidence from radiometric डेटिंग indicates कि the धरती is about 4.54 अरब years बूढ़ा.
the geology or गहन time of Earth 's past has महरूम organized into various units according to events which took place in each period.
Different spans of समय on the gts are प्रायः delimited by changes in the composition of strata जिससे correspond to them, indicating major geological or paleontological events, ऐसे as mass extinctions.
For example, the boundary between the Cretaceous period and the paleogene काल is पारिभाषित by the Cretaceous–Paleogene extinction event, which marked the निधन of the dinosaurs और अनेक अन्य groups of जीवन.
पुरानी time spans which predate the reliable चट्टान record ( before the Proterozoic Eon ) are defined by absolute age.
The TI-82 is a graphing calculator made by टेक्सास Instruments.
The TI-82 थी designed in 1993 as a stripped down, more उपयोक्ता friendly संस्करण of the TI-85, and as a replacement for the TI-81.
It was the direct predecessor of the TI-83.
it साझा साथ the TI-85 a 6 mhz zilog Z80 माइक्रोप्रोसेसर.

The डाल of characters of the किंग of Fighters XI.
The King of Fighters fighting game श्रेणी, उत्पादित by SNK Playmore, शामिल a wide डाल of characters, some of which हैं taken इससे अन्य snk games.
The story takes place in a fictional ब्रह्मांड in which an annual श्रेणी of 3-on-3 or 4-on-4 लड़ tournaments are आयोजित.
the पहला game in the series introduces the आरंभिक main character of the series, Kyo Kusanagi, a young जापानी fighter who is the heir to a powerful group of martial artists having pyrokinetic abilities.
Kyo fights विरूद्ध the Kusanagi गोत्र 's enemies, his rival Iori Yagami, and the परमेश्वर orochi and its इंसान followers, among अन्य.
The पहला four games in the श्रेणी revolve about these fights, while the King of सेनानी '99 introduces a नई story arc, revolving around K ', a young man जो seeks to destroy the रहस्यमय nests संगठन because they kidnapped उसे at an जल्दी age और stripped him of his past memories, so कि they could force him to be a सेनानी under उनके control.
in the King of सेनानी 2003, a new character नामित राख crimson enters the टूर्नामेंट, to steal the शक्तियां of the clans who sealed the orochi in the पास्ट for an unknown कारण.
a new समूह of antagonists, known as Those इससे the Past, also appears in the series ; वे want to obtain orochi 's शक्ति for the purpose of giving it to their unknown निपुण.
the plot और the characters came इससे the Yamata no orochi लेजेंड.
There are भी several characters in the खेल that are parodies or homages to several popular anime, manga, और films.
Merchandise आधारित on the characters रै also महरूम released, including action आंकड़े and keychains.
The characters have garnered praise from several वीडियो game publications for the quality of उनके डिजाइन और movesets.
टिप्पणी focused on the lack of improvements in some of the वर्ण, but added that the roster is greatly diverse.
Whale Wars is a साप्ताहिक अमरीकी documentary-style reality television series that premiered on November 7, 2008 on the Animal Planet केबल channel.

On जनवरी 5, 2013, Animal Planet renewed the series लिये a sixth season.
The Harpy Eagle ( Harpia harpyja ) is a neotropical प्रजाति of eagle.
it is sometimes ज्ञात as the American Harpy Eagle to फर्क it इससे the Papuan Eagle जिससे is sometimes ज्ञात as the New Guinea Harpy Eagle or Papuan Harpy त्रिभुज.
It is the largest और सबसे शक्तिशाली रैप्टर मिला in the americas, and among the largest extant प्रजाति of eagles in the world.
it usually inhabits tropical lowland rainforests in the अपर ( emergent ) canopy परत.
Destruction of its प्राकृतिक आवास रै seen it vanish इससे many भाग of its पूर्व दायरा, and it is nearly extirpated in Central अमेरिका.
biological classification, or scientific वर्गीकरण in जीवविज्ञान, is a विधि of scientific taxonomy used to समूह और categorize जीवों into groups such as genus or प्रजाति.
These groups are known as taxa ( singular : taxon ).
Modern biological वर्गीकरण has इसके रूट in the work of Carolus Linnaeus, जो grouped प्रजाति according to साझा physical characteristics.
These groupings have चूंकि महरूम revised to improve consistency with the darwinian principle of common descent.
With the introduction of the cladistic method in the लेट 20th सदी, phylogenetic taxonomy in जिससे जीवों are grouped based purely on inferred evolutionary relatedness, ignoring morphological समानता, has become common in कुछ areas of जीवविज्ञान.
Molecular phylogenetics, which उपयोग डीएनए sequences as आंकड़ा, रै also चलित अनेक recent revisions and is संभावित to continue doing so.
biological classification belongs to the विज्ञान of biological systematics.

John Winston ओनो लेनन, ( born John Winston Lennon ; 9 October 1940 – 8 दिसम्बर 1980 ) was an अंग्रेज़ी संगीतकार, singer and songwriter who रोज़ to worldwide कीर्ति as a founder सदस्य of the बीटल्स, one of the most commercially कामयाब and critically acclaimed अधिनियमों in the history of popular music.
साथ Paul McCartney, he formed one of the most मनाये songwriting partnerships of the 20th century.
Born and raised in Liverpool, as a किशोरावस्था Lennon became involved in the skiffle craze ; उसके पहला band, the Quarrymen, evolved into the Beatles in 1960.
as the समूह disintegrated towards the समाप्त of the decade, Lennon embarked on a सोलो career कि produced the critically acclaimed एल्बम जॉन Lennon/Plastic Ono Band और imagine, and iconic songs such as `` दे Peace a मौका `` and `` imagine ``.
बाद his विवाह to Yoko ओनो in 1969, he changed his name to जॉन Ono Lennon.
Lennon disengaged खुद from the music business in 1975 to devote time to raising उसके शिशु son Sean, लकिन re-emerged with Ono in 1980 with the new album Double Fantasy.
he was murdered three weeks after इसके release.
लेनन revealed a rebellious nature and acerbic wit in his म्यूज़िक, writing, drawings, on film and in interviews.
Controversial through his राजनैतिक and peace activism, he स्थानांतरित to New York City in 1971, where his criticism of the वियतनाम युद्ध resulted in a lengthy attempt by Richard Nixon 's administration to deport him, जबकि some of his songs were अपनाया as anthems by the anti-war movement.
As of 2012, Lennon 's सोलो album sales in the United States exceed 14 million units, and as writer, co-writer or performer, he is responsible for 25 number-one singles on the US hot 100 चार्ट.
in 2002, a बीबीसी poll on the 100 Greatest britons voted him eighth, and in 2008, रोलिंग Stone ranked him the fifth-greatest singer of all समय.
He थी posthumously inducted into the Songwriters Hall of Fame in 1987 and into the चट्टान और Roll Hall of Fame in 1994.
Statue of Rip वैन Winkle in Irvington, New यॉर्क, not far इससे `` sunnyside ``, the घर of Washington इरविंग
`` Rip Van winkle '' is a छोटी story by अमरीकी लेखक Washington Irving published in 1819, as well as the name of the स्टोरी 's fictional protagonist.
लिखा while इरविंग थी living in Birmingham, England, it was भाग of a संग्रहण entitled the स्केच Book of Geoffrey crayon.
हालांकि the story is set in New York 's Catskill kyu, Irving later admitted, `` When i wrote the स्टोरी, I था never been on the catskills. ''
Throughout the fifty-five साल history of the ग्रैमी पुरस्कार, many significant records have महरूम set.
This पेज तभी शामिल the competitive पुरस्कार जीती by विभिन्न artists.
This करता not शामिल the विभिन्न special पुरस्कार कि are presented by the नेशनल Academy of Recording कला और Sciences ऐसे as आजीवन Achievement पुरस्कार, Trustees Awards, तकनीकी Awards or लेजेंड Awards.
the page however does शामिल अन्य non-performance related Grammys ( ज्ञात as the Craft & उत्पादन Fields ) that may have been presented to the कलाकार ( s ).
Pee-wee Herman is a comic fictional character निर्मित and portrayed by अमरीकी comedian पॉल Reubens.
he is बेहतरीन known लिये उसके दो television series and film श्रेणी दौरान the 1980s.
the childlike Pee-wee herman अक्षर विकसित as a स्टेज act that quickly led to an HBO खास in 1981.
As the स्टेज performance gained further popularity, Reubens took the character to motion चित्र साथ Pee-wee 's बिग Adventure in 1985, toning bas the वयस्क innuendo for the अपील of children.
इस paved the way लिये Pee-wee 's Playhouse, an Emmy Award winning children 's series कि ran on CBS from 1986-1991.
Another फिल्मी, बिग Top pee-wee, was released in 1988.
Due to ऋणात्मक मीडिया ध्यान following a कांड in 1991, reubens decided to shelve his alter अहंकार दौरान the 1990s, and तब gradually resurrected it during the following दशक.
It थी at कि time that Reubens addressed plans to write a नई pee-wee फिल्मी, Pee-wee 's Playhouse : the फिल्म.
In जून 2007, Reubens appeared as pee-wee Herman लिये the पहला time चूंकि 1991 at स्पाइक tv 's यारों ' Choice पुरस्कार.
That '70s दिखाएँ is an American television period sitcom that centers on the lives of a समूह of teenage friends जीना in the fictional suburban town of पाइंट Place, विस्कॉन्सिन, इससे may 17, 1976, to December 31, 1979.
It debuted on the फॉक्स television network, पहला airing on August 23, 1998, running for eight लगातार seasons, and concluding साथ the 200th एपीसोड on may 18, 2006.
The प्रमुख teenage cast members यहूद Topher अनुग्रह, Mila kunis, Ashton कूचर, Danny Masterson, Laura Prepon, और wilmer valderrama.

कान्सास ( ) is a u.S. state located in the midwestern संयुक्त States.
It is named after the कान्सास नदी which बहती through it, which in turn was named बाद the Kansa Native अमरीकी जनजाति, which inhabited the क्षेत्रफल.
the tribe 's नाम ( natively kką : ze ) is प्रायः said to mean `` people of the wind '' or `` people of the south हवा, '' although this was probably नहीं the term 's original meaning.
निवासियों of Kansas are called `` Kansans. ''
For thousands of सालो what is now कान्सास was home to numerous and diverse Native अमरीकी tribes.
जनजातियों in the Eastern भाग of the state generally जिया in villages along the river valleys.
Tribes in the Western भाग of the state were semi- nomadic और hunted large herds of bison.
Kansas was first settled by European अमेरिकी in the 1830s, लकिन the pace of settlement accelerated in the 1850s, in the midst of political wars over the गुलामी issue.
जब officially opened to settlement by the U.S. government in 1854, abolitionist Free-Staters from New इंग्लैण्ड and pro-slavery settlers इससे neighboring मिसौरी rushed to the territory to determine if कान्सास would become a free state or a स्लेव राज्य.
Thus, the area was a hotbed of violence and chaos in इसके early days as these forces collided, and was known as bleeding Kansas.
the abolitionists आखिरकार prevailed and on January 29, 1861, Kansas entered the संघ as a free state.
बाद the सिविल युद्ध, the population of कान्सास grew rapidly, when waves of आप्रवासियों turned the prairie into farmland.
Today, Kansas is one of the सबसे productive agricultural states, producing ऊँची yields of wheat, sorghum and sunflowers.
Kansas is the 15th सबसे extensive और the 33rd most populous of the 50 संयुक्त राज्य.
Psychology is an academic और applied अनुशासन कि involves the scientific study of mental कृत्यों और व्यवहार.
Psychology रै the immediate goal of understanding individuals और groups by both establishing सामान्य principles और researching विशिष्ट cases, और by many खाते it ultimately aims to लाभ society.
in this field, a professional or शोधकर्ता is called a psychologist और can be वर्गीकृत as a सोशल, behavioral, or cognitive वैज्ञानिक.
Psychologists attempt to समझे the role of mental कृत्यों in व्यक्तिगत और social बर्ताव, while also exploring the physiological और neurobiological प्रक्रियाओं कि underlie निश्चित संज्ञानात्मक functions और व्यवहार.
Psychologists explore अवधारणाओं such as बोध, संज्ञान, ध्यान, emotion, phenomenology, प्रेरणा, brain functioning, personality, बर्ताव, and interpersonal relationships.
psychologists of diverse धारियाँ also consider the unconscious mind.
Psychologists employ अनुभवजन्य विधि to infer causal and correlational relationships between psychosocial variables.
In addition, or in opposition, to employing empirical और deductive methods, some—especially नैदानिक and counseling psychologists—at टाइम्स rely upon symbolic निर्वचन और other आगमनात्मक तकनीकों.
Psychology रै been described as a `` हब विज्ञान '', with मनोवैज्ञानिक findings linking to research और perspectives इससे the social sciences, natural sciences, आयुर्विज्ञान, and the humanities, such as दर्शनशास्त्र.
While psychological knowledge is often लागू to the assessment and treatment of दिमागी स्वास्थ्य समस्याएं, it is also directed towards understanding and solving problems in अनेक different spheres of इंसान activity.
The majority of psychologists हैं शामिल in some kind of therapeutic भूमिका, practicing in नैदानिक, counseling, or school जमावट.
Many do scientific शोध on a चौड़ी दायरा of topics related to mental processes and बर्ताव, and typically कार्य in university मनोविज्ञान departments or सिखा in अन्य academic जमावट ( e.g., medical schools, अस्पताल ).
कुछ are employed in औद्योगिक and organizational settings, or in अन्य areas such as human विकास और aging, sports, स्वास्थ्य, और the media, as well as in forensic investigation और अन्य aspects of law.
Thomas Jefferson ( April 13, 1743 ( अप्रैल 2, 1743 o.S. ) – जुलाई 4, 1826 ) was an अमरीकी Founding पिता, the principal लेखक of the Declaration of Independence ( 1776 ) and the third President of the United राज्य ( 1801–1809 ).
at the शुरूआत of the American Revolution, he served in the Continental कॉंग्रेस, representing वर्जिनिया and then served as a wartime Governor of वर्जिनिया ( 1779–1781 ).
Just बाद the war ended, from mid-1784 जेफरसन served as a diplomat, stationed in Paris.
In May 1785, he became the United States मंत्री to फ़्रांस.
जेफरसन was the पहला United राज्य Secretary of राज्य ( 1790–1793 ) सेवारत under President George वॉशिंगटन.
साथ उसके बंद friend जेम्स Madison he व्यवस्थित the Democratic-Republican पार्टी, और subsequently resigned इससे वॉशिंगटन 's cabinet.
Elected वाइस President in 1796, जब he came in second to John Adams of the federalists, Jefferson opposed एडम्स और with मैडिसन secretly wrote the केंटकी और Virginia रिज़ॉल्यूशन, which attempted to nullify the Alien and Sedition Acts.
निर्वाचित president in कया Jefferson called the क्रान्ति of 1800, he oversaw the purchase of the vast Louisiana Territory इससे France ( 1803 ), and sent the Lewis and क्लार्क Expedition ( 1804–1806 ) to explore the new वेस्ट.
His दूसरी term was घिरा साथ troubles at home, such as the failed treason trial of उसके former Vice अध्यक्ष Aaron Burr.
With escalating ट्रबल with Britain who थी चुनौतीपूर्ण American neutrality and threatening शिपिंग at sea, he tried आर्थिक warfare with his embargo laws which only damaged American trade.
in 1803, President जेफरसन initiated a process of भारतीय जनजातीय removal and relocation to the louisiana Territory वेस्ट of the Mississippi River, in अनुक्रम to खोलें lands for eventual American settlers.
A leader in the आत्मज्ञान, Jefferson was a polymath जो spoke पाँच languages fluently and was deeply interested in science, invention, वास्तुकला, religion and philosophy, interests कि led him to the founding of the University of Virginia after उसके presidency.
He designed उसके own विशाल mansion on a 5,000 acre plantation near charlottesville, वर्जिनिया, which he नामित Monticello.
जबकि नहीं a notable orator, Jefferson थी a skilled writer and corresponded with अनेक influential लोगों in अमेरिका और Europe throughout his वयस्क जीवन.
Though जेफरसन स्वामित्व many स्लेव, he opposed the institution all उसके जीवन और नतीजतन treated and took care of them very खूब and expected them to work no अधिक than फ़्री किसानो.
Since 1802 historians and others have been divided over the controversy of whether जेफरसन was the father of one or अधिक children belonging to सैली hemings, a slave at Monticello. ''
इतिहासकारों हैं also in असहमति with how much Jefferson was committed to the anti-slavery cause.
In 1807, President Jefferson हस्ताक्षरित into law a bill that बैन the importation of slaves into the United राज्य.
After Martha Jefferson, उसके बीवी of eleven years, died in 1782, Jefferson remained a widower लिये the rest of his जीवन ; their marriage produced six children, of जिसको दो survived to adulthood.
Though Jefferson has महरूम criticized by अनेक modern दिन scholars over the issue of गुलामी, he remains रेटेड as one of the greatest U.S. presidents.
`` Sun City '' is a 1985 protest सोंग written by स्टीवन वैन zandt, produced by वैन zandt और Arthur Baker and अंकित by Artists United विरूद्ध Apartheid to convey विपक्ष to the दक्षिण African नीति of apartheid.
The primary means of कि opposition is to घोषित कि सब the artists शामिल would इंकार कोई and सब offers to perform at सूर्य City, a resort which was located in Bantustan of bophuthatswana, एक of a क्रमांक of internationally अपरिचित supposed `` स्वतंत्र '' राज्य created by the South African सरकारी to forcibly relocate its ब्लैक population.
