The National Basketball Association ( NBA ) is a प्रमुख professional बास्केट league in North America.
it was founded in 1946 as the Basketball Association of America ( BAA ).
The लीग adopted its current नाम at the start of the when it merged with the National Basketball लीग ( nbl ).
The एनबीए फाइनल is the चैंपियनशिप series for the एनबीए और the निष्कर्ष of the खेल 's postseason.
the जीतना team of the series receives the लैरी o'brien Championship ट्रॉफी.
Players from the winning team प्रायः receive चैंपियनशिप बजती from the टोली honoring their योगदान.
however, in some rare अवसर, the टीमों opted to gave other commemorative वस्तुएं, ऐसे as wrist watches, instead of बजती.
The number of championships जीती by NBA superstars is प्रायः used as a मापन of their greatness.
बोस्टन Celtics center विधेयक Russell holds the record लिये the most NBA championships जीती साथ 11 शीर्षक दौरान उसके 13-year playing करियर.
He won his पहला championship with the Boston सेल्टिक्स in उसके rookie साल.
Afterwards, he went on to win 10 championships in the अगला 12 years, including eight लगातार championships इससे 1959 to 1966.
he जीती the पिछला two championships in 1968 and 1969 as player-coach.
रसेल 's teammate, Sam जोन्स, won 10 championships इससे 1959 to 1969, the second most in NBA history.
Four सेल्टिक्स खिलाड़ी, Tom heinsohn, K. C. जोन्स, Satch सैंडर्स और जॉन Havlicek, जीती eight championships each.
Two other Celtics, Jim Loscutoff and Frank Ramsey, won सात championships each.
चार खिलाड़ी, Bob cousy, Kareem Abdul-Jabbar, माइकल जॉर्डन and Scottie Pippen, won छह championships प्रत्येक.
Jordan and Pippen are सदस्यों of the Chicago bulls team जो won three consecutive championships twice in the 1990s.
रॉबर्ट Horry and जॉन Salley हैं the तभी players to have won the championships with तीन अलग teams.
Horry जीती seven championships साथ the Houston Rockets, the लॉस Angeles लेकर्स and the सैन Antonio Spurs, while Salley won चार championships with the Detroit पिस्टन्स, the Bulls and the Lakers.
Frank शाऊल और Steve Kerr हैं the तभी players to win two championships साथ दो different teams in consecutive seasons.
Saul won consecutive championships with the रोचेस्टर Royals and the Minneapolis लेकर्स in the 1950s, जबकि Kerr won लगातार championships साथ the Bulls and the Spurs in the 1990s,
सटीकता indicates निकटता of मापन परिणाम to the true मान, परिशुद्धता to the repeatability, or reproducibility of the मापन
In the fields of विज्ञान, अभियान्त्रिकी, उद्योग, and आंकडे, the accuracy of a मापन प्रणाली is the degree of closeness of माप of a quantity to that मात्रा 's वास्तविक ( सच्चा ) मान.
the परिशुद्धता of a measurement system, भी called reproducibility or repeatability, is the degree to जिससे repeated measurements अंतर्गत अपरिवर्तित conditions show the वही परिणाम.
हालांकि the two words reproducibility and repeatability can be synonymous in colloquial use, they हैं deliberately contrasted in the context of the वैज्ञानिक method.
A measurement system can be सटीक लकिन not precise, precise but not accurate, neither, or दोनो.
For उदाहरण, if an प्रयोग contains a व्यवस्थित error, तब increasing the sample size generally increases precision but does not improve accuracy.
The result होता be a सतत yet inaccurate स्ट्रिंग of results from the flawed experiment.
Eliminating the व्यवस्थित गलती improves accuracy but does नहीं बदलें precision.
a मापन system is designated मान्य if it is दोनो accurate and precise.
Related शर्तें शामिल पूर्वाग्रह ( non- यादृच्छिक or निर्देशित प्रभाव caused by a फ़ैक्टर or कारकों unrelated to the independent परिवर्तनीय ) और गलती ( random variability ).
The शब्दावली is also applied to indirect measurements—that is, मान obtained by a computational procedure from observed आंकड़ा.
In जोड to accuracy and precision, माप may भी have a मापन रेज़ोल्यूशन, जिससे is the smallest change in the underlying physical quantity कि produces a जवाब in the measurement.
in the case of full reproducibility, ऐसे as जब rounding a क्रमांक to a representable floating point number, the शब्द परिशुद्धता has a meaning not सम्बन्धित to reproducibility.
For example, in the आईईईई 754-2008 standard it means the क्रमांक of बिट्स in the significand, so it is used as a माप लिये the सापेक्ष सटीकता with which an मनमानी क्रमांक can be represented.
Fuck in इसके शाब्दिक meaning refers to the अधिनियम of यौन मैथुन.
It is an English word कि is प्रायः used as a profanity, either to denote तिरस्कार or as an intensifier.
the उत्पत्ति of the शब्द is obscure.
It is प्रायः considered to be पहला attested to around 1475, लकिन it may be considerably पुरानी.
In आधुनिक उपयोग, fuck और इसके derivatives ( such as fucker and fucking ) can be प्रयुक्त in the स्थिति of a noun, a verb, an adjective or an adverb.
वहीँ हैं अनेक आम वाक्यांश जिससे make use of the word, as खूब as a number of यौगिकों incorporating it, ऐसे as motherfucker.
Animated, color-coded map प्रर्दशित the various continents and regions.
Depending on the convention और मॉडल, कुछ continents may be संचित or subdivided : लिये example, Eurasia is most प्रायः subdivided into Europe और Asia ( रेड shades ), while North and South अमेरिका are sometimes पहचाना as एक American continent ( green शेड्स ).
A महाद्वीप is one of अनेक बहुत large landmasses on धरती.
They are generally identified by convention rather than कोई सख्त मापदण्ड, with up to seven regions commonly regarded as continents—they are ( from largest in size to smallest ) : Asia, Africa, उत्तर अमेरिका, South अमेरिका, Antarctica, यूरोपीय, और ऑस्ट्रेलिया.
In भूविज्ञान, continents हैं described by अर्थात् of tectonic plates.
Plate विवर्तनिकी is the प्रक्रम and study of the गति, टक्कर and प्रभाग of continents, earlier known as महाद्वीपीय drift.

जातियाँ property is a marital property regime कि originated in सिविल law jurisdictions और is now also found in some आम विधि jurisdictions.
The states of the United States कि recognize community प्रॉपर्टी हैं primarily in the West ; it was inherited इससे Mexico 's ganancial जातियाँ प्रणाली, जिससे itself was inherited इससे Spanish law ( a Roman -derived सिविल विधि प्रणाली ) और ultimately from the Visigoths.
जबकि under Spanish rule Louisiana अपनाया the ganancial community प्रणाली of acquests और gains, which replaced the traditional French जातियाँ of movables और acquests in इसके civil law system.
Map of the United States with जातियाँ property states highlighted in red.
In addition to the highlighted states, Alaska is a separate प्रॉपर्टी state that permits couples to opt into a जातियाँ प्रॉपर्टी arrangement.
in a जातियाँ property jurisdiction, most प्रॉपर्टी acquired during the विवाह ( except लिये gifts or inheritances ) —the जातियाँ, or communio bonorum—is owned jointly by both spouses और is विभाजित upon तलाक, annulment or मौत.
Joint स्वामित्व is automatically presumed by विधि in the absence of विशिष्ट evidence that would पाइंट to a contrary conclusion for a particular टुकड़ा of property.
प्रभाग of community property may take place by item, by splitting सब items or by value.
in some jurisdictions, such as California, a 50/50 division of community property is सख्ती mandated by statute, अर्थ कि the फ़ोकस then shifts to whether particular items are to be वर्गीकृत as community or separate प्रॉपर्टी.
In other jurisdictions, such as Texas, a तलाक court may डिक्री an `` equitable वितरण `` of community प्रॉपर्टी, which may result in an unequal प्रभाग of ऐसे.
in non-community प्रॉपर्टी राज्य property may be divided by equitable distribution.
Generally speaking, the प्रॉपर्टी that each partner brings into the विवाह or receives by तोहफा, bequest or मक्कारी during marriage is called separate प्रॉपर्टी ( i.e., not community प्रॉपर्टी ).
See division of property.
Division of जातियाँ debts may नहीं be the same as division of community property.
For example, in California, community प्रॉपर्टी is required to be विभाजित `` बराबर '' while community कर्ज़ is required to be विभाजित `` equitably ''.
प्रॉपर्टी कि is owned by one जीवनसाथी पहले the विवाह is the separate property of कि spouse, unless the प्रॉपर्टी is `` transmuted '' into community property.
The rules for इस vary from jurisdiction to jurisdiction.
the Duke and duchess of कैम्ब्रिज हिलाता to the भीड at The Mall shortly बाद the विवाह.
The wedding of Prince William, Duke of Cambridge, and Catherine Middleton took place on 29 April 2011 at वेस्टमिंस्टर ऐबी in London.
The दूल्हे, Prince William, Duke of कैम्ब्रिज, is the eldest बेटे of चार्ल्स, Prince of वेल्स, और is second in the line of succession to the British सिंहासन and the तख्तों of पंद्रह other राष्ट्रमंडल realms.
the bride, Catherine `` Kate '' Middleton is the ज्येष्ठ of तीन children of Michael and carole Middleton of Bucklebury, Berkshire.
The डीन of Westminster, John Hall, presided at the service ; the Archbishop of Canterbury, rowan Williams, conducted the विवाह ; रिचर्ड chartres, the Bishop of लंदन, preached the sermon ; and a reading थी given by the बहू 's brother, James.
William 's best man was उसके brother, Prince हैरी, जबकि the bride 's सिस्टर, पिप्पा, was maid of इज्ज़त.
the रस्म was attended by the बहू 's and groom 's परिवारों, as well as अनेक विदेशी रॉयल्स, diplomats, and the couple 's chosen निजी अतिथि.
After the ceremony, the couple made the traditional appearance on the बालकनी of बकिंघम Palace.
as प्रिंस विलियम थी not the वारिस apparent to the सिंहासन, the विवाह was not a full state occasion and many details यहूद left to the couple to decide, such as much of the अतिथि सूची of परिचय 1,900.
Prince विलियम और केट मिडलटन मिले in 2001.
उनके सगाई on 20 October 2010 थी announced on 16 नवम्बर 2010.
The build-up to the wedding and the अवसर itself attracted much मीडिया attention, being compared in अनेक ways with the 1981 विवाह of William 's अभिभावक.
The occasion थी a public अवकाश in the United Kingdom और featured many ceremonial aspects, सहित use of the राज्य carriages and roles लिये the Foot गार्ड and Household प्यादे.
Events यहूद आयोजित around the Commonwealth to चिह्नित the विवाह ; संगठनों और hotels held events across कनाडा, over 5,000 गली parties यहूद held throughout the संयुक्त किंगडम, and एक million लोगों lined the रूट between Westminster Abbey and Buckingham Palace.
The ceremony थी viewed live by tens of millions more around the संसार, including 72 million on the youtube royal Channel.
In the United Kingdom, टेलीविज़न ऑडियंस peaked at 26.3 million viewers, with a कुल of 36.7 million watching part of the कवरेज.
वैनेसा Joy lachey ( née minnillo ; born नवम्बर 9, 1980 ) is an अमरीकी television personality, टेलीविज़न host, फ़ैशन model, and actress.

A hand ( med. / lat. : manus, pl. manūs ) is a prehensile, multi- fingered extremity स्तिथ at the end of an arm or forelimb of primates और इंसानो, chimpanzees, monkeys, and lemurs.
A few other vertebrates ऐसे as the कोआला ( which has two opposable thumbs on प्रत्येक `` hand '' और फिंगरप्रिंट remarkably समान to human fingerprints ) हैं often वर्णित as having either `` हैंड्स '' or `` paws '' on their सामने limbs.
Hands हैं the प्रमुख structures for physically manipulating the environment, used for दोनो gross motor skills ( such as grasping a large ऑब्जेक्ट ) and ठीक मोटर skills ( ऐसे as picking up a small pebble ).
The उंगलियों contain some of the densest areas of nerve endings on the body, हैं the richest source of tactile feedback, and have the महानतम positioning capability of the body ; thus the sense of touch is intimately associated साथ हैंड्स.
जैसे other paired अंगों ( आँखें, फीट, legs ), each हाथ is dominantly controlled by the opposing brain hemisphere, so that handedness, or the पसन्दीदा hand चुनाव for single-handed activities ऐसे as लिखने with a पेंसिल, reflects व्यक्तिगत दिमाग कामकाज.
कुछ विकासवादी anatomists उपयोग the पद hand to refer to the appendage of अंक on the forelimb more generally — for उदाहरण, in the कॉन्टेक्स्ट of whether the three digits of the बर्ड हाथ शामिल the same homologous घाटा of दो digits as in the डायनासोर hand.
The human hand रै 27 bones, not including the sesamoid bones which number varies between लोगों.
14 of which हैं the phalanges ( proximal, इंटरमीडिएट और distal ) of the उंगलियाँ.
the metacarpals हैं the bones that connects the उंगलियाँ and the कलाई.
Each human hand रै 5 metacarpals and 8 carpal bones.

The mark in the top-left of the प्रदर्शक indicates कि the time is 4:00pm, नहीं 4:00am.
a 1969 रेडियो सचेतक clock ( सोनी Digimatic 8FC-59W ) with an early mechanical-digital display.
a digital clock is a प्रकार of क्लॉक that प्रदर्शक the समय digitally, i.e. in numerals or अन्य प्रतीकों, as opposed to an analog clock, जहाँ the time is indicated by the स्थितियाँ of rotating hands.
डिजिटल घड़ियाँ are often संबद्ध with electronic drives, but the `` digital '' वर्णन refers only to the display, not to the drive mechanism.
( दोनो analog और digital clocks can be driven either mechanically or electronically, but `` clockwork '' mechanisms साथ digital प्रदर्शक हैं rare. )
The biggest digital clock is the lichtzeitpegel ( `` लाइट Time स्तर '' ) on the television tower rheinturm Düsseldorf, Germany.
Family Guy निर्माता सेठ MacFarlane also provides the आवाज़ें of पीटर Griffin, stewie griffin, Brian Griffin, and Glenn Quagmire.
Family Guy is an अमरीकी animated sitcom कि features पाँच main voice अभिनेताओं, and numerous regular cast and पुनरावर्ती guest stars.
the principal voice cast consists of दिखाएँ निर्माता Seth MacFarlane, एलेक्स borstein, Seth Green, mila Kunis ( जो replaced Lacey chabert after the पहला season ) और Mike Henry and अभी, the नई actor beau Osborne.
पुनरावर्ती voice अभिनेताओं include पैट्रिक Warburton, Adam West, John G. Brennan, निकोल Sullivan and Jennifer tilly, and repeat guest सितारों शामिल Phyllis diller, Charles Durning, Rush limbaugh, and Phil LaMarr.

the voice actors, in portraying the विभिन्न अक्षर personalities on the दिखाएँ, चित्रण प्रेरणा इससे हस्तियाँ and pop संस्कृति.
परिवार Guy वर्ण have महरूम played by more than एक actor, बाद सदस्यों of the दिखाएँ left the श्रेणी or had conflicting दायित्वों.

the पाँच sets of the फलक खेल Monopoly depicted यहाँ show the एवोल्यूशन of the खेल 's artwork और designs in the संयुक्त States इससे 1935–2005.
The history of the board game Monopoly can be traced back to the early 20th century.
The earliest known design was by the अमरीकी, Elizabeth Magie, patented in 1904 but मौजूदा as जल्दी as 1902.
Magie 's original intent थी to publish a board game to illustrate an economic principle, namely the Georgist अवधारणा of a single जमीन मान tax.
A series of फलक खेल were developed from 1906 through the 1930s कि शामिल the buying और selling of land and the विकास of that land.
by 1934, a board game had been created much like the संस्करण of Monopoly sold by Parker भाइयो and इसके सम्बन्धित companies through the rest of the 20th century, and into the 21st.
Several people, mostly in the Midwestern United States and near the East Coast, contributed to the game 's design और evolution.
By the 1970s, the idea that the खेल had been created solely by चार्ल्स Darrow had become popular लोकगीत ; it was मुद्रित in the खेल 's निर्देश for अनेक years, in a 1974 किताब devoted to Monopoly, and was cited in a सामान्य book परिचय toys even as recently as 2007.
भी a guide to family games प्रकाशित लिये रीडर 's Digest in 2003 only gave credit to darrow और एलिज़ाबेथ Magie, erroneously stating कि magie 's असली game was created in the 1800s, और नहीं acknowledging any of the खेल 's विकास between Magie 's creation of the game, and the eventual publication by पार्कर Brothers.
Also in the 1970s, Professor Ralph Anspach, who था खुद published a फलक game intended to illustrate the principles of दोनो monopolies और विश्वास busting, fought Parker Brothers और its then जनक company, General Mills, over the trademarks of the Monopoly board खेल.
Through the research of Anspach और अन्य, much of the जल्दी इतिहास of the game was `` rediscovered ''.
anspach confronted maxine Brady, author of the 1974 book the Monopoly Book : Strategy और Tactics of the World 's सबसे लोकप्रिय Game over the actual इतिहास of the game on Barry Farber 's नई यॉर्क नगर talk show in 1975.
Because of the lengthy court process, including appeals, the विधिक status of पार्कर भाइयो ' trademarks on the खेल was नहीं settled जबतक 1985.
the game 's name remains a पंजीकृत trademark of पार्कर Brothers, as do इसके specific design तत्व.
At the conclusion of the court मामला, the खेल 's logo and graphic design तत्व became part of a larger Monopoly brand, licensed by पार्कर भाइयो ' parent कंपनियाँ onto a किस्में of वस्तुएं through the उपस्थित day.
Despite the `` rediscovery '' of the board खेल 's early history in the 1970s और 1980s, and अनेक किताबे और journal articles on the subject, हास्ब्रो ( पार्कर भाइयो ' वर्तमान parent company ) किया not acknowledge any of the खेल 's history before चार्ल्स Darrow on its official एकाधिकार website as recently as June 2012.
Nor did हास्ब्रो acknowledge anyone other than Darrow in सामग्री published or प्रायोजित by them, at तनिक as recently as 2006.
अंतरराष्ट्रीय tournaments, पहला आयोजित in the जल्दी 1970s, continue to the present, with the अगला संसार चैंपियनशिप संभावित scheduled for 2013.
Starting in 1985, a new generation of spin-off board games and कार्ड games appeared on दोनो sides of the Atlantic समंदर.
In 1989, the first of अनेक वीडियो खेल और कंप्यूटर खेल संस्करण थी प्रकाशित.
चूंकि 1994, many official विसंगतियाँ of the game, based on स्थितियाँ other than Atlantic City, New जर्सी ( the आधिकारिक u.S. setting ) or London ( the official Commonwealth सेटिंग, excepting Canada ), have been published by हास्ब्रो or its licensees.
in 2008, Hasbro permanently बदला the color scheme and some of the gameplay of the standard u.s. Edition of the खेल to मैच the uk Edition, although the U.S. मानक edition maintains the Atlantic नगर प्रॉपर्टी names.
हास्ब्रो भी परिवर्धित the official लोगो to दे the `` mr. Monopoly '' character a 3-D computer-generated dekh, जिससे रै since been adopted by licensees usaopoly, जीतना Moves and जीतना Solutions.

in baseball, a बलिदान fly is a batted बॉल that satisfies चार criteria:
There are fewer than two outs when the बॉल is hit.
the बॉल is hit to the outfield ( fair or foul ), or to infield बेईमानी territory.
the बैटर is put out because an outfielder ( or an infielder कार्यशील in the outfield, or foul territory ) catches the बॉल on the मक्खी ( alternatively if the बैटर would have महरूम आउट if not लिये an गलती or if the outfielder drops the ball and another धावक is put out ).
a runner who is already on base scores on the खेल.
It is called a `` sacrifice '' मक्खी क्युकी the batter presumably intends to कारण a teammate to score a चलाएं, while sacrificing उसके अपना क्षमता to do so.
मिनेसोटा ( ) is a U.S. राज्य स्तिथ in the Midwestern United States.
मिनेसोटा थी carved out of the eastern half of the मिनेसोटा territory और admitted to the Union as the 32nd राज्य on may 11, 1858.
ज्ञात as the `` जमीन of 10,000 Lakes '', the state 's name comes from a डकोटा word for `` sky-tinted water ''.
those waters, together with forests, पार्क, and wilderness areas, offer निवासियों and tourists a किस्में of बाहरी recreational opportunities.
मिनेसोटा is the 12th most extensive और the 21st most populous of the u.S. राज्य.
Nearly 60 % of इसके residents सजीव in the Minneapolis–Saint पॉल महानगर क्षेत्रफल ( known as the `` Twin शहरों '' ), the center of transportation, कारोबार, industry, शिक्षा, government and घर to an internationally known arts जातियाँ.
The remainder of the राज्य consists of पश्चिमी prairies now दिए over to intensive agriculture ; पतझड़ी वनों in the southeast, अभी साफ, farmed and settled ; और the कम populated North वुड्स, used for mining, forestry, और मनोरंजन.
मिनेसोटा is known लिये its अपेक्षाकृत mixed सोशल और political orientations, and रै a ऊँची rate of civic participation और वोटर turnout.
Minnesota ranks among the healthiest states, और रै a highly literate population.
The विशाल बहुमत of residents हैं of Scandinavian and German descent.
The राज्य is known as a center of scandinavian अमरीकी संस्कृति.
Ethnic diversity has increased in हाल दशकों.
Substantial influxes of एशियाई, अफ़्रीकी, और लैटिन American immigrants have joined the वंशजों of European settlers and the original Native अमरीकी inhabitants.
Grants हैं non-repayable funds by एक party ( ग्रान्ट makers ), often a सरकारी विभाग, निगम, foundation or trust, to a, प्रायः ( but नहीं always ) a nonprofit एंटिटी, educational संस्था, कारोबार or an individual.
in order to प्राप्त a grant, some form of `` ग्रान्ट लिखने '' प्रायः referred to as either a प्रस्ताव or an application is usually जरूरी.
सबसे grants हैं बना to fund a विशिष्ट प्रोजेक्ट and require कुछ स्तर of compliance and reporting.
the grant writing process involves an applicant submitting a प्रस्ताव ( or सबमिशन ) to a potential funder, either on the applicant 's own पहल or in response to a Request for प्रस्ताव इससे the funder.
Other अनुदान can be given to individuals, such as पीड़ितों of प्राकृतिक आपदाओं or individuals who तलाश to खोलें a small business.
Sometimes ग्रान्ट makers आवश्यकता grant seekers to have some रूप of tax-exempt status, be a registered nonprofit organization or a local सरकारी.
For example, tiered funding लिये a freeway are बहुत विशाल grants negotiated at government policy level.
However छोटी अनुदान may be provided by a सरकारी एजेंसी ( e.g. municipal government ).
Project-related funding involving governments, कारोबार, समुदायों, और individuals is प्रायः arranged by अनुप्रयोग either in writing or ऑनलाइन.
Naturally occurring कोबाल्ट ( co ) is composed of 1 stable isotope, 59Co. 28 radioisotopes have been characterized with the most stable being 60co with a half-life of 5.2714 years, 57co साथ a half-life of 271.79 दिनों, 56co with a half-life of 77.27 days, and 58Co with a half-life of 70.86 days.
All of the remaining रेडियोसक्रिय isotopes have half-lives कि are कम than 18 घंटों and the majority of ये have half-lives that are कम than 1 second.
This तत्व भी रै 11 मेटा states, all of which have half-lives कम than 15 minutes.
the isotopes of cobalt range in परमाणु वज़न from 47co to 75Co.
The primary decay विधि लिये isotopes with atomic mass unit मान less than कि of the सबसे abundant stable समस्थानिक, 59Co, is electron कैप्चर और the प्राथमिक mode of decay लिये those of वृहद than 59 परमाणु द्रव्यमान units is beta decay.
the प्राथमिक क्षय उत्पाद before 59Co are iron isotopes and the primary products बाद हैं nickel isotopes.

Who Moved My चीज ?
an अद्भुत Way to Deal with बदलें in अपना Work and in Your Life, published in 1998, is a प्रेरक किताब by स्पेंसर जॉनसन लिखा in the style of a मिसाल or कारोबार fable.
It describes change in एक 's work और life, और four ठेठ प्रतिक्रियाएँ to कहा change by two mice and दो `` littlepeople '', during उनके hunt for cheese.
A New यॉर्क टाइम्स business bestseller चूंकि रिलीज, Who Moved my Cheese ?
remained on the list for लगभग पाँच सालो and spent over 200 weeks on प्रकाशक Weekly 's सजिल्द nonfiction list.
it has sold अधिक than 26 लाख नक़ल worldwide in 37 languages and remains to be एक of the best-selling business books.
Nikita Sergeyevich Khrushchev ( – सितंबर 11, 1971 ) led the Soviet संघ during part of the Cold युद्ध.
He परोसा as First Secretary of the Communist Party of the Soviet संघ इससे 1953 to 1964, and as Chairman of the Council of Ministers, or Premier, इससे 1958 to 1964.
Khrushchev was responsible for the partial de-Stalinization of the सोवियत संघ, लिये backing the प्रगति of the early Soviet space कार्यक्रम, और for अनेक relatively liberal reforms in क्षेत्रों of घरेलू policy.
khrushchev 's party सहयोगियों removed him from power in 1964, replacing उसे साथ Leonid Brezhnev as First सचिव और एलेक्सी Kosygin as Premier.
khrushchev थी born in the Russian village of Kalinovka in 1894, close to the present-day किनारा between Russia and युक्त.
He थी employed as a metalworker in his youth, and during the रूसी Civil युद्ध was a राजनैतिक commissar.
With the help of Lazar Kaganovich, he worked उसके way up the Soviet hierarchy.
He supported जोसेफ Stalin 's purges, and approved thousands of रखवाले.
In 1939, Stalin sent him to govern युक्त, और he जारी the purges there.
दौरान कया थी ज्ञात in the Soviet Union as the ग्रेट Patriotic युद्ध ( Eastern Front of World War ii ), khrushchev was again a commissar, सेवारत as an intermediary between Stalin and his सेनापतियों.
Khrushchev was present at the खूनी रक्षा of stalingrad, a fact he took ग्रेट pride in throughout his जीवन.
After the war, he returned to Ukraine पहले being recalled to Moscow as एक of स्टालिन 's close advisers.
In the शक्ति struggle triggered by Stalin 's मौत in 1953, khrushchev, after अनेक सालो, emerged victorious.
On February 25, 1956, at the 20th पार्टी कॉंग्रेस, he वितरित the `` Secret वाक, '' denouncing Stalin 's purges और ushering in a less repressive era in the Soviet संघ.
His domestic नीतियों, aimed at bettering the lives of ordinary citizens, were often ineffective, especially in the क्षेत्रफल of कृषि.
उम्मीद eventually to rely on missiles लिये national रक्षा, Khrushchev ordered major cuts in conventional शक्तियां.
despite the कटौती, khrushchev 's rule देखी the tensest सालो of the ठंडा युद्ध, culminating in the क्यूबन मिसाइल Crisis.
कुछ of khrushchev 's policies यहूद देखी as erratic, विशेषकर by his emerging विरोधियों, who चुपचाप rose in strength और deposed उसे in October 1964.
He did not suffer the deadly भाग्य of some previous losers of सोवियत power struggles, लकिन was pensioned off with an apartment in मास्को and a dacha in the countryside.
His lengthy memoirs यहूद smuggled to the वेस्ट and published in part in 1970.
khrushchev died in 1971 of दिल disease.
Upper gastrointestinal ( gi ) bleeding refers to hemorrhage in the upper gastrointestinal tract.
The anatomic cut-off for अपर GI bleeding is the ligament of treitz, which connects the चौथी portion of the duodenum to the diaphragm निकट the splenic flexure of the colon.
अपर GI bleeds हैं माना medical emergencies, and आवश्यकता प्रवेश to hospital लिये urgent निदान and प्रबन्धन.
Due to advances in medications और endoscopy, upper GI hemorrhage is अभी usually treated without सर्जरी.
संसार जनसांख्यिकी estimates इससे 1800 to 2100, based on UN 2010 projections ( red, नारंगी, green ) and us Census Bureau historical estimates ( ब्लैक ).
Actual recorded population figures are in ब्लू.
according to the highest estimate, the संसार population may वृद्धि to 16 billion by 2100 ; according to the lowest estimate, it may decline to 6 billion.
The संसार जनसांख्यिकी is the total number of जीना humans on धरती.
As of आज, it is अनुमानित to number billion by the संयुक्त States जनसांख्यिकी Bureau ( USCB ).
The USCB estimates that the world population exceeded 7 billion on कूच 12, 2012.
according to a separate estimate by the United राष्ट्र जनसांख्यिकी Fund, it reached इस milestone on October 31, 2011.
the world population has experienced continuous विकास since the end of the Great Famine और the Black मौत in 1350, when it stood at around 370 million.
The highest rates of growth – global population increases above 1.8 % प्रति साल – यहूद देखी briefly दौरान the 1950s, and लिये a longer period during the 1960s and 1970s.
The growth rate peaked at 2.2 % in 1963, और had declined to 1.1 % by 2011.
Total सालाना births यहूद highest in the late 1980s at about 138 लाख, और हैं अभी expected to remain essentially constant at उनके 2011 स्तर of 134 million, जबकि deaths number 56 million प्रति year, and are expected to बढ़ाएँ to 80 million प्रति year by 2040.
Current projections show a continued increase in जनसांख्यिकी in the निकट भविष्य ( लकिन a स्थिर decline in the जनसांख्यिकी growth रेट ), साथ the global जनसांख्यिकी अपेक्षित to reach between 7.5 and 10.5 billion by 2050.
विभिन्न longer-term estimates predict further विकास, stagnation, or even overall decline in the global population by 2150.
Some analysts have questioned the sustainability of further world population growth, citing the growing pressures on the environment, global food आपूर्तियाँ, and energy संसाधन.

It is a now a fully owned प्रभाग of Philips Lighting.
knuckle mnemonic for the क्रमांक of days in each माह of the Gregorian Calendar.
Each projecting knuckle represents a 31-day माह.
a mnemonic (, with a silent `` m '' ), or mnemonic device, is any learning तकनीक that aids information retention.
Mnemonics उद्देश्य to translate information into a form that the human brain can retain बेहतर than इसके original रूप.
Even the process of applying इस conversion might already aid the ट्रांसफ़र of सूचना to long-term memory.
commonly encountered mnemonics are प्रायः लिये lists and in auditory form, ऐसे as short poems, acronyms, or यादगार वाक्यांश, लकिन mnemonics can भी be for अन्य types of information और in विज़ुअल or kinesthetic फ़ॉर्म.
Their use is based on the अवलोकन that the इंसान दिमाग more easily remembers spatial, personal, surprising, physical, sexual, humorous, or वरना 'relatable ' information, rather than more abstract or impersonal forms of सूचना.
The शब्द mnemonic is निकला from the Ancient यूनानी word μνημονικός ( mnēmonikos ), meaning `` of मेमोरी '' and is related to Mnemosyne ( `` स्मरण '' ), the नाम of the देवी of मेमोरी in यूनानी mythology.
दोनो of these शब्द हैं निकला from μνήμη ( mnēmē ), `` स्मरण, मेमोरी ''.
Mnemonics in antiquity were सबसे often considered in the कॉन्टेक्स्ट of what is आज ज्ञात as the आर्ट of memory.
Ancient Greeks और Romans distinguished between two types of memory : the 'natural ' memory and the 'artificial ' मेमोरी.
The former is inborn, और is the one that everyone uses automatically and without thinking.
The कृत्रिम मेमोरी in contrast has to be प्रशिक्षित and developed through the सीखना और practicing of a variety of mnemonic techniques.
Mnemonic प्रणालियों are special techniques or strategies consciously प्रयुक्त to improve memory, it helps employ सूचना already भंडारित in long-term memory to मेक memorization an easier task.
President बुश signing the No Child Left पीछे Act at Hamilton h.s. in हैमिल्टन, Ohio.
the no चाइल्ड बाएँ पीछे अधिनियम of 2001 ( nclb ) is a United राज्य अधिनियम of कॉंग्रेस कि is a reauthorization of the Elementary and द्वितीयक शिक्षा Act, which शामिल शीर्षक i, the government 's flagship aid कार्यक्रम लिये सुविधाहीन विद्यार्थी.
nclb supports standards-based education सुधार based on the premise that setting high standards and establishing measurable लक्ष्य can improve व्यक्तिगत outcomes in शिक्षा.
The Act requires states to develop आकलन in basic skills.
राज्य जरूर give these assessments to all students at चुनें ग्रेड levels in order to प्राप्त संघीय स्कूल funding.
The Act does not assert a नेशनल उपलब्धि standard ; standards are set by each individual state.
NCLB विस्तारित the संघीय भूमिका in public education through सालाना testing, annual अकादमिक progress, रपट cards, टीचर योग्यता, और funding परिवर्तन.
the bill passed in the U.S. कॉंग्रेस with bipartisan support.

a पिकअप truck or pick-up, प्रायः बस referred to as a pickup, is a light motor गाडी with an open-top, rear कार्गो क्षेत्रफल ( bed ).
in North अमेरिका, the पद पिकअप is प्रयुक्त लिये लाइट ट्रक with a lighter duty chassis और फैक्टरी निर्मित, integrated bed, as well as for coupé utility वाहनों, प्रायः आधारित on a personal car chassis, लकिन also often on a special dedicated chassi लिये such उपयोग.
Some देशों have उनके अपना शर्तें समान to pickup, ऐसे as ute in Australia and New Zealand, or bakkie in South अफ़्रीकी.
Large पिकअप trucks are somewhat विरल in यूरोपीय, जहाँ vans and light lorries are commonly प्रयुक्त लिये similar भूमिकाएँ.
This 15th-century depiction of Charlemagne and Pope Adrian i shows a well-bred medieval horse with arched neck, परिष्कृत सिर and elegant gait.
Horses in the मध्य आयु differed in size, निर्माण and breed from the आधुनिक horse, and यहूद, on औसत, smaller.
They यहूद also more central to समाज than उनके आधुनिक counterparts, being अनिवार्य for war, कृषि, और transport.
नतीजतन, specific types of horse विकसित, many of which have no आधुनिक equivalent.
While an understanding of modern घोड़ा breeds और equestrianism is vital for any analysis of the medieval घोड़ा, researchers also need to consider documentary ( दोनो लिखा और सचित्र ) और पुरातत्व प्रमाण.
Horses in the Middle आयु were rarely differentiated by नस्ल, but rather by उपयोग.
This led उन्हें to be described, for उदाहरण, as `` chargers `` ( युद्ध horses ), `` palfreys `` ( riding horses ), cart horses or packhorses.
सन्दर्भ is also दिए to their place of origin, such as `` Spanish घोड़े, '' लकिन whether this referred to one नस्ल or several is unknown.
another परेशानी arising दौरान कोई study of मध्यकालीन दस्तावेज़ or साहित्य is the लचीलापन of the medieval भाषाएं, where अनेक words can be used for one thing ( or, conversely, several वस्तुएँ are referred to by एक word ).
शब्द such as ' courser ' और 'चार्जr ' are used interchangeably ( even within एक document ), and where one एपिक may speak disparagingly of a rouncey, another गुणगान its skill and swiftness.
Significant technological advances in equestrian equipment, often introduced इससे अन्य cultures, allowed for significant changes in both warfare और agriculture.
in particular, improved designs for the solid-treed काठी as well as the arrival of the stirrup, horseshoe और horse collar were significant advances in medieval society.
Consequently, the assumptions और theories developed by इतिहासकारों are not definitive, and बहस still rages on अनेक issues, ऐसे as the breeding or size of the horse, और a क्रमांक of sources जरूर be consulted in अनुक्रम to understand the विशालता of the subject.
the म्यूज़िक Man is a musical साथ book, music, और गीत by Meredith Willson, based on a story by willson and Franklin लेसी.
the plot चिंताएं कॉन man Harold हिल, जो poses as a boys ' बैंड organizer और leader and sells बैंड instruments और वर्दी to naive townsfolk पहले skipping कस्बा with the cash.
In River नगर, आयोवा, prim librarian and piano teacher Marian Paroo sees through उसे, but जब हिल helps उसके younger bhai overcome his fear of social interactions due to उसके लिस्प, marian begins to fall in प्रेम with हेरोल्ड.
Harold, in turn falling for Marian, risks होने caught to win her.
in 1957, the show became a hit on ब्रॉडवे, winning five Tony Awards, सहित Best Musical, and running लिये 1,375 performances.
the cast एल्बम won the पहला Grammy Award for `` Best Original Cast Album '' and was number एक on the Billboard charts लिये 245 weeks.
The दिखाएँ 's success led to revivals and a लोकप्रिय 1962 film अनुकूलन and a 2003 television remake.
It frequently is produced by both professional and amateur theater कंपनियाँ.
Surveyor 's wheel
a surveyor 's व्हील, भी called a clickwheel, hodometer, waywiser, trundle wheel, measuring व्हील, or perambulator is a यंत्र for measuring अलहदा.

बालू dunes in the rub ' al Khali ( `` Empty क्वार्टर '' ) of Saudi Arabia.

a मरुस्थल is a landscape or region of land कि is बहुत dry because of low वर्षा amounts ( वर्षण ), प्रायः has little coverage by पौधे, and in जिससे streams शुष्क up unless they हैं supplied by water from बाहर areas.
Deserts can भी be described as क्षेत्रों where more जल is lost by evapotranspiration than falls as precipitation.
Desert पौधे जरूर have खास adaptations to survive with इस little जल.
Deserts generally प्राप्त कम than 25 cm of बरसात ( precipitation ) each year.
Semideserts or steppes are regions जिससे receive between और.
In the Köppen जलवायु classification system, deserts are classed as BWh ( hot desert ) or bwk ( शीतोष्ण desert ).
in the thornthwaite climate वर्गीकरण system, deserts would be classified as arid megathermal climates.
World युद्ध I ( WWI ) was a वैश्विक युद्ध केंद्रित in यूरोपीय that began on 28 जुलाई 1914 and lasted until 11 November 1918.
it थी predominantly पुकारा the संसार युद्ध or the Great War from इसके occurrence until the start of संसार युद्ध ii in 1939, and the पहला संसार युद्ध or World युद्ध i thereafter.
It शामिल सब the world 's great powers, जिससे were assembled in two opposing alliances : the allies ( based on the ट्रिपल entente of the United किंगडम, France और Russia ) and the सेंट्रल Powers ( originally the Triple Alliance of Germany, Austria-Hungary और Italy ; but, as austria–hungary had लिया the अप्रिय against the agreement, Italy did not डालें into the war ).
These alliances यहूद both reorganised and expanded as more nations डाला the war : Italy, Japan and the United States joined the allies, and the Ottoman Empire and Bulgaria the Central शक्तियां.
Ultimately, अधिक than 70 लाख military personnel, सहित 60 million Europeans, were mobilised in एक of the largest wars in इतिहास.
More than 9 million combatants यहूद मारे, largely because of technological advancements that led to विशाल increases in the lethality of weapons without सम्बन्धित सुधार in protection or mobility.
It थी the fifth- deadliest conflict in world इतिहास, subsequently paving the way लिये various political changes, such as revolutions in many of the nations involved.
One of the long-term कल्याणकारी of the युद्ध was the resurgence of imperialism in the foreign नीतियों of the ग्रेट शक्तियां of Europe.
More तत्काल, the assassination of Archduke Franz Ferdinand of Austria, the वारिस to the throne of austria-hungary, on 28 June 1914 by Yugoslav राष्ट्रवादी gavrilo Princip in साराजेवो triggered a diplomatic crisis जब austria-hungary subsequently वितरित an ultimatum to the Kingdom of Serbia.
Several alliances formed over the पिछला decades were invoked.
भीतर weeks, the प्रमुख शक्तियां were at war and, via their colonies, the conflict soon spread around the संसार.
On 28 जुलाई, the Austro-Hungarians fired the पहला गोलियाँ of the war as तैयारी लिये the invasion of सर्बिया.
जबकि the Russians mobilised, the Germans invaded neutral बेल्जियम and ध्वज on the way to France, providing a casus belli for ब्रिटेन 's declaration of युद्ध against जर्मनी.
बाद the German कूच on पेरिस was brought to a halt—the so-called चमत्कार of the marne —the Western Front settled into a स्थिर battle of अपघर्षण with a गर्त line that बदला little until 1917.
On the पूर्वी Front, the रूसी army was कामयाब against the Austro-Hungarians, लकिन थी stopped in its invasion of ईस्ट prussia by the germans.
in November the उस्मानी साम्राज्य joined the war, opening up fronts in the काकेशस, Mesopotamia and the Sinai.
Italy और बुल्गारिया went to युद्ध in 1915 and Romania in 1916.
in Russia, the tsar 's सरकारी collapsed in कूच 1917 और a subsequent क्रान्ति in November brought the russians to terms with the सेंट्रल Powers.
After a 1918 German offensive along the western सामने, the allies drove back the germans in a series of कामयाब offensives और अमरीकी forces began entering the trenches.
Germany, जिससे था its own trouble with revolutionaries, agreed to an armistice on 11 November 1918.
the war ended in विजय for the Allies.
कार्यक्रम on the home fronts were as उग्र as on the बैटल fronts, as the भागीदार tried to mobilize उनके जनशक्ति और आर्थिक संसाधन to लड़ो a कुल war.
By the समाप्त of the war, four प्रमुख इम्पीरियल powers—the जर्मनी, Russian, austro-hungarian and उस्मानी empires—ceased to exist.
The successor states of the former दो lost a great amount of territory, while the latter two were dismantled entirely.
The map of central यूरोपीय was redrawn into several smaller राज्य.
the लीग of राष्ट्र was formed in the आशा of preventing another such conflict.
the यूरोपीय nationalism शाखित by the युद्ध and the ब्रेकअप of empires, the परखना of Germany 's शिकस्त and समस्याएं with the Treaty of Versailles are सहमत to be factors contributing to World युद्ध II.
`` लड़कियों बस Want to Have Fun '' is a 1979 सोंग originally written by रॉबर्ट Hazard and बना famous by सिंगर Cyndi Lauper.
it थी the पहला प्रमुख सिंगल released by Lauper as a सोलो artist और the lead-off सिंगल from her डेब्यू एल्बम She 's So Unusual.
Lauper’s संस्करण gained recognition as a feminist गान और promoted by an award-winning video.
It has महरूम covered on either an album or in सजीव कॉन्सर्ट by over 30 other कलाकारों.
the single थी lauper 's breakthrough hit, reaching # 2 on the Billboard Hot 100 और becoming a worldwide hit throughout late 1983 और जल्दी 1984.
it remains एक of lauper 's signature songs and was a widely लोकप्रिय song दौरान the era of its release, the 1980s.
The `` Rolling Stone & एमटीवी : '100 Greatest Pop गीतों ' : 1-50 '', `` रोलिंग Stone : `` The 100 Top म्यूज़िक Videos '' '' और the `` vh1 : 100 महानतम Videos '' सूचियाँ क्रमित the song at # 22, # 39 and # 45, क्रमशः.
The song received a ग्रैमी पुरस्कार नामांकन for Record of the साल and बेहतरीन Female Pop गायन प्रदर्शन.
View of defibrillator एलेक्ट्रोड position और placement.
Defibrillation is a common उपचार लिये life-threatening cardiac dysrhythmias, ventricular fibrillation, and pulseless ventricular tachycardia.
Defibrillation consists of delivering a therapeutic खुराक of electrical उर्जा to the प्रभावित दिल साथ a device पुकारा a defibrillator.
इस depolarizes a critical mass of the दिल muscle, terminates the dysrhythmia, and allows normal sinus rhythm to be reestablished by the देह 's natural pacemaker, in the sinoatrial node of the दिल.
Defibrillators can be external, transvenous, or implanted, depending on the प्रकार of यंत्र प्रयुक्त or needed.
Some external units, ज्ञात as automated external defibrillators ( AEDs ), automate the diagnosis of treatable rhythms, meaning कि lay responders or bystanders हैं समर्थ to use उन्हें सफलतापूर्वक with little, or in कुछ मामले no training at सब.
The Cato Institute is an अमरीकी libertarian think tank headquartered in वॉशिंगटन, d.c.
it थी founded as the Charles Koch Foundation in 1974 by Murray Rothbard, ed Crane and चार्ल्स koch, chairman of the फलक और मुख्य कार्यपालिका officer of the संगुटिका Koch Industries, inc..
in जुलाई 1976, the name was changed to the Cato संस्थान.
According to the 2011 Global Go To Think Tank Index, Cato is the 6th most influential us आधारित think tank, रैंकिंग 3rd in आर्थिक नीति and 2nd in Social Policy.
the Institute 's stated मिशन is `` to बढ़ाएँ the understanding of public policies based on the principles of limited सरकारी, free markets, व्यक्तिगत स्वतंत्रता, and peace.
the Institute will use the सबसे effective means to originate, advocate, promote, and disseminate applicable policy प्रस्ताव कि बनाएँ free, खोलें, and civil समाजों in the United States और throughout the संसार. ''
केटो विद्वानों were critical of George W. बुश 's Republican administration ( 2001–2009 ) on several मुद्दे, including the Iraq युद्ध, civil liberties, education, agriculture, energy नीति, and excessive government बिता.
on other मुद्दे, वे supported Bush administration initiatives, most notably health care, सोशल Security, वैश्विक warming, tax policy, and immigration.
During the 2008 u.S. अध्यक्षीय election, Cato विद्वानों criticized both major-party उम्मीदवार, John McCain and बराक ओबामा.
Cato रै criticized President Obama 's stances on policy issues since his उद्घाटन, such as फिस्कल stimulus, healthcare reform, विदेशी नीति, and the War on Drugs, while supporting his stance on the repeal of Do n't Ask, do n't बताना and liberal immigration policy.
ड्रैकुला is an 1897 गोथिक हॉरर अनोखा by Irish लेखक Bram स्टोकर.
प्रसिद्ध for introducing the अक्षर of the vampire Count Dracula, the novel tells the story of ड्रैकुला 's attempt to relocate from Transylvania to England, और the बैटल between Dracula और a छोटी समूह of men and women led by Professor Abraham वैन helsing.
ड्रैकुला has been आबंटित to अनेक literary genres including पिशाच literature, हॉरर fiction, the गोथिक novel और invasion literature.
the novel छू on विषयवस्तु such as the role of women in Victorian culture, sexual प्रथाओं, आव्रजन, colonialism, और post-colonialism.
हालांकि Stoker did not इफ़तेरा the पिशाच, he पारिभाषित इसके modern रूप, and the अनोखा has शाखित numerous theatrical, फिल्मी और टेलीविज़न interpretations.
Quidditch is a competitive खेल in the wizarding संसार of the Harry Potter ब्रह्मांड, और is इससे the श्रेणी of children 's novels and movies.
It is an extremely अशिष्ट लकिन very लोकप्रिय semi-contact sport, played by wizards और witches.
Matches are निभाई between दो teams of seven खिलाड़ी riding उड़ती broomsticks, using चार balls and six elevated ring-shaped goals, three on each पक्ष of the Quidditch pitch ( field ).
in the Harry कुम्हार universe, Quidditch holds a fervent following समान to the स्थिति कि संघ फ़ुटबॉल holds as a globally popular खेल.
The sport is monumental throughout the wizarding संसार.
हैरी plays an important स्थिति लिये his हाउस टोली at हॉग्वार्ट्स : he is the seeker and becomes the कप्तान in his sixth year there.
Regional and international प्रतियोगिताओं are उल्लेखित throughout the series.
In Goblet of आग, Quidditch at Hogwarts is रद्द लिये the tri-wizard Tournament, but Harry और the weasleys attend the Quidditch World कप.
In जोड, Harry uses his Quidditch skills to capture a सुनहरी अंडा इससे a dragon पुकारा the हंगेरियाई horntail ( in the first task of the Tri-Wizard टूर्नामेंट ), to capture a flying key in पारस 's स्टोन, और on दो key अवसरों in deathly hallows — getting hold of Ravenclaw 's diadem, and during the final fight साथ Voldemort — the `` unerring कौशल of the seeker '' is उपयोगी to him in snatching the Elder Wand आउट of the air.
हैरी Potter has owned दो broomsticks, the Nimbus 2000 और the Firebolt, दोनो of जिससे are नष्ट by the श्रेणी ' end.
The खेल रै महरूम अपनाया in the real world in the form of Muggle quidditch.
the United राज्य Congress is the bicameral विधानमंडल of the संघीय सरकारी of the संयुक्त States consisting of two घरों : the निम्नतर हाउस known as the House of Representatives and the upper हाउस known as the Senate.
Congress meets in the Capitol in Washington, D.C.
दोनो प्रतिनिधि और सीनेटरों हैं chosen through सीधा election.
Congress has a कुल of 535 मतदान members : 435 सदस्यों in the House of प्रतिनिधि and 100 members in the सीनेट.
Members of the House of प्रतिनिधि serve two-year terms representing the people of a ज़िला.
congressional districts are apportioned to राज्य by population using the United States Census results, प्रत्येक राज्य in the union having at तनिक one representative in the House of Representatives.
regardless of population, each of the 50 राज्य has दो सीनेटरों ; the 100 सीनेटरों प्रत्येक serve a six-year term.
the terms हैं staggered so every दो सालो approximately one-third of the सीनेट is up for चुनाव.
Each staggered समूह of one-third of the senators हैं called 'classes '.
No state of the United राज्य has two senators from the वही class.
Most incumbents seek re-election, and their historical likelihood of winning subsequent elections exceeds 90 percent.
in August 2012, a gallup पोल reported that congress’s स्वीकृति दरजा amongst Americans थी at 10 %, matching a 38-year कम reached in November 2011.
`` a छोटी अधिक देश than कि '' is the title of a song written by जॉय + Rory 's रोरी ली Feek, व्यान varble, and Don Poythress, and अंकित by अमरीकी देश कलाकार Easton कोर्बिन.
it was released in August 2009 as कोर्बिन 's debut single and is included on उसके self-titled debut एल्बम.
In अप्रैल 2010, the song पहुँचे Number One on the देश म्यूज़िक charts, making कोर्बिन the first पुरूष solo artist in seven सालो to भेजें a डेब्यू सिंगल to Number One.
It has been certified सुनहरा by the RIAA.
the ब्लैकबेरी is a line of wireless handheld devices and सेवाएं designed और marketed by Research in Motion Limited ( रिम ) ऑपरेटिंग as ब्लैकबेरी.
the first BlackBerry device, an ईमेल pager, was released in 1999 ; the most recent BlackBerry devices, the Z10 और Q10, यहूद announced on January 30, 2013.
The user इंटरफ़ेस varies by मॉडल ; most feature a physical QWERTY कुंजीपटल, while newer generations have relied on a multi-touch screen और virtual keyboard.
A ब्लैकबेरी can shoot video, take फ़ोटो, play music, and perform online functions such as web-browsing और emailing.
वे can भी send and प्राप्त धक्का ईमेल and instant संदेश जबकि maintaining a high स्तर of सुरक्षा through on-device संदेश encryption, and are designed to फलन as निजी digital assistants.
BlackBerry डिवाइस support a large किस्में of तत्काल messaging features, with the सबसे popular being the proprietary ब्लैकबेरी मेसेंजर service.
The ब्लैकबेरी playbook is a tablet computer offered by the कम्पनी.
the 100 millionth ब्लैकबेरी smartphone थी shipped in June quarter of 2010 और the 200 millionth smartphone was shipped in सितंबर quarter of 2012.
BlackBerry खाते for 3 % of mobile device बिक्री worldwide in 2011, making इसके निर्माता the sixth most popular device मेकर ( 25 % of mobile यंत्र sales are smartphones ).
The उपभोक्ता BlackBerry अंतरजाल Service is उपलब्धियाँ in 91 countries worldwide on over 500 mobile सेवा operators using various mobile technologies.
as of September 2012, वहीँ यहूद अस्सी million सदस्य विश्वव्यापी to BlackBerry.
In 2011 the caribbean and Latin America था the highest penetrations of BlackBerry smartphones विश्वव्यापी, with up to about 45 per cent in the प्रदेश having a रिम यंत्र.
ब्लैकबेरी, iPhone, एंड्रॉइड, and Windows Phone हैं माना the चार major smartphone brands.
BlackBerry is widely referred to as `` crackberry '' in the संयुक्त States, which alludes to its excessive use by its owners and is a reference to the addictiveness of क्रैक कोका.
उपयोग of the पद crackberry became so widespread कि in November 2006 वेबस्टर 's New World College Dictionary नामित `` crackberry '' the `` नई शब्द of the साल. ''
an example of a माँग वक्र shifting.
the shift इससे d1 To d2 means an increase in माँग with consequences for the other परिवर्तनीय
in economics, the demand वक्र is the graph depicting the relationship between the price of a certain commodity and the amount of it कि consumers are willing और समर्थ to खरीदें at कि दिए दाम.
It is a ग्राफिक representation of a demand schedule.
the माँग curve लिये all consumers together follows इससे the demand curve of प्रत्येक individual उपभोक्ता : the individual मांगे at each दाम are added together.
Demand वक्र are प्रयुक्त to estimate behaviors in प्रतिस्पर्धी markets, और are प्रायः combined साथ supply curves to estimate the संतुलन price ( the price at जिससे विक्रेता together are willing to बेचें the same राशि as खरीदार together are willing to buy, भी known as market clearing दाम ) and the संतुलन quantity ( the amount of that good or service that होगा be उत्पादित और खरीदा without surplus/excess supply or shortage/excess demand ) of कि मार्केट.
in a monopolistic market, the माँग वक्र facing the monopolist is simply the market demand curve.
historia
by nikolaos gysis ( 1892 )
History ( from यूनानी - historia, meaning `` inquiry, knowledge acquired by investigation '' ) is an umbrella पद that relates to पास्ट events as खूब as the डिस्कवरी, collection, संगठन, और presentation of information परिचय these events.
The term includes cosmic, geologic, और सशुल्क history, लकिन is often generically implied to औसत इंसान इतिहास.
Scholars who write about इतिहास हैं called इतिहासकारों.
History can भी refer to the अकादमिक discipline जिससे uses a narrative to examine और analyse a sequence of past events, and objectively determine the पैटर्न of cause और effect that determine उन्हें.
इतिहासकारों sometimes बहस the प्रकृति of history and इसके usefulness by discussing the study of the अनुशासन as an समाप्त in itself and as a way of providing `` perspective '' on the problems of the present.
Stories आम to a particular संस्कृति, but नहीं supported by बाह्य स्त्रोत ( ऐसे as the tales surrounding किंग Arthur ) हैं usually classified as सांस्कृतिक heritage or legends, because they do नहीं support the `` disinterested investigation '' required of the discipline of इतिहास.
Events occurring prior to written record हैं माना प्रागितिहास.
Herodotus, a 5th century b.c. Greek इतिहासकार is considered within the Western परंपरा to be the `` father of history '', और, साथ with उसके समकालीन Thucydides, helped रूप the मूलाधार लिये the modern study of इंसान इतिहास.
उनके कार्य continues to be read आज and the divide between the culture-focused Herodotus और the military-focused thucydides remains a point of contention or approach in modern ऐतिहासिक writing.
In the Eastern tradition, a state chronicle the Spring and Autumn annals was ज्ञात to be compiled from as जल्दी as 722 bce हालांकि only 2nd सदी bce texts बच.
Ancient प्रभाव have helped spawn variant interpretations of the प्रकृति of इतिहास which have विकसित over the centuries and continue to बदलें today.
the आधुनिक पढ़ाई of history is wide-ranging, and includes the पढ़ाई of विशिष्ट regions and the पढ़ाई of certain topical or thematical elements of historical investigation.
प्रायः history is taught as part of primary and secondary education, और the academic study of इतिहास is a प्रमुख discipline in विश्वविद्यालयों studies.
Malcolm x ( ; May 19, 1925February 21, 1965 ), born Malcolm Little और भी known as el-hajj Malik El-Shabazz ( ), was an African-American Muslim minister and इंसान अधिकारों activist.
To उसके admirers, he was a साहसी advocate for the अधिकारों of अश्वेतों, a man who indicted श्वेत अमेरिका in the harshest terms for its crimes विरूद्ध ब्लैक अमेरिकी.
detractors accused उसे of preaching racism, ब्लैक supremacy, and violence.
He has been पुकारा one of the greatest and most influential अफ़्रीकी Americans in history.
Malcolm x 's पिता died—killed by श्वेत supremacists, it was rumored—when he थी यंग, and at least एक of his uncles was lynched.
When he was 13, उसके mother थी लगाई in a दिमागी hospital, और he थी placed in a series of foster homes.
In 1946, at age 20, he went to prison लिये तोड़कर and प्रवेश.
In थाना, मैल्कम x became a member of the स्वदेश of Islam ; after his parole in 1952, he quickly रोज़ to become one of इसके नेताओ.
लिये a दर्जन years, Malcolm X was the पब्लिक फेस of the विवादास्पद group, लकिन disillusionment साथ Nation of islam सिर इलियास Muhammad led him to leave the Nation in March 1964.
After a period of travel in अफ़्रीकी और the Middle ईस्ट, he returned to the संयुक्त राज्य, जहाँ he founded Muslim Mosque, inc. और the Organization of afro-american Unity.
In February 1965, less than a year बाद leaving the Nation of Islam, he थी assassinated by three सदस्यों of the group.
Malcolm X 's expressed beliefs changed substantially over समय.
As a spokesman for the स्वदेश of Islam he सिखाया black supremacy और advocated विरह of black और white Americans —in contrast to the civil अधिकारों movement 's जोर on संयोजन.
After breaking with the स्वदेश of islam in 1964—saying of उसके association with it, `` i did अनेक things as a [ Black ] Muslim that i 'm sorry for now.
I was a zombie then... pointed in a certain दिशा और बताई to कूच '' —and becoming a सुन्नी मुस्लिम, he disavowed जातिवाद और expressed willingness to work साथ civil rights नेताओ, he continued to emphasize Pan-Africanism, black self-determination, and self-defense.
हेनरी Merritt `` हांक '' Paulson, Jr. ( born March 28, 1946 ) is an अमरीकी बैंकर जो served as the 74th United States Secretary of the Treasury.
He था served as the अध्यक्ष और Chief Executive अधिकारी of Goldman Sachs, and is now अध्यक्ष of the Paulson Institute, जिससे he संस्थापित in 2011 to promote चिरस्थायी economic growth and a क्लीनर environment around the संसार, with an आरंभिक focus on the संयुक्त राज्य and चीन.
a virtual machine ( VM ) is a तन्त्र implemented abstraction of the underlying हार्डवेयर, जिससे is प्रस्तुत to the अनुप्रयोग परत of the system.
Virtual machines may be आधारित on विशेषताएँ of a काल्पनिक computer or emulate the कंप्यूटर architecture and functions of a real संसार computer.
Spiders ( अनुक्रम Araneae ) हैं air-breathing arthropods that have आठ टाँगे and chelicerae with fangs that inject venom.
They हैं the largest अनुक्रम of arachnids and rank seventh in total प्रजाति diversity among सब other समूह of organisms.
Spiders हैं मिला विश्वव्यापी on every महाद्वीप मगर for Antarctica, and have become established in nearly every आवास with the एक्सेप्शन of air और sea colonization.
as of 2008, at तनिक 43,678 spider प्रजाति, और 109 परिवारों have महरूम अंकित by taxonomists ; however, वहीँ has been confusion within the वैज्ञानिक community as to how सब ये families चाहिए be classified, as evidenced by the over 20 अलग classifications that have महरूम proposed since 1900.
Anatomically, spiders differ from other arthropods in that the usual body खण्ड हैं fused into दो tagmata, the cephalothorax और उदर, और joined by a छोटी, cylindrical pedicel.
Unlike insects, spiders do not have antennae.
In all मगर the most primitive group, the mesothelae, spiders have the most centralized nervous systems of all arthropods, as all their ganglia are fused into एक द्रव्यमान in the cephalothorax.
नापसंद सबसे arthropods, spiders have no extensor muscles in उनके limbs और instead extend them by hydraulic pressure.
उनके abdomens bear appendages कि have महरूम modified into spinnerets that extrude silk from up to six प्रकार of silk glands भीतर उनके उदर.
Spider webs vary widely in आकार, shape और the amount of स्टिकी thread used.
It अभी appears that the spiral orb web may be एक of the earliest फ़ॉर्म, and spiders that उपज tangled cobwebs are more abundant and विविध than orb-web मकड़ियों.
Spider-like arachnids साथ silk-producing spigots appeared in the devonian period परिचय, but these animals apparently lacked spinnerets.
सच्चा spiders have महरूम found in carboniferous रॉक्स from, और हैं बहुत समान to the सबसे primitive surviving अनुक्रम, the mesothelae.
the main समूह of आधुनिक spiders, mygalomorphae and Araneomorphae, first appeared in the Triassic काल, पहले.
A herbivorous species, Bagheera kiplingi, थी described in 2008, but all अन्य known species are परभक्षी, mostly preying on insects और on other spiders, although a few विशाल प्रजाति भी लो birds and lizards.
Spiders use a wide range of रणनीति to कैप्चर शिकार : trapping it in स्टिकी webs, lassoing it with sticky bolas, mimicking the शिकार to avoid डिटेक्शन, or कार्यशील it down.
Most detect शिकार mainly by संवेदन vibrations, लकिन the active hunters have acute दृष्टि, और hunters of the genus portia दिखाएँ लक्षण of intelligence in their चुनाव of tactics and क्षमता to develop नई ones.
मकड़ियों ' गुस्ताखी हैं too narrow to लो solids, और वे liquidize their food by बाढ़ it with digestive एंजाइमों and grinding it साथ the bases of उनके pedipalps, as they do not have true jaws.
पुरूष spiders पहचानो themselves by a variety of जटिल courtship rituals to avoid being खाया by the females.
Males of सबसे species survive a few matings, सीमित मुख्यतः by their छोटी जीवन spans.
Females weave रेशा egg-cases, प्रत्येक of which may contain hundreds of अंडे.
महिलाओं of अनेक प्रजाति परवाह लिये their यंग, for example by carrying them around or by sharing food with उन्हें.
A अल्पसंख्यक of प्रजाति are social, building communal webs that may house anywhere इससे a few to 50,000 individuals.
सोशल behavior ranges इससे precarious toleration, as in the विधवा spiders, to co-operative शिकार and food-sharing.
हालांकि most spiders सजीव for at सबसे दो सालो, tarantulas and अन्य mygalomorph मकड़ियों can सजीव up to 25 years in captivity.
While the venom of a few प्रजाति is खतरनाक to humans, scientists हैं now researching the उपयोग of spider venom in medicine और as non-polluting pesticides.
Spider silk provides a संयोजन of lightness, strength और लोच that is superior to कि of सिंथेटिक सामग्री, और मकड़ी रेशा जीनों have महरूम inserted into mammals and plants to see if ये can be used as रेशा कारखानों.
As a परिणाम of their wide दायरा of behaviors, मकड़ियों have become common प्रतीकों in art और mythology symbolizing various combinations of patience, cruelty and creative शक्तियां.

Household income is a measure commonly used by the United States government and private संस्थानों.
Each household is measured by the income of प्रत्येक निवासी over the age of 15.
Income शामिल wages और salaries, unemployment बीमे, विकलांगता payments, चाइल्ड support payments प्राप्त, नियमित rental रसीदें, as well as any निजी business, investment, or अन्य kinds of income received routinely.
While inflation-adjusted ( `` real '' ) household income had been increasing almost प्रत्येक year from 1945 to 1999, it has since been flat and भी decreased recently.
u.S. मध्य household आय गिरी from $ 51,144 in 2010 to $ 50,502 in 2011.
Extreme poverty in the United States, meaning households living on less than $ 2 per day before government benefits, doubled from 1996 to 1.5 लाख households in 2011, सहित 2.8 लाख children.
The residents of the household do not have to be related to the head of the household for their आय to be माना part of the household 's income.
As households tend to share a similar आर्थिक context, the उपयोग of household income remains among the most widely स्वीकृत measures of आय.
That the size of a household is नहीं commonly लिया into account in such उपायों may distort any विश्लेषण of fluctuations within or among the household आय श्रेणी, और may render direct comparisons between quintiles मुश्किल or even नामुमकिन.
A पंजीकृत agent, भी known as a resident agent or statutory एजेंट, in United राज्य business विधि, is a business or individual designated to receive service of process ( SOP ) when a business एंटिटी is a पार्टी in a legal action ऐसे as a lawsuit or summons.
the registered agent 's address may भी be where the state होगा send the कागजी for the yearly नवीकरण of the business एंटिटी 's चार्टर.
The registered एजेंट लिये a कारोबार entity may be an individual member of the company, or ( more often ) a तीसरा पार्टी, such as the संगठन 's lawyer or a service company.
विफलता to properly maintain a पंजीकृत agent can affect a company negatively.

`` जीवन, Liberty, और the pursuit of Happiness '' is a well-known phrase in the United राज्य घोषणा of Independence.
the phrase is meant to exemplify the `` unalienable अधिकारों '' with जिससे all इंसान beings हैं endowed by उनके creator for उनके protection of which वे institute governments.
तलवारबाजी, is typically divided into Olympic fencing, Classical fencing और ऐतिहासिक तलवारबाजी,.
The खेल of fencing ( commonly called ओलम्पिक fencing or प्रतिस्पर्धी तलवारबाजी ) is divided into three weapon categories : foil, सब्रे और épée.
Classical fencing uses the वही तीन हथियार, but approaches तलवारबाजी as a martial art.
प्रतिस्पर्धी तलवारबाजी is one of पाँच sports जिससे रै been featured at प्रत्येक one of the modern ओलम्पिक Games, the other चार being Athletics, Cycling, Swimming, and जिमनास्टिक्स.
The quadriceps femoris ( Latin लिये `` four-headed मांसपेशी of the femur `` ), also पुकारा बस the quadriceps, quadriceps extensor, quads, is a large मांसपेशी समूह that includes the चार prevailing muscles on the सामने of the जांघ.
It is the great extensor muscle of the घुटना, forming a large fleshy mass which covers the सामने और पहलू of the femur.
The उचित लैटिन बहुवचन रूप of the adjective quadriceps would be quadricipites.
in modern अंग्रेज़ी usage, quadriceps is used in both singular और plural.
The एकवचन form quadricep, produced by hypercorrection, is frequently प्रयुक्त.
RMS Titanic was a अंग्रेजों यात्री लाइनर कि sank in the North अटलांटिक Ocean on 15 अप्रैल 1912 बाद colliding साथ an iceberg दौरान उसके maiden voyage from Southampton, UK to नई यॉर्क City, US.
the sinking of टाइटैनिक caused the deaths of 1,502 people in one of the deadliest peacetime maritime disasters in modern history.
The RMS टाइटैनिक थी the largest ship afloat at the समय of her maiden voyage.
She was the दूसरी of three Olympic class समंदर liners operated by the श्वेत स्टार लकीर, और she was built by the harland and Wolff डॉकयार्ड in Belfast with Thomas एंड्रयूज, who perished with the ship, as her naval architect.
On उसके maiden voyage, she carried 2,224 passengers और crew.
Under the command of Edward Smith, her यात्री included some of the wealthiest people in the world, as खूब as सैंकड़ों of emigrants from ग्रेट ब्रिटेन and आयरलैंड, scandinavia and elsewhere throughout यूरोपीय seeking a new life in उत्तर America.
the ship was designed to be the last शब्द in comfort और लक्ज़री, साथ an on-board gymnasium, तैराकी pool, libraries, high-class restaurants और opulent cabins.
She also था a powerful बेतार टेलीग्राफ provided लिये the convenience of passengers as खूब as लिये operational use.
हालांकि वो had उन्नत safety features such as watertight compartments और remotely activated watertight doors, वो lacked enough lifeboats to accommodate सब of those सवार.
क्युकी of outdated maritime safety regulations, she carried तभी पर्याप्त lifeboats for 1,178 people—slightly अधिक than half of the number travelling on the maiden voyage, और one-third her कुल passenger and crew capacity.
After leaving southampton on 10 अप्रैल 1912, Titanic called at Cherbourg in फ़्रांस and Queenstown ( now Cobh ) in आयरलैंड before heading westwards towards नई York.
On 14 April 1912, चार days into the crossing and परिचय 375 मील ( 600 km ) south of Newfoundland, she hit an हिमशैल at 11:40 pm जलयान 's समय.
The glancing टक्कर caused titanics hull प्लेटों to buckle inwards साथ उसके स्टारबोर्ड side और opened five of उसके sixteen watertight compartments to the समुद्र ; the जलयान धीरे filled with water.
Meanwhile, passengers और कुछ crew सदस्यों यहूद evacuated in lifeboats, अनेक of जिससे were launched only partly loaded.
A disproportionate number of men यहूद बाएँ सवार because of a `` महिलाओं और children पहला `` प्रोटोकॉल followed by कुछ of the अधिकारियों लदान the lifeboats.
by 2:20 AM, वो broke अलावा and foundered, साथ well over एक हजार लोगों स्टिल aboard.
Just under two hours after the टाइटैनिक foundered, the Cunard लाइनर RMS carpathia arrived on the scene of the sinking, where she brought सवार an अनुमानित 705 survivors.
The disaster थी greeted with विश्वव्यापी shock and आक्रोश at the विशाल घाटा of life and the regulatory and operational failures कि था led to it.
Public inquiries in Britain and the United राज्य led to major improvements in मेरीटाइम सुरक्षा.
One of उनके सबसे महत्वपूर्ण legacies was the स्थापना in 1914 of the अंतरराष्ट्रीय सम्मेलन लिये the Safety of Life at Sea ( solas ), जिससे still governs maritime सुरक्षा today.
additionally, several new wireless regulations were passed around the संसार in an प्रयत्न to learn from the many missteps in wireless संचार -- -which could have saved many अधिक passengers.
अनेक of the survivors lost all of their धन और possessions and यहूद left अक्षम ; many परिवारों, विशेषकर those of crew members from southampton, lost their primary bread-winners.
वे were helped by an outpouring of public सहानुभूति and charitable दान.
कुछ of the male survivors were अभियुक्त of cowardice for leaving the जलयान जबकि लोगों यहूद स्टिल on फलक ; the White Star Line 's अध्यक्ष, J. Bruce ismay, faced सोशल ostracism for the बाकी of उसके जीवन.
the wreck of the टाइटैनिक remains on the समुद्रतल, split in two and धीरे disintegrating at a गहराई of.
चूंकि इसके discovery in 1985, thousands of artefacts have been recovered और put on प्रदर्शक at संग्रहालय around the world.
टाइटैनिक has become one of the most प्रसिद्ध जहाजों in इतिहास, her memory kept alive by numerous books, folk songs, films, दर्शाती, और memorials.
the human leg is the entire lower extremity or limb of the इंसान body, including the foot, जांघ and भी the हिप or gluteal region ; however, the precise परिभाषा in इंसान anatomy refers तभी to the section of the lower limb extending from the knee to the ankle.
टाँगे हैं used for standing, walking, कूद, कार्यशील, kicking, and similar क्रियाएँ, और constitute a significant portion of a व्यक्ति 's mass.
इस आलेख is परिचय the demographic features of the population of तुर्कों, including population density, नस्ल, शिक्षा स्तर, health of the populace, आर्थिक status, religious संबद्धों और अन्य aspects of the population.
as of 2010, the जनसांख्यिकी of Turkey is estimated to be 73.7 लाख with a विकास रेट of 1.21 % per annum ( 2009 figure ).
the जनसांख्यिकी is अपेक्षाकृत young with 26.6 % गिरना in the 0-14 आयु bracket.

A full-size car is a विपणन term प्रयुक्त in उत्तर America लिये an automobile larger than a mid-size car.
In the United States, the EPA uses the term `` विशाल car '' to denote full-size cars.
Joel Grey ( born अप्रैल 11, 1932 ) is an अमरीकी स्टेज and screen actor, सिंगर, and dancer, known for his भूमिका as the निपुण of ceremonies in both the stage and film adaptation of the kander & Ebb musical Cabaret.
He has won the Academy पुरस्कार, टोनी Award and Golden Globe पुरस्कार.

James Madison, jr. ( March 16, 1751 ( o.s. March 5 ) – जून 28, 1836 ) थी an अमरीकी statesman and राजनैतिक theorist, the चौथी President of the United States ( 1809–1817 ).
He is hailed as the “Father of the Constitution” for being इंस्ट्रूमेंटल in the drafting of the United States संविधान and as the key champion and लेखक of the United States विधेयक of अधिकारों.
he परोसा as a politician much of his adult life.
After the constitution था been drafted, Madison became एक of the नेताओ in the movement to ratify it.
His सहयोग with सिकंदर हैमिल्टन and जॉन jay produced the federalist papers ( 1788 ).
Circulated only in New York at the time, they would later be माना among the most महत्वपूर्ण polemics in support of the Constitution.
he was भी a delegate to the वर्जिनिया constitutional ratifying सम्मेलन, and थी इंस्ट्रूमेंटल to the successful ratification effort in Virginia.
Like सबसे of his contemporaries, मैडिसन बदला his राजनैतिक views during his life.
दौरान the drafting और ratification of the संविधान, he favored a दमदार नेशनल government, though बाद he grew to favor stronger राज्य सरकारें, before settling between the two extremes लेट in उसके life.
in 1789, मैडिसन became a नेता in the नई House of Representatives, drafting many मौलिक laws.
He is notable लिये drafting the first ten amendments to the Constitution, and thus is ज्ञात as the `` Father of the विधेयक of Rights ``.
मैडिसन worked closely साथ President George वॉशिंगटन to organize the नई federal सरकारी.
तोड़कर with Hamilton और what became the federalist पार्टी in 1791, Madison and थामस जेफरसन व्यवस्थित what वे पुकारा the Republican Party ( बाद called by historians the democratic-republican Party )
as jefferson’s Secretary of State ( 1801–1809 ), मैडिसन supervised the Louisiana खरीदें, जिससे doubled the nation’s आकार.
बाद his election to the presidency, he presided over renewed prosperity for several years.
as अध्यक्ष ( 1809–17 ), after the विफलता of diplomatic विरोध and a व्यापार embargo विरूद्ध ग्रेट Britain, he led the nation into the War of 1812.
he was responding to British encroachments on American honor and rights ; in जोड, he wanted to end the influence of the अंग्रेजों among their Indian allies, whose प्रतिरोध अवरोधित संयुक्त States उपनिवेश in the मिडवेस्ट around the Great झीलों.
मैडिसन found the युद्ध to be an प्रशासनिक nightmare, as the United राज्य था neither a strong army nor वित्तीय प्रणाली ; as a परिणाम, he afterward समर्थित a stronger national सरकारी और a दमदार सैन्य, as well as the national बैंको, which he had long opposed.
जैसे other वर्जिनिया statesmen in the स्लेव समाज, he was a slaveholder who inherited his plantation known as Montpelier, और स्वामित्व सैंकड़ों of स्लेव during his आजीवन to cultivate तम्बाकू and अन्य crops.
Madison समर्थित the three-fifths सुलह that अनुमत three-fifths of the enumerated population of स्लेव to be गिने for representation.
`` रोमन 's बदला '' is a सोंग performed by American rapper Nicki minaj इससे उसके डेब्यू studio album गुलाबी Friday.
It थी लिखा by minaj और rapper एमिनेम, जो is also featured in the सोंग, and was produced by Swizz Beatz.
it थी released exclusively on October 30, 2010 through the us itunes Store, as a promotional रिलीज preceding the एल्बम 's रिलीज.
the song initiated a feud between Lil ' किम और Minaj, where अनेक लोगों felt the सोंग was निर्देशित at Lil ' Kim and regarded around उसके feelings towards minaj 's वृद्धि to कीर्ति.
The song references Minaj 's alter-ego, Roman zolanski, and Eminem 's alter-ego, पतला छायादार.

हाइड्रोलिक fluid being poured.
हाइड्रोलिक fluids, भी called हाइड्रोलिक liquids, are the मीडियम by which power is transferred in hydraulic मशीनरी.
Common हाइड्रोलिक fluids हैं आधारित on mineral oil or water.
उदाहरण of उपकरण कि might उपयोग hydraulic fluids include excavators और backhoes, हाइड्रोलिक brakes, power steering systems, transmissions, कचरा ट्रक, aircraft flight control systems, lifts, and औद्योगिक machinery.
Hydraulic प्रणालियों like the ones उल्लेखित ऊपर will work most efficiently if the hydraulic fluid प्रयुक्त रै no compressibility
महिंद्रा Tractor
Mahindra Tractors, the फार्म equipment प्रभाग of Mahindra & महिंद्रा, builds and sources tractors कि are बेची worldwide across छह continents.
महिंद्रा is भी among the शीर्ष तीन tractor निर्माताओं in the world.
Mahindra रै a huge उपभोक्ता base in इण्डिया, चीन and America and a growing आधार in Australia.
the कम्पनी builds अधिक tractors in India than कोई other निर्माता, and has the क्षमता to निर्माण 150,000 tractors a year.
In 1963, m & m formed a joint venture with अंतरराष्ट्रीय Harvester to manufacture tractors carrying the महिंद्रा nameplate लिये the भारतीय market.
हथियारबंद साथ engineering, tooling और manufacturing know-how gained from इस relationship, M & M developed its first ट्रैक्टर, the B-275.
महिंद्रा Tractors with बिक्री of nearly 85,000 इकाई annually is one of the largest tractor companies in the संसार, and is क्रमांक one in sales in इण्डिया - the largest tractor market in the संसार.
To expand into the growing tractor market in चीन, महिंद्रा acquired majority हिस्सेदारी in jiangling.
To उठाएँ जागरूकता परिचय महिंद्रा in the us, Mahindra USA घोषित इसके नई sponsorship in the nascar Nationwide Series with r3 Motorsports, जिससे is participating with a # 23 Mahindra tractors Chevrolet.
The car will be driven by Robert Richardson, jr. Mahindra यूएसए, Inc. announced a 17-race प्राथमिक and 18-race associate sponsorship लिये the 2009 nascar देशभर Series.
साथ इस sponsorship, Mahindra was the first Indian company to sponsor a car in NASCAR.
In 2008, Mahindra थी a sponsor of the मैकडोनाल्ड मोटरस्पोर्ट टोली जिससे ran the # 81 car in the NASCAR Nationwide Series.
The power6 is a माइक्रोप्रोसेसर developed by ibm that implemented the Power isa v.2.03.
When it became available in प्रणालियों in 2007, it succeeded the POWER5+ as IBM 's फ्लैगशिप Power माइक्रोप्रोसेसर.
It is भाग of the eCLipz project, said to have a लक्ष्य of converging ibm 's सर्वर hardware where practical ( hence `` ipz '' in the एक्रोनिम : iSeries, pseries, and zSeries ).
the अमरीकी middle क्लास is a social class in the United States.
जबकि the अवधारणा is typically ambiguous in popular opinion और आम language use, समकालीन सोशल वैज्ञानिकों have put आगे अनेक, more or less congruent, theories on the अमरीकी middle क्लास.
depending on क्लास model used, the middle क्लास may constitute anywhere from 25 % to 66 % of households.
एक of the पहला major studies of the middle क्लास in America was White Collar : the American Middle Classes, published in 1951 by sociologist C. Wright Wright_Mills मिलों Wright_Mills.
Later sociologists ऐसे as Dennis गिल्बर्ट of हैमिल्टन College commonly divide the मध्य क्लास into दो sub-groups.
Constituting roughly 15 % to 20 % of households is the अपर or पेशेवर middle क्लास consisting of अत्यधिक educated, salaried पेशेवर and managers.
constituting roughly one तीसरा of households is the निम्नतर middle क्लास consisting mostly of semi-professionals, skilled craftsmen और lower-level management.
Middle-class persons commonly have a आरामदायक standard of जीना, significant आर्थिक security, considerable work autonomy and rely on their expertise to sustain themselves.
Members of the मध्य class belong to विविध समूह which overlap with each अन्य.
overall, middle-class persons, especially upper-middle-class individuals, are characterized by conceptualizing, creating और consulting.
यूँ, कॉलेज education is one of the प्रमुख indicators of middle-class औकात.
Largely attributed to the nature of middle-class occupations, मध्य class values tend to emphasize independence, adherence to मूलभूत standards, valuing नवीनता और respecting non-conformity.
नीतियां more क्रियाशील than अन्य demographics, कॉलेज educated middle क्लास professionals are विभाजित between the two major parties.
आय varies considerably इससे near the national median to well in excess of $ 100,000.
household income आंकड़े, however, do not always reflect class status and standard of living, as they हैं largely influenced by the number of income earners and fail to recognize household size.
It is therefore possible लिये a विशाल, dual-earner, lower middle class household to out-earn a small, one-earner, upper मध्य class household.
The middle वर्ग हैं बहुत influential, as they encompass the बहुमत of voters, लेखक, teachers, पत्रकारों, और सम्पादक.
Most societal trends in the US originate within the middle classes.
