A विपत्ति is a प्राकृतिक or man-made ( or technological ) hazard resulting in an इवेंट of substantial extent causing significant शारीरिक damage or विनाश, loss of life, or drastic change to the environment.
A विपत्ति can be ostensively defined as any tragic इवेंट stemming from events ऐसे as earthquakes, floods, अनर्थकारी accidents, fires, or explosions.
It is a घटना that can cause damage to life and property and नष्ट the आर्थिक, सोशल and cultural life of people.
In contemporary academia, आपदाओं हैं देखी as the consequence of inappropriately प्रबंधित risk.
ये risks are the उत्पाद of a संयोजन of दोनो hazard/s और vulnerability.
Hazards कि strike in areas with low vulnerability होगा never become आपदाओं, as is the मामला in uninhabited regions.
Developing countries suffer the greatest लागत जब a disaster hits – more than 95 प्रतिशत of सब deaths caused by disasters occur in विकासशील countries, and losses due to प्राकृतिक disasters are 20 times वृहद ( as a प्रतिशत of GDP ) in developing countries than in industrialized countries.
In कम्प्यूटिंग, booting ( also known as booting up ) is the initial set of operations that a computer system performs when electrical शक्ति to the cpu is switched on.
the process begins when a कंप्यूटर is turned on for the पहला time or is re-energized after being turned बंद, and ends when the computer is ready to perform इसके सामान्य operations.
on modern सामान्य purpose computers, this can लो tens of seconds और typically involves performing a power-on self-test, locating and initializing peripheral डिवाइस, और then ढूंढना, loading and starting an ऑपरेटिंग system.
अनेक कंप्यूटर प्रणालियों also allow ये operations to be initiated by a तन्त्र command बगैर साइकिलिंग power, in कया is ज्ञात as a नरम reboot, हालांकि कुछ of the initial परिचालन might be छोड़ा on a soft रिबूट.
A बूट लोडर is a computer program that loads the main ऑपरेटिंग प्रणाली or runtime पर्यावरण for the कंप्यूटर बाद completion of the self-tests.
the computer term boot is छोटी for बूटस्ट्रैप or bootstrap लोड और गर्भाशयी from the phrase to खींचो oneself up by एक 's bootstraps.
The usage काल्स attention to the requirement that, if most तन्त्र is loaded onto a computer by अन्य software already running on the computer, some mechanism must exist to load initial software onto the computer.
Early कंप्यूटर used a variety of ad-hoc methods to मिलेंगी a छोटी कार्यक्रम into मेमोरी to solve इस प्रॉब्लम.
The invention of integrated सर्किट read-only memory ( rom ) of various प्रकार solved this विरोधाभास by allowing कंप्यूटर to be shipped साथ a प्रारंभ up program कि could not be erased.
विकास in the capacity of ROM रै अनुमत ever अधिक elaborate प्रारंभ up प्रक्रियाओं to be implemented.
on सामान्य purpose computers, the बूट process begins साथ the निष्पादन of an initial program stored in boot roms or पढ़ा in another फ़ैशन.
In कुछ older कंप्यूटर, the initial program might have been the application to चलाएं, if no operating system was used, or the operating system.
In other कंप्यूटर, the initial कार्यक्रम is a बूट loader कि may then लोड into random-access memory ( RAM ), इससे nonvolatile secondary storage ( ऐसे as a hard disk drive ) or, in some older computers, from a medium ऐसे as punched ताश, punched tape, or magnetic tape in older computers, the binary कोड of an operating system or runtime environment and then execute it.
If the boot लोडर is सीमित in its size and capabilities, it may, instead, load a larger और अधिक capable secondary बूट loader, which होता then load the ऑपरेटिंग system or runtime पर्यावरण.
Some embedded systems do नहीं require a noticeable boot sequence to शुरू functioning और जब turned on may simply run operational programs that are stored in ROM.
firebird is an open source SQL रिलेशनल database management system that runs on लिनक्स, खिड़कियाँ, and a variety of Unix.
the database forked इससे Borland 's open सोर्स संस्करण of interbase in 2000, लकिन चूंकि firebird 1.5 the code has महरूम largely rewritten.
Outsourcing is the contracting out of an internal business प्रक्रम to a third-party organization.
The practice of contracting a business process आउट to a third party बल्कि than स्टॉफ it internally is common in the आधुनिक economy.
The term `` आउटसोर्सिंग '' became लोकप्रिय in the संयुक्त राज्य near the फेरे of the 21st सदी.
आउटसोर्सिंग sometimes involves transferring कर्मचारी और assets from one कड़ to another, but not always.
the definition of outsourcing includes both विदेशी and domestic contracting, and sometimes includes offshoring, जिससे अर्थात् relocating a कारोबार function to another देश.
Financial बचत इससे lower international labor rates is a बिग प्रेरणा for outsourcing/offshoring.
The opposite of आउटसोर्सिंग is called insourcing, which entails bringing processes handled by third-party firms in-house, and is sometimes संपन्नता via लंबवत संयोजन.
However, a कारोबार can provide a अनुबंध service to another business without necessarily insourcing कि business process.
इंसान immunodeficiency वायरस ( hiv ) is a lentivirus ( slowly replicating retrovirus ) that कल्याणकारी acquired immunodeficiency सिंड्रोम ( AIDS ), a condition in इंसानो in जिससे progressive failure of the प्रतिरक्षा system allows life-threatening opportunistic infections और cancers to thrive.
Infection with HIV occurs by the transfer of blood, वीर्य, vaginal द्रव, pre-ejaculate, or स्तन मिल्क.
Within these bodily fluids, HIV is present as दोनो free वायरस अणु और virus भीतर infected immune cells.
hiv infects vital cells in the इंसान immune system ऐसे as helper t कोशिकाएं ( specifically CD4 + T कोशिकाएं ), macrophages, and dendritic cells.
hiv infection लीड to कम स्तर of CD4+ T कोशिकाएं through a number of mechanisms including : apoptosis of uninfected bystander कोशिकाएं, direct वाइरल killing of संक्रमित cells, and killing of infected CD4+ t cells by CD8 cytotoxic lymphocytes कि recognize संक्रमित cells.
जब CD4+ t cell numbers decline below a नाजुक level, cell-mediated immunity is lost, और the body becomes progressively more susceptible to opportunistic infections.
the firepole in a आग स्टेशन in टोरंटो
A fireman 's pole ( also called a स्लाइडिंग ध्रुव or firepole ) is a लकड़ी pole or a metal tube or pipe installed between floors in आग स्टेशन, allowing अग्निशमन responding to an सचेतक to quickly descend to the ground floor faster than by using a मानक staircase.
The यंत्र was invented in the 1870s by David Kenyon, in शिकागो, Illinois, हालांकि it is often incorrectly credited to the Boston आग विभाग.
Mary poppins is the title character of a श्रेणी of children 's books written by P. L. ट्रेवर्स.
Throughout the मरियम poppins series, जिससे lasted from 1934 to 1988, Mary Shepard was the इलस्ट्रेटर और acted as a second author.
The books केन्द्र on a magical English nanny, Mary Poppins.
She is blown by the East wind to Number Seventeen Cherry Tree Lane, London, and into the बैंको ' household to परवाह लिये उनके children.
Encounters with चिमनी sweeps, दुकानदारों and various adventures follow until Mary poppins abruptly leaves, i.e., `` pops-out ''.
The adventures take place over a कुल of आठ books.
however, only the पहला तीन books feature मरियम poppins arriving and leaving.
the later five books recount previously unrecorded adventures from उसके असली three visits.
as P. L. Travers explains in उसके परिचय to Mary Poppins in the पार्क, `` She can नहीं forever arrive and depart. ''
the books were adapted in 1964 into a musical डिज़्नी film अभिनीत जूली Andrews और लंड वैन Dyke.
in 2004, डिज़्नी Theatrical उत्पादित a stage musical adaptation in the West End थिएटर.
The स्टेज musical थी transferred to ब्रॉडवे in 2006 where it भागा जबतक its closing on March 3, 2013.
it रै been अत्यधिक successful, as was the 1964 film.
The Last सोंग is a 2010 अमरीकी coming of age teen romantic नाटक film विकसित alongside Nicholas Sparks ' अनोखा by the वही नाम.
the film was directed by Julie Anne Robinson in her feature फिल्मी directorial डेब्यू and co-written by Sparks and जेफ़ Van Wie.
The Last सोंग stars Miley Cyrus, लियाम hemsworth, and ग्रेग kinnear and follows a troubled किशोरावस्था as she reconnects साथ her estranged पिता and falls in love during a गर्मियाँ in a शांत दक्षिणी संयुक्त States beach कस्बा.
the film is वितरित by Touchstone Pictures.
Sparks was approached to write both the film 's screenplay and the novel.
Sparks समाप्त the screenplay in January 2009, prior to the पूर्णता of the अनोखा, making the Last Song his first script to be optioned for फिल्मी.
The setting, originally in North Carolina जैसे the novel, moved to Georgia after the states था campaigned for महीने to host production.
Upon beginning production in tybee Island, Georgia and आसपास Savannah, the Last सोंग became the first फिल्म to be both shot and set in Tybee द्वीप.
Filming lasted from June 15 to अगस्त 18, 2009 साथ much of it occurring on the द्वीप 's beach and बांध.
The पिछला Song was originally अनुसूचित लिये wide release on January 8, 2010, लकिन was postponed to March 31, 2010.
Written Simlish
simlish is a fictional language featured in EA खेल ' Sim श्रेणी of games.
it debuted in SimCopter, and रै महरूम विशेषकर prominent in The Sims, The सीम 2 और the सीम 3.
the Sims development team निर्मित the अद्वितीय simlish भाषा by experimenting with fractured Ukrainian, French, लैटिन, Finnish, अंग्रेज़ी, fijian, Cebuano, और Tagalog.
simlish can भी be heard in simcity 4, simcity समाजों and simcity 2013, लकिन दूर कम frequently.
Civilized Creatures in spore can also be taught to बोलो Simlish.
it is also प्रदर्शित to an extent in firaxis Games ' Sid मायर 's simgolf.
Designer होगा राइट was सचेत of the need for संवाद in the खेल, but विचार कि using a रियल language would make it sound too repetitive and would also be too costly to hire translators for world languages.
Initially, प्रेरित by the Native अमरीकी code talkers of संसार युद्ध II, Sims निर्माता Will Wright and language विशेषज्ञ मार्क Gimbel suggested experimenting with the Navajo language to बनाएँ Simlish.
However, वे ultimately decided that simlish worked बेहतरीन as a `` भाषा '' बना up of gibberish शब्द कि could n't be translated, so that its meaning होता be left open to the imagination of the player.
Wright later commented that using `` nonsense भाषा '' turned out to be the सही development चुनाव, as लोगों यहूद capable of imagining it अधिक realistically than a computer could simulate a रियल एक.
The वास्तविक sound of simlish was created improvisationally by voice actors स्टीफन Kearin and Gerri Lawlor.
An example of अल्ट्रासोनिक परीक्षण ( UT ) on blade roots of a V2500 IAE वायुयान engine.
Step 1 : The ut जांच is placed on the रूट of the ब्लेड to be inspected with the सहायता of a special borescope tool ( वीडियो जांच ).
Step 2 : Instrument जमावट are input.
Step 3 : The जांच is scanned over the blade root.
in इस मामला, an indication ( शिखर in the data ) through the red line ( or gate ) indicates a शुभ blade ; an indication to the बाएँ of कि दायरा indicates a क्रैक.
Principle of ultrasonic परीक्षण.
बाएँ : A जांच भेजना a ध्वनि wave into a test material.
There हैं two indications, one from the आरंभिक pulse of the probe, and the second due to the back wall echo.
सही : A defect creates a तीसरा indication और simultaneously reduces the amplitude of the back वॉल indication.
The गहराई of the defect is संकल्पित by the ratio D/E
in ultrasonic testing ( UT ), very छोटी अल्ट्रासोनिक pulse-waves साथ बीच बारंबारता ranging इससे 0.1-15 mhz and occasionally up to 50 MHz are launched into materials to detect आतंरिक flaws or to characterize materials.
a common example is ultrasonic thickness measurement, which tests the thickness of the परीक्षण object, for उदाहरण, to monitor pipework corrosion.
Ultrasonic testing is प्रायः performed on स्टील and other metals और alloys, though it can also be used on concrete, wood और composites, albeit साथ less रेज़ोल्यूशन.
It is a रूप of non-destructive testing used in many industries सहित aerospace, ऑटोमोटिव और other transportation सेक्टर.
the vas deferens ( plural : vasa deferentia ), भी called ductus deferens ( Latin : `` carrying-away पोत '' ; बहुवचन : ductus deferentes ), is part of the पुरूष anatomy of अनेक vertebrates ; वे transport sperm from the epididymis in anticipation of ejaculation.
Vascular ischemia of the toes साथ characteristic cyanosis.
in medicine, ischemia, also spelled as ischaemia or ischæmia, ( ; इससे Greek language ισχαιμία, ischaimía ; isch- root denoting a प्रतिबंध or thinning or to make or grow thin/lean, haema रक्त ) is a प्रतिबंध in blood सप्लाई to ऊतकों, causing a shortage of oxygen और glucose needed for सेल्यूलर metabolism ( to keep tissue alive ).
Ischemia is generally caused by problems साथ blood vessels, with resultant damage to or dysfunction of ऊतक.
It also means लोकल रक्ताल्पता in a given part of a body sometimes resulting from जमघट ( ऐसे as vasoconstriction, घनास्रता or embolism ).
Down syndrome ( ds ) or Down 's सिंड्रोम, भी ज्ञात as trisomy 21, is a genetic विकार caused by the presence of all or भाग of a third copy of chromosome 21.
Down syndrome is the सबसे common chromosome abnormality in humans.
it is typically संबद्ध साथ a delay in cognitive ability ( mental retardation, or mr ) and शारीरिक growth, और a particular set of फेशियल characteristics.
The औसत IQ of यंग वयस्कों साथ bas syndrome is around 50, whereas young adults बगैर the condition typically have an iq of 100.
( mr रै historically been defined as an iq नीचे 70. )
A विशाल proportion of individuals साथ bas syndrome have a severe उपाधि of intellectual विकलांगता.
Down syndrome is named after जॉन langdon Down, the अंग्रेजों physician who described the syndrome in 1866.
The कंडीशन was clinically वर्णित पहले by जां etienne Dominique esquirol in 1838 और edouard Seguin in 1844.
bas syndrome थी identified as a chromosome 21 trisomy by Dr. jérôme Lejeune in 1959.
Down सिंड्रोम can be पहचाना in a baby at जनम or पहले जनम by prenatal screening.
Pregnancies साथ इस diagnosis हैं प्रायः terminated.
the CDC estimates that about एक of every 691 शिशु born in the संयुक्त राज्य प्रत्येक साल is born with Down सिंड्रोम.
अनेक children with bas syndrome are educated in regular स्कूल classes जबकि others require specialised educational facilities.
कुछ children graduate इससे ऊँची स्कूल, और, in the US, there हैं increasing opportunities for participating in post-secondary education.
शिक्षा और proper care रै been दिखाया to improve quality of life significantly.
Many वयस्कों साथ bas Syndrome हैं able to कार्य at सशुल्क नियुक्ति in the community, जबकि others आवश्यकता a अधिक sheltered कार्य environment.
Hot flashes ( also known as hot flushes, or रात्रि sweats if वे happen at night ) are a symptom which may have several other कल्याणकारी, but which is प्रायः caused by the changing हार्मोन levels that are characteristic of menopause.
The Servicemen 's Readjustment Act of 1944 ( p.l. 78-346, 58 Stat. 284m ), ज्ञात informally as the G.I. Bill, was a law that provided a दायरा of benefits for returning संसार War II veterans ( commonly referred to as G.I.s ).
Benefits included low-cost mortgages, low-interest loans to प्रारंभ a business or farm, cash payments of ट्यूशन and living expenses to attend college, high school or वोकेशनल education, as well as one year of unemployment मुआवजे.
it was available to प्रत्येक veteran जो had been on active ड्यूटी during the war सालो for at तनिक नब्बे days और had not been dishonorably discharged ; कॉम्बैट थी नहीं जरूरी.
By the end of the program in 1956, roughly 2.2 लाख veterans had used the G.I. Bill education लाभ in अनुक्रम to attend colleges or universities, और an additional 6.6 लाख प्रयुक्त these benefits for कुछ kind of प्रशिक्षण program.
चूंकि the original 1944 law, the पद has come to शामिल other veteran लाभ कार्यक्रम created to assist veterans of subsequent wars as well as peacetime सेवा.
Historians और अर्थशास्त्रियों consider the G.I. विधेयक a प्रमुख political success—especially in कंट्रास्ट to the treatments of World War I veterans—and a प्रमुख योगदान to अमेरिका 's stock of human पूंजी that sped long-term economic growth.
The वाटरगेट scandal was a राजनैतिक कांड कि occurred in the United राज्य in the 1970s as a result of the जून 17, 1972 break-in at the लोकतांत्रिक National Committee मुख्यालय at the वाटरगेट office complex in वॉशिंगटन, D.C., और the Nixon administration 's attempted cover-up of इसके involvement.
the scandal आखिरकार led to the resignation of रिचर्ड Nixon, the अध्यक्ष of the United States, on August 9, 1974 — the तभी इस्तीफा of a U.S. President.
The scandal भी resulted in the indictment, trial, conviction, and incarceration of forty-three persons, dozens of जिसको were निक्सन 's top administration officials.
The affair began with the arrest of five men लिये breaking और प्रवेश into the Democratic National Committee ( DNC ) मुख्यालय at the Watergate जटिल on June 17, 1972.
the Federal ब्यूरो of Investigation ( एफबीआई ) connected नकदी मिला on the burglars to a slush निधि used by the Committee for the Re-Election of the अध्यक्ष, the आधिकारिक संगठन of Nixon 's अभियान.
in जुलाई 1973, as प्रमाण mounted against the president 's staff, सहित गवाही provided by former staff सदस्यों in an छानबीन conducted by the Senate Watergate कमेटी, it थी revealed that अध्यक्ष निक्सन had a tape-recording प्रणाली in his offices and he had अंकित many conversations.
Recordings इससे these tapes implicated the president, revealing he had attempted to cover up the questionable ( और illegal ) goings-on that had लिया प्लेस during उसके प्रशासन, both before और बाद the break-in.
बाद a protracted series of bitter अदालत battles, the u.S. परम् Court unanimously ruled that the अध्यक्ष था to hand over the tapes to government investigators ; he ultimately complied.
Facing near-certain impeachment in the House of Representatives and a strong possibility of a conviction in the Senate, Nixon resigned the प्रेसिडेंसी on अगस्त 9, 1974.
His successor, जेराल्ड Ford, तब issued a pardon to him.
Elizabeth Imogene Webber ( formerly Lansing और Spencer ) is a fictional character on the ABC दिन साबुन opera General Hospital.
एलिज़ाबेथ is the granddaughter of Dr. Steve Hardy ( John beradino ), एक of the originating core वर्ण of the series.

the United States presidency of रोनाल्ड Reagan, भी known as the Reagan administration, was a रिपब्लिकन प्रशासन headed by Ronald reagan from January 20, 1981, to January 20, 1989.
Domestically, the प्रशासन favored reducing government कार्यक्रम और introduced the largest across-the-board कर cuts in अमरीकी history.
The economic policies enacted in 1981, ज्ञात as `` Reaganomics ``, were an example of supply-side अर्थशास्त्र.
Reagan aimed to प्रोत्साहित उद्यमिता और सीमा the विकास of social spending, as खूब as the कटौती of regulation और महंगाई.
Economic growth saw a strong recovery in the 1980s, helping reagan to win a landslide re-election.
the national debt increased significantly, however.
Regarding foreign policy, the administration was steadfastly anti-communist, कॉलिंग the सोवियत Union an `` दुष्ट empire `` और समाप्ति 1970s détente.
Reagan त्वरित the massive buildup of the सैन्य प्रारंभ by his पूर्ववर्ती, including an invasion of हरा, the first प्रमुख overseas कार्रवाई by U.S. troops since the end of the Vietnam युद्ध.
The `` Reagan doctrine `` controversially granted सहायता to paramilitary forces seeking to फेकने communist governments, particularly in war-torn सेंट्रल America और Afghanistan.
Reagan also प्रचारित new technologies such as missile रक्षा systems in अनुक्रम to confront the soviets and their allies.
In diplomacy, Reagan forged a strong alliance with UK प्रधान मंत्री मार्गरेट Thatcher, और he met साथ सोवियत सामान्य Secretary Mikhail Gorbachev four टाइम्स, aiming to shrink the superpowers ' nuclear arsenals.
Reagan 's प्रेसिडेंसी has been termed the `` Reagan Revolution '', or the Age of reagan in मान्यता of the राजनैतिक realignment both within और beyond the U.S. in एहसान of उसके ब्रांड of कोसा and his faith in free बाज़ार.
the Reagan administration worked toward the collapse of Soviet Communism, and it किया collapse बस as he बाएँ office.
Victory in the Cold War led to a unipolar world साथ the U.S. as the संसार 's एकमात्र superpower.
While the damaging iran-contra affair engulfed several Reagan aides दौरान उसके second term, Reagan himself left दफ्तर साथ a 63 percent स्वीकृति rating, एक of the higher approval दरजा of departing presidents.
बाद years of unstinting praise from the right, और unrelenting आलोचना इससे the बाएँ, historian दाउद Henry पाता that by 2009 a consensus था उभरा among scholars कि reagan revived conservatism and turned the स्वदेश to the right by demonstrating a `` pragmatic कोसा '' that promoted ideology within the constraints imposed by the विभाजित political प्रणाली.
Furthermore, says Henry, the consensus viewpoint agrees that he revived faith in the presidency और American self-confidence, and contributed critically to ending the ठंडा War.

Mortality rate is a measure of the number of मौतों ( in general, or due to a specific cause ) in a जनसांख्यिकी.
scaled to the size of कि जनसांख्यिकी, प्रति unit of time.
Mortality rate is typically expressed in इकाई of deaths per 1000 individuals प्रति साल ; यूँ, a mortality रेट of 9.5 ( out of 1000 ) in a जनसांख्यिकी of 1,000 would mean 9.5 मौतों per साल in that entire population, or 0.95 % आउट of the कुल.
It is distinct इससे morbidity रेट, which refers to the number of individuals in poor स्वास्थ्य during a given time काल ( the prevalence रेट ) or the number of newly appearing cases of the बीमारी प्रति unit of समय ( incidence rate ).
The term `` mortality `` is also sometimes inappropriately used to refer to the number of मौतों among a नियत of diagnosed hospital cases for a बीमारी or injury, बल्कि than for the सामान्य जनसांख्यिकी of a country or जातीय समूह.
This बीमारी मृत्यु statistic is more precisely referred to as `` मामला fatality rate `` ( CFR ).
One distinguishes:
The crude death रेट, the total number of deaths प्रति year प्रति 1000 लोगों.
the crude death रेट लिये the पूरे world is about 8.37 प्रति 1000 per year according to the वर्तमान सीआईए World Factbook.
the perinatal mortality rate, the योग of neonatal deaths and fetal deaths ( stillbirths ) प्रति 1000 births.
the मातृ मृत्यु ratio, the number of maternal deaths प्रति 100,000 live births in वही समय period.
The maternal मृत्यु rate, the number of maternal deaths per 1,000 women of reproductive आयु in the जनसांख्यिकी ( generally defined as 15–44 सालो of आयु ).
the शिशु mortality rate, the क्रमांक of मौतों of children कम than 1 year old per 1000 live births.
The child mortality रेट, the क्रमांक of deaths of children कम than 5 सालो old प्रति 1000 सजीव births.
the standardised मृत्यु अनुपात ( SMR ) - इस represents a proportional तुलना to the numbers of मौतों कि would have been expected if the जनसांख्यिकी था been of a standard composition in शर्तें of आयु, लिंग, etc.
The age-specific mortality रेट ( asmr ) - इस refers to the total क्रमांक of मौतों प्रति साल per 1000 people of a given age ( e.g. age 62 last birthday ).
in regard to the or failure of medical उपचार or procedures, one होता भी distinguish:
The early mortality रेट, the total क्रमांक of deaths in the early stages of an ongoing उपचार, or in the period immediately following an treatment.
The लेट mortality रेट, the कुल क्रमांक of deaths in the late चरण of an ongoing treatment, or a significant length of समय after an acute उपचार.
नोट that the crude मौत rate as defined above और लागू to a whole population can give a भ्रामक impression.
the crude मौत rate depends on the आयु ( and लिंग ) specific mortality rates और the आयु ( और gender ) distribution of the population.
the number of deaths per 1000 people can be higher for developed nations than in less-developed countries, despite जीवन expectancy being higher in विकसित countries due to standards of स्वास्थ्य being बेहतर.
This happens because विकसित देशों typically have a completely अलग population age वितरण, with a much higher proportion of older people, due to दोनो निम्नतर recent जनम rates and lower मृत्यु दरों.
A more पूरा picture of मृत्यु is given by a जीवन table which shows the मृत्यु रेट separately लिये each age.
a जीवन तालिका is necessary to give a शुभ अनुमान of life expectancy.
an otoacoustic emission ( OAE ) is a sound जिससे is उत्पन्न from भीतर the inner कान.
Having महरूम पूर्वानुमानित by थामस Gold in 1948, इसके existence was पहला demonstrated experimentally by दाउद Kemp in 1978 and otoacoustic emissions have since been दिखाया to arise by a number of different cellular mechanisms भीतर the inner ear.
Studies have shown that OAEs disappear बाद the भीतरी कान has been damaged, so OAEs हैं often used in the प्रयोगशाला और the clinic as a measure of भीतरी ear health.
broadly speaking, there हैं दो प्रकार of otoacoustic emissions : spontaneous otoacoustic emissions ( SOAEs ), which can occur बगैर external stimulation, और जगाई otoacoustic emissions ( EOAEs ), which require an evoking stimulus.
Hurricane Tomas was the nineteenth named storm और बारहवीं hurricane of the 2010 Atlantic hurricane ऋतु.
Tomas विकसित from a tropical वेव ईस्ट of the Windward आइलैंड्स on October 29.
जल्दी intensifying into a hurricane, it स्थानांतरित through the Windward Islands और passed very निकट Saint Lucia.
After reaching श्रेणी 2 status on the saffir-simpson scale, Tomas जल्दी weakened to a तीव्र storm in the central Caribbean Sea, due to strong wind shear और dry air.
टॉमस बाद regained hurricane status as it reorganized near the Windward ड्योढ़ी.
throughout the hurricane 's path, 71 लोगों are ज्ञात to have महरूम killed, 14 of जिसको यहूद in Saint लूसिया.
मौद्रिक losses throughout the windward Islands यहूद अनुमानित at US $ 588 million, मुख्यतः in Saint Lucia.
In the वेक of the तूफ़ान in Haiti, flooding intensified an जारी cholera outbreak indirectly causing more fatalities.
According to a रपट released in December 2010, 55 people were killed in Cuba और Hispanola, though the distribution of these fatalities are अनजान.
overall damage from the तूफ़ान was at least $ 741 million.
विक्टोरिया Jackson ( born August 2, 1959 ) is an American हास्य, actress, satirist, singer और internet ब्लॉगर best known as a डाल member of the एनबीसी television sketch comedy series Saturday रात्रि सजीव ( SNL ) इससे 1986 to 1992.
She रै प्राप्त attention as a vocal आलोचक of President Barack Obama, and is an active भागीदार in the Tea Party movement.
Postmodern literature is literature characterized by भारी reliance on तकनीकों like fragmentation, paradox, और questionable narrators, and is प्रायः ( हालांकि not exclusively ) defined as a स्टाइल or trend जिससे emerged in the post–World War II era.
Postmodern works are देखी as a reaction against आत्मज्ञान thinking and modernist approaches to literature.
Postmodern साहित्य, जैसे postmodernism as a पूरे, tends to resist परिभाषा or classification as a `` गति ''.
Indeed, the convergence of postmodern literature साथ various मोड्स of critical सिद्धान्त, विशेषकर reader-response and deconstructionist approaches, और the subversions of the implicit contract between author, टेक्स्ट and रीडर by जिससे इसके works are प्रायः characterised, have led to pre-modern fictions such as Cervantes ' डॉन Quixote ( 1605,1615 ) and Laurence Sterne 's eighteenth-century satire tristram shandy being retrospectively inducted into the fold.
जबकि there is little consensus on the precise characteristics, scope, और importance of postmodern साहित्य, as is प्रायः the मामला with artistic आंदोलनों, postmodern साहित्य is commonly पारिभाषित in relation to a precursor.
लिये example, a postmodern साहित्यिक work tends नहीं to conclude साथ the neatly tied-up ending as is प्रायः found in modernist literature, but often parodies it.
postmodern authors tend to celebrate chance over शिल्प, and further employ metafiction to undermine the writer 's authority.
Another characteristic of postmodern साहित्य is the questioning of भेद between high and low culture through the use of pastiche, the संयोजन of विषय और genres नहीं previously deemed अनुरूप for literature.
Enigma is an electronic musical प्रोजेक्ट संस्थापित in Germany by माइकल cretu, David Fairstein and Frank Peterson in 1990.
The Romanian-born Cretu conceived the Enigma प्रोजेक्ट जबकि working in Germany, but based his recording studio a.r.t. Studios in Ibiza, Spain, from the जल्दी 1990s जबतक may 2009, जहाँ he रै अंकित सब of Enigma 's studio releases to तिथि.
cretu is both the composer and the producer of the project.
His former wife, पॉप singer Sandra, often provided vocals on Enigma ट्रैक्स.

scooby-doo is an अमरीकी animated cartoon मताधिकार, comprising several एनिमेटेड टेलीविज़न series produced इससे 1969 to the उपस्थित दिन.
the original series, scooby-doo, Where हैं You !
, was निर्मित लिये Hanna-Barbera Productions by लेखक Joe माणिक्य और Ken स्पीयर्स in 1969.
This Saturday morning cartoon श्रेणी featured four teenagers— फ्रेड Jones, Daphne ब्लेक, Velma dinkley, and Norville `` shaggy '' रोजर्स — और उनके talking brown ग्रेट Dane dog नामित Scooby-Doo, जो solve रहस्यों involving supposedly supernatural जीव through a series of हरकतों और missteps.
following the success of the original series, Hanna-Barbera और its successor Warner Bros. एनिमेशन have produced numerous follow-up and spin-off animated श्रेणी and several सम्बन्धित works, including टेलीविज़न specials and telefilms, a लकीर of direct-to-video films, और two warner भाईs. –produced नाट्य feature films.
कुछ versions of Scooby-Doo विशेषता different विसंगतियाँ on the show 's अलौकिक theme, और include characters ऐसे as Scooby 's cousin Scooby-Dum और nephew Scrappy-Doo in addition to or instead of some of the original characters.
scooby-doo थी originally ब्रॉडकास्ट on सीबीएस इससे 1969 to 1976, when it moved to ABC.
ABC aired the show जबतक canceling it in 1986, और प्रस्तुत a spin-off featuring the characters as children, a pup नामित scooby-doo, इससे 1988 until 1991.

और Shaggy और Scooby-Doo मिलेंगी a a Clue ! ] ], aired as part of Kids wb on the wb संजाल और इसके successor, The CW संजाल, इससे 2002 until 2008.

Mystery Incorporated, aired on Cartoon संजाल इससे 2010 to 2013.

Call of Duty is a first-person और third-person shooter computer/ वीडियो game franchise.
The श्रेणी began on the pc, and बाद विस्तारित to consoles and handhelds.
Several spin-off खेल have भी been released.
the earlier games in the series are नियत primarily in संसार युद्ध ii, this शामिल : Call of Duty, कॉल of Duty 2, और Call of Duty 3.
Beginning with Modern Warfare, which is set in modern टाइम्स, the series has shifted फ़ोकस away इससे संसार युद्ध ii.
Call of ड्यूटी 4 : Modern Warfare ( released November 2007 ) was followed by कॉल of Duty : World at War and कॉल of Duty : Modern Warfare 2.
ब्लैक ops ( released नवम्बर 2010 ) takes प्लेस in the ठंडा War, while आधुनिक Warfare 3 ( released नवम्बर 2011 ) takes place in the near-future setting.
ब्लैक Ops 2 ( Released नवम्बर 13, 2012 ) takes प्लेस in the year 2025.
The Call of Duty games are published और owned by एक्टिविजन साथ Aspyr मीडिया प्रकाशन it for ठहराना os x.
While the स्टुडियो अनंत वार्ड primarily still develops them, treyarch has also विकसित अनेक of the शीर्षक साथ the release of the studios ' games interlaced with each other.
Some games have been developed by Gray Matter इंटरैक्टिव, Spark Unlimited, Amaze Entertainment, n-space, विद्रोह Developments, Ideaworks Game Studio, sledgehammer Games और nStigate Games.
the games use a किस्में of engines, सहित the id तकनीक 3, the Treyarch NGL, और the iw 5.0.
Other products in the franchise include a लकीर of कार्रवाई figures designed by Plan-B खिलौने, a card खेल निर्मित by Upper Deck, और a comic किताब mini-series published by wildstorm.
As of नवम्बर 11, 2011, the कॉल Of Duty series have sold over 100 million नक़ल.
As of कूच 31, 2012 वहीँ हैं 40 लाख monthly active players across all of the Call of ड्यूटी titles, with 10 million कॉल of ड्यूटी : elite उपयोक्ता and 2 लाख paying annual members.
Over 1.6 अरब hours of ऑनलाइन gameplay have महरूम logged आधुनिक warfare 3 चूंकि its 2011 रिलीज.
the एस्टेट tax in the United States is a कर imposed on the ट्रांसफ़र of the `` taxable estate `` of a deceased person, whether such प्रॉपर्टी is transferred via a होगा, according to the state कानून of intestacy or otherwise made as an घटना of the मौत of the owner, ऐसे as a ट्रांसफ़र of प्रॉपर्टी from an intestate एस्टेट or trust, or the payment of certain life insurance लाभ or financial खाता रकम to beneficiaries.
The एस्टेट कर is one part of the Unified Gift और एस्टेट कर प्रणाली in the United States.
The other भाग of the प्रणाली, the तोहफा कर, imposes a tax on हस्तांतरण of प्रॉपर्टी during a व्यक्ति 's जीवन ; the तोहफा कर prevents avoidance of the estate tax should a person want to दे दूर his/her एस्टेट.
in addition to the federal सरकारी, many states भी थोपने an estate कर, साथ the राज्य version called either an estate कर or an inheritance tax.
Opponents of the estate कर call it the `` मौत tax ''.
if an एसेट is left to a जीवनसाथी or a federally recognized charity, the tax usually does नहीं apply.
in जोड, up to $ 5,250,000 can be दिए by an व्यक्तिगत, पहले and/or upon उनके मौत, बगैर incurring federal gift or एस्टेट कर.
Gavin McGregor rossdale ( born 30 October 1967 ) is an English कर्ता और musician, known as the lead singer and rhythm guitarist of the चट्टान बैंड Bush.
Following Bush 's separation in 2002, which lasted for eight years, he was the lead singer and guitarist लिये संस्थान, and later began a solo career.
When performing सोलो, गेविन plays गीतों from his extensive musical libraries.
Rossdale has महरूम ranked in the शीर्ष 100 भारी Metal Vocalists by hit Parader ( # 75 ).
Raffaello Sanzio da urbino ( अप्रैल 6 or कूच 28, 1483 – April 6, 1520 ), better ज्ञात बस as Raphael, was an इतालवी painter and architect of the ऊँची Renaissance.
उसके कार्य is admired for its clarity of रूप and ease of composition और for its visual उपलब्धि of the Neoplatonic आदर्श of इंसान वैभव.
Together with michelangelo and लियोनार्डो da Vinci, he forms the traditional trinity of ग्रेट मास्टर्स of that काल.
राफेल थी enormously productive, running an unusually large कार्यशाला, और despite उसके death at 37, a विशाल body of उसके work remains.
Many of his works हैं found in the वेटिकन राजमहल, जहाँ the frescoed Raphael कक्ष यहूद the central, और the largest, कार्य of उसके career.
The best ज्ञात work is The School of एथेंस in the वेटिकन Stanza della Segnatura.
After his early सालो in रोम much of his work थी self-designed, लकिन लिये the most भाग चलाया by the workshop from उसके drawings, साथ considerable loss of quality.
he थी extremely influential in उसके आजीवन, हालांकि outside रोम his work was mostly known इससे his collaborative printmaking.
After his death, the influence of उसके great प्रतिद्वंद्वी michelangelo was more widespread जबतक the 18th and 19th सदियां, when राफेल 's अधिक निर्मल and harmonious qualities were again regarded as the उच्चतम models.
His करियर जलप्रपात naturally into three phases और तीन styles, first described by Giorgio Vasari : his early सालो in Umbria, then a काल of परिचय four years ( from 1504–1508 ) absorbing the artistic परंपराओं of Florence, followed by उसके पिछला hectic और triumphant बारह years in Rome, working for two Popes and उनके बंद associates.
Julia Fiona Roberts ( born अक्तूबर 28, 1967 ) is an अमरीकी अभिनेत्री.
She became a Hollywood star after headlining the रोमांटिक comedy Pretty Woman ( 1990 ), जिससे grossed $ 464 million worldwide.
बाद receiving Golden Globe पुरस्कार and Academy पुरस्कार nominations for Steel Magnolias ( 1989 ) और Pretty स्त्री, she won the अकादमी पुरस्कार for बेहतरीन अभिनेत्री for her performance in Erin Brockovich ( 2000 ).
उसके films The pelican Brief ( 1993 ), my बेहतरीन dost 's विवाह ( 1997 ), रहस्यवादी Pizza ( 1988 ), Notting हिल ( 1999 ), runaway बहू ( 1999 ), Ocean 's Eleven ( 2001 ), समंदर 's Twelve ( 2004 ), Charlie Wilson 's War ( 2007 ), Valentine 's Day ( 2010 ), Eat दुवा Love ( 2010 ), and दर्पण Mirror ( 2012 ) have collectively brought box office receipts of over $ 2.6 billion, बनाना her एक of the most successful actresses in शर्तें of box दफ्तर रसीदें.
Roberts था become one of the highest-paid actresses in the संसार, topping The Hollywood Reporters सालाना `` शक्ति सूची '' of top-earning female stars from 2005 to 2006.
उसके शुल्क for 1990 's pretty स्त्री was $ 300,000 ; in 2003, she was paid an unprecedented $ 25 million for her भूमिका in Mona लिसा मुस्कान ( 2003 ).
as of 2010, Roberts 's net worth थी estimated to be $ 140 लाख.
Roberts has been named one of People पत्रिका 's `` 50 सबसे Beautiful लोगों in the संसार '' eleven times, tied with हैल बेरी.
In 2011, she was named एक of the `` 100 Hottest महिलाओं of all-time '' by मेन 's Health.
In 2001, महिलाओं घर जर्नल ranked उसके as the 11th most शक्तिशाली woman in the United States.
चिह्नित Elliot zuckerberg ( born May 14, 1984 ) is an American कंप्यूटर programmer and Internet entrepreneur.
He is best ज्ञात as one of पाँच co-founders of the सोशल नेटवर्किंग जालस्थल Facebook.
As of April 2013, Zuckerberg is the chairman और chief executive of फेसबुक, Inc. और in 2013 his निजी माल was estimated to be US $ 13.3 अरब.
Together साथ उसके college roommates and fellow Harvard विश्वविद्यालयों विद्यार्थी Eduardo Saverin, Andrew McCollum, Dustin Moskovitz और क्रिस Hughes, Zuckerberg launched Facebook from Harvard 's dormitory कक्ष.
The समूह तब introduced फेसबुक onto other campuses देशभर और स्थानांतरित to पालो Alto, California, संयुक्त राज्य ( U.S. ) shortly afterwards.
In 2007, at the age of twenty-three years, Zuckerberg became a अरबपति as a result of Facebook और the क्रमांक of फेसबुक users worldwide reached a total of one अरब in 2012.
Zuckerberg was involved in विभिन्न विधिक विवादों that were initiated by others in the समूह, who claimed a share of the company based upon their भागीदारी during the development phase of Facebook.
चूंकि 2010, zuckerberg has been named among the 100 wealthiest और most influential people in the world by Time magazine as a part of its व्यक्ति of the साल accolade.
zuckerberg was निभाई by actor जेसी Eisenberg in the 2010 Hollywood film the सोशल संजाल in which the वृद्धि of फेसबुक is portrayed.
the Mayflower was the ship that in 1620 transported 102 English Pilgrims, including a कोर group of Separatists, to New इंग्लैण्ड.
Their story is एक of travail and अस्तित्व in a harsh New World environment.

Committee of तरीके and Means is the मुख्य कर -writing committee of the United States House of प्रतिनिधि.
Members of the Ways और Means कमेटी हैं not allowed to serve on any other House समितियों unless वे लागू for a waiver from their party 's congressional नेतृत्व.
The कमेटी has jurisdiction over all taxation, tariffs and अन्य revenue-raising measures, as well as a क्रमांक of अन्य programs including:
सोशल सुरक्षा
Unemployment benefits
Medicare
Enforcement of child support laws
Temporary Assistance for Needy परिवारों, a संघीय welfare program
Foster care and adoption programs
The u.S. Constitution requires that सब bills regarding taxation जरूर originate in the House of Representatives.
Since House कार्यविधि is that all बिल्स regarding कराधान must go through this committee, the कमेटी is very influential, as is its सीनेट बंटवारा, the U.S. Senate कमेटी on Finance.
the Ways and Means कमेटी in the 111th कॉंग्रेस was chaired by Charlie Rangel, जो had taken a leave of absence as chairman जबतक House ethics उल्लंघनों were resolved.
However, his leave of absence as अध्यक्ष was शासित to be a इस्तीफा.
Pete Stark resigned as एक्टिंग chairman, so Sander Levin held that position until the प्रारंभ of the 112th कॉंग्रेस.
Dave शिविर became the कमेटी chair लिये the 112th कॉंग्रेस, after the republicans जीती control of the हाउस in the 2010 चुनाव.
The blue whale ( Balaenoptera musculus ) is a समुद्री mammal belonging to the suborder of baleen whales ( पुकारा Mysticeti ).
At in लंबाई and or more in वज़न, it is the largest known animal to have कभी existed.
long and slender, the blue व्हेल 's body can be various shades of bluish-grey dorsally and somewhat हल्का underneath.
There हैं at least three distinct subspecies : B. m. musculus of the North Atlantic और उत्तर प्रशांत, B. m. intermedia of the Southern Ocean और B. m. brevicauda ( also known as the सानो ब्लू whale ) found in the भारतीय Ocean and South Pacific Ocean.
B. m. indica, मिला in the Indian Ocean, may be another subspecies.
as साथ अन्य baleen whales, इसके diet consists almost exclusively of small crustaceans known as krill.
Blue whales were abundant in nearly all the महासागर on धरती जबतक the beginning of the twentieth सदी.
For over a century, they यहूद hunted लगभग to extinction by whalers until सुरक्षित by the international community in 1966.
A 2002 रपट estimated there were 5,000 to 12,000 blue whales worldwide, located in at तनिक five groups.
अधिक recent शोध into the Pygmy subspecies suggests this may be an underestimate.
Before whaling, the largest population was in the Antarctic, क्रमांकन approximately 239,000 ( range 202,000 to 311,000 ).
वहीँ remain तभी much smaller ( around 2,000 ) एकाग्रता in each of the eastern North प्रशांत, Antarctic, और भारतीय Ocean समूह.
वहीँ हैं दो more groups in the North अटलांटिक, और at least two in the दक्षिणी Hemisphere.
the ग्लोब artichoke ( Cynara cardunculus var. scolymus ) is a किस्में of a प्रजाति of thistle cultivated as a food.
The edible matter is कलियों that form भीतर the flower heads पहले the flowers come into खिलते.
the कलियों go दूर or change to a coarse, barely edible form when the flower blooms.
The uncultivated or जंगली किस्में of the species is called a cardoon.
it is a perennial संयंत्र देशी to the Mediterranean region.
The संयुक्त States one hundred-dollar bill ( $ 100 ) is a denomination of United States करेंसी.
u.S. statesman, inventor, और राजनयिक Benjamin Franklin is currently featured on the obverse of the विधेयक.
on the reverse of the banknote is an चित्र of Independence हॉल.
The $ 100 विधेयक is the largest denomination that has महरूम printed since July 13, 1969, when the denominations of $ 500, $ 1,000, $ 5,000, और $ 10,000 were retired.
The Bureau of Engraving and Printing says the average जीवन of a $ 100 bill in परिसंचरण is 90 महीने ( 7.5 सालो ) before it is replaced due to wear और tear.
the बिल्स are भी commonly referred to as `` Benjamins '', in reference to the use of Benjamin Franklin 's portrait on the denomination, or `` C-Notes '', based on the Roman numeral लिये 100.
the bill is एक of दो denominations printed today कि does not feature a अध्यक्ष of the United States ; the other is the $ 10 विधेयक, featuring सिकंदर Hamilton.
the समय on the क्लॉक of स्वतंत्रता हॉल on the रिवर्स, according to the U.S. Bureau of Engraving और मुद्रण, shows approximately 4:10.
One hundred hundred-dollar bills हैं delivered by Federal आरक्षित Banks in mustard-colored straps ( $ 10,000 ).
the Series 2009 $ 100 विधेयक redesign was अनावरण on April 21, 2010, and थी to be issued to the public on February 11, 2011, but उत्पादन was shut bas in दिसम्बर 2010 क्युकी as अनेक as 30 % were अनुपयोगी due to a निर्माण flaw.
A vertical crease in the paper reveals a रिक्त स्पेस on the bill जब खींचा आउट.
In their बदलना, और continuing the ऊँची माँग of this denomination, the Series 2006A was शुभारम्भ retaining the previous design ( 1996-generation ).
on अप्रैल 24, 2013, the संघीय Reserve announced the नई $ 100 विधेयक would डालें circulation on October 8, 2013.

miniature इससे the पेरिस psalter.
David ( ; ISO 259-3 dawid ; ' ; Strong 's : daveed ) according to the यहूदी Bible, was the दूसरी king of the United किंगडम of इसराईल, and according to the New Testament gospels of मैथ्यू and Luke, an ancestor of Jesus.
His life is conventionally dated to c. 1040–970 BCE, his शासनकाल over यहूदा c. 1010–1002 BCE, और उसके reign over the United Kingdom of इसराईल c. 1002–970 BCE.
The Books of Samuel, 1 Kings, और 1 Chronicles हैं the तभी sources of information on David, although the tel Dan stele ( दिनाँक c. 850–835 bce ) contains the phrase ( bytdwd ), read as `` House of David '', जिससे most scholars take as confirmation of the अस्तित्व in the mid-9th century BCE of a Judean royal राजवंश called the हाउस of दाउद.
he is depicted as a righteous किंग, although नहीं बगैर त्रुटियां, as खूब as an acclaimed योद्धा, संगीतकार, और कवि, traditionally credited for composing many of the psalms contained in the Book of Psalms.
दाउद is सेंट्रल to Jewish, ईसाई, and Islamic doctrine and culture.
biblical परंपरा maintains that a direct वंशज of David होगा be the Messiah.
in Islam he is माना to be a नबी और the किंग of a nation.
Kathmandu ( ; ) is the capital and largest urban agglomerate of Nepal.
the agglomerate consists of काठमांडू महानगर City at its core, and its sister cities Patan, kirtipur, Thimi, and भक्तपुर.
It also includes the recently पहचाना शहरी क्षेत्रों of shankhapur, karyabinayak, और Champapur.
Banepa, Dhulikhel, and Panauti हैं उपग्रह urban areas of काठमांडू located just बाहर the काठमांडू valley.
काठमांडू is also known informally as `` KTM '' or the `` tri-city ''.
According to a census conducted in 2011, काठमांडू metropolis अलोन has 975,453 निवासियों ; और the agglomerate has a population of अधिक than 2.5 लाख inhabitants.
The metropolitan city area is और रै a population density of 19,250 प्रति km2.
the नगर स्टैंड at an elevation of approximately in the bowl-shaped Kathmandu Valley of central नेपाल.
it is surrounded by four major kyu : shivapuri, phulchoki, nagarjun, and चंद्रगिरि.
Kathmandu घाटी is भाग of तीन जिले ( काठमांडू, Lalitpur, और भक्तपुर ), रै the highest जनसांख्यिकी घनत्व in the देश, and is home to about a बारहवीं of Nepal 's population.
दौरान Rana and Shah eras, the name `` Nepal '' referred only to the काठमांडू Valley ; it was what people जो जिया outside the valley पुकारा it.
During इस period, British historians called the valley itself `` नेपाल Proper ''.
Today, Kathmandu is नहीं तभी the capital of the Federal लोकतांत्रिक गणतंत्र of Nepal, लकिन also the मुख्यालय of the Central विकास Region of नेपाल.
the Central प्रदेश comprises तीन zones : bagmati, Narayani, और Janakpur.
Kathmandu is स्तिथ in the bagmati Zone.
Kathmandu is the गेटवे to tourism in Nepal.
it is also the तंत्रिका बीच of the country 's अर्थव्यवस्था.
It has the सबसे advanced अवसंरचना of any शहरी क्षेत्रफल in Nepal, और इसके economy is केन्द्रित on tourism, जिससे accounted for 3.8 % of Nepal 's GDP in 1995–96.
( Tourism in Kathmandu declined thereafter दौरान a period of political अशांति, but since then रै improved. )
The city रै a rich history, spanning nearly 2000 years, as inferred from inscriptions found in the valley.
धार्मिक and सांस्कृतिक festivities form a major भाग of the lives of people residing in काठमांडू.
Most of Kathmandu 's people follow हिंदुत्व और many others follow Buddhism.
वहीँ are लोगों of other religious beliefs as खूब, giving Kathmandu a cosmopolitan संस्कृति.
नेपाली is the सबसे commonly spoken भाषा in the city.
नेपाल Bhasa is the स्वदेशी भाषा spoken by the नेवार लोगों.
हिंदी is widely understood और अंग्रेज़ी is understood by Kathmandu 's शिक्षित निवासियों.
The नगर 's साक्षरता rate is 98 %.
काठमांडू 's सिस्टर cities ( Lalitpur patan ) and Bhaktapur are अभिन्न to Kathmandu 's cultural विरासत, पर्यटन उद्योग, और economy ; इसलिए युनेस्को 's World विरासत Site lists सब three cities ' monuments और attractions साथ under one heading, `` Kathmandu valley- UNESCO World विरासत Site ``.
फ़ील्ड हॉकी, usually referred to बस as hockey, is a टोली sport of the hockey परिवार which is played between two टीमों of eleven players साथ hockey sticks and a hard, ठोस प्लास्टिक ball.
At the turn of the 21st सदी, the खेल is played globally, with particular popularity throughout Europe, एशिया, Oceania, और South America – in addition to being the national sport of Pakistan and इण्डिया.
the पद `` फ़ील्ड hockey '' is प्रयुक्त primarily in Canada, the United States, और अन्य regions of the world where the sport of बर्फ hockey is more लोकप्रिय.
दौरान खेल, goal keepers are the तभी खिलाड़ी who हैं allowed to touch the बॉल with any part of their body ( साथ the एक्सेप्शन of a player 's hand considered 'part of the stick ' ), साथ this तभी applying within the शूटिंग circle ( भी known as the d, or shooting चाप, or just the circle ), जबकि फ़ील्ड खिलाड़ी play the ball with the चपटा पक्ष of उनके स्टिक.
the टोली कि स्कोर the most goals by the समाप्त of the match विन्स.
if the score is tied at the end of the खेल, either a draw is declared or the game goes into अतिरिक्त time and/or a penalty shootout, depending on the competition 's format.
the शासी body of हॉकी is the अंतरराष्ट्रीय Hockey Federation ( fih ), साथ men and women being represented internationally in प्रतियोगिताओं including the Olympic खेल, Commonwealth games, हॉकी संसार कप, Champions ट्रॉफी और Junior Hockey संसार कप, साथ अनेक countries कार्यशील extensive जूनियर, वरिष्ठ, और masters ' क्लबों competitions.
The fih is also responsible लिये organising the हॉकी नियम फलक और विकासशील the rules लिये the खेल.
a लोकप्रिय variant of फ़ील्ड hockey is अंदर हॉकी, जिससे differs in a number of respects while मूर्त the primary सिद्धान्त of हॉकी.
अंदर हॉकी is a 6-a-side variant, साथ a फ़ील्ड जिससे is घटाया to approximately 40m × 20m.
साथ many of the rules remaining the same, सहित रुकावट और feet, वहीँ हैं several कुंजी variations - Players may नहीं raise the बॉल unless shooting on goal, players may not hit the ball ( instead utilising pushes to transfer the ball ), और the sidelines हैं replaced साथ ठोस बाधाओं which the बॉल will rebound बंद.
Ethan `` cane '' ashby ( né Atkinson ) is a fictional character from the American सीबीएस साबुन opera The Young and the Restless.
he is portrayed by ऑस्ट्रेलियाई actor Daniel गोडार्ड, जो originally auditioned लिये Brad Snyder on As the संसार turns but थी अनुशंसित for a role on The Young और the बेचैन बजाय.
The भूमिका was to be portrayed as an अमरीकी, लकिन गोडार्ड 's Australian descent influenced the character 's पृष्ठभूमि.
Former सिर writer Lynn Marie Latham introduced him दौरान the एपीसोड airing on जनवरी 12, 2007 as an ऑस्ट्रेलियाई बारटेंडर in ढूंढें of his परिवार, a debut कि received a mixed जवाब.
लैथम निर्मित Cane as the बेटे of फिलिप Chancellor II ( Donnelly Rhodes ) and Jill Foster Abbott ( जेस वाल्टन ) but the अक्षर 's background थी rewritten by Maria Arena घंटी in 2009, reestablishing him as the बेटे of Colin and Genevieve Atkinson ( Tristan Rogers and जिनी फ्रांसिस ).
हालांकि characterized as `` mysterious '', cane is `` वफ़ादार and समर्पित '', जबकि गोडार्ड described the अक्षर as a `` typical ऑस्ट्रेलियाई, working-class kind of guy ''.
He थी the first सदस्य of the Atkinson family to appear on the श्रेणी, followed by उसके parents and identical twin brother.
Soon after उसके debut, he became a leading अक्षर, a decision praised by दर्शक और critics.
The character has been involved साथ एम्बर Moore ( Adrienne Frantz ), क्लो मिशेल ( एलिज़ाबेथ Hendrickson ) and most notably लिली Winters ( Christel Khalil ), a romance कि garnered significant fan attention.
in 2009, Cane and Lily were married ; वैश्विक bc would later call Lily the love of cane 's जीवन.
The pair had दो children, Charlie and mattie Ashby.
In 2011, the actor थी fired, and cane थी शॉट to मौत onscreen.
however, गोडार्ड थी rehired जल्द बाद viewers campaigned for his वापसी, revealing that Cane 's एकसमान जुड़वा brother was in fact the man who died.
This कुर्बान उसके marriage to लिली, but the couple यहूद remarried on वेलेंटाइन 's दिन in 2012.
Goddard has been widely acclaimed for his portrayal ; Canyon News कहा that he portrays the अक्षर honestly, and is `` always dependable, on आग और exciting ''.
John Christopher `` Johnny '' Depp ii ( born June 9, 1963 ) is an American कर्ता, फिल्मी producer, and musician.
he has जीती the Golden ग्लोब पुरस्कार और स्क्रीन अभिनेताओं गिल्ड award for Best कर्ता.
Depp रोज़ to prominence on the 1980s टेलीविज़न श्रेणी 21 Jump गली, becoming a टीन idol.
Dissatisfied साथ कि औकात, Depp turned to फिल्मी लिये अधिक चुनौतीपूर्ण roles ; he played the शीर्षक अक्षर of the acclaimed एडवर्ड Scissorhands ( 1990 ) और बाद मिला box दफ्तर success in films such as Sleepy खोखला ( 1999 ), चार्ली और the चॉकलेट Factory ( 2005 ), ऐलिस in Wonderland ( 2010 ), Rango ( 2011 ) और the Pirates of the Caribbean film श्रेणी ( 2003–present ).
he रै collaborated with निदेशक और friend Tim बर्टन in आठ films ; the most हाल होने अंधेरा साए ( 2012 ).
डेप रै gained acclaim लिये his portrayals of such people as Ed Wood in Ed लकडी, जोसेफ D. Pistone in Donnie Brasco, शिकारी S. Thompson in Fear and loathing in Las Vegas, जार्ज Jung in Blow, and the बैंको डाकू John dillinger in माइकल मन 's पब्लिक दुश्मनों.
Films featuring Depp have grossed over $ 3.1 billion at the United राज्य बक्सा office और over $ 7.6 billion worldwide.

the World Wide Web ( abbreviated as www or W3, commonly known as the वेब ), is a system of interlinked hypertext documents पहुँचा via the Internet.
साथ a वेब ब्राउजर, एक can view web pages कि may contain text, images, वीडियो, और अन्य multimedia, and navigate between उन्हें via hyperlinks.
using concepts from उसके पहले हाइपरटेक्स्ट systems like enquire, British engineer, computer वैज्ञानिक और at कि time employee of the CERN, Sir टिम Berners-Lee, now Director of the World चौड़ी वेब Consortium ( w3c ), लिखा a प्रस्ताव in March 1989 for what would eventually become the World चौड़ी वेब.
At cern, a European शोध organisation near जेनेवा straddling the किनारा between France और स्विट्ज़रलैंड, berners-lee and belgian computer scientist Robert cailliau proposed in 1990 to use हाइपरटेक्स्ट `` to link and अभिगम सूचना of various kinds as a वेब of नोड in जिससे the user can browse at will '', और they सरेआम introduced the project in December of the same year.
चिह्नित Travis John Sanchez ( born November 11, 1986 ) is an अमरीकी फ़ुटबॉल क्वार्टरबैक for the नई York Jets of the National Football League ( एनएफएल ).
He थी drafted in the first round of the 2009 NFL Draft as the fifth overall चयन by the Jets and the second quarterback लिया overall.
He निभाई कॉलेज फ़ुटबॉल at the University of Southern California ( यूएससी ).
Sanchez grew up in a well-disciplined and athletic family.
In the eighth grade, he began to play football और learn the intricacies of the quarterback स्थिति, training साथ his father, उपनाम.
a well-regarded prospect, Sanchez वचनबद्ध to Southern California following उसके कामयाब high school करियर in which he led his team to a championship title during his फाइनल season.
at यूएससी, Sanchez was relegated as the बैकअप क्वार्टरबैक during his पहला three years हालांकि he rose to prominence due to उसके ब्रैड दिखावे on the field in 2007 due to injuries suffered by starting quarterback जॉन David Booty.
Sanchez also became लोकप्रिय within the community due to his mexican-american विरासत.
नामित the प्रारंभ in 2008, Sanchez led यूएससी to a 12–1 record and won the Rose Bowl against Penn State for जिससे Sanchez थी awarded the सबसे Valuable Player award for his प्रदर्शन on ठोकर.
हालांकि many माना him too inexperienced, Sanchez announced his intention to enter the 2009 NFL Draft.
He was चयनित by the Jets after वे traded up with the क्लीवलैंड Browns, and थी named the starting quarterback prior to the start of the season.
despite a subpar performance, Sanchez led the jets to the AFC Championship खेल, a खोने effort to the इंडियानापोलिस Colts, becoming the चौथी rookie क्वार्टरबैक in एनएफएल history to win his पहला playoff game and the second to जीत दो playoff खेल.
in his second season, सांचेज़ continued to develop और led the Jets to the playoffs and the team 's second लगातार AFC Championship Game जहाँ वे narrowly खोया to the पिट्सबर्ग Steelers, 24–19.
With the win over the नई England देशप्रेमी the week prior, Sanchez tied four अन्य quarterbacks for the दूसरी most post-season road victories by a quarterback in एनएफएल इतिहास.
In leading the jets to two लगातार conference championships, Sanchez joined quarterback बेन roethlisberger as the only two quarterbacks in एनएफएल history to पहुँचें the सम्मेलन championship in उनके first दो seasons in the league.
The next दो सीज़न would be a regression for both the team और सांचेज़ as they failed to पहुँचें the playoffs.
Fans और media critics called for a struggling सांचेज़ to be benched.
he eventually थी replaced towards the समाप्त of the 2012 season साथ Greg McElroy.

A छोटी submersible ac sump pump साथ a गार्डन hose connector
A sump पंप is a pump used to remove water कि has संचित in a जल collecting sump जलाशय, commonly found in the तहखाने of homes.
the जल may enter via the perimeter नालों of a तहखाने waterproofing प्रणाली, funneling into the basin or because of rain or प्राकृतिक ground जल, if the basement is नीचे the water तालिका level.
sump पंपों are प्रयुक्त where basement बाढ़ happens regularly और to उपाय dampness where the water table is above the न्यास of a घर.
sump पंपों भेजें water दूर from a house to कोई place जहाँ it is no longer समस्यापूर्ण, such as a नगरपालिका storm नाली or a dry खूब.
Pumps may discharge to the sanitary सीवर in older installations.
Once considered acceptable, this अभ्यास may अभी violate the plumbing कोड or municipal bylaws, because it can overwhelm the municipal sewage उपचार system.
municipalities urge homeowners to disconnect और reroute sump pump निर्वहन away from sanitary sewers.
जुर्माना may be imposed लिये noncompliance.
Many homeowners have inherited उनके sump pump configurations और do not एहसास कि the pump discharges to the सीवर.
if the निर्वहन is fed to a laundry डूबना in the तहखाने, it 's संभावित going to the sewer.
प्रायः hardwired into a home 's electrical system, sump पंपों may have a battery backup.
the घर 's pressurized water supply शक्तियां some pumps, eliminating the need लिये विद्युत at the व्यय of using potable water, potentially making उन्हें more महंगी to operate than electrical pumps and बनाना an additional water disposal problem.
चूंकि a sump basin may अतिप्रवाह if not constantly उत्तेजित, a बैकअप प्रणाली is important for मामले when the प्रमुख शक्ति is आउट for prolonged अवधि of time, as during a severe तूफ़ान.
वहीँ हैं generally two प्रकार of sump पंपों — pedestal and submersible.
The pedestal पंप 's motor is mounted above the sump, जहाँ it is more easily serviced, लकिन is भी अधिक conspicuous.
the pump impeller is driven by a long, लंबवत extension शाफ्ट and the impeller is in a scroll आवास in the आधार of the pump.
The submersible pump is entirely mounted inside the sump, और is specially sealed to prevent electrical short circuits.
Sump pump systems are also utilized in industrial और commercial applications to control जल table -सुनानाd समस्याएं in surface soil.
An artesian aquifer or आवधिक high जल table situation can cause the मैदान to become unstable due to water saturation.
As long as the पंप कृत्यों, the सतह मृदा होगा remain stable.
ये sumps are typically ten feet in गहराई or more ; lined with corrugated metal पाइप कि contains perforations or नाली holes throughout.
They may शामिल electronic control systems साथ visual and audible सचेतक and are प्रायः covered to prevent debris and पशु इससे गिरना in.
Bleeding कान्सास, Bloody Kansas or the Border युद्ध, was a श्रेणी of हिंसक राजनैतिक confrontations involving anti-slavery Free-Staters and pro-slavery `` Border ruffian `` elements, कि took place in the कान्सास territory and the neighboring कस्बों of Missouri between 1854 and 1861.
At the heart of the विरोध was the question of whether Kansas would डालें the Union as a फ़्री state or slave राज्य.
As ऐसे, Bleeding Kansas थी a proxy युद्ध between Northerners and Southerners over the issue of slavery in the संयुक्त राज्य.
The पद `` Bleeding Kansas '' was coined by होरेस Greeley of the नई यॉर्क ट्रिब्यून ; the कार्यक्रम it encompasses सीधे presaged the अमरीकी Civil War.
Congress had long struggled to balance the interests of pro-slavery forces और anti-slavery forces.
the events later known as bleeding कान्सास यहूद set into motion by the Kansas–Nebraska Act of 1854, which nullified the मिसौरी सुलह और बजाय implemented the अवधारणा of popular sovereignty.
An ostensibly लोकतांत्रिक विचार, popular sovereignty stated that the inhabitants of each territory or state should decide whether it होता be a free or slave राज्य ; however, इस resulted in immigration en masse to Kansas by कार्यकर्ताओं इससे both पहलू.
At one point, Kansas had two पृथक governments, each with इसके own संविधान, हालांकि only one was federally recognized.
On January 29, 1861, Kansas was admitted to the Union as a फ़्री state, कम than तीन महीने before the Battle of Fort Sumter जिससे began the Civil War.
Benzene is an organic chemical यौगिक साथ the आणविक formula c6 H|Hydrogen|H6.
Its अणु is composed of 6 कार्बन atoms joined in a रिंग, साथ 1 हाइड्रोजन atom attached to each carbon atom.
Because its अणुओं contain only कार्बन and हाइड्रोजन atoms, benzene is classed as a hydrocarbon.
Benzene is a प्राकृतिक constituent of crude आयल, और is one of the most basic petrochemicals.
बेंजीन is an aromatic हाइड्रोकार्बन और the दूसरी [ n ] - annulene ( [ 6 ] -annulene ), a चक्रीय hydrocarbon with a निरन्तर pi bond.
It is sometimes abbreviated Ph –H. Benzene is a colorless and highly flammable द्रव with a sweet smell.
It is mainly used as a precursor to heavy रसायन, such as ethylbenzene और cumene, जिससे हैं produced on a अरब kilogram scale.
Because it has a high ऑक्टेन number, it is an महत्वपूर्ण घटक of गैसोलीन, composing a few percent of its mass.
Most non-industrial applications have been limited by benzene 's carcinogenicity.
Giovanni Virginio Schiaparelli ( ; 14 March 1835 – 4 July 1910 ) थी an Italian astronomer and science इतिहासकार.
Wii homebrew refers to the reuse of Nintendo 's वी खेल console to चलाएं software कि रै not महरूम प्राधिकृत by निन्टेंडो.
it achieves this by defeating the Wii 's नक़ल protection and code हस्ताक्षर measures.
in अधिक general terms, Wii homebrew refers to the उपयोग of the Wii 's हार्डवेयर, accessories and तन्त्र for purposes outside those intended by the निर्माता.
असली efforts focused on using the Wii रिमोट as a इंगित यंत्र on other ऑपरेटिंग systems, or कार्यशील web-based खेल in the built-in वेब browser.
Subsequent developments in खेल exploits, such as the `` गोधूलि हैक ``, `` Bannerbomb '' and इसके later अवतार `` LetterBomb '', `` Smash स्टेक '', `` Indiana pwns '', `` Yu-Gi-OWNED '', `` bathaxx '', and `` Return of the jodi '', made installing the `` homebrew Channel `` संभावित.

Stephen जॉन हैडली ( born फ़रवरी 13, 1947 ) थी the 21st U.S. सहायक to the President for National Security अफेयर्स ( commonly referred as National Security Advisor ), सेवारत अंतर्गत President जार्ज W. Bush.
Take एकसमान growing plants and दे fertilizer to हाफ of उन्हें.
If there are differences between the निषेचित plant group और the unfertilized `` कंट्रोल '' समूह, ये differences may be due to the fertilizer.
a scientific कंट्रोल is an प्रयोग or observation designed to minimize the effects of variables other than the सिंगल independent परिवर्तनीय.
This increases the reliability of the results, प्रायः through a comparison between control measurements and the other measurements.
Scientific controls हैं a भाग of the scientific method.
For example, during drug testing, वैज्ञानिकों होगा try to control two groups to रखना उन्हें as identical as possible, then allow one group to try the ड्रग.
another उदाहरण might be testing संयंत्र उर्वरक by giving it to तभी हाफ the plants in a गार्डन : the पौधे कि प्राप्त no उर्वरक are the कंट्रोल समूह, क्युकी they establish the baseline level of growth that the fertilizer-treated पौधे will be compared विरूद्ध.
Without a control group, the experiment can not determine whether the fertilizer-treated plants grow more than they would have if untreated.
ideally, all variables in an प्रयोग होगा be controlled ( accounted for by the कंट्रोल माप ) and none होगा be uncontrolled.
in such an experiment, if सब the नियंत्रण work as expected, it is possible to conclude that the प्रयोग is working as intended और that the परिणाम of the प्रयोग हैं due to the प्रभाव of the variable होने tested.
कि is, वैज्ञानिक controls allow an investigator to make a अर्जी like `` दो परिस्थितियों यहूद identical until factor x occurred.
Since फ़ैक्टर X is the तभी difference between the two परिस्थितियों, the new outcome was caused by factor X. ''

John Adams ( October 30, 1735 ( O.S. अक्तूबर 19, 1735 ) – July 4, 1826 ) was the दूसरी अध्यक्ष of the संयुक्त States ( 1797–1801 ), having earlier served as the first vice president of the संयुक्त States.
an अमरीकी founding Father, he थी a statesman, राजनयिक, and a अग्रणी advocate of American स्वतंत्रता from Great Britain.
Well शिक्षित, he was an Enlightenment राजनैतिक theorist who promoted republicanism and wrote prolifically परिचय उसके often seminal ideas, both in प्रकाशित works and in अक्षर to his wife और key adviser अबीगैल as well as to other Founding Fathers.
Adams आए to prominence in the early stages of the American Revolution.
A lawyer और पब्लिक figure in बोस्टन, as a delegate from मैसाचुसेट्स to the Continental Congress, he played a अग्रणी भूमिका in persuading कॉंग्रेस to declare independence.
he assisted Thomas जेफरसन in drafting the Declaration of Independence in 1776, और was इसके प्राथमिक एडवोकेट in the Congress.
Later, as a diplomat in Europe, he helped negotiate the eventual peace सन्धि with Great Britain, and was responsible लिये obtaining vital governmental लोन from एम्सटर्डम बैंकर्स.
a राजनैतिक theorist and इतिहासकार, Adams largely लिखा the मैसाचुसेट्स Constitution in 1780, which साथ साथ his earlier विचार on सरकारी, influenced अमरीकी राजनैतिक विचार.
एक of his greatest roles थी as a judge of character : in 1775, he nominated जार्ज Washington to be commander-in-chief, and 25 सालो बाद nominated John Marshall to be मुख्य Justice of the संयुक्त राज्य.
एडम्स ' revolutionary credentials secured him two शर्तें as George Washington 's vice president और उसके own election in 1796 as the second president.
During his one term, he encountered ferocious attacks by the jeffersonian republicans, as खूब as the dominant faction in his own federalist पार्टी led by उसके bitter enemy सिकंदर Hamilton.
एडम्स signed the controversial एलियन और Sedition Acts, and निर्मित up the army and navy especially in the face of an undeclared नवल war ( called the `` quasi-war `` ) with फ़्रांस, 1798–1800.
The major accomplishment of his presidency was his peaceful resolution of the विरोध in the फेस of Hamilton 's विपक्ष.
In 1800, एडम्स was defeated लिये re-election by Thomas Jefferson और रिटायर्ड to Massachusetts.
He later resumed उसके दोस्ती साथ Jefferson.
he और his wife, अबीगैल Adams, founded an accomplished परिवार लकीर of politicians, राजनयिकों, और historians अभी referred to as the एडम्स राजनैतिक परिवार.
एडम्स थी the father of जॉन Quincy एडम्स, the छठे President of the United राज्य.
His achievements have प्राप्त greater recognition in modern times, हालांकि उसके contributions were not initially as celebrated as those of other संस्थापकों.
एडम्स was the first U.S. अध्यक्ष to reside in the building that eventually became known as the श्वेत हाउस.
a Watt भाप engine.
The भाप engine, fuelled primarily by coal, propelled the Industrial क्रान्ति in ग्रेट Britain and the संसार.
The Industrial Revolution was the परिवर्तन to नई निर्माण processes कि occurred in the काल इससे about 1760 to कुछ समय between 1820 and 1840.
This परिवर्तन included going from हाथ production methods to machines, नई chemical manufacturing और iron उत्पादन processes, improved दक्षता of जल power, the increasing use of steam power और development of यंत्र tools.
The transition also included the बदलें from wood and other bio-fuels to coal.
The Industrial revolution began in Britain and within a few decades spread to Western Europe and the United States.
the Industrial क्रान्ति marks a major turning पाइंट in history ; लगभग every पहलू of रोज़ life थी influenced in कुछ way.
Most notably, average income and जनसांख्यिकी began to प्रदर्शनी unprecedented sustained विकास.
in the words of नोबेल Prize winner रॉबर्ट E. लुकास, Jr., `` लिये the पहला समय in इतिहास, the living standards of the masses of ordinary people have begun to undergo sustained growth... nothing remotely जैसे this economic behavior is mentioned by the शास्त्रीय अर्थशास्त्रियों, even as a सैद्धांतिक possibility. ''
William Bell Scott आयरन और कोयले, 1855-60
The period of समय covered by the औद्योगिक Revolution varies with अलग इतिहासकारों.
eric hobsbawm held कि it 'broke out ' in Britain in the 1780s और was not fully लगा until the 1830s or 1840s, while T. S. Ashton आयोजित that it occurred roughly between 1760 and 1830.
Some 20th-century historians such as जॉन clapham and Nicholas Crafts have argued कि the प्रक्रम of economic and social change took प्लेस gradually और the term revolution is a misnomer.
इस is still a विषय of बहस among historians.
जीडीपी प्रति capita थी broadly stable पहले the औद्योगिक Revolution and the emergence of the आधुनिक capitalist economy.
The औद्योगिक क्रान्ति began an era of per-capita economic growth in capitalist economies.
आर्थिक इतिहासकारों are in agreement कि the onset of the Industrial क्रान्ति is the most महत्वपूर्ण event in the history of मानवता since the domestication of animals and पौधे.
the First Industrial Revolution evolved into the दूसरी Industrial Revolution in the transition years between 1840 और 1870, when technological and economic progress gained momentum साथ the increasing अपनाना of steam-powered boats, जहाजों and रेल, the विशाल स्केल manufacture of machine टूल्स and the increasing use of steam powered कारखानों.
जूलियट annmarie huddy ( born सितंबर 27, 1969 ), is an अमरीकी टेलीविज़न न्यूज reporter, currently appearing on Fox News चैनल.
This सूची बाँधने U.S. cities by land area ( not including bodies of water ).
Total क्षेत्रों ( सहित जल ) are also दिए, लकिन नोट कि, when ranked by कुल area, a number of तटीय cities appear disproportionately `` larger ''.
सैन Francisco is an चरम example ; water makes up nearly 80 % of इसके कुल area of 232 वर्गाकार miles ( 601 km2 ).
नोट भी that in many cases a नगर may be geographically विशाल primarily because its municipal government रै merged with the government of the surrounding काउंटी.
in some cases the काउंटी no longer exists, जबकि in अन्य the arrangement has formed a संचित city–county ( or city- बरो in अलास्का, or city- मोहल्ला in Louisiana ).
These हैं दिखाया in bold in the list नीचे ( but not सब examples may be indicated ).
** These हैं independent शहरों, अर्थ they are नहीं a भाग of कोई काउंटी.
The large आंत ( or bowel, कोलन ) is the last भाग of the digestive system in vertebrate पशु.
Its फलन is to absorb water from the remaining indigestible food matter, and तब to pass useless waste सामग्री from the body.
This article is primarily परिचय the इंसान gut, हालांकि the सूचना परिचय its processes are directly applicable to most स्तनधारियों.
the विशाल intestine consists of the cecum, rectum and anal कनाल.
It starts in the right iliac प्रदेश of the pelvis, बस at or नीचे the सही waist, जहाँ it is joined to the नीचे समाप्त of the small intestine.
इससे here it continues up the उदर, तब आरपार the चौडाई of the abdominal cavity, and then it turns bas, continuing to इसके endpoint at the anus.
the large intestine is परिचय long, जिससे is about one-fifth of the whole length of the intestinal कनाल.
In terminologia Anatomica the विशाल intestine includes the cecum, colon, मलाशय, and गुदा कनाल.
However, some स्त्रोत exclude the anal कनाल.
the ग्रीन Bay Packers हैं an American फ़ुटबॉल team आधारित in Green खाड़ी, Wisconsin.
वे are सदस्यों of the North प्रभाग of the National फ़ुटबॉल सम्मेलन ( NFC ) in the National फ़ुटबॉल League ( एनएफएल ).
Green खाड़ी is the third-oldest मताधिकार in the NFL, having महरूम व्यवस्थित and playing in 1919.
The Packers हैं the only non-profit, community-owned प्रमुख लीग professional खेल टोली in the संयुक्त States.
The पैकर्स are the last vestige of `` छोटी town teams '' that were एकबार आम in the एनएफएल during the 1920s and 1930s.
Founded in 1919 by Earl `` Curly '' Lambeau ( hence the name lambeau Field on जिससे the team plays ) और George व्हिटनी Calhoun, the Green खाड़ी Packers can trace उनके lineage to other semi-professional teams in Green Bay dating वापस to 1896.
In 1919 and 1920 the Packers competed as a semi-professional फ़ुटबॉल टोली विरूद्ध clubs इससे around Wisconsin and the Midwest.
They joined the American पेशेवर Football संघ ( APFA ) in 1921, the forerunner to कया is known today as the नेशनल Football League ( NFL ).
Although Green खाड़ी is the पिछला NFL `` small town '' team, its local fan base और मीडिया extends into nearby मिल्वौकी ; the team also played चयनित home खेल there between 1933 and 1994.
The Green Bay Packers have जीती 13 league championships ( more than any अन्य team in the एनएफएल ), including nine NFL championships prior to the Super कटोरी era and चार Super कटोरी victories —in 1967 ( Super Bowl I ), 1968 ( Super कटोरी ii ), 1997 ( Super Bowl XXXI ) and 2011 ( सुपर Bowl XLV ).
The Packers have long-standing, कड़वा rivalries साथ उनके NFC North ( formerly the nfc Central ) opponents, the Chicago bears, मिनेसोटा वाइकिंग्स और the Detroit शेर.
the bears-packers rivalry is one of the oldest rivalries in NFL history, dating back to 1921.
the सैन Fernando Valley ( locally known as `` The घाटी '' ) is an urbanized valley located in the लॉस एंजिल्स महानगर क्षेत्रफल of दक्षिणी कैलिफ़ोर्निया, संयुक्त States, पारिभाषित by the kyu of the Transverse सीमाएँ घूमना it.
Home to 1.76 million लोगों, it झूठ north of the larger and more populous लॉस Angeles Basin.
Nearly दो तिहाई of the घाटी 's land area is भाग of the नगर of Los Angeles.
the other incorporated cities in the घाटी are ग्लेनडेल, burbank, San फर्नांडो, छुपा Hills और calabasas.

Susan leigh Vaughan स्मिथ ( born सितंबर 26, 1971 ) is an अमरीकी woman sentenced to life in थाना for murdering her children.
Born in Union, South Carolina, and a former छात्र of the विश्वविद्यालयों of South Carolina संघ, she was convicted on July 22, 1995 लिये murdering उसके two बेटे, 3-year-old माइकल डेनियल Smith, born October 10, 1991, and 14-month-old Alexander Tyler स्मिथ, born अगस्त 5, 1993.
The case gained worldwide ध्यान shortly after it developed, due to उसके claiming कि a ब्लैक man चुराया her car और kidnapped उसके sons.
वो later claimed that वो suffered इससे दिमागी health issues कि impaired उसके निर्णय.

She is incarcerated at South Carolina 's Leath Correctional संस्था, near Greenwood.
Mount McKinley ( also ज्ञात as denali taken from the इनुइट koyukon athabaskan language अर्थ `` The Great एक '' ) is the उच्चतम mountain शिखर in the संयुक्त States और in North America with a summit उन्नयन of above sea level.
At कुछ, the base to peak rise is considered the largest of any पहाड़ situated entirely ऊपर sea level.
Measured by topographic prominence, it is the third most prominent peak after Mount Everest और अकोंकागुआ.
Located in the Alaska Range in the आंतरिक of US state of Alaska, it is the centerpiece of denali National Park और बचाना.
The first European to document sighting the mountain was George Vancouver in 1794.
In 1903, James wickersham अंकित the पहला attempt at चढ़ाई McKinley जिससे was unsuccessful.
in 1906, फ्रेडरिक Cook claimed the first ascent which was later proven to be गलत.
The first verifiable ascent to mckinley 's समिट थी हासिल on June 7, 1913 by climbers Hudson stuck, हैरी karstens, वाल्टर Harper, और Robert Tatum.
in 1951, Bradford washburn pioneered the वेस्ट buttress route considered to be the safest और easiest रूट and इसलिए the most popular currently in उपयोग.
The Honda S600 is an ऑटोमोबाइल manufactured by Honda.
It थी launched in March 1964.
Available as a roadster – bearing strong प्रतिरूप to the Honda S500 – and as a fastback coupé – introduced in कूच 1965 – the S600 was the पहला Honda available in two trim levels.
During its उत्पादन run up to 1966, the मॉडल styling होता remain pretty much the same, with the most notable परिवर्तन coming to the सामने grille, bumper, and headlights.
Powered by a dohc, water-cooled, four-cylinder inline इंजन साथ चार carburetors, the engine capacity was increased to 606 cc इससे the S500 's 531 cc.
The इंजन उत्पादित at 8,500 rpm and had a शीर्ष speed of.
साथ the convertible weighing in at mere, the अतिरिक्त चादर metal of the कूप तभी added to the overall वज़न.
बर्खास्तगी was स्वतंत्र with sealed रोलर chain drive to each पश्च wheel.
The s600 was the first द्रव्यमान marketed होंडा car.
First offered तभी in right-hand drive, it soon became उपलब्धियाँ in left-hand ड्राइव to appeal to export markets.
वहीँ यहूद a few pre-production S500s manufactured in बाएँ hand drive, दो or तीन भी होने दिखाया in some early sales brochures.
दोनो the s600 roadster और coupé were available in standard trim and a special, upgraded पैकेज पुकारा the SM600 which शामिल, among other items, special पेंट colors, exclusive badging, a मानक रेडियो और speaker, a खास antenna in the passenger side sun visor, standard reversing lights, a मानक सिगरेट lighter, a standard हीटर, better cushioned seats, and a detachable सीट track for जल्दी removal of the यात्री seat.
Honda निर्मित 3,912 roadsters in 1964, with production climbing to 7,261 convertibles और 1,519 coupes in 1965.
Production dropped off in 1966 ( as वे were shifting to the S800 ) साथ only 111 roadsters and 281 coupes, giving tallies of 11,284 convertibles और 1,800 coupes लिये the 3 year span.
Everybody hates Chris is an American टेलीविज़न काल sitcom that depicts the teenage experiences of comedian Chris चट्टान ( जो is भी the narrator ) जबकि growing up in the Bedford-Stuyvesant neighborhood of ब्रुकलीन, नई York.
the दिखाएँ is नियत between 1983 and 1987 ; however, Rock himself थी a teenager between 1978 and 1983.
