Pleural effusion is excess द्रव that accumulates between the two pleural layers, the fluid-filled स्पेस कि surrounds the lungs.
Excessive amounts of ऐसे द्रव can impair breathing by limiting the विस्तार of the lungs during वेंटिलेशन.
बियोवुल्फ़ ( ; in बूढ़ा अंग्रेज़ी or ) is the conventional शीर्षक of an बूढ़ा अंग्रेज़ी वीर epic poem consisting of 3182 alliterative long लाइनों, set in Scandinavia, commonly cited as one of the most important works of Anglo-Saxon साहित्य.
it survives in a सिंगल manuscript known as the Nowell Codex.
Its संयोजन by an anonymous Anglo-Saxon कवि is dated between the 8th and the early 11th सदी.
In 1731, the पाण्डुलिपि थी badly क्षतिग्रस्त by a fire कि swept through a भवन housing a collection of Medieval manuscripts समवेत by Sir रॉबर्ट ब्रूस Cotton.
the कविता fell into अस्पष्टता लिये दशकों, और its अस्तित्व did नहीं become widely ज्ञात again जबतक it was मुद्रित in 1815 in an edition prepared by the icelandic-danish विद्वान grímur Jónsson Thorkelin.
In the कविता, Beowulf, a नायिका of the Geats in Scandinavia, comes to the help of hroðgar, the king of the Danes, जिनकी mead हॉल ( in heorot ) has been under आक्रमण by a monster ज्ञात as Grendel.
After Beowulf जानबूझ उसे, grendel 's माँ हमले the hall और is then भी पराजित.
विजयी, बियोवुल्फ़ goes home to geatland in Sweden और बाद becomes king of the Geats.
After a period of पचास years has passed, बियोवुल्फ़ defeats a ड्रैगन, लकिन is fatally wounded in the battle.
बाद his मौत, his attendants bury उसे in a tumulus, a दफ़न mound, in Geatland.
Shem हैम और japheth by James Tissot 1904.
Shem ( ; sēm ; Arabic : sām ; ge'ez : ሴም, Sēm ; `` renown ; prosperity ; name '' ) was one of the sons of Noah in the Hebrew Bible as well as in Islamic साहित्य.
He is most popularly regarded as the eldest बेटे, हालांकि कुछ परंपराओं regard him as the second son.
Genesis 10:21 refers to सापेक्ष आयु of Shem और उसके brother Japheth, लकिन with sufficient ambiguity to have yielded different translations.
the verse is translated in the kjv as `` Unto Shem भी, the father of all the children of Eber, the bhai of japheth the elder, even to him यहूद children born. ``.
However, the New American मानक बाइबल देता, `` भी to Shem, the father of सब the children of Eber, and the पुरानी bhai of Japheth, children were born. ''
Genesis 11:10 रिकॉर्ड कि shem थी still 100 सालो old at the जनम of Arphaxad, ( लकिन nearly 101 - see Chronology नोट, ) two years after the बाढ़, making him barely 99 at the समय the बाढ़ began ; and that he जिया लिये another 500 years after this, making his आयु at मौत 600 years.
The children of shem यहूद ईलम, Asshur, arphaxad, Lud, and aram, in addition to daughters.
अब्राहम, the patriarch of the Hebrews and Arabs, was one of the वंशजों of Arphaxad.
Islamic literature describes shem as एक of the believing बेटे of Noah.
कुछ स्त्रोत even identify Shem as a prophet in his अपना सही and that he was the next prophet बाद his पिता.
In one Muslim लेजेंड, Shem थी one of the people कि God बना Jesus उठाएगा as a sign to the Children of इसराईल.
The 1st सदी इतिहासकार flavius Josephus, among many others, recounted the परंपरा that ये five बेटे यहूद the progenitors of the राष्ट्र of ईलम, Assyria, chaldea, लीडिया, और सीरियाई, respectively.
Semitic is स्टिल a commonly प्रयुक्त term for the Semitic languages, as a subset of the afro-asiatic languages, denoting the common linguistic विरासत of Arabic, aramaic, Akkadian, ethiopic, यहूदी और Phoenician languages.
According to कुछ Jewish traditions ( e.g., B. Talmud Nedarim 32b ; उत्पत्ति rabbah 46:7 ; उत्पत्ति rabbah 56:10 ; leviticus Rabbah 25:6 ; संख्याएँ rabbah 4:8. ), Shem is believed to have been melchizedek, King of सलेम जिसको अब्राहम is recorded to have मिले after the battle of the चार kings.
in a few of the many extra-biblical sources that describe him, Shem is भी credited साथ killing nimrod, son of Cush.
Shem is mentioned in उत्पत्ति 5:32, 6:10 ; 7:13 ; 9:18,23,26-27 ; 10 ; 11:10 ; भी in 1 क्रॉनिकल्स 1:4.
Geographic identifications of Flavius Josephus, c. 100 ad ; japheth 's बेटे दिखाया in रेड, हैम 's बेटे in blue, shem 's sons in green.
Go Daddy or go Daddy Group Inc. is a privately held company कि is primarily an अंतरजाल डोमेन रजिस्ट्रार and web hosting company.
Go Daddy Group Inc. filed for an IPO in 2006, लकिन later canceled it, due to `` मार्केट uncertainties ''.
In addition to domain पंजीकरण and होस्टिंग Go Daddy also sells e-business related तन्त्र और सेवाएं.
On June 24, 2011, The वॉल गली जर्नल reported that private-equity firms KKR and चांदी झील Partners, साथ साथ a third investor, यहूद nearing a सौदे to ख़रीदे the company for between $ 2–2.5 billion.
On July 1, 2011 Go Daddy पुष्टि that KKR, चांदी Lake Partners और प्रौद्योगिकी Crossover ventures had बंद the deal.
हालांकि the खरीदें price थी नहीं officially announced it was reported to be $ 2.25 अरब, for 65 % of the company.
, bob पार्सन्स had ceded the CEO role of go Daddy to Warren Adelman, जो था been with the कम्पनी for about 10 सालो.
the andorran कोट of बाहें at the Andorran पार्लियामेंट.
Andorra ( ;, ), officially the Principality of Andorra ( ), also called the Principality of the घाटियों of Andorra, ( ), is a landlocked microstate in Southwestern Europe, located in the पूर्वी Pyrenees kyu और bordered by Spain और France.
It is the छठे smallest स्वदेश in Europe, having an area of and an अनुमानित population of 85,000 in 2012.
Its पूंजी, अंडोरा la Vella, is the highest पूंजी नगर in यूरोपीय, at an उन्नयन of above समुद्र level.
the आधिकारिक भाषा is कैटलन, हालांकि Spanish, Portuguese, and French are also commonly spoken.
Created under a चार्टर in 988, the उपस्थित principality was formed in 1278.
It is known as a principality as it is a monarchy headed by two co-princes – the बिशप of urgell और the President of France.
अंडोरा is a prosperous देश mainly क्युकी of इसके tourism उद्योग, which सेवाएं an अनुमानित 10.2 million visitors annually, and भी because of इसके औकात as a कर haven.
It is not a member of the European Union, but the यूरोपियन is the de facto currency.
the people of अंडोरा have the 4th उच्चतम human जीवन प्रत्याशा in the world — 82 सालो at birth.
The जार्ज वॉशिंगटन विश्वविद्यालयों ( GW, GWU, or George Washington ) is a comprehensive private, coeducational शोध university located in Washington, D.C..
It awards certificates, Bachelor degrees, मास्टर्स degrees, और phds आरपार अनेक दर्जन disciplines.
The university was चार्टर्ड by an अधिनियम of Congress on फ़रवरी 9, 1821 as The Columbian कॉलेज in the District of Columbia.

In 2007, वो gained सुर्खी as the subject of a sex tape that subsequently resulted in a court awarding her $ 5 लाख ; बाद in that वही year, she and her family रोज़ to prominence साथ their e !

oahu ( ) or Oahu, known as `` The महफ़िल Place '', is the तीसरा largest of the Hawaiian Islands और the most populous of the आइलैंड्स in the u.S. state of Hawaii.
the state पूंजी, Honolulu, is on Oahu 's southeast coast.
Including small close-in offshore islands ऐसे as घाट द्वीप और the islands in Kaneohe Bay और off the eastern ( windward ) coast, it has a total जमीन क्षेत्रफल of, making it the 20th largest द्वीप in the United राज्य.
In the greatest आयाम, इस volcanic द्वीप is long and across.
the length of the shoreline is.
the द्वीप is the result of two separate shield ज्वालामुखी : Waianae और Koolau, with a broad `` घाटी '' or saddle ( the सेंट्रल Oahu Plain ) between उन्हें.
the highest पाइंट is Mt. Ka'ala in the waianae दायरा, rising to above sea level.
the base करेंसी of the United States is the u.S. dollar, and is printed on bills in denominations of $ 1, $ 2, $ 5, $ 10, $ 20, $ 50, and $ 100.
At एक time, however, U.S. करेंसी included पाँच larger denominations.
Notes in the denominations of $ 500, $ 1,000, $ 5,000, and $ 10,000 यहूद printed लिये general use, and a $ 100,000 note थी printed लिये certain आतंरिक ट्रांजेक्शन.
British Honduras was a अंग्रेजों colony in सेंट्रल America.
in 1981, the colony gained पूरा independence, and is अभी the independent nation of बेलीज़.
पहला colonised by spaniards in the 17th century, the territory on the ईस्ट coast of सेंट्रल America, south of Mexico, became a अंग्रेजों crown colony in 1862.
In 1964, it became a self-governing colony.
Belize became fully स्वतंत्र from the संयुक्त किंगडम in 1981.
Belize थी the last continental possession of the संयुक्त Kingdom in the Americas.
Spelt, also known as dinkel गेहूं, or hulled गेहूं, is an ancient species of गेहूं इससे the fifth millennium bc.
Spelt थी an important staple in parts of Europe इससे the Bronze Age to medieval times ; it now survives as a relict क्रॉप in सेंट्रल Europe and northern Spain और रै found a new market as a health खाना.
spelt is sometimes माना a subspecies of the closely related प्रजाति common wheat ( T. aestivum ), in which case its वनस्पति name is माना to be triticum aestivum subsp. spelta.
it is a hexaploid गेहूं, जिससे means it has six sets of chromosomes.
Sherlock Holmes ( or ) is a fictional detective created by लेखक और physician Sir आर्थर Conan Doyle.
a london-based `` consulting detective '' whose abilities border on the fantastic, Holmes is प्रसिद्ध लिये उसके astute logical reasoning, his क्षमता to adopt almost any भेस, और उसके use of forensic science कौशल to solve difficult cases.
holmes, जो first appeared in प्रकाशन in 1887, was featured in चार novels और 56 short stories.
the पहला novel, a Study in Scarlet, appeared in beeton 's Christmas Annual in 1887 and the दूसरी, The Sign of the Four, in lippincott 's Monthly Magazine in 1890.
the character grew tremendously in popularity with the पहला series of short stories in the Strand Magazine, शुरूआत with A Scandal in बोहेमिया in 1891 ; further श्रेणी of short stories और two novels प्रकाशित in serial रूप appeared between तब and 1927.
The stories cover a period from around 1880 up to 1914.
All लकिन चार कहानियां are narrated by holmes 's friend और biographer, Dr. जॉन H. वाटसन ; दो हैं narrated by holmes खुद ( `` the Blanched सिपाही `` और `` The Lion 's माने `` ) and two others are written in the third व्यक्ति ( `` the Mazarin Stone `` और `` His Last Bow `` ).
In दो कहानियां ( `` The musgrave Ritual `` and `` The Gloria स्कॉट `` ), Holmes tells वाटसन the main story from his यादें, while वाटसन becomes the narrator of the frame स्टोरी.
the पहला and fourth novels, A पढ़ाई in स्कारलेट and the घाटी of Fear, प्रत्येक include a long interval of omniscient narration recounting events unknown to either holmes or Watson.
The United States House of प्रतिनिधि is एक of the two घरों of the United States Congress ( a bicameral legislature ).
it is frequently referred to as the House.
The अन्य house is the Senate.
The composition और powers of the House are स्थापित in Article One of the United States Constitution.
The major शक्ति of the हाउस is to pass federal legislation that affects the entire country हालांकि इसके बिल्स must भी be passed by the सीनेट and further agreed to by the U.S. President पहले becoming विधि ( unless both the हाउस और सीनेट re-pass the विधान with a two-thirds बहुमत in each chamber ).
The हाउस has several exclusive शक्तियां : the शक्ति to initiate revenue bills, to impeach officials, and to elect the u.S. अध्यक्ष in मामला there is no majority in the चुनावी कॉलेज.
Each U.S. state is represented in the House in proportion to its population लकिन is entitled to at तनिक one representative.
The most populous state, California, currently रै 53 प्रतिनिधि.
the कुल क्रमांक of voting प्रतिनिधि is फिक्स्ड by law at 435.
Each representative serves for a two-year term.
The स्पीकर of the United राज्य House of प्रतिनिधि, who presides over the chamber, is elected by the members of the House, और is therefore traditionally the नेता of the हाउस Democratic caucus or the House रिपब्लिकन सम्मेलन, whichever party रै more voting सदस्यों.
The हाउस meets in the south wing of the संयुक्त States Capitol.

The ब्रांड 's लोकप्रियता has led to it being प्रयुक्त as a generic term लिये gelatin मिठाई आरपार the U.S. and कनाडा.
Kennywood is an मनोरंजन पार्क located in वेस्ट Mifflin, पेन्सिलवेनिया, a उपनगरीय of Pittsburgh.
the park पहला खोली in 1898 as a `` ट्राली park '' attraction at the end of the mellon family 's Monongahela Street Railway.
The park थी खरीदा in 1906 by F. W. Henninger और Andrew mcswigan and thus began the kennywood entertainment company कि has remained a closely आयोजित परिवार कारोबार लिये over 100 years.
This परंपरागत मनोरंजन park still has structures और rides dating वापस to its खोलने and the early 1900s.
Along साथ Rye playland पार्क, it is एक of only two amusement पार्क सूचीबद्ध in the नेशनल Register of ऐतिहासिक स्थान.
Kennywood is स्वामित्व by Kennywood entertainment Company, जिससे until दिसम्बर 2007 थी a closely आयोजित family कारोबार owned by the Henninger और mcswigan families.
kennywood Entertainment is now संचालित by California-based Palace Entertainment, a subsidiary of parques reunidos, an international amusement पार्क कम्पनी आधारित in मैड्रिड, स्पेन.
parque Reunidos is in turn a subsidiary of Candover Investments, an निवेश fund आधारित in the UK.
A सोशल सुरक्षा card जारी by the Railroad Retirement Board in 1943 to a now मृतक person.
In the संयुक्त राज्य, a सोशल Security number ( SSN ) is a nine-digit number जारी to u.S. नागरिकों, permanent residents, and temporary ( working ) residents under section 205 ( c ) ( 2 ) of the Social Security Act, codified as.
The number is issued to an individual by the सोशल Security प्रशासन, an independent agency of the संयुक्त राज्य government.
Its प्राथमिक purpose is to track individuals लिये सोशल Security उद्देश्य.
A सोशल सुरक्षा क्रमांक may be obtained by applying on रूप ss-5, `` अनुप्रयोग लिये A Social सुरक्षा Number कार्ड ''.
Minimalism describes आंदोलनों in various फ़ॉर्म of आर्ट and design, विशेषकर विज़ुअल art and म्यूज़िक, where the कार्य is set out to expose the essence or पहचान of a विषय through eliminating सब non-essential forms, सुविधाएँ or अवधारणाओं.
Minimalism is any design or style in which the सरलतम और fewest elements हैं used to बनाएँ the अधिकतम प्रभाव.
As a specific movement in the arts it is पहचाना साथ developments in post–World War II Western Art, सबसे strongly साथ अमरीकी visual arts in the 1960s and early 1970s.
prominent कलाकारों associated with इस movement शामिल डोनाल्ड judd, John McCracken, agnes Martin, Dan flavin, Robert मॉरिस, Anne truitt, and फ़्रैंक Stella.
It is rooted in the reductive पहलुओं of Modernism, and is प्रायः interpreted as a reaction विरूद्ध अमूर्त expressionism and a bridge to postminimal आर्ट practices.
the terms have विस्तारित to encompass a गति in music जिससे सुविधाएँ repetition और iteration, as in the compositions of La Monte यंग, Terry Riley, Steve reich, फिलिप कांच, and John Adams.
Minimalist compositions are sometimes known as systems music.
The पद `` minimalist '' is often applied colloquially to designate anything that is अतिरिक्त or stripped to its essentials.
It has भी been used to describe the plays and novels of Samuel Beckett, the films of रॉबर्ट Bresson, the stories of रेमंड carver, and even the ऑटोमोबाइल डिजाइन of कोलिन Chapman.
The word was पहला used in English in the early 20th century to describe the Mensheviks.
In रसायन और physics, Dalton 's law ( also called डाल्टन 's law of आंशिक pressures ) राज्य that the total दबाव exerted by the mixture of non-reactive गैसों is बराबर to the sum of the partial pressures of व्यक्तिगत गैसों.
इस empirical law थी observed by जॉन Dalton in 1801 and is related to the ideal gas laws.
mathematically, the दबाव of a मिश्रण of gases can be defined as the summation
or
where represent the आंशिक दबाव of each component.
it is assumed that the गैसों do not react with each अन्य
जहाँ is the mole fraction of the i-th घटक in the total मिश्रण of n components.
The relationship नीचे provides a रास्ता to determine the आवाज़ आधारित concentration of any व्यक्तिगत gaseous component
जहाँ is the concentration of the i-th component expressed in ppm.
डाल्टन 's law is not exactly followed by real गैसों.
those deviations are considerably large at ऊँची pressures.
In such शर्तें, the volume occupied by the molecules can become significant compared to the free स्पेस between them.
in particular, the short average दूरियाँ between molecules उठाता the intensity of intermolecular शक्तियां between गैस molecules enough to substantially change the दबाव exerted by them.
neither of those प्रभाव are माना by the आदर्श gas मॉडल.
This is a सूची of the largest संयुक्त राज्य colleges and universities by नामांकन लिये colleges and universities in the United States.
कया this सूची शामिलs:
Colleges और विश्वविद्यालयों भीतर the संयुक्त राज्य
University systems if the प्रणाली is run under a single प्रशासन
Enrollment is the sum of the headcount of undergraduate and ग्रैजुएट students
Enrollment is counted by the Integrated Post-secondary Education प्रणाली within the U.S. Department of Education.
नामांकन is the 12-month unduplicated headcount, indicating the number of अद्वितीय students who attended the university during the year.
What this सूची does नहीं include:
Any indication of कैसा many of the enrolled विद्यार्थी are full or part time ( e.g., some universities may have a high enrollment, but have सबसे विद्यार्थी enrolled in only a सिंगल class )

`` सही गोलाकार '' is a song performed by American rapper Flo Rida, released as the सीसे single from उसके दूसरी studio एल्बम, r.o.o.t.s. ( 2009 ).
The song सुविधाएँ अतिथि vocals from Kesha.
It was released to radio on 27 January 2009 and was डिजिटली released on 10 फ़रवरी by Poe Boy entertainment and Atlantic रिकॉर्ड.
The सोंग lyrically speaks of flo rida 's net बॉल रेफरी enthusiasm, while adapting the कोरस of the 1984 Dead or Alive song `` You Spin Me गोलाकार ( Like a Record ) `` in its आँकड़ा.
According to एक of the song 's लेखक, the chorus refers to oral sex.
kesha contributed अतिथि vocals to the सोंग, लकिन in the United States, during the run atop the chart, kesha थी uncredited.
The सोंग प्राप्त mostly ऋणात्मक reviews इससे आलोचकों, who claimed it was kitsch और misogynistic.
however, it थी a commercial success, reaching the top ten of the चार्ट in उन्नीस countries worldwide.
in the United States, it became Flo Rida 's second number-one single and broke the record for first-week sales जब it was released to digital retailers.
The सिंगल 's accompanying music वीडियो was directed by Malcolm Jones and मनोनीत for an एमटीवी वीडियो म्यूज़िक पुरस्कार.
The सोंग रै been used in अनेक movies, ऐसे as the hangover, The भद्दा सच्चाई and the तेलुगु movie Pilla Zamindar.
In the फिल्म Pitch पूर्ण, the सोंग is performed by the a cappella समूह the Treblemakers.
the मुख्य Justice of the United राज्य is the head of the United राज्य federal court प्रणाली ( the judicial शाखा of the federal सरकारी of the United राज्य ) और the मुख्य judge of the Supreme अदालत of the संयुक्त राज्य.
The मुख्य इंसाफ is एक of नौ Supreme Court justices ; the other आठ are the Associate justices of the Supreme Court of the United States.
From 1789 until 1866, the office was known as the मुख्य Justice of the Supreme Court.
The मुख्य Justice is the highest न्यायिक officer in the country, और अधिनियमों as a chief प्रशासनिक officer लिये the federal courts and as head of the Judicial Conference of the संयुक्त States appoints the director of the Administrative Office of the United राज्य Courts.
the मुख्य Justice भी serves as a प्रवक्ता for the न्यायिक branch.
The मुख्य इंसाफ लीड the कारोबार of the Supreme Court.
he presides over मौखिक arguments पहले the अदालत.
When the court renders an राय, the Chief Justice—when in the majority—decides जो writes the court 's opinion.
The Chief Justice also रै significant agenda-setting शक्ति over the अदालत 's बैठक.
in the case of an impeachment of a अध्यक्ष of the United राज्य, which has occurred twice, the मुख्य इंसाफ presides over the trial in the सीनेट.
In modern परंपरा, the मुख्य Justice has the ceremonial ड्यूटी of administering the oath of office of the President of the संयुक्त राज्य.
The पहला Chief Justice थी John Jay.
The 17th and current Chief इंसाफ is जॉन G. रॉबर्ट्स, Jr.

Prudhoe खाड़ी आयल Field is a विशाल आयल फ़ील्ड on अलास्का 's North ढलान.
It is the largest oil फ़ील्ड in दोनो the United राज्य and in North America, covering and originally containing approximately of आयल.
the राशि of recoverable oil in the फ़ील्ड is अधिक than double that of the अगला largest फ़ील्ड in the संयुक्त States, the East Texas oil फ़ील्ड.
the फ़ील्ड is operated by BP ; partners हैं ExxonMobil and conocophillips अलास्का.
Labor unions हैं legally पहचाना as representatives of workers in many उद्योग in the United States.
Their activity आज centers on collective bargaining over wages, benefits, and working conditions लिये their सदस्यता, and on representing उनके सदस्यों in disputes with प्रबन्धन over violations of contract provisions.
larger unions also typically engage in lobbying क्रियाएँ and electioneering at the state and federal level.
सबसे unions in America हैं aligned with one of two larger umbrella संगठन : the AFL-CIO created in 1955, and the Change to Win Federation which विभाजित इससे the AFL-CIO in 2005.
Both advocate नीतियों and legislation on behalf of मजदूर in the United राज्य and Canada, and लो an active role in राजनीती.
The afl-cio is विशेषकर चिंतित with global trade मुद्दे.
in 2010, the percentage of मजदूर belonging to a union in the United States ( or total labor union `` density '' ) was 11.4 %, compared to 18.4 % in जर्मनी, 27.5 % in Canada, and 70 % in फिनलैंड.
Union membership in the private सेक्टर has fallen अंतर्गत 7 % — levels not seen since 1932.
Unions allege कि employer-incited opposition has contributed to this मनाही in सदस्यता.
the सबसे prominent unions are among public सेक्टर employees such as teachers and पुलिस.
सदस्यों of संघ are disproportionately पुरानी, male and residents of the Northeast, the मिडवेस्ट, and California.
संघ workers average 10-30 % उच्चतर अदा than non-union in America after controlling for व्यक्तिगत, job, and labor market विशेषताएँ.
Although much छोटी compared to उनके peak membership in the 1950s, American संघ remain a prominent political फ़ैक्टर, दोनो through mobilization of उनके own सदस्यताएँ and through coalitions साथ like-minded activist संगठन around issues such as immigrant rights, व्यापार policy, health care, and living मजदूरी अभियान.
to लड़ो कथित employer anti-union programs, unions हैं currently वकालत नई `` card check `` संघीय विधान that would require employers to bargain with a संघ if अधिक than 50 % of workers signed forms, or `` ताश, '' stating they wish to be represented by that union.
the current procedure involves waiting 45 to 90 days लिये a federally supervised secret-ballot employee referendum on the subject.
The economist Joseph Stiglitz रै asserted that, `` Strong संघ have helped to reduce असमानता, whereas weaker संघ have made it easier for CEOs, sometimes working with मार्केट forces that they have helped shape, to बढ़ाएँ it. ''
the मनाही in unionization चूंकि WWII in the संयुक्त States has महरूम associated with a pronounced वृद्धि in income and wealth inequality.
a ईसाई Lacroix फ़ैशन बुटीक
A बुटीक is a small shopping outlet, विशेषकर one that specializes in elite and fashionable वस्तुएं ऐसे as कपडे और jewelry.
The word is फ्रेंच for `` दूकान '', via लैटिन from Greek ἀποθήκη ( apothēkē ), `` storehouse ''.
The पद entered into everyday अंग्रेज़ी use in the late 1960s जब, for a brief period, London was the केन्द्र of the फ़ैशन trade.
Carnaby Street और the किंग्स Road were the focus of much media attention as घर to the सबसे फैशनेबल boutiques of the era.
Now the East of लंदन रै महरूम regenerated and more boutiques पॉप up in fashionable areas, such as मीनार सेतु Road.
It can also refer to a specialised firm such as a बुटीक निवेश बैंको or boutique विधि कड़.
The word is प्रायः used to describe a property in the independent खण्ड of the होटल मार्केट ( such as The rockwell in लंदन ) in order to distinguish themselves इससे larger chains ( ऐसे as हिल्टन Hotels ).
In ऐसे cases the establishments उद्देश्य to convey the idea कि the operation is elite and highly specialised.
in the strictest sense of the शब्द, boutiques होता be one-of-a-kind but अधिक generally बोलना, कुछ जंजीरों can be referred to as boutiques if they specialize in particular शैलियाँ.
recently, the पद `` बुटीक '' रै started होने applied to normally-mass-market items that are either niche or produced in intentionally small numbers at very ऊँची कीमतें.
This may be referred to as boutique निर्माण.
लिये example, before the release of the Wii, a Time Magazine आलेख suggested that Nintendo could become a `` boutique video-game company '', producing games लिये niche ऑडियंस, rather than trying to compete सीधे साथ microsoft and सोनी.
In the traditional luxury- watch उद्योग Scalfaro International is considered as the precursor in manufacturing और बिक्री of bespoke घड़ियाँ.
the स्विस company uses a highly लचीली बुटीक manufacturing site, जिससे allows producing छोटी series or even अद्वितीय timepieces.
Although some boutiques specialise in hand-made items and अन्य truly one-of-a-kind वस्तुएं, others simply उपज t-shirts, stickers, और other fashion accessories in artificially small रनों and बेचें उन्हें at unusually high prices.
In the early 1990s सेलिना started manufacturing her own line of women 's कपडे.
Opening दो boutiques labeled as `` Selena Etc. Boutique & Salon '' एक located in Corpus Christi and one located in सैन Antonio, Texas.
One was due to open in Monterrey, मैक्सिको, in 1995 लकिन due to her मौत it was नहीं opened.
Around 1999 the San Antonio स्थान बंद and the कॉर्पस christi location was closed in 2009.
In लेट 1990s some European खुदरा traders developed the idea of tailoring a दूकान towards a जीवनशैली theme, in the रूप of `` concept stores '', which specialised in cross-selling बगैर using separate departments.
एक of the first concept stores थी 10 कोरसो Como in मिलान, इटली followed by Colette in Paris and quartier 206 in बर्लिन.
अनेक well-known American chains such as शहरी Outfitters, d-a-s-h, और the Gap, Australian कड़ी Billabong और, though less common, रब & टेलर adapted to the concept store trend बाद 2000.
नेवी संघीय Credit Union ( or Navy Federal ) is a क्रेडिट संघ headquartered in Vienna, वर्जिनिया, चार्टर्ड and regulated under the authority of the नेशनल Credit Union प्रशासन ( NCUA ) of the u.S. federal government.
नेवी संघीय is the largest natural member ( or retail ) क्रेडिट union in the world, both in एसेट आकार और in सदस्यता.
as of सितंबर 2012, Navy Federal had over $ 50 अरब usd in assets, and over 4 million सदस्यों.
Stevland hardaway मॉरिस ( born May 13, 1950 as stevland Hardaway judkins ), ज्ञात by उसके stage नाम Stevie Wonder, is an अमरीकी singer, songwriter, and multi-instrumentalist, a चाइल्ड prodigy जो विकसित into one of the most creative musical figures of the लेट 20th सदी.
Blind चूंकि shortly after जनम, Wonder signed साथ Motown 's tamla label at the आयु of ग्यारह, और continues to perform and record for motown to this दिन.
among Wonder 's best known works हैं singles ऐसे as `` अंधविश्वास ``, `` Sir ड्यूक ``, `` You Are the Sunshine of My जीवन `` और `` I Just Called to Say I प्रेम तुम ``.
खूब known albums also include Talking किताब, innervisions and गीतों in the कुंजी of जीवन.
he has अंकित more than thirty U.S. top ten हिट्स and received twenty-two ग्रैमी पुरस्कार, the सबसे कभी awarded to a पुरूष solo artist.
अचरज is also noted लिये his work as an activist लिये राजनैतिक कल्याणकारी, including his 1980 अभियान to मेक Martin लूथर किंग, jr. 's जन्मदिवस a holiday in the United States.
in 2009, अचरज थी named a संयुक्त Nations मेसेंजर of Peace.
in 2008, Billboard magazine released a list of the Hot 100 All-Time शीर्ष कलाकारों to celebrate the us singles चार्ट 's fiftieth anniversary, साथ अचरज at number five.
By popular vote, Stevie थी inducted into The SoulMusic हॉल of Fame at soulmusic.com in December 2012.
मनस्ताप ( इससे the यूनानी ψυχή `` psyche '', for mind/soul, and -ωσις `` -ओएसआईs '', लिये abnormal condition or derangement ) refers to an abnormal condition of the mind, और is a generic मनोरोग term लिये a दिमागी state प्रायः described as involving a `` loss of contact साथ reality ``.
लोगों कष्ट from मनस्ताप are described as psychotic.
Psychosis is दिए to the अधिक कठोर फ़ॉर्म of psychiatric disorder, during जिससे hallucinations और delusions, सकल उत्तेजना or stupor and impaired insight may occur.
The पद `` मनस्ताप '' is very broad और can mean anything from relatively सामान्य aberrant अनुभवों through to the जटिल और catatonic expressions of schizophrenia और bipolar प्रकार 1 विकार.
moreover a चौड़ी किस्में of central nervous system रोगों, from दोनो external substances and internal physiologic illness, can produce symptoms of मनस्ताप.
इस led many पेशेवर to say कि मनस्ताप is नहीं specific enough as a निदान term.
Despite इस, `` मनस्ताप '' is generally given to noticeable deficits in normal behavior ( ऋणात्मक लक्षण ) and अधिक commonly to diverse types of hallucinations or delusional beliefs ( e.g. grandiosity, delusions of persecution ).
Someone exhibiting very obvious लक्षण may be described as `` frankly psychotic '', whereas one exhibiting बहुत हल्का signs could be classified in the category of an `` attenuated psychotic risk syndrome ''.
An excess in dopaminergic signalling is traditionally linked to the धनात्मक symptoms of मनस्ताप, विशेषकर those of schizophrenia.
This is thought to occur through a mechanism of aberrant salience of पर्यावरणीय stimuli.
Many antipsychotic दवाएँ accordingly निशाना the dopamine प्रणाली ; meta-analyses of placebo-controlled trials of these drugs, however, दिखाएँ either no significant अंतर between ड्रग और placebo, or a very small प्रभाव आकार, suggesting कि the pathophysiology of psychosis is much अधिक complex than an overactive dopamine प्रणाली.
People experiencing psychosis may exhibit कुछ personality changes और विचार विकार.
depending on its severity, this may be accompanied by असामान्य or bizarre बर्ताव, as well as परेशानी with सोशल interaction और impairment in carrying आउट रोज़ life activities.
General Grievous is a fictional अक्षर in the Star युद्धों universe.
a recurring antagonist, he is the Supreme कमांडर of the confederacy of स्वतंत्र प्रणालियों, a political faction of planetary systems waging युद्ध on the गांगेय Republic.
Trained in सब सात forms of lightsaber कॉम्बैट by गिनती dooku, he is a ruthless और powerful warrior devoted to जेडी 's destruction during the क्लोन युद्धों.
His अधिनियमों of wanton aggression and high Jedi body गिनती would prompt the galaxy to दे him the nickname the Knightslayer.
Though the notorious Jedi slayer was the होने in the आकाशगंगा दौरान the क्लोन Wars who had मारे the most Jedi in single combat, he did not संकोच to flee from battles he knew he होता खोना.
Statistics खेल an महत्वपूर्ण भूमिका in summarizing baseball performance and evaluating खिलाड़ी in the खेल.
Since the flow of a baseball खेल has प्राकृतिक ब्रेक to it, and सामान्यतः players act individually rather than performing in क्लस्टर, the sport lends itself to आसान record-keeping और statistics.
Statistics have महरूम रखा लिये professional baseball चूंकि the सृष्टि of the National League and American लीग, now part of प्रमुख League बेसबॉल.
Many statistics are also उपलब्धियाँ from बाहर of Major League Baseball, इससे लीग ऐसे as the नेशनल Association of Professional आधार Ball खिलाड़ी और the Negro Leagues.

The Great अवसाद was a कठोर विश्वव्यापी economic depression in the decade preceding संसार युद्ध II.
The timing of the ग्रेट अवसाद varied आरपार nations, but in सबसे countries it प्रारंभ in 1930 and lasted जबतक the लेट 1930s or middle 1940s.
It was the longest, सबसे widespread, and deepest depression of the 20th century.
In the 21st century, the ग्रेट अवसाद is commonly used as an उदाहरण of कैसा दूर the world 's economy can decline.
the depression originated in the U.S., after the पतन in भण्डार कीमतें कि began around September 4, 1929, और became विश्वव्यापी news साथ the stock market क्रैश of अक्तूबर 29, 1929 ( known as ब्लैक Tuesday ).
the ग्रेट Depression था विनाशकारी effects in countries समृद्ध और ग़रीब.
निजी income, कर revenue, profits और prices dropped, while अंतरराष्ट्रीय व्यापार plunged by अधिक than 50 %.
बेरोजगारी in the U.S. rose to 25 %, और in कुछ देशों रोज़ as high as 33 %.
Cities all around the world were hit hard, विशेषकर those निर्भर on heavy उद्योग.
Construction थी virtually halted in अनेक countries.
खेती and rural क्षेत्रों suffered as crop कीमतें fell by लगभग 60 %.
Facing plummeting माँग with few वैकल्पिक स्त्रोत of jobs, areas dependent on primary sector उद्योग ऐसे as cash cropping, mining and लॉगिंग suffered the most.
Some economies started to रिकवर by the mid-1930s.
In many countries, the negative effects of the ग्रेट अवसाद lasted जबतक the समाप्त of World War II.
A premature ventricular contraction ( पीवीसी ), also ज्ञात as a premature ventricular complex, ventricular premature contraction ( or complex or complexes ) ( VPC ), ventricular असामयिक beat ( vpb ), or ventricular extrasystole ( VES ), is a relatively आम event where the heartbeat is initiated by purkinje मछली in the ventricles rather than by the sinoatrial node, the सामान्य heartbeat initiator.
the electrical कार्यक्रम of the दिल detected by the electrocardiogram allow a PVC to be easily विशिष्ट from a normal दिल beat.
a पीवीसी may be आभास as a `` छोड़ा beat `` or लगा as palpitations in the chest.
In a normal heartbeat, the ventricles अनुबंध बाद the atria have helped to भरण उन्हें by contracting ; in this way the ventricles can पंप a maximized राशि of रक्त दोनो to the फेफड़े and to the बाकी of the body.
In a PVC, the ventricles contract पहला और before the atria have optimally भर the ventricles साथ रक्त, जिससे अर्थात् कि circulation is inefficient.
however, single ताल PVC arrhythmias do not प्रायः पोज़ a danger and can be asymptomatic in healthy individuals.
विलियम Gary Busey ( born जून 29, 1944 ), better known as Gary Busey, is an American फिल्मी और stage actor, और artist.
he has appeared in a variety of films, सहित Lethal Weapon, Point Break, और अंतर्गत Siege, as well as guest दिखावे on Gunsmoke, Walker, Texas Ranger, विधि & Order, and Entourage.
he थी मनोनीत लिये an Academy पुरस्कार for Best कर्ता in 1978 लिये उसके भूमिका in the दोस्त Holly Story.
The anti-counterfeiting व्यापार Agreement ( ACTA ), is a बहुराष्ट्रीय treaty लिये the purpose of establishing international standards for intellectual प्रॉपर्टी rights प्रवर्तन.
The अनुबंध aims to स्थापित an international विधिक फ्रेमवर्क लिये targeting counterfeit goods, जेनेरिक दवाइयाँ and copyright infringement on the Internet, and would create a नई governing देह outside existing forums, such as the संसार Trade संगठन, the संसार बौद्धिक Property Organization, or the संयुक्त Nations.
the agreement was हस्ताक्षरित in October 2011 by Australia, Canada, Japan, मोरक्को, नई Zealand, Singapore, South Korea, and the United States.
In 2012, Mexico, the European Union and 22 countries जिससे are member राज्य of the European Union हस्ताक्षरित as खूब.
One signatory ( जापानी ) रै ratified ( formally approved ) the agreement, जिससे would come into force in देशों that ratified it after ratification by six countries.
समर्थक have वर्णित the agreement as a जवाब to `` the increase in वैश्विक trade of नकली goods and pirated कापीराइट सुरक्षित works ''.
ट्रेड Unions representing workers in the music, फिल्मी और tv industries और large intellectual property-based organizations ऐसे as the गति Picture संघ of America and फार्मास्युटिकल शोध and निर्माताओं of America were क्रियाशील in the treaty 's development.
प्रतिद्वंद्वियों say the convention adversely affects आधारभूत अधिकारों including स्वतंत्रता of expression और गोपनीयता.
ACTA रै भी महरूम criticised by डॉक्टर Without Borders for endangering access to medicines in developing countries.
The secret प्रकृति of negotiations रै excluded सिविल society groups, developing countries और the सामान्य public from the अनुबंध 's negotiation process और it has महरूम described as नीति laundering by critics including the Electronic Frontier न्यास और the Entertainment Consumers Association.
The हस्ताक्षर of the eu and many of its सदस्य states resulted in the इस्तीफा in protest of the European Parliament 's appointed chief investigator, rapporteur कादर आरिफ, as well as फैली विरोध across यूरोपीय.
in 2012 the newly-appointed rapporteur, British MEP David मार्टिन, अनुशंसित against the treaty, stating : `` the intended benefits of इस international अनुबंध are दूर outweighed by the संभावित threats to civil लिबर्टीज ''.
On 4 July 2012, the यूरोपीय Parliament अस्वीकृत the अनुबंध in plenary session, with 478 मतदान against the treaty, 39 in favour and 165 MEPs abstaining.
FAW semi-trailer truck in China
ट्रैक्टर with पक्ष डम्प ट्रेलर semi-trailer
A ट्रैक्टर with an auto-transport semi-trailer.
semi-trailer ट्रक with sleeper पीछे the टैक्सी.
A semi-trailer truck is an articulated vehicle कि consists of a towing engine, ज्ञात as a ट्रैक्टर in the संयुक्त राज्य and truck in many other places, संलग्न to एक or अधिक semi-trailers to carry freight.
It is भी ज्ञात as a transport in कनाडा, prime प्रस्तावक in Australia, semi, tractor-trailer, truck and ट्रेलर, ट्रांसफ़र truck, 18-wheeler, mack truck, big रिग in the United राज्य, or artic, short for articulated लारी, in Britain and Ireland.
a semi-trailer does नहीं trail completely behind the towing vehicle, लकिन is attached at a पाइंट that is just forward of the rear-most धुरी of the towing unit.
This is done so that a भिन्न of the weight of the trailer is carried by the प्रधान mover.
This arrangement means कि both tractor and semi-trailer होगा have a distinctly अलग design than a rigid truck and trailer.
The पिट्सबर्ग Steelers are a पेशेवर football team based in पिट्सबर्ग, Pennsylvania.
the टोली फिलहाल belongs to the उत्तर प्रभाग of the अमरीकी फ़ुटबॉल Conference ( afc ) in the National फ़ुटबॉल League ( एनएफएल ).
Founded in, the Steelers are the oldest franchise in the AFC.
Pittsburgh has won more Super Bowl titles ( छह ), जीती more afc चैंपियनशिप खेल ( eight ) and निभाई in ( पंद्रह ) and hosted अधिक ( ग्यारह ) सम्मेलन championship games than any अन्य afc or NFC टोली.
the Steelers share the रिकार्ड for सबसे Super Bowl appearances with the डलास Cowboys ( आठ ).
The Steelers जीती उनके सबसे recent चैंपियनशिप, सुपर Bowl xliii, on फ़रवरी 1, 2009.
The Steelers were founded as the Pittsburgh Pirates on July 8, 1933, by Art Rooney, लेने इसके असली name from the baseball टोली of the same name, as was आम अभ्यास लिये NFL teams to do at the time.
The स्वामित्व of the स्टीलर्स has remained भीतर the रूनी परिवार since its founding.
The वर्तमान owner is आर्ट 's son, Dan Rooney, who has दिए much control of the मताधिकार to his बेटे आर्ट Rooney ii.
Long one of the एनएफएल 's फ्लैगशिप teams, the Steelers आनंद a large, फैली fanbase nicknamed Steeler Nation.
The स्टीलर्स currently play उनके घर खेल at हाइन्ज़ Field on Pittsburgh 's North Side in the North shore neighborhood, which भी hosts the विश्वविद्यालयों of पिट्सबर्ग Panthers.
Built in 2001, the stadium replaced तीन Rivers Stadium which hosted the स्टीलर्स लिये 31 सीज़न.
prior to तीन नदियाँ, the Steelers had निभाई their खेल in pitt Stadium and Forbes Field.
Three different kinds of गेहूं और rye आटा
Flour is a चूर्ण which is बना by grinding cereal दाने, or अन्य बीज or roots ( जैसे Cassava ).
it is the main संघटक of ब्रैड, जिससे is a staple food लिये many cultures, बनाना the उपलब्धता of adequate supplies of आटा a major economic और राजनैतिक issue at विभिन्न टाइम्स throughout history.
Wheat flour is one of the सबसे important भोजन in यूरोपीय, North अमरीकी, मध्य Eastern, भारतीय और उत्तर African cultures, and is the धमक ingredient in most of their शैलियाँ of breads and pastries.
जबकि wheat is the सबसे common base लिये flour, corn flour has महरूम महत्वपूर्ण in Mesoamerican cuisine चूंकि प्राचीन times, and remains a staple throughout the Americas.
Rye आटा is an important constituent of ब्रैड in much of central Europe, and rice can भी be used in आटा, हालांकि इस is अपेक्षाकृत uncommon.
Heart रेट is the क्रमांक of heartbeats प्रति ईकाई of समय, typically expressed as beats per मिनट ( bpm ).
Heart rate can vary as the body 's need to absorb ऑक्सीजन और excrete कार्बन dioxide परिवर्तन, such as during शारीरिक exercise, नींद, illness, or as a result of ingesting दवाएँ :
Central nervous प्रणाली stimulants such as amphetamines increase heart rate.
Central nervous प्रणाली depressants or sedatives decreases the heart rate ( अलावा इससे कुछ particularly strange ones with equally अजीब effects, ऐसे as केटामाइन which can cause - amongst अनेक अन्य बाते - stimulant-like effects ऐसे as tachycardia ).
वहीँ are many तरीके in जिससे the heart rate speeds up or slows bas.
सबसे involve stimulant-like endorphins and hormones being released in the दिमाग, many of जिससे हैं those कि हैं 'forced'/'enticed ' आउट by the ingestion and प्रसंस्करण of drugs.
due to individuals having a निरंतर रक्त volume, one of the physiological तरीके to deliver more ऑक्सीजन to an organ is to increase heart rate to permit रक्त to pass by the अंग अधिक प्रायः.
सामान्य resting दिल दरों range इससे 60-100 bpm.
Bradycardia is पारिभाषित as a resting दिल rate below 60 bpm.
however, दिल दरों from 50 to 60 bpm are आम among स्वस्थ people and do नहीं necessarily आवश्यकता special ध्यान.
Tachycardia is defined as a resting heart रेट ऊपर 100 bpm, though persistent rest दरों between 80-100 bpm, mainly if वे हैं उपस्थित दौरान sleep, may be लक्षण of hyperthyroidism or रक्ताल्पता ( see नीचे ).
Catherine II 's carved, चित्रित and gilded Coronation कोच ( Hermitage संग्रहालय )
a carriage is a wheeled vehicle लिये people, usually horse-drawn ; litters ( palanquins ) and सेडान कुर्सियां हैं excluded, since they are wheelless vehicles.
The carriage is विशेषकर designed लिये निजी passenger use और लिये comfort or elegance, though कुछ are also प्रयुक्त to हस्तांतरण goods.
it may be light, smart और fast or heavy, विशाल और आरामदायक.
carriages सामान्यतः have suspension using पत्ता स्रोतों, elliptical springs ( in the 19th century ) or leather strapping.
a पब्लिक यात्री vehicle would not प्रायः be पुकारा a carriage – शर्तें लिये ऐसे include stagecoach, charabanc and omnibus.
working vehicles ऐसे as the ( four-wheeled ) wagon और ( two-wheeled ) cart share important भाग of the इतिहास of the carriage, as is the तेज़ ( two-wheeled ) रथ.
The 2004 Indian समंदर earthquake थी an undersea megathrust earthquake that occurred at 00:58:53 utc on संडे, 26 December 2004, साथ an epicentre बंद the वेस्ट coast of Sumatra, इंडोनेशिया.
the quake itself is ज्ञात by the वैज्ञानिक community as the Sumatra–Andaman earthquake.
the resulting सुनामी was given various names, सहित the 2004 Indian Ocean सुनामी, South Asian tsunami, इंडोनेशियाई सुनामी, and the Boxing Day tsunami.
the भूकंप was caused by subduction and triggered a श्रेणी of devastating tsunamis along the coasts of most landmasses bordering the भारतीय Ocean, killing over 230,000 people in fourteen देशों, और inundating coastal communities with waves up to ऊँची.
it थी one of the deadliest natural disasters in recorded इतिहास.
Indonesia was the hardest-hit country, followed by श्री Lanka, इण्डिया, और थाईलैंड.
साथ a परिमाण of Mw 9.1–9.3, it is the third largest earthquake ever recorded on a seismograph.
the भूकंप had the longest duration of faulting ever observed, between 8.3 and 10 मिनट्स.
It caused the entire planet to vibrate as much as और triggered other भूकंप as दूर away as अलास्का.
इसके epicentre थी between simeulue और मेनलैंड Indonesia.
The plight of the affected लोगों and countries prompted a worldwide humanitarian response.
In all, the worldwide community दान more than $ 14 billion ( 2004 us $ ) in humanitarian aid.
भाप उठती इससे the Nesjavellir Geothermal Power Station in आइसलैंड.
geothermal उर्जा is thermal उर्जा generated and stored in the Earth.
Thermal उर्जा is the energy that determines the temperature of matter.
The geothermal energy of the धरती 's crust originates इससे the असली गठन of the planet ( 20 % ) and from रेडियोसक्रिय decay of minerals ( 80 % ).
The geothermal अनुपात, which is the अंतर in तापमान between the core of the planet and its surface, drives a continuous conduction of thermal energy in the form of heat from the core to the सतह.
the adjective geothermal originates इससे the Greek roots γη ( ge ), अर्थ earth, and θερμος ( thermos ), अर्थ hot.
At the कोर of the धरती, thermal energy is created by रेडियोसक्रिय decay और temperatures may पहुँचें over 5000 °C ( 9,000 °F ).
Heat conducts इससे the कोर to surrounding कूलर चट्टान.
the high temperature और दबाव कारण कुछ rock to melt, बनाना magma संवहन upward since it is lighter than the solid चट्टान.
the magma heats rock and water in the क्रस्ट, sometimes up to 370 °C ( 700 °F ).
इससे hot स्रोतों, geothermal energy रै been प्रयुक्त लिये bathing चूंकि Paleolithic times और for space heating since प्राचीन रोमन times, लकिन it is अभी better ज्ञात for electricity generation.
Worldwide, about 10,715 megawatts ( MW ) of geothermal power is online in 24 countries.
An अतिरिक्त 28 gigawatts of सीधा geothermal heating capacity is संस्थापित for ज़िला हीटिंग, space heating, स्पा, औद्योगिक processes, desalination and agricultural अनुप्रयोग.
geothermal power is लागत प्रभावी, विश्वसनीय, चिरस्थायी, and environmentally दोस्ताना, लकिन has historically महरूम limited to क्षेत्रों near tectonic थाली सीमाएँ.
हाल technological advances have dramatically expanded the range और size of सुगठित संसाधन, विशेषकर लिये applications ऐसे as घर heating, opening a potential for widespread शोषण.
Geothermal कुएं release greenhouse गैसों trapped गहन within the earth, but these emissions are much निम्नतर प्रति energy ईकाई than those of fossil fuels.
As a result, geothermal power रै the संभावित to सहायता mitigate वैश्विक warming if widely तैनात in place of fossil fuels.
The Earth 's geothermal resources हैं theoretically more than adequate to सप्लाई humanity 's energy needs, but तभी a very small fraction may be profitably शोषित.
Drilling and exploration लिये गहन संसाधन is very expensive.
Forecasts for the future of geothermal शक्ति depend on assumptions about technology, energy prices, subsidies, and interest दरों.
Pilot कार्यक्रम जैसे EWEB 's ग्राहक opt in ग्रीन Power Program show that ग्राहक होता be willing to pay a little more लिये a renewable उर्जा source like geothermal.
But as a परिणाम of government assisted research and industry experience, the लागत of generating geothermal power has decreased by 25 % over the past दो दशकों.
in 2001, geothermal energy cost between दो and टेन cents per kwh.
The पद घन foot is an इम्पीरियल and US customary ( non- metric ) unit of volume, used in the United राज्य and the संयुक्त Kingdom.
It is defined as the volume of a cube with पहलू of one पैर ( 0.3048 m ) in length.
To गणना घन फीट गुणा length x चौडाई x ऊँचाई.
Hồ Chí Minh ( Northern वियतनामी उच्चारण :, Southern वियतनामी pronunciation : ) ; 19 May 1890 – 2 September 1969 ), born Nguyễn Sinh Cung और also ज्ञात as Nguyễn Tất Thành and Nguyễn ái quốc, was a Vietnamese कम्युनिस्ट revolutionary leader जो was prime minister ( 1945–1955 ) और अध्यक्ष ( 1945–1969 ) of the Democratic गणतंत्र of Vietnam ( North Vietnam ).
He थी a key फिगर in the न्यास of the लोकतांत्रिक Republic of Vietnam in 1945, as well as the People’s Army of Vietnam ( pavn ) and the Việt Cộng ( NLF or VC ) during the Vietnam War.
He led the việt Minh independence movement इससे 1941 onward, establishing the communist -ruled लोकतांत्रिक गणतंत्र of Vietnam in 1945 और defeating the French Union in 1954 at the बैटल of Điện Biên Phủ.
he officially stepped down इससे शक्ति in 1955 due to स्वास्थ्य problems, but remained a highly visible figurehead and inspiration लिये those वियतनामी fighting for his cause—a united, communist Vietnam—until उसके मौत.
After the war, Saigon, पूंजी of the Republic of वियतनाम, was renamed Hồ Chí Minh City.
All Roads Lead Home is a feature film released on सितंबर 26, 2008.
निर्देशित by Dennis Fallon, it सितारों Peter Boyle, Patton oswalt, जेसन लंदन, Vivien Cardone, वैनेसा Branch, पीटर Coyote, स्टीफन Milton, and Allan Kayser.
The फिल्म थी फिल्माया in and around कान्सास नगर, Missouri.
The फिल्म बना its World Premiere January 27 at the Santa Barbara International Film पर्व.
The फिल्मी has भी recently been in अनेक film त्यौहार, और has प्राप्त bad reviews.
Peter बॉयल died before the movie 's release.
It was the पिछला फिल्म he appeared in.
बिक्री कर in the United States हैं taxes लगाई on the बिक्री or lease of goods and services in the United States.
जबकि no national general sales tax exists, the federal government levies अनेक national चयनात्मक sales कर on the sale or lease of particular goods and सेवाएं.
furthermore, forty-five states, the ज़िला of कोलंबिया, and Guam थोपने सामान्य बिक्री कर that apply to the sale or पट्टे of most goods and some services, and states also may levy चयनात्मक बिक्री taxes on the sale or पट्टे of particular goods or services.
राज्य may also delegate to लोकल सरकारें the authority to थोपने additional general or चयनात्मक बिक्री कर.
Sales tax is calculated by multiplying the purchase price by the लागू tax रेट.
Tax दरों vary widely by jurisdiction and range from कम than 1 % to over 10 %.
बिक्री कर is collected by the विक्रेता at the time of sale.
Use tax is self assessed by a buyer who has नहीं सशुल्क sales tax on a taxable खरीदें.
नापसंद the value added tax, a बिक्री tax is imposed तभी एकबार, at the खुदरा स्तर.
However, in cases where items हैं sold at खुदरा अधिक than एकबार, such as प्रयुक्त गाड़ियाँ, the बिक्री tax can be चार्ज on the same मद indefinitely.
the परिभाषा of retail बिक्री and what goods and सेवाएं हैं taxable vary among the राज्य.
Nearly all jurisdictions provide numerous श्रेणी of goods और सेवाएं कि are exempt इससे sales tax, or taxed at घटाया दरों.
The purchase of goods for further manufacture or for resale is uniformly exempt from sales tax.
Most jurisdictions exempt खाना sold in grocery stores, prescription medications, and many agricultural आपूर्तियाँ.
बिक्री कर, including those imposed by लोकल governments, are generally administered at the राज्य स्तर.
States imposing sales कर require खुदरा sellers to collect tax from ग्राहक, file रिटर्न, और remit the tax to the state.
Procedural rules vary widely.
Sellers generally must collect tax इससे in-state purchasers unless the क्रेता provides an exemption certificate.
सबसे राज्य allow or require electronic remittance.
A central प्रसंस्करण unit ( CPU ), भी referred to as a सेंट्रल प्रोसेसर unit, is the हार्डवेयर within a computer that carries आउट the instructions of a computer कार्यक्रम by performing the मौलिक arithmetical, logical, और input/output operations of the प्रणाली.
the term has been in use in the कंप्यूटर industry at least since the early 1960s.
The रूप, design, and implementation of CPUs have changed over the course of उनके इतिहास, but their fundamental operation remains much the वही.
A कंप्यूटर can have more than एक CPU ; इस is called multiprocessing.
Some integrated circuits ( ics ) can contain multiple CPUs on a सिंगल चिप ; those ICs हैं पुकारा multi-core processors.
Two ठेठ components of a cpu हैं the गणित लॉजिक unit ( ALU ), which performs arithmetic और logical operations, and the control unit ( CU ), जिससे extracts निर्देश इससे memory and decodes और executes them, calling on the ALU when necessary.
Not all computational systems rely on a central प्रसंस्करण unit.
an सरणी processor or वेक्टर processor रै multiple समानांतर computing elements, with no one unit माना the `` बीच ''.
In the distributed computing model, problems हैं solved by a वितरित interconnected नियत of processors.
rfid chip अगला to a grain of rice.
इस chip contains a radio-frequency इलेक्ट्रोमैग्नेटिक फ़ील्ड coil that modulates an बाह्य magnetic field to transfer a coded identification number जब queried by a reader device.
This छोटी प्रकार is incorporated in consumer products, and implanted in पालतु, लिये identification उद्देश्य.
radio-frequency पहचान ( rfid ) is the wireless non-contact use of radio-frequency electromagnetic फ़ील्ड to transfer आंकड़ा, for the purposes of automatically identifying और tracking tags attached to objects.
the टैग contain electronically भंडारित सूचना.
Some tags are powered and read at छोटी ranges ( a few meters ) via magnetic fields ( इलेक्ट्रोमैग्नेटिक induction ).
अन्य use a local power source such as a battery, or else have no बैटरी but collect उर्जा from the interrogating EM field, and then अधिनियम as a passive transponder to emit microwaves or UHF रेडियो लहरें ( i.e., इलेक्ट्रोमैग्नेटिक radiation at high frequencies ).
Battery संचालित tags may operate at hundreds of मीटर.
Unlike a bar कोड, the टैग does not necessarily need to be within लकीर of sight of the रीडर, and may be embedded in the tracked object.
rfid tags हैं प्रयुक्त in many industries.
an RFID टैग attached to an automobile दौरान production can be प्रयुक्त to track its प्रगति through the सभा line.
Pharmaceuticals can be tracked through warehouses.
पशुधन और पालतु may have टैग injected, allowing धनात्मक पहचान of the एनिमल.
Since RFID टैग can be संलग्न to clothing, possessions, or even implanted within people, the possibility of पढना personally-linked information without सहमति रै raised privacy concerns.
Overtime is the amount of समय someone works परे normal working घंटों.
Normal घंटों may be संकल्पित in several रास्ताs:
by custom ( what is माना स्वस्थ or reasonable by society ),
by practices of a दिए trade or profession,
by legislation,
by agreement between नियोक्ता and मजदूर or उनके representatives.
सबसे nations have ओवरटाइम मजदूर कानून designed to dissuade or prevent नियोक्ता from forcing their employees to work excessively long hours.
These laws may take into account other considerations than the humanitarian, such as preserving the health of workers so that they may continue to be उत्पादक, or increasing the overall स्तर of नियुक्ति in the economy.
One common दृष्टिकोण to regulating overtime is to require employers to अदा workers at a higher hourly रेट for overtime work.
Companies may choose to pay workers higher overtime pay even if नहीं obliged to do so by law, विशेषकर if they believe कि they फेस a backward bending supply वक्र of श्रमिक.
Overtime pay दरों can cause workers to work longer hours than they would at a चपटा hourly rate.
Overtime laws, attitudes toward ओवरटाइम और घंटों of कार्य vary greatly from country to country and between अलग आर्थिक सेक्टर.
Visualization of कड़ी between pages on a wiki using a force-directed layout.
Force-directed आलेख drawing algorithms are a class of algorithms for आरेखण रेखाचित्र in an aesthetically pleasing way.
Their purpose is to स्थिति the नोड of a graph in two-dimensional or three-dimensional space so that all the edges हैं of more or less equal length and there are as few crossing edges as possible, by assigning शक्तियां among the नियत of edges and the set of नोड, based on their सापेक्ष स्थितियाँ, and then using these forces either to सिमुलेट the motion of the edges और nodes or to minimize उनके energy.
While graph आरेखण can be a difficult problem, force-directed algorithms, being शारीरिक simulations, प्रायः require no special ज्ञान परिचय आलेख सिद्धान्त ऐसे as planarity.
खरीदना power ( sometimes retroactively called adjusted for inflation ) is the राशि of goods or सेवाएं कि can be purchased साथ a ईकाई of currency.
लिये example, if तुम था लिया one डालर to a स्टोर in the 1950s, you would have महरूम समर्थ to ख़रीदे a वृहद number of वस्तुएं than you would आज, indicating that you would have था a वृहद खरीदना शक्ति in the 1950s.
Currency can be either a commodity धन, जैसे सुनहरा or चांदी, or fiat करेंसी, or free-floating market-valued currency like us डॉलर.
as Adam Smith विख्यात, having money gives एक the क्षमता to `` कमांड '' अन्य ' मजदूर, so purchasing power to कुछ extent is power over other people, to the extent that वे are willing to trade their मजदूर or goods for money or currency.
if one 's monetary आय stays the वही, लकिन the price स्तर increases, the purchasing power of that आय falls.
Inflation करता not always imply गिरना purchasing power of one 's money income since it may rise faster than the price स्तर.
A उच्चतर real income अर्थात् a higher खरीदना power since real income refers to the आय समायोजित for महंगाई.
For a price अनुक्रमणिका, इसके value in the base साल is usually normalized to a मान of 100.
The खरीदना power of a ईकाई of currency, कह a dollar, in a given साल, expressed in dollars of the base year, is 100/p, जहाँ P is the price अनुक्रमणिका in कि साल.
so, by परिभाषा the purchasing power of a dollar decreases as the price level उदय.
The purchasing शक्ति in today 's धन of an amount c of money, t सालो into the भविष्य, can be computed with the सूत्र for the उपस्थित मान :
where in इस मामला i is an assumed भविष्य annual inflation rate.
Education in दक्षिण कोरियाई is viewed as होने निर्णायक लिये कामयाबी and competition is consequently very heated and fierce.
A सेंट्रल administration oversees the प्रक्रम for the शिक्षा of children from किंडरगार्टन to the third और final year of ऊँची स्कूल.
Mathematics, science, Korean, English, और social studies हैं generally माना to be the most important subjects.
सामान्यतः physical शिक्षा is not considered महत्वपूर्ण as it is not recognised, by the generally अकादमिक elitist South Korean populace, as education and इसलिए many schools lack high-quality gymnasiums and varsity athletics.
दक्षिण Korea was the first देश in the world to provide high-speed internet access to all primary, junior, और high schools.
Although South कोरियाई विद्यार्थी often रैंक अत्यधिक on international comparative assessments जब compared to विद्यार्थी of most Western education प्रणालियों, the दक्षिण Korean शिक्षा प्रणाली is criticised for emphasising too much upon passive learning and memorisation.
The South Korean शिक्षा system is बल्कि notably strict और overly structured as compared to its counterparts in most पश्चिमी societies.
Also, the prevalence of non-school for-profit private institutes such as academies or cram-schools ( Hagwon [ 학원 ] ), which too emphasise on passive memorisation, as opposed to conceptual समझना, in students are criticised as a प्रमुख social problem.
the my lai Massacre (, ;,, or ) was the Vietnam War mass murder of between 347 और 504 निहत्थे नागरिकों in South वियतनाम on कूच 16, 1968, by संयुक्त States फौज soldiers of `` चार्ली '' कम्पनी of 1st Battalion, 20th Infantry Regiment, 11th Brigade of the Americal Division.
Victims included महिलाओं, मेन, children, और infants.
कुछ of the महिलाओं were gang-raped and their bodies यहूद later found to be mutilated and अनेक महिलाओं यहूद allegedly raped prior to the killings.
जबकि 26 u.S. सैनिको यहूद initially चार्ज with criminal offenses for उनके actions at mỹ Lai, only दूसरी Lieutenant विलियम calley, a प्लाटून leader in चार्ली कम्पनी, was convicted.
मिला guilty of हत्या 22 ग्रामीणों, he थी originally given a life sentence, but तभी परोसा three और a हाफ सालो under house arrest.
the massacre took place in the hamlets of my lai और my khe of Son My village.
the इवेंट is भी known as the बेटे my Massacre, विशेषकर in the Vietnamese state media.
the U.S. military codeword for the `` viet cong stronghold '' was `` pinkville ''.
The incident prompted वैश्विक outrage जब it became पब्लिक ज्ञान in 1969.
The नरसंहार भी increased domestic opposition to the u.S. involvement in the वियतनाम युद्ध.
तीन U.S. servicemen who had आजमाया to halt the massacre and protect the wounded were initially denounced by several u.s. कांग्रेसियों as traitors.
They received नफ़रत mail और death खतरे and मिला mutilated animals on their doorsteps.
the तीन were later widely praised और decorated by the Army for उनके heroic क्रियाएँ.
the hijackers in the सितंबर 11 हमले were 19 men affiliated with al-qaeda, और 15 of the 19 were citizens of सऊदी अरब.
Others were इससे मिश्र, Lebanon, और the UAE.
the hijackers यहूद व्यवस्थित into चार teams, each led by a pilot-trained hijacker साथ चार `` muscle hijackers '' जो were trained to help subdue the pilots, passengers, and क्रू.
The पहला hijackers to arrive in the United राज्य were Khalid al-mihdhar and Nawaf al-Hazmi, who settled in the सैन Diego क्षेत्रफल in जनवरी 2000.
They were followed by तीन hijacker-pilots, Mohamed Atta, Marwan al-Shehhi, and ziad Jarrah जल्दी in the गर्मियाँ of 2000 to undertake flight प्रशिक्षण in दक्षिण फ्लोरिडा.
The fourth hijacker-pilot, Hani Hanjour, arrived in सैन Diego in दिसम्बर 2000.
The बाकी of the `` muscle hijackers '' arrived in the वसन्त and early summer of 2001, just months before the सितंबर 11 हमले.
Abū al-qāsim Muḥammad ibn ʿAbd allāh इब्न ʿAbd al-muṭṭalib ibn Hāshim ( ) ( circa| 570 – circa| 8 जून 632 ), भी transliterated as मुहम्मद ( ), was a धार्मिक, political, and सैन्य leader इससे Mecca जो एकीकृत अरब into a सिंगल religious polity अंतर्गत Islam.
he is believed by Muslims and bahá'ís to be a messenger and prophet of God.
Muhammad is लगभग universally considered by Muslims as the last prophet sent by परमेश्वर for mankind.
Non-Muslims लिहाज़ मुहम्मद as the founder of Islam.
Muslims consider him to be the restorer of an unaltered असली monotheistic faith of आदम, Noah, Abraham, Moses, Jesus, और other नबियों.
Born in about 570 CE in the Arabian नगर of Mecca, he was अनाथ at an जल्दी आयु and brought up अंतर्गत the care of his uncle Abu Talib.
He later worked ज़्यादातर as a merchant, as well as a shepherd, और थी first married by आयु 25.
Being in the habit of periodically retreating to a cave in the surrounding mountains लिये several नाइट्स of seclusion और दुआ, he later reported कि it थी वहीँ, at आयु 40, that he received उसके first revelation from God.
Three years बाद this इवेंट मुहम्मद started preaching ये revelations publicly, proclaiming कि `` परमेश्वर is एक ``, कि complete `` आत्मसमर्पण '' to Him ( lit.
islām ) is the only way ( dīn ) acceptable to परमेश्वर, and that he खुद थी a prophet and messenger of God, in the same vein as other इस्लामी prophets.
Muhammad gained few followers जल्दी on, and was met साथ hostility from some meccan tribes ; he and उसके अनुसरणकर्ता were treated harshly.
to एस्केप persecution, Muhammad sent some of his followers to Abyssinia पहले he and his followers in Mecca migrated to मदीना ( तब known as yathrib ) in the year 622.
इस event, the हिज्र, marks the beginning of the इस्लामी पंचांग, which is also known as the Hijri Calendar.
In मदीना, Muhammad united the जनजातियों अंतर्गत the संविधान of मदीना.
बाद eight सालो of लड़ with the Meccan tribes, his अनुसरणकर्ता, who by तब had grown to 10,000, took control of मक्का in the largely peaceful Conquest of Mecca.
He destroyed the pagan idols in the city और then sent his followers out to destroy सब of the remaining pagan temples in Eastern अरब.
In 632, a few महीने after returning to Medina from the विदाई Pilgrimage, Muhammad fell ill and died.
by the समय of his death, most of the arabian Peninsula had परिवर्तित to Islam, and he था united अरब into a सिंगल Muslim धार्मिक polity.
The खुलासे ( or ayah, lit.
`` Signs [ of God ] '' ) — which Muhammad reported receiving until उसके मौत – form the आयतें of the कुरान, regarded by मुसलमान as the `` Word of God '' and around which the धर्म is आधारित.
besides the Quran, Muhammad 's life ( sira ) and परंपराओं ( sunnah ) हैं भी upheld by Muslims as the sources of sharia विधि.
They discuss मुहम्मद और other prophets of Islam साथ reverence, adding the phrase peace be upon him whenever their names हैं उल्लेखित.
While conceptions of Muhammad in मध्यकालीन Christendom और premodern टाइम्स were largely negative, appraisals in modern इतिहास have been दूर कम so.
This is a list of टेबल of the verified oldest people in the संसार in ordinal rank, ऐसे as oldest व्यक्ति or oldest man.
In these tables, a supercentenarian is माना 'verified ' if उसके or her claim रै महरूम validated by an international देह कि specifically deals in longevity research, such as the Gerontology शोध Group ( GRG ) or गिनीज World रिकॉर्ड.
the longest unambiguously documented इंसान lifespan is कि of Jeanne Calment of France ( 1875–1997 ), who died at age 122 सालो, 164 दिनों.
वो met विंसेंट van Gogh when she थी 12 or 13.
This led to news मीडिया ध्यान in 1985, after calment turned 110.
Subsequent investigation found documentation लिये Calment 's आयु, beyond any reasonable सवाल, in the records of उसके native नगर, Arles, फ़्रांस.
More evidence of calment 's जीवनकाल has महरूम उत्पादित than for any अन्य supercentenarian ; उसके case serves as an archetype in the methodology for verifying the आयु of the संसार 's oldest लोगों.
The longest undisputed lifespan for पुरूष supercentenarians is that of Jiroemon किमुरा, जो फिलहाल lives in Japan and is age as of.
चूंकि the death of 115-year old दीना Manfredini of the संयुक्त States, on 17 दिसम्बर 2012, किमुरा, born 19 अप्रैल 1897, is the oldest living व्यक्ति in the संसार whose age can be documented.
he has भी महरूम the oldest जीना man since the death of 114-year old Walter breuning on 14 April 2011.
Since the death of 115-year बूढ़ा Koto okubo of जापानी on 12 जनवरी 2013, the oldest जीना स्त्री has been -year-old Misao Okawa, भी from Japan, born on 5 कूच 1898.
This is a timeline of the African-American Civil अधिकारों गति.
the सिविल Rights गति was a freedom struggle by अफ़्रीकी Americans in the 1950s और 1960s to लाभ समता.
the लक्ष्य of the movement यहूद freedom from पक्षपात, बराबर opportunity in नियुक्ति, education and housing, the right to vote और बराबर access to public facilities.
Heavy मेटल ( often referred to as metal ) is a विधा of rock music कि developed in the लेट 1960s और जल्दी 1970s, largely in the United Kingdom और in the United राज्य.
साथ जड़ें in ब्लूज़ rock and साइकेडेलिक चट्टान, the bands that created heavy metal विकसित a thick, massive ध्वनि, characterized by अत्यधिक प्रवर्धित distortion, extended guitar solos, emphatic बीट्स, and overall loudness.
Heavy metal lyrics and performance शैलियाँ are generally associated साथ मर्दानगी and machismo.
The पहला भारी metal bands such as led zeppelin, Deep जामुनी and Black Sabbath आकर्षित विशाल audiences, हालांकि they यहूद प्रायः derided by critics, a status common throughout the history of the विधा.
In the mid-1970s Judas पुजारी helped spur the genre 's एवोल्यूशन by discarding much of इसके blues influence ; Motörhead introduced a punk rock sensibility and an increasing जोर on speed.
Bands in the नई वेव of British भारी Metal such as Iron maiden followed in a समान रग.
Before the समाप्त of the दशक, भारी मेटल fans became known as `` metalheads `` or `` headbangers ``.
दौरान the 1980s, glam metal became a वाणिज्यिक force with groups like Mötley Crüe and Poison.
Underground scenes produced an array of more चरम, aggressive शैलियाँ : thrash metal broke into the mainstream साथ bands ऐसे as मेटालिका, Megadeth, slayer, and एंथ्रेक्स, जबकि अन्य styles of the सबसे चरम subgenres of metal like मौत metal and ब्लैक मेटल remain subcultural phenomena.
Since the mid-1990s, popular शैलियाँ ऐसे as nu metal, which often incorporates तत्व of grunge and hip hop ; और metalcore, which मिश्रणों extreme metal साथ हार्डकोर punk, have further expanded the परिभाषा of the विधा.
The far-right ( भी known as the चरम right ) refers to the उच्चतम degree of rightism in right-wing politics.
Far right राजनीती involves support of दमदार or complete social hierarchy in society, और supports supremacy of निश्चित individuals or समूह deemed to be innately श्रेष्ठ or preferable जो are to be अधिक valued than those deemed to be innately inferior or undesirable.
The दूर सही 's वकालत of supremacism is based on कया its adherents perceive as innate विशेषताएँ of people that can not be बदला.
इस stands as a पाइंट of difference with the centre-right 's आरोपण of behaviours, ऐसे as आलस्य or decadence, as the प्राथमिक sources of social inequalities.
The centre right—unlike the far right—claims that people can end उनके behavioural हीनता through बदलना their आदतें और choices.
The original far right, जिससे उभरा in France after the French Revolution, refused to accept the French Republic और supported a counter-revolution to restore the French साम्राज्य and aristocracy.
the दूर सही is commonly associated with व्यक्तियों or समूह who थाम चरम राष्ट्रवादी, xenophobic, जातिवाद, religious fundamentalist or प्रतिक्रियावादी दृश्य.
The सबसे extreme-right आंदोलनों have pursued दमन और नरसंहार विरूद्ध समूह of लोगों on the basis of their alleged inferiority.
Thomas hobbes of malmesbury ( 5 April 1588 – 4 December 1679 ), in कुछ पुरानी texts थामस हाब्स of Malmsbury, was an English पारस, बेहतरीन ज्ञात today for his work on political दर्शनशास्त्र.
His 1651 book Leviathan established the न्यास for most of पश्चिमी political philosophy इससे the perspective of सोशल contract theory.
hobbes was a चैंपियन of absolutism लिये the sovereign, but he also विकसित some of the fundamentals of यूरोपीय liberal विचार : the right of the individual ; the natural समता of all men ; the artificial character of the political order ( जिससे led to the later distinction between civil समाज and the राज्य ) ; the view that all legitimate political शक्ति must be `` representative '' और आधारित on the consent of the people ; and a उदार निर्वचन of law which leaves people फ़्री to do whatever the विधि करता not explicitly forbid.
he was one of the संस्थापकों of आधुनिक political philosophy.
His समझना of humans as being matter और motion, obeying the same physical laws as other matter and गति, remains influential ; and his account of इंसान प्रकृति as self-interested सहयोग, and of राजनैतिक communities as being आधारित upon a `` सोशल अनुबंध `` remains एक of the प्रमुख विषय of political philosophy.
In जोड to राजनैतिक philosophy, Hobbes भी contributed to a diverse सरणी of other फ़ील्ड, सहित history, भूगोल, the physics of gases, धर्मशास्त्र, आचार, और general philosophy.
emotional प्रज्ञा ( EI ) is the ability to पहचानो, assess, और control the emotions of oneself, of अन्य, and of groups.
it can be विभाजित into क्षमता EI और trait EI.
क्षमता EI is usually measured using maximum प्रदर्शन tests and रै stronger संबंध साथ traditional intelligence, whereas trait EI is प्रायः measured using self-report questionnaires और रै stronger relationships with personality.
Criticisms have centered on whether EI is a real intelligence और whether it रै incremental validity over IQ and the Big पाँच व्यक्तित्व traits.
Heredity is the passing of traits to औलाद from its अभिभावक or ancestor.
This is the process by which an offspring cell or सजीव acquires or becomes predisposed to the विशेषताएँ of इसके parent cell or organism.
Through heredity, विसंगतियाँ exhibited by individuals can accumulate और कारण कुछ species to evolve.
The पढ़ाई of आनुवंशिकता in जीवविज्ञान is called आनुवंशिकी, जिससे शामिल the field of epigenetics.
For United States individual आय कर, adjusted gross income ( AGI ) is total gross income minus विशिष्ट reductions.
Taxable आय is adjusted gross income ऋण allowances लिये निजी exemptions और itemized deductions.
For most व्यक्तिगत tax purposes, AGI is अधिक relevant than gross income.
सकल आय is बिक्री दाम of goods or property, minus cost of the property sold, plus other income.
It includes मजदूरी, ब्याज, dividends, कारोबार income, rental आय, and all अन्य प्रकार of income.
Adjusted सकल आय is gross आय less deductions from a business or rental activity and 21 other specific वस्तुएं.
अनेक deductions ( e.g. medical expenses and विविध itemized deductions ) are limited आधारित on a प्रतिशत of AGI.
Certain phase outs, including those of निम्नतर tax rates और itemized deductions, are आधारित on स्तर of AGI.
Many राज्य आधार राज्य income कर on agi with निश्चित deductions.
`` Lazy नजर '' is the third सिंगल from silversun Pickups ' डेब्यू album Carnavas.
The बैंड performed the सोंग on the लेट Show साथ David Letterman, The Tonight Show साथ jay Leno, बाद साथ Jools Holland, और Last कॉल साथ Carson Daly.

A telephone उपसर्ग is the first नियत of अंक of a टेलीफोन number ; in the North अमरीकी क्रमांकन योजना countries ( country कोड 1 ), it is the first तीन digits of a seven-digit phone क्रमांक.
In अन्य countries दोनो the prefix and the number may have different lengths.
It shows which exchange the बाकी numbers refer to.
A पूरा telephone number is प्रायः बना up of country code ( जरूरी for international calls तभी ), क्षेत्रफल कोड ( जरूरी for calls between telephone क्षेत्रों ), उपसर्ग, और subscriber number.
Some places restrict निश्चित prefixes to फैक्स numbers or cell phones तभी ; in other places ऐसे समर्पित prefixes are नहीं प्रयुक्त.
As टेलीफोन technology advanced, the precise significance of the prefix became blurred in अनेक स्थान ; 485 in लंदन, UK, was once the GULliver exchange, लकिन now 44207485xxxx is just माना one of many number ब्लॉक served by the CLKEN Kentish Town exchange ; 4420770703xx is another.
metformin ( BP, pronounced, ; originally sold as glucophage ) is an oral antidiabetic ड्रग in the biguanide class.
It is the first-line ड्रग of choice लिये the उपचार of type 2 diabetes, in particular, in overweight और obese people and those with normal kidney function.
इसके use in गर्भकालीन diabetes has been सीमित by safety concerns.
It is भी used in the treatment of polycystic ovary syndrome, and रै महरूम investigated लिये अन्य diseases where insulin प्रतिरोध may be an महत्वपूर्ण फ़ैक्टर.
metformin works by suppressing glucose production by the liver.
Metformin is the only antidiabetic drug that रै been conclusively shown to prevent the cardiovascular complications of diabetes.
It helps reduce LDL कोलेस्ट्रॉल and triglyceride levels, and is नहीं associated साथ वज़न लाभ.
, metformin is एक of only two oral antidiabetics in the संसार Health Organization Model सूची of अनिवार्य Medicines ( the other होने glibenclamide ).
When विहित appropriately, metformin कल्याणकारी few adverse effects ( the most common is gastrointestinal upset ) and is associated साथ a कम risk of hypoglycemia.
Lactic acidosis ( a buildup of lactate in the blood ) can be a गंभीर concern in overdose और when it is prescribed to people साथ contraindications, लकिन otherwise, वहीँ is no significant risk.
First synthesized and मिला to reduce blood sugar in the 1920s, metformin was forgotten for the next दो decades as research shifted to इंसुलिन and अन्य antidiabetic दवाएँ.
ब्याज in metformin was rekindled in the late 1940s after several reports that it could reduce रक्त शुगर स्तर in लोगों, और in 1957, फ्रेंच physician Jean sterne published the पहला clinical trial of metformin as a उपचार लिये मधुमेह.
it was introduced to the संयुक्त Kingdom in 1958, Canada in 1972, और the United States in 1995.
metformin is अभी believed to be the most widely विहित antidiabetic ड्रग in the संसार ; in the संयुक्त States अलोन, अधिक than 48 लाख prescriptions यहूद filled in 2010 for its जेनेरिक formulations.
the Mount rushmore National मेमोरियल is a मूर्तिकला carved into the granite फेस of माउंट rushmore निकट Keystone, South डकोटा, in the United राज्य.
sculpted by Danish-American Gutzon Borglum and उसके son, lincoln Borglum, Mount Rushmore features sculptures of the heads of चार संयुक्त States presidents : George वॉशिंगटन, थामस Jefferson, थियोडोर Roosevelt और Abraham lincoln.
The entire मेमोरियल covers and is ऊपर sea level.
The tallest पहाड़ in the प्रदेश is Harney Peak ( ).
South डकोटा इतिहासकार दोने रॉबिन्सन is credited साथ conceiving the idea of carving the likenesses of famous people into the ब्लैक पहाड़ियाँ प्रदेश of South Dakota in order to promote tourism in the प्रदेश.
रॉबिन्सन 's आरंभिक विचार थी to sculpt the Needles ; however, gutzon Borglum rejected the needles site क्युकी of the ग़रीब quality of the ग्रेनाइट and दमदार विपक्ष from पर्यावरणविद and देशी अमरीकी groups.
वे settled on the Mount rushmore location, which भी रै the advantage of facing southeast for अधिकतम सूर्य exposure.
Robinson wanted it to feature western नायक जैसे लुईस और Clark, Red बादल and Buffalo Bill Cody but Borglum decided the sculpture चाहिए have a अधिक national फ़ोकस, और chose the चार राष्ट्रपतियों whose likenesses would be carved into the पहाड़.
बाद securing federal funding, construction on the memorial began in 1927, and the presidents ' faces were समाप्त between 1934 and 1939.
upon gutzon Borglum 's death in March 1941, उसके son lincoln Borglum took over निर्माण.
Although the initial concept called for each अध्यक्ष to be चित्रित इससे सिर to waist, lack of funding forced निर्माण to end in late October 1941.
The U.S. नेशनल Park सेवा took control of the मेमोरियल in 1933, while it was still under construction, and has प्रबंधित the memorial to the present दिन.
it attracts nearly तीन million लोगों annually.

A shirt, dress shirt, button-front, button-front shirt, or button-up shirt is a परिधान साथ a collar, a full-length opening at the front from the collar to the हेम, and sleeves साथ cuffs.
शर्ट are predominantly used by मेन, since women usually पहनें blouses.
The सामने opening is fastened using buttons or studs, and the cuffs close with बटन or cuff links.
Shirts हैं normally बना from woven cloth, और are प्रायः accompanied by a jacket and tie, for example with a suit or formalwear, लकिन shirts are भी worn अधिक casually.
In British अंग्रेज़ी, dress shirt अर्थात् specifically the अधिक formal evening garment worn साथ black- or white- टाई, also discussed below.
Some of ये formal शर्ट have stiff fronts and detachable collars attached with collar studs.
The पद `` button-down '' ( which refers a type of कमीज़ which has a कॉलर fastened down by buttons ) is sometimes used in error to लागू to सब shirts ( साथ or बगैर buttoned down छल्लों ), being प्रयुक्त as a पर्याय लिये `` button-up '' or `` button-front ''.
Administrative Professionals Day ( भी known as Secretaries दिन or Admin Day ) is an unofficial धर्मनिरपेक्ष अवकाश observed in अनेक देशों to recognize the work of secretaries, administrative assistants, receptionists, and other administrative support पेशेवर.
in North America, it is मनाये on the Wednesday of the last full week of अप्रैल ( अप्रैल 24 in 2013 ).
In France it is celebrated on the third Thursday in April ( अप्रैल 18 in 2013 ).
In Australia it is मनाये on the पहला शुक्रवार in May

निकोलस Poussin ( ; 15 June 1594 – 19 November 1665 ) was the leading painter of the शास्त्रीय फ्रेंच बरॉक स्टाइल, although he spent most of his working life in रोम.
उसके work is characterized by clarity, logic, और अनुक्रम, और favors line over color.
जबतक the 20th century he remained a प्रमुख प्रेरणा for such classically उन्मुख कलाकारों as Jacques-Louis David, Jean-Auguste-Dominique ingres और पॉल Cézanne.
he worked in Rome लिये a वृत्त of leading collectors there and elsewhere, except for a short period जब Cardinal रिचलू ordered उसे वापस to France to serve as First चित्रकार to the किंग.
Most of उसके works are इतिहास paintings of religious or पौराणिक विषय that बहुत often have a विशाल लैंडस्केप element.

whitley 's brief करियर in mainstream देश म्यूज़िक lasted from 1984 until उसके मौत in 1989, but he continues to influence an संपूर्ण पीढी of गायकों and songwriters.
He charted 19 singles on the Billboard country charts, including five consecutive Number ones : `` Do n't Close Your Eyes ``, `` जब तुम Say nothing at All ``, `` i 'm No अजनबी to the बरसात ``, `` I Wonder do You सोचो of Me `` और `` it Ai n't Nothin ' `` ( the last two मरणोपरांत ).
