a statute is a औपचारिक लिखा enactment of a legislative authority कि governs a राज्य, city, or काउंटी.
Typically, statutes command or prohibit something, or declare नीति.
the शब्द is often used to फर्क विधि made by विधान लाशें इससे case law, decided by न्यायालयों, and regulations issued by सरकारी एजेंसियों.
Statutes हैं sometimes referred to as विधान or `` black letter law. ''
As a source of law, statutes are considered प्राथमिक प्राधिकार ( as opposed to secondary प्राधिकार ).
ideally all statutes must be in harmony with the fundamental law of the land ( constitutional ).
इस शब्द is प्रयुक्त in contradistinction to the आम law.
Statutes acquire उनके force इससे the time of their ड्योढ़ी, however unless otherwise provided.
statutes are of अनेक kinds ; namely, पब्लिक or निजी.
Declaratory or remedial.
अस्थाई or perpetual.
A temporary statute is one which is सीमित in इसके duration at the time of इसके enactment.
It continues in फ़ोर्स until the समय of its limitation has expired, जबतक sooner repealed.
A perpetual statute is एक for the continuance of which there is no limited समय, हालांकि it may नहीं be expressly declared to be so.
If, however, a statute which किया नहीं itself contain कोई limitation is to be governed by another which is अस्थाई only, the former will also be अस्थाई और निर्भर upon the अस्तित्व of the latter.
Before a statute becomes law in कुछ countries, it जरूर be agreed upon by the highest कार्यपालिका in the सरकारी, और finally published as part of a code.
In many देशों, statutes are organized in topical arrangements ( or `` संहिताबद्ध '' ) भीतर publications पुकारा codes, such as the संयुक्त States कोड.
In many nations statutory law is distinguished इससे and subordinate to संवैधानिक law.
The external iliac arteries are two major arteries which bifurcate बंद the common iliac धमनियों anterior to the sacroiliac संयुक्त of the pelvis.
They proceed anterior और inferior साथ the medial border of the psoas major muscles.
वे exit the pelvic girdle posterior और अवर to the वंक्षण ligament about one तीसरा laterally इससे the प्रविष्ट point of the वंक्षण ligament on the जननांग tubercle at which point वे are referred to as the नैया arteries.
the external iliac artery is usually the artery used to attach the renal धमनी to the प्राप्तकर्ता of a kidney transplant.
Steam is a digital distribution, डिजिटल अधिकारों management, एकाधिक and communications platform विकसित by Valve निगम.
It is प्रयुक्त to वितरित games और related media ऑनलाइन, from small independent डेवलपर to larger तन्त्र घरों ; in October 2012, वाल्व विस्तारित the service to include non-gaming तन्त्र.
Steam provides the user साथ संस्थापना and automatic management of software आरपार multiple computers, community features ऐसे as मित्रों lists and groups, cloud saving, and in-game आवाज़ and chat कार्यक्षमता.
The तन्त्र provides a freely उपलब्धियाँ अनुप्रयोग programming interface, steamworks, that डेवलपर can take advantage of to integrate अनेक of Steam 's functions भीतर उनके तन्त्र products, सहित copy protection, नेटवर्किंग and matchmaking, in-game उपलब्धियाँ और micro-transactions, और support लिये user-created सामग्री through Steam Workshop.
Though initially विकसित for use on microsoft खिड़कियाँ, the client has विस्तारित to include os X और लिनक्स संस्करण, और क्लाइंट साथ limited कार्यक्षमता on the PlayStation 3 console और लिये both iOS और Android mobile devices.
In addition to being a central hub for gaming software, Valve रै created a संस्करण of भाप with altered functionality to be used in स्कूलों for educational software, including a modified संस्करण of Portal 2 for शिक्षण science and critical thinking lessons.
, there are nearly 2000 games available through Steam, and 54 million क्रियाशील उपयोक्ता accounts.
As of जनवरी 2013, भाप has देखी over 6.6 million संयुक्त खिलाड़ी.
भाप has an estimated 50–70 % share of the डिजिटल वितरण मार्केट लिये video games.
the Steam logo is a stylised left-side fly-crank और rod from the Walschaerts valve gear of a steam locomotive.
जेरी Lewis ( born March 16, 1926 ) is an American हास्य, actor, सिंगर, फिल्मी निर्माता, screenwriter and फिल्मी director.
he is ज्ञात for उसके slapstick humor in फिल्मी, टेलीविज़न, stage और radio.
he was originally paired up साथ डीन Martin in 1946, forming the famed comedy team of Martin और Lewis.
In addition to the duo 's popular nightclub work, वे स्ट्रक्चर in a successful श्रेणी of कॉमेडी films लिये Paramount तस्वीरें.
Lewis is भी known for his charity fund-raising telethons और स्थिति as नेशनल chairman for the Muscular Dystrophy Association ( mda ).
लुईस has जीती several awards लिये lifetime achievements from The अमरीकी Comedy Awards, Los Angeles Film Critics Association, और Venice Film Festival, और he has two सितारों on the हॉलीवुड Walk of कीर्ति.
in 2005, he received the Governors Award of the Academy of Television कला & sciences फलक of राज्यपालों, which is the उच्चतम Emmy Award presented.
on फ़रवरी 22, 2009, the Academy of Motion चित्र कला and sciences awarded लुईस the Jean hersholt Humanitarian पुरस्कार.
the राइन ( ; ; ) is a European नदी that रनों इससे the Swiss canton of Grisons in the southeastern स्विस Alps through जर्मनी और eventually बहती into the उत्तर Sea coast in the Netherlands और is the twelfth longest नदी in Europe, at about, with an average discharge of more than.
The Rhine and the Danube formed most of the northern अंतर्देशीय frontier of the रोमन Empire और, चूंकि those दिनों, the राइन has been a vital and navigable जलमार्ग carrying trade and goods deep inland.
It has also served as a defensive feature and has been the आधार for क्षेत्रीय and international borders.
the अनेक castles and prehistoric fortifications साथ the राइन गवाही to its importance as a waterway.
River traffic could be रोका at these locations, usually लिये the purpose of collecting tolls, by the state कि controlled that portion of the river.
Sri ( Sinhala )
Sri ( Devanagari : श्री, iast ; śrī ), also transliterated as sree or shri or Shree is a word of संस्कृत origin, used in the Indian subcontinent as polite रूप of address equivalent to the English `` Mr. '' in written and बोला भाषा, or as a title of veneration for deities ( usually translated as `` Holy '' ).

Civil अभियान्त्रिकी is a professional engineering अनुशासन कि सौदे with the डिज़ाइन, construction, और मेंटेनेंस of the शारीरिक और naturally built environment, सहित works like सड़कें, bridges, canals, dams, और buildings.
Civil engineering is the oldest अभियान्त्रिकी discipline after military अभियान्त्रिकी, और it थी defined to फर्क non-military अभियान्त्रिकी इससे military engineering.
It is traditionally broken into अनेक sub-disciplines सहित पर्यावरणीय engineering, geotechnical अभियान्त्रिकी, geophysics, geodesy, control engineering, संरचनात्मक अभियान्त्रिकी, biomechanics, nanotechnology, परिवहन अभियान्त्रिकी, धरती विज्ञान, वायुमंडलीय sciences, forensic अभियान्त्रिकी, municipal or शहरी अभियान्त्रिकी, water संसाधन अभियान्त्रिकी, materials engineering, coastal अभियान्त्रिकी, surveying, and construction engineering.
Civil engineering takes प्लेस on सब स्तर : in the public sector from municipal through to national governments, और in the private सेक्टर from individual homeowners through to international कंपनियाँ.

कैथरीन Dunham ( June 22, 1909 – may 21, 2006 ) थी an American नर्तकी, choreographer, author, educator, और सोशल activist.
Dunham था एक of the most successful नृत्य करियर in अमरीकी and European theater of the 20th century, and directed her अपना नृत्य कम्पनी लिये many सालो.
She has महरूम called the `` matriarch and queen mother of black dance ''.
दौरान उसके heyday in the 1940s and 1950s, dunham was प्रसिद्ध throughout Europe and Latin America and was widely popular in the United राज्य, जहाँ the Washington Post called उसके `` नर्तकी Katherine the ग्रेट ''.
For लगभग तीस सालो she maintained the Katherine dunham नृत्य कम्पनी, the only self-supported American black नृत्य troupe at कि समय, and over her long career she choreographed more than ninety individual dances.
dunham was an innovator in African-American modern dance as well as a नेता in the field of नृत्य anthropology, or ethnochoreology.
Sphagnum is a genus of between 1510 और 3500 species of mosses, commonly पुकारा peat moss due to its prevalence in गीला habitats जहाँ it contributes to the formation of peat bogs and mires.
sphagnum accumulations can store water, since both जीना and dead plants can hold large quantities of water अंदर उनके कोशिकाएं ; plants may थाम from 16-26 times as much जल as उनके शुष्क weight depending on the species.
The empty कोशिकाएं सहायता retain water in drier conditions.
Hence, as sphagnum मॉस grows, it can slowly spread into drier conditions, forming larger peatlands, दोनो raised bogs और blanket bogs.
These peat accumulations तब provide आवास लिये a wide सरणी of peatland पौधे, including sedges और ericaceous shrubs, as खूब as orchids and carnivorous plants.
sphagnum and the peat formed इससे it do not decay readily because of the phenolic compounds embedded in the मॉस 's कोशिका दीवारें.
In जोड, bogs, like सब wetlands, develop anaerobic soil conditions, which produces धीमा anaerobic क्षय rather than aerobic microbial action.
Peat moss can भी acidify its परिवेश by लेने up cations, ऐसे as calcium and मैग्नीशियम, और releasing hydrogen ions.
Under the right शर्तें, peat can accumulate to a गहराई of many meters.
अलग species of sphagnum have अलग सहिष्णुता limits for flooding and pH, so any one peatland may have a number of different sphagnum species.
Individual peat moss plants consist of a main stem, with tightly arranged clusters of branch fascicles usually consisting of two or three spreading branches और two to four hanging branches.
the शीर्ष of the संयंत्र, or capitulum, has compact clusters of young शाखाओं.
Along the stem are बिखरे leaves of various आकार, named stem leaves ; the आकार varies according to प्रजाति.
The leaves consist of दो kinds of cells ; small, green, जीना cells ( chlorophyllose cells ), and large, साफ, structural, मुर्दे cells ( hyaline cells ).
The latter have the large water-holding capacity.

the परिचय of the weekday न्यूनतम fare condition in 2002 resulted in a minor change : the रेड `` R '' shows that इस is the `` संशोधित '' version of the railcard.
This version is still in use as of 2007.
The Network railcard is a discount card introduced in 1986 by अंग्रेजों रेल, upon the सृष्टि of उनके Network southeast area around लंदन, England.
the कार्ड is intended to प्रोत्साहित अवकाश travel by रेल by offering छूट लिये वयस्कों और accompanying children on a wide range of off-peak fares.
The range of discounts उपलब्धियाँ, और the दाम of the कार्ड, have varied since कि time, लकिन the कार्ड has सदा been valid लिये a साल 's unlimited use.
It can be purchased by any व्यक्ति aged 16 or over from कोई staffed नेशनल Rail station or रेल नियुक्त Travel Agent, by completing an application form - no photographic identification or other दस्तावेज़ीकरण is needed to ख़रीदे or use the card.
It is एक of a number of concessionary fare योजनाएं उपलब्धियाँ on the British railway system.
the United Nations ( un ; फ्रेंच : Organisation des Nations unies, onu ) is the world 's largest, foremost, और सबसे prominent international organization.
The stated aims of the संयुक्त Nations शामिल promoting और facilitating सहयोग in international law, international security, economic विकास, social progress, इंसान rights, सिविल rights, civil liberties, political freedoms, लोकतंत्र, और the achievement of lasting world सलाम.
the un was founded in 1945 बाद World War II to बदलें the League of Nations, to stop युद्धों between देशों, और to provide a मंच लिये संवाद.
It contains multiple subsidiary संगठन to carry out इसके मिशन.
At इसके founding, the un had 51 member राज्य ; as of 2011, there हैं 193.
इससे its कार्यालयों around the संसार, the UN और इसके specialized एजेंसियों decide on सत्य and administrative issues in regular meetings आयोजित throughout the साल.
the संगठन has छह principal organs : the General Assembly ( the main deliberative सभा ) ; the सुरक्षा परिषद ( for deciding certain resolutions for सलाम और security ) ; the Economic और सोशल Council ( लिये assisting in promoting अंतरराष्ट्रीय economic and सोशल सहयोग and विकास ) ; the सचिवालय ( for providing अध्ययन, information, और facilities needed by the un ) ; the अंतरराष्ट्रीय अदालत of Justice ( the primary न्यायिक organ ) ; and the United Nations ट्रस्टीशिप Council ( जिससे is फिलहाल inactive ).
Other prominent UN प्रणाली agencies include the संसार स्वास्थ्य Organization ( जो ), the World खाना Programme ( WFP ) and संयुक्त Nations children 's Fund ( UNICEF ).
The UN 's सबसे prominent स्थिति is कि of the दफ्तर of Secretary-General which रै been held by Ban Ki-moon of South Korea चूंकि 2007.
The संयुक्त राष्ट्र मुख्यालय resides in international territory in New यॉर्क नगर, साथ further प्रमुख offices at जेनेवा, नैरोबी, and Vienna.
the organization is financed from assessed और voluntary contributions इससे its member states, and has छह official languages : Arabic, चाइनीज, अंग्रेज़ी, French, रूसी, and स्पेनी.
South बीच, also nicknamed SoBe, is a पड़ोस in the city of Miami बीच, Florida, संयुक्त States, located due east of Miami नगर proper between Biscayne खाड़ी और the Atlantic Ocean.
The क्षेत्रफल encompasses सब of the barrier islands of मियामी Beach south of Indian Creek.
इस क्षेत्रफल थी the पहला section of Miami Beach to be विकसित, starting in the 1910s, thanks to the development efforts of कार्ल G. Fisher, the Lummus Brothers, and John S. कॉलिन्स, the latter whose construction of the Collins सेतु provided the पहला vital जमीन कड़ी between mainland मियामी और the समुद्रतट.
the area has गए through numerous कृत्रिम और natural परिवर्तन over the years, including a booming regional economy, increased tourism, and the 1926 hurricane, which destroyed much of the area.
as of 2010, परिचय 39,186 निवासियों live in South बीच.
The United States presidential election of 1960 थी the 44th quadrennial presidential election, आयोजित on मंगलवार, नवम्बर 8, 1960.
The Republican Party nominated लाज़िम Vice-President Richard Nixon, जबकि the Democratic पार्टी nominated जॉन F. कैनेडी, Senator इससे मैसाचुसेट्स.
The incumbent अध्यक्ष, रिपब्लिकन Dwight D. आइज़नहावर, थी नहीं eligible for re-election after serving the अधिकतम two terms अनुमत by the Twenty-second amendment.
कैनेडी थी elected with a सीसे of 112,827 votes, or 0.17 % of the popular vote, giving him a विजय of 303 to 219 in the चुनावी College, the closest चूंकि 1916.
This थी the first election in which all पचास of the current United States participated.
A क्रमांक of factors explain why the election was so close.
Kennedy gained चूंकि there was an आर्थिक recession जिससे hurt the incumbent Republican, और he था the लाभ of 17 लाख more पंजीकृत डेमोक्रेट than Republicans.
furthermore, the नई मत that Kennedy gained among Catholics almost neutralized the नई votes Nixon gained among Protestants.
Kennedy 's campaigning skills decisively outmatched Nixon 's.
In the end, निक्सन 's emphasis on उसके अनुभव carried छोटी वज़न, और he wasted energy by campaigning in सब 50 states instead of concentrating on the झूले राज्य.
कैनेडी प्रयुक्त his विशाल, well-funded campaign संगठन to win the नामांकन, secure endorsements, और, with the सहायता of the last of the big-city bosses, to get out the vote in the big cities.
He relied on running mate Lyndon B. जॉनसन to थाम the दक्षिण और used television effectively.
इस election is notable as होने the पहला time in u.S. history कि two बैठे U.S. सीनेटरों ( Kennedy और जॉनसन ) were निर्वाचित as president और vice-president, a phenomenon कि has been repeated once, by बराक ओबामा और जो Biden in 2008 ( in both cases, the president was the younger, more junior सीनेटर ).
A poster लिये a c. 1884 American उत्पादन of Macbeth, अभिनीत Thomas W. Keene.
Depicted, counter clockwise इससे top-left, are : मैकबेथ and Banquo meet the witches ; just after the murder of डंकन ; Banquo 's भुत ; Macbeth duels macduff ; and Macbeth.
Macbeth is a play written by William Shakespeare.
It is considered एक of उसके darkest and most powerful tragedies.
Set in Scotland, the play dramatizes the corroding मनोवैज्ञानिक and राजनैतिक effects उत्पादित when its समर्थक, the Scottish रब Macbeth, chooses दुष्ट as the रास्ता to fulfill his ambition लिये power.
he commits regicide to become king और तब furthers his moral descent साथ a शासनकाल of murderous आतंक to stay in शक्ति, eventually plunging the country into civil war.
in the end, he loses सबकुछ कि देता अर्थ and purpose to उसके जीवन before losing उसके life itself.
The play is believed to have been written between 1603 and 1607, and is most commonly dated 1606.
The earliest account of a performance of what was probably शेक्सपियर 's play is April 1611, when Simon forman recorded देखकर ऐसे a खेल at the ग्लोब Theatre.
It थी first published in the Folio of 1623, possibly इससे a prompt किताब.
It थी most संभावित लिखा during the शासनकाल of James I, who था been James VI of स्कॉटलैंड before he succeeded to the अंग्रेज़ी throne in 1603.
जेम्स was a patron of shakespeare’s एक्टिंग company, and of सब the plays Shakespeare wrote during James’s reign, मैकबेथ सबसे clearly reflects the playwright’s relationship with the sovereign.
Macbeth is Shakespeare’s shortest tragedy, and tells the स्टोरी of a वीर स्कॉटिश general named मैकबेथ जो receives a prophecy from a trio of witches that एक दिन he will become किंग of स्कॉटलैंड.
Consumed by ambition and spurred to कार्रवाई by his बीवी, मैकबेथ murders King डंकन and takes the सिंहासन for खुद.
His शासनकाल is racked साथ guilt और paranoia, और he soon becomes a tyrannical शासक as he is forced to commit more and अधिक हत्याएं to protect himself इससे enmity और suspicion.
the bloodbath swiftly takes मैकबेथ and महिला मैकबेथ into realms of arrogance, madness, और death.
शेक्सपियर 's source लिये the tragedy is the account of King Macbeth of स्कॉटलैंड, macduff, and Duncan in Holinshed 's Chronicles ( 1587 ), a history of England, Scotland and Ireland परिचित to शेक्सपियर and his contemporaries, although the events in the play differ extensively from the history of the real Macbeth.
In the backstage world of theatre, some believe कि the खेल is cursed, और will not mention its शीर्षक aloud, referring to it instead as `` the स्कॉटिश खेल ``.
over the course of many centuries, the खेल रै आकर्षित कुछ of the most renowned actors to the भूमिकाएँ of Macbeth and महिला Macbeth.
It रै been adapted to फिल्मी, टेलीविज़न, opera, novels, कॉमिक किताबे, और अन्य media.
the Milton hershey School is a private परोपकारी ( pre-k through 12 ) boarding school in Hershey, पेन्सिलवेनिया.
Originally named the hershey औद्योगिक School, the institution was founded and funded by chocolate industrialist Milton Snavely hershey and उसके wife, कैथरीन Sweeney Hershey.
The school was originally established for impoverished, healthy, Caucasian, पुरूष orphans, while आज it serves विद्यार्थी of various backgrounds.
the Milton Hershey School Trust, जिससे funds the स्कूल, owns controlling ब्याज in the Hershey Company और owns the hershey Entertainment and Resorts कम्पनी ( HERCO ) जिससे oversees many of the area होटल along with a थीम park called hersheypark.
With over छह अरब डॉलर in assets, the Milton hershey स्कूल is one of the wealthiest schools in the world.
the school is overseen by a फलक of Managers.
The स्कूल फिलहाल serves 1,818 students, और योजनाएँ to grow to 2,100 students by 2013.
A member of CORE : Coalition for आवासीय Education, it is the largest आवासीय शिक्षा program in the us.

the नियंत्रित Substances Act ( CSA ) थी enacted into law by the Congress of the संयुक्त राज्य as शीर्षक ii of the व्यापक Drug Abuse Prevention and Control Act of 1970.
The सीएसए is the संघीय U.S. drug नीति under which the manufacture, importation, possession, उपयोग and वितरण of निश्चित substances is regulated.
The अधिनियम also served as the national implementing विधान for the सिंगल Convention on narcotic Drugs.
The विधान created five Schedules ( classifications ), with varying योग्यता for a पदार्थ to be शामिल in each.
Two federal एजेंसियों, the Drug Enforcement Administration और the खाना और Drug Administration, determine जिससे substances are added to or removed from the various schedules, though the statute passed by Congress created the initial listing, और कॉंग्रेस रै sometimes scheduled other substances through legislation such as the hillory J. farias और Samantha Reid date-rape रोकथाम अधिनियम of 2000, जिससे placed gamma hydroxybutyrate in Schedule I. वर्गीकरण decisions हैं जरूरी to be made on मापदण्ड including potential for गाली ( an undefined term ), currently स्वीकृत medical उपयोग in उपचार in the United States, और international treaties.
second-language अधिग्रहण or second-language सीखना is the प्रक्रम by जिससे लोगों learn a second भाषा.
second-language acquisition ( प्रायः abbreviated to sla ) also refers to the scientific अनुशासन devoted to अध्ययन that process.
Second भाषा refers to any language सीखे in addition to a व्यक्ति 's पहला भाषा ; although the concept is नामित second-language acquisition, it can also चरितार्थ the learning of third, fourth, or subsequent भाषाएं.
Second-language acquisition refers to what learners do ; it does not refer to practices in भाषा teaching.
the अकादमिक discipline of second-language acquisition is a subdiscipline of applied भाषाविज्ञान.
It is broad-based और relatively नई.
as well as the various branches of भाषाविज्ञान, second-language अधिग्रहण is भी closely सम्बन्धित to मनोविज्ञान, संज्ञानात्मक psychology, and education.
To separate the academic discipline from the सीखना process itself, the शर्तें second-language acquisition शोध, second-language studies, and second-language acquisition studies हैं भी used.
sla research began as an interdisciplinary फ़ील्ड, and क्युकी of इस it is मुश्किल to identify a precise starting तिथि.
However, it does appear to have developed a ग्रेट deal since the mid-1960s.
the पद अधिग्रहण was originally प्रयुक्त to emphasize the subconscious nature of the learning प्रक्रम, but in हाल years learning and अधिग्रहण have become largely synonymous.
Second-language acquisition can incorporate विरासत language सीखना, but it करता नहीं usually चरितार्थ bilingualism.
सबसे SLA शोधकर्ताओं see bilingualism as being the end result of सीखना a language, not the process itself, and see the term as referring to native-like fluency.
लेखक in fields ऐसे as education और मनोविज्ञान, however, often उपयोग bilingualism loosely to refer to all forms of बहुभाषिकता.
second-language acquisition is also नहीं to be contrasted साथ the acquisition of a foreign भाषा ; बल्कि, the सीखना of दूसरी languages और the सीखना of foreign languages involve the same fundamental प्रक्रियाओं in different situations..
वहीँ रै been much बहस about exactly कैसा language is learned, and अनेक issues are स्टिल अनसुलझे.
There are अनेक theories of second-language acquisition, but none are accepted as a पूरा explanation by all SLA शोधकर्ताओं.
due to the interdisciplinary nature of the फ़ील्ड of second-language acquisition, this is not expected to happen in the foreseeable भविष्य.
Forbes list of billionaires is an सालाना रैंकिंग of the संसार 's wealthiest people, compiled and प्रकाशित by फोर्ब्स, an American नेशनल कारोबार magazine.
The total net worth of प्रत्येक व्यक्तिगत on the list is अनुमानित, in United States dollars, आधारित on उनके एसेट और accounting लिये debt.
the सूची only represents प्रत्येक व्यक्ति 's valuation on a single day, due to daily fluctuations among exchange दरों and stock valuations.
The United States रहस्य Service is a u.S. federal law enforcement agency that is part of the United States Department of Homeland Security.
The sworn members हैं विभाजित among the खास Agents और the uniformed Division.
जबतक March 1, 2003, the सेवा was part of the संयुक्त States Department of the Treasury.
the u.S. Secret Service has two distinct क्षेत्रों of responsibility:
Financial अपराधों, covering मिशन such as prevention और छानबीन of counterfeiting of U.S. currency and U.S. राजकोष प्रतिभूति, and छानबीन of प्रमुख धोखाधड़ी.
सुरक्षा, जिससे entails ensuring the safety of वर्तमान और former national नेताओ and उनके families, such as the अध्यक्ष, past presidents, वाइस presidents, presidential उम्मीदवार, visiting heads of state, और विदेशी embassies ( per an agreement साथ the u.S. राज्य Department 's Bureau of राजनयिक Security ( DS ) दफ्तर of विदेशी मिशन ( ofm ), etc. )
the Secret सेवा 's initial responsibility was to investigate counterfeiting of U.S. करेंसी, which थी rampant following the U.S. Civil War.
The एजेंसी then evolved into the United States ' पहला घरेलू प्रज्ञा और counterintelligence agency.
Many of the agency 's मिशन were बाद लिया over by subsequent एजेंसियों ऐसे as the Federal Bureau of छानबीन ( FBI ), Bureau of Alcohol, तम्बाकू, Firearms and विस्फोटक ( ATF ), Immigration and कस्टम Enforcement ( ICE ), and Internal Revenue Service ( IRS ).
`` me and Bobby mcgee '' is a song लिखा by Kris kristofferson and Fred फोस्टर, originally performed by रोजर Miller.
Others performed the song later, सहित kristofferson खुद, and Janis Joplin who अव्वल the U.S. singles chart with the song in 1971 after उसके death, making the song the दूसरी posthumous number-one सिंगल in U.S. चार्ट इतिहास after `` ( Sittin ' On ) the Dock of the Bay `` by Otis redding.
फ्रैंकलिन delano रूज़वेल्ट ( or ; January 30, 1882 – अप्रैल 12, 1945 ), भी known by his initials, FDR, was the 32nd अध्यक्ष of the United राज्य ( 1933–1945 ) and a central figure in world events during the mid-20th सदी, leading the संयुक्त States दौरान a time of विश्वव्यापी economic depression और कुल युद्ध.
A dominant leader of the Democratic Party and the तभी American president निर्वाचित to अधिक than दो शर्तें, he निर्मित a नई सौदे Coalition कि realigned American राजनीती बाद 1932, as his domestic policies पारिभाषित अमरीकी liberalism for the middle तीसरा of the 20th century.
With the bouncy popular song `` Happy दिनों Are Here again `` as उसके अभियान थीम, FDR defeated लाज़िम रिपब्लिकन Herbert हूवर in November 1932, at the depth of the Great अवसाद.
Energized by उसके निजी victory over polio, FDR 's unfailing optimism and सक्रियता contributed to a नवीकरण of the national spirit.
He worked closely with अंग्रेजों प्रधान Minister Winston Churchill और सोवियत सामान्य सचिव Joseph Stalin in अग्रणी the allies विरूद्ध Germany and Japan in World War II, और restoring prosperity to the nation 's अर्थव्यवस्था.
In उसके पहला hundred days in office, which began March 4, 1933, रूज़वेल्ट पथप्रदर्शन major legislation और issued a profusion of executive orders कि instituted the New सौदे —a किस्में of programs designed to produce राहत ( सरकारी jobs for the बेरोजगार ), recovery ( economic विकास ), and reform ( through regulation of Wall गली, banks और transportation ).
the economy improved rapidly from 1933 to 1937, but then relapsed into a deep मंदी.
the bipartisan Conservative गठबन्धन कि formed in 1937 prevented his packing the Supreme Court or गुजर कोई considerable legislation ; it abolished अनेक of the relief programs जब unemployment diminished during संसार युद्ध II.
Most of the regulations on कारोबार यहूद ended परिचय 1975–85, except लिये the regulation of Wall Street by the Securities और Exchange Commission, which still exists.
Along with several छोटी programs, major surviving programs शामिल the Federal Deposit बीमे निगम, जिससे was created in 1933, and Social Security, जिससे कॉंग्रेस passed in 1935.
As World युद्ध II loomed बाद 1938, with the जापानी आक्रमण of चीन and the आक्रामकता of Nazi Germany, FDR gave strong राजनयिक और वित्तीय support to China और Great Britain, while remaining officially neutral.
His goal was to make अमेरिका the `` Arsenal of Democracy `` जिससे होता supply munitions to the Allies.
in कूच 1941, Roosevelt, with Congressional approval, provided lend-lease aid to the countries लड़ against नाजी जर्मनी साथ ब्रिटेन.
With बहुत दमदार नेशनल support, he made war on जापानी और Germany after the जापानी आक्रमण on पर्ल हार्बर on दिसम्बर 7, 1941, कॉलिंग it a `` date which होगा सजीव in infamy ``.
He पर्यवेक्षित the mobilization of the U.S. economy to support the Allied युद्ध effort.
As an active military नेता, रूज़वेल्ट implemented an overall war strategy on दो fronts कि ended in the defeat of the अक्ष Powers and the विकास of the संसार 's first अणु bomb.
In 1942 रूज़वेल्ट ordered the internment of 100,000 जापानी American नागरिकों.
बेरोजगारी dropped to 2 %, राहत कार्यक्रम largely ended, and the industrial economy grew rapidly to नई हाइट्स as millions of लोगों स्थानांतरित to नई jobs in war centers, और 16 million men और 300,000 women were drafted or volunteered for सैन्य service.
रूज़वेल्ट वर्चस्व the अमरीकी राजनैतिक scene नहीं तभी दौरान the twelve सालो of उसके प्रेसिडेंसी, but भी for दशकों afterward.
he orchestrated the realignment of मतदाता that निर्मित the पांचवां पार्टी प्रणाली.
fdr 's नई Deal गठबन्धन united labor संघ, बिग नगर मशीने, श्वेत ethnics, African अमेरिकी और ग्रामीण white southerners.
He भी बहकावे the later creation of the United राष्ट्र और bretton वुड्स.
रूज़वेल्ट is consistently rated by scholars as one of the शीर्ष तीन U.S. राष्ट्रपतियों, along with Abraham Lincoln और George Washington.
A liberal डेमोक्रेट, Roosevelt defined उसके वैचारिक स्थिति as `` a छोटी बाएँ of center. ''
Mara Salvatrucha ( commonly abbreviated as MS, Mara, and ms-13 ) is a transnational दण्ड गिरोह कि originated in लॉस एंजिल्स and रै spread to अन्य भाग of the United States, कनाडा, मैक्सिको, and Central America.
The बहुमत of the गिरोह is ethnically composed of Central Americans और active in शहरी and suburban areas.
in the U.S., the ms-13 has an विशेषकर heavy presence in Los Angeles काउंटी और the San Francisco Bay Area in Northern कैलिफ़ोर्निया ; the Washington, d.C. metropolitan क्षेत्रों of फेयरफैक्स County, Virginia, Montgomery काउंटी, Maryland, and Prince जार्ज 's County, Maryland ; long Island, New York ; the बोस्टन, Massachusetts area ; Charlotte, North कैरोलिना ; and ह्यूस्टन, Texas.
There is also a presence of ms-13 in Toronto, ओंटारियो, Canada.
Members of MS distinguish themselves by tattoos covering the body and also often the फेस, as खूब as the use of their अपना चिह्न भाषा.
They are notorious for their उपयोग of violence and a subcultural moral code कि predominantly consists of merciless revenge and cruel retributions.
इस cruelty of the विशिष्ट सदस्यों of the `` Maras '' or `` mareros '' earned उन्हें a path to be recruited by the sinaloa कार्टेल battling against Los zetas in an ongoing ड्रग war दक्षिण of the संयुक्त States किनारा.
उनके wide-ranging activities have drawn the attention of the एफबीआई और Immigration और Customs Enforcement, who have initiated wide-scale raids against known और suspected गिरोह सदस्यों – netting hundreds of रखवाले across the देश.
Bones is an American crime comedy-drama television series that premiered on the फॉक्स संजाल in the संयुक्त States on September 13, 2005.
The दिखाएँ is आधारित on forensic anthropology and forensic पुरातत्व, साथ प्रत्येक एपीसोड focusing on an एफबीआई मामला संचिका concerning the रहस्य पीछे human remains brought by एफबीआई खास Agent seeley बूथ ( दाउद Boreanaz ) to the forensic anthropologist dr. Temperance `` Bones '' ब्रेनन ( Emily Deschanel ).
the बाकी of the main cast includes Michaela Conlin, T. J. thyne, eric Millegan, tamara टेलर, Jonathan एडम्स, और जॉन फ्रांसिस Daley.
निर्मित by हार्ट Hanson, the series is very loosely आधारित on the life and कृतियाँ of novelist और forensic anthropologist कैथी reichs, जो also produces the दिखाएँ.
इसके title character, Temperance ब्रेनन, is नामित after the protagonist of Reichs ' अपराधों novel श्रेणी.
Conversely, Dr. ब्रेनन writes successful mystery novels based around a fictional ( in the Bones ब्रह्मांड ) forensic anthropologist नामित Kathy Reichs.
Bones is a joint उत्पादन by Josephson entertainment, दूर फ़ील्ड प्रोडक्शन्स and 20th सदी फॉक्स Television.

Super कटोरी xxv was an American football खेल between the अमरीकी फ़ुटबॉल Conference ( afc ) चैंपियन भैंस बिल्स and the National Football Conference ( nfc ) champion New यॉर्क Giants to decide the नेशनल Football लीग ( NFL ) champion लिये the 1990 ऋतु.

it is the तभी सुपर कटोरी decided by one point.
The game was आयोजित at Tampa स्टेडियम in tampa, Florida, on January 27, 1991, during the ऊँचाई of the गल्फ युद्ध.
It थी thus played अंतर्गत much patriotic fervor.
The कार्यवाही included a rousing rendition of `` The Star-Spangled Banner `` by व्हिटनी Houston during the pregame ceremonies.

In advancing to their second Super कटोरी, the दिग्गज भी posted a 13-3 नियमित season record, लकिन with a ball-control ठोकर और a defense कि allowed a लीग low 211 points.
the खेल is best remembered for Bills placekicker स्कॉट नॉर्वुड 's last-second field लक्ष्य attempt which went चौड़ी सही of the uprights, अग्रणी to a दिग्गज विजय, और starting a four-game खोने streak in the Super Bowl for the Bills.
The दिग्गज set a Super कटोरी रिकार्ड holding कब्ज़ा of the ball लिये 40 मिनट्स and 33 seconds.
नई यॉर्क also overcame a 12-3 second-quarter deficit, और made a 75-yard touchdown drive कि consumed a Super कटोरी record 9:29 बंद the क्लॉक.
दिग्गज running back Ottis एंडरसन, जो carried the ball 21 times लिये 102 yards and एक touchdown, थी named सुपर Bowl mvp.

Malcolm x ( ; may 19, 1925February 21, 1965 ), born मैल्कम Little और also ज्ञात as El-Hajj Malik El-Shabazz ( ), was an african-american मुस्लिम minister और human rights activist.
To उसके admirers, he was a साहसी एडवोकेट लिये the rights of blacks, a man जो indicted white अमेरिका in the harshest terms for its अपराधों against ब्लैक अमेरिकी.
Detractors accused him of उपदेश जातिवाद, ब्लैक supremacy, and violence.
He has महरूम पुकारा one of the greatest and most influential African अमेरिकी in history.
मैल्कम X 's father died—killed by white supremacists, it was rumored—when he थी यंग, and at least one of his uncles थी lynched.
When he थी 13, his mother was placed in a mental hospital, and he was placed in a series of foster homes.
in 1946, at age 20, he went to prison for तोड़कर और entering.
In prison, मैल्कम X became a सदस्य of the स्वदेश of islam ; after his पैरोल in 1952, he quickly rose to become one of इसके leaders.
For a dozen years, Malcolm x थी the पब्लिक फेस of the विवादास्पद group, लकिन मोहभंग साथ Nation of Islam head Elijah Muhammad led उसे to leave the Nation in March 1964.
After a period of सफर in अफ़्रीकी and the Middle ईस्ट, he लौटे to the United States, where he founded Muslim मस्जिदे, Inc. और the Organization of afro-american एकता.
In February 1965, less than a year बाद leaving the स्वदेश of Islam, he was assassinated by तीन members of the समूह.
Malcolm X 's expressed beliefs बदला substantially over time.
as a spokesman for the स्वदेश of Islam he taught black supremacy and advocated separation of black और श्वेत Americans —in कंट्रास्ट to the सिविल rights movement 's emphasis on integration.
After breaking with the Nation of Islam in 1964—saying of his association with it, `` i did many things as a [ ब्लैक ] मुस्लिम that I 'm sorry for अभी.
I was a zombie then... pointed in a certain direction and बताई to कूच '' —and becoming a सुन्नी Muslim, he disavowed racism and expressed willingness to work साथ सिविल rights leaders, he continued to emphasize Pan-Africanism, black self-determination, और self-defense.

एलिज़ाबेथ II ( एलिज़ाबेथ Alexandra मरियम ; born 21 अप्रैल 1926 ) is the constitutional monarch of 16 sovereign राज्य, known as the Commonwealth realms, and उनके territories and dependencies, और सिर of the 54-member Commonwealth of Nations.
She is परम् राज्यपाल of the Church of England and, in some of her realms, carries the title of Defender of the आस्था as भाग of उसके पूरा title.
On उसके accession on 6 फ़रवरी 1952, एलिज़ाबेथ became Head of the Commonwealth और महारानी regnant of सात independent Commonwealth countries : the संयुक्त Kingdom, Canada, Australia, New Zealand, दक्षिण Africa, पाकिस्तानी and Ceylon.
इससे 1956 to 1992, the number of her realms varied as territories gained स्वतंत्रता and some realms became republics.
At उपस्थित, in addition to the पहला चार aforementioned countries, Elizabeth is Queen of Jamaica, बारबाडोस, the बहामा, Grenada, पापुआ New Guinea, the सुलेमान आइलैंड्स, Tuvalu, संत Lucia, संत Vincent and the Grenadines, Belize, अण्टीगुआ और Barbuda and संत Kitts और Nevis.
Her reign of सालो is currently the दूसरी longest for a British monarch ; only Queen विक्टोरिया has reigned longer at over 63 सालो.
एलिज़ाबेथ थी born in लंदन और शिक्षित privately at home.
Her पिता acceded to the throne as George vi in 1936 on the abdication of उसके bhai एडवर्ड viii, इससे जिससे समय वो थी the heir presumptive.
वो began to undertake पब्लिक कर्तव्य दौरान the Second World युद्ध, in जिससे वो परोसा in the auxiliary Territorial सेवा.
in 1947, वो शादीशुदा Prince Philip, Duke of एडिनबर्ग, with whom she has चार children : चार्ल्स, ऐनी, एंड्रयू, और Edward.
Her coronation सेवा took place in 1953 और थी the पहला to be televised.
The Queen 's many ऐतिहासिक visits and बैठक शामिल a state visit to the Republic of Ireland और reciprocal विज़िट to और from the पोप.
The Queen रै seen major संवैधानिक परिवर्तन in her realms, ऐसे as devolution in the United Kingdom और the patriation of the Canadian constitution.
Times of personal significance have शामिल the births and marriages of her children, the births of उसके grandchildren, the प्रतिष्ठापन of the Prince of Wales, and the जश्न of माइलस्टोन ऐसे as her Silver, सुनहरी, and Diamond Jubilees in 1977, 2002, और 2012, क्रमशः.
प्रमुख events in the Queen 's reign have शामिल the Troubles in Northern Ireland, the Falklands War, wars with इराकी and the War in Afghanistan.
There have been टाइम्स of personal sorrow for उसके जिससे शामिल the death of her father at 56, the assassination of Prince फिलिप 's uncle, Lord Mountbatten, the breakdown of उसके children 's marriages in 1992 ( a year deemed her annus horribilis ), the मौत in 1997 of उसके former daughter-in-law, डायना, राजकुमारी of Wales, and the deaths of उसके mother and सिस्टर in 2002.
The Queen रै occasionally faced severe press criticism of the royal परिवार and रिपब्लिकन sentiments, but support लिये the monarchy and her निजी popularity remain ऊँची.
the 2010 संयुक्त States Senate election in Florida took प्लेस on नवम्बर 2, 2010 साथ साथ other elections to the United राज्य Senate in अन्य states as well as सब elections to the United States House of Representatives और various state और लोकल elections.
Republican मार्को Rubio, former Speaker of the फ्लोरिडा House of Representatives, defeated स्वतंत्र Charlie crist and Democrat Kendrick Meek in a three-way race.
एक पद Senator Mel मार्टिनेज थी निर्वाचित in a बहुत close race against Democrat Betty अरंडी in 2004 साथ 49 % of the vote.
मार्टिनेज announced on December 2, 2008 that he होता नहीं seek re-election to the Senate, and would इस्तीफा prior to the समाप्त of his term.
in August 2009, Governor चार्ली Crist घोषित कि he would appoint उसके former Chief of Staff, जार्ज lemieux, a रिपब्लिकन, to the सीनेट seat being vacated by मार्टिनेज.
Governor crist publicly announced he was running लिये the सीट in mid-2009.

उपग्रह view of दोहा
Doha (, ' or ', literally : `` the big पेड़ '' ) is the पूंजी city of the state of Qatar.
स्तिथ on the coast of the Persian गल्फ,
it had a population of 998,651 in 2008, and is भी एक of the municipalities of Qatar.
दोहा is Qatar 's largest city, साथ over 60 % of the स्वदेश 's population residing in Doha or its surrounding suburbs, और is भी the economic centre of the देश.
दोहा also serves as the सीट of government of क़तर, which is ruled by Sheikh Hamad bin खलीफा al थानी.
दोहा is home to the Education City, an area devoted to research और education.
दोहा was the साईट of the पहला ministerial-level meeting of the Doha Development गोलाकार of World व्यापार Organization negotiations.
the city of Doha held the 2006 एशियाई खेल, जिससे थी the largest एशियाई Games ever held.
Doha also hosted the 2011 Pan Arab Games and most of the games at the 2011 AFC एशियाई कप.
दोहा hosted the UNFCCC Climate Negotiations ( COP 18 ) December 2012 and will मेजबान a large क्रमांक of the venues लिये the 2022 FIFA संसार कप.
The संसार Petroleum Council held the 20th World पेट्रोलियम सम्मेलन in Doha in दिसम्बर 2011.
paranasal sinuses are a group of four paired air-filled spaces that घेर the nasal cavity ( maxillary sinuses ), above the आँखें ( frontal साइनस ), between the आँखें ( ethmoid sinuses ), and behind the ethmoids ( sphenoid साइनस ).

झुकना manufacturing, झुकना एंटरप्राइज़, or lean production, often simply, `` झुकना, '' is a production practice that considers the व्यय of संसाधन for any goal अन्य than the creation of value for the end customer to be wasteful, and thus a निशाना for elimination.
Working इससे the perspective of the ग्राहक जो consumes a product or सेवा, `` मान '' is defined as any कार्रवाई or प्रक्रम कि a customer would be willing to pay for.
Essentially, lean is centered on preserving मान साथ less work.
Lean manufacturing is a प्रबन्धन philosophy निकला mostly इससे the Toyota Production प्रणाली ( tps ) ( hence the पद Toyotism is भी prevalent ) and पहचाना as `` झुकना '' तभी in the 1990s.
tps is renowned लिये its फ़ोकस on कटौती of the असली Toyota सात wastes to improve overall ग्राहक मान, but there हैं varying perspectives on कैसा this is best achieved.
The steady growth of टोयोटा, from a small कम्पनी to the संसार 's largest automaker, has focused attention on how it रै हासिल this कामयाबी.

icarly is an American sitcom कि airs on Nickelodeon, जिससे premiered on सितंबर 8, 2007.
Nickelodeon प्रचारित अनेक episodes so far such as `` ido '', `` iHire an idiot '', `` iPity the Nevel '', `` idate sam & फ्रेडी '', etc. as specials, despite their होने नियमित episodes.
Every episode title begins with a lower मामला i जिससे represents the internet, as in `` icarly ''.
The दिखाएँ थी nominated for an Emmy award लिये Outstanding children 's Program in 2009.
The श्रेणी starring Miranda cosgrove as कार्ली Shay, a 13-year-old जो becomes an अंतरजाल star.
The series ended on नवम्बर 23, 2012 साथ the one-hour खास एपीसोड `` igoodbye ''.
A total of 7 सीज़न and 109 episodes were broadcast.
The largest audience of the series थी 11.2 million viewers, with the खास एपीसोड `` iSaved Your Life '' premiered in January 2010.
When Carly ( मिरांडा Cosgrove ) and her sassy best friend sam ( Jennette mccurdy ) act funny at a school talent show audition, tech-savvy Freddie ( नाथन Kress ) tapes it और पोस्ट it ऑनलाइन without telling उन्हें.

जबकि grappling साथ typical issues of adolescence, कार्ली, sam, and फ्रेडी find out that वे have भी become ऑनलाइन celebrities as their दिखाएँ – which features हुनर प्रतियोगिताओं, व्यंजनों, problem-solving, and यादृच्छिक नाचना – garners अंतरराष्ट्रीय accolades.
Carly lives in सिएटल, Washington with उसके 26-year-old bhai and guardian स्पेंसर ( Jerry Trainor ) and produces the show in a makeshift third-floor स्टुडियो loft in their अपार्टमेंट.
Their mother रै never been seen or उल्लेखित, लकिन their पिता, Steven Shay ( दाउद chisum ), is a u.S. एयर Force officer temporarily stationed on a submarine, और is प्रायः उल्लेखित but is only देखी in person during the series finale एपीसोड, `` iGoodbye ''.
Westlife यहूद an Irish boy band जिससे formed in 1998 और disbanded in 2012.
Originally signed by साइमन Cowell and प्रबंधित by Louis वाल्श, the group 's final line-up consisted of nicky Byrne, Kian Egan, चिह्नित Feehily and Shane filan.
Brian McFadden was a सदस्य from 1998 until उसके departure in 2004.
westlife sold over 50 million records विश्वव्यापी, a कुल that included studio एल्बम, singles, video releases, और संकलन albums.
the group संचित 14 number-one singles in the संयुक्त Kingdom ( the third-highest in uk history ), tying with Cliff Richard and ranking just behind the Beatles and Elvis Presley.
They हासिल a total of 26 शीर्ष टेन singles over their 14-year career.
By 2010, westlife was listed in the Guinness संसार Records, as the uk 's top-selling album group of the 21st सदी.
वे also जीती The Record of the Year ( the तभी म्यूज़िक award आधारित on public मत in the UK ) a record-breaking four times and in 2012, the आधिकारिक चार्ट Company सूचीबद्ध Westlife 34th amongst the biggest-selling singles artists in British music इतिहास.
despite उनके European and Asian कामयाबी, Westlife never managed to break into the U.S. मार्केट, achieving only one hit single in 2000 : `` Swear It Again ``.
in अक्तूबर 2011, Westlife announced their intention to विभाजित in 2012, following their Greatest Hits Tour and the रिलीज of their महानतम Hits album.
The boyband 's फाइनल concerts were आयोजित on 22 और 23 June 2012 at Croke पार्क Stadium in डबलिन.
the first farewell concert, offering 85,000 tickets, sold out in a record-breaking 5 minutes and the latter screened live in cinemas worldwide.
विटामिन a is a समूह of nutritionally unsaturated hydrocarbons, जिससे include retinol, retinal, retinoic acid और several provitamin a carotenoids among जिससे beta-carotene is the सबसे important.
Vitamin A रै multiple functions, it is important for विकास and विकास, लिये the maintenance of the प्रतिरक्षा system and शुभ vision.
विटामिन A is needed by the retina of the eye in the form of retinal, जिससे combines साथ protein opsin to रूप rhodopsin the light-absorbing molecule, that is necessary for both low-light ( scotopic vision ) और रंग vision.
विटामिन a भी कृत्यों in a very different role as an irreversibly oxidized form of रेटिनॉल known as retinoic acid, which is an important hormone-like growth फ़ैक्टर लिये epithelial and other कोशिकाएं.
in foods of animal उत्पत्ति, the प्रमुख form of विटामिन a is an ester, primarily retinyl palmitate, जिससे is converted to रेटिनॉल ( chemically an दारू ) in the small आंत.
The रेटिनॉल form कृत्यों as a storage form of the विटामिन, and can be परिवर्तित to and इससे its visually क्रियाशील aldehyde form, retinal.
The associated acid ( retinoic एसिड ), a metabolite that can be irreversibly synthesized इससे vitamin a, has तभी आंशिक vitamin A activity, and does नहीं फलन in the retina लिये the visual cycle.
Retinoic acid is प्रयुक्त लिये विकास और सेल्यूलर differentiation.
All forms of विटामिन A have a beta-ionone रिंग to which an isoprenoid chain is attached, पुकारा a retinyl समूह.
Both structural features हैं essential for vitamin activity.
the orange रंजक of गाजर – beta-carotene – can be represented as two कनेक्ट retinyl समूह, जिससे हैं used in the देह to contribute to vitamin a levels.
Alpha-carotene and gamma-carotene भी have a सिंगल retinyl group, जिससे दे them कुछ vitamin activity.
None of the अन्य carotenes have vitamin activity.
The carotenoid beta- cryptoxanthin possesses an ionone group and has vitamin कार्यकलाप in humans.
विटामिन a can be मिला in two principal forms in भोजन :
Retinol, the form of विटामिन A absorbed जब eating एनिमल food sources, is a yellow, fat-soluble पदार्थ.
Since the pure alcohol form is unstable, the vitamin is found in ऊतकों in a form of retinyl ester.
It is also commercially produced and administered as esters such as retinyl एसीटेट or palmitate.
The carotenes alpha-carotene, beta-carotene, gamma-carotene ; और the xanthophyll beta-cryptoxanthin ( सब of which contain beta-ionone rings ), but no other carotenoids, function as provitamin A in herbivores and omnivore पशु, जिससे possess the enzyme ( 15-15'-dioxygenase ) which cleaves beta-carotene in the intestinal mucosa and converts it रेटिनॉल.
In general, carnivores हैं poor converters of ionine-containing carotenoids, and pure carnivores ऐसे as cats and ferrets कमी 15-15'-dioxygenase and can नहीं convert any carotenoids to retinal ( resulting in none of the carotenoids being फ़ॉर्म of विटामिन a for these species ).
Selena Marie Gomez ( born July 22, 1992 ) is an American सिंगर और actress.
She बना her debut as a child actress in Barney & मित्रों.
In 2007, गोमेज़ came to prominence as a starring cast member in the television श्रेणी Wizards of waverly प्लेस.
She signed to Hollywood Records the following year, and became the founder और lead singer of the pop बैंड सेलिना Gomez & the झाँकी.
Their स्टुडियो albums Kiss & Tell ( 2009 ), a साल बगैर Rain ( 2010 ), and जब the सूर्य goes Down ( 2011 ) were certified सुनहरा by the Recording Industry संघ of America ( RIAA ) and have spawned Platinum-certified singles `` Naturally ``, `` Who Says ``, और `` Love तुम like a प्रेम सोंग ``.
After the release of television films and उनके accompanying soundtracks, Gomez made her नाट्य film डेब्यू in ramona और Beezus in 2010 and स्ट्रक्चर in Monte कार्लो in 2011.
upon the conclusion of Wizards of waverly Place and the hiatus of Selena गोमेज़ & the झाँकी in 2012, she केन्द्रित on उसके film करियर, सेवारत as a voice अभिनेत्री in Hotel Transylvania and अभिनीत in Spring Breakers the following साल.
उसके debut सोलो album is tentatively अनुसूचित to be released in गर्मियाँ 2013, and is preceded by its lead single `` Come & Get it ``.
बाहर of her कार्य in the entertainment उद्योग, गोमेज़ is involved in philanthropic activities through दान कार्य and विभिन्न social and environmental causes.

Sacramento is the capital नगर of the U.S. state of California और the सीट of government of sacramento County.
It is located at the confluence of the sacramento River और the अमरीकी River in the उत्तरी portion of California 's expansive Central घाटी.
साथ an estimated 2011 population of 477,891, it is the sixth-largest नगर in कैलिफ़ोर्निया और the 35th largest city in the संयुक्त राज्य.
sacramento is the कोर cultural और economic center of the sacramento metropolitan area which includes सात counties with an estimated 2009 जनसांख्यिकी of 2,527,123.
इसके महानगर area is the चौथी largest in कैलिफ़ोर्निया after the Greater लॉस एंजिल्स क्षेत्रफल, San Francisco Bay क्षेत्रफल, and the San डिएगो महानगर area, as खूब as the 25th largest in the संयुक्त States.
Sacramento was cited by Time magazine as America 's सबसे ethnically और racially integrated नगर in 2002.
Sacramento became a city through the efforts of the Swiss immigrant जॉन Sutter, Sr., उसके बेटे जॉन sutter, jr., and James W. Marshall.
sacramento grew जल्दी thanks to the protection of Sutter 's फोर्ट, which was established by sutter in 1839.
दौरान the California Gold फटाफट, Sacramento थी a प्रमुख वितरण point, a commercial and agricultural बीच, and a terminus for वैगन trains, stagecoaches, riverboats, the टेलीग्राफ, the Pony Express, and the First Transcontinental Railroad.
California State University, Sacramento, more commonly ज्ञात as Sacramento State or Sac राज्य, is the largest लोकल university.
It is one of the twenty-three campuses of the California राज्य University system.

University of the Pacific 's McGeorge School of Law is located in the Oak Park पड़ोस.

the uc Davis Medical बीच, a world-renowned research हॉस्पिटल, is स्तिथ in the नगर of Sacramento.
मेमोरियल दिन is a संयुक्त States federal अवकाश which occurs every year on the final सोमवार of May.
Memorial दिन is a day of remembering the men and महिलाओं जो died जबकि सेवारत in the United राज्य Armed शक्तियां.
Formerly ज्ञात as सजावट दिन, it originated बाद the अमरीकी सिविल युद्ध to commemorate the Union and Confederate soldiers who died in the सिविल युद्ध.
by the 20th century मेमोरियल दिन had been extended to honor all Americans जो have died in all युद्धों.
It typically marks the start of the summer vacation ऋतु, while Labor Day marks इसके end.
अनेक people विज़िट cemeteries और memorials, particularly to honor those who have died in military सेवा.
Many volunteers प्लेस an American ध्वज on each grave in नेशनल कब्रिस्तान.
by the जल्दी 20th century, मेमोरियल Day थी an अवसर for more general expressions of memory, as people visited the graves of their deceased रिश्तेदारों in church कब्रिस्तान, whether they had परोसा in the सैन्य or not.
It also became a long वीकेंड increasingly devoted to shopping, परिवार gatherings, fireworks, trips to the beach, and national media कार्यक्रम.
Annual सजावट Days for particular cemeteries are held on a संडे in लेट spring or early summer in कुछ ग्रामीण areas of the American दक्षिण, notably in the kyu.
in cases involving a family graveyard where remote पूर्वजो as खूब as those who were मृतक more recently are buried, इस may लो on the character of an विस्तारित family reunion to which some लोगों सफर सैंकड़ों of miles.
People gather on the designated दिन and put flowers on graves and नवीनीकृत सम्पर्क साथ kinfolk और others.
वहीँ often is a धार्मिक service and a `` डिनर on the मैदान, '' the traditional term लिये a potluck भोजन in which people प्रयुक्त to spread the बर्तन out on sheets or tablecloths on the grass.
It is believed कि this practice began पहले the अमरीकी सिविल War and thus may प्रतिबिंबित the real उत्पत्ति of the `` memorial दिन '' विचार.
Memorial Day is नहीं to be उलझन साथ दिग्गजों Day ; मेमोरियल Day is a day of remembering the men and महिलाओं who died while serving, जबकि दिग्गजों Day मनाता the सेवा of सब u.S. military veterans, जीना or मुर्दे.
Mt. zion Church state history marker निकट Philadelphia, Mississippi.
Freedom Summer ( also known as the मिसिसिपी Summer प्रोजेक्ट ) was a campaign in the संयुक्त States शुभारम्भ in June 1964 to attempt to register as अनेक African अमरीकी मतदाता as possible in Mississippi, जिससे था historically excluded सबसे blacks from voting.
the project also नियत up dozens of Freedom Schools, स्वतंत्रता Houses, और community centers in छोटी towns throughout Mississippi to aid the local black population.
The project थी व्यवस्थित by the Council of Federated संगठन ( COFO ), a coalition of the Mississippi branches of the चार major सिविल rights संगठन ( SNCC, CORE, naacp and sclc ).
Most of the impetus, नेतृत्व, और financing for the गर्मियाँ प्रोजेक्ट आए इससे the sncc.
Robert Parris मूसा, SNCC फ़ील्ड सचिव और co-director of COFO, directed the summer प्रोजेक्ट.
Blues is the नाम दिए to both a musical form and a music विधा that originated in communities of primarily the `` Deep दक्षिण `` of the संयुक्त States around the end of the 19th century from spirituals, work songs, field hollers, shouts और chants, and rhymed simple कथा ballads.
The blues रूप, ubiquitous in jazz, rhythm and blues, और rock and फेंकें is characterized by विशिष्ट chord progressions, of which the twelve-bar ब्लूज़ chord progression is the सबसे common.
the blue notes that, for expressive purposes हैं sung or played flattened or धीरे bent ( minor 3rd to major 3rd ) in संबंध to the pitch of the major स्केल, हैं also an important part of the sound.
the blues genre is आधारित on the blues form but possesses other विशेषताएँ such as specific lyrics, बास lines, and instruments.
ब्लूज़ can be subdivided into several subgenres ranging इससे country to urban blues कि were अधिक or less popular during different periods of the 20th century.
Best ज्ञात हैं the Delta, Piedmont, जम्प, and Chicago ब्लूज़ styles.
World War ii marked the transition इससे ध्वनिक to इलेक्ट्रिक ब्लूज़ और the प्रगतिशील opening of blues music to a wider audience, especially श्वेत listeners.
In the 1960s और 1970s, a hybrid रूप पुकारा blues-rock evolved.
the पद `` the blues '' refers to the `` ब्लू शैतानों '', अर्थ वेदना and sadness ; an जल्दी use of the term in इस भाव is मिला in George Colman 's one-act farce Blue शैतानों ( 1798 ).
हालांकि the use of the phrase in African-American music may be older, it has महरूम attested to since 1912, when हार्ट Wand 's `` Dallas ब्लूज़ `` became the first स्वत्वाधिकार blues संयोजन.
In गीत the phrase is प्रायः used to describe a depressed मनोदशा.
a quarter dollar, commonly shortened to quarter, is a coin worth 1⁄4 of a संयुक्त राज्य डालर or 25 cents.
the quarter has महरूम उत्पादित since 1796.
the choice of 25¢ as a denomination, as opposed to 20¢ जिससे is more common in other parts of the संसार, originated with the practice of dividing Spanish Milled डॉलर into eight wedge shaped segments ( cf. `` pieces of आठ `` ).
At one time `` two बिट्स ``, i.e. दो wedges, प्रत्येक wedge an eighth, यूँ a quarter of the Spanish रियल, was a आम nickname for a quarter.
दिन of the मुर्दे ( ) is a Mexican holiday celebrated throughout मैक्सिको and around the संसार in अन्य संस्कृतियों.
The अवकाश focuses on महफिलों of परिवार और friends to दुवा लिये and याद friends और परिवार members who have died.
It is विशेषकर celebrated in Mexico, where it is a नेशनल अवकाश, और all बैंको हैं बंद.
the जश्न takes place on November 1 और 2, in कनेक्शन with the Catholic holidays of All Saints ' Day और सब souls ' दिन.
Traditions कनेक्ट साथ the अवकाश include भवन निजी altars honoring the मृतक using शुगर skulls, marigolds, and the पसंदीदा foods and beverages of the departed and visiting क़ब्रों with these as उपहार.
वे also छोड़ possessions of the deceased.
Scholars trace the origins of the आधुनिक मैक्सिकन अवकाश to indigenous observances dating back hundreds of सालो and to an Aztec festival dedicated to the देवी Mictecacihuatl.
the holiday रै spread throughout the संसार : In ब्राज़ील, Dia de finados is a public अवकाश कि many brazilians celebrate by visiting cemeteries and चर्च.
in स्पेन, वहीँ are festivals और parades, और, at the end of the दिन, लोगों gather at कब्रिस्तान and pray for their मुर्दे loved ones.
Similar observances occur elsewhere in Europe, and similarly themed celebrations appear in many एशियाई and अफ़्रीकी cultures.
ANITA Mk VIII.
The ANITA चिह्नित VII and अनीता Mark viii calculators were शुभारम्भ simultaneously in लेट 1961 as the world 's पहला all- electronic डेस्कटॉप calculators.
Designed and built by the Bell Punch Co.
in Britain, और marketed through its Sumlock comptometer division, वे प्रयुक्त vacuum tubes और cold-cathode switching tubes in उनके लॉजिक circuits और nixie tubes लिये their numerical displays.
They were the पहला of a श्रेणी of डेस्कटॉप और hand-held इलेक्ट्रॉनिक calculators कि the कम्पनी was to develop और sell under the अनीता name into the mid-1970s.
George Washington ( –, 1799 ) थी the first अध्यक्ष of the संयुक्त States ( 1789–1797 ), the commander-in-chief of the महाद्वीपीय फौज during the American Revolutionary War, and एक of the Founding fathers of the United States.
He presided over the convention that drafted the Constitution, जिससे replaced the आलेख of कनफेडरेशन and स्थापित the स्थिति of President.
Washington was elected President as the सर्वसम्मत चुनाव of the 69 निर्वाचक in 1788, and he served दो terms in दफ्तर.
He oversaw the creation of a दमदार, well-financed national सरकारी that कायम neutrality in the wars raging in Europe, suppressed विद्रोह, and जीती acceptance among Americans of all प्रकार.
His leadership स्टाइल स्थापित अनेक forms और संस्कार of government that have महरूम used चूंकि, such as using a cabinet प्रणाली and delivering an inaugural पता.
Further, the peaceful transition इससे his प्रेसिडेंसी to the presidency of जॉन Adams स्थापित a परंपरा that continues into the 21st century.
Washington थी hailed as `` पिता of his country `` even during his lifetime.
Washington was born into the provincial gentry of औपनिवेशिक वर्जिनिया ; his धनवान planter family owned तम्बाकू plantations और slaves.
बाद both his पिता and पुरानी bhai died when he थी young, वॉशिंगटन became personally और professionally संलग्न to the शक्तिशाली विलियम फेयरफैक्स, जो promoted his करियर as a surveyor और soldier.
Washington जल्दी became a senior अधिकारी in the colonial forces during the पहला stages of the French and Indian War.
चुनी by the दूसरी महाद्वीपीय कॉंग्रेस in 1775 to be commander-in-chief of the महाद्वीपीय फौज in the American क्रान्ति, Washington प्रबंधित to force the British आउट of Boston in 1776, but थी defeated and almost captured later कि year जब he खोया New York नगर.
After crossing the डेलावेयर नदी in the मुर्दे of winter, he पराजित the British in two लड़ाइयों, retook New Jersey and restored आवेग to the Patriot cause.
Because of his रणनीति, Revolutionary forces captured two major British सेना at साराटोगा in 1777 और yorktown in 1781.
इतिहासकारों laud वॉशिंगटन for उसके selection and supervision of उसके generals, प्रोत्साहन of मनोबल and ability to थाम together the army, समन्वय with the state राज्यपालों and state militia units, relations साथ Congress और attention to supplies, लोजिस्टिक्स, और training.
in battle, however, Washington was repeatedly outmaneuvered by अंग्रेजों generals with larger armies.
बाद victory had been finalized in 1783, वॉशिंगटन resigned as Commander-in-chief rather than seize शक्ति, proving उसके opposition to तानाशाही और उसके प्रतिबद्धता to अमरीकी republicanism.
Dissatisfied with the weaknesses of the Articles of Confederation, in 1787 वॉशिंगटन presided over the Constitutional Convention that drafted the United States संविधान.
निर्वाचित unanimously as the first अध्यक्ष of the संयुक्त राज्य in 1789, he attempted to bring प्रतिद्वंद्वी factions together to unify the nation.
He supported सिकंदर Hamilton 's कार्यक्रम to pay off सब राज्य and नेशनल कर्ज़, to implement an effective tax प्रणाली और to बनाएँ a नेशनल बैंको ( despite opposition from Thomas जेफरसन ).
Washington proclaimed the United राज्य न्यूट्रल in the wars raging in Europe after 1793.
He avoided युद्ध with ग्रेट Britain and guaranteed a decade of peace and profitable trade by securing the jay Treaty in 1795, despite तीव्र opposition from the Jeffersonians.
Although never officially joining the Federalist पार्टी, he supported its कार्यक्रम.
वॉशिंगटन 's विदाई Address was an influential primer on republican virtue and a warning against partisanship, sectionalism, और भागीदारी in foreign wars.
he retired from the प्रेसिडेंसी in 1797 and लौटे to उसके home, माउंट Vernon, और his घरेलू life where he managed a किस्में of enterprises.
He freed all his स्लेव by his final होगा.
Washington था a vision of a great and शक्तिशाली nation that होता be निर्मित on रिपब्लिकन lines using federal शक्ति.
He sought to उपयोग the नेशनल सरकारी to बचाना liberty, improve अवसंरचना, open the western lands, प्रचार commerce, found a स्थाई पूंजी, reduce क्षेत्रीय तनाव और promote a spirit of American nationalism.
at his death, Washington was eulogized as `` पहला in war, first in peace, और पहला in the hearts of उसके देशवासियों '' by हेनरी Lee.
The federalists बना उसे the symbol of their पार्टी but लिये अनेक years, the Jeffersonians continued to अविश्वास his influence and delayed building the Washington Monument.
as the leader of the first कामयाब revolution विरूद्ध a औपनिवेशिक साम्राज्य in संसार history, वॉशिंगटन became an अंतरराष्ट्रीय icon for liberation और nationalism, especially in France and Latin America.
Fiscal साल 2012 U.S. Federal बिता – नकदी or Budget Basis.
Fiscal Year 2012 u.S. Federal Receipts.
The Budget of the संयुक्त States सरकारी often begins as the अध्यक्ष 's प्रस्ताव to the U.S. कॉंग्रेस जिससे अनुशंसा funding स्तर for the next fiscal year, beginning October 1.
However, कॉंग्रेस is the देह required by law to pass a budget annually and to submit the बजट passed by दोनो houses to the अध्यक्ष for हस्ताक्षर.
Congressional निर्णय हैं governed by rules और विधान regarding the संघीय budget process.
Budget committees set spending limits for the House and सीनेट समितियों और लिये appropriations subcommittees, which then स्वीकृति individual appropriations बिल्स to allocate funding to विभिन्न federal कार्यक्रम.
If कॉंग्रेस fails to pass an सालाना बजट ( as रै महरूम the case चूंकि 2009 ), a श्रेणी of Appropriations bills जरूर be passed as `` रोकें gap '' उपायों.
बाद कॉंग्रेस approves an appropriations विधेयक, it is sent to the President, who may चिह्न it into विधि, or may वीटो it ( as he होता a बजट जब passed by the कॉंग्रेस ).
a vetoed विधेयक is sent back to Congress, which can pass it into law साथ a two-thirds majority in each कक्ष.
Congress may also combine सब or some appropriations bills into an omnibus reconciliation bill.
in addition, the president may request and the Congress may pass supplemental appropriations bills or emergency supplemental appropriations bills.
Several government agencies provide budget आंकड़ा और विश्लेषण.
ये include the Government Accountability Office ( GAO ), congressional बजट Office, the दफ्तर of प्रबन्धन and बजट ( OMB ) and the u.S. राजकोष Department.
ये एजेंसियों have reported that the federal government is facing a श्रेणी of महत्वपूर्ण financing challenges.
in the short-run, tax revenues have declined significantly due to a severe recession and tax नीति choices, जबकि expenditures have विस्तारित for wars, बेरोजगारी बीमे and अन्य safety जाल spending.
In the long-run, expenditures related to healthcare कार्यक्रम ऐसे as medicare और Medicaid हैं projected to grow तेज़ than the अर्थव्यवस्था overall as the जनसांख्यिकी matures.
नई गिनी ( also, Tok पिसिन : niugini, Dutch : nieuw Guinea, और ; historically : Papua ) is the world 's second largest द्वीप, after ग्रीनलैंड, covering a जमीन क्षेत्रफल of 786,000 km2.
Located in the southwest Pacific Ocean, it झूठ geographically to the east of the मलय Archipelago, with जिससे it is sometimes included as भाग of a greater indo-australian द्वीपसमूह.
Geologically it is a part of the same tectonic थाली as Australia.
When संसार समुद्र levels यहूद low, the two shared shorelines ( जिससे now lie 100 to 140 metres below समुद्र level ), combining with lands अभी inundated into the tectonic continent of sahul, भी ज्ञात as Greater Australia.
the two landmasses became separated when the area now known as the Torres जलसन्धि flooded after the end of the last glacial period.
anthropologically, New Guinea is considered भाग of Melanesia.
Politically, the western हाफ of the द्वीप comprises two इंडोनेशियाई प्रांतों : Papua और वेस्ट Papua.
The पूर्वी half forms the मेनलैंड of the country of Papua New गिनी.
The द्वीप has a population of about 7.5 million, with a very कम जनसांख्यिकी density of तभी 8 inh/km2.
New गिनी is differentiated इससे इसके drier, flatter, और कम fertile दक्षिणी counterpart, Australia, by its much उच्चतर वर्षा and its क्रियाशील volcanic geology, with its उच्चतम point, Puncak Jaya, reaching an उन्नयन of 4,884 m ( 16,023 ft ).
Yet the दो जमीन masses share a similar animal fauna, साथ marsupials, सहित wallabies and possums, and the egg-laying monotreme, the spiny anteater, or एकिडना.
Other than bats and some two dozen स्वदेशी rodent genera, there हैं no pre-human indigenous placental mammals.
सूअर, several additional प्रजाति of rats, and the पूर्वज of the नई Guinea Singing Dog were introduced with human colonization.
the इंसान presence on the island dates back at least 40,000 years to the oldest human migrations out of अफ़्रीकी.
Research indicates कि the हाइलैंड्स were an early and independent center of कृषि, साथ evidence of सिंचाई going back at least 10,000 सालो.
क्युकी of the समय depth of इसके inhabitation और इसके highly fractured लैंडस्केप, an unusually ऊँची number of languages are बोला on the द्वीप, with some 1,000 languages ( a figure higher than कि of सबसे महाद्वीपों ) having महरूम catalogued out of an अनुमानित world-wide pre-Columbian total of 6,000 इंसान dialects.
सबसे are classified as Papuan languages, a generally accepted geographical term which a minority of authors hold to be a जेनेटिक एक.
a number of Austronesian languages are बोला on the coast and on offshore islands.
In the 16th सदी स्पेनी explorers खोजा the द्वीप and पुकारा it नुएवा गिनी.
In हाल इतिहास पश्चिमी New Guinea थी included in the Dutch ईस्ट Indies उपनिवेश.
The germans annexed the उत्तरी coast of the पूर्वी half of the island as जर्मनी New Guinea in their pre–World War I effort to establish themselves as a औपनिवेशिक शक्ति, whilst the south पूर्वी portion was reluctantly claimed by Britain.
Following the सन्धि of Versailles, the German portion was awarded to ऑस्ट्रेलिया ( जिससे was already governing the British claim, named the territory of पापुआ ) as a League of Nations mandate.
The पूर्वी हाफ of the द्वीप थी granted independence from Australia as पापुआ नई Guinea in 1975.
the पश्चिमी हाफ gained स्वतंत्रता इससे the डच in 1961, लकिन became भाग of इंडोनेशिया soon afterwards in विवादास्पद हालातों.
`` the वैन Buren Boys '' is the 148th episode of the sitcom seinfeld, and नाम of a fictional New York street गिरोह.
उनके sign is क्रासिंग the हैंड्स, with one hand साथ सब the उंगलियाँ 'up ' और spread आउट.
the अन्य हाथ has सब but the अंगूठा and सूचक finger up, लिये a कुल of आठ ( 8 ).
The गिरोह is नामित for the 8th अध्यक्ष of the United States, Martin वैन buren ( who थी the first अध्यक्ष इससे New यॉर्क ).
This was the 14th एपीसोड for the 8th season.
it aired on February 6, 1997.
Bevo चिह्न
Bevo was a non-alcoholic malt पेय, or निकट beer, brewed in the संयुक्त States by the Anheuser-Busch company शुरूआत in the जल्दी 20th सदी.
bevo enjoyed its महानतम success during the समय of निषेध, when beer, wine और आसुत liquors, यहूद made illegal for thirteen years.
the anheuser-busch company started brewing Bevo when alcoholic beverages were निषिद्ध in 1916 by the संयुक्त States हथियारबंद शक्तियां.
Production rose greatly with national prohibition in 1919, and Bevo was by far the सबसे popular of the अनेक `` cereal beverages '' or `` निकट beers '' of the time.
At the शिखर of इसके लोकप्रियता in the early 1920s, अधिक than पाँच लाख cases of bevo were sold annually.
renard with a मग of Bevo, depicted in टेरा cotta on the आंतरिक दीवारें of the bevo भवन, St. Louis
Labels on the बोतलों billed it as `` Bevo the पेय ''.
The name `` Bevo '' थी coined इससे the शब्द `` beverage '' और the Slavic language word लिये बियर `` pivo '', और was pronounced `` Bee-vo ''.
Some Bevo विज्ञापन featured the अक्षर `` Renard the Fox `` ( based on the protagonist of a मध्यकालीन फ्रेंच folk-tale ), and promotional mugs साथ इस character were manufactured.
In 1930 anheuser-busch built a श्रेणी of boat-bodied cars in इसके St. लुई shops पुकारा the `` bevo Boats '' which यहूद प्रयुक्त for प्रमोशन.
सात हैं believed to have been built on pierce-arrow 8-cylinder chassis while एक surviving उदाहरण थी based upon 1930 Cadillac 353 V8.
बिलबोर्ड advertising bevo in trenton, New जर्सी, 1917
a contemporary advertisement read `` कूलिंग और invigorating, Bevo the Beverage.
Order by the मामला इससे your grocer, druggist, or dealer. ''
The पेपर label on the वापस of the bottle read `` the all-year-round Soft Drink.
appetizing - Healthful - Nutritious - Refreshing.
मिल्क or water may contain bacteria.
bevo never does. ''
Bevo became भाग of the लोकप्रिय culture of the time, and is mentioned in विभिन्न popular songs और Vaudeville skits of the era.
This led to द्वितीयक slang uses of the शब्द ; for उदाहरण, in American सैन्य slang a young और inexperienced officer was पुकारा a `` Bevo ''.
The विश्वविद्यालयों of Texas नामित its शुभंकर `` Bevo '', a नाम जिससे रै stuck to this दिन.
इरविंग Berlin शामिल a paean to the drink, `` You Ca n't Stay Up on bevo '', in उसके 1917 army revue, Yip यिप Yaphank.
in the late 1920s smuggled bootleg बियर और liquor as well as `` homebrew ``, काटें into Bevo 's marketshare.
साथ sales flattening to 100,000 cases by 1929, Anheuser-Busch stopped production.
The bevo मिल, st. लुई, in 2008
The Bevo building, with the Renard अक्षर prominently प्रदर्शित at the corners, still operates as a bottling facility at उनके main ब्रेवरी in st. लुई, Missouri.
The landmark Bevo Mill, constructed by August Anheuser Busch, Sr. in 1917.
it was closed in 2009, but it reopened in October 2009 under new owners.
Bevo is also mentioned in the छोटी स्टोरी `` The Killers `` by अर्नेस्ट Hemingway ; as well as in babbitt by Sinclair Lewis.
Mylanta is an over the counter medication प्रयुक्त लिये the उपचार of एसिड reflux, heartburn, and gastroesophageal reflux disease ( भी known as GERD ).
foremilk and Hindmilk samples of human breast मिल्क
A glass of pasteurized गाय milk
Milk is a white liquid produced by the mammary glands of mammals.
It is the primary सोर्स of nutrition लिये यंग mammals before they हैं समर्थ to डाइजेस्ट other प्रकार of food.
अर्लy- lactation मिल्क contains colostrum, जिससे carries the माँ 's antibodies to the baby and can reduce the रिस्क of अनेक diseases in the baby.
It भी contains many अन्य nutrients.
as an agricultural product, milk is extracted इससे mammals और प्रयुक्त as food for इंसानो.
विश्वव्यापी, dairy खेतो produced परिचय 730 million टन of milk in 2011.
India is the world 's largest निर्माता और consumer of मिल्क, yet neither exports nor imports milk.
New जीलैंड, the यूरोपीय संघ 's 27 member states, Australia, and the United States are the world 's largest exporters of milk and मिल्क उत्पाद.
चीन और Russia are the world 's largest importers of milk and मिल्क products.
Throughout the world, वहीँ हैं more than 6 अरब consumers of मिल्क and मिल्क products.
Over 750 लाख people सजीव within dairy farming households.
Milk is a key contributor to improving nutrition और खाना सुरक्षा particularly in developing देशों.
Improvements in पशुधन और dairy प्रौद्योगिकी offer significant promise in reducing poverty और malnutrition in the संसार.
Motorcycle speedway, प्रायः referred to as speedway, is a motorcycle sport involving चार और sometimes up to six राइडर्स competing over four anti-clockwise गोद of an ओवल circuit.
स्पीडवे मोटरसाइकिल use only एक gear और have no brakes and रेसिंग takes प्लेस on a flat oval track प्रायः consisting of मैल or loosely packed shale.
प्रतिस्पर्धी use this surface to स्लाइड their मशीने बगलों, powersliding or broadsiding into the bends.
on the straight भाग of the track the मोटरसाइकिल reach speeds of up.
The exact origins of the sport हैं unknown but वहीँ is evidence of a प्रकार of स्पीडवे racing होने practised in the USA पहले the पहला World युद्ध और in ऑस्ट्रेलिया in the late 1910s and early 1920s.
वहीँ हैं now दोनो घरेलू and international competitions in a number of countries including the Speedway World Cup whilst the highest overall scoring individual in the Speedway Grand प्रिक्स कार्यक्रम is pronounced the world चैंपियन.
Speedway is लोकप्रिय in central and northern यूरोपीय and to a lesser extent in Australia और North अमेरिका.
A variant of track racing, speedway is administered internationally by the Fédération Internationale de motocyclisme ( FIM ).
Domestic स्पीडवे events हैं regulated by fim affiliated national मोटर sport federations.
Vitamin d is a group of fat-soluble secosteroids जिम्मेदार लिये intestinal अवशोषण of कैल्सियम और phosphate.
In humans, the सबसे महत्वपूर्ण सम्बन्धित यौगिकों of विटामिन D are विटामिन D2 and विटामिन D3.
cholecalciferol ( vitamin D3 ) and ergocalciferol ( विटामिन D2 ) हैं अद्वितीय as they constitute what we know as विटामिन d and can be ingested from the आहार and/or पूरक.
The body can भी synthesize vitamin D ( इससे कोलेस्ट्रॉल ) जब sun एक्सपोज़र is पर्याप्त ( hence its उपनाम, the `` सनशाइन vitamin '' ).
हालांकि vitamin D is commonly called a vitamin, it is not दरअसल an अनिवार्य dietary विटामिन in the सख्त sense, as it can be synthesized in adequate amounts by most mammals exposed to sunlight.
( बिल्लियों और कुत्तो can not synthesize vitamin D efficiently and must receive it in उनके आहार. )
an organic chemical compound ( or related set of compounds ) is तभी scientifically पुकारा a विटामिन when it can नहीं be synthesized in sufficient quantities by an सजीव, और must be प्राप्त from their diet.
however, as with other compounds commonly पुकारा विटामिन, vitamin D was discovered in an प्रयत्न to ढूँढें the dietary पदार्थ that was lacking in a disease, namely, rickets, the बाल्यकाल रूप of osteomalacia.
additionally, like other यौगिकों called विटामिन, in the developed संसार vitamin D is added to staple foods, such as मिल्क, to avoid disease due to deficiency.
Measures of serum levels प्रतिबिंबित endogenous संश्लेषण इससे exposure to sunlight as well as सेवन इससे the diet, and it is believed that संश्लेषण may योगदान generally to the maintenance of पर्याप्त serum एकाग्रता.
the प्रमाण indicates that the synthesis of विटामिन D इससे सूर्य एक्सपोज़र works in a feedback लूप कि prevents toxicity but, because of uncertainty परिचय the कर्कट risk from धूप, no recommendations हैं issued by the संस्थान of आयुर्विज्ञान, यूएसए, लिये the amount of sun एक्सपोज़र required to मिलें vitamin D आवश्यकताएँ.
तदनुसार, the dietary सन्दर्भ intakes लिये vitamin D assume that no synthesis occurs and कि all of a व्यक्ति 's विटामिन D is from उनके diet, हालांकि that होगा rarely occur in practice.
in the liver vitamin D is converted to calcidiol, जिससे is also known as calcifediol ( INN ), 25-hydroxycholecalciferol, or 25-hydroxyvitamin D—abbreviated 25 ( OH ) D ; and which is the विशिष्ट विटामिन D metabolite कि is measured in serum to determine a व्यक्ति 's vitamin d औकात.
Part of the calcidiol is परिवर्तित by the kidneys to calcitriol, the biologically active रूप of विटामिन D. Calcitriol circulates as a hormone in the रक्त, regulating the concentration of calcium and फास्फेट in the bloodstream और promoting the स्वस्थ growth and remodeling of अस्थि.
calcidiol is also परिवर्तित to calcitriol outside of the गुर्दे for other उद्देश्य, ऐसे as the proliferation, differentiation and apoptosis of कोशिकाएं ; calcitriol also affects neuromuscular function and inflammation.
Beyond इसके use to prevent osteomalacia or rickets, the evidence लिये other स्वास्थ्य effects of विटामिन D supplementation in the general population is असंगत.
the बेहतरीन evidence of लाभ is लिये अस्थि स्वास्थ्य और a decrease in mortality in elderly महिलाओं.

Propolis is a resinous mixture कि honey मधुमक्खियों collect इससे पेड़ buds, sap बहती, or other वनस्पति sources.
it is used as a sealant for unwanted open spaces in the छत्ता.
Propolis is प्रयुक्त for small गैप ( approximately or less ), जबकि larger स्पेसेस are प्रायः filled साथ beeswax.
Its color varies depending on इसके वनस्पति source, the most common being dark brown.
Propolis is sticky at and ऊपर room temperature,.
at lower temperatures, it becomes मुश्किल and बहुत भंगुर.

He is ज्ञात as the `` Demon of Screamin ' '' due to his high चिल्लाती और his wide vocal range.
He is भी ज्ञात for उसके on-stage acrobatics.
During his high-energy performances, he usually पोशाक in bright, colorful outfits with उसके ट्रेडमार्क स्कार्फ hanging from उसके microphone stand.
In the 1970s, टायलर rose to prominence as the frontman of एरोस्मिथ, which released such milestone hard rock albums as खिलौने in the Attic और Rocks.
in the late 1970s and early 1980s, टायलर था a heavy drug and alcohol व्यसन, और the band 's popularity waned.
he completed drug rehabilitation in 1986 and subsequently maintained sobriety for over 20 सालो, but had a relapse with prescription painkillers in the late 2000s, लिये जिससे he successfully received उपचार in 2009.
After Aerosmith शुभारम्भ a remarkable वापसी in the लेट 1980s and जल्दी 1990s with the albums स्थाई अवकाश, पंप, and Get a पकड़, टायलर became a household नाम और has remained a relevant rock icon.
As a result, he has since embarked on several solo endeavors including guest दिखावे on other artists ' म्यूज़िक, film and tv roles ( सहित as a न्यायधीश on American आइडल ), authoring a bestselling किताब, and solo work ( सहित a शीर्ष 40 hit सिंगल in 2011 ).
However, he has जारी to रिकार्ड music and perform with Aerosmith, after more than 43 सालो in the band.

The जिगर produces urea in the urea cycle as a बर्बाद product of the digestion of protein.
Normal इंसान adult रक्त चाहिए contain between 7 to 21 mg of यूरिया nitrogen प्रति 100 ml ( 7–21 mg/ dL ) of blood.
