The यहूदियों ( आईएसओ 259-3 Israeli pronunciation ), also known as the Jewish लोगों, are a nation and an ethnoreligious group, originating in the israelites or hebrews of the Ancient निकट East.
the Jewish नस्ल, nationality, और religion are strongly interrelated, as Judaism is the traditional faith of the यहूदी स्वदेश.
converts to judaism, जिनकी status as Jews within the Jewish ethnos is equal to those born into it, have महरूम absorbed into the Jewish people throughout the सहस्राब्दियों.
in यहूदी tradition, Jewish ancestry is traced to the Biblical patriarchs Abraham, Isaac and Jacob in the second मिलेनियम BCE.
The modern राज्य of Israel थी established as a Jewish nation-state, और defines itself as such in its मौलिक कानून.
इसके विधि of Return अनुदान the right of citizenship to any jew जो निवेदन it.
Israel is the only country where यहूदियों are a बहुमत of the जनसांख्यिकी.
Jews भी enjoyed political स्वायत्तता twice before in ancient history.
The first of ये periods lasted from 1350 to 586 BCE, और encompassed the अवधि of the न्यायाधीशों, the संयुक्त साम्राज्य, and the Divided Monarchy of the kingdoms of Israel and यहूदा, ending with the विनाश of the First टेम्पल.
The दूसरी was the काल of the Hasmonean किंगडम spanning इससे 140 to 37 BCE.
Since the विनाश of the First टेम्पल, most यहूदियों have जिया in diaspora.
A minority in every country in which वे सजीव ( except Israel ), वे have frequently अनुभवी persecution throughout इतिहास, resulting in a जनसांख्यिकी that रै fluctuated both in numbers and distribution over the सदियां.
the world यहूदी जनसांख्यिकी पहुँचे a peak of 15 million prior to the दूसरी World युद्ध, but छह million यहूदियों were killed in the holocaust.
Since तब the population has risen again and, थी estimated at 13.4 million by the उत्तर American Jewish Data Bank, or कम than 0.2 % of the total world जनसांख्यिकी ( roughly one in every 514 people ).
according to इस रपट, about 42.5 % of सब यहूदियों reside in Israel ( 5.7 million ), और 39.3 % in the United States ( 5.3 million ), with सबसे of the remainder living in Europe ( 1.5 लाख ) and कनाडा ( 0.4 million ).
These numbers include सब those जो consider themselves यहूदियों, whether or not they are संबद्ध साथ a यहूदी organization.
The total world Jewish population, however, is difficult to माप.
In addition to issues with census methodology, वहीँ are halakhic disputes regarding जो is a jew and secular, राजनैतिक, और ancestral पहचान factors that may affect the फिगर considerably.
Corpus Christi बारात.
आयल on कैनवास by Carl एमिल Doepler.
Corpus Domini redirects here.
For अन्य उपयोग देखिए Corpus domini ( बहुविकल्पी )
The Feast of Corpus Christi ( लैटिन लिये Body of Christ ), also known as कॉर्पस Domini, is a लैटिन Rite liturgical solemnity celebrating the tradition और belief in the देह और blood of Jesus मसीह and his रियल Presence in the Eucharist.
it emphasizes the आनन्द of the institution of the Eucharist, जिससे was observed on पावन गुरुवार in the somber atmosphere of the nearness of शुभ Friday.
in the present Roman Missal, the feast is designated the solemnity of The Most Holy Body and रक्त of Christ.
it is also मनाये in some anglican, Lutheran, और Old कैथोलिक चर्च that थाम समान beliefs regarding the रियल उपस्थिति.
The feast is liturgically celebrated on the गुरुवार बाद ट्रिनिटी Sunday or, `` where the solemnity of the Most Holy Body and रक्त of मसीह is not a Holy दिन of दायित्व, it is assigned to the संडे after the Most पावन ट्रिनिटी as इसके उचित day ''.
At the समाप्त of Holy द्रव्यमान, there is often a बारात of the Blessed Sacrament, generally प्रदर्शित in a monstrance.
The procession is followed by Benediction of the धन्य Sacrament.
A notable Eucharistic procession is कि presided over by the Pope each year in Rome, where it begins at the Archbasilica of St. John lateran and makes its way to the basilica of Saint Mary Major, where it concludes with Benediction.
C-reactive protein ( CRP ) is a protein मिला in the रक्त, the levels of which वृद्धि in response to inflammation ( i.e. C-reactive protein is an acute-phase protein ).
Its physiological role is to bind to phosphocholine expressed on the surface of मुर्दे or dying कोशिकाएं ( and कुछ types of bacteria ) in अनुक्रम to activate the complement system via the C1Q जटिल.
CRP is synthesized by the liver in response to factors released by macrophages and मोटे cells ( adipocytes ).
It is a सदस्य of the pentraxin परिवार of प्रोटीन.
It is not related to C-peptide or प्रोटीन c.
c-reactive protein was the first पैटर्न मान्यता receptor ( PRR ) to be identified.
The start of the systematic यूरोपीय colonization of the Americas is typically dated to 1492, when a Spanish expedition headed by Christopher कोलंबस sailed लिये India to खोलें व्यापार लकिन inadvertently discovered the Americas.
European conquest, large-scale खोजी and colonization soon followed.
Seeing that यूरोपीय was preoccupied with अनेक आतंरिक wars and थी slowly recovering from the अनेक मौतों कि the bubonic plague caused, the rapid विस्तार at जिससे it grew in माल और power was unforeseeable in the जल्दी 1400s.
The first रिझाने occurred साथ the caribbean coasts on the islands of Hispaniola, प्यूर्टो Rico and Cuba, और after 1500 extended into the interiors of both उत्तर और South अमेरिका.
In 1497, sailing from the north on behalf of England, John Cabot उतरा on the North American coast, and a year बाद, कोलंबस 's third voyage reached the दक्षिण अमरीकी coast.
फ़्रांस संस्थापित colonies in much of eastern North America, on a number of caribbean islands, और in दक्षिण अमेरिका.
Portugal colonized Brazil.
आखिरकार, the entire Western गोलार्ध came under the control of European सरकारें, अग्रणी to profound changes to its लैंडस्केप, population, और संयंत्र and animal जीवन.
In the 19th सदी alone over 50 लाख लोगों बाएँ यूरोपीय for the Americas.
The post-1492 era is ज्ञात as the काल of the Columbian एक्सचेंज.
Keith रिचर्ड्स ( born 18 December 1943 ) is an English संगीतकार, singer-songwriter and संस्थापक member of the अंग्रेज़ी rock band the Rolling पत्थरों.
रोलिंग स्टोन magazine कहा Richards had निर्मित `` rock 's greatest single body of riffs '', ranking उसे 4th on इसके list of 100 बेहतरीन guitarists.
चौदह songs Richards wrote with the रोलिंग Stones ' lead vocalist Mick जैगर are सूचीबद्ध among रोलिंग स्टोन पत्रिका 's `` 500 Greatest गीतों of सब समय ``.
रिचर्ड्स ' सुर्खी लिये illicit drug उपयोग stems in part from several drug busts दौरान the late 1960s और 1970s and उसके candour regarding उसके addiction to and eventual abstinence from heroin.
Testosterone is a steroid हार्मोन इससे the androgen group and is found in स्तनधारियों, reptiles, पक्षियों, and अन्य vertebrates.
In स्तनधारियों, testosterone is primarily secreted in the अंडकोष of males and the अंडाशय of females, although small amounts हैं also secreted by the adrenal glands.
It is the principal पुरूष sex hormone और an anabolic steroid.
in men, टेस्टोस्टेरोन plays a key role in the development of पुरूष reproductive tissues such as the testis and प्रोस्टेट as well as promoting secondary यौन विशेषताएँ ऐसे as increased मांसपेशी, bone द्रव्यमान, और the growth of देह बाल.
In जोड, testosterone is essential for health और well-being as well as the prevention of ऑस्टियोपोरोसिस.
on average, in adult इंसान males, the प्लाज्मा विशेषज्ञता of टेस्टोस्टेरोन is परिचय 7–8 टाइम्स as great as the concentration in वयस्क human females ' plasma, but as the metabolic खपत of टेस्टोस्टेरोन in males is greater, the daily उत्पादन is about 20 टाइम्स वृहद in men.
Females also हैं more sensitive to the hormone.
Testosterone is observed in सबसे vertebrates.
Fish मेक a slightly different form पुकारा 11-ketotestosterone.
इसके बंटवारा in कीट is ecdysone.
These ubiquitous steroids सुझाएँ that sex हार्मोन have an ancient evolutionary इतिहास.
Cluster sampling is a sampling technique used जब `` प्राकृतिक '' but relatively समरूप groupings हैं evident in a सांख्यिकीय population.
It is often used in marketing research.
In this technique, the total population is विभाजित into ये groups ( or क्लस्टर ) and a simple यादृच्छिक नमूना of the समूह is चयनित.
तब the required सूचना is collected from a simple random sample of the elements within each selected समूह.
This may be done for every element in ये groups or a subsample of elements may be चयनित within each of ये groups.
A common प्रेरणा for cluster sampling is to reduce the कुल क्रमांक of interviews और costs दिए the desired accuracy.
Assuming a fixed नमूना आकार, the तकनीक gives अधिक सटीक परिणाम when सबसे of the variation in the population is भीतर the समूह, not between them.

the population was 3,382 at the 2010 census.
Natalie Portman ( born नताली hershlag ; ; जून 9, 1981 ) is an actress और model साथ dual अमरीकी and Israeli citizenship.

She completed उसके bachelor 's degree in 2003.

In 2005, Portman received a नामांकन for the अकादमी Award for बेहतरीन Supporting अभिनेत्री and won the सुनहरी Globe पुरस्कार for बेहतरीन supporting Actress - Motion Picture for the drama करीब.
वो जीती a नक्षत्र पुरस्कार for Best Female Performance and a Saturn Award for बेहतरीन Actress लिये her अभिनीत role in v लिये वेंडेट्टा ( 2006 ).
She played अग्रणी roles in the historical dramas गोया 's Ghosts ( 2006 ) and the Other बोलिन Girl ( 2008 ).

तांबे is a chemical तत्व with the symbol Cu ( from ) और atomic number 29.
it is a ductile metal with very high thermal and विद्युत conductivity.
Pure copper is नरम and malleable ; a freshly exposed सतह रै a reddish-orange color.
It is प्रयुक्त as a कंडक्टर of heat और electricity, a भवन सामग्री, and a constituent of various मेटल alloys.
the metal and its alloys have been used for thousands of years.
In the रोमन era, तांबे थी principally mined on Cyprus, hence the उत्पत्ति of the नाम of the मेटल as сyprium ( metal of साइप्रस ), later shortened to сuprum.
इसके यौगिकों हैं commonly encountered as copper ( II ) salts, which प्रायः impart blue or green रंगों to खनिज such as azurite and फ़िरोज़ा और have महरूम widely प्रयुक्त historically as pigments.
Architectural structures built with तांबे corrode to दे ग्रीन verdigris ( or patina ).
Decorative आर्ट prominently features तांबे, both by itself and as part of pigments.
तांबे is essential to सब जीना organisms as a trace dietary खनिज because it is a key constituent of the respiratory enzyme जटिल cytochrome c oxidase.
In molluscs and crustacea copper is a constituent of the blood pigment hemocyanin, which is replaced by the iron-complexed हीमोग्लोबिन in fish and other vertebrates.
The प्रमुख क्षेत्रों जहाँ copper is मिला in vertebrates are liver, मांसपेशी and bone.
In sufficient विशेषज्ञता, copper compounds are poisonous to उच्चतर organisms और are used as bacteriostatic substances, fungicides, और wood preservatives.
The प्रमुख professional sports लीग, or बस प्रमुख leagues, in the United राज्य और Canada हैं the highest पेशेवर competitions of team sports in the two देशों.
Although individual खेल such as golf, tennis, और स्वचालित racing are also बहुत popular, the term is प्रायः limited to टोली sports.
The term `` प्रमुख league '' was first used in 1921 in reference to Major लीग बेसबॉल ( MLB ), the शीर्ष level of professional अमरीकी बेसबॉल.
आज, the major उत्तरी North America पेशेवर टोली sports leagues हैं प्रमुख लीग बेसबॉल ( MLB ), the National Basketball Association ( NBA ), the National Football लीग ( NFL ), और the National हॉकी League ( एनएचएल ).
अन्य notable लीग शामिल प्रमुख लीग Soccer ( MLS ), the कनाडाई फ़ुटबॉल League ( cfl ), the Arena फ़ुटबॉल लीग, Major League lacrosse, the National lacrosse League and the महिलाओं 's National बास्केट Association.
The NFL, एमएलबी, NBA, and NHL हैं commonly referred to as the Big Four.
Each of ये is the richest professional club competition in its खेल worldwide.
The बेहतरीन players can become cultural icons in both countries and elsewhere in the world, because the लीग आनंद a significant place in लोकप्रिय culture in the US और Canada.
The NFL has 32 टीमों, and the others have 30 each.
The vast majority of major league टीमों हैं concentrated in the most populous metropolitan areas of the संयुक्त States.
Baseball, football, हॉकी, and soccer have था professional leagues for over 100 years ; जल्दी लीग ऐसे as the National Association, ओहियो League, and National हॉकी Association formed the basis of the modern एमएलबी, एनएफएल और एनएचएल respectively.
Soccer was पहला professionalized in 1894, but leagues suffered greatly from lack of स्थिरता और seldom lasted अधिक than a decade.
सॉकर 's महानतम successes यहूद in the रूप of the American सॉकर लीग ( 1921-1933 ), the असली North अमरीकी सॉकर League ( 1968-1984 ), the National Professional Soccer League ( 1984-2001 ) and, currently, प्रमुख League Soccer ( 1996-present ).
Basketball is a relatively new विकास ; the एनबीए evolved from the National Basketball लीग and इसके splinter group the Basketball Association of अमेरिका, लेने on its वर्तमान form in 1949.
प्रत्येक major लीग averages 15,000 fans in attendance प्रति खेल or उच्चतर as of 2011.
मध्याह्न Altitude is an खगोलीय navigation method of calculating an observer 's latitude.
Earned value management ( EVM ), or Earned मान project/performance management ( EVPM ) is a प्रोजेक्ट management technique for measuring project प्रदर्शन and progress in an उद्देश्य manner.
Because EVM has the क्षमता to combine measurements of :
scope
अनुसूची
और cost,
in a सिंगल integrated प्रणाली, Earned Value Management is able to provide accurate forecasts of project performance problems, जिससे is an महत्वपूर्ण contribution लिये प्रोजेक्ट management.
Early EVM शोध showed that the क्षेत्रों of planning and control are significantly impacted by इसके use ; और similarly, using the methodology improves both scope परिभाषा as well as the analysis of overall project performance.
More हाल शोध studies have दिखाया that the सिद्धान्त of EVM हैं positive predictors of project success.
Popularity of evm has grown significantly in हाल years beyond government contracting, in which sector its महत्व continues to वृद्धि ( e.g., recent नई dfar नियम ), in part क्युकी EVM can भी surface in and help substantiate अनुबंध विवादों.

Spring is एक of the four conventional temperate seasons, following winter और preceding गर्मियाँ.
वहीँ are विभिन्न technical परिभाषाएं of वसन्त, but local usage of the term varies according to local जलवायु, cultures and customs.
जब it is वसन्त in the उत्तरी hemisphere, it होगा be पतझड़ in the southern hemisphere.
at the spring equinox, दिनों हैं close to 12 घंटों long with day लंबाई increasing as the ऋतु progresses.
वसन्त और `` springtime '' refer to the ऋतु, and भी to विचार of rebirth, कायाकल्प, नवीकरण, resurrection, and regrowth, साथ festivals such as कार्निवल, Easter and Holi being मनाये at इस time.
Jamestown थी a settlement in the Colony of Virginia, the first permanent English settlement in the Americas.
Established by the Virginia Company of London as `` James Fort '' on May 14, 1607 ( O.S., May 24, 1607 n.s. ), it followed several earlier failed attempts, सहित the खोया Colony of roanoke.
jamestown परोसा as the capital of the colony for 83 सालो, from 1616 until 1699.
the settlement was located भीतर the territory of a political एंटिटी ज्ञात as tsenacommacah, the state of the powhatan Confederacy, साथ around 14,000 देशी निवासियों, and specifically थी in भाग of the subdivision known as the paspahegh tribe.
the natives initially welcomed the colonists साथ नाचना, feasting और tobacco ceremonies, and वे provided crucial provisions और support for the survival of the colonists, who यहूद not agriculturally inclined, although relations with the newcomers also soured fairly early on, अग्रणी to the कुल annihilation of the Paspahegh in warfare within 3 सालो.
Within a year of Jamestown 's founding, the Virginia कम्पनी brought Polish और Dutch colonists to सहायता improve the settlement.
In 1619, the first documented Africans were brought to jamestown, हालांकि the modern धारणा of slavery in the भविष्य संयुक्त States किया not begin in Virginia जबतक 1660.
When the colony थी subdivided into the असली आठ shires of वर्जिनिया in 1634, the town became स्तिथ in the eponymous जेम्स City Shire.
The लंदन कम्पनी 's second settlement, बरमूडा, claims to be the site of the oldest town in the English New World, as St. George 's, Bermuda थी officially established ( as New लंदन ) in 1612, whereas James फोर्ट, in Virginia, was not to be परिवर्तित into जेम्स towne जबतक 1619, और further did not survive into the उपस्थित दिन.
in 1699, the capital was relocated इससे Jamestown to what is today Williamsburg, after जिससे jamestown ceased to exist as a settlement, मौजूदा today only as an archaeological site.
आज, Jamestown is one of तीन स्थितियाँ comprising the Historic त्रिभुज of Colonial Virginia, along with Williamsburg and yorktown, with two primary heritage sites.
Historic Jamestowne, the पुरातत्व site on Jamestown Island, is a cooperative effort by Jamestown National ऐतिहासिक Site ( part of Colonial National ऐतिहासिक पार्क ), और Preservation वर्जिनिया.
The jamestown उपनिवेश, a living history interpretive site, is operated by the jamestown Yorktown Foundation in conjunction साथ the Commonwealth of Virginia.
James क्रिस्टोफर फ्रे ( born September 12, 1969 ) is an अमरीकी writer.
His किताबे A Million Little Pieces ( 2003 ) और My dost Leonard ( 2005 ), as well as Bright चमकदार morning ( 2008 ), यहूद bestsellers.
he was the subject of a scandal जब investigators discovered that prison time and the extent of निश्चित injuries were अतिरंजित in a Million छोटी Pieces, a purportedly autobiographical खाता of the लेखक 's struggle with addiction.
deere & Company, most commonly ज्ञात by its name जॉन Deere, is an अमरीकी corporation based in moline, इलिनोइस, और one of the largest निर्माताओं of agricultural मशीनरी in the संसार.
in 2012, it थी सूचीबद्ध as 97th in the Fortune 500 America 's ranking and 190th in the Fortune 500 Global रैंकिंग.
deere और कम्पनी agricultural products, sold अंतर्गत the John Deere नाम, include tractors, combine harvesters, cotton हार्वेस्टर, balers, planters / seeders, sprayers, और UTVs.
the company is also a निर्माता of निर्माण equipment and वानिकी उपकरण, as खूब as a प्रदायक of डीज़ल इंजन and drivetrains ( axles, transmissions, gearboxes ) प्रयुक्त in heavy उपकरण.
additionally, John Deere manufactures equipment used in लॉन, grounds, and turf care, ऐसे as walk-behind लॉन mowers, zero-turn lawn mowers, लॉन tractors, and snowthrowers.
To support the core व्यवसायों, John Deere also provides वित्तीय services and other सम्बन्धित activities.
the कम्पनी 's slogan is `` nothing रनों Like a Deere '' और रै a picture of a leaping deer as a लोगो, a word play pun on `` nothing runs like a deer ''.
Carl Westby coined the phrase `` Nothing Runs Like a deere '' for a विपणन campaign to sell snowmobiles.
The कम्पनी 's उत्पाद हैं भी identifiable by इसके distinctive शेड of green paint, प्रायः augmented by पीला trim.
The संयुक्त States ten-dollar विधेयक ( $ 10 ) is a denomination of संयुक्त राज्य currency.
The first u.S. सचिव of the Treasury ( 1789–95 ), सिकंदर Hamilton, is currently featured on the obverse of the bill, while the U.S. राजकोष Building is प्रदर्शित on the रिवर्स.
( Hamilton is one of दो non-presidents प्रदर्शित on currently जारी u.S. बिल्स.
the other is Benjamin Franklin, on the $ 100 विधेयक.
हैमिल्टन is एक of only four people featured on u.S. पेपर करेंसी ( 1861 to the present ) जो was नहीं born in the महाद्वीपीय संयुक्त States, as he थी from the West इंडीज.
The others are : Albert gallatin, Switzerland ( $ 500 1862/63 Legal टेंडर ) ; जार्ज Meade, Spain ( $ 1,000 1890/91 Treasury नोट ) ; और Robert मॉरिस, England ( $ 1,000 1862/63 Legal Tender ; $ 10 1878/80 चांदी Certificate ).
In addition, Kamehameha I, appears on the 2008 हवाई state क्वार्टर. )
सब $ 10 bills जारी आज हैं Federal आरक्षित टीप.
The Bureau of Engraving और Printing says the average जीवन of a $ 10 विधेयक in circulation is 18 months before it is replaced due to wear.
लगभग 6 % of सब US banknotes मुद्रित in 2009 were $ 10 bills.
Ten dollar bills are delivered by Federal Reserve Banks in yellow straps.
The सोर्स of the फेस on the $ 10 विधेयक is John Trumbull ’s 1805 portrait of Hamilton कि belongs to the portrait collection of New York City हॉल.
the $ 10 bill is the only u.S. पेपर करेंसी in circulation in which the portrait faces to the left ( the $ 100,000 bill प्रदर्शित a portrait of वुडरो विल्सन facing to the left, लकिन was प्रयुक्त only for intra-government transactions ).
एंडी Samuel ग्रिफ़िथ ( June 1, 1926 – July 3, 2012 ) was an American actor, television निर्माता, Grammy पुरस्कार -winning southern-gospel singer, and writer.
he was a टोनी Award nominee for दो roles, and gained prominence in the starring भूमिका in निदेशक एलिया कज़न 's film A Face in the Crowd ( 1957 ) पहले he became better ज्ञात लिये उसके टेलीविज़न roles, playing the सीसे characters in the 1960–1968 situation comedy the एंडी Griffith Show और in the 1986–1995 legal drama matlock.
टेरेसा पेनेलोप `` terri '' इरविन, ( née raines ; born July 20, 1964 ) is an ऑस्ट्रेलियाई -आधारd, American -born naturalist, लेखक, the widow of Australian naturalist स्टीव Irwin and मालिक of Australia चिड़ियाघर at Beerwah, Queensland, Australia.
She co-starred with her husband on the Crocodile Hunter, उनके unconventional टेलीविज़न nature documentary श्रेणी along with its spin-off श्रेणी, Croc Files and The Crocodile शिकारी Diaries.
She has lived in Australia चूंकि 1992, when she शादीशुदा Steve Irwin.

heliocentrism, or heliocentricism, is the astronomical model in which the धरती और planets revolve around a अपेक्षाकृत stationary Sun at the बीच of the Solar प्रणाली.
The word आता from the यूनानी ( helios `` sun '' और kentron `` बीच '' ).
Historically, heliocentrism was opposed to geocentrism, which placed the धरती at the center.
the notion कि the Earth घूमती around the Sun था been proposed as जल्दी as the 3rd सदी BC by aristarchus of Samos, लकिन Aristarchus 's heliocentrism attracted छोटी attention until कोपरनिकस revived and elaborated it.
Lucio Russo, however, argues that this is a भ्रामक impression resulting from the घाटा of वैज्ञानिक works of the Hellenistic Era.
using अप्रत्यक्ष evidence he argues कि a heliocentric दृश्य was expounded in Hipparchus 's work on gravity.
it थी not until the 16th सदी कि a fully predictive mathematical model of a heliocentric प्रणाली was presented, by the Renaissance mathematician, astronomer, और कैथोलिक cleric nicolaus Copernicus of कैंडल, leading to the Copernican Revolution.
In the following century, Johannes Kepler elaborated upon and expanded this model to शामिल elliptical orbits, and supporting observations बना using a telescope were presented by गैलीलियो गैलिली.
साथ the observations of William हर्शेल, Friedrich bessel, and अन्य, astronomers realized कि the sun was नहीं the center of the universe and by the 1920s Edwin हबल था दिखाया that it थी भाग of a galaxy ( the Milky रास्ता ) that was तभी एक of अनेक billions.
Norah जोन्स ( born Geetali Norah जोन्स शंकर ; March 30, 1979 ) is an American singer-songwriter, pianist, और अभिनेत्री.
वो is the daughter of Indian sitar player Ravi Shankar and मुकदमा जोन्स.
वो is also Anoushka शंकर 's half-sister.
in 2002, she launched उसके solo music career with the रिलीज of the commercially कामयाब and critically acclaimed album आइये Away with me, a fusion of देश music and पॉप साथ तत्व of जैज़ which was certified डायमंड एल्बम, selling over 26 लाख नक़ल.
The record earned Jones five Grammy Awards, including the Album of the साल, रिकार्ड of the Year, और Best New Artist.
Her subsequent studio albums, feels Like Home, released in 2004, नहीं too Late, released in 2007, the same year she बना her film डेब्यू in My Blueberry Nights, और उसके 2009 release the पतन all gained Platinum status, selling over a million copies and were generally well received by आलोचकों.
जोन्स ' fifth studio एल्बम, छोटी Broken Hearts, was released on अप्रैल 27, 2012.
Jones रै जीती nine ग्रैमी Awards और थी 60th on Billboard magazine 's कलाकारों of the 2000–2009 दशक चार्ट.
Throughout her career, Jones has won numerous awards और has sold अधिक than 50 million एल्बम worldwide.
Billboard नामित her the top jazz artist of the 2000–2009 decade.
Not to be confused साथ Dimension of a physical quantity.
For other उपयोग, see Dimension ( disambiguation ).
From left to सही, the square, the घन, and the tesseract.
The वर्गाकार is bounded by 1-dimensional लाइनों, the cube by 2-dimensional क्षेत्रों, और the tesseract by 3-dimensional volumes.
A प्रक्षेप of the cube is given चूंकि it is viewed on a two-dimensional screen.
the वही applies to the tesseract, जिससे additionally can तभी be दिखाया as a प्रक्षेप भी in three-dimensional स्पेस.
a diagram showing the पहला चार spatial आयाम.
In physics और mathematics, the dimension of a स्पेस or object is informally पारिभाषित as the न्यूनतम क्रमांक of निर्देशांक needed to बताएँ any point within it.
यूँ a line रै a dimension of एक because only one निर्देशांक is needed to specify a पाइंट on it ( लिये उदाहरण, the पाइंट at 5 on a क्रमांक line ).
a सतह ऐसे as a प्लेन or the सतह of a cylinder or गोला has a आयाम of two because two coordinates are needed to specify a पाइंट on it ( लिये example, to locate a point on the surface of a sphere you need दोनो its latitude and its longitude ).
The inside of a cube, a cylinder or a sphere is three-dimensional because three coordinates हैं needed to locate a point within ये स्पेसेस.
In शारीरिक terms, आयाम refers to the constituent structure of all स्पेस ( आवाज़ ) and इसके स्थिति in time ( आभास as a अदिश dimension along the t-axis ), as well as the स्थानिक constitution of objects within—structures that correlate साथ दोनो particle and field conceptions, interact according to सापेक्ष properties of द्रव्यमान —and हैं fundamentally mathematical in description.
These, or other axes, may be referenced to uniquely identify a पाइंट or ढांचा in its attitude and संबंध to other objects and occurrences.
Physical theories that incorporate time, such as general आपेक्षिकता, हैं said to work in 4-dimensional `` spacetime ``, ( defined as a Minkowski space ).
Modern theories tend to be `` higher-dimensional '' including quantum field और string theories.
the state-space of क्वांटम यांत्रिकी is an infinite-dimensional function स्पेस.
The अवधारणा of आयाम is नहीं restricted to शारीरिक objects.
High-dimensional स्पेसेस occur in mathematics and the sciences for अनेक कारण, frequently as विन्यास spaces ऐसे as in Lagrangian or हेमिल्टोनीय यांत्रिकी ; these are अमूर्त स्पेसेस, स्वतंत्र of the physical space we सजीव in.
Fontana ( ) is a city of 200,762 residents in सैन bernardino County, कैलिफ़ोर्निया.
Founded in 1913, it remained essentially ग्रामीण until संसार War ii, when entrepreneur हेनरी J. Kaiser built a large steel mill in the area.
It is now a regional hub of the trucking industry, साथ Interstate 10 और State रूट 210 transecting the city इससे ईस्ट to west, और Interstate 15 passing diagonally through इसके northwestern quadrant.
It is home to the largest of the सैन bernardino County प्रणाली libraries, a renovated historic theater, a नगरपालिका park, and the Auto Club Speedway on the site of the कैसर Steel Mill.
fontana also होस्ट the fontana Days Half Marathon and 5K चलाएं.
This रेस is the fastest half-marathon course in the world.
The U.S. 2012 जनसांख्यिकी reported that fontana 's जनसांख्यिकी was 200,762 in 2012, making it the दूसरी सबसे populous नगर in सैन Bernardino काउंटी county और 14th in the राज्य.
Cowboys स्टेडियम is a stadium with a retractable roof in Arlington, Texas.
It serves as the home of the नेशनल फ़ुटबॉल लीग 's डलास cowboys.
It replaced the partially covered Texas Stadium, which opened in 1971, and served as the Cowboys ' घर through the 2008 ऋतु.
It was completed on May 27, 2009.
The स्टेडियम सीटे 85,000, making it the third largest stadium in the NFL by seating capacity.
the maximum capacity of the स्टेडियम, including standing room, is 105,000.
The Party Pass ( open areas ) sections हैं पीछे सीटे in प्रत्येक end zone and on a series of six elevated प्लेटफ़ॉर्म connected by stairways.
It रै the संसार 's largest column-free interior और the fourth largest ऊँची definition video स्क्रीन, जिससे hangs इससे 20 यार्ड लकीर to 20 यार्ड लकीर.
the सुविधा can भी be used for a किस्में of अन्य क्रियाएँ बाहर of इसके main purpose ( पेशेवर फ़ुटबॉल ) such as concerts, basketball games, boxing मिलान, कॉलेज football and ऊँची school फ़ुटबॉल प्रतियोगिताओं, सॉकर matches, and motocross races.
कनाडाई historians until the 1980s tended to फ़ोकस on economic history, including श्रमिक history.
In भाग this is because Canada रै था far कम राजनैतिक or सैन्य विरोध than अन्य societies.
This थी विशेषकर सच्चा in the first हाफ of the twentieth century जब economic इतिहास थी overwhelmingly dominant.
अनेक of the most prominent English Canadian historians इससे इस period were economic इतिहासकारों, ऐसे as हेरोल्ड innis, Donald Creighton and Arthur R. M. Lower
विद्वानों of Canadian history यहूद heirs to the traditions that developed in Europe and the United States, but frameworks कि worked खूब elsewhere often failed in Canada.
The heavily Marxist influenced economic history कि dominates Europe रै little relevance to most of कनाडाई इतिहास.
a फ़ोकस on class, urban क्षेत्रों, और industry fails to address Canada 's ग्रामीण and resource आधारित economy.
Similarly, the monetarist स्कूल that is dominant in the संयुक्त States also रै been मुश्किल to transfer north of the border.
The study of economic इतिहास in कनाडा became अत्यधिक focused on economic geography, and लिये many सालो the dominant school of thought has been the staples लेख.
This school of thought bases the study of the Canadian economy on the study of प्राकृतिक resources.
This approach has since also become used outside of Canada in ऑस्ट्रेलिया and in अनेक विकासशील nations.
पहले the arrival of Europeans, the पहला Nations of what होता become Canada था a विशाल and vibrant व्यापार network.
Furs, टूल्स, decorative items, और other goods यहूद often transported हज़ारों of kilometres, ज़्यादातर by canoe throughout the अनेक rivers and lakes of the region.
the early यूरोपीय history of the कनाडाई economy is usually पढ़ाई through the staples thesis जिससे argues the कनाडाई अर्थव्यवस्था विकसित through the exploitation of a series of staples कि होता be exported to यूरोपीय.
Carbon-14, 14C, or radiocarbon, is a radioactive समस्थानिक of carbon साथ a nucleus containing 6 protons and 8 neutrons.
Its presence in सशुल्क सामग्री is the basis of the radiocarbon डेटिंग विधि pioneered by Willard लिब्बी and सहयोगियों ( 1949 ) to तिथि पुरातत्व, geological and hydrogeological नमूने.
Carbon-14 थी discovered on 27 February 1940, by मार्टिन कामेन and sam Ruben at the विश्वविद्यालयों of कैलिफ़ोर्निया विकिरण Laboratory in Berkeley, हालांकि its existence had been सुझाया by फ्रांज kurie in 1934.
There हैं तीन naturally occurring isotopes of carbon on Earth : 99 % of the कार्बन is carbon-12, 1 % is carbon-13, and carbon-14 occurs in trace amounts, i.e., making up परिचय 1 part per trillion ( 0.0000000001 % ) of the carbon in the माहौल.
The half-life of carbon-14 is 5,730±40 सालो.
Carbon-14 decays into nitrogen-14 through beta क्षय.
The primary natural source of carbon-14 on धरती is लौकिक ray कार्रवाई upon नाइट्रोजन in the माहौल, and it is इसलिए a cosmogenic nuclide.
However, open-air नाभिकीय परीक्षण between 1955–1980 contributed to इस पूल.
The different isotopes of कार्बन do नहीं differ appreciably in their रासायनिक properties.
This is प्रयुक्त in रासायनिक and biological research, in a तकनीक पुकारा carbon labeling : carbon-14 अणु can be प्रयुक्त to replace nonradioactive कार्बन, in order to ट्रेस रासायनिक and biochemical प्रतिक्रियाएँ involving carbon atoms from any given सशुल्क यौगिक.
Lightning is a highly दृश्य form of energy transfer
Lightning हमलों are विद्युत discharges on a विशाल scale between the माहौल and an earth-bound object.
वे mostly originate in thunderclouds और terminate on the मैदान, called बादल to Ground ( CG ) बिजली.
However, they may भी be initiated from a very tall grounded object और पहुँचें into the बादल.
Although `` a बिजली स्ट्राइक '' is commonly प्रयुक्त to describe सब lightning, it is rather ग़लत and a misnomer, as तभी परिचय 25 % of सब बिजली कार्यक्रम विश्वव्यापी हैं CG, the विशाल bulk of lightning कार्यक्रम are Intracloud ( IC ) or Cloud to Cloud ( cc ), where discharge only occurs high in the atmosphere.
the वैज्ञानिक name for the पूरा process of a सिंगल बिजली event is a और it is a very complex, अनेक stepped interaction, which is not completely understood.
Most cg flashes तभी `` स्ट्राइक '' one शारीरिक location, referred to as a termination.
The प्राथमिक conducting channel, the bright coursing light you may see and call a `` strike '', is only about 1 इंच in diameter, हालांकि to our eyes it looks much larger.
They are miles long, upwards of tens of मील.
And the entire flash, lasts तभी a few भिन्नों of a second, most of which is not दृश्य to human eyes.
Thunder is सदा produced by lightning.
बस like बिजली, कि deceives our eyes, usually looking larger or करीब than it really is, the earth 's atmosphere and our brain 's perception of the बाहर संसार, ultimately determines whether it is `` heard '' or not.
बिजली can not happen in a vacuum विहीन of ions, nor can thunder occur without molecules to vibrate.
Thunder is a physical absolute लिये every single फ्लैश of lightning.
Contrary to लोकप्रिय belief, a lightning स्ट्राइक itself is usually not जिम्मेदार लिये अनेक मौतों or injuries from a सिंगल इवेंट.
it would be impossible given the प्राकृतिक tendencies of a फ्लैश, जबतक people or पशु were stacked on शीर्ष of प्रत्येक अन्य, or वे यहूद somehow arranged vertically और part of the flash channel.
When बिजली ignites an available fuel source और an explosion occurs, it is the शॉक वेव or आग causing the injuries, not the strike itself.
Ground Currents, भी पुकारा कदम potential, of an earth termination is कया truly causes सबसे चोटों or death to इंसानो और animals.
The near instantaneous फटाफट of surface charges, induced by the ओवरहेड thundercloud itself, race to the strike पाइंट from hundreds to हज़ारों of feet away दौरान निर्वहन.
इस current, caused during each stroke, takes the path of least प्रतिरोध, which may be ion rich human or एनिमल legs, over poorly conducting earth.
इस is why it is best to crouch, साथ feet close together, if ever caught in the open during a thunderstorm.
Unfortunately, सबसे रिपोर्ट्स do not चित्रण a distinction between the रियल cause of injury or मौत, be it the strike itself, a resulting विस्फोट or fire, or usually responsible step संभावित.
Peter F. kilmartin ( born 1962 ) is the वर्तमान Attorney General of Rhode द्वीप.
Kilmartin is भी a रिटायर्ड पुलिस captain and a former member of the Rhode द्वीप हाउस of Representatives.

sealing is an अध्यादेश ( अनुष्ठान ) performed in Latter दिन Saints temples by a person holding the sealing प्राधिकार.
the purpose of this ordinance is to seal familiar relationships, making possible the existence of family संबंध throughout शाश्वत.
lds teachings प्लेस great महत्व on the specific authority required to perform these sealings.
गिरिजाघर doctrine सिखाती that this प्राधिकार, called the priesthood, corresponds to that given to Saint Peter in.
sealings are typically performed as marriages or as sealing of children to parents.
वे were performed prior to the death of Joseph स्मिथ, Jr. ( the प्रमुख संस्थापक of the latter दिन Saint गति ), and are currently performed in The Church of Jesus मसीह of Latter-day संतो.
Although कुछ other denominations, such as the Community of Christ, दृश्य sealing as an artifact of Smith 's अभ्यास of plural marriage, some do still perform उन्हें.
The 2000s, सुनाया `` two हज़ारों '', was a दशक that began on जनवरी 1, 2000, और ended on December 31, 2009.
वैश्वीकरण, which had accelerated बाद the early 1990s fall of communism, continued to be a force in the 2000s.
the growth of the Internet was एक of the प्रधान contributors to globalization दौरान the दशक, making it possible लिये लोगों to interact with अन्य लोगों, express ideas, introduce others to अलग cultures and पृष्ठभूमि, उपयोग goods और services, sell और buy online, research and learn परिचय things, साथ साथ experiencing the world without having to छोड़ home.
the संस्थानों, linkages और technologies कि emerged or were redefined earlier would subsequently in इस दशक benefit many countries, in particular China और India.
However, in अन्य parts of the world such progress failed to address जारी struggles with modernity, most notably characterized by the वृद्धि of al-qaeda and other इस्लामवादी groups.
The September 11 attacks in 2001 led to the संयुक्त राज्य, United किंगडम, स्पेन, Canada and other राष्ट्र आक्रमणकारी Afghanistan, as खूब as implementing various anti-terrorist measures at home और abroad in what was known as the War on आतंक.
the European संघ देखी further संयोजन और expansion throughout much of Europe.
The economic growth of the 2000s had considerable पर्यावरणीय consequences, raised demand लिये घटाते energy resources, and was स्टिल shown to be vulnerable as demonstrated दौरान the Global Financial Crisis of the लेट 2000s.
The Gunfight at the O.K. corral was a gunfight कि took place at about 3:00 p.m. on Wednesday, October 26, 1881, in tombstone, Arizona Territory, and is generally regarded as the most famous gunfight in the history of the American Old वेस्ट.
The gunfight, believed to have lasted तभी about thirty सेकेंड, थी लड़ा between the गैरकानूनी Cowboys Billy claiborne, आइक और Billy clanton, and tom और फ़्रैंक mclaury, and the opposing town Marshal Virgil Earp and उसके brothers Assistant Town मार्शल मॉर्गन and अस्थाई lawman व्याट, aided by दस्तावेज़ हॉलिडे designated as a temporary marshal by Virgil.
आइक Clanton and बिली Claiborne ran from the लड़ो unharmed, लकिन आइक 's bhai Billy Clanton was मारे, along साथ दोनो McLaurys.
Lawmen वर्जिल and Morgan earp and Doc हॉलिडे were wounded.
Only व्याट earp आए through the लड़ो unharmed.
The fight has come to represent a time in अमरीकी history जब the frontier was open range लिये outlaws opposed by law enforcement that was स्प्रेड thin over विशाल territories, leaving कुछ क्षेत्रों unprotected.
the gunfight was not खूब ज्ञात to the American public until 1931 जब लेखक स्टुअर्ट Lake प्रकाशित what has since महरूम determined to be a largely fictionalized जीवनी, Wyatt earp : Frontier Marshal, दो years बाद Earp 's death.
झील retold his story in a 1946 book that director जॉन घाट विकसित into the फिल्म My Darling Clementine.
After the movie Gunfight at the O.K. Corral थी released in 1957, the shootout came to be known by that name.
चूंकि then, the conflict has been portrayed साथ varying degrees of accuracy in numerous पश्चिमी films and किताबे.
despite इसके name, the gunfight actually occurred in a सीमित लॉट six doors west of the rear प्रवेश to the o.k. Corral on Fremont Street, and भी in the गली.
the two opposing parties were initially तभी about अलावा.
About thirty shots were fired in तीस seconds.
आइक clanton filed हत्या आरोप विरूद्ध the Earps और Doc Holliday but वे were eventually exonerated by a लोकल judge after a 30-day preliminary hearing and then again by a लोकल ग्रैंड jury.
On December 28, 1881, Virgil Earp was maimed in an assassination attempt by the outlaw cowboys, और on March 18, 1882, they assassinated Morgan Earp.
The संदिग्धों सुसज्जित solid alibis, and newly appointed Deputy U.S. मार्शल व्याट Earp took matters into उसके own hands during the earp वेंडेट्टा सवारी, ironically pursued by county Sheriff Johnny behan with वारंट for the earp 's arrest.
HDMI ( High-Definition Multimedia Interface ) is a compact audio/video interface लिये transferring uncompressed वीडियो data और compressed/uncompressed digital audio data from a HDMI-compliant device ( `` the सोर्स device '' ) to a compatible computer मॉनिटर, वीडियो projector, digital television, or डिजिटल audio device.
hdmi is a डिजिटल replacement for existing analog वीडियो मानकों.
वहीँ हैं a क्रमांक of HDMI-standard केबल कनेक्टर्स उपलब्धियाँ, each of which can be used लिये any uncompressed TV or pc video format, including standard, उन्नत, high परिभाषा, and 3D वीडियो signals ; up to 8 channels of संपीडित or uncompressed digital audio ; a cec ( Consumer Electronics Control ) कनेक्शन ; और an Ethernet data connection.
HDMI implements the eia/cea-861 मानकों, which define video स्वरुप और waveforms, transport of संपीडित, uncompressed, and lpcm ऑडियो, auxiliary data, और implementations of the vesa EDID.
The CEC allows hdmi डिवाइस to कंट्रोल प्रत्येक अन्य when necessary and allows the user to operate multiple डिवाइस साथ one remote कंट्रोल handset.
क्युकी HDMI is electrically compatible with the CEA-861 सिग्नल used by digital visual interface ( dvi ), no signal परिवर्तन is जरुरी, nor is there a घाटा of video विशेषता when a dvi-to-hdmi एडाप्टर is used.
as an uncompressed cea-861 connection, hdmi is independent of the विभिन्न डिजिटल television मानकों used by individual डिवाइस, ऐसे as atsc and dvb, as these are encapsulations of compressed MPEG video streams ( जिससे can be decoded and output as an uncompressed video stream on HDMI ).
Production of consumer hdmi उत्पाद started in लेट 2003.
In Europe either DVI-HDCP or HDMI is शामिल in the HD तैयार in-store labeling specification for TV sets लिये HDTV, formulated by EICTA साथ SES अस्त्र in 2005.
HDMI began to appear on उपभोक्ता hdtv camcorders and digital स्टिल कैमरे in 2006.
as of जनवरी 8, 2013, which is ten सालो after the release of the first hdmi specification, over 3 billion HDMI डिवाइस have shipped चूंकि the लॉन्च of the hdmi standard.
Bree वैन de Kamp ( née Mason ; भी ज्ञात in the श्रेणी as ब्री Hodge और Bree Weston ) is a fictional character और one of the चार protagonists on the ABC television series हताश Housewives.
वो is played by actress Marcia Cross, who has प्राप्त multiple awards और nominations for her portrayal, including an Emmy Award नामांकन, तीन Golden Globe Award nominations, और दो स्क्रीन Actors Guild Awards.
Cross 's portrayal of Bree has been widely praised by आलोचकों और fans.
Cross originally auditioned for the भूमिका of Mary Alice यंग, but series creator Marc चेरी विचार she थी better suited for the role of Bree.
Dana Delany, who आखिरकार was डाल as Katherine mayfair, was originally chosen लिये the role but turned it down, saying it थी too समान to her भूमिका in Pasadena.
ब्री 's main struggle throughout the series has been her कोशिशें to maintain a पूर्ण life despite विभिन्न obstacles such as widowhood, तलाक, and alcoholism hindering her.
वो रै been शादीशुदा three टाइम्स ; to Rex वैन de Kamp ( Steven Culp ), orson Hodge ( काइल maclachlan ) और Trip वेस्टन ( स्कॉट bakula ).

See also Algoma ( बहुविकल्पी ).
algoma is a नगर in Kewaunee County in the u.S. राज्य of Wisconsin.
the जनसांख्यिकी was 3,167 at the 2010 जनसांख्यिकी.

The hangover Part II is a 2011 अमरीकी comedy film produced by Legendary Pictures and वितरित by warner Bros. Pictures.
It is the sequel to 2009 's The Hangover और the दूसरी film in The hangover मताधिकार.
टॉड Phillips निर्देशित the फिल्मी in जोड to co-authoring the स्क्रिप्ट with Craig mazin, और scot Armstrong.
the film stars Bradley Cooper, Ed helms, Zach galifianakis, केन jeong, जेफरी Tambor, Justin Bartha and पॉल giamatti.
the hangover भाग ii tells the story of Phil, stu, एलन, and Doug as they सफर to Thailand लिये Stu 's विवाह.
After the bachelor party in लास Vegas, stu takes no chances and opts for a safe, subdued pre-wedding brunch.
however, things do not go as नियोजित, resulting in another bad hangover with no memories of the previous रात्रि.
विकास of The Hangover Part II began in April 2009, दो महीने पहले the hangover was released.
The principal actors were cast in March 2010 to reprise their roles इससे the first फिल्मी.
Production began in October 2010, in Ontario, California, before चलती on स्थान in Thailand.
the फिल्मी was released on May 26, 2011 और, despite receiving ज़्यादातर ऋणात्मक समीक्षाएँ from आलोचकों, it became the highest-grossing r-rated कॉमेडी during its नाट्य run.
A third film is set लिये on may 24, 2013.

The English पुनर्जागरण was a cultural और कलाकारी गति in England डेटिंग from the लेट 15th और early 16th centuries to the early 17th सदी.
it is associated with the pan-European पुनर्जागरण that is प्रायः regarded as beginning in Italy in the लेट 14th century.
Like most of northern Europe, इंग्लैण्ड देखी little of these developments until अधिक than a सदी later.
the शुरूआत of the अंग्रेज़ी Renaissance is often taken, as a convenience, to be 1485, when the Battle of Bosworth फ़ील्ड ended the Wars of the Roses and उदघाटन the Tudor राजवंश.
पुनर्जागरण style और विचार, however, were slow in penetrating England, and the Elizabethan era in the second हाफ of the 16th century is usually regarded as the height of the अंग्रेज़ी Renaissance.
Elizabeth ऐन bloomer Warren `` Betty '' Ford ( अप्रैल 8, 1918 – जुलाई 8, 2011 ), थी First Lady of the संयुक्त States from 1974 to 1977 दौरान the प्रेसिडेंसी of her husband Gerald Ford.
as First महिला, वो was active in सोशल policy और निर्मित precedents as a politically active presidential wife.
Throughout उसके husband 's पद in दफ्तर, she कायम ऊँची स्वीकृति ratings despite opposition from some रूढ़िवादी republicans जो objected to उसके अधिक मॉडरेट और उदार positions on social issues.
घाट was noted for raising breast cancer जागरूकता following उसके 1974 mastectomy और was a passionate supporter of, and activist for, the बराबर Rights Amendment ( ERA ).
pro-choice on abortion and a नेता in the Women 's गति, she gained fame as एक of the सबसे candid first ladies in इतिहास, commenting on प्रत्येक hot-button issue of the time, सहित feminism, बराबर pay, the ERA, sex, दवाएँ, गर्भपात, और gun control.
She also raised awareness of addiction जब वो announced her long-running battle with alcoholism in the 1970s.
Following her White House सालो, she जारी to lobby लिये the ERA and remained active in the feminist गति.
वो थी the founder, and परोसा as the first कुर्सी of the फलक of directors, of the बेट्टी Ford बीच for पदार्थ abuse और addiction और is a recipient of the Congressional Gold पदक ( co-presentation with her husband, Gerald R. Ford, अक्तूबर 21, 1998 ) and the Presidential Medal of Freedom ( अलोन, presented 1991, by George H. W. बुश ).
platelet endothelial कोशिका adhesion molecule ( PECAM-1 ) also ज्ञात as cluster of differentiation 31 ( CD31 ) is a protein कि in human is encoded by the PECAM1 gene मिला on chromosome 17.
PECAM-1 plays a key role in removing aged neutrophils from the देह.

anglo-saxon England refers to the period of the history of the भाग of Britain कि became known as इंग्लैण्ड, lasting from the end of रोमन occupation and स्थापना of anglo-saxon kingdoms in the 5th सदी until the नॉर्मन conquest of England in 1066 by विलियम the Conqueror.
anglo-saxon is a सामान्य term referring to the Germanic peoples who came to ब्रिटेन during the 5th and 6th centuries, सहित Angles, Saxons, frisii, and jutes.
The पद also refers to the language spoken at the time in England, which is now called बूढ़ा English, and to the culture of the era, which has long आकर्षित लोकप्रिय और scholarly attention.
Until the 9th century Anglo-Saxon England was dominated by the Heptarchy, the kingdoms of Northumbria, mercia, East Anglia, एसेक्स, केंट, ससेक्स, और Wessex.
In शर्तें of religion the kingdoms followed Anglo-Saxon paganism during the early period, लकिन converted to Christianity during the 7th सदी.
Paganism had a final stronghold in a काल of mercian hegemony दौरान the 640s, ending with the death of Penda of Mercia in 655.
Facing the threat of viking invasions, the हाउस of Wessex became dominant दौरान the 9th century, अंतर्गत the rule of Alfred the Great.
दौरान the 10th century, the व्यक्तिगत kingdoms एकीकृत under the नियम of wessex into the Kingdom of England, which stood opposed to the Danelaw, the viking kingdoms स्थापित from the 9th century in the उत्तर और ईस्ट of England.
The Kingdom of इंग्लैण्ड गिरी in the Viking आक्रमण इससे Denmark in 1013 and was ruled by the हाउस of डेनमार्क until 1042, when the anglo-saxon House of wessex was लौटी.
The last anglo-saxon किंग, हेरोल्ड Godwinson, was मारे in 1066 at the बैटल of हास्टिंग्स.

Smoked salmon is a preparation of सामन, typically a fillet कि has been cured और hot or cold smoked.
due to इसके moderately ऊँची price, smoked सामन is considered a delicacy.
हालांकि the पद lox is sometimes लागू to smoked salmon, they are different products.
दृश्य of defibrillator एलेक्ट्रोड स्थिति और placement.
Defibrillation is a common treatment for life-threatening हृदय dysrhythmias, ventricular fibrillation, and pulseless ventricular tachycardia.
Defibrillation consists of delivering a therapeutic dose of electrical उर्जा to the affected दिल साथ a यंत्र called a defibrillator.
इस depolarizes a critical mass of the दिल मांसपेशी, terminates the dysrhythmia, and allows सामान्य sinus लय to be reestablished by the body 's natural pacemaker, in the sinoatrial node of the heart.
Defibrillators can be बाह्य, transvenous, or implanted, depending on the type of यंत्र used or needed.
कुछ external इकाई, known as automated बाह्य defibrillators ( aeds ), automate the diagnosis of treatable rhythms, अर्थ that lay responders or bystanders are समर्थ to use them सफलतापूर्वक साथ little, or in some cases no training at सब.
gabrielle `` कोको '' bonheur चैनल ( August 19, 1883 – January 10, 1971 ) थी a French fashion designer and संस्थापक of the Chanel brand.
She was the only fashion designer to appear on Time magazine 's list of the 100 सबसे influential लोगों of the 20th सदी.
Along with पॉल Poiret, Chanel थी credited साथ liberating महिलाओं इससे the constraints of the `` corseted silhouette '' and popularizing the acceptance of a sportive, casual chic as the feminine standard in the post- संसार War i era.
A prolific fashion creator, चैनल 's influence विस्तारित beyond couture clothing.
Her design aesthetic थी realized in आभूषण, handbags, और fragrance.
उसके signature सैंट, Chanel No. 5, has become an iconic product.
Chanel was known लिये उसके lifelong determination, ambition and energy जिससे वो लागू to उसके professional और social जीवन.
वो achieved दोनो कामयाबी as a businesswoman and social prominence thanks to the connections वो made through her work.
These included many कलाकारों and craftspeople to जिसको she became a संरक्षक.
however, चैनल 's highly competitive, opportunistic personality led उसके to make questionable life choices which have generated विवाद around her प्रतिष्ठा, particularly her behaviour during the जर्मनी occupation of France in World War II.
अलाइड Mills flour mill on the banks of the Manchester Ship Canal
A gristmill ( also : grist mill, corn mill or आटा mill ) grinds grain into आटा.
The term can refer to both the grinding mechanism and the भवन कि holds it.
रोमानिया ( ; dated spellings roumania and Rumania ; ) is a country स्तिथ at the intersection of Central and Southeastern यूरोपीय, bordering on the ब्लैक Sea.
रोमानिया साझा a border साथ हंगेरियाई and Serbia to the west, Ukraine and Moldova to the northeast and ईस्ट, and बुल्गारिया to the दक्षिण.
At, रोमानिया is the eighth largest देश of the European Union by क्षेत्रफल, और has the seventh largest population of the यूरोपीय Union with more than 19 लाख people.
इसके capital and biggest city is बुखारेस्ट, the 11th largest नगर in the EU.
The United principalities emerged when the territories of Moldavia और wallachia were संयुक्त under Prince Alexander ioan Cuza in 1859.
in 1866 Prince karl of Hohenzollern-Sigmaringen थी पुकारा to the throne as the Ruling Prince of the रोमानियाई Principate and in 1881 he was finally पहनाया as किंग Carol I the first monarch of the Kingdom of Romania.
Independence इससे the उस्मानी Empire was declared on 9 May 1877, and was internationally पहचाना the following साल.
At the समाप्त of World युद्ध I, Transylvania, bukovina and bessarabia united with the Kingdom of रोमानिया.
संसार युद्ध II gave cause to the rise of a सैन्य तानाशाही in Romania under फासिस्ट सामान्य Ion Antonescu, who chose to लड़ो on the side of the Axis शक्तियां from 1941 to 1944.
बाद his removal, Romania switched sides in 1944 and joined the Allies.
by the end of the war, कुछ formerly Romanian northeastern territories were occupied by the Soviet संघ, with रेड फौज इकाई stationed on Romanian मृदा.
In 1947 Romania forcibly became a People 's गणतंत्र ( 1947-1965 ) and a सदस्य of the Warsaw Pact.
in 1965 nicolae Ceauşescu became सामान्य सचिव of the Romanian Communist Party, and the harsh austerity उपायों, राजनैतिक repression, and cult of personality he implemented led to the समाजवादी गणतंत्र of Romania ( 1965-1989 ) becoming the most Stalinist police state in the Eastern bloc.
Eventually उसके authoritarian सरकारी थी toppled in December 1989 during the रोमानियाई Revolution of 1989.
With the fall of the Iron Curtain, Romania began इसके परिवर्तन towards democracy and a capitalist मार्केट economy.
After a decade of post-revolution economic problems और living-standards decline, extensive reforms fostered economic रिकवरी.
As of 2010, रोमानिया is an upper-middle-income देश with a ऊँची human विकास index.
रोमानिया joined NATO on 29 कूच 2004, और the यूरोपीय संघ on 1 January 2007.
It is भी a सदस्य of the : Latin संघ, francophonie, osce, wto, BSEC, United राष्ट्र, etc.
Today, रोमानिया is a unitary semi-presidential गणतंत्र, in which the executive branch consists of the President and the Government.
`` प्राचीन '' redirects here.
For other उपयोग, देखिए Antiquity ( बहुविकल्पी ).
the times पहले writing belong either to protohistory or to प्रागितिहास.
Khafre 's पिरामिड ( 4th dynasty ) और ग्रेट sphinx of गीज़ा ( c. 2500 BC or perhaps earlier )
प्राचीन history is the पढ़ाई of the written past इससे the शुरूआत of recorded human history to the Early मध्य Ages.
The स्पैन of अंकित history is roughly 5,000 सालो, with cuneiform script, the oldest discovered रूप of coherent लिखने, from the protoliterate period around the 30th century BC.
इस is the beginning of history, as opposed to prehistory, according to the परिभाषा used by most इतिहासकारों.
the term classical antiquity is प्रायः used to refer to history in the Old संसार इससे the beginning of recorded Greek इतिहास in 776 bc ( पहला ओलंपियाड ).
This roughly coincides with the परंपरागत तिथि of the founding of Rome in 753 bc, the beginning of the history of ancient Rome, और the शुरूआत of the archaic period in Ancient यूनानियों.
Although the समाप्ति date of प्राचीन इतिहास is disputed, कुछ Western scholars use the fall of the Western Roman Empire in 476 ad, the closure of the platonic अकादमी in 529 AD, the death of the सम्राट जुस्तिनियन I, the coming of islam or the वृद्धि of Charlemagne as the समाप्त of ancient and Classical European history.
in India, the period includes the जल्दी period of the मध्य kingdoms, and, in चीन, the time up to the Qin राजवंश is included.
methylcobalamin ( shown ) is a form of vitamin B12.
Physically it resembles the other forms of vitamin B12, occurring as dark रेड crystals that freely रूप cherry-colored transparent solutions in water.
Vitamin b12, vitamin B12 or vitamin B-12, also called cobalamin, is a water-soluble vitamin with a कुंजी भूमिका in the सामान्य कामकाज of the brain and बेचैन system, and लिये the गठन of blood.
it is one of the eight b vitamins.
It is normally involved in the metabolism of every कोशिका of the इंसान body, especially affecting डीएनए संश्लेषण और regulation, but also वसीय एसिड synthesis and energy production.
neither fungi, plants, nor animals हैं सक्षम of producing vitamin b12.
Only bacteria और आर्किया have the enzymes जरूरी लिये its synthesis, although अनेक foods are a natural source of B12 क्युकी of bacterial symbiosis.
The vitamin is the largest और most structurally जटिल vitamin and can be produced industrially only through बैक्टीरियल fermentation-synthesis.
Vitamin B12 consists of a क्लास of chemically सम्बन्धित compounds ( vitamers ), all of जिससे have vitamin कार्यकलाप.
it contains the biochemically विरल तत्व cobalt.
जैवसंश्लेषण of the basic structure of the vitamin is संपन्नता only by bacteria ( जिससे प्रायः produce hydroxocobalamin ), लकिन परिवर्तन between different फ़ॉर्म of the विटामिन can be accomplished in the इंसान body.
A common semi-synthetic रूप of the vitamin, cyanocobalamin, does not occur in प्रकृति, but is produced इससे bacterial hydroxocobalamin और तब प्रयुक्त in many दवाएँ और पूरक, और as a food additive, because of its स्थिरता and निम्नतर उत्पादन लागत.
in the देह it is converted to the human physiological forms methylcobalamin और adenosylcobalamin, leaving behind the cyanide, albeit in minimal concentration.
More recently, hydroxocobalamin, methylcobalamin, और adenosylcobalamin can be found in more expensive pharmacological उत्पाद और food supplements.
The अतिरिक्त utility of these is फिलहाल debated.
विटामिन B12 was discovered from इसके relationship to the disease pernicious anemia, which is an autoimmune बीमारी in which parietal cells of the stomach जिम्मेदार for secreting intrinsic फ़ैक्टर are destroyed.
मूलभूत फ़ैक्टर is crucial लिये the normal अवशोषण of B12, so a lack of मूलभूत factor, as देखी in pernicious anemia, causes a vitamin B12 deficiency.
अनेक other subtler kinds of vitamin B12 deficiency and उनके biochemical effects have since been elucidated.
The रोमन Empire ( ) थी the post- Republican काल of the ancient रोमन civilization, characterised by an autocratic form of सरकारी and large territorial holdings around the Mediterranean in Europe, Africa, and Asia.
The 500-year-old रोमन गणतंत्र, जिससे preceded it, had महरूम destabilized through a series of civil wars.
अनेक events marked the transition इससे Republic to Empire, सहित जूलियस Caesar 's appointment as perpetual dictator ( 44 bc ) ; the Battle of actium ( 31 BC ) ; and the granting of the honorific Augustus to Octavian by the Roman सीनेट ( 27 bc ).
The first two centuries of the Empire were a period of unprecedented स्थिरता and prosperity ज्ञात as the Pax Romana ( `` Roman सलाम '' ).
It पहुँचे इसके महानतम expanse दौरान the reign of Trajan ( 98–117 ad ).
in the 3rd सदी, the Empire underwent a crisis कि threatened इसके existence, but was reunified and stabilized under the emperors aurelian and Diocletian.
Christians rose to शक्ति in the 4th सदी, during which समय a system of dual rule थी developed in the Latin वेस्ट and Greek ईस्ट.
बाद the collapse of central सरकारी in the वेस्ट in the 5th century, the पूर्वी half जारी as कया would later be known as the Byzantine Empire.
Because of the Empire 's विशाल extent and long सहनशीलता, the institutions and संस्कृति of रोम had a profound and lasting influence on the development of language, religion, architecture, philosophy, विधि, और forms of government in the territory it governed, विशेषकर यूरोपीय, and by अर्थात् of यूरोपीय expansionism throughout the modern world.
Total देह सतह area ( TBSA ) is an मूल्यांकन माप of burns of the skin.
In वयस्कों, the `` rule of nines '' is used to determine the total percentage of area burned for each प्रमुख section of the देह.
In some cases, the burns may cover more than one body भाग, or may not fully cover ऐसे a part ; in these मामले, burns are measured by using the casualty 's palm as a सन्दर्भ point for 1 % of the देह.
For children and infants, the lund-browder chart is used to assess the burned देह सतह area.
अलग percentages are प्रयुक्त क्युकी the ratio of the combined surface area of the head and गर्दन to the सतह क्षेत्रफल of the limbs is typically larger in children than that of an वयस्क.
Typical मान for आम groups of humans follow.
( Due to rounding, values may not add to 100 %. )

Jonah किर्स्टन Sorrentino ( born जून 26, 1975 ), better known by उसके stage name KJ-52, is a ईसाई rapper from Tampa, फ्लोरिडा.
the `` kj '' part of his नाम refers to his old रैप alias, `` King J. मैक, '' a नाम जिससे he later वर्णित in एक of उसके podcasts as `` horribly cheesy. ''
`` 52 '', जिससे is pronounced `` पाँच two '', not `` fifty-two '', is a reference to the biblical story of यीशु feeding the multitude साथ five loaves और two fish, जिससे is भी sung about in his सोंग `` धक्का Up '' इससे the Yearbook and in the `` KJ Five Two '' on it 's Pronounced 'Five दो.
He थी awarded the Rap/Hip Hop अंकित Song of the साल for `` Never dekh दूर '' and Rap/Hip Hop Album of the साल at the GMA Dove Awards of 2007.
On जुलाई 28, 2009, kj-52 released `` End of My Rope '', which is the first सिंगल लिये उसके album Five-Two टेलीविज़न.
His song `` Dear पतला '' is आधारित on एमिनेम 's song `` Stan `` और is a sort of निजी message from kj-52 to Eminem.
The degree symbol ( ° ) is a typographical symbol कि is used, among other बाते, to represent डिग्री of चाप ( e.g. in भौगोलिक coordinate systems ), hours ( in the medical फ़ील्ड ), or degrees of तापमान.
The symbol consists of a small raised वृत्त, historically a zero glyph.
In युनिकोड it is एनकोडेड at.
This is a सूची of roots, suffixes, and prefixes used in चिकित्सा terminology, their meanings, and their etymology.
वहीँ हैं a few rules जब using चिकित्सा जड़ें.
Firstly, prefixes और suffixes, primarily in Greek, but also in Latin, have a droppable -o-.
As a सामान्य नियम, this -o- लगभग सदा acts as a joint-stem to connect दो consonantal जड़ें, e.g. arthr- + -o- + logy = arthrology.
But generally, the -o- is dropped when connecting to a vowel-stem ; e.g. arthr- + itis = arthritis, बजाय of arthr-o-itis.
Secondly, medical roots generally go together according to language : Greek prefixes go साथ यूनानी suffixes and लैटिन prefixes साथ लैटिन प्रत्यय.
Although international वैज्ञानिक vocabulary is नहीं stringent परिचय segregating combining फ़ॉर्म of different भाषाएं, it is advisable when coining new शब्द not to mix different lingual roots.
पेट cancer, or gastric cancer, refers to कर्कट arising इससे कोई भाग of the stomach.
पेट cancer कल्याणकारी परिचय 800,000 deaths worldwide per साल.
Prognosis is poor ( 5-year survival < 5 to 15 % ) because most मरीजों present with उन्नत disease.
सारा Lynn इवांस ( born February 5, 1971 ) is an American country singer and songwriter.
लिये उसके संपूर्ण करियर, she has been हस्ताक्षरित to RCA Records नैशविले.
इवांस ' debut, Three Chords और the सच्चाई, did not उपज a Top 40 hit on the hot देश गीतों charts.
She followed this up with No Place कि Far ( 1998 ), Born to Fly ( 2000 ), Restless ( 2003 ) और Real Fine Place ( 2005 ).
No Place That दूर received a gold certification इससे the Recording उद्योग संघ of America ( RIAA ), while the अन्य तीन एल्बम all were certified platinum.
ये discs include the क्रमांक 1 singles `` no प्लेस कि दूर ``, `` Born to Fly ``, `` Suds in the Bucket `` and `` a Real ठीक Place to प्रारंभ ``, प्लस the top 10 hits `` i Could नहीं पूछो for अधिक `` ( a कवर of the एडविन मैक्केन song ), `` i Keep Looking ``, `` पूर्ण `` and `` cheatin ' ``.
उसके 2007 महानतम Hits included the top 15 hits `` You 'll Always be my baby `` और `` As If ``.

Evans has also जीती one award प्रत्येक इससे Billboard, the अकादमी of देश Music, Country म्यूज़िक Association, Broadcast Music incorporated ( BMI ) and a dove Award.
The संसार 's प्रिंसिपल धर्मों और spiritual traditions may be classified into a small क्रमांक of major groups, although this is by no means a uniform अभ्यास.

Berliners watching a C-54 जमीन at Tempelhof Airport ( 1948 )
The बर्लिन नाकेबंदी ( 24 June 1948 – 12 May 1949 ) was one of the पहला major अंतरराष्ट्रीय crises of the ठंडा युद्ध.
During the multinational occupation of post–World War ii Germany, the Soviet Union blocked the Western allies ' railway, road, and कनाल access to the सेक्टर of बर्लिन अंतर्गत Allied control.
उनके उद्देश्य थी to force the पश्चिमी powers to allow the Soviet zone to start supplying Berlin साथ खाना and fuel, thereby giving the soviets व्यावहारिक control over the संपूर्ण city.
In response, the पश्चिमी allies व्यवस्थित the बर्लिन airlift to carry आपूर्तियाँ to the लोगों in वेस्ट बर्लिन.
aircrews from the संयुक्त States एयर Force, the अंग्रेजों Royal एयर फ़ोर्स, the royal ऑस्ट्रेलियाई Air Force, the royal Canadian एयर Force, the Royal New Zealand Air Force, और the South अफ़्रीकी Air फ़ोर्स उड़ाया over 200,000 flights in एक year, providing up to 4700 टन of daily necessities ऐसे as fuel and food to the Berliners.
by the spring of 1949, the effort थी clearly succeeding and, by April, the airlift थी delivering more cargo than had previously महरूम transported into the city by rail.
The कामयाबी of the Berlin Airlift brought शर्मिंदगी to the Soviets जो had refused to believe it could मेक a अंतर.
The blockade was lifted in may 1949 and resulted in the creation of two separate जर्मनी states.
The Federal Republic of Germany ( West Germany ) और the जर्मनी लोकतांत्रिक Republic ( East जर्मनी ) विभाजित up बर्लिन.
in स्मरण of the airlift, three airports in the पूर्व western zones of the नगर परोसा as the प्राथमिक gateways to Germany for another fifty सालो.

the euro चिह्न is the करेंसी चिह्न used for the euro, the आधिकारिक currency of the Eurozone in the यूरोपीय संघ ( eu ).
the design was presented to the पब्लिक by the European Commission on 12 December 1996.
the international three-letter कोड ( according to ISO मानक आईएसओ 4217 ) लिये the euro is eur.
In Unicode it is encoded at.
In English, the sign precedes the मान.
In some styleguides, but नहीं others, the euro चिह्न is unspaced.
Mate (, ; sometimes also spelled maté ), also ज्ञात as chimarrão ( ) or cimarrón ( ), is a traditional South American infused पेय, particularly in अर्जेंटीना, Uruguay, पैराग्वे and the southern states of ब्राज़ील और to a lesser degree in दक्षिण of Chile, the Bolivian Chaco, सीरियाई and लेबनान.
it is prepared from steeping dried पत्ते of yerba mate ( llex paraguariensis, known in Portuguese as erva-mate ) in hot water.
mate is परोसा with a मेटल straw इससे a shared खोखला calabash करेले.
The स्ट्रॉ is called a bombilla in some लैटिन अमरीकी देशों, a bomba in Portuguese, और a bombija or, more generally, a masassa ( type of straw ) in अरबी.
The straw is traditionally made of silver.
आधुनिक, commercially available straws हैं typically बना of nickel silver, पुकारा Alpaca ; बेदाग स्टील, or hollow-stemmed cane.
The gourd is known as a mate or a guampa ; while in Brazil, it रै the specific name of cuia, or भी cabaça ( the name लिये Indigenous-influenced calabash gourds in अन्य regions of ब्राज़ील, स्टिल used for सामान्य food and पेय in remote regions ).
भी if the जल is supplied इससे a आधुनिक thermos, the infusion is traditionally नशे from mates or cuias.
As with other brewed herbs, yerba mate leaves are dried, कटा, और ground into a powdery मिश्रण called yerba.
The bombilla acts as both a straw and a sieve.
The submerged end is flared, with small छेद or slots that allow the brewed द्रव in, but block the chunky matter that makes up much of the मिश्रण.
a modern bombilla डिज़ाइन uses a सीधा tube with holes, or वसन्त sleeve to act as a sieve.
`` Tea-bag '' type infusions of mate ( mate cocido ) have महरूम on the market in अर्जेंटीना, Paraguay और Uruguay लिये many years under such trade names as `` Taragüí Vitality '' in Argentina, `` pajarito '' and `` kurupí '' in Paraguay, and in ब्राज़ील अंतर्गत the नाम `` Mate leão ''.
This is considered a completely different drink.
It is never नशे from cuias or called chimarrão, nor is it associated साथ the gaucho/gaúcho संस्कृति.
The ऑटोमोटिव industry is a term that covers a चौड़ी range of companies और organisations शामिल in the design, विकास, manufacture, marketing, and selling of मोटर वाहनों, towed vehicles, मोटरसाइकिल and mopeds.
it is one of the संसार 's most महत्वपूर्ण आर्थिक sectors by आय.
The term automotive industry usually करता नहीं include उद्योग समर्पित to the maintenance of automobiles following डिलीवरी to the end-user, such as repair shops and motor fuel filling stations.
The पद automotive थी created इससे Greek autos ( self ), और Latin motivus ( of गति ) to represent any form of self-powered गाडी.
इस पद थी proposed by SAE सदस्य एल्मर Sperry.
David माइकल `` डेव '' Bautista, Jr. ( born January 18, 1969 ), is an American mixed martial artist, bodybuilder, actor, and former पेशेवर wrestler best known लिये his time in World Wrestling entertainment competing under the ring name Batista.
in WWE, he became a six-time world चैंपियन, winning the संसार Heavyweight Championship four times, and the डब्ल्यूडब्ल्यूई Championship दो टाइम्स.
He is the longest-reigning World हेवीवेट Champion in डब्ल्यूडब्ल्यूई इतिहास.
in जोड to these championships, Batista has जीती the संसार Tag Team Championship three times ( twice with ric Flair and once साथ जॉन Cena ) और the WWE Tag Team Championship once ( with Rey Mysterio ).

Henry T. Thomas Sampson, Jr. ( born in Jackson, Mississippi in 1934 ) is an African-American inventor.
he ग्रैजुएट from ऊँची school in 1951 इससे Lanier High School in Jackson, Mississippi.
he then attended Morehouse College for a couple of years पहले transferring to purdue विश्वविद्यालयों जहाँ he became a सदस्य of the Omega psi फाई fraternity.
he प्राप्त a Bachelor 's degree in science from purdue विश्वविद्यालयों in 1956.
he graduated with an MS degree in अभियान्त्रिकी from the विश्वविद्यालयों of California, Los एंजिल्स in 1961.
Sampson भी received his ms in Nuclear अभियान्त्रिकी इससे the University of Illinois urbana-champaign in 1965, and उसके phd in 1967.
He is the first African अमरीकी to earn a Ph.D.in Nuclear अभियान्त्रिकी in the United राज्य.
कुछ of his accomplishments include being a member of the United States Navy between the years 1962 and 1964 and earning an परमाणु उर्जा आयोग सम्मान between 1964 and 1967.
Later he थी awarded the Black चित्र पुरस्कार इससे Aerospace निगम in 1982.
He was awarded the अश्वेतों in अभियान्त्रिकी, Applied विज्ञान पुरस्कार, और prize लिये education, by the लॉस Angeles Council of Black Professional Engineers in 1983.
in जून 2007, Sampson was married to Laura howzell Young in St. Thomas, u.S. Virgin Islands.
young-sampson is a professor in the College of शिक्षा at California State विश्वविद्यालयों सैन bernardino.
Robert Lane Gibbs ( born कूच 29, 1971 ) is a वरिष्ठ अभियान adviser for US President बराक ओबामा.
Previously, he थी the 28th White House दबायें Secretary.
Gibbs was the communications निदेशक लिये then- u.s. सीनेटर ओबामा and उसके 2008 presidential अभियान.
Gibbs, who has worked with ओबामा since 2004, was press secretary of जॉन Kerry 's 2004 अध्यक्षीय campaign and has previously specialized in सीनेट अभियान, having परोसा as communications director for the लोकतांत्रिक senatorial अभियान Committee और for four व्यक्तिगत सीनेट campaigns, including those of ओबामा in 2004 and फ्रिट्ज़ Hollings in 1998.
Gibbs थी also the दबायें सचिव of Representative bob etheridge.
on November 22, 2008, Gibbs was announced as the press सचिव of the ओबामा administration.
He assumed the भूमिका of press secretary on January 20, 2009, and gave his पहला official drug on जनवरी 22.
On जनवरी 5, 2011, Gibbs घोषित that he would leave the White House to become an बाहर adviser to the administration.
He left on फ़रवरी 11, 2011.
On February 12, 2013, it was announced that Gibbs had been नियुक्त as a contributor for cable-news channel MSNBC.
His first appearance was on the वही night prior to the 2013 राज्य Of The संघ Address.
Armando pérez ( born जनवरी 15, 1981 ), better known by his stage नाम pitbull, is an अमरीकी rapper, songwriter, and record निर्माता.

Rebelution went on to sell over 7.5 million विश्वव्यापी डिजिटल singles and एल्बम संयुक्त.
Nevertheless, he dropped a तोड़ called `` दे me Everything '' जिससे पहुँचे # 1 worldwide, और प्रदर्शित artists Ne-yo, Nayer, और Afrojack.

In 2005 Pérez और rapper Sean 'diddy ' Combs co-founded Bad Boy लातीनी, a subsidiary of Combs ' Bad Boy रिकॉर्ड लेबल.
it primarily focuses on Latin हिप हॉप, Latin आत्मा, Latin pop और अन्य तीव्र music, और रै offices in नई York and Miami, Florida.

Halloween or Hallowe'en ( a contraction of `` सब Hallows ' Evening `` ), भी known as All hallows ' Eve, is a yearly celebration observed in a क्रमांक of देशों on October 31, the eve of the Western Christian feast of All Hallows ( or सब Saints ) and the दिन initiating the triduum of hallowmas.
According to अनेक scholars, All hallows ' संध्या is a Christianised feast originally influenced by western यूरोपीय कटाई festivals, and त्यौहार of the dead with संभावित pagan roots, particularly the Celtic Samhain.
Other scholars maintain that it originated independently of samhain और has solely ईसाई जड़ें.
Typical त्यौहार हैलोवीन activities शामिल trick-or-treating ( भी ज्ञात as `` guising `` ), उपस्थित वेशभूषा parties, carving pumpkins into jack-o'-lanterns, lighting bonfires, apple bobbing, visiting haunted आकर्षण, playing pranks, telling scary stories, और watching हॉरर films.
Freedom of वाक is the राजनैतिक right to communicate one 's opinions and विचार using one 's body and प्रॉपर्टी to anyone जो is willing to receive them.
the पद freedom of अभिव्यक्ति is sometimes used synonymously, लकिन includes any act of seeking, receiving and imparting information or विचार, regardless of the medium used.
in अभ्यास, the right to freedom of वाक is not absolute in any country और the सही is commonly subject to सीमाएं, as with मानहानि, slander, obscenity, sedition ( including, for example inciting जातीय hatred ), copyright उल्लंघन, revelation of information कि is classified or वरना.
the सही to freedom of expression is recognized as a human right अंतर्गत आलेख 19 of the Universal Declaration of इंसान अधिकारों and recognized in अंतरराष्ट्रीय इंसान rights विधि in the International Covenant on सिविल and राजनैतिक अधिकारों ( ICCPR ).
आलेख 19 of the ICCPR states कि `` [ e ] veryone shall have the right to hold opinions without interference '' and `` everyone shall have the right to freedom of अभिव्यक्ति ; इस right shall शामिल स्वतंत्रता to seek, प्राप्त and impart सूचना and ideas of all kinds, regardless of frontiers, either orally, in लिखने or in छपाई, in the form of art, or through any other media of his चुनाव ''.
Article 19 goes on to say that the exercise of these rights carries `` खास कर्तव्य और responsibilities `` और may `` therefore be subject to certain restrictions '' when जरुरी `` [ f ] or respect of the rights or प्रतिष्ठा of अन्य '' or `` [ f ] or the सुरक्षा of national security or of पब्लिक order ( अनुक्रम public ), or of public स्वास्थ्य or morals ''.
Freedom of वाक may be legally curtailed in some religious legal systems and in धर्मनिरपेक्ष jurisdictions जहाँ it is found to कारण धार्मिक offense, ऐसे as the British जातिगत and धार्मिक Hatred Act 2006.
सिडनी Harbour from the एयर, showing the Opera House, the CBD, गोलाकार quay, the Bridge, the Parramatta River, North Sydney and kirribilli in the अग्रभूमि
the सिडनी Harbour Bridge is a स्टील through मेहराब bridge across Sydney Harbour that carries rail, vehicular, bicycle and pedestrian traffic between the सिडनी central business district ( CBD ) और the North Shore.
the dramatic view of the सेतु, the harbour, and the nearby Sydney Opera House is an iconic चित्र of Sydney, नई South Wales, and Australia.
The सेतु is nicknamed `` The coathanger '' because of इसके arch-based design.
Under the दिशानिर्देश of Dr j.j.c. bradfield of the nsw विभाग of पब्लिक works, the सेतु थी designed and built by British firm dorman Long and Co Ltd of middlesbrough and खोली in 1932.
The bridge 's design थी influenced by the Hell Gate Bridge in New York.
it was the संसार 's widest long-span bridge, at 48.8 meters ( 160 feet ) चौड़ी, जबतक construction of the नई बंदरगाहों Mann सेतु in वैंकूवर.
It is also the fifth longest spanning-arch bridge in the world, and it is the tallest steel मेहराब सेतु, measuring इससे top to जल level.
जबतक 1967 the harbour Bridge थी Sydney 's tallest structure.
The Hawaii हॉटस्पॉट is a volcanic hotspot स्तिथ निकट the namesake Hawaiian Islands, in the उत्तरी Pacific Ocean.
One of the most well-known and heavily studied हॉटस्पॉट in the world, the Hawaii plume is responsible लिये the सृष्टि of the Hawaiian – सम्राट seamount chain, an over 5,800 kilometres ( 3,600 mi ) long chain of ज्वालामुखी, four of which are active, दो of which हैं dormant, and अधिक than 123 of which हैं extinct, many having since been ground beneath the लहरें by erosion as seamounts and atolls.
The chain extends from south of the द्वीप of हवाई to the edge of the Aleutian Trench, near the eastern किनारे of Russia.
जबकि सबसे volcanoes are निर्मित by geological activity at tectonic plate boundaries, the Hawaii hotspot is located दूर इससे nearby थाली boundaries ; the classic हॉटस्पॉट theory, first proposed in 1963 by John tuzo Wilson, proposes that a single, फिक्स्ड mantle plume builds volcanoes that तब, काटें off from उनके सोर्स by the movement of the प्रशांत Plate, become increasingly निष्क्रिय और आखिरकार इरोड नीचे समुद्र level over millions of सालो.
According to इस theory, the nearly 60° bend separating the सम्राट and हवाई खण्ड of the कड़ी was caused by a sudden shift in the गति of the Pacific थाली.
in 2003, fresh investigations of this irregularity led to the प्रस्ताव of a mobile hotspot theory, suggesting कि hotspots are मोबाईल, not fixed, और कि the 47 million year old bend थी caused by a shift in the hotspot 's गति बल्कि than the plate 's.
Ancient Hawaiians were the पहला to recognize the increasing age and weathered state of the volcanoes to the उत्तर as they progressed on fishing expeditions साथ the islands.
the volatile state of the Hawaiian volcanoes और उनके constant battle with the sea was a major तत्व in Hawaiian mythology, embodied in pele, the देवता of volcanoes.
After the arrival of europeans on the island, in 1880-1881 James Dwight Dana निर्देशित the first formal geological study of the hotspot 's volcanics, confirming the संबंध long observed by the natives.
1912 marked the founding of the हवाई Volcano वेधशाला by volcanologist थामस Jaggar, initiating निरन्तर scientific अवलोकन of the islands.
In the 1970s, a mapping project थी initiated to लाभ more information परिचय the जटिल भूविज्ञान of Hawaii 's seafloor.
The hotspot has चूंकि been tomographically imaged, प्रर्दशित it to be wide और up to गहन, and ओलीवाइन and गार्नेट -आधारd अध्ययन have दिखाया its मैग्मा chamber is approximately.
In its at least 85 लाख सालो of activity the hotspot has उत्पादित an अनुमानित of rock.
the chain 's rate of बहाव रै slowly increased over समय, causing the राशि of time each individual ज्वालामुखी is क्रियाशील to decrease, from 18 लाख सालो लिये the 76 million साल old Detroit Seamount, to just अंतर्गत 900,000 लिये the एक million year-old Kohala ; on the other hand, eruptive volume has increased इससे per year to about.
Overall, this रै caused a trend towards अधिक active लकिन quickly-silenced, closely spaced volcanoes—whereas ज्वालामुखी on the निकट side of the hotspot overlap each other ( forming such superstructures as Hawaii द्वीप and the ancient मावी नुई ), the oldest of the Emperor seamounts हैं spaced as दूर as apart.
