osteonecrosis of the jaw ( ONJ ) is a severe bone disease कि affects the maxilla और the mandible.
Various forms of onj have महरूम described over the last 160 years, and a number of causes have महरूम सुझाया in the literature.
Osteonecrosis of the जबड़े associated with bisphosphonate therapy, required by कुछ cancer treatment regimens, रै been identified and defined as a pathological entity चूंकि 2003.
The संभावित risk from lower मौखिक doses of bisphosphonates, taken by patients to prevent or दावत osteoporosis, remains अनिश्चित.
Various treatment विकल्प have महरूम छान, however severe cases of ONJ स्टिल require surgical हटाना of the प्रभावित bone.
A thorough इतिहास and assessement of pre-existing systemic problems and संभावित sites of dental संक्रमण are जरूरी to help prevent the condition, विशेषकर if bisphosphonate therapy is माना.
The Boston Red sox हैं a professional बेसबॉल टोली based in बोस्टन, Massachusetts, और a member of Major लीग बेसबॉल 's American लीग पूर्वी प्रभाग.
Founded in as one of the अमरीकी League 's eight charter franchises, the रेड Sox 's घर ballpark has been fenway Park since.
the `` Red sox '' नाम थी चुनी by the टोली owner, जॉन I. Taylor, around, following previous Boston टीमों that था been ज्ञात as the `` रेड stockings ``.
They have निभाई in 11 World Series, winning 7.
Boston was a dominant टोली in the new लीग, defeating the Pittsburgh pirates in the first World Series in and winning चार more championships by.
However, they तब went into एक of the longest चैंपियनशिप droughts in बेसबॉल history, called by some the `` Curse of the Bambino `` after its alleged शुरूआत with the Red Sox 's sale of Babe Ruth to the प्रतिद्वंद्वी Yankees two years after their world चैंपियनशिप in 1918, an 86-year wait before the team 's छठे World Championship in.
However, the टोली 's history during that काल was hardly one of futility, लकिन was rather punctuated साथ कुछ of the सबसे memorable पल in संसार श्रेणी इतिहास, सहित Enos वध 's `` mad डैश `` in, the `` Impossible सपना `` of, कार्लटन फिस्क 's घर चलाएं in, और Bill buckner 's गलती in.
Red Sox history has also been marked by the टोली 's तीव्र rivalry with the New यॉर्क Yankees, arguably the fiercest और most historic in North American professional खेल.
the Boston रेड sox are owned by Fenway Sports समूह, who भी अपना Liverpool Football क्लबों of the प्रीमियर लीग in England.
The Red sox are consistently एक of the top एमएलबी teams in average road attendance, while the small capacity of Fenway Park रोकता them इससे leading in overall attendance.
इससे May 15, 2003 to April 10, 2013, the Red sox बेची out प्रत्येक घर game-a total of 820 games ( 794 regular ऋतु ) for a major professional sports record that lasted almost a दशक.
Mince pie filled with mincemeat
Mincemeat is a मिश्रण of कटा dried fruit, distilled आत्माओं और मसाले, and sometimes बीफ suet, beef, or venison.
originally, mincemeat सदा contained मांस.
अनेक आधुनिक व्यंजनों contain beef suet, हालांकि सब्ज़ी shortening is sometimes used in इसके place.
विसंगतियाँ of mincemeat are मिला in Australia, ब्रिटनी, कनाडा, northern यूरोपीय, Ireland, दक्षिण अफ़्रीकी, the संयुक्त Kingdom और the United States.
In some countries the term mincemeat refers to minced or मैदान मांस.
Diana, Princess of Wales ( Diana frances ; née Spencer ; 1 July 1961 – 31 August 1997 ) थी the first wife of चार्ल्स, Prince of वेल्स, the ज्येष्ठ बेटे and heir apparent of महारानी एलिज़ाबेथ ii.
वो was well ज्ञात लिये her fund-raising work for अंतरराष्ट्रीय charities and as an eminent celebrity of the late 20th century.
Her विवाह to the Prince of Wales on 29 July 1981 was held at st Paul 's गिरजाघर and seen by a वैश्विक टेलीविज़न audience of over 750 लाख.
जबकि शादीशुदा वो bore the शीर्षक राजकुमारी of वेल्स, Duchess of कॉर्नवॉल, Duchess of rothesay, Countess of Chester and Baroness of Renfrew.
The marriage produced two बेटे, the princes विलियम और हैरी, जो became दूसरी and third in लकीर to the British throne.
Diana was born into an aristocratic English परिवार with royal ancestry.
She was the fourth child of John Spencer, 8th Earl Spencer और उसके wife frances, बेटी of मौरिस रोश, 4th Baron Fermoy.
She became a पब्लिक figure साथ the announcement of उसके engagement.
She also प्राप्त recognition for उसके दान कार्य और लिये her support of the International Campaign to बैन landmines.
इससे 1989, she was the president of the Great Ormond Street हॉस्पिटल for children, in addition to dozens of अन्य धर्मार्थ.
Diana remained the object of worldwide मीडिया scrutiny दौरान और बाद her marriage, जिससे ended in तलाक on 28 अगस्त 1996.
Media attention and पब्लिक mourning were considerable following her मौत in a car क्रैश in पेरिस on 31 August 1997.
Argentina, officially the अर्जेंटाइन गणतंत्र ( ), is the दूसरी largest country in दोनो दक्षिण अमेरिका और the Latin अमेरिका प्रदेश.
The देश is a federation of 23 provinces और the autonomous नगर of buenos आयर्स, इसके पूंजी and largest नगर.
It is the eighth -largest देश in the संसार by land area और the largest among spanish-speaking राष्ट्र by भौगोलिक area of 2,780,400 km2 and is the चौथी by population, साथ over 41 लाख people.
अर्जेंटीना is a founding member of the United Nations, mercosur, the Union of दक्षिण American Nations, the Organization of Ibero-American राज्य, the World Bank समूह and the संसार Trade Organization, और is one of the G-15 and g-20 major economies.
Argentina is located in दक्षिण अमेरिका, bordered by Chile to the west and दक्षिण, Bolivia और Paraguay to the north and ब्राज़ील और Uruguay to the northeast.
अर्जेंटीना claims प्रभुता over भाग of Antarctica, the Falkland आइलैंड्स ( ) and South जॉर्जिया and the South Sandwich Islands.
Argentina is the successor state of the Viceroyalty of the Río de la Plata, an विदेशी उपनिवेश of the स्पेनी साम्राज्य.
Argentina declared independence during the अर्जेंटाइन युद्ध of स्वतंत्रता, which was followed by the Argentine सिविल Wars during सबसे of the 19th century.
The देश faced अनेक सैन्य coups and राजनैतिक instability दौरान the 20th सदी, साथ with periodic economic crisis that continue to this दिन.
A पहचाना Southern कोन शक्ति, and middle power, अर्जेंटीना is Latin America 's third-largest अर्थव्यवस्था, with a `` very high '' rating on the Human development index.
Within लैटिन अमेरिका, अर्जेंटीना has the पांचवां highest nominal GDP प्रति capita और the highest in खरीदना power terms.
the legatum Institute have argued कि the देश has a `` न्यास लिये future विकास due to इसके market आकार, स्तर of विदेशी direct investment, and प्रतिशत of high-tech निर्यात as share of कुल manufactured goods '', and it is classed by investors as middle emerging economy.
अर्जेंटीना is the Latin American country with the सबसे Nobel Prizes, for a total of पाँच, सब प्राप्त during the second half of the बीसवीं सदी.
The देश has three Nobel prizes in science and दो of peace.
the most important aspects of science और technology in Argentina हैं चिंतित with medicine, nuclear भौतिकी, biotechnology, nanotechnology, space और rocket technology and several fields related to the country 's Main आर्थिक Activities.
The देश also रै the mega प्रदर्शनी center of विज्ञान, technology, industry and art that are Latin अमेरिका 's largest.
Hickory is a city in Catawba काउंटी, with भाग भी in बुर्के County और काल्डवेल County.
The नगर 's 2010 estimated population is 40,010.
Hickory is the principal city in the Hickory-Lenoir-Morganton MSA, in which the population at the 2010 Census was 365,497.
polyethylene terephthalate ( sometimes written poly ( एथिलीन terephthalate ) ), commonly abbreviated PET, पीट, or the obsolete PETP or pet-p, is a thermoplastic polymer राल of the polyester family and is used in synthetic मछली ; पेय, food और other liquid containers ; thermoforming applications ; और engineering resins often in संयोजन with glass fiber.
the term polyethylene terephthalate is a source of confusion because this substance, PET, does नहीं contain polyethylene.
Thus, the alternate रूप, poly ( एथिलीन terephthalate ), is often used in scholarly जर्नल्स for the sake of accuracy and clarity.
Depending on इसके processing and thermal history, polyethylene terephthalate may मौजूद both as an amorphous ( पारदर्शी ) और as a semi-crystalline पॉलिमर.
The semicrystalline सामग्री might appear transparent ( particle आकार < 500 nm ) or अपारदर्शी और श्वेत ( कण size up to a few microns ) depending on इसके क्रिस्टल structure and particle size.
Its monomer ( bis-β-hydroxyterephthalate ) can be synthesized by the esterification reaction between terephthalic एसिड and ethylene glycol साथ water as a byproduct, or by transesterification प्रतिक्रिया between एथिलीन ग्लाइकोल and dimethyl terephthalate साथ methanol as a byproduct.
Polymerization is through a polycondensation प्रतिक्रिया of the monomers ( किया immediately बाद esterification/transesterification ) with water as the byproduct.
The majority of the world 's PET production is for सिंथेटिक fibers ( in excess of 60 % ), साथ bottle उत्पादन हिसाब लिये around 30 % of global demand.
in the कॉन्टेक्स्ट of वस्त्र applications, पालतु is referred to by its common name, `` पॉलिएस्टर, '' whereas the acronym `` PET '' is generally प्रयुक्त in relation to packaging.
Polyester makes up about 18 % of world polymer उत्पादन और is the third-most-produced पॉलिमर ; polyethylene ( pe ) और polypropylene ( PP ) हैं first and second, क्रमशः.
PET consists of polymerized इकाई of the monomer ethylene terephthalate, साथ repeating C10H8O4 units.
PET is commonly recycled, and has the क्रमांक `` 1 '' as इसके recycling symbol.
Louisiana थी admitted to the संघ on अप्रैल 30, 1812, and elects senators to Classes 2 and Class 3.
Its current senators are डेमोक्रेट मरियम Landrieu and Republican David vitter.
Black pudding, रक्त खीर or रक्त sausage is a type of सॉसेज made by कुकिंग blood or सूखी blood with a फिलर जबतक it is thick enough to congeal जब cooled.
The dish exists in various संस्कृतियों from Asia to Europe and the Americas.
Pig, cattle, शीप, बतख, and बकरी रक्त can be प्रयुक्त depending on different countries.
In यूरोपीय and the Americas, typical fillers include मांस, मोटे, suet, bread, cornmeal, sweet potato, प्याज, chestnuts, barley, and oatmeal.
In Spain, पुर्तगाल and Asia, potato is प्रायः replaced by rice.
शेयरधारक may refer to:
Stakeholder ( corporate ), a person, समूह, organization, सदस्य or प्रणाली who affects or can be affected by an organization 's actions
Stakeholder, an entity कि can be affected by the परिणाम of कि in which वे हैं said to be हितधारकों, i.e., कि in which वे have a हिस्सेदारी.
प्रोजेक्ट शेयरधारक, a person, समूह or संगठन साथ an ब्याज in a प्रोजेक्ट
Stakeholder theory, a सिद्धान्त कि identifies and models the groups जिससे are हितधारकों of a corporation or प्रोजेक्ट
शेयरधारक analysis, the प्रक्रम of identifying those affected by a प्रोजेक्ट or event
शेयरधारक ( law ), a third party who temporarily holds money or property जबकि its owner is still होने determined
जोकर Smight ( March 9, 1925 - सितंबर 1, 2003 ) was an American theatre and फिल्मी निदेशक.
Smight थी born in मिनियापोलिस, मिनेसोटा और गई to school with भविष्य कर्ता Peter क़ब्रों.
His film credits शामिल the Traveling Executioner, खरगोश, Run, Loving युगल, Midway, Harper, विमानक्षेत्र 1975, फटकार alley and the Emmy Award -winning Eddie, as well as many एपीसोड of टेलीविज़न series such as The Twilight मण्डल और The अल्फ्रेड Hitchcock घंटा.
He भी directed the 1960 Broadway play The 49th cousin और रचित the music for the फिल्मी adaption of फेंकें of थंडर सुन My Cry.
Smight died इससे कर्कट in लॉस Angeles, कैलिफ़ोर्निया.
Dmitri Ivanovich mendeleev ( ; 8 फ़रवरी 1834 – 2 February 1907 o.s. 27 January 1834 – 20 January 1907 ) थी a रूसी chemist और आविष्कारक.
He प्रतिपादित the Periodic विधि, created उसके own संस्करण of the periodic table of elements, and प्रयुक्त it to correct the properties of some already discovered तत्व और भी to predict the properties of elements yet to be खोजा !
Modesto ( स्पेनी लिये `` modest '' ), officially the City of Modesto, is the county सीट and largest नगर of Stanislaus County, कैलिफ़ोर्निया, United राज्य.
With a जनसांख्यिकी of लगभग 201,165 at the 2010 जनसांख्यिकी, modesto ranks as the 18th largest city in the राज्य of कैलिफ़ोर्निया.
The Modesto Census काउंटी Division, जिससे शामिल the cities of Ceres और Riverbank, has a population of 312,842 as of 2010.
modesto is located in the सेंट्रल valley क्षेत्रफल of उत्तरी कैलिफ़ोर्निया, 90 miles उत्तर of Fresno, 92 miles east of San Francisco, 68 miles south of the state capital of Sacramento, 66 miles west of Yosemite National Park, और 24 मील south of Stockton.
Modesto, a 29-time पेड़ City USA honoree, is surrounded by समृद्ध farmland, lending to a ranking लिये the काउंटी as 6th among सब California counties in फार्म production.
Led by मिल्क, almonds, मुर्गियों, अखरोट, और मकई silage, the county grossed nearly $ 3.1 billion in agricultural production in 2011.
modesto was immortalized in the 1973 George लुकास film अमरीकी graffiti.
the award जीतना film captured the spirit of `` cruising '' and friendship on 10th और 11th Streets in 1962 and led to the पुनरुद्धार of 1950 's nostalgia कि शामिल the tv show Happy Days and the other spin-offs.
Ron Howard, हैरिसन Ford and Richard dreyfuss स्ट्रक्चर in the film.
The soundtrack थी a huge success.
निदेशक जार्ज Lucas is a native of Modesto, graduating from Downey High School in 1962.
the gallup-healthways Well-Being अनुक्रमणिका for 2011, जिससे साक्षात्कार 1,000 भागीदार रोज़ and asks individuals to assess उनके jobs, finances, शारीरिक health, emotional राज्य of दिमाग and communities, ranked modesto 126 out of the 190 cities surveyed.
in December 2009, Forbes ranked modesto 48th out of 100 among `` बेहतरीन bang-for-the-buck Cities ''.
in this ranking, Modesto क्रमित 8th in housing affordability and सफर time but also ranked 86th in job भविष्यवाणी विकास and 99th in foreclosures.
स्वतंत्रता Day, commonly known as the चौथी of July, is a संघीय holiday in the United राज्य commemorating the adoption of the Declaration of स्वतंत्रता on जुलाई 4, 1776, declaring स्वतंत्रता from the किंगडम of ग्रेट Britain.
Independence दिन is commonly associated साथ आतिशबाजी, parades, barbecues, carnivals, fairs, picnics, कॉन्सर्ट, बेसबॉल games, family reunions, and political भाषणों and ceremonies, in जोड to विभिन्न other public and निजी events celebrating the history, government, and traditions of the संयुक्त States.
स्वतंत्रता दिन is the नेशनल day of the United States.
a gender प्रतीक denotes the sex of an organism or characterizes an एजेंट by लिंग.
The two standard लिंग symbols denoting male ♂ और female ♀ हैं निकला from astrological symbols, denoting the शास्त्रीय planets Mars and Venus, क्रमशः.
ये प्रतीकों have been in use चूंकि the Renaissance also denoting तत्व in alchemy, specifically the metals iron and copper.
वे यहूद first प्रयुक्त to denote the effective लिंग of plants ( i.e. sex of individual in a दिए crossbreed, चूंकि most पौधे are hermaphroditic ) by Carolus लीनियस in 1751.
A leasehold estate is an ownership of a अस्थाई right to थाम जमीन or property in जिससे a lessee or a tenant holds rights of रियल प्रॉपर्टी by some रूप of शीर्षक from a lessor or landlord.
हालांकि a tenant does थाम rights to real प्रॉपर्टी, a leasehold एस्टेट is typically माना personal property.
Leasehold is a रूप of जमीन कार्यकाल or प्रॉपर्टी कार्यकाल जहाँ one party buys the सही to occupy जमीन or a building लिये a given length of समय.
as lease is a legal एस्टेट, leasehold एस्टेट can be bought and sold on the open market.
A leasehold यूँ differs from a freehold or शुल्क simple जहाँ the ownership of a प्रॉपर्टी is खरीदा outright and thereafter आयोजित for an अनिर्धार्य length of time, और भी differs from a tenancy where a प्रॉपर्टी is let ( rented ) on a periodic आधार ऐसे as साप्ताहिक or monthly.
Until the समाप्त of the पट्टे period ( प्रायः measured in दशकों or centuries ; a 99 साल lease is काफी आम ) the leaseholder रै the सही to remain in occupation as an assured किरायेदार paying an agreed rent to the owner.
Terms of the agreement are contained in a पट्टे, which has elements of अनुबंध और प्रॉपर्टी विधि intertwined.
the term estate for years may occasionally be प्रयुक्त.
इस refers to a leasehold एस्टेट for any specific period of time ( the word `` years '' is भ्रामक ).
An एस्टेट लिये years is not automatically नवीनीकृत.
Colloquially, `` lease '' और `` पट्टे `` हैं प्रायः a formalization of a longer, विशिष्ट काल as compared with a `` rental '' that created a tenancy at will, terminable or renewable at the end of a short काल.
Olivia ( भी known as Welcome to the World of the Pig ओलिविया ) is a British-American children 's एनिमेटेड television series उत्पादित by media कम्पनी Chorion और based on Ian Falconer 's books.

, Nick jr. in the UK और आयरलैंड, और डिज़्नी Junior in लैटिन America और ब्राज़ील, Treehouse TV in कनाडा.
the show रै won a चांदी Parents ' चुनाव पुरस्कार for its positive स्टोरी लाइनों और वर्ण.
स्थान of Panama between Pacific ( bottom ) और caribbean ( top ), with कनाल at top center
the Panama कनाल ( ) is a ship कनाल in Panama कि connects the Atlantic समंदर ( via the caribbean समुद्र ) to the प्रशांत Ocean.
the कनाल cuts across the Isthmus of पनामा and is a कुंजी conduit for international मेरीटाइम व्यापार.
There हैं ताले at प्रत्येक समाप्त to lift जहाजों up to Gatun Lake ( above sea-level ).
gatun Lake थी created to reduce the amount of कार्य required लिये the canal.
The वर्तमान locks हैं चौड़ी.
A तीसरा, wider लेन of locks is being built.
फ़्रांस began work on the canal in 1881, लकिन had to रोकें क्युकी of अभियान्त्रिकी problems and high मृत्यु due to disease.
The संयुक्त राज्य ( US ) later took over the प्रोजेक्ट and took a दशक to complete the कनाल in 1914, enabling ships to avoid the lengthy Cape Horn route around the southernmost tip of South America ( via the ड्रेक ड्योढ़ी ) or to navigate the Strait of Magellan.
One of the largest और most difficult engineering projects ever undertaken, the पनामा Canal shortcut made it संभावित for ships to travel between the Atlantic and Pacific महासागर in half the time previously जरूरी.
the shorter, faster, safer route to the us वेस्ट coast and to राष्ट्र in and along the प्रशांत समंदर अनुमत those places to become more integrated with the world अर्थव्यवस्था.
During this time, ownership of the territory कि is अभी the पनामा Canal थी first कोलम्बियाई, then French, and then American ; the United राज्य completed the construction.
the canal was लिया over in 1999 by the panamanian government, as long planned.
Annual traffic रै risen इससे about 1,000 जहाजों जब the कनाल खोली in 1914, to 14,702 बरतन in 2008, the latter measuring a total of 309.6 लाख Panama canal/universal Measurement प्रणाली ( PC/UMS ) टन.
by 2008, more than 815,000 vessels had passed through the कनाल, अनेक of them much larger than the असली planners could have envisioned ; the largest जहाजों कि can पारगमन the canal today are called Panamax.
The अमरीकी Society of सिविल Engineers has named the Panama कनाल one of the seven wonders of the modern world.
बेंजामिन Franklin ( April 17, 1790 ) was एक of the founding Fathers of the United राज्य.
a noted बहुश्रुत, Franklin थी a अग्रणी author, printer, political theorist, politician, postmaster, वैज्ञानिक, संगीतकार, inventor, satirist, civic activist, statesman, and राजनयिक.
As a वैज्ञानिक, he was a प्रमुख फिगर in the अमरीकी आत्मज्ञान और the इतिहास of physics for उसके discoveries and theories regarding विद्युत.
he invented the lightning rod, bifocals, the फ्रैंकलिन stove, a carriage ओडोमीटर, and the glass 'armonica '.
He facilitated many civic organizations, सहित a आग विभाग और a university.
Franklin earned the title of `` the पहला American '' for उसके early and indefatigable campaigning for colonial unity ; as an author और spokesman in London लिये several colonies, then as the first संयुक्त राज्य Ambassador to France, he exemplified the emerging American nation.
Franklin थी foundational in defining the American ethos as a विवाह of the practical मान of thrift, hard work, शिक्षा, जातियाँ स्पिरिट, self-governing institutions, और विपक्ष to authoritarianism both political and religious, साथ the वैज्ञानिक and सहिष्णु मान of the Enlightenment.
in the words of historian Henry Steele Commager, `` in a फ्रैंकलिन could be मिलाया the virtues of puritanism without its defects, the illumination of the Enlightenment without इसके ऊष्मा. ''
to Walter Isaacson, this makes Franklin `` the सबसे संपन्नता American of his age और the सबसे influential in inventing the type of समाज America would become. ''
Franklin, सदा proud of उसके working class roots, became a कामयाब समाचारपत्र एडिटर and printer in Philadelphia, the अग्रणी नगर in the colonies.
he was also partners with William Goddard and जोसेफ Galloway the three of जिसको प्रकाशित the पेन्सिलवेनिया वृत्तान्त, a newspaper कि was known for इसके क्रांतिकारी sentiments and criticisms of the अंग्रेजों साम्राज्य in the American colonies.
He became wealthy publishing Poor Richard 's Almanack and The Pennsylvania Gazette.
फ्रैंकलिन gained international renown as a scientist लिये his प्रसिद्ध प्रयोग in electricity and for his many inventions, especially the lightning लाठी.
He निभाई a major role in establishing the विश्वविद्यालयों of Pennsylvania और was निर्वाचित the first अध्यक्ष of the अमरीकी philosophical Society.
Franklin became a national hero in America when he spearheaded the effort to have Parliament repeal the unpopular Stamp Act.
An accomplished राजनयिक, he थी widely admired among the French as American minister to Paris and was a major फिगर in the विकास of धनात्मक Franco-American relations.
For many years he was the British postmaster for the colonies, जिससे enabled him to set up the पहला national communications संजाल.
He was active in community affairs, colonial और state राजनीती, as खूब as नेशनल and अंतरराष्ट्रीय affairs.
इससे 1785 to 1788, he served as governor of Pennsylvania.
toward the end of his life, he freed उसके स्लेव और became one of the most prominent abolitionists.
His रंगीन life and विरासत of scientific and political achievement, and औकात as एक of America 's most influential Founding Fathers, have seen फ्रैंकलिन honored on coinage and धन ; warships ; the names of many कस्बों, counties, educational संस्थानों, namesakes, और कंपनियाँ ; और more than two centuries after his death, अनगिनत cultural references.
दण्ड Minds is an American police procedural television program that premiered September 22, 2005, on CBS.
the श्रेणी फ़ॉलो a team of profilers इससे the एफबीआई 's Behavioral Analysis ईकाई ( BAU ) आधारित in क्वांटिको, Virginia.
The BAU is part of the एफबीआई National बीच लिये the विश्लेषण of Violent अपराधों.
The show differs इससे अनेक प्रक्रियात्मक dramas by focusing on profiling the criminal, बल्कि than the अपराधों itself.
The show is उत्पादित by The Mark गॉर्डन Company in संघ with सीबीएस Television studios ( originally Paramount Network टेलीविज़न then CBS सर्वोपरि संजाल Television ) और ABC studios ( originally touchstone Television ).
सीबीएस announced in October 2009 कि Legacy इंटरैक्टिव होता develop a video खेल based on the show.
The game होता आवश्यकता players to जाँचें अपराधों दृश्यों for clues to सहायता solve हत्या रहस्यों.
the interactive puzzle game was released in 2012, लकिन did not feature any of the आवाज़ें of the show 's डाल, nor was the cast involved साथ the project.
On March 14, 2012, CBS नवीनीकृत दण्ड minds for an eighth season, which premiered on September 26, 2012.
`` Heart-Shaped बक्सा '' is a सोंग by the अमरीकी grunge बैंड निर्वाण, लिखा by vocalist और guitarist कर्ट कोबेन.
the song was released as the first single इससे the समूह 's third and final studio album, In Utero, in 1993.
It थी एक of two songs इससे the album mixed by Scott litt in order to augment the original production by निर्माता Steve albini.
While Nirvana 's लेबल dgc रिकॉर्ड did not release a physical single लिये sale in the संयुक्त States, `` Heart-Shaped Box '' received much American रेडियो airplay, reaching क्रमांक one on the बिलबोर्ड आधुनिक Rock Tracks chart.
the अंतरराष्ट्रीय release of the single reached क्रमांक पाँच on the uk Singles चार्ट.
the song 's music वीडियो, directed by एंटोन Corbijn, garnered critical plaudits.
the orbital गति of a body, generally a planet, a natural satellite, an artificial satellite, or a multiple star, is the speed at जिससे it orbits around the barycenter of a system, usually around a अधिक massive body.
It can be used to refer to either the औसत कक्षीय गति, the average speed as it completes an orbit, or instantaneous orbital गति, the गति at a particular पाइंट in इसके कक्षा.
the orbital गति at any स्थिति in the orbit can be computed इससे the distance to the central देह at that स्थिति, और the specific orbital उर्जा, which is स्वतंत्र of position : the kinetic उर्जा is the कुल उर्जा ऋण the potential उर्जा.

Brown राजमहल Hotel is the second-oldest operating hotel in डेनवर, कोलोराडो and is one of the first atrium-style hotel ever निर्मित.
it is now operated by Quorum Hotels और रिसॉर्ट.
it was built in 1892, one साल बाद than the ऑक्सफोर्ड Hotel.
It थी नामित लिये its original owner, Henry C. भूरा, और was designed with इसके odd triangular shape by architect फ़्रैंक Edbrooke.
the hotel is located at 321 17th St, Denver, co between 17th Street, ब्रॉडवे and Tremont Street/Pl in downtown डेनवर behind the गणतंत्र Plaza.
The प्रमुख entrance door is on tremont Street.
DVD-Video is a consumer video format used to स्टोर digital वीडियो on DVD discs, और is फिलहाल the प्रबल consumer video format in एशिया, North America, Europe, and ऑस्ट्रेलिया.
Discs using the dvd-video specification require a DVD drive and an H.262/MPEG-2 भाग 2 डिकोडर ( e.g., a dvd खिलाड़ी, or a कंप्यूटर dvd ड्राइव with a software dvd player ).
वाणिज्यिक DVD फिल्मों हैं encoded using a संयोजन of H.262/MPEG-2 Part 2 compressed वीडियो and audio of varying formats ( often multi-channel formats as वर्णित below ).
Typically, the आंकड़ा rate for DVD फिल्मों सीमाएँ from 3 Mbit/s to 9.5 Mbit/s, and the bit rate is प्रायः adaptive.
it थी first available लिये खुदरा around 1997.
The DVD-Video specification थी created by DVD Forum and can be प्राप्त from dvd Format/Logo Licensing Corporation for a fee of $ 5,000.
The specification is not सरेआम available, because प्रत्येक subscriber must sign a non-disclosure अनुबंध.
Certain information in the DVD Book is मालिकाना and गोपनीय.
the nautical mile ( symbol M, nm or nmi ) is a ईकाई of लंबाई that is about एक मिनट of arc of latitude measured along any meridian, or about one minute of चाप of longitude at the equator.
By अंतरराष्ट्रीय अनुबंध it has been नियत at 1,852 metres exactly ( about 6,076 feet ).
It is a non- si ईकाई ( although accepted लिये उपयोग in the International System of Units by the BIPM ) used विशेषकर by navigators in the शिपिंग and विमानन उद्योग, and also in polar खोजी.
It is commonly used in अंतरराष्ट्रीय law और treaties, विशेषकर regarding the हद of territorial waters.
it विकसित इससे the समुद्र mile और the सम्बन्धित भौगोलिक मील.
The nautical mile remains in उपयोग by sea और एयर navigators worldwide because of its convenience when working साथ charts.
Most nautical चार्ट उपयोग the Mercator प्रक्षेप whose स्केल varies by परिचय a factor of six from the equator to 80° latitude, so चार्ट covering large क्षेत्रों can not use a सिंगल रैखिक scale.
the nautical mile is nearly equal to a मिनट of अक्षांश on a चार्ट, so a distance measured with a chart divider can be roughly converted to nautical मील using the chart 's अक्षांश स्केल.
Shippensburg is a बरो in कम्बरलैंड and Franklin काउंटी in the U.S. राज्य of Pennsylvania.
Settled in 1730, Shippensburg झूठ in the Cumberland घाटी, 41 miles ( 66 km ) west-southwest of Harrisburg, और is part of the Harrisburg– carlisle Metropolitan Statistical क्षेत्रफल.
in 1900, 3,228 people lived there ; in 1910, 3,457 ; और in 1940, 5,244 people lived there.
The population was 5,492 at the 2010 जनसांख्यिकी.
shippensburg was incorporated as a बरो on January 21, 1819.
In the पास्ट, वहीँ were furniture factories, engine and pump works, और other industrial works located within the कस्बा.
shippensburg is also the घर of The Beistle Company, the oldest and largest निर्माता of decorations and party goods, जिससे sells इसके distinctive honeycomb पेपर सजावट विश्वव्यापी.
It is also the location of pague और Fegan, the oldest continuously संचालित हार्डवेयर स्टोर in Pennsylvania.
in May 2012, वोल्वो Construction उपकरण began a $ 100 लाख विस्तार project to लाओ its American headquarters to Shippensburg.
Shippensburg is also घर to shippensburg University of Pennsylvania, एक of 14 विश्वविद्यालयों of the पेन्सिलवेनिया राज्य प्रणाली of Higher शिक्षा.
Yearly the last पूरा सप्ताह of जुलाई, the Shippensburg जातियाँ मेला is आयोजित.
Begun in 1958, the fair बिल्स itself as पेन्सिलवेनिया 's largest bi-county मेला.
The मेला शामिल agricultural exhibits, a शिल्प दिखाएँ, खाना vendors, और carnival यात्राएँ amongst अन्य things.
प्रत्येक summer on the last शनिवार of अगस्त, shippensburg holds the मकई Festival, an इवेंट that brings regional artisans and vendors to operate stands downtown.
the शहर is closed to traffic for at तनिक 5 blocks लिये सबसे of the day.
Average उपस्थिति at the पर्व is अनुमानित at 60,000 - 70,000 each year.
Black hairy tongue ( bht, also termed lingua villosa nigra ) refers to a कंडीशन of the जीभ जहाँ the filiform papillae elongate with black or brown discoloration, giving a ब्लैक और hairy appearance.
the रूप may be alarming, but it is a harmless कंडीशन.
Predisposing कारकों include धूम्रपान, xerostomia ( शुष्क मुँह ), नरम आहार, ग़रीब मौखिक hygiene and certain medications.
प्रबन्धन is by improving oral hygiene, especially scraping or brushing the tongue.
the आईईईई 1394 interface is a सीरियल bus इंटरफ़ेस standard for high-speed संचार and isochronous real-time data ट्रांसफ़र.
It was developed in the लेट 1980s और जल्दी 1990s by Apple, who called it FireWire.
the 1394 interface is comparable to USB, and often those two technologies हैं माना together, हालांकि usb रै more market share.
Apple first शामिल FireWire in some of its 1999 मॉडल, and most Apple computers चूंकि the year 2000 have included FireWire पोर्ट, though, as of 2013, nothing परे the 800 संस्करण ( IEEE-1394b ).
The interface is भी known by the brand i.link ( सोनी ), and Lynx ( Texas यंत्र ).
IEEE 1394 replaced समानांतर SCSI in many अनुप्रयोग, क्युकी of lower क्रियान्वयन costs और a सरलीकृत, अधिक अनुकूलनीय cabling system.
The 1394 standard भी defines a backplane interface, हालांकि this is not as widely used.
IEEE 1394 is the High-Definition Audio-Video Network गठबंधन ( HANA ) standard कनेक्शन इंटरफ़ेस लिये a/v ( audio/visual ) घटक communication and control.
firewire is also available in बेतार, रेशा optic, और समाक्षीय versions using the isochronous protocols.
Stephen `` Stevie '' Ray vaughan ( October 3, 1954 – August 27, 1990 ) थी an American guitarist, singer-songwriter, और record producer.
Often referred to by his initials srv, Vaughan is बेहतरीन ज्ञात as a founding सदस्य और leader of Double ट्रबल.
Together with वादक Chris layton and bassist Tommy शैनन, they ignited the blues revival of the 1980s.
साथ a career spanning सात years, Vaughan और दोगुना Trouble consistently sold out concerts जबकि their एल्बम अक्सर went सुनहरा.
He थी born और raised in Dallas, Texas, and for a short period of time जिया in Graham, Texas.
As the younger brother of Jimmie Vaughan, Vaughan started playing the guitar at age seven और formed several bands that occasionally performed in लोकल nightclubs.
At age 17, he dropped आउट of high स्कूल and moved to Austin to further pursue उसके musical career, joining groups such as krackerjack, the nightcrawlers, and the cobras.
in 1977, he formed Triple Threat revue, a band that eventually evolved into दोगुना Trouble and regularly performed around ऑस्टिन.
In 1982, Vaughan और Double Trouble performed at the Montreux Jazz Festival in स्विट्ज़रलैंड, catching the ध्यान of musicians दाउद बोवी और जैक्सन browne.
Bowie पूछा Vaughan to खेल on उसके upcoming स्टुडियो एल्बम Let 's Dance, while Browne offered the band free use of उसके निजी स्टुडियो in लॉस एंजिल्स to record an album.
In कूच 1983, vaughan and Double Trouble were signed to एपिक रिकॉर्ड by दिग्गज record producer जॉन Hammond Sr. and released उनके debut एल्बम, Texas Flood in June of that year.
After successful touring, the group released the albums, could n't Stand the मौसम ( 1984 ) और Soul to आत्मा ( 1985 ), the latter of which featured new keyboardist रीज़ wynans.
Although his career had progressed successfully, Vaughan checked into a पुनर्वास hospital in Atlanta, Georgia to give up a cocaine and दारू आदत and returned to touring with the बैंड.
In जून 1989, In Step was released and अर्जित उन्हें a Grammy पुरस्कार लिये Best Contemporary Blues Performance.
On August 27, 1990, Vaughan थी मारे in a helicopter क्रैश following a performance in East Troy, विस्कॉन्सिन.
Vaughan 's uniquely eclectic yet intense स्टाइल was derived from a variety of musical जाति.
He थी बहकावे by blues musicians including Albert किंग, फ्रेडी King, Otis फटाफट, and muddy Waters, और चट्टान guitarists ऐसे as जिमि हेंड्रिक्स and Lonnie mack.
उसके गिटार playing reflected the classic blues और pentatonic तराजू.
he has received चौड़ी critical recognition for उसके guitar playing, रैंकिंग at # 6 on Rolling Stones list of `` 100 Greatest Guitarists '' in 2011.
He was मरणोपरांत inducted into the ब्लूज़ Hall of Fame in 2000 and a मेमोरियल statue थी erected in ऑस्टिन 's ऑडिटोरियम shores park.
Stevie रे Vaughan is widely considered to be one of the महानतम musicians to come from the राज्य of Texas.

In computer networking, gigabit ईथरनेट ( gbe or 1 gige ) is a term describing various technologies for transmitting Ethernet frames at a रेट of a gigabit प्रति दूसरी ( 1,000,000,000 bits प्रति दूसरी ), as पारिभाषित by the आईईईई 802.3-2008 standard.
It came into उपयोग beginning in 1999, धीरे supplanting तेज़ Ethernet in wired local संजाल, जहाँ it performed considerably faster.
the केबल और उपकरण हैं very समान to पिछला standards और were बहुत common and किफायती by 2010.
Half-duplex gigabit कड़ी connected through hubs are allowed by the specification, लकिन full-duplex usage with switches is much अधिक आम.

The प्रमुख components of a stamp:
1. Image
2. Perforations
3. Denomination
4. Country name
A postage स्टैम्प is a small piece of paper that is purchased and displayed on an item of mail as प्रमाण of payment of postage.
Typically, stamps are बना from खास paper, with a national नामांकन and denomination ( दाम ) on the फेस, and a gum चिपकने on the reverse side.
Postage stamps हैं खरीदा from a postal प्रशासन or other authorized vendor and are प्रयुक्त to अदा लिये the लागत शामिल in चलती mail as well as other business necessities such as insurance और registration.
The stamp’s shape is usually that of a छोटी rectangle of varying proportions, though triangles or अन्य shapes are occasionally used.
The स्टैम्प is affixed to an लिफाफा or अन्य डाक कवर ( i.e., पैकेट, box, mailing बेलन ) कि the ग्राहक बधाइयां to भेजें.
the item is then processed by the postal प्रणाली, where a postmark, sometimes ज्ञात as a cancellation चिह्नित, is usually लागू over the stamp and कवर ; this कार्यविधि marks the stamp as प्रयुक्त, which prevents its reuse.
The postmark indicates the date और पाइंट of origin of the mailing.
the mailed मद is तब delivered to the address that the ग्राहक रै applied to the लिफाफा or cover.
postage stamps have facilitated the डिलीवरी of mail since the 1840s.
Before this time, ink and hand-stamps ( hence the word 'stamp ' ), usually made from लकडी or cork, were प्रायः used to frank the मेल और confirm the payment of postage.
the पहला adhesive postage stamp, commonly referred to as the पैनी Black, was जारी in the United Kingdom in 1840.
The आविष्कार of the स्टैम्प was a भाग of the attempt to reform और improve the डाक system in the United Kingdom of ग्रेट ब्रिटेन और आयरलैंड, जिससे in the early 19th century was in disarray and rife with भ्रष्टाचार.
वहीँ are varying accounts of the inventor or inventors of the stamp.
Before the introduction of postage stamps, mail in the uk was सशुल्क for by the प्राप्तकर्ता, a प्रणाली that was संबद्ध with an irresolvable प्रॉब्लम : the costs of delivering mail were नहीं recoverable by the postal service when प्राप्तकर्ता were unable or unwilling to pay लिये delivered वस्तुएं, और senders had no प्रोत्साहन to restrict the क्रमांक, आकार, or वज़न of items भेजा, whether or नहीं they होता ultimately be सशुल्क for.
The postage stamp resolved इस issue in a सरल and elegant manner, साथ the additional benefit of रूम for an तत्व of beauty to be introduced.
बाद सम्बन्धित आविष्कारों include डाक stationery such as prepaid-postage लिफाफे, post cards, lettercards, aerogrammes and wrappers, postage मीटर, and, more recently, specialty boxes and लिफाफे provided free to the customer by the U.S. डाक सेवा लिये priority or express mailing.
The postage stamp afforded convenience लिये दोनो the mailer and postal officials, अधिक efficiently recovered costs लिये the डाक सेवा, और ultimately resulted in a बेहतर, faster postal system.
With the conveniences stamps offered, उनके उपयोग resulted in greatly increased mailings दौरान the 19th and 20th centuries.
Postage stamps दौरान इस era were the most लोकप्रिय way of paying लिये मेल, but by the end of the 20th century यहूद rapidly होने eclipsed by the use of metered postage and bulk mailing by व्यवसायों. )
the वही result साथ आदर to संचार by निजी पार्टियों occurred over the last decade of the 20th सदी और the first decade of the 21st due to घटती cost of long distance टेलीफोन संचार और the development और explosive स्प्रेड of electronic mailing ( `` e-mail '' via the अंतरजाल ) and bill paying प्रणालियों था.
As postage stamps साथ उनके engraved imagery began to appear on a widespread basis, इतिहासकारों और collectors began to take notice.
The study of postage stamps और उनके use is referred to as philately.
स्टैम्प collecting can be both a hobby और a form of historical पढ़ाई और reference, as government-issued postage stamps and उनके mailing systems have always महरूम शामिल with the history of nations.
the University of अलबामा at बर्मिंघम ( UAB ) is a पब्लिक विश्वविद्यालयों in Birmingham in the u.S. राज्य of Alabama.
Developing इससे an extension center स्थापित in 1936, the institution became an autonomous संस्था in 1969 और is आज one of तीन institutions in the विश्वविद्यालयों of Alabama System.
uab offers over 140 कार्यक्रम of पढ़ाई in 12 अकादमिक divisions अग्रणी to bachelor 's, master 's, doctoral, and पेशेवर degrees in the social and behavioral sciences, the liberal कला, business, education, अभियान्त्रिकी, and health-related fields ऐसे as आयुर्विज्ञान, dentistry, optometry, nursing, और public स्वास्थ्य.
the स्कूल is अत्यधिक renowned for इसके चिकित्सा शोध and natural sciences programs.
The UAB Health प्रणाली, एक of the largest academic चिकित्सा centers in the United States, is affiliated साथ the विश्वविद्यालयों.
uab Hospital प्रायोजकों residency programs in various चिकित्सा specialties, सहित आतंरिक medicine, neurology, surgery, radiology, and anesthesiology.
uab Hospital is the only ACS verified स्तर I trauma center in अलबामा, as rated by the American कॉलेज of Surgeons Trauma Program.
uab is the state 's largest employer, साथ more than 18,000 faculty और staff and over 53,000 कार्य at the university और in the स्वास्थ्य system.
an estimated 10 percent of the jobs in the Birmingham-Hoover Metropolitan Area and 1 in 33 jobs in the state of अलबामा हैं directly or indirectly related to UAB.
The university 's overall सालाना economic प्रभाव was अनुमानित to be $ 4.6 billion in 2010.
In the fall of 2012, the विश्वविद्यालयों of अलबामा at Birmingham enrolled 17,999 students इससे more than 110 countries, सहित 1,605 freshmen.
There हैं plans to commence with an `` आक्रामक '' growth in enrollment at uab.
The वर्तमान UAB President is dr. Ray L. Watts.
Tofu, also called सेम curd, is a food बना by coagulating soy juice and then pressing the resulting curds into नरम white ब्लॉक.
It is a component in many ईस्ट Asian और southeast एशियाई cuisines.
There हैं अनेक different varieties of टोफू, सहित भैस tofu और tofu कि रै महरूम processed in some रास्ता.
Tofu has a हल्का स्वाद और can be used in savory and मीठी बर्तन.
It is often seasoned or marinated to suit the dish.
टोफू originated in ancient China some 2,000 years ago.
Chinese legend ascribes इसके invention to prince लियू An ( चाइनीज : 劉安 Liú Ān, 179–122 bc ).
Tofu और इसके उत्पादन technique were introduced into कोरियाई और then Japan दौरान the nara period.
It spread into अन्य parts of ईस्ट Asia as well.
This स्प्रेड likely coincided with the स्प्रेड of Buddhism because it is an important source of protein in the vegetarian diet of ईस्ट Asian Buddhism.
Li shizhen in the मिंग Dynasty वर्णित a method of बनाना tofu in Bencao Gangmu.
Tofu has a low calorie गिनती, relatively large amounts of प्रोटीन, और छोटी मोटे.
It is high in आयरन and depending on the coagulant used in manufacturing, may भी be ऊँची in calcium and/or magnesium.
बुलबुले ( born 1983 ) is a common chimpanzee, known for होने the one-time pet of अमरीकी recording कलाकार Michael Jackson, जो bought the primate from a Texas research facility in the जल्दी 1980s.
The एनिमल was a बारंबार travel companion to the singer, whose attachment to the animal led to मीडिया mockery and, among अन्य कारकों, to a public बोध of जैक्सन as an eccentric.
दौरान the Bad संसार Tour, लिये example, जैक्सन brought Bubbles with him to Japan, जहाँ वे दोनो पिया tea साथ the महापौर of Osaka.
बुलबुले was initially रखा at the जैक्सन family 's home in Encino, Los Angeles, लकिन was moved to neverland Ranch in 1988.
There, he slept in a crib in Jackson 's bedroom, used the singer 's toilet, and ate candy in the Neverland फिल्म theater.
In 2003 the public सीखे that, जैसे all खिलाते chimpanzees, बुलबुले था matured into a large and आक्रामक adult chimp unsuitable as a companion animal.
he was sent to a California animal प्रशिक्षक, जहाँ he was reported to have attempted suicide.
When the trainer shut bas his आपरेशन in 2004, Bubbles was moved to the Center for Great apes, a sanctuary in Wauchula, फ्लोरिडा, जहाँ he has जिया since 2005.
Muse हैं an English rock बैंड इससे Teignmouth, देवों, which formed in 1994.
the band consists of school मित्रों Matthew bellamy ( lead vocals, सीसे guitar, पियानो, keyboards, keytar ), क्रिस्टोफर wolstenholme ( bass, vocals, keyboards, rhythm गिटार, harmonica ) and Dominic Howard ( ड्रम, percussion, synthesisers, sampling ).
Since the release of उनके 2006 एल्बम Black छेद and खुलासे, keyboardist and percussionist Morgan Nicholls has performed live with the band.
Muse are known लिये their ऊर्जावान and हद live performances और उनके संलयन of many music genres, सहित स्पेस rock, प्रगतिशील चट्टान, वैकल्पिक चट्टान, भारी metal, शास्त्रीय music and electronica.
चिंतन have released six स्टुडियो albums : Showbiz ( 1999 ), उत्पत्ति of Symmetry ( 2001 ), Absolution ( 2003 ), ब्लैक छेद और Revelations ( 2006 ), the Resistance ( 2009 ) और The 2nd Law ( 2012 ).
They have also issued three live एल्बम, Hullabaloo साउंडट्रैक ( 2002 ), जिससे is also a compilation of B-sides, absolution दौरे ( 2005 ), and HAARP ( 2008 ), which documents the band 's performances at Wembley Stadium in 2007.
ब्लैक छेद and Revelations अर्जित the बैंड a Mercury पुरस्कार nomination and a third प्लेस समाप्त in the NME एल्बम of the साल सूची for 2006.
चिंतन have also won a संग्रहण of music पुरस्कार throughout their इतिहास, including पाँच MTV यूरोपीय म्यूज़िक Awards, छह q पुरस्कार, eight NME Awards, two ब्रिट पुरस्कार —winning `` बेहतरीन अंग्रेजों Live Act '' twice, an एमटीवी वीडियो Music Award, चार Kerrang !
Awards and an American Music Award.
They यहूद also nominated लिये पाँच Grammy पुरस्कार, of जिससे they won बेहतरीन Rock एल्बम, for उनके fifth studio album The Resistance ( 2009 ).
Muse have बेची over 15 million albums worldwide.
Bloemfontein (, ; Dutch लिये `` फव्वारा of पुष्प '' ) is the capital city of the Free State Province of South Africa ; और, as the judicial capital of the nation, एक of South Africa 's three नेशनल capitals – the अन्य दो होने केप Town, the legislative पूंजी, and Pretoria, the प्रशासनिक capital.
Bloemfontein is popularly and poetically ज्ञात as `` the city of roses ``, owing to the abundance of ये flowers और the annual rose festival आयोजित there.
The city 's Sesotho name is Mangaung, अर्थ `` place of cheetahs `` और it has been included in the Mangaung लोकल Municipality चूंकि 2000.
Bloemfontein is situated on शुष्क घासभूमि at, at an ऊँचाई of above समुद्र स्तर.
The नगर is home to 369,568 residents, जबकि the Mangaung लोकल नगरपालिका has a population of 645,455.

the meaning of life is a philosophical question concerning the significance of जीवन or existence in सामान्य.
It can भी be expressed in different फ़ॉर्म, such as `` Why are we यहाँ ? ``, `` What is life all about ? ``, and `` What is the purpose of अस्तित्व ? ''
It रै been the विषय of much philosophical, scientific, and theological अटकलें throughout history.
There have महरूम a विशाल क्रमांक of proposed answers to ये questions इससे अनेक अलग सांस्कृतिक and ideological backgrounds.
The अर्थ of जीवन is in the philosophical और धार्मिक conceptions of existence, सोशल ties, consciousness, and happiness, और सीमायें on many other issues, ऐसे as सांकेतिक meaning, सत्तामीमांसा, मान, purpose, ethics, good and evil, free will, the अस्तित्व of one or multiple देवताओं, conceptions of God, the आत्मा, और the afterlife.
वैज्ञानिक contributions फ़ोकस primarily on describing सम्बन्धित अनुभवजन्य तथ्य about the universe, exploring the context और parameters concerning the 'how ' of life.
Science also अध्ययन and can provide recommendations for the pursuit of well-being and a related conception of नैतिकता.
An alternative, humanistic approach poses the question `` What is the अर्थ of my life ? ''
The मान of the question pertaining to the purpose of life may coincide with the उपलब्धि of ultimate reality, or a feeling of oneness, or भी a अहसास of sacredness.
परिवार Guy creator Seth macfarlane also provides the आवाज़ें of पीटर griffin, Stewie griffin, ब्रायन Griffin, and Glenn कीचड़.
परिवार Guy is an अमरीकी एनिमेटेड sitcom कि features five प्रमुख आवाज़ अभिनेताओं, and numerous regular डाल and recurring guest stars.
The principal voice cast consists of show creator Seth MacFarlane, Alex borstein, Seth ग्रीन, Mila Kunis ( जो replaced लेसी Chabert बाद the first season ) और माइक हेनरी and अभी, the new actor Beau Osborne.
Recurring voice actors include Patrick Warburton, आदम West, John G. ब्रेनन, Nicole Sullivan और Jennifer Tilly, and repeat अतिथि सितारों शामिल Phyllis diller, चार्ल्स durning, फटाफट limbaugh, और Phil lamarr.
अनेक डाल members provide voices for multiple वर्ण.
the voice अभिनेताओं, in portraying the विभिन्न character personalities on the show, draw प्रेरणा from celebrities and pop संस्कृति.
Family Guy characters have been निभाई by अधिक than one actor, बाद members of the दिखाएँ left the series or had conflicting दायित्वों.

`` the राजकुमारी और the Pea '' ( ; literal अनुवाद : `` The राजकुमारी on the Pea '' ) is a literary fairy टेल by Hans Christian Andersen परिचय a young स्त्री whose royal identity is स्थापित by a test of her physical संवेदनशीलता.
The tale was पहला published साथ three others by andersen in an inexpensive पुस्तिका on 8 may 1835 in Copenhagen by c.a. Reitzel.
Andersen had सुना the story as a child, and it संभावित has इसके source in लोक material, संभवतः originating from स्वीडन as it is unknown in the डैनिश मौखिक परंपरा.
Neither `` The राजकुमारी और the Pea '' nor Andersen 's other किस्से of 1835 were well received by डैनिश आलोचकों, जो disliked their कैज़ुअल, chatty स्टाइल, and their lack of morals.
In 1959 `` The Princess and the Pea '' was adapted to the musical stage in a production called एकबार Upon a Mattress starring Carol burnett.
German Americans ( ) are citizens of the United राज्य who were either born in Germany or हैं of German ancestry.
They comprise परिचय 50 लाख लोगों, बनाना उन्हें the largest ancestry group ahead of आयरिश Americans, अफ़्रीकी Americans और अंग्रेज़ी अमेरिकी.
वे comprise परिचय 1/3 of the German diaspora सब over the world.
None of the जर्मनी राज्य had New World colonies.
Not जबतक the 1670s did the पहला significant समूह of German immigrants arrive in the अंग्रेजों colonies, settling primarily in New यॉर्क and पेन्सिलवेनिया.
आव्रजन continued in very large numbers दौरान the 19th century, with some आठ million आमद इससे Germany.
They were खींचा by the attractions of land और धार्मिक freedom, and pushed आउट of Europe by shortages of जमीन and religious or political oppression.
Many arrived seeking धार्मिक or राजनैतिक freedom, अन्य for आर्थिक opportunities वृहद than those in Europe, और others बस for the chance to start भैस in the New संसार.
the आमद before 1850 यहूद ज़्यादातर किसानो who sought out the most उत्पादक land, जहाँ their intensive खेती techniques would pay बंद.
After 1840, many came to cities, where `` germania '' —German-speaking districts—soon emerged.
German अमेरिकी established the पहला kindergartens in the संयुक्त राज्य, introduced the क्रिसमस पेड़ tradition, और originated popular अमरीकी भोजन such as hot dogs and hamburgers.
German अमरीकी जश्न are आयोजित throughout the country, एक of the most well-known होने the German-American steuben Parade in नई York नगर, held every third शनिवार in सितंबर.
वहीँ are भी major annual कार्यक्रम in Chicago, Cincinnati, Milwaukee, पिट्सबर्ग, st. लुई and अन्य शहरों.
Like many other immigrants कि आए to the संयुक्त राज्य, an overwhelming क्रमांक of लोगों of जर्मनी or partial जर्मनी descent have essentially become Americanized.
The Preamble to the United राज्य संविधान is a brief introductory statement of the Constitution 's fundamental उद्देश्य और guiding सिद्धान्त.
It राज्य in सामान्य terms, and courts have referred to it as विश्वसनीय evidence of, the founding Fathers ' intentions regarding the संविधान 's meaning and कया they hoped the Constitution होता achieve as it pertains to all of the people of the संयुक्त States.
As the phrase, `` we the people '' suggests that the नई government originates इससे the people of the संयुक्त States और it sets into motion a सवाल as it pertains to that vast population concerning the व्यक्तिगत rights और equality among all people ; this can be देखी most broadly in the divide between republicanism and सोशल लोकतंत्र.
the इतिहास of the Internet began with the development of electronic computers in the 1950s.
The पब्लिक was पहला introduced to the concepts कि would सीसे to the Internet जब a संदेश was sent over the ARPANet इससे computer science Professor Leonard Kleinrock 's laboratory at विश्वविद्यालयों of California, Los एंजिल्स ( ucla ), after the दूसरी piece of network उपकरण थी संस्थापित at स्टैनफोर्ड शोध संस्थान ( श्री ).
पैकेट switched संजाल such as arpanet, चिह्नित I at NPL in the uk, cyclades, Merit Network, tymnet, and Telenet, were developed in the लेट 1960s and early 1970s using a किस्में of प्रोटोकॉल.
The ARPANET in particular led to the विकास of protocols for internetworking, in जिससे अनेक separate networks could be joined together into a संजाल of networks.
In 1982, the अंतरजाल प्रोटोकॉल suite ( tcp/ip ) was standardized, और नतीजतन, the concept of a world-wide संजाल of interconnected TCP/IP संजाल, पुकारा the अंतरजाल, थी introduced.
Access to the ARPANET थी expanded in 1981 जब the National विज्ञान Foundation ( nsf ) developed the कंप्यूटर विज्ञान Network ( CSNET ) and again in 1986 जब NSFNET provided अभिगम to महासंगणक sites in the संयुक्त States इससे शोध and शिक्षा संगठन.
Commercial Internet service providers ( isps ) began to emerge in the late 1980s और जल्दी 1990s.
The ARPANET was decommissioned in 1990.
The Internet was commercialized in 1995 when NSFNET थी decommissioned, निकालना the पिछला restrictions on the use of the अंतरजाल to carry वाणिज्यिक traffic.
Since the mid-1990s, the Internet रै था a revolutionary impact on culture और कॉमर्स, सहित the वृद्धि of near-instant communication by electronic मेल, तत्काल messaging, Voice over Internet Protocol ( VoIP ) `` phone calls '', two-way इंटरैक्टिव video calls, and the संसार Wide Web with its चर्चा forums, blogs, सोशल networking, और online shopping साइट.
the research और education community continues to develop और use advanced networks such as NSF 's बहुत high speed रीढ़ Network Service ( vbns ), internet2, and National lambdarail.
Increasing amounts of आंकड़ा are transmitted at उच्चतर and उच्चतर speeds over fiber optic संजाल operating at 1-Gbit/s, 10-Gbit/s, or more.
The Internet 's कब्ज़ा over the वैश्विक संचार landscape was almost तत्काल in ऐतिहासिक terms : it तभी communicated 1 % of the सूचना बहती through two-way telecommunications networks in the year 1993, already 51 % by 2000, और अधिक than 97 % of the telecommunicated information by 2007.
Today the Internet continues to grow, driven by कभी greater amounts of online information, कॉमर्स, entertainment, और social नेटवर्किंग.
दक्षिणपश्चिम Airlines Co. ( ) is a प्रमुख u.S. airline and the संसार 's largest low-cost carrier, headquartered in डलास, टेक्सास.
It was established in 1967 और adopted its वर्तमान name in 1971.
the एयरलाइन has more than 46,000 कर्मचारी and operates more than 3,400 फ़्लाइट per day.
as of जून 5, 2011, it carries the most domestic passengers of कोई U.S. airline.
as of April 2013, दक्षिणपश्चिम एयरलाइंस has scheduled सेवा to 84 गंतव्यों in 41 राज्य और प्यूर्टो Rico.
दक्षिणपश्चिम Airlines रै solely operated Boeing 737s, except for a few सालो in the 1970s and 1980s, when it संचालित Boeing 727s.
As of अगस्त 2012, दक्षिणपश्चिम is the largest operator of the 737 विश्वव्यापी with over 550 in service, प्रत्येक operating an average of six flights प्रति day.
In May 2011, the एयरलाइन acquired airtran Airways, with संयोजन of the वाहक expected to be complete by 2014.
On March 1, 2012, the company थी जारी a single ऑपरेटिंग certificate, technically becoming one एयरलाइन.
रोलिंग चट्टान is a 4.6 % abv pale lager launched in 1939 by the Latrobe Brewing कम्पनी.
Although संस्थापित as a लोकल beer in Western Pennsylvania, it was marketed aggressively और आखिरकार became a national उत्पाद.
The brand थी sold to Anheuser-Busch of St. Louis, मिसौरी, in mid 2006, जिससे transferred brewing operations to New Jersey.
बेनेडिक्ट xvi (,, ; born जोसेफ aloisius ratzinger on 16 अप्रैल 1927 ) is Pope emeritus of the Catholic Church.
He परोसा as पोप इससे 2005 to 2013.
In that position, he was both the नेता of the Catholic गिरिजाघर and Sovereign of the वेटिकन City राज्य.
Benedict was निर्वाचित on 19 April 2005 in a papal conclave, celebrated उसके Papal Inauguration द्रव्यमान on 24 April 2005, और took कब्ज़ा of his गिरजाघर, the archbasilica of st. John Lateran, on 7 May 2005.
ordained as a priest in 1951 in उसके native बायर्न, Ratzinger established himself as a highly regarded विश्वविद्यालयों theologian by the late 1950s और थी नियुक्त a full professor in 1958.
After a long करियर as an academic, सेवारत as a professor of theology at several German universities—the last होने the University of Regensburg, where he served as वाइस President of the विश्वविद्यालयों in 1976 and 1977—he was appointed archbishop of म्यूनिख और freising and cardinal by Pope Paul VI in 1977, an unusual प्रमोशन for किसी साथ छोटी pastoral अनुभव.
in 1981, he settled in Rome when he became Prefect of the सभा for the Doctrine of the Faith, one of the सबसे महत्वपूर्ण dicasteries of the Roman curia.
From 2002 until his election as पोप, he was also Dean of the College of कार्डिनल्स, and as such, the primus इंटर pares among the cardinals.
Prior to becoming पोप, he was `` a major फिगर on the Vatican स्टेज for a quarter of a सदी '' as `` एक of the सबसे respected, influential और विवादास्पद members of the College of Cardinals '' ; he had an influence `` second to none when it came to सेटिंग गिरिजाघर priorities और दिशानिर्देश '' as one of Pope John Paul ii 's closest confidants.
He was originally a उदार theologian, but adopted conservative views बाद 1968.
उसके prolific writings defend traditional कैथोलिक doctrine and values.
दौरान his papacy, Benedict xvi advocated a return to आधारभूत ईसाई values to counter the increased secularisation of अनेक पश्चिमी countries.
he दृश्य relativism 's denial of उद्देश्य सच्चाई, and the denial of moral truths in particular, as the central problem of the 21st सदी.
He taught the importance of दोनो the कैथोलिक Church and an understanding of God 's redemptive love.
पोप Benedict also revived a number of परंपराओं including elevating the Tridentine द्रव्यमान to a more prominent position.
He नवीनीकृत the relationship between the कैथोलिक गिरिजाघर और art, viewing the उपयोग of beauty as a path to the sacred, promoted the use of Latin, और reintroduced traditional papal garments, for जिससे reason he was पुकारा `` the पोप of aesthetics ''.
he has been described as `` the main intellectual force in the गिरिजाघर '' since the mid-1980s.
अनेक of Pope बेनेडिक्ट 's students from उसके अकादमिक करियर are also prominent churchmen today and confidantes of him, notably Christoph Schönborn.
on 11 February 2013, पोप बेनेडिक्ट announced his resignation in a speech in लैटिन before the कार्डिनल्स, citing a `` lack of शक्ति of mind and body '' due to his advanced age.
उसके resignation became effective on 28 फ़रवरी 2013.
He is the पहला पोप to इस्तीफा since पोप ग्रेगरी XII in 1415, and the first to do so on his अपना पहल चूंकि Pope celestine V in 1294.
as pope emeritus, Benedict retains the style of उसके Holiness, and the शीर्षक of Pope, and होगा continue to dress in the papal colour of white.
He was succeeded by Pope Francis on 13 March 2013, और he स्थानांतरित into the newly renovated मेटर Ecclesiae मठ लिये उसके retirement on 2 May 2013..

kaiser-panorama consisted of a multi-station viewing apparatus and sets of stereo स्लाइड.
Patented by A. fuhrmann around 1890.
कम्पनी of महिलाओं watching stereoscopic छायाचित्र, painting by Jacob Spoel, before 1868.
A very early चित्रण of people using a stereoscope.
Stereoscopy ( भी called stereoscopics or 3d imaging ) is a technique लिये creating or बढ़ाना the illusion of depth in an image by means of stereopsis लिये binocular vision.
The शब्द stereoscopy derives from the Greek `` στερεός '' ( stereos ), `` firm, ठोस '' + `` σκοπέω '' ( skopeō ), `` to dekh '', `` to देखिए ''.
Most stereoscopic methods present दो offset images separately to the left and right नजर of the viewer.
ये two-dimensional images are then combined in the दिमाग to दे the perception of 3D गहराई.
इस technique is विशिष्ट इससे 3D displays कि display an image in three पूरा आयाम, allowing the observer to increase information about the 3-dimensional objects being displayed by सिर और eye आंदोलनों.
John Adams ( October 30, 1735 ( O.S. October 19, 1735 ) – जुलाई 4, 1826 ) was the second president of the United States ( 1797–1801 ), having पहले served as the first vice president of the United States.
An अमरीकी Founding Father, he was a statesman, diplomat, और a अग्रणी एडवोकेट of American स्वतंत्रता इससे Great Britain.
Well educated, he थी an आत्मज्ञान राजनैतिक theorist who प्रचारित republicanism और लिखा prolifically परिचय his often seminal विचार, both in प्रकाशित works and in अक्षर to उसके wife and key adviser Abigail as well as to अन्य Founding Fathers.
Adams आए to prominence in the जल्दी चरण of the अमरीकी Revolution.
A वकील and public figure in Boston, as a delegate इससे Massachusetts to the Continental Congress, he played a leading भूमिका in persuading कॉंग्रेस to घोषित स्वतंत्रता.
he assisted थामस Jefferson in drafting the Declaration of स्वतंत्रता in 1776, और थी its primary advocate in the कॉंग्रेस.
बाद, as a राजनयिक in Europe, he helped negotiate the eventual peace सन्धि with ग्रेट ब्रिटेन, and थी जिम्मेदार for obtaining vital सरकारी loans इससे Amsterdam बैंकर्स.
A political theorist और historian, Adams largely wrote the Massachusetts संविधान in 1780, जिससे साथ with उसके earlier विचार on सरकारी, influenced अमरीकी राजनैतिक विचार.
एक of उसके महानतम roles was as a judge of character : in 1775, he मनोनीत जार्ज वॉशिंगटन to be commander-in-chief, and 25 सालो later nominated John मार्शल to be मुख्य इंसाफ of the United राज्य.
एडम्स ' revolutionary credentials secured him two शर्तें as जार्ज Washington 's वाइस president and his own election in 1796 as the second president.
During उसके एक term, he encountered ferocious हमले by the Jeffersonian Republicans, as खूब as the dominant faction in his own federalist Party led by उसके कड़वा दुश्मन सिकंदर हैमिल्टन.
Adams हस्ताक्षरित the विवादास्पद एलियन और Sedition Acts, और built up the army और नेवी especially in the face of an undeclared naval war ( called the `` Quasi-War `` ) with फ़्रांस, 1798–1800.
The प्रमुख accomplishment of his प्रेसिडेंसी was his peaceful resolution of the विरोध in the face of हैमिल्टन 's opposition.
in 1800, Adams was defeated for re-election by Thomas Jefferson और रिटायर्ड to मैसाचुसेट्स.
he बाद resumed his friendship with Jefferson.
he and his wife, अबीगैल Adams, founded an accomplished family line of राजनेता, diplomats, और इतिहासकारों अभी referred to as the Adams राजनैतिक family.
Adams was the father of John क्विंसी एडम्स, the छठे President of the United राज्य.
उसके achievements have received greater recognition in modern टाइम्स, हालांकि उसके contributions were not initially as celebrated as those of other संस्थापकों.
Adams was the first u.S. अध्यक्ष to reside in the भवन कि eventually became ज्ञात as the White हाउस.
the United States ten-dollar विधेयक ( $ 10 ) is a denomination of संयुक्त States करेंसी.
the पहला U.S. Secretary of the Treasury ( 1789–95 ), सिकंदर हैमिल्टन, is currently featured on the obverse of the bill, while the u.S. राजकोष भवन is प्रदर्शित on the रिवर्स.
( Hamilton is one of two non-presidents प्रदर्शित on currently issued u.S. bills.
The other is बेंजामिन फ्रैंकलिन, on the $ 100 bill.
Hamilton is एक of तभी four people प्रदर्शित on u.S. paper करेंसी ( 1861 to the उपस्थित ) who was नहीं born in the continental United States, as he थी from the वेस्ट Indies.
The अन्य are : Albert gallatin, Switzerland ( $ 500 1862/63 विधिक Tender ) ; जार्ज Meade, स्पेन ( $ 1,000 1890/91 Treasury नोट ) ; and Robert मॉरिस, इंग्लैण्ड ( $ 1,000 1862/63 विधिक Tender ; $ 10 1878/80 चांदी Certificate ).
In जोड, kamehameha i, appears on the 2008 हवाई राज्य क्वार्टर. )
सब $ 10 bills issued आज हैं संघीय Reserve टीप.
the ब्यूरो of नक्काशी और Printing says the average जीवन of a $ 10 bill in circulation is 18 महीने पहले it is replaced due to wear.
लगभग 6 % of सब US banknotes मुद्रित in 2009 were $ 10 bills.
Ten dollar bills are वितरित by Federal Reserve Banks in पीला straps.
The source of the फेस on the $ 10 विधेयक is जॉन trumbull ’s 1805 पोर्ट्रेट of Hamilton that belongs to the portrait collection of नई यॉर्क City Hall.
the $ 10 bill is the only U.S. paper currency in परिसंचरण in which the portrait faces to the बाएँ ( the $ 100,000 bill featured a portrait of Woodrow विल्सन facing to the left, but was प्रयुक्त only for intra-government transactions ).

A jetboat is a नाव propelled by a jet of water ejected इससे the back of the craft.
Unlike a powerboat or motorboat that uses a propeller in the water below or पीछे the boat, a jetboat draws the water इससे under the boat into a pump inside the नाव, then expels it through a nozzle at the stern.
Jetboats यहूद originally designed by Sir William Hamilton ( who विकसित a waterjet in 1954 ) for आपरेशन in the fast-flowing और shallow rivers of नई Zealand, specifically to overcome the प्रॉब्लम of propellers striking rocks in such waters.
पिछला attempts at waterjet नोदन had बहुत छोटी lifetimes, generally due to the inefficient design of the units and the fact कि they offered few लाभ over conventional propellers.
नापसंद ये previous waterjet developments, such as Campini 's और the hanley Hydrojet, हैमिल्टन had a specific need for a नोदन प्रणाली to operate in very-shallow water, और the waterjet proved to be the ideal समाधान.
इससे this, the लोकप्रियता of the जेट unit and jetboat increased rapidly.
Through further developments, it was found the waterjet offered several अन्य लाभ over propellers for a wide दायरा of पोत types, and as such, waterjets are used widely आज for अनेक high-speed vessels, सहित यात्री ferries, rescue craft, पैट्रोल boats and offshore सप्लाई vessels.
Jetboats are highly maneuverable, और अनेक can, from पूरा speed, be reversed और brought to a stop within little more than उनके own length, in a maneuver known as a `` crash रोकें ''.
The well known Hamilton turn or `` jet spin '' is a high-speed maneuvre जहाँ the नाव 's इंजन throttle is काटें, the steering is turned sharply and the throttle opened again, causing the boat to spin quickly around साथ a विशाल स्प्रे of water.
There is no अभियान्त्रिकी सीमा to the आकार of jetboats, though the वैध of their उपयोग depends a लॉट on the प्रकार of application.
Classic prop-drives are generally more efficient and economical at कम speeds, up to परिचय, but as boat गति increases परे this, the extra हल resistance generated by struts, rudders, shafts ( etc. ) means waterjets हैं अधिक efficient in the 20-50 knot दायरा ( up to ).
Also, in परिस्थितियों with बहुत विशाल propellers turning at slow speeds ( ऐसे as tug boats ), the equivalent आकार waterjet would be too big to be व्यावहारिक.
लिये these reasons, the vast majority of waterjet इकाई are installed in high-speed vessels और in particular situations where shallow draught, maneuverability, और load flexibility are main चिंताएं.
the biggest jet-driven बरतन are found in सैन्य use or the high-speed passenger/car ferry industry.
दक्षिण अफ़्रीकी 's s ( approximately long ) हैं the biggest jet-propelled vessels so far.
Even ये German-built vessels are capable of performing `` crash stops ''.
Uveitis is broadly defined as inflammation of the uvea.
the uvea consists of the middle, pigmented, vascular structures of the नजर और includes the आईरिस, ciliary body, और choroid.
Uveitis requires an तात्कालिक referral and thorough examination by an ophthalmologist or optometrist साथ with urgent treatment to control the सूजन.

मर्फी is a fictional character on the comedy-drama television series अनुगामी.
He is played by केविन connolly.
the Shining is a 1980 psychological हॉरर film produced and निर्देशित by स्टेनली Kubrick, co-written with novelist Diane Johnson, और अभिनीत Jack Nicholson, Shelley duvall, Scatman crothers, and Danny लॉयड.
The film is आधारित on the Stephen King अनोखा The जगमगाता.
A लेखक, जोकर Torrance, takes a job as an off-season कार्यवाहक at an isolated hotel.
His young son possesses psychic abilities and is able to see बाते इससे the past और future, ऐसे as the ghosts who inhabit the hotel.
जल्द बाद settling in, the family is trapped in the होटल by a snowstorm, and Jack धीरे becomes बहकावे by a supernatural presence ; he उतरता into दीवानगी and कोशिशें to murder his wife and बेटे.
Unlike पिछला Kubrick films, जिससे विकसित an दर्शक धीरे by building on word-of-mouth, The Shining was released as a mass-market film, opening at पहला in बस two शहरों on Memorial Day, then देशभर a माह बाद.
Although initial response to the film was mixed, बाद critical assessment was अधिक favorable and it is अभी viewed as a classic of the हॉरर genre.
Film director मार्टिन Scorsese, लिखने in the रोज़ जानवर, क्रमित it as एक of the 11 scariest हॉरर फिल्मों of all time.
Film critics, film students, and Kubrick 's निर्माता, जन Harlan, have remarked on the enormous influence the फिल्मी has था on popular culture.
the initial European रिलीज of The Shining थी 25 minutes shorter than the अमरीकी संस्करण, हासिल by removing most of the दृश्यों taking प्लेस outside the environs of the होटल.
Patio Cola Bottle
आँगन Diet Cola थी a brand of आहार soda introduced by Pepsi in 1963.
It was created in जवाब to आहार Rite Cola, which थी the first आहार cola on the मार्केट.
फ़िटनेस promoter Debbie ड्रेक was Patio Diet Cola 's spokesperson.
In 1964, Patio released orange, grape, और रूट बियर flavors.
This flavor line थी नहीं meant to compete with brands like नारंगी Crush, लकिन बल्कि भरण out the लकीर.
Patio sodas यहूद available in the cold-bottle market : grocery and mom-and-pop स्टोर्स.
विज्ञापन for आँगन थी comparatively scarce ; at the समय, bottlers were regionally franchised, and related advertising थी necessarily लोकल.
in 1964, Patio diet cola became Diet Pepsi.
The newly branded diet soda थी advertised alongside Pepsi with the टैगलाइन `` Pepsi either रास्ता '', which replaced the स्लोगन `` dances with स्वाद ''.
The short जीवन span of आँगन आहार कोला makes it a ग्रेट जोड लिये bottle collectors.
Most of the बाकी Patio line of flavors यहूद phased out by the जल्दी 1970s, जबकि a few बच जबतक the mid 70s
Infrastructure is basic शारीरिक and organizational structures needed for the operation of a society or एंटरप्राइज़, or the services and facilities जरुरी लिये an economy to function.
It can be generally पारिभाषित as the नियत of interconnected structural elements कि provide framework supporting an entire ढांचा of development.
it is an important term for judging a देश or प्रदेश 's विकास.
the term typically refers to the technical structures कि support a society, ऐसे as roads, पुलों, जल supply, sewers, electrical ग्रिड, दूरसंचार, और so forth, और can be पारिभाषित as `` the physical components of interrelated systems providing commodities और services अनिवार्य to enable, sustain, or बढ़ाएँ societal जीना शर्तें. ''
viewed functionally, infrastructure facilitates the उत्पादन of goods and services, और also the distribution of समाप्त उत्पाद to बाज़ार, as well as basic social सेवाएं such as schools and अस्पताल ; for example, roads enable the हस्तांतरण of raw materials to a factory.
in military parlance, the term refers to the buildings और permanent संस्थापना जरुरी for the support, redeployment, and operation of military शक्तियां.
To make it simple, अवसंरचना is anything कि is needed everyday, an everyday मद.
A graphical representation of the ideal इंसान karyotype
mitochondrial डीएनए.
इंसान genetic विभिन्नता is the genetic differences both भीतर and among populations.
There may be multiple variants of कोई given gene in the इंसान जनसांख्यिकी ( genes ), leading to बहुरूपता.
अनेक genes हैं not polymorphic, meaning कि तभी a सिंगल allele is present in the जनसांख्यिकी : the जीन is then कहा to be fixed.
no दो इंसानो हैं genetically identical.
Even monozygotic twins, जो develop from one zygote, have infrequent genetic मतभेद due to mutations occurring during विकास and gene नक़ल number variation.
Differences between individuals, भी closely related individuals, are the कुंजी to techniques such as जेनेटिक fingerprinting.
alleles occur at अलग frequencies in अलग human populations, साथ populations that हैं अधिक geographically and ancestrally रिमोट tending to differ more.
Causes of मतभेद between individuals include the एक्सचेंज of जीनों during meiosis और various mutational कार्यक्रम.
वहीँ are at तनिक two reasons क्यों जेनेटिक विभिन्नता exists between populations.
Natural selection may confer an adaptive लाभ to individuals in a specific पर्यावरण if an allele provides a competitive advantage.
Alleles अंतर्गत चयन are likely to occur तभी in those geographic regions जहाँ वे confer an advantage.
The second main कारण of genetic variation is due to the ऊँची degree of neutrality of most mutations.
सबसे mutations do not appear to have कोई selective प्रभाव one way or the other on the सजीव.
The main कारण is genetic drift, this is the effect of यादृच्छिक changes in the gene pool.
in humans, founder effect and past small population आकार ( increasing the likelihood of genetic drift ) may have had an महत्वपूर्ण influence in न्यूट्रल मतभेद between populations.
The theory that इंसानो recently migrated आउट of अफ़्रीकी supports this.
The study of इंसान genetic विभिन्नता रै both evolutionary significance और medical applications.
It can सहायता scientists समझे ancient इंसान population migrations as well as how अलग इंसान समूह हैं biologically सम्बन्धित to एक another.
For आयुर्विज्ञान, पढ़ाई of human जेनेटिक variation may be important because कुछ disease-causing alleles occur more often in people from विशिष्ट geographic regions.
New findings दिखाएँ कि प्रत्येक human has on average 60 new mutations compared to their अभिभावक.
Apart इससे mutations, many जीनों कि may have aided humans in ancient टाइम्स प्लेग इंसानो आज.
लिये example, it is suspected कि जीनों that allow इंसानो to more efficiently process खाना हैं those कि make people susceptible to मोटापा and मधुमेह आज.
Tea Party प्रदर्शनकारियों on the West लॉन of the u.S. Capitol and the National Mall at the Taxpayer March on Washington on September 12, 2009.
The चाय पार्टी movement is an American political गति that advocates strict adherence to the संयुक्त States Constitution, reducing U.S. government बिता और taxes, और reduction of the U.S. नेशनल debt and federal budget deficit.
the movement रै been called partly रूढ़िवादी, partly libertarian, and partly populist.
The movement रै sponsored protests and supported political उम्मीदवार चूंकि 2009.
The नाम of the गति is derived इससे the बोस्टन Tea पार्टी of 1773, an iconic event in अमरीकी history.
Anti-tax प्रदर्शनकारियों in the संयुक्त States have often referred to the असली Boston Tea Party for प्रेरणा.
References to the बोस्टन चाय पार्टी यहूद भाग of Tax Day protests आयोजित throughout the 1990s और पहले.
by 2001, a custom था developed among कुछ conservative कार्यकर्ताओं of mailing tea bags to legislators और अन्य officials as a symbolic act.
the मुद्राएँ of Puerto Rico closely follow the historic development of प्यूर्टो रीको.
As a उपनिवेश of Spain and the United राज्य, प्यूर्टो Rico थी granted the उपयोग of both foreign और प्रांतीय currencies.
following the Spanish colonization in 1502, प्यूर्टो रीको became an महत्वपूर्ण port, with इसके own सप्लाई of gold.
However, as the खनिज reserves भागा खाली within the century, the archipelago 's अर्थव्यवस्था suffered.
The Spanish क्राउन issued the Situado mexicano, which meant कि a semi-regular shipment of सुनहरा from the viceroyalty of नई स्पेन would be भेजा to the island, as a रास्ता to provide economic support.
Between 1636 and 1637, Philip IV of Spain imposed a tax which had to be paid using a revenue स्टैम्प.
Inspired by इस, Puerto Rico began producing banknotes in 1766, becoming the पहला colony to print 8- real banknotes in the Spanish Empire और जिससे in the स्पेनी government 's approval of subsequent मुद्दे.
the situado was discontinued दौरान the 19th century, बनाना an आर्थिक crisis, as a result of Mexico gaining its independence इससे Spain.
Salvador meléndez Bruna, the colonial governor in office, ordered the issue of provincial banknotes, creating the Puerto Rican पेसो.
however, मुद्रण of these banknotes ceased बाद 1815.
दौरान the following decades, foreign coins became the फैली करेंसी.
In the 1860s and 1870s, banknotes reemerged.
on फ़रवरी 1, 1890, the banco Español de Puerto रीको was inaugurated और began issuing banknotes.
The bank designed four श्रेणी और लगाई three in परिसंचरण अंतर्गत Spanish rule.
In 1895, a Royal डिक्री ordered the production of provincial पेसो सिक्के.
On August 13, 1898, the Spanish-American युद्ध ended with स्पेन ceding प्यूर्टो रीको to the United States.
The banco Español de Puerto रीको थी renamed Bank of पोर्टो रीको and जारी bills समतुल्य to the United States डालर, creating the प्यूर्टो Rican डालर.
In 1902, the First नेशनल Bank of पोर्टो रीको जारी banknotes in a समानांतर manner.
दो अधिक श्रेणी यहूद issued until 1913.
After Puerto Rico 's economy and monetary system was fully integrated into the संयुक्त States ' आर्थिक और monetary system, the प्यूर्टो rican डॉलर were redeemed for those issued by the संयुक्त राज्य राजकोष.
The peso और डालर have been followed by अन्य समकालीन issues, including commemorative banknotes, private currency, और a quarter सिक्का designed साथ फोर्ट सैन Felipe del morro in the face.
Pepsi ( stylized in lowercase as पेप्सी, formerly stylized in uppercase as PEPSI ) is a carbonated नरम drink that is produced और manufactured by PepsiCo.
Created and विकसित in 1893 और introduced as Brad 's पेय, it थी renamed as Pepsi-Cola on August 28, 1898, then to Pepsi in 1961.
The Book of ezekiel is the third of the latter Prophets in the Hebrew बाइबल, following the किताबे of यशायाह and Jeremiah और preceding the किताब of the Twelve.
( the order is somewhat different in the Christian Old Testament ).
It derives its name from, and रिकॉर्ड the visions of, the 6th सदी bc priest and prophet Ezekiel.
According to the book, the prophet, exiled in बाबुल, experienced a श्रेणी of सात visions during the 22 सालो from 593 to 571 bc, a period जिससे spans the फाइनल destruction of Jerusalem in 586.
The visions, and the किताब, are structured around three themes : ( 1 ) judgment on Israel ( chapters 1-24 ) ; ( 2 ) judgment on the nations ( chapters 25-32 ) ; and भविष्य blessings लिये इसराईल ( अध्याय 33-48 ).
New ऑरलियन्स ( or, locally or ; ) is a major United राज्य port और the largest नगर और metropolitan क्षेत्रफल in the state of Louisiana.
The population of the नगर was 343,829 as of the 2010 U.S. Census.
the New Orleans metropolitan area ( नई Orleans–Metairie–Kenner महानगर Statistical क्षेत्रफल ) had a जनसांख्यिकी of 1,167,764 in 2010 और was the 46th largest in the संयुक्त राज्य.
The New Orleans–Metairie–Bogalusa Combined Statistical Area, a larger trading क्षेत्रफल, था a 2010 जनसांख्यिकी of 1,214,932.
The city is नामित बाद Orléans, a city located on the loire River in Centre, France, and is खूब known for its distinct फ्रेंच Creole architecture, as well as इसके cross-cultural and multilingual विरासत.
नई ऑरलियन्स is also प्रसिद्ध लिये its भोजन, music ( particularly as the birthplace of jazz ), और इसके सालाना celebrations और त्यौहार, most notably Mardi ग्रा.
The नगर is often referred to as the `` most unique '' in America.
New Orleans is located in southeastern louisiana, straddling the Mississippi River.
the city and Orleans Parish ( ) हैं.
The नगर और parish are bounded by the parishes of st. tammany to the north, St. Bernard to the ईस्ट, Plaquemines to the दक्षिण and Jefferson to the south and west.
Lake pontchartrain, part of which is शामिल in the city limits, झूठ to the उत्तर और झील Borgne lies to the east.
the National जनम कंट्रोल लीग थी a जनम control organization in the United राज्य.
it थी founded in March 1915 by Mary Dennett, Clara Gruening stillman and Jessie एशले.
Its प्रमुख purpose was to overturn the laws which banned contraceptives from the U.S. mails.
Campaigns were mounted in नई York, but in 1919 the League was disbanded and reformed into the voluntary Parenthood League.
Cancer, ज्ञात medically as a malignant neoplasm, is a broad समूह of विभिन्न रोगों, all involving unregulated कोशिका विकास.
In कर्कट, कोशिकाएं divide and grow uncontrollably, forming malignant tumors, और invade nearby parts of the देह.
the कर्कट may also स्प्रेड to more दूर parts of the body through the lymphatic system or bloodstream.
Not all tumors are cancerous.
Benign tumors do not grow uncontrollably, do not invade neighboring ऊतकों, और do not spread throughout the देह.
There are over 200 अलग ज्ञात cancers that afflict इंसानो.
Determining what कल्याणकारी कर्कट is complex.
Many बाते are ज्ञात to increase the रिस्क of कर्कट, including tobacco use, certain infections, radiation, lack of शारीरिक कार्यकलाप, मोटापा, and पर्यावरणीय प्रदूषक.
These can सीधे damage genes or combine with मौजूदा genetic faults भीतर कोशिकाएं to कारण the disease.
Approximately five to टेन प्रतिशत of cancers are entirely hereditary.
कर्कट can be detected in a number of तरीके, including the presence of certain signs और लक्षण, screening tests, or medical imaging.
Once a संभावित कर्कट is detected it is diagnosed by microscopic examination of a tissue sample.
Cancer is प्रायः treated साथ chemotherapy, radiation चिकित्सा and surgery.
The chances of surviving the disease vary greatly by the type और location of the cancer and the extent of बीमारी at the start of treatment.
While cancer can affect लोगों of सब आयु, और a few प्रकार of cancer are अधिक आम in children, the risk of developing cancer generally increases with आयु.
In 2007, कर्कट caused about 13 % of all human मौतों worldwide ( 7.9 million ).
Rates हैं rising as more people live to an बूढ़ा age और as mass lifestyle परिवर्तन occur in the विकासशील world.
