Skiing is a recreational activity and competitive खेल in which the participant attaches long runners or skis to boots or shoes on the फीट and uses them to travel on शीर्ष of हिम.
aside इससे recreation और competition, स्कीइंग has महरूम used for military purposes और भी travelling in क्षेत्रों that अनुभव भारी snowfall.
Many types of प्रतिस्पर्धी स्कीइंग कार्यक्रम are पहचाना by the अंतरराष्ट्रीय Olympic Committee, and the International स्की Federation.
John मेनार्ड keynes, 1st सामन्त Keynes, cb, FBA ( ; 5 June 1883 – 21 April 1946 ) थी a British अर्थशास्त्री whose ideas have fundamentally affected the सिद्धान्त और practice of modern macroeconomics, and सूचित the आर्थिक policies of governments.
He built on and greatly परिष्कृत पहले कार्य on the causes of कारोबार चक्र, and is widely considered to be one of the संस्थापकों of modern macroeconomics and the सबसे influential अर्थशास्त्री of the 20th century.
His ideas are the basis for the school of thought known as keynesian economics, as well as its various offshoots.
In many ways, subsequent developments in 20th सदी अर्थशास्त्र can be viewed as either भवन on keynes ' विचार or reacting against उन्हें.
In the 1930s, Keynes spearheaded a क्रान्ति in आर्थिक thinking, overturning the पुरानी विचार of neoclassical economics that held कि फ़्री markets would, in the short to मीडियम पद, automatically provide पूरा employment, as long as मजदूर यहूद flexible in उनके wage demands.
keynes instead argued that aggregate माँग determined the overall स्तर of आर्थिक कार्यकलाप, and that अपर्याप्त aggregate माँग could lead to prolonged अवधि of high unemployment.
he advocated the use of फिस्कल and monetary उपायों to mitigate the प्रतिकूल प्रभाव of economic recessions and depressions.
following the outbreak of the Second World युद्ध, keynes 's विचार concerning economic नीति यहूद अपनाया by अग्रणी पश्चिमी economies.
In 1942, Keynes was awarded a खानदानी peerage as Baron keynes of Tilton in the County of ससेक्स.
Keynes died in 1946, but during the 1950s and 1960s the कामयाबी of keynesian economics resulted in almost all capitalist governments adopting इसके policy recommendations.
Keynes 's influence waned in the 1970s, partly as a परिणाम of समस्याएं that began to पहुँचकर the anglo-american economies from the प्रारंभ of the दशक, and partly क्युकी of critiques इससे Milton फ्राइडमैन and अन्य अर्थशास्त्रियों who were pessimistic about the ability of governments to regulate the कारोबार साईकिल साथ fiscal नीति.
However, the आगमन of the global वित्तीय crisis in 2007 caused a पुनरुत्थान in Keynesian thought.
Keynesian economics provided the सैद्धांतिक underpinning लिये economic नीतियों undertaken in response to the crisis by राष्ट्रपतियों जार्ज W. बुश और Barack Obama of the संयुक्त राज्य, Prime Minister Gordon भूरा of the संयुक्त Kingdom, and अन्य heads of सरकारें.
In 1999, समय पत्रिका शामिल keynes in उनके list of the 100 सबसे महत्वपूर्ण and influential लोगों of the 20th सदी, commenting that : `` His radical idea that सरकारें चाहिए खर्च धन they do n't have may have saved capitalism. ''
In addition to होने an अर्थशास्त्री, keynes was also a civil servant, a director of the अंग्रेजों eugenics Society, a director of the Bank of England, a patron of the कला और an art कलेक्टर, a part of the Bloomsbury समूह of intellectuals, an advisor to अनेक charitable trusts, a लेखक, a philosopher, a private investor, and a farmer.
This 1768 parchment ( 612×502 mm ) by jekuthiel Sofer emulated the 1675 Ten Commandments at the Amsterdam esnoga synagogue.
The Ten आयतें, also ज्ञात as the decalogue, are a set of biblical laws relating to आचार and इबादत, जिससे play a fundamental role in judaism, Islam and christianity.
They include निर्देश to worship तभी परमेश्वर, to keep the sabbath holy and prohibitions against idolatry, इनकार, हत्या, theft, deception and व्यभिचार.
Different groups follow slightly different traditions लिये interpreting and numbering उन्हें.
the टेन Commandments appear twice in the Hebrew बाइबल, in the books of exodus और deuteronomy.
According to the story in Exodus, God inscribed उन्हें on two stone टैबलेट, which he gave to मूसा on माउंट Sinai.
Modern scholarship has found likely influences in hittite and mesopotamian laws and treaties, लकिन is divided over exactly when the टेन Commandments were written और who लिखा them.
The discography of the English alternative चट्टान band the smiths consists of चार स्टुडियो albums, one विस्तारित play ( EP ), one सजीव एल्बम, टेन compilation एल्बम, बीस singles, एक वीडियो album and चौदह music वीडियो on the अशिष्ट Trade, sire और WEA record labels.
The बैंड was formed in 1982 in Manchester by vocalist morrissey, guitarist Johnny Marr, bass खिलाड़ी Andy rourke and drummer Mike Joyce.
Despite being championed by बीबीसी रेडियो 1 डिस्क jockey जॉन Peel, the बैंड 's डेब्यू single, `` हाथ in दस्ताने `` ( May 1983 ), विफल to chart.
Its follow-up, `` इस आकर्षक man `` ( October 1983 ), मिले with critical acclaim and reached number twenty-five on the UK Singles Chart.
The smiths ' cult status was followed by मुख्यधारा कामयाबी in 1984, as वे reached number बारह in the UK with the `` कया अंतर Does it Make ? `` सिंगल और पहुँचे क्रमांक two on the uk Albums Chart with their डेब्यू album, The Smiths ( 1984 ).
उनके अगला three singles all reached the शीर्ष twenty of the charts in the UK, helping to consolidate उनके पिछला chart success.
the अगला studio album, Meat is Murder ( 1985 ), पहुँचे the top of the अंग्रेजों चार्ट ; however, the only सिंगल to be released from the एल्बम, `` कि Joke is n't मजेदार Anymore `` ( 1985 ), failed to break the UK Top 40.
Returning to form, The Smiths ' next six singles all पहुँचे the उच्चतर than number thirty in the UK and उनके third एल्बम, The Queen is Dead ( 1986 ), पहुँचे क्रमांक two in the UK.
despite the बैंड 's chart success, Marr left the समूह in अगस्त 1987 due to a strained relationship with morrissey.
failing to ढूँढें a replacement, the smiths disbanded by the समय their final studio album, Strangeways, यहाँ We आइये, was released in सितंबर that year.
Strangeways, Here We Come पहुँचे क्रमांक two in the UK and became the बैंड 's highest-charting रिलीज in the United States when it reached क्रमांक fifty-five on the बिलबोर्ड 200.
In early 1992, WEA acquired the entire वापस catalogue of The Smiths और उत्पादित two compilations – Best... I and... बेहतरीन ii – the पहला of which reached the top of the UK एल्बम Chart.
wea released two further singles compilations in 1995 और 2001, with a further संकलन, the Sound of The smiths, released in November 2008.
Gone साथ the Wind is a novel लिखा by Margaret Mitchell, first प्रकाशित in 1936.
It is प्रायः placed in the literary sub-genre of the ऐतिहासिक रोमांस novel.
However, it has been argued the अनोखा is a `` निकट miss '' and करता not contain all of the तत्व of the रोमांस genre, making it simply a historical novel.
The story is नियत in Clayton County, Georgia, और Atlanta दौरान the American Civil युद्ध and पुनर्निर्माण.
it depicts the अनुभवों of स्कारलेट O'Hara, the spoiled daughter of a well-to-do plantation owner, who must use every अर्थात् at her निपटान to आइये out of the गरीबी वो पाता herself in after शरमन 's `` March to the Sea ''.
Margaret मिशेल began लिखने Gone with the Wind in 1926 to pass the समय जबकि recovering from an auto-crash injury कि refused to heal.
in अप्रैल 1935, Harold Latham of Macmillan, an एडिटर who थी looking लिये new fiction, read कया वो था written and देखी that it could be a best-seller.
After Latham agreed to publish the किताब, Mitchell worked लिये another six महीने checking the historical references, और rewrote the खोलने chapter अनेक times.
मिशेल and her husband John दलदल, a copy editor by व्यापार, संपादित the final version of the novel.
Mitchell लिखा the book 's final moments पहला, और then लिखा the events कि led up to it.
as to what became of her lovers, रहेट and Scarlett, after the अनोखा ended, Mitchell किया नहीं know, और कहा, `` For all I जान, Rhett may have found someone else who was कम difficult. ''
Mitchell received the Pulitzer Prize for fiction for the book in 1937.
The book थी adapted into a 1939 American फिल्मी.
गए with the Wind is the तभी अनोखा by मिशेल प्रकाशित दौरान her lifetime.
endodontics ( इससे the Greek endo `` अंदर '' ; and odons `` दाँत '' ) is एक of the dental specialties recognized by the American दंत संघ, Royal College of dentists of Canada, और royal Australasian College of Dental Surgeons, और सौदे साथ the दाँत pulp and the tissues surrounding the root of a दाँत.
endodontists perform a किस्में of procedures सहित endodontic therapy ( commonly ज्ञात as `` root canal therapy '' ), endodontic retreatment, surgery, treating cracked दांत, and treating दंत trauma.
रूट कनाल therapy is one of the सबसे common procedures.
If the pulp ( containing nerves, arterioles, venules, lymphatic tissue, and fibrous tissue ) becomes diseased or injured, endodontic treatment is जरूरी to save the दाँत.
Serial संलग्न SCSI ( sas ) is a point-to-point सीरियल प्रोटोकॉल कि moves आंकड़ा to and from computer storage devices ऐसे as मुश्किल drives और tape drives.
SAS replaces the पुरानी Parallel SCSI ( सुनाया `` scuzzy '' ) बस प्रौद्योगिकी that first appeared in the mid-1980s.
SAS, like इसके पूर्ववर्ती, उपयोग the standard SCSI कमांड set.
sas offers पिछड़ा संगतता साथ second-generation SATA ड्राइव.
SATA 3 gbit/s ड्राइव may be connected to SAS backplanes, but sas drives can not connect to SATA backplanes.
the T10 technical committee of the International Committee for सूचना Technology मानकों ( INCITS ) develops और maintains the SAS protocol ; the SCSI Trade संघ ( SCSITA ) promotes the technology.

Status as a natural-born citizen of the United States is one of the eligibility आवश्यकताएँ established in the United राज्य संविधान for election to the office of President or Vice President.
This requirement was intended to protect the nation from foreign influence.
The Constitution करता not define the phrase natural-born citizen, and various opinions have been offered over time regarding इसके precise meaning.
A 2011 Congressional Research Service रपट stated
the natural-born-citizen clause रै महरूम उल्लेखित in गुजर in several decisions of the संयुक्त राज्य Supreme अदालत and lower courts dealing साथ the सवाल of eligibility for नागरिकता by जनम, लकिन the परम् Court रै never directly addressed the सवाल of a specific presidential or vice-presidential प्रत्याशी 's eligibility as a natural-born citizen.
kurtis Eugene `` कर्ट '' warner ( born जून 22, 1971 ) is a former अमरीकी football player.
He निभाई quarterback for तीन नेशनल फ़ुटबॉल League ( एनएफएल ) टीमों : the St. लुई Rams, the नई York दिग्गज, और the Arizona Cardinals.
he was originally signed by the Green Bay पैकर्स as an undrafted फ़्री agent in 1994 बाद playing college football at उत्तरी आयोवा.
Warner would go on to be considered the बेहतरीन undrafted player of all समय, following a 12-year career regarded as एक of the greatest stories in NFL history.
warner first attained stardom जबकि playing लिये the St. लुई Rams इससे 1998 to 2003, where he won two एनएफएल MVP पुरस्कार in 1999 and 2001 as well as the Super Bowl mvp पुरस्कार in सुपर कटोरी xxxiv.
He led the 2008 एरिज़ोना Cardinals to Super Bowl XLIII ( the franchise 's first Super कटोरी berth ), and owns the तीन highest single-game passing yardage योग in सुपर कटोरी history.
Warner फिलहाल holds the seventh-highest career passer rating of all-time ( 93.7 ), and the third-highest career पूर्णता percentage in एनएफएल history with 65.5 %.
In 13 career playoff games, warner बाँधने first all-time in completion प्रतिशत ( 66.5 % ), yards per attempt ( 8.55 ), और दूसरी in passer दरजा ( 102.8 ).
he also holds the उच्चतम पूर्णता प्रतिशत for a single game during the नियमित ऋतु, at 92.3 percent ( 24/26 ), on सितंबर 20, 2009, विरूद्ध the Jacksonville jaguars.
he announced उसके रिटायरमेंट on January 29, 2010. < ref name='CNN 2010-01-29 ' >
Janet Kay Ruthven Hagan ( ; born may 26, 1953 ) is the जूनियर United States Senator इससे North कैरोलिना, in office since January 2009.
Previously she परोसा in the North Carolina सीनेट from 1999 to 2009.
वो is a member of the Democratic Party and is viewed as a moderate member of उसके पार्टी.
When Hagan पराजित रिपब्लिकन incumbent Elizabeth Dole in the 2008 संयुक्त States Senate चुनाव, she became the पहला woman to शिकस्त an incumbent woman in a सीनेट election.
The Heisman Memorial Trophy Award ( प्रायः known colloquially as the Heisman ट्रॉफी or the Heisman ), is awarded annually to the player deemed the सबसे outstanding player in कॉलेजिएट फ़ुटबॉल.
It was निर्मित in 1935 as the Downtown एथलेटिक Club trophy and renamed in 1936 following the मौत of the क्लबों 's athletic director, John Heisman ( former Brown University और University of पेन्सिलवेनिया player ; सिर फ़ुटबॉल coach at Oberlin कॉलेज, auburn University, Clemson University, Rice विश्वविद्यालयों, और the विश्वविद्यालयों of Pennsylvania ; and football, basketball, and baseball head coach and एथलेटिक director at Georgia तकनीक ).
The award is प्रस्तुत by the Heisman ट्रॉफी Trust in early December before the postseason कटोरी games.
It is the oldest of several overall awards in college football, including the Maxwell Award, वाल्टर Camp Award, and the AP खिलाड़ी of the Year.
The Heisman and the ap खिलाड़ी of the साल हैं the तभी awards to honor the most outstanding खिलाड़ी, जबकि the मैक्सवेल Award and Walter Camp पुरस्कार recognize the best player, and the Archie Griffin Award recognizes the most valuable खिलाड़ी.
the United राष्ट्र Command ( UNC ) is the unified command structure लिये the multinational सैन्य forces supporting the Republic of Korea ( South कोरियाई or rok ) during and after the कोरियाई War.
After सैनिकों of the Democratic लोगों 's गणतंत्र of Korea ( North Korea or DPRK ) invaded South Korea on June 25, 1950, the United Nations Security Council adopted रेज़ोल्यूशन 82 कॉलिंग on North कोरियाई to cease hostilities and withdraw to the 38th समानांतर.
On June 27, 1950, it adopted Resolution 83, recommending that members of the United राष्ट्र provide assistance to the गणतंत्र of Korea `` to repel the हथियारबंद आक्रमण and to restore अंतरराष्ट्रीय peace and सुरक्षा to the area ''.
Security परिषद Resolution 84, अपनाया on July 7, 1950, recommended that members providing सैन्य forces and अन्य सहायता to दक्षिण Korea `` make ऐसे शक्तियां and other सहायता available to a unified command under the United राज्य of अमेरिका ''.
Although the resolutions suggested the forces under the UNC यहूद `` United Nations forces '', and United Nations itself could be considered a belligerent, in अभ्यास the United Nations exercised no कंट्रोल over the combat forces, which यहूद controlled by the संयुक्त राज्य.
Most observers concluded कि the forces under the unc यहूद not in विधि संयुक्त Nations troops, and the acts of the unc यहूद not the अधिनियमों of the United राष्ट्र.
the unc can be regarded as an गठबंधन of नेशनल armies, ऑपरेटिंग under the collective right of self-defense.
On अगस्त 29, 1950, the British Commonwealth 's 27th Infantry ब्रिगेड arrived at Busan to join the UNC, जिससे until then included only rok और u.S. forces.
The 27th ब्रिगेड moved into the naktong River लकीर वेस्ट of Daegu.
Troop इकाई from अन्य देशों of the un followed in rapid succession ; Australia, belgian संयुक्त Nations Command, Canada, कोलंबिया, इथियोपिया, France, Greece, Luxembourg, the नीदरलैंड्स, New जीलैंड, the फिलीपीन, Thailand and तुर्कों.
the Union of South Africa provided air इकाई which लड़ा alongside the air forces of अन्य सदस्य nations.
Denmark, इण्डिया, नार्वे, और स्वीडन provided medical units.
Italy provided a hospital, भी though it was not a UN member.
The संयुक्त Nations Command और the Chinese-North Korean कमांड signed the कोरियाई Armistice Agreement on 27 July 1953, समाप्ति the भारी लड़.
the armistice agreement स्थापित the Military armistice आयोग ( MAC ), consisting of प्रतिनिधि of the दो signatories, to supervise the implementation of the armistice शर्तें.
The North korean-chinese मैक has been replaced by panmumjon प्रतिनिधि under exclusive North Korean प्रबन्धन.
Regular meetings have महरूम रोका, हालांकि ड्यूटी अधिकारियों of संयुक्त सुरक्षा क्षेत्रफल, commonly ज्ञात as the Truce Village of Panmunjom, from प्रत्येक side meet regularly.
lincoln हाइट्स is an अमरीकी परिवार drama टेलीविज़न श्रेणी परिचय एडी सटन, a Mission Vista पुलिस officer जो moves his परिवार वापस to his old neighborhood, lincoln Heights, to start a नई life और to help out his old neighborhood.
it is a dangerous place to raise a परिवार, and through the many ट्रायल the परिवार goes through, they जल्द learn that settling in is not as easy as it seems.
While अधिकारी Sutton struggles to cope साथ प्रत्येक दिन जीवन as a गली cop in Los एंजिल्स, his kids कोशिश to fit in at their new स्कूलों और with उनके new पड़ोसी.

it was स्वीकृत for a second season, जिससे premiered सितंबर 4, 2007.

A Christian denomination is an identifiable religious body under a common name, ढांचा, and doctrine within christianity.
in the Orthodox tradition, churches are विभाजित प्रायः along जातीय and linguistic lines, into पृथक चर्च and परंपराओं.
technically, divisions between एक समूह and another हैं defined by doctrine और church authority.
Issues such as the nature of यीशु, the authority of apostolic succession, eschatology, and papal primacy separate एक denomination from another.
The Roman कैथोलिक गिरिजाघर is the largest denomination with over 1.1 अरब members, over हाफ of all Christians विश्वव्यापी, making it the largest denomination लिये कोई religion worldwide ( although the गिरिजाघर करता नहीं view itself as a denomination, but as the original pre-denominational church ).
Protestant denominations comprise roughly 38–39 % of ईसाइयों विश्वव्यापी, and together the catholics, Protestants, anglicans, और other closely सम्बन्धित denominations comprise पश्चिमी Christianity.
the पूर्वी Orthodox गिरिजाघर, Oriental परंपरागत चर्च और the Assyrian गिरिजाघर of the ईस्ट are considered पूर्वी Christian denominations.
Western Christian denominations जीतना in Western Europe and its former colonies.
पूर्वी ईसाई denominations are represented mostly in Eastern यूरोपीय, the Middle ईस्ट और North Africa.
ईसाइयों have विभिन्न doctrines about the Church, the देह of faithful कि वे believe थी स्थापित by यीशु मसीह, और कैसा the दैवी church corresponds to ईसाई denominations.
Both the Catholics and the Eastern Orthodox consider प्रत्येक of themselves solely to faithfully represent the One पावन Catholic और अपोस्टोलिक गिरिजाघर to the exclusion of the other.
Protestants अलग from the Catholic गिरिजाघर because of theologies और practices that they considered to be in violation of उनके निर्वचन.
Generally, members of the various denominations acknowledge each अन्य as ईसाइयों, at least to the extent कि they have mutually recognized baptisms और acknowledge historically परंपरागत views including the देवत्व of Jesus और doctrines of sin and salvation, even हालांकि doctrinal और ecclesiological obstacles hinder पूरा नियाज़ between churches.
चूंकि the reforms surrounding Vatican II, the कैथोलिक गिरिजाघर has referred to Protestant समुदायों as `` denominations '', while reserving the term `` गिरिजाघर '' for apostolic चर्च, सहित the Eastern Orthodox ( देखिए subsistit in और शाखा सिद्धान्त ).
There हैं however some non-denominational ईसाइयों जो do not follow कोई particular शाखा.
the पांडा ( ailuropoda melanoleuca, lit.
`` black and श्वेत cat-foot '' ), also ज्ञात as the giant पांडा to distinguish it इससे the unrelated red panda, is a bear native to central-western और south पश्चिमी चीन.
it is easily recognized by the large, distinctive black patches around इसके eyes, over the कानों, and आरपार its गोलाकार देह.
Though it belongs to the order carnivora, the panda 's आहार is 99 % बाँसुरी.
pandas in the wild will occasionally eat other grasses, जंगली tubers, or भी मांस in the रूप of birds, rodents or carrion.
In captivity, they may receive honey, eggs, मछली, yams, झाड़ी पत्ते, संतरे, or केले साथ साथ विशेषकर prepared food.
The दानव पांडा lives in a few पहाड़ ranges in central China, mainly in Sichuan प्रांत, but भी in the shaanxi and Gansu provinces.
As a परिणाम of farming, deforestation and other development, the पांडा रै महरूम driven out of the lowland areas where it once जिया.
The पांडा is a संरक्षण reliant endangered species.
a 2007 report shows 239 pandas जीना in captivity inside China and another 27 outside the country.
जंगली जनसांख्यिकी estimates vary ; एक अनुमान shows that there are about 1,590 individuals living in the wild, while a 2006 study via DNA analysis estimated that this फिगर could be as ऊँची as 2,000 to 3,000.
Some reports also दिखाएँ that the क्रमांक of pandas in the जंगली is on the वृद्धि.
however, the आईयूसीएन does not believe there is enough certainty yet to reclassify the species from endangered to vulnerable.
While the dragon has often परोसा as चीन 's national emblem, internationally the पांडा appears at least as commonly.
As such, it is becoming widely प्रयुक्त within चीन in international contexts, for example the five fuwa mascots of the Beijing ओलंपिक.
The पतंग Runner is a 2007 American drama film directed by Marc forster based on the novel of the same name by Khaled Hosseini.
It tells the story of Amir, a well-to-do boy from the वज़ीर akbar खान ज़िला of काबुल, who is tormented by the guilt of abandoning his friend Hassan, the बेटे of उसके father 's Hazara servant.
The story is set against a backdrop of उग्र कार्यक्रम, from the fall of the monarchy in अफगानिस्तान through the सोवियत सैन्य हस्तक्षेप, the mass exodus of Afghan शरणार्थियों to Pakistan and the United States, और the Taliban शासन.
हालांकि most of the film is set in अफगानिस्तान, ये parts were mostly शॉट in Kashgar, China, due to the dangers of filming in अफगानिस्तान at the समय.
The majority of the film 's dialogue is in Dari, साथ the remainder spoken in English.
the child actors हैं देशी अध्यक्षों, but अनेक adult अभिनेताओं था to learn जमींदारी.
Filming wrapped up on दिसम्बर 21, 2006, and the फिल्मी was expected to be released on November 2, 2007.
however, after concern for the safety of the यंग अभिनेताओं in the film due to fears of violent reprisals to the यौन nature of some scenes in जिससे they appear, its रिलीज date थी pushed वापस six सप्ताह to दिसम्बर 14, 2007.
The Kite धावक was released on dvd on कूच 25, 2008.
A HD dvd release was announced लिये the same date, but was रद्द following the स्वरूप 's demise.
The film was मनोनीत लिये the Golden ग्लोब Award for Best Foreign Language Film in 2007.
The फिल्मी 's स्कोर by Alberto इग्लेसियस was मनोनीत for बेहतरीन असली Score at the Golden ग्लोब्स and the अकादमी Awards.
the वैधता of cannabis varies from देश to देश.
कब्ज़ा of कैनबिस is illegal in most देशों और has been since the शुरूआत of widespread cannabis निषेध in the लेट 1930s.
however, many countries have decriminalized the कब्ज़ा of small quantities of cannabis, particularly in North अमेरिका, दक्षिण America and Europe.
furthermore, कब्ज़ा is legal or effectively विधिक in the Netherlands, North Korea and would be in the U.S. states of कोलोराडो और वॉशिंगटन if it यहूद नहीं for federal विधि, जिससे governs व्यक्तियों in all states.
The औषधीय use of cannabis is legal in a क्रमांक of देशों, including Canada, the चेक Republic and Israel.
While federal विधि in the United States bans सब sale और possession of cannabis, प्रवर्तन varies widely at the state स्तर और some states have established औषधीय marijuana कार्यक्रम in कि contradict संघीय law ; दो राज्य ( कोलोराडो and वॉशिंगटन ) have repealed उनके कानून prohibiting the recreational उपयोग of cannabis and replaced them with a regulatory regime, भी contrary to federal statute.
Some देशों have laws कि are not as vigorously prosecuted as अन्य but, अलावा from the countries कि offer access to medical marijuana, most countries have various दंड ranging from lenient to बहुत severe.
Some infractions are taken more seriously in some countries than अन्य in regard to the cultivation, use, कब्ज़ा or ट्रांसफ़र of कैनबिस लिये recreational use.
a few jurisdictions have lessened penalties for कब्ज़ा of small quantities of कैनबिस, making it दंडनीय by confiscation and a ठीक, बल्कि than imprisonment.
कुछ क्षेत्राधिकारs/ ड्रग न्यायालयों use अनिवार्य उपचार programs for young or बारंबार users, with freedom from narcotic drugs as the लक्ष्य and a few jurisdictions permit cannabis use लिये औषधीय उद्देश्य.
There हैं भी changes in a अधिक restrictive दिशा as in कनाडा.
ड्रग परीक्षण to detect cannabis are increasingly common in many countries and have resulted in jail वाक्य और people losing their कार्य.
however, सरल possession can carry long कारावास sentences in कुछ देशों, particularly in भाग of ईस्ट एशिया and southeast एशिया where the बिक्री of कैनबिस may सीसे to a sentence of life in prison or भी execution.
Loxahatchee is a community located in Palm Beach काउंटी, Florida, संयुक्त राज्य.
it is located in the areas north of Wellington and west and northwest of Royal Palm Beach, Florida और approximately west of वेस्ट ताड़ Beach.
Loxahatchee is also the नाम of the पोस्ट दफ्तर that serves इस क्षेत्रफल, which is अंतर्गत the zip code of 33470.
The नाम Loxahatchee means `` कछुआ नदी. ''
Loxahatchee is स्तिथ within the भारतीय trails सुधार ज़िला and the loxahatchee groves Water Control ज़िला.

In 2006, the state of फ्लोरिडा approved incorporation of part of loxahatchee as the Town of loxahatchee Groves to become the 38th municipality in ताड़ Beach County.
The प्रमुख कारण for incorporating was to better protect the area from encroaching विकास और to बचाना the rural character of the पड़ोस.
शायद the सबसे ग्रामीण क्षेत्रफल भीतर a close निकटता to वेस्ट Palm बीच, साथ lot sizes range इससे 1-20 acres.
साथ साथ The acreage, it is notable लिये ढीला जमीन restrictions and the native और exotic animal presence is काफी notable.
Seminole Ridge High School serves the क्षेत्रफल.
The Canadian Citizenship परीक्षण is a परीक्षण, administered by Citizenship and आव्रजन Canada ( सीआईसी ), that is required लिये all applicants लिये Canadian citizenship who हैं aged between 18 और 54 और who मिलें the basic requirements for नागरिकता.

They operated year-round cruise itineraries to the Mediterranean, the Greek isles, tahiti और the South Pacific, उत्तरी Europe and Scandinavia.

epithelium is one of the four मौलिक प्रकार of animal tissue, along with connective ऊतक, मांसपेशी tissue and nervous ऊतक.
Epithelial tissues line the cavities and surfaces of structures throughout the देह, and भी form many glands.
Functions of epithelial कोशिकाएं include स्राव, selective absorption, सुरक्षा, transcellular हस्तांतरण और detection of sensation.
in Greek `` ἐπί '' ( `` epi '' ) means `` on '' or `` upon '', and `` θηλή '' ( `` thēlē '' ) means `` nipple ''.
Epithelial layers are avascular, so they जरूर प्राप्त nourishment via diffusion of substances इससे the underlying संयोजी tissue, through the basement membrane.
epithelia can भी be व्यवस्थित into clusters of cells that function as exocrine और endocrine ग्रंथियों.
केंट E. Hovind ( born January 15, 1953 ) is an अमरीकी यंग धरती creationist.
Hovind has बोला on creation science and has aimed to मनाना listeners to reject theories of evolution, geophysics, और cosmology in favor of उसके निर्वचन of the उत्पत्ति सृष्टि narrative from the Bible.
Hovind 's views हैं contradicted by वैज्ञानिक evidence and कुछ of उसके ideas have also been criticized by young धरती creationist organizations ऐसे as जवाब in Genesis.
Hovind established the Creation Science Evangelism in 1991, and अक्सर spoke on young Earth creationism at seminars at निजी स्कूलों और चर्च, debates, and on रेडियो और television broadcasts.
Since January 2007, Hovind रै महरूम serving a ten-year prison sentence after होने convicted of 58 federal counts, including 12 tax offenses, one count of obstructing federal एजेंटों, and 45 counts of structuring cash ट्रांजेक्शन.
he is incarcerated at the Federal correctional संस्था at Berlin, New हैम्पशायर.
बहू साथ बिंदी decorated forehead
A बिंदी (, इससे संस्कृत bindu, meaning `` a बूँद, small particle, dot '' ), or a pottu/bottu ( in Tamil, तेलुगु, और मलयालम ) is a forehead decoration worn in दक्षिण एशिया ( particularly India, Bangladesh, Nepal, Sri Lanka and मॉरीशस ) और Southeast Asia.
Traditionally it is a bright dot of red color applied in the center of the माथे बंद to the eyebrows, लकिन it can also consist of a sign or piece of jewelry worn at this location.
The नई यॉर्क gubernatorial election of 2010 was आयोजित on Tuesday, नवम्बर 2, 2010, to elect the Governor of New यॉर्क, to serve a four-year term that began in January 2011.
Incumbent लोकतांत्रिक Governor दाउद Paterson, elected as Lieutenant Governor in 2006 as the कार्यशील mate of former राज्यपाल Eliot Spitzer, chose not to run for a full-term.

the प्रमुख डाल of Dragon Ball at the end of the manga.
The Dragon Ball manga and anime श्रेणी सुविधाएँ an extensive cast of characters created by Akira Toriyama.

दौरान the कोर्स of the स्टोरी, he मुठभेड़ों allies such as bulma, Yamcha, Kuririn and Trunks, विरोधियों such as tenshinhan, piccolo और Vegeta, and दुश्मनों such as freeza and Cell.

the Comanche are a Plains Indian tribe whose historic territory, ज्ञात as Comancheria, consisted of present दिन eastern New Mexico, southern कोलोराडो, northeastern Arizona, दक्षिणी Kansas, सब of Oklahoma, और सबसे of northwest टेक्सास.
the comanche लोगों हैं enrolled in the federally पहचाना Comanche Nation, in ओक्लाहोमा.
historically, the Comanches यहूद hunter-gatherers साथ a घोड़ा culture.
वहीँ may have महरूम as many as 45,000 Comanches in the late 18th century.
Today, the Comanche Nation Comanche tribal नामांकन numbers 15,191 साथ लगभग 7,763 members residing in the Lawton – फोर्ट Sill and surrounding क्षेत्रों of Southwest Oklahoma.
The Comanche स्वदेश Homecoming Powwow is आयोजित annually in walters, Oklahoma in mid-July.
The comanche spoke the comanche भाषा, a Numic language of the Uto-Aztecan family, sometimes classified as a Shoshone dialect ; however, तभी परिचय 1 % of Comanches speak it आज.

टाइम्स Square Studios ( TSS ) is an American टेलीविज़न studio स्तिथ in the टाइम्स वर्गाकार neighborhood of the मैनहटन borough of नई यॉर्क City, नई York.
The स्टुडियो is बेहतरीन known as the production home of एबीसी न्यूज ' Good Morning America ( GMA ), a morning न्यूज and talk program और खण्ड for GMA on एबीसी News Now.
the Las Vegas स्ट्रिप संसार of coca-cola संग्रहालय in 2003
coca-cola is a carbonated नरम पेय बेची in stores, restaurants, and vending मशीने in every country मगर क्यूबा and उत्तर कोरियाई.
it is उत्पादित by The Coca-Cola कम्पनी of Atlanta, जॉर्जिया, and is often referred to simply as Coke ( a registered trademark of The coca-cola कम्पनी in the United राज्य चूंकि March 27, 1944 ).
Originally intended as a patent medicine जब it थी invented in the लेट 19th सदी by जॉन Pemberton, Coca-Cola थी bought out by बिजनेसमैन Asa griggs candler, जिनकी marketing tactics led Coke to its दबदबा of the world soft-drink market throughout the 20th century.
The कम्पनी produces concentrate, which is तब बेची to licensed Coca-Cola bottlers throughout the world.
The bottlers, who hold territorially exclusive contracts with the company, produce समाप्त उत्पाद in डिब्बे and bottles from the concentrate in combination with filtered water and sweeteners.
The bottlers तब sell, वितरित और merchandise Coca-Cola to retail stores और vending machines.
Such bottlers include coca-cola उद्यमों, which is the largest single Coca-Cola bottler in North अमेरिका and पश्चिमी यूरोपीय.
The Coca-Cola Company भी बिकता concentrate लिये सोडा fountains to major restaurants and खाना service distributors.
the coca-cola कम्पनी रै, on अवसर, introduced अन्य cola पेय under the Coke ब्रांड name.
the most common of these is आहार कोक, with others सहित caffeine-free Coca-Cola, Diet Coke Caffeine-Free, Coca-Cola Cherry, coca-cola Zero, Coca-Cola वैनिला, and special versions with lemon, lime or coffee.
Based on Interbrand 's बेहतरीन global ब्रांड 2011, coca-cola was the world 's most मूल्यवान brand.
Types of bar-lines
in musical notation, a bar ( or measure ) is a segment of समय defined by a given क्रमांक of बीट्स, each of जिससे हैं आबंटित a particular note value.
Dividing म्यूज़िक into bars provides regular reference अंक to pin पाइंट स्थितियाँ within a piece of म्यूज़िक.
it also makes लिखा music easier to follow, since प्रत्येक bar of स्टाफ symbols can be read और निभाई as a batch.
Typically, a टुकड़ा consists of several bars of the वही length, and in आधुनिक musical notation the क्रमांक of बीट्स in each bar is specified at the beginning of the score by the top number of a time हस्ताक्षर ( ऐसे as 3/4 ), while the नीचे number indicates the note value of the beat ( the ताल has a quarter note value in the 3/4 example ).
the word bar is more common in British English, and the word माप is अधिक आम in American अंग्रेज़ी, although musicians generally understand both usages.
in American English, although the शब्द बार and measure हैं often used interchangeably the correct उपयोग of the word 'bar ' refers only to the लंबवत line itself, while the word 'measure ' refers to the बीट्स contained between bars.
In international usage, it is equally correct to speak of bar संख्याएँ and measure numbers, e.g. ‘bars 9–16’ or ‘mm. 9–16’.
Along the वही lines, it is हिकमत to reserve the abbreviated form ‘bb.
3–4’ इत्यादि. for बीट्स only ; bars should be referred to by नाम in पूरा.
The first metrically complete measure भीतर a टुकड़ा of music is पुकारा ‘bar 1’ or ‘m. 1’.
When the piece begins साथ an anacrusis ( an incomplete measure at the सिर of a piece of music ), ‘bar 1’ or ‘m. 1’ is the following measure.
the 19.9 mw Gemasolar solar संयंत्र in Spain features 15 hours of storage and can supply शक्ति 24 घंटों a दिन.
सौर energy, radiant light और ऊष्मा from the sun, has महरूम harnessed by इंसानो since ancient टाइम्स using a range of ever-evolving technologies.
Solar energy technologies include सौर heating, सौर photovoltaics, सौर थर्मल विद्युत, solar architecture and कृत्रिम photosynthesis, which can make considerable contributions to solving some of the most तात्कालिक energy समस्याएं the संसार अभी faces.
Solar technologies हैं broadly characterized as either passive solar or क्रियाशील सौर depending on the way they capture, बदलें and distribute सौर energy.
Active सौर तकनीकों include the use of photovoltaic panels और solar थर्मल collectors to दोहन the energy.
Passive सौर techniques शामिल orienting a building to the Sun, selecting materials with अनुकूल थर्मल द्रव्यमान or लाइट dispersing गुण, और designing spaces that naturally circulate air.
In 2011, the अंतरराष्ट्रीय Energy एजेंसी said कि `` the development of सस्ती, inexhaustible and साफ solar उर्जा technologies will have विशाल longer-term लाभ.
It will बढ़ाएँ countries’ energy security through reliance on an स्वदेशी, inexhaustible और mostly import-independent संसाधन, enhance स्थिरता, reduce pollution, lower the costs of mitigating climate change, और रखना चट्टान fuel कीमतें lower than otherwise.
These लाभ are वैश्विक.
Hence the अतिरिक्त costs of the incentives लिये early deployment should be considered learning investments ; they जरूर be wisely खर्च and need to be widely shared ''.
प्राथमिक care may be provided in community health centres.
प्राथमिक care is the स्वास्थ्य care दिए by a health care provider.
Typically this प्रदाता अधिनियमों as the principal पाइंट of परामर्श for patients within a स्वास्थ्य परवाह system and coordinates अन्य specialists कि the रोगी may need.
ऐसे a पेशेवर can be a प्राथमिक care physician, such as a सामान्य practitioner or family physician, or depending on the locality, health प्रणाली संगठन, and रोगी 's discretion, they may see a pharmacist, a physician assistant, a nurse practitioner, a nurse ( such as in the United Kingdom ), a नैदानिक अधिकारी ( ऐसे as in parts of Africa ), or an आयुर्वेदिक or other traditional medicine professional ( such as in भाग of Asia ).
depending on the प्रकृति of the health कंडीशन, मरीजों may then be referred लिये secondary or tertiary care.
`` Ocean Avenue '' is a सोंग recorded by American पॉप punk group yellowcard.
it was released in फ़रवरी 2004 as the second single from Ocean Avenue और the third track.
It is known for bringing them into the mainstream, as it received numerous spins on MTV और increasing radio airplay.
समंदर Avenue is a street in Jacksonville, Florida, the band 's stomping grounds निकट उनके high school, डगलस Anderson स्कूल of the कला, and another गली mentioned in the song, चेरी Street.
The name of Ocean Avenue in jacksonville is actually Beach boulevard.
They बाएँ their असली base behind when they स्थानांतरित to लॉस एंजिल्स.
the song was featured on the Much म्यूज़िक compilation album Big Shiny Tunes 9.
A psychiatrist is a physician जो specializes in psychiatry.
A मनोचिकित्सक specializes in the उपचार of mental disorders.
Psychiatrists are authorized to prescribe medicine, conduct शारीरिक examinations, order और interpret laboratory परीक्षण, use psychotherapy and may अनुक्रम brain imaging studies such as computed टोमोग्राफी ( ct/cat Scan ), चुम्बकीय अनुनाद imaging ( mri ), और positron emission टोमोग्राफी ( PET ) scanning.
भीतर the framework of the संसार Health Organization 's ( WHO ) definition of health as a राज्य of पूरा physical, दिमागी और social well-being, and नहीं merely the अनुपस्थिति of बीमारी or infirmity, reproductive health, or यौन health/hygiene, addresses the reproductive processes, functions and प्रणाली at all चरण of life.
Reproductive स्वास्थ्य, therefore, implies that लोगों हैं able to have a responsible, satisfying और safer sex जीवन and that वे have the capability to reproduce and the freedom to decide if, जब and कैसा often to do so.
One निर्वचन of इस implies that men और women ought to be सूचित of and to have access to सुरक्षित, effective, सस्ती और acceptable methods of birth कंट्रोल ; भी access to appropriate health परवाह services of sexual, reproductive medicine and क्रियान्वयन of स्वास्थ्य शिक्षा programs to stress the महत्व of महिलाओं to go safely through pregnancy and प्रसव could provide युगल with the बेहतरीन chance of having a healthy infant.
On the other hand individuals do फेस inequalities in reproductive स्वास्थ्य services.
Inequalities vary based on socioeconomic औकात, education level, आयु, ethnicity, religion, और resources उपलब्धियाँ in their पर्यावरण.
It is संभावित लिये उदाहरण, कि low income individuals कमी the resources for उचित स्वास्थ्य services और the knowledge to जान what is उचित for maintaining reproductive health.
according to the WHO, `` Reproductive and sexual ill-health accounts लिये 20 % of the वैश्विक burden of ill-health लिये women, and 14 % for men. ''
reproductive health is a part of यौन and reproductive स्वास्थ्य and अधिकारों.

Core 2 is a ब्रांड encompassing a range of इंटेल 's उपभोक्ता 64-bit x86-64 single-, dual-, और quad-core microprocessors आधारित on the Core microarchitecture.
The single- and dual-core models are single- die, whereas the quad-core models comprise two मरता, each containing दो cores, packaged in a multi-chip module.
The introduction of कोर 2 relegated the pentium brand to the mid-range market, and reunified लैपटॉप और desktop cpu lines, which previously had been divided into the Pentium 4, Pentium d, and Pentium M ब्रांड्स.
The कोर 2 brand was introduced on 27 July 2006, comprising the सोलो ( single-core ), Duo ( dual-core ), Quad ( quad-core ), and in 2007, the चरम ( दुआl- or quad-core cpu for enthusiasts ) subbrands.
Intel Core 2 processors with vPro प्रौद्योगिकी ( designed for businesses ) include the dual-core और quad-core branches.
The Super कटोरी is the annual championship game of the नेशनल Football League ( NFL ), the highest level of पेशेवर American football in the संयुक्त States, culminating a season कि begins in the late summer of the पिछला पंचांग साल.
The Super कटोरी uses Roman numerals to identify each game, rather than the year in जिससे it is held.
For example, सुपर Bowl I was played on जनवरी 15, 1967, following the 1966 regular season, जबकि सुपर Bowl xlvii थी played on फ़रवरी 3, 2013, following the 2012 season.
the game थी created as भाग of a merger agreement between the एनएफएल और its then-rival league, the American Football League ( AFL ).
It was agreed कि the two leagues ' चैंपियन teams होता खेल in an AFL–NFL World चैंपियनशिप खेल until the विलय थी to officially begin in 1970.
After the merger, each लीग थी redesignated as a `` conference ``, and the खेल was then played between the conference champions.
फिलहाल, the National Football सम्मेलन ( NFC ) leads the श्रेणी साथ 25 विन्स to 22 wins for the अमरीकी Football सम्मेलन ( AFC ).
the दिन on which the सुपर Bowl is निभाई, अभी considered by some a de facto American नेशनल अवकाश, is पुकारा `` Super कटोरी संडे ``.
it is the second-largest day for U.S. खाना consumption, after Thanksgiving Day.
in addition, the सुपर Bowl has frequently been the most देखी American television broadcast of the year.
सुपर कटोरी xlv, played in 2011, became the most-watched American टेलीविज़न program in history, drawing an औसत दर्शक of 111 million viewers और लेने over the spot held by the पिछला साल 's Super Bowl, which itself था taken over the # 1 spot held for twenty-eight सालो by the फाइनल episode of m*a*s*h.
The Super कटोरी is भी among the सबसे देखी sporting events in the संसार, almost सब होने उत्तर American ऑडियंस, and is दूसरी to संघ फ़ुटबॉल ’s UEFA Champions League final as the most देखी सालाना sporting इवेंट विश्वव्यापी.
क्युकी of its high viewership, commercial airtime during the Super कटोरी ब्रॉडकास्ट is the सबसे expensive of the year.
due to the high cost of निवेश in advertising on the Super कटोरी, कंपनियाँ regularly develop their most expensive advertisements for this broadcast.
as a result, watching और discussing the broadcast 's commercials has become a significant पहलू of the इवेंट.
In addition, many popular गायकों and संगीतकारों have performed during the event 's pre-game and halftime ceremonies क्युकी of the exposure.
Fiona is a feminine given नाम.
The name Fiona was invented, और first प्रयुक्त, by the Scottish कवि James macpherson ( 1736–96 ), लेखक of the ossian poems, which he claimed were translations from ancient Gaelic sources ( sources, when challenged, he never उत्पादित ).
the नाम was subsequently used as a pseudonym by William शार्प ( 1855–1905 ), who authored several रोमांटिक works अंतर्गत the नाम `` फिओना macleod ''.
the नाम has since become लोकप्रिय in इंग्लैण्ड, Scotland and Ireland.
The name is माना to be a latinised रूप of the गैलिक word fionn, अर्थ `` white '', `` मेला ''.
the name Fiona is also sometimes used as an Anglicisation of the irish-language नाम Fíona, although ये names are otherwise unrelated ( as fíona is derived from an तत्व अर्थ `` बेल '' ).
There is also a modern tendency to equate the प्रामाणिक स्कॉटिश Gaelic feminine नाम Fionnghal साथ Fiona.
the name Fiona is rising in लोकप्रियता particularly in जर्मनी -speaking देशों.
Fiona was the 49th most popular name लिये baby girls born in 2008 in जर्मनी.
Fiona थी tied लिये तीसरा प्लेस in the रैंकिंग of most popular names for baby girls born in the छोटा principality of liechtenstein in 2008.
The नाम थी the 347th most popular नाम for लड़कियों born in the संयुक्त States in 2008, where it रै ranked among the top 1,000 most लोकप्रिय names लिये लड़कियों since 1990 and among the top 500 since 1999.
the नाम फिओना रै been विशेषकर लोकप्रिय लिये लड़कियों of Asian or प्रशांत Islander descent in New York City, where फिओना ranked as the ninth most लोकप्रिय नाम लिये लड़कियों from those groups in 2007.
Many भाषाएं are प्रयुक्त, or historically have been प्रयुक्त in the United राज्य.
The सबसे commonly प्रयुक्त language is English.
There are भी अनेक भाषाएं indigenous to उत्तर अमेरिका or to U.S. राज्य or holdings in the प्रशांत region.
Languages brought to the country by colonists or आप्रवासियों from Europe, एशिया, or अन्य भाग of the world make up a large portion of the भाषाएं currently used ; अनेक languages, सहित creoles and sign languages, have also developed in the संयुक्त States.
Approximately 337 भाषाएं are spoken or signed by the population, of which 176 हैं indigenous to the area.
fifty-two languages formerly spoken in the country 's territory are now extinct.
the किस्में of अंग्रेज़ी spoken in the United राज्य is known as अमरीकी English.
English is the de facto नेशनल भाषा of the United States, साथ 80 % of the जनसांख्यिकी claiming it as a mother tongue, and कुछ 95 % claiming to बोलो it `` well '' or `` बहुत खूब ''.
However, no official language exists at the federal level.
There have been अनेक प्रस्ताव to make अंग्रेज़ी the national language in amendments to आव्रजन reform bills, लकिन none of these बिल्स रै become law with the amendment intact.
The situation is quite varied at the state and territorial levels, साथ कुछ states mirroring the संघीय policy of adopting no official language in a de jure क्षमता, अन्य adopting English alone, अन्य officially adopting English as खूब as लोकल भाषाएं, and still others adopting a policy of de facto bilingualism.
स्पेनी is the second सबसे common language in the देश, and is spoken by over 12 % of the जनसांख्यिकी.
the United राज्य holds the world 's पांचवां largest spanish-speaking population, outnumbered only by Mexico, स्पेन, कोलंबिया, और Argentina.
Throughout the Southwestern United राज्य, long-established Spanish-speaking communities coexist with large संख्याएँ of अधिक recent hispanophone immigrants.
Although अनेक नई लैटिन अमरीकी immigrants हैं less than धाराप्रवाह in अंग्रेज़ी, nearly सब second-generation Hispanic अमेरिकी speak अंग्रेज़ी fluently, जबकि only परिचय half still speak स्पेनी.
According to the 2000 us census, people of जर्मनी ancestry मेक up the largest single ethnic समूह in the United States, and the जर्मनी language ranks पांचवां.
इतालवी, पॉलिश, और French हैं still widely बोला among populations descending from आप्रवासियों इससे those countries in the early 20th century, but the use of ये languages is dwindling as the older generations die.
रूसी is also बोला by अप्रवासी populations.
tagalog and वियतनामी have over one लाख अध्यक्षों each in the संयुक्त States, almost entirely within हाल immigrant populations.
दोनो languages, along साथ the varieties of the Chinese language, जापानी, और कोरियाई, are अभी प्रयुक्त in elections in Alaska, कैलिफ़ोर्निया, Hawaii, इलिनोइस, New यॉर्क, टेक्सास, and Washington.
Native अमरीकी languages हैं बोला in छोटी pockets of the देश, लकिन these populations हैं अवरोहण, और the languages are almost never widely used outside of reservations.
Hawaiian, although having few देशी speakers, is an official language साथ साथ English at the state स्तर in हवाई.
the state government of louisiana offers सेवाएं and दस्तावेज़ in French, as does New Mexico in स्पेनी.
Besides English, Spanish, French, German, Navajo और अन्य Native American languages, all other languages are usually learned from immigrant पूर्वजो that आए after the समय of स्वतंत्रता or learned through some रूप of शिक्षा.
1990 's Pontiac ग्रैंड Am सेडान fender and quarter panel
On an automobile, a quarter panel ( or rear wing as it is known in अंग्रेजों English ) is usually माना the body फलक जिससे goes between the rear द्वार and the trunk और typically wraps around the व्हील खूब ; however, the समान सामने section फेंडर ( vehicle ), between the द्वार and the हुड, is sometimes incorrectly referred to as a quarter फलक.
The क्वार्टर panel is typically बना of Sheet metal, but is sometimes बना of fiberglass or fiber-reinforced प्लास्टिक ; although, इस varies with different makes और models.
A क्वार्टर panel is typically a welded on घटक of the uni-body ढांचा or Monocoque.
Replacement of a चादर मेटल quarter panel typically requires it to be काटें off the vehicle and a replacement भाग to be welded ( or sometimes bonded ) to the गाडी.
due to this ऊँची राशि of specialized labor, a क्वार्टर panel may प्रायः be repaired rather than replaced by hammering out the damage, and a body filler sometimes referred to as bondo to be applied to finalize the असली सतह.
Shropshire ( or ; alternatively Salop ; abbreviated, in छपाई only, shrops ) is a काउंटी in the West Midlands प्रदेश of England.
it सीमायें वेल्स to the west, चेशायर to the उत्तर, Staffordshire to the east, वॉस्टरशायर to the south-east and Herefordshire to the south.
A unitary authority ( Shropshire Council ) थी निर्मित on 1 April 2009, taking over from the पिछला county council and 5 ज़िला councils, and covers सबसे of the county.
The borough of Telford और wrekin has been a पृथक एकात्मक authority since 1998 लकिन continues to be included in the ceremonial काउंटी.
The county 's population और economy is centred on पाँच towns : the काउंटी कस्बा of Shrewsbury, जिससे is culturally and historically important और is स्तिथ in the केन्द्र of the county ; telford, a new town in the ईस्ट which was constructed around a number of older towns, most notably वेलिंगटन, dawley और Madeley, which is today the सबसे populous ; and Oswestry in the north-west, bridgnorth just to the south of Telford, and Ludlow in the south.
The काउंटी has अनेक further market कस्बों, including Whitchurch in the उत्तर, Newport बस to the north-east of Telford, and मार्केट drayton in the north-east of the county.
The Ironbridge gorge area is a UNESCO संसार विरासत Site, covering Ironbridge, coalbrookdale और a part of Madeley.
There are, additionally, other notable historic industrial sites located around the county, such as at Shrewsbury, Broseley, snailbeach and highley as well as the Shropshire Union Canal.
The Shropshire Hills Area of Outstanding Natural Beauty कवर about a quarter of the काउंटी, मुख्यतः in the south.
Shropshire is one of England 's most rural and sparsely आबादी counties, साथ the population घनत्व of the shropshire Council area being just 91/km2 ( 337/sq mi ).
the wrekin is एक of the most प्रसिद्ध प्राकृतिक लैंडमार्क in the county, though the उच्चतम hills हैं the clee Hills, stiperstones और the long mynd.
Wenlock किनारे is another significant geographical and geological landmark.
in the low-lying northwest of the काउंटी ( and overlapping the किनारा साथ Wales ) is the Fenn 's, Whixall and Bettisfield mosses National Nature Reserve, one of the सबसे महत्वपूर्ण and बेहतरीन preserved bogs in ब्रिटेन.
the River severn, Great ब्रिटेन 's longest river, runs through the county, exiting into वॉस्टरशायर via the Severn Valley.
shropshire is landlocked, और with an area of, is England 's largest inland county.
The काउंटी flower is the round-leaved sundew.
For Eurostat उद्देश्य, the काउंटी ( कम the unitary district of telford and wrekin ) is a nuts 3 प्रदेश ( कोड UKG22 ).
The two Shropshire एकात्मक areas ( covering all of the ceremonial काउंटी ), together with the authorities covering the ceremonial काउंटी of Staffordshire, comprise the `` Shropshire and staffordshire '' NUTS 2 प्रदेश.

The American sitcom The बिग बंग Theory, created and executive उत्पादित by Chuck Lorre and विधेयक prady, premiered on CBS on September 24, 2007.
The दिखाएँ centers on पाँच characters : roommates Sheldon कूपर and Leonard Hofstadter, दो caltech physicists ; Penny, a वेट्रेस और aspiring actress who lives आरपार the हॉल ; और Leonard and Sheldon 's मित्रों और co-workers aerospace engineer Howard Wolowitz, and astrophysicist Rajesh koothrappali.
over समय, अनेक supporting characters have महरूम promoted to अभिनीत roles : लेस्ली Winkle ( season 1 पुनरावर्ती ; season 2 regular ; ऋतु 3 अतिथि ), a physicist सहयोगी, और, at different times, a lover of दोनो Leonard और हावर्ड ; Bernadette Rostenkowski-Wolowitz ( ऋतु 3 recurring ; season 4-present regular ), a microbiologist, Howard 's fiancée और subsequent wife, and पूर्व part-time waitress alongside पैनी ; neuroscientist Amy Farrah Fowler ( season 3 अतिथि ; season 4 recurring ; ऋतु 4-present regular ), जो joins the group बाद being matched to शेल्डन on a dating website ; and कॉमिक book store-owner, Stuart Bloom ( सीज़न 2–5 पुनरावर्ती ; season 6-present regular ), जो replaces हावर्ड as Raj 's बेहतरीन friend when Howard is in space.
The दिखाएँ also सुविधाएँ numerous supporting वर्ण, each of whom plays a prominent role in a small समूह of एपीसोड.
The a-team is an अमरीकी action-adventure television series, running from 1983 to 1987, परिचय a fictional group of ex– United States फौज खास शक्तियां कर्मियों जो work as soldiers of fortune, while on the चलाएं इससे the फौज after being branded as war अपराधियों for a `` crime they किया n't कमिट ``.
A feature film आधारित on the series थी released by 20th Century फॉक्स on June 11, 2010.
A comic book series, A-Team : Shotgun विवाह, began March 9, 2010.
Diana प्रिंस is a fictional character appearing regularly in कहानियां प्रकाशित by DC Comics.
वो debuted in सनसनी कॉमिक्स # 1 ( जनवरी 1942 ) और serves as the civilian and रहस्य identity of the superhero Wonder स्त्री.

Wat Phra Kaew, Bangkok, थाईलैंड
There is no official राज्य religion in the Thai constitution, जिससे guarantees religious स्वतंत्रता for all थाई citizens, though the king is required by law to be Buddhist.
According to the last जनसांख्यिकी ( 2000 ) 94.6 % of thais are Buddhists of the Theravada परंपरा.
Muslims are the दूसरी largest religious समूह in Thailand at 4.6 %.
Thailand 's southernmost provinces - Pattani, yala, narathiwat और part of songkhla chumphon have प्रबल Muslim populations, consisting of both ethnic Thai और मलय.
The दक्षिणी tip of थाईलैंड is mostly ethnic Malays.
Christians, mainly catholics, represent 0.7 % of the population.
a small but influential जातियाँ of Sikhs in Thailand और कुछ Hindus भी live in the country 's cities, and are heavily सगाई in खुदरा commerce.
वहीँ is also a small यहूदी community in Thailand, dating वापस to the 17th सदी.
Since 2001, Muslim कार्यकर्ताओं, generally described by the Thai government as terrorists or separatists, have rallied against the सेंट्रल government because of alleged भ्रष्टाचार और जातीय पूर्वाग्रह on the part of officials.
Thailand 's Department of Religion, फिलहाल अंतर्गत the Ministry of Culture, is formally जिम्मेदार for the पंजीकरण of religious groups in Thailand url_http which थाम properties through legally स्थापित foundations.
It has oversight, along with the Immigration पुलिस, over the कार्य permits of प्रचारकों जो हैं `` expatriate religious मजदूर '' of सब धर्मों.
A मान added tax ( VAT ) is a रूप of खपत tax.
From the perspective of the खरीदार, it is a कर on the purchase दाम.
From कि of the seller, it is a कर तभी on the value added to a उत्पाद, सामग्री, or service, from an हिसाब point of view, by इस stage of its manufacture or वितरण.
The निर्माता remits to the government the difference between ये two amounts, and retains the rest लिये themselves to offset the कर वे had previously सशुल्क on the inputs.
the value added to a उत्पाद by or साथ a business is the बिक्री दाम charged to इसके customer, ऋण the लागत of materials and other taxable inputs.
A VAT is जैसे a बिक्री कर in कि ultimately only the end उपभोक्ता is taxed.
It differs from the बिक्री कर in that, with the latter, the कर is collected और remitted to the सरकारी only once, at the पाइंट of खरीदें by the end consumer.
With the VAT, संग्रहण, remittances to the सरकारी, and क्रेडिट for taxes already सशुल्क occur each time a business in the supply chain purchases उत्पाद.
a रेफरी calling a high-sticking penaltyhigh
-sticking is the name of दो infractions in the खेल of बर्फ हॉकी that may occur when a player intentionally or inadvertently plays साथ his or her stick ऊपर the ऊँचाई of the shoulders or ऊपर the cross bar of a hockey लक्ष्य.
इस can result in a stoppage of play or in a दंड.
in the rules of the National Hockey League, high-sticking is पारिभाषित as a penalty in Rule 60 और as a non-penalty foul in Rule 80.
A stoppage in play results if a high stick comes in contact साथ the पक और the team who touched it regains control of the puck.
however, play प्रायः continues if a खिलाड़ी touches the पक साथ a ऊँची स्टिक and the opposing टोली gains control of the पक.
If the पक goes into the opposing net बाद coming into contact साथ a ऊँची स्टिक, the लक्ष्य is disallowed.
the स्तर at which a stick is considered too high लिये a लक्ष्य is the crossbar of the जाल.
However, if a खिलाड़ी knocks the पक into उसके own net साथ a high stick, the goal is allowed.
A penalty is assessed if a खिलाड़ी हमलों another खिलाड़ी with a ऊँची stick.
The player is given a minor penalty जबतक his high stick caused an चोट, in which case the रेफरी has the option to assess a double-minor, major or मैच दंड.
it is the referee 's discretion जिससे दंड to assess : the नियम calls for a double minor for an accidental injury, or a match दंड लिये a deliberate attempt to injure ( whether the opposition खिलाड़ी was दरअसल घायल ).
Injury is प्रायः decided by the ऊँची स्टिक causing bleeding, but the उपस्थिति of blood करता नहीं automatically mean an extra penalty is awarded.
Some referees have been known to award an अतिरिक्त दंड without the presence of blood if the referee determines कि the injury sustained थी sufficient to वारंट a double-minor penalty.
ठेठ आधुनिक memory card reader, compatible साथ अनेक आम formats
a memory कार्ड reader is a device, typically having a usb इंटरफ़ेस, लिये accessing the आंकड़ा on a memory कार्ड ऐसे as a CompactFlash ( CF ), Secure Digital ( SD ) or MultiMediaCard ( MMC ).
Most card पाठक भी प्रस्ताव write capability, and together with the card, this can function as a pen ड्राइव.
Some printers and personal कंप्यूटर have a built-in कार्ड reader.
A multi कार्ड reader is प्रयुक्त for communication with more than one type of flash मेमोरी card.
Multi card readers do नहीं have built-in मेमोरी क्षमता, लकिन हैं able to accept multiple प्रकार and शैलियाँ of मेमोरी cards.
The क्रमांक of compatible memory cards varies from रीडर to reader and can include more than 20 different प्रकार.
The क्रमांक of अलग memory cards that a मल्टी कार्ड रीडर can accept is expressed as x-in-1, with x being a figure of मेरिट indicating the क्रमांक of memory cards accepted, ऐसे as 35-in-1.
There are तीन categories of card readers sorted by the type and quantity of the card slots : सिंगल card रीडर ( e.g. 1x SD-only ), multi कार्ड reader ( e.g. 9-in-1 ) and श्रेणी card reader ( e.g. 4x sd only ).
कुछ kinds of memory ताश with their own USB functions do not need the card रीडर, ऐसे as the Intelligent स्टिक memory card, जिससे can प्लग सीधे into a USB स्लॉट.
The USB device class प्रयुक्त is 0x08.
धमकाना is detrimental to विद्यार्थी ' well-being and development.
Bullying is the उपयोग of force or coercion to गाली or intimidate others.
The behavior can be habitual and involve an imbalance of social or शारीरिक power.
it can include verbal harassment or threat, शारीरिक उत्पीड़न or coercion and may be directed repeatedly towards particular victims, शायद on grounds of रेस, धर्म, लिंग, sexuality, or ability.
If bullying is done by a समूह, it is called mobbing.
The victim of धमकाना is sometimes referred to as a `` निशाना ''.
धमकाना can be defined in अनेक अलग ways.
The uk currently रै no विधिक definition of धमकाना, while some U.S. states have laws against it.
Bullying consists of three मौलिक types of गाली – emotional, मौखिक, और शारीरिक.
It typically involves subtle विधि of coercion such as intimidation.
Bullying सीमाएँ from simple one-on-one bullying to more जटिल धमकाना in जिससे the bully may have एक or more `` lieutenants '' who may seem to be willing to assist the primary bully in उसके or her धमकाना activities.
Bullying in स्कूल और the workplace is भी referred to as पीर गाली.
Robert W. Fuller has analyzed धमकाना in the context of rankism.
A bullying culture can develop in कोई कॉन्टेक्स्ट in जिससे human beings interact साथ प्रत्येक अन्य.
This includes school, church, family, the workplace, home, and पड़ोस.
