Laura Bush and Rae leigh bradbury ( formerly लापता ) on April 4, 2007, in Austin, टेक्सास, after the 8-year-old introduced Mrs. Bush दौरान announcement of the future opening of the Texas Regional Office of the नेशनल बीच for लापता and शोषित Children.
Rae leigh थी the पहला चाइल्ड in the U.S. to be recovered as a परिणाम of an एम्बर चेतावनी when she was 8 सप्ताह बूढ़ा in नवम्बर 1998.
an AMBER Alert or a चाइल्ड Abduction Emergency ( SAME code : CAE ) is a child abduction alert प्रणाली originating in 1996, now employed in 9 देशों.
AMBER is officially a backronym for अमेरिका 's लापता : प्रसारण Emergency Response, named for एम्बर Hagerman, a 9-year-old abducted and murdered in Arlington, Texas in 1996.
Alternate क्षेत्रीय alert names were once used ; in जॉर्जिया, `` लेवी 's कॉल '' ( नामित after Levi Frady ) ; in हवाई, `` maile एम्बर चेतावनी '' ( बाद maile गिल्बर्ट ) ; and Arkansas, `` मॉर्गन Nick एम्बर Alert '' ( in memory of Morgan chauntel उपनाम ).
AMBER Alerts हैं वितरित via वाणिज्यिक रेडियो स्टेशन, अंतरजाल रेडियो, satellite रेडियो, television stations, and cable tv by the आपात चेतावनी System and NOAA मौसम Radio ( जहाँ they हैं termed `` चाइल्ड Abduction आपात '' or `` एम्बर Alerts '' ).
The चेतावनियाँ are भी issued via e-mail, electronic traffic-condition signs, the led billboards जिससे हैं located बाहर of newer Walgreens locations, साथ साथ the LED/LCD लक्षण of billboard कंपनियाँ ऐसे as साफ चैनल Outdoor, CBS बाहरी और Lamar, or through बेतार device SMS text messages.
एम्बर चेतावनी रै भी teamed up with Google और फेसबुक to रिले information regarding an एम्बर Alert to an कभी growing demographic.
Those दिलचस्पी in subscribing to receive एम्बर Alerts in their area via sms संदेश can विज़िट Wireless एम्बर चेतावनियाँ, which are offered by विधि as फ़्री messages.
In कुछ states, the प्रदर्शक scrollboards in सामने of लॉटरी terminals are also used.
the निर्णय to declare an एम्बर चेतावनी is बना by each police organization ( in अनेक cases, the state police or highway patrol ) which investigates each of the abductions.
Public सूचना in an AMBER Alert usually consists of the नाम और वर्णन of the abductee, a description of the suspected abductor, और a description and license थाली क्रमांक of the abductor 's vehicle, if available.
Monica samille Lewinsky ( born जुलाई 23, 1973 ) is an American woman with जिसको संयुक्त States अध्यक्ष Bill क्लिंटन admitted to having had an `` improper relationship '' while she worked at the श्वेत हाउस in 1995 and 1996.
The affair और इसके repercussions ( which included क्लिंटन 's impeachment ) became ज्ञात as the lewinsky scandal.
हाउस of Night is a series of vampire -themed fantasy novels by American author P. C. डाल and उसके daughter kristin Cast.
it follows the adventures of zoey Redbird, a sixteen-year-old लड़की who has just become a `` fledgling vampyre '' and is जरूरी to attend the House of रात्रि boarding school in तुलसा, Oklahoma.
The श्रेणी has been on the New York टाइम्स Best Seller सूची for 63 weeks और there हैं over सात लाख copies in छपाई in North America अलोन.
The छठे novel, Tempted, जिससे went on sale on October 27, 2009 with a पहला printing of a लाख copies, डाला the यूएसए आज bestseller list that week at # 1.
In January, 2010, Gezeichnet, a German अनुवाद of चिह्नित, reached the # 1 spot on the Der Spiegel बेस्टसेलर list.
the series has so दूर sold अधिक than ten लाख books in 39 countries.
Burned was released on April 27, 2010, and like Tempted, it डाला the यूएसए Today bestseller list that week at # 1.
awakened, released in January, 2011, also entered the list at # 1.
the श्रेणी, which is प्रकाशित by St Martin 's दबायें is नियोजित to include twelve books.
in 2008, plans लिये a film अनुकूलन यहूद also घोषित.
The tenth book in the श्रेणी, छुपा, was released on October 16, 2012.
The second book in the novellas ( जिससे दे backgrounds on supporting वर्ण ), lenobia 's Vow, was released जनवरी 31, 2012.
Book eleven is फिलहाल called नाज़िल, और the Casts have announced कि two अधिक novellas, neferet’s अभिशाप, नियोजित to be released February 19, 2013, and a prequel novel परिचय kalona, are to be released to coincide साथ the eleventh and twelfth किताबे.
in यूनानी mythology, the trojan War was waged विरूद्ध the city of Troy by the Achaeans ( यूनानियों ) बाद Paris of Troy took हेलेन from उसके husband Menelaus किंग of Sparta.
the युद्ध is one of the most important कार्यक्रम in Greek mythology and has been narrated through many works of यूनानी literature, most notably through Homer 's इलियड और the Odyssey.
The इलियड relates a भाग of the last year of the घेरा of Troy ; the Odyssey describes Odysseus 's journey home.
Other parts of the युद्ध are contained in a साईकिल of एपिक poems, which have बच through fragments.
Episodes इससे the war provided सामग्री for Greek tragedy and other works of यूनानी literature, and for Roman कवियों including Virgil and Ovid.
the युद्ध originated इससे a quarrel between the देवियाँ Athena, hera, और Aphrodite, after Eris, the goddess of strife और अनबन, दिया them a golden ठहराना, sometimes known as the Apple of Discord, marked `` for the fairest ''.
ज़ीउस sent the goddesses to पेरिस, जो judged that aphrodite, as the `` fairest '', should receive the ठहराना.
in एक्सचेंज, aphrodite made हेलेन, the most खूबसूरत of all women और wife of Menelaus, fall in love with Paris, who took उसके to Troy.
Agamemnon, king of Mycenae and the brother of Helen 's husband Menelaus, led an expedition of achaean troops to ट्रॉय and besieged the city for ten years because of पेरिस ' बेइज्जती.
After the मौतों of many नायक, including the Achaeans Achilles और Ajax, और the Trojans हेक्टर and पेरिस, the city गिरी to the ruse of the trojan Horse.
The achaeans slaughtered the Trojans ( except for some of the महिलाओं and children जिसको they kept or sold as स्लेव ) और desecrated the temples, यूँ earning the देवताओं ' wrath.
few of the Achaeans returned safely to उनके घरों and many founded colonies in distant shores.
the Romans later traced their origin to aeneas, एक of the ट्रोजन्स, who थी said to have led the surviving ट्रोजन्स to modern-day Italy.
The प्राचीन यूनानियों विचार that the trojan War was a historical event that had taken place in the 13th or 12th सदी BC, and believed that ट्रॉय was located in modern-day तुर्कों निकट the dardanelles.
By आधुनिक times, both the युद्ध और the city were widely believed to be non-historical.
in 1868, however, the German archaeologist Heinrich schliemann मिले Frank Calvert, जो convinced schliemann कि ट्रॉय was at Hissarlik and Schliemann took over Calvert 's excavations on property belonging to Calvert ; this claim is अभी accepted by most विद्वानों.
Whether there is any ऐतिहासिक वास्तविकता behind the Trojan War is an खोलें question.
अनेक विद्वानों believe that वहीँ is a historical core to the tale, हालांकि इस may simply mean that the Homeric stories are a संलयन of विभिन्न tales of sieges and रिझाने by माइसीनियाई यूनानियों during the कांस्य Age.
Those who मानना that the stories of the Trojan War are derived from a specific historical विरोध usually date it to the 12th or 11th centuries BC, often preferring the dates दिए by इरैटोस्थनिज़, 1194–1184 BC, which roughly corresponds with पुरातत्व evidence of a अनर्थकारी burning of ट्रॉय viia.
Anarchists have employed निश्चित प्रतीकों लिये their cause, सहित सबसे prominently the circle-a and the ब्लैक flag, although anarchists have historically largely denied the importance of प्रतीकों to राजनैतिक movement.
Since the revival of अराजकतावाद around the start of the 21st-century concurrent साथ the rise of the anti-globalization गति, anarchist सांस्कृतिक प्रतीकों are widely उपस्थित.
The greater palatine कनाल ( or pterygopalatine कनाल ) is a passage in the skull that transmits the greater palatine धमनी, vein, और तंत्रिका between the pterygopalatine fossa और the मौखिक cavity.
सतह तापमान of Antarctica in winter and गर्मियाँ from the European Centre for Medium-Range Weather forecasts
The जलवायु of अंटार्कटिक is the coldest on the पूरे of Earth.
Antarctica has the lowest naturally occurring temperature कभी अंकित on the ground on धरती : −89.2 °c ( −128.6 °f ) at वोस्तोक Station.
It is also अत्यधिक शुष्क ( technically a desert ), averaging 166 mm ( 6.5 in ) of precipitation per year.
Even so, on सबसे parts of the महाद्वीप the snow rarely melts और is आखिरकार compressed to become the glacial ice कि makes up the ice sheet.
Weather fronts rarely penetrate दूर into the continent.
Most of Antarctica रै an ice कैप climate ( köppen EF ) with very cold, generally extremely dry weather throughout the साल और no month averaging above 0 °c ( 32 °f ).
कुछ fringe coastal areas have a tundra climate ( Köppen ET ) साथ a short summer averaging ऊपर freezing, and much उच्चतर वर्षण.
Current head coach माइक tomlin, during the 2007 season
The Pittsburgh Steelers franchise has had 16 head कोच throughout इसके history.
संस्थापित as the पिट्सबर्ग Pirates in, the name थी changed to the Steelers prior to the season to celebrate the city 's विरासत of producing steel.
जो बच served two separate terms as head कोच and वॉल्ट kiesling served तीन पृथक terms.
During the और सीज़न, due to the amount of players who fought in World War II, the Steelers संयुक्त their team साथ Philadelphia and शिकागो, respectively.
During these seasons, Steelers ' coach Walt kiesling साझा coaching duties with चिकनी neale और Phil हैंडलर, जो have नहीं been included भीतर इस list.
struggling for much of the franchise 's early सालो, the team 's first season साथ more wins than losses was coached by jock Sutherland in.
in, under Sutherland, the Steelers निभाई their पहला playoff खेल विरूद्ध the Philadelphia ईगल्स.
टेन of the 16 head coaches खर्च their entire पेशेवर कोचिंग करियर with the मताधिकार, सहित John McNally, Walt Kiesling and चक Noll, who have also महरूम voted into the Pro Football Hall of Fame.
One of तभी चार men to कोच the same team लिये 23 सालो, चक noll रिटायर्ड in.
Noll is also the only coach in नेशनल फ़ुटबॉल League history to win four Super Bowls.
विधेयक Cowher, noll 's replacement, coached the Steelers to their fifth सुपर कटोरी victory, in 2005.
the स्टीलर्स sixth Super Bowl win came in सुपर कटोरी xliii, जबकि सिर coached by Mike Tomlin, the टोली 's वर्तमान सिर कोच.
in दण्ड विधि, fraud is intentional deception बना लिये निजी लाभ or to damage another individual ; the सम्बन्धित adjective is बेईमान, और क्रिया is defraud.
धोखाधड़ी is a crime और a सिविल विधि violation, though the specific criminal विधि definition varies by विधिक क्षेत्राधिकार.
Defrauding people or entities of धन or valuables is a common purpose of धोखाधड़ी.
A hoax भी involves deception, लकिन without the intention of gain or of damaging or depriving the victim.
Fraud is a रक्षा in a सिविल कार्रवाई for breach of अनुबंध or विशिष्ट performance of a contract.
Fraud is a आधार लिये निष्पक्ष jurisdiction.
Passover, or pesach ( from : in Hebrew, यहूदी ), Tiberian :, Modern यहूदी : /ˈpesaχ/ Pesah, pesakh, यहूदी : Peysekh, paysakh, Paysokh ) is an important Biblically -derived यहूदी festival.
historically, together with Shavuot ( `` Pentecost '' ) और sukkot ( `` Tabernacles '' ), passover is एक of the तीन यात्राएं त्यौहार ( shalosh Regalim ) during जिससे the संपूर्ण population of the kingdom of Judah बना a यात्राएं to the Temple in जेरूसलम.
Samaritans still मेक इस pilgrimage to माउंट Gerizim, लकिन तभी men participate in public worship.
Passover commences on the 15th of the Hebrew month of Nisan and lasts for either seven दिनों ( in Israel ) or eight days ( in the diaspora ).
In judaism, a दिन commences at dusk and lasts until the following dusk, thus the पहला दिन of Passover only begins after dusk of the 14th of nisan और ends at dusk of the 15th दिन of the month of Nisan.
The संस्कार unique to the Passover celebrations commence with the passover Seder when the 15th of Nisan रै begun.
In the Northern गोलार्ध passover takes प्लेस in spring as the Torah prescribes it : `` in the माह of [ the ] spring '' ( בחדש האביב ).
It is एक of the सबसे widely observed Jewish holidays.
the Jewish people celebrate Passover as a commemoration of their मुक्ति over 3,300 years ago by God from slavery in ancient Egypt that थी ruled by the Pharaohs, और their जनम as a nation under the नेतृत्व of मूसा.
It commemorates the story of the exodus as described in the यहूदी Bible especially in the Book of exodus, in जिससे the Israelites यहूद freed इससे गुलामी in मिश्र.
in the कथा of the Exodus, the बाइबल tells that God helped the Children of Israel escape इससे their slavery in मिश्र by inflicting ten plagues upon the ancient उन्होंने before the pharaoh होता रिलीज his Israelite slaves ; the दसवाँ and worst of the plagues थी the death of the Egyptian first-born.
The israelites were instructed to चिह्नित the doorposts of their homes with the रक्त of a slaughtered spring lamb और, upon seeing this, the spirit of the Lord knew to pass over the first-born in these homes, hence the name of the अवकाश.
There is some debate over where the term is actually निकला इससे.
जब the pharaoh freed the Israelites, it is कहा that वे बाएँ in such a hurry कि they could नहीं wait लिये ब्रैड dough to वृद्धि ( leaven ).
in commemoration, for the duration of Passover no leavened ब्रैड is eaten, लिये जिससे reason it is पुकारा `` The Festival of the Unleavened ब्रैड ''.
Thus Matzo ( चपटा unleavened ब्रैड ) is खाया during passover and it is a symbol of the holiday.
हैली 's Comet or Comet Halley ( or ), officially designated 1p/halley, is the best-known of the short-period comets और is visible इससे Earth every 75–76 years.
हैली is the तभी short-period धूमकेतु that is clearly visible to the naked eye from धरती, and thus the only naked-eye comet that might appear twice in a human आजीवन.
Other naked-eye comets may be brighter and अधिक spectacular, लकिन होगा appear only एकबार in हज़ारों of years.
Halley 's returns to the भीतरी सौर System have महरूम observed and अंकित by astronomers since at least 240 BCE.
Clear records of the धूमकेतु 's appearances यहूद made by Chinese, Babylonian, and medieval यूरोपीय chroniclers, but were नहीं पहचाना as reappearances of the same ऑब्जेक्ट at the time.
the comet 's periodicity was first determined in 1705 by अंग्रेज़ी astronomer Edmond हैली, बाद जिसको it is now नामित.
हैली 's Comet last appeared in the inner सौर System in 1986 and will अगला appear in mid-2061.
During its 1986 apparition, Halley became the पहला धूमकेतु to be observed in detail by spacecraft, providing the पहला observational data on the structure of a comet केंद्रक and the यांत्रिकी of coma और टेल गठन.
These observations supported a number of longstanding hypotheses about comet construction, particularly Fred whipple 's `` dirty स्नोबॉल '' model, जिससे correctly predicted that Halley would be रचित of a मिश्रण of volatile ices – such as water, कार्बन dioxide और अमोनिया – and धूल.
The missions भी provided data which substantially reformed और reconfigured ये ideas ; लिये instance it is अभी understood कि हैली 's surface is largely composed of dusty, non-volatile materials, and that तभी a small portion of it is icy.
Anti-communism is विपक्ष to communism.
Organized anti-communism विकसित in reaction to the rise of communism, especially बाद the 1917 October Revolution in रूस and reaching वैश्विक dimensions during the ठंडा War.
Most anti-communists reject the concept of historical materialism, which is a central विचार in Marxism.
anti-communists reject the Marxist belief that पूंजीवाद will be followed by socialism and communism, just as सामंतवाद was followed by capitalism.
Anti-communists सवाल the validity of the मार्क्सवादी अर्जी that the socialist राज्य होगा `` wither away '' when it becomes unnecessary in a सच्चा communist समाज.
Anti-communists argue that the दमन in the early सालो of bolshevik rule, जबकि नहीं as extreme as that during जोसेफ स्टालिन 's नियम, was still severe by उचित standards, citing examples ऐसे as Felix dzerzhinsky 's रहस्य police, जिससे eliminated numerous political opponents by extrajudicial executions, and the brutal crushing of the Kronstadt rebellion and Tambov विद्रोह.
कुछ anti-communists refer to both Communism and fascism as सर्वसत्तावाद, seeing similarity between the actions of communist and fascist सरकारें.
Historian Robert conquest has argued that Communism was responsible for tens of लाखो of deaths during the 20th century.
Opponents argue that कम्युनिस्ट पार्टियों कि have come to शक्ति have tended to be rigidly intolerant of राजनैतिक opposition.
These प्रतिद्वंद्वियों अर्जी कि most कम्युनिस्ट countries have shown no signs of advancing from Marx 's समाजवादी stage of economy to an आदर्श कम्युनिस्ट stage.
Rather, Communist सरकारें have been accused of creating a नई सत्ताधारी क्लास ( a nomenklatura ), साथ शक्तियां और privileges greater than those previously enjoyed by the अपर classes in the non- communist regimes.
gil बगुला ( 9 अप्रैल 1922 – 27 November 2008 ) थी a Jamaican पेशेवर footballer.
He was the पहला ब्लैक खिलाड़ी to खेल लिये स्कॉटिश club Celtic, and थी the father of poet और musician Gil Scott-Heron.
He died in डेट्रॉयट of a heart attack on 27 November 2008.
the सोयाबीन ( US ) or soya bean ( UK ) ( Glycine max ) is a प्रजाति of legume native to ईस्ट Asia, widely grown for इसके edible bean जिससे रै numerous उपयोग.
the संयंत्र is classed as an oilseed rather than a pulse by the UN Food and Agricultural Organization ( FAO ).
Fat-free ( defatted ) soybean भोजन is a significant और cheap source of प्रोटीन लिये animal feeds and अनेक prepackaged meals ; soy vegetable आयल is another product of processing the सोयाबीन क्रॉप.
For example, soybean उत्पाद such as textured vegetable protein ( TVP ) are ingredients in many मांस and दुग्ध analogues.
soybeans produce significantly more protein per एकड़ than सबसे अन्य uses of land.
Traditional nonfermented खाना उपयोग of soybeans शामिल soy milk, and from the latter tofu and टोफू स्किन.
Fermented foods include soy सॉस, fermented सेम paste, natto, and tempeh, among अन्य.
the oil is used in अनेक industrial अनुप्रयोग.
The main निर्माता of सोया are the संयुक्त States ( 35 % ), Brazil ( 27 % ), Argentina ( 19 % ), China ( 6 % ) and India ( 4 % ).
the beans contain significant amounts of phytic एसिड, alpha-linolenic एसिड, and isoflavones.
हैरिसन घाट ( born July 13, 1942 ) is an अमरीकी फिल्मी कर्ता and producer.
He is famous लिये his प्रदर्शन as Han Solo in the असली Star Wars त्रयी and the title character of the इंडियाना Jones film series.
Ford is भी known लिये उसके roles as रिक Deckard in ब्लेड Runner, John किताब in Witness और जोकर Ryan in Patriot खेल and Clear और Present Danger.
His करियर has spanned six दशकों और शामिल roles in अनेक Hollywood blockbusters, including presumed Innocent, the Fugitive, Air फ़ोर्स एक, और What झूठ beneath.
at one पाइंट, four of the शीर्ष six box-office hits of all time included one of his roles.
पाँच of उसके films have been inducted into the नेशनल फिल्मी Registry.
in 1997, Ford थी ranked No. 1 in Empire `` The शीर्ष 100 Movie Stars of सब Time '' list.
, the United राज्य domestic box दफ्तर grosses of घाट 's films total over US $ 3.5 अरब, साथ worldwide grosses surpassing $ 6 billion, making Ford the third उच्चतम grossing U.S. घरेलू box-office star.
घाट is the husband of actress Calista flockhart.
a tube of chapstick
ChapStick is a ब्रांड नाम लिये लिप balm manufactured by Pfizer Consumer Healthcare and used in many countries worldwide.
it is intended to help treat and prevent chapped lips ; hence the name.
अनेक किस्में भी शामिल सनस्क्रीन in order to prevent sunburn.
Due to its लोकप्रियता, the term रै become a genericized ट्रेडमार्क.
It popularly refers to कोई lip balm contained in a lipstick-style ट्यूब और applied in the same manner as lipstick.
however, the पद is स्टिल a पंजीकृत ट्रेडमार्क, with अधिकारों exclusively owned by Pfizer.
In Sweden और in the United किंगडम, the product 's main competitor is lypsyl, made by Novartis उपभोक्ता स्वास्थ्य, which is distributed in समान packaging to chapstick.
George Berkeley ( ; 12 March 168514 January 1753 ), also ज्ञात as बिशप बर्कली ( Bishop of Cloyne ), was an Anglo-Irish philosopher whose प्राथमिक achievement was the advancement of a theory he called `` immaterialism '' ( later referred to as `` subjective idealism `` by others ).
This theory denies the existence of material substance and बजाय contends that परिचित वस्तुएँ like tables and कुर्सियां हैं only ideas in the minds of perceivers, and as a result can not मौजूद बगैर being आभास.
यूँ, as बर्कली famously put it, लिये शारीरिक वस्तुएँ `` esse est percipi '' ( `` to be is to be आभास `` ).
बर्कली is also ज्ञात for उसके critique of abstraction, an important premise in his argument for immaterialism.
In 1709, बर्कली published his पहला major work,, in जिससे he discussed the सीमाएं of human दृष्टि and उन्नत the सिद्धान्त कि the proper objects of sight are not material objects, but लाइट और colour.
This foreshadowed his मुख्य philosophical work A Treatise concerning the Principles of Human ज्ञान in 1710 which, बाद its poor reception, he rewrote in संवाद form और published under the title Three Dialogues between Hylas और Philonous in 1713.
In this किताब, Berkeley 's views यहूद represented by philonous ( यूनानी : 'प्रेमr of mind ' ), जबकि Hylas ( Greek : 'matter ' ) embodies the Irish thinker’s opponents, in particular John Locke.
Berkeley argued विरूद्ध सर इसहाक़ Newton 's doctrine of absolute स्पेस, समय and motion in De Motu ( on Motion ), published 1721.
His वितर्क were a precursor to the दृश्य of Mach and आइंस्टीन.
in 1732, he published Alciphron, a ईसाई apologetic विरूद्ध the free-thinkers, और in 1734, he published The विश्लेषक, an empiricist critique of the मूलाधार of infinitesimal calculus, which थी influential in the विकास of mathematics.
His last major philosophical work, siris ( 1744 ), begins by वकालत the औषधीय उपयोग of tar water, and then continues to discuss a चौड़ी range of विषय including विज्ञान, दर्शनशास्त्र, और theology.
Interest in बर्कली 's कार्य increased बाद संसार युद्ध ii, क्युकी he tackled many of the issues of paramount interest to philosophy in the 20th सदी such as the problems of बोध, the अंतर between प्राथमिक and secondary qualities, और the importance of language.
Qingdao ( ), historically ज्ञात as tsingtao, is a major city in eastern शानदोंग province, Eastern चीन, साथ a जनसांख्यिकी of over 8.715 लाख ( 2010 census ).
Its built up area, made of 6 urban districts and 4 county-level cities, is home to about 4,896,000 inhabitants in 2010.
it borders yantai to the northeast, weifang to the west and Rizhao to the southwest.
qīng ( ) in चाइनीज means `` ग्रीन '' or `` lush '', जबकि dǎo ( ) अर्थात् `` द्वीप ''.
Qingdao is administered at the sub-provincial स्तर.
Lying आरपार the Shandong Peninsula जबकि looking आउट to the Yellow Sea, Qingdao is a प्रमुख seaport, naval base, and औद्योगिक centre.
it is also the site of the Tsingtao ब्रेवरी.
The संसार 's longest sea सेतु, the Qingdao Haiwan सेतु, कड़ी the प्रमुख urban क्षेत्रफल of Qingdao with Huangdao ज़िला, straddling the jiaozhou Bay समुद्र क्षेत्रों.
Qingdao is named China 's most livable नगर.
Mimivirus is a viral genus containing a single identified species named Acanthamoeba polyphaga mimivirus ( apmv ), or is a group of phylogenetically सम्बन्धित विशाल वाइरस ( designated प्रायः mimin ).
In colloquial speech, APMV is अधिक commonly referred to as बस `` mimivirus ''.
जबतक October 2011, when a larger virus Megavirus chilensis was वर्णित, it had the largest capsid diameter of सब known viruses.
mimivirus has a large और complex genome compared साथ सबसे other viruses.
mimivirus, छोटी for `` mimicking microbe '', is so called to प्रतिबिंबित its large आकार and apparent Gram-staining properties.
The मैक्सिकन War of स्वतंत्रता ( 1810–1821 ) was an armed conflict between the लोगों of मैक्सिको and the स्पेनी colonial अधिकारियों which started on September 16, 1810.
the गति, which became known as the Mexican युद्ध of स्वतंत्रता, was led by mexican-born spaniards, mestizos and amerindians जो sought independence from Spain.
it started as an आदर्शवादी peasants ' विद्रोह विरूद्ध their औपनिवेशिक मास्टर्स, but ended as an unlikely गठबंधन between Mexican ex-royalists और मैक्सिकन guerrilla insurgents.
crohn 's बीमारी, भी ज्ञात as crohn सिंड्रोम and क्षेत्रीय enteritis, is a प्रकार of inflammatory bowel disease कि may affect any part of the जठरांत्र ट्रैक्ट इससे mouth to anus, causing a wide variety of symptoms.
It primarily कल्याणकारी abdominal पीड़ा, diarrhea ( जिससे may be खूनी if inflammation is at its worst ), उल्टी ( can be continuous ), or weight घाटा, but may भी कारण complications बाहर the gastrointestinal tract such as skin rashes, गठिया, सूजन of the eye, थकान, and कमी of concentration.
crohn 's disease is caused by interactions between environmental, immunological and bacterial factors in genetically susceptible individuals.
इस results in a chronic inflammatory disorder, in which the body 's प्रतिरक्षा प्रणाली attacks the gastrointestinal tract संभवतः directed at सूक्ष्मजैविक antigens.
Crohn 's बीमारी रै wrongly महरूम described as an असंक्राम्य बीमारी in the past ; recent जांचकर्ताओं have described it as an प्रतिरक्षा कमियां state.
There is a जेनेटिक संघ with crohn 's बीमारी, primarily with variations of the NOD2 gene and इसके protein, which senses बैक्टीरियल कोशिका दीवारें.
सहोदर of affected individuals हैं at उच्चतर risk.
Males and females हैं equally affected.
Smokers are two टाइम्स more likely to develop Crohn 's disease than nonsmokers.
Crohn 's disease affects between 400,000 and 600,000 people in उत्तर अमेरिका.
Prevalence estimates for उत्तरी Europe have ranged from 27–48 per 100,000.
crohn 's disease tends to present initially in the teens and twenties, with another peak incidence in the fifties to seventies, although the disease can occur at कोई आयु.
वहीँ is no known फार्मास्युटिकल or सर्जिकल cure लिये Crohn 's disease.
Treatment options हैं restricted to controlling symptoms, maintaining remission, and preventing पतन.
The बीमारी थी named बाद gastroenterologist Burrill Bernard Crohn, जो, in 1932, together साथ दो अन्य colleagues at Mount Sinai हॉस्पिटल in नई York, described a series of मरीजों साथ सूजन of the terminal ileum, the area most commonly affected by the बीमारी.

The सूची directly includes the tallest इमारतें and structures for each देश, and where उचित, it also अंक to अधिक detailed country-specific lists.

It is located west of Grass घाटी, California, approximately 62 miles ( 100 km ) from sacramento.
The population was 963 at the 2010 census.
YouTube is a video-sharing जालस्थल, created by three पूर्व PayPal employees in February 2005, on जिससे उपयोक्ता can upload, दृश्य and share videos.
the company is based in San Bruno, California, and uses adobe Flash Video और html5 प्रौद्योगिकी to display a wide किस्में of user-generated वीडियो content, सहित फिल्म क्लिप्स, TV clips, और music videos, as well as amateur content ऐसे as वीडियो blogging, short असली videos, and शैक्षणिक videos.
सबसे of the content on YouTube रै महरूम अपलोड by individuals, although media corporations सहित CBS, the बीबीसी, Vevo, hulu, and other organizations offer some of उनके material via the site, as part of the YouTube partnership कार्यक्रम.
Unregistered users can watch वीडियो, while पंजीकृत users can अपलोड an असीमित number of videos.
वीडियो माना to contain potentially offensive content are उपलब्धियाँ तभी to registered users at तनिक 18 years old.
in नवम्बर 2006, YouTube, llc थी खरीदा by Google लिये us $ 1.65 billion, and operates as a subsidiary of Google.
Sister अधिनियम is a musical written by cheri Steinkellner and विधेयक steinkellner साथ अतिरिक्त किताब सामग्री by डगलस Carter beane, with गीत by ग्लेन Slater and म्यूज़िक by Alan menken.
It is based on the hit 1992 फिल्मी कॉमेडी of the same name.

गोल्डबर्ग is also a producer of the 2011 Broadway अनुकूलन.
Microsoft DirectX is a संग्रहण of अनुप्रयोग programming interfaces ( APIs ) for हैंडलिंग tasks related to मल्टीमीडिया, विशेषकर खेल प्रोग्रामिंग और वीडियो, on microsoft platforms.
Originally, the names of these api सब began साथ सीधा, such as Direct3D, DirectDraw, DirectMusic, DirectPlay, DirectSound, and so forth.
the नाम DirectX थी coined as shorthand term for all of ये APIs ( the X standing in for the particular api names ) और जल्द became the नाम of the collection.
जब microsoft later नियत out to develop a gaming console, the X was used as the basis of the नाम एक्सबॉक्स to indicate कि the console was आधारित on डाइरेक्टएक्स technology.
The x आरंभिक रै been carried आगे in the naming of APIs designed लिये the Xbox such as XInput and the Cross-platform ऑडियो सृष्टि Tool ( XACT ), while the DirectX pattern has been continued for Windows APIs such as Direct2D and DirectWrite.
direct3d ( the 3D graphics API within DirectX ) is widely used in the विकास of video games for microsoft खिड़कियाँ, microsoft एक्सबॉक्स, microsoft एक्सबॉक्स 360 and some Sega dreamcast games.
Direct3D is also used by other तन्त्र applications for visualization और graphics कार्य such as cad/cam अभियान्त्रिकी.
As direct3d is the सबसे widely publicized component of डाइरेक्टएक्स, it is common to see the names `` DirectX '' और `` Direct3D '' used interchangeably.
the DirectX तन्त्र development kit ( SDK ) consists of runtime पुस्तकालयों in redistributable शब्दकोष रूप, along साथ accompanying documentation and headers लिये उपयोग in कोडिंग.
Originally, the runtimes were only installed by खेल or explicitly by the उपयोक्ता.
Windows 95 did नहीं launch with DirectX, but DirectX was included साथ खिड़कियाँ 95 OEM Service रिलीज 2.
खिड़कियाँ 98 और Windows NT 4.0 both shipped with DirectX, as has every संस्करण of Windows released चूंकि.
the sdk is available as a फ़्री download.
While the runtimes are proprietary, closed-source तन्त्र, source कोड is provided for most of the sdk samples.
starting with the release of Windows 8 डेवलपर पूर्वावलोकन, DirectX sdk has been एकीकृत into खिड़कियाँ sdk.
Direct3D 9Ex, direct3d 10, and Direct3D 11 are तभी उपलब्धियाँ लिये खिड़कियाँ विस्टा और नए क्युकी each of these new संस्करण was built to depend upon the new Windows Display ड्राइवर मॉडल कि थी introduced लिये Windows Vista.
The new Vista/WDDM ग्राफिक्स architecture शामिल a new video memory manager supporting virtualization of graphics हार्डवेयर for various applications and services जैसे the डेस्कटॉप खिड़की Manager.
Quetzaltenango, भी commonly known by its indigenous name, Xelajú, or more commonly, Xela, is the second largest city of Guatemala.
it is दोनो the capital of Quetzaltenango विभाग and the नगरपालिका seat of Quetzaltenango नगरपालिका.
it has an estimated population of 224,703.
The population is about 61 % स्वदेशी or amerindian, 34 % मेस्टिज़ो or ladino and 5 % European.
Quetzaltenango is located in a mountain valley at an उन्नयन of 2,330 मीटर ( 7,655 ft ) ऊपर समुद्र स्तर at इसके lowest part.
It may reach ऊपर 2,400 मीटर within the नगर.
the Municipality of quetzaltenango consists of an area of.
municipalities abutting the municipality of quetzaltenango शामिल : salcajá, Cantel, almolonga, zunil, El palmar, concepción Chiquirichapa, San mateo, la Esperanza, Olintepeque, and सैन Andrés Xecul.
All ये municipalities हैं part of the विभाग of quetzaltenango, मगर सैन Andrés Xecul which is a part of the विभाग of totonicapán.
the एपिक of Gilgamesh, an epic poem from Mesopotamia, is amongst the earliest surviving works of literature.
The literary इतिहास of gilgamesh begins with five independent Sumerian कविताएं about 'bilgamesh ' ( Sumerian for gilgamesh ), king of uruk.
Four of ये were used as source material for a combined epic in Akkadian.
This first combined एपिक, known as the `` बूढ़ा Babylonian '' version, dates to the 18th century bc and is titled बाद its incipit, shūtur eli sharrī ( `` surpassing All अन्य किंग्स '' ).
तभी a few fragments of it have बच.
the बाद `` Standard babylonian '' संस्करण dates from the 13th to the 10th centuries bc and bears the incipit शा naqba īmuru ( `` he who Saw the Deep '' ).
Fragments of लगभग two thirds of इस longer, twelve-tablet version have महरूम बरामद.
कुछ of the best copies यहूद खोजा in the पुस्तकालयों ruins of the 7th-century bc Assyrian king ashurbanipal.
the story centers on a दोस्ती between Gilgamesh and Enkidu.
Enkidu is a wild man created by the देवताओं as Gilgamesh 's बराबर to distract him from oppressing the लोगों of Uruk.
Together, वे journey to the देवदार Mountain to defeat Humbaba, its monstrous guardian.
Later वे kill the Bull of स्वर्ग, which the goddess इश्तार sends to सजा gilgamesh for spurning her अग्रिम.
As a दंड for these actions, the gods वाक्य enkidu to मौत.
The second half of the एपिक focuses on gilgamesh 's तकलीफ at Enkidu 's death, और his quest लिये immortality.
in order to सीख the secret of अनन्त life, Gilgamesh undertakes a long and perilous journey.
He learns that `` the life that you हैं seeking you will never find.
When the देवताओं created man वे allotted to him मौत, but जीवन वे retained in their own keeping. ''
This quote was originally attributed to siduri in the बूढ़ा Babylonian version of the epic, and तब attributed to the अमर flood नायिका utnapishtim in the Akkadian version of the एपिक.
nevertheless, gilgamesh 's fame जिया on after his मौत, क्युकी of his great भवन projects, और उसके खाता of what Utnapishtim बताई उसे happened during the flood.
the story has been अनूदित into many अलग भाषाएं, और Gilgamesh रै since become adapted in works of लोकप्रिय fiction.
वहीँ are numerous debates over who created the first video game, with the जवाब depending largely on how वीडियो खेल हैं defined.
the एवोल्यूशन of video games represents a उलझे web of several different industries, including scientific, computer, आर्केड, और consumer इलेक्ट्रॉनिक्स.
the `` वीडियो '' in `` वीडियो खेल `` traditionally refers to a raster प्रदर्शक यंत्र.
साथ the popular कैच phrase use of the पद `` वीडियो game '', the term अभी implies all प्रदर्शक प्रकार, स्वरुप, और platforms.
Historians have also sought to bypass the issue by instead using the more specific `` digital games '' वर्णनात्मक.
This पद leaves out the earlier analog-based कंप्यूटर खेल.
This is a list of best-selling वीडियो खेल franchises that have बेची or shipped at तनिक 5 लाख copies.
Unless otherwise stated, संख्याएँ indicate worldwide units बेची, ordered alphabetically whenever two or more सूची the वही amount.
The exception हैं the ones specifying shipments, which have निम्नतर precedence than others listing sales.
Franchise sales include विस्तार पैक even though they हैं नहीं considered पूरा video games.
For best-selling individual वीडियो games, देखिए सूची of best-selling वीडियो games.

इस does not necessarily apply लिये श्रेणी that हैं not video game-based.
डोरोथी ऐन Willis Richards ( सितंबर 1, 1933 – September 13, 2006 ) was an American politician and the 45th राज्यपाल of Texas.
वो first आए to नेशनल attention as the state treasurer of टेक्सास, when वो delivered the keynote पता at the 1988 लोकतांत्रिक National Convention.
Richards served as the 45th Governor of Texas इससे 1991 to 1995 and was defeated for re-election in 1994 by जार्ज W. बुश.
Ann Richards was the दूसरी female governor of Texas.
आंकड़ा Execution Prevention ( DEP ) is a security feature included in आधुनिक ऑपरेटिंग प्रणालियों.
it is ज्ञात to be available in लिनक्स, Mac OS x, iOS, Microsoft खिड़कियाँ and Android ऑपरेटिंग systems और is intended to prevent an अनुप्रयोग or service from निष्पादित code from a non-executable memory region.
इस helps prevent certain कारनामे that store code via a बफ़र अतिप्रवाह, for example.
DEP रनों in दो मोड्स : hardware-enforced DEP for cpu कि can mark memory pages as nonexecutable, और software-enforced DEP with limited सुरक्षा लिये cpu that do नहीं have hardware support.
Software-enforced DEP does not protect विरूद्ध execution of code in data pages, but instead counters seh मिटाकर, another प्रकार of आक्रमण.
dep थी introduced on Linux in 2004 ( कर्नेल 2.6.8 ), on खिड़कियाँ in 2004 साथ Windows XP Service Pack 2, while Apple introduced DEP when they moved to x86 in 2006.
उदाहरण उदाहरण of two common futanari विसंगतियाँ
, is the जापानी word for hermaphroditism, which is भी प्रयुक्त in a broader sense लिये androgyny.
Beyond जापानी the पद is used to describe a commonly pornographic विधा of computer खेल, कॉमिक्स और एनिमेशन, which includes characters that दिखाएँ both प्राथमिक sexual characteristics.
But in today 's language it refers almost exclusively for वर्ण who have an overall feminine रूप.
In that case the term is भी often abbreviated as futa ( s ), which is occasionally भी प्रयुक्त as पद for the works itself.
Early CAPTCHAs such as these, generated by the EZ-Gimpy कार्यक्रम, यहूद used on याहू !
A modern CAPTCHA, बल्कि than attempting to create a distorted background and high levels of warping on the टेक्स्ट, might focus on making segmentation मुश्किल by adding an angled line.
Another way to मेक segmentation difficult is to crowd symbols together, as in याहू ! 's current CAPTCHA format.
Some captchas कोशिश to utilize the ability of people to see three-dimensional objects.
On इस चित्र, प्रतीकों हैं drawn साथ lines of different मोटाई to make an effect of extrusion.
A CAPTCHA ( ) is a type of challenge-response परीक्षण used in कम्प्यूटिंग as an attempt to ensure कि the जवाब is उत्पन्न by a human होने.
The process usually involves a computer asking a उपयोक्ता to complete a सरल परीक्षण जिससे the कंप्यूटर is समर्थ to grade.
These tests are designed to be easy for a कंप्यूटर to generate but मुश्किल for a कंप्यूटर to solve, but again आसान लिये a इंसान.
If a सही solution is received, it can be presumed to have महरूम entered by a human.
A common type of CAPTCHA requires the उपयोक्ता to प्रकार letters and/or digits from a distorted image कि appears on the स्क्रीन.
ऐसे परीक्षण हैं commonly used to prevent unwanted अंतरजाल बॉट इससे accessing वेबसाइटों, since a normal इंसान can easily read a captcha, जबकि the bot can नहीं प्रक्रम the image letters and therefore, can not answer properly, or at all.
हालांकि most CAPTCHAs are letter तस्वीरें randomly generated, अनेक of उन्हें have become difficult even for a human to पढ़ा, so picture CAPTCHAs यहूद निर्मित in which a human is shown a सरल test to show a picture of a निश्चित animal ( दिए few एनिमल pictures ), जिससे is सरल for a इंसान होने to process, and इसलिए आसान to pick, while a bot can not process and solve the question because although it can analyze the picture, it can not easily guess the animal.
the पद `` CAPTCHA '' थी coined in 2000 by लुइस von ahn, Manuel ब्लम, निकोलस J. Hopper, and John Langford ( सब of Carnegie Mellon University ).
It is an acronym आधारित on the word `` capture '' and खड़ा लिये `` Completely Automated Public Turing test to tell कंप्यूटर and इंसानो Apart ''.
कार्नेगी mellon विश्वविद्यालयों attempted to trademark the term on 15 October 2004, but the trademark अनुप्रयोग was abandoned on 21 April 2008.
a CAPTCHA is sometimes described as a reverse turing test, because it is administered by a machine and targeted at a human, in कंट्रास्ट to the मानक turing परीक्षण कि is typically administered by a human and targeted at a machine.
Jacques-Yves Cousteau ( ; commonly ज्ञात in English as ज़ाक Cousteau ; 11 जून 1910 – 25 June 1997 ) was a French naval अधिकारी, एक्सप्लोरर, conservationist, filmmaker, innovator, scientist, फ़ोटोग्राफ़र, लेखक and शोधकर्ता who studied the sea and सब forms of life in जल.
He co-developed the Aqua-Lung, pioneered marine conservation and was a सदस्य of the Académie française.
KFC ( केंटकी fried मुर्गा ) is a fast खाना restaurant कड़ी headquartered in louisville, Kentucky, संयुक्त States, which specializes in fried chicken.
An `` अमरीकी प्रतीक '', it is the world 's second largest restaurant chain overall ( as measured by बिक्री ) बाद McDonald 's, साथ over 18,000 outlets in 120 countries और territories.
The company is a subsidiary of Yum !
ब्रांड्स, a रेस्तरां company जिससे also owns Pizza हट and टैको Bell.
केएफसी was founded by Harland Sanders, जो began selling fried chicken from उसके roadside restaurant in कोर्बिन, केंटकी दौरान the Great Depression.
Sanders थी one of the first people to देखिए the potential of the restaurant फ़्रेंचाइज़िंग concept, साथ the पहला `` Kentucky fried मुर्गा '' franchise opening in यूटा in 1952.
The मताधिकार popularized chicken in the fast food industry, thereby diversifying the मार्केट and challenging the dominance of the हैमबर्गर.
विपणन himself as `` Colonel सैंडर्स '', he became a legendary figure of American cultural history, और his image is स्टिल prominently used in केएफसी branding.
The company 's rapid expansion saw it grow too large लिये सैंडर्स to manage, और in 1964 he sold the company to a समूह of निवेशकों led by जॉन Y. Brown, Jr. और Jack Massey.
केएफसी थी एक of the पहला fast food chains to expand internationally, खोलने outlets in इंग्लैण्ड, Mexico और Puerto Rico by the mid-1960s.
Throughout the 1970s और 1980s, KFC experienced मिश्रित सौभाग्य domestically, as it गई through a श्रेणी of corporate owners who had little or no experience in the restaurant कारोबार.
In the early 1970s, KFC was बेची to the spirits firm Heublein, जो यहूद लिया over by the R.J. Reynolds खाना and tobacco conglomerate, जो sold the chain to पेप्सिको.
the chain continued to expand overseas however, and in 1987 KFC became the first पश्चिमी restaurant chain to open in China.
The chain has चूंकि expanded rapidly in चीन, and the देश is now the कम्पनी 's most profitable मार्केट.
पेप्सिको spun बंद इसके restaurants प्रभाग as Tricon Global रेस्तरां, which later बदला इसके नाम to Yum !
Brands.
KFC primarily बिकता fried मुर्गा टुकड़े and विसंगतियाँ ऐसे as मुर्गा sandwiches और wraps, सलाद and पक्ष बर्तन ऐसे as French फ्राइज़ and coleslaw, desserts and soft पेय, प्रायः supplied by PepsiCo.
इसके most famous उत्पाद is pressure fried मुर्गा pieces, seasoned with Sanders ' `` Original Recipe '' of 11 herbs and मसाले.
the exact nature of these ingredients is unknown, और represents a notable व्यापार secret.
larger portions of fried मुर्गा are served in a distinctive गत्ता `` bucket '', जिससे has become a signature of the chain since being introduced by वाल पीट Harman.
केएफसी is famous for the slogan `` finger lickin ' शुभ '', which has since महरूम replaced by `` nobody करता chicken like केएफसी '' और `` So good ''.
Cnidaria ( with a मूक c ) or Coelenterata is a phylum containing over 10,000 प्रजाति of पशु found exclusively in aquatic and mostly marine environments.
Their distinguishing feature is cnidocytes, specialized cells that they उपयोग मुख्यतः for capturing prey.
Their bodies consist of mesoglea, a non-living jelly-like substance, sandwiched between two परतों of epithelium that are mostly एक कोशिका thick.
They have दो basic body forms : swimming medusae and sessile polyps, दोनो of which are radially सममित with mouths surrounded by tentacles that bear cnidocytes.
दोनो forms have a single orifice and देह cavity that हैं used for digestion and श्वसन.
अनेक cnidarian species produce colonies कि हैं सिंगल organisms composed of medusa-like or polyp-like zooids, or both.
Cnidarians ' activities are समन्वित by a decentralized nerve net और सरल receptors.
Several free-swimming Cubozoa and Scyphozoa possess balance-sensing statocysts, और some have simple eyes.
Not all cnidarians reproduce sexually.
अनेक have जटिल lifecycles with asexual polyp stages और sexual medusae, but कुछ omit either the polyp or the medusa stage.
Cnidarians were for a long समय grouped with ctenophores in the phylum Coelenterata, लकिन increasing जागरूकता of their differences caused them to be placed in separate phyla.
Cnidarians हैं वर्गीकृत into चार main groups : the लगभग wholly sessile Anthozoa ( समुद्र anemones, corals, समुद्र पेन ) ; swimming scyphozoa ( जेलीफ़िश ) ; Cubozoa ( box jellies ) ; and Hydrozoa, a diverse समूह that शामिल all the freshwater cnidarians as खूब as many समुद्री forms, and has both sessile members such as hydra and colonial swimmers ऐसे as the पुर्तगाली Man o ' युद्ध.
staurozoa have recently been recognised as a class in their own right बल्कि than a sub-group of scyphozoa, और वहीँ is debate about whether Myxozoa and Polypodiozoa are cnidarians or करीब to bilaterians ( अधिक complex पशु ).
सबसे cnidarians शिकार on जीवों ranging in size from प्लवक to animals अनेक times larger than themselves, लकिन many obtain much of their nutrition इससे endosymbiotic शैवाल, और a few are परजीवी.
Many are preyed upon by अन्य पशु सहित starfish, sea slugs, fish और टर्टल्स.
मूँगा reefs, whose polyps हैं समृद्ध in endosymbiotic शैवाल, support some of the संसार 's most उत्पादक ecosystems, and protect वनस्पति in tidal zones and on shorelines इससे strong currents and tides.
While corals are लगभग entirely प्रतिबंधित to गरम, उथले marine waters, other cnidarians live in the गहराइयों, in ध्रुवीय समंदर और in freshwater.
Fossil cnidarians have महरूम मिला in rocks formed about, and other fossils show that corals may have महरूम present shortly पहले और diversified a few million years बाद.
जीवाश्मों of cnidarians कि do not निर्माण mineralized structures are बहुत विरल.
वैज्ञानिकों currently सोचो कि cnidarians, ctenophores and bilaterians are more closely सम्बन्धित to calcareous sponges than these हैं to अन्य sponges, और that anthozoans are the evolutionary `` aunts '' or `` sisters '' of other cnidarians, और the most closely related to bilaterians.
Recent analyses have concluded that cnidarians, although considered अधिक `` primitive '' than bilaterians, have a wider range of genes.

The Aztec लोगों were certain ethnic समूह of central Mexico, विशेषकर those groups who spoke the Nahuatl language और जो dominated large भाग of Mesoamerica from the 14th to 16th centuries.
the नावातल शब्द aztecatl ( singular ) और aztecah ( plural ) mean `` लोगों इससे Aztlan ``, a mythological place for the nahuatl-speaking culture of the time, and later adopted as the word to define the Mexica people.
प्रायः the पद `` एज़टेक '' refers exclusively to the mexica people of tenochtitlan ( अभी the स्थान of मैक्सिको नगर ), situated on an द्वीप in झील Texcoco, जो referred to themselves as mexica tenochca or cōlhuah mexica.
sometimes the term also शामिल the inhabitants of tenochtitlan 's two principal अलाइड city-states, the Acolhuas of Texcoco and the tepanecs of Tlacopan, who together साथ the mexica formed the Aztec Triple Alliance which नियंत्रित what is often ज्ञात as `` the Aztec Empire ''.
in अन्य contexts, एज़टेक may refer to all the विभिन्न city states और their peoples, जो साझा large parts of उनके ethnic history और cultural traits with the Mexica, Acolhua और Tepanecs, और who प्रायः भी used the Nahuatl language as a lingua फ़्रांका.
in this meaning it is संभावित to बात about an एज़टेक civilization including सब the particular सांस्कृतिक पैटर्न common लिये most of the peoples inhabiting Central Mexico in the लेट postclassic period.
From the 13th सदी, the घाटी of Mexico was the heart of Aztec civilization : here the capital of the Aztec Triple Alliance, the city of tenochtitlan, was built upon raised आइलेट in झील Texcoco.
The ट्रिपल Alliance formed a उपनदी empire expanding its political आधिपत्य far beyond the घाटी of Mexico, conquering अन्य नगर states throughout Mesoamerica.
at its pinnacle, Aztec culture had rich और complex mythological and religious traditions, as खूब as reaching remarkable architectural और कलाकारी accomplishments.
In 1521 Hernán Cortés, along with a large number of नावातल speaking स्वदेशी allies, conquered Tenochtitlan and defeated the एज़टेक Triple Alliance अंतर्गत the leadership of Hueyi tlatoani Moctezuma ii.
Subsequently the Spanish संस्थापित the new उपनिवेश of Mexico नगर on the site of the ruined Aztec पूंजी, from where they proceeded साथ the प्रक्रम of colonizing Central America.
Aztec culture और इतिहास is primarily ज्ञात through पुरातत्व प्रमाण मिला in excavations such as that of the renowned templo Mayor in मैक्सिको City ; इससे indigenous छाल paper codices ; from eyewitness खाते by Spanish conquistadors ऐसे as Hernán Cortés and Bernal Díaz डेल कैस्टिलो ; और विशेषकर from 16th and 17th century descriptions of Aztec संस्कृति and history written by स्पेनी clergymen and literate aztecs in the स्पेनी or Nahuatl भाषा, ऐसे as the प्रसिद्ध Florentine Codex compiled by the Franciscan monk Bernardino de sahagún with the सहायता of indigenous एज़टेक informants.
Anderson Hays Cooper ( born June 3, 1967 ) is an American journalist, author, और television personality.
He is the primary anchor of the सीएनएन न्यूज show Anderson Cooper 360°.
the program is normally broadcast live इससे a New York City स्टुडियो ; however, कूपर often broadcasts सजीव on स्थान for तोड़कर न्यूज stories.
As of September 2011, he also serves as मेजबान of उसके अपना eponymous syndicated daytime बात show, Anderson Live, जिससे will be cancelled at the end of the second ऋतु.
a plot of a normal वितरण ( or bell-shaped curve ) where each band रै a चौडाई of 1 मानक deviation – देखिए also : 68-95-99.7 rule
संचयी संभाव्यता of a सामान्य distribution with expected value 0 and मानक deviation 1.
in आंकडे और संभाव्यता सिद्धान्त, standard विचलन ( represented by the symbol sigma, σ ) shows how much विभिन्नता or dispersion exists from the औसत ( औसत ), or अपेक्षित value.
A low मानक deviation indicates कि the data अंक tend to be very close to the औसत ; high standard विचलन indicates that the data अंक are spread out over a large range of values.
the मानक deviation of a यादृच्छिक variable, सांख्यिकीय जनसांख्यिकी, data set, or संभाव्यता वितरण is the वर्गाकार रूट of its variance.
it is algebraically simpler though practically कम robust than the average absolute विचलन.
a useful property of standard deviation is that, unlike variance, it is expressed in the वही units as the data.
Note, however, that for माप साथ प्रतिशत as ईकाई, the standard deviation होगा have प्रतिशत points as unit.
in addition to expressing the variability of a population, standard विचलन is commonly used to माप confidence in statistical conclusions.
लिये example, the हाशिया of error in polling data is संकल्पित by calculating the अपेक्षित मानक deviation in the results if the same पोल were to be conducted multiple टाइम्स.
the reported margin of error is typically परिचय twice the standard deviation ­– the radius of a 95 percent विश्वास interval.
In science, शोधकर्ताओं commonly report the standard deviation of प्रायोगिक आंकड़ा, and only प्रभाव कि fall दूर बाहर the range of मानक deviation हैं considered statistically significant – normal random error or विभिन्नता in the माप is in this रास्ता distinguished from causal variation.
Standard deviation is भी important in वित्त, जहाँ the मानक deviation on the रेट of वापसी on an investment is a measure of the volatility of the investment.
When only a sample of आंकड़ा from a जनसांख्यिकी is available, the standard deviation of the population can be estimated by a modified quantity called the `` sample मानक deviation ''.
When the नमूना is the संपूर्ण population, इसके unmodified मानक deviation is called the `` population standard विचलन ''.
ulluco ( u : ju : kɔ : ) ( Ullucus tuberosus ) is a संयंत्र grown primarily as a रूट vegetable, secondarily as a leaf सब्ज़ी.
The ulluco is one of the most widely grown and economically महत्वपूर्ण रूट फसलों in the andean प्रदेश of South अमेरिका, second only to the आलू.
it is ज्ञात there with the common name of पापा लिसा, but भी by the regional names melloco ( Ecuador ), olluco ( Peru ), chugua ( कोलंबिया ) or ruba ( वेनेजुएला ), among अन्य.
The पत्ता और the tuber are edible, समान to spinach and the potato, respectively.
वे are known to contain ऊँची levels of प्रोटीन, calcium, और केरोटीन.
papalisa यहूद used by the Incas prior to आगमन of europeans in South America.
Ulluco tubers are marketed as `` धरती Gems '' in नई जीलैंड, by Halfords Exotic उपज.

an अप्रैल 24, 1851 पोस्टर warning the `` colored people of Boston '' about policemen acting as स्लेव catchers.
the Fugitive स्लेव Law or भगोड़े Slave अधिनियम थी passed by the संयुक्त राज्य कॉंग्रेस on September 18, 1850, as भाग of the Compromise of 1850 between दक्षिणी slave-holding interests and Northern Free-Soilers.
इस was one of the सबसे controversial acts of the 1850 सुलह और heightened उत्तरी fears of a `` slave power conspiracy ''.
it declared कि all runaway slaves यहूद, upon कैप्चर, to be returned to their masters.
Abolitionists nicknamed it the `` Bloodhound Law '' लिये the dogs that यहूद used to track down runaway स्लेव.
फ़्रैंक जोसेफ pallone, Jr. ( born अक्तूबर 30, 1951 ) is the U.S. प्रतिनिधि for, serving चूंकि 1993.
He is a member of the Democratic Party.
He previously represented the 3rd ज़िला from 1988 to 1993.
trin-i-tee 5:7 is a इन्जील duo इससे नई Orleans, Louisiana in the United राज्य.
the समूह थी marketed as a gospel वैकल्पिक to R & B लड़की समूह ऐसे as नियति 's Child and TLC.
Trin-i-tee 5:7 रै बेची over 2.5 लाख एल्बम.

Mary Do n't You रोते ''.
The album बाद became certified सुनहरा.
In 1999, Terri Brown left the समूह और थी बाद replaced by singer Adrian एंडरसन.
दौरान that year, the समूह recorded और released their second एल्बम, Spiritual प्रेम.
the album became the group 's दूसरी # 1 album on the Top Gospel चार्ट.

The United States संघीय earned आय tax credit or अर्जित income क्रेडिट ( EITC or EIC ) is a refundable कर credit लिये low- और medium-income individuals and युगल, primarily for those जो have qualifying children.
जब the क्रेडिट exceeds the राशि of taxes owed, it results in a कर refund to those who अर्जी the credit.
इस credit is provided to offset the बोझ of सोशल security कर and also to promote an incentive to work.
In order for a व्यक्ति or युगल to अर्जी one or more व्यक्तियों as their qualifying चाइल्ड ( ren ), the आयु, relationship, and साझा residency आवश्यकताएँ जरूर be met, as खूब as some अन्य requirements.
U.S. tax फ़ॉर्म 1040EZ, 1040a, or 1040 can be used to अर्जी eic without qualifying children.
To अर्जी the क्रेडिट with qualifying children, 1040A or 1040 must be प्रयुक्त, as well as attaching अनुसूची eic.
EIC phases in धीरे, has a medium-length पठार, और then phases out more धीरे than it phased in.
चूंकि the credit phases out at 21 % ( लिये two children और लिये three or अधिक qualilfying children ) or 16 % ( for one qualifying child ), it is सदा preferable to have one more डालर of वास्तविक सैलरी or मजदूरी ( हालांकि technically, चूंकि the EIC table moves by fifty डालर increments, it 's सदा अस्तबलों to have an अतिरिक्त fifty-dollar increment of सैलरी or मजदूरी ).
For tax year 2011, the maximum eic लिये a single व्यक्ति or couple filing without qualifying children थी $ 464.
the maximum EIC with एक qualifying चाइल्ड थी $ 3,094, साथ दो children थी $ 5,112, और with तीन or अधिक qualifying children was $ 5,751.
These amounts are indexed annually लिये महंगाई.
The अर्जित आय कर क्रेडिट has महरूम भाग of राजनैतिक debates in the United राज्य regarding whether उठाने the minimum wage or increasing EIC will बेहतर पता a seeming shortage of good-paying कार्य.
The following is a list of halftime shows आयोजित at the National Football League 's चैंपियनशिप game, the Super Bowl.
While मध्यांतर shows are a tradition during football खेल at सब स्तर of प्रतियोगिता, the सुपर Bowl halftime show represents a fundamental link to pop culture, which helps broaden the टेलीविज़न audience और देशभर ब्याज.
In सबसे सालो चूंकि the mid-1980s, the मध्यांतर दिखाएँ of the सुपर कटोरी has featured popular recording कलाकारों और other well-known हस्तियाँ.
it has measurably increased टेलीविज़न viewers दौरान और बाद the halftime show.
The प्रदर्शन is regarded one of the most-watched events in American टेलीविज़न annually with over 100 million viewers in the United States अलोन.
musical genres over the सालो have represented a व्यापक दायरा of music प्रकार, सहित pop, चट्टान, classic चट्टान, country, hip hop, रैप, blues, and soul.
In some years, short skits or नाटक दृश्यों हैं acted out on a stage.
The performance समूह Up साथ People has performed at the सबसे Super Bowl halftime shows, starring in चार दौरान the 1970s and 1980s.
According to nielsen ratings, सुपर कटोरी XLVI halftime show headlined by Madonna in 2012 remains the most-watched halftime show in इतिहास, with 114 million दर्शक or about 3 million more than the वास्तविक game.
Beyonce 's 2013 मध्यांतर दिखाएँ प्रदर्शन was the second सबसे viewed दिखाएँ in history.
It is सूचीबद्ध on the Guinness World रिकॉर्ड as the largest TV audience for a Super Bowl half-time प्रदर्शन.
International मेन 's दिन ( IMD ) is an सालाना international event celebrated on 19th नवम्बर.
Inaugurated in 1999 in Trinidad और Tobago, the दिन and its कार्यक्रम find support इससे a किस्में of individuals and groups in Australia, the caribbean, North America, Asia, यूरोपीय और अफ़्रीकी.
Speaking on निमित्त of UNESCO, निदेशक of महिलाओं and Culture of Peace ingeborg Breines said of IMD, `` This is an excellent विचार और would give कुछ gender balance. ''
वो added कि UNESCO was looking forward to cooperating with the organizers.
The objectives of celebrating an International Men 's दिन include focusing on मेन 's and boys ' health, improving लिंग संबंध, promoting gender equality, and highlighting positive male role models.
It is an अवसर to highlight discrimination विरूद्ध मेन और boys and to celebrate उनके उपलब्धियाँ और योगदान, in particular for their योगदान to जातियाँ, family, marriage, and चाइल्ड care.
the broader and परम उद्देश्य of the event is to प्रचार basic humanitarian values.
अंतरराष्ट्रीय Men 's दिन is celebrated in over 60 देशों, सहित त्रिनिदाद and Tobago, Jamaica, Australia, India, China, संयुक्त States, रोमानिया, Singapore, Malta, United Kingdom, South Africa, Tanzania, ज़िम्बाब्वे, बोत्सवाना, Seychelles, Burundi, हंगेरियाई, Ireland, आइल of man, Ghana, कनाडा, डेनमार्क, नार्वे, Austria, Bosnia and हर्ज़ेगोविना, Ukraine, फ़्रांस, Italy, पाकिस्तानी, Cuba, अण्टीगुआ and Barbuda, st. Kitts and Nevis, St. लूसिया, Grenada and केमन Islands, on 19 नवम्बर, और वैश्विक support लिये the celebration is broad.
घाटी गाँव parkvalley
गाँव is a ज़िला in the San फर्नांडो घाटी region of लॉस Angeles, कैलिफ़ोर्निया.
The median age of its population, at 36, is `` बूढ़ा for the city of लॉस एंजिल्स. '' और its average household size of two people is कम, compared to other भाग of the city.
developmental psychology is the scientific study of परिवर्तन कि occur in human beings over the कोर्स of उनके life span.
originally चिंतित with infants और children, the फ़ील्ड has expanded to शामिल adolescence, वयस्क development, वृद्धावस्था, और the entire जीवन span.
इस field examines बदलें across a broad range of विषय including मोटर कौशल और अन्य psycho-physiological प्रक्रियाओं ; संज्ञानात्मक development involving क्षेत्रों such as प्रॉब्लम solving, moral understanding, और conceptual समझना ; भाषा acquisition ; social, व्यक्तित्व, और emotional विकास ; और self-concept and पहचान formation.
developmental psychology includes issues ऐसे as the extent to जिससे development occurs through the gradual accumulation of ज्ञान बनाम stage-like विकास, or the extent to जिससे children हैं born with स्वाभाविक mental structures versus सीखना through experience.
Many researchers हैं interested in the interaction between personal characteristics, the individual 's behavior, and पर्यावरणीय कारकों सहित सोशल कॉन्टेक्स्ट, and उनके प्रभाव on development ; अन्य take a more narrowly-focused approach.
developmental psychology informs several लागू fields, including : शैक्षणिक psychology, child psychopathology, और forensic developmental psychology.
Developmental psychology complements several other मौलिक research fields in psychology including social psychology, संज्ञानात्मक psychology, ecological psychology, and तुलनात्मक psychology.
Joseph Michael `` Joey '' Stivic is a fictional अक्षर who first appeared on the 1970s अमरीकी sitcom सब in the Family.
जॉय Stivic थी the बेटे and only child of माइक Stivic ( played by रोब reiner ) and ग्लोरिया Stivic ( played by Sally struthers ), and the grandson of Archie Bunker ( Carroll O'Connor ) और Edith Bunker ( Jean Stapleton ).
The character first appeared as a newborn baby in a two-part episode of All in the Family जिससे aired in दिसम्बर 1975.
After अनेक appearances on सब in the Family until reiner और Struthers बाएँ the series in 1978 ( by कि time, जॉय था been निभाई सबसे प्रायः by alternating twins Jason and Justin draeger ), the Joey stivic character next appeared on the All in the परिवार spin-off श्रेणी ( कुछ कॉल it a continuation of the original ) Archie बंकर 's प्लेस in a guest appearance in the November 1979 episode `` Thanksgiving Reunion. ''
In this instance, the character थी निभाई by चाइल्ड actor Dick Billingsley और was appropriately pre-school आयु.
साथ ग्लोरिया now अलग from माइक, वो returned to आर्ची बंकर 's प्लेस with Joey in the February 1982 episode `` ग्लोरिया Comes Home. ''
In इस एपीसोड, Joey थी played by क्रिस्टोफर johnston.
Joey Stivic थी a नियमित character on the सब in the परिवार spin-off श्रेणी ग्लोरिया in 1982 और 1983.
On इस श्रेणी, in which the now-divorced ग्लोरिया Bunker character had moved to upstate नई यॉर्क in अनुक्रम to work as an assistant veterinarian, the part of Joey stivic थी played by ten-year-old कर्ता Christian Jacobs.
After ग्लोरिया was canceled in 1983, Joey Stivic disappeared from prime time टेलीविज़न लिये 11 years, जबतक the character made one पिछला रूप on 704 Hauser, a short-lived 1994 series about a black family who था moved into the बूढ़ा Bunker घर, सालो after Bunker had sold it.
In इस appearance, the Joey stivic character थी played by केसी Siemaszko, an actor born in 1961 ( 14 सालो पहले जॉय stivic 's fictional birth ).
In 1976 the Ideal खिलौना कम्पनी released a 14-inch `` Joey Stivic गुड़िया '' ( पुकारा `` आर्ची बंकर 's पोता '' ) which was billed as the `` first anatomically सही male गुड़िया. ''
the गुड़िया inspired mild विवाद at the time, and is a collectors ' item today.
the 2011 रोज़ Bowl was the 97th edition of the annual bowl खेल played on जनवरी 1, 2011, as भाग of the 2010 कॉलेज football season.
Played in pasadena, California, the TCU horned Frogs of the पहाड़ West सम्मेलन पराजित the विस्कॉन्सिन badgers of the Big टेन Conference by a स्कोर of 21 – 19.
The Pasadena Tournament of गुलाब Association was the आयोजक of the game.
vizio Inc. थी the corporate sponsor और the game was officially नामित `` the Rose Bowl खेल presented by vizio ''.
This game marked the पहला time a team इससे a non-Automatic qualifying Conference निभाई in, and जीती, the Rose Bowl in इसके 97 years.
The contest was ब्रॉडकास्ट on केबल टेलीविज़न स्टेशन ESPN साथ a radio broadcast on ईएसपीएन रेडियो and xm Satellite Radio और ESPN3 स्ट्रीमिंग video over the अंतरजाल.
कवरेज began at 1:30 pm ( PST ) साथ kickoff at 2:10 pm ( PST ).
इस चिह्नित the first time कि the game was नहीं broadcast nationally `` over-the-air '' ( terrestrial television ) since the खेल prior to the 1952 Rose कटोरी, which was the first nationally televised कॉलेज फ़ुटबॉल game.
the Rose कटोरी Game, themed Building Dreams, Friendships, & यादें, was a contractual sell-out, with 64,500 tickets allocated to the participating teams and सम्मेलनों.
Ticket कीमतें for all सीटे in the रोज़ Bowl are listed at $ 145.
The remaining टिकटें गई to the टूर्नामेंट of Roses members, प्रायोजकों, City of Pasadena निवासियों, और the general पब्लिक.
The रोज़ Bowl stadium capacity is सूचीबद्ध at approximately 91,000.
The Declaration of स्वतंत्रता is a statement adopted by the महाद्वीपीय Congress on July 4, 1776, which announced that the thirteen American colonies, then at war with Great ब्रिटेन, regarded themselves as independent राज्य, और no longer a part of the अंग्रेजों साम्राज्य.
Instead वे अभी formed a new nation—the संयुक्त राज्य of अमेरिका.
John एडम्स was a नेता in pushing for स्वतंत्रता, which थी unanimously approved on जुलाई 2.
A committee था already drafted the formal घोषणा, to be तैयार जब कॉंग्रेस voted on independence.
Adams persuaded the committee to select Thomas Jefferson to लिखें the original ड्राफ्ट of the दस्तावेज़, which congress होता संपादन to उपज the final version.
the Declaration थी ultimately a formal explanation of क्यों Congress had voted on July 2 to declare स्वतंत्रता from Great ब्रिटेन, अधिक than a साल after the outbreak of the American क्रांतिकारी युद्ध.
The national जन्मदिवस, the स्वतंत्रता दिन is मनाये on जुलाई 4, although Adams चाही July 2.
बाद ratifying the text on July 4, Congress issued the Declaration of Independence in several फ़ॉर्म.
it was initially published as the printed डनलप broadside कि was widely distributed और पढ़ा to the पब्लिक.
The सबसे प्रसिद्ध version of the Declaration, a signed नक़ल that is popularly regarded as the घोषणा of Independence, is प्रदर्शित at the National Archives in Washington, d.c.
हालांकि the wording of the घोषणा was स्वीकृत on July 4, the date of its signing was अगस्त 2.
The असली जुलाई 4 संयुक्त राज्य Declaration of Independence manuscript was lost while all other नक़ल have महरूम निकला इससे this असली दस्तावेज़.
The sources और interpretation of the Declaration have महरूम the subject of much scholarly inquiry.
the घोषणा justified the independence of the United States by लिस्टिंग औपनिवेशिक grievances against King George iii, और by asserting certain natural and legal rights, सहित a सही of revolution.
Having परोसा its original purpose in announcing independence, the text of the घोषणा was initially उपेक्षित after the अमरीकी क्रान्ति.
चूंकि then, it has आइये to be considered a major statement on human rights, विशेषकर इसके second sentence:
we थाम these सच्चाई to be self-evident, कि सब men are created बराबर, कि वे are endowed by उनके Creator with निश्चित unalienable Rights, that among these हैं Life, Liberty और the pursuit of Happiness.
इस रै been पुकारा `` one of the best-known sentences in the अंग्रेज़ी भाषा '', containing `` the सबसे potent and consequential शब्द in अमरीकी इतिहास. ''
The passage came to represent a moral मानक to जिससे the संयुक्त States चाहिए नीयत.
इस view was notably promoted by Abraham Lincoln, जो considered the घोषणा to be the foundation of his political philosophy, and argued कि the Declaration is a statement of सिद्धान्त through जिससे the United States Constitution चाहिए be interpreted.
It has inspired work लिये the rights of marginalized people throughout the संसार.
Chitty Chitty बंग बंग is a 1968 British musical film loosely based on Ian Fleming 's novel.
The film 's script is by Roald dahl और केन ह्यूजेस and इसके songs by the Sherman Brothers.
it stars लंड वैन Dyke as Caractacus potts and सैली Ann Howes as truly Scrumptious.
the film was directed by केन Hughes and उत्पादित by अल्बर्ट R. Broccoli ( co-producer of the James Bond श्रेणी of films, भी आधारित on Fleming 's novels ).
John Stears पर्यवेक्षित the खास प्रभाव.
इरविन kostal supervised and conducted the music, while the musical numbers यहूद staged by मार्क breaux and Dee Dee Wood.
a region is arid when it is characterized by a कठोर कमी of उपलब्धियाँ water, to the extent of hindering or preventing the growth and विकास of plant and animal life.
environments subject to arid climates tend to lack vegetation and are पुकारा xeric or desertic.
Most `` arid '' climates surround the equator ; these places include most of Africa और parts of South America and सेंट्रल America.
कर्कट ( ♋ ) is an astrological चिह्न, which is associated with the नक्षत्र Cancer.
it spans the 90-120th उपाधि of the zodiac, between 90 और 125.25 degree of celestial longitude, which the सूर्य transits this area on औसत between June 22 to जुलाई 22 प्रत्येक year.
और under the sidereal zodiac, it is फिलहाल from जुलाई 21 to अगस्त 9.
The संयुक्त States presidential चुनाव of 1960 थी the 44th quadrennial अध्यक्षीय चुनाव, आयोजित on Tuesday, नवम्बर 8, 1960.
The Republican Party nominated incumbent vice-president रिचर्ड निक्सन, while the Democratic Party मनोनीत John F. कैनेडी, सीनेटर इससे Massachusetts.
the लाज़िम President, Republican ड्वाइट D. आइज़नहावर, was not eligible for re-election after सेवारत the अधिकतम two terms अनुमत by the Twenty-second Amendment.
Kennedy थी elected with a lead of 112,827 मत, or 0.17 % of the लोकप्रिय vote, giving him a विजय of 303 to 219 in the चुनावी College, the closest since 1916.
This was the first election in which all fifty of the वर्तमान United States participated.
a number of factors explain क्यों the election थी so close.
Kennedy gained since there थी an economic मंदी which ठेस the लाज़िम Republican, and he had the advantage of 17 million more पंजीकृत Democrats than Republicans.
Furthermore, the नई मत कि कैनेडी gained among Catholics almost neutralized the new votes निक्सन gained among protestants.
कैनेडी 's campaigning skills decisively outmatched Nixon 's.
in the end, Nixon 's जोर on his experience carried छोटी weight, और he wasted उर्जा by campaigning in all 50 states बजाय of concentrating on the swing states.
Kennedy used उसके विशाल, well-funded campaign संगठन to win the नामांकन, secure endorsements, and, with the सहायता of the last of the big-city bosses, to get आउट the vote in the big cities.
He relied on running mate lyndon B. जॉनसन to थाम the दक्षिण और प्रयुक्त television effectively.
इस election is notable as being the पहला समय in U.S. history that two sitting U.S. Senators ( Kennedy and Johnson ) यहूद elected as अध्यक्ष and vice-president, a phenomenon that has been repeated एकबार, by बराक Obama और Joe बिडेन in 2008 ( in both cases, the president was the younger, अधिक junior सीनेटर ).
Sherwood is a नगर in Washington काउंटी, Oregon, संयुक्त राज्य.
Located in the southeast corner of the county, it is a residential community in the Tualatin Valley southwest of Portland.
the population was 11,791 at the 2000 census.
According to the 2010 census, the जनसांख्यिकी was 18,205 निवासियों.
indirectly named लिये the Sherwood वन in England, it was पहला incorporated in 1893 as a town.
the USA patriot Act of 2001 is an Act of the U.S. Congress that थी हस्ताक्षरित into law by अध्यक्ष George W. Bush on अक्तूबर 26, 2001.
The title of the अधिनियम is a ten letter acronym ( यूएसए patriot ) that stands लिये uniting ( और ) strengthening America ( by ) Providing Appropriate टूल्स Required ( to ) इंटरफेस ( and ) Obstruct आतंक Act of 2001.
The act, as a response to the आतंकवादी attacks of September 11th, significantly reduced प्रतिबंध in विधि enforcement agencies ' gathering of intelligence within the United राज्य ; विस्तारित the सचिव of the Treasury’s authority to regulate financial transactions, particularly those involving foreign individuals और entities ; and broadened the discretion of law enforcement और आव्रजन authorities in निमाड़ और deporting आप्रवासियों suspected of terrorism-related acts.
The act भी expanded the definition of terrorism to शामिल domestic terrorism, यूँ enlarging the क्रमांक of क्रियाएँ to जिससे the यूएसए patriot Act’s विस्तारित law प्रवर्तन powers can be लागू.
on may 26, 2011, President Barack Obama used an Autopen to चिह्न the PATRIOT Sunsets Extension Act of 2011, a four-year extension of three key provisions in the USA PATRIOT Act while he थी in फ़्रांस : roving wiretaps, खोज of कारोबार records ( the `` library records provision `` ), and conducting surveillance of `` lone wolves '' — individuals suspected of terrorist-related क्रियाएँ not linked to terrorist समूह.
Republican नेताओ questioned if the use of the Autopen met the संवैधानिक आवश्यकताएँ लिये signing a bill into law.
