Snohomish is a city in snohomish County, वॉशिंगटन, United राज्य.
The population थी 9,098 at the 2010 census.
the mayor of Snohomish is karen Guzak, and the नगर Manager is Larry bauman.
Snohomish prides itself लिये इसके historical शहर, और was once known लिये its अनेक antique दुकानें when it was known as the `` पुरातन Capital of the उत्तरपश्चिम. ''
The historic business and residential center of the कस्बा constitutes the Snohomish Historic ज़िला, जिससे is सूचीबद्ध on the National Register of Historic स्थान.
अनेक घरों भालू plaques with the year the house was built and the नाम of the family or individual who originally occupied it.
Once every साल, the city देता टुर of the historic घरों ; एक of उन्हें, the blackman हाउस, is a year-round museum.
A सामान्य विमानन एयरफील्ड, घनघोर Airfield, is less than one मील southwest of Downtown Snohomish.
डेव matthews बैंड ( DMB ) is an अमरीकी rock band that was formed in Charlottesville, वर्जिनिया, संयुक्त States, in 1991.
The founding members were singer-songwriter और guitarist Dave matthews, bassist Stefan Lessard, drummer /backing vocalist Carter beauford and saxophonist leroi मूर.
boyd tinsley was added to the band as a violinist soon after the बैंड was formed.
Moore died suddenly in August 2008 due to जटिलताओं from injuries sustained in an ATV accident.
GRAMMY Award -winner जेफ़ Coffin of Béla Fleck and the flecktones रै चूंकि filled Moore 's स्पॉट as the बैंड 's saxophonist.
Rashawn रॉस और Tim Reynolds have भी become full-time touring members of the band.
The बैंड 's 2009 एल्बम बिग Whiskey and the groogrux King ( the पहला album since Moore 's death ) debuted at number one on the बिलबोर्ड 200, earning the band उनके fifth consecutive number-one debut— making उन्हें the दूसरी band behind मेटालिका to do so.
उनके most हाल album, दूर इससे the World, was released in 2012, and also debuted at number one on the बिलबोर्ड चार्ट.
as of 2010, the डेव matthews Band रै बेची over 30 million रिकॉर्ड विश्वव्यापी.
the बैंड is known लिये their सालाना summer-long tours of the United राज्य and यूरोपीय, featuring lengthy improvisational renditions of their गीतों, accompanied by an elaborate video और lighting show.
This portion of the tour रै become a stamp of DMB and रै grown with the band since fenton विलियम्स began working साथ उन्हें in the जल्दी 1990s.
बाद twenty लगातार सालो of touring the band announced that it होता take the summer of 2011 बंद.
Dave matthews Band रै won one ग्रैमी पुरस्कार, और was awarded the NAACP Chairman 's Award.
according to Julian Bond, `` वे sell out the largest arenas on Earth, but अक्सर give उनके music away. ''
अनुभवातीत जंगली Oats : A अध्याय from an Unwritten रोमांस is a prose satire लिखा by Louisa May alcott, about her family 's involvement साथ the transcendentalist जातियाँ fruitlands in the early 1840s.
The कार्य was first प्रकाशित in a नई York newspaper in 1873, and reprinted in 1874, 1876, and 1915 and after.
In her account, alcott provides the रियल लोगों involved साथ thin pseudonymous disguises.
Her father अमोस bronson Alcott is `` Abel Lamb, '' जबकि उसके संगी और जातियाँ co-founder Charles Lane is `` Timon Lion ; '' Abigail May Alcott, Louisa 's mother and bronson 's wife, is `` सिस्टर Hope. ''
alcott depicts her father as dominated by his अधिक forceful partner, और दोनो men as feckless and impractical dreamers.
The men of the community spend their time in pointless debates while सिस्टर Hope works इससे भोर to dusk to maintain उनके existence.
A crisis arises at harvest time, जब the grain crop is threatened by an approaching तूफ़ान.
In Alcott 's words, `` About the time the अनाज was ready to हाउस, कुछ call of the Oversoul wafted सब the men दूर. ''
Sister Hope organizes the तभी उपलब्धियाँ सहायता, तीन छोटी girls and a boy, और manages to सहेजें the क्रॉप.
The little जातियाँ collapses as जल्द as the weather turns cold, जब it becomes साफ that their provisions हैं too meager to last the coming winter.
Timon शेर और his बेटे abscond to जुड़ें the Shakers — though timon is unhappy to learn कि life among them is `` सब work and no खेल. ''
abel is crushed by the विफलता of the enterprise ; after days of despair he begins to खा again तभी जब he realizes that his परिवार needs उसे.
सिस्टर Hope पाता a रास्ता लिये उन्हें to subsist और persevere.
Alcott 's दृश्य of पुरूष arrogance and मादा exploitation in this piece is paralleled in her अनोखा, प्रकाशित in the वही year as `` अनुभवातीत जंगली Oats. ''
`` अनुभवातीत Wild Oats '' has महरूम reprinted in अनेक modern editions.
माउंट of the Holy क्रॉस is the northernmost 14,000-foot mountain in the Sawatch दायरा, भाग of the Rocky Mountains in Colorado.
it is स्तिथ in the पावन क्रॉस Wilderness near the भुत कस्बा of Holy Cross City और in Eagle County.
It was named लिये the distinctive cross-shaped snowfield on the पूर्वोत्तर फेस.
Under USDA Forest Service प्रशासन, the mountain was proclaimed `` Holy Cross नेशनल स्मारक '' by Herbert हूवर on may 11, 1929.
the स्मारक was transferred to the National Park सेवा in 1933.
in 1950, it थी लौटे to the Forest सेवा और खोया its National स्मारक status—the क्रमांक of visitors to the mountain और the nearby `` pilgrim 's Hut '' था waned, और the expense of full-time स्टाफ could not be justified.
This mountain has been the subject of painters, photographers and भी a poem by Henry वाड्सवर्थ Longfellow, ( The क्रॉस of हिम ).
the first सरेआम उपलब्धियाँ फोटोग्राफ was प्रकाशित in National भौगोलिक पत्रिका.
Thomas मोरान depicted the mountain in an oil painting, जिससे अभी is part of the संग्रहण of the Museum of the American West, भाग of the Autry नेशनल बीच in लॉस एंजिल्स, California.
It is स्टिल much photographed but it is not as well ज्ञात आज as it was in the पास्ट.
आसपास सुविधाएँ include कटोरी of आंसू Lake, सीधे under the east face of the peak, tuhare Lakes, in a cirque that झूठ south of a significant subpeak, and अनेक other lakes.
Notable स्थितियाँ भीतर include the dotsero ज्वालामुखी ( निकट Interstate 70 ), vail और Aspen.
US 24 रनों निकट the peak through Gilman.
photochrom छपाई of Mount of the Holy Cross c. 1900.
This image is a reversed view of the mountain compared to how it दरअसल appears.
The first recorded ascent of Holy क्रॉस was in 1873, by F. V. Hayden और photographer W. H. जैक्सन दौरान one of hayden 's geographical सर्वेक्षण.
However, the peak may well have been ascended previously by miners or American इंडियंस.
the पहला शीत ascent of the peak was बना in 1943 by Russel Keene and Howard Freedman of the 10th Mountain Division, then stationed at Camp Hale.
पावन क्रॉस can be climbed by at least four अलग routes, with the easiest और सबसे आम रूट होने the North लकीरें, which involves of लंबवत gain over and is rated YDS Class 2 लिये मॉडरेट scrambling.
The Cross Couloir route फ़ॉर्म the लंबवत portion of the famous क्रॉस विशेषता, और provides an उन्नत हिम climb or extreme ski descent.
Mount of the Holy क्रॉस has a इतिहास of endangering the जीवनदान of many hikers.
Primarily, the hikers जो आवश्यकता rescue हैं unfamiliar साथ the risks of entering wilderness क्षेत्रों and do नहीं लाओ adequate उपकरण and supplies to respond to आपात conditions.
Although the समिट on Mount of the Holy Cross is अक्सर reached on a long day hike, unprepared hikers are frequently stranded or खोया due to changing environmental शर्तें and confusion regarding the surrounding लैंडस्केप, especially on the descent of उत्तर Ridge.
Thorough शोध और reasonable planning should prevent most tragedies.
Mount of the Holy cross is accessible from tigiwon सड़क, south of minturn, Colorado.
The हाफ Moon Pass Trail is the standard route to the summit of Mount of the पावन क्रॉस via the North लकीरें.
following the Fall क्रीक ट्रेल to an ascent of Notch Mountain ट्रेल provides the best दृश्य of the Holy Cross snow feature from Notch Mountain लकीरें.
The जीएसएम logo is used to identify compatible handsets and उपकरण
GSM ( Global System लिये Mobile Communications, originally ' ), is a standard set विकसित by the European Telecommunications Standards Institute ( etsi ) to describe protocols लिये second generation ( 2g ) digital cellular networks used by mobile फोन.
It became the de facto global standard for mobile communications with over 80 % market share.
The जीएसएम standard was developed as a replacement for पहला पीढी ( 1G ) analog cellular संजाल, और originally वर्णित a digital, सर्किट switched संजाल optimized लिये full duplex voice telephony.
इस was expanded over time to include आंकड़ा communications, पहला by circuit switched हस्तांतरण, then packet आंकड़ा transport via gprs ( General Packet Radio सेवाएं ) और किनारे ( Enhanced Data rates लिये GSM Evolution or EGPRS ).
further improvements यहूद बना जब the 3gpp विकसित third पीढी ( 3g ) UMTS मानकों followed by चौथी पीढी ( 4g ) LTE Advanced standards.
`` जीएसएम '' is a trademark owned by the GSM Association.
अध्यक्ष Franklin D. Roosevelt signs the lend-lease bill to give सहायता to Britain and चीन ( 1941 )
The Lend Lease act थी an अधिनियम जहाँ the United राज्य had समर्थित its allies.
Lend-Lease ( ) was the विधि कि प्रारंभ a program अंतर्गत which the United States of America supplied the United Kingdom, the ussr, गणतंत्र of China, फ़्री France, and other Allied राष्ट्र with materiel between 1941 and 1945.
it was signed into विधि on कूच 11, 1941, a year और a half after the outbreak of World War II in Europe in September 1939.
इस was nine months before the u.S. entered the युद्ध in December 1941.
Formally titled an Act to Further प्रचार the Defense of the संयुक्त States, the अधिनियम effectively ended the संयुक्त States ' pretense of neutrality.
A total of $ 50.1 billion ( समतुल्य to $ today ) worth of supplies यहूद shipped : $ 31.4 अरब to Britain, $ 11.3 billion to the Soviet Union, $ 3.2 billion to France, $ 1.6 billion to China, and छोटी रकम to अन्य allies.
Reverse Lend-Lease comprised services ऐसे as rent on एयर bases कि went to the u.S., and totaled $ 7.8 अरब ; of इस, $ 6.8 अरब came from the अंग्रेजों and the Commonwealth.
The terms of the अनुबंध provided that the materiel थी to be used until time लिये उनके वापसी or destruction.
Supplies बाद the termination तिथि were sold to Britain at a विशाल छूट लिये £1.075 अरब using long-term loans from the United States.
कनाडा operated a समान कार्यक्रम that sent $ 4.7 billion in आपूर्तियाँ to the United Kingdom and the सोवियत संघ.
The United राज्य did नहीं चार्ज लिये सहायता supplied अंतर्गत इस विधान.
इस program थी a decisive step away इससे non-interventionist नीति, which had वर्चस्व United States foreign relations चूंकि the end of संसार युद्ध i, towards international भागीदारी.
The जेरूसलम artichoke ( Helianthus tuberosus ), भी called sunroot, sunchoke, धरती ठहराना or topinambour, is a species of sunflower native to eastern North America, और found इससे eastern Canada and Maine west to उत्तर डकोटा, और दक्षिण to उत्तरी Florida and Texas.
it is also cultivated widely आरपार the शीतोष्ण zone लिये its tuber, जिससे is used as a root vegetable.
कैस्टिलो सैन Felipe del morro भी known as फोर्ट San Felipe del Morro or Morro Castle, is a 16th-century citadel स्तिथ in San Juan, प्यूर्टो रीको.
Stonehenge is a प्रागैतिहासिक monument in Wiltshire, इंग्लैण्ड, about west of amesbury and north of salisbury.
One of the most famous sites in the world, Stonehenge is the remains of a ring of खड़ा stones नियत within earthworks.
it is in the middle of the most घना complex of पाषाणकालीन and Bronze आयु स्मारक in England, सहित अनेक सौ burial mounds.
archaeologists believe it थी built anywhere इससे 3000 BC to 2000 BC.
Radiocarbon dating in 2008 suggested that the पहला stones were उठाया between 2400 और 2200 BC, whilst another theory suggests that bluestones may have been उठाया at the साईट as early as 3000 BC.
The surrounding circular earth bank and ditch, जिससे constitute the earliest phase of the monument, have महरूम दिनाँक to परिचय 3100 bc.
The साईट और its surroundings were added to the UNESCO 's list of World Heritage साइट in 1986 in a co-listing with avebury Henge.
It is a national legally सुरक्षित अनुसूचित प्राचीन Monument.
Stonehenge is owned by the Crown and managed by अंग्रेज़ी Heritage, while the surrounding land is स्वामित्व by the नेशनल Trust.
Archaeological evidence found by the stonehenge Riverside Project in 2008 indicates that Stonehenge could have been a दफ़न मैदान इससे its earliest beginnings.
The dating of cremated remains found on the site indicate कि deposits contain human bone इससे as जल्दी as 3000 bc, जब the खाई and bank were first dug.
ऐसे deposits continued at stonehenge लिये at least another 500 years.
The साईट is a place of religious significance and pilgrimage in Neo-Druidry.
The ncaa महिलाओं 's Division I Championship is an सालाना college basketball tournament लिये women.
Held प्रत्येक April, the महिलाओं 's Championship थी उदघाटन in the 1981–82 ऋतु.
the ncaa tournament थी preceded by the AIAW Women 's Basketball Tournament, which थी आयोजित annually from 1972 to 1982.
Basketball was one of twelve women 's sports added to the NCAA championship program for the 1981-82 school year, as the NCAA engaged in बैटल साथ the संघ for intercollegiate Athletics for महिलाओं for sole governance of महिलाओं 's collegiate sports.
The AIAW continued to conduct its established चैंपियनशिप program in the वही बारह ( and other ) खेल ; however, after a साल of dual women 's championships, the NCAA prevailed, while the aiaw disbanded.
उपस्थिति और interest in the महिलाओं 's प्रभाग i Championship have grown over the years, especially since 2003, when the फाइनल चैंपियनशिप खेल was स्थानांतरित to the मंगलवार following the सोमवार मेन 's चैंपियनशिप game.
The women 's championship खेल is now the final overall game of the college बास्केट season.
पहले that, the महिलाओं 's Final चार was प्रायः played on the शुक्रवार पहले the मेन 's Final Four or the hours पहले the men निभाई on the final शनिवार of the tournament.
The final was usually played the Sunday दोपहर following the मेन 's Final चार.
The tournament bracket is बना up of champions इससे each प्रभाग I सम्मेलन, which receive automatic bids.
The remaining slots are at-large bids, साथ teams chosen by an NCAA चयन कमेटी.
The चयन process और tournament seedings are based on अनेक कारकों, including team rankings, win-loss रिकॉर्ड and दरजा Percentage Index ( rpi ) data.
नापसंद the मेन 's tournament, there are तभी 32 at-large bids ( as of the next tournament in 2014 ), and no play-in खेल.
The women 's टूर्नामेंट, जैसे the men 's, is staged in a single विलोपन स्वरूप, and is part of the media और public frenzy known colloquially as March दीवानगी or the Big Dance.
All 63 games have महरूम broadcast on television since 2003 on ईएसपीएन and ESPN2.
Similar to the pre-2011 men 's टूर्नामेंट coverage on CBS, local teams हैं shown on each चैनल जब available, with `` whip-around '' coverage designed to शोकेस the most competitive प्रतियोगिताओं in the बाकी of the country.
The rosetta Stone in the British संग्रहालय
The Rosetta Stone is an ancient Egyptian granodiorite stele inscribed with a decree issued at मेम्फिस in 196 BC on निमित्त of King Ptolemy v.
The decree appears in three scripts : the अपर text is Ancient मिश्र hieroglyphs, the middle portion Demotic script, and the न्यूनतम प्राचीन यूनानी.
क्युकी it presents essentially the same टेक्स्ट in all तीन scripts ( साथ some नाबालिग differences between उन्हें ), it provided the कुंजी to the modern understanding of Egyptian hieroglyphs.
Originally displayed within a temple, the stone थी संभवतः स्थानांतरित दौरान the early Christian or medieval काल और eventually प्रयुक्त as building material in the निर्माण of Fort Julien निकट the town of रशीद ( Rosetta ) in the nile Delta.
It थी rediscovered there in 1799 by a soldier, Pierre-François Bouchard, of the फ्रेंच expedition to मिश्र.
As the first Ancient मिश्र bilingual text recovered in modern times, the Rosetta स्टोन aroused फैली पब्लिक interest with its potential to decipher this hitherto untranslated ancient language.
Lithographic नक़ल and प्लास्टर casts began circulating among European museums and scholars.
Meanwhile, British troops defeated the French in Egypt in 1801, और the original stone came into British कब्ज़ा under the Capitulation of एलेक्जेंड्रिया.
transported to London, it रै महरूम on public display at the British संग्रहालय since 1802.
it is the most-visited ऑब्जेक्ट in the अंग्रेजों संग्रहालय.
कभी चूंकि its rediscovery, the स्टोन has been the focus of nationalist rivalries, including its transfer इससे फ्रेंच to अंग्रेजों possession during the Napoleonic Wars, a long-running विवाद over the सापेक्ष मान of Young 's और champollion 's contributions to the decipherment, and since 2003, demands for the stone 's return to मिश्र.
पढ़ाई of the डिक्री was already under रास्ता as the first full translation of the Greek text appeared in 1803.
it was 20 years, however, before the लिप्यन्तरण of the Egyptian स्क्रिप्ट थी घोषित by jean-françois champollion in Paris in 1822 ; it took longer still before विद्वानों यहूद able to पढ़ा Ancient मिश्र inscriptions और literature confidently.
प्रमुख अग्रिम in the decoding were : मान्यता कि the स्टोन offered तीन versions of the same टेक्स्ट ( 1799 ) ; कि the demotic टेक्स्ट प्रयुक्त phonetic वर्ण to spell विदेशी names ( 1802 ) ; कि the hieroglyphic टेक्स्ट did so as खूब, and had pervasive similarities to the demotic ( Thomas Young, 1814 ) ; and that, in addition to होने प्रयुक्त for foreign names, ध्वन्यात्मक वर्ण यहूद also used to spell देशी Egyptian words ( champollion, 1822–1824 ).
Two other fragmentary copies of the same डिक्री were discovered later, और अनेक similar Egyptian bilingual or trilingual inscriptions are अभी ज्ञात, सहित दो slightly पहले Ptolemaic decrees ( the डिक्री of Canopus in 238 bc, और the मेम्फिस decree of टॉलेमी iv, ca. 218 BC ).
the Rosetta Stone is therefore no longer unique, लकिन it थी the essential कुंजी to modern समझना of Ancient Egyptian साहित्य और सभ्यता.
The term Rosetta Stone is now प्रयुक्त in other contexts as the name लिये the essential clue to a new फ़ील्ड of knowledge.
Poison dart frog ( भी dart-poison frog, ज़हर frog or formerly poison तीर frog ) is the common नाम of a समूह of मेंढक in the परिवार Dendrobatidae जिससे are native to Central and South America.
These प्रजाति हैं diurnal और often have brightly colored लाशें.
Although all जंगली dendrobatids हैं at तनिक somewhat toxic, स्तर of toxicity vary considerably from one species to the next and from one जनसांख्यिकी to another.
अनेक प्रजाति are threatened.
These amphibians are प्रायः पुकारा `` dart मेंढक '' due to the amerindians ' indigenous उपयोग of उनके to poison the नुस्ख़े of blowdarts.
however, of over 175 species, only four have been documented as being प्रयुक्त for this purpose ( curare plants हैं more commonly प्रयुक्त ), all of जिससे come इससे the Phyllobates genus, which is characterized by the अपेक्षाकृत large size and high स्तर of toxicity of इसके members.
Cajeta is a मैक्सिकन confection of thickened syrup usually made of sweetened caramelised मिल्क.
according to chef Rick Bayless, the name for cajeta आए इससे the Spanish phrase al punto de cajeta, जिससे means `` a द्रव thickened to the point at जिससे a spoon drawn through the liquid reveals the bottom of the घट in जिससे it is being cooked ''.
Another परिकल्पना is that it takes its name from the small लकड़ी boxes in which it was traditionally packed.
मैक्सिकन cajeta is माना a specialty of the city of Celaya in the state of Guanajuato, although it is also produced साथ the traditional method in अनेक towns of the राज्य of jalisco, such as Mazamitla, sayula, और atotonilco el Alto.
Cajeta is बना by simmering बकरी 's milk, or occasionally a sweetened liquid, stirring frequently, जबतक it becomes बहुत viscous due to evaporation of water, and caramelized.
जबकि goat milk is the most usual आधार, other liquids or juices may be used.
In Celaya, and आखिरकार the rest of Mexico, the confection of half goat 's milk और हाफ गाय 's milk became ज्ञात by the name cajeta, लकिन elsewhere, the milk कैंडी became known as leche quemada, dulce de leche, etc.
It रै cousins in the many भारतीय milk-based sweets like pera और the milk फ़ज burfi, and in the ओपेरा fudge of the u.S. Cajeta is खाया on its own as a sweet, as a स्प्रेड or भरना लिये breads and pastries, such as churros, और as a topping लिये ice cream.
Certain liquors हैं added to special recipes called cajeta envinada.
in जोड, cajeta envinada especial is समृद्ध साथ किशमिश, almonds, pecans or nuts.
प्रायः it is प्रयुक्त as a topping for crêpes, as a sweet sauce boiled and softened bas with milk to soak the crepes, resulting in a tasty मिठाई.
in Mexico अनेक brands make cajeta but the सबसे common brand is coronado.
It is also बहुत common to प्लेस cajeta between obleas to make a traditional Mexican dessert.
प्रिंस William, Duke of Cambridge ( William Arthur Philip Louis ; born 21 जून 1982 ), is the elder son of Charles, प्रिंस of वेल्स, और Diana, Princess of वेल्स, और third-eldest grandchild of महारानी Elizabeth II और Prince फिलिप, ड्यूक of Edinburgh.
He is दूसरी in the लकीर of succession, behind उसके father, to the thrones of सोलह independent sovereign राज्य known as the राष्ट्रमंडल realms : the संयुक्त Kingdom, Canada, Australia, New Zealand, जमैका, Barbados, The बहामा, Grenada, Papua नई Guinea, the Solomon Islands, तुवालू, संत Lucia, संत विंसेंट and the grenadines, बेलीज़, अण्टीगुआ और Barbuda, and Saint किट्स and Nevis.
प्रिंस विलियम थी शिक्षित at चार schools in the United Kingdom और प्राप्त a उपाधि from the विश्वविद्यालयों of St एंड्रयूज.
He spent parts of a gap year in चिली, बेलीज़, Tanzania, और Kenya where he रै lived और holidayed several times.
Prince William रै also taken kiswahili अध्ययन at universities in कीनिया और तंजानिया.
He थी commissioned as a लेफ्टिनेंट in the Blues and Royals रेजीमेंट of the household प्यादे —serving साथ his brother Prince हैरी —and, two years later, अर्जित उसके wings by completing पायलट प्रशिक्षण at Royal एयर Force College Cranwell.
In 2009, he transferred to the Royal Air Force, was promoted to Flight Lieutenant and underwent helicopter flying प्रशिक्षण in order to become a full-time pilot with the Search and Rescue फ़ोर्स.
In 2010, he completed उसके general and special-to-type हेलीकाप्टर training और गई on to RAF Valley on no. 22 Squadron performing co-pilot duties on board a Sea King search and rescue हेलीकाप्टर.
Prince विलियम शादीशुदा his longtime गर्लफ्रेंड, Catherine मिडलटन, on 29 अप्रैल 2011 at Westminster Abbey.
घंटों prior to उसके wedding, प्रिंस William was created ड्यूक of Cambridge, Earl of Strathearn, और Baron Carrickfergus.
माली is a बहुभाषी country.
The languages spoken वहीँ प्रतिबिंबित प्राचीन settlement patterns, migrations, and its long इतिहास.
ऍथनोलॉग रिश्तो 50 भाषाएं.
Of ये, फ्रेंच is the आधिकारिक भाषा और bambara is the सबसे widely spoken.
altogether 13 of the indigenous languages of माली have the विधिक status of नेशनल भाषा.

Rogers भवन, the headquarters of Rogers Communications
Rogers Communications inc. is a diversified public Canadian communications और media कम्पनी.
it is विशेषकर in the field of बेतार communications, cable टेलीविज़न, टेलीफोन, और Internet कनेक्टिविटी साथ significant additional telecommunications और द्रव्यमान मीडिया एसेट.
The company is headquartered in the Rogers Building in टोरंटो, Ontario.
the company claims the heritage of the रोजर्स Vacuum Tube Company, founded in 1925 by एडवर्ड Rogers, which प्रारंभ the CFRB रेडियो station in Toronto, which was later acquired by बाहर interests.
The उपस्थित enterprise dates to 1960, जब रोजर्स ' son, Ted Rogers, founded Rogers Radio Broadcasting ltd.
कि कम्पनी acquired CHFI that साल, as well as Aldred-Rogers Broadcasting, a साझेदारी with जोएल aldred which helped launch cfto in 1961.
रोजर्स later खरीदा out Aldred and started the वर्तमान cable और wireless operations, known as रोजर्स Cablesystems Ltd.
the chief प्रतिस्पर्धी to the company is Bell Canada, which रै a similarly extensive portfolio of radio and टेलीविज़न media assets, as well as wireless, television वितरण, and टेलीफोन सेवाएं, particularly in पूर्वी and सेंट्रल Canada ; the दो companies हैं प्रायः देखी as having a duopoly on communications सेवाएं in their regions.
However, the कम्पनी भी competes nationally with telus लिये बेतार सेवाएं, and primarily indirectly with Shaw संचार for टेलीविज़न सेवा.
The कम्पनी भी competes with a number of other मीडिया companies in the broadcasting industry.
the Internet is a वैश्विक system of interconnected computer संजाल that use the मानक अंतरजाल protocol सुइट ( TCP/IP ) to serve अरबों of users worldwide.
it is a संजाल of networks that consists of millions of private, public, अकादमिक, business, and government संजाल, of local to वैश्विक पैमाना, कि हैं linked by a broad array of इलेक्ट्रॉनिक, बेतार और optical नेटवर्किंग technologies.
The Internet carries an extensive range of सूचना संसाधन and services, ऐसे as the inter-linked hypertext documents of the संसार Wide वेब ( www ) and the infrastructure to support ईमेल.
Most traditional communications media सहित telephone, म्यूज़िक, फिल्मी, and television are being reshaped or redefined by the Internet, giving birth to new services ऐसे as voice over Internet प्रोटोकॉल ( VoIP ) और अंतरजाल Protocol television ( IPTV ).
Newspaper, book and अन्य print publishing are adapting to Web site technology, or are reshaped into blogging and web feeds.
The Internet has enabled और त्वरित new फ़ॉर्म of human interactions through instant messaging, अंतरजाल forums, and सोशल नेटवर्किंग.
ऑनलाइन खरीदारी has boomed both लिये major retail आउटलेट और छोटी artisans and व्यापारियों.
Business-to-business and financial सेवाएं on the Internet affect supply chains across संपूर्ण उद्योग.
The origins of the Internet पहुँचें वापस to research commissioned by the United States government in the 1960s to build मजबूत, fault-tolerant communication via कंप्यूटर networks.
The funding of a new u.S. backbone by the नेशनल Science Foundation in the 1980s, as well as private funding लिये अन्य वाणिज्यिक backbones, led to worldwide भागीदारी in the development of नई नेटवर्किंग technologies, and the merger of many संजाल.
The commercialization of what was by the 1990s an international संजाल resulted in इसके popularization and incorporation into virtually प्रत्येक पहलू of modern human जीवन.
, more than 2.4 billion people—over a third of the world 's human जनसांख्यिकी —have प्रयुक्त the services of the अंतरजाल ; लगभग 100 टाइम्स more people than were using it in 1995, जब it was ज़्यादातर used by tech-savvy middle and अपर क्लास people in the संयुक्त States and several अन्य countries.
The Internet has no centralized शासन in either technological क्रियान्वयन or policies लिये अभिगम and usage ; each constituent network सेट इसके own नीतियों.
Only the overreaching परिभाषाएं of the two principal नाम spaces in the अंतरजाल, the अंतरजाल Protocol address space and the Domain Name प्रणाली, हैं निर्देशित by a maintainer organization, the अंतरजाल Corporation for Assigned names and संख्याएँ ( ICANN ).
The technical underpinning and मानकीकरण of the core protocols ( IPv4 and IPv6 ) is an कार्यकलाप of the Internet Engineering Task Force ( ietf ), a non-profit संगठन of loosely affiliated अंतरराष्ट्रीय participants कि anyone may associate with by contributing तकनीकी विशेषज्ञता.
The 2006 शीत Olympics, officially ज्ञात as the XX Olympic Winter Games, थी a शीत multi-sport इवेंट which was celebrated in Turin, Italy from February 10, 2006, through February 26, 2006.
This चिह्नित the second समय इटली hosted the ओलम्पिक Winter Games, the first होने the VII Olympic Winter Games in cortina d'Ampezzo in 1956.
Italy भी hosted the खेल of the XVII Olympiad in रोम in 1960.
टोरीनो was चयनित as the मेजबान नगर लिये the 2006 खेल in 1999.
The आधिकारिक logo displayed the नाम `` टोरिनो '', the Italian नाम of the city ; the city is known as `` Turin '' in दोनो English and the लोकल traditional language, pms.
the ओलम्पिक mascots of Torino 2006 were neve ( `` snow '' in इतालवी ), a मादा snowball, and Gliz, a पुरूष ice cube.
the आधिकारिक motto of the XX ओलम्पिक Winter Games थी `` जुनून lives here ''.
`` Help ! '' is a song by the बीटल्स that served as the title song for both the 1965 फिल्मी और its soundtrack एल्बम.
It was also released as a single, and was क्रमांक one for three सप्ताह in दोनो the United राज्य और the संयुक्त Kingdom.

दौरान an interview साथ प्लेबॉय in 1984, पॉल McCartney stated that the शीर्षक थी `` आउट of छटपटाहट ''.
पोस्टर for the 2005 exhibition
Siegfried bing ( 26 फ़रवरी 1838 – 6 सितंबर 1905 ), जो प्रायः gave his नाम as S. Bing, और थी यूँ often संदर्भित erroneously as `` Samuel Bing '' ( Samuel ओटो bing, 1850–1905, थी उसके bhai ) was a German art dealer who lived in Paris as an वयस्क, और who helped introduce जापानी art और artworks to the वेस्ट और was a फ़ैक्टर in the development of the Art Nouveau स्टाइल दौरान the late nineteenth century.
तुलना of male and female जीवन expectancy at birth लिये देशों और territories as पारिभाषित in the 2011 CIA factbook, with selected बुलबुले labelled.
the dotted लकीर corresponds to बराबर female and male life expectancy.

kennewick is a city in Benton काउंटी in the southeastern part of the U.S. state of Washington, निकट the hanford नाभिकीय site.
It is the most populous of the three शहरों collectively referred to as the Tri-Cities ( the others being Pasco और Richland ).
Kennewick is located साथ the southwest bank of the Columbia River, विपरीत Pasco and just south of the confluence of the Columbia और yakima नदियाँ.
the population was 73,917 at the 2010 जनसांख्यिकी.
अप्रैल 1, 2012 estimates इससे the Washington राज्य Office of वित्तीय Management put the city 's जनसांख्यिकी at 75,160.
the nearest commercial विमानक्षेत्र is the tri-cities Airport in Pasco, a regional commercial और private विमानक्षेत्र.
Forbes magazine named Kennewick the # 2 area in the संयुक्त States for जॉब growth, जबकि आसपास yakima was named # 1.
The article cites the number of वैज्ञानिकों employed by the Pacific उत्तरपश्चिम National Laboratory और area farmland for this outlook.
the prothrombin time ( pt ) and इसके derived उपायों of prothrombin ratio ( PR ) और international normalized ratio ( INR ) हैं उपायों of the extrinsic pathway of coagulation.
This test is भी पुकारा `` protime INR '' and `` PT/INR ''.
They are used to determine the clotting tendency of blood, in the measure of warfarin dosage, liver damage, and विटामिन K status.
pt measures factors I ( फाइब्रिनोजेन ), ii ( prothrombin ), v, VII, and X.
it is प्रयुक्त in conjunction with the activated partial thromboplastin समय ( aPTT ) which measures the intrinsic pathway.
`` I 'm in the Mood लिये Love '' is a लोकप्रिय song.
The म्यूज़िक थी लिखा by jimmy McHugh, the गीत by Dorothy फ़ील्ड.
the सोंग was published in 1935.
it थी introduced by frances Langford in the movie प्रत्येक Night at Eight released कि year.
The song थी प्रदर्शित in the 1936 Our गिरोह ( Little Rascals ) छोटी, the Pinch Singer, sung by Carl `` Alfalfa '' Switzer, और in the 1936 film Palm स्रोतों.
It is प्रायः ज्ञात to be Switzer 's signature song.

Hip hop कलाकार प्रिंस Paul sampled the सोंग as the आधार for the track `` मनोदशा for प्रेम '' on उसके एल्बम A Prince among Thieves ( 1999 ), साथ डॉन Newkirk singing its original lyrics.

cross-cultural psychology is the scientific पढ़ाई of human behavior and mental processes, सहित दोनो उनके variability और invariance, अंतर्गत diverse सांस्कृतिक conditions.
through expanding research methodologies to recognize सांस्कृतिक variance in behavior, language, and meaning it seeks to extend और develop मनोविज्ञान.
Since psychology as an academic discipline was विकसित largely in North America, some psychologists became concerned कि constructs accepted as सार्वभौमिक यहूद not as invariant as previously assumed, विशेषकर since अनेक attempts to replicate notable प्रयोग in other cultures had varying कामयाबी.
चूंकि there हैं questions as to whether theories dealing साथ central विषयवस्तु, such as affect, cognition, conceptions of the self, and मुद्दे ऐसे as psychopathology, anxiety, and अवसाद, may lack बाह्य validity when `` exported '' to other cultural contexts, cross-cultural मनोविज्ञान re-examines them using methodologies designed to फ़ैक्टर in cultural मतभेद so as to खाता for सांस्कृतिक variance.
Although some critics have pointed to methodological flaws in cross-cultural मनोवैज्ञानिक research और claim that serious shortcomings in the सैद्धांतिक और methodological bases used impede rather than help the वैज्ञानिक search for universal सिद्धान्त in psychology, cross-cultural psychologists are turning अधिक to the पढ़ाई of how differences ( variance ) occur, rather than searching for universals in the style of physics or रसायन.
in 1972 the International संघ of Cross-Cultural मनोविज्ञान ( iaccp ) was established.
इस branch of मनोविज्ञान has continued to expand as वहीँ has been an increasing popularity of incorporating culture and विविधता into अध्ययन.
Cross-cultural psychology is differentiated इससे Cultural psychology.
The latter is the शाखा of psychology that holds that human बर्ताव is significantly influenced by cultural मतभेद, अर्थ that मनोवैज्ञानिक phenomena can तभी be compared साथ each अन्य across cultures to a very limited extent.
in contrast, cross-cultural psychology शामिल a search लिये संभावित universals in behavior और mental प्रक्रियाओं.
Walter J. Lonner, writing for नजर on Psi ची, has stated कि `` cross-cultural मनोविज्ञान can be विचार of as a type research methodology, rather than an entirely separate फ़ील्ड भीतर मनोविज्ञान ( 2000 ). ''
`` यहूदा '' is a सोंग by अमरीकी recording कलाकार महिला Gaga, from her दूसरी स्टुडियो album born This रास्ता ( 2011 ).
it थी released by Interscope रिकॉर्ड on April 15, 2011, चार days ahead of इसके अनुसूचित रिलीज.
Written and उत्पादित by Lady गागा और RedOne, `` Judas '' is a नृत्य and इलेक्ट्रो house सोंग परिचय a woman in love साथ a man who गद्दारी उसके.
it embodies the incidents that have haunted गागा in the पास्ट, और its core meaning refers to the negative parts of her जीवन that she ca n't escape.
गागा has further explained कि the song थी भी about honoring one 's भीतरी अंधेरा in अनुक्रम to bring oneself into the light.
The कलाकृति for the single was designed by Gaga in Microsoft Word.
in spite of a polarizing impact on अनेक धार्मिक groups, the सोंग थी generally खूब प्राप्त by आलोचकों, जो likened the song to `` Bad Romance `` with some noting it चाहिए have महरूम the album 's lead single.
The सोंग has a similar sound to गागा 's previous RedOne-produced tracks, including `` Poker फेस ``, `` LoveGame ``, `` ख़राब रोमांस '', और `` alejandro ``.
it contains three पृथक hooks and a house -influenced ब्रेक bas.
Gaga explained that the lines spoken during the विश्लेषण talk about her as beyond मोचन, regarding the traditional दृश्य of what a woman should be.
`` यहूदा '' initially had a strong बिक्री opening, but थी less कामयाब commercially in तुलना to गागा 's पिछला singles.
the song reached the शीर्ष टेन of the charts in सबसे major music बाज़ार, and also पहुँचे the top of the चार्ट in South कोरियाई.
a music video लिये the song थी filmed in अप्रैल 2011, co-directed by गागा and Laurieann Gibson and co-starring Norman Reedus.
It रै a Biblical storyline where Reedus played Judas इस्कैरियट and Gaga played मरियम Magdalene.
the video portrays उन्हें as modern दिन प्रचारकों going to Jerusalem.
it included the Biblical story of Judas betraying Jesus, and ended with Gaga as Magdalene getting stoned to death.
Before इसके release, the Catholic League condemned गागा for the कथित उपयोग of धार्मिक imagery और उसके role in the video.
However, critics generally praised the video, नहीं ढूंढना any अप्रिय सामग्री.
The video थी nominated for दो पुरस्कार at the 2011 MTV Video म्यूज़िक Awards.
Gaga रै performed `` यहूदा '' on a number of टेलीविज़न shows, सहित the Graham नॉर्टन दिखाएँ, शनिवार Night Live, Good Morning americas `` Summer कॉन्सर्ट Series '', the French X Factor as खूब as on the Ellen DeGeneres Show.
H.264/MPEG-4 Part 10 or AVC ( उन्नत वीडियो कोडिंग ) is a मानक लिये video compression, and is currently one of the सबसे commonly used स्वरुप for the recording, संपीडन, और वितरण of high definition video.
The final drafting कार्य on the first version of the मानक थी समाप्त in May 2003.
h.264/mpeg-4 avc is a block-oriented motion-compensation -आधारd कोडेक standard विकसित by the itu-t वीडियो Coding Experts Group ( VCEG ) together with the ISO/IEC JTC1 चलती चित्र विशेषज्ञ Group ( एमपीईजी ).
The project partnership effort is ज्ञात as the Joint Video Team ( JVT ).
the itu-t H.264 मानक and the iso/iec MPEG-4 AVC standard ( formally, ISO/IEC 14496-10 – MPEG-4 Part 10, उन्नत वीडियो कोडिंग ) are jointly कायम so that वे have एकसमान technical content.
H.264 is perhaps best ज्ञात as being one of the codec मानकों for blu-ray Discs ; all Blu-ray डिस्क players जरूर be समर्थ to डिकोड h.264.
It is भी widely प्रयुक्त by streaming अंतरजाल sources, such as videos इससे vimeo, YouTube, और the itunes Store, web software ऐसे as the Adobe फ्लैश Player and microsoft Silverlight, और भी various hdtv प्रसारण over terrestrial ( atsc, ISDB-T, DVB-T or dvb-t2 ), केबल ( dvb-c ) and satellite ( DVB-S and DVB-S2 ).
Non-binding arbitration is a प्रकार of arbitration in जिससे the arbitrator makes a determination of the rights of the पार्टियों to the dispute, but इस determination is नहीं binding upon उन्हें, और no enforceable मध्यस्थता award is जारी.
the `` पुरस्कार '' is in effect an सलाहकार opinion of the arbitrator 's दृश्य of the respective merits of the parties मामले.
Non-binding मध्यस्थता is used in connection with कोशिशें to reach a negotiated settlement.
The भूमिका of an arbitrator in non-binding arbitration is, on the सतह, similar to कि of a मध्यस्थ in a मध्यस्थता.
However, the principal भेद is that whereas a mediator will try to help the पार्टियों find a मध्य मैदान to compromise at, the arbitrator remains totally removed from the उपनिवेश process and will तभी give a determination of liability और, if appropriate, an indication of the quantum of damages देय.
Subsequent to a non-binding मध्यस्थता, the parties remain free to pursue उनके claims either through the courts, or by way of a binding arbitration, although in अभ्यास a settlement is the most आम outcome.
The पुरस्कार and reasoning in a non-binding arbitration is almost invariably inadmissible in any subsequent कार्रवाई in the courts or in another मध्यस्थता tribunal.
Non-binding मध्यस्थता is utilised mostly in the संयुक्त राज्य and कनाडा.
it is largely अनजान in Europe, although in the United Kingdom वहीँ is a practice of पार्टियों who हैं seeking a settlement to jointly instruct a महारानी 's counsel for an opinion on the merits और संभावित quantum of a claim, और then to negotiate on the basis of the दृश्य expressed in कि opinion.
Augustine Volcano is a Lava Dome जटिल on Augustine Island in southwestern Cook Inlet in the Kenai प्रायद्वीप बरो of southcentral coastal Alaska, southwest of Anchorage.
The Alaska ज्वालामुखी वेधशाला फिलहाल rates माउंट अगस्टाइन as Level of Concern Color कोड ग्रीन for विमानन and the ज्वालामुखी चेतावनी Level is at सामान्य.
Augustine Island रै a जमीन area of, while West Island, just off Augustine 's पश्चिमी shores, रै.
the द्वीप is made up mainly of past eruption जमा.
वैज्ञानिकों have been able to discern that पास्ट dome पतन has resulted in विशाल avalanches.
A map of Belize.
the country of Belize रै roughly 386 km of तटरेखा, and रै अनेक coral reefs, cays, and आइलैंड्स in the Caribbean Sea.
सबसे of ये form the Belize Barrier Reef, the longest in the पश्चिमी hemisphere stemming लगभग.
The रीफ और इसके islands have महरूम a युनेस्को World विरासत Site चूंकि 1996.
the following is a list of oceanic आइलैंड्स of Belize, arranged according to region but सब of which are in the Caribbean Sea.
सबसे of the आइलैंड्स variate in स्पेलिंग between `` cay '' and `` caye '', और भी उपयोग the Spanish `` cayo ''.
River islands have not been सूचीबद्ध.
Drive Letter Access ( DLA ) is a discontinued वाणिज्यिक packet लिखने application लिये the microsoft Windows ऑपरेटिंग system कि allows ऑप्टिकल disc data storage devices to be used in a manner समान to फ्लॉपी डिस्क.
dla is a packet writing technology लिये CD and DVD media that uses the udf file प्रणाली.
dla is not संगत साथ खिड़कियाँ Vista and नए, although a patch exists to fix इस issue under Windows विस्टा.
Roxio Burn थी introduced on अप्रैल 30, 2009.
As a replacement for DLA, it remedies संगतता issues अंतरजाल Explorer 8.

अलास्का ( ) is a राज्य in the संयुक्त States, situated in the northwest extremity of the उत्तर American महाद्वीप, साथ the international boundary साथ Canada to the east, the आर्कटिक समंदर to the north, and the प्रशांत समंदर to the वेस्ट and south, with Russia further west across the Bering Strait.
अलास्का is the largest राज्य in the संयुक्त States by area, the 4th least populous और the least densely populated of the 50 United राज्य.
Approximately हाफ of अलास्का 's 731,449 residents live within the anchorage metropolitan क्षेत्रफल.
अलास्का 's economy is dominated by the आयल, प्राकृतिक gas, and फ़िशिंग industries ; it रै these resources in प्रचुरता.
अलास्का थी purchased इससे Russia on March 30, 1867, लिये $ 7.2 million ( $ adjusted लिये inflation ) at approximately two cents per acre ( $ 4.74/km2 ).
The जमीन went through several administrative changes before बनने an organized ( or incorporated ) territory on May 11, 1912, and the 49th राज्य of the u.S. on January 3, 1959.
the नाम `` अलास्का '' ( аляска ) was already introduced in the रूसी औपनिवेशिक period, जब it was used तभी लिये the peninsula और is निकला from the Aleut alaxsxaq, अर्थ `` the mainland '' or, अधिक वस्तुतः, `` the object towards which the action of the sea is directed ''.
it is also known as Alyeska, the `` ग्रेट land '', an Aleut शब्द निकला from the वही रूट.
नेल्सन Mandela Metropolitan विश्वविद्यालयों ( nmmu ) is a South अफ़्रीकी tertiary शिक्षा संस्था साथ its main प्रशासन in the coastal नगर of Port Elizabeth.
A merging of तीन institutions संस्थापित NMMU in जनवरी 2005 but its history dates back to 1882 साथ the foundation of Port एलिज़ाबेथ Art School.
The विश्वविद्यालयों draws international विद्यार्थी इससे all over the world.
वहीँ हैं over 3000 international विद्यार्थी and शामिल students इससे the संयुक्त राज्य, France, China, जर्मनी, Belgium, Denmark, Finland, नीदरलैंड्स, Norway, स्वीडन, संयुक्त Kingdom and अनेक अन्य देशों.
NMMU is a comprehensive university offering professional और vocational training.
the University रै six campuses - five in Port एलिज़ाबेथ और one in George.
The main कैम्पस is the दक्षिण Campus.
विद्यार्थी at NMMU can पढ़ाई towards diplomas and degrees up to और सहित doctoral level योग्यता.
A number of courses include कार्यस्थल experience as भाग of the curriculum.
CoverGirl is an अमरीकी cosmetics brand founded in Maryland, by the noxzema Chemical Company ( later called noxell ) और acquired by procter & Gamble in 1989.
the noxell Company advertised इस कॉस्मेटिक्स लकीर by allowing `` cover girls '', fashion models जो appear on the सामने cover of women 's magazines, to wear its products.
CoverGirl makes up लिये lack of direct individual ग्राहक service by providing a चौड़ी variety of cosmetics उपलब्धियाँ at reasonable prices.
on the उत्पत्ति of Species, प्रकाशित on 24 नवम्बर 1859, is a कार्य of वैज्ञानिक साहित्य by चार्ल्स Darwin which is considered to be the foundation of evolutionary biology.
Its full title was On the Origin of Species by Means of प्राकृतिक Selection, or the Preservation of favoured दौड़ in the Struggle लिये Life.
For the sixth edition of 1872, the short शीर्षक थी बदला to the Origin of Species.
Darwin 's book introduced the scientific सिद्धान्त that populations evolve over the कोर्स of generations through a process of natural चयन.
It presented a body of प्रमाण that the विविधता of life arose by आम descent through a branching पैटर्न of एवोल्यूशन.
डार्विन included evidence that he had gathered on the Beagle expedition in the 1830s और उसके subsequent निष्कर्षों इससे research, correspondence, and experimentation.
विभिन्न evolutionary विचार had already been proposed to बताइये नई findings in biology.
There was growing support for ऐसे ideas among dissident anatomists और the general public, लकिन during the first half of the 19th century the अंग्रेज़ी scientific establishment was closely tied to the गिरिजाघर of इंग्लैण्ड, while science थी part of natural धर्मशास्त्र.
Ideas about the transmutation of species यहूद controversial as they विरोधी with the beliefs कि species यहूद अपरिवर्तनशील भाग of a designed hierarchy and कि humans were अद्वितीय, unrelated to other animals.
The political और theological implications यहूद intensely debated, लकिन transmutation थी not स्वीकृत by the वैज्ञानिक mainstream.
The book was लिखा लिये non-specialist पाठक and आकर्षित फैली interest upon इसके प्रकाशन.
As डार्विन थी an प्रतिष्ठित scientist, his findings were taken seriously and the evidence he प्रस्तुत generated scientific, philosophical, and धार्मिक चर्चा.
the बहस over the book contributed to the अभियान by T.H. हक्स्ले and उसके fellow members of the X Club to secularise विज्ञान by promoting scientific naturalism.
Within two दशकों there थी फैली वैज्ञानिक अनुबंध that एवोल्यूशन, with a branching पैटर्न of common descent, had occurred, but वैज्ञानिकों were slow to give प्राकृतिक selection the significance that डार्विन विचार appropriate.
दौरान the `` eclipse of Darwinism `` इससे the 1880s to the 1930s, विभिन्न other mechanisms of एवोल्यूशन were given अधिक credit.
With the development of the आधुनिक evolutionary synthesis in the 1930s और 1940s, Darwin 's अवधारणा of evolutionary अनुकूलन through प्राकृतिक selection became central to modern विकासवादी theory, now the unifying concept of the life sciences.
Charles Dillon `` Casey '' स्टेंगल ( ; जुलाई 30, 1890 – सितंबर 29, 1975 ), nicknamed `` The बूढ़ा perfessor '', थी an अमरीकी Major लीग Baseball outfielder और मैनेजर.
he was निर्वाचित to the बेसबॉल Hall of Fame in.
स्टेंगल was born in Kansas City, Missouri, and originally nicknamed `` Dutch '', a आम nickname at कि समय लिये अमेरिकी of जर्मनी ancestry.
बाद his प्रमुख लीग career began, he acquired the उपनाम `` Casey '', जिससे originally came from the आद्याक्षर of उसके गृहनगर ( `` K. C. '' ), जिससे evolved into `` Casey '', influenced by the wide popularity of the कविता Casey at the चमगादड़.
in the 1950s, sportswriters dubbed him साथ yet another उपनाम, `` The Old प्राध्यापक '' ( or `` perfessor '' ), for उसके sharp wit and his ability to बात at length on anything baseball -सुनानाd.
Although his बेसबॉल करियर spanned a क्रमांक of टीमों and cities, he is primarily संबद्ध with clubs in नई York नगर.
Between playing and managing, he is the तभी man to have worn four of New York 's major लीग clubs ' uniforms.
He was the first of four men ( through the season ) to मैनेज दोनो the नई यॉर्क Yankees and नई York Mets ; Yogi Berra, Dallas Green, और जो Torre are the अन्य.
जैसे Torre, he भी managed the braves and the डॉजर्स.
He ended his baseball career as the beloved मैनेजर लिये the तब expansion New York मेट्स, which won over the hearts of नई York partly due to the unique character of their veteran नेता.
June ( ) is the sixth माह of the साल in the Julian and Gregorian calendars और एक of the चार महीने with a length of 30 days.
Ovid provides दो etymologies for June 's नाम in his कविता concerning the महीने हकदार the Fasti.
The first is कि the month is named after the Roman goddess juno, wife of बृहस्पति और समतुल्य to the यूनानी देवी hera ; the second is that the नाम comes इससे the लैटिन शब्द iuniores, अर्थ `` younger ones, '' as opposed to maiores ( `` elders '' ) for जिससे the preceding month May may be नामित ( fasti vi.1–88 ).
See : Months in विभिन्न calendars भी called the ऋतु of the जून is the month with the longest daylight hours of the year in the Northern गोलार्ध और the shortest daylight घंटों of the year in the Southern Hemisphere.
जून in the उत्तरी गोलार्ध is the seasonal समतुल्य to December in the दक्षिणी Hemisphere and vice versa.
in the Northern गोलार्ध, the शुरूआत of the meteorological summer is 1 June.
in the दक्षिणी गोलार्ध, the शुरूआत of the meteorological winter is 1 जून.
at the start of June, the सूर्य उदय in the नक्षत्र of वृष ; at the end of June, the sun rises in the constellation of Gemini.
However, due to the precession of the equinoxes, June begins with the sun in the astrological sign of Gemini, और ends with the सूर्य in the astrological चिह्न of कर्कट.
June is known for the विशाल number of विवाह that occur over the course of the month.
According to एक etymology, June is named बाद Juno ( hera ).
juno was the देवी of विवाह और a married couple 's household, so some consider it good luck to be शादीशुदा in this month.
according to another etymology provided by the रोमन poet ओविड, जून is named लिये the iuniores, लैटिन for `` यंग people '' ( fasti vi.88 ) और कि the month of may is named for the maiores, Latin for `` elders ''.
in आइसलैंड, folklore says that if तुम bathe naked in the morning dew on the morning of जून 24, तुम are supposed to keep वृद्धावस्था at खाड़ी for longer.
a constitution is a नियत of fundamental principles or established precedents according to जिससे a state or अन्य organization is governed.
These rules together मेक up, i.e. constitute, कया the एंटिटी is.
जब these principles हैं written bas into a single document or नियत of legal documents, those documents may be कहा to embody a written संविधान ; if वे are written down in a सिंगल comprehensive दस्तावेज़, it is said to embody a संहिताबद्ध संविधान.
Constitutions concern अलग levels of संगठन, from sovereign states to companies and unincorporated एसोसिएशन.
a treaty which establishes an अंतरराष्ट्रीय organization is भी इसके संविधान, in that it would define कैसा that organization is constituted.
Within राज्य, whether sovereign or federated, a संविधान defines the principles upon which the state is आधारित, the procedure in जिससे कानून हैं made and by whom.
कुछ constitutions, especially codified constitutions, also act as limiters of state power, by establishing lines which a state 's rulers can not cross, such as fundamental rights.
जार्ज Washington at Constitutional Convention of 1787, हस्ताक्षर of u.S. Constitution.
the Constitution of India is the longest लिखा संविधान of कोई sovereign देश in the संसार, containing 448 articles, 12 schedules और 100 amendments, with 117,369 words in its English भाषा संस्करण, जबकि the संयुक्त राज्य संविधान is the shortest लिखा constitution, at 7 आलेख और 27 amendments.
Ron diftler ( left ), NASA Robonaut मैनेजर assisting in a Robonaut familiarization training session in the Space पर्यावरण Simulation Laboratory at NASA 's Johnson Space बीच.
अभियान्त्रिकी प्रबन्धन is a specialized form of प्रबन्धन that is चिंतित साथ the application of engineering principles to कारोबार practice.
Engineering management is a career कि brings together the technological problem-solving savvy of engineering and the organizational, administrative, और नियोजन abilities of management in order to oversee जटिल enterprises इससे धारणा to completion.
उदाहरण areas of engineering are product development, निर्माण, construction, design engineering, industrial engineering, प्रौद्योगिकी, उत्पादन, or any other field that employs personnel जो perform an अभियान्त्रिकी function.
कामयाब engineering managers typically require training and अनुभव in कारोबार and अभियान्त्रिकी.
technically inept managers tend to be deprived of support by उनके तकनीकी team, and non-commercial managers tend to कमी commercial acumen to deliver in a market economy.
Largely, engineering प्रबंधक manage engineers who are चलित by non-entrepreneurial thinking, thus आवश्यकता the necessary लोगों skills to coach, mentor और motivate technical पेशेवर.
Engineering पेशेवर joining निर्माण companies sometimes become engineering managers by डिफॉल्ट after a period of time.
They हैं जरूरी to learn how to मैनेज once they are on the जॉब, हालांकि इस is प्रायः an ineffective रास्ता to develop managerial abilities.
in an insurance नीति, the deductible is the राशि of expenses that must be paid out of pocket पहले an insurer will अदा any खर्च.
In सामान्य उपयोग, the पद deductible may be प्रयुक्त to describe एक of several प्रकार of clauses ( see below ) that हैं used by insurance कंपनियाँ as a threshold लिये policy भुगतान.
Deductibles हैं typically प्रयुक्त to deter the large number of नगण्य claims that a consumer can be reasonably expected to भालू the cost of.
By restricting its coverage to events that हैं significant पर्याप्त to incur विशाल costs, the insurance firm expects to pay out slightly smaller amounts much less frequently, incurring much higher बचत.
As a result, बीमे premiums हैं typically सस्ता जब वे involve higher deductibles.
Deductibles are सामान्यतः provided as clauses in an insurance नीति that dictate कैसा much of an insurance-covered व्यय is borne by the policyholder.
They are सामान्यतः कोटेड as a फिक्स्ड मात्रा and is a भाग of most नीतियों covering losses to the policy holder.
the insurer तब becomes liable for claimable खर्च that exceed इस राशि ( subject to the maximum sum claimable indicated in the contract ).
Depending on the policy, the deductible may लागू per covered incident, or per साल.
लिये नीतियों जहाँ incidences हैं not easy to delimit ( for example health बीमे ), the deductible is typically applied per साल.
Several deductibles can be set by the insurer based on the कारण of the claim.
लिये example, a सिंगल housing insurance policy may contain अनेक deductible amounts for loss or damage arising from theft, fire, natural calamities, evacuation etc.
There are also deductible reimbursement programs कि reimburse a deductible in the इवेंट of an auto, home, boat/yacht or health insurance claim.
An invoice or विधेयक is a वाणिज्यिक document जारी by a seller to a खरीदार, indicating the products, quantities, and agreed prices for products or services the seller has provided the buyer.
An invoice indicates the sale लेनदेन तभी.
Payment terms हैं independent of the चालान and हैं negotiated by the खरीदार और the विक्रेता.
भुगतान terms हैं प्रायः शामिल on the चालान.
The buyer could have already paid for the उत्पाद or services listed on the invoice.
Buyer can also have a maximum number of days in जिससे to pay लिये these goods and is sometimes offered a छूट if paid पहले the due तिथि.
in the rental उद्योग, an invoice जरूर include a specific सन्दर्भ to the duration of the समय being billed, so in addition to मात्रा, दाम and छूट the invoicing amount is भी based on duration.
generally each लकीर of a rental invoice will refer to the actual घंटों, दिनों, weeks, months, etc., होने billed.
From the पाइंट of दृश्य of a seller, an invoice is a बिक्री invoice.
From the point of दृश्य of a buyer, an invoice is a purchase invoice.
the document indicates the खरीदार and seller, but the पद invoice indicates धन is owed or owing.
In अंग्रेज़ी, the context of the term invoice is usually used to clarify इसके अर्थ, such as `` we भेजा them an चालान '' ( they owe us money ) or `` We प्राप्त an invoice इससे उन्हें '' ( we owe उन्हें money ).
the right प्रमुख bronchus ( or right primary bronchus, or सही प्रिंसिपल bronchus ) is a bronchus of the respiratory प्रणाली.
It is wider, shorter, and more लंबवत in direction than the बाएँ.
It is about 2.5 cm long, and enters the सही lung nearly opposite the पांचवां thoracic vertebra.
The azygos रग arches over it from पीछे ; और the सही pulmonary artery lies at first below and तब in front of it.
About 2 cm from इसके commencement it gives बंद a branch to the upper lobe of the सही lung.
This is termed the eparterial शाखा of the bronchus, because it arises ऊपर the right pulmonary धमनी.
the bronchus अभी गुजरता नीचे the artery, और is ज्ञात as the hyparterial branch ; it divides into two शाखाओं for the middle and lower lobes.
if a विदेशी देह in the airway गुजरता through the trachea, it होगा most संभावित डालें the right प्रमुख bronchus बजाय of the left, due to the straighter संरेखण of the सही bronchus to the श्वासनली.
Squash is a racquet खेल played by दो ( singles ) or four players ( doubles ) in a four-walled court with a small, खोखला रबर बॉल.
the खिलाड़ी जरूर alternate in striking the ball with their racquet और hit the ball onto the playable सतहों of the चार दीवारें of the अदालत.
the game was formerly पुकारा स्क्वैश racquets, a सन्दर्भ to the `` squashable '' नरम ball used in the game ( compared साथ the fatter बॉल used in इसके parent game racquets or rackets ).
Squash is recognized by the IOC and समर्थक हैं lobbying लिये its incorporation in a भविष्य ओलम्पिक कार्यक्रम.
In 2003, Forbes rated स्क्वैश as the number one healthiest sport to play.
अवशेष oil is oil found in low एकाग्रता naturally or in exhausted oil fields.
Often मिश्रित with water, it can not be बरामद by conventional तकनीकों.
However, it can be बरामद using carbon dioxide-enhanced oil रिकवरी ( co2 eor ) जिससे involves injecting carbon डाइऑक्साइड into the well reducing viscosity and बढ़ाना flow of the आयल.
The technique is नहीं new लकिन रै नहीं been प्रयुक्त extensively on residual आयल zones, low-grade deposits of petroleum ऐसे as the 38 square miles in the Permian जलाशय of Texas leased by elliott Roosevelt Jr.
The technique is सीमित by availability of carbon dioxide.
It करता नहीं result in sequestration of the carbon डाइऑक्साइड but the gas is recycled as much as possible.
United States reserves of residual oil are estimated to be 100 billion barrels.

the Great शिकागो आग was a conflagration कि burned इससे Sunday, October 8, to early Tuesday, October 10, 1871, हत्या hundreds और destroying परिचय in Chicago, Illinois.
हालांकि the fire was एक of the largest u.S. आपदाओं of the 19th century, the पुनर्निर्माण कि began helped develop Chicago as एक of the सबसे populous और economically important अमरीकी शहरों.
हेनरी viii ( 28 जून 1491 – 28 जनवरी 1547 ) was किंग of इंग्लैण्ड from 21 अप्रैल 1509 until his death.
he was lord, और later king, of Ireland, as well as continuing the nominal claim by the अंग्रेज़ी monarchs to the Kingdom of France.
Henry was the दूसरी monarch of the ट्यूडर राजवंश, succeeding his पिता, हेनरी सात.
Besides उसके छह विवाह, Henry VIII is ज्ञात लिये उसके role in the separation of the Church of इंग्लैण्ड from the Roman Catholic Church.
Henry 's struggles साथ Rome led to the separation of the Church of England from papal authority, the विच्छेद of the monasteries, and उसके अपना establishment as the Supreme सिर of the गिरिजाघर of इंग्लैण्ड.
yet he remained a आस्तिक in कोर कैथोलिक theological शिक्षाओं, even after उसके excommunication इससे the Roman Catholic Church.
Henry oversaw the legal union of इंग्लैण्ड और Wales with the Laws in वेल्स अधिनियमों 1535 और 1542.
In 1513, the new king allied with the पावन रोमन Emperor, maximillian I, और invaded France in 1513 with a large, well-equipped फौज, but हासिल little at a considerable वित्तीय cost.
maximillian, लिये उसके भाग, used the English invasion to his अपना ends, and इस prejudiced England 's क्षमता to शिकस्त the French.
इस foray होता prove the start of an obsession for Henry, जो invaded again in 1544.
इस time, Henry 's forces captured the महत्वपूर्ण नगर of Boulogne, but again the Holy Roman सम्राट, Charles V, supported हेनरी तभी as long as he needed to and इंग्लैण्ड, strained by the विशाल cost of the युद्ध, ransomed the नगर वापस लिये सलाम.
His contemporaries माना हेनरी in उसके prime to be an आकर्षक, educated और accomplished king, और he has been वर्णित as `` one of the सबसे charismatic शासकों to sit on the English throne ''.
besides सत्ताधारी साथ निरपेक्ष power, he भी engaged खुद as an लेखक and composer.
His ख्वाहिश to provide इंग्लैण्ड with a male वारिस – जिससे stemmed partly from निजी vanity और partly because he believed a daughter would be unable to consolidate the Tudor dynasty and the fragile सलाम कि existed following the युद्धों of the Roses – led to the two things लिये जिससे हेनरी is most remembered : his six marriages और the English Reformation.
Henry became morbidly obese and his health suffered, contributing to his death in 1547.
He is अक्सर characterised in his later जीवन as a lustful, egotistical, हर्ष, और insecure किंग.
La Reina del Sur ( the महारानी of the South ) is a spanish-language telenovela उत्पादित by the संयुक्त States television network telemundo, in संयोजन with the Antena 3 network और RTI Producciones.
आधारित on a अनोखा of the same नाम by Spanish लेखक arturo Pérez-Reverte, the drama depicts the rise of Teresa Mendoza ( केट डेल Castillo ), a young woman इससे मैक्सिको जो becomes the most शक्तिशाली drug trafficker in southern Spain.
Patricio wills, the अध्यक्ष of Telemundo टेलीविज़न Studios, थी the executive निर्माता.
हालांकि La Reina डेल Sur was मनोनीत for Novela of the साल, पसंदीदा Lead अभिनेत्री, और Best Bad Luck Video, it won no पुरस्कार.
साथ a $ 10 million budget, La reina del Sur was the most महंगी telenovela ever produced by Telemundo.
the program 's premiere on February 28, 2011, was the संजाल 's highest rated premiere for a telenovela to date.
the program अक्सर dominated इसके समय स्लॉट, भी over English language प्रोग्रामिंग on other प्रमुख U.S. networks.
la reina डेल सूर समाप्त its 63 episode run on Telemundo और इसके 13 episode run on एंटेना 3 simultaneously on May 30, 2011.
the final एपीसोड थी the उच्चतम रेटेड broadcast in Telemundo 's 19-year history ( 4.2 million viewers ), और beat all of the English language U.S. television networks to earn the number एक slot in the 18-49 adult जनसांख्यिकी.
The कार्यक्रम 's कामयाबी spurred Telemundo to launch its first campaign to लाभ the series an Emmy पुरस्कार nomination.
A one-night खास featuring several cast सदस्यों aired on May 31, 2011, और marked the Telemundo debut of noted latina television व्यक्तित्व Cristina saralegui.
La Reina डेल Sur is ब्रॉडकास्ट in several other बाज़ार, including Serbia, Colombia, Chile, साइप्रस, Nicaragua, कोस्टा रिका, मैक्सिको, Albania, हंगेरियाई, Slovenia, Croatia, रोमानिया, ( among अन्य ).

A वेब hosting service is a type of अंतरजाल hosting service that allows individuals और संगठन to मेक their जालस्थल accessible via the World चौड़ी वेब.
Web hosts are कंपनियाँ that provide space on a server owned or leased लिये use by clients, as खूब as providing अंतरजाल कनेक्टिविटी, typically in a आंकड़ा बीच.
वेब होस्ट can भी provide data center स्पेस and कनेक्टिविटी to the अंतरजाल for other servers located in their data center, called colocation, भी known as Housing in Latin अमेरिका or France.
the scope of वेब hosting services varies greatly.
The most basic is web page और small-scale file hosting, where files can be uploaded via संचिका ट्रांसफ़र प्रोटोकॉल ( एफटीपी ) or a Web interface.
the files are प्रायः delivered to the वेब `` as is '' or with minimal processing.
अनेक Internet सेवा providers ( isps ) offer इस सेवा free to सदस्य.
Individuals और organizations may also obtain Web page hosting from alternative सेवा providers.
Personal web site hosting is typically फ़्री, advertisement-sponsored, or inexpensive.
Business web site hosting often रै a higher व्यय depending upon the आकार and प्रकार of the website.
Single पेज hosting is generally sufficient लिये personal वेब pages.
A जटिल site काल्स लिये a more comprehensive package that provides डेटाबेस support और application विकास platforms ( e.g. PHP, जावा, Ruby on Rails, ColdFusion, or ASP.NET ).
ये facilities allow ग्राहक to write or स्थापना scripts for applications जैसे forums और content management.
भी, सुरक्षित sockets Layer ( SSL ) is typically used लिये e-commerce.
The host may भी provide an इंटरफ़ेस or control फलक for managing the Web server and installing स्क्रिप्ट, as well as other मौड्यूल और service अनुप्रयोग जैसे e-mail.
कुछ होस्ट specialize in certain software or services ( e.g. e-commerce ), जिससे हैं commonly used by larger companies कि outsource network अवसंरचना.
मैडेन NFL ( known as John मैडेन फ़ुटबॉल before 1993 ) is an अमरीकी फ़ुटबॉल video game श्रेणी developed by इलेक्ट्रॉनिक Arts Tiburon for EA Sports.
The game श्रेणी is named after Pro Football Hall of Famer जॉन Madden, a well-known former सुपर कटोरी –winning coach of the ओकलैंड Raiders and रंग commentator.
the series is the best selling EA Sports श्रेणी.
The games have consistently been a best seller, और रै even spawned TV shows जहाँ players compete.
Among the खेल 's realistic features include sophisticated playbooks और खिलाड़ी statistics, और आवाज़ commentary कि allows players to hear the game as if it were a real tv broadcast.
the Madden NFL श्रेणी has been nicknamed the एनएफएल 's 33rd Franchise.
The series थी originally conceived by Electronic Arts संस्थापक Trip Hawkins, जो तब approached मैडेन in 1984 लिये उसके समर्थन और expertise.
Due to मैडेन 's insistence that the खेल be as realistic as संभावित, the first version of John Madden फ़ुटबॉल थी not released until 1988.
The second version of the game was released in 1990, with सालाना संस्करण since then.
The श्रेणी ' name was changed to Madden NFL in 1993 after EA acquired the rights to use एनएफएल टीमों और players.
despite Madden 's retirement as a प्रसारणकर्ता in 2009, he continues to lend his name and provide expertise for the game.
Cindy Lee मिलर Sheehan ( born July 10, 1957 ) is an अमरीकी antiwar activist whose son, U.S. Army Specialist Casey Sheehan, was मारे by enemy कार्रवाई during the इराकी युद्ध.
वो attracted नेशनल और international मीडिया ध्यान in अगस्त 2005 for उसके extended antiwar protest at a makeshift camp outside President George W. बुश 's टेक्सास ranch —a स्टैंड कि drew दोनो passionate support and एंग्री आलोचना.
sheehan ran unsuccessfully for Congress in 2008.
She is a गायन critic of President Barack ओबामा 's foreign नीति.
उसके memoir, सलाम माँ : A माँ 's Journey Through heartache to Activism, was published in 2006.
sheehan was the 2012 vice-presidential nominee of the सलाम and स्वतंत्रता पार्टी.
Wyclef Jeanelle जां ( ; ; born October 17, 1969 ) wyclef Dumped From Haiti 's Presidential बैलट – TIME, अगस्त 21, 2010.
`` Before he घोषित on August 5 कि he थी running for President of Haiti, wyclef Jean थी स्टिल listing उसके आयु as only 37 सालो बूढ़ा.
लकिन बाद declaring himself a presidential प्रत्याशी, the haitian-american-irish hip-hop star भी decided to come साफ और confirm कि he was really 40. '' is a three-time ग्रैमी पुरस्कार -winning Haitian-American rapper, singer-songwriter, संगीतकार, रिकार्ड producer, and राजनेता.
At age नौ, Jean moved to the United States साथ उसके परिवार and has spent much of his life in the देश.
He पहला received कीर्ति as a सदस्य of the acclaimed New Jersey हिप hop group the Fugees.
On August 5, 2010, जां दायर लिये candidacy in the 2010 Haitian अध्यक्षीय election, although the चुनावी आयोग subsequently शासित him अयोग्य to stand as he था not met the आवश्यकता to have been resident in Haiti लिये five सालो.
wyclef जां to appeal against Haiti election ruling – BBC News, Aug 22, 2010.
हैती 's चुनावी commission said कि mr जां was ineligible to स्टैंड as the haitian constitution requires candidates to have जिया in the country for पाँच years prior to an election.
The 40-year-old singer lives in the US.
Jean 's प्रयत्न at earthquake relief, highly publicized in 2010 throughout Haiti and the संयुक्त States, were channeled through उसके charitable organization, yéle Haiti.
The दान, which performed a किस्में of charitable works in Haiti between 2005 and 2010, effectively closed in 2012.
In विधि, a set-off is a statutory रक्षा to the पूरे or to a portion of a अभियोक्ता 's claim.
It had no अस्तित्व under the English common विधि, being निर्मित by 2 जियो. II c. 22 for the राहत of insolvent debtors, although set-off was recognized in इक्विटी.
Such a रक्षा could be pleaded only in respect of mutual debts of a definite अक्षर, and did not लागू to मामले in जिससे damages were claimed, nor to निष्पक्ष दावा or मांगे.
By the rules of the Supreme अदालत ( O. XIX. r. 3 ) a प्रतिवादी in an कार्रवाई may set off or set up कोई सही or अर्जी by रास्ता of counterclaim विरूद्ध the दावा of a plaintiff, and such set-off or counterclaim has the वही effect as a बयान of अर्जी in a cross-action.
the विधिक रक्षा of set-off ( above ) was originally introduced to prevent the unfair हालात whereby a व्यक्ति ( `` पार्टी a '' ) जो owed money to another ( `` पार्टी B '' ) could be sent to debtors थाना, despite the fact that Party b also owed धन to Party a.
the विधि thus allows दोनो parties to टालना भुगतान until उनके respective claims have महरूम heard in अदालत.
Upon judgment, both claims are बुझे and replaced by a सिंगल net sum owing ( e.g. if पार्टी A owes Party b 100 और पार्टी b owes Party A 105, the दो रकम are set बंद and replaced with a single दायित्व of 5 इससे पार्टी B to Party a ).
Set-off can also be incorporated by contractual अनुबंध so that, where a party defaults, the mutual amounts owing हैं automatically set बंद and extinguished.
in निश्चित jurisdictions ( including the UK ), set-off takes place automatically upon the insolvency of a company.
This means that, for each पार्टी which is दोनो a creditor and debtor of the insolvent कम्पनी, mutual debts हैं set-off against प्रत्येक अन्य, and then either the bankrupt 's creditor can claim the balance in the bankruptcy or the trustee in bankruptcy can ask लिये the balance बाकी to be सशुल्क, depending on जिससे side owed the most.
This रै महरूम criticized as an undeclared security interest that violates the principle of pari passu.
the वैकल्पिक, जहाँ a creditor रै to अदा सब इसके debts, लकिन receive only a सीमित portion of the leftover moneys that अन्य unsecured लेनदारों get, poses the खतरे of 'knock-on ' insolvencies.
the सही to set बंद is विशेषकर important when reporting a bank 's विकिरणों to regulatory authorities.
The हालात जहाँ a bank has to रपट that it has lent a large योग to a borrower ( और is therefore exposed, because there is a risk कि the borrower might default thereby leading to the घाटा of the bank 's or its depositors ' money ) is यूँ replaced ( जहाँ the bank has taken सुरक्षा over साझा or securities of the borrower ) with an exposure of the धन lent ऋण the value of the security taken.
Jennifer Joanna एनिस्टन ( born February 11, 1969 ) is an अमरीकी अभिनेत्री, film निदेशक, and producer.
Aniston gained worldwide recognition in the 1990s लिये portraying रेचल Green on the television sitcom Friends, a role which earned her an Emmy पुरस्कार, a सुनहरी ग्लोब पुरस्कार, and a Screen अभिनेताओं Guild Award.
एनिस्टन has also enjoyed a कामयाब हॉलीवुड फिल्मी career.
She gained critical acclaim लिये her प्रदर्शन in the स्वतंत्र films She 's the एक ( 1996 ), Office Space ( 1999 ), The Good लड़की ( 2002 ) and मित्रों with Money ( 2006 ).
She रै था her greatest commercial successes साथ the films Bruce Almighty ( 2003 ), The Break-Up ( 2006 ), Marley & me ( 2008 ), Just go with It ( 2011 ) and Horrible Bosses ( 2011 ).
एनिस्टन received a star on the Hollywood Walk of Fame on February 22, 2012.

A श्वेत बाघ at Tobu चिड़ियाघर, in saitama, जापानी.
The white बाघ is a recessive mutant of the बंगाल tiger, जिससे was reported in the wild इससे time to समय in Assam, Bengal, Bihar और especially from the पूर्व राज्य of रीवा.
Conventional पीसीआई ( पीसीआई is an initialism formed from Peripheral Component Interconnect, part of the PCI लोकल बस मानक and often shortened to बस PCI ) is a local कंप्यूटर बस for attaching hardware devices in a कंप्यूटर.
The पीसीआई bus supports the functions found on a प्रोसेसर bus, but in a standardized format कि is स्वतंत्र of any particular प्रोसेसर.
Devices connected to the bus appear to the processor to be कनेक्ट सीधे to the प्रोसेसर bus, and are assigned पता in the processor 's पता space.
Attached डिवाइस can take either the form of an integrated circuit fitted onto the मदरबोर्ड itself, पुकारा a planar device in the PCI specification, or an expansion card कि fits into a slot.
The PCI Local Bus थी पहला implemented in ibm PC compatibles, where it displaced the combination of ISA plus one vesa Local Bus as the बस विन्यास.
It रै subsequently been अपनाया लिये अन्य computer types.
पीसीआई and pci-x हैं होने replaced by पीसीआई Express, but, most motherboards are स्टिल made साथ one or more PCI स्लॉट, which are sufficient for अनेक उपयोग.
The पीसीआई specification covers the physical size of the bus ( including the size और अंतरण of the circuit board किनारे विद्युत contacts ), विद्युत characteristics, bus timing, and प्रोटोकॉल.
The specification can be खरीदा from the पीसीआई खास ब्याज Group ( PCI-SIG ).
Typical पीसीआई cards प्रयुक्त in PCs include : संजाल cards, ध्वनि cards, modems, extra पोर्ट such as USB or serial, tv tuner cards and डिस्क controllers.
पीसीआई video cards replaced ISA and vesa ताश, until growing बैंडविड्थ requirements outgrew the capabilities of PCI ; the पसन्दीदा interface लिये वीडियो cards became AGP, और then पीसीआई Express.
पीसीआई video cards remain उपलब्धियाँ for उपयोग with बूढ़ा pcs बगैर AGP or PCI Express slots.
अनेक devices previously provided on PCI expansion cards are now commonly एकीकृत onto motherboards or उपलब्धियाँ in सार्वभौमिक serial बस और PCI Express संस्करण.
कैफीन is a कड़वा, श्वेत crystalline xanthine alkaloid that acts as a stimulant ड्रग.
कैफीन is found in varying quantities in the बीज, leaves, और fruit of some plants, where it acts as a प्राकृतिक pesticide that paralyzes and kills certain insects feeding on the plants, as well as बढ़ाना the reward memory of pollinators.
It is most commonly consumed by इंसानो in infusions निकाली from the बीज of the coffee संयंत्र and the leaves of the tea बुश, as well as from विभिन्न foods और drinks containing products derived इससे the kola nut.
Other sources शामिल yerba maté, guarana जामुन, guayusa, और the yaupon होली.
In humans, कैफीन अधिनियमों as a central nervous प्रणाली stimulant, temporarily warding बंद drowsiness and restoring alertness.
It is the संसार 's सबसे widely consumed psychoactive ड्रग, but नापसंद many अन्य psychoactive substances, it is legal और unregulated in nearly all parts of the संसार.
पेय containing caffeine, such as कॉफी, tea, नरम drinks, और energy drinks, enjoy great लोकप्रियता.
in North America, 90 % of adults consume कैफीन daily.
भाग of the reason कैफीन is वर्गीकृत by the Food and ड्रग Administration as ग्रा ( generally पहचाना as safe ) is that toxic doses ( over 10 grams ) हैं much उच्चतर than typically used doses ( कम than 500 milligrams ).
Ordinary खपत can have कम health risks, भी जब carried on for years – वहीँ may be a modest protective effect विरूद्ध some रोगों, सहित Parkinsons बीमारी, और certain types of cancer.
Caffeine can have दोनो positive और ऋणात्मक effects on चिंता disorders.
कुछ people experience नींद disruption if वे consume कैफीन, विशेषकर दौरान the संध्या hours, but others दिखाएँ little disturbance और the effect of caffeine on नींद is highly परिवर्तनीय.
प्रमाण of a risk to pregnancy is equivocal, लकिन some अधिकारियों have concluded that prudent advice is लिये गर्भवती women to limit consumption to the समतुल्य of two cups of coffee प्रति day or कम.
The अमरीकी Congress of obstetricians और स्त्रीरोग ( acog ) concluded in 2010 that कैफीन consumption is safe up to 200 mg per day in pregnant women.
Caffeine रै pressor and mild diuretic प्रभाव जब administered to लोगों जो are not प्रयुक्त to it, but regular उपयोक्ता develop a tolerance to this प्रभाव, और studies have generally विफल to support the common notion that ordinary खपत contributes significantly to dehydration.
With भारी उपयोग, सहिष्णुता develops rapidly to autonomic प्रभाव such as elevated heart rate और मांसपेशी twitching, लकिन not to the cognitive or arousal effects of कैफीन.
the degree to which caffeine can उपज clinically significant शारीरिक and दिमागी dependence remains a subject of विवाद in the medical literature.

it is commonly प्रयुक्त लिये cruising, downhill रेसिंग, slalom रेसिंग, sliding, and/or transport.

The coast Ranges of कैलिफ़ोर्निया span इससे Humboldt County, कैलिफ़ोर्निया दक्षिण to सांता बारबरा County.
The other तीन coastal कैलिफ़ोर्निया mountain सीमाएँ are the Transverse सीमाएँ, Peninsular Ranges और the Klamath kyu.
physiographically, वे हैं a section of the larger Pacific Border province, जिससे in फेरे are part of the larger प्रशांत पहाड़ System physiographic प्रभाग.

an ऑटोमोबाइल, autocar, motor car or car is a wheeled मोटर गाडी used लिये transporting यात्री, which also carries इसके अपना engine or motor.
Most परिभाषाएं of the term बताएँ कि automobiles are designed to run primarily on roads, to have seating लिये एक to eight लोगों, to typically have four wheels, और to be constructed प्रधानतया लिये the transport of people rather than goods.
the पद motorcar has also been प्रयुक्त in the कॉन्टेक्स्ट of electrified रेल systems to denote a car which functions as a छोटी locomotive लकिन भी provides space for यात्री और baggage.
These locomotive गाड़ियाँ were प्रायः used on suburban रूट by दोनो interurban और intercity रेलरोड प्रणालियों.
it थी अनुमानित in 2010 कि the number of ऑटोमोबाइल had risen to over 1 अरब vehicles, up इससे the 500 लाख of 1986.
The संख्याएँ हैं increasing rapidly, especially in चीन and इण्डिया.
जॉन Fitzgerald `` जोकर '' Kennedy ( May 29, 1917 – नवम्बर 22, 1963 ), often referred to by उसके initials JFK, was the 35th President of the United राज्य, serving इससे 1961 until उसके मौत in 1963.
After सैन्य सेवा as commander of the मोटर torpedo नौकाएँ PT-109 and PT-59 दौरान World War II in the दक्षिण Pacific, कैनेडी represented मैसाचुसेट्स ' 11th congressional ज़िला in the U.S. हाउस of Representatives from 1947 to 1953 as a डेमोक्रेट.
Thereafter, he served in the U.S. सीनेट from 1953 until 1960.
Kennedy defeated Vice President और रिपब्लिकन प्रत्याशी Richard निक्सन in the 1960 U.S. अध्यक्षीय चुनाव.
At 43 सालो of age, he is the youngest to have महरूम elected to the office, the second-youngest President ( बाद थियोडोर Roosevelt ), and the first व्यक्ति born in the 20th सदी to serve as अध्यक्ष.
a कैथोलिक, कैनेडी is the only non- प्रोटोस्टेंट president, and is the तभी अध्यक्ष to have जीती a Pulitzer पुरस्कार.
Events during his presidency शामिल the Bay of Pigs Invasion, the क्यूबन Missile संकट, the building of the Berlin वॉल, the Space रेस, the African-American Civil अधिकारों गति, और early stages of the वियतनाम War.
Therein, कैनेडी increased the क्रमांक of सैन्य advisers, special operation forces, and helicopters in an effort to curb the spread of communism in South East एशिया.
The Kennedy प्रशासन adopted the policy of the Strategic हैमलेट Program जिससे was implemented by the South Vietnamese सरकारी.
It शामिल certain मजबूर relocation, गाँव internment, और पृथक्करण of rural दक्षिण वियतनामी from the northern and दक्षिणी कम्युनिस्ट insurgents.
Kennedy was assassinated on November 22, 1963 in Dallas, टेक्सास.
ली Harvey ओसवाल्ड थी चार्ज with the अपराधों, but he थी शॉट और killed by जोकर Ruby two days later, before a विचारण could take place.
The एफबीआई and the Warren आयोग officially concluded कि Oswald थी the लोन हत्यारे.
However, the United राज्य हाउस Select कमेटी on Assassinations ( HSCA ) concluded that those investigations were flawed and that कैनेडी was संभवतः assassinated as the result of a conspiracy.
however, ABC न्यूज in their छानबीन, the Kennedy Assassination : Beyond Conspiracy, confirmed the findings of the वारेन Commission ; having concluded Oswald acted alone.
Kennedy 's controversial विभाग of रक्षा TFX fighter bomber कार्यक्रम led to a congressional investigation कि lasted from 1963 to 1970.
Since the 1960s information concerning कैनेडी 's निजी जीवन has आइये to लाइट.
Details of कैनेडी 's स्वास्थ्य समस्याएं in जिससे he struggled have become better known, especially since the 1990s.
Although initially रखा रहस्य इससे the सामान्य पब्लिक, reports of कैनेडी 's philandering have garnered much दबायें.
Kennedy ranks highly in public राय दरजा of u.S. presidents.

a Fire सचेतक कंट्रोल फलक ( FACP ), or Fire सचेतक कंट्रोल ईकाई ( FACU ), is the controlling component of a आग Alarm System.
the फलक receives सूचना इससे पर्यावरणीय सेंसर designed to detect changes associated साथ fire, monitors their operational अखंडता and provides for automatic कंट्रोल of equipment, and हस्तांतरण of information जरुरी to prepare the facility लिये आग आधारित on a predetermined sequence.
the फलक may भी सप्लाई विद्युत energy to operate any associated sensor, कंट्रोल, transmitter, or रिले.
There are four मौलिक types of panels : coded panels, conventional panels, addressable panels, और multiplex प्रणालियों.
