Bandaranaike International Airport ( BIA ) ( also known as katunayake अंतरराष्ट्रीय Airport और कोलोन International Airport ) is एक of the दो अंतरराष्ट्रीय airports सेवारत the city of Colombo, the अन्य is Ratmalana अंतरराष्ट्रीय विमानक्षेत्र.
Mattala राजपक्षे International विमानक्षेत्र located in southern city of Hambantota is the other international airport in Sri Lanka.
भण्डारनायके International विमानक्षेत्र is स्तिथ in katunayake, 22 मील ( 35 km ) north of कोलोन.
it is administered by Airport and विमानन Services ( श्री लंका ) ltd.
It is the hub of श्रीलंकन Airlines, the national carrier of Sri Lanka, and Mihin लंका, the budget airline of Sri Lanka.
ब्लैक Swan is a 2010 अमरीकी मनोवैज्ञानिक थ्रिलर and horror film directed by Darren Aronofsky and starring Natalie Portman, Vincent Cassel, और mila Kunis.
The प्लाट revolves around a production of Tchaikovsky 's swan Lake बैले by a prestigious New यॉर्क नगर company.
The production requires a नर्तकी to play the innocent और नाजुक श्वेत Swan, लिये जिससे the वचनबद्ध dancer नीना ( Portman ) is a पूर्ण fit, as well as the अंधेरा और कामुक ब्लैक Swan, which are qualities embodied by the नई आगमन लिली ( Kunis ).
नीना is overwhelmed by a feeling of immense दबाव when she पाता herself competing for the part, causing उसके to खोना her tenuous पकड़ on वास्तविकता और descend into a living nightmare.
aronofsky conceived the आधार by connecting उसके viewings of a उत्पादन of Swan Lake with an unrealized पटकथा परिचय understudies और the notion of होने haunted by a दोगुना, similar to the folklore surrounding doppelgängers.
Aronofsky cites Fyodor दोस्तोयेव्स्की 's `` the Double `` as another inspiration for the film.
The director also considered Black Swan a companion टुकड़ा to उसके 2008 film the पहलवान, with both films involving demanding प्रदर्शन for different kinds of art.
he और Portman पहला discussed the प्रोजेक्ट in 2000, और after a ब्रैड attachment to Universal Studios, ब्लैक swan was उत्पादित in New यॉर्क City in 2009 by Fox Searchlight Pictures.
Portman और kunis trained in ballet लिये several महीने prior to फिल्मांकन, and notable figures from the ballet संसार helped साथ film production to shape the ballet presentation.
the film premiered as the opening film for the 67th Venice अंतरराष्ट्रीय Film Festival on सितंबर 1, 2010.
It था a सीमित release in the United States starting December 3, 2010 and opened nationwide on December 17.
Black Swan received critical praise upon its release, particularly for पोर्टमैन 's प्रदर्शन and aronofsky 's दिशा, और was a significant box office success, grossing $ 329 million worldwide.
the फिल्मी प्राप्त पाँच अकादमी पुरस्कार nominations and Portman won the Best Actress award लिये the फिल्मी, as well as many other Best Actress awards in अनेक guilds and त्यौहार, जबकि Aronofsky was nominated लिये बेहतरीन निदेशक.
In जोड, the film itself प्राप्त a nomination for बेहतरीन Picture.
The world’s first ice-calorimeter, प्रयुक्त in the winter of 1782-83, by Antoine Lavoisier और pierre-simon लाप्लास, to determine the heat involved in विभिन्न रासायनिक परिवर्तन ; calculations which were आधारित on Joseph Black ’s prior discovery of latent ऊष्मा.
These experiments चिह्नित the foundation of thermochemistry.
A calorimeter ( from Latin calor, meaning ऊष्मा ) is an ऑब्जेक्ट used for कैलोरीमिति, or the process of measuring the heat of रासायनिक reactions or physical changes as खूब as ऊष्मा capacity.
Differential scanning calorimeters, isothermal microcalorimeters, titration calorimeters and accelerated rate calorimeters are among the most common प्रकार.
a simple calorimeter just consists of a thermometer attached to a metal संग्राहक पूरा of water suspended ऊपर a दहन कक्ष.
To ढूँढें the enthalpy बदलें per mole of a substance A in a प्रतिक्रिया between two substances a और B, the substances are added to a ऊष्मामापी and the initial और फाइनल temperatures ( before the reaction प्रारंभ and बाद it has समाप्त ) are noted.
Multiplying the तापमान बदलें by the द्रव्यमान and विशिष्ट ऊष्मा capacities of the substances gives a मान for the उर्जा given बंद or अवशोषित during the reaction.
Dividing the उर्जा change by how many moles of A were उपस्थित देता its enthalpy change of प्रतिक्रिया.
इस method is used primarily in academic teaching as it describes the सिद्धान्त of calorimetry.
It does not account लिये the heat loss through the संग्राहक or the heat capacity of the thermometer and संग्राहक itself.
In जोड, the object लगाई inside the ऊष्मामापी shows कि the वस्तुएँ transferred their heat to the calorimeter and into the liquid, and the ऊष्मा absorbed by the calorimeter और the liquid is बराबर to the heat given off by the metals.
A pair of ग्रीन flip-flops
Flip-flops ( also called zōri, thongs, jandals, or a variety of अन्य names throughout the world ) हैं a प्रकार of open-toed चन्दन typically worn in कैज़ुअल situations, such as outside or at the बीच.
They consist of a flat sole आयोजित loosely on the पैर by a Y-shaped strap कि passes between the first and दूसरी toes and around either पक्ष of the foot.
They may also be held to the पैर with a single डोरी over the front of the पैर बल्कि than a थोंग.
The name `` flip-flop '' originated क्युकी of the sound that is बना by slapping between the sole of the पैर और the मंजिल when walking.
इस style of जूते has been worn by the people of अनेक संस्कृतियों throughout the संसार, originating as जल्दी as the ancient Egyptians in 4,000 b.c.
The आधुनिक flip-flop descends इससे the Japanese zōri, which became popular after World War ii when सैनिको returning to the United States brought उन्हें back.
वे became popular in casual settings दौरान the 1960s, 1990s, और 2000s, और कुछ varieties have even found their रास्ता into अधिक formal attire, despite criticism.
The उपयोग of flip-flops can result in many pains and चोटों, including टखने sprains and टूटा हड्डियों.
Some individuals who walk लिये long अवधि रपट पीड़ा in the फीट, ankles, and lower टाँगे.
The कमी of support provided by flip-flops often परिणाम in over-pronation injuries, caused by the पैर slipping inwards further than सामान्य.
This can lead to चपटा feet और tendonitis.
Other injuries that may परिणाम हैं due to the जूते 's open-toed nature, ऐसे as stubbed toes, cuts, and bruises.
Doctors recommend purchasing pricier sandals with thick-cushioned soles, as खूब as those that have a strap कि is not canvas और that आता वापस almost to the ankle.
The owners of Hanjin Osaka, seen यहाँ transiting the Panama Canal in 2008, घोषित general average following an explosion in the ship 's इंजन रूम on.
The law of general औसत is a विधिक principle of maritime विधि according to which all पार्टियों in a समुद्र venture proportionally share any नुकसान resulting इससे a voluntary sacrifice of भाग of the जलयान or cargo to save the पूरे in an emergency.
In the exigencies of hazards faced at sea, क्रू members often have अनमोल little समय in जिससे to determine precisely whose कार्गो they हैं jettisoning.
Thus, to avoid quarrelling that could waste मूल्यवान time, there arose the equitable अभ्यास whereby all the merchants whose cargo उतरा safely would be called on to contribute a portion, based upon a share or percentage, to the व्यापारी or व्यापारियों जिनकी goods had been tossed overboard to avert निकट peril.
While general औसत traces इसके origins in ancient मेरीटाइम law, स्टिल it remains भाग of the admiralty विधि of most countries.
the पहला संहिताकरण of general average was the यॉर्क antwerp नियम of 1890.
American कंपनियाँ स्वीकृत it in 1949.
General average requires तीन elements which are clearly stated by mr. Justice Grier in बर्नार्ड v. Adams:
`` 1st.
A common खतरे : a danger in which पोत, cargo and crew all participate ; a danger imminent और जाहिर 'inevitable, ' except by voluntarily incurring the loss of a portion of the whole to सहेजें the remainder. ''
`` 2nd. There must be a voluntary jettison, jactus, or ढलाई दूर, of some portion of the joint concern for the purpose of avoiding इस imminent peril, periculi imminentis evitandi causa, or, in other words, a transfer of the peril from the whole to a particular portion of the whole. ''
`` 3rd.
This attempt to avoid the imminent common peril must be successful ''.
उदाहरण पॉलिश call लिये टीकाकरण विरूद्ध डिप्थीरिया and टेटनस.
A vaccination अनुसूची is a श्रेणी of vaccinations, सहित the समय of all doses, जिससे may be either recommended or compulsory, depending on the देश of residence.
A vaccine is an antigenic preparation used to produce active प्रतिरक्षण to a बीमारी, in order to prevent or reduce the प्रभाव of infection by any natural or `` wild '' pathogen.
Many vaccines require अनेक doses लिये अधिकतम effectiveness, either to उपज sufficient initial प्रतिरक्षा जवाब or to boost response that fades over समय.
For example, tetanus vaccine boosters are often अनुशंसित every 10 सालो.
Vaccine schedules are developed by governmental एजेंसियों or physicians groups to achieve maximum प्रभावकारिता using required और recommended टीके for a locality while minimizing the क्रमांक of health care प्रणाली interactions.
Over the past दो दशकों, the recommended टीकाकरण schedule has grown rapidly and become more complicated as अनेक new vaccines have been developed.
कुछ टीके are अनुशंसित only in certain areas ( countries, subnational areas, or at-risk populations ) where a बीमारी is आम.
लिये उदाहरण, yellow ज्वर vaccination is on the routine टीका schedule of फ्रेंच Guiana, is recommended in certain regions of Brazil लकिन in the संयुक्त States is तभी given to travelers heading to countries with a इतिहास of the बीमारी.
In विकासशील countries, टीका सुझाव भी लो into account the स्तर of स्वास्थ्य care अभिगम, the cost of vaccines और मुद्दे with vaccine availability and भंडार.
Sample vaccinations schedules discussed by the संसार स्वास्थ्य संगठन show a विकसित देश using a अनुसूची which extends over the पहला five years of a चाइल्ड 's जीवन and uses vaccines जिससे cost over $ 700 including administration costs जबकि a developing country उपयोग a schedule providing टीके in the पहला 9 महीने of life and costing only $ 25.
This difference is due to the lower cost of स्वास्थ्य care, the lower cost of अनेक टीके provided to developing nations, और that more expensive vaccines, often for कम common रोगों, are नहीं utilized.
In 1900, the smallpox vaccine थी the only एक administered to children.
By the early 1950s, children routinely प्राप्त चार vaccines, for protection विरूद्ध ( डिप्थीरिया, pertussis, टेटनस, polio, and smallpox ), और as अनेक as पाँच गोलियाँ by two years of आयु.
चूंकि the mid-1980s, many vaccines have been added to the अनुसूची.
, the us centers for बीमारी Control and रोकथाम ( CDC ) now recommends vaccination against at least fourteen रोगों.
By two years of age, u.S. children receive as अनेक as 24 टीका injections, and might receive up to five shots दौरान one visit to the doctor.
The उपयोग of combination vaccine products अर्थात् कि,, the संयुक्त Kingdom 's immunization कार्यक्रम consists of 10 injections by the age of दो, rather than 25 if टीकाकरण for प्रत्येक disease was given as a separate injection.

a म्यूज़िक Truck entertains the crowd on the गलियों.

The Trinidad और Tobago Carnival is an annual event held on the Monday and Tuesday पहले Ash Wednesday, और is well known लिये participant 's colorful वेशभूषा and समृद्ध celebrations.
Carnival in त्रिनिदाद and टोबैगो is the सबसे significant event on the आइलैंड्स ' cultural and tourism calendar, साथ numerous cultural कार्यक्रम कार्यशील in the lead up to the street परेड on कार्निवल Monday और मंगलवार.
It is कहा कि if the islanders are नहीं celebrating it, तब वे are preparing लिये it, while reminiscing about the पास्ट year 's festival.
The दिल of the musical celebration रै महरूम calypso ; recently soca has replaced calypso as the most celebrated type of म्यूज़िक.
वेशभूषा, stickfighting and limbo competitions are भी important components of the पर्व.
कार्निवल as it is celebrated in त्रिनिदाद and टोबैगो is also मनाये in शहरों worldwide.
These including Toronto 's Caribana, मियामी 's Miami कार्निवल, ह्यूस्टन Carifest, लंदन 's नॉटिंग हिल Carnival as खूब as नई यॉर्क नगर 's Labor Day कार्निवल to नाम a few.
कार्निवल was created जब West African स्लेव mimicked their फ्रेंच owners जो where known लिये their lavish वेशभूषा balls.
Forbidden to partake in ये festivities और confined to उनके quarters, slaves combined तत्व इससे their अपना cultures to their master 's fete.
hence the creation of वर्ण ऐसे as jab jab or Jab Molassie ( Devils ), Midnight Robbers, Imps, lagahroo, soucouyant, la diablesse and Demons.
साथ the abolition of slavery in 1838, freed Africans took उनके version of Carnival to the गलियों through expression of drums, riddim भाग like tamboo बाँसुरी और as each नई immigrant population डाला त्रिनिदाद, कार्निवल विकसित into कया we जान today.
the नगर of शिकागो, Illinois held a nonpartisan mayoral चुनाव on Tuesday, February 22, 2011.
लाज़िम Mayor Richard M. Daley, a सदस्य of the लोकतांत्रिक पार्टी who had been in office चूंकि 1989, did not तलाश a सातवाँ पद as mayor.
Candidates needed to collect 12,500 petition signatures by November 22, 2010 to qualify लिये a place on the ballot.
April 5, 2011 थी scheduled to be a runoff election date if no candidate प्राप्त an absolute बहुमत.
Rahm Emanuel जीती the race for महापौर साथ अधिक than 55 % of the vote.
He थी उदघाटन on may 16, 2011.
`` Pumped Up Kicks '' is a सोंग by American इंडी पॉप band फोस्टर the People.
It थी released as the समूह 's डेब्यू single in September 2010, और the following साल was included on उनके EP Foster the People और their debut एल्बम Torches.
`` Pumped Up kicks '' became the group 's भेदन hit and was one of the most लोकप्रिय songs of 2011.
the सोंग was written and recorded by frontman चिह्नित फोस्टर जबकि he was working as a commercial jingle writer.
चिहृ with the upbeat musical संयोजन, the lyrics describe the homicidal विचार of a troubled youth.
The track प्राप्त considerable ध्यान after it was posted online in 2010 as a फ़्री डाउनलोड, and it helped the समूह garner a multi-album record deal with कोलंबिया Records imprint Startime International.
`` उत्तेजित Up Kicks '' proved to be a स्लीपर hit ; in 2011, बाद receiving significant airplay on modern rock stations, the song crossed-over onto contemporary hit radio stations.
the सोंग spent eight लगातार weeks at क्रमांक three on the Billboard hot 100 चार्ट in the United States, making it the पहला Billboard वैकल्पिक Songs number-one single to क्रैक the U.S. top 5 चूंकि किंग्स of लिओन 's `` Use Somebody `` in 2009.
the song was widely praised by critics, and it has महरूम licensed for use in a चौड़ी दायरा of popular मीडिया since इसके रिलीज.
`` उत्तेजित Up kicks '' प्राप्त a Grammy Award नामांकन for Best Pop Duo/Group प्रदर्शन.
The State Fair of West वर्जिनिया is an सालाना state मेला for वेस्ट Virginia.
It is held annually in mid-August on the State Fairgrounds in fairlea, near Lewisburg, वेस्ट Virginia in the southeastern part of the state.
The राज्य Fairgrounds consists of a विशाल open field for carnivals and exhibitions, a horse track, grandstands, and अनेक exhibition इमारतें.
Free पार्किंग is provided adjacent to the fairgrounds और, until 2006, free camping थी also available in a large फ़ील्ड साथ running-water toilets and बौछार, but no hookups.
Campers हैं अभी चार्ज a छोटी शुल्क.
The श्वेत House, the president 's आधिकारिक निवास और बीच of the administration
अंतर्गत the United राज्य संविधान, the President of the United राज्य is the सिर of state और head of government of the United राज्य.
as chief of the कार्यपालिका branch and head of the federal सरकारी as a पूरे, the प्रेसिडेंसी is the उच्चतम political office in the संयुक्त States by influence and recognition.
the अध्यक्ष is also the commander-in-chief of the संयुक्त States Armed Forces.
the president is indirectly निर्वाचित to a four-year पद by an चुनावी College ( or by the हाउस of Representatives should the चुनावी कॉलेज असफल to award an absolute बहुमत of votes to any व्यक्ति ).
Since the ratification of the twenty-second Amendment to the United राज्य संविधान in 1951, no व्यक्ति may be निर्वाचित अध्यक्ष more than twice, and no one जो रै served more than two years of a term to जिससे किसी else थी निर्वाचित may be elected more than एकबार.
upon the death, इस्तीफा, or हटाना from office of an लाज़िम President, the वाइस अध्यक्ष assumes the office.
The अध्यक्ष जरूर be at least 35 years of आयु and a `` natural born '' नागरिक of the United राज्य.
This list includes only those persons who were sworn into office as president following the ratification of the United States संविधान, जिससे took effect on March 4, 1789.
For अमरीकी leaders before this अनुसमर्थन, देखिए President of the Continental Congress.
The सूची करता not include any Acting Presidents under the Twenty-fifth Amendment to the United राज्य Constitution.
वहीँ have been 43 people sworn into office, और 44 presidencies, as Grover Cleveland परोसा two non-consecutive शर्तें और is counted chronologically as दोनो the 22nd और 24th president.
Of the individuals निर्वाचित as president, four died in office of natural causes ( विलियम हेनरी Harrison, Zachary टेलर, वारेन G. हार्डिंग, and फ्रैंकलिन D. रूज़वेल्ट ), four were assassinated ( Abraham Lincoln, James A. Garfield, विलियम McKinley, और John F. कैनेडी ) और एक resigned ( Richard Nixon ).
George वॉशिंगटन, the पहला अध्यक्ष, was inaugurated in 1789 after a सर्वसम्मत vote of the Electoral College.
William हेनरी Harrison spent the shortest time in office with 32 days in 1841, and फ्रैंकलिन D. रूज़वेल्ट spent the longest with over बारह सालो, लकिन died shortly into his चौथी term in 1945.
he is the only अध्यक्ष to serve अधिक than two terms, and a संवैधानिक amendment, affecting presidents बाद हैरी Truman, was passed to सीमा the क्रमांक of times an individual can be निर्वाचित अध्यक्ष.
Andrew Jackson, the seventh अध्यक्ष, was the पहला to be निर्वाचित by मेन of सब classes in 1828 after most laws barring non-land-owners from voting were repealed.
Warren Harding was the first elected बाद women gained voting rights in 1920.
History records four presidents – John q एडम्स, Rutherford B. हेज़, Benjamin Harrison and जार्ज W. Bush – जो lost the popular vote लकिन assumed दफ्तर.
जॉन F. कैनेडी has been the only president of Roman Catholic faith, and the वर्तमान अध्यक्ष, Barack Obama, is the पहला अध्यक्ष of अफ़्रीकी descent.
`` लोम्बार्डी Trophy '' redirects here.
For the award awarded annually to the बेहतरीन college फ़ुटबॉल lineman or linebacker, देखिए Lombardi पुरस्कार.
the विंस Lombardi Trophy is the trophy awarded प्रत्येक year to the winning टोली of the National Football League 's championship game, the सुपर Bowl.
The trophy is named in सम्मान of legendary NFL कोच Vince Lombardi.
This is a list of tables of the verified oldest people in the संसार in ordinal rank, ऐसे as oldest person or oldest man.
In these टेबल, a supercentenarian is considered 'verified ' if his or her अर्जी रै महरूम validated by an अंतरराष्ट्रीय देह कि specifically deals in longevity शोध, such as the Gerontology Research समूह ( GRG ) or Guinness World Records.
The longest unambiguously documented इंसान lifespan is कि of jeanne Calment of France ( 1875–1997 ), who died at आयु 122 years, 164 days.
She met Vincent वैन Gogh when वो थी 12 or 13.
इस led to न्यूज media ध्यान in 1985, after Calment turned 110.
subsequent छानबीन मिला documentation for Calment 's age, परे कोई reasonable question, in the records of her देशी city, Arles, France.
अधिक प्रमाण of Calment 's जीवनकाल has महरूम उत्पादित than for any other supercentenarian ; her मामला serves as an archetype in the methodology for verifying the ages of the संसार 's oldest people.
The longest undisputed lifespan लिये male supercentenarians is that of Jiroemon Kimura, जो currently lives in Japan and is आयु as of.
चूंकि the मौत of 115-year बूढ़ा Dina Manfredini of the संयुक्त States, on 17 December 2012, Kimura, born 19 April 1897, is the oldest living person in the world जिनकी आयु can be documented.
he रै भी महरूम the oldest जीना man since the death of 114-year old Walter breuning on 14 April 2011.
चूंकि the मौत of 115-year old Koto Okubo of Japan on 12 जनवरी 2013, the oldest living स्त्री has been -year-old misao Okawa, भी from Japan, born on 5 March 1898.
The लोगों 's अदालत is an अमरीकी arbitration-based reality court show, फिलहाल presided over by retired फ्लोरिडा State सर्किट अदालत न्यायधीश मर्लिन Milian, in which छोटी claims disputes are संभाला.
the People 's Court is the पहला court show to उपयोग बाइंडिंग मध्यस्थता, introducing the format into the विधा in 1981.
the system has been duplicated by most of the दिखाएँ 's successors in the न्यायिक विधा.
Moreover, the लोगों 's Court is the पहला popular, long-running वास्तविकता in the न्यायिक genre.
it थी preceded only by a few short-lived हकीकत in the genre ; these short-lived predecessors were only loosely सम्बन्धित to न्यायिक कार्यवाही, except लिये एक : Parole ( 1959 ) took footage from real-life courtrooms holding legal कार्यवाही.
prior to The People 's Court, the vast बहुमत of TV courtroom shows used actors, and बनाई or fictional cases ( as did radio पहले that ).
Among examples of these types of court shows include Famous Jury Trials and Your Witness.
the People 's अदालत has था दो contrasting lives.
The show 's पहला जीवन was presided over solely by former Los एंजिल्स County Superior Court Judge Joseph Wapner.
His कार्यकाल lasted इससे the show 's debut on September 14, 1981, जबतक May 21, 1993, when the दिखाएँ was रद्द due to कम ratings.
This बाएँ the दिखाएँ साथ a total of 2,484 1⁄2-hour episodes and 12 seasons.
the show थी taped in Los एंजिल्स during इसके first life.
बाद होने रद्द, reruns aired जबतक सितंबर 9, 1994.
On सितंबर 8, 1997, बाद being out of production for four सालो, The लोगों 's अदालत थी revived लिये a second life in first-run अनुप्रयोग as a 60-minute कार्यक्रम.
Former वकील और Mayor of नई यॉर्क ed koch was chosen as arbiter, जिससे he maintained लिये 2 सीज़न from the 1997–98 ऋतु through the 1998–99 ऋतु ( the उपस्थित जीवन 's 2nd season and overall दिखाएँ 's 14th ).
by the 1999–00 ऋतु, husband of Judith Sheindlin ( who presides over न्यायधीश Judy ) और पूर्व New York राज्य परम् अदालत न्यायधीश जेरी Sheindlin succeeded koch.
Sheindlin lasted one and a half सीज़न as he was replaced towards the समाप्त of the 2000–01 season ( present life 's 4th ऋतु and overall show 's 17th ).
Beginning in spring 2001, फ्लोरिडा judge Marilyn Milian took over The People 's Court और रै presided over the show कभी चूंकि.
Once milian completes the 2012–13 season, she will have served as longest arbiter over the श्रेणी साथ 12 और a हाफ seasons.
as of the उपस्थित, however, उसके सालो on the program टाई wapner at 12 seasons.
In the 2009-10 television season, The People 's Courts 2nd/present life outlasted its first जब it पहुँचे 13 seasons.
जबकि the दिखाएँ taped in New यॉर्क City for the first 15 seasons of its दूसरी जीवन, it अभी tapes in Stamford, Connecticut as of the 2012-13 season.
On September 3, 2012, The लोगों 's Court 's 2nd/present जीवन entered its 16th season ( 28th overall season ).
With 28 total seasons, The लोगों 's Court ranks as the 2nd longest-running courtroom program behind the ongoing Divorce Court at 33 seasons ( from its 3 combined lives ).
Utah ( or ) ( arapaho : Wo'tééneihí ' ) is a राज्य in the पश्चिमी संयुक्त States.
It became the 45th state admitted to the संघ on जनवरी 4, 1896.
यूटा is the 13th-largest, the 34th-most populous, और the 10th-least-densely आबादी of the 50 United राज्य.
लगभग 80 % of यूटा 's 2,817,222 लोगों live along the wasatch सामने, centering on Salt Lake City, leaving विशाल expanses of the state nearly uninhabited and बनाना the population the sixth सबसे urbanized in the U.S. Utah is bordered by Colorado on the east, व्योमिंग on the पूर्वोत्तर, idaho on the north, एरिज़ोना on the south, and Nevada on the west.
it also छू a कोने of नई मैक्सिको on the southeast.
Utah is the सबसे religiously समरूप state in the Union.
लगभग 63 % of utahns are reported to be members of the गिरिजाघर of Jesus Christ of Latter-day Saints or lds ( Mormons ), जिससे greatly influences Utah संस्कृति and daily life.
The world मुख्यालय of The Church of Jesus Christ of Latter-day Saints ( LDS गिरिजाघर ) is located in यूटा 's state पूंजी.
the state is a center of परिवहन, education, information technology and शोध, government services, mining, and a major tourist destination लिये बाहरी मनोरंजन.
According to the U.S. Census Bureau 's population estimates, यूटा is the fifth fastest-growing state in the United राज्य as of 2012.
St. जार्ज, was the fastest–growing metropolitan area in the United States from 2000 to 2005.
a 2012 gallup नेशनल survey मिला Utah overall to be the `` best state to live in '' based on 13 forward-looking measurements including विभिन्न आर्थिक, जीवनशैली, and health-related outlook metrics.

it is in the Memphis महानगर Area.
The जनसांख्यिकी was 1,674 at the 2000 census.
the hard palate is a पतला horizontal bony plate of the skull, located in the छत of the मुँह.
it spans the arch formed by the upper दांत.
It is formed by the palatine प्रक्रम of the maxilla and horizontal थाली of palatine अस्थि.
it फ़ॉर्म a विभाजन between the nasal passages और the mouth.
भी on the anterior portion of the roof of the मुश्किल palate is the Rugae which हैं the irregular ridges in the mucous झिल्ली कि help facilitate the movement of खाना backwards towards the pharynx.
This विभाजन is continued deeper into the मुँह by a मांसल एक्सटेंशन called the soft palate.
पूरा set of scrolls, constituting the संपूर्ण Tanakh.
the Tanakh (, or ; भी tenakh, tenak, Tanach ) is a name प्रयुक्त in Judaism लिये the canon of the Hebrew Bible.
The Tanakh is also ज्ञात as the Masoretic Text or the Miqra.
The name is an acronym formed from the आरंभिक Hebrew letters of the masoretic Text 's three परंपरागत subdivisions : the Torah ( `` शिक्षण '', भी known as the पाँच Books of Moses ), nevi'im ( `` Prophets '' ) and ketuvim ( `` Writings '' ) —hence TaNaKh.
the name `` miqra '' ( מקרא ), meaning `` that which is पढ़ा '', is an वैकल्पिक Hebrew पद for the Tanakh.
The books of the Tanakh were relayed with an accompanying मौखिक tradition passed on by प्रत्येक generation, called the मौखिक Torah.
Sobriety checkpoint in Germany
Driving under the influence ( DUI ), driving while intoxicated ( dwi ), drunken driving, drunk ड्राइविंग, पेय driving, ऑपरेटिंग under the influence, पीने और ड्राइविंग, or impaired driving is the crime of driving a motor vehicle with blood स्तर of alcohol in excess of a legal limit ( `` Blood Alcohol Content '', or `` BAC '' ).
Similar regulations cover driving or operating certain types of मशीनरी while affected by पीने दारू or taking अन्य दवाएँ, including, लकिन नहीं सीमित to prescription दवाएँ.
This is a दण्ड ठोकर in सबसे nations.
Convictions do not necessarily involve actual ड्राइविंग of the vehicle.
in सबसे jurisdictions a measurement ऐसे as a blood alcohol content ( bac ) in excess of a specific दहलीज स्तर, ऐसे as 0.05 % or 0.08 % defines the offense, साथ no need to prove impairment or होने under the influence of alcohol.
in some jurisdictions, there is an aggravated category of the offense at a higher level e.g. 0.12 %.
In सबसे देशों, anyone who is convicted of injuring or हत्या someone while अंतर्गत the influence of दारू or दवाएँ can be heavily fined, as in France, in addition to being given a lengthy prison वाक्य.
कुछ jobs have उनके अपना rules और BAC हद, लिये example commercial pilot, और the संघीय Railroad Administration in the United States has a 0.04 % सीमा for train crew.
Some jurisdictions have multiple स्तर of bac ; लिये example, the state of कैलिफ़ोर्निया has a 0.08 % BAC सीमा, जिससे is lowered to 0.04 % if the ऑपरेटर holds a वाणिज्यिक driver 's license.
The कैलिफ़ोर्निया BAC limit is 0.01 % for those younger than 21 सालो of age and those on probation for a previous dui conviction.
कुछ large corporations have their own rules ; Union प्रशांत रेलरोड has their अपना bac limit of 0.02 % that, if violated during a यादृच्छिक test or a for-cause परीक्षण — for example, after a traffic accident — can परिणाम in termination of नियुक्ति with no मौका of future re-hire.
Many states in the U.S. and provinces in Canada have adopted सच्चाई in sentencing laws कि enforce strict guidelines on sentencing, differing from previous अभ्यास where prison time was घटाया or निलंबित बाद sentencing had been issued.
कुछ jurisdictions have judicial दिशानिर्देश requiring a mandatory minimum sentence.
दंड for DUI आरोप दायरा from expensive fees to forfetiruree of your license plates and in कुछ serious circumstances, अपना गाडी.
a drunk driving simulator in Montréal, Canada
The specific दण्ड offense may be called, depending on the क्षेत्राधिकार, driving अंतर्गत the influence [ of alcohol or other दवाएँ ] ( dui ), driving under intense influence ( DUII ), driving while intoxicated ( DWI ), operating अंतर्गत the influence ( OUI ) operating while intoxicated ( OWI ), operating a मोटर गाडी जबकि intoxicated ( omvi ), driving under the संयुक्त influence of alcohol and/or other दवाएँ, driving under the influence प्रति se or नशे in charge [ of a vehicle ].
अनेक such कानून लागू भी to motorcycling, boating, piloting वायुयान, use of motile farm उपकरण ऐसे as tractors and combines, riding घोड़े or driving a horse-drawn vehicle, or bicycling, संभवतः साथ different bac level than driving.
In कुछ jurisdictions वहीँ are separate charges depending on the गाडी used, ऐसे as BWI ( bicycling जबकि intoxicated ), जिससे may carry a lighter वाक्य.
in the United राज्य, लोकल law enforcement agencies बना 1,467,300 arrests देशभर for driving अंतर्गत the influence of alcohol in 1996, compared to 1.9 million ऐसे रखवाले during the शिखर साल in 1983.
In 1997 an estimated 513,200 DWI अपराधियों यहूद in थाना or कारावास, down from 593,000 in 1990 and up इससे 270,100 in 1986.
Officers इससे US कस्टम and Border सुरक्षा boarding a ship
Law enforcement in the United States is एक of three major components of the criminal justice प्रणाली of the United States, along with courts and corrections.
हालांकि वहीँ exists an inherent interrelatedness between the अलग groups that make up the criminal justice प्रणाली based on their अपराधों deterrence purpose, प्रत्येक घटक operates independently इससे एक another.
However, the judiciary is vested with the शक्ति to make legal determinations regarding the conduct of the अन्य two components.
अलावा इससे maintaining अनुक्रम and service कृत्यों, the purpose of policing is the investigation of suspected criminal activity और the referral of the results of investigations and of suspected criminals to the न्यायालयों.
Law enforcement, to varying डिग्री at अलग स्तर of government and in अलग एजेंसियों, is भी commonly charged with the responsibilities of deterring दण्ड कार्यकलाप और of preventing the successful commission of अपराधों in progress ; the सेवा और enforcement of वारंट, writs and other orders of the courts.
Law enforcement agencies हैं also involved in providing पहला जवाब to emergencies and अन्य खतरे to पब्लिक सुरक्षा ; the protection of certain public facilities and infrastructure ; the मेंटेनेंस of पब्लिक order ; the protection of public officials ; और the आपरेशन of some correctional facilities ( usually at the लोकल स्तर ).
Elmer Figueroa Arce ( born June 28, 1968 ), बेहतरीन known under the stage नाम chayanne, is a प्यूर्टो rican Latin pop सिंगर and कर्ता.

`` World युद्ध Hulk '' is a comic किताब crossover storyline that ran through a self titled limited series and various other titles प्रकाशित by आश्चर्य कॉमिक्स in 2007, featuring the Hulk.
the श्रेणी consists of five main मुद्दे titled World War हल्क, with Greg पाक as writer and John romita, Jr. as penciller, and तीन other सीमित श्रेणी : संसार War Hulk : Front लकीर, संसार युद्ध Hulk : Gamma corps, and संसार War हल्क : x-men.

Marion Mitchell Morrison ( born Marion Robert Morrison ; may 26, 1907 – जून 11, 1979 ), better ज्ञात by his stage नाम John Wayne, was an American फिल्मी actor, director and producer.
An Academy Award -winner, Wayne was among the शीर्ष बक्सा office draws for three दशकों, and was named the all-time top money-making star.
An enduring American icon, he epitomized rugged मर्दानगी और is famous for his demeanor, सहित his distinctive calm आवाज़, walk, और height.
Wayne थी born in winterset, Iowa but his family relocated to the greater Los Angeles क्षेत्रफल जब he was four years old.
he मिला work at लोकल फिल्मी studios जब he lost his football scholarship to USC as a परिणाम of a bodysurfing accident.
Initially working for the फॉक्स Film निगम, he ज़्यादातर appeared in small bit parts.
उसके पहला leading भूमिका came in the widescreen एपिक The बिग Trail ( 1930 ), जिससे led to leading भूमिकाएँ in numerous films throughout the 1930s, अनेक of them in the western विधा.
His career rose to further heights in 1939, with John घाट 's Stagecoach making उसे an instant superstar.
Wayne होता go on to star in 142 तस्वीरें, primarily typecast in Western films.
Among उसके best ज्ञात later films are The शांत Man ( 1952 ), जिससे follows him as an Irish-American boxer और his प्रेम affair with a fiery spinster played by Maureen o'hara ; The Searchers ( 1956 ), in which he plays a सिविल War veteran जो seeks out उसके abducted niece ; रिओ Bravo ( 1959 ), playing a Sheriff with डीन Martin ; True Grit ( 1969 ), playing a humorous U.S. मार्शल जो सेट out to avenge a man 's मौत in the role कि जीती Wayne an अकादमी पुरस्कार ; and The shootist ( 1976 ), his फाइनल screen performance in जिससे he plays an aging gunslinger battling कर्कट.
वेन moved to Orange County, California in the 1960s, और was a prominent रिपब्लिकन in हॉलीवुड, supporting anti-communist positions.
He died of stomach cancer in 1979.
In June 1999, the American फिल्मी संस्थान named Wayne 13th among the Greatest पुरूष Screen Legends of सब Time.
गैलीलियो Galilei ( ; 15 February 1564 – 8 जनवरी 1642 ), was an Italian physicist, गणितज्ञ, astronomer, और philosopher who played a प्रमुख भूमिका in the Scientific Revolution.
His achievements शामिल सुधार to the telescope and consequent खगोलीय observations और support for Copernicanism.
Galileo has been पुकारा the `` father of modern observational खगोलशास्त्र ``, the `` father of modern physics ``, the `` father of science '', and `` the पिता of Modern Science ''.
उसके contributions to observational astronomy include the telescopic confirmation of the phases of शुक्र, the डिस्कवरी of the चार largest satellites of Jupiter ( नामित the Galilean moons in उसके इज्ज़त ), and the अवलोकन and analysis of sunspots.
Galileo भी worked in applied science and प्रौद्योगिकी, inventing an improved military कम्पास और अन्य instruments.
Galileo 's championing of heliocentrism was controversial within his आजीवन, जब most subscribed to either geocentrism or the Tychonic प्रणाली.
He मिले साथ विपक्ष from astronomers, who doubted heliocentrism due to the absence of an observed stellar लंबन.
the पदार्थ थी investigated by the रोमन Inquisition in 1615, and they concluded that it could be supported as only a सम्भावना, not an established फैक्ट.
Galileo later defended his views in Dialogue Concerning the दो Chief संसार प्रणालियों, which appeared to आक्रमण पोप Urban VIII और thus alienated him and the Jesuits, जो had दोनो supported Galileo up जबतक इस point.
He थी आजमाया by the Inquisition, found `` vehemently suspect of heresy '', forced to recant, and खर्च the बाकी of his जीवन under हाउस गिरफ़्तार.
It थी जबकि Galileo थी under हाउस arrest कि he लिखा one of his finest works, Two New Sciences, in जिससे he summarised the work he had किया कुछ forty years पहले, on the दो sciences now called kinematics और शक्ति of materials.

an oled ( organic light-emitting diode ) is a light-emitting diode ( LED ) in which the emissive electroluminescent परत is a film of organic यौगिक which emits light in जवाब to an electric वर्तमान.
इस layer of सशुल्क semiconductor is situated between two electrodes.
generally, at तनिक एक of ये electrodes is transparent.
OLEDs हैं used to create डिजिटल displays in devices such as television screens, कंप्यूटर monitors, पोर्टेबल systems such as मोबाईल phones, हैंडहेल्ड games consoles and गुस्से.
a major क्षेत्रफल of research is the development of white OLED डिवाइस लिये उपयोग in solid-state lighting अनुप्रयोग.
वहीँ are two main परिवारों of oleds : those based on छोटी अणुओं and those employing polymers.
adding मोबाईल ions to an OLED creates a light-emitting electrochemical कोशिका or लैक, which has a थोड़ा different mode of आपरेशन.
oled displays can use either passive-matrix ( PMOLED ) or active-matrix संबोधित schemes.
active-matrix oleds ( AMOLED ) आवश्यकता a thin-film transistor backplane to स्विच प्रत्येक individual pixel on or off, लकिन allow for उच्चतर resolution and larger display आकार.
An oled प्रदर्शक works without a backlight.
Thus, it can display deep black levels and can be thinner और lighter than a liquid crystal प्रदर्शक ( LCD ).
in low परिवेश लाइट conditions ऐसे as a dark room an oled screen can achieve a higher contrast अनुपात than an LCD, whether the एलसीडी उपयोग cold cathode fluorescent lamps or LED backlight.
A carton and a glass of eggnog from Montreal, Canada, प्रर्दशित its French facade ( अंग्रेज़ी रिवर्स ) और the फ्रेंच term lait de poule ( literally, `` hen 's मिल्क '' )
Eggnog, or अंडा nog, is a sweetened dairy -आधारd beverage traditionally बना with मिल्क and/or मलाई, sugar, and whipped eggs ( which gives it a frothy texture ).
Brandy, rum, व्हिस्की, bourbon, वोदका, or a संयोजन of liquors are प्रायः added.
The finished सेवारत is often garnished with a sprinkling of ground cinnamon or जायफल.
It was भी known as the अंडा milk punch.
Eggnog is a लोकप्रिय drink throughout the United राज्य and Canada, and is usually associated साथ क्रिसमस.
eggnog may be added as a flavoring to food or drinks such as coffee and tea.
Eggnog as a custard can भी be used as an ice मलाई base.
A pasty (, ), ( sometimes ज्ञात in Britain as a Cornish pasty, and in the संयुक्त States as a pastie or अंग्रेजों pasty ) is a baked पेस्ट्री, a परंपरागत variety of जिससे is विशेषकर associated साथ कॉर्नवॉल, the westernmost काउंटी in इंग्लैण्ड.
It is made by रखकर uncooked भरना typically of meat and vegetables, बगैर meat in vegetarian संस्करण, on a चपटा pastry circle and फोल्डिंग it to रैप the filling, crimping the edge to form a seal.
After बेकिंग, the result is a उठाया semicircular comestible.
The traditional Cornish pasty, which has Protected Geographical indication ( pgi ) औकात in Europe, is filled साथ beef, sliced or diced potato, swede ( also ज्ञात as a yellow turnip or rutabaga – referred to in Cornwall as turnip ) और onion, seasoned साथ नमक and pepper, and is baked.
Today, the pasty is the खाना most संबद्ध साथ कॉर्नवॉल, it is regarded as the national डिश, and it खाते लिये 6 % of the Cornish खाना अर्थव्यवस्था.
pasties with अनेक different fillings are बना ; कुछ shops specialise in selling all sorts of pasties.
The origins of the pasty are unclear, though there हैं many references to them throughout ऐतिहासिक documents and fiction.
The pasty is now popular world-wide due to the स्प्रेड of cornish miners, और variations can be मिला in Australia, the संयुक्त राज्य, मैक्सिको and elsewhere.
The ( ortho- ) सहानुभूतिपूर्ण बेचैन system ( sns ) is one of तीन प्रमुख भाग of the autonomic nervous system : the अन्य होने the enteric and parasympathetic systems.
इसके general action is to mobilize the body 's बेचैन system fight-or-flight response.
It is, however, constantly active at a basic स्तर to maintain homeostasis.
Secure Digital or ( SD ) is a non-volatile memory card format for उपयोग in पोर्टेबल devices, such as मोबाईल phones, digital cameras, GPS नेविगेशन devices, और टैब्लेट कंप्यूटर.
The Secure Digital मानक is maintained by the sd कार्ड Association ( sda ).
sd technologies have been implemented in more than 400 ब्रांड्स across दर्जनों of उत्पाद categories and अधिक than 8,000 models.
The Secure Digital format शामिल चार कार्ड परिवारों available in three अलग form factors.
the four परिवारों are the original standard-capacity ( SDSC ), the High-Capacity ( SDHC ), the eXtended-Capacity ( sdxc ), and the sdio, which combines input/output कृत्यों साथ data भंडार.
The three form factors are the original आकार, the `` मिनी '' आकार, and the `` micro '' size ( see illustration ).
There are many combinations of form कारकों and device families.
Electrically passive adapters allow the use of a छोटी कार्ड in a मेजबान यंत्र built to थाम a larger कार्ड.
Host devices that comply with नए versions of the specification provide backward संगतता और accept पुरानी sd ताश, but this आलेख explains अनेक factors कि can prevent the use of a newer SD card:
A नए card may प्रस्ताव वृहद capacity than the मेजबान यंत्र can handle.
A नए card may उपयोग a file system the host device can नहीं navigate.
उपयोग of an SDIO कार्ड requires the host device be designed लिये the input/output functions the कार्ड provides.
the organization of the कार्ड थी changed starting with the sdhc परिवार.
कुछ vendors produced sdsc cards above 1 gb before the sda had मानकीकृत a विधि of doing so.
The sda उपयोग several trademarked logos to enforce compliance with its specifications and assure users of संगतता.

डेनियल Lawrence व्हिटनी ( born फ़रवरी 17, 1963 ) best known by his stage name और अक्षर लैरी the Cable guy, is an American stand-up हास्य, actor, country music कलाकार, आवाज़ कर्ता, and पूर्व radio personality.
he was one of the members of the Blue Collar Comedy दौरे, a comedy troupe which included Bill Engvall, रॉन White, और जेफ़ Foxworthy ( साथ जिसको he रै starred on Blue Collar TV ).
Whitney has released seven कॉमेडी albums, of जिससे three have महरूम certified gold by the RIAA for शिपमेंट of 500,000 copies.
In जोड, he has starred in तीन Blue कॉलर Comedy tour-related movies, as well as in the films लैरी the केबल Guy : स्वास्थ्य Inspector, Delta Farce, and witless Protection, as well as voicing Mater in the Cars मताधिकार.
Whitney 's catchphrase : `` Git-R-Done ! '' is also the शीर्षक of his किताब.
On January 26, 2010, the tv channel History announced that it was ordering a series अभिनीत Whitney पुकारा तभी in America with लैरी the केबल guy, in which he would explore the देश और immerse himself in different lifestyles, jobs, और hobbies.
The first एपीसोड of the श्रेणी aired on February 8, 2011.
Vitamin D is a समूह of fat-soluble secosteroids जिम्मेदार लिये intestinal अवशोषण of calcium and phosphate.
In humans, the सबसे important related यौगिकों of vitamin D हैं विटामिन d2 and vitamin D3.
cholecalciferol ( विटामिन D3 ) and ergocalciferol ( विटामिन D2 ) are unique as they constitute कया we जान as vitamin D और can be ingested from the diet and/or supplements.
The body can also synthesize विटामिन d ( इससे cholesterol ) when sun एक्सपोज़र is पर्याप्त ( hence its nickname, the `` सनशाइन विटामिन '' ).
Although विटामिन D is commonly called a विटामिन, it is not actually an essential dietary vitamin in the strict sense, as it can be synthesized in adequate amounts by most स्तनधारियों exposed to sunlight.
( बिल्लियों and dogs can not synthesize विटामिन d efficiently and जरूर receive it in their diet. )
An organic chemical यौगिक ( or सम्बन्धित नियत of compounds ) is तभी scientifically पुकारा a vitamin जब it can not be synthesized in sufficient quantities by an सजीव, और must be प्राप्त इससे उनके diet.
however, as with other यौगिकों commonly called vitamins, विटामिन d was खोजा in an effort to find the dietary पदार्थ that थी lacking in a बीमारी, namely, rickets, the बाल्यकाल रूप of osteomalacia.
Additionally, like other यौगिकों पुकारा vitamins, in the विकसित world विटामिन d is added to staple foods, ऐसे as milk, to avoid बीमारी due to deficiency.
Measures of सीरम levels प्रतिबिंबित endogenous synthesis इससे एक्सपोज़र to sunlight as खूब as सेवन from the diet, और it is believed that synthesis may contribute generally to the maintenance of adequate serum concentrations.
The evidence indicates that the संश्लेषण of विटामिन d from सूर्य exposure works in a feedback loop that prevents toxicity but, क्युकी of अनिश्चितता परिचय the cancer risk from धूप, no सुझाव are issued by the संस्थान of आयुर्विज्ञान, USA, for the amount of sun exposure required to meet विटामिन D आवश्यकताएँ.
Accordingly, the Dietary Reference Intakes for विटामिन D assume that no संश्लेषण occurs and कि all of a person 's vitamin D is from उनके diet, although कि will rarely occur in practice.
in the liver vitamin d is परिवर्तित to calcidiol, which is also known as calcifediol ( INN ), 25-hydroxycholecalciferol, or 25-hydroxyvitamin d—abbreviated 25 ( OH ) D ; and which is the specific vitamin D metabolite that is measured in serum to determine a व्यक्ति 's vitamin d औकात.
भाग of the calcidiol is परिवर्तित by the kidneys to calcitriol, the biologically active form of vitamin D. Calcitriol circulates as a hormone in the blood, regulating the विशेषज्ञता of कैल्सियम और phosphate in the bloodstream and promoting the स्वस्थ विकास और remodeling of bone.
Calcidiol is भी परिवर्तित to calcitriol outside of the kidneys for other purposes, ऐसे as the अप्रसार, differentiation and apoptosis of कोशिकाएं ; calcitriol also affects neuromuscular function and inflammation.
परे इसके use to prevent osteomalacia or rickets, the प्रमाण लिये other health effects of vitamin d supplementation in the general population is inconsistent.
the best evidence of लाभ is लिये bone स्वास्थ्य and a decrease in मृत्यु in बुजुर्ग women.
मानक रूप of the periodic table.
the colors represent different श्रेणी of तत्व समझाया नीचे.
The आवधिक तालिका is a tabular प्रदर्शक of the रासायनिक elements, organized on the basis of their परमाणु numbers, इलेक्ट्रॉन configurations, and recurring रासायनिक properties.
Elements हैं प्रस्तुत in order of increasing परमाणु number ( number of protons ).
The मानक रूप of तालिका comprises an 18 × 7 grid or प्रमुख देह of elements, positioned above a smaller double पंक्ति of elements.
the तालिका can also be deconstructed into four rectangular blocks : the s-block to the left, the p-block to the सही, the d-block in the middle, और the f-block below that.
The पंक्ति of the तालिका हैं पुकारा अवधि ; the कालम of the s-, d-, and p-blocks हैं पुकारा groups, with कुछ of ये having names such as the हैलोजन्स or the प्रतिष्ठित gases.
Since, by परिभाषा, a आवधिक table incorporates recurring trends, कोई such तालिका can be used to derive संबंध between the properties of the तत्व और predict the properties of new, yet to be discovered or synthesized, तत्व.
As a परिणाम, a आवधिक table—whether in the standard रूप or कुछ अन्य variant—provides a useful फ्रेमवर्क लिये analyzing chemical behavior, and such tables हैं widely used in रसायन और other sciences.
Although precursors exist, Dmitri mendeleev is generally credited साथ the publication, in 1869, of the first widely पहचाना periodic तालिका.
he विकसित his table to illustrate periodic trends in the properties of the then-known elements.
Mendeleev भी predicted some गुण of then-unknown elements that would be अपेक्षित to भरण gaps in इस table.
सबसे of उसके पूर्वानुमान were proved correct जब the elements in सवाल were subsequently खोजा.
Mendeleev 's periodic table रै since been विस्तारित और refined with the discovery or synthesis of further नई elements और the development of new theoretical models to बताइये chemical बर्ताव.
All elements इससे atomic संख्याएँ 1 ( hydrogen ) to 118 ( ununoctium ) have महरूम discovered or synthesized.
The elements इससे 1 to 98 ( californium ) have been found to exist naturally, although some are मिला तभी in ट्रेस amounts और were initially खोजा by synthesis in laboratories.
The elements after 98 have तभी महरूम synthesized in laboratories.
उत्पादन of elements beyond ununoctium is being धड़ा, साथ the question of how the periodic तालिका may need to be modified to accommodate any such additions होने a matter of जारी debate.
Numerous synthetic radionuclides of naturally occurring elements have also been produced in laboratories.
Minimum मजदूरी by U.S. state and u.S. territory ( अमरीकी Samoa, Guam, प्यूर्टो Rico, Virgin Islands ), as of jan. 1, 2013.
In the United States, workers हैं generally entitled to be paid no less than the statutory minimum wage.
The संघीय सरकारी mandates a nationwide न्यूनतम मजदूरी level of $ 7.25 per hour, जबकि some राज्य and municipalities have नियत minimum मजदूरी levels higher than the federal level, with the highest state minimum wage होने $ 9.19 प्रति घंटा in Washington as of 2013.
Among those paid by the hour in 2012, 1.6 लाख were reported as कमाई exactly the prevailing federal minimum wage.
About 2.0 million were reported as earning wages below the न्यूनतम.
Together, these 3.6 लाख workers with मजदूरी at or below the न्यूनतम made up 4.7 प्रतिशत of सब hourly-paid मजदूर.
a selection of Bourbons and टेनेसी whiskeys offered at a liquor store in Decatur, जॉर्जिया
evan Williams bourbon whiskey
bourbon whiskey is a type of अमरीकी whiskey – a barrel-aged आसुत spirit बना primarily from मकई.
The name of the spirit derives इससे इसके ऐतिहासिक संघ with an area ज्ञात as Old bourbon, around what is now Bourbon काउंटी, Kentucky ( which, in turn, थी named after the French House of Bourbon royal family ).
it has महरूम produced चूंकि the 18th सदी.
जबकि it may be बना anywhere in the संयुक्त States, it is strongly संबद्ध साथ the American South in सामान्य, और Kentucky in particular.
the Mona Lisa ( la Gioconda or la Joconde ) is a half-length पोर्ट्रेट of a woman by the Italian artist Leonardo da विंची, जिससे रै been acclaimed as `` the बेहतरीन known, the most visited, the most written परिचय, the सबसे sung परिचय, the सबसे parodied work of आर्ट in the world. ''
The painting, विचार to be a पोर्ट्रेट of लिसा Gherardini, the बीवी of Francesco डेल Giocondo, is in आयल on a poplar panel, and is believed to have been painted between 1503 and 1506.
it was acquired by किंग Francis i of France and is अभी the प्रॉपर्टी of the French Republic, on स्थाई display at the musée du Louvre in Paris चूंकि 1797.
the ambiguity of the subject 's अभिव्यक्ति, जिससे is frequently वर्णित as enigmatic, the monumentality of the composition, the subtle modeling of forms and the वायुमंडलीय illusionism were अनोखा qualities कि have contributed to the continuing fascination और पढ़ाई of the work.
Robert एलन Palmer ( 19 January 1949 – 26 September 2003 ), थी an अंग्रेज़ी singer-songwriter and musician.
he was ज्ञात for his distinctive आवाज़ and the eclectic mix of musical शैलियाँ on his एल्बम, combining soul, जैज़, rock, pop, reggae and ब्लूज़.
He found कामयाबी both in his solo career और in the musical act The Power Station, and had Top 10 songs in both the UK and the us.
His iconic music videos by टेरेंस Donovan लिये the हिट्स `` Addicted to प्रेम `` और `` बस irresistible `` featured identically वेश नाचना महिलाओं with pale चेहरों, dark eye मेकअप और उज्जवल रेड लिपस्टिक, which resembled the women in the आर्ट of Patrick Nagel, an artist लोकप्रिय in the 1980s.
sharp-suited, his भागीदारी in the music industry commenced in the 1960s, covered five decades and शामिल a spell with Vinegar Joe.
Palmer received a number of awards throughout उसके करियर, सहित two Grammy Awards लिये Best पुरूष चट्टान Vocal Performance, an MTV वीडियो म्यूज़िक Award, और was twice मनोनीत लिये the ब्रिट Award for बेहतरीन अंग्रेजों Male.
Computed tomography एंजियोग्राफी ( CTA ) is a computed tomography technique used to visualize arterial and venous vessels throughout the देह.
इस सीमाएँ इससे arteries सेवारत the brain to those bringing रक्त to the फेफड़े, kidneys, बाहें और legs.
The champs-élysées सजा with ध्वज लिये bastille Day
Horseman of the French Republican गार्ड during the 2007 military परेड on the Champs-Élysées.
Prise de la bastille by Jean-Pierre-Louis-Laurent houel
Bastille Day is the name given in English-speaking countries to the फ्रेंच नेशनल Day, जिससे is celebrated on the 14th of July प्रत्येक साल.
In France, it is formally called La fête nationale ( ; The नेशनल Celebration ) and commonly Le quatorze juillet ( ; the fourteenth of July ).
It commemorates the 1790 fête de la Fédération, आयोजित on the first anniversary of the storming of the Bastille on 14 July 1789 ; the वर्षगांठ of the storming of the Bastille fortress-prison was देखी as a symbol of the uprising of the आधुनिक स्वदेश, और of the reconciliation of सब the French inside the संवैधानिक साम्राज्य which preceded the First Republic, दौरान the फ्रेंच क्रान्ति.
Festivities and official ceremonies are held all over France.
the oldest and largest नियमित military parade in Europe is आयोजित on the morning of 14 July, on the champs-élysées एवेन्यू in पेरिस in front of the अध्यक्ष of the Republic, French officials and विदेशी अतिथि.
the United राज्य of America ( USA or u.s.A. ), commonly पुकारा the United राज्य ( US or U.S. ) or America, is a संघीय गणतंत्र consisting of पचास states और a federal district.
the lower forty-eight contiguous states and the federal ज़िला of वॉशिंगटन, D.C. हैं in सेंट्रल North America between Canada and Mexico.
The राज्य of अलास्का is west of Canada and east of Russia across the बेरिंग Strait, and the state of Hawaii is in the mid-North प्रशांत.
the देश भी रै five populated और nine unpopulated territories in the Pacific and the caribbean.
at 3.79 लाख square मील ( 9.83 million km2 ) and with around 315 million people, the संयुक्त States is the third- or fourth-largest country by total area और the third-largest by दोनो land area और population.
It is one of the संसार 's सबसे ethnically विविध और multicultural राष्ट्र, the product of large-scale आव्रजन from अनेक देशों.
the geography और जलवायु of the U.S. is भी अत्यधिक diverse, with रेगिस्तान, plains, forests, and mountains कि हैं home to a wide variety of प्रजाति.
Paleoindians migrated from Asia to कया is अभी the संयुक्त States मेनलैंड around 15,000 years ago.
After 1500, बूढ़ा World रोगों introduced by Europeans greatly reduced उनके populations.
यूरोपीय colonization began around 1600 और came mostly from England.
The संयुक्त States emerged इससे thirteen British colonies located साथ the Atlantic seaboard.
Disputes between Great ब्रिटेन और the American colonies led to the American Revolution.
on July 4, 1776, delegates from the 13 colonies unanimously जारी the घोषणा of स्वतंत्रता, जिससे established the United राज्य of America.
The American Revolutionary War, जिससे ended with the मान्यता of स्वतंत्रता of the संयुक्त राज्य इससे the Kingdom of Great Britain, थी the first successful war of independence विरूद्ध a European औपनिवेशिक empire.
The current संविधान was अपनाया on सितंबर 17, 1787 ; twenty-seven amendments have चूंकि been added to the संविधान.
the पहला ten amendments, collectively named the Bill of अधिकारों, were ratified in 1791 और गारंटी many fundamental सिविल अधिकारों और freedoms.
चलित by the doctrine of manifest destiny, the संयुक्त States embarked on a vigorous expansion आरपार North अमेरिका throughout the 19th सदी.
This involved displacing देशी tribes, acquiring new territories, and धीरे admitting new states.
The American सिविल War ended legalized slavery in the United States.
By the समाप्त of the nineteenth सदी, the United राज्य extended into the Pacific Ocean, and इसके economy was the संसार 's largest.
The Spanish–American War and confirmed the country 's औकात as a global सैन्य शक्ति.
The संयुक्त States emerged from as a वैश्विक superpower, the पहला country साथ नाभिकीय हथियार, और a स्थाई member of the United Nations Security Council.
the end of the Cold War और the विच्छेद of the Soviet संघ left the United राज्य as the एकमात्र महाशक्ति.
the United राज्य is a विकसित देश and has the संसार 's largest national अर्थव्यवस्था, with an estimated 2012 जीडीपी of $ 15.6 खरब 19 % of global GDP at purchasing-power parity, as of 2011.
the प्रति capita GDP of the u.S. was the संसार 's sixth-highest as of 2010, हालांकि अमेरिका 's wealth असमानता was भी ranked highest among oecd देशों by the World Bank.
The economy is fueled by an प्रचुरता of प्राकृतिक resources, a well-developed infrastructure, and ऊँची productivity ; और जबकि its economy is considered post-industrial it continues to be one of the संसार 's largest manufacturers.
The देश खाते for 39 % of वैश्विक military बिता, and is a leading economic, political, and cultural फ़ोर्स in the world, as well as a leader in scientific research and technological नवीनता.
The ncaa Men 's प्रभाग I Basketball Championship is a single-elimination टूर्नामेंट played each वसन्त in the United States, currently featuring 68 college बास्केट teams, to determine the national championship of the major college basketball टीमों.
the tournament, व्यवस्थित by the National Collegiate एथलेटिक Association ( ncaa ), was created during 1939 by the नेशनल Association of Basketball Coaches, और was the idea of Ohio State विश्वविद्यालयों कोच Harold Olsen.
Played mostly दौरान March, it is known informally as March Madness or the Big Dance, और रै become एक of the most famous सालाना sporting events in the United States.
The NCAA has credited Bob Walsh of the Seattle आयोजन कमेटी for starting the कूच दीवानगी celebration दौरान 1984.
The टूर्नामेंट teams शामिल champions from 31 Division I conferences ( which प्राप्त automatic bids ), और 37 teams which are awarded at-large berths.
ये `` at-large '' teams are chosen by an NCAA selection कमेटी, as detailed नीचे.
The 64 teams हैं विभाजित into चार regions और organized into a सिंगल विलोपन `` bracket '', which predetermines, when a टोली wins a game, जिससे टोली it will face next.
प्रत्येक team is `` seeded '', or ranked, within its region.
बाद an आरंभिक four खेल between eight lower-ranked टीमों, the टूर्नामेंट occurs दौरान the कोर्स of three weekends, at pre-selected न्यूट्रल sites around the United States.
Lower-ranked teams are लगाई in the कोष्ठक विरूद्ध higher क्रमित teams.
Each वीकेंड eliminates three-fourths of the teams, from a round of 64, to a `` Sweet सोलह '', और लिये the पिछला weekend of the टूर्नामेंट a Final चार ; the Final Four is usually निभाई during the पहला weekend of April.
ये four टीमों, one इससे प्रत्येक region, तब compete in one स्थान लिये the national championship.
the tournament has been at least partially televised since 1969.
Presently, the games are reported by सीबीएस, tbs, टीएनटी, and truTV by the trade-name NCAA कूच दीवानगी.
Since 2011, all खेल are उपलब्धियाँ लिये viewing देशभर.
as television कवरेज has grown, so too has the टूर्नामेंट 's लोकप्रियता.
Presently, millions of Americans `` fill आउट a bracket '', predicting विजेता of सब 67 games.
साथ 11 national शीर्षक, UCLA रै the रिकार्ड for the सबसे NCAA Men 's Division I बास्केट championships ; जॉन Wooden coached UCLA to 10 of its 11 titles.
the University of Kentucky is second, with 8 national शीर्षक, जबकि इंडियाना University and the University of उत्तर Carolina are tied for third साथ 5 national शीर्षक.
Duke University ranks fifth साथ 4 national titles.
a sample of सिंथेटिक motor oil
सिंथेटिक oil is a lubricant consisting of chemical compounds कि हैं artificially made ( synthesized ).
Synthetic lubricants can be manufactured using chemically परिवर्धित पेट्रोलियम components rather than whole crude आयल, but can also be synthesized इससे अन्य raw materials.
सिंथेटिक oil is used as a substitute लिये lubricant refined from पेट्रोलियम when operating in extremes of temperature, क्युकी, in सामान्य, it provides superior mechanical and रासायनिक properties than those found in परंपरागत mineral oils.
Aircraft jet engines, for example, require the use of synthetic oils, whereas वायुयान piston engines do not.
Jackass is an अमरीकी वास्तविकता series, originally shown on MTV इससे 2000 to 2002, featuring people performing विभिन्न dangerous, crude self-injuring stunts and pranks.
The show served as a launchpad लिये the television और एक्टिंग करियर of Bam Margera, steve-o, and also जॉनी Knoxville, who previously था only a few नाबालिग एक्टिंग भूमिकाएँ.
Since 2002, three Jackass films have महरूम produced and released by MTV corporate सहोदर सर्वोपरि तस्वीरें, continuing the मताधिकार after इसके run on television.
the show sparked several spin-offs including Viva La Bam, wildboyz, Homewrecker, dr. Steve-O and blastazoid.
The show लगाई # 68 on Entertainment Weekly `` नई tv क्लासिक '' list.
roseanne Cherrie Barr ( born November 3, 1952 ) is an American actress, comedienne, writer, टेलीविज़न निर्माता, निदेशक, और 2012 अध्यक्षीय nominee of the California -आधारd सलाम और Freedom Party.
Barr began उसके career in stand-up कॉमेडी at clubs पहले gaining कीर्ति for her role in the sitcom roseanne.
The दिखाएँ was a hit and lasted nine seasons, from 1988 to 1997.
She जीती both an Emmy and a Golden ग्लोब पुरस्कार for Best अभिनेत्री for her work on the show.
barr had crafted a `` fierce working-class domestic goddess '' persona in the eight years preceding her sitcom और wanted to do a realistic show परिचय a strong mother who थी not a शिकार of patriarchal भोगवाद.
The granddaughter of immigrants from यूरोपीय and Russia, barr was the oldest of चार children in a working-class यहूदी Salt Lake City family ; वो थी भी active in the lds Church.
In 1974, she married Bill Pentland, with जिसको she had three children, before divorcing in 1990 और marrying हास्य tom अर्नाल्ड लिये four सालो.
विवाद arose when she sang `` The star-spangled ध्वज `` off-key at a 1990 nationally aired baseball खेल, followed by grabbing her crotch और spitting.
बाद her sitcom ended, she launched उसके own talk show, the Roseanne Show, जिससे aired from 1998 to 2000.
in 2005, she लौटे to stand-up कॉमेडी with a संसार tour.
in 2011, she स्ट्रक्चर in an unscripted TV show, Roseanne 's nuts, that lasted from जुलाई to सितंबर of that साल, about her life on a Hawaiian farm.
In जल्दी 2012, barr announced her उम्मीदवारी for the Presidential nomination of the ग्रीन Party.
Barr lost the nomination to jill Stein.
वो then sought the अध्यक्षीय nomination of the Peace and Freedom पार्टी, which वो won on अगस्त 4, 2012.
barr received 61,971 votes in the general election, placing sixth overall.
Francesco albani 's 17th century बपतिस्मा of मसीह is a typical चित्रण साथ the आसमान opening और the Holy Spirit descending as a dove.
the बपतिस्मा of Jesus marks the beginning of उसके पब्लिक ministry.
इस event is recorded in the canonical gospels of मैथ्यू, Mark और Luke.
John 's इन्जील does not describe यीशु ' baptism, but John the Baptist करता testify of the अन्य बाते in.
In the नई Testament, John the बैपटिस्ट preached the baptism of repentance for the remission of पापों ( ), and declared himself a forerunner of he that would baptize `` with the पावन Ghost और with fire '' ( ).
in so doing he was तैयारी the way लिये यीशु.
Jesus आए to the Jordan नदी जहाँ he was baptized by जॉन.
the baptismal scene includes the heavens खोलने, a dove-like descent of the पावन Spirit, और a आवाज़ from स्वर्ग saying, `` इस is my beloved Son, in जिसको I am खूब pleased. ''
Most modern scholars दृश्य the fact that Jesus was baptized by जॉन as an historical event to which a ऊँची degree of certainty can be आबंटित.
Along with the crucifixion of Jesus most scholars दृश्य it as एक of the दो historically निश्चित तथ्य about him, and often use it as the starting points for the study of the historical Jesus.
the baptism is one of the five प्रमुख milestones in the gospel कथा of the जीवन of Jesus, the others being the Transfiguration, crucifixion, क़यामत, and आरोहण.
सबसे ईसाई denominations दृश्य the baptism of Jesus as an महत्वपूर्ण event और a आधार लिये the ईसाई rite of बपतिस्मा ( see also ).
In Eastern Christianity, Jesus ' baptism is commemorated on 6 January, the feast of epiphany.
in the Roman कैथोलिक Church, the anglican Communion, the लूथरन चर्च and some other Western denominations, it is recalled on a दिन within the following week, the feast of the बपतिस्मा of the Lord.
In रोमन catholicism, the बपतिस्मा of यीशु is one of the चमकदार Mysteries sometimes added to the rosary.
it is a trinitarian feast in the Eastern Orthodox Churches.
Methylcobalamin ( shown ) is a रूप of विटामिन b12.
physically it resembles the अन्य forms of विटामिन B12, occurring as dark red crystals कि freely रूप cherry-colored पारदर्शी समाधान in water.
Vitamin b12, vitamin B12 or vitamin b-12, also called cobalamin, is a water-soluble विटामिन साथ a key भूमिका in the normal कामकाज of the brain and बेचैन system, and लिये the formation of रक्त.
it is one of the आठ b विटामिन.
it is सामान्यतः involved in the metabolism of प्रत्येक कोशिका of the human body, विशेषकर affecting डीएनए संश्लेषण and regulation, but also fatty एसिड synthesis and उर्जा production.
Neither fungi, plants, nor पशु are सक्षम of producing vitamin B12.
Only bacteria और आर्किया have the enzymes required for its संश्लेषण, हालांकि अनेक भोजन हैं a प्राकृतिक source of b12 because of bacterial symbiosis.
The vitamin is the largest and most structurally complicated विटामिन and can be produced industrially only through bacterial fermentation-synthesis.
Vitamin B12 consists of a class of chemically सम्बन्धित compounds ( vitamers ), all of जिससे have vitamin कार्यकलाप.
It contains the biochemically rare तत्व cobalt.
जैवसंश्लेषण of the मौलिक structure of the vitamin is accomplished only by bacteria ( which प्रायः produce hydroxocobalamin ), but परिवर्तन between अलग forms of the vitamin can be संपन्नता in the human body.
A आम semi-synthetic form of the विटामिन, cyanocobalamin, does not occur in प्रकृति, लकिन is उत्पादित इससे बैक्टीरियल hydroxocobalamin and तब प्रयुक्त in many pharmaceuticals and supplements, और as a food additive, because of इसके stability और lower production cost.
in the देह it is converted to the human physiological forms methylcobalamin और adenosylcobalamin, leaving behind the cyanide, albeit in minimal concentration.
अधिक recently, hydroxocobalamin, methylcobalamin, and adenosylcobalamin can be found in more expensive pharmacological products and खाना supplements.
the अतिरिक्त utility of these is currently debated.
विटामिन B12 was discovered from इसके relationship to the बीमारी घातक रक्ताल्पता, जिससे is an असंक्राम्य बीमारी in which parietal cells of the stomach responsible for secreting intrinsic factor हैं destroyed.
Intrinsic factor is crucial लिये the normal अवशोषण of b12, so a कमी of intrinsic factor, as देखी in घातक रक्ताल्पता, कल्याणकारी a vitamin B12 deficiency.
अनेक अन्य subtler kinds of vitamin b12 deficiency और उनके biochemical effects have चूंकि been elucidated.
Full Metal जैकेट is a 1987 युद्ध फिल्मी produced, directed और co-written by Stanley Kubrick.
It is an अनुकूलन of Gustav hasford 's 1979 अनोखा The Short-Timers and सितारों मैथ्यू Modine, Vincent D'Onofrio, R. Lee Ermey, arliss Howard, and Adam Baldwin.
the फिल्मी follows a platoon of U.S. Marines through their प्रशिक्षण and the experiences of two of the platoon 's marines in the Tet Offensive दौरान the Vietnam युद्ध.
The film 's title refers to the full मेटल जैकेट bullet प्रयुक्त by infantry riflemen.
The फिल्मी प्राप्त critical acclaim.
It received an Academy Award नामांकन लिये Best Adapted Screenplay for kubrick, Michael हेर और गुस्ताव Hasford.
in 2001, the अमरीकी Film Institute placed Full Metal Jacket at # 95 in उनके `` AFI 's 100 Years... 100 Thrills `` poll.
tmz is a celebrity news जालस्थल that debuted on November 8, 2005.
it थी a सहयोग between एओएल और telepictures Productions, a division of Warner Bros., until Time Warner divested AOL in 2009.
However, it remained affiliated with AOL न्यूज and has the AOL News logo affixed in the अपर सही कोने.
the नाम TMZ stands लिये the ऐतिहासिक `` studio मण्डल `` or 30-mile zone radius from the intersection of वेस्ट Beverly boulevard and North La Cienega Boulevard in लॉस एंजिल्स.
tmz 's managing एडिटर is घनघोर Levin, a lawyer-turned-journalist who was previously a विधिक expert लिये the लॉस एंजिल्स television स्टेशन KCBS-TV.
the site दावा कि it करता नहीं pay for stories or interviews ; however, Levin has admitted कि TMZ does `` sometimes अदा sources for leads on stories ''.
levin has stated that `` everything is researched and vetted for accuracy. ''
a साथी TV श्रेणी, tmz on TV, debuted on सितंबर 10, 2007.
Scream 3 is a 2000 अमरीकी slasher film created by Kevin Williamson, directed by Wes Craven and लिखा by ehren Kruger, अभिनीत Neve कैम्पबेल, Courteney Cox Arquette और दाउद arquette.
it थी released on February 4, 2000 as the third installment in the Scream फिल्मी series.
The कार्यक्रम of the स्टोरी are नियत तीन years after those of चीख 2 और follows sidney Prescott ( Campbell ) who has gone into self-imposed isolation following the कार्यक्रम of the previous two films लकिन is drawn to Hollywood after a new Ghostface begins killing the डाल of the film within a film `` Stab 3 ''.
चीख 3 combines the violence of the slasher विधा साथ comedy और `` whodunit `` रहस्य while satirizing the cliché of film trilogies.
Unlike the previous चीख films, there थी an increased emphasis on comedic elements and the violence and हॉरर was घटाया in जवाब to increased पब्लिक scrutiny about violence in media following the columbine ऊँची School massacre.
The film थी the concluding chapter of the चीख series जबतक it was revived with a sequel, Scream 4, in 2011.
Williamson provided a five-page रूपरेखा for two sequels to चीख when auctioning his असली script, hoping to entice bidders with the potential of buying a franchise.
Williamson 's प्रतिज्ञाओं to अन्य projects meant he थी unable to develop a पूरा स्क्रिप्ट for चीख 3 and writing duties were undertaken by Ehren क्रूगर जो discarded much of Williamson 's टीप.
Craven और मार्को Beltrami returned to सीधा और स्कोर the फिल्मी respectively as they था with the previous two श्रेणी entries.
उत्पादन थी troubled साथ script rewrites, with pages sometimes तभी ready on the day of filming, और scheduling कठिनाइयों with the main डाल.
Scream 3 performed both financially and critically बदतर than its preceding films, कमाई over $ 161 million and with अनेक critics claiming that the film had become कया चीख originally `` spoofed ``.
despite ऋणात्मक criticism the film did receive तारीफ़ with reviewers calling it the perfect end to the चीख trilogy.
As of 2012, the film is currently the number 3 highest-grossing slasher-film in उत्तर America, following चीख at number 1 and चीख 2 at number 2.
The film 's soundtrack was well-received, बिता fourteen सप्ताह on the Billboard 200 और reaching a ऊँची of # 32.
Shoulder impingement सिंड्रोम, also पुकारा painful arc सिंड्रोम, supraspinatus syndrome, तैराक 's shoulder, and thrower 's कंधे, is a clinical सिंड्रोम which occurs when the tendons of the rotator कफ muscles become irritated and inflamed as वे pass through the subacromial स्पेस, the passage beneath the acromion.
इस can result in pain, weakness और loss of movement at the shoulder.

the colonial history of the United States covers the history of European settlements इससे the प्रारंभ of colonization of America until their incorporation into the संयुक्त States.
in the लेट 16th century, England, France, स्पेन and the नीदरलैंड्स शुभारम्भ प्रमुख colonization कार्यक्रम in eastern North America.
Small early attempts—such as the अंग्रेज़ी खोया Colony of Roanoke —often disappeared ; everywhere the मौत rate of the पहला arrivals was बहुत high.
Nevertheless successful colonies यहूद established.
यूरोपीय settlers आए from a variety of सोशल and religious समूह.
No aristocrats settled permanently, but a क्रमांक of adventurers, soldiers, किसानो, and tradesmen arrived.
Diversity थी an अमरीकी characteristic as the Dutch of नई netherland, the Swedes and finns of New Sweden, the अंग्रेज़ी Quakers of पेन्सिलवेनिया, the English puritans of New England, the English settlers of jamestown, और the `` worthy poor '' of Georgia, आए to the new महाद्वीप and built colonies with distinctive social, religious, राजनैतिक और economic styles.
Occasionally one colony took control of another ( during wars between उनके यूरोपीय parents ).
Only in Nova स्कोटिया ( now भाग of Canada ) did the conquerors expel the पिछला colonists.
Instead वे all lived पक्ष by पक्ष in peace.
There were no major civil wars among the 13 colonies, and the दो chief हथियारबंद rebellions ( in वर्जिनिया in 1676 and in नई York in 1689–91 ) were short-lived असफलताओं.
युद्धों between the फ्रेंच and the British—the French and Indian Wars and Father rale 's युद्ध —were तूल, and शामिल french-support for Wabanaki Confederacy attacks on the frontiers.
by 1760 France was defeated and the अंग्रेजों seized its colonies.
the four पृथक regions were : New इंग्लैण्ड, the मध्य Colonies, the Chesapeake खाड़ी Colonies ( अपर South ) और the निम्नतर दक्षिण.
Some historians add a पांचवां region, the frontier, which was never separately व्यवस्थित.
by the समय यूरोपीय settlers arrived around 1600–1650, the बहुमत of the Native Americans जीना in the पूर्वी संयुक्त States था been decimated by new रोगों, introduced to them decades before by explorers and sailors.
देखिए timeline of Colonial America लिये सूची of ऐतिहासिक कार्यक्रम.
ग्लोरिया लौरा Vanderbilt ( born फ़रवरी 20, 1924 ) is an अमरीकी कलाकार, लेखक, actress, heiress, and socialite most noted as an जल्दी developer of designer blue jeans.
She is a member of the prominent वेंडरबिल्ट family of नई York और the mother of CNN 's Anderson Cooper.
यूनानियों ( Romanization of Greek| ), officially the Hellenic Republic ( ' ), is a देश in southeast Europe.
according to the 2011 census, Greece 's जनसांख्यिकी is around 11 लाख.
Athens is the nation 's capital and largest नगर, इसके urban area also including Piraeus.
Greece is strategically located at the क्रॉसरोड्स of Europe, एशिया, the Middle East, and अफ़्रीकी, and has जमीन सीमायें with Albania, the Republic of मकदूनिया and Bulgaria to the north, and तुर्कों to the पूर्वोत्तर.
The Aegean Sea lies to the east of mainland यूनानियों, the आयोनियन Sea to the west, और the Mediterranean समुद्र to the south.
Greece has the 11th longest coastline in the world at in length, featuring a vast क्रमांक of आइलैंड्स ( approximately 1,400, of which 227 हैं inhabited ), including Crete, the dodecanese, the cyclades, और the Ionian Islands among others.
Eighty प्रतिशत of यूनानियों consists of mountains, of जिससे माउंट ओलम्पस is the उच्चतम at.
आधुनिक Greece traces its roots to the सभ्यता of Ancient यूनानियों, generally considered the cradle of Western civilization.
as such, it is the जन्मस्थान of democracy, Western philosophy, the ओलम्पिक Games, पश्चिमी literature और historiography, राजनैतिक विज्ञान, major scientific and mathematical principles, और पश्चिमी नाटक, सहित both त्रासदी और कॉमेडी.
इस legacy is partly reflected in the सत्रह UNESCO World विरासत Sites located in यूनानियों, रैंकिंग it 7th in Europe और 13th in the world.
the modern Greek राज्य थी established in 1830, following the Greek युद्ध of स्वतंत्रता.
Greece is a founding member of the United Nations, has महरूम a member of what is now the यूरोपीय Union since 1981 ( और the eurozone since 2001 ), और has been a member of नाटो चूंकि 1952.
Greece is a developed country साथ an उन्नत, high-income अर्थव्यवस्था and बहुत high standards of living, including the संसार 's 21st highest quality of life as of 2010.
यूनानियों 's economy is also the largest in the Balkans, जहाँ यूनानियों is an important क्षेत्रीय investor.
A प्रधान meridian is a मध्याह्न, i.e. a line of देशांतर, at जिससे देशांतर is पारिभाषित to be 0°.
A prime मध्याह्न and its विपरीत in a 360°-system, the 180th meridian ( at 180° longitude ), form a great वृत्त.
This ग्रेट circle divides the गोला, e.g. the धरती, into दो hemispheres.
if एक uses directions of East और West इससे a defined प्रधान meridian, तब they can be called पूर्वी Hemisphere and Western गोलार्ध.
Gerardus मर्केटर in his एटलस Cosmographicae ( 1595 ) uses a प्रधान meridian somewhere close to 25°W, passing just to the west of सांता मरिया Island in the Atlantic.
उसके 180th meridian रनों along the Strait of anián ( Bering Strait )
A प्रधान meridian is ultimately मनमानी, unlike an equator, जिससे is determined by the अक्ष of rotation—and various प्रथाओं have been used or advocated in different regions and throughout इतिहास.
