R.O.B. ( Robotic ऑपरेटिंग दोस्त ), released in जापानी as the, is an accessory for the Nintendo Entertainment प्रणाली ( NES ).
it थी released in July 1985 in Japan and बाद that year in उत्तर अमेरिका.
It had a छोटी product lifespan, with support लिये only two खेल which comprised the `` रोबोट श्रेणी '' ; gyromite और stack-up.
R.O.B. was released with the intention of portraying the Nintendo Entertainment System as कुछ अनोखा in अनुक्रम to alleviate खुदरा fears following the वीडियो game crash of 1983.
R.O.B. was available in the Deluxe Set, a विन्यास for the कंसोल that शामिल, among other things, r.o.b. and gyromite.
Stack-Up was खरीदा separately and शामिल its अपना शारीरिक game pieces.
The Walking Liberty हाफ डालर थी a चांदी 50-cent piece or हाफ dollar coin issued by the United States Mint इससे 1916 to 1947 ; it थी designed by Adolph A. Weinman.
In 1915, the new Mint निदेशक, रॉबर्ट W. Woolley, came to believe that he थी not only allowed but जरूरी by law to बदलें सिक्का डिजाइन that had been in use for 25 years.
He therefore began the process of replacing the नाई coinage : dimes, quarters and half डॉलर, all bearing similar designs by long-time Mint Engraver Charles E. Barber, और पहला struck in 1892.
Woolley had the Commission of Fine Arts conduct a प्रतियोगिता, as a परिणाम of which weinman was चयनित to design the dime और हाफ डालर.
Weinman 's डिज़ाइन of Liberty striding towards the सूर्य for the half डालर proved मुश्किल to perfect, और Treasury सचिव विलियम G. McAdoo, whose विभाग included the Mint, considered having नाई create his own design.
Mint officials यहूद कामयाब in getting weinman 's design into production, हालांकि it never struck बहुत well, which may have been a factor in its बदलना by the फ्रैंकलिन half dollar beginning in 1948.
nevertheless, आर्ट इतिहासकार Cornelius Vermeule considered the टुकड़ा to be among the सबसे beautiful us coins.
Since 1986, a परिवर्धन of Weinman 's obverse design has महरूम used लिये the American चांदी Eagle.
the Toyota 4runner is a mid-size खेल utility vehicle ( SUV ) उत्पादित by the Japanese manufacturer Toyota and बेची throughout the world इससे 1984 to present.
In Japan it was ज्ञात as the टोयोटा Hilux लहरे.
The original 4Runner थी a compact SUV और little more than a Toyota pickup ट्रक with a fiberglass shell over the bed, लकिन the model has since undergone significant स्वतंत्र development into a क्रॉस between a compact and a mid-size SUV.
All 4Runners have महरूम निर्मित at Toyota 's tahara plant in tahara, Aichi, जापानी, or at hino मोटर्स ' Hamura, Japan संयंत्र, और in Brazil.
इसके mid-size crossover SUV counterpart is the टोयोटा highlander.
This article deals with medicine as practiced by trained पेशेवर from प्राचीन टाइम्स to the उपस्थित.
The प्राचीन Egyptians had a system of आयुर्विज्ञान that थी बहुत advanced for इसके समय और बहकावे बाद चिकित्सा traditions.
the Egyptians and Babylonians both introduced the अवधारणाओं of diagnosis, prognosis, और medical परिक्षा.
the Greeks went भी further, और advanced as well चिकित्सा आचार.
The hippocratic Oath, स्टिल taken by doctors आज, was written in Greece in the 5th सदी BCE.
In the medieval era, surgical practices inherited from the ancient मास्टर्स were improved and then systematized in rogerius 's The Practice of Surgery.
Universities began व्यवस्थित training of physicians around the years 1220 in Italy.
दौरान the पुनर्जागरण, understanding of anatomy improved, and the microscope was invented.
the germ theory of disease in the 19th सदी led to cures for many संक्रामक रोगों.
सैन्य doctors advanced the methods of trauma उपचार and सर्जरी.
Public health उपायों यहूद developed especially in the 19th century as the rapid growth of cities जरूरी व्यवस्थित sanitary उपायों.
उन्नत शोध centers खोली in the early 20th century, often कनेक्ट साथ major अस्पताल.
the mid-20th century was characterized by new biological treatments, such as एंटीबायोटिक.
ये advancements, along with developments in रसायन, genetics, और lab technology ( such as the x-ray ) led to आधुनिक आयुर्विज्ञान.
Medicine was heavily professionalized in the 20th century, and new careers opened to women as नर्स ( इससे the 1870s ) and as physicians ( विशेषकर after 1970 ).
the 21st century is characterized by very उन्नत research involving numerous फ़ील्ड of विज्ञान.
The hippocratic कॉर्पस, is a संग्रहण of early medical works from प्राचीन Greece strongly associated with the प्राचीन Greek physician Hippocrates and his शिक्षाओं.
Potassium is a chemical तत्व साथ प्रतीक K ( इससे neo-latin kalium ) and atomic number 19.
Elemental potassium is a नरम silvery-white क्षारीय metal कि oxidizes rapidly in air and is very reactive साथ जल, generating sufficient heat to ignite the hydrogen emitted in the reaction and burning with a lilac ज्वाला.
Because पोटैशियम और sodium are chemically very समान, उनके salts यहूद नहीं at पहला differentiated.
the अस्तित्व of multiple elements in their salts was suspected from 1702, and this was proven in 1807 when potassium and सोडियम were individually पृथक इससे अलग salts by electrolysis.
Potassium in nature occurs तभी in ionic salts.
As ऐसे, it is मिला dissolved in seawater ( जिससे is 0.04 % potassium by weight ), and is भाग of अनेक minerals.
Most industrial chemical applications of potassium employ the अपेक्षाकृत high घुलनशीलता in जल of potassium compounds, ऐसे as potassium soaps.
पोटैशियम metal रै तभी a few special अनुप्रयोग, being replaced in सबसे chemical reactions साथ sodium मेटल.
पोटैशियम ions are necessary for the फलन of सब living cells.
Potassium ion diffusion is a key यांत्रिकी in तंत्रिका transmission, and potassium depletion in पशु, including humans, परिणाम in various cardiac डिस्फंक्शन.
पोटैशियम accumulates in संयंत्र cells, और thus fresh fruits and vegetables are a शुभ dietary source of it.
Conversely, सबसे पौधे except विशेषज्ञ halophytes हैं असहिष्णु of नमक, and सोडियम is उपस्थित in उन्हें तभी in low concentration.
This resulted in पोटैशियम पहला होने isolated from potash, the ashes of plants, giving the element its नाम.
For the same कारण, भारी crop production rapidly depletes soils of पोटैशियम, and agricultural fertilizers consume 95 % of global पोटैशियम chemical production.
The Singapore dollar or डालर ( चिह्न : $ ; code : sgd ) is the आधिकारिक currency of सिंगापुर.
It is normally abbreviated with the डालर sign $, or alternatively S $ to distinguish it इससे other डालर -denominated मुद्राएँ.
It is divided into 100 cents.
The Monetary Authority of सिंगापुर और the Brunei करेंसी और Monetary फलक स्टिल maintain the historic exchangeability of their दो मुद्राएँ, the Singaporean डालर and the Brunei डालर, क्रमशः.
the dollar is स्वीकृत as `` प्रथागत tender '' in Brunei according to the Currency Interchangeability अनुबंध.
Likewise, the Brunei डालर is customarily स्वीकृत in सिंगापुर
James सैमुएल कोलमैन ( may 12, 1926 – March 25, 1995 ) was an अमरीकी समाजशास्त्री, theorist and empirical researcher, based chiefly at the विश्वविद्यालयों of Chicago.
He थी निर्वाचित president of the अमरीकी Sociological संघ.
Coleman studied the समाजशास्त्र of education, public policy, and थी one of the earliest उपयोक्ता of the term `` social पूंजी ``.
उसके Foundations of Social Theory influenced sociological theory.
उसके The Adolescent समाज ( 1961 ) and `` Coleman Report '' ( समता of Educational अवसर, 1966 ) यहूद दो of the most heavily cited किताबे in educational sociology.
The landmark Coleman Report helped रूपांतरण educational theory, reshape नेशनल education नीतियों, और influenced पब्लिक and scholarly opinion regarding the भूमिका of schooling in determining समता and उत्पादकता in the संयुक्त States.
Superman ( from DC comics ) थी the पहला superhero created, art by Jim Lee.
a superhero ( sometimes rendered super-hero or super नायिका ) is a type of भण्डार character possessing `` extraordinary or superhuman शक्तियां '' and dedicated to protecting the पब्लिक.
Since the डेब्यू of the prototypical superhero Superman in 1938, कहानियां of superheroes—ranging इससे ब्रैड episodic adventures to continuing years-long sagas—have वर्चस्व अमरीकी comic किताबे and crossed over into other मीडिया.
the शब्द itself dates to at least 1917.
a मादा superhero is sometimes पुकारा a superheroine ( also rendered super-heroine or सुपर नायिका ).
`` सुपर HEROES '' is a trademark co-owned by dc Comics and Marvel कॉमिक्स.
By सबसे definitions, characters do not सख्ती require actual superhuman powers to be deemed superheroes, although terms such as costumed crime fighters or नकाबपोश vigilantes हैं sometimes प्रयुक्त to refer to those ऐसे as Batman and ग्रीन Arrow बगैर such powers who share other common superhero traits.
Such characters were generally referred to as `` mystery men '' in the so-called सुनहरी Age of Comic किताबे to फर्क them from वर्ण with super-powers.
सामान्यतः, superheroes उपयोग their शक्तियां to काउंटर day-to-day crime while also combating खतरे against मानवता by supervillains, उनके दण्ड counterparts.
प्रायः, एक of these supervillains will be the सुपरहीरो 's archenemy.
as well, some longrunning superheroes, ऐसे as सुपरमैन, Batman, spider-man and आयरन Man प्रत्येक रै a rogues gallery of दुश्मनों.
As well, superheroes sometimes होगा कॉम्बैट ऐसे irregular threats as aliens, magical/ fantasy entities, American युद्ध enemies ऐसे as nazism or साम्यवादी, और godlike or demonic creatures.

The shawshank Redemption is a 1994 American drama film written और directed by फ़्रैंक Darabont and अभिनीत Tim Robbins और मॉर्गन Freeman.
Adapted from the Stephen King novella Rita Hayworth and Shawshank Redemption, the फिल्मी tells the story of Andy Dufresne, a बैंकर जो spends nearly दो दशकों in shawshank State Prison for the murder of उसके wife और उसके lover despite his दावा of innocence.
दौरान his समय at the थाना, he befriends a fellow inmate, Ellis Boyd `` Red '' Redding, and पाता himself protected by the guards बाद the warden begins using him in his धन laundering operation.
despite a lukewarm box दफ्तर reception कि barely recouped its budget, the फिल्मी प्राप्त अनुकूल reviews from critics, multiple award nominations, and has since enjoyed a remarkable life on cable television, VHS, DVD, and Blu-ray.
It was शामिल in the American Film Institute 's 100 Years... 100 Movies 10th Anniversary Edition.
IT प्रबन्धन is the discipline whereby all of the technology resources of a कड़ हैं प्रबंधित in accordance with इसके needs और priorities.
ये resources may include ठोस investments like कंप्यूटर hardware, software, data, networks and आंकड़ा केन्द्र सुविधाएं, as well as the staffs who हैं hired to maintain them.
Managing this responsibility within a company entails many of the basic management functions, जैसे budgeting, staffing, और organizing and controlling, साथ साथ other aspects कि are अद्वितीय to technology, like बदलें management, software डिज़ाइन, संजाल planning, tech support etc.
the Penitentiary of New मैक्सिको Prison Riot, जिससे took place on February 2 and 3, 1980, in the state 's maximum सुरक्षा prison south of Santa fe, थी एक of the most violent थाना riots in the इतिहास of the अमरीकी correctional प्रणाली : 33 inmates died और अधिक than 200 inmates यहूद treated लिये चोटों.
None of the 12 अधिकारियों लिया बंधक यहूद मारे, but सात were treated for injuries caused by beatings and rapes.
This was the तीसरा major riot at the NM State Penitentiary, the first occurring on 19 July 1922 and the दूसरी on 15 June 1953.
Author रोजर Morris suggests the मौत टोल may have महरूम higher, as a number of लाशें यहूद incinerated or dismembered during the course of the mayhem.

the Northern कार्डिनल ( Cardinalis cardinalis ) is a North अमरीकी bird in the genus Cardinalis ; it is भी known colloquially as the redbird or common cardinal.
it can be found in southern Canada, through the eastern संयुक्त राज्य इससे Maine to Texas और दक्षिण through Mexico.
It is मिला in वुडलैंड्स, gardens, shrublands, and swamps.
the Northern Cardinal is a mid-sized songbird with a body length of 21 centimeters ( 8.3 inches ).
it रै a distinctive crest on the सिर and a मुखौटा on the face जिससे is ब्लैक in the male and धूसर in the female.
The पुरूष is a vibrant रेड, while the female is a dull red-brown shade.
the उत्तरी Cardinal is mainly granivorous, but also फ़ीड्स on कीट and फल.
The पुरूष behaves territorially, marking out उसके territory साथ सोंग.
During प्रेमालाप, the male फ़ीड्स seed to the female beak-to-beak.
A clutch of three to four eggs is रखी, and दो to four clutches हैं produced each year.
It थी once prized as a pet, but इसके sale as cage पक्षियों is अभी बैन in the United राज्य by the migratory Bird Treaty अधिनियम of 1918.
सतह runoff, also पुकारा nonpoint सोर्स pollution, from a फार्म फ़ील्ड in Iowa during a rain तूफ़ान.
Topsoil as well as farm fertilizers और other संभावित pollutants चलाएं off unprotected फार्म फ़ील्ड when भारी rains occur.
Topsoil is the upper, outermost layer of soil, प्रायः the शीर्ष to.
It रै the उच्चतम विशेषज्ञता of सशुल्क पदार्थ and microorganisms and is where most of the Earth 's biological मृदा कार्यकलाप occurs.
musical cryptogram : `` Aschbeg '' नियत in Schoenberg 's sechs kleine Klavierstücke, op. 19, no. 1, m. 5.
नोट that the notes do not come in spelling order लकिन हैं सब adjacent ( not अलग by अन्य टीप ).
Sechs kleine Klavierstücke, op. 19 ( or छह छोटी Piano Pieces ) is a set of टुकड़े for सोलो piano लिखा by the Austrian composer Arnold Schoenberg, published in 1913.
मैक्एफ़ी, inc. ( ) is an अमरीकी global computer security software company headquartered in Santa Clara, कैलिफ़ोर्निया, and the world 's largest dedicated security प्रौद्योगिकी company.
as of February 28, 2011, मैक्एफ़ी is a wholly स्वामित्व subsidiary of Intel.
मैक्एफ़ी 's प्रतिस्पर्धी in the एंटीवायरस industry हैं Avira, BitDefender, bullguard, F-Secure, frisk, Kaspersky, Symantec, and ट्रेंड सूक्ष्म to नाम a few.
संत Rita of cascia ( Born margherita lotti 1381 - May 22, 1457 ) was an इतालवी Augustinian नन, widow और saint venerated in the रोमन Catholic Church.
Rita was शादीशुदा at an जल्दी आयु.
the marriage lasted for 18 सालो, दौरान which she is remembered लिये her Christian values as a model wife and mother जो made प्रयत्न to बदलें her husband इससे his गाली behavior.
upon the murder of her husband by another feuding family, she sought to dissuade her sons from बदला.
वो subsequently joined an Augustinian जातियाँ of religious sisters, जहाँ वो was ज्ञात for practicing mortification of the flesh, साथ साथ the apparent efficacy of उसके prayers.
St. Rita is venerated due to various miracles attributed to her intercession, और is प्रायः portrayed साथ a bleeding घाव on उसके माथे, which the Roman कैथोलिक Church दावा to have been a आंशिक stigmata.
the Roman Catholic Church, अंतर्गत the pontificate of Pope leo XIII officially canonized Rita on May 24, 1900, जबकि her feast दिन is celebrated प्रत्येक may 22.
in अनेक pious Catholic देशों, रीता is known to be a patroness लिये abused wives and शोक women.
North अमेरिका is a continent wholly भीतर the उत्तरी Hemisphere and लगभग wholly भीतर the Western गोलार्ध.
It is also considered a उत्तरी subcontinent of the americas.
It is bordered to the north by the आर्कटिक Ocean, to the ईस्ट by the अटलांटिक Ocean, to the west and south by the Pacific Ocean, and to the southeast by South America और the caribbean समुद्र.
North अमेरिका covers an area of about 24,709,000 वर्गाकार किलोमीटर ( 9,540,000 square मील ), परिचय 4.8 % of the ग्रह 's सतह or about 16.5 % of its जमीन area.
As of July 2008, its जनसांख्यिकी थी estimated at nearly 529 लाख लोगों across 23 independent states, representing about 7.5 % of the human population.
उत्तर America is the third-largest continent in area, following Asia और Africa, और the fourth in population after एशिया, Africa, and यूरोपीय.
the पहला people to सजीव in उत्तर America यहूद Paleoindians who began to arrive during the पिछला glacial period by crossing the बेरिंग जमीन bridge.
They differentiated into a number of diverse cultures and समुदायों across the continent.
the largest and सबसे advanced Pre-Columbian सभ्यताओं in North America were the aztecs in what is अभी Mexico and the Mayans in Central America.
यूरोपीय colonists began to arrive starting in the 16th and 17th सदियां, wiping आउट विशाल संख्याएँ of the native populations और beginning an era of European दबदबा.
Jermaine Lamarr Cole ( born January 28, 1985 ), better known by his स्टेज name J. Cole, is an American hip-hop रिकॉर्डिंग कलाकार और record निर्माता from fayetteville, North कैरोलिना.
In 2009, he became the पहला कलाकार to sign to Jay-Z 's आरओसी स्वदेश लेबल.
His long-awaited debut एल्बम, entitled Cole World : the Sideline स्टोरी, was released on सितंबर 27, 2011.
The एल्बम debuted at number एक on the US Billboard 200, शीर्ष R & B Albums and शीर्ष Rap एल्बम चार्ट, selling more than 218,000 in its पहला week.
He received a nomination लिये Best New कलाकार at the 54th ग्रैमी पुरस्कार.
The दो प्रमुख वर्ण of the series, Ratchet ( सही ) और Clank ( left ).
Ratchet & Clank is a श्रेणी of मंच वीडियो खेल.
The मताधिकार थी created और developed by Insomniac खेल and प्रकाशित by सोनी कंप्यूटर Entertainment for अनेक अलग PlayStation consoles, such as PlayStation 2 and PlayStation 3 with the exclusion of आकार Matters और Secret एजेंट Clank, जिससे यहूद विकसित by ऊँची Impact Games लिये the PlayStation Portable.
प्रत्येक game in the series has महरूम released for every console, as the IP is owned by सोनी Computer entertainment.
An एनिमेटेड विशेषता film adaptation उत्पादित by Rainmaker Entertainment और Blockade Entertainment is अनुसूचित for a theatrical release sometime in 2015.
the games लो place in a science fiction setting and follow the adventures of Ratchet ( an animalistic human-like character ज्ञात as a lombax, जो is a मैकेनिक ) और clank ( a diminutive, sentient robot ) as they सफर through the ब्रह्मांड, saving it from evil शक्तियां on a regular basis.
The श्रेणी is noted for the inclusion of अनेक exotic and अद्वितीय, over the top weapons और डिवाइस, a concept that insomniac Games also expanded into their अन्य खेल.
a will or testament is a विधिक declaration by जिससे a व्यक्ति, the testator, names एक or more व्यक्तियों to manage his/her एस्टेट and provides लिये the transfer of his property at मौत.
लिये the devolution of property not disposed of by होगा, see inheritance and intestacy.
in the strictest sense, a `` will '' रै historically महरूम limited to रियल प्रॉपर्टी while `` testament '' applies only to dispositions of निजी property ( यूँ giving वृद्धि to the popular शीर्षक of the दस्तावेज़ as `` पिछला होगा और Testament '' ), हालांकि this distinction is seldom observed today.
A होगा may also बनाएँ a testamentary trust कि is effective only after the death of the testator.
The 19.9 mw Gemasolar solar संयंत्र in Spain features 15 hours of storage and can supply power 24 hours a day.
सौर energy, radiant light और heat इससे the सूर्य, has been harnessed by इंसानो since ancient times using a दायरा of ever-evolving technologies.
सौर उर्जा technologies include सौर हीटिंग, solar photovoltaics, सौर thermal विद्युत, solar वास्तुकला और artificial photosynthesis, which can make considerable contributions to solving some of the सबसे urgent energy problems the world now चेहरों.
Solar technologies are broadly characterized as either passive सौर or क्रियाशील solar depending on the way they capture, convert और वितरित सौर energy.
Active सौर तकनीकों शामिल the use of photovoltaic panels और solar thermal collectors to harness the उर्जा.
passive solar techniques include orienting a building to the सूर्य, selecting materials with अनुकूल थर्मल द्रव्यमान or light dispersing properties, and designing spaces कि naturally circulate air.
In 2011, the International Energy Agency said कि `` the विकास of affordable, inexhaustible and clean solar उर्जा technologies will have huge longer-term benefits.
It will बढ़ाएँ countries’ उर्जा security through रिलायंस on an indigenous, inexhaustible और mostly import-independent resource, बढ़ाएँ स्थिरता, reduce pollution, lower the costs of mitigating climate change, और keep fossil fuel कीमतें lower than वरना.
These लाभ are global.
Hence the additional costs of the incentives for जल्दी deployment चाहिए be माना सीखना investments ; वे जरूर be बुद्धिमानी खर्च और need to be widely shared ''.
Sir थामस More ( ; 7 February 14786 जुलाई 1535 ), known to रोमन Catholics as संत Thomas अधिक चूंकि 1935, was an English lawyer, सोशल philosopher, author, statesman, and noted Renaissance humanist.
He was an important councillor to हेनरी VIII of England और थी Lord चांसलर from October 1529 to 16 may 1532.
he was canonized by पोप पायस XI in 1935 as one of the जल्दी martyrs of the schism that अलग the गिरिजाघर of England from Rome in the 16th सदी.
In 2000, Pope John पॉल II declared उसे patron of कैथोलिक कूटनीतिज्ञों और politicians.
More थी an प्रतिद्वन्दी of the प्रोटोस्टेंट Reformation, in particular of मार्टिन Luther and William Tyndale.
However, चूंकि 1980, he is also commemorated by the गिरिजाघर of इंग्लैण्ड as a reformation martyr.
अधिक coined the word `` यूटोपिया `` – a name he दिया to the आदर्श और imaginary island स्वदेश, the political system of which he वर्णित in Utopia, published in 1516.
He opposed the किंग 's विरह from the Roman Catholic Church और refused to accept him as Supreme Head of the Church of England, a शीर्षक which had been given by parliament through the Act of Supremacy of 1534.
He was imprisoned in 1534 for his refusal to लो the शपथ required by the First Succession Act, क्युकी the act disparaged papal Authority और Henry’s marriage to Catherine of Aragon.
in 1535, he was tried for देशद्रोह, convicted on perjured गवाही, and beheaded.
More भी helped to originate the phrase `` grasp at लोभी '' to औसत `` desperately trying even useless things '', in उसके Dialogue of Comfort विरूद्ध Tribulation.
Intellectuals and कूटनीतिज्ञों आरपार Europe were stunned by More 's निष्पादन.
Erasmus saluted him as एक `` whose आत्मा थी more pure than any snow, जिनकी प्रतिभाशाली थी ऐसे that England never had and never again will have इसके like ''.
There was a more controversial side to अधिक 's जीवन, क्युकी he advocated the persecution और execution of protestants who refused to recant their faith.
However, the judgement of history has been largely willing to forgive this in light of the times he जिया in and उसके martyrdom in the रोमन Catholic कारण.
Two सदियां बाद Jonathan स्विफ्ट said More थी `` the person of the greatest virtue this kingdom ever उत्पादित '', a sentiment साथ which Samuel जॉनसन सहमत.
इतिहासकार Hugh trevor-roper कहा in 1977 that अधिक थी `` the first great अंग्रेज whom we महसूस कि we जान, the most saintly of humanists, the most human of saints, the universal man of हमारी cool northern पुनर्जागरण. ''
Captain Nemo, also known as Prince Dakkar, is a fictional character invented by the फ्रेंच science fiction author Jules Verne.
nemo appears in दो of Verne 's novels, Twenty Thousand Leagues Under the Sea ( 1870 ) and The रहस्यमय Island ( 1874 ), and makes a कैमियो appearance in Verne 's play Journey through the Impossible ( 1882 ).
Nemo, one of the most famous antiheroes in fiction, is a रहस्यमय figure.
the बेटे of an Indian Raja, he is a वैज्ञानिक genius who roams the depths of the समुद्र in उसके submarine, the नॉटिलस, which थी निर्मित on a उजाड़ island.
nemo tries to project a stern, controlled confidence, लकिन he is चलित by a thirst for vengeance and a द्वेष of imperialism ( विशेषकर the British साम्राज्य ).
He is also wracked by remorse over the deaths of उसके crew members and even by the मौतों of enemy sailors.
nemo has appeared in विभिन्न adaptations of वर्न 's novels, सहित films, जहाँ he रै been portrayed by a number of different अभिनेताओं.
he has furthermore been adopted by अन्य लेखक लिये समावेश in उनके novels, most notably in Alan Moore 's The League of Extraordinary सज्जनों and Philip जोस Farmer 's the अन्य log of phileas Fogg.

ध्वनिक coupler modem
A modem ( modulator-demodulator ) is a device that modulates an analog carrier सिग्नल to encode digital information, और also demodulates such a carrier signal to डिकोड the transmitted information.
The goal is to produce a सिग्नल कि can be transmitted easily और decoded to reproduce the असली digital आंकड़ा.
Modems can be used over कोई अर्थात् of transmitting analog signals, from light emitting diodes to radio.
The most परिचित उदाहरण is a voice band मॉडेम कि turns the digital आंकड़ा of a निजी computer into modulated electrical signals in the voice frequency दायरा of a टेलीफोन channel.
These signals can be transmitted over telephone लाइनों and demodulated by another modem at the receiver side to recover the digital data.
Modems are generally वर्गीकृत by the amount of data वे can भेजें in a given unit of समय, usually expressed in bits per दूसरी ( bit/s, or bps ), or बाइट्स प्रति दूसरी ( B/s ).
Modems can alternatively be वर्गीकृत by their प्रतीक rate, measured in baud.
the baud unit denotes symbols प्रति दूसरी, or the number of times per second the मॉडेम भेजना a new signal.
लिये उदाहरण, the itu v.21 standard used audio आवृत्ति शिफ़्ट keying with two possible frequencies corresponding to two पृथक symbols ( or one bit प्रति प्रतीक ), to carry 300 बिट्स per दूसरी using 300 baud.
By contrast, the असली ITU V.22 मानक, which थी able to transmit and प्राप्त four पृथक प्रतीकों ( दो bits प्रति symbol ), संभाला 1,200 bit/s by sending 600 symbols प्रति दूसरी ( 600 baud ) using phase shift keying.
The Declaration of Independence is a बयान adopted by the Continental कॉंग्रेस on जुलाई 4, 1776, which announced that the तेरह American colonies, then at युद्ध साथ Great ब्रिटेन, regarded themselves as independent states, and no longer a भाग of the British Empire.
बजाय वे now formed a new nation—the संयुक्त राज्य of America.
जॉन Adams was a leader in pushing for independence, which was unanimously approved on July 2.
A कमेटी had already drafted the formal declaration, to be ready when congress voted on स्वतंत्रता.
Adams persuaded the committee to चुनें Thomas जेफरसन to compose the असली draft of the document, which कॉंग्रेस would edit to उपज the फाइनल संस्करण.
The घोषणा थी ultimately a formal explanation of why कॉंग्रेस had voted on जुलाई 2 to declare स्वतंत्रता इससे Great Britain, more than a year बाद the outbreak of the American क्रांतिकारी युद्ध.
the national birthday, the Independence दिन is मनाये on July 4, हालांकि Adams चाही जुलाई 2.
बाद ratifying the text on जुलाई 4, Congress issued the Declaration of Independence in several forms.
it थी initially published as the printed डनलप broadside कि was widely distributed और पढ़ा to the पब्लिक.
the सबसे famous version of the Declaration, a हस्ताक्षरित copy that is popularly regarded as the Declaration of स्वतंत्रता, is displayed at the नेशनल Archives in Washington, d.c.
Although the wording of the Declaration was approved on July 4, the तिथि of इसके हस्ताक्षर was August 2.
The असली July 4 United राज्य Declaration of Independence manuscript थी खोया while सब other copies have been derived from this असली document.
the स्त्रोत and निर्वचन of the Declaration have been the विषय of much scholarly inquiry.
The घोषणा justified the स्वतंत्रता of the संयुक्त राज्य by listing colonial grievances विरूद्ध King George iii, और by asserting certain natural and विधिक अधिकारों, including a right of क्रान्ति.
having served इसके असली purpose in announcing independence, the text of the Declaration was initially ignored बाद the अमरीकी क्रान्ति.
चूंकि then, it रै आइये to be considered a major statement on human rights, particularly इसके second sentence:
we hold ये सच्चाई to be self-evident, that सब मेन are created बराबर, that वे are endowed by their निर्माता with certain unalienable Rights, that among ये हैं जीवन, स्वतंत्रता और the pursuit of Happiness.
This has been पुकारा `` one of the best-known वाक्य in the English language '', containing `` the सबसे potent और consequential words in American इतिहास. ''
The passage came to represent a moral standard to जिससे the संयुक्त States should नीयत.
This view थी notably प्रचारित by Abraham lincoln, who माना the घोषणा to be the foundation of his political philosophy, and argued that the घोषणा is a statement of principles through जिससे the संयुक्त States Constitution should be interpreted.
It रै inspired कार्य लिये the rights of अधिकारहीन लोगों throughout the संसार.
The अर्थव्यवस्था of ग्रीनलैंड can be characterized as छोटी, मिश्रित and vulnerable.
The present economy consists of a बिग public सेक्टर and व्यापक foreign व्यापार, which रै resulted in an अर्थव्यवस्था with अवधि of strong विकास, considerable inflation, unemployment problems and extreme dependence on capital inflow from डेनमार्क और use of outside, मुख्यतः Danish, skilled labor.
जीडीपी per capita is similar to the औसत यूरोपीय economies but the अर्थव्यवस्था is critically निर्भर upon substantial support from the Danish government, जिससे supplies about half the revenues of the home rule government who in फेरे employ about 8,000 greenlanders out of a मजदूर फ़ोर्स of 40,156 ( Jan. 2012 ).
बेरोजगारी nonetheless remains high, साथ the rest of the economy निर्भर upon माँग for exports of shrimp और fish.
हाइड्रोजन is a chemical element with symbol h और atomic number 1.
साथ an atomic वज़न of ( लिये hydrogen-1 ), हाइड्रोजन is the lightest element and its monatomic रूप ( h1 ) is the most abundant chemical substance, constituting roughly 75 % of the ब्रह्मांड 's baryonic द्रव्यमान.
non- remnant stars हैं मुख्यतः composed of hydrogen in its प्लाज्मा राज्य.
at standard temperature और pressure, हाइड्रोजन is a colorless, गंधहीन, tasteless, non-toxic, nonmetallic, highly combustible diatomic gas with the molecular सूत्र H2.
सबसे of the hydrogen on Earth is in अणुओं such as water और सशुल्क compounds because hydrogen readily forms covalent यौगिकों साथ most non-metallic तत्व.
हाइड्रोजन plays a particularly important भूमिका in acid-base chemistry साथ अनेक reactions exchanging protons between soluble अणुओं.
in ionic compounds, it can take a negative charge ( an anion ज्ञात as a hydride और लिखा as H− ), or as a positively charged species H+.
the latter cation is लिखा as हालांकि composed of a bare प्रोटॉन, लकिन in वास्तविकता, हाइड्रोजन cations in ionic यौगिकों सदा occur as अधिक complex प्रजाति.
The सबसे common समस्थानिक of हाइड्रोजन is protium ( name rarely used, प्रतीक 1H ) with a सिंगल प्रोटॉन और no neutrons.
As the simplest अणु ज्ञात, the hydrogen अणु has been of सैद्धांतिक उपयोग.
For example, as the only न्यूट्रल atom साथ an analytic समाधान to the Schrödinger equation, the study of the energetics और bonding of the hydrogen atom निभाई a key role in the विकास of क्वांटम mechanics.
Hydrogen gas was first artificially उत्पादित in the जल्दी 16th century, via the mixing of धातुओं साथ acids.
in 1766–81, हेनरी कैवेंडिश was the first to recognize that हाइड्रोजन गैस थी a discrete पदार्थ, and that it produces जल जब burned, a property which later दिया it इसके name : in Greek, hydrogen अर्थात् `` water-former ''.
Industrial उत्पादन is मुख्यतः इससे the steam reforming of प्राकृतिक gas, और कम often from अधिक energy-intensive hydrogen production methods like the electrolysis of जल.
Most hydrogen is employed निकट इसके उत्पादन site, with the two largest उपयोग होने fossil fuel processing ( e.g., hydrocracking ) and अमोनिया उत्पादन, ज़्यादातर for the fertilizer market.
हाइड्रोजन is a concern in metallurgy as it can embrittle many धातुओं, complicating the डिज़ाइन of pipelines and storage tanks.

The film, loosely based on the real-life CSX 8888 incident, tells the story of a runaway भाड़ा ट्रैन, and the दो men ( Washington and Pine ) who manage to रोकें it.
It was Scott 's फाइनल feature film before his death in 2012.

it received mostly favorable reviews from film आलोचकों ; it garnered a `` Certified भैस '' rating on Rotten Tomatoes based upon aggregated reviews और a rating of `` generally अनुकूल reviews '' at metacritic.
the film was nominated for an अकादमी Award for Best Sound संपादन at the 83rd अकादमी Awards, but खोया to Inception.
in छायाचित्र, bracketing is the general technique of taking several shots of the same विषय using different कैमरा जमावट.
bracketing is useful and often अनुशंसित in परिस्थितियों that make it difficult to obtain a satisfactory image साथ a single शॉट, especially जब a small विभिन्नता in exposure parameters रै a comparatively large effect on the resulting image.
autobracketing is स्वचालित bracketing by using a setting on the camera to take अनेक bracketed गोलियाँ ( in contrast to the photographer altering the settings by हाथ between each शॉट ).
Given the time it takes to accomplish multiple shots, it is typically, लकिन नहीं always, used for static subjects.
insulated glazing ( ig ), अधिक commonly ज्ञात as double glazing ( or double-pane, और increasingly triple glazing/pane ) हैं दोगुना or triple glass window panes separated by an air or अन्य गैस filled स्पेस to reduce heat ट्रांसफ़र across a भाग of the भवन लिफाफा.
Insulated Glass Units are manufactured साथ कांच in range of मोटाई इससे 3 mm to 10 mm or more in special applications.
laminated or tempered कांच may भी be प्रयुक्त as भाग of the construction.
सबसे इकाई are manufactured with the same मोटाई of glass प्रयुक्त on both panes लकिन special applications such as acoustic attenuation or security may require wide ranges of thicknesses to be incorporated in the वही ईकाई.
a sectioned diagram of a fixed insulated चमकीले Unit ( IGU ), indicating the क्रमांकन convention used in this आलेख.
Surface # 1 is facing बाहर, Surface # 2 is the अंदर surface of the exterior फलक, सतह # 3 is the बाहर surface of the interior pane, and सतह # 4 is the inside सतह of आंतरिक pane.
The खिड़की frame is labelled # 5, a spacer is indicated as # 6, seals हैं shown in रेड ( # 7 ), the internal खुलासा is on the right hand side ( # 8 ) and the exterior windowsill on the left ( # 9 )
to reduce shear effects on the sealed ईकाई ( a प्रमुख cause of असामयिक failure ), निर्माताओं use a नियम of thumb कि permits a अंतर of 1 mm between the मोटाई of the panes of glass प्रयुक्त in the ईकाई और स्टिल maintain the वारंटी लिये the unit.
लिये उदाहरण, a ईकाई may be ordered साथ a 4 mm फलक on the exterior और a 3 mm pane on the आंतरिक.
ये variations are allowed लिये architectural and लागत reasons.
Other combinations can be निर्दिष्ट और produced लकिन the manufacturer may reserve the right to limit the पद of the warranty or refuse to वारंटी the unit altogether.
For ease of वर्णन the surfaces of a double paned unit are named according to the following convention : Surface # 1 ( facing outside ), Surface # 2 ( अंदर of outside pane ), Surface # 3 ( outside of अंदर फलक ) and Surface # 4 ( inside surface of inside फलक ).
applying the corresponding nomenclature for ट्रिपल paned units results in सतहों # 1 through # 6.

सेलेनियम is a chemical element with symbol se और परमाणु क्रमांक 34.
It is a nonmetal with गुण कि are intermediate between those of इसके आवधिक table column-adjacent chalcogen elements sulfur and tellurium.
It rarely occurs in इसके elemental राज्य in प्रकृति, or as pure ore यौगिकों.
Selenium ( Greek σελήνη selene अर्थ `` Moon '' ) थी खोजा in 1817 by Jöns Jacob Berzelius, who noted the similarity of the new element to the previously-known tellurium ( named for the Earth ).
सेलेनियम is found impurely in metal sulfide ores, जहाँ it partially replaces the sulfur.
commercially, selenium is produced as a byproduct in the शोधन of ये ores, सबसे प्रायः दौरान तांबे उत्पादन.
खनिज that हैं pure selenide or selenate compounds are known, but हैं rare.
The मुख्य वाणिज्यिक uses लिये selenium today are in glassmaking and in pigments.
Selenium is a semiconductor and is प्रयुक्त in photocells.
Uses in electronics, once महत्वपूर्ण, have been ज़्यादातर supplanted by सिलिकॉन semiconductor devices.
Selenium continues to be प्रयुक्त in a few प्रकार of dc शक्ति surge protectors और one type of fluorescent quantum बिन्दु.
सेलेनियम salts हैं विषाक्त in विशाल amounts, but trace amounts हैं necessary लिये cellular फलन in अनेक जीवों, सहित सब पशु.
Selenium is a घटक of the antioxidant एंजाइमों glutathione peroxidase and thioredoxin reductase ( which indirectly reduce certain oxidized अणुओं in पशु and कुछ plants ).
It is भी found in तीन deiodinase enzymes, which convert one थायराइड hormone to another.
Selenium आवश्यकताएँ in plants differ by species, साथ कुछ plants requiring अपेक्षाकृत विशाल amounts, और अन्य जाहिर requiring none.
The संयुक्त States अध्यक्षीय चुनाव of 2008 was the 56th quadrennial अध्यक्षीय election.
it was held on मंगलवार, November 4, 2008.
Democrat बराक Obama, then the जूनियर Senator इससे इलिनोइस, defeated Republican John मैक्केन, the senior सीनेटर from Arizona.
As the campaign progressed, the युद्ध in Iraq and outgoing Republican अध्यक्ष जार्ज W. Bush था become increasingly unpopular, and the major-party candidates ran on a platform of बदलें and reform.
Domestic policy and the economy eventually उभरा as the main themes in the last few months of the चुनाव अभियान बाद the onset of the worst recession चूंकि the 1930s.
Obama would go on to win a निर्णायक victory over McCain in both the electoral and लोकप्रिय vote.
ओबामा received the सबसे votes लिये a presidential candidate in अमरीकी history, and won the लोकप्रिय और electoral vote by the largest हाशिया in 12 years, as well as the largest प्रतिशत of the popular vote लिये a Democrat in nearly a half-century.
This थी the first u.S. अध्यक्षीय चुनाव in which an अफ़्रीकी American was elected, having also been the first in जिससे an African अमरीकी won the nomination of either प्रमुख party.
This चुनाव was भी notable लिये being the first time in U.S. history कि both major party उम्मीदवार यहूद बैठे U.S. Senators, only the तीसरा time ( after 1920 और 1960 ) that कोई sitting U.S. सीनेटर was निर्वाचित अध्यक्ष, and only the दूसरी समय कि the winning President and Vice President ( ओबामा and बिडेन ) were both sitting U.S. Senators.
इस थी also the first election चूंकि 1952 in which neither of the प्रमुख parties ' नामांकित थी the incumbent President or वाइस President.
The Sovereign Prince or Princess of मोनाको is the reigning monarch and head of state of the Principality of मोनाको.
All princes or राजकुमारियों have officially taken the name of the House of Grimaldi, but have belonged to विभिन्न अन्य घरों ( Goyon de matignon, polignac ) in पुरूष लकीर.
The reigning Prince is Albert II.
कल्पना of fragmentation और तब of defragmentation
In the मेंटेनेंस of संचिका systems, defragmentation is a प्रक्रम that reduces the राशि of fragmentation.
it does this by physically organizing the contents of the द्रव्यमान storage device used to store फाइलें into the smallest number of contiguous regions ( fragments ).
it भी attempts to create larger regions of फ़्री space using compaction to impede the वापसी of fragmentation.
Some defragmentation utilities कोशिश to keep छोटी फाइलें भीतर a single directory साथ, as they हैं often accessed in sequence.
Defragmentation is लाभदायक and relevant to file प्रणालियों on electromechanical disk drives.
the गति of the hard drive 's read/write heads over different areas of the डिस्क when accessing fragmented files is slower, compared to accessing the entire सामग्री of a non-fragmented file sequentially without चलती the read/write heads to तलाश other fragments.
A service-level agreement ( SLA ) is a part of a service अनुबंध where a सेवा is formally defined.
In अभ्यास, the term SLA is sometimes used to refer to the contracted delivery समय ( of the service or performance ).
As an example, internet सेवा providers will commonly include service level agreements भीतर the शर्तें of their contracts with customers to define the level ( s ) of सेवा होने sold in plain language शर्तें.
In this case the SLA will typically have a technical definition in शर्तें of mean time between failures ( MTBF ), mean time to repair or mean time to recovery ( mttr ) ; विभिन्न आंकड़ा rates ; throughput ; jitter ; or similar measurable details.
Union स्टेशन is a former shopping mall in संघ City, Georgia, in southwest मैट्रो Atlanta सटा to Interstate 85.
After new ownership and renovations in 2006, the नाम was changed from Shannon southpark मॉल in 2007 to Union Station मॉल.

इस map shows the संलग्न United States and, in insets at the निम्नतर left, the दो राज्य that are नहीं contiguous.
The contiguous संयुक्त राज्य are the 48 adjoining U.S. राज्य on the continent of North America कि are दक्षिण of Canada और उत्तर of मैक्सिको, प्लस the District of कोलंबिया.
The term excludes the states of Alaska and हवाई, और all off-shore U.S. territories and possessions, such as प्यूर्टो Rico.
साथ, the 48 contiguous states and D.C. occupy a संयुक्त area of, which is 1.58 % of the कुल surface area of the Earth.
Of this, is land, composing 83.65 % of U.S. land area.
officially, is जल area, composing 62.66 % of the nation 's water area.
The 2010 जनसांख्यिकी population was 306,675,006, composing 99.33 % of the nation 's जनसांख्यिकी, and a density of 103.639 inhabitants/sq mi ( 40.015/km2 ), compared to 87.264/sq mi ( 33.692/km2 ) for the nation as a पूरे.

Utilization प्रबन्धन is the evaluation of the appropriateness, medical need और efficiency of health परवाह services procedures and facilities according to स्थापित criteria or guidelines and under the provisions of an applicable स्वास्थ्य benefits plan.
typically it includes नई activities or निर्णय based upon the analysis of a case.
utilization प्रबन्धन describes proactive procedures, सहित निर्वहन नियोजन, concurrent नियोजन, pre-certification और नैदानिक मामला appeals.
It also covers proactive processes, such as concurrent नैदानिक reviews and peer reviews, as खूब as appeals introduced by the प्रदाता, payer or patient.
As pre-certification and concurrent review of cases grew, utilization management spun आउट of utilization review.
While not synonymous, स्वास्थ्य परवाह पेशेवर tend to use the terms as interchangeable.
the अंतर is utilization management is and intends to मैनेज health care cases efficiently और cost effectively before और दौरान स्वास्थ्य परवाह प्रशासन.
Utilization review is more considering whether स्वास्थ्य care थी appropriately applied बाद it थी administered.
There are four basic techniques in utilization management:
माँग प्रबन्धन
Utilization पुनर्विलोकन
Case Management
बीमारी Management
the Outsiders is a coming-of-age अनोखा by S. E. hinton, first published in 1967 by Viking Press.

hinton was 18 when the book was published.
The book follows two rival समूह, the greasers and the Socs ( pronounced by the लेखक as, short for socials ), जो are विभाजित by उनके socioeconomic status.
the book takes place in तुलसा, ओक्लाहोमा, in 1965, but it is never stated in the book.

The संयुक्त States House of Representatives is एक of the दो घरों of the United States कॉंग्रेस ( a bicameral legislature ).
it is frequently referred to as the House.
the अन्य हाउस is the Senate.
The संयोजन और powers of the हाउस हैं established in Article One of the United राज्य संविधान.
the प्रमुख शक्ति of the हाउस is to pass federal legislation कि affects the entire country although its बिल्स जरूर भी be passed by the सीनेट और further सहमत to by the U.S. अध्यक्ष before becoming विधि ( जबतक both the House और Senate re-pass the विधान with a two-thirds बहुमत in each chamber ).
The हाउस has several exclusive शक्तियां : the शक्ति to initiate revenue bills, to impeach officials, और to elect the U.S. अध्यक्ष in मामला वहीँ is no majority in the Electoral College.
Each U.S. state is represented in the House in proportion to इसके population लकिन is entitled to at least एक representative.
The most populous state, California, फिलहाल रै 53 representatives.
The total number of voting प्रतिनिधि is फिक्स्ड by law at 435.
प्रत्येक प्रतिनिधि serves लिये a two-year term.
the Speaker of the United States हाउस of प्रतिनिधि, who presides over the कक्ष, is elected by the सदस्यों of the हाउस, and is therefore traditionally the leader of the हाउस लोकतांत्रिक caucus or the हाउस रिपब्लिकन Conference, whichever party has more मतदान members.
The हाउस meets in the दक्षिण wing of the संयुक्त States Capitol.
A सप्लाई chain is actually a जटिल and डायनेमिक सप्लाई and demand network.
( cf. wieland/wallenburg, 2011 )
a supply chain is a प्रणाली of organizations, people, activities, information, और resources involved in चलती a product or सेवा from supplier to customer.
सप्लाई chain activities transform natural संसाधन, कच्चा सामग्री, and components into a finished product that is delivered to the समाप्त customer.
in sophisticated सप्लाई chain प्रणालियों, प्रयुक्त products may re-enter the supply chain at any पाइंट where residual value is recyclable.
सप्लाई chains कड़ी value जंजीरों.
`` Purple haze '' is a song लिखा और recorded by Jimi Hendrix in 1967, released as the second सिंगल by The Jimi Hendrix Experience in both the संयुक्त Kingdom and the United States.
it later appeared on the अमरीकी संस्करण of the बैंड 's 1967 album हैं तुम अनुभवी.
`` जामुनी haze '' has become एक of the `` archetypical psychedelic drug songs of the sixties ''.
`` जामुनी Haze 's '' guitar virtuosic techniques would be emulated by अनेक metal guitarists.
a close up चित्र of a rhinoceros skin.
स्किन is the soft outer covering of vertebrates.
Other एनिमल coverings such as the सन्धिपाद बहि have different developmental origin, structure and chemical composition.
The adjective cutaneous means `` of the skin '' ( from लैटिन cutis, स्किन ).
In स्तनधारियों, the skin is the largest अंग of the integumentary system made up of अनेक परतों of ectodermal ऊतक, and guards the underlying मांसपेशियां, bones, ligaments और internal organs.
Skin of a different प्रकृति exists in amphibians, सरीसृपों, and पक्षियों.
All mammals have कुछ बाल on उनके स्किन, भी marine mammals which appear to be hairless.
The स्किन interfaces with the पर्यावरण और is the first line of defense इससे external factors.
For उदाहरण, the स्किन plays a key role in protecting the देह विरूद्ध pathogens और excessive water loss.
Its other functions हैं इन्सुलेशन, तापमान विनियमन, sensation, and the उत्पादन of विटामिन D folates.
severely damaged स्किन may चंगा by forming scar tissue.
इस is sometimes discoloured and depigmented.
the thickness of skin भी varies from location to location on an organism.
In इंसानो लिये example, the skin located under the eyes and around the eyelids is the thinnest स्किन in the body at 0.5 mm मोटा, and is one of the first areas to show signs of aging such as `` crows feet '' and झुर्रियां.
The skin on the palms and the soles of the feet is 4 mm thick and the thickest skin in the body.
Fur is dense hair.
primarily, fur augments the इन्सुलेशन the skin provides लकिन can also serve as a द्वितीयक sexual characteristic or as camouflage.
on some animals, the skin is बहुत मुश्किल और thick, और can be processed to create leather.
Reptiles and fish have hard सुरक्षात्मक तराजू on their skin for protection, and birds have मुश्किल feathers, सब made of tough β- keratins.
Amphibian skin is not a दमदार barrier to ड्योढ़ी of chemicals and is प्रायः subject to osmosis and diffusive forces.
लिये example, a frog sitting in an anesthetic solution would be sedated quickly, as the chemical diffuses through its स्किन.
थामस Scott
The रेव. थामस स्कॉट ( 1747-1821 ) was an influential preacher and author who is प्रधानतया ज्ञात for his best-selling work A commentary on The Whole Bible and the Force of Truth, और as one of the founders of the Church Missionary Society.
डेनियल Radcliffe, who portrays Harry Potter, रै महरूम the icon of the फिल्मी series since the release of the पहला फिल्मी in 2001.
कुछ of the most प्रसिद्ध अभिनेताओं of the United Kingdom and Ireland have voiced or portrayed वर्ण appearing in the हैरी Potter फिल्मी series based on the book series by J. K. रोलिंग.
डेनियल Radcliffe, Rupert grint and Emma Watson have निभाई हैरी Potter, Ron Weasley और Hermione Granger in all the films.
जब वे यहूद cast तभी radcliffe had previously acted in a film.
Complementing them on screen हैं such अभिनेताओं as हेलेना Bonham Carter, Jim broadbent, John Cleese, Robbie Coltrane, Warwick Davis, Ralph Fiennes, माइकल Gambon, Brendan Gleeson, रिचर्ड ग्रीफिथ, Richard Harris, John ठेस, जेसन isaacs, Miriam Margolyes, हेलेन mccrory, Gary oldman, Alan Rickman, फिओना Shaw, Maggie स्मिथ, Timothy Spall, Imelda staunton, दाउद thewlis, Emma Thompson, और जूली walters, among अन्य.
Thirteen actors have appeared as the वही character in all eight films of the franchise.
Some well-known British अभिनेताओं जो have नहीं appeared in the series, हैं पूछा in jest why वे have नहीं महरूम डाल.
जब David Yates थी directing the fifth film, विधेयक Nighy, who था previously collaborated with Yates on three of his टेलीविज़न प्रोजेक्ट, said that he joked साथ येट्स that संभवतः now he would n't be the only actor in इंग्लैण्ड जो था n't महरूम in Harry कुम्हार.
`` लकिन nobody पुकारा '', Nighy added.
But in 2009, येट्स डाल nighy as Minister of जादू rufus scrimgeour in deathly hallows.
Nighy said, `` I am no longer the only English actor नहीं to be in Harry Potter and i am बहुत pleased. ''
Jude Law has quipped, `` nobody 's asked me.
I was a bit too old लिये Harry ''.
जब a रिपोर्टर compared potions प्राध्यापक Horace slughorn 's obsession with famous names to the series ' कनेक्शन to `` every notable British actor, '' Jim Broadbent, who plays slughorn कहा, `` खूब, not every कर्ता gets invited.
i know कुछ who are still प्रतीक्षारत. ''

The सूची नीचे is sorted by film और character, as कुछ characters have महरूम portrayed by multiple अभिनेताओं.
Key
( v ) indicates the actor or actress lent only his or her आवाज़ लिये his or उसके film अक्षर
( y ) indicates the कर्ता or actress portrayed the भूमिका in a flashback झाँकी or जब the character थी young.
( f ) indicates the कर्ता or अभिनेत्री किया not appear in कोई new footage लिये the film ; फुटेज from an earlier film or films was used.

A twelve-step कार्यक्रम is a नियत of guiding principles ( accepted by members as 'spiritual सिद्धान्त, ' based on the approved साहित्य ) outlining a course of action for recovery इससे, मजबूरी, or other behavioral समस्याएं.
Originally proposed by alcoholics Anonymous ( AA ) as a method of रिकवरी from alcoholism, the बारह कदम were पहला published in the book Alcoholics Anonymous : the स्टोरी of How More than One Hundred Men Have Recovered from Alcoholism in 1939.
The method was then adapted and became the foundation of other twelve-step कार्यक्रम.
As summarized by the अमरीकी Psychological Association, the प्रक्रम involves the following:
admitting कि one can नहीं कंट्रोल एक 's व्यसन or compulsion ;
recognizing a उच्चतर power that can give strength ;
examining पास्ट errors साथ the सहायता of a प्रायोजक ( experienced member ) ;
making amends for these त्रुटियाँ ;
learning to live a new जीवन साथ a नई code of बर्ताव ;
helping others who suffer इससे the वही addictions or compulsions.
Witness महाभियोग, in the law of प्रमाण of the United States, is the process of calling into question the credibility of an individual who is testifying in a विचारण.
The Federal Rules of Evidence contain the नियम governing महाभियोग in federal courts.
Party leaders and whips of the United States House of Representatives are elected by their संबंधित पार्टियों in a closed-door caucus by रहस्य ballot and are भी ज्ञात as floor leaders.
The U.S. हाउस of Representatives करता नहीं officially use the term `` अल्पसंख्यक Leader '' हालांकि the मीडिया अक्सर do.
The हाउस instead uses the terms `` रिपब्लिकन नेता '' or `` Democratic नेता '' depending on which party holds a minority of सीटे.

Following the outbreak of World युद्ध i in 1914, the German Army opened the Western Front by first आक्रमणकारी ध्वज and Belgium, तब gaining सैन्य control of महत्वपूर्ण industrial regions in France.
the tide of the advance थी dramatically turned साथ the बैटल of the Marne.
following the race to the sea, both sides dug in along a meandering line of fortified trenches, stretching from the उत्तर Sea to the Swiss frontier साथ फ़्रांस.
इस line remained essentially unchanged for सबसे of the युद्ध.
Between 1915 और 1917 there were several major offensives साथ इस front.
the attacks employed massive artillery bombardments and massed infantry अग्रिम.
However, a combination of entrenchments, यंत्र gun nests, barbed wire, और तोपखाने repeatedly inflicted severe हताहत on the attackers and counterattacking defenders.
as a परिणाम, no significant अग्रिम यहूद made.
among the most costly of these offensives were the Battle of Verdun with a संयुक्त [ अनुमानित ] 700,000 dead, the बैटल of the somme साथ more than [ an estimated ] million हताहत, और the Battle of passchendaele साथ roughly [ an estimated ] 600,000 casualties.
In an effort to ब्रेक the deadlock, this सामने saw the introduction of नई सैन्य प्रौद्योगिकी, including poison gas, aircraft and tanks.
But it थी तभी बाद the adoption of improved tactics that कुछ उपाधि of गतिशीलता थी restored.
The जर्मनी वसन्त Offensive of 1918 was made possible by the Treaty of Brest-Litovsk कि चिह्नित the end of the conflict on the Eastern सामने.
using the recently-introduced infiltration tactics, the German सेना उन्नत nearly to the west, which चिह्नित the deepest अग्रिम by either side चूंकि 1914 और very nearly succeeded in forcing a breakthrough.
In spite of the generally stagnant nature of this सामने, this थिएटर would prove निर्णायक.
The inexorable advance of the Allied armies दौरान the second हाफ of 1918 persuaded the जर्मनी commanders कि defeat was inevitable, और the government was मजबूर to sue लिये conditions of an armistice.
The terms of सलाम यहूद सहमत upon with the signing of the सन्धि of Versailles in 1919.

Because इस position is traditionally filled by the wife of the अध्यक्ष of the United States, the शीर्षक is सबसे often applied to the बीवी of a बैठे president.

बाद her husband Barack Obama was re-elected on नवम्बर 6, 2012, she is scheduled to serve until जनवरी 20, 2017.
सेप्टिक shock is a चिकित्सा condition as a result of severe infection and sepsis, though the microbe may be systemic or localized to a particular साईट.
It can cause multiple organ dysfunction सिंड्रोम ( formerly ज्ञात as multiple organ failure ) and मौत.
इसके सबसे common पीड़ितों are children, immunocompromised individuals, और the elderly, as उनके immune systems can नहीं सौदे with the infection as effectively as those of healthy adults.
अक्सर, मरीजों suffering from सेप्टिक shock are cared लिये in intensive care units.
The मृत्यु rate इससे सेप्टिक shock is लगभग 25–50 %.
Kevin brereton ( born फ़रवरी 20, 1972 ), बेहतर ज्ञात by उसके stage name k-os ( ; `` chaos '' ), is a Canadian rapper, singer, songwriter और record producer.
His given नाम may also be cited as Kheaven, a स्पेलिंग he later adopted.
the alias `` k-os '', spelled with a निम्नतर case `` k '', was intended to be less aggressive than the pseudonyms of other rappers whose names यहूद all upper case, such as KRS-One.
it is an acronym for `` ज्ञान of स्वः, '' हालांकि in a later इंटरव्यू he कहा कि it originally stood for `` Kevin 's असली Sound. '' k-os ' music incorporates a wide variety of music genres, सहित rap, funk, rock, and reggae.
The lyrics अक्सर फ़ोकस on promoting a `` positive message '' जबकि at times expressing आलोचना of मुख्यधारा हिप hop संस्कृति 's obsession with money, कीर्ति और glorification of violence.
A musician as खूब as a producer, k-os has written और produced nearly प्रत्येक भाग of all चार of his एल्बम.
k-os प्रायः performs साथ a सजीव band, something that is uncommon in the hip हॉप विधा.
He sometimes plays guitar and कुंजीपटल दोनो during सजीव performances and in the studio.
k-os प्राप्त his first musical exposure साथ the single `` Musical Essence '', released in 1993.
बाद the release of his second single `` वृद्धि जैसे the सूर्य '' in 1996, he withdrew from the उद्योग because he थी असंतुष्ट with his musical style.
He reappeared briefly in 1999 and released his debut album Exit in 2002.
The एल्बम प्राप्त धनात्मक समीक्षाएँ but बेची relatively few नक़ल.
He released उसके second album Joyful Rebellion in 2004, जिससे received platinum औकात in कनाडा.
A third album,, थी released in 2006 and also went प्लेटिनम.
उसके fourth album, Yes !
, थी released in 2009.
उसके fifth album ब्लैक on सुनहरे was released in 2013.

The वर्दी वाणिज्यिक Code ( UCC or the कोड ), पहला published in 1952, is एक of a क्रमांक of uniform अधिनियमों that have been promulgated in संयोजन with efforts to harmonize the law of बिक्री और अन्य वाणिज्यिक transactions in सब 50 states within the संयुक्त States of अमेरिका.
multi-pitch climbing is the ascent of climbing routes with एक or more stops at a belay station.
प्रत्येक section of actual climbing between stops at the belay stations is पुकारा a पिच.
The leader ascends the पिच, रखकर गियर and stopping to लंगर themselves to the belay station.
the कारण लिये the stops can be संकल्पित by choice, convention or necessity.
For example:
the rope is too short to do the entire route in one pitch ( necessity ).
The नेता रै run out of protective gear ( necessity ).
वहीँ is a सुविधाजनक protectable कगार, or फिक्स्ड bolts लगाई by पिछला climbers, at the स्थान लिये a belay स्टेशन ( सम्मेलन ).
The leader chooses to rest or एक्सचेंज लीड before the next खण्ड of the climb ( choice ).
The general purpose of ये stops is to allow the दूसरी to ascend to the पाइंट of the सीसे climber while collecting the protective gear from the route in the course of the सीसे climber 's ascent.
at the belay station, the सुरक्षात्मक gear is collected, possibly exchanged to a new leader, and the leader of the अगला पिच ascends the route.

in अमरीकी football, each team has eleven players on the field at one time.
The विशिष्ट role कि a player takes on the field is called their स्थिति.
Under the आधुनिक नियम of American football, teams are allowed unlimited subsititutions, कि is teams may change any number of खिलाड़ी after any play.
This has resulted in the विकास of three `` platoons '' of players, the ठोकर ( the team साथ the बॉल, जो is trying to score ), the defense ( the टोली trying to prevent the other team from scoring, and to take the बॉल from उन्हें ), और the खास टीमों ( who play in kicking situations ).
Within those platoons, various विशिष्ट positions exist depending on कया the player 's प्रमुख जॉब is.
the नियंत्रित Substances Act ( CSA ) was enacted into law by the कॉंग्रेस of the United States as Title ii of the Comprehensive Drug Abuse Prevention and Control Act of 1970.
The सीएसए is the federal U.S. drug नीति under which the manufacture, importation, कब्ज़ा, use and distribution of निश्चित substances is regulated.
The Act भी परोसा as the national implementing legislation लिये the Single Convention on narcotic Drugs.
the legislation निर्मित five schedules ( classifications ), with varying qualifications for a substance to be शामिल in each.
Two संघीय agencies, the ड्रग Enforcement Administration and the खाना and Drug Administration, determine which substances are added to or removed from the विभिन्न schedules, though the statute passed by Congress निर्मित the आरंभिक लिस्टिंग, और Congress रै sometimes scheduled other substances through legislation such as the Hillory J. Farias and Samantha reid date-rape रोकथाम अधिनियम of 2000, which लगाई गामा hydroxybutyrate in Schedule I. Classification decisions are required to be made on criteria सहित potential for abuse ( an अपरिभाषित पद ), फिलहाल accepted medical use in उपचार in the United राज्य, and international treaties.
The Wayne Route 23 Transit बीच is a New जर्सी Transit park-and-ride स्टेशन in Wayne, New जर्सी along the Montclair-Boonton Line that provides bus service to New यॉर्क City और विभिन्न other points in the क्षेत्रफल as well as montclair-boonton लकीर train सेवा to New York, Hoboken, and इंटरमीडिएट अंक साथ the line between hackettstown and montclair राज्य विश्वविद्यालयों.
It is स्तिथ off of the southbound lanes of New जर्सी Route 23 on West Belt Road, near the interchange where रूट 23, Interstate 80, and U.S. रूट 46 meet, across from the Willowbrook Mall.
The station opened in January 2008 और रै 1,000 पार्किंग spaces.
New Jersey Transit intends लिये इस संयुक्त rail और bus स्टेशन to become an `` interceptor स्टेशन, '' कि will help relieve the habitual जमघट at the West Belt Road Interchange, जहाँ the three major राजमार्गों meet.
In जोड, the construction of the station थी meant to also आसानी the जमघट at what was then रूट 23 Park & Ride, a बस डिपो on Route 23 उत्तर that has चूंकि been renamed Mother 's Park & Ride, and the Willowbrook Mall Park & Ride ; the now-mother 's साईट था सीमित पार्किंग while NJT was having trouble with overfull parking areas at Willowbrook.
the Wayne Township bus garage is located on the opposite side of रूट 23.
वहीँ has महरूम a proposal to build a पार्किंग डेक with another thousand spots and develop the जमीन at the station.
in जोड to Montclair-Boonton trains, the Transit Center is served by the following नई Jersey Transit bus लकीरs:
