748 to Willowbrook Mall और paterson
The at sign @ is भी commonly called the at symbol, ampersat, apetail or commercial at in english—and less commonly a चौड़ी range of other शर्तें.
The fact that there is no single word in अंग्रेज़ी for the प्रतीक रै prompted some लेखक to use the फ्रेंच arobase or स्पेनी and पुर्तगाली arroba—or to coin नई शब्द such as asperand, ampersat—but none of ये रै हासिल wide करेंसी.
originally an हिसाब and commercial चालान abbreviation अर्थ `` at the rate of '' ( e.g. 7 widgets @ $ 2 = $ 14 ), it was नहीं शामिल on the keyboard of the earliest commercially कामयाब typewriters, but थी on at तनिक एक 1889 model and the बहुत successful underwood मॉडल from the `` Underwood no. 5 '' in 1900 onward.
It is now universally included on कंप्यूटर keyboards.
In recent सालो, इसके meaning रै grown to include the sense of being `` located at, '' `` और, '' or `` directed at '', especially in ईमेल addresses और social media, विशेषकर Twitter.
the mark is एनकोडेड at.
the Catcher in the rye is a 1951 अनोखा by J. D. Salinger.
Originally प्रकाशित for वयस्कों, it रै चूंकि become लोकप्रिय साथ adolescent readers लिये इसके themes of teenage angst और alienation.
It रै been translated into almost all of the world 's प्रमुख languages.
Around 250,000 नक़ल are बेची each year with total बिक्री of अधिक than 65 लाख books.
the अनोखा 's समर्थक and antihero, Holden Caulfield, has become an प्रतीक लिये teenage rebellion.
the novel was शामिल on Times 2005 list of the 100 बेहतरीन english-language novels written since 1923, and it थी named by आधुनिक Library and its पाठक as one of the 100 best English-language novels of the 20th सदी.
It has been frequently challenged in the United States and other countries लिये इसके उदार use of profanity and portrayal of sexuality.
It भी deals साथ complex issues of पहचान, belonging, connection, and alienation.
skeletal muscles homo sapiens
इस is a table of muscles of the इंसान anatomy.
There are लगभग 642 skeletal muscles within the typical इंसान, and लगभग प्रत्येक muscle constitutes one part of a pair of identical bilateral muscles, found on both पहलू, resulting in लगभग 320 pairs of muscles, as presented in this article.
Nevertheless, the exact number is difficult to define क्युकी different स्त्रोत समूह मांसपेशियां differently, e.g. regarding कया is defined as different parts of a single muscle or as अनेक muscles.
Examples range इससे 640 to 850.
the muscles of the इंसान देह can be categorized into a number of groups which include मांसपेशियां relating to the सिर और गर्दन, मांसपेशियां of the torso or ट्रंक, muscles of the अपर limbs, and मांसपेशियां of the निम्नतर limbs.
the action refers to the action of प्रत्येक muscle इससे the मानक anatomical position.
In other positions, other क्रियाएँ may be performed.
ख़राब लड़कियों क्लबों ( BGC ) is an अमरीकी reality television श्रेणी created by Jonathan मरे for the Oxygen television station.
The दिखाएँ centers on सात feisty और शरारती महिलाओं with different backgrounds and personalities, जो have a number of मनोवैज्ञानिक and behavioral problems.
वे हैं introduced to the दिखाएँ off their घातक बर्ताव और accomplish विशिष्ट goals.
The cast, deemed `` bad लड़कियों '', enjoy a luxurious lifestyle in a fine mansion for three months, दौरान which they must obey specified नियम.
Their जीवनदान inside – और outside – of the house are chronicled and recorded by the उत्पादन टोली.
the ख़राब Girls क्लबों is broadcast in पाँच countries ( United States, Netherlands, Australia, Hungary, and Sweden ).
It रै received negative समीक्षाएँ from आलोचकों, who believe the दिखाएँ promotes हिंसा by adolescent दर्शक.
Furthermore, several डाल members made controversial remarks which outraged अनेक viewers.
The स्वरूप of the show रै changed from early seasons.
if a `` bad लड़की '' breaks a नियम, वो is evicted from the show और, if it is early in the ऋतु, replaced by a new `` bad लड़की ''.
There have been nine complete seasons of The Bad Girls क्लबों, with the tenth ऋतु फिलहाल airing.
The चौथी ऋतु had the highest ratings in the show 's history, बनने its `` breakthrough ऋतु ''.
वहीँ have been three spin-offs of The Bad Girls क्लबों.
One of उन्हें, Love Games : ख़राब Girls Need प्रेम too, where पास्ट cast members seek सच्चा love, रै gained ऊँची ratings.
Oxygen रै also released a mobile game, comic स्ट्रिप and merchandise to promote the show.
Of the 92 contestants, Kerry Harvick ( of season one ) was a successful देश सिंगर पहले the show.
tanisha Thomas ( of season two ) later hosted Oxygen 's oxygenlive !
और the subsequent seasons of प्रेम Games : ख़राब लड़कियों need प्रेम Too.
थामस, who has महरूम उतावले the `` godmother '' to सब contestants, रै her own टेलीविज़न documentary entitled Tanisha gets Married.
As of Season 8 she 's been the host of the पुनर्मिलन specials.
The Iowa सीनेट is the upper house of the Iowa सामान्य Assembly.
There हैं 50 सीटे in the आयोवा Senate, representing 50 single-member districts across the state साथ populations of approximately 60,927 per constituency,.
Each सीनेट district is रचित of दो हाउस districts.
the Senate meets at the Iowa राज्य Capitol in देस moines.
Unlike the lower house, the आयोवा House of प्रतिनिधि, Senators serve four-year terms, साथ half of the Senate लड़खड़ाते for re-election every दो सालो.
There are no term limits लिये the सीनेट.
Mechanical repair
Maintenance, repair, and परिचालन ( mro ) or मेंटेनेंस, मरम्मत, and overhaul involves fixing कोई sort of mechanical, plumbing or विद्युत यंत्र चाहिए it become आउट of order or broken ( ज्ञात as repair, unscheduled or casualty maintenance ).
It also शामिल performing दिनचर्या actions which keep the यंत्र in working order ( known as अनुसूचित maintenance ) or prevent trouble from arising ( preventive maintenance ).
MRO may be defined as, `` सब क्रियाएँ जिससे have the उद्देश्य of retaining or restoring an मद in or to a राज्य in which it can perform इसके required फलन.
the actions include the combination of all तकनीकी और सम्बन्धित administrative, managerial, and supervision actions. ''
mro operations can be categorised by whether the उत्पाद remains the प्रॉपर्टी of the ग्राहक, i.e. a service is होने offered, or whether the उत्पाद is bought by the reprocessing संगठन and sold to कोई customer wishing to make the खरीदें ( Guadette, 2002 ).
In the former मामला it may be a backshop operation within a larger organisation or smaller operation.
the former of ये represents a बंद लूप supply कड़ी and प्रायः रै the पैमाना of maintenance, repair or of the product.
The latter of the categorisations is an खोलें loop supply chain और is typified by refurbishment और remanufacture.
The main characteristic of the closed loop system is that the demand for a उत्पाद is matched with the सप्लाई of a used उत्पाद.
Neglecting asset write-offs and exceptional activities the total population of the product between the ग्राहक और the service provider remains constant.
प्रिंस William, Duke of Cambridge ( विलियम Arthur Philip लुई ; born 21 June 1982 ), is the elder son of Charles, प्रिंस of Wales, और डायना, Princess of वेल्स, and third-eldest grandchild of Queen Elizabeth II और Prince फिलिप, ड्यूक of एडिनबर्ग.
he is second in the line of उत्तराधिकार, पीछे उसके father, to the thrones of सोलह स्वतंत्र sovereign states ज्ञात as the Commonwealth realms : the United Kingdom, Canada, Australia, New Zealand, जमैका, बारबाडोस, The बहामा, हरा, पापुआ नई Guinea, the सुलेमान Islands, तुवालू, Saint लूसिया, Saint विंसेंट और the Grenadines, Belize, अण्टीगुआ and Barbuda, and Saint Kitts and नेविस.
Prince William was educated at चार schools in the संयुक्त Kingdom और obtained a degree from the University of St Andrews.
He खर्च parts of a गैप year in चिली, Belize, Tanzania, and कीनिया where he रै जिया और holidayed अनेक times.
प्रिंस William रै also taken Kiswahili अध्ययन at विश्वविद्यालयों in कीनिया and Tanzania.
He was commissioned as a Lieutenant in the ब्लूज़ and Royals Regiment of the Household प्यादे —serving with his bhai Prince Harry —and, two सालो later, earned his wings by completing पायलट training at royal Air Force College cranwell.
in 2009, he transferred to the Royal Air फ़ोर्स, was promoted to Flight Lieutenant and underwent हेलीकाप्टर flying training in अनुक्रम to become a full-time pilot with the Search और Rescue Force.
in 2010, he completed his general और special-to-type helicopter प्रशिक्षण and गई on to RAF घाटी on No. 22 Squadron performing co-pilot duties on फलक a Sea King search and rescue हेलीकाप्टर.
प्रिंस William married उसके longtime girlfriend, Catherine Middleton, on 29 April 2011 at वेस्टमिंस्टर Abbey.
Hours prior to his विवाह, Prince William was created Duke of Cambridge, अर्ल of strathearn, and सामन्त carrickfergus.
DeAndre cortez Way ( born July 28, 1990 ), बेहतर ज्ञात by his stage name soulja लड़के Tell 'Em, or simply Soulja Boy, is an American rapper, रिकार्ड producer, कर्ता, and entrepreneur.
In September 2007, his single `` crank कि ( Soulja Boy ) `` reached क्रमांक एक on the बिलबोर्ड hot 100.
The single was initially self-published on the अंतरजाल, and it बाद became a number-one hit in the संयुक्त States लिये सात non-consecutive सप्ताह starting in September 2007.
On August 17 Way was सूचीबद्ध at # 18 on the Forbes list of hip-hop Cash किंग्स of 2010 कमाई $ 7 million for that year.
Way has currently released तीन studio albums and एक स्वतंत्र एल्बम : उसके डेब्यू स्टुडियो album souljaboytellem.com ( 2007 ) was certified platinum by the RIAA.
however, उसके next two एल्बम, iSouljaBoyTellem ( 2008 ) and The DeAndre Way ( 2010 ) did नहीं match the commercial success of his debut, the latter तभी selling 100,000 नक़ल, despite the success of several singles across दोनो albums, ऐसे as `` Kiss me Thru the फोन `` and `` फेरे my Swag On `` ( isouljaboytellem ) and `` Pretty Boy Swag `` ( The deandre Way ).
This was mainly due to negotiation समस्याएं with Interscope रिकॉर्ड which meant a सीमित amount of records यहूद बना available to the public.
as of 2011, Way has पुष्टि he is working on his चौथी स्टुडियो album, entitled USA ड्रे, which will be released in 2013.
The electron transport कड़ी in the mitochondrion is the site of oxidative phosphorylation in eukaryotes.
The nadh and succinate generated in the citric acid cycle are oxidized, providing energy to power ATP synthase.
Photosynthetic electron transport chain of the thylakoid झिल्ली.
an electron transport chain ( ETC ) couples इलेक्ट्रॉन ट्रांसफ़र between an electron donor ( such as nadh ) and an इलेक्ट्रॉन acceptor ( ऐसे as o2 ) with the ट्रांसफ़र of H+ ions ( protons ) across a झिल्ली.
the resulting electrochemical proton gradient is used to generate रासायनिक उर्जा in the form of एडीनोसिन ट्राइफॉस्फेट ( एटीपी ).
Electron transport chains are the सेल्यूलर mechanisms प्रयुक्त लिये extracting उर्जा from sunlight in photosynthesis and also from redox प्रतिक्रियाएँ, such as the oxidation of sugars ( respiration ).
In chloroplasts, लाइट drives the conversion of water to oxygen and nadP+ to nadph with transfer of H+ ions across chloroplast membranes.
in mitochondria, it is the conversion of ऑक्सीजन to water, nadh to naD+ and succinate to fumarate कि are required to generate the प्रोटॉन अनुपात.
इलेक्ट्रॉन हस्तांतरण chains हैं major sites of असामयिक electron leakage to oxygen, generating superoxide and potentially resulting in increased oxidative तनाव.
tramadol hydrochloride ( trademarked as Conzip, Ryzolt, Ultracet, ultram in the USA, Ralivia, Zytram xl Durella { cr-100/200 mg } in कनाडा or adolonta in Spain ) is a centrally acting synthetic analgesic used to treat moderate to moderately कठोर pain.
the drug has a wide दायरा of अनुप्रयोग, including उपचार of rheumatoid arthritis, बेचैन legs syndrome, मोटर neurone बीमारी और fibromyalgia.
It was launched और marketed as tramal by the जर्मनी फार्मास्युटिकल कम्पनी grünenthal GmbH in 1977.
Tramadol is a weak μ-opioid receptor agonist that भी induces serotonin रिलीज and inhibits the reuptake of norepinephrine.
tramadol is metabolized to O-desmethyltramadol, a significantly more potent μ-opioid agonist.
Tramadol and इसके major metabolite ( s ) हैं विशिष्ट from other more potent opioid agonists by relative selectivity for μ-opioid receptors.
Bernard लॉरेंस `` बर्नी '' madoff ( ; born April 29, 1938 ) is an American पूर्व stockbroker, investment advisor, फाइनेंसर, and white कॉलर criminal.
He is the former non-executive Chairman of the NASDAQ भण्डार market, and the admitted operator of a पेन्शन scheme कि is considered to be the largest वित्तीय धोखाधड़ी in U.S. इतिहास.
madoff संस्थापित the वॉल गली firm Bernard L. madoff Investment Securities llc in 1960, and was its chairman जबतक उसके गिरफ़्तार on December 11, 2008.
the firm was एक of the शीर्ष market मेकर व्यवसायों on Wall Street, which bypassed `` विशेषज्ञ '' firms by directly executing orders over the counter from retail brokers.
He employed at the firm his bhai पीटर as Senior Managing Director and मुख्य Compliance अधिकारी ; पीटर has since been sentenced to 10 सालो in prison.
Peter 's बेटी Shana madoff as the firm 's rules and अनुपालन officer and attorney, और उसके बेटे Andrew and चिह्नित ( Mark committed आत्महत्या by hanging exactly two years after his father 's arrest ).
On December 10, 2008, Madoff 's sons told authorities कि उनके पिता था confessed to them कि the asset management ईकाई of his कड़ was a विशाल Ponzi योजना, and कोटेड उसे as describing it as `` one बिग झूठ. ''
the following दिन, FBI agents arrested Madoff and charged him with one count of securities fraud.
The u.S. Securities और एक्सचेंज Commission ( SEC ) had previously conducted investigations into madoff 's business practices, but किया not ख़ोज the massive धोखाधड़ी.
in March 2009, Madoff pleaded अपराधी to 11 संघीय felonies and admitted to turning उसके माल प्रबन्धन business into a विशाल Ponzi scheme कि झांसे हज़ारों of investors of अरबों of dollars.
Madoff said he began the Ponzi scheme in the early 1990s.
However, संघीय जांचकर्ताओं believe the fraud began as जल्दी as the 1970s, and those charged साथ recovering the missing money believe the निवेश operation may never have been legitimate.
the amount missing from client खाते, including fabricated gains, थी almost $ 65 billion.
The court-appointed trustee estimated actual losses to investors of $ 18 अरब.
on June 29, 2009, he थी sentenced to 150 सालो in थाना, the maximum allowed.
Administrative पेशेवर Day ( भी ज्ञात as secretaries Day or Admin Day ) is an unofficial secular holiday observed in several countries to recognize the कार्य of secretaries, administrative assistants, receptionists, and other administrative support पेशेवर.
In North America, it is मनाये on the Wednesday of the last full week of April ( अप्रैल 24 in 2013 ).
In फ़्रांस it is celebrated on the third Thursday in अप्रैल ( April 18 in 2013 ).
In ऑस्ट्रेलिया it is मनाये on the पहला शुक्रवार in May
A quasi-judicial देह is an एंटिटी such as an arbitrator or tribunal board, generally of a public प्रशासनिक agency, जिससे has शक्तियां and procedures resembling those of a court of विधि or judge, and which is obligated to objectively determine facts and चित्रण conclusions इससे them so as to provide the आधार of an आधिकारिक कार्रवाई.
ऐसे actions हैं able to remedy a situation or थोपने legal penalties, और may affect the विधिक अधिकारों, कर्तव्य or privileges of विशिष्ट parties.
Monument of tycho Brahe और योहानेस Kepler in Prague
tycho ब्राहे ( 14 December 154624 अक्तूबर 1601 ), born Tyge Ottesen Brahe, was a Danish nobleman known लिये his सटीक और comprehensive खगोलीय and planetary observations.
He थी born in स्कैनिया, then part of Denmark, अभी भाग of modern-day Sweden.
Tycho was well known in उसके lifetime as an astronomer and alchemist.
in his De नोवा स्टेला ( On the new स्टार ) of 1573, he refuted the aristotelian belief in an unchanging celestial realm.
His precise measurements indicated that `` नई stars, '' ( stellae novae, now known as supernovae ) in particular that of 1572, lacked the parallax अपेक्षित in sub-lunar phenomena, और were therefore not `` atmospheric '' tailless comets as previously believed, लकिन were ऊपर the माहौल और moon.
Using similar measurements he दिखाया that comets यहूद also not atmospheric phenomena, as previously thought, और must pass through the माना `` अपरिवर्तनीय '' celestial spheres.
As an astronomer, Tycho worked to combine कया he देखी as the geometrical benefits of the copernican system with the philosophical लाभ of the Ptolemaic प्रणाली into उसके अपना model of the universe, the tychonic system.
Furthermore, he थी the last of the major naked नजर खगोलशास्त्रियों, working without telescopes for his observations.
tycho Brahe थी granted an estate on the island of Hven और the funding to build the uraniborg, an early research institute, where he built large astronomical instruments and took अनेक careful measurements, and later Stjerneborg, underground, when he discovered कि उसके यंत्र in the former were not fear steady.
on the island ( on which he demonstrated निरंकुश अक्षर and बर्ताव toward the residents ) he संस्थापित manufactories such as paper-making to provide सामग्री लिये मुद्रण his results.
After disagreements with the new डैनिश king Christian IV in 1597, he थी invited by the Bohemian king और Holy रोमन emperor rudolph II to Prague, where he became the आधिकारिक imperial astronomer.
he निर्मित the नई वेधशाला at Benátky nad jizerou.
Here, from 1600 जबतक उसके death in 1601, he was assisted by योहानेस Kepler who बाद used tycho 's astronomical आंकड़ा to develop कॅप्लर 's laws of planetary गति.
guro District ( guro-gu ) is a ज़िला of Seoul, South Korea, which was अलग from Yeongdeungpo District on April 1, 1980.
Located in the southwestern part of the नगर, जहाँ besides yangcheon ज़िला और Geumcheon District Guro ज़िला has an important position as a हस्तांतरण link which contains railroads, land routes इससे the बाकी of Seoul to the south of the देश.
the Gyeongbu और Gyeongin railway लाइनों connect सियोल to बुसान and इंचियोन.
In जोड, Seoul महानगर Subway लाइनों 1, 2, and 7, and प्रमुख highways intersect in Guro District.
The नाम Guro originates इससे the लेजेंड कि nine ( ) old मेन ( कोरियाई : ro ) enjoyed longevity in the district.
a digital industrial जटिल is located in guro District.
the guro Digital Industrial Complex, which played a leading औद्योगिक role mainly साथ textile निर्माण, dressmaking और other labour-intensive industries in 1967, has महरूम rapidly changed into an IT औद्योगिक complex.
This complex निभाई a pivotal role in the economic growth of the South Korea 's विकास era, referred to as the `` चमत्कार on the Han River ``, and also contributed 10 प्रतिशत of national निर्यात in the 1970s.
Twenty-one प्रतिशत of the total area of guro ज़िला is a प्रतिबंधित zone to be प्रयुक्त as a greenbelt with the only arboretum in Seoul.
The zone is बदलना into a lively ज़िला as विशाल labour-intensive factories are चलती from the क्षेत्रफल और the परिषद is विकासशील what it terms its चार zones.
An `` e-government `` system आधारित on this hosted the international e-participation फ़ोरम on February 7–9, 2007, साथ the participation of अधिक than thirty-seven देशों.
The forum was शुभारम्भ with the थीम `` Promoting लोकतंत्र and Regional Development '' and twenty-five mayors including André Santini ( Issy-les-Moulineaux, France ), Kevin foy ( Chapel हिल, US ), Apirak kosayothin ( Bangkok, Thailand ), uvais Mohamed emthiyas ( कोलोन, श्री Lanka ), and संसार experts such as dr विलियम H. Dutton ( Director of ऑक्सफोर्ड अंतरजाल संस्थान at the University of Oxford, UK ) and dr Ari-Veiko Anttiroiko ( प्राध्यापक at the University of Tampere, Finland ) participated in the फ़ोरम.
The guro घोषणा, adopted दौरान the फ़ोरम, aims to set up a portal site for e-government विकास and to स्थापित a कंक्रीट project in order to सेतु the digital divide among the संसार 's शहरों.
इस अभ्यास has been recognised लिये providing a नई महत्वपूर्ण कदम in the development of e-democracy.
the e-participation फ़ोरम was a कुंजी फ़ैक्टर for guro to खेल the leading भूमिका in bridging the digital divide among शहरों, to provide i.t. उद्यमों स्तिथ in guro Digital Industrial Complex the opportunity to लॉन्च into the अंतरराष्ट्रीय market, to improve इसके चित्र और become a global leader to concrete e-democracy.

A wonton ( also spelled wantan, wanton, or wuntun in transcription from Cantonese ; मंदारिन : húndùn ) is a type of पकौड़ी commonly found in a number of चाइनीज व्यंजन.
अनेक people यहूद involved in the आविष्कार of radio as we now know it.
अनेक संभावित methods of बेतार संचार यहूद considered, including आगमनात्मक and capacitive प्रेरण and हस्तांतरण through the ground, however the method प्रयुक्त for radio आज exclusively involves the transmission and reception of electromagnetic लहरें.
बाद जल्दी speculation on the subject, प्रायोगिक work on the कनेक्शन between electricity और चुंबकत्व began around 1820 with the कार्य of Hans Christian ओर्स्टेड और continued with the work of andré-marie एम्पीयर, Joseph Henry, and Michael फैराडे.
These investigations culminated in the complete सिद्धान्त of electromagnetism developed by James Clerk Maxwell.
इस theory वर्णित the theoretical आधार of the propagation of इलेक्ट्रोमैग्नेटिक waves.
बाद मैक्सवेल 's theory was published many people experimented साथ बेतार communication, some intentionally using मैक्सवेल 's सिद्धान्त some not.
It is considered likely कि the पहला intentional transmission of a signal by अर्थात् of इलेक्ट्रोमैग्नेटिक waves थी performed by दाउद Edward ह्यूजेस around 1880, although this थी considered to be induction at the समय.
The first systematic और unequivocal transmission of em लहरें was performed by heinrich रुडॉल्फ Hertz और described in papers प्रकाशित in 1887 and 1890.
हर्ट्ज़ famously considered these results as being of little practical मान.
After Hertz 's कार्य many people यहूद involved in the development of components और सिद्धान्त शामिल साथ the हस्तांतरण and reception of electromagnetic लहरें.
Others, notably Guglielmo मार्कोनी, were concerned with practical सुधार and the commercial अनुप्रयोग of radio to wireless telegraphy.
Later on रेगिनाल्ड A. Fessenden became the first to send an ऑडियो signal by अर्थात् of electromagnetic waves.
Scurvy is a disease resulting from a कमियां of vitamin c, which is required for the synthesis of कोलेजन in humans.
the chemical नाम for विटामिन c, ascorbic acid, is निकला इससे the लैटिन नाम of scurvy, scorbutus, which भी provides the adjective scorbutic ( `` of, characterized by or having to do साथ scurvy '' ).
स्कर्वी often presents itself initially as symptoms of malaise and lethargy, followed by formation of spots on the skin, स्पंजी gums, और bleeding from the mucous झिल्लियों.
Spots हैं most abundant on the जांघों और टाँगे, और a person with the ailment looks पाले, feels depressed, and is partially immobilized.
as स्कर्वी अग्रिम, वहीँ can be खोलें, suppurating wounds, loss of teeth, पीलिया, fever, न्यूरोपैथी and मौत.
स्कर्वी was at one समय common among sailors, pirates and others सवार जहाजों at समुद्र longer than perishable fruits and vegetables could be भंडारित ( subsisting बजाय only on cured and salted meats and dried grains ) and by सैनिको similarly वंचित of these foods for विस्तारित अवधि.
It was described by Hippocrates ( c. 460 BC–c. 380 bc ), और हर्बल cures for scurvy have been ज्ञात in many देशी cultures चूंकि prehistory.
Scurvy was एक of the limiting कारकों of marine travel, often हत्या large संख्याएँ of the passengers और क्रू on long-distance voyages.
This became a significant समस्या in Europe इससे the beginning of the modern era in the Age of Discovery in the 15th century, continuing to play a significant role through World War i in the 20th century.
While today scurvy is ज्ञात to be caused by a nutritional कमियां, until the अलगाव of विटामिन c और direct प्रमाण of its link to स्कर्वी in 1932, numerous theories और उपचार यहूद प्रस्तावित, often on little or no प्रायोगिक data.
इस inconsistency is attributed to the lack of विटामिन c as a distinct अवधारणा, an अक्षमता to reliably link different foods ( notably present in भैस citrus, watercress, और अंग मांस ) to स्कर्वी.
an अतिरिक्त concept जरूरी to understand scurvy was the degradation of विटामिन C by exposure to air और तांबे और अन्य परिवर्तन मेटल salts such as those of आयरन, thus changing the कड़ी of भोजन to स्कर्वी over समय.
Treatment by भैस food, विशेषकर citrus fruit, was periodically implemented, as it था been चूंकि प्राचीनता.
However until the 1930s, treatment थी inconsistent, with many अप्रभावी treatments प्रयुक्त into the 20th सदी.
it was a Scottish surgeon in the royal Navy, जेम्स Lind who first proved it could be treated with citrus fruit in प्रयोग he described in his 1753 book, a Treatise of the Scurvy, though उसके सलाह थी नहीं implemented by the Royal नेवी for अनेक decades.
in infants, स्कर्वी is sometimes referred to as barlow 's disease, named बाद Sir Thomas barlow, a British physician who वर्णित it.
However, Barlow 's disease may भी refer to mitral वाल्व prolapse.
Other eponyms for स्कर्वी शामिल Moeller 's disease और cheadle 's बीमारी.
स्कर्वी करता not occur in सबसे पशु क्युकी they can synthesize उनके own विटामिन C.
however, humans और other उच्चतर primates ( the simians - monkeys और apes - and tarsiers ), guinea सूअर, most or all bats, and कुछ species of birds and fish lack an enzyme ( L-gulonolactone oxidase ) necessary for ऐसे संश्लेषण and must obtain विटामिन c through उनके diet.
विटामिन c is widespread in संयंत्र ऊतकों, with विशेषकर high concentrations occurring in citrus फल ( oranges, lemons, limes, grapefruits ), टमाटर, potatoes, cabbages, और ग्रीन peppers.
आयरन is a chemical element with the symbol Fe ( from ) and atomic number 26.
It is a metal in the first परिवर्तन series.
it is the most common तत्व ( by द्रव्यमान ) forming the ग्रह Earth as a whole, forming much of धरती 's बाहरी and inner core.
it is the fourth most common element in the Earth 's क्रस्ट.
Iron 's very common presence in rocky ग्रह like धरती is due to its abundant उत्पादन as a परिणाम of संलयन in high-mass stars, where the production of nickel-56 ( which decays to the most common isotope of iron ) is the पिछला nuclear संलयन reaction that is ऊष्माक्षेपी.
इस causes रेडियोसक्रिय निकल to become the last element to be produced before collapse of a supernova लीड to the explosive events that scatter this precursor radionuclide of iron abundantly into space.
Like other group 8 तत्व, आयरन exists in a wide range of oxidation राज्य, −2 to +6, हालांकि +2 and +3 हैं the most common.
elemental iron occurs in meteoroids and other कम oxygen environments, but is reactive to ऑक्सीजन और water.
भैस iron सतहों appear lustrous silvery-gray, but oxidize in normal एयर to give hydrated आयरन आक्साइड, commonly ज्ञात as चढ़.
नापसंद many other metals जिससे रूप passivating ऑक्साइड परतों, iron oxides occupy more आवाज़ than iron metal, और thus आयरन oxides फ्लेक off and expose fresh सतहों for संक्षारण.
आयरन metal has been used चूंकि प्राचीन टाइम्स, हालांकि copper alloys, जिससे have lower melting temperatures, यहूद प्रयुक्त पहला in इतिहास.
pure आयरन is soft ( softer than एल्युमिनियम ), but is unobtainable by smelting.
The सामग्री is significantly hardened and strengthened by impurities इससे the smelting process, ऐसे as carbon.
a certain proportion of carbon ( between 0.002 % और 2.1 % ) produces steel, which may be up to 1000 times harder than pure iron.
Crude आयरन metal is produced in blast furnaces, where ore is घटाया by coke to pig iron, which has a high carbon content.
Further refinement with oxygen reduces the carbon content to the correct proportion to make स्टील.
Steels and low carbon iron alloys with अन्य धातुओं ( alloy steels ) हैं by far the most common धातुओं in industrial उपयोग, due to their ग्रेट दायरा of वांछनीय properties and the abundance of iron.
Iron chemical compounds, which include अमिश्रित and ferric compounds, have अनेक uses.
Iron oxide मिश्रित साथ एल्युमिनियम powder can be ignited to बनाएँ a thermite reaction, used in welding और purifying ores.
It फ़ॉर्म शब्दकोष compounds with the halogens और the chalcogens.
Among इसके organometallic यौगिकों is ferrocene, the पहला सैंडविच यौगिक discovered.
Iron plays an important role in जीवविज्ञान, forming complexes साथ molecular ऑक्सीजन in हीमोग्लोबिन and myoglobin ; these two यौगिकों are common ऑक्सीजन हस्तांतरण प्रोटीन in vertebrates.
Iron is भी the metal used at the क्रियाशील site of अनेक महत्वपूर्ण रेडॉक्स enzymes dealing with cellular respiration and ऑक्सीकरण और reduction in plants और animals.
The Blue क्रॉस Blue Shield Association ( bcbsa ) is a federation of 38 separate health बीमे organizations और कंपनियाँ in the संयुक्त States.
संयुक्त, they directly or indirectly provide health insurance to over 99 million Americans.
The history of Blue Cross तिथियाँ वापस to 1929, जबकि the history of ब्लू Shield तिथियाँ to 1939.
the Blue Cross संघ dates वापस to 1960, while इसके Blue Shield बंटवारा was created in 1948.
the two संगठन merged in 1982, forming the current association.
a potato chip ( known as a chip in अमरीकी, Australian, New Zealand, Canadian, Singaporean, Hong काँग, दक्षिण African and Jamaican English ; as a crisp in अंग्रेजों English और Hiberno-English, और as either a chip or wafer in भारतीय English ) is a thin टुकड़ा of potato that is गहन fried or baked until crunchy.
आलू चिप्स हैं commonly served as an appetizer, पक्ष डिश, or snack.
The मौलिक chips are cooked and salted ; additional किस्में हैं manufactured using विभिन्न flavorings और संघटक सहित seasonings, herbs, spices, cheeses, और artificial एडिटिव.
`` Crisps '', however, may भी refer to many अलग प्रकार of savory snack उत्पाद sold in the United Kingdom और आयरलैंड, some बना इससे आलू, but may also be made from मक्का, tapioca or अन्य cereals.
An example of these kinds of savory स्नैक्स is Monster Munch.
आलू chips हैं a predominant भाग of the snack खाना market in English-speaking देशों और numerous other Western nations.
The global potato चिप market उत्पन्न total revenues of us $ 16.4 billion in 2005.
इस accounted for 35.5 % of the कुल savory snacks मार्केट in that year ( US $ 46.1 billion ).
Henry Clay, sr. ( April 12, 1777 – जून 29, 1852 ) थी a lawyer, politician and skilled orator जो represented केंटकी in दोनो the सीनेट और in the House of Representatives.
he served three अलग शर्तें as Speaker of the संयुक्त राज्य House of प्रतिनिधि and was भी Secretary of State from 1825 to 1829.
He खोया उसके campaigns for अध्यक्ष in 1824, 1832 and 1844.
Clay was a dominant figure in दोनो the पहला और दूसरी Party systems.
As a अग्रणी war hawk in 1812, he favored युद्ध with Britain और played a significant role in leading the स्वदेश to war in the युद्ध of 1812.
in 1824 he भागा लिये president and खोया, but फेंका his चुनावी votes to John क्विंसी Adams, who बना him secretary of राज्य as the jacksonians denounced what they considered a `` corrupt सौदेबाजी. ''
He ran and lost again in 1832 and 1844 as the प्रत्याशी of the Whig Party, जिससे he founded and usually dominated.
Clay was the foremost proponent of the American System, fighting for an increase in tariffs to foster उद्योग in the संयुक्त States, the use of federal funding to निर्माण and maintain infrastructure, और a strong national bank.
He opposed the annexation of Texas, fearing it would inject the slavery समस्या into राजनीती.
मिट्टी भी opposed the mexican-american War and the `` manifest Destiny `` नीति of Democrats, which cost him votes in the बंद 1844 election.
उतावले the `` Great pacificator, '' Clay brokered important compromises दौरान the Nullification संकट and on the slavery issue.
As भाग of the `` Great Triumvirate `` or `` अमर Trio, '' साथ with his colleagues डेनियल वेबस्टर और John C. calhoun, he was इंस्ट्रूमेंटल in formulating the Missouri सुलह of 1820 and the सुलह of 1850.
he was viewed as the प्राथमिक representative of पश्चिमी interests in this group, and was given the names `` Henry of the West '' और `` the Western स्टार. ''
A plantation मालिक, मिट्टी held slaves during उसके lifetime but freed उन्हें in his होगा.
Abraham Lincoln, the whig leader in इलिनोइस, was a ग्रेट admirer of Clay, saying he थी `` my ideal of a great man. ''
Lincoln wholeheartedly समर्थित Clay 's economic programs.
In 1957, a सीनेट Committee selected Clay as one of the five महानतम u.s. Senators, साथ with Daniel Webster, John C. Calhoun, रॉबर्ट La follette, and Robert Taft.

Marvin gaye ( अप्रैल 2, 1939April 1, 1984 ), born Marvin pentz Gay, Jr., थी an अमरीकी singer-songwriter and संगीतकार.
Gaye helped to shape the sound of Motown रिकॉर्ड in the 1960s with a string of हिट्स सहित `` कैसा Sweet It Is ( To Be loved By You ) `` और `` i सुना it Through the Grapevine `` and duet recordings with Mary कुएं और tammi Terrell, बाद कमाई the titles `` Prince of Motown '' और `` Prince of आत्मा ''.
दौरान the 1970s, Gaye recorded the concept albums कया 's going On and let 's Get It On and became among the पहला कलाकारों in motown to break away from the reins of its उत्पादन company.
Gaye 's later recordings influenced several R & B subgenres ऐसे as शांत तूफ़ान and neo-soul.
Following a काल in यूरोपीय अंतर्गत a कर exile in the early 1980s, gaye released the 1982 Grammy award-winning hit `` Sexual Healing `` और the Midnight प्रेम album.
चूंकि his death in 1984, Gaye has been posthumously honored by many institutions, सहित the ग्रैमी Lifetime उपलब्धि Award और the Rock and फेंकें Hall of Fame.

The chernobyl disaster (, chornobylska katastrofa – Chornobyl Catastrophe ) थी a अनर्थकारी नाभिकीय accident that occurred on 26 अप्रैल 1986 at the chernobyl नाभिकीय Power संयंत्र in Ukraine ( then officially the Ukrainian SSR ), which was अंतर्गत the सीधा क्षेत्राधिकार of the central अधिकारियों of the सोवियत Union.
An विस्फोट and fire released large quantities of radioactive अणु into the माहौल, which स्प्रेड over much of the western USSR और Europe.
The chernobyl विपत्ति is widely considered to have महरूम the worst नाभिकीय शक्ति plant दुर्घटना in history, और is एक of only दो वर्गीकृत as a level 7 event on the International नाभिकीय Event Scale ( the other होने the फुकुशिमा Daiichi nuclear disaster in 2011 ).
the बैटल to contain the contamination और avert a वृहद प्रलय ultimately शामिल over 500,000 workers और लागत an अनुमानित 18 billion rubles.
the आधिकारिक Soviet casualty count of 31 मौतों has been disputed, और long-term प्रभाव such as cancers and deformities हैं still being accounted for.

Mrs. क्लॉस is the wife of Santa क्लॉस, the Christmas gift-bringer in North American और यूरोपीय क्रिसमस tradition.
She is known for बनाना cookies with the elves और preparing toys with her husband सांता Claus.
Her first name is a mystery, though she has been referred to as Mary, जेसिका, layla, Annette, Heidi, or Martha.
HijackThis ( भी hijackthis or HJT ) is an open source enumerating tool लिये microsoft खिड़कियाँ originally created by Merijn Bellekom, and बाद sold to Trend Micro.
the program is notable लिये targeting browser-hijacking विधि, rather than relying on a database of ज्ञात spyware.
It scans a उपयोक्ता 's computer जल्दी, and प्रदर्शक ब्राउजर hijacking locations, showing what entries हैं वहीँ.
HijackThis is प्रयुक्त primarily for निदान of ब्राउजर hijacking, as uninformed उपयोग of its removal facilities can कारण significant तन्त्र damage to a कंप्यूटर.
HijackThis करता नहीं हटाएँ or detect spyware ; it सूचियाँ most आम locations where ब्राउजर hijacking कार्यकलाप can occur.
ब्राउजर hijacking can cause मैलवेयर to be installed on a कंप्यूटर.
On फ़रवरी 16, 2012, Trend सूक्ष्म released the HijackThis source code as open सोर्स and it is now available on the SourceForge साईट.
Saddle क्रीक Records is an American रिकार्ड लेबल based in ओमाहा, Nebraska.
प्रारंभ as a college class project on entrepreneurship, the label थी founded by माइक Mogis और जस्टिन Oberst in 1993 ( as Lumberjack रिकॉर्ड ).
mogis soon turned over his role in the company to robb nansel.
The label is नामित बाद Saddle Creek Road, a street that cuts through the east side of midtown Omaha, and the beginnings of a झाँकी जिनकी सदस्यों शामिल conor Oberst ( then a solo कलाकार, currently of Bright Eyes, Conor Oberst और the रहस्यवादी Valley Band, Desaparecidos and Monsters of लोक ), टिम Kasher ( then of Slowdown Virginia, फिलहाल of Cursive and the Good Life ), and others.
collectively, they were known unofficially as the `` creekers ''.
Saddle Creek first appeared in print on a दिखाएँ flyer, offering to `` खर्च an evening साथ काठी Creek '' ( later to be the शीर्षक of the label 's dvd. )
काठी Creek became an incorporated एंटिटी as a result of a class project on entrepreneurship.
Distribution is संभाला by the Alternative Distribution Alliance, which is अंतर्गत the Warner Music Group छतरियाँ.
काठी क्रीक Records continues to be the फ्लैगशिप लेबल of a style of म्यूज़िक called `` the Omaha Sound ``, characterized by a पतला देश twang.
This is increasingly inaccurate, हालांकि, साथ the rise of more electronic sounds ऐसे as those favored by The faint and Broken Spindles.
The eclectic sounds of Saddle Creek 's disparate member bands is somewhat explained by their इतिहास ; a number of the original सदस्यों of the label attended grade school together.
a `` sister लेबल '', of sorts, to काठी Creek is Team प्रेम, started by conor Oberst in 2004.
the label opened arms to their first bands not आधारित in ओमाहा in 2001 with releases by Now it 's ओवरहेड और Sorry About Dresden.
Other non-Nebraskan artists followed, including लॉस Angeles 's Rilo kiley, eric Bachmann ( formerly नेता of archers of Loaf और Crooked Fingers from उत्तर कैरोलिना ), georgie James ( Washington D.C. ), Two Gallants ( San फ्रांसिस्को ), और सबसे recently Tokyo पुलिस Club ( टोरंटो ).
In 2005, खर्च an संध्या साथ Saddle क्रीक, a documentary detailing the first ten years of the रिकार्ड label 's history, was released.
the dvd features extensive interviews साथ the काठी Creek bands, archival फुटेज, and rare सजीव performances.
on जून 8, 2007, the लेबल opened उनके own music स्थान named Slowdown ( बाद the group slowdown Virginia ), स्तिथ in downtown Omaha, Nebraska.
The following is a सूची of episodes for the television show Full हाउस.
In total, वहीँ were 192 episodes फिल्माया for the दिखाएँ over the कोर्स of its आठ seasons, from 1987 to 1995.
Full House is a हालात कॉमेडी which chronicles a widowed पिता 's struggles of उठाने his three young बेटियां और the lives that वे have छुआ.
The patriarch of the family, Danny ( bob saget ), invites his brother-in-law Jesse ( जॉन stamos ) and his बेहतरीन dost Joey ( Dave coulier ), to help raise his children ( candace Cameron, jodie sweetin, and Mary Kate/Ashley Olsen ), बाद his wife थी killed during an automobile दुर्घटना involving a drunk driver.
After episodes 88 and 89, जेसी marries बेकी ( Lori loughlin ), and वे मूव into the अटारी.
तब, after एपीसोड 104 and 105, बेकी and Jesse have जुड़वा लड़कों named Nicky and Alex ( डेनियल और केविन Renteria/Blake and Dylan Tuomy-Wilhoit ).
The श्रेणी ends with episode 192, `` मिशेल यात्राएँ again Part 2 '', when Michelle loses उसके memory and the परिवार tries to restore it.
Notice of स्टैम्प अधिनियम of 1765 in Newspaper
American अखबारों reacted to the स्टैम्प Act साथ गुस्सा and predictions of the demise of journalism.
The Stamp Act 1765 ( छोटी title कर्तव्य in American Colonies Act 1765 ; 5 George III, c. 12 ) imposed a सीधा tax by the अंग्रेजों पार्लियामेंट specifically on the colonies of British अमेरिका, and it जरूरी कि many printed सामग्री in the colonies be produced on stamped paper उत्पादित in लंदन, carrying an embossed revenue stamp.
ये मुद्रित सामग्री were legal दस्तावेज़, मैगज़ीन, अखबारों और अनेक other types of paper used throughout the colonies.
Like पिछला taxes, the stamp कर had to be सशुल्क in मान्य अंग्रेजों करेंसी, not in colonial पेपर money.
The purpose of the tax थी to help अदा for troops stationed in North अमेरिका after the अंग्रेजों विजय in the सात Years ' युद्ध.
The British government लगा that the colonies यहूद the primary beneficiaries of this military presence, और चाहिए pay at least a portion of the expense.
The स्टैम्प Act met ग्रेट resistance in the colonies.
The colonies भेजा no representatives to Parliament, और therefore था no influence over कया कर were उठाया, how they यहूद levied, or how they would be spent.
Many colonists माना it a violation of उनके rights as Englishmen to be taxed without उनके consent —consent कि तभी the औपनिवेशिक legislatures could ग्रान्ट.
औपनिवेशिक सभाओं sent petitions and विरोध.
The स्टैम्प Act कॉंग्रेस आयोजित in New यॉर्क City, reflecting the पहला significant joint colonial जवाब to कोई अंग्रेजों माप, also petitioned पार्लियामेंट और the King.
Local विरोध समूह, led by colonial merchants and landowners, स्थापित connections through पत्राचार कि निर्मित a ढीला coalition कि extended from New England to Georgia.
Protests and demonstrations initiated by the बेटे of Liberty often turned हिंसक and destructive as the masses became involved.
Very जल्द all stamp कर distributors were सहमे into resigning उनके commissions, and the tax थी never effectively collected.
Opposition to the Stamp Act थी not सीमित to the colonies.
British merchants and manufacturers, whose exports to the colonies यहूद threatened by colonial आर्थिक समस्याएं exacerbated by the tax, also pressured Parliament.
the अधिनियम थी repealed on कूच 18, 1766 as a matter of expedience, लकिन Parliament affirmed इसके शक्ति to legislate for the colonies “in सब मामले whatsoever” by भी passing the declaratory Act.
वहीँ followed a श्रेणी of नई taxes और regulations, likewise opposed by the colonists.
The episode played a प्रमुख role in defining the grievances and enabling the organized colonial प्रतिरोध that led to the American Revolution in 1775.

PT boats were a variety of torpedo-armed fast आक्रमण craft used by the संयुक्त States Navy in संसार युद्ध ii to attack larger सतह ships.
`` PT '' is the us hull वर्गीकरण symbol लिये `` Patrol Torpedo ''.
The PT नाव squadrons यहूद nicknamed `` the मच्छर fleet ''.
The Japanese called उन्हें `` शैतान नौकाएँ ''.
The original pre– World War i torpedo नौकाएँ यहूद designed with `` displacement '' hulls.
They विस्थापित up to 300 tons and the top speed was.
The pt boats प्रयुक्त in संसार War II were निर्मित using the planing -type हल रूप developed लिये racing boats.
वे यहूद much smaller ( 30–75 tons ) and faster ( 35–40 knots ).
Both types were designed to strike at larger warships with torpedoes, using relatively ऊँची speed to get बंद, and small size to avoid होने spotted और hit by gunfire.
वे were much less महंगी than large warships.
PT boats यहूद much तेज़, छोटी, and सस्ता than conventional ( displacement हल ) बरतन.
During World War II, American PT boats engaged enemy destroyers और numerous अन्य surface craft, ranging इससे small boats to विशाल supply जहाजों.
PT boats also संचालित as gunboats against दुश्मन छोटी craft, ऐसे as armored barges used by the जापानी forces लिये inter-island transport.
Good शुक्रवार is a धार्मिक holiday observed primarily by ईसाइयों commemorating the crucifixion of यीशु मसीह और उसके मौत at Calvary.
the holiday is observed during Holy Week as भाग of the paschal Triduum on the शुक्रवार preceding ईस्टर Sunday, and may coincide साथ the Jewish observance of Passover.
It is also known as पावन Friday, ग्रेट Friday, Black Friday, or Easter Friday, हालांकि the latter properly refers to the शुक्रवार in Easter सप्ताह.
Based on the details of the canonical gospels, the crucifixion of Jesus थी most संभावित to have been on a Friday ( the day पहले the sabbath ) ( ).
The अनुमानित साल of the crucifixion is ad 33, by two अलग groups, and originally as ad 34 by इसहाक़ Newton via the मतभेद between the Biblical and जूलियन calendars and the crescent of the चंद्रमा.
A third method, using a completely different astronomical approach आधारित on a lunar Crucifixion darkness and ग्रहण model ( सतत साथ Apostle Peter 's reference to a `` moon of blood '' in Acts 2:20 ), अंक to शुक्रवार, 3 April AD 33.
The Great Basin is the largest area of endorheic watersheds in उत्तर अमेरिका.
It is विख्यात for both its arid शर्तें और its Basin and range topography that varies from the North अमरीकी कम point at Badwater Basin to the उच्चतम पाइंट of the संलग्न United States, less than दूर at the समिट of माउंट Whitney.
The region spans अनेक physiographic divisions, biomes / ecoregions, and रेगिस्तान.
रास्टर may refer to:
Raster ग्राफिक्स, आलेखीय techniques using arrays of पिक्सेल values
रास्टर graphics editor, a computer program
रास्टर scan, the pattern of चित्र readout, हस्तांतरण, भंडार, और reconstruction in television और कंप्यूटर images
Rasterisation, or rasterization, conversion of a vector चित्र to a raster image
Raster image प्रोसेसर, or RIP, a घटक of a मुद्रण system that performs rasterisation
Raster इन्टरनेट, a computer interrupt signal
Raster to वेक्टर, an चित्र conversion process
Raster bar, an effect प्रयुक्त in कंप्यूटर demos
Raster-Noton, a रिकार्ड label
Rastrum, a यंत्र प्रयुक्त in मध्यकालीन म्यूज़िक manuscripts to draw staff lines
Raster Document Object, a संचिका format
Beowulf ( ; Old English : ) is a legendary Geatish नायिका और later turned king in the epic poem नामित after उसे, एक of the oldest surviving टुकड़े of literature in the English language.
the attack on Pearl हार्बर ( called Hawaii आपरेशन or आपरेशन ai by the जापानी Imperial सामान्य Headquarters ( Operation Z in planning ) and the Battle of पर्ल हार्बर ) was a surprise सैन्य strike conducted by the इम्पीरियल जापानी नेवी against the United States naval base at पर्ल हार्बर, Hawaii, on the morning of December 7, 1941 ( दिसम्बर 8 in Japan ).
From the standpoint of the defenders, the आक्रमण commenced at 7:48 a.m. हवाई समय.
The आक्रमण थी intended as a निवारक action in अनुक्रम to keep the u.S. प्रशांत बेड़े इससे interfering with military actions the Empire of जापानी was planning in Southeast एशिया against विदेशी territories of the संयुक्त Kingdom, the Netherlands, and the United States.
the base थी attacked by 353 जापानी सेनानी, bombers और torpedo planes in two waves, शुभारम्भ from six aircraft carriers.
सब आठ u.S. Navy battleships were damaged, with चार होने sunk.
दो of ये were later raised, and साथ the remaining four repaired, छह battleships returned to सेवा later in the युद्ध.
The जापानी also sank or क्षतिग्रस्त three cruisers, three destroyers, an anti-aircraft training जलयान, और एक minelayer.
188 U.S. aircraft were नष्ट ; 2,402 Americans were मारे और 1,282 wounded.
Important आधार installations such as the शक्ति स्टेशन, shipyard, maintenance, और fuel और torpedo storage facilities, as well as the पनडुब्बी piers and headquarters भवन ( भी home of the प्रज्ञा section ) यहूद not attacked.
Japanese नुकसान were light : 29 वायुयान और पाँच midget submarines lost, और 65 servicemen killed or wounded.
One Japanese sailor थी captured.
The attack आए as a profound शॉक to the American लोगों और led directly to the अमरीकी प्रविष्टि into संसार War II in दोनो the प्रशांत and यूरोपीय थिएटर.
The following दिन ( December 8 ), the संयुक्त राज्य घोषित युद्ध on जापानी.
Domestic support लिये non-interventionism, which था been दमदार, disappeared.
Clandestine support of ब्रिटेन ( for उदाहरण the neutrality Patrol ) थी replaced by active alliance.
subsequent परिचालन by the U.S. prompted जर्मनी and इटली to declare युद्ध on the U.S. on December 11, which was reciprocated by the u.S. the same day.
There were numerous historical precedents लिये unannounced military action by जापानी.
However, the lack of any formal warning, particularly while negotiations were still apparently ongoing, led अध्यक्ष Franklin D. रूज़वेल्ट to proclaim दिसम्बर 7, 1941, `` a तिथि जिससे होगा सजीव in infamy ``.
u.S. Route 85 ( US 85 ) is a north–south संयुक्त States highway कि रनों for in the पहाड़ - उत्तरी Plains राज्य of the संयुक्त राज्य.
The southern terminus of the रूट is at the United states-mexico border in El पासो, टेक्सास, connecting with मैक्सिकन Federal Highway 45.
The northern terminus is at the United States-Canada किनारा in Fortuna, उत्तर Dakota, जहाँ the रूट continues उत्तर as saskatchewan Highway 35.
in both the United States and saskatchewan, कनाडा the रूट is known as the CanAm Highway.
Sections of US 85 are considered भाग of the Theodore Roosevelt Expressway.
The United States presidential election of 1968 was the 46th quadrennial presidential चुनाव, held on Tuesday, नवम्बर 5, 1968.
The रिपब्लिकन nominee, पूर्व Vice-President Richard Nixon, जीती the election over the लोकतांत्रिक nominee, incumbent Vice-President Hubert Humphrey.
Nixon भागा on a campaign that promised to restore law and order to the स्वदेश 's cities, torn by riots और crime.
Analysts have argued the चुनाव of 1968 is a realigning चुनाव as it permanently disrupted the नई Deal Coalition कि had वर्चस्व अध्यक्षीय politics लिये 36 years.
coming four years बाद डेमोक्रेट Lyndon B. जॉनसन जीती in a ऐतिहासिक landslide, the चुनाव saw the incumbent अध्यक्ष forced out of the रेस and a रिपब्लिकन निर्वाचित for the first time in twelve सालो.
It थी a विदारक national अनुभव, conducted during a year of violence कि शामिल the हत्या of सिविल rights leader मार्टिन लूथर King, Jr., and subsequent race दंगे across the nation, the assasination of Democratic presidential candidate Robert F. Kennedy, widespread opposition to the Vietnam War across विश्वविद्यालयों campuses, और हिंसक confrontations between police और anti-war protesters at the 1968 Democratic नेशनल Convention as the Democratic party split again and again.
the चुनाव featured the strongest तीसरा party effort चूंकि 1912 by पूर्व Alabama Governor George वालेस, a Democrat.
क्युकी Wallace 's campaign opposed federal हस्तक्षेप in the South to समाप्त स्कूल segregation, he carried the Deep South and ran खूब in जातीय industrial districts in the North.
This was the last चुनाव in which New York had the सबसे मत in the चुनावी college ( 43 मत ).
बाद the 1970 census, कैलिफ़ोर्निया gained the most electoral votes and has remained the सबसे populous state since then.
This is the latest चुनाव where a presidential ticket जीती without carrying the vice अध्यक्षीय प्रत्याशी 's घर state.
खिड़कियाँ कार्य Manager is a task manager or System monitor application शामिल साथ the microsoft खिड़कियाँ NT family of operating systems that provides limited सूचना about कंप्यूटर performance और running अनुप्रयोग, processes और CPU usage, commit charge and memory information, network activity and आंकडे, logged-in users, और system services ( and as often is the case with तन्त्र टूल्स provided by microsoft for Windows, 3rd पार्टी software is available which fills the आवश्यकताएँ अधिक thoroughly, e.g, `` Process Explorer '', `` विस्तारित Task मैनेजर '', `` Anvir कार्य मैनेजर '', `` Process Hacker '', and `` प्रणाली Explorer '' ).
the कार्य Manager can also be used to set process priorities, प्रोसेसर affinity, forcibly terminate प्रक्रियाओं, and shut down, restart, hibernate or log बंद from खिड़कियाँ.
Windows कार्य मैनेजर was introduced with खिड़कियाँ NT 4.0.
पिछला संस्करण of खिड़कियाँ nt शामिल the कार्य List अनुप्रयोग, जिससे था far कम सुविधाएँ.
The task list was सक्षम of listing currently running processes and killing them, or creating a new process.
In Windows XP only, a Shutdown menu is also उपस्थित कि allows access to Standby, Hibernate, फेरे off, restart, Log Off and स्विच उपयोक्ता.
पहले versions of Microsoft खिड़कियाँ ( Microsoft Windows 3.x, Windows 95, Windows 98 ) था a कार्यक्रम ज्ञात as कार्य to display the कार्यक्रम फिलहाल running.
This संचिका was executed by running the taskman.exe file from the c : \खिड़कीs निर्देशिका.
Kanji ( ; ) are the adopted logographic Chinese characters ( hanzi ) कि are used in the आधुनिक जापानी लिखने system along साथ hiragana ( ひらがな, ), katakana ( カタカナ, ), Hindu-Arabic numerals, और the occasional उपयोग of the लैटिन वर्णमाला.
The Japanese term kanji ( ) for the Chinese characters वस्तुतः means `` Han characters '' और is written using the same वर्ण as the Chinese hanzi ( ).
John R Williams ( may 4, 1782 – अक्तूबर 20, 1854 ) was an American soldier, व्यापारी, and राजनेता who is most well known लिये serving as the पहला महापौर of Detroit, Michigan.
In कुल, he served as Detroit 's महापौर लिये पाँच other terms.
He also was a brigadier सामान्य in the United राज्य Army during the Black हॉक युद्ध.

A स्मार्टफोन that can be used as a compass because of the magnetometer अंदर.

A सैन्य compass that was used during संसार युद्ध i.
a कम्पास is a navigational यंत्र कि shows directions in a फ़्रेम of reference कि is stationary relative to the सतह of the earth.
the frame of reference defines the चार कार्डिनल directions ( or अंक ) – north, दक्षिण, east, और west.
Intermediate directions हैं भी defined.
प्रायः, a आरेख called a कम्पास रोज़, जिससे shows the दिशानिर्देश ( साथ their names प्रायः abbreviated to initials ), is marked on the कम्पास.
When the compass is in उपयोग, the rose is लकीर साथ the real directions in the फ़्रेम of reference, so, for example, the `` n '' mark on the rose वाकई points to the उत्तर.
अक्सर, in addition to the rose or sometimes instead of it, कोण markings in डिग्री are shown on the कम्पास.
उत्तर corresponds to शून्य डिग्री, and the angles बढ़ाएँ clockwise, so ईस्ट is 90 degrees, south is 180, और वेस्ट is 270.
ये numbers allow the कम्पास to show azimuths or बियरिंग, which are commonly stated in इस संकेतन.
The magnetic compass थी पहला invented as a यंत्र लिये divination as early as the Chinese Han राजवंश ( चूंकि about 206 BC ).
The compass was प्रयुक्त in Song Dynasty चीन by the military लिये navigational orienteering by 1040-1044, और थी used लिये maritime navigation by 1111 to 1117.
the use of a compass is recorded in पश्चिमी Europe between 1187 and 1202, and in Persia in 1232.
the dry compass was invented in Europe around 1300.
This थी supplanted in the early 20th century by the liquid-filled magnetic कम्पास.
The Inca साम्राज्य or Inka Empire ( quechua : tawantinsuyu ) थी the largest साम्राज्य in pre-Columbian अमेरिका.
the administrative, राजनैतिक और military center of the empire was located in Cusco in modern-day Peru.
The इन्का civilization arose from the हाइलैंड्स of Peru sometime in the early 13th सदी.
From 1438 to 1533, the incas used a किस्में of विधि, from conquest to शांतिपूर्ण assimilation, to incorporate a large portion of पश्चिमी South अमेरिका, केन्द्रित on the Andean mountain ranges, including, besides Peru, विशाल भाग of modern इक्वाडोर, western और दक्षिण central बोलीविया, northwest Argentina, north और central चिली, और दक्षिणी Colombia into a state comparable to the historical empires of Eurasia.
The official language of the साम्राज्य was quechua, हालांकि सैंकड़ों of लोकल भाषाएं और dialects of quechua यहूद spoken.
the इन्का referred to उनके empire as Tawantinsuyu which can be अनूदित as the Four regions or The Four United Provinces.
There were अनेक local forms of worship, सबसे of उन्हें concerning local sacred `` Huacas ``, but the इन्का leadership encouraged the worship of Inti —the सूर्य god—and imposed इसके प्रभुता above other cults such as कि of Pachamama.
The incas considered their King, the Sapa Inca, to be the `` child of the sun. ''
the गुर्दे हैं organs कि serve अनेक essential regulatory भूमिकाएँ in most animals, including vertebrates and some invertebrates.
वे हैं essential in the urinary प्रणाली और also serve homeostatic कृत्यों such as the regulation of इलेक्ट्रोलाइट्स, maintenance of acid–base balance, and विनियमन of blood दबाव ( via maintaining salt and जल संतुलन ).
They serve the body as a natural filter of the blood, and हटाएँ wastes जिससे हैं diverted to the urinary bladder.
In producing urine, the kidneys excrete wastes such as यूरिया और ammonium, and वे are भी जिम्मेदार लिये the reabsorption of जल, glucose, and amino acids.
The kidneys भी उपज हार्मोन including calcitriol, erythropoietin, और the enzyme renin.
Located at the rear of the abdominal cavity in the retroperitoneum, the kidneys receive blood इससे the paired renal धमनियों, and drain into the paired renal रगों.
Each kidney excretes मूत्र into a ureter, itself a paired structure कि empties into the urinary ब्लैडर.
renal physiology is the पढ़ाई of गुर्दा फलन, while nephrology is the चिकित्सा specialty concerned साथ kidney diseases.
रोगों of the kidney are विविध, लकिन individuals with गुर्दा बीमारी frequently प्रदर्शक characteristic नैदानिक features.
आम clinical conditions involving the kidney include the nephritic और nephrotic syndromes, renal cysts, acute गुर्दा injury, chronic kidney disease, urinary tract infection, nephrolithiasis, and urinary ट्रैक्ट obstruction.
विभिन्न cancers of the गुर्दा exist ; the most आम adult renal cancer is renal cell carcinoma.
Cancers, cysts, and some other renal conditions can be managed with removal of the kidney, or nephrectomy.
When renal function, measured by glomerular filtration rate, is persistently poor, डायलिसिस and गुर्दा प्रत्यारोपण may be उपचार options.
हालांकि वे हैं not severely harmful, kidney पत्थरों can be दुखद और a nuisance.
The हटाना of गुर्दा पत्थरों involves अल्ट्रासाउंड उपचार to break up the पत्थरों into smaller टुकड़े, which are तब passed through the urinary tract.
One आम symptom of गुर्दा पत्थरों is a sharp pain in the medial/lateral खण्ड of the lower back.
Lockton कंपनियाँ inc. is the संसार 's largest privately आयोजित बीमे brokerage firm, providing insurance, रिस्क management और employee benefits solutions.
In addition to its Kansas नगर, मिसौरी headquarters, Lockton operates 60 locations in 17 countries.
Lockton is currently घर to अधिक than 4,450 शरीक worldwide.
the company थी founded by जोकर lockton in 1966 and has चूंकि become the world’s 9th largest insurance brokerage firm.
lockton serves a चौड़ी सरणी of industries with services कि शामिल रिस्क management, casualty, surety, पेशेवर indemnity और अधिक.
For 46 सालो, Lockton posted extraordinary organic growth, साथ global revenues reaching $ 915 लाख in फिस्कल 2012.
lockton Benefits समूह : Lockton’s कर्मचारी benefit’s टोली works closely with बीमे carriers and administrators to create व्यापक and integrated लाभ strategies लिये क्लाइंट.
The lockton Benefits Group provides services including compliance, executive लाभ, health and welfare, स्वास्थ्य रिस्क solutions, retirement and अधिक.
Lockton अपनापन : Lockton अपनापन, an संबद्ध of Lockton Companies, meets the बीमे needs of affinity groups, franchises, professional संगठन, and एसोसिएशन of all sizes.
lockton Affinity offers a किस्में of insurance उत्पाद options and कार्यक्रम.
Products include : General देयता, पेशेवर Liability, प्रॉपर्टी, Workers मुआवजे, Directors & Officers Liability, वाणिज्यिक स्वचालित, Specialty Coverage, excess, स्वास्थ्य Plans and more.
Lockton International : Lockton International operates offices in the UK and आयरलैंड, as well as कार्यालयों throughout एशिया and Latin अमेरिका.
in Europe, lockton अंतरराष्ट्रीय is a संगी in EOS risq, Europe’s leading insurance broking and risk प्रबन्धन consultancy.
EOS RISQ is an equity-based यूरोपीय साझेदारी of प्रमुख स्वतंत्र बीमे brokers with over 3,500 कर्मचारी based in अधिक than 30 countries in Europe.
Lockton International provides specialized solutions for निजी lines, sme’s and major multi-national क्लाइंट.
White chocolate is a चॉकलेट डेरिवेटिव.
it commonly consists of cocoa मक्खन, शुगर, milk solids और salt, और is characterized by a पाले पीला or आइवरी रूप.
The melting पाइंट of cocoa butter, इसके प्राथमिक cocoa सेम घटक, is high enough to रखना श्वेत chocolate ठोस at room temperature.
Donald Leon `` डॉन '' blankenship ( born March 14, 1950 ) was अध्यक्ष and CEO of Massey उर्जा Co., the sixth largest कोयले कम्पनी ( by 2008 production ) in the United States.
He served in those roles from नवम्बर 30, 2000, until दिसम्बर 31, 2010.
Blankenship is an क्रियाशील financial backer of the Republican पार्टी and भागीदार in local and state politics, especially in his घर state of वेस्ट वर्जिनिया.
He has frequently बोला out publicly about राजनीती, the environment, संघ, and coal production.
u.S. प्रतिभूति and एक्सचेंज Commission filings show Blankenship was सशुल्क $ 17.8 million in 2009, the highest in the coal industry.
His 2009 pay represents a $ 6.8 लाख उठाएँ over 2008 और almost double उसके compensation package in 2007.
Blankenship also received a deferred compensation package valued at $ 27.2 million in 2009.
on December 3, 2010, blankenship घोषित कि he was retiring as सीईओ at the end of the साल, और would be succeeded by massey President बैक्सटर F. phillips Jr.
