Negligence ( lat. negligentia, from neglegere, to neglect, literally `` नहीं to pick up कुछ '' ) is a failure to exercise the care that a reasonably prudent person would exercise in जैसे circumstances.
The क्षेत्रफल of tort law ज्ञात as लापरवाही involves harm caused by carelessness, नहीं intentional harm.
according to jay M. feinman of the rutgers विश्वविद्यालयों School of Law ;
`` The core idea of लापरवाही is that people should exercise reasonable परवाह when वे अधिनियम by लेने account of the संभावित नुक़सान that they might foreseeably cause नुक़सान to other लोगों. ''
`` those जो go personally or लाओ property जहाँ they know that they or it may आइये into टक्कर with the व्यक्तियों or प्रॉपर्टी of अन्य have by विधि a ड्यूटी डाल upon उन्हें to use reasonable care and कौशल to avoid such a collision. ''
Fletcher v Rylands ( [ 1866 ] LR 1 Ex 265 )
Through सिविल litigation, if an घायल व्यक्ति proves कि another person acted negligently to cause उनके injury, वे can recover damages to compensate for their नुक़सान.
Proving a मामला for लापरवाही can potentially entitle the injured plaintiff to मुआवजे लिये नुक़सान to उनके body, प्रॉपर्टी, दिमागी well-being, financial औकात, or intimate संबंध.
However, because negligence cases are very fact-specific, this सामान्य परिभाषा करता not fully explain the अवधारणा of जब the law होगा आवश्यकता one person to compensate another लिये losses caused by accidental injury.
further, the विधि of negligence at आम विधि is तभी एक aspect of the law of liability.
Although resulting क्षतिपूर्ति जरूर be proven in order to recover मुआवजे in a लापरवाही action, the nature और extent of those damages are not the primary फ़ोकस of negligence मामले.
a melanocytic nevus ( also ज्ञात as `` nevocytic nevus '' ) is a type of lesion कि contains nevus कोशिकाएं ( a type of melanocyte ).
कुछ sources equate the term mole साथ `` melanocytic nevus ''.
अन्य sources reserve the term `` mole '' for other purposes.
the बहुमत of औज़ार appear दौरान the first दो decades of a person’s जीवन, while about one in प्रत्येक 100 शिशु is born साथ औज़ार.
Acquired औज़ार are a रूप of benign फुलाव, जबकि congenital moles, or जन्मजात nevi, are माना a minor malformation or hamartoma और may be at a higher risk लिये melanoma.
A mole can be either subdermal ( under the स्किन ) or a pigmented growth on the skin, formed ज़्यादातर of a type of कोशिका ज्ञात as a melanocyte.
the high विशेषज्ञता of the body’s pigmenting एजेंट, मेलेनिन, is responsible लिये their dark color.
औज़ार हैं a सदस्य of the family of skin lesions ज्ञात as nevi.
the comprehensive metabolic फलक, or रासायनिक screen, ( CMP ; CPT कोड 80053 ) is a panel of 14 blood परीक्षण which serves as an आरंभिक व्यापक चिकित्सा स्क्रीनिंग tool.
The cmp provides a rough जाँच of गुर्दा function, liver फलन, and electrolyte and द्रव संतुलन, लकिन it is far इससे perfect.
असामान्य मान from a CBC may be a result of गलत positives and thus the cbc may need to be repeated for a patient ( or replaced साथ a more विशिष्ट परीक्षण ).
The CMP is an विस्तारित संस्करण of the मौलिक metabolic panel ( BMP ), जिससे does नहीं include जिगर परीक्षण.
A CMP ( or BMP ) can be ordered as भाग of a routine physical परिक्षा, or may be प्रयुक्त to monitor a रोगी with a chronic बीमारी, ऐसे as diabetes mellitus or hypertension.
Previous names for the फलक of tests have been chem 12, रसायन panel, रसायन स्क्रीन, SMA 12, sma 20 and SMAC ( Sequential अनेक Analysis - कंप्यूटर ).
The परीक्षण are performed on machines based on the autoanalyzer invented in 1957.
Natural gas extraction by countries in cubic meters per साल.
Natural gas is a naturally occurring hydrocarbon gas mixture consisting primarily of मिथेन, but commonly including varying amounts of अन्य hydrocarbons, carbon dioxide, nitrogen, and हाइड्रोजन sulfide.
Natural गैस is an energy सोर्स often used लिये heating, cooking, और विद्युत generation.
it is also प्रयुक्त as fuel लिये वाहनों and as a chemical feedstock in the manufacture of प्लास्टिक और other commercially important organic रसायन.
प्राकृतिक गैस is found in deep भूमिगत natural rock formations or associated साथ अन्य hydrocarbon टंकी in coal beds और as मिथेन clathrates.
Petroleum is भी another संसाधन found in proximity to and साथ natural गैस.
Most natural gas was created over समय by two mechanisms : biogenic और thermogenic.
Biogenic gas is created by methanogenic organisms in marshes, bogs, landfills, and shallow sediments.
Deeper in the earth, at greater temperature and pressure, thermogenic gas is निर्मित इससे buried सशुल्क सामग्री.
Before natural गैस can be प्रयुक्त as a ईंधन, it must undergo processing to remove impurities, including water, to meet the विशेषताएँ of marketable natural गैस.
the by-products of प्रसंस्करण शामिल ethane, propane, butanes, pentanes, and उच्चतर molecular weight hydrocarbons, हाइड्रोजन sulfide ( जिससे may be परिवर्तित into pure गंधक ), कार्बन dioxide, water vapor, और sometimes helium and nitrogen.
प्राकृतिक gas is often informally referred to बस as गैस, especially when compared to other energy स्त्रोत ऐसे as oil or coal.
इस page is about the Imagination मूवर्स बैंड.
For सूचना about the tv दिखाएँ starring the band, see Imagination Movers ( TV series ).
Imagination Movers is a band formed in New Orleans, Louisiana, in 2003.
the lineup शामिल समृद्ध Collins, Scott durbin, Dave Poche, and Scott `` Smitty '' स्मिथ.
Members of the group were longtime friends and neighbors.
The समूह started as a television/music concept which थी pitched to लोकल pbs affiliates in नई Orleans.
wlae-tv थी the first to take an interest in the group and बाद introduced उन्हें to Beth कोर्टनी, the अध्यक्ष & Chief Executive Officer at Louisiana Public प्रसारण.
Soon बाद, LPB began airing one-minute videos उत्पादित by the Imagination मूवर्स themselves.
the मूवर्स निर्मित a sizable regional following by सेटिंग शैक्षणिक songs for kids to melodies और लय that वयस्कों कद्र as well.
They sold more than 100,000 copies of their self-produced CDs and DVDs.
Their three indie cds : `` Good विचार, '' `` Calling सब Movers, '' and `` आठ फीट '' साथ साथ their grass roots dvd `` हलचल It up '' have, combined, won fourteen नेशनल awards, from such समूह as the National संघ of Parenting Publications ( NAPPA ) and Parents ' चुनाव.
in जल्दी 2005, डिज़्नी took notice, और initiated negotiations to add the मूवर्स to the company 's रोस्टर.
These were interrupted in August when the बाढ़ protection designed और built by the फौज corps of Engineers to protect New ऑरलियन्स failed.
The resulting floodwater claimed the बैंड 's office, as well as the homes of Collins, durbin and Poche – but the सौदे थी signed in the spring of 2006.
In 2008, वॉल्ट Disney Records introduced the कल्पना मूवर्स ' music to the स्वदेश with the release of the Movers ' पहला nationally-released CD, `` Juice Box नायक. ''
in सितंबर 2008, a 30-minute show featuring the समूह began airing on the डिज़्नी Channel 's preschool प्रोग्रामिंग block ज्ञात as playhouse Disney, and currently airs on Playhouse Disney 's बदलना, डिज़्नी जूनियर.
The मूवर्स write और perform सब the गीतों on their show.
Moreover, the Imagination Movers have प्राप्त नाजुक kudos लिये उनके live concert performances.
in October 2009, the Imagination मूवर्स प्रारंभ the `` Live इससे the विचार Warehouse कॉन्सर्ट Tour 2009 ''.
Traveling इससे mid-October to mid-december 2009 उनके live performances include lots of उनके पसंदीदा गीतों और dancing, as खूब as video appearances of Warehouse चूहा.
Beginning in early-February 2011 और wrapping up in late May 2011, the Imagination मूवर्स presented their `` in a Big गोदाम Concert Tour, '' playing more than 100 shows in 50+ शहरों across उत्तर America.
इससे March to अक्तूबर 2012, the कल्पना Movers toured उत्तर America on their post-disney `` rock-o-matic '' tour.
The show maintained several elements of the असली TV concept, such as an on-stage `` विचार emergency '' और several sets इससे their पुरानी कैटलॉग ; however, with the departure of Wendy calio वापस to her देशी Hawaii, the character `` Nina '', along with her musical numbers, is not उपस्थित.
the दौरे promotes the कल्पना Movers ' new album/DVD रिलीज, `` rock-o-matic '', which सुविधाएँ all new म्यूज़िक इससे the band.
the एल्बम itself is produced independently of Disney and रै a notably more वयस्क, समकालीन rock-and-roll sound, though still very appropriate for children.
Several performance dates were moved to later in 2012 to benefit from the increased exposure of the Imagination Movers TV show अभी playing रोज़ on Disney Junior.
The platypus ( ornithorhynchus anatinus ) is a semiaquatic mammal endemic to eastern ऑस्ट्रेलिया, including तस्मानिया.
Together with the चार प्रजाति of echidna, it is one of the five extant species of monotremes, the only mammals that lay eggs बजाय of giving birth.
It is the एकमात्र जीना प्रतिनिधि of its परिवार ( ornithorhynchidae ) and genus ( ornithorhynchus ), though a number of सम्बन्धित species have महरूम found in the चट्टान रिकार्ड.
The unusual रूप of this egg-laying, duck -billed, बीवर -tailed, otter -footed mammal baffled यूरोपीय naturalists जब वे first encountered it, साथ some considering it an elaborate धोखाधड़ी.
It is one of the few विषैला mammals, the male platypus having a spur on the हिन्द पैर कि delivers a venom capable of causing कठोर पीड़ा to इंसानो.
the unique सुविधाएँ of the platypus make it an important subject in the पढ़ाई of विकासवादी biology and a recognisable और iconic symbol of Australia ; it रै appeared as a शुभंकर at national events and is featured on the रिवर्स of इसके 20-cent coin.
The platypus is the animal emblem of the state of नई दक्षिण Wales.
जबतक the early 20th century, it was hunted लिये इसके fur, but it is now सुरक्षित throughout इसके दायरा.
हालांकि खिलाते breeding programmes have had only सीमित कामयाबी and the platypus is vulnerable to the प्रभाव of pollution, it is नहीं अंतर्गत कोई immediate threat.
the Chupacabra or chupacabras (, इससे chupar `` to suck '' और cabra `` goat '', literally `` बकरी चूषक '' ) is a legendary cryptid rumored to inhabit parts of the Americas.
it is associated more recently with sightings of an allegedly unknown एनिमल in प्यूर्टो Rico ( जहाँ ये sightings were first reported ), Mexico, और the संयुक्त States, विशेषकर in the latter 's Latin अमरीकी समुदायों.
The name comes इससे the एनिमल 's reported habit of attacking and drinking the blood of livestock, विशेषकर goats.
Physical descriptions of the प्राणी vary.
Eyewitness sightings have महरूम claimed as जल्दी as 1995 in प्यूर्टो Rico, and have चूंकि been reported as far उत्तर as Maine, and as far दक्षिण as चिली, and भी being spotted बाहर the Americas in countries जैसे रूस और the Philippines.
It is supposedly a भारी creature, the size of a small bear, साथ a row of कांटे reaching from the neck to the आधार of the tail.
Sighting reports of the Chupacabra have महरूम disregarded as uncorroborated or lacking प्रमाण, while सबसे रिपोर्ट्स in northern मैक्सिको और the दक्षिणी United States have been सत्यापित as canids afflicted by mange.
Biologists and wildlife प्रबन्धन officials view the chupacabra as a contemporary लेजेंड.
The North अमरीकी Free Trade Agreement ( nafta ) is an अनुबंध हस्ताक्षरित by Canada, Mexico, and the United States, बनाना a trilateral trade bloc in North अमेरिका.
the अनुबंध came into force on January 1, 1994.
It superseded the Canada–United States फ़्री Trade अनुबंध between the u.S., कनाडा, and Mexico
nafta has two supplements : the उत्तर अमरीकी Agreement on Environmental सहयोग ( NAAEC ) and the North American Agreement on Labor Cooperation ( NAALC ).
थर्मल सुकून is the कंडीशन of mind कि expresses satisfaction साथ the thermal environment और is assessed by subjective evaluation ( ansi / ASHRAE मानक 55 ).
maintaining this standard of थर्मल comfort लिये occupants of buildings or other enclosures is एक of the important goals of hvac ( heating, वेंटिलेशन, और air conditioning ) design engineers.
the Predicted Mean vote ( pmv ) model stands among the सबसे recognized thermal सुकून मॉडल.
it was developed using principles of heat balance और experimental data collected in a controlled climate कक्ष अंतर्गत steady state conditions.
Because the PMV model was derived from आंकड़ा collected in a controlled climate, it is not suitable for अनुप्रयोग in naturally ventilated स्पेसेस which प्रायः have high levels of air गति.
This shortcoming motivated the विकास of a family of अनुभवजन्य सांख्यिकीय models of thermal सुकून in naturally ventilated स्पेसेस ज्ञात as अनुकूली मॉडल.
Adaptive models of thermal comfort consider occupants as dynamically interacting साथ उनके पर्यावरण, and controlling उनके thermal comfort by अर्थात् of clothing or window-opening and closing.
This is in contrast to thermal comfort in sealed buildings, in which occupants अनुभव the environment passively.
Thermal comfort is affected by heat conduction, convection, radiation, और evaporative heat घाटा.
थर्मल comfort is कायम जब the heat generated by human metabolism is अनुमत to dissipate, thus maintaining थर्मल संतुलन with the surroundings.
it रै महरूम long पहचाना कि the सनसनी of feeling hot or ठंडा is not just निर्भर on एयर temperature अलोन.
Thermal सुकून calculations according to ANSI/ASHRAE मानक 55 can be freely performed with the CBE Thermal सुकून Tool लिये ASHRAE-55.
Durante degli एलीगियरी, बस referred to as Dante (, ; ; c. 1265–1321 ), थी a major Italian कवि of the Middle Ages.
His दैवी कॉमेडी, originally called ' और later called ' by Boccaccio, is widely considered the महानतम literary कार्य रचित in the Italian language and a कलाकृति of world literature.
In Italy he is known as ' ( `` the Supreme Poet '' ) or just '.
He, Petrarch and Boccaccio हैं also known as `` the three स्रोतों '' or `` the three crowns ''.
Dante is भी पुकारा the `` पिता of the इतालवी भाषा ''.
Headquarters ( Kobe, Japan )
( ) is a टायर and rubber company based in Japan.
It is part of the Sumitomo Group.
The कम्पनी traces इसके origins to 1909, when the sumitomo समूह बना an investment in Dunlop Japan, the newly formed Japanese subsidiary of the British कम्पनी Dunlop रबर.
over the सालो Sumitomo and dunlop developed a close कारोबार relationship, and in 1963 the Sumitomo समूह acquired control of dunlop Japan और renamed it sumitomo Rubber Industries Ltd.
in 1985, when Dunlop Rubber थी लिया over by btr plc, the company acquired the automobile tire एसेट of Dunlop, सहित the right to use the dunlop brand on automobile tires.
the acquisition did not शामिल the US and Australian businesses, जिससे यहूद separately owned, लकिन in 1986 Sumitomo also acquired the Dunlop Tire निगम of the US from its प्रबन्धन.
In 1997, sumitomo formed a संयुक्त venture साथ Goodyear टायर और Rubber कम्पनी, by जिससे Goodyear और Sumitomo agreed to manufacture टायर लिये प्रत्येक other 's markets, सहित dunlop branded tires.
as भाग of the agreement, goodyear acquired 75 % रूचि in dunlop Tyres, the uk company which sumitomo had formed, और in Dunlop टायर निगम.
Goodyear and sumitomo also बना निवेश in प्रत्येक अन्य.
Today, the company makes a wide range of rubber आधारित products, including ऑटोमोबाइल tires, golf balls and टेनिस balls.
Microsoft Visual Studio एक्स्प्रेस is a नियत of फ्रीवेयर integrated विकास environments ( IDE ) developed by Microsoft that हैं lightweight versions of the microsoft Visual स्टुडियो उत्पाद line.
Express Editions यहूद conceived शुरूआत साथ विज़ुअल स्टुडियो 2005.
The idea of Express editions is to provide streamlined, easy-to-use and easy-to-learn IDEs for उपयोक्ता अन्य than professional तन्त्र डेवलपर, such as hobbyists and students.
the ऐल्प्स हैं one of the ग्रेट mountain दायरा प्रणालियों of यूरोपीय stretching लगभग across eight Alpine देशों इससे ऑस्ट्रिया और स्लोवेनियाई in the east, Switzerland, liechtenstein, Germany, फ़्रांस to the वेस्ट and Italy and Monaco to the south.
The mountains were formed over hundreds of लाखो of years as the African and यूरेशियाई tectonic प्लेटों collided.
चरम shortening caused by the इवेंट resulted in marine sedimentary रॉक्स rising by thrusting and फोल्डिंग into ऊँची mountain चोटियों such as Mont Blanc और the matterhorn.
मोंट Blanc spans the French–Italian border, and at is the highest mountain in the ऐल्प्स.
the Alpine region area contains many चोटियों higher than, known as the `` four-thousanders ``.
The altitude और आकार of the दायरा affects the climate in Europe ; in the mountains precipitation स्तर vary greatly and climatic शर्तें consist of distinct zones.
वन्यजीव ऐसे as ibex live in the higher peaks to elevations of, and पौधे such as edelweiss grow in रॉकी क्षेत्रों in निम्नतर elevations as well as in higher elevations.
Evidence of human habitation in the Alps goes वापस to the Paleolithic era.
a mummified man, determined to be 5,000 years बूढ़ा, was discovered on a हिमानी at the austrian–italian border in 1991.
By the 6th century BC, the सेल्टिक la Tène संस्कृति was well स्थापित.
Hannibal may have crossed the ऐल्प्स साथ a herd of elephants, और the Romans had settlements in the region.
in 1800 नेपोलियन crossed एक of the mountain passes साथ an army of 40,000.
the 18th और 19th centuries saw an influx of naturalists, लेखक, और artists, in particular the romantics, followed by the golden age of alpinism as mountaineers began to ascend the peaks.
in World युद्ध II the Third Reich invaded the Alpine देशों, with the एक्सेप्शन of Switzerland और liechtenstein ; Adolf हिटलर kept a base of operation in the bar Alps throughout the war.
The अल्पाइन प्रदेश has a strong cultural पहचान.
the परंपरागत culture of farming, cheesemaking, और woodworking still exists in अल्पाइन गांवों, हालांकि the tourist उद्योग began to grow early in the 20th century और विस्तारित greatly after World युद्ध ii to become the प्रबल उद्योग by the end of the सदी.
The शीत ओलम्पिक Games have been hosted in the Swiss, फ्रेंच, Italian, Austrian and German ऐल्प्स.
At present the region is home to 14 लाख people और रै 120 million annual visitors.
Lois Patrice Griffin ( née pewterschmidt ) is a character इससे the animated television श्रेणी Family guy.
She is voiced by writer Alex Borstein and first appeared on television, साथ साथ the rest of the family in the 15-minute short on December 20, 1998.
Lois was निर्मित and designed by श्रेणी creator सेठ MacFarlane.
MacFarlane थी asked to pitch a pilot to the फॉक्स प्रसारण Company based on Larry and स्टीव, a छोटी made by MacFarlane which प्रदर्शित a middle-aged अक्षर नामित लैरी and an बौद्धिक dog, स्टीव.
After the pilot was दिए the ग्रीन light, the griffin family appeared on the एपीसोड `` Death Has a Shadow ``.
Lois is the mother of the Griffin परिवार.
With उसके husband पीटर, वो रै had three children : मेग, क्रिस, and Stewie.
लोइस is often portrayed as a stereotypical television mother, despite her admitting to होने a ड्रग उपयोक्ता, a recovering meth addict kleptomaniac.
Lois रै also था अनेक affairs, one of which allegedly resulted in the conception of Meg.
She रै appeared in other मीडिया relating to Family Guy—including a video खेल, commercials and books—and inspired an entire line of merchandise.
लोइस 's distinctive New York एक्सेंट originated from a character in a stage दिखाएँ that Alex Borstein had performed in, जिससे थी largely inspired by a सापेक्ष जो grew up on Long द्वीप, New York.
Family transmission of Basque language ( Basque as initial language )
Percentage of students registered in बास्क language schools ( 2000–2005 ).
स्थान of the basque-language provinces within स्पेन and फ़्रांस
Basque ( endonym :, ) is the ancestral language of the Basque people, जो inhabit the बास्क Country, a region spanning an क्षेत्रफल in northeastern Spain and southwestern फ़्रांस.
it is spoken by 27 % of Basques in सब territories ( 714,136 out of 2,648,998 ).
of these, 663,035 live in the स्पेनी भाग of the बास्क देश and the remaining 51,100 live in the फ्रेंच part.
In academic discussions of the distribution of Basque in Spain और France, it is प्रथागत to refer to तीन ancient provinces in फ़्रांस और four स्पेनी provinces.
देशी अध्यक्षों are concentrated in a संलग्न area सहित parts of the स्पेनी autonomous communities of the बास्क देश और Navarre and in the पश्चिमी half of the फ्रेंच département of Pyrénées-Atlantiques.
The बास्क Autonomous Community is an administrative entity भीतर the binational ethnographic बास्क Country incorporating the traditional स्पेनी provinces of Biscay, Gipuzkoa, and Álava, which retain their existence as politico-administrative divisions.
ये provinces and अनेक क्षेत्रों of नावारा are heavily populated by जातीय Basques, but Basque was, at least until the 1990s, not spoken as a native भाषा in सबसे of Álava, western parts of Biscay और central and southern areas of Navarre, either क्युकी it had महरूम replaced by Spanish साथ the centuries, in some areas, or because it had never been spoken there, in other क्षेत्रों.
in southwestern फ़्रांस, the ancient basque-populated provinces were Labourd, Lower Navarre, and Soule.
They and अन्य regions were संचित into a सिंगल département in 1790 under the name basses-pyrénées, a नाम which persisted until 1970.
A मानकीकृत रूप of the Basque language, पुकारा euskara batua, was developed by the Basque Language अकादमी in the लेट 1960s.
Euskara Batua थी निर्मित so that Basque language could be used—and easily understood by सब बास्क speakers—in औपचारिक situations ( शिक्षा, mass मीडिया, साहित्य ), and इस is its प्रमुख use today.
the role of इस standard Basque भाषा depends on the linguistic educational model of प्रत्येक region and प्रत्येक school.
in most areas of the स्पेनी Basque Country, the educational Model D, where all subjects हैं taught in Basque, except `` Spanish language और literature '' ( जिससे is taught in Spanish ) is now the predominant model.
In फ़्रांस, the बास्क language school Seaska and the association for a bilingual ( Basque और French ) schooling Ikasbi meet a wide दायरा of बास्क language शैक्षणिक needs up to the Sixth रूप, जबकि प्रायः struggling to surmount financial और administrative constraints.
Apart from this मानकीकृत version, वहीँ are five main बास्क dialects : bizkaian, Gipuzkoan, and अपर navarrese in Spain, और navarrese–lapurdian and Zuberoan ( in फ़्रांस ).
हालांकि वे take their names इससे the mentioned ऐतिहासिक provinces, the dialect सीमाएँ हैं not congruent साथ province सीमाएँ.
the President, Directors and कम्पनी, of the बैंको of the United राज्य, commonly known as the पहला बैंको of the संयुक्त States, was a central bank, चार्टर्ड for a पद of बीस सालो, by the संयुक्त States Congress on फ़रवरी 25, 1791.
Establishment of the बैंको was included in a three-part विस्तार of federal फिस्कल and monetary power ( along साथ a federal mint and excise taxes ) championed by सिकंदर Hamilton, first सचिव of the राजकोष.
Hamilton believed a central bank थी जरुरी to stabilize and improve the स्वदेश 's credit, और to improve हैंडलिंग of the financial business of the संयुक्त राज्य सरकारी under the newly enacted Constitution.
officially proposed to the पहला सत्र of the First कॉंग्रेस in 1790, हैमिल्टन 's बैंको faced widespread resistance from प्रतिद्वंद्वियों of increased federal शक्ति.
सचिव of State Thomas जेफरसन and James मैडिसन led the opposition, which claimed that the bank was असंवैधानिक, और कि it benefited व्यापारियों and investors at the expense of the majority of the जनसांख्यिकी.
the First Bank building is अभी a नेशनल ऐतिहासिक लैंडमार्क located in Philadelphia, पेन्सिलवेनिया within Independence National ऐतिहासिक Park.
जेम्स वेस्ले Marsters ( born August 20, 1962 ) is an अमरीकी कर्ता and संगीतकार.
Marsters पहला आए to the ध्यान of the सामान्य पब्लिक playing the popular अक्षर Spike, a platinum-blond yobbish अंग्रेज़ी vampire in the television श्रेणी Buffy the Vampire Slayer and इसके spin-off series, देवदूत, from 1997 to 2004.

In molecular biology, इंसान chorionic gonadotropin ( hcg ) is a hormone produced by the निषेचित egg after conception.
Later during pregnancy it is made by the developing placenta, and later by the placental घटक syncytiotrophoblast.
कुछ cancerous tumors उपज this हार्मोन ; therefore, elevated स्तर measured जब the patient is नहीं pregnant can सीसे to a कर्कट diagnosis.
however, it is नहीं known whether this production is a contributing cause or an प्रभाव of tumorigenesis.
the pituitary एनॉलॉग of hcg, known as luteinizing hormone ( LH ), is produced in the pituitary gland of males और महिलाओं of सब आयु.
, the एफडीए रै निषिद्ध the बिक्री of `` homeopathic '' and over the काउंटर hcg diet products और declared them fraudulent and illegal.
बेयोंस गिजेला Knowles-Carter, ज्ञात by her stage name बेयोंस ( ; born September 4, 1981 ), is an American singer, songwriter, dancer, and अभिनेत्री.
Born and raised in Houston, Texas, she performed in गायन and नाचना प्रतियोगिताओं as a चाइल्ड before forming in 1990 a समूह with केली rowland and LaTavia Roberson कि थी eventually नामित Destiny 's चाइल्ड.
एकबार हस्ताक्षरित to Columbia रिकॉर्ड, the लड़कियों subsequently became one of the world 's best-selling girl groups of all समय.
The समूह थी plagued by internal विरोध और legal turmoil and Knowles suffered इससे अवसाद that lasted for a क्रमांक of years.
दौरान the समूह 's hiatus, नॉलेस released her debut सोलो album Dangerously in Love ( 2003 ), जिससे earned her पाँच Grammy Awards and has sold a total of 4.9 million copies in the US alone.
It spawned बिलबोर्ड क्रमांक one singles `` Crazy in Love, '' considered by VH1 to be the `` Greatest Song Of the 00 's, '' और `` baby लड़के. ''

Sasha Fierce ( 2008 ) जिससे spawned hits `` If i Were a Boy ``, `` Single महिलाओं ( Put a Ring on It ) ``, `` Halo ``, and `` Sweet Dreams ``.

Her fourth एल्बम 4 ( 2011 ) deviated towards traditional r & b and became her fourth consecutive क्रमांक एक album on the बिलबोर्ड 200.
in January 2012, Knowles gave जनम to daughter Blue Ivy कार्टर, her पहला child साथ husband jay-z.
Knowles has sold over 13 लाख albums in the us और 118 लाख records विश्वव्यापी ( as well as a further 50 लाख रिकॉर्ड साथ Destiny 's चाइल्ड ), और is one of the best-selling music कलाकारों of all समय.

in 2009, Billboard named her the Top Radio Songs कलाकार of the decade and ranked उसके the Top Female Artist and the fourth Artist of the Decade.
Beyoncé नॉलेस is the most मनोनीत woman in ग्रैमी Award इतिहास, receiving 17 पुरस्कार ; other accolades include 12 MTV Video Music पुरस्कार, 7 बिलबोर्ड पुरस्कार including a मिलेनियम Award, और a स्टार on the हॉलीवुड चलना of Fame as part of Destiny 's Child.

it थी released theatrically in उत्तर America on February 5, 2010.

Santa Fe ( ; ( tewa : ogha po'oge, ) ) is the capital of the U.S. state of New मैक्सिको.
It is the fourth-largest नगर in the राज्य और is the seat of.
सांता fe ( meaning “holy faith” in Spanish ) had a population of 67,947 in the 2010 जनसांख्यिकी.
it is the principal नगर of a Metropolitan सांख्यिकीय क्षेत्रफल which encompasses all of सांता fe County and is part of the larger Albuquerque-Santa Fe-Las Vegas Combined Statistical क्षेत्रफल.
the city’s पूरा नाम जब संस्थापित was La Villa Real de la Santa Fé de San Francisco de Asís ( “The Royal Town of the पावन Faith of st. Francis of assisi” ).
Pepsi ( stylized in lowercase as pepsi, formerly stylized in अपरकेस as PEPSI ) is a कार्बोनेटेड soft drink कि is produced and manufactured by पेप्सिको.

The बेटे of स्वतंत्रता थी a समूह consisting of American देशप्रेमी that originated in the pre-independence उत्तर American अंग्रेजों colonies.
The group थी formed to protect the अधिकारों of the colonists और to लो to the streets against the taxes by the British government.
वे हैं बेहतरीन known for undertaking the Boston Tea Party in 1773, which led to the Intolerable अधिनियमों ( an intense crackdown by the अंग्रेजों government ), and a counter-mobilization by the देशप्रेमी.
Osaka castle
is a नगर in the Kansai प्रदेश of जापानी 's प्रमुख island of Honshu, a designated नगर अंतर्गत the लोकल Autonomy Law, the capital city of Osaka Prefecture and also the largest part of the keihanshin metropolis, which comprises three major शहरों of Japan, Kyoto, Osaka और Kobe.
स्तिथ at the mouth of the yodo नदी on Osaka Bay, Osaka is Japan 's तीसरा largest नगर by population after टोकियो ( खास wards ) and Yokohama.
Keihanshin is the second largest metropolitan area in जापानी by जनसांख्यिकी and one of the largest महानगर areas highly ranked in the संसार, with nearly 19 लाख people, and by GDP the second largest area in Japan और the सातवाँ largest area in the संसार.
historically the commercial बीच of जापानी, ओसाका functions as एक of the command centers for the Japanese अर्थव्यवस्था.
the ratio between daytime and रात्रि time population is 141 %, the highest in जापानी, highlighting its status as an आर्थिक center.
इसके nighttime population is 2.6 लाख, the third in the country, but in दिन the population surges to 3.7 million, second तभी बाद टोकियो ( combining the special wards of Tokyo, जिससे is नहीं a सिंगल incorporated city, लिये statistical उद्देश्य ; देखिए the Tokyo article for more information on the परिभाषा and makeup of Tokyo ).
Osaka प्रयुक्त to be referred to as the in सामंती Edo काल because it was the केन्द्र of trading for rice, बनाना the पहला आधुनिक futures एक्सचेंज market in the संसार.
The Little मरमेड is a 1989 American animated musical काल्पनिक फिल्मी produced by वॉल्ट डिज़्नी Feature एनिमेशन और distributed by Walt Disney Pictures.
आधारित on the डैनिश fairy tale by Hans Christian andersen, The Little Mermaid tells the स्टोरी of a खूबसूरत मरमेड जो सपनो of बनने human.
Written, directed, and produced by Ron क्लेमेंट्स और जॉन Musker, साथ music by एलन menken और Howard ashman, the film features the voices Jodi Benson, Christopher Daniel barnes, Pat Carroll, सैमुएल E. Wright, जेसन मारिन, Kenneth Mars, दोस्त Hacket, and रेने auberjonois.
The 28th film in the वॉल्ट डिज़्नी एनिमेटेड क्लासिक series, the Little Mermaid was released to theaters on November 14, 1989 to largely धनात्मक समीक्षाएँ, garnering $ 84 लाख at the box दफ्तर during its आरंभिक release, और $ 211 million in total lifetime gross.
बाद the कामयाबी of the 1988 Disney / Amblin film Who framed Roger Rabbit, the Little Mermaid is दिए credit for श्वास life back into the आर्ट of डिज़्नी एनिमेटेड विशेषता films बाद a स्ट्रिंग of नाजुक or commercial failures उत्पादित by Disney कि दिनाँक वापस to the जल्दी 1970s.
It भी चिह्नित the प्रारंभ of the era known as the डिज़्नी Renaissance.
A स्टेज adaptation of the film with a book by Doug राइट and अतिरिक्त गीतों by Alan menken और नई lyricist ग्लेन Slater opened in डेनवर in July 2007 और began प्रदर्शन on Broadway जनवरी 10, 2008.

जामुनी drank is a slang term for a recreational ड्रग popular in the hip hop जातियाँ in the दक्षिणी United States, originating in Houston, Texas.
Its main संघटक is नुस्खा -strength cough syrup containing codeine and promethazine.
Cough सिरप is typically मिश्रित साथ संघटक such as Sprite नरम पेय or Mountain Dew और pieces of Jolly rancher candy.
The purplish hue of purple drank आता इससे dyes in the cough सिरप.
वहीँ are numerous slang terms for purple drank, including sizzurp, lean, सिरप, drank, barre, जामुनी jelly, Texas tea, और Tsikuni.
first/given, middle, और last/family/surname diagram with J. S. बच as example.
J. S. बच shared his given name साथ six तात्कालिक family सदस्यों और अनेक विस्तारित family सदस्यों.
He साझा उसके परिवार name साथ most परिवार members.
A दिए name, in Western contexts प्रायः referred to as a first name, is a personal नाम that specifies and differentiates between सदस्यों of a group of individuals, especially in a परिवार, all of whose members usually share the वही family name ( उपनाम ).
A दिए नाम is purposefully दिए, usually by a चाइल्ड 's parents at or near जनम, in contrast to an inherited एक such as a family name.
A दिए name is sometimes legally changed through a नाम change.
Given names are often प्रयुक्त in a familiar and दोस्ताना manner in अनौपचारिक situations.
in more औपचारिक परिस्थितियों the surname is प्रयुक्त instead, unless it is जरुरी to distinguish between people साथ the same उपनाम.
The idiom `` on a first-name basis '' ( or `` on first-name terms '' ) alludes to the familiarity of addressing another by a given name.
The western style of having both a family name ( उपनाम ) और a given नाम is दूर इससे universal.
In अनेक देशों it is common for ordinary people to have only one name ( a mononym ).
हाइड्रोक्लोरिक acid is a clear, colourless समाधान of hydrogen chloride ( H Cl ) in water.
It is a highly क्षयकारी, strong खनिज एसिड साथ अनेक औद्योगिक उपयोग.
Hydrochloric एसिड is found naturally in gastric एसिड.
Historically called muriatic एसिड, and आत्माओं of salt, hydrochloric acid was उत्पादित इससे vitriol ( sulfuric एसिड ) and common salt.
it first appeared during the पुनर्जागरण, और then it was प्रयुक्त by chemists ऐसे as Glauber, प्रीस्टलि and Davy in their वैज्ञानिक research.
With major production starting in the औद्योगिक Revolution, हाइड्रोक्लोरिक एसिड is प्रयुक्त in the रासायनिक industry as a रासायनिक reagent in the large-scale production of vinyl chloride for PVC प्लास्टिक, और mdi / TDI for polyurethane.
It रै numerous smaller-scale applications, including household सफ़ाई, production of gelatin और अन्य food एडिटिव, descaling, और leather processing.
About 20 लाख tonnes of hydrochloric acid हैं उत्पादित annually.
Wheat ( triticum spp. ) is a खाद्यान्न अनाज, originally इससे the Levant region of the निकट East and Ethiopian Highlands, लकिन अभी cultivated विश्वव्यापी.
in 2010, world production of गेहूं थी 651 लाख tons, making it the third most-produced खाद्यान्न after मक्का ( 844 million tons ) and rice ( 672 million टन ).
Wheat थी the second most-produced cereal in 2009 ; संसार production in that year was 682 million टन, after maize ( 817 million टन ), और साथ राइस as a बंद तीसरा ( 679 million tons ).
This अनाज is grown on more जमीन area than कोई other commercial food.
World व्यापार in wheat is greater than for all other फसलों संयुक्त.
globally, wheat is the leading सोर्स of vegetable protein in इंसान food, having a higher protein सामग्री than soybeans or the other major cereals, maize ( corn ) or rice.
In terms of total production tonnages used लिये food, it is फिलहाल दूसरी to rice as the प्रमुख इंसान खाना क्रॉप and ahead of maize, after allowing for मक्का 's अधिक extensive उपयोग in animal फ़ीड्स.
गेहूं was a कुंजी factor enabling the emergence of city-based societies at the start of सभ्यता क्युकी it was एक of the पहला crops that could be easily cultivated on a विशाल स्केल, and had the additional advantage of yielding a harvest कि provides long-term storage of खाना.
गेहूं contributed to the emergence of city-states in the fertile Crescent, including the babylonian and Assyrian empires.
Wheat grain is a staple food used to make आटा लिये leavened, flat and steamed breads, बिस्कुट, cookies, cakes, breakfast cereal, पास्ता, नूडल्स, couscous and लिये fermentation to make beer, other alcoholic beverages, or biofuel.
Wheat is planted to a limited extent as a forage crop for पशुधन, और its स्ट्रॉ can be प्रयुक्त as a निर्माण material लिये roofing thatch.
the whole grain can be milled to छोड़ just the endosperm for श्वेत flour.
The by-products of इस are चोकर and रोगाणु.
The पूरे अनाज is a concentrated source of विटामिन, minerals, and protein, जबकि the refined अनाज is ज़्यादातर मंड.
Printing
to publish is to मेक content available to the general public.
While specific use of the पद may vary among देशों, it is प्रायः applied to टेक्स्ट, बिंब, or other audio-visual content on कोई परंपरागत medium, including paper ( अखबारों, magazines, कैटलॉग, इत्यादि. ).
the शब्द publication means the act of प्रकाशन, and भी refers to कोई printed नक़ल.
मेलिसा & जॉय is an ABC Family original television series starring Melissa Joan हार्ट and Joey Lawrence.
It पहला aired on एबीसी परिवार on August 17, 2010.
the श्रेणी follows लोकल राजनेता mel Burke ( Melissa जोन Hart ) and Joe Longo ( Joey Lawrence ), जिसको mel hires to dekh बाद her भांजी and nephew after a पेन्शन scheme leaves him broke.
The series was renewed by ABC Family लिये a second ऋतु of पंद्रह एपीसोड, जिससे began airing on may 30, 2012 और ended on August 29, 2012.

On August 17, 2012, ABC Family नवीनीकृत Melissa & Joey लिये a third ऋतु, नियत to premiere in spring 2013.
The Dharma wheel, often प्रयुक्त to represent the प्रतिष्ठित Eightfold Path
The प्रतिष्ठित Eightfold Path (, ) is एक of the principal teachings of the Buddha, who वर्णित it as the way leading to the cessation of suffering ( dukkha ) and the achievement of self-awakening.
It is used to develop insight into the true nature of phenomena ( or reality ) and to eradicate लोभ, द्वेष, and delusion.
The Noble eightfold Path is the fourth of the Buddha 's Four Noble सच्चाई ; the first element of the Noble eightfold पाथ is, in फेरे, an समझना of the Four Noble Truths.
It is also known as the Middle Path or Middle Way.
All eight तत्व of the पाथ begin with the word `` right '', which translates the word samyañc ( in Sanskrit ) or sammā ( in Pāli ).
ये denote पूर्णता, togetherness, and coherence, and can also suggest the होश of `` पूर्ण '' or `` आदर्श ''.
'samma ' is भी अनूदित as `` wholesome '', `` wise '' and `` skillful ''.
in Buddhist symbolism, the Noble Eightfold पाथ is often represented by means of the dharma wheel ( dharmachakra ), whose आठ तीलियां represent the eight elements of the पाथ.
the ग्रैमी Award लिये Song of the Year is an honor प्रस्तुत at the Grammy Awards, a ceremony कि was स्थापित in 1958 and originally पुकारा the gramophone Awards.
पुरस्कार in several श्रेणी हैं distributed annually by the National Academy of Recording कला और sciences of the United States to `` सम्मान कलाकारी achievement, तकनीकी proficiency and overall excellence in the recording उद्योग, without regard to album sales or chart position. ''
अर्थशास्त्र is the social science that analyzes the production, वितरण, and consumption of goods and सेवाएं.
the पद economics आता from the प्राचीन Greek ( ', `` management of a household, प्रशासन '' ) from ( ', `` house '' ) + ( ', `` कस्टम '' or `` law '' ), hence `` नियम of the हाउस ( hold ) ''.
राजनैतिक अर्थव्यवस्था was the earlier नाम for the विषय, but economists in the late 19th century suggested `` अर्थशास्त्र '' as a shorter term लिये `` आर्थिक विज्ञान '' that also avoided a narrow political-interest connotation and as समान in form to `` गणित ``, `` ethics '', and so forth.
A focus of the subject is how economic agents व्यवहार or interact and how economies work.
Consistent साथ this, a primary textbook distinction is between microeconomics और macroeconomics.
microeconomics examines the behavior of मौलिक elements in the economy, including individual agents ( such as households and firms or as buyers and विक्रेता ) और markets, और उनके interactions.
macroeconomics analyzes the संपूर्ण economy and issues affecting it, सहित unemployment, महंगाई, economic growth, and monetary और फिस्कल नीति.
Other व्यापक distinctions include those between positive economics ( describing `` what is '' ) and normative economics ( वकालत `` what ought to be '' ) ; between economic सिद्धान्त and लागू economics ; between rational और behavioral economics ; और between mainstream economics ( more `` orthodox '' और dealing साथ the `` rationality-individualism-equilibrium nexus '' ) and heterodox economics ( more `` radical '' and dealing with the `` institutions-history-social ढांचा nexus '' ).
आर्थिक analysis may be लागू throughout समाज, as in business, वित्त, health परवाह, और government, but भी to such diverse subjects as अपराधों, education, the परिवार, विधि, राजनीती, धर्म, social संस्थानों, युद्ध, and विज्ञान.
at the turn of the 21st सदी, the expanding domain of अर्थशास्त्र in the सोशल sciences has महरूम वर्णित as आर्थिक साम्राज्यवाद.
An increasing number of economists have called for increased जोर on पर्यावरणीय sustainability ; this क्षेत्रफल of research is known as Ecological economics.
This is a सूची of Schedule IV drugs अंतर्गत the नियंत्रित Substances Act लिये the United States.
Required निष्कर्षों for drugs to be placed in this schedule:
The ड्रग or अन्य पदार्थ has a low potential लिये abuse relative to the drugs or अन्य substances in schedule iii.
The drug or अन्य पदार्थ has a फिलहाल accepted medical use in treatment in the संयुक्त States.
गाली of the drug or अन्य पदार्थ may lead to सीमित शारीरिक dependence or psychological dependence relative to the दवाएँ or अन्य substances in schedule iii.
The पूरा सूची of अनुसूची iv drugs हैं as follows.
the Administrative Controlled Substances कोड क्रमांक for each ड्रग is included.
US county household मध्य आय 2009.
Median us household आय, 2001-2011
Household income is a measure commonly used by the United राज्य government and निजी संस्थानों.
Each household is measured by the income of प्रत्येक resident over the आयु of 15.
Income शामिल wages and salaries, unemployment बीमे, विकलांगता भुगतान, चाइल्ड support भुगतान प्राप्त, नियमित rental receipts, as well as any personal कारोबार, निवेश, or अन्य kinds of income प्राप्त routinely.
जबकि inflation-adjusted ( `` real '' ) household आय था महरूम increasing almost प्रत्येक साल इससे 1945 to 1999, it has since been flat and even decreased recently.
U.S. मध्य household income fell इससे $ 51,144 in 2010 to $ 50,502 in 2011.
चरम गरीबी in the United States, अर्थ households जीना on less than $ 2 per day before government benefits, doubled इससे 1996 to 1.5 million households in 2011, सहित 2.8 लाख children.
the residents of the household do not have to be related to the सिर of the household लिये उनके आय to be considered भाग of the household 's income.
As households tend to share a similar economic context, the use of household आय remains among the सबसे widely स्वीकृत measures of income.
That the size of a household is not commonly लिया into account in such measures may विकृत कोई विश्लेषण of fluctuations within or among the household income categories, and may render सीधा comparisons between quintiles difficult or भी नामुमकिन.
The बीतने rate is defined as the rate of घटी with height for an वायुमंडलीय variable.
The variable शामिल is temperature जबतक specified वरना.
the terminology arises from the word बीतने in the भाव of a घटी or मनाही.
While सबसे often applied to धरती 's atmosphere the concept can be extended to any gravitationally supported ball of gas.

it portrays निश्चित पहलुओं of American विश्वविद्यालयों जीवन, सहित फ़ुटबॉल, sex, binge पीने, drugs, wild partying, और hazing.

ठहराना Inc., formerly Apple Computer, Inc., is an American multinational corporation headquartered in cupertino, कैलिफ़ोर्निया कि designs, develops, और sells उपभोक्ता electronics, कंप्यूटर तन्त्र and personal computers.
इसके best-known हार्डवेयर products हैं the मैक लकीर of computers, the iPod म्यूज़िक player, the iphone smartphone, and the ipad टैब्लेट कंप्यूटर.
Its software शामिल the os X and iOS ऑपरेटिंग प्रणालियों, the iTunes media browser, the Safari web ब्राउजर, और the ilife और iWork creativity and production suites.
The कम्पनी was founded on April 1, 1976, और incorporated as Apple Computer, inc. on जनवरी 3, 1977.
The word `` कंप्यूटर '' थी removed from its नाम on जनवरी 9, 2007, reflecting इसके shifted फ़ोकस towards consumer इलेक्ट्रॉनिक्स बाद the परिचय of the iphone.
Apple is the संसार 's second-largest सूचना प्रौद्योगिकी company by आय after samsung Electronics, and the world 's third-largest मोबाईल फोन मेकर after samsung और नोकिया.
सौभाग्य magazine नामित Apple the most admired कम्पनी in the संयुक्त States in 2008, and in the world from 2008 to 2012.
However, the कम्पनी has प्राप्त criticism for its ठेकेदारों ' labor practices, and लिये Apple 's अपना environmental and business practices.
, Apple maintains 394 retail stores in fourteen countries as well as the ऑनलाइन Apple Store and iTunes Store.
it is the second-largest सरेआम traded corporation in the world by मार्केट capitalization, साथ an estimated मान of US $ 414 billion as of जनवरी 2013.
, the कम्पनी had 72,800 स्थाई full-time कर्मचारी and 3,300 temporary full-time कर्मचारी worldwide.
Its worldwide सालाना आय in 2012 totalled $ 156 अरब.
Section 8 housing in the दक्षिण bronx
Section 8 of the Housing अधिनियम of 1937 ( ), often simply known as खण्ड 8, as repeatedly amended, authorizes the payment of rental housing सहायता to private landlords on निमित्त of लगभग 3.1 million low-income households.
It operates through अनेक कार्यक्रम, the largest of which, the आवास चुनाव Voucher कार्यक्रम, pays a विशाल portion of the rents and utilities of परिचय 2.1 लाख households.
The US Department of Housing and Urban Development manages the खण्ड 8 कार्यक्रम.
the Housing चुनाव वाउचर Program provides `` tenant-based '' rental सहायता, so a किरायेदार can move from one unit of at least न्यूनतम housing quality to another.
It भी allows individuals to apply their monthly वाउचर towards the purchase of a home, साथ over $ 17 billion going towards such purchases each साल ( from ncsha.org analysis ).
The अधिकतम अनुमत वाउचर is $ 2200 a month.
Section 8 भी authorizes a variety of `` project-based '' rental assistance programs, अंतर्गत जिससे the owner reserves कुछ or all of the units in a building लिये low-income किरायेदारों, in return for a संघीय government guarantee to make up the difference between the किरायेदार 's contribution and the rent लिये 1 cent in the owner 's contract with the सरकारी.
A किरायेदार who leaves a subsidized project होगा खोना अभिगम to the project-based subsidy.
the United राज्य Department of आवास और Urban विकास and संयुक्त States Department of Veterans Affairs have a special Section 8 program पुकारा VASH ( Veterans अफेयर्स supportive आवास ), or hud-vash, जिससे gives आउट a certain क्रमांक of Section 8 vouchers to योग्य बेघर and otherwise vulnerable us armed forces veterans.
रेस्तरां categorized by type और information about these different types.
